[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]lam gsum khongs/_/mdzes byed rgyan gyi dam pa bskal pa brgyar/_/brtan pa'i cho ga rab rdzogs rgyal tshab tu/_/rim par byon rnams skye ba gtan gyi skyabs/_34_/[(*]phyag bya ba'i sgo nyer bdun pa dpe rgyan las chos dpe/[)]'jal byed dpyad pa gsum dang man ngag gis/_/gzhal bya dam pa'i chos

[\[7a.3\]]drang por 'bigs la 'jigs med grub pa'i rtags/_/bsgrigs legs phreng du bstar ba 'dren byed dpyid/_36_/[(*]phyag bya ba'i sgo nyer dgu pa mtshungs pa gsal byed las gzhung gis dngos su zin pa'i 'gog pa dang dgod sgra can/[)]'chad rtsod rtsom la mi 'jigs ngagaM gi dbaMng*/_/grub mthus bloM gsal bye ba'i snyems pa 'gog_/gsar rnying grub pa'i 
[\[7a.4\]]srol bzang ris med pas/_/rgya mtsho'i gos can nye 'khon med la dgod/_37bcu phrag grangs su rdzogs pa rig pa'i srog_/'chi med rtag par sgrub pa'i phrin las ni/_/phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[7a.5\]]kun du bkod pa yis/_/thub bstan rab tu gsal byed khyod rmad byung*/_38_/[(]phyag bya ba'i sgo gsum cu pa skyed byed kyi rgyu/[) ]khyad par bdag blo rab rmongs rdo ba'i khams/_/rang bzhin mnyen par bcos su med na yang*/_/rig gnas rgya mtsho'i nang du drangs pa'i drin/_/bsam kyin dad 
[\[7a.6\]]pa'i ba spu gcig tu phyogs/_39_/[(*]phyag bya ba'i sgo so gcig pa yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]gzhan yang gsar rnying bka' dang zab gter gyi/_/[(]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]srol chen 'byed pa'i thugs rje'i dar bab mas/_/bstan 'gro'i dge legs yid gcugs mdza' na bo/_/'gugs byed phyag bgyir 'os pa kun la dad/_40_/[(*]'di nas brtsams te ljongasa'adir thugs rje lhag par che ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la bsngags pa rab spel/[)]mi 'gyur bde pa'i 
[\[7a.7\]]thang chen stong pa nyid/_/yang dag rtogs pa'i rgyal po mngon gyur kyang*/_/ngo mtshar mdzad pas ma hA b+ho Ta'i ljongs/_/phan pa sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus bran ltar bzang*/_41_/[(]mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]byams pa'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rtsa brtan snying rje'i yal ga rgyas/_/kun dga' ster ba'i yon tan me tog bkra/_/sku gsum 'bras bu smin pa'i dpag bsam shing*/_/bkra shis grib ma snum ldan kun la 'bebs/_42_/se na shu b+har grags pa'i rgyal po'i khab/_/rgyal ba gnyis pa'i lugs 
[\[7b.2\]]bzang nor bu'i tog_/dpal dang mchog gi 'byung gnas dam pa des/_/bshad sgrub rgyal mtshan rtse na brtan par byas/_43_/[(*]sbyar ba'i dpe/[)]rang gzhan grub pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams kyi/_/[(]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]pha mtha' la son 'bras bu phyogs kun las/_/rnam par 
[\[7b.3\]]rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi bkra shis dbyangs/_/dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa bas kyang snyan/_44_/shin tu dar byas kho ra khor yug tu/_/rdzogs sangaMs rgyasaM kyi zhal lung dri ma med/_/lung rtogs yon tan phunaM sum tshogaMs 'dzin las/_/byung ba'i 'chad 
[\[7b.4\]]rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las rgyun/_45_/[(*]rab spel/[)]srid zhi'i mtha' chen 'gongs pa'i mya ngan las/_/[(]bya ba brjod pa thog ma'i gsal byed/[)]'das par kun du bzaMng bzhin dbang gyur kyang*/_/ris bral 'gro ba mang poM'i bran nyid du/_/dam bcas 'bras bu ngur smrig rgyal mtshan bzung*/_46_/zab 
[\[7b.5\](*]mtshungs pa gsal byed las mtshan nyid mthun sgra can/[)]rgyas gdams pas rgyags pa'i mgrin pa las/_/rtag par bkra shis byed pa'i chos kyi glu/_/rtsol med lhun gyis grub par 'jo ba la/_/dbyangs mchog rdo rje chos dang mtshan nyid mthun/_47_/[(*]las kyi rgyu las rnam 'gyur gyi rgyu/[)]dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi gsang ba gsum/_/blo dman 
[\[7b.6\]]mos par 'tsham pa'i sgyu 'phrul gzugs/_/kun mkhyen choMs kyi rgyal srid skyoMng ba la/_/sde snod smra ba yongs kyi gtsug na mtho/_48_/[(*]mdzes pa'i yon tan gtam la sbyar ba/[)]lha mchog ngag gi dbaMng phyug dpal gyi mgur/_/rjes su chags 
[\[7b.7\]]pas blo ldan kunaM dgaM' brgya/_/skyed byed legs pa'i lam ston thun mong mchog_/zung gi dngos grub 'byungaM gnaMs rmad du byung*/_49_/[(]rab spel/[)]lung rtogs chos kyi tshul la sbyangs pa'i thugs/_/mkha' ltar yangs pa'i rnam 'gyur 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ci 'dod kyi/_/legs bshad 'dzad du med pa 'byung ba'i gnas/_/lnga rig bstan pa'i snang byed bla na med/_50_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]byang chub mchog tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sras/_/lnga rig gzhung gi brjod 
[\[8a.2\]]bya ma lus pa/_/snyan dngags dam pa'i glu ru len la dpa'/_51_/[(*]rig byed gtam dang sbyar ba'i bsdus dang ma bsdus 'gres pa'i gzugs can/[)]brtse chen kun dga' snying po'i lung rtogs kyi/_/chos tshul lam gsum sgrib pa sbyong ba'i rgyun/_/mang thos skal ldan shing rta'i dka' spyad kyis/_/mi nub rtag tu 'phel ba'i 
[\[8a.3\]]cho ga bsgrubs/_52_/[(*]skyod byed 'grub pa'i rgyu/[)]chos kyi bkra shis dam pa 'jig rten 'di'i/_/rgyan du brtan pa'i cho ga rig pa'i gzhung*/_/rab 'byams legs par smra ba'i ngo mtshar gyis/_/ngag gi dbaMng phyug dgyes pa'i 'dzum mang ston/_53_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]sangs 
[\[8a.4\]]rgyas gang+gA klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/byin rlabs nus pa rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes/_/song ba sngags kyi spyod pas rang dbang du/_/grub pa'i yon tan phung po bsam las 'das/_54_/[(*]'di nas brtsams te sde dge'i gdung rabs bstan pa la sku drin che ba rnams la bsngags pa'i thog mar dngos po'i dpes brling ba'i mchog gi nges bstan/[)]'khrul snang rang sar dag pa'i rang rig par/_/dus gsum dngos po 
[\[8a.5\]]sgrib med bkra ba yi/_/mtshon phyir grub pa'i mtshan ma kun dga'i dpyid/_/ci yang ngom pa yon tan rgyaM mtsho bzhin/_55_/[(*]mtha' dag gi gzugs can/[)]ris bral byams pa'i btung ba ngoms med du/_/bsten pas stobs 
[\[8a.6\]]kyi shugs 'chang sa srung dbang*/_/sde bzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i skyed mos tshal/_/dge ba'i gom stabs lhod po cir yang bsgyur/_56_/[(*]dgag pa'i dpe/[)]gang gis bsgrun min dpung pas sa yi steng*/_/rang dbang byed par mtshungs kyang pad dkar mig_/'tshe 
[\[8a.7\]]ba chos su 'doms phyir sangs rgyas kyi/_/bstan pa'i dpal gyur khyod las shin tu dman/_57_/[(]khyad par la gnas pa'i do[)(]nan bkod pa/[)]bsod nams phun sum tshogs 'dod sa bdag gi_/las ni sems can thams cad bde ba'i rgyu/_/bdag don bor ba rgyal 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ba'i myu gu rnams/_/gzhan phan min pa'i bsgrub bya cang srid dam/_58_/[(*]rnam 'gyur gyi rgyu/[)]gzhan yang snying stobs rab brling spyod pa yis/_/rgyal bstan bla nas bla mar 'degs pa'i ched/_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' sa skyong du/_/brdzus pa'i bsngags 'os kun la gus btud 
[\[8b.2\]]nas/_59_/[(*]'di nas brtsams te dngos po nges par bstan pa'i dang po rigs pa rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]gang zhig thos na yon tan kun gyi ma/_/dkon mchog dam pa'i chos la dad gsum gyi/_/rtsa ba brtan pa'i rang bzhin bdud las bzhis/_/gzhom du med pa thog mar dge ba'i chos/_60_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]legs par thos pa'i ma mas bskyed bsrings pa'i/_/
[\[8b.3\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i bu mo mig yangs mas/_/dpyad na mi bslu nges pas dga' ba'i grogs/_/gsar du thob pa bar du dge ba'i chos/_61_/[(*]yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]bsams byung mthu yi sor mos yid gnyis mdud/_/
[\[8b.4\]]yongs su bkrol te rtse gcig mnyam bzhag pas/_/brjod bya'i snying po ji bzhin rtogs pa'i blo/_/rnam par rgyas de tha mar dge ba'i chos/_62_/[(*]rigs mthun ldog pa can la rab rtog gis brling ba/[)]gang des dben pa'i sngo bsangs mun pa che/_/nyin mtshan mgon po zung gis ma phrogs shing*/_/
[\[8b.5\]]g.yo thabs stong gis bslu bar ma nus par/_/brtse med snying nas bzung snyam bgyid pa de/_63_/[(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]snang ba dam pas yongs su bsal slad du/_/byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed smon pa'i stobs/_/gzhan la khyad par gyur pa'i 'phrin dang po/_/mu 
[\[8b.6\]]med rgyal bas bsgrags pa shAkya'i sras/_64_/[(*]bsam pa rgya che ba/[)]dga' bar ldan pa'i yid bzang grangs med dbus/_/theg chen chos kyi gtong phod mi dman yang*/_/smon bya'i snying po rjes su dran pa'i gar/_/'dzam gling 'dzin ma'i do ra yangs par bsgyur/_65_/[(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can rig byed kyi gtam la sbyar ba/[)]de na 
[\[8b.7\]]ngo mtshar sngon med rlabs kyi lce/_/srid pa gsum las 'das par glal ba yi/_/bsam yas legs par spyad pa'i chu gter las/_/byang chub bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i tshul chen bstan/_66_/[(*]rab spel/[)]khyad par bsod 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]nams brgya yi byed po des/_/yang yang legs par bkrus pa zla ba'i bzhin/_/mthong na mi mthun bral ba'i ya mtshan de/_/'jig rten kun du lham mer ngom pa bzhin/_67_/[(*]rab spel/[)]ban+d+hu dzI ba kA yi mchu sgros dang*/_/mu tig phreng ba dngar ba'i tshems bar nas/_/
[\[9a.2\]]glog 'gyu stong gi mnyen lcug sma 'bebs su/_/byed pa 'phrul gyi ro 'dzin cir yang bsgyur/_68_/[(*]rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]de tshe kun gyi rna lung 'bab pa'i gdangs/_/snyan dgu ma tshang med pa'i rgyud gcig las/_/tha dad rang rang skad du 'phos pa'am/_/byin gyis rlabs sam 
[\[9a.3\]]rjes su gnang ba'i bka'/_69[ (*]yon tan ma tshang ba'i khyad par brjod pa/[)]/srid pa gsum gyi kun rtog sngo bsangs ma'i/_/dpung pa bag chags bcas las 'das gyur kyang*/_/sems can sna tshogs mos pa'i rgyun phyogs su/_/gzhol zhing babs pa'i rnam grangs bsam 
[\[9a.4\]]mi khyab/_70_/[(*]rab spel/[)]tshig don lang tsho dar bab bka' gang dag_/ji snyed 'dzin dang sdud byed gzungs kyi sgo/_/dbang thob mang pos slad 'byin bsdus pa dang*/_/yi ger bris pa'i glegs bam bgrang du med/_71_/[(*]rig byed kyi gtam la sbyar ba'i ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]bka' lung dri med shel gyi khang pa'i ngos/_/
[\[9a.5\]]drang dang nges pa'i gzugs dang gzugs brnyan gyi/_/ltad mo mtshar du dngar ba'i khyad par dag_/tshul bzhin dpyod pa'i rgyal po rnam mang gis/_72_/[(*]mang ba'i dpe/[)]rgya chen sdud dang zab mo rnam par 'byed/_/dkrugs pa sdebs phyir byas pa'i 
[\[9a.6\]]bstan bcos grangs/_/bskal pa'i char dang dbyig 'dzin ma yi rdul/_/chu gter thigs pa'i rjes su rkang pa 'jog_73_/[(*]sems med rab rtog[)]'on te bka' don legs par bshad nga ni/_/rang dga'i tshig don 'dre na mi rung zhes/_/'phags yul gdod nas grub pa'i skad 
[\[9a.7\]]rigs kyi/_/lkog na sbas pa'i brtul zhugs bzung ngam snyam/_74_/[(]rab rtog[)]de tshe mkhas pa'i tshogs dang lo tsA ba/_/rgyal chen rnams kyi rtsom pa rmad byung dang*/_/thub pa'i lung bstan rtse dga' dran che bas/_/gangs can brda yi lam du brgyud cing byon/_75_/
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gang tshe legs par gsungs dang dgongs 'grel zhes/_/mtshan gyi gling bu gang du snyan pa der/_/mtha' 'khob ming gi dud mo bskal pa yi/_/pha rol la yang gnas pa'i go sa phrogs/_76_/[(*]yan lag can gyi gzugs can/[)]gzhi lam 'bras bu'i ltad mo bkrag po che/_/'gog byed sgrib gsum gnyen 
[\[9b.2\](]rgyu'i rgyan las rig pa'i rgyu/[)]po bla na med/_/snang ba mi zad mdzod kyi nyi ma 'di/_/thob pa'i 'jig rten skal ba mi dman grang*/_77_/[(*]sbyar ba'i 'gog pa/[)]mthong chos slad ma'i gnas skabs mthar thug gi_/'thob bya yid 'ong nges par 'byin pa'i dpyid/_/dam chos yongs 'du'i 
[\[9b.3\]]dbang po 'di yod bzhin/_/dpag bsam rkang 'thung phal la re ba lhod/_78_/[(*]rmad byung gi dpe/[)]gang zhig thob na gnas skabs 'dod pa dgu/_/rtog med char du bsnyil ba yid bzhin nor/_/byang chub gsum gyi 'bras bu 'byin nus na/_/'chos skyob yon tan ldan pa'i 
[\[9b.4\]]rjes su snyegs/79_/[(*]chos dpe la gzugs can gyis sba ba/[)]gang 'di yi ge'i ris su 'dri ba dang*/_/klog pa la sogs legs byas re re'i mtha'/_/mkha' bzhin gzhal du med pa'i lung gi rnga/_/bden dpang tshad ma de bzhin gshegs pas bskul/_80_/[(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]dam pa'i zhal lung bdud rtsi 'jig rten 
[\[9b.5\]]na/_/yun du gnas pa'i rtse dgas byang chub kyi/_/lang tsho mchog tu bdo bar 'dod pa'i las/_/klog spong las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum/_81_/[(*]rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]de ni brjod bya bden pa zung gi gnas/_/ma nor legs par 'doms pa'i tshogs pa 
[\[9b.6\]]gsum/_/'dus pa'i rang bzhin tshad mar gyur pa'i lung*/_/glegs bam phreng du dngar ba 'di la rag_82_/[(*]bzhi ga'i thog mar yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]tshul chen 'di dag don dang ma 'brel ba'i/_/tshul lugs smra ba'i mgrin pa dpang mtho yang*/_/tshul min mun pa 'dom gyis 'jal ba 
[\[9b.7\]]bzhin/_/tshul bzhin rig pa'i mdun sar khrel ba'i rgyu/_83_/[(*]smad pa'i dpe/[)]de sogs bsam gyis mi khyab dgos pa dang*/_/phan 'dogs yon tan che ba'i rigs pa lung*/_/mi zad tshangs pa'i bu mo'i rgyud mang gi_/dpal yang nyung ngur byed 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]pa'i glu dag gis/84_/[(*]'byung min gyi dpe/[)]rings par bsu bas sngon med 'dzum gyi rlabs/_/nya rgyas zla ba 'bum phrag bzhu ba'i tshon/_/bzhin la byugs pa bzhin du sa la spyod/_/sras bcas spro ba mchog gi rtse mor phyin/_85_/[(*]sh+lau ka gnyis ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]grangs med skye bar bsags pa'i 
[\[10a.2\]]legs byas kyis/_/mngon mtho mi bdag chen po'i zhabs zung gi_/'khor lo'i yan lag ldan pa khyo shug dag_/gdub sil mgrin pa'i rdza rnga 'khrol ba can/_86_/khengs ldan phyogs kyi sa 'dzin bye ba yi/_/thor tshugs dbang 
[\[10a.3\]]sngon zhun ma 'khyil ba'i rdzing*/_/rgyan phreng pad+ma kun nas dgod pa der/_/ngal bsor spyod pa'i dbang phyug mi yi lha/_87_/[(*]rigs brjod pa bar gyi gsal byed/[)]kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/_/phan pa bgyis pa zla med mi yi lha/_/lus can tshe ring sgrub pa'i rig byed sogs/_/gtsug lag 
[\[10a.4\]]lugs brgya mkhyen pa'i dbang phyug dang*/_88_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can la rab rtog gis sba ba/[)]skye dgu yongs kyi bsod nams khang pa ru/_/snga na med pa'i bde skyid snying gi mdza'/_/'gugs phyir lha brgya'i mgon po mig stong can/_/dbang gi las grub mi bdag rdzu 'phrul zhugs/_89_/
[\[10a.5\](*]sgras zin mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can las gcig gi ldog pa can/[)]gtsug lag kun la blo gros rnam gsal zhing*/_/grags snyan rgya mtsho'i ska rags can mdzes pa'i/_/smra mkhas de ni dge dbang dang mtshungs mod/_/'byed byed tshangs par spyod pa'i brtul zhugs yod/_90_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]'jig rten stobs kyis 
[\[10a.6\]]dregs pa bye ba brgya'i/_/gtsug rgyan nor bu'i khri 'phang ga la bar/_/shin tu brling bar ngal bsor spyod pa'i dbang*/_/las shugs btsan pos bskur ba'i bla ma che/_91_/[(*]rab spel gyi rgyan/[)]kun du dga' bskyed yid gcugs 
[\[10a.7\]]rgyal ba'i sras/_/rnam 'dren bstan pa skyong la spro ba'i rlabs/_/srid pa'i rtse mor lung snyam chos srid kyi/_/phrin las rgya mtsho'i gos can khyab pa'i sde/_92_/[(]skyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu/[)]gang dag sngon gyi thugs bskyed rgya chen mas/_/byang chub spyod par spyad pa'i smon lam 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]dbyangs/_/brjod bya bzang po'i ro ldan blangs pa yi/_/'bras bu tshe 'di'i grogs su nye bar lhags/_93_/[(*]shes byed kyi sgyu las nang shes byed/[)]snying stobs che dgu kun gyis ma spobs shing*/_/stobs 'byor mang po'i 'dzum gyis ma khugs pa'i/_/bgyi ba 'di la me tog gzhu can yang*/_/bslu bar ma 
[\[10b.2\]]bzod pham pa'i grags pa byung*/_94_/[(*]rkang pas bskor ba'i rjes khrid/[)]rgyal sras snying stobs ldan pas bsgrubs na sngon/_/brgya phrag bcu rdzogs mig gis ma mthong zhing*/_/brgyad ldan rna ba bas kyang ma thos pa'i/_/rgya chen rtsom pa kun la dka' ba ci/_95_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[10b.3\]]nyi ma'i gnyen dpal gyi/_/bka' lung spyi dang bye brag dgongs pa'i don/_/rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i/_/skad kyi lam du legs par 'gyur ro 'tshal/_96[(*]yan lag can gyi gzugs can/[)]kun gyi chos sbyin ji srid bskal pa'i bar/_/
[\[10b.4\]]rgyun mi chad pa'i 'byung gnas par zhes pa/_/ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi+i phyi mo rdzogs ldan gyi/_/bskal pa'i bsod nams sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs/_97_/[(*]rkang pa dang po dang tha mar yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]rgyal dang de yi sras rnams 'jig rten na/_/'byon dang bzhugs dang mdzad pa mang ston 
[\[10b.5\]]yang*/_/sgrib pa bag chags bcas pa dpyis 'byin la/_/rgyal gsung dam pa'i chos las gzhan yod min/_98_/[(*]de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/[)]zang zing srid pa'i rtser mnyam gtogs pa de/_/sbyin chen ma yin chos sbyin 'di kho na/_/gnas skabs dbul ba bcom de phan chen 
[\[10b.6\]]nyid/_/ma yin gtan du phan 'dogs bsgrubs 'di'o/_99_/[(*] cha shas gzugs can/[)]gzhan la sman byed byang chub sems mchog gi_/bcud kyis len pas snying stobs phrag pa dag_/shin tu brling byas bstan pa'i khur gyi dbyig_/'degs par las kyi gnam bskos 
[\[10b.7\]]bla ma che/_100_/[(*]khyad 'phags phul byung*/[)]gang drin gal te gsob 'dod stong gsum gyi/_/snod 'di bum pa brgya skyes dngos po yis/_/yongs su lud pa nyid du gtams bzod kyang*/_/stong gi char yang 'tshob par mi 'gyur snyam/_101_/legs byas rgya 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]chen gang las brtsams pa'i gtam/_/cung zad mnyan par 'dun pa'i blo can dag_/ngo mtshar chu gter yongs su 'phel bgyid pa'i/_/legs bshad zla ba gsar pa 'di na ngom/_102_/kun mkhyen nyi ma'i rtsa lag sras bcas kyi/_/
[\[11a.2\](]bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]rjes su slob par 'dun rnams brtse ba yis/_/legs par gdams pa'i tshul chen sbyin pa'i rnga/_/rgya chen brdungs pa'i tshul 'dir dga' bas nyon/_103_/zhes pa ste/[ (]cha shas can gyi gzugs can/[)]de'ang 'phags pa'i yul gyi smra ba'i dbang 
[\[11a.3\]]phyug chen po dpal ldan daN+DIs/_shis brjod phyag bya dngos po ni/_/nges par bstan pa'ang de yi sgo/_/zhes dang*/_sa skya paN+Di ta chen pos/_bstan bcos rtsom pa'i dam pa yi/_/ston pa la ni mchod brjod bya/_/bstan pa spel phyir dag pa'i tshig_/'di la 
[\[11a.4\]]'thad pa bzang po snang*/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_sngon byon mkhas pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i 'dun pas/_dbyangs kyi rgyal mo'i tam+bu ra'i rgyud las 'phos pa'i 'gyur khugs snyan pa'i dpal las yang dag par drangs pa'i tshig rgyan 
[\[11a.5\]]gyi phreng ba dag gis mchod par brjod par bya ba yang*/_'phags pa bskal pa bzang po las/_de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po ni/_/snyan dngags mkhan tshe bde gshegs rtsa mchog la/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas kyang*/_/dang 
[\[11a.6\]]por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar/_'dir yul mchog tu gyur pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan gyi cha shas las nye bar drangs pa'i mchod par brjod pa dang*/_dngos po nges par bstan pa'i 
[\[11a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa bcu phrag bcu la gsum gyis nye bar lhags pa sngon du 'gro bas lam yangs por byas nas/_skabs su bab pa'i gleng bar bya ba nyid ni 'di ltar slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis/_mdo don che ba nyid thos nas/_/nyan pa dang ni 'dzin pa la/_/nyan pa po ni gus 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]byed pas/_/thog mar dgos pa brjod par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_sgron ma'i bskal pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i 'chi ba med pa'i lam du/_gang dag byon pa dang 'byon par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi snang byed chen po stong phrag gcig gam 
[\[11b.2\]]stong dang lnga 'byung bar lung bstan pa las/_byang chub kyi mchog tu thugs bskyed cing*/_zhing bzung ba'i tshe na gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa'i bram ze'i rig byed slob pa stong rtsa bzhi po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i spyan sngar sems bskyed cing zhing bzung yang*/_
[\[11b.3\]]de dag gis spangs par gyur pa'i rtsod dus kyi sems can rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du gyur pa na/_bde ba dang*/_dbang phyug dang*/_rigs dang*/_gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing ser sna can du gyur te/_tshe dang*/_las dang*/_sems can dang*/_lta ba dang*/_nyon 
[\[11b.4\]]mongs pa ste snyigs ma lnga'i mun par gyur pa'i sems can 'dod chags bdo ba/_zhe sdang bdo ba/_gti mug bdo ba/_nga rgyal bdo ba/_sdig pa dang phrag dog dang ser sna bdo ba/_chos ma lags par 'dod chags kyis chags pa/_chos ma lags pa'i longs spyod 
[\[11b.5\]]tshol ba/_log par lta ba/_phyin ci log tu mthong ba/_'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyi ba/_bsod nams ma lags pa bsags pa/_'jig 
[\[11b.6\]]rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/_bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mi brtson pa la sogs pa zhing ma dag pa mi mjed zhing gi sems can shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams la thugs brtses lhag par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang smon lam gyi chu 
[\[11b.7\]]gter chen po shin tu zab cing gting dpog par dka' ba lnga brgya btab ste bden pa'i stobs brjod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos legs so bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dngos po phul du byung ba rnam pa bzhi dang ldan zhing*/_le lo'i dngos po bzhi yongs su bor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po lta bu'o zhes rgya cher bsngags shing bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi pa nyid 
[\[12a.2\]]du lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag skyes su stsal ba dang*/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu mang pos mngon par mchod pa la sogs pa'i ngo mtshar gtam gyi phung po gang de lha dang mi'i 
[\[12a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams na snyan dngags smra ba'i dbang po ji snyed pa de snyed kyis rjod par byed pa'i gling bu dam pa bye ba phrag brgyas bskal pa nas bskal pa'i phreng bar bsngags kyang mur thug pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gcig pu/_bdag cag gi ston pa bla na med pa 
[\[12a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i nyin mor byed pa chen po/_ris su ma chad pa'i sems can thams cad la sman pa'i thugs rje chen po'i bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor phyogs thams cad nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can te/_'di 
[\[12a.5\]]ltar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang*/_drag po dang*/_sred med kyi bu dang*/_mig stong ldan pa dang*/_nam mkha' lding dang*/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po dang*/_gdengs can dbang po dang*/_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i go sar che zhing che bar rlom 
[\[12a.6\]]pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od zer stong gi drwa bas mngon par dkrigs pa/_lha dang mi las khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyan gyi rnam pa mang pos nye bar spud pa'i ral pa'i do ker gyi rtse mo dag gis lan cig min par yang nas yang du btud par byas pa/_gang gi zhabs 
[\[12a.7\]]sen rin po che'i pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog gi dpal la lan brgyar 'khu ba'i lam nas nye bar 'phos pa'i rdul gyi zegs ma re re yang*/_ji srid legs byas rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son par ma gyur pa de srid du thob par dka' ba de nyid kyis/_snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can las 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dang nyon mongs pa'i kun 'byung gi dba' rlabs kyi shugs drag po rgyun mi chad par g.yo bas rang dbang med par bskyod cing*/_brnag par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal gyi zug rngu rnam pa gsum mam brgyad kyi gdung ba shin tu bzod brlag med pa'i chu srin chen pos yongs su 
[\[12b.2\]]gang ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po mtha' med pa rnams su bying ba dag la nye bar gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang de las thar bar bya ba'i thabs kyi sgo mang po phyogs du ma nas dbye ba'i phyir/_dpal gyi mgur/_dung gi tshems bar nas 'phrul gyi ljags brkyangs te/_
[\[12b.3\]]tshangs pa'i dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i gdangs su bsgyur nas chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa bskor te dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams kun du snang bar bkye bas/_chu srin rgyal mtshan thogs pa sde dang bcas pa'i stobs dang 'byor pa ma lus pa 
[\[12b.4\]]stongs par byas/_sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i ling tog ni bsal/_ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs pa dang the tshom gyi drwa ba ni dral/_bdag tu lta ba'i 'ching ba dam po ni bkrol/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i kun 'byung gi 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun ni 
[\[12b.5\]]bzlog_/nga rgyal gyi brag ri mthon po ni bsnyil/_'dod chags kyi me dpung rab tu 'bar ba ni bcil/_zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po ni brtul/_sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum gyi dba' rlabs kyi lce zhags drag po gnam du 'phyo ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho ni zad pa'i mtha' can du 
[\[12b.6\]]byas/_mtha' yas pa'i gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag rang rang gi mos pa dang bag la nyal dang rjes su mthun par legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi phung po'i bgo skal zad mi shes par stsal ba'i sgo nas/_'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag bla na med pa'i 'byor pa phun 
[\[12b.7\]]sum tshogs pa'i khur gyis yongs su lci bar mdzad do/_/gzhan yang ston pa nyid kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal ba'i myu gu grangs med pa dag kyang byon nas kha cig gis ni bka' lung 'thor ba sdud pa dang slad 'byin pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sgo nas yang dag pa nyid du bsdus so/_/la las ni dgongs don phyin ci ma log pa nyid du bkral lo/_/la las ni gzhan la rgya cher yang dag pa nyid du bshad do/_/la las ni tshul bzhin du bsgrubs pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis chos shin 
[\[13a.2\]]tu dar zhing rgyas par mdzad pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'phrin yig dam pa'i zegs ma phra mo re yang mig gi dbang po'i longs su spyad par bya ba'i bgo skal du thob pa'am/_thos pa 'dzin pa'i snod kyi bu ga dag tu lhung bar gyur pa'am/_yid kyi rtsig ngos skyon med pa gang 
[\[13a.3\]]du rjes su sems pa'i pir gyi rtse mos 'dri bar byed pa gang dag gi rgyud la dad pa gsum gyi chu gter rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi mchog dam pa de dag gi bka' drin rjes su dran cing byas pa drin du gzo ba'i phyir dang*/_blo dang ldan 
[\[13a.4\]]pa'i skye bo gzhan dag la'ang 'dri ba dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_lung len pa dang*/_kha ton du byed pa dang*/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang*/_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher spel ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas/_rtag tu 'bad par bgyi 
[\[13a.5\]]pa'i snying po las kyang chos snying por gyur pa ni dam pa'i chos tshul rnam par dag pa 'di dag go zhes rjes su gdams shing nges par bya ba'i ched du thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can 
[\[13a.6\]]pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa zhes bya ba 
[\[13a.7\]]'di 'chad pa la/_bkra shis pa'i grangs kyis rnam par nges par bya ba ste/_de'ang yid ches bskyed pa'i ched du bstan pa gang las byung ba/_spro ba bskyed pa'i ched du bstan skyong rnams kyis bya ba byas pa/_bkral bya nges pa'i ched du dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par gzhag 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]pa/_'grel tshul nges pa'i ched du bstan bcos kun gyi rnam par gzhag pa/_bstan pa gnas pa'i ched du dgongs 'grel par du sgrub par bskul ba/_bskul ba mi ldog ched du ji ltar par du sgrub pa/_dgos don rtogs par sla phyir chos kyi bzhugs byang smos pa/_
[\[13b.2\]]brtsams pa don yod ched du dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba'o/_/dang po yid ches bskyed pa'i ched du bstan pa gang las byung ba brjod pa la gnyis te/_ston pa sangs rgyas ji ltar byon pa dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor ba'o/_/dang po la ston pa gang du byon pa'i zhing 
[\[13b.3\]]dang*/_der ji ltar byon pa dngos so/_/dang po la zhing spyir bshad pa dang*/_bye brag tu mi mjed kyi zhing ngos bzung ba'o/_/dang po la'ang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhing dang*/_sprul pa'i sku'i zhing gnyis las/_dang po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhing ni nges pa 
[\[13b.4\]]bzhi'am phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa gang du yod pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste/_bzhi ni ston pa dang*/_'khor dang*/_dus dang*/_chos phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la ston pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 
[\[13b.5\]]mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa'i bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o/_/'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa thob pa yan chad kyi yul du gyur pa ste/_sa dang po thob pa yan chad kyi yul du gyur pa la 'dod pa ni sprul pa'i sku 
[\[13b.6\]]khyad par can la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur btags par dbu ma pa chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis bshad pa ltar shes par bya'o/_/dus ni rgyun mi chad par gnas pa ste/_rtag pa brtan pa mchog tu yang zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/chos ni theg pa chen po'i chos 
[\[13b.7\]]zab pa dang rgya che ba'i longs spyod rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba ste/_de la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/de dag zhib tu bshad pa ni 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtso bor 'chad pa'i skabs yin pas rgyas par ma spros so/_/de lta bu'i nges pa 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bzhi'am phun sum tshogs pa bzhi gang la yod pa'i gnas de la stug po bkod pa'am 'og min zhes bya zhing*/_de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid bskal pa dpag tu 
[\[14a.2\]]med pa'i dus nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs pa'i gnas yin no/_/de ltar yang slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas 'chi bdag bslu ba'i rtog pa las/_dpal ldan stug po bkod pa nyid du don dam thugs chud cing*/_
[\[14a.3\]]dga' ldan skye bo'i don mdzad phyir na dam pa tog dkar gyur/_/de nas 'dir ni 'gro ba'i don du shAkya'i tog gyur gang*/_/'chi bdag las rgyal sgyu ma kun ston de ni rgyal gyur cig_/ces dang*/_lang+kar gshegs pa las/_gtsang ma'i rigs dag spangs pa yi/_/'og 
[\[14a.4\]]min zhes bya nyams dga' bar/_/yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/_/sprul pa rnams ni 'dir 'tshang rgya/_/zhes so/_/de la 'og min zhes bya ba'i don ni/_de nyid 'dus pa'i gleng gzhir bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs te 
[\[14a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i 'grel par/_'og min gyi lha zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i lha ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/de'i gnas ni thog mar sangs rgyas pa'i gnas so zhes slob dpon kun dga' snying pos bshad do/_/
[\[14a.6\]]de ltar bshad pa'i 'og min de la ngos 'dzin tshul mi 'dra ba 'ga' re 'byung ste/_bkas bcad bar par/_'og min ni gtsang ma'i gnas kyi logs shig na yod par bshad de/_de bzhin du kha cig gnas gtsang ma'i steng ma ni 'og min zhes bya ba yin la/_de dag 
[\[14a.7\]]spangs pa'i steng na dbang phyug chen po'i gnas gzhan 'og min zhes bya ba yod do zhes 'og min phal pa'i steng na yod par 'dod do/_/slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo la sogs pa mkhas pa phal che ba dag ni/_de ltar bzhed pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu yang 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]yin zhing longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/stug po bkod pa ni mi 'jig pa yin te/_rdo rje rtse mo las/_'og min stug po nyams dga' 'di/_/stug po'i zhing khams 'jig 
[\[14b.2\]]med pa/_/de na sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/_/rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di 'byung*/_/zhes ji skad bstan pa ltar yin no/_/de la'ang stug po'i zhing khams de'i khyad par ci lta bu zhig go snyam na/_slob dpon rtse mos/_sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo dang*/_de nyid 
[\[14b.3\]]'dus pa dang*/_dbang bskur ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas theg pa chen po thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa sgo bstun nas bshad pa ni/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nang du chud pa ni gzhi dang snying po me tog 
[\[14b.4\]]gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa nang du chud pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i phyag gi mthil 
[\[14b.5\]]gyi snying po la gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de ni stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 
[\[14b.6\]]gnas yin no zhes bzhed pa ltar ro/_/de'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes 'byung ba'i don de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba'i grangs kyis nges par bya ba'i phyir cung zad bshad na/_mngon pa mdzod las/_gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang*/_/ri rab dang ni 'dod lha 
[\[14b.7\]]dang*/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/_/stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod/_/de stong la ni stong gnyis pa/_/bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no/_/de stong la ni stong gsum mo/_/mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/_/zhes pa ltar rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas tshangs 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan dang po'i bar dang*/_phyi rol khor yug gi lcags ri'i mu khyud kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa la ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/de nyid gcig nas bgrangs pa'i stong du langs pa gang 
[\[15a.2\]]yin pa de la ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste mu khyud gcig gis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas bgrangs pa'i stong du langs pa gang yin pa de la ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste/_
[\[15a.3\]]mu khyud gcig gis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de yang gcig nas bgrangs pa'i stong du langs pa gang yin pa de la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste mu khyud gcig gis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[15a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya la ni rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba gcig go_/de bye ba phrag brgya la ni rab 'byams kyi rgyud gcig go_/de bye ba phrag brgya la ni rab 'byams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go_/de bye ba phrag brgya la ni me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i 
[\[15a.5\]]rgyan bkod pa gcig go_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo*/_/de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i phyag gi rdul phra rab gcig la gnas shing*/_de lta bu'i rnam 
[\[15a.6\]]par snang mdzad de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can no/_/tshul 'di dag ni dbu ma pa chos kyi bshes gnyen la sogs pa yongs su grags pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi bzhed pa mthun par 'byung ngo*/_/de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15a.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon gyi dus su byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa rnams su/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa yongs su dag par byas te/_bskal pa re re la'ang 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa'i drung du/_byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa'i smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i stobs las byung ba ste/_sangs rgyas phal po cher byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos/_gzhi rgyan 
[\[15b.2\]]me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de/_/rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te/_/rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan cad sangs rgyas kyi/_/drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pa dri med pas/_/rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing*/_/
[\[15b.3\]]zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas/_/sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na/_/'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de/_/'od snang btang ba nam mkha'i 
[\[15b.4\]]dkyil na gnas pa ni/_/rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste/_/nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du 'byung ngo*/_/de lta bu'i rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 
[\[15b.5\]]dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i zhing khams kyi yon tan dang tshad gzung du med pa ni 'phags pa kho na'i yul las gzhan du ma gyur pa ste/_nam mkha'i khams thams cad chos kyi sku'i zhing yin zhing*/_de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi sku rgya mtshos rgyas par gtams pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku'i zhing ni de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhing khams kyi nang gi dum bu thams cad dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ba spu'i khung bu re re na'ang sprul pa'i sku'i 
[\[15b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag mang po yod cing*/_de dag kyang gnas pa tha dad pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams su klas pa/_la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pa dang*/_la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang*/_la la ni sangs 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la gnas pa la sogs pa gnas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag yod de/_sangs rgyas phal po cher byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos/_zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i 
[\[16a.2\]]dbyings la gnas/_/snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to/_/de bzhin du dbyibs kyi rnam pa'ang sna tshogs pa dag tu yod de/_ji skad du/_dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/_/phyogs 
[\[16a.3\]]rnams kun nas zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang*/_/la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste/_/de dag la la phyogs nang gru bzhir gnas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lhun dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan du yod de/_ji skad du/_zhing 
[\[16a.4\]]gi rgya mtsho rnams la ni/_/rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas/_/rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra/_/rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas/_/la la 'od zer rang bzhin te/_/dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung*/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa dang*/_gzhan yang 
[\[16a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa dang*/_las dang*/_smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i stobs kyis rgyan yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste/_ji skad du/_zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya che mtha' yas te/_/rnam dag las kyis rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/_/phyogs 
[\[16a.6\]]bzhi zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang*/_/sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/_/kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams/_/rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun du 'byung*/_/rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin/_/sgra 'byin zhing 
[\[16a.7\]]gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams su klas pa de dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul yang sems can gyi mos pa'i bye brag ltar ram bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de/_la la ni chos 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston pa dang*/_la la ni sku tshe ring por ston pa dang*/_la la ni thung ngur ston pa dang*/_la las ni zhing mang po sbyangs pa dang*/_la las ni zhing nyung ngu sbyangs pa dang*/la las ni theg pa yang mang por ston pa dang*/_la las ni theg 
[\[16b.2\]]pa gcig tu ston pa dang*/_la las ni sems can ha cang mi mang ba 'dul ba dang*/_la las ni skad cig gcig la'ang mtha' yas pa 'dul bar ston pa la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra ba snyed du shes par bya dgos kyi byis pa so so skye bo'i blo las ring du 'das 
[\[16b.3\]]pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu zhen par bgyir mi btub pa nyid de/_ji skad du/_sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs/_/gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu/_/sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston 
[\[16b.4\]]la ltos/_/sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston/_/la las bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob/_/chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo/_/rab tu mdzes par 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs/_/la las zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag_/sbyangs shing 'byams 
[\[16b.5\]]klas phyogs bcu kun na yang*/_/la las zhing gcig rnam par sbyang bar mdzad/_/smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ngo*/_/don de dag la dgongs nas slob dpon chen po bsod nams rtse mos/_blo gros kyi rim 
[\[16b.6\]]pas kha cig la ni dzam+bu gling du sangs rgyas par snang ngo*/_/kha cig la ni gnas gtsang ma'i 'og tu sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa dag mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' kha cig la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi 
[\[16b.7\]]bye ba phrag brgyar sangs rgyas par mngon no/_/kha cig la ni gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag pa yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu ston par mdzad ces gsungs so/_/de dag kyang don dam par na 'phags pa 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]rnams kyi yul du sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig kyang ma yin la mang po yang ma yin pa dang*/_gcig dang tha dad pa gang du yang ma grub pa nyid de/_rgyan las/_zag med dbyings na sangs rgyas rnams/_/mkha' ltar lus ni med phyir 
[\[17a.2\]]dang*/_/sngon gyi lus rjes 'brangs pa'i phyir/_/gcig min mang po nyid ma yin/_/zhes dang*/_tha dad rigs don med phyir dang*/_/rdzogs dang tha ma med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas gcig min dri med gnas/_/tha dad min phyir mang po'ang min/_/
[\[17a.3\]]zhes so/_/gnyis pa bye brag tu mi mjed kyi zhing ngos bzung ba la/_dngos dang*/_dzam+bu'i gling bkar te bshad pa'o/_/dang po la mi mjed kyi zhing 'di gang du gnas pa ngos bzung ba ni/_ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i phyag gi mthil gyi 
[\[17a.4\]]rdul phra rab la gnas pa'i gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i zhing de'i khor yug chen po'i nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi dbus su/_spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma'i ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od mtha' 
[\[17a.5\]]yas pa gnas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo chen po bzhi'i gzhi la brten pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi shu brtsegs ma nyid du yod do/_/de dag kyang phreng ba bsdus pa lta bur gcig nas gcig tu brgyud mar ma yin par bar skabs rnams su'ang 'jig rten 
[\[17a.6\]]gyi khams bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis bar chod par byas pa dang bcas te gnas so/_/de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/_dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i 
[\[17a.7\]]mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus 
[\[17b.2\]]mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 
[\[17b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[17b.4\]]pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang*/_yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[17b.5\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na de 
[\[17b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[17b.7\]]so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ces bya ba 'di bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[18a.2\]]'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma 
[\[18a.3\]]med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 
[\[18a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang 
[\[18a.5\]]nam mkha' kun du snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 
[\[18a.6\]]bzhugs te chos ston pa'i zhing du bstan pa'i bar gyis rgyas par bstan to/_/de las bcu gsum pa mi mjed ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid yin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba/_
[\[18a.7\]]rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams dang ldan pa/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bzung ba/_pad+mo'i drwa ba la rab tu gnas so/_/mi mjed kyi zhing de na'ang ston pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so zhes mdo las 'byung ste/_de'ang 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]slob dpon bsod nams rtse mos/_des na blo rgya che chung gi dbye bas sna tshogs su snang ba ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes gsungs pa bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad 'di yang sprul pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas yin par gsal lo/_/de lta bu'i zhing de la mi mjed ces 
[\[18b.2\]]bya bar grags so/_/ci'i phyir de skad du grags she na/_mi mjed ces bya ba ni bzod pa'am sran thub pa'i ming yin te/_zhing de'i sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa dug gsum la mi mjed pa'i phyir/_mi mjed ces bya ba'i don du snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las 
[\[18b.3\]]bshad do/_/yang na zhing de na yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa brtan po la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par las te/_zhing de dag gi sems can mi srun pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas spyos pa dang bsdigs pa'i las kyis rnam 
[\[18b.4\]]par gtse bar byas kyang ji mi snyam par mi mjed pa'i phyir de skad ces bya ba'i don du yang bshad de/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang*/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i thog 
[\[18b.5\]]pa pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_bzod pa dang*/_dul ba dang*/_des pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/_de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spyos/_bsdigs/_mtshon gyis 
[\[18b.6\]]btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/_'dod chags dang*/_zhe sdang dang*/_gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so/_/rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces brjod do zhes bstan to/_/de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de bskal 
[\[18b.7\]]pa bzang po zhes bya bar yang grags te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bskal pa 'di dang po chags pa'i dus su rgya mtsho'i nang nas gser gyi pad+ma stong phrag gcig shar ba/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis brtags pas bskal pa 'di la 'dren pa stong 'byon pa'i ltas su shes nas/_e 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]ma bskal pa 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'o zhes ched du brjod pas de skad du grags pa'i don yang snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po las bshad do/_/de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba'i tshul snga ma ltar shes 
[\[19a.2\]]par bya zhing*/_de la gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji ltar gnas pa'i tshul rnams theg pa thun mong ba'i lugs su grags pa'i gtam las brtsams te mdo tsam brjod par bya'o/_/de'ang snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten mngon par 'grub pa'i rkyen ni/_der skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can 
[\[19a.3\]]rnams kyi las mthun par bsags pa'i mthu nyid kyis so/_/mngon par 'grub pa'i tshul dang tshad kyi nges pa rnams ni gzhan du shes par bya ba las 'dir ma spros so/_/ci'i phyir ma spros she na/_gong du ji skad bshad pa rnams dang*/_'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ba thams cad dang 'gros mtshungs su 
[\[19a.4\]]btang ba las/_'dir ha cang bshad pa lhag pa glo bur ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'degs par byed pa'i 'og gzhi ni 'jam pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngo skyar yod pa/_tshan po che'i rdo rjes kyang gzhig par mi nus 
[\[19a.5\]]pa shin tu 'thas pa nyid du gnas te/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed lta bu zhig rton par byed pa'i gzhi yin no/_/de'i steng du 'og gi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba chu'i phung po chen por gyur pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor de la brten te gnas so/_/de'ang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis/_ji ltar na chu de 
[\[19a.6\]]dag thad kar mi 'bo ba ni kha cig na re sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis te/_dper na bza' ba dang btung ba zos pa dang 'thung ba ma zhu ba long kar mi ltung ba bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/sde pa gzhan dag na re sbyang gi tshul du rlung gis 'dzin to zhes zer ro zhes gsungs so/_/chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[19a.7\]]steng du yang gser gyi sa gzhi zhes bya ba shin tu mi shigs pa gser gyi rang bzhin can du yod pa'o/_/sa gzhi de la ni khor yug ri bo'i bar gyi ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas pa rnams brten nas gnas te/_de'ang thams cad kyi dbus na ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab ces bya ba yod de/_de ni gru bzhi 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa'i rnam pa la bang rim bzhis mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i rang bzhin can te/_de ni shel dang*/_bai DUr+Ya dang*/_pad+ma rA ga dang*/_gser rnams kyi rgyu las ngos bzhi dag tu rim pa bzhin du grub pa yin no/_/de dag gi rkyen gyis bsgyur bas nam mkha' la'ang kha dog tha dad pa nyid du snang 
[\[19b.2\]]ba ste/_dzam+bu'i gling 'di yod pa'i logs kyi ngos ni bai DUr+Ya'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir/_de'i 'od kyis nam mkha' yang bai DUr+Ya'i kha dog tu shar ba bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i ri rab de'i chu mtshams nas 'og tu rnam par bcal ba'i ri bo'i khong seng rnams su lha ma yin gyi tshogs rten dang 
[\[19b.3\]]brten par bcas pa rnams yod do/_/de'ang 'di lta ste lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya ba dang*/_de bzhin du mgul phreng can dang*/_rab gnon dang*/_thag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris rnams rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te 'og nas 'og tu rim pa de ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so/_/ri rab kyi 
[\[19b.4\]]bang rim bzhi las bang rim dang po ni lag na gzhong thogs pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/bang rim gnyis pa ni lag na phreng thogs pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/bang rim gsum pa ni rtag myos pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas so/_/bang rim bzhi pa ni rgyal chen ris bzhir gtogs pa'i lha'i rigs 
[\[19b.5\]]mang po ste de dag rten dang brten par bcas pa rnams gnas so/_/ri rab kyi steng gi mtshams bzhi'i lcog chen po bzhi la ni gnod sbyin gsang ba pa rnams grong dang grong rdal du bcas pa gnas so/_/de'i dbus su sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas grong khyer lta na sdug ces bya ba 
[\[19b.6\]]yod cing*/_grong khyer de'i dbus su lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi pho brang rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang zhes bya ba bsod nams kyi mthu las grub pa/_phyi nang kun du ngo mtshar gyi bkod pa dpag tu med pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa dag yod do/_/de la'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes 
[\[19b.7\]]pa'i tha tshig kyang nor lha brgyad dang*/_drag po bcu gcig dang*/_tha skar gyi bu gnyis dang*/_nyi ma bcu gnyis te nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_de dag gi dbang po mchod sbyin brgya pa dang bcas pa'i lha'i gtso bo sum cu rtsa gsum yod pas de skad du grags so/_/grong khyer lta na sdug gi 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]phyogs bzhi na bzhon pa gnas pa'i shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang*/_g.yul du chas pa'i gnas rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshal dang*/_spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i gnas 'dres ma zhes bya ba'i tshal dang*/_rtse zhing rol pa'i gnas 
[\[20a.2\]]dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba rnams yod do/_/tshal de dag gi phyi rol du lha rnams kyis mngon par rtse bar byed pa'i gnas sa gzhi bzang po yid du 'ong ba rnam pa bzhi yang yod cing*/_lta na sdug gi grong khyer gyi byang shar mtshams su lha rnams kyi 'dod dgu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba'i 
[\[20a.3\]]gnas su gyur pa'i shing yongs 'du sa brtol dang*/_dar dkar po la ba lta bu'i rdo a mo lig ces bya ba la sogs pa dag yod do/_/lho nub kyi mtshams su lha rnams kyis bgyi bar rung ba dang bgyi bar rung ba ma yin pa rnams gtam du bgro ba'i lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba bkod 
[\[20a.4\]]pa phun tshogs mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar byas pa yod do/_/gzhan yang lha'i rnga bo che zhes bya ba lha rnams kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan la bag med par spyod pa na mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung bas skul bar byed pa dang*/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i shis par brjod pa la sogs 
[\[20a.5\]]pa'i sgra rang 'byung bar byed pa de dang*/_g.yul ngor spyod pa'i glang po che rab brtan dang*/_skyed mos tshal du spyod pa'i glang po che sa srung gi bu dang*/_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can te de dag rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas rnams so/_/lhun po'i phyi rol gyi khor 
[\[20a.6\]]yug kun du gser gyi ri bdun zhes bya ba rin po che gser gyi rdul 'ba' zhig brtsegs pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ri rab la rim pa bdun du gru bzhi pa'i dbyibs su bskor ba thams cad kyang gser gyi sa gzhi la brten te gnas so/_/de'i dang po ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi ri ste/_de'i byang phyogs kyi 
[\[20a.7\]]logs kyi steng na lcang lo can zhes bya ba'i pho brang yod de/_de na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dang*/_shar phyogs su yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba na rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dri za'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang*/_nub phyogs su sna tshogs gzugs 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]zhes bya ba na rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dang*/_lho phyogs su 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba na rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dang bcas pa rnams dang*/_de dag gi grong dang grong rdal dang*/_tshal gyi rnam pa dag gis 
[\[20b.2\]]mdzes par byas pa dag gnas so/_/de bzhin du gser gyi ri gnyis pa ni gshol mda' 'dzin no/_/gsum pa ni seng ldeng can no/_/bzhi pa ni lta na sdug go_/lnga pa ni rta rna can no/_/drug pa ni rnam par 'dud do/_/bdun pa ni mu khyud 'dzin zhes bya ba rnams te/_thams cad kyang chu'i steng du 
[\[20b.3\]]'phags pa'i dpangs la ni mtho dman gyi khyad par zhugs pa ste/_ri rab nas brtsams te mu khyud 'dzin gyi bar la snga ma snga ma'i phyed phyed kyis phyi ma phyi ma dman par gnas so/_/gser gyi ri de dag gi thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phul bar byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dwangs shing 
[\[20b.4\]]sgrib pa med pa 'khor lo bzhin du g.yas su 'khor ba la brten pa'i nyi ma dang*/_zla ba dang*/_rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang rnams dang*/_khor yug lcags kyi ri bo dang*/_dzam+bu'i gling gi ri bo dang*/_ljon shing la sogs pa rnams su'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi pa'i sder gtogs pa'i lha rnams 
[\[20b.5\]]ci rigs par gnas so/_/de dag las nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi 'og gi phyi rol ni me shel dang chu shel gyi dkyil 'khor las tsha bar byed pa dang*/_bsil bar byed pa dang*/_snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba dag spros te 'gro ba rnams rang rang gi las dang rjes su 'tsham par/_
[\[20b.6\]]mig dang*/_lus dang*/_yan lag dang*/_me tog dang*/_'bras bu dang*/_lo tog dang*/_sman dang*/_chu klung rnams 'ga' zhig tu ni phan 'dogs par byed pa dang*/_'ga' zhig tu ni gnod par byed pa dag ci yang 'byung ngo*/_/gzhan yang 'char nub kyi dus kyang mdzod las/_nam phyed nyi 
[\[20b.7\]]ma nub pa dang*/_/nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig_/ces gsungs pa bzhin du/_dper na sgra mi snyan du nam phyed par gyur pa de'i tshe lus 'phags su nyi ma nub bo/_/dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma phyed do/_/ba lang spyod du nyi ma 'char ba rnams dus cig car nyid du 'byung ba yin no/_/rol pa'i mtsho bdun 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni ri brgyad po de dag gi bar du gnas pa'i chu'i phung po yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa gang yin pas mngon par gtams pa'i rgya mtsho rim pa bdun du yod do/_/de'ang yan lag brgyad ni bsil ba dang*/_zhim pa dang*/_yang ba dang*/_'jam pa dang*/_dwangs pa 
[\[21a.2\]]dang*/_dri nga ba med pa dang*/_'thung na mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang*/_lto ba la mi gnod pa rnams so/_/mtsho de dag tu klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mngon par rtse zhing rol pa'i gnas su byed do/_/gser gyi ri bo phyi ma nas brtsams te khor yug gi ri bo'i bar la gling dang gling 
[\[21a.3\]]phran rnams ma gtogs pa phyi'i rgya mtsho'am ba tsha can gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba kho ra khor yug kun du dum bur ma chad pa yod kyang ri rab kyi rin po che'i mdangs kyis phog pas rgya mtsho chen po de'i kha dog kyang tha dad pa nyid du gyur pas rgya mtsho bzhi'i grangs su mngon par brjod pa yin no/_/gling 
[\[21a.4\]]rnams ni phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po na yod de/_de'ang ri rab kyi shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho na lus 'phags po'i gling zhes bya ba zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/_de la lus dang lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling g.yog gnyis dang bcas pa yod do/_/de dag tu skyes pa'i mi rnams ni 
[\[21a.5\]]gzugs che zhing lta na sdug pa yod pas lus 'phags zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i mi rnams kyi gnas pa grong dang*/_grong rdal dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_yul 'khor dang*/_pho brang rnams gnas so/_/de bzhin du ri rab kyi lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho na dzam+bu'i gling ste shing rta chen po'i dbyibs su gnas 
[\[21a.6\]]pa/_'di la'ang rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan zhes bya ba'i gling g.yog gnyis dang bcas pa yod do/_/'di dag tu mi rigs mi 'dra ba mang po rnams dang*/_de dag gis bsti ba'i grong dang grong rdal la sogs pa du ma yod do/_/gling 'di'i 'og rol dpag tshad nyi khri na dmyal ba chen po'i gnas rnams 
[\[21a.7\]]yod de/_de'ang 'di lta ste tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad las sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar thug par gyur pa ni mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya ba ste/_de ni thams cad kyi 'og tu gnas shing*/_de'i gong nas gong du rab tu tsha ba dang*/_tsha ba dang*/_ngu 'bod chen po dang*/_ngu 'bod dang*/_bsdus 'joms dang*/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]thig nag dang*/_yang sos kyi dmyal ba pa lcags bsregs kyi sa gzhi'i gnas dang bcas pa rnams rim par gnas so/_/de bzhin du brgyad po de dag gi ngos re la nye 'khor ba zhes bya ba me mur dang*/_ro myags kyi 'dam dang*/_mtshon cha'i skor gyi dmyal ba dang*/_chu bo rab med de/_
[\[21b.2\]]dmyal ba lhag pa bzhi bzhi ste bcu drug po rnams kyang gnas so/_/tsha ba'i dmyal ba de dag gi mtha' logs shig tu grang ba'i dmyal ba zhes bya ba brgyad yod pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_chu bur can dang*/_chu bur rdol ba can dang*/_a chu 'don pa dang*/_kyi hud 'don pa dang*/_so thams thams 
[\[21b.3\]]pa dang*/_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang*/_pad+ma ltar gas pa dang*/_pad+ma chen po ltar lus thams cad gas par gyur pa'i grang ba'i dmyal ba pa rnams dang de dag gi gnas gangs ri'i phreng ba chab rom gyi thang dang bcas pa rnams yod do/_/gzhan yang nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba zhes pa kun 'byung ba tha dad pa 
[\[21b.4\]]las grub pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bye brag rnam pa mang po yod cing gnas ni nges pa med de/_chu bo dang*/_ri dang*/_mya ngam gyi thang dang*/_'og tu'ang yod par bshad do/_/yi dwags kyi 'jig rten zhes bya ba yang dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po'i khab kyi 'og rol dpag tshad lnga brgya na yi dwags kyi grong 
[\[21b.5\]]khyer ser skya zhes bya ba yod de/_de na yi dwags kyi bdag po chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje mthu bo che dpung dang bcas pa gnas shing*/_de'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i yi dwags kyi rigs ni kha khab mig ltar phra ba la sogs pa sum cu rtsa drug tu gsungs pa rnams te thams cad ris su bsdu na/_
[\[21b.6\]]phyi'i sgrib pa can dang*/_nang gi sgrib pa can/_zas skom gyi sgrib pa can du 'du ba ste/_de dag gi 'dug pa'i gnas dang bcas pa rnams yod do/_/dud 'gro ni thang dang chu dang nam mkha'i spyod yul can yin pas phal che ba dag phyi'i rgya mtsho'i nang du chang gi sbang ma ltar byings na gnas pa dang*/_
[\[21b.7\]]kha 'thor ba ni mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul dang gling bar gyi mun pa chen po rnams su gnas so/_/yang ri rab kyi nub phyogs kyi phyi'i rgya mtsho na ba lang spyod kyi gling zhes bya ba kun nas zlum por gyur pa zla ba nya gang ba'i dbyibs su gnas pa/_de la g.yo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro zhes 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bya ba'i gling g.yog gnyis dang bcas pa yod de/_de dag tu skyes pa'i mi rnams kyi longs spyod ni shas cher ba lang dang rin po che las byung ba la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ming yang de skad ces bya ste/_de lta bu'i yul gling mi'i 'gro ba dang bcas pa rnams yod do/_/ri rab kyi byang phyogs kyi 
[\[22a.2\]]phyi'i rgya mtsho na sgra mi snyan gyi gling zhes bya ba gru bzhi pa khri'u'i dbyibs su gnas pa/_de la sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla zhes bya ba'i gling g.yog gnyis dang bcas pa yod de/_de dag tu skyes pa'i mi rnams kyi longs spyod ni ma rmos pa dang ma btab par 'khrungs pa'i 'bras sA lu'i zas dang*/_
[\[22a.3\]]dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba la ci bder spyod pa la sogs pa mtho ris kyi lha'i 'jig rten lta bu yod de/_dran pa nyer gzhag las/_mtho ris las gzhan pa'i mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gnyis pa lta bu zhes gsungs pas/_gling 'di'i bde ba dang 'byor pa la mi'i gnas 
[\[22a.4\]]gzhan gsum gyis 'gran par mi nus pa zhig go_/yul der pi shA tsi ka zhes pa sha za'am 'dre'i skad kyis smra ba'i phyir sgra mi snyan nam/_dpag bsam gyi shing las 'chi 'pho bar sgron pa'i sgra mi snyan par 'byung bas sam/_yang na klu rnams kyis gtses pa'i skyon gyi nyi ma sprin 
[\[22a.5\]]gyis g.yogs pa na/_des rdza rnga dang pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams las skad mi snyan par 'byin pa las de skad du gdags par grag go_/de lta bu'i yul gling mi'i 'gro ba dang bcas pa rnams yod de/_de dag gi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha' skor kun du lcags ri chen po 
[\[22a.6\]]zhig gis bskor ba la khor yug gi lcags ri zhes bya ba yin no/_/ri rab kyi rtse mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas nas/_steng gi nam mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten te sprin gyi phung po bzhin du mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i gzhi la/_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang*/_
[\[22a.7\]]'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dam pa lha rdzas kyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa las legs par grub pa rnams ni/_dper na bla khab mang po steng nas steng du phub pa'am/_mchod rten kha sbubs pa'i bang rim gyi rnam pa bzhin du 'og ma 'og ma las gong ma gong ma je cher 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]gnas te/_de'ang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i gnas bzhi ni nyis 'gyur dang*/_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i gnas ni stong 'gyur gyis rgya che ba nyid du gnas te/_ji skad du/_gnas nas gnas 'og ji srid pa/_/de nas de yi gong de srid/_/ces so/_/gnas de dag tu brten pa'i lha rnams ni 
[\[22b.2\]]'di lta ste/_'thab bral dang*/dga' ldan dang*/_'phrul dga' dang*/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa ste 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams so/_/de ltar na mnar med pa nas brtsams te 'di'i bar la 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya zhing*/_bye brag tu lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha yan chad ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 
[\[22b.3\]]drug yin te/_de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan 'khrig pa dang khams kyi zas la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha zhes gdags so/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams ni bsam gtan bzhis bsdus te/_de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_tshangs ris dang*/_tshangs pa mdun na 
[\[22b.4\]]'don dang*/_tshangs chen te bsam gtan dang por gtogs pa'i lha rnams so/_/'od chung dang*/_tshad med 'od dang*/_'od gsal ba ste bsam gtan gnyis par gtogs pa'i lha rnams so/_/dge chung dang*/_tshad med dge dang*/_dge rgyas te bsam gtan gsum par gtogs pa'i lha rnams 
[\[22b.5\]]so/_/sprin med dang*/_bsod nams skyes dang*/_'bras bu che ba dang*/_mi che ba dang*/_mi gdung ba dang*/_gya nom snang ba dang*/_shin tu mthong ba dang*/_'og min te bsam gtan bzhi par gtogs pa'i lha rnams te gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams so/_/de dag la la ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha ris 
[\[22b.6\]]bcu bdun zhes bya ste/_'dod pa'i yon tan 'dod chags dang bral la/_gzugs la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams kyi lha zhes gdags so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams ni 'di lta ste/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang*/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang*/_
[\[22b.7\]]ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang*/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched de gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams so/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni lus can ma yin pa'i phyir gnas logs pa med kyang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gi rnam pa bzhir 'byed pa'i sgo nas gzugs med pa'i 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]khams kyi lha zhes bya ste/_gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur la/_gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i phyir de skad ces gdags so/_/mngon pa ba kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i khams ni 'og min gyi steng nas steng du brtsegs mar yod pa dang gzugs 
[\[23a.2\]]kyang yod la/_gzugs med pa zhes brjod pa ni dman pa la dgag sgra sbyar ba yin zhes smra ba yang yod do/_/de dag gi skye ba'i gnas kyi khyad par yang*/_lha dang*/_dmyal ba dang*/_srid pa bar ma rnams ni brdzus te skyes pa yin la/_mi dang dud 'gro ba rnams ni sgo nga las skyes pa dang*/_mngal las skyes pa dang*/_
[\[23a.3\]]brdzus te skyes pa dang*/_drod gsher las skyes pa ste bzhi ga tshang ba dang*/_yi dwags la mngal las skyes pa dang brdzus te skyes pa gnyis ka yod par bshad do/_/de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i gling bzhi dang*/_ri'i rgyal po dang*/_gser gyi ri bdun dang*/_khor yug dang*/_'dod pa'i lha drug dang*/_tshangs pa'i 
[\[23a.4\]]'jig rten gyi bar la gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/de bye ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ji ltar bgrang ba'i tshul ni sngon du smras zin pa ltar ro/_/gnyis pa dzam+bu'i gling bkar te bshad pa ni/_de la ji skad smos pa'i gling gzhan gsum ni/_
[\[23a.5\]]longs spyod kyi sa dang*/_dzam+bu'i gling ni las kyi sa ste de yang dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'grel rnams nas/_ri rab kyi rwa'i 'og gi gling drug ni longs spyod kyi sa pa dang*/_bsil ri'i phyi mtshams nas lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i bdun pa dzam+bu'i gling ni las kyi sa pa ste/_de la dum bu bcu 
[\[23a.6\]]gnyis su gnas pa'i lho gling dbus ma dzam+bu'i gling chung ngur bzhed pa yin no/_/de la ci'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling zhes bya zhe na/_gling gang gi yul dbus su gyur pa ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi ma ga d+hA ste/_de'i byang nas byang du ri nag po rgyud dgu 'das pa'i pha rol na ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba gangs 
[\[23a.7\]]ri dpal dang ldan pa yod do/_/de'i pha rol du ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod de/_de dag gi tshu rol na klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bdag gir byas pa'i mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya ba chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba la/_me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang ku mu dA dang puN+Da rI ka rnams kyis 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]khebs pa dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa gnas so/_/de'i shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs bzhi nas chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab pa ni 'di lta ste/_chu bo gang+gA dang*/_sin+d+hu dang*/_pak+Shu dang*/_si tA rnams rim pa de nyid kyis so/_/chu bo de dag re res kyang ma dros pa'i mtsho la g.yas su 
[\[23b.2\]]lan grangs bdun bdun du bskor nas chu bran lnga brgya lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu rang rang gi phyogs kyi rgya mtsho ga la bar 'gro bar byed do/_/mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram ngogs su shing dzam+bu tri sha zhes bya ba 'bras bu ro mchog mngar po dang ldan par skyes pa/_shing de'i 'bras bu shin tu smin par gyur pa chu'i 
[\[23b.3\]]nang du lhung ba las dzam+bu zhes bya ba'i sgra yang 'byung ngo*/_/der ldang ba'i 'bras bu de las klu'i rgyal po rnams nyar sprul nas za bar byed cing*/_ma zos pa rnams ni chu dang phrad pa'i stobs kyis dzam+bu chu bo'i gser du 'gyur ba zhig yod do/_/des na shing des nye bar mtshon pa'i gling yin pas dzam+bu'i 
[\[23b.4\]]gling zhes tha snyad du byas so/_/gzhan yang ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de'i byang phyogs na brag gser gyi bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos zhes bya ba dbyibs legs pa nang gi sa gzhi yang gser gyi bye ma brdal zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/_der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/_
[\[23b.5\]]thagaseg ma gang ci yang rung ba lhung ba mi ma yin rnams kyis phyir 'dor bar byed pa/_de'i khor yug tu'ang brag gser gyi bya skyibs brgyad stong dang bcas pa yod do/_/brag de'i byang phyogs su shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dom bzhi bcu thur du zug cing brgyad cu gyen du 'phags 
[\[23b.6\]]pa sA la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba dang*/_shing de'i shar phyogs su rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab pa zhes bya ba dbyibs zlum po/_/rdzing g.yog brgyad stong dang bcas pa/_thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i nang na me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang ku mu dA dang pad+ma 
[\[23b.7\]]dkar po che zhing mchog tu che ba dag gis khebs pa yod do/_/brgya byin gyi g.yul ngor spyod pa'i glang po che rab brtan zhes bya ba glang po che brgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas te/_dgun dang*/_dpyid dang*/_ston gsum du zla ba bzhi bzhir brag gser gyi bya skyibs dang*/_shing sA la'i rgyal po dang*/_rdzing bu 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dal gyis 'bab pa dag tu re mos su 'jug cing 'khod pa de lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi phreng ba mang po dag yod do/_/de dag tu ma zad gling 'di ni gling gzhan las mngon par 'phags pa'i khyad par gyi chos shin tu mang te/_mdo dran pa nyer gzhag las/_gling gsum gyi 
[\[24a.2\]]nang nas 'di ni las kyi sa yin/_'dir ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag sems pa yin/_'dir ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yin/_'di ni mi'i gnas bzhi dag gi rag las pa yin/_'dir ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag nges par sems shing rnam par dpyod pa yin/_'dir ni 
[\[24a.3\]]tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin/_'dir ni 'chi ba dang skye ba'i sems pa yin/_'dir rdo rje las byas pa'i gdan yod ces gsungs pa ltar gling 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis zhing sbyong ba'i smon lam gyi khyad par mang pos mdza' bar bcings pa dang*/_
[\[24a.4\]]gdul bar bgyi ba'i 'gro ba mtha' dag gis kun nas bsten pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa ste/_de yang sngon bdag cag gi ston pa 'dis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_wA rA Na sI kho na la yang 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas mang po byon pa la mchod pa dang*/_de dag 
[\[24a.5\]]gi rjes su bstan pa thos pa'ang dpag tu ma mchis pa byung bar nges te/_rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las/_der ni nga yis mchod sbyin stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig drug cu byas/_/der ni sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig drug cu de dag mchod/_/wA rA Na sI dam pa de ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams 
[\[24a.6\]]kyi gnas/_/sa de lha dang klu yis mngon bstod rtag tu chos ni mngon par gzhol/_/ngas ni sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig dran/_/de dag drang srong zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor/_/zhi zhing nyer zhi bsam gtan mngon gyur rtag tu 
[\[24a.7\]]ri dwags rnams kyis bsten/_/de phyir drang srong zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor/_/zhes gsungs pa dang*/_gnas bya rgod phung po nyid du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la bkur stir mdzad pa yang ches shin tu mang ste/_ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las/_sangs rgyas 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]dag ni bye ba phrag stong dang*/_/de bas lhag pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/_/kun kyang bya rgod phung po 'dir bzhugs te/_/mi dbang de kun nga yis bkur stir byas/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs par yang sgron me'i bskal pa 'di la 'byon par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[24b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das stong phrag gcig la bzhis dman pa'am gcig gis dman pa rnams kyang byang chub kyi snying po mngon du mdzad cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir dang*/_bye brag tu bdag cag gi ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
[\[24b.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa thub pa'i dbang po nyid kyis byang chub kyi shing ljon pa'i drung ga la bar skyil mo krung gcig la yid kyi srub shing sde dang bcas pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i go 'phang 
[\[24b.4\]]dam pa mngon du mdzad pa'i tshul bstan pa dang*/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis brlabs te/_slar yang mi shigs rdo rje rin po che'i khams su brling bar byas pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i gling thams cad kyi gtsug 
[\[24b.5\]]gi nor bu gcig pur gyur pa ni dzam+bu'i gling 'di nyid do/_/gzhan yang gling 'di'i nub phyogs su gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam gyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i chos mdzod chen po/_rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal lta bu'i gnas mchog khyad par can au D+yAn 
[\[24b.6\]]rdo rje chen po'i pho brang zhes bya ba yod do/_/shar phyogs su rgyal ba ma lus bskyed pa'i yab gcig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal brtan pa'i 'khor lo bus pa chung ngu'i gzugs su bzung nas/_yid can rgya mtsho chen po'i rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam pa rnam pa thams cad 
[\[24b.7\]]mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du 'khrid pa'i chos kyi tshul legs par 'doms pa'i gnas rgya'i ri bo rtse lnga zhes bya ba yod do/_/lho phyogs su snying rje chen po'i gter chen 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang thugs rje shin tu myur ba'i dpa' mo rje btsun sgrol ma ste de gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams su nyin mtshan 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]gyi dus rnam pa drug tu dgongs shing dngos dang rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgyu 'phrul gyi drwa bas byang chub kyi spyod pa skyong zhing bzhugs pa'i gzhal med khang dag gis mngon par brgyan pa'i ri bo gru 'dzin zhes bya ba dang*/_ston pa shAkya'i rgyal pos zung 'jug gi skur bzhengs nas skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya mchog 
[\[25a.2\]]gi 'khor rnams la dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bdud rtsi'i dga' ston stsal ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi mchod rten chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/byang phyogs su rgyal ba'i sras kyi rang gzugs chos bzhin mdzad pa'i chos rgyal bdun dang rigs ldan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[25a.3\]]lngas legs par bsrungs pa/_ka lA pa zhes bya bas mtshon pa'i grong khyer bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ldan pa'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sham+b+ha la zhes bya ba dang*/_sa chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rol rtsed bgrang du med pa dag 
[\[25a.4\]]gis/_bcom ldan 'das bu ram shing pa'i lung dang rtogs pa'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che mkhas pa'i phrin las gsum gyi rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rtse mo la mnga' gsol te/_ji srid ma pham rgyal ba'i dbang po'i bstan pa shar bar ma gyur pa de srid du brtan par bgyid pa'i gnas dam pa bod yul 
[\[25a.5\]]kha ba'i ljongs zhes bya ba rnams yod do/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa chen po dpal he ru ka'i ye shes skye ba med pa'i klong nas skye ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma sa chen po'i rdul phra ba snyed kyis rnam par rtse ba'i gnas chen po yul sum cu rtsa gnyis/_gnas nyi shu 
[\[25a.6\]]rtsa bzhi/_dur khrod chen po brgyad rnams dang*/_gzhan yang yul 'khor lnga brgya dang*/_ljongs chen po bcu drug dang*/_yul phran stong phrag gcig ste/_de dag tu bsten pa'i mi'i rigs mi 'dra ba sum brgya drug cu dang*/_skad kyi rigs mi 'dra ba bdun brgya nyi shu 'byin pa yod par bshad pa rnams 
[\[25a.7\]]kyang gling 'di nyid du yod pas so/_/mdor na bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang bzhi las thugs bskyed kyi stobs rmad du byung bar bshad pa ni ston pa 'di nyid de/_gang des mdzad pa'i phreng ba rmad du byung ba dang bcas te sems can gyi don la byon pa'i gnas ni dzam+bu'i gling zhes bya ba 'di nyid 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]do/_/gnyis pa der ji ltar byon pa dngos ni/_slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis/_dang por byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed de/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing*/_/bar du gcod pa'i bdud rnams 'joms mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan seng ge de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes 
[\[25b.2\]]gsungs pa lta bu'i go rim dang rjes su mthun par brjod par bya'o/_/de la dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang*/_bar du tshogs gnyis bsags pa dang*/_mthar sangs rgyas pa dngos so/_/dang po thugs bskyed pa la'ang theg pa dman pa la grags pa dang*/_theg pa chen po la grags 
[\[25b.3\]]pa gnyis so/_/dang po theg pa dman pa ltar na/_'dul ba lung las/_sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing*/_/glang po dregs pa'i shas chen dang*/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/_/ngas ni byang chub sems bskyed do/_/zhes 'byung ba'i don bsdus te brjod na 'di ltar 
[\[25b.4\]]sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa la kho bo cag gi ston pa 'di ni rgyud rang bzhin gyis mnyen zhing chos la gus pa lhur bgyid pa/_'od ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer gyi rgyal po rab gsal lam 'od ldan zhes bya ba stobs dang 'byor pa ni lha rnams kyi dbang po'i phun sum tshogs pa lta bu la spyod pa 
[\[25b.5\]]zhig tu gyur to/_/de la dus gzhan zhig na/_glang po che me tog ku mu da'i mdog bzhin du thal kar yod pa/_gzugs bzang zhing yan lag bdun legs par rdzogs pa zhig yod de/_de 'dul ba'i ched du kun du bgrod ces bya ba'i glang po 'dul mkhan zhig yod pa de bkug ste 'dul du 'jug 
[\[25b.6\]]go_/des kyang de ltar mnyan te dul bar byas nas slar rgyal po la phul lo/_/de nas nyams sad pa'i phyir rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan gnyi gas glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon te ri dwags bshor du song ngo*/_/ji tsam na glang po che des nags kyi ban glang mo'i dri tshor ba'i rkyen byas pas rtse dga'i bde ba rjes su dran 
[\[25b.7\]]te de'i rjes su rlung dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis rgyug pa na/_rgyal po skrag ste 'dul mkhan la smras pa/_kye glang po 'dul ba glang po'i dbang po gdul ba la 'bad par gyis shig_des smras pa/_lha 'di ni 'khrul gyis/_shing gi yal ga la 'jus shig_de nas gnyis kas shing gi yal 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ga la 'jus te glang po che ci dgar btang nas bde bar bab bo/_/der rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/_khyod kyis glang po ma thul ba nga la byin no/_/des smras pa/_lha kho bo cag gis 'di'i lus ni shin tu dul bar byas pa yin no/_/'on kyang sems ni de ltar ma lags pas/_
[\[26a.2\]]deng ban glang mo'i dri tshor te nyan du ma btub bo/_/de lta na'ang dpyad rjes su dran nas ring por mi thogs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/des ji skad smras pa bzhin du zhag bdun nas khyim du byung ngo*/_/de mthong nas 'dul mkhan gyis rgyal po la sbron no/_/de nas rgyal po'i mdun du yid ches par bya ba'i 
[\[26a.3\]]phyir kun du bgrod kyis lcags kyi tho lum sol mal du bsregs pa rab tu 'bar ba zhig thogs te kha kha zhes brjod do/_/de la glang pos kyang bag tsha ba med par len du brtsams pa na/_'dul mkhan gyis smras pa/_lha 'di len du ni btub na 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis rgyal po 
[\[26a.4\]]yid ches par gyur te yang smras pa/_de ltar dul bar bgyis pa la bdag cag zung ni de lta bu'i g.yeng bar byed pa'i rgyu ci zhig ces dris pa la/_lha kho bo cag gis lus ni thul gyis sems ni ma lags so zhes bya ba sngar yang ma gsol lam/_der rgyal pos smras pa/_sems 'dul ba gang 
[\[26a.5\]]dag yod pa khyod kyis mthong ba dang thos pa byung ngam zhes dris so/_/de yang lhas bskul nas/_lha gcig lus dang sems 'dul ba po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtam gyi zhar las sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'i mod la rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[26a.6\]]'das la shin tu dad par gyur te sbyin pa ni byin/_bsod nams ni ci yang bsags te bla na med pa'i byang chub la mos pas/_sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su/_/'gro ba rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams bdag gis 
[\[26a.7\]]bsgral bar bya/_/zhes pa smon lam du btab pas smon lam gyi thog ma bskrun par bshad do/_/gnyis pa theg pa chen po las 'byung ba la/_sems bskyed kyi ngo bo dang*/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa dngos so/_/dang po sems bskyed kyi ngo bo ni/_gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir yang dag par 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa ste/_de skad du'ang*/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/ces so/_/de la'ang nang gses kyi sgo nas dbye na/_byang chub tu smon pa'i sems 
[\[26b.2\]]bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang*/_de bsgrub par rtsom pa 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur te/_zhi ba'i lhas/_'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba yis/_/de bzhin mkhas pas 'di gnyis kyi/_/bye brag rim bzhin shes par bya/_/zhes so/_/de la'ang yul gyi sgo nas dbye na/_
[\[26b.3\]]kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba dang*/_don dam byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba gnyis su 'gyur te/_dang po thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni/_rgyan las/_grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs/_/thos stobs dge ba goms pa las/_/mi brtan pa dang brtan 'byung ba/_/gzhan gyis 
[\[26b.4\]]bstan pa'i sems bskyed 'dod/_/ces 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/phyi ma thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni/_ji skad du/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab bsnyen byas/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab bsags/_/chos la mi rtog ye shes ni/_/bskyed phyir de ni dam par 'dod/_/ces 'byung ba lta 
[\[26b.5\]]bu'o/_/de bzhin du sa mtshams kyi sgo nas dbye na/_mos pa dang*/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang*/_rnam par smin pa dang*/_sgrib pa spong ba ste bzhi'o/_/de skad du'ang*/_sems bskyed de ni sa rnams la/_/mos dang lhag bsam dag pa dang*/_/rnam par smin pa gzhan du 
[\[26b.6\]]'dod/_/de bzhin sgrib pa spong ba'o/_/zhes so/_/grogs dang dpe'i sgo nas ni/_'dun pa dang ldan pas lta bu nas/_chos kyi sku sprin lta bu'i bar gyi nyi shu rtsa gnyis su rgyan las ji skad bshad pa ltar shes par bya'o/_/gnyis pa ji ltar sems bskyed pa dngos ni/_drin lan bsabs 
[\[26b.7\]]pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i snying po dril na 'di ltar/_bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon gyi bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i gong rol du so so skye bo 'ching ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i dus su/_las kyi dbang gis mi'i shing rta zhes bya ba'i dmyal bar lhungs te/_grogs gzhan zhig dang lhan cig tu dmyal 
[\[27a\]]
