[\[27a.1\]]ba'i srung ma a bang sdod pa'i shing rta 'dren pa'i gyad du gyur to/_/srung ma de ni lus bong shin tu che zhing kha dang mig dang rna ba dang sna rnams nas me 'bud cing du ba gtul ba/_rgyud gtum po mi bzad pa dang ldan pa yin pas shing rta la skyil mo krung bcas te gnas bzhin du lag pa 
[\[27a.2\]]na lcags kyi dbyug pa thogs nas shing rta 'dren pa gnyis la brdeg go_/des shin tu na ba'i sdug bsngal la ma bzod nas ji ltar nus pa'i stobs kyis drangs pas/_cig shos ni nyam chung bar gyur pas de ltar du 'dren par ma nus pa la/_dmyal ba'i srung mas lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum pa 
[\[27a.3\]]brang la btsugs nas lcags kyi dbyug pas bsnun pas khrag chal bar phab bo/_/de'i tshe gyad de ni theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan par gyur pa yin pas grogs kyi sdug bsngal mthong bas snying rje rab tu rgyas pa'i sems skyes te/_srung ma a bang la/_'di la snying rje cung zad skyed cig ces 
[\[27a.4\]]smras so/_/des de la khros nas lcags kyi mdung thung 'bar ba rtse gsum pa gyad kyi gnya' bar btsugs pas de nyid du dus byas so/_/der snying rje'i sems kyi mthu chen pos bskal pa brgya snyed kyi sdig pa yang chus bkrus pa'i dri ma bzhin du byang nas dmyal ba'i gnas de las thar bar gyur to/_/
[\[27a.5\]]de nas ring zhig lon pa na dzam+bu'i gling gi lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rdza mkhan gyi khye'u snang byed ces bya ba zhig tu gyur to/_/de lta bu'i rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag de la yang*/_ji skad du/_rigs dang dge bshes snying rje dang*/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi ldog pa/_/rgyu bzhi rkyen ni 'di dag 
[\[27a.6\]]gis/_/byang chub sems ni rab tu 'jug_/ces pa ltar byang chub kyi sems 'phel bar byed pa'ang bdag rkyen dge ba'i bshes la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir/_ji ltar na khye'u snang byed sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa chen po la shin tu dad par gyur te/_thug 'jam yol go gang zhig phul te/_me tog 
[\[27a.7\]]tu 'gron bu lngas kyang mngon par gtor nas/_bde bar gshegs pa khyed sku ci 'dra dang*/_/sku tshe'i tshad kyang khyed dang ci 'dra ba/_/mtshan mchog bzang po khyed dang ci 'dra ba/_/de bzhin bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog_/ces smon lam btab cing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]de ltar yang*/_'phags pa bskal pa bzang po las/_nga ni sngon tshe dman par gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la/_/'jam gang zhig ni dbul bar byas nas kyang*/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/zhes 'byung ngo*/_/gnyis pa bar du tshogs gnyis 
[\[27b.2\]]bsags pa la/_theg pa chung ngur grags pa dang*/_theg pa chen por grags pa gnyis so/_/dang po theg pa chung ngur grags pa ltar na/_mdzod las/_de grangs med gsum la 'tshang rgya/_zhes gsungs pa ltar/_grangs med gsum gyis tshar phyin par 'dod de/_de yang 
[\[27b.3\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gzhan don du byang chub thob pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas rnams mchod pas mnyes par byed pa dang*/_gzhan don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa rnams bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum du spyad pas byang chub tu sangs rgyas par 'dod pa'i dbang du byas 
[\[27b.4\]]pa ni/_'di ltar bskal pa grangs med pa dang po la bdag cag gi ston pa 'di ni sngon du rdza mkhan gyi khye'ur gyur pa'i tshe/_thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po 'jig rten du byon pa la mar dang til mar gyis bsnyen bkur ba nas bzung ste/_rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe yan lag bzhi pa'i 
[\[27b.5\]]dpung gi tshogs yongs su spangs nas/_byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i sems kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor skyong gi zham ring byas pa'i bar la/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun khri lnga stong la bsnyen bkur bas mnyes par byas pa yin no/_/de ltar yang 'dul ba lung las/_
[\[27b.6\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/_/'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/_/bdun khri dang ni lnga stong gi_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/_/ces so/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis 
[\[27b.7\]]mngon par gtor ba nas bzung ste/_bram zer gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba la yid rab tu dga' bas thal mo sbyar te bstod pa phul ba'i bar la/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun khri drug stong la bsnyen bkur bas mnyes par byas pa yin te/_ji skad du/_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas/_/thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bar/_/bdun khri dang ni drug stong gi_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/_/ces so/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pa la/_rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad 
[\[28a.2\]]dam pa la mchod pa phul ba dang*/_sangs rgyas de mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs pa nas bzung ste/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe/_dga' skyong gi tshig thos nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs las rab tu 'byung ba'i thugs bskyed pa'i bar 
[\[28a.3\]]la/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun khri bdun stong la bsnyen bkur bas mnyes par byas pa yin te/_ji skad du/_gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas/_/sangs rgyas 'od srungs bar du ni/_/ngas ni bdun khri bdun stong gi_/rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas/_/zhes 'byung ngo*/_/de la'ang mngon 
[\[28a.4\]]pa mdzod las ni/_shAkya thub pa nas rin chen gtsug tor can tha mar gyur pa'i bar ni grangs med pa dang po'o/_/de nas mar me mdzad tha mar gyur pa'i bar ni grangs med pa gnyis pa'o/_/de nas rnam par gzigs tha mar gyur pa'i bar ni grangs med pa gsum pa ste/_de ltar yang*/_de nyid las/_
[\[28a.5\]]rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug_/grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung*/_/dang po shAkya thub pa yin/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar ro/_/de nas mtshan bzang gi rgyu bsgrub pa la bskal pa brgyar thogs pa la/_bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa na sangs rgyas skar rgyal me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[28a.6\]]pa la rkang gcig gis 'greng ste zhag bdun gyi bar du bskor ba bar ma chad par byas te bstod pa/_skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/_/'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang med/_/lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang 
[\[28a.7\]]yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/_/ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa stengs rgyas pa kun tu bskor kyang yul gcig ga la yod/_/ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa byas pa dang*/_bskal pa chen po dgu'i tshogs bzlums te/_de nas bskal pa 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]chen po dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa na grong khyer nyer ldan du sangs rgyas 'od srungs byon pa'i tshe/_bram ze'i khye'u bla mar gyur pa yan chad kyis mtshan bzang gi rgyu grub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' nges pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'ang mtshan bzang grub pa'i rgyu ni/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[28b.2\]]khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang*/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de snyed bcur bsgyur bas ni sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'i khung bu gcig go_/ba spu ji snyed skyed par byed pa'i bsod nams de snyed brgyar bsgyur bas ni dpe byad bzang po 
[\[28b.3\]]gcig go_/dpe byad brgyad cu po tshang bar 'grub par byed pa'i bsod nams de snyed brgyar bsgyur bas ni mtshan bzang po gcig go_/mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po tshang bar 'grub par byed pa'i bsod nams stong du bsgyur bas ni zla ba nya gang ba lta bu'i mdzod spu 'grub bo/_/mdzod spu 
[\[28b.4\]]'grub par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de 'bum du bsgyur bas ni gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ltar yang rin chen phreng ba las/_rang sangs rgyas kun las byung dang*/_/slob dang mi slob las byung dang*/_/'jig rten ma lus kun bsod nams/_/'jig rten bzhin 
[\[28b.5\]]du dpag med gang*/_/de tsam bcur ni bsgres pa yis/_/ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'grub ste/_/sangs rgyas ba spu'i bu ga ni/_/thams cad de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad ni/_/skyed par byed pa'i bsod nams gang*/_/de dag brgyar ni bsgyur ba yis/_/dpe byad 
[\[28b.6\]]bzang po gcig tu bzhed/_/bsod nams de dag de snyed kyis/_/rgyal po dpe byad bzang po ni/_/gcig mthar phyin te de lta bur/_/brgyad cu'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag_/'grub pa'i bsod nams tshogs gang yin/_/de dag brgyar ni bsgyur ba 
[\[28b.7\]]yis/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig go_/mtshan ni sum cu 'grub pa'i rgyu/_/bsod nams rgya che gang yin pa/_/de dag stong du bsgyur ba yis/_/zla ba nya 'dra'i mdzod spu'o/_/mdzod spu yi ni bsod nams dag_/stong phrag brgya ni bsdoms pa yis/_/spyi gtsug 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bltar ni mi snang ba/_/skyob pa'i gtsug tor skyed par byed/_/ces so/_/de ltar mtshan bzang 'grub pa'i rgyu mthar phyin nas/_dga' ldan gyi gnas su dam pa tog dkar du 'khrungs pa ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de nyid 
[\[29a.2\]]nas dzam+bu'i gling du byung ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur pa ni srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin no/_/dus de dang de dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang rgyal bu thams cad sgrol du gyur pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad la bdog pa ma lus pa btang bas sbyin 
[\[29a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs shing*/_drang srong bzod par smra bar gyur pa'i tshe chags pa dang bcas bzhin du yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang 'khrugs pa mi mnga' bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa yin la/_bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa'i tshe 
[\[29a.4\]]sangs rgyas skar rgyal la mngon par bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa yin no/_/rgyal bu don grub tu gyur pa'i tshe rdo rje'i gdan la srod kyi dus su bdud btul nas tho rangs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rgyud la bskyed pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[29a.5\]]phyin pa rdzogs par 'dod pa yin no/_/mdzad pa bcu gnyis ji ltar bstan pa ni mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo la sogs pa nas 'byung ba ltar shes par bya ba nyid do/_/gnyis pa theg pa chen po'i lugs la/_ji srid bsags pa tshogs kyi yun tshad dang*/_bsags par bya ba tshogs kyi ngo bo dang*/_
[\[29a.6\]]ji ltar bsags pa'i tshul te rnam pa gsum las/_dang po ji srid du bsags pa'i yun gyi tshad ni/_bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum du bshad pa ni bka' dang dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos phal che ba las 'byung ste/_mdo sde rgyan las/_sa ni dang po yin par 'dod/_/'di ste 
[\[29a.7\]]bskal pa dpag med kyi/_/zhes dang*/_grangs med gnyis ni rdzogs pa yis/_/sgom pa'i lam ni tshar phyin to/_/zhes grangs med dang pos ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa dang po dang*/_grangs med gnyis pas ni sa gnyis pa nas bdun pa man chad dang*/_grangs med gsum pas ni sa 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bcu pa man chad thob par bzhed do/_/brgyad stong pa'i 'grel chen las ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu rtsa gsum du bshad de/_de'ang tshogs lam dang sbyor lam la grangs med gsum dang*/_sa bcu po re re la gsum gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[29b.2\]]sa rdzogs par bshad pa ni nges pa'i don dang*/_grangs med gsum du bshad pa ni drang don dgongs pa can yin te/_grangs med sum tshan bcu gcig tu rigs gcig pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa rnams ha cang rgyun ring ba la zhum pa spang ba'i phyir yin par bzhed do/_/de lta bu'i grangs med brtsam pa'i thog ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi ched du 
[\[29b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bsags pa rnams mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyogs gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon par 'gyur ba'i bzang po dang*/_tshe rabs thams cad du byang chub kyi sems ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i smon lam stobs dang ldan pa dang*/_mi dge ba'i grogs kyis 
[\[29b.4\]]mos pa bzlog kyang de'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i sems brtan pa dang*/_yon tan la chog par mi 'dzin zhing mthong ba'i chos dang tshe rabs phyi mar bcas pa la dge ba'i chos mi nyams shing 'phel bar byed pa ste/_chos 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni khyad 
[\[29b.5\]]par du 'gro ba ste/_de lta bu'i chos bzhi po 'di dag tshogs kyi lam du nam thob na/_de nas bzung ste bskal pa grangs med kyi 'go brtsam par 'dod de/_theg pa bsdus pa las/_bzang dang smon pa'i stobs can dang*/_/sems brtan khyad par 'gro ba yis/_/byang chub sems 
[\[29b.6\]]dpa' grangs med gsum/_/kun tu brtsam par mdzad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs shing*/_rje btsun bsod nams rtse mos ni rang gi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba nas grangs med dang po 'go brtsam par gsungs so/_/gnyis pa bsags par bya ba tshogs kyi ngo bo ni/_stong 
[\[29b.7\]]nyid snying rje'i snying po can dang*/_'khor gsum du rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i lam gang yin pa ste/_mdo sde rgyan las/bsod nams ye shes mtshungs pa med/_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gcig gis 'khor bar mngon mtho byed/_/gzhan gyis nyon mongs med par 'khor/_/zhes dang*/_sbyin dang tshul khrims bsod nams kyi/_/tshogs yin shes rab ye shes kyi/_/gsum ni gnyis char la yang gtogs/_/lnga char yang ni ye shes tshogs/_/
[\[30a.2\]]zhes dang*/_gtam du bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba las/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku 'dir/_/bsod nams tshogs las byung ba ste/_/chos kyi sku ni mdor bsdus na/_/rgyal po ye shes tshogs las byung*/_/de lta bas na tshogs 'di gnyis/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa'i 
[\[30a.3\]]rgyu/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gsum pa ji ltar tshogs bsags pa'i tshul ni/_bskal pa chen po grangs med dang po la 'jug pa'i dus su rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan du ston pa 'di nyid rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i sras gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur 
[\[30a.4\]]to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos rjes su bstan pa mnos shing*/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug tu bsnyen bkur bgyis pa nas brtsams te/_bskal pa grangs med pa 
[\[30a.5\]]gcig tu tshogs bsags pas sa dang po mngon du mdzad pa yin no/_/grangs med gnyis pa la 'jug pa'i dus su grong khyer dzam+bu chu bo'i gser du rgyal po mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de'i tshe ston pa 'di nyid de'i gnang chen tshong dpon shes rab bzang po zhes bya bar gyur 
[\[30a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag las rjes su bstan pa mnos shing*/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa lo stong du bsnyen bkur ba nas brtsams te/_bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu tshogs bsags pas sa bdun pa mngon du mdzad pa yin no/_/
[\[30a.7\]]grangs med pa gsum pa la 'jug pa'i dus su rgyal po dgra thul gyi pho brang pad+mo can dang nye ba zhig tu bram ze'i slob ma gzhon nu sprin zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la ut+pa la lngas mngon par gtor te/_ral pa gser gyi mdog can stan du bting nas/_'di 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs 'jog pa dang bdag lung ston par mi mdzad na 'di nyid du lus bskam par bya'o zhes yi dam brtan par bcas te logs shig tu 'khod pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te ral pa la zhabs bzhag nas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin 
[\[30b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de'i mod la shin tu dga' zhing mgu la rangs par gyur te/_steng gi bar snang la shing tA la bdun srid kyi tshad du mngon par 'phags te/_ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig mang 
[\[30b.3\]]po mngon du byas te sa brgyad pa mngon du mdzad pa yin no/_/de ltar yang*/_sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la ut+pal lngas/_/gtor te ral pa stan du bting byas pas/_/mi skye'i chos la bzod pa thob gyur nas/_/shAkya'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes nga lung bstan/_/zhes dang*/_lung las 
[\[30b.4\]]kyang*/_gang tshe mar me mdzad kyis nga*/_/lung bstan gyur pa de yi tshe/_/sa brgyad pa ni thob gyur te/_/dbang bcu dag kyang thob par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de nas brtsams te brgya byin mig bzang po la sogs pa'i skye ba mang du bzhes nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i mthar/_bskal 
[\[30b.5\]]pa 'di'i tshe lo nyi khri pa'i dus su grong khyer nyer ldan du sangs rgyas 'od srung byon pa'i tshe/_bram ze'i khye'u bla mar gyur pa'i bar la bskal pa grangs med gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur zhing tshogs bsags pas sa bcu pa mngon du byas par 'dod de/_ting nge 'dzin rgyal po las/_
[\[30b.6\]]sangs rgyas dag ni bye ba khrag khrig dang*/_/de las lhag pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/_/kun kyang bya rgod phung po 'dir bzhugs te/_/mi dbang de kun nga yis bsnyen bkur byas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/gsum pa mthar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshul la/_theg pa 
[\[30b.7\]]dman pa las 'byung ba dang*/_theg pa chen po las 'byung ba'o/_/dang po theg pa dman pa'i lugs su 'dul ba lung dang mdzod las 'byung ba ltar/_bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum du tshogs bsags shing sangs rgyas rnams bsnyen bkur te pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs kyang 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]so so skye bo rang rgyud pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo srid pa tha ma pa'i skye ba la/_rdo rje'i gdan du stan gcig gi steng du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rab mtha' la brten nas/_sbyor lam drod nas brtsams te zad pa dang mi skye shes pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i byang 
[\[31a.2\]]chub gdan thog gcig la mngon du byas te/_gsar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bzhed do/_/de ltar yang mdzod las/_ston dang bse ru byang chub bar/_/bsam gtan mtha' rten gcig la kun/_/de yi sngon du thar cha mthun/_/zhes so/_/de ltar rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[31a.3\]]chos kyi sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhi nas 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu 'bras ma lus pa dang bral ba dang*/_rnam par smin pa'i gzugs kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan zhing*/_yon tan dang phrin las kyis rnam par phye ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid du sangs rgyas nas/_kun shes nas 
[\[31a.4\]]bzung ste rab bzang gi bar la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed do/_/gnyis pa theg pa chen po las 'byung ba la/_ji ltar sangs rgyas pa dang*/_de'i rang bzhin ngos bzung ba dang*/_thub pa'i mdzad pa bye brag tu bshad pa ste gsum las/_
[\[31a.5\]]dang po ji ltar sangs rgyas pa ni/_sa bcu rgyun gyi mtha' mar rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis yongs su spangs pa mthar phyin pa dang*/_shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i don ma lus pa mngon sum du mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i 
[\[31a.6\]]rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i byang chub chen po thob pa ni/_dper na rin po che snod du bcug pa sgrib byed kyi snod legs par bsal ba na mngon sum du gyur pa lta bu ste/_rgyan las/_sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid thob/_/rin chen snod ni phye ba ltar/_/sangs 
[\[31a.7\]]rgyas nyid ni yang dag bstan/_/zhes so/_/gnyis pa de'i rang bzhin ngos bzung ba ni/_dang po rang don phun sum tshogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang*/_gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa sprul pa'i sku ste/_de gnyis ka'i rten chos kyi sku dang*/_sku gsum gyis bsdus pa'i 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]rang bzhin can du sangs rgyas pa ste/_rgyan las/_sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi/_/sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste/_/sku gsum dag gis rang bzhin gyi/_/don 'di rten dang brten par bstan/_/zhes pa ste/_de'ang dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang*/_spang 
[\[31b.2\]]bya glo bur gyi dri mas dag pa'i rang bzhin gang la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' yang*/_lhun gyis grub cing chags thogs mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen brtse nus pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don 'bad pa med pa nyid du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi sku ste/_sku gsum grub pa las/_dri med de bzhin nyid dang 
[\[31b.3\]]ni/_/mi rtog ye shes ma gtogs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos gzhan ni/_/'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid zag pa med pa'i yon tan dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i chos kyi dbyings dag pa gnyis ldan mngon du gyur pa'i cha nas ngo bo nyid kyi skur 'jog 
[\[31b.4\]]ste/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni/_/zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag_/thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa/_/de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/_/zhes so/_/de nyid 'og min chen por rgyal sras 'phags pa rnams la mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang 
[\[31b.5\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i skur snang ba ste/_mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_/dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di/_/theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/_/thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/_/ces so/_/de nyid gdul bya mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang 
[\[31b.6\]]mthun par rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs pas sems can gyi don rgyun mi chad par mdzad pa ni/_gang gis srid pa ji srid par/_/'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag_/mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni/_/thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi chad/_/ces gsungs so/_/des na gong du ji skad bshad 
[\[31b.7\]]pa rnams kyang gdul bya drang ba'i don du 'jig rten dang tshul mthun par bstan pa yin gyi/_nges pa'i don gyi dbang las ni bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa'i gong rol du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi zhing gcig tu gyur pa der/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]po'i tog ces bya bar sangs rgyas shing*/_da dung yang 'tshang rgya ba dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis gzhan don mdzad par yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las bshad de/_ji skad du/_sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing*/_/sems can yongs su 
[\[32a.2\]]smin mdzad phyir/_/dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/_/bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang*/_/da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/_/zhes dang*/_da dung dang po thugs bskyed par/_/de dang der ni yongs bstan te/_/da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod/_/
[\[32a.3\]]sangs rgyas mang po ston par mdzad/_/ces dang*/_de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las/_bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shAkya'i rigs su skye bar ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gsum 
[\[32a.4\]]pa thub pa'i mdzad pa bye brag tu bshad pa ni/_spyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma chen pos legs par brgyan pa'i bskal pa 'di la/_'phags pa bskal pa bzang po las ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag gcig 'byon par bstan te/_gang dag bstan pa de rnams kyang so 
[\[32a.5\]]so'i yul dang*/_rigs dang*/_'od dang*/_yab dang*/_yum dang*/_sras dang*/_rim gro pa dang*/_shes rab can gyi mchog dang*/_rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog dang*/_'dus pa'i grangs dang*/_sku tshe'i tshad dang*/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i tshad dang*/_sku gdung ste rnam pa 
[\[32a.6\]]bcu gsum mam mchod rten yod pa 'byung ba ltar na bcu bzhi re'i sgo nas bstan to/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo sdelas kyang*/_bskal pa 'di nyid du sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang*/_gser thub dang*/_'od srungs dang*/_shAkya thub pa nas mos pa la thug pa'i 
[\[32a.7\]]bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa stong 'byung ba sngon gyi lo rgyus dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis rgyas par bstan to/_/de bzhin du snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po las kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di la thub pa'i nyi ma stong dang lnga 'byung ba/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos lung bstan pa'i 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]lo rgyus dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar bstan to/_/ji ltar bstan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa de dag las bzhi par gyur pa thub pa'i dbang po 'di nyid kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das kho na las gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i yul las ring du gyur pa nyid do/_/de lta na'ang ston pa 'di 
[\[32b.2\]]nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i gdul bya grangs kyi nges pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_mdzad pa'i gtso bo rnams ni sde tshan bcu gnyis kyi grangs su don gyis 'du bar mdo sde rnams su gsungs pa dang*/_de dag dang rjes su mthun par mgon po byams pas theg pa chen 
[\[32b.3\]]po rgyud bla ma las/_skye ba mngon par skye ba dang*/_/dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang*/_/lhums su 'jug dang bltams pa dang*/_/bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang*/_/btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa dang*/_/nges 'byung dka' ba spyod pa dang*/_/byang chub snying por gshegs pa 
[\[32b.4\]]dang*/_/bdud sde 'joms dang rdzogs par ni/_/byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo dang*/_/mya ngan 'das par gshegs mdzad rnams/_/yongs su ma dag zhing rnams su/_/srid pa ji srid gnas par ston/_/zhes gsungs pa'i go rim dang rjes su mthun par mdo tsam zhig gleng bar bya'o/_/
[\[32b.5\]]de las dang po dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i mdzad pa la/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar bskul ba dang*/_bskul nas 'pho bar brtsams pa'o/_/dang po ni/_bdag cag gi ston pa thugs rje dpag tu med pa'i bdag nyid can 'di bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba tshe 'phos te dga' ldan gyi 
[\[32b.6\]]gnas su lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po'i skye ba bzhes te/_der skye ba blangs nas dga' ldan chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzang du seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas lha'i 'khor dpag tu med pa la chos ston cing bzhugs pa la/_lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pas mdun bdar te/_chos 
[\[32b.7\]]kyi sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs rnams kyi mchod pa mang pos mngon par mchod pa byed do/_/dus ji tsam zhig na/_dzam+bu'i gling pa rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab pa dang*/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang*/_phyogs bcu'i zhing gi stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]rol mo'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don du bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang*/_/blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa/_/mtshungs med stobs mang sgyu rtsal rgya che ba/_/mar me mdzad 
[\[33a.2\]]kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod/_/ces bya ba la sogs pas skul bar byed do/_/ji ltar bskul ba'i tshig gi phreng ba de dag sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des rjes su sems shing rjes su dgongs pa na/_da ste kho bo cag gis dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro ba'i dus la nges par bab bo zhes rtse gcig tu dgongs 
[\[33a.3\]]shing re zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/gnyis pa ni/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rgyal mtshan mthon por gshegs nas seng ge'i khri ga la ba der bzhugs so/_/de na dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris mtha' dag bsdus nas 'khor de dag la/_grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus 
[\[33a.4\]]bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa ltos shig ces bskul ba dang*/_phyogs bcu kun tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma pa la mngon du phyogs pa/_lha'i 'khor gyis bskor ba 'chi 'pho ba'i rnam pas chos snang ba'i sgo yang 
[\[33a.5\]]dag par ston pa grangs med pa bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor de dag la chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad bstan pas/_lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyangs pa byas pa sum khri nyis 
[\[33a.6\]]stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du khyab par gyur to/_/de nas dzam+bu'i gling du gshegs par dgongs 
[\[33a.7\]]nas gzigs pa bzhi'am lngas gzigs te/_de'ang 'gro ba gdul sla ba tshe lo brgya pa'i dus dang*/_gling ni dzam+bu'i gling dang*/_yul ni dbus 'gyur 'chang dang*/_rigs ni rgyal rigs te bzhi'am/_rigs dang*/_dus dang*/_yul dang*/_rus dang*/_bud med de lnga la gzigs so/_/de nas byang 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]chub sems dpas 'khor rnams la kho bo dzam+bu'i gling du 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes gsungs pas/_de thos pa'i mod la lha rnams shin tu yid mi dga' bar gyur te smras pa/_dga' ldan gyi gnas 'dir khyed kyis bzhugs par mi mdzad na slan chad ston par 'os pa su zhig_/gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling ni 
[\[33b.2\]]'od srungs rdzogs byed la sogs pa'i rtog ge pa drug dang*/_bram ze rgyus rgal la sogs pa'i rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang*/_rengs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la sogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa drug ste/_mu stegs kyi ston pa bco brgyad kyis ma rungs par bgyis pas 'di nyid du bzhugs par rigs so zhes gsol ba 
[\[33b.3\]]dang*/_de dag la byang chub sems dpas dung gcig gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dpe rjes su bstan nas/_de bzhin du ngas kyang dzam+bu'i gling du song la de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsis 'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya'o/_/des na kho bo ni ma'i mngal du ji lta bu'i gzugs 
[\[33b.4\]]kyis 'gro bar bgyi zhes gsungs pa dang*/_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pas bram ze'i rig byed las 'byung ba ltar glang po che dam pa'i gzugs kyis 'jug par rigs so zhes gsol ba ltar/_de lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'jug par dgongs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa 
[\[33b.5\]]na/_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi mthar thug par gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis rjes su thos nas byang chub sems dpa' dzam+bu'i gling du gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/_bdag cag gi byas pa ma shes par 'gyur bar bsams nas/_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa'i 
[\[33b.6\]]lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang*/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang*/_'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang*/_dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang*/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'bum dang*/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha drug khri dang*/_tshangs ris kyi lha drug khri brgyad stong dang*/_'og min gyi lha brgya stong mang po yang byang chub 
[\[33b.7\]]sems dpa' lhums su 'jug pa nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du phan pa'i sems dang dga' ba'i sems kyis zham ring du 'brang zhing rtag tu bsrung ba'i phyir chas te/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po yang mchod pa'i phyir lhags so/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs pas kyang mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho 
[\[34a.2\]]bston pa'i drung du nye bar lhags so/_/ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dag gis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_rang rang gi mchod pa'i bye brag dpag tu med pas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa yongs su bkang ste mngon par mchod bzhin pas dus 'da' 
[\[34a.3\]]bar bgyis so/_/gnyis pa lhums su zhugs pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de nas sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga'i rgyu skar rgyal la bab pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang*/_lha'i tshogs de dag gis kun nas yongs su bskor zhing mdun bdar nas/_dga' ldan gyi 
[\[34a.4\]]gnas nas bskyod pa'i tshe 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par bran te/_sa gzhi rnam pa bco brgyad du g.yos shing*/_lha bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag gis lhags pa dang spyi bos byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i 
[\[34a.5\]]gzhal med khang 'degs pa dang bcas te/_nam gyi gung la zas gtsang ma'i khyim du ngo mtshar ba'i snga ltas brgyad kyis yongs su dkrigs pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' ni glang po'i phru gu dam pa kha ba dang dngul dang ku mu dA ltar dkar ba'i rnam pas sgyu 'phrul dga' ma'i glo 
[\[34a.6\]]g.yas pa nas zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas logs su lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa'i khang bzang chung ngu rin po che'i bkod pa mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/_gru bzhi pa/_ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sngon legs 
[\[34a.7\]]par spyad pa'i mthu las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mchod pa'i sprin dpag tu med pa'i bkur sti dang bcas te bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma'i rmi lam du yang de ltar du snang bar gyur te/_ji skad du/_glang po kha ba dngul mdog che ba drug_/_rkang lag rab mdzes mgo 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bo dmar sdug pa/_/'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa/_/glang po mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed/_/des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang*/_/ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te/_/lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas/_/bsam gtan mnyam 
[\[34b.2\]]par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur/_/zhes pa ltar gyi rnam pas lhums su zhugs so/_/gsum pa bltams pa'i mdzad pa la/_ji ltar bltams pa dang*/_bltams pa'i ltas kyi khyad par ro/_/dang po ni/_de ltar yum gyi lhums su zla ba bcu rdzogs par gnas nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul mas byang chub 
[\[34b.3\]]sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par shes nas rgyal po la gsol pa dang*/_rgyal pos 'khor rnams la ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du lum+bi nI'i tshal gyi kho ra khor yug thams cad yid du 'ong bar brgyan te/_rin po che'i phreng ba dang lha'i gos dag gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa'i 
[\[34b.4\]]shing rta mchog gi nang du lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma zhugs pa la/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang*/_tshangs pa dang*/_dbang po la sogs pas mchod cing*/_shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris mdun du bdar/_shAkya bzhi khri dang*/_dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i dpung tshogs go cha dang 
[\[34b.5\]]mtshon cha thogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bsrungs shing*/_lha dang*/_klu dang*/_dri za dang*/mi'am ci dang*/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams re re la yang brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 
[\[34b.6\]]pa rnams rjes su 'brangs te lum+bi nI'i tshal ga la ba der zhugs so/_/nags tshal dam pa de na shing ljon pa ji snyed yod pa rnams kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang*/_me tog dang*/_'bras bu'i khur gyis yongs su dud par gyur pa la lha rnams kyis rgyan thams cad kyis kyang brgyan par 
[\[34b.7\]]byas so/_/der shing rta las bde bar bab nas nags dang shing drung rnams su 'chag cing song ba na/_sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi yum gyis kyang bsten pa'i shing p+lak+Sha zhes bya ba lo ma dang*/_me tog dang*/_'bras bu sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'i sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu stug por skyes pa der byon pa na p+lak+Sha des kyang mngon par btud de phyag byas so/_/de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis shing de'i yal ga la 'jus te cung zad bzhugs pa'i glo g.yas pa nas khye'u byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'od dang 'od zer gyi phung 
[\[35a.2\]]po rab tu dkrigs pa'i snang ba chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mur thug pa med pa thams cad kyang rgyas par 'gengs pa dang bcas te/_rmi lam gyi ltad mo'i ya mtshan nyams su myong ba bzhin du gnod pa med par bltams so/_/ji ltar bltams pa'i mod de la tshangs pa dang brgya 
[\[35a.3\]]byin gnyis kyis kA shi ka'i ras mchog dri ma med pa'i sleb mos dran shes bzhin du blangs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas nye bar spyad pa'i khang bzang ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod pa'i phyir bteg go_/de nas sa la bab ma thag tu sa'i lha mos 
[\[35a.4\]]pad+ma dkar po shin tu rgyas pa gdan du phul lo/_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis nam mkha'i mthongs nas bsil ba dang dro ba'i rgyun gyis khrus byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas phyogs drug tu gom pa bdun bdun bor te/_'jig rten gsum na mtshungs pa 
[\[35a.5\]]med par bya bar dam bca' ba'i tshig rnams seng ge'i sgra nyid du bsgrags pas gom pa gang dang gang du bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma rnams brtol te phyung ngo*/_/gnyis pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams su sa g.yo ba dang*/_lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang*/_phyogs thams cad 'od 
[\[35a.6\]]kyis gang ba dang*/_yul chen po bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi la sras bzhi yang btsas pa dang*/_ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya dang*/_grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i bu mo brgyad brgya dang*/_'dun pa la sogs pa'i bran lnga brgya dang*/_bsngags ldan la sogs pa'i rte'u nyi khri dang*/_ba 
[\[35a.7\]]lang gi be'u khri rnams kyang btsas so/_/gzhan yang gling gi dbus su byang chub kyi shing skyes pa dang*/_gter kha lnga stong dang*/_skyes mos tshal lnga brgya yang byung ngo*/_/mdor na sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad lhun gyis grub par gyur pas rgyal bu'i mtshan yang 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]don thams cad grub pa zhes btags so/_/rigs kyi lha mchod pa'i sar byon pas shAkya rnams kyi lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis gzhon nu'i zhabs la phyag byas pas lha'i lha zhes btags so/_/shAkya mur cor smra ba rnams kyi nang na lus ngag 'du 'dzis dben pa thub pa bzhin du 
[\[35b.2\]]bzhugs pas shAkya thub pa zhes btags so/_/de nas gzhon nu skye dgu'i bdag mo la gtad de/_ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pas rim gror byed cing bskyed bsrings so/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i dus kyi ltas ngo mtshar ba dag gis bskul te/_
[\[35b.3\]]ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong nag po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa snag gi tsha bo mes byin zhes bya ba dang mnyam du 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la lding zhing byung ngo*/_/ji tsam na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba der 
[\[35b.4\]]phyin pa dang rdzu 'phrul brtul te rkang gis 'ongs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang du phyin to/_/der rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras shig bltams par gyur pa de blta bar 'dod do/_/der rgyal pos bstan pa na/_de'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[35b.5\]]yod pa mthong ste/_'di ni gnyis su 'gyur gyis gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim la gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang*/_rab tu byung na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_rgya cher rol pa las/_'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dri med 
[\[35b.6\]]mnga' ba las/_/rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor byon/_/'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/gzhan yang lha'i bu dbang 
[\[35b.7\]]phyug chen po gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis mdun bdar te 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni gdon mi za bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan du bsgrags te/_ji 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]skad du/_'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang*/_/'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang*/_/mdzod spu nas ni rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las/_/bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar ro//_//
[\[36a.2\]]bzhi pa bzo'i gnas la mkhas par sbyangs pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de nas gzhon nu de cung zad cher son pa na/_bskal pa bye ba mang po'i gong nas bstan bcos thams cad la ma bslabs pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na'ang 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par bstan pa'i phyir/_khye'u stong phrag bcus 
[\[36a.3\]]yongs su bskor cing lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i tshogs mang pos 'dun gyis bltas te mchod pa'i dbus su byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba las yi ge bslab pa'i grar zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i phyag gis tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las 
[\[36a.4\]]byas pa'i gaN+Da lha'i tshon gyis byugs pa gser gyi yang mig gis btags pa/_mtha' mar nor bu rin po ches kun nas spras pa thogs te/_slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la/_yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi'i ming nas smos te/_kye mkhan po yi ge 'di rnams las bdag la gang dag bslab par 
[\[36a.5\]]bgyi zhes gsungs pas/_slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen nga rgyal ba yongs su chag ste/_ngo mtshar du gyur cing 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung ste smras pa/_sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che/_/bstan bcos kun las bslabs gyur kyang*/_/'jig rten 'jig rten rjes bsnyag phyir/_/yi ge'i grwar 
[\[36a.6\]]ni byon par gyur/_/yi ge gang gi ming dag kyang*/_/bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa/_/de ni 'di la byang gyur kyang*/_/yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to/_/zhes ched du brjod do/_/de'i tshe byis pa stong phrag bcu po la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus yi ge'i phyi mo gang dag bslabs pa las chos kyi sgo mo 
[\[36a.7\]]brgya stong grangs med pa byung ste thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu smin par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du rtsis dang*/_'phang dang*/_rtsal dang*/_chu'i rkyal la sogs pa'i sgo nas rigs dang*/_stobs dang*/_rig pa'i gtsug lag gis kun nas khengs pa'i dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis mnan te 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]'jig rten na 'gran zla med pa nyid du mdzad do/_/de ltar yang mdo las/_mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa/_/grangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang*/_/'jig rten bzo yi sbyor ba tshad med mang po dag_/bskal pa bye mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslabs/_/'on kyang skye 
[\[36b.2\]]bo'i rjes su mthun pa tsam mdzad de/_/byis pa mang po theg pa mchog la smin mdzad dang*/_/sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi med dgod pa'i phyir/_/shin tu lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar ro/_/de nas gzhon nu de gzhon nu'i tshogs mang po dang 
[\[36b.3\]]thabs cig tu zhing pa'i grong du lta zhing dong ste/_rim gyis zhing blas kyi mtha'i skyed mos tshal du phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pus byon te dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas bsam gtan bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[36b.4\]]sku ni shing gi grib mas ma spangs par bzhugs so/_/skabs der phyi rol gyi drang srong rdzu 'phrul thob pa lngas nam mkha' nas 'ongs pa byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin pa na 'gro bar ma nus par ngo mtshar skyes te tshigs su bcad pas bstod cing lan gsum du bskor ba byas te song ngo*/_/de'i tshe 
[\[36b.5\]]rgyal po zas gtsang gis/_/thub pa gang tshe bltams pa dang*/_/gang tshe 'od ldan bsam gtan mdzad/_/'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su/_/mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes pa'i bstod pa phul lo/_/lnga pa btsun mo'i 'khor du dgyes par rol pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de nas 
[\[36b.6\]]shAkya rgan rabs rnams 'dus te rgyal po zas gtsang la/_gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdung mi 'chad pa'i phyir khab mdzad par gsol ba na/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_de ltar bgyi na 'on kyang gzhon nu nyid la dri bar bya'o/_/de nas de dag 'dus te don de dag gzhon 
[\[36b.7\]]nu la gsol lo/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i skyon mtha' yas pa rig nas re zhig ma gnang ngo*/_/yang des rnam par brtags nas thabs la mkhas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir dang*/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_kha na ma tho ba spang bar bstan pa'i phyir dang*/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang dag byung ba rnams kyi rjes su bslab pa'i phyir slar gsungs pa/_'dam dang ljan ljin khrod na pad+ma rnam par 'phel/_/mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob/_/gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa/_/
[\[37a.2\]]de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul/_/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba/_/de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras dang slas kyang bsten/_/'on kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams/_/bdag kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya/_/zhes dang*/_bud 
[\[37a.3\]]med kyi yon tan thams cad tshigs su bcad par bris nas yab la phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bram ze mdun na 'don la/_tshul 'di dang mthun pa'i bud med gang du yod pa rtog cig ces bsgo ba na des kyang ser skya'i grong khyer thams cad du bltas pa'i tshe shAkya lag na be con gyi bu mo 
[\[37a.4\]]zhig la yon tan de dag yongs su tshang ba mthong nas rgyal po la gsol lo/_/rgyal pos shAkya lag na be con can du pho nya btang nas dgug par brtsams so/_/de'i tshe lag na be con gyis smras pa/_'phags pa gzhon nu de ni pho brang na skyid nge bar 'khrungs pa lags la/_bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos 
[\[37a.5\]]ni sgyu rtsal shes pa ste/_sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/_gzhon nu de la ji ltar gtong*/_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag gsol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir smras pa/_grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal 
[\[37a.6\]]'gran pa mchis na/_de dag gi mdun du bdag gis sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i grong khyer chen po kun du dril bsgrags te sgyu rtsal 'gran par dam bcas so/_/de nas ji tsam na sgyu rtsal 'gran pa thams cad kyi thog mar gzhon nu lhas byin grong khyer nas byung 
[\[37a.7\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon pa glang po che'i mchog cig sgo na yod pa thal mos bsnun te bsad do/_/de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung nas glang po'i ro de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon te byung 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]nas/ro de shing rta la gnas bzhin du rkang pa'i mthe bos blangs te rwa ba bdun rim dang*/_'obs bdun rim brgal ba'i phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tu 'phangs pas sa phyogs de na gshong chen po zhig tu gyur pa la glang po'i gshong zhes bya bar grags so/_/de'i tshe nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khod 
[\[37b.2\]]pa'i lha rnams 'di skad ces smra'o/_/glang po'i dbang po bde ba bzhin bzhud pa/_/zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs/_/rwa ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs 'das nas/_/grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/_/mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon mi zar/_/nga rgyal stobs kyis mtho 
[\[37b.3\]]ba'i lus can rnams/_/'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du/_/shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu dag gis sgyu rtsal ston pa'i sa phyogs der dong ste/_thog mar slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste yi ge dang*/_de bzhin du shAkya srid sgrub yod 
[\[37b.4\]]par rtsis dang*/_de'i 'og tu mchongs pa dang*/_rkyal dang*/bang la sogs pa dang*/_gzhan yang stobs 'gyed pa dang*/_'phong dang rkyal la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'gran pa thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' nyid ni 'gran zla med par gyur te lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba brgya stong phrag mang po tshim 
[\[37b.5\]]zhing mgu la rangs te/_e ma a la la zhes bya ba'i ca co dang ga zha mang po sprin gyi sgra bzhin du sgrogs par gyur te/_shAkya lag na be con gyis kyang rang gi bu mo btsun mo'i mchog tu 'phul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir/_sa 'tsho ma dang grags 
[\[37b.6\]]'dzin ma dang*/_ri dwags skyes ma la sogs pa'i bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshogs kyi nang du bzhugs te dga' zhing rtse ba'i rnam pas sems can gyi don mdzad do/_/drug pa nges par 'byung ba'i mdzad pa la/_mngon par 'byung ba'i rkyen dang*/_ji ltar mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul lo/_/
[\[37b.7\]]dang po ni/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khab tu bzhugs nas bgrang ba'i gzhi nyi shu rtsa dgur son pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung bar bskul 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]ba'i phyir 'di skad du 'byin par byed de/_sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni/_/'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing*/_/phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces/_/khyod kyis sngon ni smon 
[\[38a.2\]]lam de skad btab/_/dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang*/_/'gro phan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos/_/'di ni khyod kyi dus dran tshod yin gyis/_/drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byos/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa byung bas bskul te byang chub 
[\[38a.3\]]sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba la rtse gcig tu phyogs par gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal gzigs pa'i phyir byon pas/_grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas 'thon pa dang*/_lam ka na gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lhas sprul pa'i mi zhig 
[\[38a.4\]]rgas shing 'khogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang*/_lho phyogs kyi sgo nas byon pa'i lam ka na na ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang*/_nub phyogs kyi sgo nas byon pa'i lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa khyogs la bzhag ste/_nye du'i tshogs kyis mtha' bskor nas 
[\[38a.5\]]smre sngags 'don pa dang*/_byang phyogs kyi sgo nas byon pa'i lam ka na dge slong zhi ba dang dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa rnams rim pa bzhin du gzigs pas khyim gyi nyes dmigs dang thar pa'i phan yon rjes su dran pa'i rkyen byas te/_shing rta mchog de slar 
[\[38a.6\]]bsgyur nas grong khyer du zhugs so/_/de ltar mngon par 'byung bar skul bar byed pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa ji ltar gzigs pa de dag rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos pas bud med rnams la gzhon nu mngon par mi 'byung ba'i glu dang rol mo rgyun mi chad pa sbyor 
[\[38a.7\]]cig_mgu bar 'gyur ba'i bud med kyi sgyu yang ston cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas phas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byung ba mi rigs so snyam nas/_mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na yab kyi khang pa na byon te gsungs pa/_lha gcig bdag ni mngon par 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'byung ba'i dus bab rigs/_/gegs kyang ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig_/rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par gsol/_/de'i tshe yab kyis rnam pa du mas lan gsum du bshol yang bzlog par ma spobs te/_mthar khyod kyi 
[\[38b.2\]]bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces smras so/_/gnyis pa ni/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ngo*/_/nam nangs pa dang zas gtsang gis dngos po de dag shAkya rnams la bsnyad pas thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar bgros te/_grong khyer 
[\[38b.3\]]ser skya'i sgo 'byed pa na rgyang grags su grag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam por bcug ste grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang*/_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang*/_sum mdo thams cad nas dmag gis yongs su bskor bar byas so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i grogs su 
[\[38b.4\]]lhags pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po la la ni bud med kyi tshogs dang dmag gi tshogs rnams gnyid kyis myos par byas so/_/la las ni mchod pa'i las byed do/_/la las ni chab sgo 'byed par byed do/_/la las ni skyes pa dang bud med dang rta dang glang po che 
[\[38b.5\]]la sogs pa'i sgra mi grag par byed do/_/la las ni btsun mo'i 'khor mi sdug par sgyur bar byed pa dang*/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes sgom par byed do/_/sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi yang mngon du byed do/_/
[\[38b.6\]]de nas khang bzang gi steng du byon nas byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas thams cad la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas te bltas pas/_lha'i dbang po dang*/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang*/_lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug 
[\[38b.7\]]pa mthong ngo*/_/de'i tshe nam mkha' la skar ma rgyal shar ba yang mthong bar gyur te/_'dun pa la smras pa/_nga yi bkra shis 'di ni don kun grub/_/do mod gdon mi za bar don grub kyis/_/'dun pa phyi shol ma byed la gor du/_/rta rgyal rgyan gyis 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]brgyan pa'ang nga la byin/_/des kyang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba shes nas lan mang du bzlog kyang 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rjes su bstan te bzlog par ma nus par rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan zhes bya ba rgyan gyis brgyan pa 
[\[39a.2\]]phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la bcibs pa'i mod la 'jig rten skyong ba chen po bzhis nam mkha' la bteg ste byon pa na/_tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis lam bstan pa dang*/_lha bye ba khrag khrig gis mdun bdar te gshegs so/_/de ltar mngon par 
[\[39a.3\]]byung nas/_me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas/_dpag tshad drug tu phyin pa nam nangs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta las bab nas 'dun pa phyir btang nas/_mchod rten rnam dag gi drung du ral gri ut+pa la mthing ga 'dra bas 
[\[39a.4\]]bdag gi gtsug phud bcad do/_/de'i tshe dbu skra ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhas mchod pa'i phyir bteg go_/der rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mthun pa'i gos yid la byas pa tsam nas/_lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs su sprul pas ngur smrig gi gos phul ba blangs te/_
[\[39a.5\]]rang gi na bza' rin thang shin tu che ba'i kA shi pa de la byin no/_/ngur smrig gi gos de sku la gsol nas bdag nyid rang byung gi rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen pa rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de ltar yang*/_mkha' la rdul gnag du ba mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag_/mi chags bzhin du skyes 
[\[39a.6\]]mchog thugs mi chags/_/dri med yul gyi bde bas mi gos te/_/chu las pad+ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin/_/zhes so/_/bdun pa dka' ba spyad pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i gdul bya rnams la byang chub dam pa ni dka' ba 
[\[39a.7\]]spyad pa dpag tu med pas sgrub dgos so zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_de nas rim par yangs pa can du sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang*/_rgyal po'i khab tu rengs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang srid rtse'i sems ston pa rnams su byon te/_de 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dag gi tshul myur bar khong du chud par byas nas chos de dag gis nges par mi 'byung bar dgongs nas sun phyung ngo*/_/des na de bas lhag pa zhig btsal lo snyam du rkang gis ljongs rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyas su phyin pa'i shar phyogs na chu klung nai rAny+dza na gya gyur 'bab pa'i 
[\[39b.2\]]ngogs/_sa'i phyogs khod mnyam zhing nyams dga' ba mthong nas de nyid du bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma dzam+bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab pa/_sems can dman pa la mos pa/_mu stegs can gyi 
[\[39b.3\]]sdes gang ba/_lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa/_skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes pa/_bkra shis pa ma yin par bkra shis su 'du shes pa/_dag pa ma yin pa la dag par 'du shes pa kho na ste 'di dag rnams yang dag pa'i lam du bsrang ba'i phyir dang*/_
[\[39b.4\]]sems can las dang bya ba chud gson pa rnams chud mi 'dza' bar bstan pa'i phyir dang*/_brtul zhugs ngan pa dang dka' thub ngan pas dag par 'dzin pa rnams sun dbyung ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam par bya'o zhes dgongs nas lo drug tu 
[\[39b.5\]]mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go_/de nas dka' thub kho nas grol bar 'dzin pa yang dgag pa'i phyir kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu bskyed de/_de nas byang chub kyi snying po la gshegs par dgongs te/_de ltar tshig tu brjod 
[\[39b.6\]]pas/_de'i tshe lnga sde bzang pos rim gro byas shing*/_til 'bru gcig dang*/_'bras 'bru gcig dang*/_rgya shug 'bru gcig rnams phul ba yang bzhes so/_/de nas phyag dar khrod pa'i gos 'ga' zhig rnyed na snyam ste sems btud pa na/_grong pa'i bu mo 
[\[39b.7\]]legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba shi ba sha na'i ras kyis dkris te dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa de blangs te brgya byin gyis byin pa'i rdo la bzhag ste lag pa'i rdzing du bkrus pa las snam sbyar du drubs pa zhig dang*/_lha'i bu dri ma med pa zhes bya bas lha'i gos ngur smrig gi 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]tshon du btsos pa phul ba dag gsol te/_snga dror spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang*/_sngon du lha rnams kyis grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la ji ltar sbran pa ltar/_des ba nyis stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nying khur byas pa dang*/_'bras 
[\[40a.2\]]gsar pa dang phru ba gsar pa blugs te bsgrubs pas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/ji ltar stob pa legs par bzhes nas gser gyi yol go chu bo la bskyur ba klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos blangs so/_/de las kyang mig stong pas nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul te 'phrog 
[\[40a.3\]]par brtsams kyang*/_yang dbrog par ma nus par rang gi gzugs kyis bslangs nas sum cu rtsa gsum du khyer ro/_/de lta bu'i rags pa'i zas kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la lus snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang*/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[40a.4\]]gnyis dang*/_dpe byad brgyad cu dang*/_'od 'dom gang ba'i dpal rnams shin tu gsal ba byung ngo*/_/brgyad pa byang chub kyi snying po la gshegs pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de lta bu'i rags pa'i zas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sku lus stobs dang ldan par bskyed de/_shing 
[\[40a.5\]]gi rgyal po'i drung du skyes bu chen po'i stabs kyis gshegs so/_/der byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug dang*/_gzhan yang lha'i bu dang rgyal ba'i myu gu mang pos deng byang chub sems dpa' 'dir 'dug ste mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[40a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par byas te/_de'ang byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can dang*/_kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can dang*/_kha cig ni tsan+da na'i rang bzhin can dang*/_kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi 
[\[40a.7\]]rang bzhin can du yod pa la/_shing re re'i drung na'ang seng ge'i khri dang stan sna tshogs pa dag bshams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu skad cig nyid la byang chub kyi shing gi khri stan de 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par 'dug pa/_rgyal ba'i myu gu dang lha'i bu so so'i yid la'ang bdag gi khri la bzhugs kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no snyam par gyur pa de lta bu dag mdzad do/_/gzhan yang ri dang nags 
[\[40b.2\]]tshal la sogs pa rnams kyang byang chub kyi shing la mgo phyogs te 'khod do/_/de nas lam gyi g.yas phyogs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyis rtswa brnga ba la/_bkra shis rtswa dag nga la myur du byin/_/de ring nga la rtswas ni don chen 'gyur/_/dpung dang bcas 
[\[40b.3\]]pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su/_/byang chub dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_de ring nga la rtswa sbyin byas na ni/_/khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te/_/de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[40b.4\]]gsungs so/_/des kyang rtswa sngon shin tu 'jam pa phul ba khyer te/_byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas/_rtswa'i rtse mo nang du bstan te bting ba'i stan la skyil mo krung bcas te zhal shar du phyogs par bzhugs nas/_sku drang por bsrangs 
[\[40b.5\]]shing*/_dran pa mngon du bzhag ste yi dam du bcas pa/_stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung*/_/pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung*/_/bskal mang rnyed dka' byang chub ma thob bar/_/stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o/_/
[\[40b.6\]]zhes 'byung ba ltar ro/_/de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir phyogs kun du 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i tshe smin mtshams nas byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba 
[\[40b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas phyogs bcu kun du chos kyi dbyings mtha' klas par bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa bsdus te mchod pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po ga la bar 'dug pa dag mngon par bstan to/_/dgu pa bdud sde 'joms pa'i mdzad pa la/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]bdud kyis tho btsams pa dang*/_de ji ltar bcom pa'o/_/dang po ni/_byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug bdud sdig can la ma sbran par bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i go 'phang mngon du mi 'gyur bar dgongs nas/_
[\[41a.2\]]de dag bskul bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i smin mtshams nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/_bdud kyi gnas thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_de dag gi mdangs dang gzi brjid 
[\[41a.3\]]thams cad mog mog por byas so/_/'od kyi rtse mo las sgra 'di lta bu yang byung ste/_sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa/_/zas gtsang sras po rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/_/phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung*/_/byang 
[\[41a.4\]]chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim par gyis/_/zhes dang*/_bdud kyi gtso bo la mi dge ba'i rmi lam sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang byung bas shin tu ma rangs par gyur te rang gi 'khor rnams bsdus te byang chub sems dpa' gzhom pa'i phyir 'gro bar brtsams so/_/
[\[41a.5\]]de'i tshe bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas de ni thub par mi 'gyur ba'i ltas su nges pas/_der ma song na dge bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bzlog kyang bshol du ma btub bo/_/gnyis pa ni/_de nas bdud kyi dmag yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i dpung chen po 'thab 
[\[41a.6\]]mo la shin tu dpa' ba gnod sbyin dang*/_grul bum dang*/_lto 'phye chen po dang*/_srin po dang*/_yi dwags dang*/_sha za dang*/_keng rus kyi gzugs 'jigs su rung ba spu zing zhes byed pa/_mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa rnams gcig pa nas stong phrag pa'i 
[\[41a.7\]]bar du yod pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs pas lag pa brel ba/_stag dang*/_sbrul dang*/_phag pa dang*/_glang po dang*/_rta dang*/bong bu dang*/_rnga mo dang*/_spre'u dang*/_seng ge dang*/_dred kyi kha gdong dang ldan pa/_ral pa brdzes shing kha mig nas me 'bar ba'i rnam pa 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]can dag sprul te dpag tshad brgyad cu'i kho ra khor yug tu bkang nas 'ongs so/_/de'ang bdud kyi bu ded dpon la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa rnams ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yas rol du 'khod cing phyir zlog par byed do/_/bdud kyi 
[\[41b.2\]]phyogs la dga' ba rnams kyis ni g.yon rol nas bskul te byang chub sems dpa' la mtshon cha sna tshogs pas char du phab bo/_/ji snyed phab pa'i mtshon cha thams cad kyang skad cig gcig gis me tog gi phreng ba dang*/_me tog gi bla re dang*/_byang chub kyi shing mdzes par 
[\[41b.3\]]byed pa'i rgyan du gyur to/_/der bdud kyis smras pa/_khyod kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis thar pa ga la thob/_byang chub sems dpas 'jam pa'i gsung gis smras pa/_sdig can khyod kyis gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 
[\[41b.4\]]thob par zad do/_/ngas ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig du ma byas so/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_kho bos mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bgyis pa'i dpang po ni khyod nyid yod na/_khyod la ni dpang po su yang med do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[41b.5\]]dpas phyag g.yas pa mtshan gyi ri mos brgyan pa sa la bsnun te smras pa/_sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye 'khon med/_/'di ni bdag gi dpang ste bdag rdzun med/_/'di la khyod ni bdag gi dpang byos shig_/
[\[41b.6\]]ces gsungs ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i rum nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas lus phyed rgyan gyis spras pa mngon par phyung ste/_skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no/_/khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te/_'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo/_/'on 
[\[41b.7\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi dpang du gyur pa dang tshad mar gyur pa dam pa'o zhes sgra chen pos brjod de mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe g.yon can dpung dang bcas pa yid mi bde ba dang skyengs bzhin par slar yang rjes su chags 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pas bslang bar nus sam mi nus sad par bya'o snyam nas/rang gi bu mo rnams sad pa'i phyir btang ngo*/_/de dag gis kyang ji ltar nus pa'i g.yo sgyu sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam pas bslus kyang ba spu'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yo bar ma nus te ched du brjod pa/_pad+ma 
[\[42a.2\]]dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal/_/mar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro ci 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba/_/srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig_/bdag nyid brgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol/_/
[\[42a.3\]]zhes pas bstod cing song ngo*/_/de'i tshe shing gi lha mo bcu drug gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la bstod par byed do/_/gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis ni bdud kyi sde rnam pa bcu drug gis nyams dmas par byed do/_/lha mang pos ni rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud phyir bzlog par byas kyang ma 
[\[42a.4\]]log ste/_slar yang mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'phen par byed kyang snga ma bzhin du gyur te/_mthar bdud kyi dpung thams cad mgo rmongs par gyur te/_lam yang stor nas zhag bdun du phrad pa med par 'thor bar gyur cing*/_de'i tshe bdud kyi ris mang pos kyang byang chub tu sems 
[\[42a.5\]]bskyed do/_/de ltar yang*/_mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa/_/de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod/_/gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang*/_/gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho'i chu 'byin dang*/_/skad cig gis 
[\[42a.6\]]ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba/_/des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/bcu pa mngon par byang chub pa'i mdzad pa ni/_de nas byang chub sems dpas nam gyi cha stod la ni bsam gtan bzhi mngon du mdzad do/_/gung thun 
[\[42a.7\]]la ni rig pa gsum bskyed de/_nam gyi cha smad skya rengs 'char ba rnga brdung ba'i tshod tsam la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang*/_bden pa bzhi mngon du byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba de bzhin 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la bzhugs so/_/de nas shing tA la bdun srid kyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_lam gyi rgyud ni chad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ched du rjod pas ched du brjod do/_/de'i tshe lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog pus mo nub pa tsam 
[\[42b.2\]]du gtor nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i skad cig de la sems can thams cad kyang de srid du mchog tu bde ba la reg pa dang*/_'od kyi snang ba chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams 
[\[42b.3\]]cad kyang phyag brkyang ste ka la ping+ka'i dbyangs kyis/_phyis kyi sangs rgyas de la bdag cag rnams ji ltar byang chub thob pa ltar khyod kyis kyang byang chub mngon du byas pa legs so zhes bya ba byin te chos kyi dag pa ba dag kyang bskur ro/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo rnams 
[\[42b.4\]]dang*/_lha'i bu dang*/_bdud dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pas bstod pa'i tshogs ji snyed pas bstod cing*/_me tog gi sil ma rnam pa sna tshogs pas phyogs kun nas 'thor ba'i mchod pas mchod do/_/bcu gcig pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdzad pa la/_thog mar bskul 
[\[42b.5\]]dgos par bstan pa dang*/_bskul bar zhal gyis bzhes pa dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dngos so/_/dang po ni/_de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun phrag bdun la rim pa ltar skyil mo krung ma bshig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs nas 
[\[42b.6\]]dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba myong ba dang*/_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten rgyang ring du 'chag pa dang*/_byang chub kyi shing la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa dang*/_shar gyi rgya mtsho nas nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar mi ring bar 'chag cing*/_bdud sdig can gyis 
[\[42b.7\]]mya ngan 'da' bar gsol ba btab kyang zhal gyis ma bzhes pa la bdud sems khong du chud par gyur pas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bslu ba'i sems kyis ston pa'i gan du 'ongs ba rgan mor byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_yul ngan gyi tshe klu btang bzung gi gnas su bzhugs pa dang*/_
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]shing n+ya gro d+har skyong du bzhud pa'i tshe kun du rgyu la sogs pas dpyas 'dogs pa la ched du brjod pa gsungs pa dang*/_shing sgrol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs te tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis kyis sbrang rtsi dang*/_skyo ma dang bu ram gyi shing bshus pa 
[\[43a.2\]]rnams phul ba la sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis snod kyi rnam pa ci 'dra bas bzhes par dgongs pa de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi me tog gis bkang ste phul ba gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas de nyid du bzhes par mdzad do/_/de nas tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po 
[\[43a.3\]]gnyis kyis ba stong gi 'o ma nying khur byas pa'i spris ma rin po che'i gzhong par blugs te phul ba yang bzhes nas yol go de nyid du bor ba ni lha'i bu rab tshangs zhes bya bas mchod pa'i phyir khyer ro/_/de nas tshong dpon de gnyis la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams gsungs nas sbrang rtsi 'byung ba zhes 
[\[43a.4\]]bya ba'i sangs rgyas su lung bstan no/_/de nas ston pa thugs las chung ngur gnas par dgongs te/_zab zhi rdul bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas/_/bdud rtsi'i chos ni bdag gis thob par gyur/_/bdag gis bstan kyang gzhan gyis mi shes te/_/mi smrar nags 'dabs gnas par bya ba snyam/_/zhes 
[\[43a.5\]]gsungs so/_/gnyis pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can ma rig pas ldongs pa rnams la rjes su brtse ba mi mnga' ba ma yin yang*/_ma bskul bar chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor bar bstan pa'i phyir/_slar gsungs pa/_'jig rten kun la snying brtse mtha' yas nga*/_/gzhan gyis gsol 
[\[43a.6\]]ba btab la nga mi sdod/_/skye bo 'di dag tshangs la dad pa ste/_/de yis gsol ba btab na 'khor lo bskor/_/zhes gsungs nas smin mtshams nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba'i 'od phyung ngo*/_/de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis rig nas/_rang gi 'khor 
[\[43a.7\]]tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/_'phags pa'i nor la sems can dag ni mgron gnyer te/_/srog chags bye ba mang po dbugs phyung mdzad nas ni/_/gang slad mi gsung 'gro la btang 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]snyoms mdzad pa 'di/_/'jig rten rtsa lag khyod la rigs pa ma lags so/_/chos kyi dam pa'i rnga bo che ni brdung du gsol/_/dam pa'i chos kyi drung ni myur du 'bud du gsol/_/chos kyi mchod sdong chen po bsgreng bar mdzad du gsol/_/chos kyi mar me chen po sbar bar mdzad du gsol/_/
[\[43b.2\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pas bskul ba la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas dga' ba mchog tu skyes nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/slar yang thugs las chung ngur bzhugs pa tshangs pas rig nas brgya byin dang lhan cig tu 'ongs te brgya byin gyis/_zla ba nya ba gza' las thar ba ltar/_/
[\[43b.3\]]khyod kyi thugs ni rnam par grol ba lags/_/g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol/_/'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol/_/zhes dang*/_tshangs pas kyang slar yang gsol ba btab bo/_/de dag gi tshe yang cang mi gsung bar gyur pa rig nas de dag 'khor dang bcas 
[\[43b.4\]]pa yang yid mi dga' bzhin du mi snang bar gyur to/_/slar yang tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis yul ma ga d+hA pa'i mi rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyis ji ltar btud pa de lta bu yang rig nas/_slar yang ljon pa sgrol rgyu'i drung thams cad du lha'i snang bas snang 
[\[43b.5\]]bar byas te 'ongs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ma ga d+hA yi yul 'dir sngon chad chos/_/ma dag dri mas rjes su 'brel ba byung*/_/bdud rtsi'i sgo mo dbye bar mdzod cig chos/_/rdul bral dri ma med pa bstan du gsol/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bskul lo/_/de ltar tshangs pa gtsug phud 
[\[43b.6\]]can gyis lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab pa'i mthar/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad la gzigs nas ma nges pa dang*/_legs par nges pa dang*/_yang dag par nges pa ste gsum du gnas pa las/ma nges pa la gzigs te gsungs pa/_tshangs pa ma ga 
[\[43b.7\]]d+hA yi sems can gang*/_/skal bar ldan zhing rigs dang ldan gyur la/_/mi 'tshe 'du shes rtag tu chos nyan pa/_/de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo dbye'o/_/zhes gsungs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar zhal gyis 'ches par mdzad do/_/gsum pa ni/_de nas sngon gyi drang srong rnams 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gnas wA rA Na sI ga la ba der chos gsungs pa'i dgongs pa bzhag ste/_de'ang thog mar gdul bar bya ba ni rnam pa bzang ba/_gdul sla ba/_sbyong sla ba/_dug gsum gyi stobs chung ba/_rnam par shes pa klog tu ma gyur pa ste/_gal te 
[\[44a.2\]]chos thos par ma gyur na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i rigs can zhig la bstan par bya'o dgongs pa dang*/_lhag spyod dang ring 'phur dag ni 'das par gyur pa gzigs nas/_de bas lnga sde bzang po rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pas/_de dag 
[\[44a.3\]]kyang wA rA Na sI'i drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags na 'khod pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing grong khyer chen po wA rA Na sI ga la bar byon nas/_der bsod snyoms bzhes te zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/_drang srong lhung bar gshegs so/_/lnga sdes ston pa byon pa 
[\[44a.4\]]mthong ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma lhod pa/_mang du za ba/_spong ba las nyams pa de 'ongs kyi sus kyang bsu bar mi bya'o/_/ldang bar mi bya'o/_/chos gos dang lhung bzed blang bar mi bya'o/_/stan dang yongs su spyad par 'os pa'i btung ba dang rkang pa zhag pa yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/stan lhag 
[\[44a.5\]]ma gzhan ni ma gtogs te 'dod na 'dug cig par brjod do zhes 'og khrims bcas te/_kun shes kyis sems kyis khas ma blangs so/_/de nas ston pa byon pa dang lnga sdes ma bzod par khrims dral te stan las langs nas/la las bsu/_la las stan bting*/_la las zhabs 
[\[44a.6\]]bkru ba'i chu bshams nas khyod legs par byon tam/_stan 'di la bzhugs shig ces gsol pa dang*/_ston pas gdan la bzhugs nas lnga sde dag mgu bar bya ba'i gtam mang po mdzad do/_/lnga sde tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma'i dbang po ni gsal lo/_/pags pa ni yongs su dag na ye shes 
[\[44a.7\]]mthong ba'i khyad par cung zad mngon du mdzad dam/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la tshe dang ldan pa zhes ma brjod cig_khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang mi bde bar gyur ta re/_dge slong dag ngas ni bdud rtsi thob bo/_/'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]du byas so/_/nga ni sangs rgyas so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/thams cad gzigs pa'o/_/bsil bar gyur pa'o/_/zag pa zad pa'o/_/chos thams cad la dbang ba'o/_/dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos bshad kyis tshur shog_/nyon ciganan tan gyis shig_/rna ba lhogs shig dang*/_
[\[44b.2\]]ngas gdams shing rjes su bstan no zhes sogs nas/_khyod kyis 'og khrims 'di ltar ma bcas sam zhes bya ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa dang*/_de dag gis mu stegs kyi rtags rnams skad cig de nyid la med par gyur te dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur gyur to/_/de dag 
[\[44b.3\]]gis kyang nyes pa bshags te gus pa yang bskyed do/_/de nas ston pas sku bsil nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sngon gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang du bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor snyam pa dang*/_sa phyogs der rin po che'i khri stong glo bur du byung ba'i khri snga ma gsum la bskor 
[\[44b.4\]]ba mdzad de/_khri bzhi pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od bkye bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas so/_/ltas chen po rnam pa bco brgyad byung zhing*/_'od de las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra 
[\[44b.5\]]byung ba/_'jig rten thugs rje bskyed nas su/_/thub pa yis ni snang ba mdzad/_/de ni thugs dam brtan pa ste/_/wA rA Na sI ri dwags nags/_/gshegs te 'khor lo bla med pa/_/shin tu rmad byung dpal ldan bskor/_/rgyal bas bskal pa khrag khrig bsgrubs/_/chos de nyan 
[\[44b.6\]]par gang 'dod pa/_/des ni rings par la gor du/_/chos nyan pa yi phyir shog cig_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras bskul te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gang dag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang*/_brgya byin dang*/_tshangs pa dang*/_'jig rten skyong ba la 
[\[44b.7\]]sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor dpag tu med pa 'dus te thams cad kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mgrin gcig tu gsol ba 'debs so/_/sa bla'i lha rnams kyis chos kyi khyams dpag tshad bdun brgya yod pa sprul to/_/lha rnams kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang*/_seng ge'i khri 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong bshams nas ston pa la phul te 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul lo/_/sngon gzhon nu sprin mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa'i tshe/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar smon lam btab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag chos kyi 'khor 
[\[45a.2\]]lo bskor ba zhes bya ba des/_gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa phul nas/_phyogs bcu dag nas sems can dam pa gang dag 'dir lhags pa/_/de dag thams cad 'jug pas bgrang bar nus pa ma lags te/_/btud cing thal mo sbyar nas zhabs gnyis la ni gtugs nas 
[\[45a.3\]]su/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor phyir shAkya'i rigs la dgyes par bskul/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas de'i nub mo nam gyi cha stod la cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/gung thun la yang dag par 'chag par 'gyur ba'i gtam rnams gsungs so/_/cha 
[\[45a.4\]]smad la lnga sde la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mtha' gnyis po 'di dag ni rab tu byung bas 'jug par bya ba ma yin te/_'dod pa bsod snyoms kyi mtha' dang*/_ngal zhing dub pa'i mtha'o/_/de bas mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to/_/de ni 'di 
[\[45a.5\]]lta ste 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do/_/dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ste gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal dang*/_kun 'byung dang*/_'gog pa dang*/_lam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang*/_lan dang pos bden pa bzhi'i ngo bo dang*/_yang dge slong dag 
[\[45a.6\]]sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon du bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam bstan par bya'o zhes sogs lan gnyis pas bden pa bzhi'i bya ba dang*/_yang dge slong dag sdug bsngal yongs su shes so/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs so/_/sdug 
[\[45a.7\]]bsngal 'gog pa mngon du byas so/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pas 'gro ba'i lam bstan no zhes lan gsum pa bden pa bzhi la mthar phyin par bzlas pa ste/_de ltar rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bzlas pa dang po la kauN+Di n+ya dang lha mang po 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]la mthong lam skyes/_gnyis pa la kauN+Di n+ya dgra bcom pa thob/_gzhan bzhi la mthong lam skyes/_gsum pa la bzhi pos kyang dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/de bzhin du gdul bya so so'i bsam pa dang mthun par/_bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang*/_tha ma legs par 
[\[45b.2\]]rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rnams bskor bar mdzad do/_/de dag gi bar skabs dang gzhan du yang rung ste lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad pa'i tshul 'dul ba'i sde snod la sogs pa nas 'byung ba'i don cung zad brjod na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor lnga sde dang 
[\[45b.3\]]bcas pa 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du 'chag kyin bzhugs pa na/_wA rA Na sI'i khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba bros te 'ongs pa dang*/_de btsal ba'i phyir rigs kyi gtso bo nyid byung ba gnyis ka la chos bstan pas mthong ba'i lam rtogs par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[45b.4\]]rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gang po dang dri med dang ba lang bdag dang lag bzang ste bzhi po dag kyang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mdzad do/_/de'i 'og tu wA rA Na sI'i grong mi'i gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rab tu byung bas dgra bcom pa thob par gyur te/_dus der 'jig rten 
[\[45b.5\]]na dgra bcom pa drug cur langs pa byung ngo*/_/de nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can du byon nas rjes su gdams pa bstan pas bzang sde tshogs drug cu dang*/_bram ze lha chung ma dang bcas pa rnams kyang bden pa mthong ba dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang*/_lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can zhes pa lo 
[\[45b.6\]]brgya dang nyi shu lon pa 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dad par gyur te tshur shog gis bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/de'i spun zla chu klung 'od srungs dang ga ya 'od srungs gnyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu re dang bcas pa'ang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de ltar dge slong stong phrag gcig dang 
[\[45b.7\]]thabs cig tu ga ya'i mgor byon te/_dge slong de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang*/_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang*/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul te cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis rjes su gdams pas thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzugs 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]can snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan 'dren par gsol ba ltar dgra bcom pa stong phrag gcig dang bcas pa ltang brang gi tshal mchod rten legs par rab gnas yod pa ga la ba der byon te/_der chos gsungs pas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dang lha brgyad khri tsam gyis kyang 
[\[46a.2\]]bden pa mthong ngo*/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'ong ma'i tshal zhes pa bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa de nyid bzhugs pa'i gnas su phul te/_ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar la bsnyen bkur ba bgyid par gsol lo/_/de'i tshe mu stegs kyi ston pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba shi nas/_de'i slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pa kun du rgyu nye rgyal 
[\[46a.3\]]dang pang na skyes gnyis la rta thul gyis chos bshad pas bden pa mthong nas/_slar yang de gnyis rang rang gi 'khor brgya lnga bcu re dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ba na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang*/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog zung du 'gyur bar lung bstan te tshur shog gis 
[\[46a.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs nas dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du ston pa dang mjal te/_de nyid du rjes su bstan pa thos pas bden pa mthong ngo*/_khyim bdag des kyang rgyal byed kyi tshal du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas 
[\[46a.5\]]pa ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par khas blangs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed dang*/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal zhes bya ba la sogs pa srog chags mang po yang dad pa la rab tu bkod do/_/de skabs shig tu rgyal po zas gtsang gis ston pa spyan 'dren pa'i phyir pho nya rim 
[\[46a.6\]]par btang ba rnams kyang rab tu byung nas phyir 'ong bar ma gyur pa dang*/_slar yang 'char kas zas gtsang gis bskur ba'i 'phrin yig thogs te dong pa yang shA ri'i bu la gtad de rab tu byung ngo*/_/de nas de nyid pho nya'i tshul tu btang bas/_des rgyal byed tshal gyi bkod pa ci 'dra ba'i gzugs brnyan 
[\[46a.7\]]rnams ri mor bris te bstan pas de nyid la dper byas te/_rgyal pos n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rwa ba'i gtsug lag khang dam pa brtsig go_/der bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'dab chags kyi rgyal po bzhin du lding ste byon pas rgyal po la sogs 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]pa'i 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dad par gyur pa dang*/_rdzu 'phrul brtul te chos kyi bdud rtsi legs par bstan pas zas gtsang dang lhas byin gnyis ma gtogs pa'i shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang*/_bre bo zas bdun khri drug stong dang*/_bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa bdun khri lnga stong rnams rgyun du 
[\[46b.2\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod de/_gzhan mang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la gzhol bar byas so/_/yab la phan gdags pa'i phyir maung gal gyi bu la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang po bstan du bcug ste/_bcom ldan 'das nyid ni n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rwa ba na lha rnams kyi khang bzang gi 
[\[46b.3\]]bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pa bskrun te de'i nang du lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'i tshe/_zas gtsang gis nang du son par ma nus par phyi rol du lus pa la/_ston pas khang bzang de nyid rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te de'i nang na sku ma 
[\[46b.4\]]bsgribs par bzhugs pa snang bar byas nas chos bstan pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/des na shAkya phal che ba dag gis bden pa mthong bas shAkya bzang ldan rgyal srid la bzhag par bgros te/_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rwa ba bcom ldan 'das la phul bas de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[46b.5\]]'das kyis yon yongs su bsngo ba mdzad do/_/zas gtsang gis ston pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi tshogs mang pos mdzes par bya ba'i phyir khyim re re nas kyang mi re re rab tu 'byung dgos par dril gyis bsgrags pas de bzhin du bgyi bar khas blangs te/_rgyal po bzang ldan la sogs pa
