[\[46b.6\]]shAkya lnga brgya shing rta la zhugs te 'byor pa chen pos phyir byung ba na/_zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la lta zhing*/_mtshan mkhan gyis de dag gi mtshan la brtag pa na/_ko ka li ka dang*/_khaN+Da dra bya dang*/_ko Ta mo ra ta tiSh+ya dang*/_rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir byung ba 
[\[46b.7\]]na bong bu'i skad grag par gyur pa dang*/_lhas byin byung ba na gtsug gi nor bur bya khras phrogs pa mthong ste/_de dag gis ston pa dang ston pa'i 'khor la tshig ngan smras pas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang*/_gzhan rnams kyis ni ston pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bar lung bstan no/_/de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin nas rab tu byung ba blangs par gyur to/_/de dag gi tshe 'dreg mkhan du gyur pa'i nye ba 'khor ni tshur shog gis bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/der rgan rim gyis 'dud par byed pa na/_bzang 
[\[47a.2\]]ldan gyis nye ba 'khor gyi rkang pa la btud pa'i tshe dogs pa skyes nas ci 'di'i rkang pa la 'dud par byed dam zhus pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung ba ni nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir yin pas thud cig gsungs nas btud pas de'i mod la sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/gzhan yang 
[\[47a.3\]]grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i btsun mo drug khri rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang*/_yangs pa can du skye dgu'i bdag mo la sogs pa shAkya mo lnga brgya rab tu byung ba dang*/_n+ya gro d+ha skyes ston par khas blangs kyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang*/_drang srong mes byin ka t+ya'i bur 
[\[47a.4\]]grags pa 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas dgra bcom pa la bkod pa dang*/_sum cu rtsa gsum du dbyar gnas mdzad cing slar yang bai DUr+Ya'i them skas la brten nas lha las bab pa'i mdzad pa bstan pa dang*/_mnyan du yod par cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa mdo 
[\[47a.5\]]sde rnams las rgya cher 'byung ba las shes par bya'o/_/mdor na bye brag tu bshad pa las/_chos 'khor gnas dang yangs pa can/_/sa dkar can dang lha yi gnas/_/byis pa gsod dang ko shAm+bIr/_/'brog dang mchod rten ri dang ni/_/'od ma'i grong dang sgrar bcas dang*/_/ser 
[\[47a.6\]]skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer te/_/'di rnams su ni thub pa yi/_/skyes mchog lo re lo re bzhugs/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum mnyan yod du/_/sman gyi nags su lo bzhi ste/_'bar ba'i phug gi gnas su gnyis/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du lnga/_/dka' ba spyad pa lo drug ste/_/nyi shu rtsa 
[\[47a.7\]]dgu khab gnas su/_/rgyal ba de ltar brgyad cu la/_/thub mchog dam pa mya ngan 'das/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar ro/_/bcu gnyis pa mya ngan las 'das par ston pa'i mdzad pa la/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas dang*/_ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa dang*/_sku gdung rgyas pa ste gsum 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]las/_dang po mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas ni/_gser 'od dam pa las/_sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/_/chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/_/sems can yongs su smin mdzad cing*/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar ston/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_spyir bcom ldan 
[\[47b.2\]]'das ni bskal pa dpag tu med par bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba'i go 'phang la gnas pas mya ngan las 'da' ba med kyang*/_gdul bya rtag 'dzin can rnams kyi rtag par 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir dang*/_skal ba dman pa'i gdul bya 'ga' zhig la sangs rgyas nye bar mi snang ba 
[\[47b.3\]]tsam la mya ngan 'da' ba'i tha snyad du gdags pa'i phyir/_de ltar snang ba yin te/_de'ang 'di ltar 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa'i skabs shig tu ston pas kun dga' bo la bskul ma 'debs pa dran pa'i phyir 'di skad gsungs te/_gang su rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la 
[\[47b.4\]]brten nas sgom mang du byas pa de 'dod na bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag gi bar du yang 'dug go zhes bya ba la sogs pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas kyang bdud kyi stobs kyis bsgribs par byas te cang gsol ba'i dran pa ma shar ro/_/de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis lhags 
[\[47b.5\]]nas dben pa zhig tu mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas ston pas kyang zla ba gsum nas des ji skad gsol ba bzhin du bgyid par zhal gyis bzhes nas btang ngo*/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'tsho ba'i 'du byed ni byin gyis brlabs/_tshe'i 'du byed ni spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[47b.6\]]la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dus de nyid du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i ltas kyi rnam pa mang po byung ste/_gang dag byung ba rnams kyang kun dga' bos ston pa la zhus pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe'i 'du byed spangs pa'i ltas su bstan to/_/de'i dus su kun dga' bo 
[\[47b.7\]]ni ston pa mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs par gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su mi gsung ba yin pa'i phyir gnang bar ma gyur to/_/de nas tsa ba li'i dge slong rnams la dus tha ma'i gdams ngag rnams kyang ci rigs pa bstan nas mthar gyis ljongs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rgyu zhing yangs pa can dang*/_br-i dza dang*/_longs spyod kyi grong gi byang rol shing sha pa'i tshal rnams su byon te de dag gi lam du yang 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa dang*/_khyad par du kun dga' bo la/_mdo sde la 'juga'adul ba la snang*/_chos nyid dang mi 
[\[48a.2\]]'gal na chos su gzung la/_de lta ma yin na mi gzung bar gdams so/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can du gshegs pa'i lam nas cung zad bsnyung ba'i tshul bstan nas ngal bso ba dang*/_kun dga' bo la chu bo ka ku sta las chu byin cig ces gsungs pa na chu rnyog ma can las rnyed par ma gyur 
[\[48a.3\]]kyang chu des zhal bkrus so/_/de nas kyang grong khyer rtswa can du gyad kyi yul dang nye ba shing sA la zung gi tshal du byon te der mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dgongs pa nye bar zhag go_/gnyis pa ni/_gnas de nyid du dus tha ma'i gdan khri 'phang byang gi phyogs su bstan par bcas te/_de la glo g.yas pa 
[\[48a.4\]]phab ste zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag pa'i stabs kyis snang ba'i 'du shes dang*/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang*/mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes par mdzad de gzims so/_/de'i dus na rtswa can gyi gyad rnams 'dus pa la chos bstan nas kun dga' bo la bslab pa'i gzhi 'bogs 
[\[48a.5\]]su bcug go_/de ltar dus tha ma'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du sku dngos kyis gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ste/_de 'dul ba'i don du dri za'i cha byad du sprul te lag pa na pi wang rgyud stong dang ldan pa bsnams nas rab dga'i sgo drung na phyin te/_de dang glu dbyangs len pa 
[\[48a.6\]]dang pi wang 'khrol ba'i khyad par la 'gran pa'i tshe ston pas rgyud stong phrag yod pa nas gcig gi bar la rim gyis bcad kyang sgra gdangs snyan pa la khyad par ma byung ba dang*/_mthar rgyud gcig pu de yang bcad pas nam mkha' las sgra gdangs snga ma bzhin du 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pas 
[\[48a.7\]]de ngo mtshar du skyes nas nga rgyal gyi ri bo gzhig par mdzad do/_/de nas dad par gyur pa gzigs nas sku dngos su snang bas chos gsungs nas bden pa rtogs par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du kun du rgyu rab bzang zhes pa lo brgya dang nyi shu lon pa des u dum+bA ra'i me tog gi tshal rnyings par 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]gyur pa mthong ste/_de bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas su shes nas/_bdag gi the tshom 'ga' zhig sel bar 'gyur grang snyam ste byung ba la dga' ba'i gtam mang po mdzad pa'i mthar/de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pas bden pa mthong bar gyur pa dang*/_
[\[48b.2\]]tshur shog gis bsnyen par rdzogs nas dgra bcom pa thob par mdzad do/_/des kyang ston pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ba la spro bar ma gyur te gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs nas mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas ston pas 'khor rnam bzhi la mdo 'don pa la sogs pa'i bslab gzhi phran tshegs 
[\[48b.3\]]kyi rigs 'ga' zhig gdams pa dang*/_dkon mchog gsum dang bden pa bzhi la the tshom med pa'i nges pa mdzad do/_/de nas sku'i stod g.yogs bsal te/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ltos shig_de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba ni rnyed par dka' ste me tog u 
[\[48b.4\]]dum wA ra bzhin no/_/dge slong dag cang ma smra zhig dang*/_'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad ni 'jig pa'i chos can no zhes pa gsung gi tha ma nyid du stsal to/_/de nas bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi dang 'gog snyoms lugs 'byung lugs bzlog la mnyam par zhugs nas/_
[\[48b.5\]]slar yang bsam gtan bzhi la zhugs te rab mtha' la mya ngan las 'das so/_/de ma thag tu sa g.yo ba la sogs pa'i ltas kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni shin tu 'khrugs par gyur to/_/gsum pa ni/_de nas kun dga' bos zhag bdun gyi bar du sku 
[\[48b.6\]]gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i nyer bsdogs rnams bshams te/_bdun pa la gyad kyi chung ma dang bu mo rnams kyis bla re bres pa dang*/_gyad gzhon nu rnams kyis ni khyogs bteg pa dang*/_lha bye ba phrag khrig du ma rnams kyis ni dri dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_me tog dang*/bdug pa dang*/_sil 
[\[48b.7\]]snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti dang bcas te/_rtswa can gyi nub sgo nas dbus su zhugs shing shar sgo nas 'thon te chu bo dbyig ldan brgal ba'i pha rol/_gyad kyi dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung ga la bar bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de nas gyad gzhon nu rnams kyis sku 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]gdung shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang*/_ras zung lnga brgyas g.yogs te lcags kyi sgrom bur bcug nas 'bru mar gyis bkang ba kha bkab ste/_dri zhim po'i shing spungs pa dang lhan cig tu zhugs la bzhen par brtsams kyang me 'bar bar ma gyur to/_/ji tsam zhig tu 
[\[49a.2\]]rgyal po'i khab nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te byon pas lhags nas sgrom gyi kha phye zhing shing dang ras bal rnams legs par bsal nas sku ma nyams pa la phyag byas te/_de nas zhugs 'bul bar byed pa'i nyan thos chen po rnams ni 'di lta ste/_kun shes 
[\[49a.3\]]kauN+Di n+ya dang*/_skul byed dang*/_stobs bcu 'od srungs dang*/_'od srungs chen po ste bzhis shing bal gyi 'da' ba gzhan yang bsabs te g.yogs pa la sogs pa snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas bzhag pas me rang 'bar du byung ste tshig par gyur to/_/de nas me de 'o ma'i chab kyis bsad 
[\[49a.4\]]pa las/_me tog gser can dang*/_ser skya dang*/_rta don dang*/_u dum+bA ra bzhi skyes so/_/de nas sgrom bu kha phye nas bltas pa'i tshe gdung yungs 'bru lta bu'i ring bsrel gyi phung por gyur pa dang*/_ras zung thams cad kyi'ang phyi ma shos dang nang ma shos gnyis po ma tshig par gnas pa dang bcas pa gyad rnams 
[\[49a.5\]]kyis grong khyer gyi dbus su spyan drangs nas bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de'i tshe phyogs kyi rgyal po la sogs pas so so'i gnas su sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs pa'i phyir dang dus ston bya ba'i phyir ring bsrel gyi skal ba len du byung ba rnams la cha brgyad du bgos te so sor 
[\[49a.6\]]byin no/_/de ltar yang lung las/_spyan ldan sku gdung bre bo brgyad dag las/_/bdun ni dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mchod par thob/_/skyes bu mchog de'i bre bo gang zhig ni/_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod/_/skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi dag las/_/mche ba gcig ni rtsa 
[\[49a.7\]]gsum 'jig rten mchod/_/gnyis pa tshig 'dzin grong khyer yid 'ong na/_/gsum pa ka ling rgyal po'i yul na ste/_/skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi pa ni/_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod/_/mya ngan med rgyal skya snar bur gnas pas/_/mchod rten bdun po rgya 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]cher spel byas te/_/de yi mthu yis dbyig 'dzin 'dir yang ni/_/smon lam dngos pos mngon par brgyan gyur te/_/'di ltar spyan ldan sku gdung de la ni/_/lha dbang kru dbang mi yi dbang po dang*/_/mi dang klu dang gnod sbyin bdag po yis/_/rab tu bkur nas bkur ste mchod pa 
[\[49b.2\]]byas/_/zhes so//_//gnyis pa chos kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor ba la/_mtshan nyid theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor ba dang*/_rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor ba'o/_/dang po la rim can du 'dod pa brjod pa dang*/_cig car du 'dod pa brjod pa'o/_/dang 
[\[49b.3\]]po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa can du bskor ba yin te/_'di ltar yul wA rA Na sIr lnga sde la sogs pa'i gdul bya nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams drang ba'i don du dang po bden pa rnam pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas pa'i tshul du bskor ro/_/de'ang 
[\[49b.4\]]ji ltar na dge slong dag khur yang yod/_khur khyer ba po yang yod ces gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yod par gsungs te/_de lta ma yin na ni skrag par 'gyur ba'i phyir de ltar du bstan no/_/des ni med par 'dzin pa las bzlog par byas pas/_yod par 'dzin pa shas che bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[49b.5\]]nas gnas bya rgod phung po'i ri bo la sogs pa na gdul bya theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi don du/_bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/de'ang ji ltar na gzugs nas brtsams te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i 
[\[49b.6\]]stong pa nyid du ston par byed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bstan to/_/des ni yod par 'dzin pa las bzlog par byas pas chos thams cad med par 'dzin pa shas che bar gyur to/_/de nas yul mnyan du yod pa la sogs pa na gdul bya theg pa thams cad la yang dag par 
[\[49b.7\]]zhugs pa rnams kyi don du/_tha ma legs par rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/de ni ji ltar zhe na/_chos kyi 'khor lo snga ma de gnyis ni yod par 'dzin pa dang med par 'dzin pa shas che bas drang ba'i don rtsod pa can yin la/_tha ma 'dis ni kun brtag med/_gzhan dbang kun 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]rdzob tu yod/_yongs su grub pa gnyis don dam pa nyid du yod par bstan pas mtha' gnyis su 'dzin par bzlog pa dbu ma'i lam yin pa'i phyir/_nges don rtsod pa dang bral ba yin te/_de ltar ni rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'dod cing*/_de'ang ji skad du 'phags pa 
[\[50a.2\]]dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po yul wA rA Na sIr drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags su nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i 
[\[50a.3\]]bden pa bzhi rnam par bstan pas chos kyi 'khor lo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon lhar gyur pa'am/_mir gyur pa sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba cig rab tu bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de yang bla na mchis pa/_skabs mchis pa/_
[\[50a.4\]]drang ba'i don/_rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa lags la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid las brtsams te/_skye ba ma mchis pa dang*/_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang*/_gzod ma nas zhi ba dang*/_rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[50a.5\]]'das pa nyid las brtsams nas theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la stong pa nyid smos pa'i rnam pas ches ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de yang bla na mchis pa/_skabs mchis pa drang ba'i 
[\[50a.6\]]don rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa lags la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid las brtsams te/_skye ba ma mchis pa dang*/_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang*/_bzod ma nas zhi ba dang*/_rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las 
[\[50a.7\]]brtsams nas theg pa thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la legs par rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gsum pa bskor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa/_skabs ma mchis pa/_nges 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]pa'i don lags te/_rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa ma lags so zhes gsungs so/_/ngo bo nyid med par smra ba dag ni/_de nyid tshol bas thog mar ni/_/thams cad yod ces brjod par bya/_/'di nyid rig 'dod de nas ni/_/phyi nas rnam par dben pa nyid/_/ces pas tha 
[\[50b.2\]]ma mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yin par 'dod do/_/gang ltar yang gdul bya rim gyis drang dgos pa rnams kyi ngor chos kyi 'khor lo gsum rim pa can du bskor ba'i lugs so/_/gnyis pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig gis dus tha dad pa med pa nyid du gsungs pa 
[\[50b.3\]]yin na'ang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gyi mos pa tha dad pa dang rjes su 'tsham par chos mi 'dra ba gsum du go ba ni yang dag pa nyid de/_dgongs pa lung ston pa las/_rtog pa med cing 'khrul med pa/_/yid 'ong rdo rje'i tshig gcig pu/_/gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 
[\[50b.4\]]ni/_/bye brag mang por 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes dang*/_mdo sde rgyan las kyang*/_sngar lung ma bstan lhan cig byung*/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar du bshad pa'i tshul 'dis ni gong gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i lung dang mi mthun pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te/_de nas kyang 
[\[50b.5\]]chos ni tha dad par gsungs pa nyid du bstan mod kyi/_dus dang gnas dag ni tha dad pa ci yang bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na ston pa'i gsung gcig nyid kyis dus gcig tu chos tha dad pa mang po gsungs par go ba ni gsung gi bkod pas chos ston pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de 
[\[50b.6\]]bzhin du dus gcig la gnas tha dad pa dag na sku tha dad par bzhugs par snang ba ni sku'i bkod pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/nges pa'i don du ni de bzhin gshegs pas ngag kun nas slong ba'i bag chags ma lus pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir mngon par rdzogs 
[\[50b.7\]]par sangs rgyas pa nas mthar mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar la tshig gam yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs te/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/_phyag na rdo rjes zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs so/_/ma brjod do 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]zhes sngar kho bos ma bshad dam/_de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigs so/_/smras pa/_gsungs na nyes pa ci yod/_ngag gi las kyi nyes par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ngag gi las 
[\[51a.2\]]las nyes pa ci zhig 'byung*/_yi ge la sems pas bklags pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_nyes pa med pa gang yin/_gang mi smra mi brjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do/_/rnam par rig pa med pa nyid ni nyes pa med pa'o/_/gang bdag la rnam par rig 
[\[51a.3\]]par mi byed pa dang*/_gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de ni nyes pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ngag kun nas slong ba'i bag chags mi mnga' bas/_nang gi shes pa phyi rol gyi sgra zhen pa yongs su spangs bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang ye 
[\[51a.4\]]shes kyi stobs dang*/_gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang las dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba sna tshogs pa dag byung ba yin te/_de nyid las/_ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas/_/rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung ba/_/sgra 'byin byed pa 'ga' yang med/_/'on kyang sgra rnams de 
[\[51a.5\]]dag 'byung*/_/de bzhin sngon chad rnam dag phyir/_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pas bskyod/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang*/_/'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'/_/ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra/_/nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/_/de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung*/_/nang dang phyi rol 
[\[51a.6\]]mi gnas so/_/ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par/_/snang bas sems can tshim byed pa/_/de ltar rgyal ba mi rtog gsung*/_/sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor ba ni/_spyir gsang ba sngags 
[\[51a.7\]]kyi rgyud sde rin po che mtha' dag kyang ji ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul de lta bus bskal pa bzang po'i 'dren pa bzhi pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i snga rol gyi dus na sprul pa'i sku mchog gi rnam pas legs par gsungs zin pa la/_slar yang shAkya thub pa nyid kyis bzlas nas gsungs pa dag 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]kyang yod de/_dper na phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan par kun du bzang po dbang bskur ba'i gleng gzhi gsungs nas/_slar yang mi mjed kyi zhing du phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/phyi nas bzlas te gsungs pa ma 
[\[51b.2\]]yin pa dag kyang yod de/_dper na bde mchog gi rgyud ni bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus su'ang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi nyams su blangs te ma nub pa nyid du yod par bshad pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan pa mang po zhig ni shAkya thub pa rang nyid dang de'i rnam par 'phrul pa'am gzhan dag 
[\[51b.3\]]byin gyis brlabs nas des gsungs pa dag kyang yod de/_dper na 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po la sogs pa'i rgyud sde phal che ba rnams lta bu'o/_/gal te thub pa 'di'i gong du sngags kyi lam yod par gyur na ni gsang ba 'dus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[51b.4\]]pa thams cad sngon byung ba brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas thub pa chen po 'od srungs sangs rgyas pa'i 
[\[51b.5\]]bar gyis kyang ma gsungs par bshad pa dang ci'i phyir mi 'gal snyam na/_de ni de'i che ba brjod pa'i phyir yin gyi gsang ba sngags kyi theg pa ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyang gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba'i chos yin te/_de ltar yang 'jam dpal 
[\[51b.6\]]mtshan brjod las/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la/_/da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang*/_/zhes 'byung ba ni nges pa'i don du bshad pa nyid kyis so/_/de dag gis ni bstan pa dang po ji 
[\[51b.7\]]ltar byung ba brjod zin to/_/'dir smras pa/[ (]thob byed kyi rgyu/[)]'jig rten mgon po grangs med mnyes byas shing*/_/zhing rab sbyangs dang sems can yongs smin pa'i/_/spyod mchog smon lam yangs pa'i tshogs bdag gis/_/bskal pa dpag tu med par bsgrubs pa'i zhing*/_/[(*]sems ldan rab rtog[)]yon 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\](*]sems ldan brtog/[)]tan mi zad dpal kun stug po ru/_/bkod pa'i ya mtshan pha rol ma mthong bar/_/rgyal ba'i myu gu rnams ni chos sprin rtser/_/langs te ye shes mig gis blta ba snyam/_/[(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]zhing gi rgyal po deng bdag gsang ba gsum/_/mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor grub pa'i sku/_/
[\[52a.2\]]theg gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i chos rdzogs par/_/longs su spyod dang 'byin par lhun gyis grub/_/[(*]'byor pa rgya che ba/[)]mi shigs sku yi ba spu'i 'khri shing gi_/skye ba re yang sangs rgyas sprul pa'i skus/_/rtsen pa rab 'byams zhing gi rnam pa nyid/_/snang 
[\[52a.3\]]mdzad sgyu ma'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das/_/[(*]bsam pa rgya che ba/[)]gang de 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa/_/kun gyi khyab bdag bla nas bla ma ru/_/yongs su lud pa'i go 'phang rtag pa de/_/grangs med bskal pa nyid nas mngon du mdzad/_/'on te ye shes dag pa'i gter gyi rlabs/_/chos kyi 
[\[52a.4\]]dbyings mthar klas pa'i zhing khams su/_/'gro ba yongs su smin phyir sprul pa'i sku/_/lhun grub zlos pa'i gar la chog shes med/_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]gang phyir thub pa'i spyan sngar thog ma'i sems/_/byang chub mchog tu 'dun dang 'jug pa yi/_/g.yar dam brtan pa'i go cha lus med kyi/_/
[\[52a.5\]]nus pa yongs su 'gongs pa nyid du bgos/_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]zab cing yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rkang pa dag_/mi zad brgyad cu'i lam du bkod pa yis/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi thang mo che/_/snying stobs do zla med pa'i shugs kyis brgal/_/[(*]rigs brjod pa bar gyi gsal byed/[)]gong nas gong ma'i them pa 
[\[52a.6\]]'gongs tsam gyis/_/yon tan brgya stong la sogs bsgyur ba'i sa/_/chos sprin rtse mo la chags skye mtha' yi/_/rgyal sras tshul gyi spyod pas gdul ba btul/_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]lus med thul ba mang pos byang chub pa'i/_/byin rlabs sngags kyis legs 
[\[52a.7\]]btab rdo rje'i gdan/_/gang du dpa' bas bgrod byed rdo rje yi/_/skyil krung mdud pa bor ba gcig cig tu/_/[(]mi ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]byang chub snying po len pa dam bca'i mkha'/_/brtan pa de la 'gro 'dod sog le'i so/_/snying la yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]srub dpung*/_/bye ba khrag khrig lhags pa'i g.yul gyis gtses/_/[(*]rab spel gyi rgyan/[)]gang tshe bzod dang byams pa chen po yis/_/bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bkrus pa'i 'dzum bsu bas/_/rtsub mo'i mtshon cha rnams kyang me tog gi_/rgyan du len pa tsam gyis pham par mdzad/_/[(*]'gal ba'i gsal byed/[)]rgyu des sa 'di 
[\[52b.2\]]dga' ba brgyas g.yos te/_/bden dpang ched du brjod pa glur len yang*/_/'dod lha'i snying ni mi bzad mya ngan gyis/_/bcir la ma bzod dbugs ni shugs ring brtsegs/_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]de mthar thub pa kho na'i khyad par chos/_/mtha' dag rdzogs 
[\[52b.3\]]par byed pa 'phrin gyi rnga/_/'og min bar du lud par brdungs pa las/_/rgol ba med par thams cad mkhyen par bstan/_/[(*]zla bo dngos po'i dpe/[)]'jig rten phan bde sgrub pa mang yod kyang*/_/thub pa chos kyi 'byung gnas 'dra ba med/_/mkha' dbyings 
[\[52b.4\]]'od zer 'byin pa grangs med dbus/_/bdud rtsi'i 'od can gnyis pa 'di na su/_/[(*]mang po'i dpe/[)]rin chen 'byung gnas chu ni snyim pas dang*/_/kun gsal pha rol rkang drug 'phur lding gis/_/sems can bsam pa'i bye brag byis pas bzhin/_/
[\[52b.5\]]thub pa'i spyod mtha' brjod pas gtugs pa med/_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]'on te dri med lung las 'byung ba'i don/_/cung zad bris pa 'dis kyang mdzub mo yis/_/nam mkha' bstan pa bzhin du 'jig rten na/_/thugs rje yangs pa dran pa'i rgyu tsam 
[\[52b.6\]]byed/_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs 
[\[52b.7\]]ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_yid ches bskyed pa'i ched du bstan pa gang las byung ba'i sarga ste dang po'o//_//
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ab+h+yAram+b+hashAs+t+raMkiny+tsake\u0f85saMkalbenaniHsamyakatshutsistasmAyut+tarAShAMb+hAShanaHkIr+t+tiHshAsanabr-id+d+hash+tsire/
[\[53a.2\](]spangs nas med pa'i byed rgyu/[) ]brtsams pa'i bstan bcos ci dang cir/_/dpyad pas yang dag ma bgrungs med/_/de phyir smra ba'i mchog rnams kyi/_/grags pa bstan pa srid du 'phel/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\](*]gnyi ka'i thog mar yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[) ]thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdung 'tshob pa/_/thams cad kyi ni blo gros kyang*/_/thams cad mkhyen ltar dag pa'i las/_/thams cad phan par smra ba byung*/_/[(*]sbyar ba'i gzugs can/[)]brtan par bcas pa'i rwa ba na/_/khrims gtsang tsan+da na yi shing*/_/mtshar du dngar bas bskyed pa'i dri/_/gang la reg pa 
[\[53b.2\]]bsil ba'i dpyid/_/[(*]bya ba lhan cig brjod pa/[)]bdag don mngon par zhen pa'i blo/_/'khor ba'i dpal dang lhan cig spangs/_/gzhan la phan pa'i byang chub sems/_/dka' spyad dag dang mnyam du bzung*/_/[(*]'jigs rung gi nyams dang ldan pa/[)]chos mngon la sbyangs shes rab kyi/_/bslab ldan 
[\[53b.3\]]rnams kyi mdun sa ru/_/rmongs pa'i rang gzugs brtan byed pa'i/_/cho ga yid srubs kyis mi shes/_/[(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]thos bsam sgom pa'i gru chen bskyod/_/sngags gzhung rgya mtsho'i pha rol du/_/brgal ba'i snying po lung rtogs kyi/_/yon tan 
[\[53b.4\]]nor bu ci yang blangs/_/[(*]khyad par la gnas pa'i don gzhan bkod pa/[) ]snying rjes gzhan dbang gyur pa rnams/_/rtag tu bdag don khom ma yin/_/dag byed ldan pa'i sprin gyi phreng*/_/chu ru gron pa rang don nam/_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan/[)]zab cing yangs pa bdud rtsi'i gtam/_/mi zad tshogs kyis phye ba'i 'dzum/_/tshems 
[\[53b.5\]]dkar 'od kyi thigs pa dag_/snang ba'i mun pa bkru phyir rgyu/_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]sems can khams kyi dri ma gsum/_/dag pa'i snying po ster ba'i chos/_/ris su bsdus pa'i sde snod bzhis/_/bstan par bya ba bslab pa'i gnas/_/[(*]rgyu 'gog pa/[)]mtha' dag 'doms 
[\[53b.6\]]pa'i dbang phyug ces/_/mchog tu ngo mtshar su zhig smra/_/gang phyir thub pas lung bstan pa'i/_/bstan skyong kun gyi las 'di yin/_/[(*]sngon byung gi gtam dang sbyar ba'i bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]rigs par smra mchog lha rnams kyis/_/sgrub dang sun 'byin dpung ba yis/_/lta ngan 'bigs byed ri bsnyal te/_/dam chos 
[\[53b.7\]]nyi ma rab gsal byas/_/[(*]skyed byed 'dul ba'i rgyu/[)]rgyal sras rnams kyi so so rang*/_/rig pas ji bzhin mthong ba dang*/_/mi mchog kun gyis gshegs pa'i lam/_/ma nor bde ba'i 'phrin dam pa/_/[(*]bya ba rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]phyi nang rig pa'i gtsug lag sde/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bcu phrag gcig tu bcings pa gang*/_/mtha' dag dbyangs kyi rgyal mo yang*/_/dgyes bskyed tshig gi bstan bcos byas/_/[(*]mang ba'i dpe/[)]rab rib can la mig gi dpal/_/'da' ka ma la mi shigs srog_/de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod la/_/legs bshad 
[\[54a.2\]]'dra ba'i phan byed dkon/_/[(*]mdzes pa'i yon tan/[)]e ma phan mdzad rnams kyi drin/_/che ba'i do zlar stong gsum gyi/_/ri rab phyogs gcig spungs na yang*/_/byed po'i srang la mnyam mi 'gyur/_/[(*]bya ba thog ma'i gsal byed/[)]gleng bar bgyi'o stobs bcu pa'i/_/bstan pa snang byed gang byon pa/_/byon pa'i 'phags pa 
[\[54a.3\]]gang dag gis/_/bya ba ji ltar byas pa'i tshul/_/spyi don gnyis pa spro ba bskyed pa'i ched du bstan skyong rnams kyis bya ba byas pa la/_bsdu ba ji ltar byas pa dang*/_'grel byed ji ltar byon pa'o/_/dang po bsdu ba ji ltar byas pa la'ang theg pa thun mong 
[\[54a.4\]]ba dang*/_theg pa chen po gnyis las/_dang po theg pa thun mong ba ltar na 'di lta ste/_ston pa thub pa'i dbang po 'khor dge slong khri brgyad stong dang bcas pa mya ngan las 'das/_de'i sngon du shA ri'i bu 'khor brgyad khri dang bcas pa dang*/_maung gal gyi bu 'khor bdun khri dang bcas pa 
[\[54a.5\]]dag kyang mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i dus na tshe lo bskal pa mang por 'tsho ba'i lha rnams ni 'di skad du smra ste/_ston pa'i gsung rab ni dud pa tsam du gyur/_dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang 'das par gyur pas/_mdo sde dang*/_'dul ba dang*/_ma mo dag mi sgrogs so zhes 'phya 
[\[54a.6\]]bar byed do/_/de bsal ba'i ched du gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams sdus shig ces bsgos pa dang*/_des kyang 'od srungs kyi ltar mnyan te gaN+DI brdungs pas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga brgya la gcig gis ma tshang ba 'dus so/_/gcig ni ba 
[\[54a.7\]]lang bdag ste de 'bod pa'i phyir gang po la khyod song nas ba lang bdag la 'di skad ces smros shig_/'od srungs la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'di skad du nad med par gyur cig_/dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad yod pas myur du bos shig ces byos shig_/des kyang 'di ltar 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]grong khyer rtswa can nas mi snang zhing*/_sum cu rtsa gsum shing shi ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ba lang bdag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ji ltar bsgo ba de ltar du gsol ba dang*/_ci gang po bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don 
[\[54b.2\]]du 'jig rten gzhan du ma gshegs sam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyu dris pas/_des smras pa/_blo ldan bstan pa gnas bya'i phyir/_/nyan thos dge 'dun tshogs nas ni/_/de dag der ni 'dus gyur te/_/khyod la sdod cing de brtson byed/_/de'i tshe ba lang bdag gis 'di skad du bsgo ste/_gang 
[\[54b.3\]]po chog gis de skad ma smra shig_'gro ba'i dus ma yin no/_/'on kyang jo co gang po/_'gro ba'i sgron ma mgon po bzhugs na der/_/bdag ni 'gro bar bya ba'i blo yod kyang*/_/de nas pha rol rab zhir gshegs gyur na/_/blo ldan gang zhig 'jig rten de dag 'gro/_/lhung bzed chos 
[\[54b.4\]]gos rnam gsum mchog 'di dag_/khyod kyis dge 'dun dag la dbul bar gyis/_/bdag ni zhi ba yang srid med par 'gro/_/bdag gis bsams pa 'phags la bzod par gsol/_/zhes gsungs nas spar ba dang*/_dro ba dang*/_char dbab pa dang*/_gsal ba mchog dag gi cho 
[\[54b.5\]]'phrul bstan te mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i rang lus las me 'bar bas tshig ste de las chu'i rgyun rnam pa bzhi bab pa so so'i sgra las tshigs su bcad pa re re yang byung ngo*/_/de nas gang pos rus pa la mchod pa byas te rdzu 'phrul gyis dgra bcom pa rnams kyi nang du phyin te/_ba lang bdag 
[\[54b.6\]]gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag phul nas/_mgon po'i sku ni med par des thos nas/_/bsod nams las kyis rab tu zhi bar song*/_/de yi lhung bzed chos gos 'di yin te/_/des bsams dge 'dun dag la bzod par gsol/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas 'od srungs chen 
[\[54b.7\]]pos dge slong rnams la gsungs pa/_kye tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag nyon cig_ji ltar de ni 'phags pa'i tshul gyis 'das/_/gzhan gyis de bzhin rab zhir 'gro mi bya/_/de bas ji srid dgos pa'i don bya zhing*/_/dbang chen tshogs nas de srid bgro bar bya/_/zhes dang*/_slar 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]yang re zhig dge slong lnga brgya po mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i phyir khrims su bca' ba/_ji ltar bsod nams las kyis zhi gyur pa/_/shi ri sha ka'i sems mchog ba lang bdag_/de ltar khyed kyis de bzhin mi bsam ste/_/'gro don dgos phyir tshogs nas 
[\[55a.2\]]blo gros bya/_/zhes bcas nas/_gnas 'dir chos bgro ba la ni g.yeng ba che bas/_ma ga d+hA'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu 'dong ngo zhes kun dga' bo chu 'brim pa'i zhal ta bar bskos te dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig tu ci dga' bar ljongs rgyus la song zhig_/nga ni lam drang po nas 'gro'o 
[\[55a.3\]]zhes 'od srungs chen po rgyal po'i khab tu byon no/_/der ma skyes dgra ni sngon yang gang du ston pa mthong ba na dad pas rta dang glang po las rang lhung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ma smras par sa la 'jog pa yin te/_der yang de bzhin du 'od srungs chen po 'byon pa mthong ba na'ang bcom ldan 
[\[55a.4\]]'das rjes su dran pas sa la lhung ba dang*/_'od srungs chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis cang ma snad par bzung ste smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin la/_nyan thos rnams la ni mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa ci rigs pa srid pas 
[\[55a.5\]]slad chad 'di lta bu mi bgyid par bcas so/_/slar yang smras pa/_rgyal po chen po deng dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams lam du zhugs te/_lha'i gnas 'dir chos kyi tshul bgro bar 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis bdag gis yo byad thams cad bstab par bgyi'o 
[\[55a.6\]]zhes dang*/_yang smras pa/_bdag la bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' ba ni sbran par ma byas kyi/_khyod kyis nam mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa na bdag la sbran par mdzod cig_/'od srungs kyis kyang de bzhin du bgyi bar zhal gyis 'ches so/_/de nas gang du chos bgro 
[\[55a.7\]]bar bya ba'i gnas ni/_n+ya gro d+hA'i phug tu dben par gzigs nas de nyid du byon no/_/ji tsam na dge slong de dag gi nang nas mdo sde 'don pa'i 'os su gyur pa ni kun dga' bo yin na'ang*/_de'i sems 'od srungs chen pos brtags pas dgra bcom pa ma thob par mkhyen te/_de 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]'dul bar byed pa la spro ba'am spyo ba gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par dpyad pas spyo ba'i thabs kyis 'dul bar rig nas/_des de la nged ni mchog 'dus pa yin la/_kun dga' bo khyod ni zag pa rnams la sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur pas deng lhan cig tu bgro bar 
[\[55b.2\]]mi bya bas khyod longs shig ces dang*/_sngon gyi nyes pa brgyad kyang rnam par bsgrags nas phyir bskrad do/_/de'i dus na nam mkha' nas lha rnams kyis/_a la la/_kye da lta lha rnams kyi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi lus rnams ni rmas par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[55b.3\]]'das kyi bstan pa ni rgyas par 'gyur te/_de ltar ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen pos ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen po la nyes pa rnam pa brgyad glengs pas so zhes kyang gtam du brjod do/_/de nas kun dga' bos dge slong gi tshogs de las byung ste br-i dzi'i grong du gshegs 
[\[55b.4\]]nas/_de'i g.yog ni br-i dzi'i bus byas te 'khor bzhi la chos 'chad pa dang bcas te bzhugs pa dang*/_nam zhig na br-i dzi'i bus mkhan po'i sems la bltas pas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i slob pa zhig tu mthong nas smras pa/_gau tam khyod ni bag med ma mdzad 
[\[55b.5\]]par/_/shing drung thibs por brten nas mya ngan 'das/_/thugs la bzhag ste bsam gtan mdzod cig dang*/_/ring por mi thogs zhi ba'i gnas thob 'gyur/_/des ji ltar bskul ba ltar nyin par dang mtshan gyi thun dang po la 'chag pa dang 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos 
[\[55b.6\]]rnams la sems yongs su sbyong bar byed do/_/mtshan gyi gung thun la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas nang du glo g.yas pa phab ste/_sngas nang tshangs can la mgo ma bzhag pa kho nar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/
[\[55b.7\]]thob nas kyang slar yang rgyal po'i khab kyi n+ya gro d+ha'i phug ga la ba der phyin to/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang dge slong rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dge slong brjed ngas pa rnams dang*/_lus nyam chung bar gyur pas mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa ma yin par/_sde snod 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]gsum 'dzin par mi nus na/_de bas na snga dro ni mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang*/_phyi dro ni sde snod gsum bgro bar bya'o/_/de'ang thog mar mdo sde bgro bar bgros te/_'od srungs chen po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_kun dga' bo la spro ba dris 
[\[56a.2\]]nas/_gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par bskos te/_kun dga' bo bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri la dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas snam sbyar bting ngo*/_/de nas kun dga' bos phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/_sems can la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag pa 
[\[56a.3\]]dang*/_chos la gus pa bskyed pa dang*/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la zhe sar dmigs nas seng ge'i khri la g.yas su bskor cing spyi bos gtugs te/_rgan rims su ji ltar 'os pa la phyag byas nas seng ge'i khri gang la bag tsha ba med par bzhugs so/_/bzhugs 
[\[56a.4\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gang dag lha dang klu la sogs pa la gsungs pa dang*/_dngos dang brgyud nas thos pa ji snyed bzung ba thams cad bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams pa dang*/_lha rnams kyis kyang shes par gyur te chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/de nas 'od srungs chen 
[\[56a.5\]]pos kun dga' bo la 'di skad do/_/ston pa 'jig rten phan bzhed pa/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/rnam pa mchog ni gar bshad pa/_/tshe dang ldan pas mdo sde gsungs/_/des de ma thag par bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa'i thal mo sbyar nas dbyangs 
[\[56a.6\]]kyis khyab par byas te/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul wA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos 
[\[56a.7\]]'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdo sde bshad do/_/de'i tshe kun shes kauN+Di n+yas 'od srungs chen po bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon sum du thos te/_bdag gi don du mdo sde 'di bshad cing rjes su bstan pas/_bdag gi khrag dang 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri las ni brgal/_ngan song gi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste/_mdo sde rin po che 'di bshad pas bdag dang lha stong phrag brgyad cus chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de ring 'dir 
[\[56b.2\]]'di skad thos nas bshad de/_kye ma thams cad mi rtag pas khyad par med do zhes smras nas stan las babs pa dang*/_kun dga' bo de blta ba'i phyir dgra bcom pa gzhan thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan las babs nas/_skye bo'i nang na thams cad mkhyen pas stongs par mngon mthong 
[\[56b.3\]]na/_/dge ba'i blo gros gang dag srog la chags shing dam por byed/_/ces dang*/_nam mkha' nas lha rnams kyang ston pa rjes su dran te/_gang la bdag gis mngon thos pa/_/chos ni thar pa'i bde ba byed/_/'di skad thos zhes rab sbyar te/_/de yang de ring bsgrags pa 
[\[56b.4\]]yin/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang pas/_kun dga' bo la khyod kyi lung de yin nam/_des bdag gi lung de lags so/_/bdag gi lung de lta bu lags sam/_kun dga' bo de kho na'o zhes phan tshun yid ches par byas so/_/de 
[\[56b.5\]]nas 'od srungs chen pos bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang po bsdus na tshangs par spyod pa gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur to/_/de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du shes so/_/yang des de la bcom ldan 
[\[56b.6\]]'das kyis mdo sde gnyis pa gang du bshad/_des gsal bar yul wA rA Na sI kho nar dge slong lnga po'i ched du ste/_de yang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa nas/_dge slong dag 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ste/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang*/_sdug bsngal 
[\[56b.7\]]kun 'byung ba dang*/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang*/_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang zhes bya ba nas 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lhag ma dge slong bzhi po yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so zhes 
[\[57a.2\]]bya ba dang*/_kun shes kyis kyang yid ches par bskyed pa man chad snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yang des de la bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gsum pa gang du bshad/_des gsal bar yul wA rA Na sI kho nar dge slong lnga po'i ched du ste/_de yang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya 
[\[57a.3\]]ba nas/_dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin par gyur du zin na/_gzugs la gnod pa'am/_sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing*/_gzugs 'di lta bu dang*/_'di lta bur ni gyur cig_'di lta bur ni ma gyur cig ces 
[\[57a.4\]]pa 'di 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/_'di las srid pa gzhan med par rab tu shes so zhes pa'i bar gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_dge slong lhag ma bzhi po len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dgra bcom pa gcig gis ma tshang ba zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston 
[\[57a.5\]]pas bstan pa'o snyam du shes pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_yul 'khor dang*/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang du bshad pa de dang de kun dga' bos bzlas nas/_dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bas 
[\[57a.6\]]mdo sder byas te/_de'i tshe gang phung po dang ldan pa'i mdo sde ni phung por bsdus te bzhag go_/de bzhin du skye mched dang yang dag par ldan pa ni skye mched drug tu'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pas rig pa dang yang dag par ldan pa ni gleng gzhi dang yang dag par ldan par 
[\[57a.7\]]ro/_/gang nyan thos kyi bshad pa mang ba ni nyan thos kyi bshad par ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa mang ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bshad par ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ni lam gyi yan lag tu'o/_/yang dag par brjod pa mang ba ni yang dag par brjod pa'i sder 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ro/_/tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas par yang dag par ldan pa ni yang dag par ldan pa'i lung zhes bya ba rnams su bsdus te bzhag go_/mdo sde ring po ni lung ring por bzhag go_/bar ma bar ma dag ni lung bar mar bzhag go_/tshig gcig dang tshig gnyis zhes bya ba nas/_tshig bcu 
[\[57b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i bar ni gcig las 'phros pa'i lung zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'od srungs chen pos kun dga' bo la khyod kyi lung de snyed cig gam/_'od srungs chen po de snyed cig lags te/_'di las lhag pa med do zhes smras nas seng ge'i khri las babs so/_/de nas 'od srungs 
[\[57b.3\]]chen pos dge slong dag des ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde ma lus par bsdus zin pas da ni 'dul ba bgro bar bya ste/_de'ang nye ba 'khor mkhas par gyur pa ni 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu lung bstan 
[\[57b.4\]]no zhes bgros nas/_'od srungs chen po seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste nye ba 'khor spro bar byas nas gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis 'dul ba'i sdud pa por bskos so/_/de nas nye ba 'khor seng ge'i khri la bzhag nas/_'od srungs chen pos nye ba 'khor la/_gang du bcom 
[\[57b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dang por bslab pa'i gzhi bcas/_des gsal bar smras pa/_yul wA rA Na sIr ro/_/gang gi don du/_dge slong lnga'i ched du ste/_gang gi phyir/_'di lta ste sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bya'o zhes bslab pa bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga 
[\[57b.6\]]brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon pa'i shes pas bltas nas zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du rig pa'i bar du'o/_/yang des de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis 
[\[57b.7\]]pa bcas pa gsung shig_des yul wA rA Na sIr ro/_/gang gi ched du dge slong lnga po'i don du ste/_gang gi tshe 'di ltar de chos gos zlum por bgo bar bya'o zhes bslab pa bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]snyam du rig pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/yang des de la gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi gsum pa bcas pa gsung shig_des ka lan+da ka'i grong du'o/_/gang gi ched du ka lan+da ka'i bu bzang sbyin gyi ched du ste/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar 
[\[58a.2\]]yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs shing mnyam pa las bslab pa ma phul/_bslab pa nyams par ma byas par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pas tha na byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa la yang rung ste/_dge slong des phas pham par 
[\[58a.3\]]gyur pa yin pas gnas par mi bya'o/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma gang dang gang du bshad pa de dang de dge slong rnams la nye ba 'khor gyis bzlas 
[\[58a.4\]]nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bas gzhung du byas te/_phas pham pa bzhi dang*/_dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum dang*/_ma nges pa gnyis dang*/_spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang*/_ltung byed dgu bcu dang*/_so sor bshags par bya ba bzhi dang*/_bslab pa mang po 
[\[58a.5\]]dang*/_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba bdun dang*/_bcas pa dang*/_rjes su bcas pa dang*/_so sor spang ba dang*/_gnang ba dang*/_rab tu byung ba dang*/_gso sbyong dang*/_dgag dbye dang*/_phra mo dang*/_gleng gzhi dang*/_mos pa ste 'di dag ni 'di dang 'di'o zhes 'dul bar yang dag par bsdus 
[\[58a.6\]]nas/_nye ba 'khor seng ge'i khri las babs so/_/de nas 'od srungs chen pos ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag shes rab zhan pa rnams kyi ched du ma mo bshad par bya ba'i phyir don du gnyer bas gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas te/_seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas dge slong dag ma mo lta bu zhes bya ba de 
[\[58a.7\]]bdag kho nas smra bar bya ste/_ma mo lta bu ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa yin te/_'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang zhes bya ba nas rdzogs par bshad do/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]no/_/de ltar sde snod gsum gyi bka'i bsdu ba re re la'ang dgra bcom pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag la gsungs so/_/'di ni bdag la gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas rjes su mthun par brjod cing bsdus so/_/de'i tshe sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams nas brtsams te 'og min pa'i bar gyi lha 
[\[58b.2\]]rnams ni 'di skad ces smra ste/_a la la/_'phags pa 'od srungs la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas bde bar gshegs pa'i sde snod gsum yang dag par bsdus pas lha rnams kyi lus ni mngon par 'phel bar gyur to/_/lha ma yin gyi lus rnams ni yongs su 'gribs par gyur to zhes 
[\[58b.3\]]mgrin gcig tu sgrogs so/_/de dag ni dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas bsdus pas lnga brgyas yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad du gdags so/_/de nas 'od srungs chen pos 'di snyam du bdag gis sde snod gsum gyi bsdu ba ni yang dag par byas/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 
[\[58b.4\]]lung bstan pa dang bstan pa gtad pa'i bya ba ni ma lus par byas so/_/da ni phung po'i khur dang lus rnag can 'dis kyang skyo na/_bdag ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_bdag gis thub pa'i mdo sde ni/_/yang dag bsdus nas chos lam bzhag_/gcig nas 
[\[58b.5\]]gcig tu yun ring bar/_/ston pa'i gsung rab 'di gnas 'gyur/_/ngo tsha med rnams chad pas bcad/_/ngo tsha byed ni yongs su bzung*/_/bdag gis phan dang dge byas pas/_/bdag ni mya ngan 'das dus bab/_/de nas 'od srungs kyis kun dga' bo'i drung du phyin te/_kun dga' bo shes 
[\[58b.6\]]par gyis shig_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag la bstan pa gtad de yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/da ni bdag kyang zhi ba la 'gro bas/_khyod kyis bstan pa legs par skyongs shig_khyod kyis kyang sha na'i gos can zhes bya ba 'byung ba de rab tu byung la bstan pa gtod cig ces 
[\[58b.7\]]gdams nas/_mi'i yul dang*/_klu'i yul dang*/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi yul rnams su song ste/_de dag tu bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung dang tshems mcho ba rnams la mchod pa byas nas/slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu byon te/_rgyal po'i chab sgo ba la rgyal po 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]la 'od srungs ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes sgron par gdams te/_lho phyogs kyi ri bo bya gag rkang ga la bder 'dzegs te/_ri gsum gyi dbus su rtswa bting ba'i stan du ston pas stsal ba'i phyag dar khrod pa'i snam sbyar sku la bgos nas/_rgyal ba byams pa'i 
[\[59a.2\]]gsung rab rgyas par gyur gyi bar du mi nyams par bya bar dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod kyi snam sbyar sku la gsol te nam zhig ma pham mgon gyi gsung rab rgyas par gyur pa de srid du mi shigs par byin gyis brlabs nas cho 'phrul du ma bstan te mya ngan las 'das so/_/
[\[59a.3\]]de'i dus na gser mngal can dang*/_mig stong ldan pa la sogs pa'i lha brgya stong mang po dag gis kyang nye bar lhags nas/_ston pa gnyis pa'i sku gdung de la lha'i me tog ut+pal dang*/_pad+ma dang*/_ku mu dA dang*/_tsan+dan dang*/_a ga ru la sogs pas mngon par mchod cing phyag 
[\[59a.4\]]byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de tsam zhig nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras kyang 'od srungs chen po mya ngan las 'das pa thos nas/_yid mya ngan dang bcas te 'od ma'i tshal na kun dga' bo bzhugs pa'i drung du 'ongs pa na/_des lam bstan te bya gag rkang gi ri la 'dzegs pa na/_der 'khod 
[\[59a.5\]]pa'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis ri bo de dag lag pa'i spar ba gdangs pa bzhin du bstan no/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos bsreg shing bsags te sreg par brtsams pa dang*/_kun dga' bos/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni byams pa'i gsung rab rgyas pa'i bar du mi nyams par byin gyis brlabs te/nam 
[\[59a.6\]]zhig byams pa 'khor nyan thos bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus bskor nas 'dir 'byon par 'gyur ro/_/byon nas kyang 'phags pa'i lus 'di nyan thos de dag la bstan te 'di ni 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'chang ba'i mchog tu 
[\[59a.7\]]gyur pa ste/_'dis thub pa de'i bstan pa yang dag par bsdus so zhes nyan thos rnams la bstan pa dang*/_dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs nas ci nus kyis bsgrubs te/_dgra bcom pa mngon du byed pa de ltar du byin gyis brlabs pas sreg par 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]byed mi nus so/_/'on kyang steng du mchod rten zhig rtsigs shig ces gsungs nas/_slar yang rgyal pos phyir phyung ba dang ri bo gsum gyis snga ma bzhin du bsgribs so/_/de'i steng du rgyal pos mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa'i phreng ba mang pos kyang mngon par gtams nas bzhag go_/de'i tshe 
[\[59b.2\]]rgyal po ma skyes dgras ston pa dang 'od srungs chen po gnyis ka mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mthong bas yid yongs su gdung bar gyur nas kun dga' bo la/_'phags pa nam zhig mya ngan las 'da' ba blta bar bgyi'o smras pa dang*/_des kyang de ltar du bgyi bar zhal gyis 'ches so/_/de nas gnas brtan 
[\[59b.3\]]kun dga' bo 'khor dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 'od ma'i tshal la sogs par bzhugs nas/_bstan pa skyong ba'i bgyi ba kho nas dus 'da' zhing*/_skye bo'i tshogs mang po 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi la bkod pa la sogs pa'i ngo mtshar mdzad pa'i phreng ba mtshar du dngar ba dag gis skye 'gro thams cad kyi 
[\[59b.4\]]yid yongs su phrogs nas/_'phags pa kun dga' bo ni ston pa dang mtshungs so zhes lha dang mi'i 'gro ba mang pos dus gcig tu sgrogs pa byung ngo*/_/dus gzhan zhig na sde dpon gyi bu btsas pa'i tshe sha na'i gos dang lhan cig tu btsas pas sha na'i gos can du grags pa de rgya mtsho chen po nas rnyed pa 
[\[59b.5\]]legs par thob nas bde bar brgal te 'ongs pa des/_gnas brtan kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi dri'i gtsang khang gi sgo na 'chag pa mthong nas phyag byas te smras pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa lo lnga'i bar du dus ston bgyid par 'tshal na/_ston pa gang na bzhugs zhes dris pa la/_gnas 
[\[59b.6\]]brtan gyis smras pa/_bu khyod kyis ma thos sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das so/_/de skad thos ma thag nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel lo/_/de las sad pa dang*/_nyan thos chen po mchog zung 'od srungs dang bcas pa rnams kyang dris pas/_de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das so/_/de skad ces 
[\[59b.7\]]thos nas kun dga' bo dge 'dun dang bcas pa lo lnga'i bar du mngon par mchod pa'i mthar gnas brtan chen pos bskul nas rab tu byung ngo*/_/de nas ring por ma thogs par thos pa 'dzin pa'i rtse mor phyin par gyur to/_/ji tsam na kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa dang*/_dge slong gis mdo'i 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]tshig log par 'don pa thos nas/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs zhes lan gcig lan gnyis su bzlog kyang bcos su ma btub nas/_gal te bdag nyid kyis smras na ni 'thab mor 'gyur la/_de'i mkhan po gang yin pa de ni bdag la 'dud par mi 'gyur zhing*/_
[\[60a.2\]]bdag ni der 'gro ba'i dus la cha ma yin par dgongs nas mya ngan las 'da' ba la mngon par phyogs nas smras pa/_rnying pa gang dag sngar 'das te/_/gsar bu de dang bdag mi mthun/_/bdag ni gcig pu bsam gtan la/_/sgo nga las skyes bzhin du gnas/_/bdag gi grogs dang mdza' bo kun_/
[\[60a.3\]]sngon du 'das shing song bar gyur/_/ji ltar bsam gtan gnas dran pa/_/de 'dra'i bshes gnyen 'di na med/_/dri ma byang nas zhir song 'gro ba'i sgron ma ste/_/bdag nyid chen pos gti mug mun nag rab rib bsal/_/de dag gis ni gdul ba tshad med btul gyur nas/_/gcig pu dgon pa 
[\[60a.4\]]mchod rten tshal shing lhag ma 'dra/_/zhes smras nas sha na'i gos can la bstan pa gtad de/_slad ma'i dus na yul bcom brlag gi ri mu run+d+har tshong dpon gyi bu na ta dang pha ta zhes bya bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang yon bdag byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan no/_/de na spos 
[\[60a.5\]]'tshong sbas pa'i bu nyer sbas zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste de rab tu byung shig dang*/_ston pas nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya na de nyid mtshan med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do zhes lung bstan pas de la gtod cig ces par gdams so/_/de nas kun dga' bos bdag yul spong byed 
[\[60a.6\]]dam yangs pa can gang rung cig tu mya ngan las 'das na ni cig shos de mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de na chu bo gang+gA'i dbus su song la mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel so sor thob par bya'o snyam ste ma skyes dgra sbran par bskul nas/_kun dga' bo grur zhugs te gang+gA'i dbus su rdzu 'phrul gyis sa 
[\[60a.7\]]ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bzhugs so/_/de skad thos pa dang ma skyes dgra dpung dang bcas pa yid mi dga' zhing gang+gA'i 'gram du song bas/_lits+tsha bI rnams kyang dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te gang+gA'i 'gram du phyin nas ring bsrel gyi phyir 'khod do/_/de'i tshe sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste de ni 'phags 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas su rig pa'i drang srong gcig cig 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te byung nas rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/_/de'i tshe 'phags pas gang+gA'i dbus su gling yid du 'ong ba sprul te/_de nyid du nyi ma gung la bab pa'i dus su gsol ba'i las byas pas phyir mi 
[\[60b.2\]]'ong ba dang*/_las gsum pa byas pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/de la chu dbus pa'am nyi ma gung pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/des ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sngon du bzang ldan mya ngan las 'das pa ltar/_mkhan po'i sngon du bdag nyid mya ngan 
[\[60b.3\]]las 'da' bar zhus kyang*/_mkhan pos 'di skad du gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kha che ni bsam gtan dang mthun pa'i gnas mal gyi mchog go zhes lung bstan pa dang*/_ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na dge slong nyi ma gung pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_des de na bstan pa 
[\[60b.4\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes lung du bstan pas/_khyod kyis kha cher song la bstan pa zung zhig ces gdams so/_/de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bo nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po bstan nas mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sbyangs 
[\[60b.5\]]nas ring bsrel dum bu gnyis su song ba gcig ni ma skyes dgra dang gcig ni lits+tsha bI rnams kyis thob ste/_de dag gis kyang skya snar gyi bu dang yangs pa can du mchod rten brtsigs so/_/nyi ma gung ba ni ston pa'i lung bstan rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir kha cher byon te/_de na klu hu lun+ta zhes bya ba 
[\[60b.6\]]gdug pa can zhig gis rten bcas nas 'gro ba mang po la 'tshe bar byed pa zhig yod pa/_de gdul ba'i don du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas/_klu des shin tu ma bzod par khros nas rdzi char drag po dang*/_mda' bo che dang*/_dgra sta dang*/_rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha char du phab 
[\[60b.7\]]bo/_/gnas brtan gyis mtshon cha de thams cad me tog ut+pal dang*/_pad+ma dang*/_puN+DA rI ka rnams su bsgyur te glags rnyed par ma gyur pa dang*/_slar gnas brtan gyi bka' mnyan pa'i phyir drung du byung ba la/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_gnas 'di nga la byin cig_de dag gis 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]'bul bar rngo mi thog go_/gnas brtan gyis gnas 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i gnas su lung bstan pas nga'i gnas yin no/_/de ltar yin na ji tsam dgos pa'i tshad dang rjes su mthun pa zhig de bzhin du gyur cig ces phul lo/_/de ltar phul ba dang 'phags pas 
[\[61a.2\]]de na grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_yul 'khor dang*/_gtsug lag khang mang po byas te/_skye bo'i tshogs dag zhugs pa dang*/_de rnams 'phel ba'i ched du skye bo de dag khrid de/_ri spos kyi ngad ldang las gur gum thob cig gsungs pa dang*/_de na gnas pa'i klu gnyan rnams khros pa'ang 'phags 
[\[61a.3\]]pas rdzu 'phrul gyis btul nas nam zhig sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ji srid gnas par gyur pa de srid du gnang ba phul lo/_/ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis kha che'i yul du gur gum skye bar byin gyis brlabs te cho 'phrul rnam pa mang pos sbyin pa po dang*/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi yid 
[\[61a.4\]]dga' bar byas te mya ngan las 'das so/_/'phags pa sha na'i gos can gyis ni ma ga d+har bzhugs nas bstan pa skyong ba'i dus na/_ma ga d+hA dang nye ba'i sa phyogs shig gnod sbyin mi srun pa zhig gis bdag gir byas nas skye bo rnams la 'tshe ba zhig yod pa de gdul ba'i phyir/_de'i bsti 
[\[61a.5\]]gnas su song ste me'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pas gnod sbyin de legs par btul ba dang*/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang rjes su bstan pa'i sgo nas/_rgyal po gzhu bzang zhes bgyi ba'i 'khor dang zho shas 'tsho ba la sogs pa dgra 
[\[61a.6\]]bcom pa khri phrag gcig dang*/_bden pa mthong ba 'bum phrag tsam byung bar grags shing*/_bye brag tu spos 'tshong sbas pa zhes bya ba'i bu nyer sbas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la bkod de/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de'i lag tu bzhag ste yul tsa mA na mya 
[\[61a.7\]]ngan las 'das so/_/de'i 'og tu 'phags pa nyer sbas kyis bstan pa bskyangs te/_'phags pa 'dis ni lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gnas su gshegs te/_khyim bdag dbyig gi snying pos bzhengs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang*/_gan+d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i ri dang*/_mgo bo'i ri la gar mkhan dpa' 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]bo'i gtsug lag yod pa rnams su bzhugs shing skye bo mang po la chos bstan pas dgra bcom pa thob pa dang bden pa mthong ba mang du byung ste/_mdor na 'phags pa rang gis chos bstan pas dgra bcom pa thob pa re res shing bu sor mo bzhi pa re bskyur bas phug pa srid du khru bco brgyad pa/_rgyar khru bcu 
[\[61b.2\]]gnyis pa/_dpangs su khru drug pa cig khengs pa byung ba la sogs pa ston pa 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di las 'gro don che ba ma byung bar grags shing*/_khyad par du grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal gyi bram ze'i gtso bo'i bu d+hi ti ka rig byed mang po'i pha rol du son cing slob ma bram ze lnga brgya yod pa des 
[\[61b.3\]]phyogs kun na gnas pa'i bram ze la sogs pa mkhas par grags pa rnams la tshangs spyod kyi lam la brtsad cing dris bas mgu bar ma nus par/_mthu rar 'phags pa 'di nyid bzhugs pa'i gan du 'ongs nas dris pas shin tu yid ches shing dad par gyur te/_dam pa'i chos 'dul ba las 
[\[61b.4\]]rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pas dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can du bsgrubs so/_/ji zhig gi dus na de la bstan pa gtad de/_rang nyid zhi ba'i dbyings su mnal ba na/_sku gdung ni shing bu de dag spungs pa'i zhugs la bzhen pas ring bsrel gcig tu 
[\[61b.5\]]gyur pa lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir bskyod do/_/de'i 'og tu 'phags pa d+hi ti kas bstan pa bskyangs te/_'phags pa 'dis tho gar gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas gnam mchod pa bya'o zhes 'bru dang gos la sogs pa me la bsregs nas mchod pa byed pa dag yod de/_de na 'phags pa 'di 
[\[61b.6\]]dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs nas de'i bkad sar bzhugs pas/_de dag gis gnam gyi lha yin pa'i 'du shes kyis mchod pa rgya cher byas pa la chos bstan pas bden pa mthong ba mang du byung ba dang*/_gzhan yang mal+la bar bram 
[\[61b.7\]]ze dregs med ces bya bas nyin re la ra skyes stong dang ba lang stong gi mchod sbyin byed pa'ang chos la bcug pa dang*/_shar phyogs kA ma rU pa'i bram ze sing+ha zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pas nyi ma mchod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su byon te chos bstan nas/_bden pa 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mthong ba la sbyar te yul der dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bzhengs te dus ston gyi rgyun btsugs pa la sogs pa bstan pa rgyas par mdzad do/_/bye brag tu ang+ga'i yul gyi khyim bdag bsod nams kyi mthu dang ldan pa/_dgos 'dod phal cher rang gi khyim du skyes pa'i 
[\[62a.2\]]shing ljon pa las 'byung ba zhig yod de/_de la lha nag po zhes bya bas byin pa'i bu gcig byung ba de'i ming du yang nag po zhes btags so/_/nam zhig cher son nas rgya mtsho chen po lan bdun du brgal ba'i phyi ma de la/_srin po'i ris khrung khrung gzhon nu zhes bya bas bzung ba/_'phags 
[\[62a.3\]]pa d+hi ti kas 'jigs pa de las yongs su bskyabs nas dzam+bu'i gling du phyin pa'i tshe/_ded dpon nag pos phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la lo gsum du dus ston chen po byas nas/_mthar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dgra bcom pa la bzhag go_/de nas 'phags pa d+hi ti 
[\[62a.4\]]kas 'phags pa nag po la bstan pa gtad de/_grong khyer 'phags rgyal du mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i rjes su 'phags pa nag pos bstan pa skyong ba'i tshe/_kaSh+mi ra'i yul na dge slong gnas pa zhes bya bas log pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po bdag tu lta ba la dkris pas cung zad 
[\[62a.5\]]cig tu bstan pa rtsod pa'i dri ma can du gyur te/_de'i tshe ma ru'i yul gyi puSh+ka ra Na'i dri'i gtsang khang du gnod sbyin ser skya zhes bya bas sbyin bdag byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bsdus nas rtsod pa phyir bcos shing*/_de'i tshe 'phags pa 'dis chos bstan pas lta ba yang dag 
[\[62a.6\]]par bcug ste bden pa mthong ba mang du byung ngo*/_/dus gzhan zhig na dzam+bu'i gling gi tshong pa rnams kyis 'phags pa nag po'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams gtam du gleng ba rjes su thos nas/_sing+ga la'i gling gi rgyal po sing+ha zhes bya bas spyan 'dren pa'i rkang mgyogs kyis nye bar son 
[\[62a.7\]]no/_/ji ltar son pa de dag gi ngor 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu rdzu 'phrul gyi bgrod pas gling der byon te/_rgyal po dang 'khor dang*/_yul mi'i skye bo dang bcas pa la chos bstan pas bden pa mthong ba dang*/_zag pa rnams la sems rnam par 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]grol ba la bkod de/_gling de na sngon dus bcom ldan 'das kyis gshegs shing bstan pa gnas pa yin na'ang*/_phyi nas nub par gyur pa la/_'phags pa 'dis byon te slar yang shin tu dar bar mdzad par grags so/_/de'i mthar nub phyogs b+ha ru kats+tsha na skya bseng gi rigs 
[\[62b.2\]]las byung ba mthong ba can gyi bu legs mthong zhes bya ba/_nyi ma re la me tog gi phreng ba kho na'i phyir yang gser pa Na lnga stong gis bsgrubs pa la longs spyod pa'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_des srid pa'i 'byor pa thams cad mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du 
[\[62b.3\]]spangs nas dgra bcom pa su kA yA na las rab tu byung nas zag pa rnams las rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dus nam zhig na 'phags pa nag pos de la bstan pa gtad de rang nyid byang phyogs ku sha'i tshal du mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas legs mthong chen pos 
[\[62b.4\]]bstan pa skyong ba'i dus su/_nub phyogs sin+d+hu'i yul na gnod sbyin mo sha khrag la mngon par dga' ba zhig gnas te/_de la mchod pa ma byas na ni skye 'gro rnams la rnam par 'tshe zhing*/_mchod na ni nyin re'i gtor ma la yang*/_skyes pa dang*/_bud med dang*/_rta dang*/_ba lang dang*/
[\[62b.5\]]bza' bca'i rnam pa mang po bstab dgos te/_de bdag nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba nyid du mkhyen nas/_lhung bzed bshal ba'i chus de phyogs su mngon par gtor ro/_/de'i rkyen gyis de rab tu khros nas mtshon gyi char pa 'bebs par byed kyang*/_'phags pas mtshon cha thams 
[\[62b.6\]]cad me tog gi sil ma'i rnam par bsgyur ro/_/slar yang 'phags pas de gnas pa'i phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du me rab tu 'bar bas khengs par sprul pa dang*/_de'i 'jigs pa la ma bzod de skyabs su 'gro ba dang*/_bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin par khas blangs te/_
[\[62b.7\]]phyin chad yul der sha khrag gi mchod sbyin med par grags so/_/gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi yul mang po dang*/_gling phran gzhan du yang rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa btsugs te mthar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul du ma bstan nas mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/de rnams 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]kyis 'dul ba phran tshegs nas bshad pa'i bstan pa'i gtad rabs bdun rdzogs pa yin no/_/theg pa chen po mdo sde lang+kar gshegs pa las ni/_bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas ni/_/yang dag bstan pa su zhig 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'grel par 
[\[63a.2\]]'od srungs chen po nas/_d+hi ti ka'i bar lung dang 'dra zhing*/_de nas rim pa bzhin du/_bi d+ha ka_btsun pa bud+d+hA nan+dI/_bud+d+ha mi tra/_dge slong rtsibs/_su na sha ta/_rta skad/_ma shi ba/_klu sgrub/_Ar+Ya de wa/_rA hu la/_saM g+hA nan+dI/_dge slong dgra bcom pa ka la sha_/ku mA ra ta/_
[\[63a.3\]]sha ya ta/_ba su nan+da/_ma no ta/_ha ka li ka_na ya nA sha ste dge slong de rnams snga ma snga mas phyi ma phyi mar bstan pa gtad par gsungs so/_/bsdu ba gnyis pa ni/_ston pa 'das nas lo brgya dang bcu lon pa 'phags pa d+hi ti kas bstan pa bzung ba'i skabs tsam na/_yangs 
[\[63a.4\]]pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi bcu/_mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_'dul ba la mi snang*/_chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i mi rung ba'i gzhi bcu la kun du spyod par gyur te/_de'ang*/_
[\[63a.5\]]hu lu hu lu yi rang dang*/_/kun spyod snod dang lan tshwa dang*/_/lam dang sor gnyis dkrugs dang gding*/_/gser gyis rung ba zhes bya ste/_/'di dag rung min gzhi bcu yin/_/zhes pa'am/_yang na/_a la la dang rjes su yi rang spyod pa dang*/_/brtag pa dang ni lan tshwa dag dang lam 
[\[63a.6\]]dang ni/_/sor mo rnams kyis rung dang dkrugs dang gding ba dang*/_/gser dngul byas pa 'di ni bar sdom yang dag bsdus/_/zhes pa lta bu'i bzhi bcu ste/_de'ang chos min gyi las chos kyi las su byas te dge slong rnams kyis/_a la la zhes bya bas rung bar byed pa dang*/_de 
[\[63a.7\]]bzhin du las byas te/_thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya bas rung ba byed pa dang*/_rang gi lag gis sa brko zhing rkor 'jug par kun du spyod pas rung bar byed pa dang*/_chang blugs pa'i snod nas nad pas srin bu pad pas khrag gzhibs pa ltar gzhibs 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]shing 'thung ba nad pas rung bar byed pa dang*/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlabs pa'i lan tshwa dus su rung ba dang bsres nas kun du spyod pas rung bar byed pa dang*/_lam dpag tshad dang dpag tshad phyed du song ste 'dus shing zas zos nas lam gyis rung bar byed pa dang*/_lhag mar 
[\[63b.2\]]ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang*/_bca' ba sor mo gnyis kyis spyad de sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar byed pa dang*/_'o ma bre gang dang zho bre gang dkrugs nas dus ma yin par za zhing bsres pas rung bar byed pa dang*/_gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyis gsar pa la ma glan 
[\[63b.3\]]par yongs su spyod cing gding bas rung bar byed pa dang*/_lhung bzed dri zhim pos byugs shing me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa khri rten dang bcas pa dge sbyong gi mgo bor bzhag ste lam po che dang*/_srang dang*/_lam gyi bzhi mdor lhung bzed 'dir byin nam/_ldug par byas pa don chen 
[\[63b.4\]]por 'gyur ba gleng zhing*/_gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_rin po che gang dag rnyed pa blangs nas spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung bar byed pa rnams so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer nor can nas dgra bcom pa grags pa zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa de 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa 
[\[63b.5\]]ljongs rgyus shing yangs pa can du phyin pas/_mi rung ba'i gzhi bcur kun du spyod pa mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang de bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir dgra bcom pa thams cad 'dod ces bya ba rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa zhig ste de'i drung du song ste mi rung ba'i gzhi de dag gleng ngo*/_/
[\[63b.6\]]des kyang de dag btang snyoms su bgyir mi btub pas/_khyod kyis song la phyogs tshol zhig dang*/_ngas kyang chos bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang*/_des kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes rim gyis song ste/_grong khyer nor can na dgra bcom pa g.yo ldan dang*/_grong khyer saM ka sha 
[\[63b.7\]]na gnas brtan nor can dang*/_dmar bu can na yid dga' dang*/_srug na na mang po pa dang*/_ma he ldan na yang dag skyes dang*/_lhan cig skyes na nam gru ste/_de dag la'ang gzhi bcur spyod pa glengs te phyogs btsal lo/_/nam grus grags pa lam gyis dub pa shes nas/_byed[(] khyed[)]
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]kyis ngal bsor zhugs dang lhag ma ngas btsal lo zhes smras nas song ngo*/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams grags pa'i nye gnas rnams yod pa gang na bar song ste khyod kyi mkhan po gar song zhes dris so/_/des smras pa/_phyogs tshol du song ngo*/_/
[\[64a.2\]]ci'i phyir/_khyed rnams gnas nas dbyung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas rdzogs par smras pa dang*/_de nyid nas song ste ji ltar bskrun pa 'gro zhing rab tu bgros pa'i mthar grags pa'i nye gnas rnams la lhung bzed dang chos gos sogs byin nas bsdus la gzod ji ltar rigs par bya'o zhes smras 
[\[64a.3\]]nas de ltar du byas so/_/de nas grags pas phyogs btsal te byung ba dang nye gnas rnams kyis thugs de lta bu ni bshol bar rigs so zhes gsol bas/_de dag las bdag gir bya ba blangs par shes nas de dag la bslab pa lhod pa'i phyogs dag 'phel bas rings par 'ong ba rig pas 
[\[64a.4\]]bstan pa'i dgos pa la bshol bar ma byed cig ces smras nas ma bzlog go_/de nas grags pas yangs pa can gyi kuSh+ma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang gi khyams su zhugs nas/_rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs te smon nas shes pas brtags nas gaN+DI brdung ba'i mod 
[\[64a.5\]]la dgra bcom pa bdun brgya 'dus te de'i sbyin bdag rgyal po mya ngan med kyis byas so/_/der grags pas rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi bcu rgyas par bzlas nas re re bzhin du sun phyung ste/_thams cad kyis de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bya'o zhes mi rung bar spyod pa rnams yongs su spangs so/_/de 
[\[64a.6\]]la bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pa zhes tha snyad du byung ba la/_phyi nas bsdu ba gnyis pa zhes 'bod do/_/bsdu ba gsum pa ni/_de'ang ji ltar 'byung ba'i rgyu/_sdom pa gsum gyi rab tu dbye ba las/de ltar dag par gnas pa'i rjes/_/lha chen zhes bya'i dge slong zhig_/
[\[64a.7\]]bstan pa 'di yi chom rkun byung*/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa ltar/_rgya gar lho phyogs ma ru Ta'i ded dpon zhig gi chung ma las bu btsas pa na de'i ming du lha chen por btags pa zhig yod de/_nam zhig gi dus na ded dpon gyis tshong pa mang po dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen por rin po che 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]len pa'i phyir song ba'i tshe lha chen po rang gi ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas ci zhig na ded dpon gyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed nas khyim du 'ongs pa na/_de'i gtam thos nas lam gol ba cig tu song nas bsad do/_/ring zhig nas ma yang skye bo gzhan dang 'grogs par shes 
[\[64b.2\]]nas bkums so/_/rang gi slob dpon du gyur pa'i dgra bcom pa zhig gis sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa bstan pas/_'dis ni rang gi bya ba ngan pa thams cad yongs su shes so snyam nas bkrongs so/_/de nas mkhan slob la ma ltos par dge slong byas nas mtshams med kyi las byas 
[\[64b.3\]]pa'i sdig pa thams cad gsang nas dben pa bsten pas bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la brten nas dad can gyi blun po mang du 'dus pa la/_sde snod gsum byang bar shes pas log par brtag pa mang pos bslad nas ston cing dgra bcom par khas blangs nas/_tho rangs kyi dus 
[\[64b.4\]]shig tu rang rgyud kyi sdig pa'i khur chen po yongs su dran pa'i shugs kyis/_kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes smre sngags bton pa 'khor rnams kyis thos nas rgyu mtshan dris pa na/_bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgoms pas sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon sum du mthong nas bos pa 
[\[64b.5\]]yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i g.yo sgyu mang po bstan pas sems can rnams kyi mgo bo bskor bzhin du nam zhig tshe'i dus byas ma thag nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so/_/de ltar yang rtog ge 'bar ba las/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[64b.6\]]pa nas bzung ste/_lo brgya dang sum cu rtsa bdun lon pa na/_rgyal po dga' bo dang pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i dus/_grong khyer pA Ta li pu tra'i nang du sdud par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'phags pa yang len pa med par bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur pa na/_'phags pa 'od srungs chen po dang*/_'phags pa sbu chen po dang*/_
[\[64b.7\]]gtong ba chen po dang*/_bla ma dang*/_re wa ta la sogs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun de ltar bzhugs pa na/_bdud sdig to can bzang po thams cad kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa/_dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa bstan nas/_bzhi lngas dge 'dun gyi dbyen chen po bskyed de/_gnas brtan klu zhes bya ba dang*/_yid brtan zhes bya ba mang du thos pa dag gis gzhi lnga bsngags par byed/_rjes su ston par byed cing de gzhan la lan gdab pa dang*/_mi 
[\[65a.2\]]shes pa dang*/_yid gnyis dang*/_yongs su brtag pa dang*/_bdag nyid gso bar byed pa ni lam yin te 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas sde pa gnyis su chad nas gnas te/_gnas brtan dang*/_dge 'dun phal chen sde zhes bya'o/_/de ltar lo 
[\[65a.3\]]drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du dge 'dun bye nas 'khrugs long gis gnas so zhes 'byung ba 'dir kha cig gong du bshad pa'i lha chen po dang*/_rtog ge 'bar ba nas bshad pa'i bdud sdig to can sngon rjes kyi rim pas byung bar 'dod pa dang*/_kha cig ni don gcig ming gi rnam grangs su 'dod 
[\[65a.4\]]pa ste mi mthun pa cung zad byung ngo*/_/'on kyang rtog ge 'bar ba nas 'byung ba'i tshig ris 'di la dpag na/_bdud sdig to can bzang po zhes pa'i tshig 'di rdzogs par de'i ming du 'dod pa ni cung zad mi rigs par sems te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang po zhes pa de'i ming yin na/_thams cad 
[\[65a.5\]]kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa zhes pa 'di mar sbyar dgos par 'gyur la/_de ltar dgos na mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa de la phyogs bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' yang yod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de med na 'dis gzhi lnga bsgrags pa la rjes su bsngags pa mang po byung nas 
[\[65a.6\]]dge 'dun bye ste bstan pa lo grangs mang por 'khrugs long byung bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/des na bdud sdig to can zhes bya ba 'di ni spyi'i ming tsam las ma smos par zad la/_bzang po thams cad ces pa ni/_de'i skabs kyi mkhas pa legs par smra ba dang*/_rigs par smra ba dang*/_drang 
[\[65a.7\]]por smra ba dang*/_yang dag par smra ba'i mkhas par gtogs pa dang*/_bzang por gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig to can nam/_de dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa des zhes bya ba'i don du bshad kyang mi 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]'brel ba med par sems kyang da dung brtag par bya'o/_/de lta bas na rtog ge 'bar ba nas bshad pa dang dge slong lha chen po gnyis don gcig tu dgongs nas mkhas pa chen po slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo dang*/_chos kyi rje sa skya paN+Di ta la sogs pa yongs su grags pa mang po'ang bsdu ba gsum pa'i dgos 
[\[65b.2\]]ched kyi gtso bo ni dge slong lha chen po kho na smos pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bu'i bdud kyi las de dag byung nas bstan pa la chu bur chen po bskyed pa'i dus ni/_snying rje pad+ma dkar po las/_nga 'das nas lo brgya na grong khyer skya snar gyi bur mu ra ta'i rigs su rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba 'byung ste/_nyin 
[\[65b.3\]]gcig la nga'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang*/_rtog ge 'bar ba las/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya drug cu lon pa na grong khyer me tog gis rgyas pa zhes bya ba na rgyal po a shwa kas rgyal srid byed 
[\[65b.4\]]pa'i tshe rtsod pa'i chos 'ga' zhig byung ba'i dbang gis rtsod pa'i chos 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur to zhes dang*/_btsun pa dbyig gi bshes gnyen gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub nas lo brgya lon te/_dus cung zad cig 'das 
[\[65b.5\]]nas shing skya snar gyi bu me tog gi grong bar gyi rten na rgyal po mya ngan med pa gdugs gcig pa'i sa skyong zhing rgyal srid mdzad pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun phal chen bgyes pa byung ste 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyis nye bar bsgrub pa dang*/_mi shes pa dang*/_som nyi dang*/_gzhan gyis rnam par dpyod 
[\[65b.6\]]pa dang*/_lam sgra 'byin pa dang bcas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yin no zhes gnas lnga rjes su brjod cing rjes su sgrogs pa gnas brtan klu dang*/_shar phyogs pa dang*/_mang du thos pa byung bar gyur to/_/gnas lnga po de dag rjes su brjod cing rjes su bsgrags nas kyang dge 'dun phal chen pa'i 
[\[65b.7\]]sde pa dang*/_gnas brtan pa'i sde pa zhes bya ba sde pa gnyis su rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang*/_'od ldan las/_de nas rgyal po d+harmA shwa ka shi ba dang*/_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis tha mal pa dang*/_zur chag pa dang*/_bar mar 'don pa'i tshig la mngon par 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]zhen pa gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/_rim gyis gzhung gzhan dang gzhan du sbyar te/_rgya chen po'i skad du sbyar ba'i mdo sde la sogs pa lta bu ste bstan pa rnam pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gyur pa yin no zhes bshad pa ltar na/_rgyal po mya ngan med kyis rgyal srid mdzad pa'i dus 
[\[66a.2\]]na/_rgyal po dga' bo byung ba'i dus nas brtsams te de nyid 'das pa'i bar gyi lo ste lo drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du byung bar gsal lo/_/de lta bu'i bdud kyi las rlung dmar drag po dang 'dra ba rab tu g.yos te chos kyi tshul rnam par dkrugs pas the tshom gyi tsher ma rnon po mang pos bstan pa la 
[\[66a.3\]]rma srol byung bas/_gzhan lan gdab pa dang*/_mi shes pa dang*/_yid gnyis dang*/_yongs su brtag pa dang*/_bdag nyid gso bar byed pa ste bzhi lnga yongs su bsgrags pas so so skye bo'i dge slong gi dge 'dun blo gros gsar bur gyur pa rnams ni som nyi'i drwa ba na chud de mthun par 
[\[66a.4\]]ma gyur pa'i dbang gis mdo 'don pa'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid du gyur nas yang dag par rnal du gnas par ma 'dod do/_/de'i tshe grong khyer skya snar gyi bur 'phags pa 'od srungs dang spu chen po la sogs pas bstan pa skyong ba dang*/_rgyal po dga' bo dang pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba byung ba'i 
[\[66a.5\]]dus su/_slar yang dge slong klu zhes bya bas kyang bzhi lnga rjes su bsngags pa'i rtsod pa chen po 'phel bar byas pas sde pa so sor gyes so/_/de'i rjes su de'i slob ma yid brtan zhes bya bas kyang rtsod pa'i gzhi chen por bskyed pa na de'i dus su sde pa rnams so sor gyes par 'dod do/_/de bas na 
[\[66a.6\]]de dag dag par bya ba'i phyir nam bsdu ba byas pa'i dus ni/_rtog ge 'bar ba las bshad pa ltar na/de ltar lo drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du dge 'dun rnams 'khrugs long gis gnas so zhes pa'i rjes thogs su/_de nas lo brgya phrag gnyis 'das pa'i rjes la gnas brtan gnas ma'i bus 
[\[66a.7\]]bstan pa yang dag par bsdus zhes so/_/des na ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang sum cu rtsa bdun nas sde pa so sor gyes par gyur pa dang*/_de'i khar lo drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar 'khrugs long byung bar gsungs pa'i lo 'di bsnan pas brgya phrag gnyis 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]du kun mkhyen bu ston gyis kyang*/_sde pa so sor gyes nas lo drug cu rtsa gsum na gnas brtan gnas ma'i bus bsdus so zhes lugs so sor smos pas kyang gsal ba'i phyir ro/_/yang lugs tha dad pa gcig las ni/_dus ni ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya na bsdu ba byas par bshad 
[\[66b.2\]]pa'ang yod de/_'di ltar gyes pa bco brgyad po bka' ma yin pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/_gnas kha che'i yul gyi bye brag kun sa na zhes bya ba'i dgon par/_dzA lan+d+ha ra'i rgyal po ka niSh+kas sbyin bdag byas nas/_gnas brtan dgra bcom pa seng ge zhes bya bas gzhi bzung ste pUr+Ni ka 
[\[66b.3\]]la sogs pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya/_ba su mi tra la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya/_so so skye bo'i paN+Di ta lnga brgya ste stong lnga brgya 'dus nas zhal thon du mdzad de gyes pa bco brgyad po bkar bsgrubs so/_/de'ang 'od ldan las/_bslab pa gsum ni rab ston cing*/_/phyag rgya 
[\[66b.4\]]gsum dang yang dag ldan/_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/_/sangs rgyas gsung du mkhas pas rtogs/_/zhes pa ltar/_tshul khrims kyi bslab pa ston pas na 'dul ba la snang*/_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa ston pas na mdo sde la 'jug_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ston pas 
[\[66b.5\]]na chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang*/_chos thams cad bdag med pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir dang*/_ston pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dang*/_ston pa'i bka'i don gtso bor bzhed pa'i phyir dang*/_ston pa'i sngon gyi phrin las las byung ba'i phyir dang*/_rgyal po kr-i kI'i 
[\[66b.6\]]rmi lam lung bstan pa las/_rgyal po khyod kyis ras gcig mi bco brgyad kyis drangs kyang ma ral ba rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa sde pa bco brgyad du gyur kyang*/_rnam par grol ba'i ras ni ral bar mi nus te/_de ni de'i snga ltas yin no zhes gsungs pa rnams kyis 
[\[66b.7\]]bkar bsgrubs so/_/'on kyang sngar log par brgal zhing brtag pa'i bslad pa mang pos de dag gi le len gyis sde pa bco brgyad po rnams la yang 'jig rten las 'das par smra ba'i sde pa dgra bcom pa la the tshom dang som nyi yod par 'dod pa dang*/_thams cad yod par smra bas/_dgra bcom 
[\[67a\]]
