[\[67a.1\]]pa'i 'bras bu las nyams pa yod par 'dod pa la sogs pa cung zad bslad par yod par grags shing*/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis kyang*/_bla ma kun dga' 'od sel dang*/_/sdug bsngal phung ston sa ston dang*/_/'char ka stong nyid chu las skyes/_/gang po sa 
[\[67a.2\]]'tsho chu shing dang*/_/mya ngan 'das dang yul 'khor skyong*/_/'gro ba'i mdo dang de bzhin gzhan/_/yang dag bsdus pa'i gzhi nyams phyir/_/mtha' dag min par rtogs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/de ltar sde pa gyes pa'i tshul yang rtog ge 'bar ba las/_de nas re zhig sde 
[\[67a.3\]]pa gnyis su chad nas gnas te/_dge 'dun phal chen pa dang*/_gnas brtan pa'o zhes rtsa ba'i sde pa gnyis po de las gyes pa'i tshul mi 'dra ba gnyis dang*/_yang rtsa ba'i dbye ba ni gsum ste/_'di ltar gnas brtan pa dang*/dge 'dun phal chen pa dang*/_rnam par phye ste smra ba'o zhes rtsa ba'i sde 
[\[67a.4\]]pa gsum las sde pa bco brgyad du gyes pa'i tshul te de ltar mi 'dra ba gsum dang*/_dul ba'i lha dang*/_lo dri mkhan po dag ni phal chen pa dang*/_thams cad yod par smra ba dang*/_gnas brtan pa dang*/_mang pos bkur ba ste rtsa ba'i sde pa bzhir 'dod do/_/de las gyes pa sde pa bco brgyad de/_
[\[67a.5\]]dang po ni 'di ltar/_shar dang nub dang gangs rir gnas/_/'jig rten 'das par smra ba'i sde/_/btags par smra ba'i sde pa dang*/_/lnga tshan dge 'dun phal chen pa/_/gzhi kun pa dang 'od srungs sde/_/sa ston sde dang chos srungs sde/_/mang thos gos dmar slob ma dang*/_/rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde/_/
[\[67a.6\]]thams cad yod par smra ba yin/_/rgyal byed tshal gnas 'jigs med gnas/_/gtsug lag khang chen gnas brtan pa/_/sa sgrogs ris dang sa srungs pa/_/gnas ma bu yi sde rnams ni/_/kun gyis bkur ba rnam pa gsum/_/yul don slob dpon bye brag gis/_/tha dad rnam pa bco brgyad gsungs/_/
[\[67a.7\]]zhes so/_/phyi ma ltar na/_'od srungs zhes bya sa srungs dang*/_/chos srungs pa zhes bya ba dang*/_/gzhi kun yod par smra ba ste/_/lta ba'i bye brag 'ga' zhig gis/_/rgyu yis 'di dag tha dad byas/_/ston pa tha dad yod ma yin/_/zhes yod par smra ba bzhi dang*/_dge 'dun phal chen dbye ba ni/_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]drug ste shar gyi ri bo dang*/_/de bzhin nub ri zhes bya dang*/_/gangs gnas zhes bya de las gzhan/_/rnam par phye ste smra ba dang*/_/gzhan ni de bzhin btags par smra/_/'jig rten 'das smra zhes bya ba/_/de dag tu ni yang dag smras/_/zhes phal chen pa drug dang*/_mang pos bkur ba'i bye brag ni/_/
[\[67b.2\]]rnam pa lngar ni mkhas pas bsgrags/_/gos dmar ba dang srung ba pa/_/ku ru kul+le de las gzhan/_/mang du thos pa zhes bya dang*/_/gnas ma bu zhes bya ba'o/_/zhes mang pos bkur ba'i dbye ba lnga dang*/_rgyal byed tshal na gnas pa dang*/_/'jigs med ri la gnas pa dang*/_/gtsug lag khang chen 
[\[67b.3\]]la gnas dang*/_/gnas brtan dbye ba gsum du 'dod/_/zhes gnas brtan pa gsum ste/_de ltar bye brag bco brgyad du/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa ni/_/gyur te 'gro ba'i bla ma de'i/_/sngon gyi phrin las nges pa yin/_/zhes so/_/de ltar bka'i bsdu ba gsum pa yan chad kyi gang zag rnams 
[\[67b.4\]]ni thos pa 'dzin pa yin la/_ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag brjed ngas can rnams kyis thub pa'i gsung rab lhag chad can du 'don pa dang*/_lta spyod mi mthun par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir gsung rab rnams glegs bam du yi ger bris so/_/de'ang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pas/_
[\[67b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba yi ger mi 'dri la/_'dul ba dang 'dra ba yi ge mi 'dri zhes gsungs na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can dag dran pa nyams par gyur na ji ltar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_u pA li dran pa nyams na lo ma la yi ger bris te bcang bar bya'o zhes pa ltar ram/_'on te 'jam dpal 
[\[67b.6\]]rtsa rgyud las ni ma skyes dgra'i bu u pa zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab rnams yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang*/_dri med 'od las bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa na/_sdud par byed pa po dag gis theg pa gsum glegs bam la bris te zhes gsungs pa ltar 
[\[67b.7\]]sngar nas kyang bris par shes so/_/'di ni gnas brtan seng ges gzhi bzung nas sdud pa po stong lnga brgyas bsdus pa zhes bya ste bsdu ba gsum pa'o/_/de ltar na chos bsdu ba gsum po 'di dag ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi lugs la ji ltar grags pa ltar bris pa yin no/_/de ltar thub pa chen po'i 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de snyed cig gsungs pa de dag ston pa'i sras rnams kyis legs par bsdus nas shin tu dar bar byas pa yin no/_/gnyis pa theg pa chen po'i bsdu ba la rnam par dbye na/_rgyu'i theg pa dang*/_'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis su gnas pa 
[\[68a.2\]]las/_dang po rgyu'i theg pa ni/_ngor chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen pos/_de bzhin theg pa chen po'i mdo rnams ni/_/lho phyogs dri med 'byung gnas zhes bya bar/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag_/dgu bcu 'dus nas bsdus zhes 'ga' zhig bzhed/_/'on kyang theg 
[\[68a.3\]]chen mtha' dag sdud pa po/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yin/_/zhes gsungs te/_de'ang slob dpon kha cig ma ga d+hA rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lho phyogs bi ma la sam+b+ha wa zhes pa ste dri ma med pa 'byung ba'i gnas zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba 
[\[68a.4\]]phrag dgu bcu 'dus nas/_'jam dpal dang byams pa dang phyag na rdo rje gsum gyis rim pa bzhin du mngon pa dang 'dul ba dang mdo sde gsum bsdus par 'dod do/_/rtog ge 'bar ba las ni/_theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te/_rtsa ba'i sdud par byed pa po kun 
[\[68a.5\]]du bzang po dang*/_'jam dpal dang*/_gsang ba'i bdag po dang*/_byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag cag gi rtsa ba'i sdud par byed pa nyan thos ni ma yin te/_theg pa chen po'i gsung ni de dag gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do/_/'on te bskal pa 
[\[68a.6\]]bzang po 'di la theg pa chen po'i thun mong ma yin pa'i mdo dang sngags kyi bstan pa gnyis ka'i sdud par byed pa phyag na rdo rje nyid du nges pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis dang*/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag por dbang bskur nas bstan pa gtad 
[\[68a.7\]]par bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji ltar zhe na/_'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ngo*/_/de'i tshe rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]pho brang du gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba la sras stong du tshang ba yod de/_rgyal po sras dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du chos mnyan to/_/ji zhig gi tshe na rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal du rnam par rtse 
[\[68b.2\]]zhing song ba na/_btsun mo ma smad ma dang dpe med ma zhes bya ba gnyis kyis dga' ba zhes bya ba'i rdzing du zhugs te khrus byas nas spos chu'i rlan gyis gos yongs su brlan bzhin du khri la 'khod do/_/dus der btsun mo gnyis kyi pang du khye'u chung gnyis skyil mo krung bcas bzhin par brdzus te 
[\[68b.3\]]'khrungs so/_/de'i tshe nam mkha' nas lha rnams kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni chos sems so/_/khye'u 'di ni chos kyi blo gros so zhes brjod pas khye'u dag gi ming yang de ltar du grags so/_/de nas khye'u de gnyis yul 'khor srung gi drung du song ste/_yab gcig gsan par mdzad du gsol/_
[\[68b.4\]]bskal pa bye bar chos rnyed rab tu dka'/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnang ba zhus nas khye'u de gnyis dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song ste chos mnyan no/_/rgyal bu stong phrag po thams cad kyang*/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid du 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam btab pa sha stag go_/de'i tshe 
[\[68b.5\]]rgyal po 'di snyam du gzhon nu 'di dag byang chub 'thob pa sha stag yin na gang thog ma nyid du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur brtag par bya'o snyam nas/_rgyal pos gzhon nu de rnams kyi ming bris pa rin po che'i bum par bcug ste zhag bdun du mchod pa byas pa'i mthar ming de rnams re re nas phyung ba na/_thams 
[\[68b.6\]]cad kyi thog mar gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi ming byung ba nas/_mthar blo gros mthar yas kyi ming gi bar stong phrag gcig tu tshang ba byung ngo*/_/de nas rdzus skyes kyi khye'u chos sems dang chos kyi blo gros gnyis la rgyal bu de dag gis smras pa/_khyed gnyis smon lam ji ltar 'debs zhes 
[\[68b.7\]]dris pas/_chos sems kyis khyed rnams sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe nga khyed rnams kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te nang na spyod cing*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad las phyi rol du ma gyur la/_phyi nang gi chos thams cad nyan mos rtogs par smon lam btab ste/_de nyid phyag na rdo rje zhes 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]sangs rgyas stong gi bka'i sdud pa por gyur cing*/_ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa rnam par sbyang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag par sangs rgyas rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan no/_/chos kyi blo gros kyis gang gi tshe khyed 
[\[69a.2\]]thams cad la thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa por 'gyur bar smon lam btab ste/_de ni tshangs pa gtsug phud can yin par gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo las bshad do/_gnyis pa 'bras bu'i theg pa la/_sdud pa po ngos gzung ba dang*/_des 
[\[69a.3\]]ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po spyir ston pa'i 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa'i sdud pa po ni/_gzhan gyi ngor byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul bstan pa tsam las nges pa'i don du ston pa nyid kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje thog mtha' med pa'i bdag nyid can kho na ste/_
[\[69a.4\]]ye shes thig le'i rgyud las/_phyag na rdo rje mgon po che/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag_/mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams/_/skye dang 'jig pa mchog yin no/_/de la skye ba gang yang med/_/rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go_/zhes dang*/_rdo rje rtse mo las/_e ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag_/
[\[69a.5\]]e ma'o sangs rgyas nyan thos pa/_/e ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'dis/_/rang gis ye shes 'dri bar byed/_/ces dang*/_dpal gsang ba grub pa'i rgyud las/_de yi sdud par byed pa po/_/gzhan dag yod pa ma yin te/_/bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed/_/rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs 
[\[69a.6\]]rdo rje/_/gsung ba po de sdud pa'ang de/_/zhes so/_/de lta na'ang gzhan gyi ngor na rdo rje sems dpa' dang kun du bzang po dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i tshul gyis stug po bkod pa dang*/_gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa dang*/_mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lcang lo can la sogs pa'i gnas tha 
[\[69a.7\]]dad pa dag tu bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ma lus pa 'dzin pa yin te/_phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan par 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]smon lam btab nas/_gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/_dbus kyi dzam+bu'i gling gi mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas so zhes so/_/de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa dang 'jig pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang 
[\[69b.2\]]skye ba tha dad par len cing sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi chad par byed par dbang bskur ba yin te/_de nyid las byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir/_dus kyi dbang gis skye ba 
[\[69b.3\]]yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do zhes gsungs pa dang*/_lta ba kun gyi bsrung don phyir/_/sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su spyod/_/la lar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang*/_/la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/_/
[\[69b.4\]]la lar he ru ka yi gzugs/_/la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang*/_/la lar byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/_/la lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs/_/la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma/_/la lar zlog pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni/_/mdzad pa dang ni la lar 'dzin/_/
[\[69b.5\]]mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos/_/de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal/_/zhes 'byung ngo*/_/gzhan yang rgyud kyi zhu ba po gang yin pa de nyid sdud pa por 'gyur ba yang yod de/_dper na kye rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud rnams dang*/_dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud lta bu'o/_/yang sngon du lag na rdo rjes 
[\[69b.6\]]bsdus nas/_phyis nas sdud pa po gzhan gyis bsdus par bshad pa'ang yod do/_/de bzhin du bde mchog la sogs pa'i rgyud 'ga' zhig ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i ma mo 'dus pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las ji ltar thos pa rnams phan tshun gcig gis gcig la dri ba dang lan rjes su bstan pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[69b.7\]]rdo rje'i gnas su bsdus pa'ang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa nas bshad do/_/de bas na ji skad bshad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de nyid ni spyir dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang*/_bye brag tu mi mjed kyi zhing dzam+bu'i gling dang*/_dus 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab khyad par ba gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa mtha' dag sdud par byed pa'i gtso bo nyid yin pa ni/_gong du smos pa lta bu'i smon lam gyi mthu dang*/_ston pa nyid kyis gang la gsang ba ma lus pa 'dzin 
[\[70a.2\]]pa'i bdag por dbang bskur nas bstan pa gtad pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_ji ltar na/_phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rjes dbang bskur 
[\[70a.3\]]bas khyod la dbang bskur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so/_/rdo rje snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa 
[\[70a.4\]]thams cad kyi don bya ba dang*/_bsrung bar gnang ngo*/_/khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher brjod pas dbang bskur ro/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rtags thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bsgrubs nas/_ma 'ongs pa na gsang 
[\[70a.5\]]ba'i rgyud nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'chad par byed pa'i ston pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/_dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud las/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang ba'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad 
[\[70a.6\]]par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do zhes gsungs shing*/_de kho na nyid sgron me'i rgyud las/_lha mos gsol pa/_gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni/_/shes pa dang ni bshad pa su/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[70a.7\]]nub phyogs su dpal rdo rje chen po'i au D+yAn du/_rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang*/_bshad pa dang*/_sems can la gsal bar byed do/_/zhes so/_/dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/_gang zhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i rgyal po de nyid de/_in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i sku sa bcu'i dbang phyug 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]ye shes kyi sku sa bcu'i dbang phyug go zhes bshad do/_/gnyis pa ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul la/_lcang lo can du ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul dang*/_au D+yan du ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po ni/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas/_ri rab lhun po'i byang phyogs lcang lo can zhes bya ba der/_sa 
[\[70b.2\]]bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis gsol ba btab pa'i ngor phyag na rdo rjes bsdus par mngon te/_gdugs dkar gyi 'grel pa las lcang lo can gyi pho brang na gnas pa sdud par byed pa lag na rdo rje la/_'khor sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang*/_rdo rje chos la sogs pas 
[\[70b.3\]]bla gos lnga brgya gdan du bting nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo bde bar gshegs pas gang du gsungs/_rdo rje 'chang ba khyod smros shig_shes rab sras po khrod smros shig_ces gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes gleng bslang ba gsungs so zhes bshad pa 
[\[70b.4\]]dang*/_slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i rnal 'byor rgyud kyi 'grel pa las/_sdud par byed pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pas/_'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa yin te zhes dang*/_lcang lo can na bzhugs pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul bzung 
[\[70b.5\]]ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pas kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_ji ltar bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can na yang dag par sdud pa'i dus su dzam+bu'i gling til gyi gong bu til gyi sa bon gyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du/_dzam+bu'i 
[\[70b.6\]]gling na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kun du gang bar bdag cag la snang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgya mtsho'i klong nas mngon par sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du gong du lung smos pa lta bu'i skal ba dang ldan 
[\[70b.7\]]pa'i gdul bya au D+yAn gyi rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti 'khor dang bcas pa legs par bcug nas dbang bskur zhing rgyud smin par mdzad pa la/_phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ste/_dpal gsang ba grub pa las/_ye shes sgyu ma'i 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]rang bzhin thugs rdo rje skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i skur gyur nas/_'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid dang*/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag nyid ston to zhes 'byung ngo*/_/de ltar 
[\[71a.2\]]na phyag na rdo rjes rgyud sde mtha' dag bsdus nas rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti 'khor dang bcas pa la byin no/_/de dag gis kyang dngos grub thob par gyur nas rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma zhes bya bar gyur nas au D+yAn gyi yul de stongs te/_de na chu'i phung po chen po lag 'gro'i 
[\[71a.3\]]tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba cig byung bar gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu dpal gsang ba'i bdag pos chu'i phung po chen po na gnas pa'i klu'i tshogs de dag sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du smin par byas nas gser gyi shog bu la bai DUr+Ya zhun mas bris pa'i rgyud sde mang po'i glegs bam rnams phyag na 
[\[71a.4\]]rdo rjes de dag la gtad do/_/de nas klu de rnams rim gyis mi'i lus su gyur te mtsho'i 'gram du grong dang grong khyer mang po dag byas nas/_der rdo rje theg pa nyams su blangs pas skyes bu phal cher gyis ni dngos grub kyi dam pa grub par gyur cing*/_ma grub pa rnams kyang mir gyur to/_/
[\[71a.5\]]bud med phal che ba rnams kyang gsang ba'i chos 'dzin pa'i mkha' 'gro mar gyur te/_da lta yang au D+yAn mkha' 'gro'i gnas zhes bya ba gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dang*/_gzhan yang yul de na yod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyang chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[71a.6\]]rgyal po chen po sha stag 'byung bar bshad do/_/de nas rim gyis mi'i yul du ji ltar 'phel ba'i tshul yang*/_yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud na rgyal po bi su kalpa zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa cig yod pa de'i nub cig gi rmi lam du khyod kyis 'di nas au D+yAn gyi gnas su song zhig 
[\[71a.7\]]dang skye ba 'di nyid du rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa rjes su thos shing*/_thos nas kyang shin tu spro ba chen pos au D+yAn du byon pas de na yod pa'i bud med cig dang phrad de de la bsnyen bkur yang dag par byas pas des byin gyis brlabs nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud dang*/_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de kho na nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud rnams byin nas rjes su gdams pa las yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rgya cher 'phel lo zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon gzhan mang pos kyang au D+yAn du byon nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rjes su gdams pa mnos shing rgyud 
[\[71b.2\]]sde mang po spyan drangs nas de las rgya cher 'phel bar bshad do/_/de rnams kyis theg pa che chung gi bka'i bsdu ba ji ltar byung ba'i tshul brjod zin to/_/gnyis pa 'grel byed kyi slob dpon ji ltar byon pa'i tshul ni/_de ltar nyan thos pa'i lugs kyi bstan pa sde pa bco 
[\[71b.3\]]brgyad kyi bar du gyes pa'i 'khrugs long gis gnas pa'i skabs yin na'ang 'on kyang dar rgyas shin tu che bar gyur la/_theg pa chen po'i lugs kyi bstan pa ni shin tu nyag phra ba'i rnam par gyur pa'i tshe/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya skor du zin 
[\[71b.4\]]pa na/_grub pa'i dbang phyug yongs kyi spyi'i mes por gyur pa'i slob dpon chen po sa ra ha ste ljongs 'dir mda' bsnun zhes par bsgyur du btub pa de nyid dzam+bu'i gling du byon par gyur to/_/de'ang 'phags pa'i yul gyi lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rigs rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa bram 
[\[71b.5\]]ze'i rigs kyi skye ba'i ljon shing yongs su bzung nas/_cung zad cig nas yi ge dang*/_grangs dang*/_rtsis dang*/_lag rtsis dang*/_dbyung ba dang*/_gzhug pa dang*/_gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing*/_gzhan yang gzhi brtag pa dang*/_gos brtag pa dang*/_rin po che brtag pa 
[\[71b.6\]]dang*/shing rta brtag pa dang*/_glang po che brtag pa dang*/_rta brtag pa dang*/_gzhon nu brtag pa dang*/_gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang*/_'byed pa dang klog pa dang sgra nges par sbyor ba la sogs pa'i gtsug lag rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol du son cing dben pa zhig tu gnas pa'i 
[\[71b.7\]]tshe/_nam mkha' stong pa'i khong nas bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa khyod kyis 'di na ci zhig byar yod/_de bas na phyag rgya chen por song zhig ces pa'i sgra snyan gling bu lta bus sems kyi rgyud yongs su bskul bar gyur to/_/de skad thos pa'i mod la bram ze'i khye'u de snga na med pa'i spro ba 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mchog gi shing rta la 'dzegs par brtsams te bram ze rnams kyi rnam par g.yeng ba'i bya ba thams cad dug can gyi bza' ba bzhin du yongs su spangs nas/_dpal gyi ri ga la ba der song ngo*/_/song nas kyang ji tsam zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i 
[\[72a.2\]]bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gsang ba zab mo'i chos kyi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog tu mkhyen nas rang rig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dag mngon sum du bstan te/_de nyid du dbang bskur nas rgyud sde rin po che mtha' dag gi lung legs par byin nas byin gyis 
[\[72a.3\]]brlabs pa la brten nas dngos grub rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid legs par thob nas/_bsti ba'i gnas de nyid du lo grangs brgya phrag 'ga' zhig kyang bzhugs zhes grags so/_/de nas kyang rab tu byung ba ni bstan pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o snyam du shrI nA len+d+rA zhes bya 
[\[72a.4\]]bar byon nas 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i sde las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por bsgrubs nas/_gnas de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba smra ba'i mkhan por gyur nas 'gro ba dpag tu med pa yang chos 'dul ba la yang dag par gzung 
[\[72a.5\]]par byed cing lo brgya phrag 'ga' zhig brgal bar grags so/_/de nas 'di snyam du sems te phyag rgya chen po nyid du myur bar 'dong bar byed pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su bstan pa de la rjes su slob par bgyi'o snyam pa'i 'dun 
[\[72a.6\]]pas nye bar bzung nas rab tu byung ba'i brtul zhugs la zhen pa spangs nas/_mda' tshong gi bu mo dngos grub kyi rten du nye bar bzung nas rang nyid mda' mkhan mchog gi cha lugs kyis spyod nas/_sems can dpag tu med pa srid pa las bsgral ba la yang lo grangs brgya 
[\[72a.7\]]phrag 'ga' zhig brgal bar bzhugs te mdor na dzam+bu'i gling na lo grangs stong dang nyis brgya rdzogs par bzhugs nas/_'chos skyob kyi yon tan ldan pa'ang do ha spyod pa'i glu la sogs pa mang po dag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi ngo na gdams te/_mthar yi drags[(] dwags[)]kyi 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]don du rang gi pur sbyangs pa'i dud pa in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i ngad pas kyang yi dwags kyi tshogs mang po lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid phyag rgya chen po nyid du bzhud do zhes bya ba 'di dag ni sngon gyi mkhas pa rnams la gtam du yongs su grags so/_/de lta bu'i grub pa 
[\[72b.2\]]chen po de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su gdams pas yongs su grol ba'i slob ma'i rtse mor gyur pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling mchog mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan gyi gtso bo dus gsum gyi dngos po ma lus pa mkhyen cing gzigs nas lung du ston pa'i tshad ma'i skyes bu chen po shAkya'i rgyal 
[\[72b.3\]]pos 'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa dang*/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud/_dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i mdo sde dang rgyud sde mang po nas bstan pa skyong ba'i skyes bu dam pa nyid du lung gi phreng bas nye bar bsngags pa'i 'phags pa klu sgrub ste/_de'ang ston pa mya ngan las 'das 
[\[72b.4\]]nas bgrang gzhi bzhi brgya lon pa na/_lho phyogs bai dar+b+ha'i yul na rigs rnams kyi bla mar gyur pa bram ze gtsug phud can zhes bya ba'i sras su skye ba'i zlos gar bsgyur bar gyur to/_/de lta na'ang 'tsho ba shin tu thung ba'i mtshan ma ngan pa shar ba de yongs su bzlog pa'i bya ba rnams kyis bskyed 
[\[72b.5\]]bsrings te dgung lo bdun du son pa na yab yum las gnang ba zhus par rang grol du byung nas dpal ldan rgyun ster zhes bya ba'i dri'i gtsang khang gang na ba der 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i mkhan po sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i bka' las rab tu byung nas/_rig pa sngags kyi 
[\[72b.6\]]rgyal mo ma hA ma yU ra zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dang rjes su gdams pa bdud rtsi zab mos yongs su bran no/_/de'i mod la rab tu dga' ba'i sa la reg pa'i yon tan mtha' dag la stong nyid smra ba'i seng ger gyur te lo grangs drug brgya'i bar du mi shigs pa'i rdo rje 
[\[72b.7\]]chen po nyid du byin gyis brlabs so/_/de las gzhan yang gsang chen 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gzhung dang nye bar bstan pa rnams kyang mnos pa dang*/_dbang 'byor zhing chos nyid dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum gzigs pas/slar yang sde snod gsum po ma lus pa 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid chen 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]po nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang dag par bsgrubs nas 'bod phyogs su dge slong dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i grags pas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rnam par brgyan par byas so/_/de nas dpal nA lan+dAr dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po rnams 
[\[73a.2\]]kyi zhal ta ba nyid kyi khur blangs nas gang gi tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun chos nas 'byung bzhin byed pa rnams la ni rjes su bsngags shing*/_cig shos de las ldog pa rnams ni gnas las bskal pa la sogs pa'i bya bas bstan pa chos dang mthun par bskyangs pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[73a.3\]]pa'i sku'i tshad kyi gzugs brnyan byang chub chen po la srog chags kyi gnod pa bsrung ba'i phyir rdo rje'i drwa mig gi rwa bas bskor ba la sogs pa dang*/_sku gdung mchod rten bye ba bskrun pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan dang bstan par bcas pa la ri mor bgyis pa'i 
[\[73a.4\]]tshul 'di la 'gran zlar 'os pa 'ga' yang yod par ma grags shing*/_khyad par klu'i rgyal pos rang gi bsti gnas rin po che 'byung ba'i pho brang gang na ba der spyan drangs pa na/_de dag gi mos pa dang 'tsham pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_rgyal ba thams cad kyi yum gcig shes rab kyi pha 
[\[73a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dang yi ge nyung ngu rnams mi yul du sngon med pa la spyan 'dren pa'i phrin las kyi snang ba chen po mdzad pa dang*/_skabs shig na dge slong bde byed ces bya bas rgyal ba'i bstan pa la rma srol btod pa'i ched du brtsams pa bka'i don la log par brtag pa rig pa'i rgyan 
[\[73a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'bum phrag bcu gnyis can byung ba yang 'phags pa 'di nyid kyi dngos stobs rigs pa'i sngags kyis btab ste rma med pa nyid du bde bar bkod do/_/khyad par stobs bcu mnga' ba'i dgongs don gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi rgyal po mang du bskrun pa ni/_'di 
[\[73a.7\]]lta ste/_phyi rig pa'i gnas kyi brjod bya gtso bor gyur pa la dmangs la gdams pa skye bo gso ba'i thig pa dang*/_mdzangs blon la gdams pa shes rab brgya pa dang*/_sa bdag la gdams pa dbu ma rin po che'i phreng ba dang*/_gzhan yang gser 'gyur dang spos sbyor dang*/_rten cing 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i rtsis dang*/_gso ba rig pa la sbyor ba brgya pa la sogs pa dang*/_nang rig pa'i gnas kyi brjod bya gtso bor ston pa la/_lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa dbu ma la rigs pa'i tshogs rnam pa lnga dang*/_bstod pa'i tshogs bco brgyad dang*/_spyod pa gtan la 
[\[73b.2\]]'bebs pa dang*/_mod kun las btus pa dang*/_theg pa chen po blo sbyong ngo*/_/nyan thos kyi rigs sad par byed pa rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu dang*/_khyim pa'i spyod pa gtso bor ston pa dbu ma bshes pa'i spring yig dang*/_rab tu byung ba'i spyod pa gtso bor ston pa byang chub kyi tshogs la sogs 
[\[73b.3\]]pa rnams so/_/sngags kyi phyogs la/_lta spyod mdor bsdus te ston pa rgyud kun las btus pa dang*/_lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa byang chub sems 'grel dang*/_bskyed rim ston pa 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs mdor byas dang mdo bsre dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyi shu pa dang*/_rdzogs 
[\[73b.4\]]pa'i rim pa ston pa rim pa lnga pa la sogs pa rang rgyud du brtsams pa'i bstan bcos mang po dang*/_gzhan 'grel du btab pa la'ang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'grel dang*/_sA lu ljang pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa mang du mdzad do/_/de ltar bgrang gzhi brgya phrag drug 
[\[73b.5\]]gi srid du bstan pa legs par bskyangs nas mthar rgyal po bde spyod kyi bu gzhon nu nus ldan zhes bya ba cig la mas gos bzang po srub med pa cig byin pas/_'di bdag gis rgyal srid 'dzin pa'i dus su gyon no zhes smras pa la/_mas khyod kyis rgyal srid 'dzin pa mi 'ong ste yab dang slob 
[\[73b.6\]]dpon tshe sgrub dang bcud len stabs su byas pa yin pas/_de ltar grub ste slob dpon dang srog gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pas/_des pha'i rgyal srid thob pa'i 'dod gdung gis kun nas bslangs te/_dpal gyi ri la slob dpon gyi drung du dbu bslang ba'i phyir 'ongs pa na/_slob dpon 
[\[73b.7\]]gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin chod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang*/_des ral gri shin tu rno bas bcad pas chad par ma gyur to/_/de'i tshe slob dpon gyis de la smras pa/_nga nyid sngon dge 'dun gyi zhal ta bar gyur pa'i tshe smyug ma zhig bcad pas skye ba bcad pa'i ltung byed byung ba'i las kyi lhag ma 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]yod pas/_smyug ma'i shun lpags kyis breg par bsgo ba na/_des kyang de bzhin du byas pas chad par gyur pa'i ske mtshams nas/_nga ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du/_/song nas lus 'di la yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i gdangs 
[\[74a.2\]]snyan pa pi wang gi sgra lta bu byung bar gyur to/_/de nas des dbu blangs te song bas lam du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis phrogs te dpag tshad gcig gi sar dor ro/_/slar yang ring zhig lon pa na lo re bzhin du dbu dang sku lus rim gyis nye bar song nas mthar snga ma bzhin du 'byar bar gyur pa dang*/_sems 
[\[74a.3\]]can gyi don mdzad do zhes grag go_/'phags pa de nyid kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bdud rtsis nye bar bskyed pa'i sras kyi thu bo rnam pa bzhi'i ya gyal du gyur pa/_dzam+bu'i gling 'dir mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan gnyis pa ni/_slob dpon Ar+Ya de wa ste de'ang 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_
[\[74a.4\]]gzhan yang rab byung dam pa ni/_/sing+ga la yi grong na gnas/_/'phags pa min la 'phags pa'i ming*/_/sing+ga la yi gling na gnas/_/pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/_/mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun dbyung*/_/zhes pa nges pa'i don gyi lung gis ji ltar mngon par sngags pa'i skyes 
[\[74a.5\]]bu chen po de nyid ni/_yul sing+ga la'i gling gi rgyal po pany+tsa shring+ga ra zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal gyi ldum ra me tog dang pad+ma'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pas kun nas yid du 'ong bar byas pa zhig yod de/_der pad+ma gzhan rnams ni nyin mo'i dus su kha 'byed cing mtshan mor zums nas dud cing 
[\[74a.6\]]gnas pa la/_de'i nang na pad+ma'i gong bu gcig ni ring mo zhig nas rtag tu zums shing kha 'bye bar mi 'dod pa bzhin du gnas so/_/de tshe ldum ra ba des sa'i bdag po de'i thad du phyin te ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du zhus pa dang*/_des cung zad cig brtags nas smras pa/_bzhin bzang 
[\[74a.7\]]de ni rigs sras khyad par can zhig bltams pa'i ltas su mngon na legs par gnyer ba gyis shig ces bsgos so/_/de nas nam zhig dus la bab pa na pad+ma de yid du 'ong ba'i 'dab ma brgya stong du kha bye ba'i sbubs na mi'i khye'u mtshan thams cad dang ldan zhing 'od zer 'bar ba zhig btsas so/_/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]btsas ma thag nas rgyal po de dga' ba dang ngo mtshar ba lhan cig tu byung ste rang gi bur bzung nas mthun pa'i yo byad mang po dag gis bsnyen bkur ba'i sgo nas bskyed du bsrings so/_/de nas khye'u de cher son pa dang mkhan po ma he de wa zhes bya ba las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[74b.2\]]dngos por bsgrubs nas mtshan Ar+Ya de wa zhes bya ba gsol te lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na grags pa'i zla 'od rnam par gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas slob dpon klu sgrub can du byon nas/_rgyal ba'i myu gu kun gyis bslab par bya ba rig pa'i gnas rnam pa lnga yan lag dang bcas pa dang*/_
[\[74b.3\]]phyi dang nang gi grub pa'i mtha' ma lus pa la bsnyengs pa med pa'i sbyangs pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son par mdzad de/_smra ba'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtsug gi rgyan du gyur to/_/ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig tu mu stegs kyi ston pa rta dbyangs zhes bya ba rang gi 'dod pa'i lha gtsug na zla ba bsgrubs pas/_de'i 
[\[74b.4\]]zhal bstan pa la phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub zhus so/_/des kyang mngal skyes su gtogs pa gang gis kyang thub pa med pa'i dngos grub byin no/_/de nas brtsams te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yod pa'i phyogs kun tu nyul zhing rtsod pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa smra ba mang po 
[\[74b.5\]]pham par byas nas phal cher mur 'dug pa'i grub mtha' la sbyar to/_/slar yang nga rgyal cher skyes nas/_shrI nA len+d+rA zhes bya ba mkhas pa thams cad kyis bsti ba'i gnas ga la ba der song la rnam par rgyal bar bya'o snyam du 'ongs nas/_der rang rang gi bstan pa rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du btsugs te 
[\[74b.6\]]rtsod par bya'i dus thob cig ces smras pa la/_nang pa'i paN+Di ta rnams kyis gzhan gyis thub par dka' ba shes nas/_dpal gyi ri las 'phags pa 'byon pa'i yun ji srid dang rjes su 'tsham par/_nyin zhag sum cu nas rtsod pa'i dus btab bo/_/de'i bar la klu sgrub yab sras dpal gyi ri 
[\[74b.7\]]nas spyan 'dren pa'i 'phrin yig chos skyong ba rnams la bcol bas bya rog gi rnam pa can gyis byung zhing yi ge blangs nas 'phags pa'i mdun du bskyal lo/_/'phags pas de nyid gzigs pa'i 'phral de la 'byon par brtsams pa dang*/_Ar+Ya de was gsol pa/_'phags pa nyid 'byon par 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]mi 'tshal gyis/_bdag cag gis 'dul bar zhal gyis 'ches so/_/slob dpon gyis kyang des 'dul ba'i skal ba yod par mkhyen nas gnang ba stsal te byon pa dang*/_lam kha zhig tu ljon pa'i lha mo zhig gis 'phags pa'i spyan bslang du byung ba la/_ut+pal 
[\[75a.2\]]rgyas pa'i 'dab ma la co 'drir byed pa'i dbang po'i dwangs ma ya gcig de la byin no/_/de nas mthar gyis nA len+d+rAr byon te/_thog mar dris lan blan pa'i sgo nas nga rgyal gyi ri bo rnam par bsnyil lo/_/dngos gzhi'i dus su rtsod pa'i gral rim so sor 'khod pa la/_des de la mig gcig pa 
[\[75a.3\]]'di ci smra zhes dris pa la/_'phags pas/_drag po mig gsum ldan yang de nyid mthong ba med/_/brgya byin mig stong ldan yang de nyid mthong ba med/_/Ar+Ya de wa mig gcig po ni gang yin des/_/srid pa gsum po ma lus pa yi de nyid mthong*/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog drangs te 
[\[75a.4\]]sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa'i tshig gi me lce rab tu mched pas gzhung lugs ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa bsregs te/_thugs rje dpag tu med pa'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rjes su bzung zhing 'gran zlas dben pa'i paN+Di ta chen po nyid du byin gyis brlabs so/_/de la sogs 
[\[75a.5\]]pa'i sgo nas bstan pa skyong ba'i bu slob kyi tshogs kyang bgrang las 'das pa bskrun pa dang thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa dang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i 'bras bu yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/skabs kyi don la brtsams pa'i bstan bcos kyi sgo nas bstan pa gsal bar mdzad pa'i 
[\[75a.6\]]tshul ni/_mtha' bral gyi don rgyas par ston pa dbu ma bzhi brgya pa dang*/_bsdus te ston pa dbu ma lag pa'i tshad dang*/_de la rtsod pa spong ba dang*/_'khrul pa bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs grub pa dang*/_mtshan nyid dang sngags kyi grub mtha'i rnam gzhag ston pa ye shes snying po kun las btus pa/_
[\[75a.7\]]sngags kyi phyogs la sngags kyi lta spyod gtan la 'bebs pa la/_mdo rgyud rtog pa'i lung dang bsres nas sgrub pa spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma dang*/_rigs pas grub pa sems kyi sgrib sbyong dang*/_smin byed dbang gi cho ga la gdan bzhi'i dkyil chog snying po mdor bsags dang*/_bskyed 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]pa'i rim pa ston pa rdo rje gdan bzhi'i sgrub thabs dang*/_ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs dang gtor ma'i cho ga_rdzogs pa'i rim pa ston pa shing gcig gi dka' 'grel la sogs pa rnams mdzad do/_/slob dpon klu'i byang chub ni slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi nye bar gnas par gyur pa na tshod 
[\[75b.2\]]mthar phyin pa zhig yod pa de nam zhig shi 'phos nas/_phyugs skyong gi rigs kyi skye ba'i sdong bu yongs su bzung nas lang tsho'i me tog kha bye nas ring zhig tu ma he 'tsho ba'i brtul zhugs la gnas so/_/de'i tshe sngon gyi bag chags bzang po'i grogs kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su bskul te 'phags pa klu sgrub can du byon te/_
[\[75b.3\]]'phags pa la bdag cag 'khor bas shin tu skyo bar gyur pas sgom byed par 'tshal lo zhes zhus pa dang*/_slob dpon gyis dang po ma he bsgom du bcug go_/de nas mi dkar po dang de yang snying la 'jug pa'i gdams pa rnams rim gyis bstan pas bden 
[\[75b.4\]]pa mthong ngo*/_/de nas dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas mtshan klu'i byang chub ces bya bar btags so/_/slar yang gsang chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te gdams pa byin pas/_'chi med rtag par 'tsho ba'i dngos grub brnyes nas dpal gyi rir gnas shing sems can rnams 
[\[75b.5\]]kyi don mdzad ces grags so/_/slob dpon de nyid kyis brtsams pa'i bstan bcos ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyi shu pa dang*/_sbyin sreg dang*/_rnam gzhag rim pa dang*/_las mtha' rnam 'byed dang*/_rig pa khong bsdu la sogs pa rnams so/_/dpal 'phags pa lhas byin gyis brlabs shing 
[\[75b.6\]]rjes su gdams pa'i slob ma ni/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_dge slong mang du thos pa ni/_/de yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/_/ma khol zhes kyang bya ba ste/_/nga nyid kyi ni bstod byed pa/_/ji ltar yon tan bzang po ni/_/
[\[75b.7\]]ji lta bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/_/kun nas sems ni rab dang zhing*/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/_/bsgrub dka' sngags ni rab grub cing*/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi de bzhin no/_/yon tan ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/_/zhes bya ba nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub thob/_/ces pa'i bar gyis lung bstan pa'i mkhol ni/_shar phyogs 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]kyi yul gru na bram ze'i rigs su skyes shing*/_gzhon nu'i dus nas sgra tshad la mkhas par sbyangs so/_/der de'i ma sangs rgyas pa la dad pas nang pa'i grub mthar gzud par 'dod kyang*/_pha'i dbang du song nas phyi rol pa'i grub mthar sbyar ba dang dbang phyug bsgrubs pas 
[\[76a.2\]]zhal gzigs shing mngal skyes thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur cig ces pa'i smon lam btab nas de'i grogs su sgra tshad la mkhas pa sring mo paN+Di ta dang*/_ne tso paN+Di ta dang*/_bsgyur ba tsam gyis rtsod pa'i yi ge rang bris su 'byung ba'i thod le kor rnams dngos grub tu byin no/_/de gsum gyis ma thub na 
[\[76a.3\]]dbang phyug rang nyid snying la zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs par khas 'ches so/_/des rgya gar shar phyogs nas rim pa bzhin du rtsod pas sus kyang ma thub par Ar+Ya de was pham par byas pas skyo nas gang+gAr lceb par brtsams pa na/_slob dpon 'phags pas sde snod kyi glegs bam mang po yod 
[\[76a.4\]]pa'i lha khang du bcug go_/der smon lam gyi dbang gis glegs bam la bltas pas rang gi lta ba nor bar go ste/_rgyu 'bras la skur pa btab pa dran te 'gyod cing nyes pa lce 'dis byas so zhes rang gi lce gcod pa'i phyir spu gri blangs pas de ltar bgyid du ma ster ba'i nub mo der rmi lam du/_sngar byas pa'i 
[\[76a.5\]]sdig pa la 'gyod pa skyes kyang sdig pa ma byed/_da nang pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas las 'bras ston pa'i bstan bcos brtsams na sdig pa 'dag go zhes lung bstan byung ngo*/_/de nas mdo dran pa nyer gzhag la sogs pa la brten nas las 'bras ston pa'i bstan bcos brtsams so/_/de nas 
[\[76a.6\]]Ar+Ya de wa'i bka' las rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa la gnas shing gdams ngag nyams su blangs pas dngos grub brnyes so/_/de nas brtsams pa'i bstan bcos kyi sgo nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa nyin mo ltar mdzad pa'i tshul gzhan yang*/_yan lag brgyad pa chen po dang*/_yan lag brgyad pa la 
[\[76a.7\]]'jug pa dang*/_snying po bsdus pa dang*/_yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa ste bzhi dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi skyes rabs so bzhi pa dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa snyan dngags chen po la sbyar ba dang*/_byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag gnyis dang*/_mi dge ba bcu dang dge ba bcu bstan pa 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dang*/_rtsa ltung bcu bzhi dang*/_bla ma lnga bcu pa dang*/_bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa'i rigs mang po mdzad do/_/mkhas pa chen po zla ba grags pa ni/_lho phyogs kyi yul gru sa man+tar sku'i skye ba yongs su bzung ste/_de'ang gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/
[\[76b.2\]]'gro ba kun gyi yid dang mig 'phrog par bzod pa cig tu gyur te/_cher son pa na mdo rgyud kyi don ma lus par sbyangs shing*/_khyad par dbu ma thal 'gyur gyi srol 'byed slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs kyi slob ma ka ma la bud+d+hi las klu sgrub yab sras kyi gzhung mnyan pas 
[\[76b.3\]]dgongs don phyin ci ma log par mkhyen no/_/'dir kha cig zla ba grags pas klu sgrub kyi zhabs ma zin te/_'jug pa rang 'grel las/_gal te gnas brtan dbyig gnyen dang chos skyong la sogs pa bstan bcos rnams kyi mdzad pa po byon zin par gyur pa de dag gis kyang zhes sogs 'byung 
[\[76b.4\]]ba'i gtan tshigs kyis klu sgrub ni ston pa 'das nas lo bzhi brgya nas byon te lo drug brgyar bzhugs pa dang*/_thogs med dgu brgya nas byon te lo brgya dang lnga bcur bzhugs par bshad pa ltar na/_de'i sku tshe'i smad kyi slob ma dbyig gnyen yin pas/_zla ba grags pa'i dus su dbyig gnyen la sogs 
[\[76b.5\]]pa'ang mi bzhugs pa grub pa'i phyir ro zhes 'dod mod/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa sgron ma gsal ba las/_sangs rgyas kun gyi rim gnyis gnas kyi rgyas btab ste/_de ni klu las rnyed pa dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar brgyud de zla ba grags par rim bzhin bshad ces dang*/_paN+Di ta skal 
[\[76b.6\]]ldan grags pas de ni dpal ldan klu sgrub las rnyed pa zhes smos te/_de ni dpal ldan klu sgrub zhal snga nas kyi dngos kyi slob ma nyid du so sor ston gyi brgyud pas ni ma yin no zhes dang*/_do ha mdzod kyi TI ka las kyang*/_zla grags kyis klu sgrub las man ngag dngos su thob cing*/_mthar dbu 
[\[76b.7\]]sbyin pa btang nas bde ba can du gshegs pa'i tshe klu byang dang*/_Ar+Ya de wa dang*/_zla grags gsum gyis gsol ba btab pas/_sku ci 'dra ba'i 'od kyis lus snang bar byas nas/_gar yang ma rtog cir yang ma sems par zhes sogs kyi gdams pa gnang ba dang*/_de'i tshe Ar+Ya de was/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]'gro'o Ar+Ya de wa 'gro/_/'od lus dag pa'i zhing du 'gro/_/song cig nA ga bod+d+hi song*/_/bya rkang can du 'phur te song*/_/song cig zla ba grags pa song*/_/dpal gyi ri la rtog med song*/_/zhes gsungs shing zla ba grags pas/_chad do zla ba grags pa chad/_/klu sgrub gshegs 
[\[77a.2\]]pas lam mkhan rgyu thag chad/_/ma bcos skye med chos kyi rgyun thag chad/_/yid la mi byed chos kyi rgyun thag chad/_/ces gsungs nas dpal 'bras spungs kyi ri la bzhugs zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste zhar las byung ba'i 'phros so/_/slob dpon 'di ni sku'i skye ba lnga brgyar rje btsun 
[\[77a.3\]]'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs par grags shing*/_de kho na nyid kyi don la thugs gzhol bas kun rdzob kyi snang ba thams cad rdzun par mnyam zhes gsungs pa na/_gzhan dag na re/_'o na dngos po'i ba las 'o ma 'byung ba bzhin du/_ri mor bris pa'i ba las kyang 'o ma 'byung ngam zhes 
[\[77a.4\]]smras pa la/_slob dpon gyis de bzhin no gsungs nas ri mor bris pa'i ba las 'o ma bzhos so/_/yang don dam du stong par mnyam zhes gsungs pa na/_'o na rdo'i ka ba 'di stong pa yin nam zhes smras pa la/_de bzhin no gsungs nas/_rdo'i ka ba las phyag thal byung mdzad pa la sogs 
[\[77a.5\]]pa'i sgo nas gzhan dag bden par zhen pa las bzlog pa'i mdzad pa mang pos ngo mtshar mig gi dga' ston gsar pa mang du ngom par mdzad do/_/nam zhig na phyi rol na 'gro ba mang po la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa dang*/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi dang chos bgro bar mdzad pas/_tsan+d+ra go mis dris lan thams 
[\[77a.6\]]cad thogs pa med par ldon pa mdzad do/_/khyad par tsan+d+ra go mis spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo skus mdzub mo g.yob cing*/_slob dpon gyis slob mar ston pa bzhin rig pa bslab par mthong nas zla ba grags pas 'phags pa nye ring mnga' 'am/_khong la zhal ston pa ltar bdag la'ang bstan du gsol 
[\[77a.7\]]zhes zhus pas/_de'i mtshan mo rmi lam du byon nas/_khyod 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mkhas pa yin pas byin gyis brlabs mi dgos la/_tsan+d+ra go mi la ngas cung zad cig byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi gsung ngo*/_/sad pa dang de ltar lags kyang zhal ston par zhu zhus pas zhal mngon 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]sum bstan no/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas sems can thams cad la bstan par bya snyam nas spyi bor khur te grong khyer ba rnams la nga'i spyi bo na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bzhugs pas/_thams cad kyis phyag dang mchod pa gyis shig ces bsgrags pas/_la las ni ci yang 
[\[77b.2\]]ma mthong ngo*/_/la las ni khyi ro zhig mthong zhing*/_phal che ba dag ni 'di chos mang po bshad pas rlung smyo byung ba yin no zhes smras so/_/chang 'tshong ma zhig gis zhabs tsam mthong bas kyang thun mong gi dngos grub thob ces grags so/_/slob dpon 'dis brtsams pa'i bstan bcos la dbu ma rigs 
[\[77b.3\]]pa'i tshogs dang*/_bzhi brgya pa'i 'grel pa dang*/_dbu ma la 'jug pa'i rtsa 'grel dang*/_rtsa ba'i shes rab kyi 'grel pa tshig gsal dang*/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa sgron gsal te/_gsal ba rnam pa gnyis la sogs pas bstan pa'i sgron ma phyogs dus thams cad du snang bar mdzad do/_/
[\[77b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras po shAn+ta de wa ni/_paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras/_rgyal ba'i bstan la bdag nyid che/_/skyes bu mang po byon mod kyi/_/zhi ba'i lha yi mdzad pa 'dra'i/_/nyams dang dgongs pa can mi rnyed/_/ces dang*/_'jam dbyangs sprul pa zhi ba'i lha/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar 'di'i che ba'i yon tan 
[\[77b.5\]]ni ngo mtshar ba'i gtam bdun du grags te/_de'ang lho phyogs kyi yul gru na mi'i bdag po 'jam dpal go cha zhes bya ba'i sras shAn+ta warma zhes bya bar gyur te/_dang po nyid nas pha ma dang dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa'i bkur bar 'os pa thams cad la gus shing*/_phongs pa dang mgon med pa rnams la 
[\[77b.6\]]snying brtse ba dang ldan pa gcig tu dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba/_theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bag chags bzang pos bgos pa zhig ste/_de ni bstan bcos thams cad dang sgyu rtsal thams cad la shin tu mkhas par gyur nas/_sang nyin rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i khri bshams pa dang*/_da'i[(] de'i[)]
[\[77b.7\]]nub mo rmi lam du khri de la 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhugs nas/_bu gcig 'di ni nga yi stan yin te/_/nga ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/_/khyod dang nga nyid stan gcig la 'dug pa/_/'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa rmi ba dang*/_sang nyin yum gyis chu dron mos khrus byed du 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bcug pa na chu'i tsha ba la ma bzod pa na/_bu snyigs ma'i dus kyi rgyal srid bzung na/_nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi dge bar spyod cing phyi ma ngan song du 'di bas che ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'jig rten gyi bya ba la snying po med pas shar phyogs b+hang+ga la'i yul du song zhig_/
[\[78a.2\]]der 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro zhes gnang ba byin pa na/_'di snyam du kye ma rgyal srid 'di ni dug gi sdong po bzhin te gang la chags pa tsam gyis thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i srog gi gshed ma nyid do/_/de bas na zhi bsil dam pa'i bdud rtsi ro mchog nye bar blangs nas rang 
[\[78a.3\]]gzhan thams cad kyi don chen po bya'o snyam du dam bcas nas/_rta mchog rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhig la bcibs te dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la byed cing song song ba na/_b+hang+ga la'i nags 'dabs su slebs te skom pa'i gdung ba bsal ba'i phyir du chu btung bar brtsams so/_/der glo bur du 
[\[78a.4\]]bu mo zhig byung nas de ni dug chu yin pas ma 'thung zhig ces smra zhing bdud rtsi'i chu las ngoms par byin no/_/de la khyod gang nas 'ongs dris pas/_des kyang nags tshal 'di'i nye logs shig na bdag gi bla ma 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin grub pa zhig bzhugs te/_de nyid kyi spyan snga nas 
[\[78a.5\]]'ongs so/_/de skad thos pa'i mod las/_spro ba mchog tu brtas pa'i mchid nas/_de bdag la ston cig ces smras nas/[ {]rings [,]ring [}]bar song bas ci tsam na bla ma de nyid sku gsung thugs dul zhing zab pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing gzi byin nyi ma 'char ka'i dpal bzhin du lham mer 
[\[78a.6\]]bzhugs par mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang gus pa'i ri mo dang bcas te rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rta mchog de phul nas rjes su 'dzin par zhus pas/_der 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur nas gdams pa byin te/_lo gnyis su bsgrubs pas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal mthong zhing mchog gi 'bras bu 
[\[78a.7\]]grub bo/_/de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag mtshan shing gi ral gri shubs dang bcas pa cig bcang ste spyod pa'i brtul zhugs kyis rgyu zhing*/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i sku srung mdzad cing rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'gro ba'i don byed kyin yod pa'i tshe/_phrag dog can dag na re/_'di la ni 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]shing gi ral gri zhig las gzhan ma mchis na/_lha'i sku srung nus sam ma yin brtag par bya'o zhes bcas nas/_gzhan pa rnams kyi mtshon cha la rim gyis bltas zin pa dang*/_bdag gi ral gri blta bar mi bzod do zhes gsungs kyang nan gyis bstan par bskul lo/_/der slob dpon gyis smras 
[\[78b.2\]]pa/_'o na mig ya gcig bkab la ltos shig ces bsgos te/_ral gri shubs nas phyung bas gzi brjid kyis rgyal po'i mig cig shos 'phral du sa la lhung ngo*/_/rgyu de nyid kyis g.yog dang bcas pa shin tu skrag ste skyabs su song bas/_slar yang mig snga ma bzhin du sbyar nas ring po'i bar du 
[\[78b.3\]]mthong bar byin gyis brlabs par mdzad pas thams cad kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas dad par byas so/_/de nas kyang dong ste sgo drung zhig tu sleb pa na/_mi zhig gis 'khrud ma dor ba'i zegs ma slob dpon gyi zhabs la reg pas de lcags sreg la ji ltar phog pa bzhin du khol bar gyur pa mi des mthong ngo*/_/dus 
[\[78b.4\]]gzhan zhig tu ba ti bi ha ra'i rgyal pos bsrungs pa'i sa phyogs su mu stegs kyi paN+Di ta bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod pa des 'ongs nas phyi nang gi grub mtha' la brtsad cing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran no/_/de'ang su pham pa de rgyal ba de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i ched byas so/_/rgyal pos sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' 
[\[78b.5\]]'dzin pa thams cad la rtsod par byar nus pa su zhig yod dris pas sngar gyi 'khrud ma dor ba'i mi des/_sgo drung gi rnal 'byor pa de dran nas de nyid kyis rtsod pa bzlog nus sam snyam ste gang na ba der phyin nas/_gsol ba btab pas zhal gyis bzhes so/_/des rgyal po la zhus nas/_rgyal pos skye bo mang 
[\[78b.6\]]po 'dus pa'i dbus su khri brtsigs nas phyi nang gi paN+Di ta rnams gral du bkod de grub mtha' la rtsod du bcug pas slob dpon rgyal lo/_/yang mu stegs kyis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis dkyil 'khor bris pa na/_slob dpon gyis zad par rlung gi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[78b.7\]]dang mu stegs kyi grong khyer dang bcas pa rlung gis bshigs nas de thams cad kyang nang pa'i bstan pa la btsud do/_/de nas nA len+d+rAr mkhan po rgyal ba'i lha las rab tu byung ste zhi ba'i lha zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas brtsams te b+hU su ku'i brtul zhugs kyis sgrub pa la thugs rtse gcig tu gzhol zhing*/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du mdzad do/_/nam zhig cho 'phrul gyi zla ba la gsung rab 'don pa'i re mos yod pas/_der slob dpon 'byon par zhus pa la/_ci yang mi shes so zhes lan 'ga' bzlog kyang gzhan dag gis nyams sad par bgros nas yang yang zhus pa dang zhal 
[\[79a.2\]]gyis bzhes so/_/sang nyin gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol skye bo mang po 'du ba'i dbus na khri mthon por bshams te spyan drangs pas khri de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po bzhin du bag tsha ba med par bzhugs nas sngon drang srong gis gsungs pa grags zin pa zhig gam/_de'i rjes su byung ba sngar 
[\[79a.3\]]ma grags pa zhig gdon gsungs pas/_der bzhugs pa thams cad kyis ma la zhes brjod cing ma grags pa zhig 'don par gsol ba btab pa'i ngor/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i bstan bcos chen po gsungs te/_gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag_/ces bya ba la sogs 
[\[79a.4\]]pa'i tshe bden pa bzhi'i chos nyid mngon sum gzigs shing*/_'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa skye bo mang pos mngon sum du mthong nas dad par gyur te/_skyes bu dam pa 'di ni blo gros mi zad pa'o zhes mgrin gcig tu sgrogs so/_/de nas bsngo ba'i le'u gsungs 
[\[79a.5\]]pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dang bcas nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phags te mthar mi snang bar gyur kyang*/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa'i chos kyi sgra ni gzhung ma rdzogs kyi bar du rgyun chad par ma gyur to/_/de nas lho phyogs kyi rgyud sau man+tha dang nye bar byon nas ya mtshan can gyi lta ba 'dzin pa lnga brgya tsam dang*/_
[\[79a.6\]]sprang po bkres pa stong phrag tsam gyi 'tsho ba sbyar nas chos bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la btsud do/_/de'i rjes su nA len+d+rA'i mkhas pa rnams kyis gzhung de yi ger bkod pa'i tshe/_kha che ba rnams kyis sh+lau ka bdun brgya yod pa bzung ba dang*/_yul dbus pa rnams kyis sh+lau ka stong yod pa bzung ste 
[\[79a.7\]]ma mnyam par bslab pa kun las btus pa dang*/_mdo kun las btus pa'ang blta zhes 'byung ba'i bstan bcos gnyis ma rnyed pa la gzungs thob pa'i paN+Di ta gnyis kyis phyis su zhus pas gzhung gi tshad ni yul dbus pa rnams kyis bzung ba ltar dang*/_bstan bcos gnyis ni kho bo'i spo khang gi 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]gdung gseb na paN+Di ta'i yi ge phra mo bris pa zhig yod pas ltos shig ces bstan cing*/_de dag gi bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i lung yang gnang ste bstan pa la phan pa rgya cher mdzad do/_/'dzam gling mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan gyi ya gyal thogs med sku mched ni ji skad du/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_
[\[79b.2\]]thog med ces bya'i dge slong ni/_/bstan bcos de ni don la mkhas/_/mdo sde nges don drang ba'i don/_/rnam pa mang po rab tu 'byed/_/'jig rten rig pa ston bdag nyid/_/gzhung 'byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/_/de yi rig pa grub pa ni/_/sA la'i pho nya mo zhes brjod/_/de yi sngags kyi 
[\[79b.3\]]mthu yis ni/_/blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/_/bstan pa yun ring gnas bya'i phyir/_/mdo yi de nyid don sdud byed/_/lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/_/de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/_/'khor ba rnams su 'gro ba na/_/yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/_/bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis te/_/
[\[79b.4\]]byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes pa'i lung gis mngon par bsngags pa'i skyes bu de dag ji ltar byon pa'i tshul ni/_dam pa'i chos mngon pa la dgra lan gsum byung ste/_de'ang dang po ni nang pas gaN+DI brdung ba'i sgra la brtags nas de la mu stegs pa rnams khros nas dmag drangs te bsnubs 
[\[79b.5\]]so/_/gnyis pa ni stag gzig gi rgyal po'i skyes kyi mtshan ma la brtags nas khros te dmag drangs nas bsnubs so/_/gsum pa ni mu stegs kyi slong mo ba la bshal chus gtor ba la khros te nyi ma bsgrubs nas bsnubs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze mo su pra kA sha shI lA zhes bya ba nang pa la dad pa zhig 
[\[79b.6\]]'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba mngon pa 'di ni 'di ltar nub par gyur kyang slar dar bar byed pa ni gzhan 'ga' yang mi snang na bdag ni bud med kyi lus su song bas mi nus mod kyi/_'on kyang lus las khye'u bskyed de/_de la bstan pa dar bar byed du gzhug go snyam ste/_rgyal 
[\[79b.7\]]rigs dang 'dus pa las thogs med dang*/_bram ze'i rigs dang 'dus pa las dbyig gnyen 'khrungs so/_/'khrungs ma thag nas de dag gi lce la gi wang gis a yig 'dri ba la sogs pa blo rno ba'i cho ga rnams byas so/_/cher son pa'i tshe bdag cag gi pha'i las gang yin zhes smras pa la/_
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ma des 'di skad du/_de'i phyir na khyed dag bskyed pa ma yin gyi/_blo sbyong gis bstan pa dar bar byos shig ces gdams so/_/gzhon nu gnyis kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes gnyis ka'ang chung ngu nyid nas rig pa'i gnas thams cad la 'jug pa'i blo gros shin tu gsal bar gyur 
[\[80a.2\]]te rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum la sbyangs/_de nas gcen gyis theg pa chen po'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa la dgongs nas ri bo bya rkang gi phug tu byon te lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du byams pa bsgrubs kyang grub pa'i rtags mtshan ma byung nas skyo ste phyi rol du byon pa na/_khyi mo khog smad 'bus 
[\[80a.3\]]gang zhing za ba la khog stod ma shi bar zug pa zhig mthong nas/_der snying rje lhag par skyes nas/_'di ltar 'bu 'di dag bsal na ni 'chi bar 'gyur la/_ma bsal na ni khyi mo 'chi bar 'gyur gyi de bas na rang gi lus las sha bcad de 'bu rnams der bsal bar bya'o snyam ste/_grong khyer du byon 
[\[80a.4\]]nas gseg shang gteng bar bcug ste/_spu gri g.yar nas lus kyi sha bcad de/_srog chags phra mo de dag lag pas bsal na ni shi ba'i dogs pas spyan btsums bzhin par ljags kyi rtse mos len par brtsams pa na de nyid du khyi mo med par rje btsun gyi sku 'od dang 'od zer lham mer bzhugs 
[\[80a.5\]]pa mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang yus pa'i tshul gyis/_kye ma yab gcig bdag gi skyabs/_/ngal brgyas 'bad kyang 'bras ma mchis/_/ci phyir char sprin rgya mtsho'i dpung*/_/gdung bas bsregs te skom tshad 'bebs/_/bdag gis de tsam bsgrubs na rtags kyang ma byung bas thugs 
[\[80a.6\]]rje re chung zhes gsol ba dang rje btsun gyis/_lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang*/_/sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni byon gyur kyang*/_/skal ba med pas bzang mi myong*/_/nga dang po nyid nas yod kyang khyod rang gi las kyi sgrib pas ma mthong bar zad do/_/da lta snying rje 
[\[80a.7\]]chen po skyes pas las kyi sgrib pa byang nas mthong ba yin no zhes dang*/_khyod kyi 'dod pa ci zhig gsungs pa la/_theg pa chen po dar bar zhus pas/_nga'i chos gos la 'jus shig gsungs nas yud tsam gyis dga' ldan gyi gnas su khrid de/_lha'i gro skad gcig tu bzhugs nas/_yum gyi mdo 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]rnams dang*/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa chen po pa dang*/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde mang po dang*/_de dag gi don ston pa'i bstan bcos byams chos lnga rnams gsan te mi yul du byon nas/_dbyig gnyen la sogs pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa bskrun no/_/brtsams pa'i sgo nas 
[\[80b.2\]]bka'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos ni/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa rgyas pa'i bstan bcos sa sde lnga dang*/_theg pa chen po'i sdom theg bsdus dang*/_theg pa thun mong ba'i sdom chos mngon pa kun las btus pa gnyis dang*/_byams chos lnga yang yi ger bkod do/_/mngon 
[\[80b.3\]]rtogs rgyan dang yum gyi don ston pa de nyid rnam par nges pa dang*/_rgyud bla ma'i 'grel pa/_mdo dgongs pa nges 'grel gyi 'grel pa dang*/_dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa mang du mdzad cing 'od byed pa'i sa mngon du mdzad de/_mdor na lo grangs phyed dang nyis 
[\[80b.4\]]brgya'i bar du bstan pa la bya ba byas so zhes grags so/_/slob dpon de'i gcung 'dzam gling mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan bzhi pa mang du thos pa'i mkhas mchog dbyig gnyen ni/_rgyud de nyid las/_lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/_/yi ge dang po ba bstan pa/_/ston pa'i bstan pa de gtso byed/_/
[\[80b.5\]]mchod rten kun dga' rwa bar gnas/_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong ba'i/_/sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug_/thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/_/zhes pa dus gsum gzigs pa mchog gi lung bstan pa'i skyes bu chen po ste 'dis kha cher slob dpon saM g+ha b+ha dra'i drung du byon nas/_bstan 
[\[80b.6\]]bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang mngon pa sde bdun la sogs pa gsan cing sbyangs pas mthar phyin par mdzad do/_/de nas shrI nA len+dAr byon pas de nyid du gcen gyis theg pa chen po'i bstan bcos kyi rnam grangs mang po brtsams nas bstan pa spel gyin bzhugs pa thos pas/_de la cung zad 
[\[80b.7\]]ma rangs pa'i rnam 'gyur gyis theg pa chen po'i chos dang gang zag la bstings pa'i tshig gis 'di ltar/_kye ma thogs med nags su lo/_/bcu gnyis bar du ting 'dzin bsgrub/_/ting 'dzin ma grub glang chen gyi/_/rgyab khal longs pa'i grub mtha' brtsams/_/zhes smras so/_/de gcen 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]gyis gsan pas tshul bzhin min pa'i log sgrub tu mkhyen nas de ma bsal na mi btub par dgongs nas/_rang gi slob ma gnyis la mdo sde sa bcu pa dang*/_blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa gnyis de'i thad du srod dang tho rangs kyi dus su kha ton byed du btang nas/_de dag gis 
[\[81a.2\]]kyang de bzhin du byas so/_/de'i dus na dbyig gnyen gyis mdo 'don pa gsan pas srod la theg pa chen po rgyu bzang ba tsam zhig rtogs/_tho rangs rgyu 'bras gnyis ka bzang bar rtogs nas sngar gyi skur pa btab pa rjes su dran cing 'gyod pas rang gi lce gcod par brtsams so/_/der mdo 'don pa 
[\[81a.3\]]gnyis kyi mchid du/_des sgrib pa 'byang bar mi 'gyur gyi/_de bas phu bo can du gshegs na de la sgrib pa sbyong ba'i thabs mnga'o zhes smras pa dang thogs med kyi drung du byon no/_/der thog ma nyid du chos kyi 'bel gtam 'ga' zhig byas pas/_gcung po ni spobs pa myur zhing lan thogs pa med 
[\[81a.4\]]par 'byung ba dang*/gcen po de bas cung zad bul zhing lan bzang po 'byung ba la/_gcen gyi gsung las khyod ni skye ba'i phreng ba lnga brgyar paN+Di tar gyur pas da lta yang skyes stobs kyi shes rab che ba yin la/_nga ni de lta bu ma yin pas lhag pa'i lha la 'dri yin lan smra ba yin no zhes byung bas/_der lhag 
[\[81a.5\]]par dad nas/_de nyid bdag la bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas/_rje btsun la 'dri yi gsungs nas zhus pa dang*/_byams pas 'di so so skye bo yin zhing theg pa chen po la skur ba btab pas tshe 'di la mthong ba'i skal ba med pas/_las sgrib zad par byed pa'i thabs su theg chen gyi 
[\[81a.6\]]mdo'i 'grel pa mang po brtsams pa dang*/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma yi dam du bgyis nas/_phyi ma'i dus na mjal bar lung bstan pa de ltar bsnyad pas shin tu yid ches te/_de'i tshe/_nga yi phu bo klu dang 'dra/_/nga ni char sdod bya dang 'dra/_/klu yi rgyal pos char phab kyang*/_/bya yi 
[\[81a.7\]]mgrin par song ba med/_/ces smras so/_/slob dpon 'dis b+ha ga bi ha ra zhes bya ba na zangs chen 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'i nang du bzhugs nas 'bum sde brgyad cu'am dgu bcu rtsa dgu thugs la bcang ba zhal ton du mdzad cing*/_mkhas pa'i tshogs kyi slob ma'ang 'di las mang bar ma byung bar 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]mngon no/_/'dis mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa brtsams te skyes dang bcas pa slob dpon 'dus bzang la bskur bas shin tu mnyes nas/_de'i 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa zhes bya ba yang byas so/_/brtsams pa'i bstan bcos kyi nyi mas stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bzhed pa gsal bar 
[\[81b.2\]]mdzad pa'i tshul ni/_bka' 'khor lo dang po bstan pa'i gzhir bzung nas chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa mdzod rtsa ba rang 'grel dang bcas pa mdzad de/_rang 'grel 'di nyid brtsams nas slob dpon 'dus bzang la bskur bas/_cung zad ma mnyes par rtsa ba sun 'byin gyi 
[\[81b.3\]]'grel pa 'di lung rigs kyis tshar bcad de pham par bya bar dgongs nas/_bstan bcos lan gyi phung po zhes pa'ang brtsams te rgya gar du 'byon par chas pa na/_de slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis gsan nas/_slob dpon 'di bye brag tu smra ba'i grub mtha' la mkhas pa yin pas 
[\[81b.4\]]bzlog par yang dka' zhing*/_bzlog pa'i dgos pa yang med pas bdag ni rang byung gi mchod rten bltar 'gro'o zhes bsgrags te bal yul du byon no zhes grags so/_/'khor lo bar pa'i dgongs 'grel chos thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam du ston pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[81b.5\]]gzhung 'grel dang*/_'khor lo tha ma nges don du bshad pa pra kA ra Na sde brgyad dang*/_gzhan yang sa bcu pa dang*/_blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang*/_ga ya go ri'i mdo dang*/_chos bzhi pa'i mdo dang*/_sgo drug pa'i gzungs dang*/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa la sogs 
[\[81b.6\]]pa bka' dang bstan bcos kyi 'grel pa mang du mdzad de/_bal po ha ngu zhes pa rab byung gi cha byad la sdom khrims mi bsrung ba chang gi bum pa thogs pa gzigs pas/_bstan pa nyams par dgongs nas thugs skyo ste rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs bzlog ste bton pas mya ngan las 'das so/_/
[\[81b.7\]]de'i shul du mchod rten brtsigs pa da lta'i bar du yod ces gtam du grags so/_/slob dpon des tshad ma dang*/_mngon pa dang*/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dul ba rnams bshad pa'i slob ma rang las mkhas par grags pa'i slob ma'i gtso bo bzhi byung ba'i tshad ma rang bas mkhas 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa 'dzam gling mdzes pa'i rgyan drug gi nang gses gzhung byed pa'i slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang po ni/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/_phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba pad+ma'i myu gu dang*/_/zhes thams cad 
[\[82a.2\]]mkhyen pa'i bkas lung bstan pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po de ni/_ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo dgu lhag tsam gyi dus na/_'phags pa ku ru kul+le rang byung du bzhugs pa'i ri dang nye ba'i lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rigs rnams kyi nang nas kun gyis bkur bar 'os pa rgyal rigs su sku 
[\[82a.3\]]'khrungs so/_/cung zad nar son nas brda sprod rig pa la sogs pa'i gtsug lag thams cad la shin tu mkhas par sbyangs nas/_dam pa'i bstan pa la dad par gyur nas rgyal srid kyi bya ba yongs su btang ste/_gnas ma bu'i sde pa'i mkhan po rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba las rab tu 
[\[82a.4\]]byung ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga legs par bzung ngo*/_/skabs shig na dpal nA len+d+rAr byon te thams cad mkhyen pa gnyis pa dbyig gnyen gyi zhabs la brten te theg pa gsum la mkhas par sbyangs/_khyad par rnam par rig par smra ba'i grub mtha' dang tshad ma la shin tu mkhas par gyur te/_
[\[82a.5\]]'khor bar 'phyan pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo ma rig pa'i mun pa dpyis 'byin par byed pa'i gnyen po rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i ched du tshad ma la sogs pa'i bstan bcos thor bu brgya rtsar longs pa brtsams so/_/nam zhig na bstan bcos de dag kyang thor bu lta bur song nas lus yongs 
[\[82a.6\]]su ma rdzogs par dgongs nas/_de dag gi brjod bya thams cad tshang zhing lus gcig tu dril nas ston pa'i bstan bcos shig brtsam par bgyi'o snyam du/_lho phyogs ri bo 'bigs byed dang nye ba na rang gi bsti gnas yod pa'i phug pa de'i brag ngos su/_tshad ma'i mdo kun las btus pa'i 
[\[82a.7\]]mchod par brjod pa dang*/_bshad par dam bca' ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bris pa ni 'di ltar/_tshad mar gyur pa 'gro la phan bzhed pa/_/ston pa bde gshegs skyob la phyag 'tshal nas/_/tshad mar bsgrub phyir rang gi gzhung kun las/_/btus te sna tshogs 'thor rnams 'dir gcig bya/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]zhes pa 'di dag rdo thal gyis bris ma thag nas sa g.yo ba dang*/_'od 'byin pa dang*/_sgra chen po 'byung ba dang*/_mu stegs kyi ston pa rnams kyi byin pa rengs pa la sogs pa'i ltas kyi khyad par mang po byung ngo*/_/de'i tshe mu stegs kyi ston pa nag po thub rgyal zhes bya bas brtags pa na tshigs 
[\[82b.2\]]su bcad pa de'i mthur shes pas/_slob dpon bsod snyoms la bzhud pa'i skabs su 'ongs nas lan gnyis su bsubs so/_/lan gsum par slob dpon gyis slar yang bris nas de'i mjug tu/_su zhig ngas bris pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'phyi ba ku re dang kyal ka'i phyir yin na dgos pa 
[\[82b.3\]]rgya chen po yod pas ma dbyi/_phrag dog gi dbang gis yin na blo la yod pa'i phyir dbyi bar mi nus so/_/gal te rtsod pa'i phyir yin na lus dngos su ston cig brtsad par bya'o zhes bris so/_/de mthong nas brtsad pa'i phyir kho 'ongs nas bstan pa rgyal du btsugs te brtsad pas slob dpon lan 
[\[82b.4\]]gsum gyi bar du rgyal te/_khyod nang pa'i bstan pa la 'jug dgos gsungs pas/_shin tu khros shing kha nas me sbar te slob dpon gyi yo byad phal cher bsregs so/_/de la slob dpon thugs skyo ste/_kye ma bdag gis mu stegs 'di gcig pu'i don yang bya bar mi nus na/_sems can 
[\[82b.5\]]thams cad kyi don bya ba lta zhog_de bas zhi ba'i bde ba mngon du bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bdag gi thod le kor 'di nam mkhar 'phangs nas/_ji srid 'di sa la lhung ba na sems bskyed btang ngo zhes dam bcas nas 'phangs pas/_sa la ma lhung ba'i bar de nyid du 'jam dpal byon te/_
[\[82b.6\]]bu kye ma khyed theg pa dman dang phrad las blo gros ngan pa skyed/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas ma thob bar du dge ba'i bshes su nga nyid 'gyur/_/mu stegs tshogs kyis khyod kyi bstan bcos 'di la gnod par nus min te/_/phyi ma'i dus na bstan bcos kun gyi mig gcig tu ni 'di 'gyur ro/_/zhes 
[\[82b.7\]]gnang ba byin te lung bstan pa'i bstan bcos chen po tshad ma kun las btus pa brtsams so/_/gzhan yang de'i rang 'grel dang*/_dmigs pa brtags pa rtsa 'grel dang*/_dus gsum brtag pa dang*/_rig pa la 'jug pa dang*/_phyogs chos dgu'i 'khor lo la sogs pa mang du 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]mdzad pa'i sgo nas bstan pa shin tu rgyas par mdzad do/_/slob dpon de'i slob ma dbang phyug sde ni rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas par gyur te/_des kun las btus kyi 'grel bshad mdzad do/_/dbang phyug sde'i slob ma ni/_rigs par smra ba thams cad kyi gtsug 
[\[83a.2\]]gi nor bu lta bu 'dzam gling mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan drug las/_gzhung 'grel bar byed pa'i slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa ni/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid/_/lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/_/pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang*/_/
[\[83a.3\]]de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang 'grub/_/ces lung bstan pa ltar/_lho'i phyogs kyi rgya mtsho dang nye ba'i yul kAny+tsi na ga ra zhes bya ba'i phyogs na mur 'dug pa'i bram ze'i rigs su skye ba bzhes shing*/_chung ngu'i dus nas brda sprod pa'i rig pa la legs par 'byongs nas/_bram ze'i rigs 
[\[83a.4\]]kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga bya ba'i phyir rang gi zhang po mu stegs kyi paN+Di ta gzhon nu ma lan zhes bya ba las rtswa muny+dza dang tshangs skud la sogs pa bram ze'i yo byad rnams bslangs pas/_zhang pos glan pa khyod la chas mi ster zhes smras nas bskrad pa na/_gzhon nu'i bsam pa yo byad mi sbyin na yang 
[\[83a.5\]]ngan smras kyi kha phru 'thor ba mi rigs so/_/'on kyang mu stegs thams cad pham par byed pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/_nang pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum la sbyangs so/_/khyad par slob dpon dbang phyug sde las tshad ma kun las btus pa tshar gsum gsan te/_de'ang gnyis 
[\[83a.6\]]pa'i dus nas slob dpon dbang phyug sde las mkhas par gyur te/_slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin brjod pas shin tu mnyes nas/_khyod kyis nga'i grub mtha' nor ba thams cad phyogs sngar gyis la kun las btus kyi 'grel pa rtsoms shig ces rjes su gnang ngo*/_/
[\[83a.7\]]gzhan yang grub mtha'i gnad thams cad rtogs dgos par dgongs nas slob dpon bran gyi rnam par brdzus nas grangs can pa'i gsang tshig rnams kyang ma lus pa mkhyen par mdzad nas/_chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pas rgol ba ngan pa thams cad tshar bcad de chos kyi lam la bkod do/_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]de'i tshe/_gal te chos kyi grags pa yi/_/smra ba'i nyi ma nub pa na/_/chos rnams gnyid log yang na shi/_/chos ma yin rnams da gdod long*/_/zhes ched du brjod skad do/_/khyad par brtsams pa'i bstan bcos ni/_rtog ge rab tu byed pa sde bdun dang*/_rnam 'grel le'u dang 
[\[83b.2\]]po'i rang 'grel mdzad do/_/de'i 'phros le'u phyi ma gsum gyi 'grel pa lha dbang blor brtsams su bcug nas des lan gcig lan gnyis kyi bar du brtsams te gzigs su phul bas gnyis ka'ang chu dang mer sbyangs par grags shing*/_yang lan gcig brtsams nas gzigs par 
[\[83b.3\]]phul bas tshig zur gyi mtshon pa'i don rnams dang 'phros don rnams ma gtogs pa'i dngos su bstan pa'i don rnams byung 'dug gsungs so/_/de'i slob ma shAkya blos de'i 'grel bshad byas so/_/de'i slob ma rgyan mkhan pos spur las lung blangs te 'grel bshad mdzad do/_/mngon 
[\[83b.4\]]pa rang bas mkhas pa slob dpon blo gros brtan pa ni/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'bum sde brgyad cu zhal 'don du mdzad pa'i tshe/_de'i nye 'khor du phug ron zhig rtag tu gnas pa des chos kyi sgra de rna ba'i dpyid du nos so/_/dus nam zhig gi tshe na phug ron de tshe 'phos te mtha' 'khob kyi 
[\[83b.5\]]phyogs na dmangs rigs kyi skye ba'i myu gu yongs su bzung ngo*/_/gang gi tshe byis pa de btsas ma thag nas sngon gyi bag chags bzang po'i sa bon yongs su sad de nga'i slob dpon gang du bzhugs zhes 'dri'o/_/der khyod kyi slob dpon su zhig ces smras pa na dbyig gnyen no zhes smra'o/_/de'i tshe yul 
[\[83b.6\]]dbus su 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams la phas dris pas dbyig gnyen zhes bya ba da lta yang bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/de nas cung zad cig cher son pa na slob dpon dbyig gnyen can du bskyal nas/_slob dpon gyis de la yi ge'i phyi mo ston pa nas brtsams te rig pa'i gnas thams cad tshar 
[\[83b.7\]]phyin pa'i bar du bslabs so/_/de chung ngu'i dus nas rang gi bza' ba'i sran ma nas phud blangs te/_rgyun gyi dbang po na sgrol ma'i sku rten bzhugs pa de'i phyag tu phud phul nas gzod rang gis bza' bar bya'o snyam ste lan 'ga' zhig gi bar du phul yang sa la lhung ngo*/_/slar yang sngon du 'phags mas 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ma bzhes par rang gis zos na mi rung snyam ste/_sran ma zad zad kyi bar du phul yang lhung ba na byis pa ngus so/_/de la rje btsun mas zhal dngos su bstan nas ma ngu bar khyim du song shig dang*/_ngas khyod la byin gyis brlab kyis byin gyis brlabs so gsungs/_
[\[84a.2\]]de nas brtsams te shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i blo gros skyes shing*/_dam pa'i chos dkon mchog brtsegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde mang po'i tshig don ma lus pa khong du chud de/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa la 'grel pa mdzad par grags so/_/mdor na de skad du/_bstan 
[\[84a.3\]]bcos kun gyi dbang gcig la/_/slob dpon blo gros brtan pa nyid/_/ces mkhas pa d+harma kIrti la sogs pa mang pos bsngags par brjod pa'i rol mo phyogs bral 'gro ba'i rna ba'i bcud du len pa byung ngo*/_/skabs su bab pa brtsams pa'i bstan bcos kyi sgo nas rgyal ba'i 
[\[84a.4\]]dgongs pa ji lta ba bskyangs pa'i tshul ni/_mdzod kyi 'grel pa gnam lcags thog gzer dang*/_chos mngon pa kun las btus kyi 'grel pa pra kA ra Na sde brgyad kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos mang du mdzad do/_/slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi slob ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[84a.5\]]phyin pa rang las mkhas pa 'phags pa rnam grol sde ni/_slob dpon sangs rgyas 'bangs kyi dbon du 'khrungs shing*/_chung ngu nas dbyig gnyen gyi zhabs la gus pas bsnyen cing rig pa'i gtsug lag mang po la thugs su chud pa dang*/_bye brag tu rgyal ba'i yum gyi gzhung lugs mtha' dag la 
[\[84a.6\]]shin tu mkhas par gyur cing*/_rab tu dga' ba'i sa la bde bar reg pa'i yon tan mang po rgyud la 'khrungs par grags shing*/_gang gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las chos kyi bdud rtsi yang mngon sum du mnyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur te/_chos kyi tshul thams cad la som 
[\[84a.7\]]nyi yongs su bral nas/_rje btsun byams pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan nyi khri dang sbyar ba'i 'grel pa nyi khri snang ba zhes bya ba mdzad do/_/de'i slob ma btsun pa rnam grol sde ste/_des kyang nyi khri rnam par 'grel pa brtsams so/_/slob dpon seng ge bzang po ni rgyal rigs las rab tu 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]byung ba/_bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' lung rab 'byams la mkhas pa dang*/_khyad par du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 'chad pa la 'jigs pa med pa'i dbang brnyes par gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig tu shar phyogs kha sar+pa Nir bzhugs pa na/_nub gcig gi rmi lam du nam mkha' 
[\[84b.2\]]la sprin gyi phung po dkrigs pa'i khrod na 'dir rje btsun byams pas brgyad stong pa gsung ngo zhes lha'i bu mang pos mchod pa byed pa tsam mthong ste der yun du bltas pas rje btsun byams pa zhal gyi dkyil 'khor btso ma gser gyi mdangs dang ldan pa spyi bo'i gtsug na gser gyi mchod rten 
[\[84b.3\]]gyis spras pa/_phyag g.yas pas chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa cig mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang de la phyag dang mchod pa byas nas 'di skad du/_rje btsun gyi bstan bcos la 'grel pa mang du mchis na gang gi rjes su 'jug par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang*/_thams cad kyi gzhung 
[\[84b.4\]]legs par rtogs la 'thad pa bsdus te khyod kyis phyogs gcig tu rtsoms shig ces bya bas bskul lo/_/mnal sad pa dang 'phags pa'i bka' rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir nub phyogs su byon te/_tsha ba gsum gyi gtsug lag khang du dpal ldan chos skyong zhes bya bas sbyin bdag 
[\[84b.5\]]byas te/_brgyad stong pa'i 'grel chen dang*/_nyi khri bsdus don le brgyad ma dang*/_don gsal 'grel pa dang*/_bsdus don rtogs par sla ba la sogs pa mang du mdzad do/_/slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi slob ma 'dul ba rang las mkhas pa yon tan 'od ni bram ze'i rigs su skyes 
[\[84b.6\]]nas/_bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i don la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i blo gros kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyas pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur te dgung lo brgya phrag 
[\[84b.7\]]bzhi'i bar la sems can gyi don mdzad do/_/bye brag tu bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i bdud rtsi ma lus pa gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi phreng ba ni/_'dul ba mdo dang*/_de'i rang 'grel dang*/_karma sha tam dang*/_byang 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u'i 'grel pa la sogs pa mang du brtsams so/_/slob dpon chen po shAkya 'od ni ma ga d+hA'i mkhan po bsod nams grags pa dang zhi ba'i 'od rnams las 'dul ba'i sde snod mnyan cing sbyangs pa mthar phyin par mdzad 
[\[85a.2\]]pas chos 'dul smra ba mchog gi khri la bzhugs te/_'dul ba sum brgya pa dang*/_rang 'grel 'od ldan la sogs pa mang du mdzad do/_/brda sprod pa ji ltar byung ba'i tshul ni/sngon sum cu rtsa gsum na brda sprod smra ba sar+b+ba dz+nyA zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sar+b+ba dz+nyA byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba'i 
[\[85a.3\]]sgra'i bstan bcos mdzad do/_/de las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bslabs pas mkhas par gyur nas in+d+ra byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos chen po mdzad do/_/de las drang srong phur bus bslabs nas mkhas par gyur pa dang*/_lha'i bu rnams la brda sprod pa ston pa'i 
[\[85a.4\]]slob dpon du bskos pas lha'i bla ma'am sgra mkhan zhes bya bar grags te/_'on kyang nga rgyal che bar gyur pas slob ma rnams kyang shin tu bsten dka' bar byung ste/_de'i nga rgyal rnam par gzhil ba'i phyir du/_lha'i dbang pos phur bu la gser gyi bum pa gcig bskur te phyi'i rgya mtsho las 
[\[85a.5\]]chu len du btang ngo*/_/des kyang dbang po'i ltar mnyan te rgya mtsho nas chu blangs te phul ba dang*/_brgya byin gyis chu de las ku sha'i rtse mos thigs pa gcig blangs pa phur bu'i lag pa la bzhag ste/_'di skad du/_brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos ni rgya mtsho chen po tsam mo/_/kho bos 
[\[85a.6\]]khong du chud pa ni bum pa'i chu tsam mo/_/khyod kyis shes pa ni chu'i thigs pa de tsam mo zhes smras pa dang*/_de yi mug par gyur te slan chad du sgra mi 'chad par dam bcas so/_/de'i tshe slar yang brgya byin gyis 'on te rang gis gang dag shes pa nas gzhan la ston cig dang phan thogs 
[\[85a.7\]]par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs/_sngar gyi dam bca' ba dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir/_ji skad du/_tshes brgyad slob dpon nges par 'joms/_/bcu bzhi la ni slob ma 'joms/_/gnam stong la ni rig pa 'joms/_/tshes gcig la ni thams cad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba'i dus 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gnyen pa bzhi po bsrungs nas/_de las gzhan rnams la ston par khas blangs so/_/dbang pos byas pa'i brda sprod pa ni mi'i yul du 'ong re zhig dar bar gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu bram ze pA Ni ni byung ste/_de ni thog ma nyid nas brda sprod pa'i rig pa slob pa'i 'dun pa chen pos mtshan 
[\[85b.2\]]mkhan la lag ris bstan pas byA ka ra Na shes pa'i mtshan bzang ci yang mthong bar ma gyur mod/_mtshon rnon po dag gis lag ris legs par bcos te bslab par brtsams kyang slob dpon ma rnyed do/_/de nas ma hA de wa bsgrubs pas ji tsam zhig na lha'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon 
[\[85b.3\]]sum bstan te 'dod pa dris so/_/des kyang brda sprod pa shes par 'tshal lo zhes smras pas/_lha de nyid kyis/_a i u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te byin gyis brlabs pas de'i mod la brda sprod thams cad shes pa yin no zhes 'ga' zhig 'chad la/_nang pa rnams ni 
[\[85b.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bsgrubs pas de ltar du shes par 'chad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_bram ze'i khye'u pA Ni ni/_/nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/_/nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/_/'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/_/de yang 
[\[85b.5\]]de yi sngags grub bo/_/zhes dang*/_lang+kar gshegs pa las kyang*/_sgra byed pa ni pA Ni ni/_/zhes lung du bstan pa'i slob dpon chen po des pA Ni byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba sh+lau ka nyis stong yod pa byas so/_/de la klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bus ma hA b+hA Sha zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa byas pa la sogs 
[\[85b.6\]]pa mang du yod do/_/ka lA pa'i mdo ni slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyal po bde spyod la btsun mo sgra rig pa cung zad shes pa zhig yod de/_nam zhig gi tshe khrus kyi ched du chu la zhugs pa'i dus na rgyal pos de la chab kyi zegs mas gtor ba dang*/_des ma mo da kA sIny+tsa 
[\[85b.7\]]zhes pa bdag la chu ma 'thor zhes pa saM skr-i ta'i skad kyis smras pa la/_rgyal pos 'phral skad dang sbyar te til gyi la du slong zhes bya bar go ste/_bran mo la til gyi la du bskur ro/_/de'i tshe btsun mo 'di snyam du/_saM skr-i ta'i skad cung zad kyang mi shes pa'i rgyal po ba lang lta bu 'di dang 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]lhan cig tu gnas pa bas shi ba bla'o snyam ste yi mug par gnas pa rgyal pos shes te/_ngas kyang brda sprod pa bslab par bgyi'o zhes spro ba bsring ngo*/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po'i zhang po dbang phyug go chas rgyal pos bsten par 'os pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa yang rnyed par dka' 
[\[86a.2\]]zhing*/_rnyed par gyur kyang yun ring du thogs pas rgyal srid kyi bya ba 'chor bar 'gyur bas des na bdag gis 'dod pa'i lha bsgrubs te legs par shes par byas nas rgyal po la tshegs chung ngus bslab par bgyi'o zhes smras te/_des gzhon nu kArti ka bsgrubs pas zhag bdun nas gzhon 
[\[86a.3\]]nu gdong pa drug dang ldan pa/_rma bya'i bzhon pa la bcibs te mdung thung gis lag par spras pa'i rnam pa can du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu khyod la ci zhig 'dod ces dris pa la/_des kyang sgra shes par 'tshal lo/_/lha'i zhal nas/_sid+d+ho\u0f85 war+Na sa mAm+nA ya zhes bya ba nas mtshams sbyor
