[\[86a.4\]]rkang pa lnga dang*/_ming rkang pa drug dang*/_kun bshad pa rkang pa bzhi rnams bshad pas/_lha'i byin gyis brlabs dang rang gi bag chags sad pas legs par shes te/_tshim pa'i rlom pas des chog par 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/de nas rma bya'i bzhon pa gdong bsgyur te song ba dang*/_de'i 
[\[86a.5\]]tshe bstan bcos 'di'i ming ci yin snyam nas/_de wa shAs+t+ra nA ma ki ho zhes smras pas/_lha'i zhal nas ka lA pa sU tra zhes gsungs pa dang*/_rma bya'i mdongs kyi kha dog la legs pa'i cha mang po bsags pa ston pa dang gnyis ka 'dzom pas bstan bcos la'ang legs pa'i brjod bya thams cad 
[\[86a.6\]]tshang bar shes nas ka lA pa sU tra zhes btags so/_/yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa kun bshad pa rkang pa bzhi dang kr-i ta rkang pa drug ni/_dbang phyug go cha dang bram ze mchog sred kyis kha bskang byas par grags so/_/de nas rgyal po la bslabs pas myur du shes te/_bdag gi lag g.yas 
[\[86a.7\]]pad+ma yod/_/g.yon pa la ni ut+pa la/_/yu ba 'jam dang rtsub pa dag_/gang 'dod smros shig bzhin bzang ma/_/zhes pa bskur bas btsun mo'ang mgu'o/_/rgyal pos 'di la don 'grel zhig mdzad pa bde spyod kyi byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba sh+lau ka lnga brgya pa cig yod ces grags so/_/de la 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]brten nas paN+Di ta bram ze u gra b+hU ti ste grags 'byor dang*/_durga sing+ha dang*/_kha che'i paN+Di ta rat+na ts+tsha tra dang*/_slob dpon spyan gsum 'bangs kyis byas pa'i 'grel bshad la sogs pa mang du yod do/_/slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi ni shar phyogs b+hang+ga lar 'khrungs shing gzhon nu nas mkhas 
[\[86b.2\]]par gyur te/_mu stegs kyi paN+Di ta brda sprod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba sgra rig pa smra ba kun gyis ma thub pa des phyi dang nang gi bstan pa rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste rtsod pa'i phyir byung ba'ang*/_slob dpon 'dis byis par gnas pa'i dus nas tshar bcad de paN+Di ta 'khor dang bcas pa nang 
[\[86b.3\]]pa'i bstan pa la bcug go_/b+ha ren+d+ra'i rgyal po'i bu mo tA rA zhes pa dang lhan cig bzhugs pa na/_dus gcig gi tshe g.yog mos rje mo la tA rA zhes bos pa gsan pas/_yi dam gyi lha'i mtshan dang mthun pas mi rung bar dgongs nas 'byon par chas pa dang*/_rgyal pos nga'i 
[\[86b.4\]]bu mo dang lhan cig mi 'dug na gang+gA la skyur cig ces de ltar du bskyur ba'i tshe/slob dpon gyis sgrol ma la bstod pa mdzad pas/_sgrol mas zhal bstan nas chu'i dbus su gling sprul te mi 'jigs par byin gyis brlabs pas deng sang yang tsan+d+ra gling zhes bya ba grong dang grong rdal du 
[\[86b.5\]]bcas pa yod par grags so/_/gtam de thos pas b+ha ren+d+ra'i rgyal po'ang slar dad par gyur te bla ma nyid du bkur ro/_/mthar gyis nA len+d+rAr byon te/_slob dpon zla ba grags pas chos 'chad pa'i sar gdugs shig khyer te phyin pa na/_slob dpon zla ba grags pas 'di nga la rtsod pa'i 
[\[86b.6\]]phyir 'ongs so dgongs nas yon tan ci shes dris pas/_sgra pA Ni dang*/_'jam dpal mtshan brjod dang*/_bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa gsum shes gsungs pas/_slob dpon tsan+d+rA go mi yin nam gsungs pas/de ltar du grags so zhes gsungs so/_/'o na dge 'dun gyis 
[\[86b.7\]]bsu ba byed pas re zhig phar thegs shig gsungs pa na/_nga dge bsnyen la dge 'dun gyis bsu bar byar mi rung byas pas/_shing rta'i steng du 'jam dpal bzhugs nas de'i rgyab tu khyed bzhugs shig_'jam dbyangs la bsu ba byed pa'i lugs su bya'o gsungs nas de ltar 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]byas so/_/de'i dus su slob dpon gyis rnga yab g.yob cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs de la bstod pa sh+lau ka bcu bzhi pa mdzad pas/_'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal nas nga la de tsam gyi yon tan mchis sam gsungs nas dbu yon mdzad pas rten de la 'jam dbyangs dbu yon 
[\[87a.2\]]ma zhes grags so/_/rtsod pa mdzad pa'i dus su tsan+d+ra go mi la 'phags pa'i rdo sku gcig gis slob kyin yod pa zla ba grags pas gzigs nas 'phags pa nye ring ma mdzad cig gsungs pas skyengs te phyag mdzub kye re lus pa la spyan ras gzigs mdzub kyer ma zhes bya bar grags so/_/yang 
[\[87a.3\]]dbul po zhig gis slob dpon la nor bslangs pa na/_slob dpon la nor med par sgrol ma'i sku brnyan zhig la gsol ba btab pas/_phyag gdub la sogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan rnams byin pas sgrol ma rgyan med ma zhes bya bar grags so/_/de la sogs pa'i yi dam gyi lhas rjes 
[\[87a.4\]]su bzung ba'i lo rgyus mang du yod do/_/de nas sman dpyad la sogs pa'i bstan bcos mang du brtsams pas/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi bkas theg pa chen po'i bstan bcos mang du rtsoms shig dang sems can la phan pa che bar 'gyur ro zhes bskul nas/_zla ba sgron me'i 'grel 
[\[87a.5\]]pa dang*/_sdom pa nyi shu pa dang*/_sku gsum la 'jug pa la sogs pa mdzad do/_/de'i tshe slob ma rgyal rigs kyi dge slong zhig babs nas sdig pa sna tshogs spyod pa gzigs pas de 'dul ba'i phyir du slob ma la spring ba dang*/_tsan+d+ra pa'i mdo dang*/_yi ge'i mdo dang*/_byings 
[\[87a.6\]]kyi mdo dang*/_nyer bsgyur dang*/_uN dang*/_sub dang ting la sogs pa mdzad nas btul lo/_/dus der slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos kun du bzang po zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad par byas pa legs pa zhig yod pa de nyid dar che bar gyur pas/_
[\[87a.7\]]tsan+d+ra go mis 'phags pa la bdag gi de dar bar gsol ba btab pas/_kun du bzang po dar 'phro chad nas tsan+d+ra pa dar bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe slob dpon zla ba grags pa thugs chad de bstan bcos khron pa la 'phangs pas khron pa de la tsan+d+ra khron pa zhes grags shing*/_de nas chu 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'thungs pa rnams blo rno bar 'gyur ro zhes grags so/_/de la brten nas slob dpon de'i zhang po chos kyi 'bangs dang*/rat+na ma ti dang*/_paN+Di ta zla ba gang ba dang*/_paN+Di ta rA dza shrI la sogs pas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa mang du byung ngo*/_/brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo ni/_rgya gar lho 
[\[87b.2\]]phyogs ma hA rASh+Ta zhes bya ba'i yul khams su bram ze'i gtsang ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa'i dge bsnyen rjes su 'byor pa rang bzhin bzang po zhes bya ba/_rig byed thams cad dang bye brag tu brda sprod pa'i gzhung la mkhas pa zhig byung ngo*/_/
[\[87b.3\]]dus gzhan zhig tu yul dbus su phyin te/_bram ze'i paN+Di ta stong phrag lhag tsam dang*/_gzhan yang rig byed smra ba'i mkhas pa mang po tshogs pa'i khrod du brda sprod kyi gzhung las brtsams pa'i 'bel gtam nyin zhag tu sbrel bar byas pa na/_skyes bu'i ming la rnam dbye bdun pa'i 
[\[87b.4\]]mang po'i tshigs su pra byin pa la puM su zhes 'don dgos pa/_slob dpon gyis puM k+Shu zhes thal te/_/de'i rkyen gyis slob dpon thugs mug ste rang nyid shi bar brtsams pa na/_dus de nyid du dbyangs can mas zhal bstan te bu de lta bu'i 
[\[87b.5\]]las rtsom par byed mi dgos kyi/_de dang mthun pa'i mdo yod pa ngas bstan par bya'o zhes dbugs phyung nas/_brda sprod pa'i gzhung gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo mtshams sbyor le'u lnga dang*/_ming le'u bcu gnyis dang*/_kun bshad pa le'u bcu gsum dang*/_kr-i ta 
[\[87b.6\]]le'u gcig ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'di nyid skad cig gi yun du rdzogs par gsungs nas/_slob dpon gyis mdo 'di 'grel pa dang bcas pa mtshan mo de la bris te/_de'i 'phral la dpe shog kyang rnying pa ltar song ngo*/_/sang nyin rgol ba rnams kyi gnas su phyin te bstan pas thams 
[\[87b.7\]]cad mgu bar gyur pa dang*/_slar yang sngar gyi lo rgyus dang bcas pa rgyas par bstan pas thams cad kyang ngo mtshar che bar gyur cing brda sprod pa'i gzhung gzhan las khyad par 'phags par bkur ro/_/mdo de la brten nas phyi nang gi paN+Di ta rnams kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa mang du yod 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]par grags so/_/de tsam gyis ni bdag cag gi ston pa thub pa'i dbang po sras dang bcas pa'i rnam par thar pa dag gi rjes su 'jug cing rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i blo ldan rnams la phan pa dang bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas dam par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88a.2\]]kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid 'jig rten gyi khams su ring por gnas pa'i thabs la shin tu gus pa bgyid dgos so zhes spro ba skyed pa'i dgos pa dam pas nye bar drangs te/_bstan pa'i gtad rabs rnams dang*/_dzam+bu'i gling 'di mdzes par byed pa'i mkhas pa rgyan drug dang mchog 
[\[88a.3\]]zung la sogs pa ji ltar byon pa dang*/_bstan pa la bya ba ji ltar byas pa'i tshul thor bu ba mdo tsam du smos pa yin la/_de las gzhan pa'i 'grel byed kyi slob dpon ji snyed byon pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa re re zhing brjod pa la ni ma lus pa'i 'byung khungs btsal ba yang dka' zhing*/_
[\[88a.4\]]phal che ba zhig ni rig pa'i gnas kyi gtsug lag rnams dang*/_bye brag tu sdom pa rin po che rnam pa gsum dang rjes su 'brel pa'i bshad pa dang*/_lung 'bogs pa dang*/_gdams ngag 'doms pa dang*/_rgyud sde rin po che rnams kyi dbang ka dang*/_byin gyis brlab pa dang*/_rjes 
[\[88a.5\]]su gnang ba dang*/_bshad ka la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing ji ltar byung ba'i tshul dang rnam par thar pa rnams ni so so'i chos 'byung dang rtogs pa brjod pa rnams su 'byung yang*/_'di na mthong thos gang dag byung ba tsam gleng ba la yang yi ge'i khur gyi ngal ba'i rgyus ma bris 
[\[88a.6\]]shing*/_de las gzhan pa'i dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos tha dad pa'i rtsom pa po'i slob dpon rnams dang sgyur ba po'i lo tsA ba rnams kyi mtshan gyi phreng ba tsam shes par 'dod pa la ni 'og tu chos tshan rnams kyi mtshan byang smos pa'i skabs su legs par bltas pas shin tu gsal bar 
[\[88a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan du bstan bcos rin po che 'di dag la da lta'i skabs su lung rgyun thor bu ba bzhugs pa rnams kyi brgyud pa'i mtshan gyi phreng ba rim par bstar ba zhig byung na shin tu 'thad pa'i gnas su rigs na'ang 'dir yi ge [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]dogs pa la sogs pas slar yang gzhan du 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rnam par spro bar bya'o/_/de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi bstan skyong chen po rnams kyis bstan pa la bya ba byas pa'i tshul ji ltar rigs pa ngag gi lam nas re zhig gleng zin to//_//da ni gangs can yul gyi bstan skyong chen po rnams kyis bstan pa la bya ba byas pa'i tshul la bstan pa snga dar dang*/_
[\[88b.2\]]phyi dar gnyis so/_/dang po bstan pa snga dar la/_spyir bod kyi rgyal po'i brgyud pa ni/_'phags pa'i yul gyi ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sras lnga tshigs su bshad pa dang*/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras chung ba stobs chung ste de'i sras lnga tshigs su bshad pa dang*/_bat+sa la'i 
[\[88b.3\]]rgyal po 'char byed kyi sras su bshad pa ste/_'dod tshul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa mchis shing*/de las phyi ma 'di'i lugs la ni/_rgyal po 'char byed la sras mig mas lcibs kyis 'gebs pa dang*/_sor mo rnams drwa bas 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de nyid legs 
[\[88b.4\]]pa ma yin pa'i mtshan mar bzung nas/_zangs kyi sgrom bu kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug ste chu bo gang+gA la bskur ba mthar gyis zhing pa rnams kyis rnyed de/_de la mthun pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba dag gis tshul bzhin du bskyed du bsring bar byas so/_/nam zhig cher son pa na sngar gyi byung ba rnams thos 
[\[88b.5\]]pas yid skyo bar gyur te gangs ldan gyi ri bo'i dbrag tu bros nas rim gyis lha ri yol ba'i khar byung ste btsan thang sgo bzhir thon pa la/_bon po rnams ni dmu thag dang dmu skas la brten te babs pa'i lha yin no zhes smra zhing*/_dngos la khyod su zhig ces dris pa dang btsan po zhes smras so/_/
[\[88b.6\]]gang nas byon dris pa dang nam mkha' la mdzub mo sbreng ngo*/_/de nas 'di ni kho bo cag rnams kyi jo bo bya'o zhes shing gi khri la bzhag ste mi'i gnya' ba la khur bas ming yang gnya' khri btsan po zhes bya bar thogs so/_/de nas bzung ste gnam gyi khri bdun dang*/_bar gyi steng gcig dang*/_
[\[88b.7\]]sa'i legs drug dang*/_de nas kyang phyi ma'i sras lde gnam zhes bya ba nas/_khri rje thog btsan zhes bya ba'i bar gyi rgyal rabs nyi shu rtsa drug yan chad kyi chab srid dag ni bon gyis bskyangs so/_/de nas lha mo dri ma med pas zhus pa'i mdo las/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyis 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]stong lnga brgya na gdong dmar can gyi yul du dam pa'i chos dar bar 'gyur ro zhes thams cad mkhyen pa'i lung bstan gyi rnga bo che bden pa'i mtha'i rang sgra 'bum du ldir ba gang yin pa de ni nam yang 'gog tu med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi khyad par gyi chos te/_ci'i phyir 
[\[89a.2\]]zhe na/_bar skabs de nas lha tho tho ri gnyan btsan zhes bya ba bsil ldan kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi thog mar gyur pa de bod khams kyi 'gro ba spyi'i bsod nams kyi mgron du khugs par gyur to/_/de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_rgyal po de yum bu gla sgang gi rtse na 
[\[89a.3\]]bzhugs pa'i dus su bsod nams kyi mthu las nam mkha' nas za ma tog cig babs te de kha phye ba'i nang na za ma tog bkod pa dang*/_pang kong phyag brgya pa dang*/_gser gyi mchod rten gcig la sogs pa byung ste/_de'i ming la gnyen po gsang ba zhes bya bar btags te de la mchod pa 
[\[89a.4\]]byas pas rgyal po tshe lo brgya dang nyi shu thub pa byung zhing dam pa'i chos kyi dbu brnyes par gyur to/_/de nas brtsams te rgyal rabs lnga'i phyi mar gyur pa gnam ri srong btsan la sras legs pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhing*/_dbu'i gtsug tu sangs rgyas a mi tA b+ha bzhugs pa zhig sku bltams 
[\[89a.5\]]so/_/de cung zad cher son nas bzo la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal dang rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag la mkhas par gyur pas blon po rnams kyis 'o cag rnams kyi rje 'di thugs shin tu sgam mo zhes bsngags pa brjod pa byung bas/_mtshan yang srong btsan sgam po zhes grags so/_/
[\[89a.6\]]chos rgyal chen po de'i sku ring la dam pa'i chos dar bar byed pa'i sta gon du/_thon mi a nu'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa rgya gar du brdzongs nas/_'phags pa'i yul nas bram ze'i rigs kyi slob dpon li byin dang lha rigs pa'i seng ge la sogs pa la gtugs nas rgya gar gyi yi ge'i 
[\[89a.7\]]rigs dang brda sprod pa'i gzhung lugs rnams la sbyangs pa mthar phyin par mdzad nas shin tu mkhas par gyur te/_legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi yi ge lnga bcu bod kyi skad la mkho ba'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi dang gsal byed sum cur dbri ba dang bsnan pa'i sgo nas nges 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]par mdzad do/_/'phags pa'i yul gyi brda sprod pa'i gzhung chen po brgyad dang grangs mtshungs su sbyar nas bod kyi skad dang rjes su mthun pa'i brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos brgyad brtsams pa la sogs pas kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir bka' drin gyi gting mtha' gzhal ba'i yul las 'das 
[\[89b.2\]]par gyur te/_lo tsA ba de nyid kyi gsung las/_nga drin chen gyi blon po thon mi ngas/_/lam bgrod par dka' ba'i rgya gar du/_/lus tsha grang che yang dka' ba spyad/_/khong mkhas pa bram ze li byin la/_/yid gus pa'i tshul gyis mos gus byas/_/
[\[89b.3\]]nor rin chen gser gyi phyag rten phul/_/don rnyed par dka' ba'i yig 'bru bstan/_/blo the tshom sel ba'i mdzub khrid byas/_/tshig dbyangs yig rnams la mkhas par bslabs/_/rgya yig lnga bcu tham pa ste/_/bod yig sum cur gtan la phab/_/rang mkhas pa'i nges shes blo la shar/_/'phral 
[\[89b.4\]]yon tan thams cad khong du chud/_/dus da lta dga' la phyi ma skyid/_/yul mtha' 'khob bod kyi rgyal khams 'dir/_/mi mkhas pas sleb pa'i snga ma yin/_/nga mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma yin/_/rje rgyal po nyi zla'i tshul du bzhugs/_/grogs blon po'i khrod na nga tsam med/_/bod 
[\[89b.5\]]kha ba can pa'i mi rnams la/_/nga thon mi bka' drin mi che'am/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar bka' drin gyi gting mtha' thug pa med par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang bslabs te thog mar mdo za ma tog bkod pa dang*/_pang kong dang*/_mdo sde dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa'i dam pa'i 
[\[89b.6\]]chos bsgyur ba dang*/_bod 'bangs rnams kyang dam pa'i chos la bkod pa la sogs pa'i sku drin shin tu che ba byung ste/_rgyal po 'dis thog mar yul phyogs bkra shis par bsgrub pa'i phyir bod kyi sa'i dbyibs 'di srin mo gan rkyal du nyal ba ltar yod pa'i sa dgra gnon pa'i gnyen por 
[\[89b.7\]]mtha' 'dul dang*/_yang 'dul dang*/_ru gnon gyi gtsug lag khang rnams btab ste/_dzam+bu'i gling gi rten gyi mchog dam pa jo shAka rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa spyan drangs te lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang rten dang brten par bcas pa bzhengs pa dang*/_rgya gar gyi slob dpon ku sa 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]ra dang*/_bram ze shang+ka ra dang*/_bal po'i slob dpon shI la many+dzu dang*/_rgya nag gi slob dpon ma hA yA na dang d+harma ko Sha rnams spyan drangs shing thon mi sam+b+ho Tas lo tsA ba byas te dam pa'i chos mang du bsgyur ro/_/de nas rgyal rabs lnga nas 'jam dpal 
[\[90a.2\]]brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgyu 'phrul rnam par rol pa'i chos rgyal tshangs pa lha'i me tog gis/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhi ba 'tsho dang*/_slob dpon pad+ma sam+b+ha wa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta mang po spyan drangs pa dang*/_zan g.yang mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i 
[\[90a.3\]]gtsug lag khang rten dang brten par bcas pa skye dgu'i bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa nyid du bskrun par mdzad do/_/bod kyi rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi thog mar gyur pa sad mi mi bdun la sogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i sde tshugs shing*/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la 
[\[90a.4\]]mi tra dang*/_sangs rgyas gsang ba dang*/_shAn+tiM garba dang*/_rnam dag seng ge la sogs pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'khon klu'i dbang po'i bsrungs pa dang*/_pa gor bai ro tsa na dang*/_A tsAr+Ya rin chen mchog dang*/_ye shes dbang po dang*/_ka cog zhang gsum la 
[\[90a.5\]]sogs pa'i lo tsA ba stong phrag tsam gyis sde snod gsum dang*/_gsang sngags rgyud sde bzhi dang*/_de dag gi dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa'i chos mang po bsgyur cing*/_de dag kyang 'chad pa dang*/_nyan pa dang*/_sgom pa la sogs pas bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams 
[\[90a.6\]]cad du rgyas pa'i las bsgrubs so/_/de'i sras sad na legs mjing yon gyi sras byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rol pa chos rgyal chen po khri ral pa can gyi sku ring la/_rgya gar dang bal po la sogs pa nas paN+Di ta mang po 
[\[90a.7\]]spyan drangs te bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i srol shin tu dar bar gyur to/_/nyi 'og gi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya dzi na mi tra la sogs pa'i lo tsA ba mkhas pa rnams la gsung rab kyi brda'i skad mi 'dra ba'i khyad par mang du mchis pa rnams shin tu rtogs par sla bar kun gyis bslab tu rung bar 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas gsung rab mtha' dag skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab pa dang*/_'on cang gi rdo'i rgya phibs dgu thog bzhengs pa dang*/_rab tu byung ba re re la'ang 'bangs su mi khyim bdun re 'bul ba la sogs pas bstan pa la sman pa'i phrin las bsam 
[\[90b.2\]]pa'i yul las brgal bar mdzad do/_/mdor na de dag gi skabs su bod kyi yul 'dzin ma'i khyon 'dir zhabs kyis bcags shing bstan pa rgyas pa'i rtsa lag tu gyur pa'i paN+Di ta dang*/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po sprul pa'i lo tsA ba gang dag byon pa phal che ba rnams kyi mtshan gyi phreng ba 
[\[90b.3\]]rtogs par sla ba'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad par bsdebs na 'di lta ste/_bod du rgyal ba'i bstan pa snga dar dus/_/rgya bal kha che nas byon paN+Di ta/_/ku sa ra dang bram ze shang+ka ra/_/[(*]bal po/[)]many+dzu shrI dang mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho/_/pad+ma 'byung gnas sngags 'chang chos kyi grags/_/
[\[90b.4\]]dri med bshes gnyen dang ni sangs rgyas gsang*/_/[(*]bsam yas rab gnas mkhan/[)]shAn+tiM garba rnam dag seng ge dang*/_/pad+ma'i ngang tshul bram ze A nan+da/_/kalpa mi tra dzi na mi tra dag_/[(*]su ren+d+ra bo d+hiH[)]lha dbang byang chub shI len+d+ra bo d+hiH/_/dA na shI la bo d+hi mi tra dang*/_/mu ni warma sarba dz+nyA de wa/_/[(*]bi d+yA ka ra pra g+hA/[)]rig byed 
[\[90b.5\]]'od zer zhes bya la sogs dang*/_/rgya nag slob dpon ma hA de wa tshe/_/ma hA yA na zhes bya la sogs byon/_/de de'i skabs su skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang*/_/kun gyi sngon ma thon mi sam+b+ho Ta/_/d+harma koSh+Tha dang ni rdo rje dpal/_/
[\[90b.6\](*]gnyags/[)]mU la ko Sha ye shes gzhon nu dang*/_/[(*]rba/[)]ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs ye shes dbang*/_/[(*]'ba' khri bzhir/[)]saM shi ta dang sbrang rgyar legs gzigs mtshan/_/[(*]rba/[)]seng gong lha lung gzigs dang gsal snang dang*/_/[(*]sna nam/[)]rdo rje bdud 'joms dz+nyA na [(*]lce/[)]sid+d+hi'i mtshan/_/[(*]gling ti/[)]shAkya pra b+hA dza ya rak+Shi ta/_/[(*]shung bu/[)]dpal gyi 
[\[90b.7\]]seng ge many+dzu shrI dba'/_/[(*]rtsangs/[)]lha dbang bsrungs dang bran ka mu ti ka_/[(*]pa gor/[)]rnam par snang mdzad bsrungs dang [(*]'khon/[)]klu dbang bsrungs/_/[(*]rtsangs/[)]rin chen mchog dang rin chen mchog dang rin chen legs par grub/_/d+harmA lo ka 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dran pa nam mkha' dang*/_/rnam par mi rtog shAkya 'od dang lce/_/[(*]nyang*/[)]khyi 'brug dang ni khams pa go cha dz+nyA/_/[(*]zhang*/[)]de wa ko Sha rgyal nyen nya bzang dang*/_/'gos lo chos 'grub stong gi A tsAr+YA/_/[(*]cog ro/[)]d+harma shI la klu yi rgyal mtshan dang*/_/dpal brtsegs 
[\[91a.2\]]bsrungs dang rat+na rak+Shi ta/_/ye shes sde dang dza ya rak+Shi ta/_/'jam dpal go cha rat+nen+d+ra shI la/_/bzang skyong lha yi za ba dpal gyi lhun/_/dpal gyi 'byor pa ye shes snying po can/_/rgyal ba shes rab shAkya bshes gnyen dang*/_/dge ba 
[\[91a.3\](*]gnubs/[)]dpal dang legs sde nam mkha'i snying*/_/yig mkhan dgon gling rma dang gzhon nu bsrungs/_/nam mkha' skyong ste skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/_/dam pa'i chos mang bod kyi skad du bsgyur/_/zhes so/_/skabs der bod yul 'dir sngon dus rgya gar gyi yul la 'gran 
[\[91a.4\]]nus pa'i bstan pa dar ba la/_sngon gyi smon lam log pa'i pho nyas bos pa'i glang dar ma 'u dum btsan dang*/_sdig can gyi blon po dbang btsan pa rnams kyi snying la yid kyi srub shing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshang stan bcas pa'i dbang gis ma bzod par/_chos 
[\[91a.5\]]rgyal chen po bkrongs nas rgyal srid kyi khri bzung*/_dge 'dun gyi 'dul ba'i khrims thams cad lo thog la ser ba phog pa ltar bcom nas/_sngon chad dar ro cog gi bstan pa thams cad ming gi lhag ma tsam du byas te bsnubs so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 
[\[91a.6\]]rnams kyi mthu stobs dang byin rlabs ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i bdag po mi'i srid pa'i brdzu la zhugs pa'i lha lung dpal gyi rdo rjes sdig can gyi rgyal po la lcags mdas bsnun te gshin rje'i ded dpon chen po'i khar bstab bo/_/de nas 'dul ba 
[\[91a.7\]]'od ldan la sogs pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'ga' zhig bsnams nas khams kyi phyogs su byon no/_/gnyis pa bstan pa phyi dar ni/_de ltar rgyal po glang dar ma 'jig rten pha rol tu 'phos pa'i rjes su yang bstan pa rmas tshab shin tu che ba'i rkyen gyis dus ring po'i bar du 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bod yul gyi 'gro ba mtha' dag mun pa'i gling du gyi nar 'khyams dgos pa byung ngo*/_/de'i tshe mdo smad kyi phyogs nas gtsang rab gsal dang*/_g.yo dge 'byung dang*/_smar shAkya mu ni ste gsum dang*/_bla chen dge ba rab gsal lam dgongs pa rab gsal te bzhi dang*/_stod 
[\[91b.2\]]nas pA la'i mtha' can rnam pa gsum nas rim par brgyud de/_'dul ba'i bstan pa rin po che'i sgron me slar yang sbor bar mdzad do/_/de'i rjes su stod nas mnga' bdag lha bla ma ye shes 'od khu dbon gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rin po che snying gi nor du 
[\[91b.3\]]bcang ba'i thugs bskyed kyi shing rta rnam par yangs pa'i 'phrul la brten nas/_yang dag bstan pa'i nyin mor byed pa ljongs 'dir 'dren par byed pa'i blo gros kyi skya rengs rnam par gsal ba'i rin chen bzang po la sogs pa'i gzhon nu nyi shu rtsa gcig rgya gar gyi yul du brdzangs so/_/
[\[91b.4\]]de'i nang nas sprul pa'i lo chen rin chen bzang po dang*/_lo chung legs pa'i shes rab gnyis kyis bod du byon nas mkhas pa'i bya ba yang dag par byas shing*/_khyad par lo chen rin chen bzang po ni sngags dang mtshan nyid gnyis ka la sbyangs pa chen po'i mthar phyin te bstan pa'i 
[\[91b.5\]]sgron me chen por gyur cing*/_shrad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma la sogs pa'i paN+Di ta yongs su grags pa mang po bod du spyan drangs te/_zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dpag tu med pa bsgyur ba dang*/_nyan pa dang bshad pa dang sgom pa'i srol bzang yang dag pas bstan pa'i gzhi chen po 
[\[91b.6\]]btsugs so/_/de'i rjes su 'phags pa'i yul gyi b+h+r-i ka ma la shI la'i gtsug lag khang gi paN+Di ta thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar gyur pa jo bo dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na zhes pa/_bskal pa du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems 
[\[91b.7\]]rin po che la legs par goms pa'i rgyal ba'i myu gu chen po de la sogs pa rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta dpag tu med pa spyan drangs nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor bas bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]rgyal mtshan du bslang ngo*/_/de bzhin du sprul pa'i lo tsA ba chen po lha bla ma ye shes 'od la sogs pa'i skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po mang du byon pa rnams kyis dka' ba du ma spyad pas bka' dang bstan bcos dpag tu med pa bsgyur cing gtan la phab ste/_chos 
[\[92a.2\]]kyi snang ba dkar pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas so/_/de dag gi skabs su paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba byon pa'i mtshan gyi phreng ba tshigs su bcad par bsdebs pa ni/_bstan pa phyi dar dus kyi paN+Di ta/_/bud+d+ha pA la d+harma pA la dang*/_/pradz+nyA pA la dang ni legs 
[\[92a.3\]]par bshad/_/shrad+d+hA ka ra warma pad+ma sbas/_/muk+ti mi tra sangs rgyas dpal zhi ba/_/shes rab go cha [(*]jo bo rje/[)]dpal ldan a ti sha_/[(*]de'i dbon po/[)]dA na shrI dang dran pa ye shes grags/_/phra la ring ba sun+yA ya shrI dang*/_/[(*]kha che/[)]dz+nyA na shrI dang tsan+d+ra rA hu la/_/[(*]'bum phrag gsum pa/[)]d+hi ra pA la a tu l+ya da sha_/blo bzang grags pa a 
[\[92a.4\]]ma ra tsan+d+ra/_/thig le bum pa gzhon nu bum pa dang*/_/gser gyi go cha dam pa rgya gar pa/_/dza yA nan+da ga ya d+ha ra'i zhabs/_/don yod rdo rje kha che zla ba mgon/_/stong nyid ting 'dzin rdo rje ye rdor ba/_/shes rab gsang ba ma hA dza na dang*/_/
[\[92a.5\]]stobs kyi zla ba man+t+ra ka lak+Shu/_/karma badzra dang ni dza mA ri/_/dpa' bo rdo rje sgra gcan 'dzin sbas pa/_/rnam snang rdo rje many+dzu g+ho Sha dang*/_/sUr+Ya kIr+t+ti pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na/_/gaM gA d+ha ra dang ni nor sbas dang*/_/kun bzang dpal dang niSh+ka lang+ka lha/_/'gro bshes dga' dang bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na/_/
[\[92a.6\]]shAkya shrI bzang rab 'byor zla ba dang*/_/su ga ta shrI dA na shI la dang*/_/dza ya dat+ta dang ni saM g+ha shrI/_/blo bzang snying po kA la tsan+d+ra dang*/_/dzi na gup+ta ma hA bo d+hi pa/_/dza b+ha ma shrI 'jig rten gsum kun dga'/_/longs spyod rdo rje dang ni rat+na shrI/_/[(*]bal po/[)]ma hA pa na badzra kIrti dang*/_/ka 
[\[92a.7\]]ya shrI dang bal po grags pa dpal/_/ku mA ra dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpal/_/sA d+hu kIrti bi na ya shrI dang*/_/shI la shrI dang mang+ga la shrI dang*/_/bi ma la shrI dAr paN A tsAr+Ya/_/rgyal ba'i lha dang lak+Sh+mI ka ra/_/A nan+da shrI rA hu la shrI dang*/_/zangs gling pa dang kIrti 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]paN+Di ta/_/sha ri pu tra nags kyi rin chen dang*/_/bud+d+ha gut+pa zhes bya la sogs so/_/dus der snga phyir byon pa'i lo tsA ba/_/chen po lha yi bla ma ye shes 'od/_/rin chen bzang po grags 'byor shes rab dang*/_/[(*]'gro/[)(*]lha [)]seng dkar shAkya 'od dang zhi ba 'od/_/[(*]rngog[)]legs pa'i shes rab 
[\[92b.2\](*]rgya[)]brtson 'grus seng+ge dang*/_/[(*]nag tsho/[)]tshul khrims rgyal ba khu yi dngos grub dang*/_/[(*]'brom/[)]rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas shAkya blo gros mtshan/_/[(*]mar thung*/[)]chos kyi shes rab dad pa shes rab dang*/_/[(*]rma/[)(*] ga rod/[)]dge ba'i blo gros tshul khrims 'byung gnas mtshan/[ (*]khyung po/[)]chos kyi brtson 'grus stag lo 
[\[92b.3\]]gzhon brtson pa/_/mgar pa chos bzang she'u rdo rje'i lha/_/[(*]rngog[)]rab zhi bshes gnyen blo ldan shes rab can/_/[(*]pu hrang*/[)]legs pa'i shes rab 'phags[(*]zangs dkar/[)]pa shes rab dang*/_/[(*]'brog mi/[)]shAkya ye shes dga' ba'i rdo rje gzu/_/gyi ljang dbu 
[\[92b.4\]]dkar chos kyi yon tan dang*/_/[(*]mar pa lho brag[)]chos kyi rin chen chos kyi blo gros mtshan/_/gnyan lo dar ma grags dang 'gos lhas btsas/_/[(*]klog skya/[)]gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer shes rab brtsegs/_/[(*]mal gyo/[)]blo gros grags dang bsod [(*]se tsa/[)]nams rgyal mtshan pa/_/rong pa chos bzang 
[\[92b.5\](*]yol lcags/[)]rdo rje dbang phyug dang*/_/[(*]mang 'or/[)]byang chub shes rab rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags/_/[(*] spang zho/[)]khe'u gad 'khor lo grags dang gsal ba grags/_/ding ri chos grags rgyus kyi smon lam grags/_/pa tshab nyi grags ba ri rin chen grags/_/[(*]'bro/[)]shes 
[\[92b.6\]]rab grags dang rwa chen rdo rje grags/_/kre bo shes dpal bkra shis rgyal mtshan pa/_/ba reg thos dga' rma phan chos 'bar dang*/_/mtshur ston dbyig gi rgyal mtshan mtshur dbang nge/_/[(*]dpyal pa/[)]kun dga' rdo rje dang ni kun [(*]dpyal/[)]dga' grags/_/mar 
[\[92b.7\]]do chos dbang chos kyi snying po dang*/_/[(*]kam/[)]chos kyi ye shes dbang [(*]phyugs mtshams/[)]phyug rgya mtsho dang*/_/tshul khrims yon tan khe'u gad yon tan dpal/_/bsod nams bzang po sum pa dpal mchog gi_/rdo rje dang ni nyi ma rdo rje dang*/_/[(*]zhu/[)]dge bsnyen ne tsho glog skya gzhon nu 'bar/_/
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]lha ston ye shes rgyal mtshan byang chub 'byung*/_/[(*]sman/[)]chos kyi blo gros ting nge [(*]cog bru/[)]'dzin bzang po/_/shes rab ye shes rig pa gzhon nu dang*/_/gzhon tshul dang ni khu yi mdo sde 'bar/_/shes rab brtson 'grus dang ni g.yung drung 'od/_/bsod nams 
[\[93a.2\](*]cog bru/[)]rgyal ba shes rab bla ma dang*/_/[(*]cog bru/[)]mya ngan med dpal la chings yon tan 'bar/_/bsod nams mos pa dge tshul khyung grags pa/_/tshul khrims brtsegs pa dang ni lha btsun pa/_/[(*]rngog[)]lha btsun mu ni rA dza sangs rgyas bskyangs/_/[(*] sbal/[)]rgyal gyi lo tsA rdo rje rgyal po 
[\[93a.3\]]dang*/_/de wa rin chen chos kyi rin chen dang*/_/[(*]gyur/[)]tshul khrims 'od zer dge slong bya yi gdong*/_/da pyid lo tsA dang ni phur bu 'od/_/[(*]pa tshab/[) ]tshul rgyal shes rab legs dang d+harma [(*]nag tsho/[)]grags/_/mar pa blo gros bzang po se lo tsA/_/zla ba grags pa gnyal 
[\[93a.4\]]mi ye shes chos/_/chos kyi zla ba dge slong shes rab bskyabs/_/nag tsho sher rgyan 'a zhwa rgya gar brtsegs/_/gnyan ston bsod nams ba ri chos grags dang*/_/ong po lo tsA gzhon nu shes rab dang*/_/'gar ba shes 'byung 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang*/_/
[\[93a.5\](*]lce/[)]shes rab 'od zer dang ni dga' ba dpal/_/ye shes 'byung gnas shAkya brtson 'grus pa/_/[(*]lo btsun chung*/[)]rwa pa chos rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang*/_/zha ma dge bsnyen seng rgyal lce bkra shis/_/chag lo dgra bcom dpyal pa chos kyi bzang*/_/[(*]gnubs/[)]byams pa'i dpal dang sa skya paN+Di ta/_/[(*]chag lo/[)]chos 
[\[93a.6\](*]dpyal pa/[)]rje dpal dang shes rab 'od dang zhang*/_/[(*]glo bo/[)]grub pa dpal dang shes rab rin po che/_/[(*]lho brag[)]'u ru dar ma seng ge mi mnyam bzang*/_/[(*]shong*/[)]shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan blo gros brtan/_/au D+yAn pa rin chen dpal dang khams/_/blo gros rgyal po ldan ma tshul 
[\[93a.7\]]seng dang*/_/ra sa gzhon brtson shu ke grags rgyal mtshan/_/[(*]thang lo/[)]nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpang lo blo gros brtan/_/[(*]dbus pa/[)]sgra tshad smra ba rin rgyal blo gsal dang*/_/legs pa'i blo gros yar lung grags rgyal mtshan/_/[(*]bu ston/[)]rin chen grub dang rin chen rnam rgyal ba/_/[(*]jo nang*/[)]blo gros 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dpal dang kun spangs grags pa'i mtshan/_/[(*]lo chen/[)]byang chub rtse mo bo dong grags rgyal mtshan/_/snar thang saM g+ha shrI dang skyabs mchog dpal/_/[(*] chos 'khor[)]shes rab rin chen 'gos sgang*/_lo gzhon nu dpal/_/[(*]chag lo/[)]rin chen chos rgyal bsod nams rgya mtsho dang*/_/[(*]zhwa lu/[)]chos skyong bzang po tA ra nA tha dang*/_/
[\[93b.2\]]ngag dbang phun tshogs la sogs skad gnyis smra/_/mang pos bka' dang bstan bcos 'di snyed cig_/bsgyur dang bshad pas gtan la phab par mdzad/_/ces so/_/de ltar 'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po dang*/_sprul pa'i lo tsA ba chen po 
[\[93b.3\]]ji snyed byon pa rnams las nye bar brgyud pa'i bka' srol dri ma med pa rnams legs par bzung nas/_ngo mtshar mkhas pa la 'os pa'i phrin las rnam pa gsum gyis dzam+bu'i gling gi byang phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po lus pa med par snang bar byed pa'i bod yul bstan 
[\[93b.4\]]pa'i sgron me chen po rnams kyi lugs srol bka' rdzogs la sogs pa ji ltar byung ba la/_bka' gdams pa ni/_lha chos bdun ldan gyi bstan pa'i bdag po mnyam med jo bo chen po dpal ldan mar me mdzad kyis gsal bar phye ba'i srol te/_de'ang theg pa gsum gyi bka' 
[\[93b.5\]]ma lus pa gang zag gcig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i cha rkyen du yang dag par gdams pas sam/_rgyal ba'i bka' mtha' dag nyams su bstar bar bya ba'i gdams ngag tu legs par rtogs pas de skad du grags shing*/_de'ang jo bo nyid kyis gzhan la rjes su gdams 
[\[93b.6\]]shing byin gyis brlabs pa las skyes pa'i slob ma rgya gar dang*/_bal bod rnams su dpag tu med par byon pa las/jo bo rang dang mkhyen pa mnyam zhing dbu dang spyan dang phyag g.yas pa dang phyag g.yon pa lta bu'i sras kyi thu bo rnams ni paN+Di ta pi to ba dang*/_rat+nA ka ra dang*/_sa'i 
[\[93b.7\]]snying po dang*/_bshes gnyen gsang ba dang*/_dbu ma seng ge'am d+harmA ka ra ma ti la sogs pa dang*/_bod na mnga' ris stod du lha btsun byang chub 'od dang*/_lo chen rin chen bzang po dang*/_nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba dang*/_rma dge ba'i blo gros la sogs pa dang*/_
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gtsang du 'brog mi shAkya ye shes dang*/_gos khug pa lhas btsas dang*/_ling lo tsA ba dang*/_mgar dge ba dang*/_se ston sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa dang*/_dbus su khu rngog 'brom gsum dang*/_lho brag tu rnal 'byor pa chag khri mchog dang*/_dge ba skyong dang*/_khams 
[\[94a.2\]]su phyag dar ston pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i TI ka khams lugs su grags pa'i mdzad pa po de dang*/_rnal 'byor pa chen po lung a mi byang chub dang*/_dgon pa ba 'dzing sgom dbang phyug rgyal mtshan dang*/gsang phur 'od du yal ba'i rnal 'byor pa shes rab la sogs pa rnams byon pa las/_bka' 
[\[94a.3\]]gdams kyi phrin las bskyang ba'i brgyud 'dzin chen po ni/_gsang ba'i bdag po'i rnam par 'phrul pa khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung dang*/_'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rngog legs pa'i shes rab dang*/_spyan ras gzigs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te 
[\[94a.4\]]gsum gyi phyi ma ni sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las/_byang phyogs su dge bsnyen chos 'phel zhes bya ba 'byung zhes pa dang*/_snying rje pad+ma dkar po las/_der dge bsnyen chos 'phel zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'byung zhes dang*/_'phags ma sgrol mas jo bo la bod du byon na phan thogs pa 'ong 
[\[94a.5\]]zhing*/_khyad par u pa si ka cig la phan thogs pa 'ong zhes bya ba'i lung gis rjes su bstan pa ste/_deng 'dir bka' gdams bstan pa'i bdag po jo bo yab sras gnyis zhes pa'i thugs sras kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni 'di nyid do/_/gang gis legs par gsungs pa'i bdud rtsis nye bar 
[\[94a.6\]]bskyed pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen phu chung ba dang*/_spyan snga ba dang*/_pu to ba rin chen gsal la sogs pa dang rjes su 'jug pa mkhas shing btsun pa dang bzang po'i yon tan gyis mngon par phyug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po mang du byon pa rnams kyis phrin las kyi 'khor lo shin tu dar bar byas 
[\[94a.7\]]so/_/'on kyang da lta ni bka' gdams pa'i grub mtha' logs su gyur pa med kyang gdams ngag gi brgyud pa phal che ba dag sa dge bkar gsum gyi nang du 'dres te mi nub par skyong ba 'di ltar nyid do/_/rnying ma pa'i lugs srol ni/_gsang sngags kyi theg pa snga 'gyur dang phyi 'gyur gyi dbang las 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]gsar rnying gnyis su 'byed pa'i phyi ma ste/_de'ang thog mar srong btsan sgam po'i ring la rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta byon pa rnams dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis thugs rje chen po'i mdo rgyud mang po bod du bsgyur ba dang*/_rgyal pos slob ma skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la gsang sngags kyi lha zhi khro rnams kyi gdams 
[\[94b.2\]]ngag sna tshogs pa bstan pas dus der dngos grub thob pa'i skyes bu'ang mang du byung zhing*/_de nas brtsams te mes ag tshom yan chad la gsang ba sngags kyi skor nyams su lon pa mang tsam byung ba dang*/_bod 'bangs gzhan thams cad kyang spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba 
[\[94b.3\]]'debs pa dang yi ge drug pa 'don pa tsam ni kun la dar ro/_/de nas khri srong lde'u btsan gyi dus su dbas many+dzu shrIs kri yog sde gsum gyi nyan bshad dar bar mdzad pa dang*/_khyad par slob dpon chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha was rnal 'byor bla na med pa gtso bor gyur pa'i dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bshad 
[\[94b.4\]]pa dang gdams ngag bstan pa dang*/_chos kyi gter dang nor gyi gter gzhug pa la sogs pas gsang sngags kyi chos shin tu dar bar mdzad do/_/phyis su 'dul ba la sogs pa'i bstan pa la 'phel 'grib cher byung mod kyi/_gsang sngags bla med kyi bstan pa ni ma nub par bzhugs par 
[\[94b.5\]]bshad do/_/'di dag gi skabs su dar ba'i rgyud ni gsang ba 'dus pa dang*/_zla gsang thig le la sogs pa'i tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad du grags pa rnams te/_khyad par nyams su spyad pa sgrub pa chen po bka' brgyad ni 'jam dpal sku la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sde lnga dang*/_ma mo rbod 
[\[94b.6\]]gtong la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i sde gsum ste/_de las phur pa dang rta mgrin gnyis ni slob dpon chen po nyid kyis rgyal po la stsal bas rgyal pos dpal rta mgrin grub ste rta mgrin gyis rta skad 'tsher ba thos pa mang po byung zhing*/_phur pa ni jo mo dang 'bre a tsa ra sa le la stsal bas de dag 
[\[94b.7\]]las rim gyis 'phel lo/_/de bzhin du 'jam dpal gyi skor ni slob dpon shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang*/_yang dag gi skor ni hU~M kA ra dang*/_bdud rtsi'i skor ni bi ma la mi tra rnams kyis bshad cing dar bar byas so/_/ma mo la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyis bod kyi lha 'dre gdug pa can btul ba rnams 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dbang bskur te dam tshig la bzhag nas ris su bcad pa'i sde gsum po 'jig rten pa la phan gdags pa'i rtsa lag tu sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pa bstan pa rnams yin no/_/'dus pa mdo ni dgongs pa 'dus pa ste/_'di ni gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rgya gar 
[\[95a.2\]]dang bru sha'i yul la sogs pa na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa rnams bsten cing*/_bru sha'i slob dpon che btsan skyes dang bcas te dgongs pa 'dus pa bod skad du bsgyur ba dang nyan bshad kyi sgo nas dar bar byas so/_/gsang ba'i snying po la sogs pa sgyu 'phrul rgyan gyi skor ni dri med bshes 
[\[95a.3\]]gnyen dang rma rin chen mchog gis bsgyur cing bshad pas dar bar gyur pa'o/_/man ngag rdzogs pa chen po sems sde dang*/_klong sde dang*/_man ngag gi sde gsum gyi dang po gnyis ni bai ro tsa na dang*/_phyi ma ni bi ma la mi tra las byung ba'i man ngag tu bshad do/_/de lta bu'i gsang sngags 
[\[95a.4\]]'di dag bslab pa las byung ba'i grub pa brnyes pa'ang sngon gyi dus su rje 'bangs nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs pa mang du byon pa rnams dang*/_de dag gi rjes su 'jug pa'i bka' gter gyi brgyud pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis shin tu dar zhing rgyas par byas so/_/rje btsun sa skya 
[\[95a.5\]]pa ni 'og tu bshad par bya'o/_/mar pa las brgyud pa'i phyag rgya pa'am sgrub brgyud pa'i lugs srol ni/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang phyug lho brag mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis 'phags pa'i yul du lan gsum du byon/_bla ma brgya rtsa brgyad tsam bsten te/_'khor lo bde mchog 
[\[95a.6\]]dang gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud sde dang*/_smin byed dang grol byed kyi gdams pa dpag tu med pa spyan drangs te/_bod yul du bsgyur bshad kyi phrin las yang dag pas gtan la phab bo/_/gsung las skyes pa'i slob bu grangs med pa byon pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur 
[\[95a.7\]]pa ni bka' chen bzhi ste/_de'ang 'pho ba rgya mthongs kha phye ba las bya 'phur ba lta bu'i bka' babs dol gyi mtshur ston dbang nge*/_rgyud bshad thabs kyi man ngag mu tig bstar la brgyus pa lta bu'i bka' babs gzhung gi rngog ston chos rdor/_'od gsal mun nang mar me 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]sbar ba lta bu'i bka' babs gtsang rong gi mes ston tshon po/_gtum mo shing gshags la me sbar ba lta bu'i bka' babs gung thang gi mid la ras pa ste/_de dag las dang po gsum gyis rgyud bshad pa'i srol bskyangs shing*/_mid las grub pa'i dbang phyug gi sar gshegs 
[\[95b.2\]]nas sgrub brgyud kyi bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bzung ste slob ma mang du bskrun pa'i chos brgyud 'dzin pa'i slob ma'i gtso bo ni ras chung pa dang*/_dwags po lha rje gnyis te/_dang pos ni rgya gar du byon te lus med mkha' 'gro'i chos skor gyi lhag ma spyan drangs pa dang*/_ras chung 
[\[95b.3\]]snyan brgyud la sogs pa'ang de nyid nas dar bar mdzad do/_/phyi mas ni thog mar dbu ru phyogs su byon te bya yul ba dang*/_snyug rum pa dang*/_lcags ri gong kha ba rnams las bka' gdams kyi chos la gsan sbyangs mthar phyin par mdzad/_phyis su mid la las zab 
[\[95b.4\]]chos kyi gdams pa gsan te dgas la sgam po'i dgon pa btab nas der bzhugs pas de skad du grags so/_/slob ma'i tshogs la bka' gdams kyi chos dang phyag rgya chen po'i gdams pa rgya cher spel ba'i phrin las rab tu rgyas par gyur te bka' phyag chu bo gnyis 'dres su 
[\[95b.5\]]grags pa'ang 'di nyid nas byung zhing*/_bka' brgyud thams cad kyi byung khungs chen po yin no/_/rjes su gdams pa'i slob ma brgyud 'dzin gyi bu chen ni/_dwags po sgom tshul dang*/_phag mo gru pa ste khams pa rdor rgyal dang*/_grub thob dbu se ste dus gsum mkhyen pa dang*/_
[\[95b.6\]]'ba' dom ras pa la sogs pa'o/_/phag gru ni thog mar dbus kyi stod lung rgya dmar la sogs pa las dbu tshad dang*/_gtsang du las stod dkon mchog mkhar dang*/_sa skya pa chen po dang*/_byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan dang*/_dmar chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa las zab chos 
[\[95b.7\]]kyi gsan sbyangs mdzad pas nyams rtogs khyad par can rgyud la 'khrungs/_phyis su dwags po lha rje'i zhabs bsten te de'i zab chos kyi bdag por gyur to/_/de nyid kyi rjes su gdams pa las skyes pa'i slob ma'i gtso bo ni gling ras dang*/_'bri khung skyur rin chen dpal dang*/_stag lung bkra 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]shis dpal dang*/_khro phu ba la sogs pa'o/_/gling ras kyi slob ma gtsang pa rgya ras ye shes rdo rje'o/_/de'i slob ma ni rgod tshang pa dang*/_lo ras pa dang*/_dbon sras la sogs pa ste/_de 
[\[96a.2\]]gsum so so las mched pa la stod smad bar gyi 'brug pa rnams te/_de dag las rim gyis byung ba'i rang rang gi srol 'dzin rnams kyis mi nub par skyong bar byed do/_/dam pa'i chos sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'i bka' srol ni/_grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po dam pa sangs rgyas kyis yongs su dar bar bgyis te/_'di la brgyud pa snga phyi bar gsum gyi brgyud pa dang po ni/_
[\[96a.3\]]dam pa rgya gar gyis kha che dz+nyA na gu h+ya la bshad pa'i zhi byed sgron ma skor gsum la sogs pa rnams te/_de rnams dam pa dang kha che ba gnyis kas ang po lo tsA ba la bshad pa dang*/_kha che bas pu hrangs lo chung la'ang bshad de/_des dmar ston chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa la bshad do/_/
[\[96a.4\]]brgyud pa bar ma ni dam pas bod la lan lngar byon pa'i bzhi pa'i dus su rma chos kyi shes rab dang*/_so dge 'dun 'bar dang*/_kam ye shes rgyal mtshan gsum la bshad do/_/brgyud pa phyi ma ni lan lnga par ding ri la byon pa'i dus su dam pa phyar chen dang phyar chung dang*/_badzra kro d+ha dang*/_
[\[96a.5\]]dam pa kun dga' la sogs pa la gsungs nas rim gyis dar ro/_/de nas brgyud pa'i gcod kyi skor ni/_dam pa bod du lan gsum par byon pa'i dus su yar lungs pa'i smar ser po dang*/_skyo ston bsod nams bla ma la bshad de/_de nas brgyud pa la pho gcod ces grags pa dang*/_ma gcig 
[\[96a.6\]]gis dam pa dang skyo ston gnyis ka las gsan te/_de nas brgyud pa la mo gcod ces grags so/_/dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud pa'i lugs srol ni/_khyung po rnal 'byor gyis rgya gar du byon te rdo rje gdan pa dang*/_mai tri pa dang*/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma ni gu ma la sogs 
[\[96a.7\]]pa'i bla ma brgya dang lnga bcu lhag pa las chos gsan te thugs nyams su bstar/_bod du byon te shangs gzhong gzhong gi dgon pa btab pas shangs pa bka' brgyud ces bya bar grags shing*/_'di la slob ma la stod dkon mchog mkhar dang*/_rmog cog pa la sogs pa khri phrag brgyad 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]du langs pa byung bar grags so/_/man ngag sbyor drug sogs ni bod du thog mar dpal chen rga lo dang*/_grub thob yu mo yab sras dang*/_bu dol la sogs pas dar bar mdzad do/_/ri bo dga' ldan pa'i lugs srol ni/_shar btsong kha pa chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi 
[\[96b.2\]]rjes su 'jug pa dang bcas pa ste/_rje btsun dam pa 'di ni 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud dang*/_bka' gdams glegs bam rin po che la sogs pa'i bka' dang bstan bcos mang po nas lung bstan cing*/_sngon gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[96b.3\]]dbang po'i tog gi drung du thugs bskyed cing*/_ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i mtshams su ngo mtshar rmad byung bkod pa sna tshogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams su/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan pa'i skyes bu 
[\[96b.4\]]dam pa ste/_rje btsun dam pa 'dis sku tshe'i stod du mdo sngags dang rig pa'i gtsug lag gangs can gyi ljongs su dar ba phal cher gyi gsan pa dang sbyangs pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin par mdzad do/_/bar skabs su thos pa'i don la dpyad pa dang bsgom pa'i sgo nas nyams su 
[\[96b.5\]]bzhes pa kho na lhur mdzad cing*/'phral gyi kun du spyod pa rnams kyang 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lag len gyi gsos btab bo/_/khyad par rgyal ba'i gsung rab mdo rgyud ma lus pa'i snying po bsdus pa/_shing rta chen po klu sgrub dang thogs med gnyis kyi lam srol/_skyes bu gsum gyis 
[\[96b.6\]]nyams su blang bar bya ba'i rim pa thams cad tshang bar ston par byed pa byang chub lam gyi rim pa gtso bor gyur pa'i bstan pa rgyas pa'i phrin las skyong ba la 'bad pa rtse gcig tu bton pas/_dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang dges pas zhal gzigs pa la/_bla ma dbu ma pas lo tsA ba 
[\[96b.7\]]mdzad pa'i tshul gyis mdo dang sngags kyi chos mang po la the tshom gyi mdud pa grol bar byas so/_/sku tshe'i smad du 'gro don dang phrin las rmad du byung bar rgyas par gyur te lha ldan du cho 'phrul dus chen gyi smon lam chen po tshugs pa dang*/_'brog ri bo dga' ldan rnam rgyal gling btab pas/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]de nas brtsams te de'i rjes su 'jug pa dang bcas pa la dga' ldan pa zhes yongs su grags pa byung ngo*/_/de nyid kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi 'thung ba las skyes pa'i slob ma grangs med pa byung ba las mchog tu gyur pa ni rgyal tshabs rje dang*/_mkhas grub rje dang*/_
[\[97a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa dang*/_'dul 'dzin grags rgyal dang*/_'dul 'dzin blo gros sbas pa ste 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa mkhas pa'i phrin las la dbang 'byor ba mang du byon pa rnams kyis phrin las kyi rgyun gnas par byed do/_/rje btsun sa skya 
[\[97a.3\]]pa'i lugs srol ni/_thog mar 'khon klu'i dbang po'i bsrungs pas sad mi mi bdun gyi nang gses su rab tu byung ste/_slob dpon pad+ma sam+b+ha wa'i zhabs kyi pad+mar brten te gsang sngags kyi smin byed dang grol byed kyi gdams pa mang du gsan cing*/_dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu la sogs 
[\[97a.4\]]pa'i gsang sngags kyi bka' babs shing grub pa brnyes so/_/de nas bzung ste 'khon rog shes rab tshul khrims yan chad la gsang sngags rnying ma'i grub pa brnyes pa sha stag byung ngo*/_/ji tsam zhig na 'khon rog gi gcung du gyur pa dkon mchog rgyal pos dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi gar 'cham byed pa la sogs 
[\[97a.5\]]pa gzigs pa'i rkyen gyis/gsang sngags gsar ma la 'jug pa'i sgo bye ste/_rnying ma'i chos skor yang phur gnyis tsam min pa'i phal che ba gter du sbas nas/_bla chen 'brog mi lo tsA la sogs pa'i mkhas grub kyi 'khor los sgyur ba du ma'i 
[\[97a.6\]]zhabs bsten nas thos bsam bsgom pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i mthar son par mdzad do/_/sa dkar po'i logs la sA lu'i sman ljongs kyi rdo rje'i gdan chen po dpal ldan sa skya'i chos grwa chen po 'di nyid skye dgu ma lus pa'i bsod nams kyi dpyid du bskrun te/_de phyin chad nas lha rigs 
[\[97a.7\]]'khon sa skya pa zhes yongs su grags so/_/de'i sras 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis 'gro ba'i don la bsam bzhin du skye ba'i sgyu 'phrul gyi rol pa dpal brtse ba chen po kun dga' snying po ste/_rje btsun dam pa 'dis lhag pa'i lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs bsgrubs pas zla 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]ba drug nas lhag pa lha'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mthong zhing*/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'i zhen pa bzhi bral gyi gdams pa'i lam srol chen po stsal to/_/de nas brtsams te bka' sde snod kyi chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa med 
[\[97b.2\]]pa'i spobs pa brnyes nas rim gyis brang ti dar ma snying po dang*/_khyung rin chen grags dang*/_mes lhang tsher dang*/_kha'u pa dar ma rgyal mtshan dang*/_sgyi chu ba dgra lha 'bar dang*/_mal lo tsA ba dang*/_pu hrangs lo chung la sogs pa las mdo sngags kyi chos tshul bsam 
[\[97b.3\]]gyis mi khyab pa gsan te bstan pa'i bdag por gyur to/_/khyad par bla chen zhang dgon pa ba yun ring du brten te/_dpal ldan bir+Wa pa'i bzhed gzhung gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag yan lag dang bcas pa gsan cing thugs nyams su bstar 
[\[97b.4\]]ro/_/dpal rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gtso 'khor lnga dam pa'i chos sgo skyel gyi tshul du byon nas/_rgyud sde bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_lcags ri'i khong las mi 'da' ba'i zab chos bzhi la sogs pa dang*/_gsung ngag rin po che nye brgyud kyi gdams pa ma lus pa stsal to/_/rang lo 
[\[97b.5\]]lnga bcu par gdams ngag gi bka' rgya grol te/_khams pa a seng gis zhus pa'i ngor gsung ngag thog mar gsungs pa nas bzung ste gdams pa rnams legs par stsal ba'i slob ma mchog thob pa gsum/_bzod pa thob pa bdun/_rtogs pa ldan pa brgyad cu/_gzhung bshad 'dzin 
[\[97b.6\]]pa'i thugs sras bcu gcig_tshig rkang rnam par 'grel pa'i thugs sras bdun/_phyogs kyi mkhas grub chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnams so/_/de'i sras rje btsun mched gnyis zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po mi thub zla ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba slob dpon bsod nams 
[\[97b.7\]]rtse mo dang*/_skye ba du mar rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs lhag pa'i lhar gyur pas skye ba 'dir 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa thugs la rang rdol du byung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan dang*/_chos rje khu dbon zhes pa mkhyen 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rab 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang gnyis su med pas/_gangs can gyi ljongs su bcu phrag rig pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i thog mar gyur pa sa skya paN+Di ta dang*/_lung rtogs kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags su/_dbu dang phyag 
[\[98a.2\]]zhabs rnams so sor phral te de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor du sprul pa dang bsdu bas sa'i steng gi 'gro ba rgya mtsho dad par byas te/_mdo sngags chos kyi snang bar byed po 'gro ba'i mgon po 'phags pa rin po che ste/_dpal sa skya'i rje btsun gong ma lnga zhes yongs su grags so/_/
[\[98a.3\]]'di dag gis stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa la lhag pa'i bya ba byas pa dang che ba'i yon tan mdor bsdus pa rtogs par 'dod pa rnams kyis dpal sa skya'i rje btsun gong ma lnga'i gsung rab rin po che'i par gyi sgo 'phar 'byed pa'i dkar chag 'phrul gyi lde mig tu 'khod pa la sogs par 
[\[98a.4\]]shes par bya ba las 'dir ma spros so/_/ji skad smos pa'i rje btsun rnam pa lnga po de dag gi bstan pa ma lus pa phyogs bcu kun du gsal bar byed pa'i bstan skyong gi skyes bu chen po bgrang gis mi ldang bar byon zhing*/_bye brag tu 'dzam gling byang phyogs kyi nor 'dzin dga' ma'i dkyil 
[\[98a.5\]]'khor kun du nyi ma dang*/_zla ba ltar yongs su grags shing*/_rgyal ba dgyes pa'i phrin las 'chad rtsod rtsom pa gsum la bsnyengs pa dang bral ba'i mkhas pa yongs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba kun dga' rnam pa gnyis sam/_rje btsun ngor pa dang rdzong pa gnyis su grags pa la sogs 
[\[98a.6\]]pa ste/_rje btsun ngor pa la slob ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa byon pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa ni/_bdag chen gzhi thog pa la sogs pa sa skya 'khon gyi gdung brgyud dang*/_bdag chen ye shes dbang phyug la sogs pa bla brang shar pa rnams dang*/_thugs sras sems dpa' chen po 
[\[98a.7\]]dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dang*/_rgyal tshab dam pa kun dga' dbang phyug dang*/_yongs 'dzin dkon mchog 'phel ba dang*/_'jam pa'i dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho dang*/_mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje dang*/_gu ge paN+Di ta grags pa rgyal mtshan dang*/_gung ru shes rab bzang po dang*/_dwags 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]po bkra shis rnam rgyal dang*/_bzang chen phyogs las rnam rgyal dang*/_smar khams pa grags pa bzang po dang*/_dmar ston rgyal mtshan 'od zer dang*/_paN+Di ta chen po shAkya mchog ldan dang*/_zhwa lu sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje dang*/_byams chen rab 'byams pa 
[\[98b.2\]]sangs rgyas 'phel dang*/_'jam dbyangs kun dga' chos bzang dang*/_dpal 'bum phrag gsum pa byams pa chos don grub dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal mchog dang*/_grub chen dkon mchog blo gros dang*/_go bo rab 'byams pa kun 
[\[98b.3\]]mkhyen bsod nams seng ge dang*/_nyag re dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang*/_yon tan 'od zer dang*/_grags pa rin chen don grub dang*/_ldan ma drung kun dga' rin chen la sogs pa dang*/_srad pa kun dga' blo gros dang*/_mkhas grub zla ba bzang po dang*/_brag dkar 
[\[98b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po dang*/_grub thob thang stong rgyal po dang*/_mngon par dga' ba'i mkhan po dpal ldan sangs rgyas dang*/_bla ma dpal ldan rgyal po la sogs pa sa'i steng na yongs su grags pa'i slob ma mang du byon pa rnams dang*/_rim gyis snyan brgyud bstan pa'i bdag po 
[\[98b.5\]]tshar chen blo gsal rgya mtsho la sogs pa ste/_de dag gi rjes su 'jug pa brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du legs par bskyangs so/_/mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge legs dang phan bde'i 'dod dgu mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas gcig 
[\[98b.6\]]pur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i gnyen gyi zhal lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i chos tshul yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'di nyid/_dzam+bu br-ik+Sha'i zur phud kyis nye bar mtshan pa'i gling gi dam pa 'di na mkhas pa'i skyes bu gang dag byon pa rnams kyis legs par bshad 
[\[98b.7\]]pa dang tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la mnga' gsol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las kyi snang ba dkar pos phyogs dang phyogs bral kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyis pa 'di ltar lags so/_/'dir smras pa/_sa gsum 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\](*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]bkra shis byed pa'i cho ga bzo gnas rig pa'i rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/_/rig byed tshe yi bdud rtsi'i dga' ston 'gyed la rab mkhas sgra dang tshad ma'i rdo rje yis/_/tshig don 'khrul pa'i ri bo'i 'gros bcings nang gi lung don rnam par 'byed 
[\[99a.2\]]pa'i mig stong bkra/_/yang dag rtogs pa'i lang tsho rtag tu dar la bab rnams blo ldan sngon gyi lha dbang yin/_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi thugs rje dang*/_/smon lam gzhal du med las zlos pa'i gar/_/phyogs bcur chos kyi snang bas 
[\[99a.3\]]'gengs bzod pa/_/smra ba'i dbang phyug byon pa bsam mi khyab/_/[(*]chos 'gog pa/[)]gang dag byon pa de dag stobs bcu pa'i/_/legs gsungs dri ma med pas 'gro ba la/_/phan pa bsgrubs pa'i rtogs brjod phyogs re tsam/_/mthong ba'i nga ro 'byin de 
[\[99a.4\]]ci la snyam/_/de ko rjes su 'jug pa'i skye bo rnams/_/chos la blo gros zhum pa gzengs bstod dang*/_/rgod pa 'dul sogs cha tsam bsnyad pa las/_/'phags rnams mdzad pa byis pa'i blo las 'gongs/_/[(*]bsam pa rgya che ba/[)]gang phyir ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[99a.5\]]yi/_/gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rang snang las/_/gzhan du bgrang las 'das pa'i bskal pa ru/_/btsal yang dmigs su med pa nges pa'i don/_/'on te blo gros dman pa'i chos kyi blo/_/'phyang mo nyug la brten pa spong ba'i slad/_/'dri dang 
[\[99a.6\]]len ldon sdud dang 'grel pa yi/_/rnam par snang bas bstan pa rab gsal byas/_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen dang brtse/_/byin rlabs zad mi shes pa'i 'bab stegs su/_/byas pa mthong na mi mthun med pa'i sku/_/tshangs bcas skye dgu kun 
[\[99a.7\]]gyis btud pa'i gnas/_/[(*]dgag pa'i dpe/[)]dngos po thams cad skyon bcu spangs pa'i glu/_/rtag par 'jo ba'i yon tan gyis dben pas/_/dri za'i gling bu snyan dgu bsgyur ba'i dpal/_/smra mchog rnams kyi gsung las shin tu 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dman/_/[(*]mdzes pa bsngags pa la sbyar ba/[)]mtha' klas skye ba'i yun du chos thams cad/_/sbyangs stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i mkhyen pa des/_/dpyad pa gang tshe ngal ba'i gtam 'byung ba/_/ches brling rig pa'i gnas de gang du mchis/_/[(*]mchog gi nges bstan/[)]e ma chu yi gter las dag byed ma/_/rtag 
[\[99b.2\]]tu 'byin yang gang ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/mkhas btsun bzang po grub pa'i yon tan dag_/smra mkhas yongs kyis brjod pas mi zad ston/_/[(*]yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]gsung rab kun gyi snying po 'doms pa la/_/mkhas pa'i 'bras 
[\[99b.3\]]bu skal bar ldan pa'i bu/_/sdug bsngal zhi ba thar pa'i lding khang dang*/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer song ba mang*/_/[(*]nang shes byed kyi rgyu/[)]'gal 'brel rigs par smra la spro ba'i 'dzum/_/dka' ba'i gnad la brtsad pas ma 'gyur zhing*/_/phyi rol 
[\[99b.4\]]rgol ba stong gis ma phrogs par/_/legs par brtags pa'i gtam gyis mgrin pa phyug_/[(*]dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa'i zol bstod/[)]legs bshad brtsams pa'i tshig don zegs mas kyang*/_/skye 'phags yid kyi brtan pa ma byin par/_/brtse med rang dbang 'phrog pa'i 
[\[99b.5\]]las 'di 'dra/_/dge sbyong chos la mi 'os pa min nam/_/[(*]nges pa'i dpe/[)]mdor na rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las mtha'/_/mthong 'dod lha yi lam 'dis rang gi lus/_/sngon por song ba de srid btsal byas kyang*/_/ma rnyed da dung 
[\[99b.6\]]rjes su song bar nges/_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs 
[\[99b.7\]]ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_spro ba bskyed pa'i ched du bstan skyong rnams kyis bya ba byas pa'i sarga ste gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]@#/_/sar+b+badz+nyenasud+hok+taMshrotamipatitaiHkritohitaMsadr-i/_k+tsin+tAmaNiHsukum+b+hehakalpadArub+hirapibishAkyaM/_/
[\[100a.2\]]@#/_/[(*]rab tu spel ba/[)]kun mkhyen gyis gsungs bdud rtsi sgra 'dzin tu/_/lhung bas bsgrubs pa'i phan pa de 'dra ni/_/'di na yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang*/_/dpag bsam yongs 'du dag kyang bzod pa min/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\](*]rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]gang gis bgrod pa'i lam dang mya ngan las/_/'das pa bsod nams gsum gyi snying po can/_/des ni 'khor ba ngan par song dag tu/_/'bab las yong ye 'dzin pa chos kyi mchog_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]lam dang 'bras bu dben pa'i bas mtha' ru/_/ngal bso'i bde ba la dmigs ltung ba las/_/'dzin cing 
[\[100b.2\]]srid dang zhi ba'i mtha' 'gong ba/_/theg chen chos kyi khyad par de bas mang*/_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]gsang chen skal bar ldan pa'i lus ngag yid/_/mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi rgyas btab nas/_/mchog gi go 'phang rings par 'dong ba'i chos/_/sgra don rgyud kyi zab khyad bsam las 
[\[100b.3\]]'das/_/[(*]khyad gzhi tha dad cing khyad chos mtshungs pa'i bsdus brjod/[)]srid pa'i lam na dub pa dbugs rab 'byin/_/gdung bas nyan la bsil ba'i ngal bso ster/_/mngon 'dod snye ma g.yur ba'i dga' tshal 'di/_/thob pa'i lus can de dag skal ba sbom/_/[(*]rmad du byung ba'i dpe/[)]tshangs pa'i bka' las ma 'das lam gsum du/_/'gro ba dag 
[\[100b.4\]]byed 'bab pa'i lha mo khyod/_/las nyon sgrib pa sbyong ba'i mthu rdzogs na/_/thub pa'i bka' lung dam pa'i rjes su snyegs/_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]brjod pa bla na med pa 'gog lam gyi/_/bden pa zung gi snying po 'dren pa'i gsung*/_/rab mchog dri 
[\[100b.5\]]mas dben pa lung rtogs kyi/_/dkon mchog dam pa'i chos kyi dbye ba bri/_/spyi don gsum pa bkral bya nges pa'i ched du dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par gzhag pa la/_chos kyi sgra 'jug pa'i yul spyir bshad pa dang*/de las dam pa'i chos bye brag tu bshad pa'o/_/dang po la sgra'i don bshad 
[\[100b.6\]]pa dang*/_dbye ba bstan pa gnyis las/_dang po sgra'i don ni spyir chos zhes bya ba de la legs par sbyar ba'i skad du ni d+harma zhes 'byung ste/_de ni Du d+h+r-i nya? 'dzin pa la'o zhes bya ba'i byings las byung ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa'i don la 'jug go_/de'ang gang 'dzin par byed pa yin zhe na/_shes bya 
[\[100b.7\]]rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'dzin par byed de/_de'ang 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gzugs su rung ba 'dzin par byed pa nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid chos thams cad mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba lta bu'i bar gyis rang gi mtshan nyid thams cad 'dzin par 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]byed do/_/gzhan yang 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba lta bu'i spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyang 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir 
[\[101a.2\]]gang chos zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig ni 'dzin par byed pa'i don du gzung bar bya'o/_/gnyis pa dbye ba bstan pa ni/_de lta bu'i sgra de 'jug pa'i yul gang la dbye na rnam pa bcu nyid du 'jug par rig par bya ste/_rnam bshad rigs pa las/_chos ni shes bya lam dang ni/_/mya ngan 'das dang yid kyi 
[\[101a.3\]]yul/_/bsod nams tshe dang gsung rab dang*/_/'byung 'gyur nges dang chos lugs la'o/_/zhes pa ltar te/_de'ang shes bya la 'jug pa ni dper na chos gang la 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba lta bu ste shes bya'i chos su gtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni mkhas par bya ba'i gnas 
[\[101a.4\]]nyid do/_/de bzhin du lam la 'jug pa ni/_yang dag par lta ba ni chos yin no/_/yang dag par lta ba ni lam yin no zhes bya ba lta bu ste lam gyi chos gang yin pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jug pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos zhes bya ba 
[\[101a.5\]]lta bu ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni reg par bya ba nyid do/_/yid kyi yul la 'jug pa ni chos kyi khams dang chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba lta bu'am/_'di ni rigs pa'i chos so 'di ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i chos so zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_yid kyi yul du gyur pa'i chos 
[\[101a.6\]]rnams ni yongs su shes nas 'jug ldog tshul bzhin du bya ba nyid do/_/bsod nams la 'jug pa ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu rnams lhan cig spyod ces bya ba lta bu ste/_bsod nams kyi chos su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su spyad par bya ba nyid do/_/tshe la 'jug pa ni mthong ba'i 
[\[101a.7\]]chos la bde bar gnas zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_mthong ba'i tshe'i chos gang yin pa de la ni brtson par bya ba nyid do/_/gsung rab la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/_mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang lung du bstan pa'i sde zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_gsung rab kyi chos 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]rnams ni thos pa dang bsam pa'i bgyi bas 'jug par bya ba nyid do/_/'byung 'gyur la 'jug pa ni lus 'di ni rga bar 'gyur ba'i chos yin no zhes bya ba lta bu ste 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyang shes par bya ba nyid do/_/nges pa la 'jug pa ni dge sbyong gi chos bzhi zhes pa lta bu ste/_nges 
[\[101b.2\]]pa'i chos la ni nam yang dbri ba dang bsnan par byar med pa'am de las mi 'da' bar bya ba nyid do/_/chos lugs la 'jug pa ni yul chos dang rigs chos zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_lugs kyi chos gang yin pa de dang de'i rjes su mthun par bya ba nyid do/_/gnyis pa dam pa'i chos bye brag tu bshad pa 
[\[101b.3\]]la/_dam pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang*/_sgra don dang*/_rab tu dbye ba ste gsum las/_dang po dam pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni/_bshad ma thag pa'i bcu po de las/_bsod nams dang lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa gsum ni brjod bya'i gtso bo nyid du bzung nas/_gsung rab ni rjod byed 
[\[101b.4\]]du byas pa'i dam pa'i chos gang la dmigs nas/_srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa mthar 'byin par byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_ji skad du/_sdug bsngal dag ni thams cad dang*/_/sgrib pa kun sel dam pa'i chos/_/zhes so/_/dam pa'i chos de la yang gang zhig brjod 
[\[101b.5\]]par bya ba dang gang gis rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid la ltos nas dbye na rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos dang*/_lung gi dam pa'i chos gnyis su 'gyur te/_mdzod las/_ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te/_/lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do/_/zhes so/_/rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos de la'ang 
[\[101b.6\]]gang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa dang*/_gang gis 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dbye na 'gog pa'i bden pa'i dam pa'i chos dang lam gyi bden pa'i dam pa'i chos rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_mgon po byams pas/_gang zhig gang gis chags bral ba/_/
[\[101b.7\]]bden gnyis mtshan nyid can de chos/_/chags bral nyid ni 'gog pa dang*/_/lam gyi bden pa dag gis bsdus/_/zhes so/_/lung gi dam pa'i chos ni rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos su 'jug par byed pa'i rjod pa phun sum tshogs pa ste de la yang spros pa las byung ba'i bag chags sam 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'jig rten pa'i mngon brjod ces bya ba dang*/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun las byung ba'i mngon brjod dam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon brjod ces bya ba gnyis su dbye bar bya ba'ang 'byung ste/_dang po ni rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i gtam sna tshogs pa ste 'khor ba dang chos mthun 
[\[102a.2\]]pas de skad ces bya'o/_/gal te de ltar yin na rtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos su 'jug pa'i rjod pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dngos su mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu gtso bor smos nas/_brgyud nas rtogs pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa ste/_shes rab brgya pa las/_mi yi chos lugs 
[\[102a.3\]]legs spyad na/_/lha yul bgrod pa thag mi ring*/_/lha dang mi yi them skas la/_/'dzegs na thar pa gam na yod/_/ces gsungs pa dang*/_mgon po byams pas kyang*/_/rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la brtson par ma byas na/_/'phags mchog ci gtam thams cad mkhyen nyid mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[102a.4\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don du dgongs nas de ltar du bzhag par mngon no/_/gnyis pa ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis te/_de ni chos nyid rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu mthun nam/_chos dbyings rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu mthun las byung bas de skad ces bya ste/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las/_
[\[102a.5\]]rgyu mthun don gyi mchog nyid dang*/_/zhes dang*/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/_chu bo chen po rgya mtshor bab/_'bab/_gzhol ba de bzhin du/_chos thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das par bab/_'bab/_gzhol zhes gsungs so/_/gnyis pa sgra don bshad pa la/_spyi dang bye brag pa gnyis 
[\[102a.6\]]las/_dang po ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad du sad+d+harma zhes 'byung ba bod skad la dam pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de la dam pa ni ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la/_chos ni des gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/yang na bstan bcos kyi dbang du byas na dam pa ni sangs 
[\[102a.7\]]rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang*/_de'i sras bka'i don rang rgyud du rtsom par byed pa'i slob dpon dang*/_gzhung 'grel byed pa la dbang brnyes pa'i slob dpon yin la/_chos ni de dag gis legs par bshad pa yin pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos so/_/yang na dam pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin la chos 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]kyang yin pas dam pa'i chos te gzhi mthun pas sam/_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spyad par bya ba yin pas na dam pa'i chos te/_dper na dge sbyong gi chos bzhi zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'ba' zhig pa ste/_de ni su b+hA Shi ta zhes pa legs par gsungs pa ste/_
[\[102b.2\]]tshig dang don phyin ci ma log par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir legs par gsungs pa ste/_ji ltar legs par gsungs she na/_mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis chos legs par gsungs pa/_yang dag par mthong ba/_nad med pa/_dus chad pa med pa/_nye bar gtod pa/_'di mthong ba la don yod pa/_mkhas pa rnams 
[\[102b.3\]]kyi rang gis rig par bya ba'o zhes gsungs pa de'ang phyin ci ma log par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir legs par gsungs pa dang*/_don mthong ba'i phyir yang dag par mthong ba dang*/_nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir nad med pa dang*/_yongs su nyams pa med pa'i phyir 
[\[102b.4\]]dus chad pa med pa dang*/_sdug bsngal ma lus pa las nges par 'byung ba la nye bar gtod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa dang*/_thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la don yod pa dang*/_rtog ges brtag par mi nus pa'i phyir mkhas pa rnams kyi rang gis rig par bya ba'o/_/gzhan yang dus 
[\[102b.5\]]thams cad du bya sla ba'i phyir dus chad pa med pa dang*/_slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba'i phyir tshur shog ltos shig ces bya ba'i skabs dbye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_dbyig gnyen gyis/_'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad po ni/_/yang dag don dang don ni mthong ba dang*/_/gnyen po 
[\[102b.6\]]dang ni gtan dang ma lus dang*/_/thun mong min dang rtog ge'i yul min dang*/_/gzhan yang de ni dus chad med pa'i phyir/_/bya sla ba dang tshur shog ltos shig ces/_/slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral bar shes bya zhing*/_/zhes so/_/gzhan yang lung las bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 
[\[102b.7\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par bstan pa/_nges par 'byung ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/_mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa/_rten pa yod pa zhes bya/_'di ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes pa 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ste/_de dag gi don ni phyi rol pa las chos 'dul ba 'di'i yon tan yang dag par bstan pa yin te/_phyi rol pa dag gi 'dul ba ni nyes par bstan pa nyid kyis legs par gsungs pa ma yin pa dang*/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis nges par 'byung 
[\[103a.2\]]ba ma yin pa dang*/_'dus pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis mthun pa ma yin pa dang*/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ma yin pa nyid kyis rten pa med pa'o/_/mdor na skyon rnam pa 'di bzhi bstan pa yin te/_bstan pa'i chos la don phyin ci log pa nyid kyi skyon dang*/_sgrub pa'i chos las 
[\[103a.3\]]mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro ba nyid kyi skyon dang*/_nyan pa po rnams la blo du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi skyon dang*/_ston pa la the tshom thams cad gcod mi nus pa'i skyon dang ldan pa ste/_de nyid las/_tshig 'bru bzang min don bzang min/_/grol dang rigs pa'i thabs ma yin/_/snga ma phyi ma 
[\[103a.4\]]'gal ba yin/_/de bzhin bsdu ba bzhi dang ni/_/bstan pa bzhi dag spangs pa dang*/_/ston pa'ang ston pa'i mtshan nyid med/_/de ltar gzhan gyi bstan bcos dang*/_/slob ma bstan pa skyon can yin/_/chos 'dul ba 'di la ni de las bzlog pas na skyon med pa yin no/_/don phyin 
[\[103a.5\]]ci ma log pa nyid kyis rigs pa yin pa'i phyir chos so/_/nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir 'dus pa'o/_/de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes dang spangs pa 'dren pa nyid bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang mdo las dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par 
[\[103a.6\]]gsungs pa/_gsal ba/_phye ba/_rgyu ba bcad pa/_lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa'o zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi yon tan bstan to/_/de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_don phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'i phyir legs par gsungs pa dang*/_tshig dang yig 
[\[103a.7\]]'bru gsal ba dang don shin tu rnam par phye nas bstan pa'i phyir bde bar 'jug pa nyid dang*/_gong du 'gro ba'am rgyu ba bcad pa nyid kyis gong na med pa nyid dang*/_lha dang mis yang dag par bzung ba nyid dang*/_ji ltar 'os pa'i gdul bya la bstan pa nyid dang*/_slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med par rgyun 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]du bstan pa nyid de/_de lta bu'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa ste/_de nyid las/de nyid don ni legs gsungs phyir/_/bde bar 'jug phyir bla med phyir/_/rab tu gzung phyir ji ltar 'os/_/ma lus pa ni bstan phyir ro/_/zhes so/_/gzhan yang rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa las yon 
[\[103b.2\]]tan yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bcu dag gis legs par gsungs pa nyid du bshad do/_/bcu ni yang dag par blang ba dang*/_dbang du mdzad pa dang*/_'jug pa dang*/_rab tu bstan pa dang*/_rab tu dbye ba dang*/_rten dang*/_go bar mdzad pa dang*/_gdags pa dang*/_dus dang*/_yon tan 
[\[103b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa rnams su gsungs te/_de dag gi don ni/_yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i phyir yang dag par blang ba dang*/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir dbang du mdzad pa nyid dang*/_res 'ga' ba ma yin 
[\[103b.4\]]par yang dang yang du rgyun du gsungs pa'i phyir 'jug pa nyid dang*/_dpe mkhyud kyis 'ga' la yang bar chad par ma byas par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir rab tu bstan pa nyid dang*/_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir rab tu dbye ba dang*/_dbyangs kyi 
[\[103b.5\]]yan lag lnga dang ldan par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir rten nyid dang*/_dbyangs gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par go bar mdzad pa'am/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa khyab par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir go bar mdzad pa nyid dang*/_mtha' gnyis spangs 
[\[103b.6\]]pa'i lam gsungs pa'i phyir gdags pa nyid dang*/_'dul ba yongs su smin pa rnams la gsungs pa'i phyir dus nyid dang*/_gsung yon tan drug cu dang ldan par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir yon tan yongs su 'dzin pa nyid de/_khyad par de dang de dag gis legs par 
[\[103b.7\]]gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don du bstan pa yin no/_/gsum pa rab tu dbye ba la lnga ste/_brjod bya'i sgo nas dbye ba dang*/_rjod byed kyi sgo nas dbye ba dang*/_gnyen po'i sgo nas dbye ba dang*/_gdul bya'i sgo nas dbye ba dang*/_bdag rkyen gyi sgo nas dbye ba'o/_/dang po brjod 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]par bya ba'i sgo nas dbye na/_bden pa gnyis sam drang nges gnyis te/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i shes rab las/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/_/bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/zhes so/_/de'ang ji ltar na gsung rab gang gis kun rdzob kyi bden 
[\[104a.2\]]pa brjod par bya ba'i gtso bor ston par byed pa de ni drang ba'i don dang*/_don dam pa'i bden pa brjod par bya ba'i gtso bor ston par byed pa de ni nges pa'i don te/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa las/_kun rdzob sgrub pa ston pa ni drang ba'i don to/_/don dam sgrub pa ston pa ni nges 
[\[104a.3\]]pa'i don to zhes so/_/gnyis pa rjod byed kyi sgo nas dbye na gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis te/_brgyad stong 'grel pa snying po mchog las/_mdo sde dbyangs bsnyad lung bstan dang*/_/tshigs bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi dang*/_/rtogs brjod de lta bu byung dang*/_/skyes rabs 
[\[104a.4\]]shin tu rgyas pa dang*/_/rmad byung gtan la dbab pa'i sde/_/gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis so/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar mdo'i sde ni gang bzhed pa'i don mdor smos pa'i tshul gyis lhug par gsungs pa ste/_'dus byas 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las/_de la 
[\[104a.5\]]tshig rkyang lhug gis mdo mdor brjod pa de ni mdo'i sde'o zhes so/_/ci'i phyir phye ste mi gsungs snyam na/_kun las btus pa las/_phan yon bcu gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pas smos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te rnam par gzhag sla ba dang*/_bshad sla ba dang*/_gzung 
[\[104a.6\]]sla ba dang*/_chos la gus pas myur du tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang*/_myur du chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang*/_sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa thob pa dang*/_chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa thob pa dang*/_mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas 
[\[104a.7\]]pa'i mchog la reg pa dang*/_'bel ba'i gtam gyis gtan la 'bebs pas dam pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed do/_/mkhas pa mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes so/_/dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde ni/_mdo'i sde de nyid la bar dang mtha' ma dag tu 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su bsnyad pa'am/_da dung brtag par bya ba gzhan yod pas drang ba'i don du gsung ba'i mdo sde gang yin pa rnams so/_/lung du bstan pa'i sde ni/_nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa sngon byung ba shi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'byung 
[\[104b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa rnams lung ston pa mdzad pa'am/_dgongs pa rnam par phye nas lung ston par byed pa nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang yin pa rnams so/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i sde ni/_lung gang dag tshig rkang pa gnyis pa nas brtsams te rkang pa drug pa'i bar du tshigs 
[\[104b.3\]]su bcad par bsdebs nas gsungs pa gang yin pa rnams so/_/ched du brjod pa'i sde ni/_gang zag gzhan gyis zhu ba la ma ltos par bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yun du gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir yi rang ba'i tshul gyis gsungs pa ste/_dper na mdo las bcom 
[\[104b.4\]]ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te gdan la bzhugs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes pa lta bu ste/rnam bshad rigs pa las/_gang zag gi ched du gsungs pa ma yin gyi/_bstan pa gnas par bya ba 
[\[104b.5\]]'ba' zhig gi phyir gsungs pa gang yin pa ste zhes gsungs so/_/gleng gzhi'i sde ni/_gang zag 'ga' zhig gi ched du gsungs pa dang byung ba dang bcas pa'i bslab pa brjod pa rnams te/_sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa las/_mdo sde dang 'dul ba la sogs pa thog ma ci las 
[\[104b.6\]]glengs te bshad pa dang*/_gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di dang byung ba 'di'i tshe bslab pa bcas pa lta bu la bya ste gleng gzhi'i sde zhes bya zhes so/_/rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde ni/_chos nyan pa rnams kyis don go zhing legs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sngon byung ba gzhan las 
[\[104b.7\]]brtsams pa'i dpe dang bcas nas ston pa gang yin pa rnams so/_/de lta bu byung ba'i sde ni sngon rabs kyi gtam rgyud gsungs pa rnams so/_/skyes pa rabs kyi sde ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe gang dang gang du skyes pa dang*/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]dka' thub ci dang ci mdzad pa rnams legs par ston pa rnams so/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i sde ni/_theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyis dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya che ba dang rgyas pa dang zab pa'i rnam par ston pa rnams so/_/rmad du byung 
[\[105a.2\]]ba'i sde ni/_gang las nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bstan pa rnams so/_/gtan la dbab pa'i sde ni/_chos thams cad rang dang spyi'i mtshan 
[\[105a.3\]]nyid kyis gtan la 'bebs pa'i sgo nas mdo sde la sogs pa'i don yang dag par bstan pa rnams so/_/gsum pa gnyen po'i sgo nas dbye na sde snod gsum ste/_spyi'i nges tshig dang*/_so so'i rang bzhin dang*/_sde snod gsum du 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan no/_/dang po spyi'i nges tshig 
[\[105a.4\]]ni/_thun mong du legs par sbyar ba'i skad du pi Ta ka zhes 'byung ste/_de nyid bsgyur na gang bu'am bsdus pa'i don la 'jug ste/_de na shes par bya ba'i chos thams cad ni 'di'i brjod bya nyid du bsdus pa'i phyir sde snod dam/_yang na yul dbus kyi bre bo che'i ming ste/_de'i nang 
[\[105a.5\]]du bre'u chung gis gzhal bar bya ba'i 'bru la sogs pa mang po chud pa ltar/_'dir yang shes par bya ba'i chos sam bslab par bya ba'i chos mang po 'dus pa'i phyir sde snod ces bya ste/_dper na snod gang du 'bru bre bcu shong zhing 'dus pa'i snod de la snod ces bya ba dang 'dra bar sde 
[\[105a.6\]]snod gsum po dang gnyis po 'dir yang gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi don dang tshig thams cad ma 'dus pa med pa'i phyir sde snod ces bya'o/_/de ltar yang slob dpon thogs med kyis gsum po'am gnyis po de yang ci'i phyir sde snod ces bya zhe na/_smras pa/_bsdus pa'i 
[\[105a.7\]]phyir te shes bya'i don thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes so/_/yang na phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi chos nas sku dang ye shes la sogs pa'i bar gyis shes par bya ba'i don thams cad 'dus pas de'i phyir sde snod ces bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/sde snod gsum du gsung rab 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]yan lag bcu gnyis po ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur ba yin snyam na/_mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang lung du bstan pa'i sde dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde ste lnga po dag ni nyan thos kyi mdo sde'i sde snod du 'dod do/_/gleng gzhi'i sde dang rtogs pa 
[\[105b.2\]]brjod pa'i sde dang de lta bu byung ba'i sde ste gsum po dag ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba ste/de'i yang dang pos ni ltung ba bslab bya dang bcas pa ston pa'i phyir na gtso bo'i tshul dang*/_phyi ma gnyis ni de'i 'khor gyi tshul du 'dod pa yin no/_/skyes pa rabs kyi sde ni byang chub sems 
[\[105b.3\]]dpa'i 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi 'khor dang*/_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang rmad du byung ba'i sde gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde'i sde snod nyid du 'dod do/_/gtan la dbab pa'i sde ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ka'i thun mong du gyur pa'i chos mngon pa'i sde snod du 
[\[105b.4\]]nges pa yin la/_rang sangs rgyas la ni sde snod logs su gyur pa med pas nyan thos kyi sde snod la dmigs pa yin no/_/gnyis pa so so'i rang bzhin la/_mtshan nyid dang*/_mtshan gzhi dang*/_nges pa'i tshigs ste gsum gsum las/_dang po mdo sde'i sde snod kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[105b.5\]]ni/_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa brjod bya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i gsung rab kyi rigs su gtogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa mtshan gzhi ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa rnams so/_/gsum pa nges tshig ni/_mdo'i skad dod la legs par 
[\[105b.6\]]sbyar ba'i skad du sU tra zhes pa mgo smos pa ste/_mdo sde rgyan las/_mdo dang chos mngon 'dul ba dag_/mdor na don ni rnam bzhir 'dod/_/blo ldan pas ni de shes na/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thob/_/ces pa'i don ni sde snod gsum po so sor re re zhing gnas la sogs 
[\[105b.7\]]pa bzhi dang*/_mngon du ba la sogs pa bzhi dang*/_ltung ba la sogs pa bzhi ste/_mdor na sde snod gsum po ma lus par shes pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par bshad la/_nyan thos dag gis ni tshigs 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]su bcad pa gcig gi don rtogs pas kyang zag pa zad pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par bshad do/_/de dag las gnas la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni/_de nyid las/_gnas rnams dang ni mtshan nyid dang*/_/chos don smos phyir mdo yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa 
[\[106a.2\]]bzhin du/sa yul gang du bshad pa dang*/_/gang gis bshad pa dang*/_gang gi phyir gsungs pa rnams smos pa'i phyir gnas dang*/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid smos pa'i phyir mtshan nyid dang*/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang rten 
[\[106a.3\]]cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir chos dang*/_de rnams kyi dgongs pa'i don smos pa'i phyir don te de dag smos pa'i tshul gyis gsungs pa'i phyir mdo yin no/_/de dag ston par byed pa'i gsung rab kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i phyir sde zhes bya ba yin no/_/gnyis pa mngon pa'i sde snod la yang dang po 
[\[106a.4\]]mtshan nyid ni/_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa brjod bya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i gsung rab kyi rigs su gtogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa mtshan gzhi ni mngon pa sde bdun la sogs pa rnams so/_/gsum pa nges pa'i tshig ni mngon pa la legs par sbyar ba'i skad du a b+hi zhes
