[\[106a.5\]]'byung ste/_a b+hi mu khya zhes pa mngon du phyogs pa dang*/_a b+hI k+Sha Na zhes pa yang yang dang*/_a b+hi b+hu zhes pa zil gnon dang*/_a b+hi sa ma ya zhes pa rtogs pa ste/_de nyid las/_mngon du phyir dang yang yang dang*/_/zil gnon rtogs phyir mngon pa'i chos/_/
[\[106a.6\]]zhes pa ltar zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa ston pa'i phyir mngon du ba dang*/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa chos re re la'ang bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med pa la 
[\[106a.7\]]sogs pa'i bye brag mang po yang dang yang du ston pa'i phyir yang yang dang*/_brtsad pa dang brtsad pa'i gzhi la sogs pa smra ba la rnam par nges pas phas kyi rgol ba zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir zil gnon dang*/_shes bya ji snyed pa'i mdo sde'i don ma nor bar rtogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]ba'i phyir rtogs pa ste rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis mngon pa yin no/_/gsum pa 'dul ba'i sde snod la'ang dang po mtshan nyid ni/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa brjod bya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i gsung rab kyi rigs su gtogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa mtshan gzhi ni lung sde bzhi 
[\[106b.2\]]la sogs pa rnams so/_/gsum pa nges tshig ni 'dul ba la legs par sbyar ba'i skad du bi na ya zhes pa 'byung ste bi bat+ti rnam par ltung ba dang*/_bi nish+tsa ya rnam par nges pa ste/_de nyid las/_ltung dang 'byung dang ldang ba dang*/_/nges par 'byung dang gang zag dang*/_/
[\[106b.3\]]bcas pa dang ni rab dbye dang*/_/rnam par nges phyir 'dul ba nyid/_/ces 'byung ba ltar te/_de la ltung ba ni phas pham pa dang*/_dge 'dun lhag ma dang*/_nyes pa sbom po dang*/_ltung byed dang*/_so sor bshags pa ste ltung ba ris lnga'o/_/ltung ba de dag gang 
[\[106b.4\]]las 'byung ba'i rgyu ni/_mi shes pa la sogs pa bzhi las 'byung ba'o/_/ltung ba las ldang ba'i thabs ni/_phyin chad mi bya bar bsdams pa'i sems ston pas ldang ba'o/_/ltung ba las nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni/_so sor bshags pa la sogs pa bdun ston 
[\[106b.5\]]pas nges par 'byung ba ste chos rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba'i phyir 'dul ba yin no/_/rnam pa gzhan yang gang la brten nas bslab pa'i tshig bca' ba'i gang zag dang*/_gang zag gi nyes pa gsol nas ston pas dge 'dun la bslab pa bcas pa dang*/_de mdor bstan 
[\[106b.6\]]pa las rab tu dbye ba dang*/_ltung ba dang ltung ba ma yin pa rnam par nges pa ste bzhi 'byung ba'i phyir yang 'dul ba yin no/_/gsum pa sde snod gsum du bzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan ni/_spang bya gsum yin pa dang bslab bya gsum yin pa dang shes bya gsum yin pa ste rgyu rnam pa dgu las/_
[\[106b.7\]]dang po ni spang bya nyon mongs pa gsum gyi dbang gis sde snod gsum du gzhag ste/_'di ltar nye ba'i nyon mongs pa the tshom gyi gnyen por mdo sde'i sde snod rnam par gzhag pa ste/_mdo sde gang las phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang*/_bden 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i don gang la yid gnyis su gyur pa de la de gdon mi za bar bya ba'i ched du bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/mtha' gnyis la sbyor ba'i gnyen por 'dul ba'i sde snod rnam par gzhag pa ste/_gang las tshegs dang rtsol bas bsgrub pa'i kha 
[\[107a.2\]]na ma tho ba'i yongs su spyad pas sred pas kun nas bslang ba'i sog 'jog la spyod pa bkag pa 'dod pa'i bsod nyams kyi mtha' spong ba dang*/_nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dag pa dang ldan pa'i dge slong gis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yongs su spyad pa lhag par rnyed na kha zas ro brgya dang ldan 
[\[107a.3\]]pa dang*/_khang pa brtsegs pa khang mig lnga brgya pa yang zhen med du spyod par gnang ba bdag nyid ngal zhing dub pa'i mtha' spong bar ston pa'i phyir te/_dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang*/_yon tan dang ldan pa la ni ngas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang gos 'bum 
[\[107a.4\]]ri ba yang gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/rang gi lta ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i gnyen por chos mngon pa'i sde snod rnam par gzhag pa ste/_chos rnams kyi ma mo gang gis shes bya thams cad kyi rang spyi'i mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par gtan la phab nas rgya cher ston pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[107a.5\]]gnyis pa ni bslab par bya ba rnam par byang ba'i lam gsum gyi dbang gis sde snod gsum du rnam par gzhag ste/_'di ltar rjod byed gsum po de dag gis brjod bya bslab pa gsum ci rigs par bstan te/_mdo sde'i sde snod kyis ni nyan thos dang theg pa chen po'i bslab pa gsum rgyas par 
[\[107a.6\]]brjod pa'i sgo nas gdul bya rnams bslab pa gsum la yang dag par sbyor bar byed do/_/'dul ba'i sde snod kyis ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i bslab bya la slob pa'i tshul rgya cher bstan pa'i sgo nas gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la dngos su tshul khrims yongs su dag par byed pa dang*/_de la gnas pas 'gyod 
[\[107a.7\]]pa med pa la sogs pa rim gyis sems rtse gcig pa 'thob pa'i phyir lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed do/_/chos mngon pa'i sde snod kyis ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ma nor bar rgya cher bstan pa'i sgo nas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]blo dri ma med par bsgrub pa'i phyir lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed do/_/de skad du yang*/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis/_mdo sdes ni bslab pa gsum bshad do/_/'dul bas ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems bsgrub pa yin te/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni 'gyod 
[\[107b.2\]]pa med pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/chos mngon pas lhag pa'i shes rab bsgrub pa yin te don phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so/_/gsum pa ni shes par bya ba chos don bshad pa dang chos don sgrub pa dang chos don 'bel gtam gyis 
[\[107b.3\]]gtan la 'bebs pa'i dbang gis sde snod gsum du rnam par gzhag pa ste/_'di ltar mdo sde'i sde snod kyis ni rjod par byed pa'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i mtshan nyid kyi chos dang des brjod par bya ba phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don nam/_mtho ris 'grub par byed pa'i 
[\[107b.4\]]rgyu dge ba bcu'i las la sogs pa'i chos dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'grub par byed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i don brjod pa'i sgo nas tshig don la blo 'byang bar byed do/_/'dul ba'i sde snod kyis ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la mi sdug 
[\[107b.5\]]pa la sogs par bsgom pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la mchog tu spro bas na/_ming gi tshogs la sogs pa'i chos dang de dag gis brjod par bya ba'i don mngon sum du byed do/_/mngon pa'i sde snod kyis ni chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu mkhas par bsgrubs nas chos dang don rnams gzhan la ma 
[\[107b.6\]]nor ba nyid du legs par 'doms pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/de skad du yang slob dpon de nyid kyis/_mdo sdes ni chos dang don bshad do/_/'dul bas ni chos dang don bsgrub pa ste/_nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pas de gnyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos mngon pas ni 'bel ba'i 
[\[107b.7\]]gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar bshad pa'i sde snod gsum gyi chos de dag las byung ba'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol bar byed do/_/de'ang thos pa'i shes rab kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i thos 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pa'i bag chags 'jog pa dang*/_bsams pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar bsams pa de dang de'i don spyi'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed pa dang*/_de lta bu'i thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas ni bsam pa'i don rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa'i bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i tshul gyis lhag 
[\[108a.2\]]mthong gi rgyu zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyud la skyed par byed do/_/des sems kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa dang lhag mthong gis chos nyid don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i sgo nas rnam par grol bar byed de/_mgon po byams pas/_sde snod dag ni gsum mam gnyis 
[\[108a.3\]]kyang rung*/_/bsdus pa'i phyir na rgyu ni dgus 'dod do/_/de yis bag chags rtogs dang zhi ba dang*/_/rab tu rtogs pas rnam par grol bar byed/_/ces so/_/bzhi pa gdul bya'i sgo nas dbye ba ni/_gal te de ltar sde snod gsum du bzhag pa de kho na nyid du nges sam zhe na/_mtha' gcig tu ma nges te/_bzhi 
[\[108a.4\]]ru dbye ba dang*/_gnyis su bsdu ba'o/_/dang po ni/_rig pa 'dzin pa sngags kyi sde snod ni sngar gyi sde snod gsum po gang yang rung ba'i khongs su 'du bar 'gyur ram/_yang na logs su 'gyur ba yin snyam na/_slob dpon a b+ha yA ka ras ni bslab pa gsum ka ston pas sde snod gsum ka'o zhes gsum char 
[\[108a.5\]]gyi zab pa'i mthar thug yin pas de dag tu bsdu ba'i lugs su mdzad do/_/slob dpon shAn+ti pas ni zab mo'i don bsdus nas ston pas mdo sde'i sde snod yin no zhes mdo sde'i khongs su bsdu ba'i lugs su bzhed do/_/slob dpon Ar+Ya de was ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod do zhes logs 
[\[108a.6\]]su phye ba'i sde snod bzhi pa nyid du bzhed do/_/de ltar na sde snod bzhir yang 'gyur te 'di ni gdul bya thun mong du ma gyur pa dag gi don gsungs pa la sogs pas phyi ma ltar 'thad pa'i lugs su bzhed do/_/gnyis pa ni/_rgyan las/_gnyis kyang rung zhes pas gdul bya'i gang zag la ltos nas sde snod gnyis 
[\[108a.7\]]su bzhag pa'ang rigs te/_nyan thos kyi sde snod dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dag go_/de'ang gdul bya'i gang zag blo dman pa lam rgya chung ngu la mos pa'i ngo na nyan thos kyi sde snod dang*/_blo mchog tu gyur pa lam rgya chen po la mos pa'i ngo na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gnyis su 'gyur 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ba yin te/_rgyan gyi 'grel par gsum po de dag nyid theg pa dman pa dang*/_theg pa mchog gi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_nyan thos kyi sde snod dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do zhes so/_/de dag la theg pa chung ngu dang theg pa chen po zhes kyang bya ste/
[\[108b.2\]]spyir theg pa zhes bya ba legs par sbyar ba la/_yA na zhes yod pa de ni khyogs dang theg pa dang bzhon pa dang lam rnams su 'jug pa las/_'dir 'gro ba'i don gyis theg pa zhes bya zhing*/_lam gyi bden pa 'khor dang bcas pa la'ang sgra de ni don gyis 'jug ste/_slob pa'i gang zag gi lam gyi bden 
[\[108b.3\]]pa ni 'dis 'dong bar byed pas theg pa zhes bya'o/_/mi slob pa'i lam gyi bden pa ni 'dir dong bas na theg pa zhes bya'o/_/theg pa dman pa dang theg pa chen po gnyis kyi khyad par yang*/_sde snod kyi dbang du byas na theg pa dman pa'i lugs kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang 
[\[108b.4\]]bstan bcos mngon pa sde bdun la sogs pa ni nyan thos kyi sde snod yin la/_de dag la ma grags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang*/_phal po che la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khyad par zhib tu 
[\[108b.5\]]phye na mtha' yas par gsungs kyang*/_gtso bor 'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa las/_chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin gsum/_/rnam par shes pa brgyad nyid dang*/_/bdag med gnyis kyi dngos por ni/_/theg pa chen po mtha' dag 'dus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la chos ni 
[\[108b.6\]]ming dang rgyu mtshan dang rnam par rtog pa dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes so/_/rang bzhin ni kun brtags dang*/_gzhan dbang dang*/_yongs su grub pa ste gsum mo/_/rnam par shes pa ni/_tshogs drug dang*/_nyon mongs pa'i yid dang*/_kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste brgyad do/_/bdag 
[\[108b.7\]]med ni gang zag gi bdag med dang*/_chos kyi bdag med gnyis te/_de dag ston par byed pa ni theg pa chen po'i gzhung yin no/_/yang lam dang 'bras bu'i dbang du byas na/_chen po bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/_de'ang mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos rgya chen po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa chen po'o/_/rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don gnyis sgrub pa'i phyir sgrub pa chen po'o/_/rtogs pa'i dus na gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa gnyis rtogs pas rtogs pa chen po'o/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du rtag tu gus par byas te sbyor 
[\[109a.2\]]ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pas brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po'o/_/'khor ba yongs su mi gtong zhing kun nas nyon mongs pas gos pa med pas thabs la mkhas pa chen po ste/_rgyu'i khyad par lnga'o/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang dag par 'grub pas yang dag 
[\[109a.3\]]par grub pa chen po'o/_/yang dang yang du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun du ston pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las chen po ste/_mgon po byams pas/_dmigs pa che ba nyid dang ni/_/de bzhin sgrub pa gnyis dag dang*/_/ye shes brtson 'grus rtsom 
[\[109a.4\]]pa dang*/_/thabs la mkhas par gyur pa dang*/_/yang dag grub pa chen po dang*/_/sangs rgyas phrin las chen po ste/_/chen po bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir/_/theg chen zhes ni nges par brjod/_/ces pa ltar ro/_/yang na theg pa chen po bsdus pa las/_shes bya'i gnas dang mtshan nyid der 'jug dang*/_/
[\[109a.5\]]de yi rgyu 'bras de rab dbye ba dang*/_/bslab pa gsum dang de 'bras spangs pa dang*/_/ye shes theg pa mchog gyur khyad par 'phags/_/zhes pa'i don rgya cher 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo nas theg pa chen po khyad par du 'phags pa bstan pa yin no/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po de la dbye na/_gdul 
[\[109a.6\]]bya dbang po rtul po rgyu la mos pas rgyu lam du byed pa la rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang*/_dbang po rnon po rgyu 'bras lhun grub la mos pas 'bras bu lam du byed pa la 'bras bu gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_mdo sde gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i rgyal po las/_'dren 
[\[109a.7\]]pa'i theg pa gsum po dag_/bcom ldan nges par gsungs lags na/_/rgyu 'bras lhun grub tu spyod cing*/_/sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i/_/nges pa'i theg pa cis ma gsungs/_/zhes pa dang*/_rgyu la mos pa rgyu chos kyi/_/'khor lo rab tu bskor byas 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]nas/_/rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam zhig_/ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de las phyi ma gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa bye brag tu bshad pa la/_mdor bstan pa dang*/_rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po la spyi'i ngo bo ngos bzung ba dang*/_rgyud kyi nges tshig bstan pa'o/_/
[\[109b.2\]]dang po la theg pa dman pa las mchog tu gyur pa'i theg pa chen po'i nang nas gzhi mi spong bar lam du byed pa'i thabs khyad par du 'phags pa/_dka' ba med par gzhan don du bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du 'grub pa'i thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis pa nges 
[\[109b.3\]]tshig ni skad bye brag tu rtogs par byed pa 'bring po las/_tan+t+ra pra ban+d+ha khyA zhes pa rgyun chags par bshad pa'i ming du bshad de/_de las bye brag tu brjod bya don gyi rgyud kyi dbang du byas na/_sems nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid gsal la ma 'gags pa/_rgyu dang 
[\[109b.4\]]thabs dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs thams cad du 'brel zhing rgyun chags pa/_ngo bo ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i bdag nyid can du gnas pa de la rgyud ces bya ste/_sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/_rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya ba ste/_/zhes dang*/_rdo rje rtse mo las/_rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/_/'khor 
[\[109b.5\]]ba rgyud du 'dod pa de/_/mya ngan 'das pa rgyud phyi ma/_/zhes dang*/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las/_rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/_/rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/_/gzhi dang de yi rang bzhin dang*/_/mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba'o/_/rang bzhin rnam pa rgyu yin te/_/gzhi ni thabs 
[\[109b.6\]]zhes bya ba yin/_/de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu ste/_/gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de lta bu'i rgyud sde de la spyir gsang sngags sam sngags kyi theg pa dang*/_rdo rje theg pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod dang*/_'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi rnam 
[\[109b.7\]]grangs dang ldan pa'o/_/de las dang po gsang sngags zhes pa 'di'i sgra don ni/_legs par sbyar ba'i skad du man+t+ra zhes 'byung ba bod skad du gsang sngags sam sngags te/_de'ang yi ge bsnan bgod kyi sgra las drangs na ma na yid dang*/_trA ya skyob pa ste/_yid mtshan ma dang rnam par rtog pa las skyob 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]pa'i phyir sngags te/_de nyid las/_dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi/_/rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung ba'i/_/yid de man zhes bya bar bshad/_/tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don/_/'jig rten spyod las rnam grol ba/_/gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste/_/rdo rje kun gyi srung ba 
[\[110a.2\]]ni/_/sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do/_/zhes dang*/_yang na stong pa dang snying rje gnyis su med pa la'ang bshad de/_dbang yon tan rim pa las/_ma ni stong pa mtshan ma bral/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba/_/shes rab chen po bdag gis bshad/_/tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don/_/de 
[\[110a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba/_/stong pa dang ni snying rje nyid/_/gnyis su med dang gnyis kyi tshul/_/zhes so/_/de la nang gses kyi dbye ba gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags gsum du 'gyur te/_dang po ni snod min du gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i 
[\[110a.4\]]phyir gsang bar bya ba'i 'os yin pas na de skad ces bya ste/_dpal kha sbyor gyi rab tu byed pa dang por/_khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o zhes so/_/gnyis pa ni/_bid+yA zhes pa'i sgras gtso cher rig pa'i mi 
[\[110a.5\]]mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i mun pa 'joms pa la ltos nas 'jog pa ste/_rdo rje rtse mor/_'dod chags mun pa rnam rtul zhing*/_/nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul/_/ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa/_/de ni rig sngags rnam par brjod/_/ces dang*/_bsam gtan 
[\[110a.6\]]phyi ma'i 'grel pa las/_de la rig sngags ni bud med kyi gzugs dang dbyibs kyi lha dang*/_de ston pa'i sgra dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o zhes so/_/gsum pa ni/_d+hA ra Ni zhes pa'i sgras yon tan 'dzin par byed pa la ltos nas 'jog pa ste/_de nyid las/_sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing*/_/chos rnams 
[\[110a.7\]]'dzin par byed pa dang*/_/dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa/_/gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/_/ces so/_/de ltar gsang sngags zhes bya ba'i sgra don dang ldan pa de la rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i don ni/_'di ltar rdo rje ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'o/_/theg pa ni 'dis 'dong bar byed pas na lam dang*/_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'dir dong bas na 'bras bu la bya'o/_/yang na mi phyed pa dang mi shigs pa dang thogs pa med pa'i don gyis na rdo rje'o/_/de na rgyu dang 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul du spyod pa'i lam gyis 'dong bas na theg pa ste/_rgyud kyi don la 'jug pa las/_de nyid ni 'tshe ba med cing yang dag pa'i don thogs pa med par 
[\[110b.2\]]thob par byed pas na rdo rje'o/_/de ni theg pa yang yin te lam des dka' ba med par myur du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro zhes dang*/_dus 'khor 'grel chen las/_rdo rje ni mi phyed pa dang mi chod pa chen po yin la/_de nyid theg pa yin pa ni rdo rje theg pa ste sngags kyi tshul dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul/_'bras 
[\[110b.3\]]bu dang rgyu'i bdag nyid gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o zhes dang*/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas/_/des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs/_/rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do/_/zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod 
[\[110b.4\]]ces bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi dang lta ba'i grub pa'i mtha' 'di nyid kyis ston par byed pa'i don du dpung bzang gi rgyud kyi 'grel pa las bshad pa lta bu'o/_/de la 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya ba'i don ni/_dper na skyes bu shin tu 
[\[110b.5\]]mdzes pa la lha zhes brjod pa bzhin du theg pa 'di pa'i lugs kyis da lta nas 'bras bu'i rnam par bsgoms pas na 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya ste/_rdo rje gur las/_sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/_/sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'grub/_/ces sogs rgya cher gsungs so/_/khyad par du 
[\[110b.6\]]theg pa 'di nyid kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_gang zag dbang po rab kyis tshe 'di nyid du 'grub pa dang*/_'bring gis bar dor 'grub pa dang*/_tha mas skye ba bdun na 'grub pa dang*/_shin tu tha mas kyang skye ba bcu drug na 'grub par gsungs te/_de'i dang po ni/_gsang ba 'dus pa 
[\[110b.7\]]las/_'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che/_/sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba/_/ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par brgyan/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa dang*/_gnyis pa yang ye shes thig le las/_yang na lus ni spangs ma thag_/brtson pa mi ldan pas kyang 'grub/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]ces gsungs pa dang*/_gsum pa yang*/_gsang ba'i mdzod las/_dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na/_/skye zhing skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur/_/de yis skye ba bdun na ni/_/ma bsgoms par yang dngos grub thob/_/ces gsungs pa dang*/_bzhi pa yang dam tshig lnga pa las/_gal 
[\[111a.2\]]te ltung ba med gyur na/_/skye ba bcu drug dag na 'grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/de bas na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu tshegs med pa nyid kyis 'grub pa'i phyir na 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya'o/_/de nyid rjod par byed pa'i sgra rgyud kyi dbang du byas na/_brjod bya rgyud gsum po ston par byed pa'i ming dang 
[\[111a.3\]]tshig dang yi ge'i rnam pa rang rang gi rnam par rig pa la sgra spyi dang don spyi 'dres ma'i rnam par snang ba gang yin pa de ni sgra'i rgyud mtshan nyid pa dang*/_sgra rgyud blo la sgra gnas pa'i 'bras bu dang*/_de nyid rgyud la skyed par byed pa'i grogs su gyur pa gang rjod par byed pa lung gi rgyud sde'i rim pa ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[111a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa nas brtsams te glegs bam du bris pa'i bar ni sgra rgyud btags pa ba nyid du bzhed do/_/gal te de lta na mngon pa mdzod las/_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag_/gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag_/tshig gam ming yin de dag ni/_/gzugs 
[\[111a.5\]]sam 'du byed dag tu 'dus/_/zhes bshad pa dang 'gal lo snyam na/_bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa dag de ltar 'dod kyang*/_theg pa chen po'i lugs la kun rdzob tu snang ba thams cad rnam par rig pa sgyu ma lta bur 'dod pa de nyid kyi phyir na 'og ma'i gzhung dang 'gal ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med do/_/de dag 
[\[111a.6\]]ni thun mong ba la grags pa'i lugs yin la/_thun mong ma yin pa'i lugs kyi sgra rgyud mtshan nyid pa ni/_rdo rje rtse mor/_sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs rdzogs/_/sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul nas ni/_/rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar 
[\[111a.7\]]'og min gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod rjod byed sgra'i rgyud thams cad mtshan nyid pa dang*/_sngar bshad pa'i mtshan btags kyi dbye ba dag ni sgra rgyud btags pa ba nyid du 'khrul pa zad pa'i rje btsun gong ma rnams kyi bzhed pa bla na med pa nyid yin no/_/gnyis pa rgyas par bshad pa 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]la/_de pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa dang*/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyud sde'i dbye ba dang*/_dbye ba de dang ldan pa'i grangs nges pa dang*/_grangs dang go rim gnyis ka nges pa dang*/_grangs nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi sgra don bshad pa'o/_/dang po de pha rol tu phyin 
[\[111b.2\]]pa'i theg pa las khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa ni slob dpon dz+nyA na shrIs/_gsang ba sngags kyi theg pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po dbu ma las kyang khyad par ci zhig yod par bstan ce na/_dmigs pa bla na med pa la dmigs pa'i thabs dang*/_sgrub pa bla na med pa dang*/_ye shes bla na 
[\[111b.3\]]med pa dang*/_brtson 'grus bla na med pa dang*/_gdul bya ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin par nus pa dang*/_nyon mongs pa byin gyis rlob pa dang*/_byin gyis rlob pa myur ba dang*/_myur du 'byung ba dang*/_nyon mongs spong ba dang*/_bsam pa bla na med pa dang*/_spyod pa bla na med pa'i thabs mkhas pa ste/_
[\[111b.4\]]de ltar thabs mkhas pa nyid rnam pa bcu gcig gi khyad par du 'phags so zhes gsungs te/_de dag gi don yang rim pa bzhin du dges pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i rgyud sde rgya chen po la dmigs pa'i phyir dang*/_bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten nas lus kyi bkod pa sna tshogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs 
[\[111b.5\]]kyis kyang mngon sum ma yin par don dpag tu med pa bsgrub par nus pa'i phyir dang*/_rgyu dang ngo bo nyid dang las dag las ye shes myur ba nyid du 'grub pa'i phyir dang*/_dam tshig rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis brtson 'grus chen po shugs 'byung du rtsom pa 'byung ba'i phyir dang*/_mtshams med 
[\[111b.6\]]pa lnga'i las byed pa la sogs pa theg pa gzhan nas yongs su spangs pa rnams kyang 'dir 'grub par gsungs pa'i phyir dang*/_lha mchod pa'i bsam pa dang bde ba la brten pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis nyon mongs pa byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir dang*/_da lta nyid nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[111b.7\]]rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur zhing byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir dang*/_tshe 'di dang skye ba bdun dang bcu drug na nges par 'tshang rgya ba'i thabs kyi khyad par mang po 'di la yod pa'i phyir dang*/_dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar spong ba'i phyir dang*/_
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor la rtse gcig tu dmigs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing nyon mongs pa tshegs med par spong bar nus pa'i phyir dang*/_theg pa gzhan nas ma gnang ba'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la 'di 
[\[112a.2\]]nas ji skad bshad pa'i thabs kyi rtsis zin pa'i sgo nas spyad pas 'bras bu myur du 'grub par gsungs pas na/_spyod pa bla na med pa ste 'di dag gis khyad par du 'phags par bzhed do/_/slob dpon shAn+ti pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang sngags kyi theg pa don dam pa'i bden pa la khyad par med kyang*/_
[\[112a.3\]]kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i khyad par la snang ba'i dmigs pa rnams lhar bsgom pas dmigs pa rgya che ba dang*/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bden pa'i tshig rnams yid bzhin du bzung bas byin gyis brlabs pa khyad par can skye bas grogs rgya che ba dang*/_'gro ba'i don dang zhing yongs 
[\[112a.4\]]su dag pa da lta nyid nas spyod pas spyod pa rgya che ba ste gsum po 'dis rdo rje theg pa khyad par du 'phags par bzhed do/_/slob dpon chen po tri pi Ta ka ma la shI las/_tshul gsum gyi sgron ma las/_don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang*/_/thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang*/_/dbang po 
[\[112a.5\]]rnon po'i dbang byas pas/_/sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang sngags kyi theg pa gnyis las/_rtogs par bya ba'i lta ba dang thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu dang kun slong byang chub kyi sems rnams la khyad par zhugs pa 
[\[112a.6\]]ma yin yang*/_ma rmongs pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhis sngags kyi theg pa khyad par du 'phags par bzhed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtogs par bya ba'i lta ba ni chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba dbu ma'i lam yin la de la khyad par zhugs pa 
[\[112a.7\]]ma yin no/_/de nyid las khyad par du gyur pa'am lhag pa'i lta ba yang dag pa zhig yod par mi 'gyur la/_gal te yod par gyur na ni lta ba de spros pa can las ma 'das shing*/_spros pa'i mthar lhung ba'i lta bas ni nam yang rnam par grol ba yod par mdo sngags gnyis ka nas rnam pa kun du 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]gsungs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas su dmigs pa la yang mi mthun pa med de/_de nyid dmigs par bya ba'i yul du ma gyur pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam zhig yod pa mi srid la gal te srid par gyur na yang de nyid 
[\[112b.2\]]ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun nas slong ba byang chub kyi sems lam gyi gzhir bzung ba yang mi mthun pa med de/_gzhan don du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i blo med na theg pa chen po'i lam la 
[\[112b.3\]]'jug pa'i dgos pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/des na lam spyi'am rtsa ba mtshungs pas gsang ba sngags kyi theg pa ni rtsod pa dang bral ba yin la/_de las spyod pa bde bas 'grub pa la sogs pa'i bye brag mang po ston du yod pas na ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/de yang 'di 
[\[112b.4\]]ltar rtogs pa'i lta ba la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par yod de/_pha rol tu phyin pa nas so so skye bo'i gnas skabs su/_dngos po'i gnas lugs dpe dang gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i sgo nas spros bral du ji ltar gtan la phab kyang don spyi'i tshul gyis rtogs pa tsam las rtogs med du 'gyur 
[\[112b.5\]]mi srid la/_gsang sngags pas dbang gi dus na rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rten 'brel zab mo'i gnad kyis ye shes phab pa de'i tshe'am dbang gsum pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ye shes rgyud la skyes pa na rtogs med kyi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba dpe'i tshul gyis dngos su 
[\[112b.6\]]rtogs pa 'byung zhing*/_de la brten nas don gyi ye shes kyang myur du 'dren par bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du yang slob dpon badzra pA Nis/_don de kho na nyid la dbye ba med kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni rmongs pa ste/_lung dang rigs pas gtan la phab ste rtogs pa'o/_/rdo rje theg 
[\[112b.7\]]pa ni ma rmongs pa ste lung dang rigs pa dang bla ma'i man ngag dag gis nyams su myong ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/rtogs par byed pa'i thabs mang ba'i khyad par yod de/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi thabs mkhas pa ji snyed pa gzhir bzhag pa'i steng du/_de dag tu ming tsam yang ma grags 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa'i rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor dang bzlas bsgom dang las kyi tshogs rab 'byams dang rtogs pa brtan pa'i thabs kyi spyod pa la sogs pa mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rim pa mang du yod pa'i phyir te/_dper na/_kye rdo rje 
[\[113a.2\]]las/_skye bo mi bzad pa yi las/_/gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/_/thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba lta bu rgya cher gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na de lta bu ni mtshan nyid theg pa las kyang bshad de/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa 
[\[113a.3\]]las/_dper na grong khyer gyi lud gang yin pa des 'bras sam bu ram gyi zhing la phan 'dogs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lud gang yin pa des byang chub kyi myu gu la phan 'dogs so zhes gsungs pas so snyam na de ni sa thob pa'i tshe yin gyis ma thob pa 
[\[113a.4\]]phyin chad kyi gang zag gis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa'i yul spong ba nyid lam du byed pa ste/_mdo las/_'dod pa rnams ni dug gi lo ma lta bu'o/_/zhes sogs dang*/_slob ma la spring ba las/_yul dang dug mtshungs dang po myong ba tsam na bde/_/yul dang dug 
[\[113a.5\]]mtshungs rnam par smin pa rtsub la mi bzad pa/_/yul dang dug mtshungs gti mug mun pas thibs por byed/_/yul dang dug mtshungs shugs bzlog dka' zhing g.yo ba yin/_/zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/dka' ba med pas byang chub 'grub pa'i khyad par yod de/_pha rol tu phyin pa ba ni 
[\[113a.6\]]bskal pa grangs med gsum la sogs par mgo dang rkang lag gi bar gyi bdog pa gtong ba la sogs pa dka' spyad dang dka' thub kyi lam yin pas tshegs chen pos bsgrub dgos la/_gsang sngags pa ni de lta bu ma yin par spyod pa bde bas byang chub 'grub pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[113a.7\]]de skad du yang gsang ba 'dus pa las/_dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pa/_/bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/_/brten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la/_/ci bde bar ni brten bzhin du/_/rang gi 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/_/zhes dang*/_slob dpon badzra pA Nis/_gzhan yang dka' ba med pa ste bde ba chen po lam du byed pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa ni btang snyoms pa dang nyams su myong ba med do/_/rgyu lam du byed pas na rgyu'i theg pa'o/_/'bras bu 
[\[113b.2\]]lam du byed pas na 'bras bu'i theg pa khyad par du 'phags so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod kyang*/_/sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste/_/sangs rgyas bsgrub bya 
[\[113b.3\]]snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed pa/_/mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa dang mtshungs so snyam na/_de nas bshad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyid nas yin la/_gsang sngags kyi skabs nas bshad pa ni 
[\[113b.4\]]dbang bskur ba thob pa'i dus nyid nas chos thams cad lhag pa'i lhar ngo sprod cing mchod pa dang mi 'bral bar bya ba yin pas khyad par che ste/_dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/_/'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/_/mchod pa 'di dang ldan par ni/_/dus kun du ni bde bar gnas/_/
[\[113b.5\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud gzhung mang po nas bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/dbang po rnon pos dbang du byas pa'i khyad par yod de/_pha rol tu phyin par/_rtun pa rab kyis ji ltar myur yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la bskal pa grangs med gsum du thogs la/_rdo rje theg par gang 
[\[113b.6\]]zag dbang po rab kyis tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par gsungs te/_gsang ba 'dus pa las/_'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dang ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag kyang*/_/tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/_/ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na 
[\[113b.7\]]gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na zhag bdun na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob bo zhes kyang bshad na/_gsang sngags dang khyad par yod pa mi grub bo snyam na/_de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa la 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bshad pa'i phyir na khyad par che'o/_/sngags las ni sdig pa chen po byed pas kyang 'grub par gsungs te/_ji skad du/_sems can mtshams med lnga la sogs/_/sdig pa chen po byed pas kyang*/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rgya mtsho ste/_/theg mchog 'di la 
[\[114a.2\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/gzhan yang kha cig 'di skad du/_dus kyi mthar gsang sngags spyod pa'i dus ma yin zhes smra ba yang rigs pa ma yin te/_rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa las/_gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste/_/chos 
[\[114a.3\]]'di de ltar shes nas ni/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/_/zhes dang*/_he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba las/_he ru ka dpal gzung byas na/_/snyigs ma'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/gnyis pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyud sde'i dbye ba la gsum ste/_
[\[114a.4\]]gnyis dang gsum du bsdu ba dang*/_/bzhir bzhag pa dang*/_lnga dang drug tu dbye ba'o/_/dang po ni/_rnam snang sgyu 'phrul drwa bar/_phyi nang dbye ba shes pa yis/_/rgyud sde'i dbye ba shes par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/ grub chen a b+ha yA ka ras/_dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga ni/_/
[\[114a.5\]]ston pas rgyud sde gnyis su spros/_/zhes dang*/_'jig rten gsum rgyal gyi rtog pa'i 'grel pa las/_gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi lam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te/_sems can 
[\[114a.6\]]rtog pa mang ba rnams kyi don du bya ba'i rgyud rnams gsungs so/_/gcig kho nar rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub par 'dod pa rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams bshad do zhes gsungs pa rnams kyis rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa gnyis su bsdu ba'i tshul du mdzad pa yin no/_/thams cad 
[\[114a.7\]]gsang ba'i rgyud las/_bya spyod gnyis ka rnal 'byor rgyud/_/ces dang*/_sngags don rnam gzigs las/_rnal 'byor spyod dang bya ba'i rgyud/_/ces dang*/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i 'grel par/_rgyud thams cad ni bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud dang gsang ba'i rgyud kha cig go zhes dang*/
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]slob dpon kun dga' snying pos de nyid snang chen du/_thams cad ces bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud dang gnyis ka'i rgyud rnams so zhes gsungs pa rnams kyis rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa gsum du bsdu ba'i tshul du bzhed pa yin no/_/gnyis pa ni/_dpal dges pa'i rdo rje'i 
[\[114b.2\]]bshad pa'i rgyud thun mong ma yin pa rdo rje gur las/_dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/_/bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/_/sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog_/rnal 'byor bla med de ltag la/_/zhes dang*/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las/_gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag 
[\[114b.3\]]bcang dang*/_/dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin/_/srin bu'i tshul gyis rgyud bzhir gnas/_/zhes gsungs pa rnams kyis rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa bzhir bzhag pa'i lugs so/_/gsum pa ni/_dpal kye rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_dgod dang blta ba dag gis dang*/_/
[\[114b.4\]]'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyis/_/rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/_/dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa/_/zhes bya bas bzhi ni dngos su bstan nas/_ma bsgrags zhes pa'i shugs las ni rgyud sde lnga pa ston par slob dpon b+ha bi lha la sogs pa bzhed pas rgyud 
[\[114b.5\]]sde lnga dang*/_dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las ni/_b+ha ga rnams su rgyud rnam lnga/_/bya ba la sogs bla med mthar/_/zhes dang*/_slob dpon badzra pA Nis/_thabs kyi rgyud la lnga ste/_bya ba'i rgyud dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud 
[\[114b.6\]]dang*/_rnal 'byor gong na med pa'i rgyud do zhes dang*/_slob dpon shAn+ti pas/_zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i theg pa ni bya ba dang*/_spyod pa dang*/_rnal 'byor dang*/_rnal 'byor chen po dang*/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa zhes bya ba rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_rab tu sgron 
[\[114b.7\]]gsal las/_rdo rje 'chang chen pos bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang bag chags kyi dbye bas sngags kyi bstan bcos rnam pa lnga ru gsungs te/_bya ba dang*/_spyod pa dang*/_rnal 'byor dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi bla ma dang*/_rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi dbye bas so zhes 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]gsungs pa rnams kyis rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa lngar dbye ba'i lugs su 'dren pa yin no/_/bde mchog le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa las ni/_ji srid mdo bya spyod pa dang*/_/rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i dbye ba las/_/sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/_/de dang 
[\[115a.2\]]de la dga' ba sbyin/_/zhes mdo sde rtog pa'i rgyud dang*/_bya ba'i rgyud dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i rgyud de rgyud sde rin po che sgo drug tu dbye ba 'di ni grub chen na ro ta pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'i 
[\[115a.3\]]bzhed pa yin te/_de dag la yang nang gses kyi dbye ba'i tshul mi 'dra ba dag yod do/_/gsum pa dbye ba de dang ldan pa'i grangs nges pa ni/_de ltar mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po rnams kyis rgyud sde so so'i rjes su 'brang ba'i bshad srol mi 'dra ba'i dbang 
[\[115a.4\]]las rgyud sde'i dbye sgo mang nyung ci rigs pa zhig 'byung yang*/_rnam par dbye ba dang ris su bsdu ba'i khyad par cung zad tsam byas pa yin gyi/_don la rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa bzhir nges pa ni/_'di ltar/_phyi rol mu stegs byed rnams kyi lugs la log pa'i spyod pa bzhi yod pas de rjes 
[\[115a.5\]]su gzung ba'i phyir du rgyud sde bzhir nges pa dang*/_sangs rgyas pa la grub mtha' mi 'dra ba bzhi yod pas de dang lung sgo bstun gyi dbang du byas nas bskyed chog mi 'dra ba bzhis rgyud sde bzhir nges pa dang*/_'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can la 'dod chags kyi spyod pa mi 'dra ba bzhi 
[\[115a.6\]]yod pas de ma spangs kyang lam du byed pa'i gnyen po bzhi yin pas rgyud sde bzhir nges pa'o/_/dang po ni 'dod chags can lha chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba kha cig ni/_'di skad du/_go haM bud med me yin te/_/de yi nye gnas thab khung yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon par zhen pa 
[\[115a.7\]]chos su smra zhing gtsang dme med par khyi dang phag pa'i brtul zhugs skyong ba dag yod de/_de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud gsungs te/_bde mchog las/_sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las/_/bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/_/zhes dang*/_gsang ba 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'dus pa las/_chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis/_/rtag tu 'dod yon rnam lnga bsten/_/zhes so/_/zhe sdang can khyab 'jug gi rjes su 'brang ba kha cig ni/_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed las/_bar gyi dus la bab pa na/_/byol song drug gam bdun sbyar bya/_/rta yi gtsang ma'i rigs 
[\[115b.2\]]yin no/_/nyung ba byol song gsum gyis so/_/zhes bya ba dang*/_rgyal rigs la ni rgyal rigs dang*/_/bram ze 'dod pas bram ze gsad/_/ma rungs dag la rje rigs te/_/dmangs rigs la ni dmangs rigs gsad/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba chos su smra ba 
[\[115b.3\]]dag yod de/_de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du spyod pa'i rgyud gsungs te/_khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/_bcom ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid ni/_/khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje'i gshed/_/de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan/_/thams cad kyis ni 
[\[115b.4\]]lag cha shor/_/zhes dang*/_de nas 'dir ni gsad bya ba/_/ji ltar yang dag sbyor ldan pas/_/dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gsod pa'i mchog ni bshad par bya/_/zhes dang*/_de nas gang gis langs pa las/_/mtshon cha rnon po 'bar ba yis/_/bsad 
[\[115b.5\]]pa'i sha dang khrag bcas pa'i/_/ar+g+ha de la dbul bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gti mug can tshangs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba kha cig ni/'di skad du/_'dag chal dag gis bgos pa'i gos/_/dri ma med par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/lus la mchod sbyin gyis bsgos pa/_/'bab stegs 
[\[115b.6\]]bkrus pa'ang de ltar 'dag_/ces bya ba la sogs pa gtsang sbra'i spyod pa chos su smra ba dag yod de/_de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du bya ba'i rgyud gsungs te/_legs par grub pa las/_khrus byas gtsang zhing gzung bya ste/_/bkra shis ngo mtshar dag byas nas/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni 
[\[115b.7\]]yongs su bzung*/_/zhes dang*/_dus su zos nas dus su khrus byas nas/_/phreng ba mar me bdug pa bstod dang dri/_/sha chang med pa'i lha bshos phul nas su/_/ku sha'i khres la 'dug la bzlas brjod brtsam/_/zhes so/_/rkyen mnyam pa skabs thob kyis gsum ka'i rjes su 'brang 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ba kha cig ni/_de dag las gang dang gang smra ba'i slob dpon dang phrad pa de dang de'i spyod pa'i rjes su skyong ba dag yod de/_de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs te/de nyid 'dus pa'i dum bu dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las ni 'dod chags can 
[\[116a.2\]]rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du lha thams cad chags pa'i nyams can dang*/_khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las ni zhe sdang can rjes su bzung ba'i phyir du khro bo'i nyams can dang*/_'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu las ni gti mug can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir du zhi ba'i nyams can dang*/_don 
[\[116a.3\]]thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las ni lha rnams kyi sku mdog dang nyams sna tshogs par gsungs so/_/'di ni de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/_slob dpon rab 'byor bskyangs dang kun dga' snying po la sogs pa rnams kyi bzhed pa yin no/_/gnyis pa ni/_sangs rgyas pa'i 
[\[116a.4\]]mtshan nyid theg pa la grub mtha' mi 'dra ba bzhi yod pa'i nyan thos gnas ma bu pa dang*/_nyi 'og bye brag tu smra ba dag ni brjod du med pa'i gang zag gi bdag khas len pa ltar/_de dang lung sgo bstun gyi dbang du byas na/_bya ba'i rgyud la bdag dang ras bris gnyis ka ma yin pa'i ye shes sems 
[\[116a.5\]]dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa yin no/_/yang nyan thos kha che bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa gnyis ni/_gang zag gi bdag khas len par mi 'dod kyang yul rdul phran dang 'dzin pa'i shes pa skad cig cha med kyi bden par khas len pa ltar/_spyod pa'i rgyud du bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' dang 
[\[116a.6\]]mdun du yang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis ka 'dod pa yin no/_/'phags pa rang sangs rgyas ni/_ji skad du/_gzung ba'i rtog pa spang phyir dang*/_/'dzin pa mi spang phyir na yang*/_/rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam/_/zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las 'byung ba ltar/_kun rdzob du gzung 
[\[116a.7\]]'dzin gnyis ka 'dod kyang don dam par gzung bar bya ba'i yul bden par mi 'dod la/_'dzin pa'i shes pa skad cig ma bden par khas len pa ltar/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpar bskyed pa la ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas slar yang de nyid gshegs su 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]gsol bar 'dod pa yin no/_/theg pa chen po sems tsam pa dang dbu ma pa ni kun rdzob tu gzung 'dzin gnyis ka 'dod la/_don dam par gzung 'dzin gnyis ka bden pa med par khas len pa ltar/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud la dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dbyer med du bsres nas/_
[\[116b.2\]]thun mtshams kyi gnas skabs su yang ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol bar mi 'dod pa ste/_de dag dang lung sgo bstun gyi dbang du byas na bskyed chog rnam pa bzhis rgyud sde bzhir bzhag pa ni ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas 'phags pa yab 
[\[116b.3\]]sras la sogs pa'i bzhed pa'o/_/gsum pa ni/_dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan las/_'di ni gnyis po 'khyud pa yis/_/rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin du ni lag bcang dang*/_/dgod dang bltas pas shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gzhan 
[\[116b.4\]]'phrul dbang byed pa bltas pa tsam gyi bde bas chags pa tshim la/_de tsam gyi bde ba gnang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud de/_bya ba'i rgyud rdo rje gtsug tor las/_dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad ni/_/dkar po'i rigs la rtag gnas shing*/_/pho ni mo la blta ba dang*/_/mo yang pho la blta ba bri/_/
[\[116b.5\]]zhes so/_/'phrul dga' ba ni dgod pa tsam gyi bde bas tshim la/_de tsam gyi bde ba gnang ba ni spyod pa'i rgyud de/_rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/_mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can/_/pho nya rnams kyis yongs su bskor/_/bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum pa bri/_/zhes 
[\[116b.6\]]so/_/dga' ldan pa dang 'phrul dga' ba ni lag bcang dang 'khyud pa tsam gyi bde bas tshim la/_de tsam gyi bde ba gnang ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/_dpal mchog dang po las/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams kun/_/dpung pa yid tsam bsdam par bzhag_/ces dang*/_rdo rje rtse mo las/_
[\[116b.7\]]de yi g.yon logs lha mo ni/_/'dzum bcas zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/_/kun du rnam par lta bas te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/_/zhes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang*/_rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang*/_mi'i 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams ni dbang po zung sbyor gyi bde bas tshim la/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]de tsam gyi bde ba gnang ba ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud de/_dgyes pa rdo rje las/_bol+la ka ko la sbyar bas/_/de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_'khor lo sdom pa las kyang*/_dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa las/_/snyoms par 'jug pa'ang de nyid 
[\[117a.2\]]'dzin/_/zhes so/_/'di dag ni grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha wi lha la sogs pas dges pa rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bzhed pa ste 'thad pa dang ldan pa'i lugs legs pa cig tu bzhed do/_/bzhi pa grangs dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]gnyis ka nges pa la/_gang zag dang*/_dbang dang*/_lam 
[\[117a.3\]]mo/_/dang po gang zag gis nges pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi gdul byar gyur pa'i gang zag bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig yod kyang phyogs ris su bsdu na/_dbang po dman pa dang*/_'bring dang*/_mchog dang*/_ches mchog tu gyur pa ste bzhi po 'dir 'du 
[\[117a.4\]]zhing*/_de dag rjes su gzung ba la dgongs nas rgyud sde rnam pa bzhi rim pa bzhin du bzhag ste/_de yang gang zag dman pa phyi lus ngag gi bya ba khrus dang gtsang sbra la dga' ba rnams la bya ba'i rgyud rnams gsungs te/_de ni legs par grub pa dang dpung bzang la sogs pa rnams so/_/
[\[117a.5\]]gang zag 'bring phyi lus ngag gi bya ba dang nang ting nge 'dzin cha mnyam du spyod pa rnams la spyod pa'i rgyud rnams gsungs te/_de ni rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la sogs pa'o/_/gang zag mchog ting nge 'dzin kho na gtso bor spyod pa rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams gsungs te/_de ni de kho 
[\[117a.6\]]na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'o/_/gang zag ches mchog tu gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gong na med pa spyod pa rnams la rnal 'byor chen po bla na med pa'i rgyud rnams gsungs pa yin te/_de la thabs kyi rgyud/_shes rab kyi rgyud/_thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud gsum las/_dang po ni gsang ba 
[\[117a.7\]]'dus pa la sogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni bde mchog nyung ngu'i rgyud la sogs pa dang*/_gsum pa ni kye rdo rje dang dus kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams so/_/de ltar yang rdo rje gur las/_dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/_/bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/_/sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog_/_rnal 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]'byor bla med de ltag la/_/zhes so/_/'di ni rgyud de nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dpal ldan bir+Wa pa dang*/_Dom+bi he ru ka rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'i bzhed pa'i lugs srol shin tu legs pa yin no/_/gnyis pa dbang gis nges pa ni/_lam 'dir 
[\[117b.2\]]'jug par byed pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo dbang bskur ba yang rnam pa bzhi yod pas/_de ston par byed pa'i phyir yang rgyud sde bzhir nges pa yin te/_ye shes thig le las/_chu dang de bzhin cod paN dbang*/_/bya ba'i rgyud la rab tu grags/_/rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming*/_/spyod pa'i rgyud la 
[\[117b.3\]]rab tu grags/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i slob dpon dbang*/_/rnal 'byor rgyud las bshad pa yin/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du ni/_/gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang*/_/shes rab ye shes chen po'o/_/zhes so/_/gsum pa lam gyis nges pa ni/_'dir zhugs pa'i gang zag rigs 
[\[117b.4\]]bzhi pos dbang bskur ba'i tshul rnam pa bzhi las/_gang dang gang thob pa de dang des lam gyi tshul rnam pa bzhi gang yin pa re nyams su blang dgos pas/_de ston par byed pa'i phyir yang rgyud sde bzhir nges pa yin te/_de yang bya ba'i rgyud du/_rje dpon gyi tshul du dngos grub len pa ste/_rje 
[\[117b.5\]]bo nyid du nye bar gnas/_/zhes so/_/spyod pa'i rgyud du grogs po'i tshul gyis te/_grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas/_/zhes so/_/rnal 'byor rgyud du ye shes 'byin 'jug gis tshul gyis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa dang sems can tshad med du bsgrubs nas slar gshegs 
[\[117b.6\]]su gsol bar bshad do/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gnyis su med pa ste/_mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/_/rgyal ba lngar ni rab tu grags/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa spro bar bya ba mang du yod do/_/lnga pa grangs nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi sgra don ni/_ci'i phyir bya ba'i rgyud ces bya zhe na/_
[\[117b.7\]]lus ngag gi bya ba gtso bor ston pa'i phyir na bya ba'i rgyud ces bya ste/_bsam gtan phyi ma'i 'grel pa las/_rgyud 'di ni phyi lus ngag gi bya ba gtso bor ston pas bya ba'i rgyud ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir spyod pa'i rgyud ces bya zhe na/_lus ngag gi bya ba dang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]cha mnyam par spyod pa'i phyir na spyod pa'i rgyud ces bya ste/_rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i don bsdus pa las/_rgyud 'di ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa la smad pa 'jig rten dang 'gal bar spyod pa gnyis ka la spyod pas spyod pa'i rgyud do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir 
[\[118a.2\]]ro/_/ci'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gtso bor byed pa'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya ste/_de kho na nyid snang ba'i don bsdus pa las/_rgyud 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gtso bor ston pas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud ces 
[\[118a.3\]]bya zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gong na med pa ston pa'i phyir na rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud ces bya ste/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las/_gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/_/snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/zhes dang*/_gsang ba 'dus pa las/_sku dang gsung dang thugs 
[\[118a.4\]]kyi mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang*/_/byang chub sems ni bla na med/_/snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/lnga pa bdag rkyen gyi sgo nas dbye ba la/_zhal nas gsungs pa dang*/_byin gyis brlab pa dang*/_rjes su gnang ba'i bka' 
[\[118a.5\]]ste gsum mo/_/dang po zhal nas gsungs pa ni 'phags pa sdud pa lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa byin gyis brlab pa ni/_sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas gsungs pa gsum ste/_dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdzad pa phyag la sogs pas byin gyis rlob pa ste 
[\[118a.6\]]sa bcu pa'i mdo lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa ni gsung gis byin gyis rlob pa ste/_ma skyes dgras 'gyod pa bsal ba'i mdo lta bu'o/_/gsum pa ni thugs kyis byin gyis rlob pa ste kun du bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa'i mdo lta bu'o/_/thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la'ang thugs ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis 
[\[118a.7\]]brlabs pa dang*/_thugs thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_thugs bden pa'i stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste gsum du 'gyed pa ltar na/_rim pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lta bu dang*/_gnod sbyin la sogs pas smras pa'i sngags bcom 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lta bu dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis 'od zer gyi rtse mo'am nam mkha' las chos kyi sgra 'byung ba lta bu rnams su bshad do/_/gsum pa rjes su gnang ba'i bka' ni/_thog mar gleng gzhi'i tshig dang*/_bar du mtshams sbyor gyi tshig dang*/_mthar 
[\[118b.2\]]mthun 'gyur gyi tshig dang*/_rjes su yi rang gi tshig rnams 'jug pa rjes su gnang ba ste/_snying rje chen po pad dkar las/_kun dga' bo de na dge slong de dag gis khyod la de skad dris pa dang 'di skad lung ston cig_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dang po 
[\[118b.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yul ma ga d+hA na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs zhes sogs nas/_don dang tshig dang yi ge gang dang gang dag gis rnam grangs gang dang gang gsungs pa de la khyod kyis gleng gzhi dang bcas pa dang*/_rgyu dang bcas pa dang*/_rkyen dang bcas pa dang*/_don 
[\[118b.4\]]bzang po dang*/_tshig 'bru bzang po rgyas par ston cig_mdo sde'i mjug tu'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bris shig_kun dga' bo chos kyi tshul 'di de ltar yang 
[\[118b.5\]]dag par bsdu bar bya'o zhes dang*/_chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_dge slong dag 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes gyis la chos bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel ba dang go rim kyang bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba lta bu'o/_/de rnams kyis gang bkral bar bya ba bka'i rnam par gzhag pa'i gleng ba 
[\[118b.6\]]re zhig bstan zin to/_/'dir smras pa/[ (*]yongs su brjes pa'i rgyan/[)]lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med pas sngon/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bgrang las 'das pa nas/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig phyir yang longs spyod dang*/_/lus srog dpag tu med pa btang nas bsgrubs pa'i chos/_/[(*]mi 'os pa'i don gzhan bkod pa/[)]gang dag phan pa'i dgongs pas legs par 
[\[118b.7\]]bslabs pa rnams/_/thos pa tsam yang rna bar tsher ma'i las 'gyur ba/_/ngan par 'gro ba'i 'bab stegs 'cha' la ring mo nas/_/goms pa'i bag chags mi dman ldan pa kun gyi gshis/_/[(]'gal ba'i gzugs can/[)]bcu gnyis khyim la longs su spyod pas 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]mi rgyu zhing*/_/rnam pa kun du kha lo 'dren pa 'theng ldan gyi/_/rjes su rgyug par mi byed chos kyi nyi ma 'dis/_/srid pa'i gdon chen gsum gyi gdung ba rab bsil byed/_/[*(]sgras zin pa mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can las gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa/[)]'bad rtsol mtshan ma'i kun du rtog pas rab tu dben/_/mngon 'dod ldan pa kun gyi re ba 
[\[119a.2\]]rdzogs byed kyang*/_/mchog gi 'dod pa ster ba med phyir nor bu'i rgyal/_/tog gi blo gros thub pa'i gsung las shin tu dman/_/[(*]spyi'i bsdus pa brjod pa/[)]nad chen gsod pa'i nus pa rmad byung a mr-i ta/_/su zhig bsten na 'chi med byed pa yod bzhin 
[\[119a.3\]]du/_/phan dang gnod pa'i mtha' gnyis dag tu ma lhung ba'i/_/'byor dgu gcig tu sbyar ba'i sman des ci zhig bya/_/[(*]mi 'os shing 'os pa'i don gzhan bkod pa/[)]blo ldan dam pa'i chos la gus pa lhod gyur na/_/rmongs chen skye bos ring du bskyur ba smos ci dgos/_/'tsho bar bcas la mi 'chi sgrub pa'i 
[\[119a.4\]]thabs dgos kyi/_/lus srog so sor dengs par gyur la de lta min/_/[(*]ngo mtshar phul byung*/[)]srid pa gsum gyi snying po phul du byung ba'i chos/_/nus mthu zad mi shes pas mngon par lci ba'i khur/_/phrag par 'dzin la nub pa med pa'i 'od srungs byin/_/yangs 
[\[119a.5\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni e ma shin tu sra/[(*]'bru mang po'i tshig sdus kyi dpe/[)]sbrang rtsis myos pa'i pa'i gdangs snyan tshig 'bru bzang po la/_/ro mchog mngar ba'i brjod bya rmad byung 'khyil pa can/_/dri med chu skyes 'dab ma yangs pa'i chos kyi tshul/_/'jig rten 'di na mi nub rtag par 
[\[119a.6\]]rgyal gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal 
[\[119a.7\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_bkral bya nges pa'i ched du dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i sarga ste gsum pa'o//_//_
[\[119b\]]
