[\[119b.2\]]@#/_/gang dag rkang pa bkod pas dub la bzhon pa bzang ldan gdungs rnams la/_/yid 'phrog lho yi dri khyer dal bu phongs pa'i lag par bum pa bzang*/_/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]@#/_/saMsArAnan+taMnakatsapatateHsAkarAlam+bashang+kaiH_trAsausaMyuk+taMsamudayahitaMdAnad+harmat+tamewaM/_
[\[120a.2\]]@#/_/lhung ba'i dogs bcas lag pa'i mchel pa mtha' bral 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang*/_/kun nas 'byung ba'i 'jigs dang ldan la chos ni mchog tu phan ster nyid/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\](*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]chos kyi chos mchog thub gsung mya ngan med/_/don bzang 'dab ma stong phrag rdzogs pa'i kha/_/zab yangs dkrugs pa pad+ma'i rgya nang du/_/chud pa'i ngo mtshar ltad mo lkog na mo/_/[(*]yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]dus der rgyal ba 'gro la phan pa'i las/_/lhun gyis grub pa las byung smra ba'i dbang*/_/rnam par 
[\[120b.2\]]'byed pa'i bu mo chos kun la/_/sbyangs pa'i mig yangs mang po 'jig rten byung*/_/[(*]cha shas kyi gzugs can/[)]de des bka' lung yangs pa sdud pa dang*/_/zab mo 'grel dang rim par bstar ba yi/_/'chad rtsom mkhas pa'i rkang rtsis bsnun pa'i tshe/_/tshig don dri med 'dab ma 
[\[120b.3\]]phyogs su grol/_/[(*]rigs rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]ye shes dag pa'i gter gyur thub pa dang*/_/dgongs pa gnyis su med par bkod pa'i chos/_/srid pa'i zug rngu kun gyi pha rol du/_/'dong bar zhi ba'i lam dang rjes su mthun/_/[(*]skyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu/[)]gang la dmigs pas 'khor ba'i nad chen gsum/_/zad par za ba'i las su 
[\[120b.4\]]mngon phyogs pa'i/_/bslab gsum dam pa'i 'byor par ldan pa'i lam/_/yang dag 'chos bar byed pa bstan pa'i chos/_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]gcig tu ngan par 'gro dang srid pa yi/_/tshor ba srin po khros pa'i so 'dra bas/_/btab pa kun las yong ye skyob pa'i mthu/_/
[\[120b.5\]]gang la rdzogs pa de yang lung gi chos/_/[(*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]sdug bsngal than pa skyed pa'i kun 'byung dus/_/gsod byed lam bden sprin gyi rlung yab kyis/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa bsil ba'i rlung 'jo ba/_/'khor lo dang po'i bka' don gsal bar byed/_/[(*]rab spel/[)]chos rnams sgyu ma'i dpe 'drar 
[\[120b.6\]]rang bzhin dang*/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i mtha' bral lung gi sgras/_/mtha' brgyad mal du yur ba slong ba'i chos/_/'khor lo bar ba'i bka' yang gsal bar byed/_/[(*]rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]yod dang med mtha' brtol pa nges pa'i lung*/_/kun brtag mtshan mas stong pa'i 
[\[120b.7\]]gzhan gyi dbang*/_/yongs grub rnam rig tsam du legs phye ba/_/'khor lo tha ma'i bka' don rnams kyang ngo*/_/[(*]de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/[)]mun pa chen po'i gshed du rgyu ba 'di/_/pad+ma'i gnyen gyi dpal dang rjes mthun yang*/_/sgrib pa'i dgra tshogs bcom las phyi rol du/_/phyogs 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]pa min phyir legs bshad snang ba'o/_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi zla ba dngos su zin pa'i bya ba/[)]stong gsum mi mjed yangs pa'i zong gis kyang*/_/legs par gdams pa'i tshig don cha re yang*/_/gzhal du med pa'i rin chen 'di thob pas/_/phal pa'i nor mchog de la rnam par 'phya/_/[(*]rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]mchog dang phal du 
[\[121a.2\]]gtogs pa'i shes bya ba/_/ji lta ji snyed yang dag 'doms pa'i gzhung*/_/lung dang rigs pa man ngag kun gyi ma/_/dgongs 'grel bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par gleng*/_/spyi don bzhi pa 'grel tshul nges pa'i ched du bstan bcos kyi 
[\[121a.3\]]rnam par gzhag pa la/_bstan bcos su gtogs pa spyir bshad pa/_de las mchog gi bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa'o/_/dang po bstan bcos su gtogs pa tsam la rnam par dbye na don med pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_don log pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_don dang ldan pa'i bstan 
[\[121a.4\]]bcos dang*/_ngan g.yo'i bstan bcos dang*/_brtse ba bral ba'i bstan bcos dang*/_sdug bsngal spong ba'i bstan bcos dang*/_thos pa lhur len pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_rtsod pa lhur len pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_sgrub pa lhur len pa'i bstan bcos te rnam pa dgur 'gyur te/_sa sde 
[\[121a.5\]]las/_don med don log don dang ldan/_/ngan g.yo brtse bral sdug bsngal spong*/_/thos rtsod sgrub pa lhur len pa/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/gnyis pa de las mchog gi bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa la/_bstan bcos rnam pa dgu po de dag las/_snga ma gnyis gnyis ni 
[\[121a.6\]]phal pa yin la/_phyi ma re re ni mchog ste/_ji skad du/_bstan bcos drug bral gsum du 'dod/_/ces so/_/de ltar phyi ma gsum po de dag gi rang bzhin nges par byed pa la/_bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid dang*/_nges pa'i tshig dang*/_rab tu dbye ba ste gsum mo/_/dang po mtshan nyid ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121a.7\]]pa'i bka' lung 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas te/_rtsom pa po rnam par g.yeng ba med cing blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag gis rjod par byed pa ngag don phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas thar pa thob par byed pa'i lam gyi chos dang rjes su mthun par legs par bshad pa ste/_'phags pa byams pas/gang 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]zhig rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'ba' zhig gi/_/dbang byas rnam g.yeng med yid can gyis bshad/_/thar pa thob pa'i lam dang rjes mthun pa/_/de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bos blangs/_/zhes so/_/gnyis pa nges pa'i tshig ni/_'chi ba med pa'i seng ges/_nirdi sha gran+tha yoHshAs+t+ra zhes 
[\[121b.2\]]bshad cing*/_de la shA sa na 'chos pa/_tra ya'am tA ra Na skyob pa/_de gnyis bsdus pa la shAs+t+ra zhes 'byung ste/_gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud nyon mongs pa dug gsum las bslab pa sum ldan du 'chos pa dang*/_ngan 'gro dang srid pa'i sdug bsngal las skyob pa'i phyir bstan bcos so/_/
[\[121b.3\]]de ltar yang rnam bshad rigs pa/_nyon mongs dgra rnams ma lus 'chos pa dang*/_/ngan 'gro'i srid las skyob pa gang yin pa/_/'chos skyob yon tan phyir na bstan bcos te/_/gnyis po 'di dag gzhan gyi lugs la med/_/ces so/_/des na 'chos pa dang skyob par byed pa'i 
[\[121b.4\]]yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' la'ang bshad du yod de/_de nyid las/_de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi gsung kho na don dam par bstan bcos yin pas 'chos pa dang skyob pa'i yon tan gyi phyir yang don du bzung ba la 'bad pa dang ldan par bya'o 
[\[121b.5\]]zhes gsungs so/_/gsum pa rab tu dbye ba ni/_byed pa las kyi sgo nas dbye ba/_brjod bya don gyi sgo nas dbye ba/_bshad bya bka'i sgo nas dbye ba ste gsum mo/_/dang po byed pa las kyi sgo nas dbye ba la'ang*/_bka' rgya chen po sdud pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_zab mo rnam par 
[\[121b.6\]]'byed pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_'khrugs pa [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]bsdebs pa'i bstan bcos dang gsum ste/_de dag dper mtshon na dang po ni 'dul ba mdo rtsa'am theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan nam dbu ma rtsa ba'i shes rab lta bu'o/_/gsum pa 
[\[121b.7\]]ni bslab pa kun las btus pa'am mdo sde rgyan nam skyes pa'i rabs lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa brjod bya bka'i sgo nas dbye ba la gsum las/_shes bya ji lta ba ston pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_ji snyed pa ston pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ston pa'i 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bstan bcos te gsum mo/_/dang po la'ang phal pa dang khyad par ba gnyis las/_dang po ni 'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab brgya pa dang*/_skye bo gso ba'i thigs pa dang*/tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod dang*/_tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i lugs kyi 
[\[122a.2\]]bstan bcos la sogs pa rnams te/_de dag bstan bcos phal pa mdzad pa'i rgyu mtshan yang*/_gtso bor mngon mtho 'thob byed kyi rgyu yin zhing*/_thar pa'i rten du 'gro ba yang srid de/_shes rab brgya pa las/_mi yi chos lugs legs spyad na/_/lha yul bgrod par thag 
[\[122a.3\]]mi ring*/_/lha dang mi yi them skas la/_/'dzegs na thar pa gam na 'dug_/ces dang*/_'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/_/chen po gang na yod gyur kyang*/_/de ni bskal pa stong du yang*/_/ngan 'gror 'gro ba mi srid do/_/zhes pas so/_/gnyis pa ni/_gtso bor brjod par bya ba 
[\[122a.4\]]rig pa'i gnas lnga ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams te/_'di dag ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa ji lta ba ston pa'i bstan bcos ni/bden pa rnam pa bzhi'am rnam pa bcu drug tu ston pa'am/_gzung 'dzin gnyis su med pa'i don ston pa dang*/_
[\[122a.5\]]rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i don ston pa ste/_dper na bden pa rnam par nges pa'am dbu ma rgyan la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/gsum pa thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ston pa'i bstan bcos ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[122a.6\]]la 'jug pa la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/de la kha cig de dag phyogs re tsam ston pa'i bstan bcos nyid yin pas na/_rab tu byed pa yin la/_'dir ni ma lus pa ston pa'i bstan bcos chen po kun las btus pa'am mngon pa mdzod lta bu'o zhes kyang 'dod do/_/gnyis pa bshad bya bka'i sgo nas 
[\[122a.7\]]dbye ba la/_spyir bshad pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po ni bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba la ches spro bar gyur pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i gnas kyi gtso bo ni rig pa'i 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gnas rnam pa lnga'am/_rig pa'i gnas bcur grags pa'i bstan bcos rnams te/_ji skad du mdo sde rgyan las/_rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la brtson par ma byas na/_/'phags pa'i dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ga la thob/_/ces gsungs shing*/_de'i 'grel bshad las/_rig 
[\[122b.2\]]pa'i gnas ni lnga ste nang rig pa dang*/_rgyu rig pa dang*/_sgra rig pa dang*/_gso ba rig pa dang*/_bzo'i las kyi gnas rig pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la mkhas pa ni nang rig pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i tshad mas zin pa'i 
[\[122b.3\]]tarka'i gzhung la mkhas pa ni rgyu rig pa zhes bya'o/_/sgra'i gtsug lag byA ka ra Na la mkhas pa ni sgra rig pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan la sogs pa nad gso ba'i gtsug lag la mkhas pa ni gso ba rig pa zhes bya'o/_/glu dang gar dang spos la sogs pa'i gtsug lag la mkhas pa ni 
[\[122b.4\]]bzo'i las kyi gnas rig pa zhes bya'o/_/rig pa'i gnas lnga po de dag la nyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas shes pa dang rtogs par ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ga la thob ste/_de bas na bye brag med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[122b.5\]]thob par bya ba'i phyir rig pa'i gnas lnga la brtson par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la 'phags pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag las mchog tu gyur pas 'phags pa dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/ji ltar yod pa ma lus pa dang phyin ci ma log par shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[122b.6\]]zhes bya'o zhes bshad pa dang*/_sa skya paN+Di tas kyang*/_mkhas gang shes bya'i de kho na/_/ji bzhin rtogs pa yin par 'dod/_/bye brag sbyangs pa'i don shes pa/_/de yang de la mkhas pa yin/_/de yul brda sprod rtog ge dang*/_/gso ba phyi nang rig ces gsungs/_/gzhan las 
[\[122b.7\]]gzhan dag rnam bshad pa/_/'di yi nang du 'dus shes bya/_/zhes te/_de yang mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni gang yin zhe na/_shes bya thams cad phyin ci ma log par shes pa yin la/_gzhan yang bye brag tu gang bslab pa shes pa de la'ang de nyid la mkhas pa zhes bya zhing*/_des bslab par bya ba'i 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]yul ni rig pa'i gnas lnga ste/_brda sprod pa sgra dang*/_rtog ge ste tshad ma dang*/_phyi rol rig pa bzo dang*/nang rig pa lung gi chos dang*/_gso ba rig pa sman dpyad rnams la bshad do/_/gzhan yang rig pa'i gnas chung ba lnga dang*/_mdo las rig pa'i 
[\[123a.2\]]gnas bco brgyad du gsungs pa rnams kyang rig pa'i gnas chen po lnga po dag tu 'du zhes pa'i don to/_/de bas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas thob pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes bya thams cad la shin tu mkhas par bya dgos so zhes pa'i don to/_/de'ang 
[\[123a.3\]]gang gi phyir zhe na/_rgyan las/_snga ma de'i rjes thogs su/_/de ltar gzhan dag tshar bcad pa dang rjes gzung phyir/_/bdag nyid shes bya'i phyir na de la der brtson byed/_/ces dang*/_de'i 'grel bshad las kyang*/_bye brag tu rgyu rig pa dang sgra rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed do/_/
[\[123a.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_mu stegs rgyu rig pa'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa dang*/_sgra rig pa'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa de dag tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/gso ba rig pa dang bzo'i las kyi gnas rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_nad 
[\[123a.5\]]kyi btab pa'i nad zhi bar 'dod pa rnams dang bzo slob par 'dod cing longs spyod 'dod pa rnams rjes su gzung zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/nang rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag nyid 'phags pa'i lam de kho na nyid kyi 
[\[123a.6\]]mtshan nyid gang yin pa phyin ci ma log par shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do zhes so/_/gnyis pa so sor bshad pa la/_gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i rig pa'i gtsug lag gnyis las/_dang po bzo rig pa la/_der 'jug pa'i dgos pa dang*/_de ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi rang 
[\[123a.7\]]bzhin bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas skabs su phan bde 'byung ba'i rtsa lag tu gyur pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi rig pa la mkhas pa'i go sar dbang ba dang*/_sha thang ba med par longs spyod kyi 'byor pa dang ldan par bya ba _
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]dang*/_'jig rten pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya ba dang*/_longs spyod kyi sgo nas gzhan la phan gdags par bya ba dang*/_mthar thug thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzugs kyi sku mtshan bzang po dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa 'grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang*/_de nyid mngon du gyur nas kyang de bzhin 
[\[123b.2\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs dang gzugs brnyan nas sprul pa tha ma'i bar gyi rnam pas sems can kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dam pas yid yongs su drangs nas rig pa'i tshul 'di la 'jug par rigs te/_mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad las/_bzo'i gnas kyi rig pa byang chub 
[\[123b.3\]]sems dpa' 'tshol bar byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshegs chung ngus sha thang ba med par longs spyod bsgrub par bya ba dang*/_longs spyod dang ldan zhing bzo'i gnas la mkhas pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya ba dang*/_longs spyod kyi sgo nas 'jig rten pa rnams la phan par bya 
[\[123b.4\]]ba'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes dang*/bsod nams kyi stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa las/_de bas na bzo 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su sman pa yin te/_bzo bo ni rigs dman par skyes su zin yang rgyal po rnams dang*/_blon po rnams dang*/_bram ze dang*/_khyim bdag 
[\[123b.5\]]rnams kyis gdon mi za bar bkur ro/_/sna tshogs las can lha rnams dang*/_/mi rnams kyis kyang legs par bkur/_/de bzhin ma rabs bzo yi phyir/_/mi dang lha rnams kyis kyang bkur/_/zhes dang*/_mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal bar/_bi shwa karma sna 
[\[123b.6\]]tshogs byed/_/las bzang can dang lha'i bzo bo/_/zhes pas bstan pa'i lha'i bzo bo bi shwa karma lta bu ni lha'i dbang po la sogs pa 'jig rten na che bar rlom pas kyang bkur zhing bsngags pa'i gnas su gyur pa'ang bzo'i gnas la mkhas pa kho na'i phyir te/_gdags pa'i bstan bcos las/_
[\[123b.7\]]'khor lo rin po che ga las 'ongs she na/_gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa la bsgo ba/_las thams cad pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba shes par gyis la/_de'i phyir 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]lha'i 'khor lo rin po che mngon par sprul par gyis shig_de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/_lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang bcas pa/_mu khyud dang bcas pa/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[124a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_dag pa/_bzang ba/_lha rdzas ril gyis gser las mngon par grub pa zhes 'khor lo rin po che lha'i bzo bos sprul dgos par bshad cing*/_rig byed pa'i gtam rgyud las kyang*/_sngon gyi dus su lha'i bu nyi mas/_las thams cad pa'i bu mo ne ru ka 
[\[124a.3\]]chung mar blangs pas nyi ma'i 'od zer che ba la ma bzod nas pha'i khyim du bros so/_/de'i tshe pha ma dag gis 'thabs pa skyo bar gyur te/_ri bo ti se na rta rgod ma'i gzugs kyis dka' thub byed cing yibs so/_/de'i tshe las thams cad pas nyi ma dum bu bcu gnyis su byas shing long mo 
[\[124a.4\]]yan chad brdar te gzugs yid du 'ong bar byas pas de phyin chad lta na sdug ces bya'o zhes 'byung ba ltar bzo rig pa ni 'jig rten thams cad du phan 'dogs rgya chen po 'byung ba'i gzhi ma nyid du bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang sngon gyi chos rgyal mya ngan med pa la sogs pa'ang bcom ldan 
[\[124a.5\]]'das kyis lung bstan pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa dang*/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rwa ba brtsigs pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas ston pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dkar po'i rgyun mi nub pa skyong ba'i rtsa lag tu 'gyur ba la dgongs nas lung bstan par bshad pa'i phyir dang*/_
[\[124a.6\]]khyad par mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/_chu bo chen po bzhi rgya mtshor bab/_'bab/_gzhol ba de bzhin du chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa la bab/_'bab/_gzhol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa de la dbye na gtso bo dang*/_phal pa gnyis so/_/de'i dang po 
[\[124a.7\]]la'ang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum las/_dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad bshad pa nas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad bshad pa'i bar te/_mdor bsdu na ngag dbang lha mos rjes su bzung ba'i dpal ldan blo gros bzang pos sku 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]gzugs kyi cha tshad bshad pa las/_rgyal ba'i sku gzugs thal mo bcu pa dang*/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi mtho bcu zhan pa dang*/_/rgyal yum sogs kyi zhal tshad dgu pa dang*/_/rgyal dbang khros pa rnams kyi gdong brgyad dang*/_/mi'u thung gi lus tshad mtho drug pa/_/zhes gsungs te/_
[\[124b.2\]]de yang gang la brten snyam na/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/_rgyal ba'i bdag po gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa'i nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur/_/de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no/_/zhabs kyi mthil 
[\[124b.3\]]dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyi ste/_/brang phyed phyed bcas nyi ma'i rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad/_/rig byed phye dang bcas 
[\[124b.4\]]pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyi/_/gtsug tor mtho ba'i 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni/_/shangs kyi 'og tu kos ko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus/_/
[\[124b.5\]]de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyi rim pas so/_/gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yi ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid/_/ces pas sku gzugs mtho bcu par byas pa'i sor mo brgya nyer lnga pa'i tshad dang*/_bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba'i 
[\[124b.6\]]rgyud las/_mthil lam thal mo bcu gcig gis/_/lha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya/_/zhes dang*/_zab mo rdo rje can gyi lha/_/cha ni bcu gnyis mtshan nyid do/_/zhes pas sor mo brgya nyi shu pa'i tshad bstan cing*/_bslab btus su/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang 
[\[124b.7\]]sor bcu gnyis pa'i mtho bcu pa nyid do zhes dang*/_sdom 'byung gi rgyud 'grel rnams las byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad bstan pa dang*/_gzhan yang sdom 'byung las/_yid du 'ong ba'i rang gzugs ni/_/cha dgu par ni mngon par bri/_/zhes pas rgyal yum rnams 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kyi tshad dang*/_khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/_/bran pho bran mo ci bgyi ma/_/drag cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs rnams ni/_/thal mo brgyad pa rnam par bri/_/zhes dang*/_gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rim par phye ba bcu bzhi bar/_/khro bo sbom la thung bar bshad/_/ces sogs kyi 
[\[125a.2\]]khro bo mtho brgyad pa'i tshad dang*/_bya ba btus par sgra gcan dang mi'u thung dang tshogs kyi bdag po rnams ni mtho lnga bya'o/_/mi'u thung gi lus byings po sku'i tshad bshad pa rnams so/_/de dag gi nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_longs spyod rdzogs pa dang*/_sprul pa'i sku'i 
[\[125a.3\]]bdag nyid can rnams ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa'i sku ste/_rgyud bla mar/_mthong na tshim byed yon tan gang*/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba/_/sprul pa chos la rdzogs par ni/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku gnyis la brten/_/
[\[125a.4\]]zhes dang*/_mngon rtogs rgyan las/_mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_/dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di/_/theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/_/thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/_/ces so/_/de lta bu'i gzugs kyi sku rnam pa gnyis kyi gzugs brnyan 
[\[125a.5\]]mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bsgrub pa la/_nye bar mkho ba'i mtshan dang dpe byad bshad pa rgyal tshab byams pa'i bstan bcos las 'byung ba ni/_phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs/_/zhes bya ba nas/_spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi_/'dra ba 'di dang sum 
[\[125a.6\]]cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba'i don ni/_snang ba'i rgyan du/_bla ma rnams la skyel ba dang bsu ba la sogs pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang*/_sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa brten pa nyid kyis rus sbal bzhin du zhabs shin tu gnas pa 
[\[125a.7\]]nyid dang*/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsten pas phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur drwa bas 'brel ba nyid dang*/_bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa gya nom pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid dang*/_bldag pa la sogs pa shin tu gya nom pa byin pas 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]phyag dang zhabs dang phrag pa dang ltag pa'i phyogs mtho ba'i phyir bdun mtho ba nyid dang*/_gsad par bya ba las thar bar byas pas sor mo ring ba nyid dang*/_'tsho ba la phan gdags pa nyid kyis rting pa yangs pa nyid dang*/_srog gcod pa spangs pas sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang*/_
[\[125b.2\]]dge ba'i chos yang dag par spangs pas zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid dang*/_dge ba yang dag par blangs pa spel bas sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang*/_rig pa dang bzo la sogs pa gus par byas te byin pas byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang*/_nor bdog pa slong ba 
[\[125b.3\]]po'i skye bo phyir ma spangs pas phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang*/_skye bo thams cad tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par len du 'jug cing gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs pas 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid dang*/_gding ba gya nom pa byin pas mdog gser 'dra ba nyid dang*/_khang 
[\[125b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa dam pa byin pas pags pa 'jam pa nyid dang*/_'du 'dzi la sogs pa yongs su spangs pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang*/_skye bo bla ma thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa nyid dang*/_rnam 
[\[125b.5\]]pa thams cad du kha drag gi tshig gis khyad du ma bsad pas ro stod seng ge 'dra ba nyid dang*/_snyan par smra ba dang legs par smra ba'i rjes su mthun par byas pas dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid dang*/_sman la sogs pa byin pas phrag pa rgyas pa nyid dang*/_skye bo nad pa'i 
[\[125b.6\]]g.yog byas pas ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa nyid dang*/_nags tshal dang kun dga'i rwa ba la sogs pa byed pa yang dag par len du bcug pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang*/_gtsug lag khang la sogs pa lhag par byin pas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang*/_
[\[125b.7\]]'jam po la sogs pa gsungs pas ljags ring ba nyid dang*/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can la dam pa'i chos go bar byas pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang*/_tshig 'khyal pa spangs pas 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang*/_skye bo thams cad bkur ba la 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]sogs pas tshems dkar ba nyid dang*/_'tsho ba rnam par dag pa nyid kyis tshems mnyam pa nyid dang*/_bden pa'i tshig kun du spyad pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang*/_phra ma'i tshig spangs pas tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba nyid dang*/_sems 
[\[126a.2\]]can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar bltas pas spyan mthon mthing nyid dang*/_khong khro ba la sogs pa med par bltas pas rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do zhes 'byung ngo*/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yang*/_/thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang*/_/zhes bya ba nas/_g.yung 
[\[126a.3\]]drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste/_/sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed/_/ces bya ba'i bar du 'byung ste/_de'i don ni/_gong ma'i rjes thogs su 'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyis sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu nyid dang*/_sems can 
[\[126a.4\]]thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis sen mo'i mdog snum pa nyid dang*/_rigs kyi mchog spel bas sen mo mtho ba nyid dang*/_tshul kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams zlum pa nyid dang*/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams rgyas pa 
[\[126a.5\]]nyid dang*/_yang dag par mthar gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba nyid dang*/_lus la sogs pa'i las dang 'tsho ba rab tu bsrungs pa nyid kyis rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang*/_nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa bkrol ba nyid kyis rtsa mdud pa med pa nyid dang*/_shin tu 
[\[126a.6\]]sbas pa'i chos kyi blo gros can nyid kyis long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang*/_bgrod par dka' ba'i gnas thams cad la skye bo sgrol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang*/_mi zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa nyid kyis seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang*/_klu 
[\[126a.7\]]zil gyis mnan pa la mkhas pa nyid kyis glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang*/_nam mkha' la gshegs par mkhas pa nyid kyis ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang*/_skyes bu khyu mchog tu mkhas pa nyid kyis khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang*/_skor 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa nyid kyis g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang*/_mdzes par mkhas pa nyid kyis mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang*/_rtag tu sems gya gyu mi mnga' ba nyid kyis ma yo bar gshegs pa nyid dang*/_yon tan yang dag par brjod pa mdzad 
[\[126b.2\]]pa nyid kyis sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang*/_sdig pa'i chos dang ma 'bags pa nyid kyis sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid dang*/_gdul bya dang 'tsham pa'i chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang*/_sku la sogs pa'i kun du spyod pa gtsang ba'i phyir rnam par 
[\[126b.3\]]dag pa nyid dang*/_thugs thugs rje can gyi phyir sku 'jam pa nyid dang*/_thugs rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang*/_chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir mtshan rdzogs pa nyid dang*/_yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir sku'i kho lag yangs shing bzang ba nyid dang*/_
[\[126b.4\]]thams cad la thugs snyoms pa'i phyir goms pa snyoms pa nyid dang*/_rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang*/_chos go sla ba ston pa'i phyir sku gzhon sha can nyid dang*/_thugs rtag tu ma zhum pa'i phyir sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang*/_dge ba'i 
[\[126b.5\]]rtsa ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i phyir sku rgyas pa nyid dang*/_yang srid pa zad pa nyid kyis sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang*/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams shin tu rnam par phye ba ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa nyid dang*/_tshig gi 
[\[126b.6\]]don shin tu rnam par dag pa ston pas rab tu gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa nyid dang*/_slob ma tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa nyid du gyur pa nyid kyis dku zlum pa nyid dang*/_'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma sbags pa nyid kyis dku skabs phyed pa nyid dang*/_nga rgyal 
[\[126b.7\]]gyi 'gying pa ma bcom pa nyid kyis dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang*/_chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa nyid kyis phyal phyang nge ba nyid dang*/_chos zab mo rtogs pa nyid kyis lte ba zab pa nyid dang*/_slob ma mthun pa zab pa nyid kyis lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang*/_'khor kun 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]nas mdzes par 'gyur ba nyid kyis kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang*/_thugs gtsang ba nyid kyis kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang*/_dus ma yin pa'i chos 'dul ba dang bral ba nyid kyis sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa nyid dang*/_lus la sogs bzo mdog 
[\[127a.2\]]bde ba 'thob pa'i chos ston par byed pa nyid kyis phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang*/_mdangs yod pa'i dge sbyong chen po rnyed pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang*/_chos zab mo la gnas pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang*/_phyis rjes su yang dag par 
[\[127a.3\]]yongs su dag pa'i chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang*/_bslab pa rab tu mang po kun ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis zhal ha cang mi ring pa nyid dang*/_'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rtogs pa nyid kyis mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba nyid dang*/_
[\[127a.4\]]tshig 'jam pos 'dul ba nyid kyis ljags mnyen pa nyid dang*/_yon tan 'thad pa mnga' ba nyid kyis ljags srab pa nyid dang*/_chos 'dul ba byis pa'i skye bo chags pa can gyis gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyis ljags dmar ba nyid dang*/_bsnyengs pa thams cad mi mnga' ba nyid kyis 
[\[127a.5\]]'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid dang*/_snyan pa la sogs par gsungs pa nyid kyis gsung snyan zhing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang*/_srid par kun du sbyor ba bsdoms pa nyid kyis mche ba zlum pa nyid dang*/_skye bo gdul bar dka' ba 'dul ba nyid kyis mche ba rno ba nyid dang*/_chos 
[\[127a.6\]]'dul ba shin tu dkar ba nyid kyis mche ba dkar ba nyid dang*/_mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa nyid kyis mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang*/_mthar gyis mngon par rtogs pa yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang*/_shes rab mchog la gnas pa 
[\[127a.7\]]nyid kyis shangs mtho ba nyid dang*/_skye bo gtsang ma phun sam tshogs pa nyid kyis shangs gtsang ba nyid dang*/_chos shin tu rgyas pa nyid kyis spyan yangs pa nyid dang*/_sems can gyi tshogs drangs pa nyid kyis rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang*/_'gro ba gzhon nu ma thams cad mngon par 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]mgu ba nyid kyis spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu nyid dang*/_rtag tu phyis rjes su gzigs pa nyid kyis smin tshugs ring ba nyid dang*/_chos 'dul ba 'jam po la mkhas pa nyid kyis smin ma 'jam pa nyid dang*/_thugs kyi rgyud dag pas brlan pa nyid 
[\[127b.2\]]kyis smin ma snum pa nyid dang*/_kun du skyon gzigs pa nyid kyis smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang*/_mchog tu gnod pa bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang*/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba nyid kyis snyan mnyam pa nyid dang*/_
[\[127b.3\]]sems can gyi rgyud ma nyams par mdzad pa nyid kyis snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang*/_lta bas byas pa thams cad kyis gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang*/_smra ba thams cad kyi thog mar gyur pa nyid kyis 'phral ba dbyes che ba nyid dang*/_smon 
[\[127b.4\]]lam gyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid dang*/_yul gyi dga' ba rjes su bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang*/_mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal spangs pa nyid kyis dbu skra stug pa nyid dang*/_bstan 
[\[127b.5\]]pa blo 'jam pos yongs su shes pa nyid kyis dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang*/_thugs 'dod chags la sogs pas ma 'khrugs pa nyid kyis dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang*/_rtag tu tshig mi rtsub pa nyid kyis dbu skra me bshor ba nyid dang*/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog bkram pa nyid kyis 
[\[127b.6\]]dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang*/_rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis pa dang g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa nyid yin no zhes 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs sku'i yon tan yin pas de dag dang ldan pa'i sku'i cha tshad de dag gi 
[\[127b.7\]]mtshan nyid ston pa'i bstan bcos ni gong du smos pa'i rgyud 'grel de dag rnams dang*/_drang srong e dra ya'i bus byas pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa rnams so/_/gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi rten lung gi chos kyi phung po ste/_de la chos kyi phung po'i tshad bstan pa 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]dang*/_de nyid 'grub pa'i rgyu bstan pa'o/_/dang po chos kyi phung po nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i tshad ni/_bdag cag gi ston pa shAkya'i rgyal pos gdul bya mtha' yas pa'i don du legs par gdams pa'i gzhung gi tshad la yang dag par na tshad dang mur 
[\[128a.2\]]thug pa med na'ang*/_gdul bya so sos dbang po'i rim pa dang 'tsham par bzung ba'i gsung rab rin po che'i tshad la 'dod pa tha dad pa dag yod de/_'di ltar bstan pa'i gzhir gyur pa theg pa dman pa'i lugs kyi 'dod pa ltar na/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs par 
[\[128a.3\]]spyod pa nang gses kyi sgo nas rnam par dbye ba brgyad khri ste/_de dag las gang yang rung ba re'i gnyen po ma tshang ba med par ston pa'i gtam rdzogs pa re la lung gi chos kyi phung po'i tshad du 'dod de/_mngon pa mdzod las/_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag_/gang rnams thub pas 
[\[128a.4\]]gsungs de dag_/ces dang*/_kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer/_/phung po la sogs gtam re yin/_/spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni/_/chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/_/zhes so/_/de lta bu'i chos kyi phung po re re'i 'jal byed kyi tshad ni ci tsam la 'jog pa 
[\[128a.5\]]yin snyam na/_mngon pa sde bdun gyi ya gyal chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba shA ri'i bus bsdus par 'dod pa'i gzhung gang la sh+lau ka stong phrag drug tu longs pa de nyid chos kyi phung po gcig gi tshad du byas nas/_de nyid kyi zlas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi phung po brgyad khri nyid du yod par 'dod do/_/
[\[128a.6\]]theg pa thun mong ba ltar na/_dbu ma pa chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis/_ma lus pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/_de la chos phung gcig gi tshad ni ji tsam zhe na/_de gcig la ni tshig le'ur byas pa stong nyid do/_/tshigs su bcad pa re la'ang yig 'bru 
[\[128a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid do/_/de ltar na phung po thams cad tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag brgyad dang*/_yang 'bum phrag bzhi bcur 'gyur bar bshad do/_/theg pa chen po ltar na glang po che rab brtan zhes bya ba lus kyi tshad ni mtha' skor la dpag tshad bdun yod pa zhig ste/_
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]de'i khur du bkur bar 'os pa'i snag tsha las bris pa ji tsam yod pa de tsam la chos kyi phung po gcig gi tshad du mngon par 'dod de/_de nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa tshig gsal las/_theg pa bla na med pa'i dbang du byas te/_dbang po'i glang po che rab brtan gyis 
[\[128b.2\]]'khur bar 'os pa'i snag tshas ni chos kyi phung po gcig 'dri bar nus so zhes gsungs te/_de ltar byas na mdo gang dag las/_'phags pa lhas byin gyis glang po che lnga stong gis 'khur bar bya ba'i glegs bam rnams kha don du rjod par byed do zhes gsungs pa 'di'ang rigs par 'gyur 
[\[128b.3\]]ro/_/chos kyi phung po de snyed yod pa nyid na/_ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling na rab tu mi snang zhe na/_kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rnam par spyod cing gzhan yang phal cher klu rnams kyi gnas na spyod pa ste zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na de dag phal che ba'i 
[\[128b.4\]]dgongs pa mthun par chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong du bzhed do/_/rgyud sde'i tshad ni/_rtog pa'i rgyud dang*/_bya ba'i rgyud dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud dang*/gnyis ka'i rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams kyi ming la rim pa bzhin du stong phrag bzhi dang*/_bzhi dang*/_brgyad dang*/_
[\[128b.5\]]drug dang*/_stong phrag bcu gnyis rnams su ste sum khri bzhi stong du yod par ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las bshad cing*/_rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi grangs ni der ma gsungs so/_/yang bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud las/_rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi ni tshad/_/bye ba 
[\[128b.6\]]phrag ni drug tu nges/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor ma rgyud grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu drug grangs/_/de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/sa ya dang ni dung phyur lnga/_/theg chen las gzhan mdo sde rnams/_/dung phyur phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin/_/zhes so/_/'di dag 
[\[128b.7\]]kyang tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs su blta bar bya ba ni ma yin te/_mdo rgyud tha dad pa'i ming gi grangs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/bya ba'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhir yod par gsungs pa la/_don yod zhags pa'i mdo kho na la'ang stong phrag brgyad yod pa dang*/_de bzhin 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]du de nyid 'dus pa stong phrag brgya pa dang*/_dgyes pa rdo rje 'bum phrag bdun pa dang*/_'bum phrag lnga pa dang*/_sangs rgyas mnyam par sbyor ba khri brgyad stong yod pa lta bu ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs re re la yang tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs mang po yod pa 
[\[129a.2\]]nyid du grub pa'i phyir rgyud sde'i grangs ni dpag tu med do zhes slob dpon bsod nams rtse mos gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i lung gi chos de dag mdo rgyud tha dad pa nas bshad pa'i gzhi ma gang yang rung ba dag la yi ger bris nas glegs bam du byas pa'i ming la legs par sbyar ba'i skad 
[\[129a.3\]]du pusta kaHzhes bya ste/_de dag ni gsung gi rten no/_/gnyis pa de nyid 'grub par byed pa'i rgyu ni yi ge ste/_de la yi ge'i ngo bo dang*/_nges pa'i tshig dang*/_dbyibs sam rnam pa ste gsum las/_dang po ni/_brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis rlung g.yos pas de'i skye ba'i 
[\[129a.4\]]gnas dang byed pa lhan cig phrad pa de las yi ge'i gdangs 'ba' zhig 'byung ste/_de'ang dbyangs dang gsal byed dag go/_/de skad du'ang rnam 'grel las/_yi ge kun slong shes pa las/_/skye la shes pas sgra skye'o/_/zhes dang*/_slob dpon chos mchog gis/_ngag 
[\[129a.5\]]gi don snang ba'i sems pa las sgra skye la/_de las gnas dang byed pa phrad cing de las sgra skye'o zhes dang*/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis yi ge'i mdor/_gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams las yi ge rnams skye'o zhes dang*/_dpang lo chen pos kyang*/_brjod 'dod dbang 
[\[129a.6\]]gis rlung g.yos shing*/_/de yi gnas dang byed pa dang*/_/lhan cig yi ge'i gdangs rnams skye/_/zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad du ak+Sha ra zhes 'byung ba ni mi 'gyur ba'i don te/_yul gyi bye brag tha dad par gyur kyang dbyangs dang gsal byed 
[\[129a.7\]]rnams ni gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/yang byany+dza na zhes pa ni gsal byed de/_de'ang brjod bya'i don gang yin pa de yi ge 'dus pa brjod pa las gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na war+NaN zhes nus pa dang ldan pas te/_brjod bya'i don thams cad rjod par byed pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]nus pa mtha' dag 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir ro/_/de skad du yang*/_mi 'gyur ba dang gsal byed dang*/_/rjod par byed pa'i nus ldan phyir/_/yi ge zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/zhes so/_/gsum pa ni mdo rgya cher rol pa las bshad pa'i tshangs pa'i yi ge la sogs pa'i yig rigs 
[\[129b.2\]]drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/_de yang mdo de nyid las/_tshangs pa'i yi ge dang*/_kha roSh+Ti'i yi ge dang*/_pad+ma'i snying po'i yi ge dang*/_ang+ga'i yi ge dang*/_mang+ga'i yi ge dang*/_yul ma ga d+hA'i yi ge dang*/_bkra shis pa'i yi ge dang*/_sor mo pa'i yi ge dang*/_sha ka na'i yi ge dang*/_

[\[129b.5\]]ge dang*/_lto 'phye chen po'i yi ge dang*/_lha ma yin gyi yi ge dang*/_nam mkha' lding gi yi ge dang*/_ri dwags kyi 'khor lo pa'i yi ge dang*/_khwa skad shes pa'i yi ge dang*/_sa bla'i lha'i yi ge dang*/_bar snang gi lha'i yi ge dang*/_nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi yi ge dang*/_
[\[129b.6\]]byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi ge dang*/_shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge dang*/_gdeg pa'i yi ge dang*/_gzhag pa'i yi ge dang*/_bsnan pa'i yi ge dang*/_rgya mtsho'i yi ge dang*/_rdo rje'i yi ge dang*/spring yig dang*/_lan gyi yi ge dang*/_rnam 'thor gyi yi ge dang*/[ {]rings [,]ring [}]

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]bcur brgyud pa'i yi ge dang*/_bla thabs su bsnan pa'i yi ge dang*/_sgra thams cad kun du sdud pa'i yi ge dang*/_rig pa dang mthun pa'i yi ge dang*/_rnam par 'dres pa'i yi ge dang*/_drang srong gi dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge dang*/_lha'i nges pa'i yi ge dang*/_

[\[130a.3\]]tu bod gangs can gyi ljongs 'dir yongs su dar ba'i yi ge ni/_'grel chen dri ma med pa'i mdor bsdus bzhi pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'phags pa'i yul 'dir bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa na/_sdud par 
[\[130a.4\]]byed pa po dag gis theg pa gsum glegs bam la bris te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pas sde snod gsum ma ga d+hA'i skad kyis bris so/_/mdo sde ni sin+d+hu'i skad kyis so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dang sngags kyi tshul ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis so/_/rgyud dang rgyud gzhan dag ni
