[\[130a.7\]]skad kyis so zhes 'byung ba'i tshig la brtags na bka' bsdu ba byed pa'i dus nas bod la yi ge yod par grub pa ltar snang zhes gsungs shing*/_sngon gyi mkhas pa mang po rnams ni/_dus kyi 'khor lo la'i 'grel chen du sdud pa po rnams kyis theg pa gsum bod kyi yul du bod kyi skad kyis 'dri bar lung bstan 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]pa ltar 'dod do/_/de'ang gong du ji skad smos pa ltar skad gnyis smra ba chen po de nyid kyis srol chen rnam par phye ba'i yi ge'i rgyun chen po de nyid rim gyis mched pa la brten nas/_bod dang bod chen por gtogs pa'i yul dang ljongs dang grong dang grong khyer dang*/_grong rdal dang gtsug lag khang dang rgyal 
[\[130b.2\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la sogs pa rnams su dar rgyas su gyur pa'i yi ge la'ang rdzab chen dang rdzab chung dang*/_'bru chen dang 'bru chung dang*/_gshar ma dang dkyus yig la sogs pa yongs su grags pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang chag lo dang 'gos lo la sogs pa'i yig gsar gyi rnam 
[\[130b.3\]]pa'ang mang du yod pa dang*/_khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i hor yig rigs gsum la sogs pa rnams kyang dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi rnam gzhag bod kyi skad dang mthun par 'byung bas 'di dag kyang rnam pa cung zad tsam ma gtogs phal cher bod kyi yi ge'i khongs su 
[\[130b.4\]]gtogs par sems so/_/de ltar na yi ge'i tshogs dang ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos ni tsan+d+ra go mi'i yi ge'i mdo lta bu'am/_brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rnams sam/_grub mtha' smra ba rnams kyi so so'i 'dod pa tha dad par ston par byed pa'i bstan 
[\[130b.5\]]bcos rnams sam/_gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa rnams su yi ge'i bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'byung ba ste de dag ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos rnams lta bu'o/_/gsum pa chos kyi sku'am thugs kyi rten ni mchod rten te/_de la spyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i mchod rten te gsum du bshad 
[\[130b.6\]]de/_de'ang nyan thos kyi mchod rten ni chos gos bzhi bltab byas pa'i steng du lhung bzed kha sbub pa la 'khar gsil btsugs pa lta bu'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni rmang gru bzhi pa'i steng du ngos gru bzhi zlum po bang rim bcu gnyis pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i rnam pa can no/_/theg pa chen po'i mchod rten 
[\[130b.7\]]ni lhung bzed kha sbub pa lta bu bim+ba'i zlum po dang*/_khang bu lta bu dang*/_rgyal mtshan lta bu'i mchod rten brgyad la sogs pa yod par klu sgrub kyis gsungs so/_/gzhan yang 'dul ba lung las/_chos 'khor la gdugs dang*/_gdugs la char khebs su btags nas so so skye bo'i mchod rten la gdugs med pa dang*/_
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]nyan thos kyi mchod rten la 'bras bu'i grangs kyi gdugs yod pa dang*/_rang rgyal gyi mchod rten la gdugs bdun yod pa dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs bcu gsum pa char khebs tog dang bcas pa ste rnam pa tha dad nyid du yod par gsungs so/_/de dag las 
[\[131a.2\]]bye brag tu mchod rten thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa ni/_las kyi mtha' brjod pa'i mdo las/_sprul pa mdzad pa sngon bstan phyir/_/mchod rten brgyad du sku gdung bzhag_/ces bshad pa ltar ston pa'i mdzad pa mtha' yas pa'i nang nas mdzad pa'i gtso bo rnams la brten nas yul 'khor chen po de dang 
[\[131a.3\]]de'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i skye 'gro rnams spro ba mchog tu skyes shing bsod nams kyi zhing du bskrun pa shAkya thub pa'i mchod rten chen po brgyad du grags pa dang*/_gzhan yang sku gdung cha brgyad du bgos pa'i mchod rten brgyad dang*/_ras tshig pa dang ma tshig pa dang sol ba'i mchod rten gsum ste bcu gcig go/_
[\[131a.4\]]gzhan yang snga phyir byung ba'i mchod rten grangs med pa yod kyang gtso bo sku bltams pa nas mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du byung ba'i mchod rten brgyad po 'di nyid yin pas/_deng gi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten gang bzheng yang rnam pa ni brgyad po de dag gang 
[\[131a.5\]]yang rung ba re'i dbyibs can du bya ba yin no/_/'di dag gi go rim ni stag tshang lo tsA ba la sogs pa bkra shis sgo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]nas thog mar byas pa dang*/_kha cig lha babs kyis thog drangs pa dang*/_khyad par stag tshang bas mchod rten brgyad kyi bstod par/_sku bltams pa'i dus kyi mchod rten bkra shis 
[\[131a.6\]]sgo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchod rten da lta'i cho 'phrul mchod rten la ngos 'dzin pa dang*/_cho 'phrul bstan pa'i tshe'i mchod rten pad+ma spungs pa la ngos 'dzin pa'i mi 'dra ba'i khyad par cung zad byung yang*/_mnga' ris pa tshul khrims 'od zer dang*/_paN chen nam mkha' dpal 
[\[131a.7\]]bzang dang*/_rgyal dbang lnga pa la sogs pa phyis kyi mkhas pa phal che bas legs par bshad pa'i go rim mthun par sku bltams pa'i tshe gter kha lnga brgya byung ba la sogs pa bkra shis pa dang dge legs kyi mtshan ma brgya phrag mang po mngon du byung ba'i rten 'brel gyi dbang dang*/_dus de nyid du phyogs 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]drug na zhabs kyi gom pa bdun bdun du bor bar pad+ma re re byung ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan du byas nas pad+ma spungs pa nas mgo 'dzin par mdzad do/_/de la dang po grong khyer ser skyar lum+bi'i tshal du sku bltams pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni dbyibs zlum po pad+ma'i rnam pa can bang rim bzhi pa pad+ma dang 'khor 
[\[131b.2\]]los spras pa sa'i bdag po zas gtsang la sogs pas bzhengs pa la pad+ma spungs pa'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/gnyis pa ma ga d+hA rgyal po'i khab tu mngon par byang chub pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs gru bzhi pa bang rim bzhis mdzes pa ma skyes dgra dang gzugs can snying po la sogs pas 
[\[131b.3\]]bzhengs pa la byang chub chen po'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/gsum pa wA rA Na sIr chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs gru bzhi pa bang rim bzhi pa glo 'bur dang bcas sgo rab brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pas mdzes pa yongs su grags pa ltar ram/_yang na bden pa rnam pa bzhi'am 
[\[131b.4\]]bcu drug dang rnam par thar pa sogs kyi mtshon byed du logs rer sgo bzhi'am brgyad dam bcu drug rer yod pa lnga sde bzang po 'phags pas bzhengs pa la bkra shis sgo [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/bzhi pa mnyan du yod par cho 'phrul bstan pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs gru bzhi pa bang rim bzhi 
[\[131b.5\]]dang ldan zhing phyogs bzhir glo 'bur dang bcas pa lits+tsha bI rnams kyis rgyal byed tshal du bzhengs pa la mu stegs pham byed kyi mchod rten nam cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/lnga pa ni gnas sum cu rtsa gsum du lha'i yul na dbyar gnas pa mdzad cing yum la chos gsungs nas phyi dro nam mkha' 
[\[131b.6\]]nas bab pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs gru bzhi pa bang rim brgyad pa'am bzhi pa ngos re la glo 'bur dang bcas pa'i glo 'bur gyi dbus su them skas yod pa gsal ldan gyi dad pa can rnams kyis bzhengs pa la sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i mchod rten nam lha bab tu grags pa'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/drug 
[\[131b.7\]]pa ni rgyal po'i khab tu lhas byin gyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa mchog zung gis bsdum par byas pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs bang rim bzhi pa gru bzhi'i grwa bzhi po mnyam par bcad pa rgyal byed la sogs pa'i ma ga d+hA pas bzhengs pa la 'od zer can nam byams dngos sam dbyen bsdums 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]pa'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/bdun pa yangs pa can du sku tshe zla ba gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs zlum po bang rim gsum pa lha rnams kyis brtsigs pa'am yangs pa can gyi grong khyer ba rnams kyis bzhengs par grags pa la sku tshe byin gyis 
[\[132a.2\]]brlabs pa'i mchod rten nam rnam par rgyal ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/brgyad pa rtswa mchog gi grong du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan pa'i dus kyi mchod rten ni/_dbyibs bang rim dang bral ba gdan khri'i steng du bum rten yan chad bzhugs pa rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis brtsigs pa la mya ngan 
[\[132a.3\]]'das pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba ste mchod rten brgyad po de dag gi cha tshad la sogs pa ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos rnams dang*/_der ma zad gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud sde so so nas bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang bum pa dang rdo rje dril bu dang zhi rgyas dbang drag gi las dang rjes su mthun 
[\[132a.4\]]pa'i thab kyi thig dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la sogs pa'i tshad dang mtshan nyid la sogs pa ste/_mdor na sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dang bcas pa'i rten gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams kyi so so'i tshad dang mtshan nyid la sogs pa ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos ni logs 
[\[132a.5\]]su gnas pa dang mdo sde dang rgyud sde so so'i 'grel pa rnams kyi gseb tshag nas bstan pa ci rigs par 'byung ba rnams lta bu'o/_/gzhan yang bzo rig pa phal pa ni/_mdo sde las gsungs pa'i bzo sbyangs bco brgyad ces pa/_tshong pa dang*/_rdza mkhan dang*/_phreng ba mkhan dang*/_chang tshong dang*/_
[\[132a.6\]]phyugs btsong ba dang*/_'dreg mkhan dang*/_'bru mar 'tshir ba dang*/_mgar ba dang*/_shing mkhan dang*/_phya mkhan dang*/_tha ga pa dang*/_ko pags mkhan dang*/_rkyal chen pa dang*/_btso blag mkhan dang*/_smyig ma mkhan dang*/_bshan pa dang*/_gdol pa mkhan dang*/_shing rta mkhan te bzo sbyangs bco 
[\[132a.7\]]brgyad dang*/_gzhan yang rin po che brtag pa/_sa gzhi brtag pa/_gos brtag pa/_ljon shing brtag pa/_rta brtag pa/_glang po che brtag pa/_skyes pa brtag pa/_bud med brtag pa ste brtag pa brgyad dang*/_gzhan yang mdo sde rnams su sgyu rtsal gyi rig pa ji snyed pa'i bya ba bstan te/_de dag drug cu rtsa bzhir bsdu ba yang*/_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rol mo'i mtshan nyid sgyu ma dang*/_/'gyed stobs dang ni me tog las/_/dmag rnams kyi ni bdag nyid shes/_/g.yos su bya ba rnam par nges/_/tshong dang nor ni bsgyur ba dang*/_/rgyan dang lag rtsis bcud kyis len/_/'khrul 'khor sbyor dang dri ba dang*/_/'phongs dpyad dang ni tshom sbyor sgra/_/yi ge dang ni 
[\[132b.2\]]khwa skad dang*/_/rang rang bzo dang mtshon rnams brtag_/gcod thabs dang ni sog le dang*/_/phub rnams bskor bar byed pa dang*/_/song dang 'ong ba shes pa dang*/_/gzhi yi mtshan nyid shes pa dang*/_/mdung dang rdo rje brtag pa dang*/_/thabs kyi tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang*/_/zug rngu 'byin dang mig 'grul 
[\[132b.3\]]dang*/_/b+ha ra ta yi bstan bcos shes/_/bcing dang khang pa brtsegs ma dang*/_/de bzhin gos kyi 'phang ba dang*/_/yan lag mnye dang mo 'debs dang*/_/de bzhin chu yi kun 'dzin dang*/_/dung gi sgra dang sdeb sbyor dang*/_/grong rdal dang ni glog 'dra dang*/_/mtshan mo chom rkun shes pa dang*/_/sgra dang 
[\[132b.4\]]sa rtog byed pa dang*/_/skyes pa bud med rta dang ni/_/glang po'i mtshan nyid gar slob dang*/_/'byung po dag ni gso ba dang*/_/zangs ma 'khar ba gser dag dang*/_/shing dang dung dang shes pa dang*/_/ri mo mtshon dang gso dag gi/_/las rnams de dag go rim bzhin/_/skar ma'i gtan tshigs shes 
[\[132b.5\]]pa dang*/_/mtshan mo shes pa nyid dang yang*/_/nges pa'i tshig gi gzhung rnams kyis/_/sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhir dran/_/zhes bya ba bsdus te ston pa'i bstan bcos 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi 'grel pa lta bu'am/_yang na snyan dngags me long du 'di ltar sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi zhes 'byung ba'i bzor gtogs 
[\[132b.6\]]pa sum cu dang*/_rol mo'i bye brag bco brgyad/_glu dbyangs kyi nges pa bdun/_gar gyi nyams dgu'o/_/de la bzor gtogs pa sum cu ni/_sgyu rtsal/_yi gelag rtsis/_grangs can/_rtsis/_'dzin stangs/_thor tshugs/_gom stabs/_lcags kyus bsgyur thabs/_ral gris thabs/_zhags pa gdab pa/_
[\[132b.7\]]mda' bo che 'phen thabs/_'phong gi slob dpon/_mdun du snur ba/_phyir snur ba/_gcad pa/_dral ba/_dbug pa/_rgyang nas 'phog pa/_sgra grag par 'phog pa/_gnad du 'phog pa/_mi 'chor bar 'phog pa/_tshabs che ba/_gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/mchongs pa/_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs/_bang*/
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rkyal/_rgal ba/_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa/_rta la zhon pa/_shing rta'i thabs/_mda' gzhu 'gyed stobs/_rol mo'i bye brag bco brgyad ni/_gar mkhan nam gro mkhan/_gar ram bro/_rnga bo che/_rdza rnga/_rnga/_rdza rnga chen po/_'khar rnga/_pi wang rgyud gcig pa/rdza rnga kha gcig_lcags 
[\[133a.2\]]kyi sil khrol/_khar dkrol/_pi wang rgyud gsum pa/_rnga mu kun+da/_sil snyan/_glu dbyangs/_pheg rdob pa/_rol mo'i sgra/_pi wang*/_gling bu/_glu dbyangs kyi nges pa bdun ni/_bar ma/_drang srong*/_sa 'dzin pa/_drug ldan pa/_lnga pa/_blo gsal/_'khor nyan/_gar stabs kyi nyams dgu ni/_stegs pa'am 
[\[133a.3\]]sgeg pa'am 'dzin pa/_dpa' bo/_mi sdug pa/_drag shul can/_bzhad gad/_'jigs su rung ba/_snying rje ba/_rngam pa/_zhi ba ste de la sogs pa'i rnam grangs ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos rnams dang*/_gzhan yang dus 'khor bsdus rgyud las/_g.yul du pham pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral 
[\[133a.4\]]la rdzong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na/_/phyi rol du ni 'phrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chad med par rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bebs pa dang*/_/ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i 'phrul 'khor dag dang sa gzhi'i gnas la gur dang go ni dbye ba yis/_/de yis rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin zhag cung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni 
[\[133a.5\]]bsgrub par bya/_/zhes ngo mtshar ba'i sbyor ba thang rdzong gzhig pa rdo'i 'phrul 'khor/_chu rdzong 'joms pa gru'i 'phrul 'khor/_ri rdzong 'joms pa me'i 'phrul 'khor/_ral gri 'khor ba gri gug gi 'phrul 'khor/_rtse mo 'byed pa rlung gi 'phrul 'khor/_rtsig pa 'jig pa gur gyi 'phrul 'khor/_go 
[\[133a.6\]]cha 'jig pa lcags mda'i 'phrul 'khor rnams dang*/_rang phyogs srung ba ral gri'i 'phrul 'khor/_rgyal rigs 'thab pa shing rta'i tshad/_ltad mo la 'gro ba'i don du khang bzang gi mtshan nyid/_dga' ston gyi don du khyogs kyi mtshan nyid/_ldum ra bcu pa'i don du chu 'dren pa'i 'phrul 'khor sogs 
[\[133a.7\]]dus kyi 'khor lo las gsungs pa dang*/_gzhan yang mi dpyad rta dpyad thor bur 'dug pa rnams ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos logs su med na'ang mdo dang rgyud kyi 'grel pa rnams kyi gseb tshag nas ci rigs par 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa gzhan rjes su 'dzin par byed pa rig pa'i gnas gnyis 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]pa/_tshe ring ba dang nad med pa'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa rig pa'i gnas gnyis pa gso ba rig pa la/_gso ba rig pa la 'jug pa'i dgos pa dang*/_de ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas 
[\[133b.2\]]skabs su bro nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab pa'i lus can rnams kyi nad kyi zug rngu mtha' dag sel bar byed pa la mkhas pa dang*/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i nus pa dang ldan par byas nas phan pa rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir/_rlung las gyur pa dang*/_mkhris pa 
[\[133b.3\]]las gyur pa dang*/_bad kan las gyur pa dang*/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad dang*/_nad kyi gleng gzhi dang*/_nad med par bya ba dang*/_de'i thabs kyi khyad par mang po la ma rmongs par byas nas gzhan gyi don rjes su bsgrub pa dang*/_mthar thug gi sman pa bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang gi rgyur 'gyur ba 
[\[133b.4\]]dang*/_de nyid mngon du gyur nas kyang gdul byar gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por 'gyur ba'i bdud rtsi'i sgo mo de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par phye bas gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba la 'god pa'i thabs la dbang brnyes par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dam pas 
[\[133b.5\]]yid yongs su drangs te tshul 'di la 'jug par rigs so/_/de ltar yang rgyan gyi 'grel bshad las/_gso ba rig pa byang chub sems dpa' tshol bar byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_nad dang nad kyi gleng gzhi dang*/_nad med pa dang*/_nad med pa'i thabs shes par bya ba dang*/_sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa 
[\[133b.6\]]sna tshogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes dang*/_ston pas chos kyi 'khor lo dang po'i skabs su yang dge slong nad pas ni sman pa la dris te bya'o zhes dang*/_bcom ldan 'das mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rwa ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe dge slong rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis skya bo bseng bseng por 
[\[133b.7\]]gyur pa'i tshe/_sman so sor bsten par gsungs kyang dus su ma gtogs par de las yol bar bsten par ma gnang bas skya bor gyur pa las/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong rnams kyi sman rnam pa bzhi po dus su rung ba dang*/_thun tshod du rung ba dang*/_zhag bdun pa dang*/_ji srid 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]'tsho'i bar du so sor bcang ba bstan par bya'o/_/de la dus su rung ba ni/_lde gu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par bka' stsal pa dang*/_yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i mdo'i gnas le'u gnyis pa nyin re'i spyod pa'i le'u las kyang*/_sems can thams cad bde 
[\[134a.2\]]'dod phyir/_/rtsom pa kun la 'jug par 'dod/_/ces dang*/_mgo'i bshad pa'i le'u las kyang*/_tshe ni ring bar 'dod pa yis/_/chos dang nor dang bde ba sgrub/_/tshe yi rig byed lung bshad pa/_/rab tu gus par bya ba gyis/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa mang du yod par shes par bya'o/_/gnyis pa 
[\[134a.3\]]ni dgos pa de dang ldan pa'i gso ba rig pa'i gzhung gi bstan bcos ni bshad ma thag pa'i gzhung de nyid las/_tshangs pas tshe yi rig byed dran/_/skye dgus bdag la bshad pa yin/_/de yis tha skar des brgya byin/_/des rgyun shes sogs drang srong la'o/_/de yis me bzhin 'jug la sogs/_/de 
[\[134a.4\]]rnams kyis kyang so sor byas/_/shin tu 'thor ba de rnams las/_/rab gces phal cher btus pa ni/_/shin tu bsdus min rgyas min par/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bya/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar lha dang mi'i drang srong la sogs pa mkhas pa gang dag byung ba rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung 
[\[134a.5\]]mang du byung bar grags kyang*/_gzhung de thams cad kyi snying po bsdus te rgyas bsdus 'tsham pa legs par bshad pa kun gyi mthar thug pa ni yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid de/_'di'i gzhung gi tshad ni sh+lau ka dgu stong dang bzhi brgya lhag tsam la/_brjod par bya ba'i snying po ni 
[\[134a.6\]]yan lag brgyad de/_brgyad ni/_lus dang byis pa gdon lus stod/_/mtshon dang mche ba rgas ro tsa/_/gso dpyad gang la gnas gyur pa/_/yan lag brgyad ces de la brjod/_/ces pa ste/_de yang brjod tshul ni/_mdo gnas lus dang nad gzhi dang*/_/gso gnas cho ga grub phyi ma/_/zhes pa ltar 
[\[134a.7\]]gnas drug tu byas nas/_mdo gnas le'u sum cu dang*/_lus gnas le'u drug dang*/_nad kyi gzhi le'u bcu drug dang*/_gso ba'i gnas le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang*/_cho ga grub pa le'u drug dang*/_phyi ma'i gnas le'u bzhi bcu ste yongs su bsdoms pa le'u brgya dang nyi shu'o/_/de las mdo gnas dang 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]po tshe ring ba'i le'us ni nad gsum gyi ngo bo/_sman dang sman pa/_nad pa dang nad g.yog rnams chos bzhi ldan la sogs pa'i spyi'i rnam gzhag dang*/_le'u rnams kyi rnam grangs ston pas rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_de nas gnas lnga pa yan chad kyis de nyid tshang bar bshad pas bshad pa'i rgyud dang*/_tha mas yan lag 
[\[134b.2\]]phyi ma rnams ston pas phyi ma rgyud kyi tshul du gnas pa ste/_de ltar na gzhung 'dis brjod par bya ba thams cad brgyad po de nyid du bsdus nas ston pa lta bu'o/_/gsum pa log par rtog pa gzhan dag tshar gcod par byed pa'i rig pa'i gnas gnyis kyi dang po tshig gi 'gal 'brel gcod pa'i rig pa gnas gsum 
[\[134b.3\]]pa brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos la/_brda sprod pa'i rig pa la 'jug pa'i dgos pa dang*/_de ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas skabs su bdag nyid legs par sbyar ba'i skad la 'byongs 
[\[134b.4\]]nas chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas shing gzhan gyis bkur ba dang*/_mkhas par rlom pa gzhan dag tshar gcad pa la dbang ba dang*/_sgra gcig cig la yang nges pa'i tshig mang po dgrol te bshad pa la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i mkhas par gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la bya ba byas pa'i 
[\[134b.5\]]dam pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba dang*/_mthar thug chos so so yang dag pa'i rig pa dang*/_don so so yang dag pa'i rig pa dang*/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag pa'i rig pa dang*/_spobs pa so so yang dag pa'i rig pa ste rig pa bzhi po de la sogs pa yon tan thams cad la dbang brnyes pa rdzogs 
[\[134b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas sgra sgrogs dbang po'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang de nyid mngon du byas nas kyang gdul byar gyur pa'i 'gro ba sna tshogs par rang rang gi skad dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa la dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'i dgos pa dam pas yid yongs su drangs te rig pa'i tshul 'di la 'jug par rigs so/_/de skad 
[\[134b.7\]]du yang mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad las/_sgra rig pa byang chub sems dpa' 'tshol bar byed de/_bdag nyid saM sgr-i ta'i skad la mkhas pa'i sgo nas bdag la mkhas pa gzhan dag yid ches par bya ba dang*/_sgra'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa'i mu stegs pa dag tshar gcad par bya ba dang*/_don gcig 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]la nges pa'i tshig mang po bstan cing bshad pa'i chos kyi tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to zhes dang*/_gzhan yang mdo las byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sgra la slob par byed ce na/_sgra'i tshig yongs su dag par bya ba dang*/_yongs su ma dag pa'i 
[\[135a.2\]]tshig gi don gsal bar ston nus pa dang*/_don thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba dang*/_yang dag pa'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shigs pa dang*/_ngan par lta ba las ldog cing sems can 'dul ba'i thabs dang mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sgra rig 
[\[135a.3\]]pa'i bstan bcos la slob par byed do zhes dang*/_thon mi lo tsAs kyang*/_bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin cing*/_/rig byed smra ba rnams kyi rgyu/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' bye brag tu smra ba dang*/_mdo sde pa dang*/_sems tsam pa dang*/_dbu ma pa ste grub pa'i mtha' smra ba bzhi'am/_nyan 
[\[135a.4\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab par bya ba thams cad kyi gzhi 'dzin cing*/_rig byed ni phyi rol pa'i lugs kyi nges brjod la sogs pa bzhi ste/_de'ang ji skad du/_snyan tshig mchod sbyin srid srung dang*/_/nges brjod rig byed rig byed bzhi/_/zhes bya ba'i rig byed smra ba rnams kyang 'di 
[\[135a.5\]]la ma brten par mi 'byung zhing*/_chos kyi don rtogs par byed pa la'ang thog mar tshig la mkhas par bya dgos te/_sa skya paN+Di tas kyang*/_tshig kyang sgrigs legs mi shes na/_/don bzang smos kyang ci zhig dgos/_/zhes dang*/_brda sprod kyi gzhung 'di kho nar ma zad/_rig pa'i gnas thams cad 
[\[135a.6\]]la 'jug pa'i sgo gcig pu yang 'di nyid yin te/_ji skad du/_gang zhig shes na mkhas pa'i gnas thob cing*/_/mthar thug kun mkhyen go 'phang bde blag bgrod/_/gzhung lugs kun la thogs med 'jug pa'i sgo/_/brda sprod rig gnas bstan bcos rnam dbye bgyi/_/zhes gsungs pa la sogs 
[\[135a.7\]]pa rgya cher 'byung ba yin no/_/gnyis pa ni/_dgos pa de dang ldan pa'i brda sprod rig pa'i gzhung 'dis brjod par bya ba ci zhig yin snyam na/_dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/_rang bzhin rkyen dang rnam 'gyur gsum/_/brda sprod gzhung gi brjod bya yin/_/zhes pa ste/_gzhung gi brjod bya ma lus pa mdor 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bsdu na/_rang bzhin dang rkyen dang rnam 'gyur te gsum du 'du zhing*/_rang bzhin la'ang dbye na/_byings dang ming gnyis te/_de skad du'ang*/_rang bzhin ming dang byings de la'ang*/_/zhes so/_/byings la'ang nang gses kyi sgo nas dbye na/_mdo'i byings dang*/_rkyen gyis bcos pa'i byings dang*/_glegs 
[\[135b.2\]]bam las 'byung ba'i byings dang gsum du 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin gnyis pa ni ming ngam rtags te/_de yang byings kyi yi ge gang la kr-ita rkyen byin pas byings yin pa'ang bor/_san la sogs pa ma byin pas rkyen gyis bcos pa'i byings kyang ma yin la/_tshig tu 'grub par byed pa'i rnam dbye yang 
[\[135b.3\]]ma byin pa ste/_lung ston pa ka lA pa'i mdo las/_byings dang rnam dbye bor ba'i don dang ldan pa ni rtags so zhes 'byung ngo*/_/rtags la yang dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi mtha' nges pa can gyi sgo nas dbye na/_skyes pa'i rtags dang bud med kyi rtags dang ma ning gi rtags gsum ste/_de dag gi rnam par 
[\[135b.4\]]dbye ba rgyas par ston pa'i bstan bcos ni mkhas pa 'chi ba med pa'i seng ges mdzad pa'i ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa'i mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos a ma ra ko Sha dang*/_de'i 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan yang de'i bye brag tu gyur pa'i nye bar bsgyur ba rnams kyang rang bzhin 
[\[135b.5\]]gyi khongs su bsdu'o/_/rkyen ni rang bzhin de nyid rnam 'gyur gzhan du sgrub par byed pa sgra'i yan lag ste/_de'i dbye ba byings las ming du sgrub par byed pa byed ldan gyi rkyen dang*/_ming las ming gzhan sgrub par byed pa de phan gyi rkyen no/_/de la'ang spyi dang grangs med dang dngos pa'i rkyen gsum du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[135b.6\]]byings las tshig tu sgrub cing rnam par 'byed par byed pa ting nga dang*/_ming las tshig tu sgrub cing don rnam par 'byed pa supra dang*/_rang bzhin dang rkyen dag gi bar du gzhug pa a ga ma dang*/_byings gzhan du bsgyur ba nye bar bsgyur ba rnams so/_/rnam 'gyur ni dpang lo chen pos/_rang bzhin rkyen dang 'brel 
[\[135b.7\]]pa dang*/_/yi ge tsam dang 'brel pa yi/_/bsgyur dang dbye ba rnam 'gyur te/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar sgra'i yan lag gi yi ge bsgyur dang dbyi ba dang*/bar rkyen ster ba dang*/_tshig gi bsdu ba bya ba rnams te/_de dag tu sgra'i brjod bya thams cad bsdus pa'o/_/yang na mtshams sbyor dang ming dang kun bshad 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dang kr-ita dang bzhis mdo'i rtsa ba ston la/_byings dang nyer bsgyur dang uN la sogs pa yan lag ste/_de dag gis 'chad pa ka lA pa lta bu'o/_/yi ge'i tshogs dang*/_ming gi tshogs dang*/_tshig gi tshogs te gsum du ston pa smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu'o/_/de dag dang 
[\[136a.2\]]rjes su 'brel pa sdeb sbyor gyi bstan bcos ni/_yi ge lci yang gi bye brag sbyor ba'i sgo nas tshigs su bcad pa'i rigs rnams rgyas par ston par byed pa ste/_tshigs su bcad pa gang la'ang lung las 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dang*/_bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so/_/
[\[136a.3\]]dang po ni mngon pa kun las btus par/_tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa gnyis pa nas drug pa'i bar du yod par gsungs pa dang*/_rje ngor chen thams cad mkhyen pas/_lung las tshigs bcad rkang pa gnyis pa nas/_/brtsams te drug pa'i bar du gsungs pas na/_/de dang mthun pa'i tshigs su 
[\[136a.4\]]bcad pa bgrang*/_/zhes gsungs te/_de'ang rkang pa gnyis pa ni/_bram ze chu la ji tsam zhig_/ces tshig rkang pa gcig gis dris pa la/_mi yi bdag po pus nub tsam/_/zhes tshig rkang gcig gis lan btab pas tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs pa lta bu ste/_des mtshon te lung rnams 
[\[136a.5\]]las mang du 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa ni snyan dngags me long du/_tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/_/br-it+ta dzA ti zhes rnam gnyis/_/de yi spros pa mtha' dag ni/_/sdeb sbyor gzhung du nges par bstan/_/rigs de snyan dngags rgya mtsho ni/_/zab mo brgal 'dod rnams kyi gru/_/zhes 
[\[136a.6\]]'byung ba bzhin du sdeb sbyor gyi bstan bcos rnams las tshigs su bcad pa re la rkang pa bzhi bzhi bsgrigs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bya ba yin te/_de la'ang yi ge bgrang ba dang phyi mo bgrang ba'i bye brag gis br-it+ta'i sdeb sbyor dang*/_dzA ti'i sdeb sbyor gnyis su dbye'o/_/br-it+ta'i sdeb sbyor la 
[\[136a.7\]]mnyam pa dang*/_phyed mnyam pa dang*/_mi mnyam pa'i br-it+ta zhes bya ba ste gsum mo/_/dzA ti'i sdeb sbyor la'ang 'phags ma'i dzA ti dang*/_ro langs can gyi dzA ti dang*/_phyi mo mnyam pa'i dzA ti ste/_de dag gi dbye ba ston pa'i bstan bcos ni/_mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang*/_/mdo nyid 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dper brjod gyur pa dang*/_/ma 'dres rim can 'don sla dang*/_/sdod dang tshogs dang yon tan brgyad/_/ces pa'i yon tan brgyad kyis gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i rin chen 'byung gnas lta bu'o/_/snyan dngags kyi bstan bcos ni/_lus bshad pa dang*/_rgyan bshad pa dang*/_skyon sel ba bshad pa ste gsum 
[\[136b.2\]]gyi lus la tshigs su bcad pa dang*/_lhug pa dang*/_spel ma ste gsum mo/_/rgyan la thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyan gyi 'dod pa rnam par dbye ba dang*/_thun mong ba don rgyan sum cu rtsa lnga dang*/_sgra rgyan bya sla bya dka' la sogs pa dang*/_gab tshig gi rgyan dang*/_de dag gi rnam 'gyur rnams so/_/skyon 
[\[136b.3\]]sel ba ni/_don nyams don 'gal don gcig pa/_/the tshom can dang rim pa nyams/_/sgra dman gcod mtshams nyams pa dang*/_/sdeb sbyor nyams dang mtshams sbyor bral/_/yul dus sgyu rtsal 'jig rten dang*/_/lung rigs dag dang 'gal ba ste/_/skyon bcu de dag snyan dngags la/_/snyan 
[\[136b.4\]]dngags mkhan gyis rnam par spang*/_/zhes pa'i skyon rnam pa bcu sel ba la sogs pa sngon gyi snyan dngags kyi gzhung rnams las phul du byung ba slob dpon dbyug pa can gyis mdzad pa'i snyan dngags me long zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos ni/_'dod 
[\[136b.5\]]'jo'i ba mor/_mtho ris mkha' dang phyogs dus blo/_/sgra sogs gar dang bcas pa dang*/_/sa 'og gdengs can dmyal ba chu/_/de rnams kyi ni tshogs bcas bshad/_/ces dang*/_sa yi sde tshan grong khyer dang*/_/ri bo dang ni nags tshal dang*/_/sman dang ri dwags la sogs dang*/_/mi dang 
[\[136b.6\]]bram ze rgyal rigs dang*/_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs yan lag bcas/_/nye ba'i yan lag bcas 'dir brjod/_/ces pa sde tshan du bcad de/_de dag gi don re re la'ang ming gi rnam grangs mang po 'byung ba ston pa/_dper na 'chi med seng ges/_nyi ma 'od 'gyed bstan bya dang*/_/mi sbyin skyes 
[\[136b.7\]]dang bcu gnyis bdag_/nyin byed 'od byed snang byed dang*/_/rab tu gsal byed rnam gsal byed/_/'od zer mig gzugs rta bdun pa/_/rta ljang dang ni tsha zer can/_/rnam 'gyur mchod 'os ma zlums dang*/_/char 'bebs 'od 'gro gso byed dang*/_/nam mkha'i nor bu sgrol byed 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bshes/_/sna tshogs 'od zer 'od snang byed/_/'od kyi nor can gza' yi bdag_/'od zer bdag po snang byed bdag_/'od can 'joms byed 'od stong pa/_/gdung ba 'od 'byin 'od zer gzung*/_/zhes pa nyi ma gcig pu'i ming la rnam grangs sum cu rtsa bdun 'byung ba 
[\[137a.2\]]dang*/_ming gcig nyid don mang po la 'jug pa/_dper na klu sgrub zhabs kyis/_ngag phyogs sa dang 'od zer dang*/_/phyugs dang mig dang rdo rje dang*/_/mtho ris chu ste don dgu la/_/mkhas pas go sgra nges par bzung*/_/zhes pa go'i sgra lta bu'i ming gcig nyid la'ang don dgu la 'jug par ston pa ste/_
[\[137a.3\]]de dag ston pa'i bstan bcos a ma ra ko Sha dang*/_de'i 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo dang*/_mu tig phreng ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/zlos gar gyi bstan bcos ni/_sngon byung gi gtam lta bu'i gzugs su byas te skad rigs so so'i rjod byed rnams nye bar drangs pa'i glu zlos shing gar byed pa la/_lus kyi 
[\[137a.4\]]rnam 'gyur rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang*/_dbyangs kyi bye brag tha dad pa rnams dang*/_lha'i rjes su skyes pa dang*/_drang srong gi rjes su skyes pa dang*/_blo gsal gyi rjes su skyes pa la sogs pa dang*/_'dren pa dang*/_dkyus gcig tu sbyar ba dang*/_dkyus gnyis pa dang phyed phyi ma la sogs pa'i mtshan 
[\[137a.5\]]nyid rnams dang ldan zhing rjod byed kyi tshig phal cher saM skr-i ta'i skad dang*/_pra kr-i ta'i skad dang*/_a ba b+h+naM sha'i skad dang*/_pi shA tsi'i skad kyis glur tshigs su bcad pa dang*/_lhug pa dang*/_spel ma rnams rol mo dang bsdebs nas bsgyur ba ste/_de yang lha dang*/_klu dang*/_dri za dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_
[\[137a.6\]]nam mkha' lding dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi gar dang skad rigs so so'i glu'i khyad par rnam pa bdun te/_ji skad du/_rtsed mo rlom par blang ba ni/_/lnga pa dang ni bar ma'i dbyangs/_/dpa' bo drag po ngo mtshar du/_/drug skyes khyu mchog de bzhin no/_/sa 'dzin pa dang 'khor 
[\[137a.7\]]nyan dbyangs/_/snying rje'i ro la blang bar bya/_/'thab mo 'jigs dang bcas pa la/_/blo gsal dbyangs ni blang bar bya/_/zhes pa ltar ston pa'i gzhung ni/_b+ha ra ta dang*/_rgyal po sprin gyi bzhon pas klu'i srog bskyabs pa'i skyes rabs klu kun du dga' ba'i zlos gar dga' ba'i lhas mdzad pa dang*/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gtsug gi nor bu'i bar btang nas bram ze'i dbul ba bsal ba'i phyir rang nyid tshong du bcug ste dgra la ster du bcug pas thams cad btul ba'i skyes rabs 'jig rten kun du dga' ba'i zlos gar tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa lta bu'o/_/skar rtsis kyi rig pa ni/_phyi nang gzhan gsum ston pa dpal ldan 
[\[137b.2\]]dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud las bshad pa'i phyi dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi rig pa ste/_ang+gi'i grangs kyi ri mo 'dri ba dang*/_dbri ba dang bsnan pa dang bsgyur ba dang bgod pa ste yi ge'i yan lag lnga dang*/_gza' dang*/_tshes dang*/_skar ma dang*/_sbyor ba dang*/_byed pa ste rtsis kyi yan lag lnga dang*/_gza' lnga 
[\[137b.3\]]dang*/_khyim dang*/_longs spyod dang*/_sgra gcan dang*/_dus me dang*/_nyi zla 'dzin pa'i rtsis dang*/_nyi ldog la sogs pa dang*/_dus sbyor dang*/_zhag gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba dang*/_de dag gi dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu brtag pa la sogs pa ste/_de dag ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos ni phyi dus kyi 
[\[137b.4\]]'khor lo'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rnams las 'byung ba lta bu dang*/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das thal ba'i dbang po'i skur bzhengs nas/_lha mo u ma dang zhu ba dang lan gyi tshul du phyi rol pa'i lugs su gsungs pa'i dpal g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud 
[\[137b.5\]]kyi rgyal po dbyangs 'char ba lta bu'o/_/gzhan yang brtsi bar bya ba dus kyi tshad brtsi ba dang*/_gzugs can gyi tshad 'jal ba gnyis las/_dang po ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i skad cig ma gcig la dus mtha'i skad cig ma'o/_/de brgya nyi shu la bya rdzogs kyi skad cig ma'o/_/de drug cu la 
[\[137b.6\]]thang gcig go/_/de sum cu la yud tsam mo/_/de sum cu la nyin zhag go_/de sum cu la zla ba'o/_/zla ba gnyis la dus gcig go_/de gsum mam zla ba drug la bgrod pa gcig go_/bgrod pa gnyis sam zla ba bcu gnyis la lo ste/_mdzod las/_skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la/_/de yi 
[\[137b.7\]]skad cig de dag kyang*/_/drug cu la ni thang gcig go/_/yud tsam nyin zhag zla ba rnams/_/gong nas gong du sum cur 'gyur/_/zhag gi thun dang bcas pa yi/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la ni lo/_/zhes so/_/gnyis pa ni rdzas kyi rdul phra rab bdun la rdul phran gcig go/_/de bdun la lcags 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]rdul lo/_/de bzhin du bdun 'gyur gyis bsgre ba'i chu rdul dang*/_ri bong gi rdul dang*/_lug rdul dang*/_glang rdul dang*/_nyi zer rdul dang*/_sro ma dang*/_shig dang*/_nas dang*/_sor mo dang*/_sor mo brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo*/_/khru bzhi la ni gzhu 'dom gang ngo*/_/
[\[138a.2\]]de lnga brgya la ni rgyang grags gcig gam dgon pa'o/_/de brgyad la dpag tshad gcig go/_/des 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad thams cad 'jal bar byed de/_mdzod las/_phra rab rdul dang ni/_rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du/_/lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang*/_/nyi zer rdul dang sro ma dang*/_/de las 
[\[138a.3\]]byung dang de bzhin du/_/sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun bsgyur/_/sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khru/_/khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo*/_/de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni/_/rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod/_/de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o/_/zhes so/_/yang na rgya dpangs kyi tshad 'jal bar byed pa la sor mo dang 
[\[138a.4\]]lci tshad 'jal bar byed pa la srang dang*/_bongs tshad 'jal ba la bre nyid yin te/_'chi med mdzod las/_'jal byed srang dang sor dang bre/_/ma ru lnga sogs ma sha ka_/de dag drug cu zho yin te/_/zho bzhi la ni srang gang ngo*/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/rtsi byed grangs kyi gnas gzhan 
[\[138a.5\]]ni mdzod kyi rang 'grel la sogs pa nas 'byung ba tshigs su bcad par bsdebs pa rkyang pa dang khug pa gnyis kyi dang po ni/_gcig bcu brgya stong khri 'bum dang*/_/sa ya bye ba dung phyur rnams/_/rkyang ba'i grangs su shes par bya/_/zhes pa ltar ro/_/gnyis pa khug pa ni gnas 'di la 
[\[138a.6\]]yang nang gses su dbye na gsum du 'gyur te/_ther 'bum khrag khrig rab bkram dang*/_/gtam dkrigs mi 'khrugs khyad 'byin dang*/_/spang rten ded 'dren zhes bya ba 'di yan chad kyi gnas dgu la/_ther 'bum bcu la ther 'bum chen po la sogs pa sbyar ba'i bco brgyad la ni khug pa 
[\[138a.7\]]dang po zhes bya'o/_/de'i rjes su mtha' snang dang*/_rgyu rigs 'od mdzes dbang po dang*/_/legs 'byin rtogs 'gro 'byin rdul dang*/_/brgya rtags stobs 'khor zhes bya ba/_/'di yan chad kyi gnas dgu la snga ma bzhin du chen po dang bcas pa'i bco brgyad la khug pa gnyis pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]de'i rjes su brda shes dang*/_rnam byung stobs mig ces bya ba 'di yan chad kyi gnas gsum po la chen po dang bcas pa'i drug 'byung ba la khug pa gsum pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na khug pa gnyis pa yan chad la chen po dang bcas pa'i gnas so drug dang*/_tha ma'i drug dang bcas pa'i zhe gnyis dang*/_rkyang pa'i 
[\[138b.2\]]gnas dgu dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de la gnas drug cu'i dbang du bgyis na gnas brgyad tha ma dang bcas pa ma tshang bar/_byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang*/_btang snyoms rnams zhes pa chen po dang bcas pa'i brgyad khug pa gsum par bstan pas grangs kyi gnas bcu bzhi ste thams 
[\[138b.3\]]cad bsdoms pa'i lnga bcu rtsa dgu ni grangs kyi ming du btags la/_drug cu pa ni de lta bu'i ming las 'das pas grangs med pa zhes bya'o/_/yang na gong gi stobs mig ces pa'i rjes su nyal nyul dang*/_wal wol khyad khyud phyad phyin rnams/_/chen por bcas te bgrang bar bya/_/grangs med pa ni tha 
[\[138b.4\]]ma yin/_/zhes bya ba'ang bshad do/_/bzhi pa log par rtog pa tshar gcod par byed pa'i rig pa'i gnas gnyis pa don gyi 'gal 'brel gcod par byed pa'i rig gnas bzhi pa rgyu rig pa'am rtog ge rig pa'am gtan tshigs rig pa la 'dug pa'i dgos pa dang*/_de ston pa'i bstan 
[\[138b.5\]]bcos kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas skabs su rigs pa dang mi rigs par smra ba thams cad kyi dbye ba rnam par phyed cing*/_mu stegs pa'i 'dod pa snying pos dben pa la yang dag pa 
[\[138b.6\]]nyid du mngon par zhen cing 'jug pa rnams tshar gcod pa'i phyir dang*/_mu stegs can la sogs pa rgyu rig pa shes par rlom pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang*/_bstan pa la mi dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang*/_dad pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[138b.7\]]chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gzhan du mchi na de dag gi 'gal 'brel rnam par dpyod pa dang*/_mthar thug ston pa tshad mar gyur pa'i go 'phang gi rgyur 'gyur ba dang*/_de nyid mngon du byas nas kyang tshad mar gyur pa'i chos kyi snang ba chen pos gdul byar gyur pa rnams kyi ma rtogs pa dang log par 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]rtogs pa dang*/_the tshom gyi drwa ba ma lus pa gcod par byed pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dam pas yid nye bar drangs te tshul 'di la 'jug par rigs so/_/de ltar yang rgyan gyi 'grel bshad las/_rgyu rig pa byang chub sems dpa' tshol 
[\[139a.2\]]bar byed de/_'di ltar legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa rnams kyi don phyin ci ma log par shes par bya ba dang*/_rgyu rig pa'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa'i mu stegs pa dag tshar gcad pa dang*/_bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa rnams dad par skyed pa dang*/_dad pa skyed pa rnams kyi dad pa 
[\[139a.3\]]phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do zhes dang*/_thabs la mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsabs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang*/_sems can dad pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyu rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do zhes dang*/_tshad ma kun 
[\[139a.4\]]las btus pa las/_tshad ma dang gzhal bya nye bar brjod pa nyid kyis mu stegs pa'i 'dod pa snying pos dben pa'i phyir/_der zhen pa rnams ldog pa'i don du 'di brtsams pa yin gyis/_'di tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzhug pa'i don du ni ma yin te/_de'i chos ni rtog 
[\[139a.5\]]ge'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ldog pa la ni ston pa'i chos nyid thos nas 'bad pa med par rtogs par 'gyur te bar du ma bskal pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang*/_yang de nyid las/_gang zhig rtog ge'i lam nas chos nyid la khrid na/_/thub pa'i chos las ches bsrings nyams par byas pa yin/_/de 
[\[139a.6\]]lta na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyin gzhan du 'gro na dpyad par rigs zhes dang*/_chos mngon pa'i mdo las/_dge slong dag gam mkhas rnams kyis/_/bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du/_/legs par brtags la nga yi bka'/_/blang bar bya yis gus 
[\[139a.7\]]phyir min/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ni ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bka' gang las brtsams te rigs par smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis legs par bkral ba'i bstan bcos la mngon sum dang*/_rang don rjes 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]dpag_/gzhan don rjes dpag_/gzhan sel dpe dang*/_ltag chod brtag pa ste drug tu bsdus nas ston pa tshad ma'i mdo lta bu'am/_de'i dgongs 'grel rab tu byed pa sde bdun lta bu'am/_brtag pa sde bdun nam/_grub pa sde brgyad dam/_rjes 'brel bdun la sogs pa'o/_/de la rab tu 
[\[139b.2\]]byed pa sde bdun ni/_gtso bo lus lta bu'i bstan bcos gsum dang*/_gyes pa yan lag dang 'dra ba'i bstan bcos bzhi'o/_/dang po la gang zag dbang po rno 'bring rtul gsum gyis yang dag pa'i shes pa bde blag tu rtogs par byed pa'i thabs ston pa'i bstan bcos ni rim pa bzhin du rigs 
[\[139b.3\]]pa'i thigs pa'i rab tu byed pa dang*/_tshad ma rnam par nges pa dang*/_rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel te gsum mo/_/de'i dang po ni dbang po rab mgo smos pa tsam gyis don rtogs pa'i dbang du byas nas rang lugs snying po tsam ma gtogs gzhan sun 'byin la sogs pa med pa'i 
[\[139b.4\]]rigs pa'i thigs pa'i rab tu byed pa le'u gsum pa'i bdag nyid can te/_de'ang le'u dang po mngon gyur rtogs par byed pa'i thabs te/_de la'ang dbang po'i shes pa'am mngon sum dang*/_de bzhin du yid kyi shes pa dang*/_rang rig pa dang*/_rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa'am mngon sum ste 
[\[139b.5\]]bzhi'i sgo nas gtan la 'bebs shing*/_de'i yul ni rang gi mtshan nyid de/_ji skad du/_yang dag pa'i shes pa ni skyes bu'i don thams cad 'grub pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can yin pas de bstan to/_/yang dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes sogs mngon sum gyi le'u dang*/_le'u 
[\[139b.6\]]gnyis pa lkog gyur gyi 'jal byed sgrub byed dang dngos stobs rjes dpag gi rten/_'bras bu'i dang rang bzhin dang ma dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs gsum ste/_ji skad du/_de la rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes sogs rang gi don gyi 
[\[139b.7\]]rjes su dpag pa'i le'u dang*/_le'u gsum pa gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i yan lag la gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i rtags brjod pa ste/_rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'i phyir ro zhes sogs gzhan don rjes su dpag pa'i le'u rnams so/_/'bring rnam par nges pa la yang le'u gsum gyi 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bdag nyid can te/_de yang le'u dang pos dbang mngon yid mngon rang rig mngon sum rnal 'byor mngon sum rnams ston pa mngon sum le'u/_gnyis pa rang don le'u/_gsum pa gzhan don le'u rnams so/_/rgyas pa tshad ma rnam 'grel le'u bzhi'i bdag nyid/_
[\[140a.2\]]le'u dang po rang gi gzhal bya rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi nang nas lkog gyur rtogs byed kyi rtags yang dag gsum gyi sgo nas rtags kyi mtshan nyid dang*/_de'i ldog pa gtan tshigs ltar snang dang bcas pa'i don gtan la 'bebs par byed pa la/_phyogs chos de ches khyab pa yi/_/gtan tshigs 
[\[140a.3\]]de ni rnam gsum nyid/_/ces sogs rang don gyi le'u/_le'u gnyis pa ston pa tshad mar gyur pa gang las gshegs pa'i lam rgyas par ston par byed pa la/_tshad ma bslu med can shes pa/_/don byed nus par gnas pa ni/_/zhes sogs tshad ma grub pa'i le'u dang*/_le'u gsum pa mngon 
[\[140a.4\]]gyur rtogs par byed pa'i thabs mngon sum bzhi gtan la 'bebs par byed pa la/_gzhal bya gnyis phyir tshad ma gnyis/_/don byed nus dang mi nus phyir/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon sum gyi le'u dang*/_le'u bzhi pa gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i yan lag la/_gzhan don rjes su 
[\[140a.5\]]dpag pa'i mtshan nyid dang*/_de'i dbye ba dang*/_de la log par rtogs pa spang ba'i tshul/_/bye brag tu so so'i sgo nas rgyas par ston pa/_/gzhan la bstan par bya nyid phyir/_/bdag mthong min yang gzhan dag gi/_/zhes sogs gzhan don le'u rnams te gsum mo/_/gnyis pa gyes pa yan 
[\[140a.6\]]lag lta bu'i bstan bcos bzhi ni/_mngon sum le'u las 'phros pa ni med la/_rang don rjes dpag las 'phros nas phyogs chos khyab pa spyir gtan la 'bebs pa gtan tshigs thigs pa dang*/_rtogs dka' ba khyab pa'am ltag chod kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pas 'brel pa brtag pa ste 
[\[140a.7\]]gnyis so/_/gzhan don le'u las 'phros nas dag las gzhan blo rtogs pa tha snyad du sems tsam la'ang mi 'gal bar ston pa rgyud gzhan grub pa dang*/_rgol phyir rgol rtsod pa dang*/_rgyal 'pham tshar bcad kyi gnas ston pa rtsod pa'i rig pa'i bstan bcos dang gnyis te bsdoms pas sde bdun 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]rtsa 'grel dang bcas pa lta bu'o/_/de dag la sogs pa'i rtog ge'i bstan bcos rnams bod dag mngon pa'i sde snod du smra ba ni mi 'thad de/_rtog ge ni gtan tshigs rig pa'i bstan bcos yin la/_mngon pa ni nang rig pa'i bstan bcos yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir na/_de dag lung 
[\[140b.2\]]la mi brten par bshad pa'i phyir te/_mgon po byams pas/_rtog ge brtan cing ma nges la/_/ma khyab kun rdzob skyo ba can/_/byis pa la ni brten par 'dod/_/ces gsungs shing*/_mngon pa ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo yin pa'i phyir de las ldog pa'i khyad par mang du yod pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[140b.3\]]lnga pa rig pa'i gnas thams cad kyi gtso bo'am phul du byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam phyin ci ma log par ston par byed pa rig pa'i gnas lnga pa kun shes par byed pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nang stong pa'i bstan bcos la/_nang don rig pa la 'jug pa'i dgos pa dang*/_de ston pa'i bstan 
[\[140b.4\]]bcos kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas skabs su bdag nyid theg pa gsum du gtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thams cad dang*/_de dag gi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par khong du chud par byas nas 
[\[140b.5\]]thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gegs su gyur pa'i spang bya ma lus pa spong ba'i gnyen po la shin tu mkhas par bya ba dang*/_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa la shin tu mkhas par bya ba dang*/_mthar thug sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa las shin tu 'das pa'i chos kyi 
[\[140b.6\]]rgyal po chen po'i go 'phang rin po che mngon du bya ba dang*/_gang mngon du gyur nas kyang theg pa gsum gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i gdul bya rnams so so'i khams dang bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dbang brnyes pa dam pa'i pha rol du son par bya ba'i dgos 
[\[140b.7\]]pa bla na med pas yid yongs su drangs nas tshul 'di dag la 'jug par rigs so/_/de ltar yang rgyan gyi 'grel bshad las/_nang rig pa byang chub sems dpa' 'tshol bar byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag nyid kyis 'bags pa'i lam dang*/_de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par shes pas nyon 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]mongs pa spang bar bya ba dang*/_byas pa chud zos pa dang*/_ma byas pa 'ong ba med pa phyin ci ma log pa shes par bya ba dang*/_gzhan la'ang mngon par rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes dang*/_mdo las/_sdug bsngal dag ni thams cad dang*/_/sgrib pa kun sel dam pa'i 
[\[141a.2\]]chos/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ngo*/_/gnyis pa de ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin bstan pa la mtshan nyid theg pa'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_sngags kyi theg pa'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos so/_/dang po la'ang bka' dang po bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs 
[\[141a.3\]]pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_tha ma legs par rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos te gsum mo/_/dang po la lta ba'i cha gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_
[\[141a.4\]]spyod pa'i cha gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos gnyis las/_dang po lta ba'i cha gsal bar byed pa ni nyan thos pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i 'dul ba mngon pa sde bdun te/_de yang ji skad du/_chos kyi phung po shA ri'i bus/_/gdags pa'i bstan bcos maung gal bus/_/khams kyi tshogs ni gang pos 
[\[141a.5\]]byas/_/rnam shes tshogs ni lha skyid kyis/_/ye shes la 'jug ka t+ya'i ngus/_/rab tu byed pa dbyig bshes kyis/_/yang dag 'gro ba'i rnam grangs ni/_/gsus po che yis byas zhes grags/_/zhes pa ltar bdun te/_'di dag ni bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni bka' yin par 'dod de/_rgyu mtshan gang gi phyir na/_bcom 
[\[141a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis yul tha dad pa dang*/_dus tha dad pa dang*/_gang zag tha dad pa dag tu rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi chos 'thor bu'i tshul du gsungs pa rnams dgra bcom pa bdun gyis bsdus pa yin no/_/gal te de ltar ma yin na bka' la sde snod gsum ma tshang bar 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do zhes zer ro/_/mdo sde pa yan 
[\[141a.7\]]chad ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gang la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ma tshang ba'i skyon yod pa ma yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_mdo sde dang 'dul ba gnyis ka'i spyi khyab tu bstan pa'am gseb tshags rnams nas bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 'di dag ni bstan bcos yin no zhes gsung ngo*/_/bdun po de 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]dag gi dgongs pa 'grel par byed pa ni byang phyogs ri bo 'bigs byed gar mkhan gyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der 'phags pa nyer sbas kyi slob ma zla ba nor bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun lnga brgyas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa'i mtsho chen po zhes bya ba gzhung gi tshad 
[\[141b.2\]]sh+lau ka 'bum phrag gcig yod pa zhig mdzad do/_/phyis slob dpon de rnams las rim par brgyud de/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis gsan nas/_bstan bcos de thams cad kyi brjod par bya ba'i snying po ma lus pa bsdus nas/_theg pa dman pa'i lugs su/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig 
[\[141b.3\]]le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba gnas brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bstan bcos chen po 'di mdzad do/_/de'ang 'di'i brjod bya'i gnas dang pos ni shes par bya ba'i gnas thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa dang*/_zag pa med pa'i chos kyi tshogs gnyis su bsdus te mdor bstan nas/_yan 
[\[141b.4\]]lag rgyas par bshad pa 'dus byas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang*/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa spyir bstan nas/_chos thams cad de gsum gyis ji ltar bsdus pa'i tshul dang*/_khams kyi rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba rgyas par ston pa khams bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas 
[\[141b.5\]]gnyis pas ni dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin dang*/_'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba'i tshul dang*/_rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dang bcas pa ston pa dbang po bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas gsum pa 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten dang*/_bcud kyi sems can dang*/_'gro 
[\[141b.6\]]ba'i dbye ba dang*/_skye ba'i tshul gyi rten 'brel dang*/_skyes pa gnas pa'i rkyen dang*/_gnas pa 'chi 'pho ba'i sems dang*/_sems can gyi tshogs gsum du bsdu ba rnams kyi sgo nas brten pa sems can gyi 'jig rten dang*/_rten snod kyi 'jig rten dang*/_de dag gi tshad dang 'jal byed la sogs 
[\[141b.7\]]pa ston pa 'jig rten bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas bzhi pas ni 'jig rten sna tshogs su skye ba'i rgyu kun nas 'byung ba'i bden pa gtan la dbab pa la sogs pa ston pa las bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas lnga pa kun nas 'byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa ni phra rgyas la rag las so 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]zhes shes pa'i ched du de dag ston pa phra rgyas bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas drug pas ni kun nas 'byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa de dag gi rgyun 'gog par byed pa'i gnyen po nyid ni lam dang gang zag la rag las so zhes shes pa'i ched du rnam par 
[\[142a.2\]]grol ba'i lam dang gang zag bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/gnas bdun pas ni mthong ba dang sgom pas spang bar bya ba spangs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa rnam pa bcu shes pa dang ldan pa dang*/_'thob pa dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan brjod pa ye shes bstan pa'i mdzod do/_/
[\[142a.3\]]gnas brgyad pas ni/_'jig rten pa dang thun mong ba'i yon tan bsam gtan dang*/_gzugs med kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbye ba bstan pa snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i mdzod de/_'di la slob dpon rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i rang 'brel dang bcas pa lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa spyod pa'i cha 
[\[142a.4\]]gsal bar byed pa ni/_'di ltar/_rab byung gso sbyong gzhi dang ni/_/dgag dbye dbyar dang ko pags dang*/_/sman dang gos dang sra brkyang dang*/_/ko sham+b+hi dang las kyi gzhi/_/dmar ser can dang gang zag dang*/_/spo dang gso sbyong bzhag pa dang*/_/gnas mal dang ni rtsod pa dang*/_/
[\[142a.5\]]dge 'dun dbyen rnams bsdus pa yin/_/zhes lung bar sdom las 'byung ba'i gzhi bcu bdun gyi go rim smos pa dag dang cung zad mi 'dra ba'i khyad par min pa gzhan lung gzhi nas byung ba'i don rnams ni gzhung gi tshul du bshad/_lung rnam par 'byed pa las byung ba rnams ni 
[\[142a.6\]]'grel pa'i tshul du mdzad/_lung phran tshegs nas byung ba rnams ni kha skong ba'i tshul du bshad/_zhu ba'i skabs su lung bla ma nas byung ba rnams dogs gcod kyi tshul du bshad de/_mdor na lung sde bzhi'i brjod bya'i snying po mtha' dag tshang la ma nor bar ston pa ste/_gzhung 'di nyid kyi gsham 
[\[142a.7\]]du yang 'dul ba'i mdo zhes bya ba nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa/_'dul ba rgya mtsho'i snying po mdor bsdus pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa mtha' dag gi mdzod du gyur pa/_'dul ba'i sde snod thams cad kyi ma lta bu zhes mngon par bsngags pa'i gzhung 'di la 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]le'u'i tha snyad ma mdzad cing*/_bka' lung gi 'khrugs pa [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]bsdebs nas 'chad par byed pa 'dul ba mdo rtsa zhes bya ba gzhung tshig lhug bam po dgu sh+lau ka nyis stong dang bdun brgya pa ste/_gzhung 'dis bstan par bya ba nyid ni gzhi bcu bdun nyid do/_/de'ang dang po rab byung 
[\[142b.2\]]gi gzhis ni/_sngar sdom pa ma thob pa thob par byed pa 'bog pa'i cho ga la sngon gyi cho ga zhes pa rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa cig car du sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_da ltar gyi cho ga zhes pa gsol ba dang gzhi'i las kyis rim can du sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_'bul ba'i cho ga dang*/_
[\[142b.3\]]thob pa mi nyams par srung ba'i thabs su dge slong pha ma'i bslab par bya ba la slob pa la sogs pa rab byung gi gzhi kun la nye bar mkho ba rnams ston to/_/gnyis pa gso sbyong gi gzhis ni/_gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa dang*/_bco lnga pa dang*/_gnod pa zhi ba'i gso sbyong dang*/_mthun pa'i gso 
[\[142b.4\]]sbyong dang*/_bkra shis pa'i gso sbyong dang*/_zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong dang bcas pa'i dbye bsdu la sogs pa bstan to/_/gsum pa dbyar gnas pa'i gzhis ni/_dbyar gnas pa'i gzhi dang*/_dgos pa dang*/_gang zag dang*/_dus dang*/_gnas dang*/_yun dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_cho ga dang*/_
[\[142b.5\]]khas len ji ltar bya ba rnams ston to/_/bzhi pa dgag dbye'i gzhis ni/_yul dang*/_gang zag dang*/_byed pa po dang*/_dngos po dang*/_dus dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_cho ga dang*/_dgos ched la sogs pa ston to/_/lnga pa sra brkyang gi gzhis ni/_sra brkyang 'ding ba dang*/_brkyang ba'i tshul dang*/_
[\[142b.6\]]dbyung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa ston to/_/drug pa gos kyi gzhis ni/_gos ji ltar sgrub pa dang*/_gos kyi rgyu dang*/_rgyu de las grub pa'i gos kyi rnam par gzhag pa la sogs pas ston to/_/bdun pa ko pags kyi gzhis ni/_yul dbus dang*/_mtha' 'khob kyi mtshams su bcang ba'i 
[\[142b.7\]]tshul la sogs pa ston to/_/brgyad pa sman gyi gzhis ni/_sman rnam pa bzhir dbye ba dang*/_mtshan gzhi dang*/_mtshan nyid dang*/_dgos pa dang*/_sgra don dang*/_brten pa'i tshul la sogs pas sman ji ltar sgrub pa dang*/_sman gyi snod dang*/_bsten pa'i gang zag dang*/_gzhag pa'i 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]gnas dang*/_rung ba'i khang pa dang*/_sman la 'jug pa'i tshul la sogs pa ston to/_/dgu pa las kyi gzhis ni/_las dngos dang*/_gang zag dang 'brel pa'i las zhar byung dang bcas pa rgyas par ston to/_/bcu pa phyir bcos kyi gzhis ni/_mi mos pa 
[\[143a.2\]]nan tur gyis phyir bcos su 'jug pa nan tur dang*/_phyir bcos kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang bcas pa ston to/_/bcu gcig pa dus dang dus ma yin pa bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhis ni/_'chab pa'i gzhi dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_sbyor ba dang*/_mthar thug gi yan lag rnams ston to/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[143a.3\]]pas gzhan na gnas pa spyod pa'i gzhis ni/_de'i dbye bsdu dang*/_gral dang*/_bslab bya dang*/_sgra don la sogs pa bstan to/_/bcu gsum pa yongs su sbyong ba'i gzhis ni/_yul dang*/_gleng ba dang*/_gang zag dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_dngos po dang*/_dus dang*/_cho ga dang*/_dgos ched dang*/_
[\[143a.4\]]ji ltar sgrub pa rnams kyis bshad do/_/bcu bzhi pa las bye ba'i gzhis ni/_gzhi dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_sbyor ba dang*/_mthar thug pa rnams kyis zhi bar bya ba dang*/_dge 'dun bye ba'i rgyu spong ba dang gnyen po bsten pa dag gis bye ba zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga rnams ston to/_/bco lnga pa 'khor lo bye ba'i 
[\[143a.5\]]gzhis ni/_gzhi dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_sbyor ba dang*/_mthar thug pa dang*/_nyes dmigs la sogs pas bye ba zhi bar bya ba dang zhi bar byed pa'i thabs rnams ston to/_/bcu drug pa rtsod pa'i gzhis ni/_'khrug long gi rgyu'i dbye ba zhi bar bya ba dang zhi bar byed pa dag ston to/_/bcu bdun pa 
[\[143a.6\]]gnas mal gyi gzhis ni/_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog tu gyur pa la phyag bya ba dang mi bya ba'i tshul dang gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i thabs la sogs pa dang*/_gtsug lag khang bskyang ba'i cho ga dang*/_longs spyod kyi rnam pa ji ltar bya ba rnams dang bcas pa ston pa'i gzhung de lta 
[\[143a.7\]]bu'am/_'dul ba lung rnam par 'byed pa gzhir byas nas gzhan ji ltar rigs par sbyar nas 'chad pa me tog phreng rgyud dam sum brgya pa la sogs lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa bka' bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa 'grel ba'i bstan bcos la/_lta ba'i cha 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_spyod pa'i cha gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos te gnyis so/_/dang po lta ba'i cha gsal bar byed pa ni/_shing rta'i srol 'byed chen po bzhi'am gnyis rjes 'brang dang bcas pa ste/_de'ang rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'i phyogs kyi lam gyi gtso bo 
[\[143b.2\]]nyid ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/_de'i nang nas mthar thug par gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_mgon po mi pham pas/_blo ldan rgyal ba'i yum 'di la mos pa/_/sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs kyi snod gyur te/_/zhes dang*/_sdud pa'i 'grel pa las/_spyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[143b.3\]]pa'i mdo dngos kyis ni theg pa gsum char gyi lam bstan pa yin te/_'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs shing*/_mthar de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

[\[143b.6\]]yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rtogs rigs kyi dbang du byas na/_lus kyi skabs su yang theg pa gsum char gyi lam bstan pas mngon pa mtha' dag bsdus pa 'phags pa de gnyis kyis gsungs pa'i dgongs pa yin par gsungs so/_/de bzhin du dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs kyis kyang*/_theg 
[\[143b.7\]]pa gsum ga dag gi byang chub thob pa'i thabs su/_gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis skye ba med do zhes sogs rgya cher dngos su bstan pa'i skye med kyi don gtan la 'bebs par byed de/_mdo las/_gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad skye ba med par gsungs 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa'i sgrub byed du/_rgyu la dpyod pa rdo rje'i gzegs ma dang*/_'bras bu la dpyod pa yod med skye 'gog dang*/_gnyis ka la dpyod pa mu bzhi skye 'gog dang*/_ngo bo la dpyod pa gcig dang du bral dang*/_thams cad la dpyod pa rten 'brel gyi rigs pa rnams

[\[144a.3\]]mdzad pa yin zhing*/_don la yang shin tu yang dag par gnas pa nyid de/_dngos po rnam pa brgyad po don bdun cu'i nang gses kyi dbye ba dang bcas pa 'di dag ni mdo'i shugs kyis bstan pa'am sbas pa'i don yin la/_de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa la sogs pa 
[\[144a.4\]]ni mdo las dngos su bstan pa'i brjod bya'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro/_/des na mdo 'dis dngos su bstan pa'i stong nyid bcu drug la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi rim pa gsal bar byed pa ni dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa ste/_de la yang rang gzhan gyi sde pa gnyis ka'i

[\[144a.6\]]bzhi pa phung po brtag pa/_lnga pa khams brtag pa/_drug pa mngon par 'dod pas chags pa brtag pa/_bdun pa skye gnas 'jig pa brtag pa/_brgyad pa byed pa po brtag pa/_dgu pa snga rol na gnas pa brtag pa/_bcu pa me dang bud shing brtag pa/_bcu gcig pa sngon dang phyi ma'i

[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bdag dang chos brtag pa/_bcu dgu pa dus brtag pa/_nyi shu pa tshogs pa brtag pa/_nyer gcig pa 'byung ba dang 'jig pa brtag pa/_nyer gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa/_nyer gsum pa phyin ci log brtag pa/_nyer bzhi pa 'phags pa'i bden pa brtag pa/_nyer lnga

[\[144b.3\]]dgag pa rigs pa drug cu pa sh+lau ka drug cu rtsa gnyis yod pa ste/_de ltar lus lta bu'i bstan bcos gnyis dang*/_gong gi rkyen brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'phros nas rang bzhin med par smra ba la rigs pa dang 'gal ba spong ba rtsod pa bzlog pa dang*/_'dus byas brtag pa'i rab tu byed
