[\[144b.7\]]dang mthar gyis pa/_/skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/_/chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad/_/ces 'jug pa'i yul mkhyen pa gsum dang*/_'jug pa sbyor ba bzhi dang*/_zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chos kyi sku dang bcas pa'i skabs rnam pa brgyad du bsdus nas bstan to/_/de dag kyang 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]nang gses kyi dbang gis don bdun cur phye nas bstan bcos kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'ang*/_de nyid las/_sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang*/_/nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang*/_/sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 
[\[145a.2\]]dang*/_/dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni/_/go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang*/_/tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams/_/thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid/_/ces rnam mkhyen gyi chos bcu dang*/_/mog mog por byed la sogs dang*/_/slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang*/_/'di dang 
[\[145a.3\]]gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis/_/phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam/_/byed pa dang ni mos pa dang*/_/bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang*/_/bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba/_/yid la byed pa bla med dag_/bsgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes/_/bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam/_/byang chub 
[\[145a.4\]]sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi/_/lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad/_/ces lam shes kyi chos bcu gcig dang*/_/shes pas srid la mi gnas shing*/_/snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang*/_/thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang*/_/thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid/_/mi mthun gnyen 
[\[145a.5\]]po'i phyogs dag dang*/_/sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang*/_/nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam/_/de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod/_/ces gzhi shes pa'i chos dgu dang*/_/rnam par sbyor bar bcas rnams dang*/_/yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas/_/thar dang nges 'byed cha 
[\[145a.6\]]mthun dang*/_/slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/_/srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang*/_/zhing dag bla na med pa ni/_/rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste/_/'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin/_/zhes rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi sbyor ba'i chos bcu gcig dang*/_de yi rtags dang 
[\[145a.7\]]rnam 'phel dang*/_/brten dang sems kun gnas pa dang*/_/mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes/_/bya ba'i lam ni so so la/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi/_/gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_/log par bsgrub dang bcas pa ni/_/rtse mo'i 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]mngon rtogs zhes rtse mor sbyor ba'i chos brgyad dang*/_mthar gyis pa dang*/_rnam gsum rnam bcu zhes mthar gyis sbyor ba'i chos bcu gsum dang*/_skad cig ma/_gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi/_/zhes skad cig ma'i sbyor ba'i chos 
[\[145b.2\]]bzhi dang*/_ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang*/_/de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni/_/chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa/_/rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod/_/ces bya bas chos kyi sku'i chos bzhi mdor bstan pa rnams so/_/yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i skabs/_sems bskyed 
[\[145b.3\]]pa ni gzhan don phyir/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa don bdun cu po re re nas rgyas par 'chad do/_/de dag kyang 'bring du bstan pa na yul gsum gcig tu bsdoms nas drug tu 'du ba dang*/_mdor bsdus su bstan pa na gsum du 'du ba yin no/_/de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rim 
[\[145b.4\]]pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos dag la ni shing rta'i srol chen po gnyis zhes mkhas pa'i tshogs la yongs su grags shing grub pa yin no/_/kha cig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don thams cad sgo gsum 
[\[145b.5\]]rnam grangs bcu gcig gi sgo nas ston pa 'bum TIka dang*/_gtso bo'i don sum cu rtsa gnyis su bsdus nas ston pa slob dpon phyogs glang gis mdzad pa'i brgyad stong don bsdus gnyis dang bcas pa'i srol 'byed bzhir 'dod de/_de ltar na sgo gsum rnam grangs bcu gcig ni/_gdul 
[\[145b.6\]]bya dbang po rnon po mgo smos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang*/_dbang po 'bring po cung zad spros pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang*/_shin tu spros pa'i tshig gis don rtogs dgos pa dag gi ngor rim pa bzhin du bsdus te bstan pa'i sgo dang*/_'bring du bstan pa'i sgo dang*/_rgyas par bstan pa'i sgo 
[\[145b.7\]]rnams so/_/rnam grangs bcu gcig ni/_shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor la/_/bka' stsal re re brgya byin dang*/_/rab 'byor byams pa gnyis bzhi gnyis/_/kun dga' bo la bka' stsal gcig_/de ltar rnam grangs bcu gcig go_/zhes pa ltar ro/_/'bum TIka 'di daM Sh+Ta? se nAs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]mdzad zer mod/[(*]dang 'di la dkar chag 'phang thang mar khri srong sde'u btsan gyis mdzad do zhes zer/[)]dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i gzhung 'grel du rigs shing 'di dang brgyad stong don bsdus gnyis kyis sems tsam bstan no zhes kun mkhyen bu ston gsung ngo*/_/kha cig ni dpa' bos mdzad pa'i 'bum TIka ces kyang gsung ngo*//gtso
[\[146a.2\]]bo'i don sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/_brgyad stong don bsdus nyid du/_rten dang dbang du bya ba dang*/_/las dang bsgom pa dang bcas dang*/_/rab dbye rtags dang ltung ba dang*/_/phan yon bcas par yang dag 
[\[146a.3\]]brjod/_/ces 'byung ba'i rten ni ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang*/_dbang du bya ba ni 'khor dang*/_las ni yum la chos spyod rnam pa bcus ji ltar spyad pa dang*/_bsgom pa ni rnam par g.yeng ba bcu'i gnyen por gyur pa'i bsgom pa rnam pa bcu dang*/_rab tu dbye ba ni nang stong 
[\[146a.4\]]pa nyid nas bzung ste dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid bcu drug dang*/_rtags ni bdud kyi las kyi rtags dang*/_phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags te gnyis dang*/_ltung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs na rnam par smin pa ngan 
[\[146a.5\]]'gror ltung ba dang*/_phan yon ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs pa rin po ches bkang nas sbyin pa sbyin pa bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na bsod nams ches che bar bsngags pa la sogs pa dang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brjod bya 
[\[146a.6\]]thams cad bsdus par 'dod do/_/de lta na shing rta chen po bzhi zhes pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang mkhas pa 'ga' zhig bzhed do/_/de la rong ston shes bya kun mkhyen la sogs pas/_phyi ma gnyis po ni/_snga ma gnyis las logs su gyur pa'i srol 'byed gzhan ma 
[\[146a.7\]]yin pas na srol 'byed la snga ma gnyis su nges so zhes bzhed do/_/rje ngor chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i zhal snga nas kyang*/_shing rta'i srol chen po ni snga ma gnyis po de yongs su grags shing yang dag par grub bo zhes gsungs te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_spyir shing rta'i 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]srol 'byed ces bya ba'i tha snyad kyi gdags gzhi ni yum gyi dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa tsam gyis de ltar du 'jog pa ma yin te/_slob dpon gzhan gyi man ngag la brten nas don spyi'i tshul gyis 'grel pa la ma ltos par chos nyid don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du mthong ba'i 
[\[146b.2\]]sgo nas bka'i dgongs pa rang dbang du 'grel pa la shing rta'i srol 'byed du 'jog pa gang zhig de la snga ma gnyis po der nges shing*/_phyi ma gnyis ni gzhan gyi man ngag la brten nas don spyi'i tshul gyis 'grel pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bden mod/_'dir ni gtso bo'i don sum cu 
[\[146b.3\]]rtsa gnyis dang*/_sgo gsum rnam grangs bcu gcig la sogs pa'i 'grel tshul mi 'dra ba'i sgo nas srol 'byed so sor 'jog go zhe na/_gal te de lta na rtsa ba shes rab dang*/_'jug pa gnyis kyang srol 'byed so sor 'jog dgos par 'gyur te/_snga mas ni rten cing 'brel par 
[\[146b.4\]]'byung ba spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral bar gtan la dbab pa'i tshul gyis 'grel la/_phyi mas ni mdo sde sa bcu pa las bshad pa sogs dang sbyar nas 'grel pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na phyi ma gnyis po gang gi man ngag la brten zhe na/_mgon po byams pa'i man ngag thogs 
[\[146b.5\]]med nas brgyud pa thos nas de'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_gong du 'di dang brgyad stong don bsdus gnyis sems tsam du bstan no zhes gsungs pas kyang rtogs par nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa spyod pa'i cha gsal bar byed pa ni/_mdo kun las btus pa'am/_bslab pa kun las 
[\[146b.6\]]btus pa'am/_gang zag gcig gi cha rkyen du lta ba dang spyod pa zung 'brel du nyams su len pa'i tshul rgyas par bstan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa lta bu'am/_yang na rin chen phreng ba'i sgom rim gsum lta bu'o/_/gsum pa bka' tha ma legs par rnam par phye 
[\[146b.7\]]ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos la'ang lta ba'i cha gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_spyod pa'i cha gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos gnyis so/_/dang po la/_mgon po byams pa'i chos lnga las gong du smos pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ma 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]gtogs pa'i byams pa'i chos bzhi dang*/_de dang rjes su 'brel pa'i chos sde bco lnga ste bsdams pa'i chos sde nyi shu la gcig gis dman pa rtsa 'grel dang bcas pa rnams so/_/de la spyir byams pa dang 'brel pa'i chos nyi shu zhes bya ba'i grangs 
[\[147a.2\]]nges kyi rnam par gzhag pa 'dod pa yang yod de/_de ltar na gang zag gsum gyis mdzad pa'i chos nyi shu ste/_rgyan gnyis 'byed gnyis rgyud bla ma zhes pa ltar byams pa'i chos lnga dang*/_thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i sa sde lnga dang*/_sdom rnam pa gnyis te bdun dang*/_dbyig 
[\[147a.3\]]gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i pra kA ra Na sde brgyad dang bcas pa rnams so/_/de las dang po byams pa'i chos lngas mdo gang dang gang gi don gtan la phab ngos gzung ba dang*/_ji ltar gtan la 'bebs pa'i tshul bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po rje btsun byams pas bstan bcos 
[\[147a.4\]]chen po lnga mdzad pa'i de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo rnams kyi dgongs pa 'grel par byed pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan mchod par brjod pa dang bcas pa mdzad do/_/de nas theg pa chen po'i mdo sde sna tshogs pa 'thor ba bsdus pa lta bu'i 
[\[147a.5\]]sgo nas mdo sde rgyan mdzad do/_/de nas 'di gnyis kyi don cung zad bsdus pa dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/_/de nas de dag gi don shin tu bsdus pa chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/_/de nas chos 'khor phyi ma'i dbang du byas pa'i nges don gyi gsung 
[\[147a.6\]]rab phul du phyin pa'i dgongs pa 'grel par byed pa theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos bsngo ba dang bcas pa mdzad do/_/de dag gi nang nas bar pa gsum la ni mchod pa brjod pa dang bsngo ba gang yang med/_dang po la bsngo ba dang tha ma la mchod brjod med pas chos lnga po dkyus 
[\[147a.7\]]thog gcig tu mdzad pa yin no zhes mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel pa 'ga' zhig las 'byung ngo*/_/de ltar bshad pa de thog mtha' gnyis su mchod brjod dang bsngo ba yod pa'i tshul dang*/_bar pa gsum la de dag gang yang med pa'i tshul la dpags na shin tu 'grigs che ba ltar mchis na'ang 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]'byed rnam pa gnyis po snga ma dag gi don cung zad bsdus pa dang shin tu bsdus nas mdzad ces pa'i rnam par gzhag pa de ltar byed pa yang 'thad pa yod med dpyad par bya'o/_/yang sngon gyi mkhas pa kha cig ni/_mdo so so ba dang thun mong ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i dbang du byas 
[\[147b.2\]]nas byams pa'i chos lngar nges pa yin te/_mdo sde rgyan gyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa rgyan gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa dang*/_rgyud bla mas ni 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo'i don gtan la 'bebs 
[\[147b.3\]]pas ni mdo so so ba dang*/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pas ni gang zag gcig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi rim pa ston la/_chos dang chos nyid rnam 'byed kyis ni de'i nang nas theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gyi rim pa ston pas na/_gnyis pos 
[\[147b.4\]]mdo'i don thun mong du gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bzhed do/_/kha cig ni rtsa ba lus lta bu'i bstan bcos dang*/_gyes pa yan lag lta bu'i bstan bcos te rnam pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas nas chos lngar nges pa yin te/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan dang mdo sde rgyan 
[\[147b.5\]]gnyis kyis mdo sde'i sde snod dang*/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pas ni mngon pa'i sde snod gtan la 'bebs pas gtso bo lus lta bu'i bstan bcos yin la/_rgyud bla mas ni/_mdo sde rgyan du rigs chad kyi sems can yod par bstan pa de dgongs pa can du bstan nas 
[\[147b.6\]]sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can du bsgrub pa dang*/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pas ni dbus mthar theg pa thun mong ba'i lam gyi rim pa bstan kyang*/_theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gyi rim pa ma bstan pa de 'dis bstan pas na gnyis 
[\[147b.7\]]po gyes pa yan lag lta bu'i bstan bcos yin no zhes bzhed do/_/kha cig ni sde snod gsum gtan la 'bebs pa'i dbang du byas nas chos lngar nges pa yin te/_de yang mdo sde'i sde snod gtan la 'bebs pa ni mdo sde rgyan dang rgyud bla ma ste/_de yang snga mas ni mdo sde drang 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]ba'i don dang*/_nges pa'i don so sor ma phye bar gtan la 'bebs pa dang*/_phyi mas ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde bye brag tu gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro/_/'dul ba'i sde snod gtan la 'bebs pa ni/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan te/_de yang theg 
[\[148a.2\]]chen thun mong ma yin pa'i 'dul ba ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin la/_'di nyid kyis ni de'i gnyen por byed pa'i phyir ro/_/mngon pa'i sde snod gtan la 'bebs pa ni 'byed rnam pa gnyis te/_'di dag gis ni chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir 
[\[148a.3\]]ro zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar so so'i bzhed pa rnams smos nas 'dir yongs su grags pa'i rtsod bral gyi mkhas pa mang po rnams kyis bzhed pa'i don gyi snying po dril te brjod na/_chos lnga po 'di dag gis ni bshad par bya ba'i mdo sde theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i sde snod 
[\[148a.4\]]yin la/_de la yang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs pa dang*/_drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs pa dang*/_drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde sna tshogs gtan la 'bebs pa dang gsum las/_dang po nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs 
[\[148a.5\]]pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan dang rgyud bla ma gnyis te/_de las kyang snga mas ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs gcig kho na gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yin te gong du smos pa ltar ro/_/phyi mas ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde 'phags pa 
[\[148a.6\]]gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo dang*/_dpal phreng gi mdo dang*/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i mdo dang*/_'phel 'grib med pa'i mdo dang*/_ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo la sogs pa rigs du 
[\[148a.7\]]ma gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yin te/_'di ltar rgyud bla ma'i 'grel pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa las kyang 'di ltar 'byung ste/_rdo rje'i gnas bstan pa de yang rgyas par ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ste/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni bstan du med pa ste/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo chos ni brjod du med pa ste/_de ni rna bas mnyan par mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ni lus dang sems kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so zhes rdo rje'i gnas gsum po 'di ni lhag pa'i 
[\[148b.2\]]bsam pa bstan pa'i le'u'i rjes su 'brangs te rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lo/_/shA ri'i bu don 'di ni re zhig nyan thos dang*/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rang gi shes rab kyis yang 
[\[148b.3\]]dag par shes pa'am/_lta ba'am/_brtag par mi nus na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis lta ci smos te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtogs pa ni ma gtogs so/_/shA ri'i bu don dam par ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu don dam par zhes bya 
[\[148b.4\]]ba 'di ni sems can gyi khams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi sku'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so zhes rdo rje'i gnas bzhi pa 'di 
[\[148b.5\]]ni 'grib pa med pa dang 'phel ba med pa nyid bstan pa'i rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[148b.6\]]dbyings zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so zhes rdo rje'i gnas lnga pa 'di ni 'phags pa dpal phreng gi mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/_gang+gA'i klung 
[\[148b.7\]]gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag dang*/_rnam par dbyer med pa'i chos dang ldan pa ma bral ba'i ye shes kyi yon tan can yin no zhes rdo rje'i gnas drug pa 'di ni 'grib pa med cing 'phel ba med pa nyid bstan pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o/_/'jam 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog par mi mdzad/_rnam par rtog par mi mdzad mod kyi/_de lta na yang de 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi mdzad pa 'di ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa bzhin du lhun gyis grub par 'jug go zhes rdo rje'i gnas bdun pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[149a.2\]]pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o/_/de ltar mdor bsdus nas rdo rje'i gnas bdun po 'di ni bstan pa'i sgo bsdus pa'i don gyis na bstan bcos 'di mtha' dag gi lus su rig par bya'o/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[149a.3\]]gnas bdun po 'di dag las rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang*/_rjes su 'brel pa ni go rim ji lta bar 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdor gleng gzhi'i le'u las gnas gsum rig par bya la/_de'i 'og tu lhag ma bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin 
[\[149a.4\]]gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbye ba las so/_/de las ji skad du/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor ba/_slob ma'i tshogs shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa mnga' ba zhes gsungs te/_rtsa 
[\[149a.5\]]ba'i tshig 'di gsum gyis ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin du dkon mchog gsum rim gyis skye ba 'grub pa rnam par gzhag par rig par bya la/_lhag ma gnas bzhi ni dkon mchog gsum 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyu 'grub pa bstan par rig par bya'o zhes sogs rgyas par gsungs 
[\[149a.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs pa ni dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang*/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa gnyis te/_de dag gis ni mdo dgongs pa nges 'grel la sogs pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa drang ba'i 
[\[149a.7\]]don dang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde sna tshogs gtan la 'bebs pa ni mdo sde rgyan te/_'dis ni gzhi'i dus su rigs chad kyi sems can yod par bshad pa dang*/_lam gyi dus su chos thams cad skye ba med par gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo drang ba'i don du ston pa dang*/_'bras bu'i dus 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]su mthar thug theg pa gcig tu nges pa drang ba'i don du bstan nas mthar thug theg pa gsum du bstan pa rnams kyis drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir dang*/_gzhi'i dus su sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can du bstan pa dang*/_lam gyi dus 
[\[149b.2\]]su pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang*/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i spyod pa dang*/_'bras bu'i dus su sku gsum dang ye shes bzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa ston pa rnams kyis nges don gyi mdo sde gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis pa ji ltar gtan la 'bebs pa'i tshul bye brag tu bshad pa 
[\[149b.3\]]ni/_mdo sde rgyan gyis theg pa chen po'i drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde du ma'i don thams cad dpe lngas mtshon pa'i don rnam pa lnga'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin te/_de'ang rgyan gyi rgya cher bshad pa las bsgrub par bya ba dang*/_bye brag tu shes par bya ba dang*/_bsam 
[\[149b.4\]]par bya ba dang*/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang*/_yongs su grub pa rtogs pa'i don so so rang gis rig par bya ba dang*/_byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes dang*/_de'i 'grel bshad las 'dir ni theg pa chen por dngos po lnga po dang*/_ngo bo nyid gsum dang*/_gang 
[\[149b.5\]]zag rnam par gzhag pa ste rnam pa gsum gyis 'grel to/_/de la dngos po lnga gang zhe na/_ming dang*/_rgyu mtshan dang*/_rnam par rtog pa dang*/_de bzhin nyid dang*/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs shing ngo bo nyid gsum ni kun brtag dang gzhan dbang 
[\[149b.6\]]dang yongs grub gsum mo/_/dpe lnga'i rtsa bar/_ji skad du/_gser las brdung byas 'dra zhing pad+ma rgyas pa bzhin/_/bkres pas nyen pa g.yos legs kha zas za ba 'dra/_/phrin yig legs pa thos 'dra rin chen sgrom phye ltar/_/chos de 'dir bshad pa yang dga' ba'i 
[\[149b.7\]]mchog bskyed do/_/zhes 'byung ba bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa ring thung sna tshogs par spel ba'i gzhung gi tshad bam po gnyis/_le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'i le'u dang pos spyir bstan/_le'u gnyis pas theg pa chen po bkar sgrub pa dang*/_gsum pas 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang*/_bzhi pas rigs bstan pa dang*/_lnga pas sems bskyed pa dang*/_drug pas bsgrub pa dang*/_bdun pas de kho na nyid dang*/_brgyad pas mthu dang*/_dgu pas yongs su smin pa dang*/_bcu pas byang chub dang*/_bcu gcig pas mos pa 
[\[150a.2\]]dang*/_bcu gnyis pas yongs su tshol ba dang*/_bcu gsum pas bshad pa dang*/_bcu bzhi pas bsgrub pa dang*/_bco lnga pas gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa dang*/_bcu drug pas thabs dang ldan pa'i las dang*/_bcu bdun pas pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsdu ba dang*/_bco brgyad pas 
[\[150a.3\]]mchod pa dang bsnyen pa tshad med dang*/_bcu dgu pas byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang*/_nyi shu pas yon tan dang*/_nyer gcig pas spyod pa dang mthar thug bstan pa rnams so/_/dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa ni/_mtha' zhes bya ba ni yod med dang*/_rtag chad kyi lta ba'o/_/
[\[150a.4\]]dbus zhes bya ba ni de nyid spangs pa dbu ma'i lam ste/_de dag rnam par 'byed pas na de skad ces bya zhing*/_'dis ni theg pa thun mong ba'i lam gyi rim pa dang*/_theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gyi rim pa don bdun gyi sgo nas bstan pa ste/_de yang*/_mtshan nyid sgrib pa de kho na/_/
[\[150a.5\]]gnyen po dag ni bsgom pa dang*/_/de yi gnas dang 'bras bu thob/_/theg pa bla na med pa'o/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar tshigs su bcad pa gzhung gi tshad le'u lnga la sh+lau ka bdun cu yod pa'i le'u dang pos mtshan nyid dang*/_gnyis pas sgrib pa dang*/_gsum pas de kho na nyid dang*/_bzhi pas gnyen 
[\[150a.6\]]po sgom pa dang*/_lnga pas bla na med pa dang bcas pa'o/_/chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni/_chos ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i chos so/_/chos nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos te de gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu ston pas na de skad ces bya ste/_ji skad du/_'di dag thams 
[\[150a.7\]]cad ni gnyis kyis bsdus te/chos dang chos nyid kyis so/_/chos kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni 'khor ba'o/_/'di nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ba ltar tshig lhug par 'dod pa'o/_/rgyud bla ma ni/_gzhung 'di nyid kyi skad dod du ut+ta ra zhes 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'byung ba mchog dang*/_bla ma dang*/_byang dang*/_phyi ma rnams su 'jug ste/_de'ang theg pa chen po'i rgyud dam/_rgyun chags pa'i chos rnams kyi gong mar gyur pas sam/_yang na theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma'i dgongs pa 'grel pas de skad ces bya zhing*/_'dis ni sngar smos pa'i 
[\[150b.2\]]mdo sde de rnams kyis don rdo rje'i gnas bdun du bsdus nas ston pa ste/_ji skad du/_sangs rgyas chos tshogs khams dang byang chub dang*/_/yon tan sangs rgyas phrin las tha ma ste/_/bstan bcos kun gyi lus ni mdor bsdu na/_/rdo rje yi ni gnas bdun 'di dag go_/zhes 
[\[150b.3\]]'byung ba ltar tshigs su bcad pa ring thung sna tshogs yod pa skabs bzhi'i skabs dang pos dkon mchog gsum dang*/_khams bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po dang*/_skabs gnyis pas 'bras bu byang chub dang*/_skabs gsum pas yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi dang*/_skabs 
[\[150b.4\]]bzhi pas phrin las dang*/_skabs lnga pas ji skad bsgrags pa'i gnas bzhi po dag la lhag par mos pa rnams kyis lhag par mos pa'i phan yon bstan pa dang bshad pa/_mjug gi don bstan bcos brtsams pa'i tshul/_bdag nyid dag pa'i thabs bstan pa/_nyams pa'i rgyu dang 
[\[150b.5\]]'bras bu bstan pa/_brtsams pa'i dge ba bsngo ba bsdus pa'i don dang bcas pa rnams bstan to/_/de ltar bshad pa de dag gi steng du mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan bsnan pa la byams pa'i chos lnga zhes bya'o/_/de dag dang rjes su 'brangs pa'i 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i chos bdun 
[\[150b.6\]]las sa sde lnga ni rtsa ba lta bu yin la/_de dag las sa'i dngos gzhis ni gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i cha rkyen thams cad sa bcu bdun du bsdus nas ston pa ste/_de nyid las 'byung ba'i spyi sdom du/_rnam shes lnga dang ldan pa'i sa/_/yid kyi sa dang gzhan gsum ste/_/rtog dpyod 
[\[150b.7\]]bcas la sogs pa dang*/_/ting 'dzin bcas dang ma yin dang*/_/sems yod pa dang sems med dang*/_/thos dang bsam dang bsgom ldan dang*/_/de bzhin theg pa gsum ldan dang*/_/phung por bcas dang phung med gzhan/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar bcu bdun po de yang rten dang*/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]spyod pa dang*/_'bras bu gsum gyi dbang du mdzad pa yin te/_de yang rten gyi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas sa dang po gnyis te/_nyams su len pa'i rten de yang rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi rgyun la 'jog dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar 'jug pa'i dbang du

[\[151a.3\]]'jug pa dang*/_bsam gtan gnyis pa man chad du rtog pa med pa dang*/_dpyod pa med pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du byas nas ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i sa bzhi ste/_rten de nyid gzugs dang gzugs med pa na ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa 
[\[151a.4\]]dang*/_'dod pa na ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa ma yin pa dang*/_snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na sems med pa dang*/_de las gzhan du ni sems yod pa'i phyir ro/_/go rim gyi dbang du byas nas thos pa dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_bsgom pa'i sa gsum ste/_

[\[151a.6\]]byas nas sa lhag ma gnyis po ste/_de lta bu'i rten de yang mthar thug theg pa gsum gyi 'bras bu phung po lhag bcas dang*/_lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/de skad du yang*/_sa'i stod 'grel du/_rang bzhin du ni ji ltar 'jug_/de la de 
[\[151a.7\]]yi gnas skabs dang*/_/go rim dang ni gang thob dang*/_/de la de ni 'gro ba yin/_/zhes so/_/rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu bas ni sa'i dngos gzhi'i 'grel pa lta bur byed par yang gsungs te/_de'i gnas skabs kyi tshig don gnyis ka mu bzhi la sogs par gtan la 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]dbab par bstan la/_de'i nang nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang*/_rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin no/_/de ltar bshad ma thag pa gnyis po des ni gsung rab rnams kyi brjod par bya ba'i don gyi cha gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yin no/_/gzhi bsdu bas ni 
[\[151b.2\]]rjod par byed pa'i gzhung de dag sde snod gsum du bsdu ba'i tshul bstan pa ste/_'di nyid kyi mdor bstan pa'i skabs su sde snod gsum ga bsdu ba 'byung ba smos nas/_rgyas par bshad pa na mdo sde dang*/_'dul ba gnyis las mi 'byung ba ni sa sde lnga ka ma mo'i bsdu ba yin pas logs 
[\[151b.3\]]su ma bstan pa yin te/_ji skad du/_de la ma mo bsdu ba ni/_sa bcu bdun dang bsdu ba bzhi'o zhes 'byung bas so/_/rnam grangs bsdu ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bye brag tu gtan la 'bebs pa ste/_'di gnyis kyi gsung rab

[\[151b.5\]]sdom rnam pa gnyis las mngon pa kun las btus ni theg pa thun mong ba'i sdom yin te/_nyan thos pa dang thun mong du phyi rol gyi rnam par gzhag pa dang*/_rnal 'byor spyod pa dang*/_thun mong du mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum dang*/_rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad la sogs pa'i rnam

[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]yi rgyu 'bras de rab dbye ba dang*/_/bslab pa gsum dang de 'bras spang ba dang*/_/ye shes theg pa mchog gyur khyad par 'phags/_/zhes pa'i don rnam pa bcur bsdus nas ston pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'og tu dbyig gnyen gyis rang rgyud du brtsams pa'i bstan 
[\[152a.2\]]bcos lnga dang gzhan 'grel TI kar brtsams pa gsum ste/_rab tu byed pa sde brgyad brtsams pa ni/_chos thams cad sems tsam du ston pa sum cu pa'i rab tu byed pa ste/_'dis ni chos dang gang zag gi 'gro ba thams cad gyur pa gsum du bsdus nas bdag med pa gnyis bstan pa'i 
[\[152a.3\]]phyir ro/_/de rigs pas sgrub pa nyi shu pa'i rab tu byed pa ste/_snang ba thams cad sems yin pa'i sgrub byed bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar chos thams cad sems yin na phung po lnga'i rnam par gzhag pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na/_de 'thad par ston pa phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa'o/_/

[\[152a.5\]]mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis 'thad par ston pa rten 'brel gyi mdo'i 'grel pa/_mtshan nyid gsum 'thad par ston pa dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang gsum ste brgyad do/_/kha cig slob dpon 'dis mdzad pa'i chos 
[\[152a.6\]]dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang*/_sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa mang du mdzad pas sde brgyad kyi grangs nges med ces dang*/_gzhan yang 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i rgyud bla ma'i 'grel pa sogs kyang bgrang du rung ste/_byams pa dang 'brel pa'i

[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]kyi gdams ngag gi rnam grangs spyir bstan pa dang*/_skabs su babs pa'i rgyud kyi rnam 'grel dper mtshon pa'o/_/dang po la spyir rgyud sde rin po che 'grel ba'am bshad pa'i thabs kyi gdams ngag bsam gyis mi khyab na'ang phal cher rnam pa drug tu 'du bar bzhed do/_/de'ang 
[\[152b.2\]]'di lta ste/_gdams ngag drug gis bshad pa dang*/_rgyud gsum gyis bshad pa dang*/_bdag nyid can gsum gyis bshad pa dang*/_gnas pa bzhis bshad pa dang*/_dag pa gsum gyis bshad pa dang*/_gsang ba bdun gyis bshad pa'o/_/dang po ni/_'grel pa pos 'grel sla zhing

[\[152b.4\]]pa'i sgra ni yan lag gi don gyis bshad pa dang*/_yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa dang*/_man ngag gi don gyis bshad pa ste gsum mo/_/de ltar yang dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/_yi ge dang ni yan lag dang*/_/bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don/_/sbas dang de bzhin mthar thug par/_/

[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]zla ba grags pas kyang*/_mdo sogs la ni rab zhugs pa'i/_/'gyod pa zlog par byed pa dang*/_/bskyed pa'i rim dang ldan pa dag_/spyi yi don ni yin par bshad/_/ces so/_/sbas pa'i don zhes bya ba ni/_bum pa'i dbang thob pa tsam la ma grags shing

[\[153a.3\]]dang ni/_/rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pas kyang*/_/kun rdzob don dam tshul can gyis/_/byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed/_/ces so/_/mthar thug pa'i don zhes bya ba ni lam gang yin pa des mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa ste/_de la'ang spyi'i mthar thug pa ni thun mong 
[\[153a.4\]]ba'i 'bras bu kun du 'od kyi sa dang*/_sbas pa'i mthar thug pa ni gsang sngags bla na med pa'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa nyid de/_'di nas bshad pa'i sku dang ye shes dang shes bya thams cad rang snang du mkhyen pa'i tshul la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung nas ma bshad pa'i khyad

[\[153a.7\]]pa'i ming dang*/_bstan bcos las grags pa'i ming dang*/_de dag 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nges pa'i tshig yod pa dang med pa skabs dang bstun pa'i bshad pa rnams dang*/_de nyid 'dus par gyur pa'i tshig gis gzhung gi don rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas rnams su tshig gi 'byed sdud dang bya ba dang byed 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]pa dang las kyi tshig la sogs pas rnam par phye nas seng ge'i lta stangs dang*/_sbal pa'i 'phar ba dang*/_rus sbal gyi bzhi 'gros dang*/_stag mo'i mchong stabs zhes bya ba ste rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhung gi tshig don gtan la phebs par 'chad pa'am/_yang na/_dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas 
[\[153b.2\]]dang*/_/tshig don bcas dang mtshams sbyor bcas/_/brgal lan bcas te bsnyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam par 'grel ba'o/_/yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa ni/_gzhung tshig gis rgyu mtshan dngos su mi rnyed kyang yi ge so sor byas pas don rtogs par 'gyur ba dag la ni yi ge'i sgra las 
[\[153b.3\]]drangs te bshad pa dang*/_yi ge kha phral te bshad pa dang*/_yi ge dbyibs mthun par bshad pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'grel ba'o/_/bsdus pa'i don gyis man ngag gis bshad pa ni/_yan lag dang yi ge gnyis kas bshad du mi btub pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i brdar gyur pa mtha' dag 
[\[153b.4\]]bsdus pa'i don gyis rnam par bshad pas rtogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/_slob dpon zla ba grags pas/_ko Ta k+Sha la sogs pa'i sgra/_/'jig rten bstan bcos la med cing*/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa/_/'di ni ji bzhin min par brjod/_/ces pa lta bu'o/_/de lta bu'i bshad par bya ba

[\[154a.1\]]'gyur te de ltar mtha' drug go_/yang yi ge'i don dang*/_spyi'i don dang*/_sbas pa'i don dang*/_mthar thug pa'i don te bzhi po la tshul bzhi zhes pa'i tha snyad 'byung ste bshad pa'i tshul 'di dag kyang gdams ngag drug gi nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i bshad thabs de dag

[\[154a.3\]]bshad pa ni yan lag gi don gyi bshad pa'am/_yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'am/_gzhung thad so'i bshad pa'am/_yongs su grags pa'i bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/khyad par gzhung gi tshig 'ga' zhig tu/_gang zag pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa la dga' ba dang*/_bskyed pa'i rim pa la dga' ba

[\[154a.5\]]gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mthar thug pa'i don du bshad pa ste de dag ni rgyud don yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni 'jigs bral rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi bshad srol thun mong ma yin par 'dod do/_/gnyis pa ni/_sems kyi rgyud rgyun chags pa zhig

[\[154a.7\]]'bras bu ste/_/gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar te/_de'ang rgyu'i rgyud ni sems can thams cad kyi chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang chos can phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi chos sam lus dang ngag dang yid kyi chos ji ltar gnas pa rnams so/_/thabs kyi rgyud ni 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]smin par byed pa'i dbang dang grol bar byed pa'i lam 'khor dang bcas pa rnams so/_/'bras bu'i rgyud ni thabs de la goms par byas pas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub grub par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi mngon par rtogs pa gsum du rgyud kyi tshig don ma lus 
[\[154b.2\]]pa bsdus nas gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i nyams len du sbyar ba'i bshad pa ste/_tshul 'dis kyang rgyud gsum po gnas skabs gang dang gang du bab par de dang der 'grel ba dang*/_tshig 'ga' zhig tu rgyud gsum dang ldan par 'grel pa gnyis ka 'byung ba yin no/_/gsum pa ni/_dbang lam du bya ba'i phyir 
[\[154b.3\]]bdag nyid can gsum gyis bshad pa ste/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/_sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/_/sbyor ba rnam pa gsum gyis ni/_/srid pa'i nyes pas mi gos shing*/_/rgyud kyi don la 'jug par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don ni lus dang ngag dang sems dang rlung ste rgyu rnam pa bzhi yod pa dang*/_
[\[154b.4\]]de bzhin du dbang bzhi dang lam bzhi dang 'bras bu bzhi yod pas rim pa ltar dbyibs kyi bdag nyid dang*/_sngags kyi bdag nyid dang*/_dbang chos kyi bdag nyid dang*/_mthar thug chos kyi bdag nyid de rnam pa bzhir 'gyur na'ang dbang chos dang mthar thug chos gnyis gcig tu byas pa'i bdag nyid can gsum ste/_de dag gis 
[\[154b.5\]]rgyud 'grel pa la'ang bdag nyid can gsum gang du bab pa'i skabs so sor bshad pa dang*/_sngags dang dbyibs dang chos gsum tshang ba'i tshig re re la'ang rgyu dang dbang dang lam dang 'bras bur sbyar te bshad pas bshad pa'i thabs bcu gnyis sam chos gnyis so sor byas pa na/_bcu drug tu bshad 
[\[154b.6\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa ni/_'bras bu sku bzhi lam du bya ba'i phyir gnas pa bzhis bshad pa ste/_dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/_gong bu chu dang gzugs su bcas/_/de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa dang*/_/gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru ni/_/rgyud rnams nges pa kho na yin/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar longs 
[\[154b.7\]]spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni gong bur gnas pa dang*/_chos kyi sku ni chur gnas pa dang*/_sprul pa'i sku ni gzugs su gnas pa dang*/_ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni gzugs las 'das par gnas pa ste/_'bras bu gnas pa bzhi yin pa ltar sbyang gzhi la'ang mngal skyes kyi 'gro ba'i dbang du byas na nying mtshams sbyor ba dang*/
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga dang*/_'tsho ba'i gnas skabs dang*/_'chi ba'i gnas skabs te gnas pa bzhi dang*/_de bzhin du gsang dbang dang rang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i smin par byed pa dang grol bar byed pa dag la'ang gnas pa bzhi ste/_lam bzhi po'i nang gses 
[\[155a.2\]]kun du yang gnas pa bzhi bzhi yin no/_/'di dag gis rgyud 'grel ba la'ang gnas pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhung tshig so so'i skabs su bshad pa las/_tshig re la gnas pa bzhi bzhi sbyar ba med kyang rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i gnas pa gsum gzhung tshig gcig la sbyar du mi rung ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[155a.3\]]lnga pa ni/_spang bya mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba'i phyir dag pa gsum gyis bshad pa ste/_kye rdo rje las/_nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/_/dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/_/phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis/_/lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya/_/rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/_/dag 
[\[155a.4\]]pa gzhan gyi rnam grol yin/_/zhes pa ste/_rgyu'i rgyud ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa gsum dang*/_thabs kyi rgyud dri ma sbyong byed kyi dag pa gsum dang*/_'bras bu'i rgyud dri ma dang bral ba'i dag pa gsum ste/_'di dag gis rgyud 'grel ba'i tshul yang rgyud gsum so so'i thad sor bshad pa las tshig re 
[\[155a.5\]]la dag pa gsum ga sbyar du mi btub na'ang tshig re la rgyud gsum tshang ba nyid du bshad par bya ba yin no/_/drug pa ni/_snod dang mi ldan pa la gab cing gsang ba'i don du gsang ba bdun gyis bshad pa ni/_dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las/_gsang ba ni mi gsal ba'o/_/gsang ba ni de kho na nyid mdor 
[\[155a.6\]]bstan pa'o/_/gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o/_/gsang ba ni dam pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o/_/gsang ba ni gsang ba'i pad+ma'o/_/gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o/_/gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba bsdus pa'o/_/gsang ba ni bde ba mtha' yas pa ste rgyud kyi gzhung gi bshad pa'o zhes 
[\[155a.7\]]gsungs so/_/de'ang 'dir gsang ba brgyad du gsungs kyang*/_rgyud de nyid las/_gsang ba'i sgra ni bdun pa ste/_brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs pas/_thog ma dang tha ma'i gsang ba gnyis rtogs bya dang rtogs pa gnyis gnas lugs la ngo bo dbyer med pa'i 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]phyir gsang ba bdun du nges pa ste/_de dag kyang rim pa ltar smin par byed pa dang*/_bskyed pa'i rim pa dang*/_rtogs pa'i lta ba dang*/_pho nya dang*/_rang byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_lam gyi yan lag rnams bstan te/_'di dag gis rgyud 'grel ba'i tshul yang gzhung thams cad gnas 
[\[155b.2\]]skabs gang dang gang du 'brel bar thad sor bshad pa kho na las mi 'byung ba yin no/_/de lta bu'i bshad pa'i thabs 'di dag dang*/_slob dpon mi thub zla ba'i rgyud don yan lag lnga'i bshad pa zhes bya ba dang*/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag tu bcas pa dang*/_bde 
[\[155b.3\]]mchog nyung ngu'i gsang ba rnam pa gsum rnams phal cher mtshungs par bshad do/_/gzhan yang ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las rgyan bdun zhes bshad pa'i nang gses kyi mtha' drug dang tshul bzhi zhes pa'i bshad pa'i srol rnams kyang gdams ngag 'di dag tu don 
[\[155b.4\]]gyis ma 'dus pa med par gsungs so/_/de dag gis ni rgyud sde rin po che spyir 'grel ba'i tshul gyi rnam par gzhag pa cung zad cig bstan pa yin la/_bye brag tu nang gses kyi rgyud sde rin po che re re la'ang thabs kyi rgyud dang*/_shes rab kyi rgyud dang*/_gnyis su med pa'i rgyud dang*/_
[\[155b.5\]]de bzhin du bya ba'i rgyud dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa rgyud sde tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnam par 'grel pa'i tshul tha dad pa shin tu mang bar 'byung ste/_de dag ni 'dir bshad kyis ldang ba med pa'i phyir/_rgyud kyi rnam 'grel so so'i steng du 
[\[155b.6\]]legs par brtags pas shes par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa skabs su bab pa'i rgyud kyi rnam 'grel dper mtshon pa ni/_de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rgyud don 'grel par byed pa'i man ngag de dag ci rigs pa la brten nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rgyud don rnam par bkral ba'i 
[\[155b.7\]]bstan bcos rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i skor la/_gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po kye rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_bshad pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_dka' 'grel pad+ma can dang*/_kau mu ti la sogs pa dang*/_rdo rje gur 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]kyi dka' 'grel dang*/_saM pu Ta'i 'grel pa man ngag gi snye ma la sogs pa dang*/_dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/shes rab kyi rgyud la bde mchog rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi stod 'grel byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[156a.2\]]phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs dang*/_dpa' bo yid 'ong dang*/_mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud 'grel la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/thabs kyi rgyud la gsang ba 'dus pa 'phags pa'i skor la rgyud 'grel sgron ma gsal ba dang*/_sbyor ba yan 
[\[156a.3\]]lag drug pa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa dang*/_ye shes zhabs kyi skor la rgyud 'grel slob ma la phan pa la sogs pa lta bu ste/_de dag spyi'i dgongs 'grel du gyur pa sgrub pa'i thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yan lag dang bcas pa rnams lta bu'o/_/rgyud sde 'og ma'i skor 
[\[156a.4\]]la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa la sogs pa dang*/_spyod pa'i rgyud la rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa dang*/_bya ba'i rgyud la bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa rgyud so so dang spyi'i 'grel 
[\[156a.5\]]pa sgrub pa'i thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yan lag dang bcas pa rnams lta bu'o/_/de dag gis ni bka' lung gi dgongs pa rnam par 'grel ba'i rnam par gzhag pa la sogs pa mdo tsam re zhig brjod zin to/_/'dir smras pa/_srid [(*]sh+lau ka dgu po zung ldan gyi rgyan gyi bye brag las 'byung ba/[)]zhir bkra shis sgrub pa chos kyi dbyangs/_/
[\[156a.6\]]dbyangs mchog dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i gdangs nyid du/_/du ma'i mos par tha dad ston pa'i mchog_/mchoMg gi yon tan mthar phyin shAkya'i gtso/_/gtso bo 'jig rten gtso bos phyag byas pa'i/_/gsung rab gnyis med gsung dang dgongs 
[\[156a.7\]]gcig tu/_/ji bzhin sgra dang jiM bzhin min pa sogs/_/legs par mkhyen don legs 'doms rgyal ba'i sras/_/bden mthong rang stobs shing rta'i srol phye'am/_/gzhan gyi gzhung don la brten 'grel yang rung*/_/thams cad shes bya'i gnas kun 'chad pa la/_/thams 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mtshungs par smra/_/smra mchog smra ba'i nyi ma gang dag gis/_/legs bshad legs par gdams pa'i snang ba che/_/'jaMg rten 'jaMg rten 'das pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul/_/ji snyed jaM bzhin ston pa 'di rmad byung*/_/phyogs bral bde gshegs 
[\[156b.2\]]gshegs pa'i lam po che/_/rnam gnyis dngos grub grub pa'i thugs kyi bcud/_/lnga rig mkhas dbang dbang pos bshad bya ba/_/legs pa'i lam 'gro 'gro ba'i mig 'di yin/_/brgya lam skye ba'i phreng bar mjal dka' dka'/_/mjal ba snying po kun gyis rab lci lci/_/mchog 
[\[156b.3\]]tu rnam grol snying pos ches brling brling /_/sbyin 'di thob pa'i skal ba rmad byung byung*/_/yang yang skye bar sbyangs pa'i blo gros kyis/_/gsal gsal yang dag rtogs nas gsungs pa'i chos/_/yang yang dpyad pa gsum gyis dag gyur pa/_/rang rang mos pa blangs don mi chung 
[\[156b.4\]]grang*/_/kun phan gzhon nu rtse dga' dran pa yis/_/kun nas 'od kyi sor mo rab brkyangs nas/_/kun+da'i 'dab ma nas bzung 'byed pa'i tshe/_/kun dga'i 'dzum brgya grol la su yis 'gog_/smra mchog rnams kyi bka' don bkral ba'i tshul/_/tshul lugs mang 
[\[156b.5\]]po'i khyad par mdo tsam du/_/du ma'i lung las nye bar 'phos pa'i dbyangs/_/dbyangs kyi rgyal mo'i glu yi spun zlar blangs/_/rjod byed [(*]rab rtog las sems ldan rab rtog[ )]snyan pa'i /_gdangs las chos kyi don/_/ci yang 'dren pa'i mtshar la ma bzod par/_/yid 'phrog sgra ngan spangs pa mtho ris su/_/bros te rang gi gling bur 
[\[156b.6\]]bshung pa 'dra/_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal 
[\[156b.7\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_'grel tshul nges pa'i ched du bstan bcos kun gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i sarga ste bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]d+harmot+tarAnan+dadadAtiloket+yAgomahAram+b+hamahAtsad+hIrakr-it+temahAsatwabatIdzinAnAMkarmAr+NabAbash+yabikurbaNaiwaM/
[\[157a.2\]]@#/_/[(]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]chos mchog kun du dga' ster 'jig rten na/_/brtan byed rtsom pa che dang gtong ba che/_/snying stobs che ldan de dag rgyal rnams kyi/_/phrin las rgya mtsho'i rnam 'phrul nges pa nyid/_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\](*]gzugs can las ma bsdus pa/[)]sde bzhi'i snye ma dud pa'i tshal du stobs kyi shing rtar yang dag 'dzegs/_/bsdu dngos bzhi yi 'khor lo'i 'gros mdzes snying rje'i gdung skyob dkar po yis/_/'jig rten khams su rdzogs ldan chos kyi grib ma yid du 'ong 'jo ba/_/chos dang srid par dge ba'i rgyal srid cig car skyong ba'i 
[\[157b.2\]]mi bdag yod/_/[(]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]je mtho'i rigs kyi sa bon ma rmas pa/_/bde bar 'gro ba'i zhing sar btab pa las/_/lus can yongs kyi mnyes gshin zla med pa'i/_/skyes bu dam pa'i lo tog ci yang legs/_/[(*]yon tan lhan cig brjod pa la chos kyi dpes brling ba/[)]de de'i rgyud du 'bab stegs legs byas pa'i/_/bzhin
[\[157b.3\]]bzang lang tsho gsar bu'i dpal nyid dang*/_/mnyam du sgyu rtsal kun la rab sgrin pa'i/_/gtam snyan dang po'i pho nya bzhin du rgyu/_/[(*]rgyu'i rgyan las thob par byed pa/[)]'ga' zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/_/blo ldan rnams kyi 'jug ngogs shes 
[\[157b.4\]]bya'i gnas/_/grangs med spro ba mchog gis rab sbyangs pas/_/mkhas dang grub pa'i rtse mor ma phyin su/_/[(*]rig byed kyi lo rgyus las drangs pa'i mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]zab brling gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs 'chang ba 'ga'/_/bstan jus rma bya'i theg pa la chibs nas/_/las dbang sha za'i mdung rnon thogs pa'i 
[\[157b.5\]]mdun/_/'tshe byed pa sangs slob mas ci ste tshugs/_/[(*]zol bstod las dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa/[)]rnam 'dren bstan pa skyong bar tshe ring lhas/_/bskos pa'i mi bdag khyod kyi mthu chen pos/_/mi bdag gzhan gyi grags pa zil gnon pa'i/_/thub chod las 'di chos la rigs 
[\[157b.6\]]sam ci/_/[(*]gzugs can las mtha' dag gzugs/[)]bsod nams gser gyi sgo nga'i sbubs yangs nas/_/legs 'khrungs mi yi rje bo 'jig rten mgoMn/_/gtsug lag rig byed 'chad pa'i dang po de/_/chab srid 'jig rten mdzes pa'i dpal du byon/_/[(*]don gzhan bkod pa las khyad par la gnas pa/[)]lhag pa'i lhas bskyed blo
[\[157b.7\]]gros dkyil 'khor du/_/rig pa'i gzhung brgya song yang khengs pa ci/_/che ba'i rgya mtsho nyid du dag byed ma/_/mtha' dag phyin pas ngoms pa nam zhig mthong*/_/[(]rkang pa dang po dang gsum par yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]rgyal ba'i phrin 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]las bar chad med sa bon/_/'dzam gling yangs ma'i mngal du legs bzung ba/_/rgyal ba'i sras su nges par zlos pa la/_/bla ma che zhes phyogs kyi blo ldan smra/_/[(*]dga' ba las dngos thob/[)]'jig rten kun dga' 'byung ba'i phrin las kyis/_/rgya mtsho'i ska rags ldan par mdzes khyod ni/_/
[\[158a.2\]]srid pas thob pa'i dga' ba mtha' yas 'di/_/nyid las gzhan pa'i drin gyis ci ste thob/_/[(*]gzugs can las ldan pa/[)]snga na med pa'i bde skyid me tog 'dab/_/'dzum ldan grags pa dge ba'i rkang drug gi_/glu snyan 'bum du 'byin pas bod chen po/_/legs ldan dpyid kyi dpal des mdzes 
[\[158a.3\]]par byas/_/[(*]ldog pa can las gnyis kyi ldog pa/[)]che ba'i khengs ldan mang po'i thor tshugs rtse/_/mdzes byed gang gi zhabs dang rtsa lag 'tsho/_/dri bzang khang pa drod kyi reg pas rnyings/_/khyod zhabs mdzes pa'i lang tsho yol ba med/_/[(*]bsnyon dor las chos la bsnyon pa/[)]bka' lung yi ge'i gzugs su 'khrungs pa res/_/'gro ba'i 
[\[158a.4\]]mi bde bcil ba sngon las mthu/_/ma yin zug rngu thams cad 'byin byed pa'i/_/sman mchog stong gi thigs pas bran par nges/_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi rab rtog la dpe'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa/[)]rnam 'byed blo gros 'bar ba'i lce bzhin du/_/g.yo ba de mthong shes bya'i dngos po dag_/rang gi brtan 
[\[158a.5\]]pa za phyir glal snyam du/_/skrag ste rang bzhin mngon sum bstan pa 'dra/_/[(*]rgyu'i rgyan las rigs 'bras/[)]phyogs dang phyogs bral dag gi rgyal rigs la/_/bsngags pa'i snyan dngags glu ru blangs rnams kyang*/_/'di na snying rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs gang gi_/che ba'i yon 
[\[158a.6\]]tan brjod pa'i 'phrin du byung*/_/[(*]gzugs can las ldan pa/[)]mi dman bsod nams yangs pa'i dga' tshal du/_/srid gsum 'byor pa yongs su spungs pas kyang*/_/bye ba brgya stong cha shas phod min pa'i/_/legs byas chos kyi sdong po 'di 'khrungs so/_/[(*]gzugs can las mi mnyam pa/[)]mthong ba'i chos kyi phan pa nyi tshe yang*/_/che bar 
[\[158a.7\]]sgro btags tshig gi sbun ma de/_/'ud chen rlung gi rta la bskyon nas ni/_/bsngags pa dbyangs su brjod dang ci zhig mtshungs/_/[(]bai dar+b+ha'i mdzes pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la sbyar ba/[)]sems rgyud la zhen rnam par gnag pa'i dri/_/gnyen po chung ngu yis kyang 'jig pa'i chos/_/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]legs par byin pa'i bka' drin gzugs can du/_/grub na srid pa gsum du cang chud dam/_/[(*]snyam sgra can gyi rab rtog[)]legs byas pha rol mthong dka' mi bdag gi/_/rtogs brjod mtha' yas tshig tu 'khrungs pa'i tshad/_/'jal byed khur chen khyer ba'i gnyis las 'thung*/_/rab tu brtan de srid pas sprul lam snyam/_/
[\[158b.2\](*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi dpe/[)]'on te che ba'i char las gzhan gyis gsos/_/ngoms par btung bas rgyas pa'i dbyangs bzhin du/_/legs par brtags pa'i mthong don cung zad cig_/tshig tu bsdebs pa 'di la dga' bas nyon/_/spyi don lnga pa bstan pa gnas pa'i ched du dgongs 'grel par du sgrub par 
[\[158b.3\]]bskul ba la/_gang gis bskul ba bstan pa'i sgron ma chen po'i khyad par dang*/_gang la bskul ba bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po'i khyad par ro/_/dang po la ngos gzung ba dang*/_de'i che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa gnyis las/_dang po bstan pa'i sgron mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa 
[\[158b.4\]]ni spyir stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che gang dang gang du dar ba de dang de dag gi phyogs dang phyogs bral kun du mdzes par byed pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chos bzhin du smra zhing chos bzhin du mdzad pa gang dag 'byon par 'gyur ba ston pa thub pa'i dbang po nyid kyis lung bstan pa'i skyes bu dam pa ste/_de 
[\[158b.5\]]la'ang dbye na/_'byon 'gyur gyi skyes bu dam pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi mtshan nas dngos su smos te lung bstan pa dang*/_brgyud nas ni/_dper na/_ba tsha chu klung gi mdo las/_snga brgya tha mar gyur pa'i tshe/_/nga nyid slob dpon gzugs kyis gnas/_/nga yin snyam du yid byos la/_/de tshe de la gus pa skyed/_/
[\[158b.6\]]ces gsungs pa ltar ston pa rang gi mkhyen brtse nus pa rgya mtsho chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyi drwa ba nyid du lung bstan pa'i skyes bu dam pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che skyong ba la thugs rtse gcig tu phyogs pa grangs med pa dag 'byon par gsungs pa las/_'dir skabs su bab pa ni phyi ma ste/_de la yang 
[\[158b.7\]]'dir rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po'i chos kyi khri chen po la mnga' gsol ba'i gdan rabs sum cu par gyur pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa zhes yongs su grags pa de nyid do/_/gnyis pa ni/_'dis sngon gyi skye ba ji ltar bzhes pa'i dbang du bgyis na/_'phags 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta mang po'i gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa dpal dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i rnam par 'phrul pa nyid du dngos dang mngon par shes pa'i me long sgrib pa med pa thogs pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang lung bstan pa dang*/_bar skabs su'ang rje btsun dam pa nyid kyi nyams kyi snang 
[\[159a.2\]]ba la rgya gar rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po mdzad pa'i sngon gyi skye ba dran pa byung ba dang*/_gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir yang bka' gdams pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po zhig gi skye ba blangs par gsungs pa dang*/_e waM chos ldan gyi gdan rabs bcu bzhi pa mkhan po rin po che dpal ldan don grub ste/_
[\[159a.3\]]de la sogs pa mkhas pa dang grub pa'i yon tan brnyes pa mang po'i sku'i skye ba lu gu rgyud du bzhes nas/_dus de dang de dag tu 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don mtha' yas par mdzad pa zhig go/_/skye ba 'dir yang gzhung lugs mang po'i don la legs par sbyangs pas/_chos dang chos ma yin pa rnam par 
[\[159a.4\]]dpyod pas log par smra ba gzhan tshar gcod pa la shin tu mkhas shing*/_nang du gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sngags kyi rig pa grub pas rtogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang 'byor ba'i rdo rje slob dpon chen por gyur pa'o/_/bye brag tu 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir thub pa'i rgyal 
[\[159a.5\]]tshab kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po zhes rgyal ba nyid kyi zhal sgo nas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i sgra las lung bstan pa'i skyes bu dam pa ste/_de'ang gang las lung bstan pa yin snyam na/_'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin 
[\[159a.6\]]pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo las/_de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul/_/de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po 'byung*/_/tshul khrims kyis kyang khyad par 'phags gyur la/_/thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags/_/thabs dang shes rab la ni shin tu bslabs/_/
[\[159a.7\]]de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa/_/mang du thos kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med/_/dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming*/_/de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa/_/de 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur/_/de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi des ni/_/ming gi 'ang sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na/_/dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa/_/de yi ming gis las ni de byed de/_/bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 
[\[159b.2\]]'gyur/_/gang gis mthong dang bsti stang byed ci smos/_/des na rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa/_/kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des/_/rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba/_/byang chub bzhugs pa ci mchis de la zhus/_/kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i 
[\[159b.3\]]ming*/_/'jig rten khams 'dir yongs su bsgrags pa na/_/gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba/_/rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yi/_/dge slong gzhan gyis 'di la rtsod par 'gyur/_/chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes/_/'jig rten phyin ci log 
[\[159b.4\]]la kun dgar ltos/_/de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni/_/nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags/_/nga yi byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang*/_/de tshe sems can lta can spro ba med/_/phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe/_/srog kyang btang nas de bzhin bya snyam ste/_/
[\[159b.5\]]nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byed/_/kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang*/_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang*/_/yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du/_/dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de la ltos/_/kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag 
[\[159b.6\]]mthong*/_/gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa/_/de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med/_/de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur/_/de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin/_/de dag thams cad tshogs par shes par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs/_yang dam 
[\[159b.7\]]chos pad+ma dkar po las/_ngas ni dge slong dge 'dun mos par byas/_/kun dga' bzang po nga yi chos 'dzin pa/_/bde gshegs bye ba drug cu mchod byas nas/_/ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe na rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de yi ming ni rgya mtsho blo 'dzin te/_/mngon par shes thob ces kyang de na grags/_/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]lta na sdug pa yongs su dag pa'i zhing*/_/ma bsnyal rgyal mtshan rgyal ba'i ba dan no/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i ji snyed der/_/de bas lhag pa yongs su smin par byed/_/rgyal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du ni sgra yang 
[\[160a.2\]]bsgrags/_/de yi tshe yang dpag tu med par 'gyur/_/'jig rten rnams na phan zhing brtse phyir gnas/_/skyob pa de ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/nyis 'gyur de yi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas gzugs brnyan de yi nyis 'gyur du/_/gnas te rgyal ba de yi bstan pa la/_/de na 
[\[160a.3\]]sems can gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba de la rgyu yang bskyed/_/ces so/_/de ltar sa'i steng thams cad du yongs su grags pa'i skyes bu chen po de nyid kyi lugs srol dri ma med par smra ba'i gdan rabs kyi khri la zhabs kyi 'khor lo rnam par bkod pa'i bstan pa'i mnga' bdag chen 
[\[160a.4\]]po nyid du gyur te/_der chos kyi khri la bzhugs nas kyang bgrang gzhi gsum gyi bar du bstan pa'i bya ba rgya chen po'i khur khyer ba'i sgo nas sdom pa gsum gyi phrin las bzang po gang+gA'i rgyun chen po bzhin du rnam par spros te/_de'i rgyun yang nam mkha' ji srid kyi bar du gnas par byed pa'i slob ma'i 
[\[160a.5\]]tshogs dpag tu med pa bskrun no/_/slar yang bod chen gyi ljongs 'dir skye ba nas skye ba'i phreng bar las bzang dang smon lam gyi sa bon legs par bzung ba'i dpal sa'i steng gi chos rgyal chen po sde dge bstan pa tshe ring yab sras rnams kyis spyan drangs pa ltar ljongs 'dir byon te mi bdag chen 
[\[160a.6\]]pos rigs kyi cod paN gcig pu bar mnga' gsol lo/_/de nas brtsams te dpal sa'i dbang phyug sde dge rgyal po yab sras rnams dang mnga' 'og tu gtogs pas mtshon te/_yangs pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba rgya mtsho smin grol gyi lam la bkod pa dang*/_rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bya ba 
[\[160a.7\]]yang dag par byas so/_/de dag gi tshul rgyas pa ni de nyid kyi rnam par thar ba dpag bsam gyi ljon pa zhes bya ba las 'byung ba ltar shes par bya ba las 'dir ma spros so/_/de ltar mchod yon nyi zla zung du 'grel pa ltar bzhugs shing chos dang srid kyi phrin las rab tu rgyas par gyur pa'i dus der mkhan po 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]chen po de nyid nas dgongs 'grel 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos kyi sbyin pa mi zad pa'i rgyun gyi phyi mo 'di dag par du bsgrub par bskul te/_de'ang 'di skad du bka' stsal pa thos te/_deng sa skyong bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po dri ma med pa'i rigs sras kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i phrin las kyi gtso bo rgyal ba'i 
[\[160b.2\]]gsung rab 'gyur ro 'tshal par du bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i bgyi ba bla na med pa gang dag mthar phyin pa ni shin tu rjes su yi rang bar gyur cing*/_slar yang rgyal ba'i bka' don yang dag par gsal bar byed pa la ni dgongs 'grel rin po che 'phags pa'i yul nas gangs can pa'i brda'i lam 
[\[160b.3\]]du 'gyur ro 'tshal 'di dag la rag las pa dang*/_'di dag gnyis ka gang du bzhugs pa de na lung gi dam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par gnas par 'dod pa dang*/_'di dag bzhugs pa la brten nas 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun du gnas 
[\[160b.4\]]pa'i rgyur 'gro ste/_ji skad du/_chos rnams thams cad bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis su 'dus/_/legs par gsungs dang de yi dgongs 'grel bcas/_/de yi dbang gis shAkya'i bstan pa 'di/_/'jig rten khams su yun ring gnas par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la 
[\[160b.5\]]sogs pa'i phan 'dogs rgya chen po 'byung ba'i tshul gyis spro ba bskyed pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bka' stsal dam pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs su bsgyur ba gang dag thos pa'i mod la/_mi bdag chen po sras dang bcas pa'i thugs la snga na ma mchis pa'i spro ba mchog gi rgya mtsho rnam par rgyas pa'i rlabs phreng gi rtse 
[\[160b.6\]]mo tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lud pa snyam byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskul bar mdzad do/_/gnyis pa gang la bskul ba bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po'i khyad par la'ang ngos bzung ba dang*/_de'i che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa gnyis las/_dang po ni/_spyir dzam+bu'i gling gi bstan pa'i 
[\[160b.7\]]sri zhu ba chen por gyur cing bye brag tu ma hA b+ho Ta'i ljongs kyi theg le 'dir thub pa'i bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don ma lus pa rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i brda'i lam du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo 'di nyid bskrun par byed pa'i bdag 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]po'i rkyen du gyur pa ni/_skal ba bzang po kun gyi yongs rtser son pa dpal sde dge sa skyong bla ma chen po kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes yongs su grags pa de nyid do/_/gnyis pa ni/_'di nyid kyi sku che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par cung zad cig yi ge dang*/_ming dang*/_
[\[161a.2\]]tshig gi phreng ba'i lam nas 'dren pa la gnyis te/_rigs rus kyi khyad par brjod pa dang*/_yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa'o/_/dang po ni mdo rgya cher rol pa las/_dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par blta ba la rnam par blta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rigs 
[\[161a.3\]]dma' ba gdol ba'i rigs sam/_smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/_shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/_g.yung rigs su mi skye'i/_bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs kho na ste rigs gnyis su skye'o/_/de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye'o/_/
[\[161a.4\]]gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs su skye ste/_dge slong dag da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rigs su skye ste zhes dang*/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya par/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[161a.5\]]ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[161a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen por skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[161a.7\]]brgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs 
[\[161b.2\]]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[161b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes dang*/_khri brgyad stong pa las/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[161b.4\]]dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal po'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang*/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[161b.5\]]dag tu skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar 
[\[161b.6\]]gyur pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no zhes dang*/_mgon po byams pas/_smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang*/_/lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang*/_/spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang*/_/mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni/_/
[\[161b.7\]]rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang*/_/'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni/_/zhes so/_/de lta bu'i rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa'i skye ba gang la yod pa de ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyis shing sA la chen po bzhin du 'jig rten na ches mchog tu mngon par bkur ba dang 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bsngags pa brjod pa mang du 'byung zhing gangs can gyi ljongs 'dir yang snyan dngags smra ba'i mkhan po thams cad kyis bla nas bla ma nyid du rjod byed rgyan gyi me tog gi sil ma dag gis lan gcig ma yin par mngon par 'thor ba kun gyi 'bab stegs su gyur pa ste/_rje ngor chen 
[\[162a.2\]]dkon mchog lhun grub kyis sa skya pa'i gdung rabs ya rabs kyi kha rgyan las/_mi shes gdol pa'i phru gu phongs pa yi/_/'khor gyis bteg la 'jig rten 'dren pa zhes/_/smig rgyu 'bab chur sgrogs pa'i grag stong sgras/_/'jig rten yam mor byed dang 'di mi mtshungs/_/zhes dang*/_
[\[162a.3\]]rin spungs sa spyod ngag dbang 'jigs bral gyis bskal pa bzang po'i legs lam las/_pad+ma 'byung gnas zhi ba 'tsho'i/_/gsung gi bcud kun snying dbus su/_/nyal te ma rig gnyid las sad/_/sad mi klu dbang bsrung ba zhes/_/brda sprod rig pa'i zer 'phro bas/_/rgya gar chos 
[\[162a.4\]]rnams bod yul du/_/gsal ba'i bde gshegs bstan pa 'di/_/'dzin pa'i skyes bu snga bar byung*/_/shes rab ma nyams thabs kyi bdag_/gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba'i/_/rgyal por dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin/_/yid bzhin 'dod 'jo rin po che/_/rigs de'i sa bon gang 
[\[162a.5\]]la lha'i/_/rang bzhin gyis mtho sA la'i shing*/_/mtho brtan rgyas pa'i yal ga can/_/'gro ba'i gdung 'phrog phan par brtson/_/zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste/_de'ang rigs ni mkhas shing mdzangs la dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/_bka' btsan la dkyel che ba/_gzhung bzang la 'grogs 
[\[162a.6\]]bde ba la sogs pa ya rabs kyi spyod tshul ci rigs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rus ni rigs ma nyams pa'i pha de'i rgyud las byung ba'o/_/cho ni zhang po'i khungs dang ldan pa'o/_/'brang ba ni bshad ma thag pa gsum po dang ldan pa'i spyod pa'i 'brang sa 'dzin pa yin no zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad pa 
[\[162a.7\]]ltar 'dir yang sngon gyi yig tshang rnams kyi gtan tshigs tshad mar bzung nas/_mkhas pa snga ma dag gis gtam gyi gling bu mang nyung ci rigs par bsgyur ba bzhin du/_'dir yang dgos pa'i dbang las de dag gi brjod bya'i snying po bsdus pa gang dag tshogs pa gsum pa'i lam nas drangs te cung 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]zad cig gleng ba ni 'di lta ste/_spyir bod chen por grags pa'i mi'i 'gro ba phal che ba dag ni sbra 'bru sga sdong zhes bya ba ste rus chen bzhi dang*/_de rnams kun gyi zhang por 'os pa sgo lha sde dkar po'i rigs te mi rigs lngar byung bar grags pa las 'di phyi ma yin zhing*/_de las mched pa stod smad kyi 
[\[162b.2\]]phyogs su yod pa'i nang gses rngu chen rgyal mo tsho bco brgyad du grags pa byung ngo*/_/de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_'gar ge 'gor gsum dang*/_gsung gser 'brom gsum dang*/_shol stag 'phyang gsum dang*/_ci 'bu gzhag gsum dang*/_gce sing ram gsum dang*/_phyug po bu 
[\[162b.3\]]gsum ste tsho chen bco brgyad de/_de dag gi ya gyal du gyur pa'i 'gar gyi rigs so/_/rigs de las skyes pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'gar chen ye shes bzang po dang*/_'gar dam pa zhes bya ba mched gnyis byung ngo zhes grag go/_/de las phyi ma 'di ni sing+ga la'i slob dpon Ar+Ya de wa'i rnam 
[\[162b.4\]]'phrul du grags pa'i mgar chos sdings pa ste/_de'i che ba'i yon tan ni 'dis thugs dam gyi lha'i gtso bo rdo rje 'jigs byed la mdzad pas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma mang du byung ngo*/_/'bri khung 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po la sogs pa'i bla ma mang po bsten te/_gsang ba sngags kyi gdams 
[\[162b.5\]]pa mang du mnos pas zab chos kyi bdag por gyur te/_tsa ri dang dwags po 'gar phug pa la sogs par byon nas gsang ba sngags kyi spyod pa bskyangs pas/_mi ma yin pa'i rigs kyi 'gro ba mang po 'dus nas tho btsams kyang glags ma rnyed par shin tu dad par gyur te srog gi snying po phul nas skyabs su 
[\[162b.6\]]bsten no/_/de la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa byas nas phyis su spo bo phyogs su byon no/_/yul de na 'khod pa'i skye bo mang po la yang rdzu 'phrul dang thabs kyi khyad par mang po bstan pas shin tu dad par byas nas dge ba'i lam gyi sa bon legs par btab bo/_/phu lung 
[\[162b.7\]]dgon pa rin chen gling gi gzhi bting nas zhi bar gshegs so/_/de nyid kyi sku'i dbon po u rgyan pa la sogs pas kyang khams kyi phyogs nas byon te de'i phrin las kyi rgyun bskyangs/_de nas dbon rgyud rim par byung ba dag la phu lung sde ba thog ka bar grags te deng sang gi bar du yod ces 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]grags so/_/'gar chen ye shes bzang po ni snying stobs dang mthu rtsal rmad du byung ba zhig ste/_des slang mdo drug gi nor 'dzin ma'i cha yangs pa bdag gir mdzad do/_/de ni snga na med pa'i dbang thang gi ljon pa rab tu rgyas pa'i grib ma la 'bangs kyi tshogs mtha' dag 
[\[163a.2\]]ngal bsor spyod cing bka' lung thams cad rgyan bzang po ltar du bsrel ba byung ngo*/_/de la rigs kyi sras gnyis byung ba'i dang po ni sgom ston bsod nams rin chen dang*/_gnyis pa rngu rgu ru zhes bya ba gnyis te/_de'i dang po ni chos dang srid pa'i gtsug lag zung gi gzhung lugs dpyod pa la blo rab tu 
[\[163a.3\]]gsal ba dang*/_byas pa gzo ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par gyur pa la sogs pa ya rabs kyi spyod tshul dang mdzangs pa'i yon tan ci rigs pa tshang bas/_rnam 'dren bu ram shing pa'i ring lugs ma nor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che'i zhabs 
[\[163a.4\]]kyi pad+mar brten nas de'i las tshan gyi rnam gzhag_/gsol gzims mchod gsum 'jal yig mdzod pa gsum/_/thab 'dren gdan gsum skya rta mdzo khyi bzhi/_/chen po la 'os las tshan bcu gsum ste/_/'di rnams chos kyi rgyal po sa skya pa/_/dpal ldan 'phags pa'i ring 
[\[163a.5\]]la dar ba yin/_/zhes pa'i las tshan bcu gsum gyi thog ma gsol dpon gyi las ka zin to/_/de nas rim gyis gong nas gong du phyin par gyur te stong skor gyi dpon po'i 'ja' sa dang stag mgo nor bu gsum pa dang dmag rnams byin te chen po'i go sa nyid du dbang bskur ro/_/phyis su 
[\[163a.6\]]sa dmar yang dgon du tshogs pa stong phrag tsam bskyangs pa dang bcas te der bstan pa'i gzhi chen po btsugs so/_/gcung po rngu rgu ru can la bsod nams kyi byed pos legs par stsal ba'i sras dgu yod pa'i nang nas rngu rje stong dpon zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba blo sgrin zhing gzu bor gnas 
[\[163a.7\]]pa/_skye bo kun gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur pa zhig ste/_de'ang gong ma mchod yon gyis bka' drin bzang pos legs par bskyangs shing rim gyis rngu rgyud sa dmar nas bzung ste ljang mtshams bar gyi stong dpon gyi bskos gzhag dang lung las kyis mngon par mtho ba chen po'i go sar bzhag 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]go/_/de la sras dpal ldan seng ge dang rgyal ba bzang po zhes bya ba gnyis 'khrungs shing*/_phyi ma'i sras ni sangs rgyas bzang po dang pad+ma bstan srung zhes bya ba gnyis so/_/de'i phyi ma la yang bsod nams 'bum dang dkar chen byang chub 'bum zhes bya ba'i sras gnyis so/_/de'i phyi ma'i 
[\[163b.2\]]sras su dbon chen dge 'dun rgyal mtshan dang*/_bde chen bsod nams bzang po dang*/_rngu chos kyi rdo rje ste gsum mo/_/dang po de'i sras su mgon po gzungs zhes bya ba byung zhing*/_de nas rim gyis mched pa'i mi brgyud ni sa dmar gyi phyogs su deng sang gi bar du yang rgyun ma chad par yod 
[\[163b.3\]]do/_/bde chen bsod nams 'bum ni yum snga pa'i lam du song ba'i dgongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i ched du ka thog rdo rje'i gdan gyi dgon par byon nas ring zhig bzhugs pa na nam zhig mched zla gzhan rnams kyis rang gi bsti gnas su 'bod par btang bar brtsams pa na karma 
[\[163b.4\]]chos grags rgya mtsho dang*/_rngu chos kyi rdo rje dpon slob zung gis ye shes kyi gzigs pa rab tu dwangs pa'i me long dag tu ji ltar shar ba'i lung bstan stsal ba ni/_khyod la ring por mi thogs par las kyi ma mas byin pa'i bgo skal du bkra shis pa'i rtags kyi dge mtshan mang po ched du 
[\[163b.5\]]bkram pa lta bu yod pa'i gnas zhig rang dbang du 'byung bar 'gyur la/_gnas de legs par bzung nas yid ci bde bar bag phobs shig dang pha las ches lhag pa'i bu rgyud je bzang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes stsal to/_/ji ltar lung bstan stsal ba thog tu bab ste rim par brgyud 
[\[163b.6\]]kyin byon pas nam zhig na lcags rar phyin to/_/der gling yul gyi mnga' ris dang sa'i dum bu'i bdag por gyur te/_de'i mod la sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'phen pas ljongs de na'ang bde ba dang*/_lo legs pa dang*/_sde bzhi'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa dang*/_dge legs 
[\[163b.7\]]kyi mtshan ma gzhan dag kyang mngon du byung ba'i rten 'brel bzang ba de rgyu mtshan du song ste sde dge zhes bya ba ming du thogs so/_/des na sde dge'i tha snyad kyi thog ma'ang 'di'i dus nas byung ba nyid do/_/de las sras bzhi byung ba'i gnyis pa sde dge bo thar zhes bya ba sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]rnam par dpyod pa'i rtsal yongs su rdzogs pa zhig ste/_de'i blo gros kyi gom stabs chen po gcig gis zul brgyud kyi mi sde mtha' dag rang dbang du thob bo/_/thob pa'i 'bangs 'khor thams cad chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las kyis bskyangs pas thams 
[\[164a.2\]]cad kyang bka' lung gang dag stsal ba gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du spyi bos len pa byung ngo*/_/de nyid kyi bla'i mchod gnas su grub thob thang stong rgyal po zhes sam brtson 'grus bzang po zhes yongs su grags pa mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gom pa'i 'degs 'jog bsgyur ba tsam gyis gang du bzhud 
[\[164a.3\]]kyang dka' ba ci zhig_/khyad par dpal ri pad+ma 'od kyi gzhal yas su skad cig res byon te slob dpon chen po pad+mA ka ra dang dngos su mjal nas/_legs par gdams pa'i bdud rtsi ci yang gsan pa dang*/_slob dpon chen pos bod yul du 'gro ba'i don la 'byon dgos par ji ltar bskul ba de 
[\[164a.4\]]bzhin du bod dang bod chen po dang rgya nag la sogs pa yul dang ljongs dang grong dang grong khyer mang por yang zhabs kyis bcags shing sku dngos dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa bgrang las 'das pa dag gis sems can gyi don la rtse gcig tu gzhol zhing bab pa/_da ltar yang sku dngos su bzhugs pa'am lus 
[\[164a.5\]]ma spangs par mkha' spyod du gshegs pa'i tshul gnyis kar grags pa de nyid spyan drangs te gtsug gis bsten no/_/gang gi tshe na grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po de'i ye shes kyis gzigs pa'i ngo na yul der sa dpyad phun sum tshogs shing der dgon pa btab na bshad sgrub kyi rgyun rgya chen po dar rgyas su 
[\[164a.6\]]'gyur ba'i rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa shar ba gzigs nas/_rngu mda'i srib ri'i 'khris de na mtsho zhig yod par klu'i dbang po zhig gis rten bcas pa la klu de btul nas bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar du rnam par mi 'tshe zhing mthun rkyen thams cad sgrub pa'i grogs su bka' bsgos pas 
[\[164a.7\]]des kyang de ltar du bgyi bar dam bcas so/_/mtsho de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen pos legs par bsubs te/_de'i khar gtsug lag khang gi rmang bting ba nas brtsams te srib kyi dgon dud brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzhengs pa'i bdag po'i rkyen sbyar ba la sogs pa legs byas rgya chen po 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bskrun no/_/gtsug lag khang legs par grub pa dang grub chen de nyid kyis der dpal mgon po chen po zhal bzhi pa'i ljags bsnyen zhig kyang mdzad do/_/de'i tshe chos dang srid pa'i dpal 'byor gyi sgo 'phar bye ba brgya stong dus cig car du phye ba'i rten 'brel thams cad 'bad med lhun gyis 
[\[164b.2\]]grub pa nyid du byung bas dgon pa'i mtshan du yang lhun grub steng zhes bya bar gsol lo/_/sde dge bo thar gyi rigs sras che ba dpal ldan seng ge zhes bya ba mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs mang po dang thos bsam gyi bgyi ba mthar son te bsgrub pa'i snying po lhur mdzad pa dang*/_gnas de'i gdags 
[\[164b.3\]]ri'i sdebs su ngur smrig 'chang ba 'dus pa'i sde btsugs shing gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa la deng sang nyin dgon du grags shing*/_rngu phu'i brag gi phug pa seng ge rdzong du grags pa 'di yang de nyid kyi sgrub gnas mdzad pas phyi nas rten la brten pa'i ming du thogs pa yin no zhes gleng ngo*/_/de'i mched 
[\[164b.4\]]ya rgyal mtshan 'bum la sras bzhi byung ba'i dbon chen a snga'i sras su jo gdan nam mkha' lhun bzang zhes bya ba 'khrungs te/_'dis bla ma mang po'i gdams pa'i mdzod bzung nas rdo rje 'jigs byed lhag pa'i lhar bzung zhing*/_de'i rtsa sngags ya ma rA dza dung phyur gcig song ba'i mtshams

[\[164b.6\]]sras che ba sde dge kun dga' rin chen zhes bya ba ste/_'dis ni shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis dang*/_pa pang mkhan chen bsod nams rin chen la sogs pa'i yongs 'dzin mang po bsten nas zab don gyi bdud rtsi ngoms par bzhes nas/_yi dam gyi lha mang po'i bsnyen sgrub 
[\[164b.7\]]dang khyad par chos skyong gi bsnyen pa la bzhugs pa'i tshe sgrub khang thams cad me'i phung po gcig tu 'bar bar kun gyis mthong ba la sogs pa lung rtogs kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes so/_/sde dge bla brang lha khang zhes pa lha khang dang bla brang bzung du 'brel ba 'di nyid gsar du 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bzhengs pa dang*/_ngur smrig 'chang ba'i dge 'dun gyi sde mang du bsags pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas bstan pa dar rgyas su mdzad do/_/de'i mched zlar gyur pa nam mkha' dang rdo rje lhun grub ces bya ba gnyis su byon pa'i phyi ma de'i rigs sras la grags pa lhun grub 
[\[165a.2\]]dang*/_karma srung zhes bya ba gnyis byon no/_/de'i dang pos ni thugs dam gyi gtso bor dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang chos skyong ba'i srung ma nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po la mdzad pas/_srung ma'i dbang po de nyid dus rtag tu lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs shing ji ltar bsgos pa'i phrin las

[\[165a.4\]]por ye shes pa dngos su thim pa'i snang ba byung ngo*/_/sku de ni da lta mgon khang chen po na bzhugs su gsol ba byin gyis rlabs kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba 'di nyid lags shing*/_phyis su yul ljongs 'di nyid kyi bstan srid la rnam par sdang zhing phrag dog gi dug chus kun nas myos pa'i kha rlangs kyi 
[\[165a.5\]]'tshubs mar pha rol gyi dpung tshogs mi srun pa dag gis nye bar lhags pa'i dus na mgon khang du gnyug mar bzhugs pa'i bla mas mchod gtor rgya chen po phul nas drag po'i phrin las su bskul ba dang bcas te mgon khang gi thog khar spyan drangs nas dgra phyogs su zhal bstan te bzhag go/_/

[\[165a.7\]]par mthong ngo*/_/ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du ring por ma thogs par dgra sde de dag nang 'khrugs pa dang cho 'phrul du ma byung ste rang zhir song ba la sogs pa bstan srung dngos su 'khor ba'i 'phrin yig bsnyon du med pa gang de bden pa'i mthas bsgrags pa ltar gyur to/_/sde dge kun dga' 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rin chen pa'i gcung dpon chen nam mkha'i sras dbon chen lhun grub thub ces bya ba bsod nams kyi ljon pa mngon par rgyas pa zhig byung ste/_de la sras drug byon pa'i dang po ni bla ma mtsho las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i lung gis zin pa'i gter ston chen po rig 'dzin rgod kyi ldem 'phru can gyi skye ba'i zlos gar du 
[\[165b.2\]]grags pa sde dge grub chen kun dga' rgya mtsho zhes pa skyes thob dang sbyangs stobs kyi mkhyen rab phul du byung zhing*/_thugs rgyud thog ma nyid nas byang chub sems kyi brlan gyis legs par bsgos pa'i skyes bu dam pa zhig ste/_'dis ni shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis 
[\[165b.3\]]grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa gtso bor smos pa'i gsang sngags gsar rnying gi grub pa'i lugs srol 'dzin pa'i mkhas grub kyi bla ma mang po bsten cing de dag la ji ltar mnga' ba'i zab chos kyi bdud rtsi thams cad bum pa gang 'byo'i tshul du gsan pas/_gsang 
[\[165b.4\]]ba sngags kyi bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam par gyur to/_/de'i 'bras bu rtogs pa'i yon tan ni gzung 'dzin gyi 'ching ba mtha' dag rang sar grol ba'i bden gtam gyi ri mo sra zhing mkhregs pa rdo ba'i gzhi ma yang 'jim pa'i phung po la brdzis pa lta bu'i zhabs rjes 'jog pa dang*/_
[\[165b.5\]]lkog tu gyur pa'i shes par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang sgrib byed kyi rnam pa 'ga' yang med par rjen pa nyid du yang dag par gzigs nas lung du bstan pa la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i mngon par shes pa thob cing*/_'byung po gdug pa can gyi rigs rnams dam la 'dogs pa la 
[\[165b.6\]]yang dka' ba med pa'i sngags kyi mthu chen po grub pa la sogs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang 'byor ro/_/gtsug lag khang bsam grub mthong grol brtsigs pa'i thog mar sa 'dul dang*/_mthar rten dang brten par bcas pa la ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'jug pa'i rab tu gnas 
[\[165b.7\]]pa'i cho ga'ang mdzad do/_/chos grwa 'dis mtshon pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams nas lhags pa'i don gnyer gyi slob ma mang po la rang rang gi blo dang 'tsham pa'i dbang lung dang nyams khrid dang gyer dbyangs dang gar 'cham dang rol mo la sogs pa'i phyag len gyi rigs shin tu phra mo 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]tshun chad la gces spras kyi sgo nas gtan la 'bebs pa la sogs pa rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las kyi rgyun chen pos bstan pa rin po che la gcig tu bka' drin che bar mdzad do/_/gnyis pa dbon chen klu 'phel zhes bya ba dang*/_gsum pa sa gzhi skyong

[\[166a.3\]]sogs pa mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa'i mkhas grub du ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma nye bar bsnyen cing*/_sdom pa gsum dang rjes su 'brel ba'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bdud rtsi zad mi shes pa'i rgyun chen po ngom par gsol lo/_/gcig tu mtshungs pa med pa'i bsod 
[\[166a.4\]]nams kyi mthus skye 'gro thams cad dbang du 'dus pa zhig ste/_'di nyid kyi sku [{]rings [,]ring [}]la/_gzhan sde mi srun pa dbang shed dang ngan dpung gis mngon par khengs shing*/_stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ring lugs rma med pa gang dang gang du dar ba de dang der sdang zhing tho btsams pa/_be

[\[166a.6\]]bkug ste/_chab 'bangs rdzong chen bco brgyad dang*/_ris su ma chad pa'i chos sde brgya rtsa la sogs pa tha gru rnam par yangs pa'i dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi mar/_las shugs gser sbyangs kyi tsakra rtsibs ma stong gis mngon par spa bas mnga' bsgyur ba mdzad do/_/khyad par rgyal 
[\[166a.7\]]ba'i bstan pa'i rtsa lag tu e waM chos ldan gyi sgrub khang bla brang nas rin po che dpal mchog rgyal mtshan pa de nyid mdo smad phyogs kyi chos grwa dang*/_yul dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_grong rdal dang*/_rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs pa rnams su bstan pa'i snang ba chen po bkye ba'i ched du 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]spyan drangs te rigs kyi cod paN gcig pu nyid du mnga' gsol lo/_/chos grwa chen po lhun grub steng 'di nyid gtsor smos pa'i chos sde mang por bshad sgrub kyi rgyun nyams pa slar gso zhing*/_med pa gsar du spel ba dang*/_sprul pa'i lha khang chen po bsam grub mthong grol gtso bor 
[\[166b.2\]]smos pa'i gtsug lag khang mang po bzhengs pa dang*/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun grangs med pa la bsnyen bkur gya nom pa stob pa dang bcas te/_kye rdo rje dang 'khor lo bde mchog dang gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gsang chen rgyud sde chen po'i dkyil 'khor mang po'i zhal phye
