[\[166b.7\]]son nas rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin zab mo la rtse gcig tu brtson pas yon tan dpag tu med pa mnga' zhing*/_lhag pa'i lha rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar grags so/_/skal bzang 'bum gyi sras bla ma bkra shis rgya mtsho la sogs 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa rnams te bla ma 'di ni gsang chen rgyud sde mang po'i lag len che phra kun la shin tu mkhas par gyur te/_ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun stong phrag phyed dang gnyis tsam gyi 'go 'dzin dang sgrig srol ma 'phyugs par bskyangs ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i bgyi 
[\[167a.2\]]ba lhag par bgyis so/_/sku tshe'i smad du lo grangs bcu gsum tsam la yi dam gyi lha mang po'i bsnyen sgrub la rtse gcig tu gzhol ba'i ring nas mkha' spyod du gshegs shing de'i dbon rgyud da ltar bzhugs pa'i bar ro/_/dbon chen klu 'phel gyi sras gsum las au D+yAn bkra shis khyim thabs la

[\[167a.4\]]gso ba rig pa dang*/_bzo rig pa la sogs pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang*/_nang gsang sngags gsar rnying gi lam gyi nyams len zab mo la brtson pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi rigs mang po'i cho ga'i phyag len dang*/_gar 'cham dang dbyangs dang rol mo la sogs pa'i gtsug 
[\[167a.5\]]lag rgya mtsho'i don la blo ldan kun gyis bsngags pa'i mkhyen rab phul du byung ba mnga' zhing*/_sa skyong bla ma chen po byams pa phun tshogs pa sku gshegs nas/_de'i gdan sa'i khri la bzhugs nas rnam dkar gyi phrin las rgya cher spel bar mdzad do/_/dbon po rgya bo ni 
[\[167a.6\]]dbon po stod du bzhugs so/_/dbon chen lhun grub kyi sras bzhi pa karma zhes bya ba de'i sras dbon po che mchog dang*/_rdor legs dang*/_g.yul rgyal te gsum las/_che mchog ni chos dang srid kyi gtsug lag kun la mi 'jigs pa'i blo gros kyi lang tsho mngon par bdo 
[\[167a.7\]]bas gdan sa gnyis pa mdzad de chab 'bangs thams cad chos dang byams pas bde bar sbyar ba la sogs pa bka' drin shin tu che ba byung ngo*/_/g.yul rgyal gyi sras ngag dbang bkra shis ni mkhyen rab phun sum tshogs pa mnga' zhing gcig tu gzhan la phan pa lhur byed pa zhig 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]go/_/dbon po klu 'phel gyi sras 'gran zla med pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mtha' dag gcig tu 'khyil ba'i khri chen bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes mtshan gyi snyan pa'i yi ge phyogs bral gyi che dgu mang pos ral pa'i rtse la ci bde bar ngal bsor spyod pa snyam bgyid pa de ni/_gter gzhung 
[\[167b.2\]]'ga' zhig tu cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan pa'i sprul pa'i rol rtsed nyid du gdon mi za bar lung gis bstan pa'i skyes bu chen po zhig ste/_dang po nas rang bzhin bzang zhing bsam pa dge ba/_yid gzhungs shing phyi nang gi rig pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams la blo gros kyi 'jug pa shin tu 
[\[167b.3\]]gsal por gyur pas sde dge'i gdan rabs kyi khri la mnga' gsol lo/_/de nas bzung ste rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba ris su med pa las dbang gi grib ma bsil po'i khongs su bde bar skyong zhing*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la phan pa'i legs byas kyi sgo 'phar bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[167b.4\]]dus cig car du phye ba la sngon rabs bod kyi chos rgyal chen po rnams kyi mdzad pa bzang po rjes su dran pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cing*/_mnga' 'og tu mchis so 'tshal gyi dge 'dun gyi sde ris su ma chad pa rnams la bshad sgrub kyi rgyun nyams pa slar gso ba dang*/_snga na med pa'i dkyil 
[\[167b.5\]]'khor gyi sgrub mchod mang po lo re bzhin 'dzugs pa'i srol btod pa dang*/_cho ga de dang de dag gi chings dang*/_mthong ba brgyud pa'i lag len du dar ba'i gyer gdangs dang*/_phyag rgya dang*/_bri thig rdul tshon la sogs pa rnams kyang grwa sa chen po rnams dang*/_ljongs 'dir 
[\[167b.6\]]snga rabs byon pa'i mkhas grub gong ma rnams kyis ji ltar bzhag pa'i lag len thams cad ma 'phyugs pa'i bca' khrims rdo rje'i rwa ba ltar brtan par bcas te/_bstan don rgya che zhing bskal pa'i bar du yang ches cher brling bar mdzad do/_/rang lugs kyi grwa sa gtsor bton 
[\[167b.7\]]pa'i dbus gtsang khams gsum du gtogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs tshad med cing grangs med pa la bsnyen bkur gya nom pa sbyar ro/_/khyad par lhun grub steng gi chos grwa chen pos mtshon pa'i mdo smad kyi sa'i cha la 'khod pa'i 'gro ba'i bde skyid dang bstan pa'i bshad sgrub la 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]phan pa'i thugs bskyed rma med pa nye bar bzhag ste/_'jam mgon bkra shis dpal ldan zhes pa mdo sde dang rgyud sde ma lus pa'i gsan sbyangs rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol du son pa de nyid spyan drangs te/_dpal dges pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i rgyud sde chen po rnams dang 
[\[168a.2\]]rjes su 'brel ba'i dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor bar bskul te bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan chen po mi nub par byas so/_/thub bstan rnam par rgyal ba'i chos grwa nas kun mkhyen go bo rab 'byams bsod nams seng ge zhes sa steng gi 
[\[168a.3\]]dkyil 'khor lus pa med par nyin mor byed pa ltar grags pa gang de'i zhabs stegs seng ge'i khri mthon po gang la mnga' gsol ba'i mkhan chen bzang po rgyal mtshan zhes pa gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang phyug de nyid spyan drangs nas bla'i mchod gnas su bkur ro/_/mgon 
[\[168a.4\]]des gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag gi nyams khrid rgyas pa/_de'i yan lag dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang*/_'phags yul gyi grub pa'i dbang phyug 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhabs kyis legs par bkral ba'i rdo rje 
[\[168a.5\]]phreng ba dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la sogs pa'i dbang bskur gyi rigs dang*/_rjes su gnang ba dang*/_nyams khrid la sogs pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor te/_de dag gi rgyun deng sang gi bar du yang dar rgyas su bzhugs so/_/slar 
[\[168a.6\]]yang dpal e waM chos ldan gyi dgon pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i rgyal tshab kyi skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po pa'i zhabs stegs mi 'jigs gdong lnga'i khri la mnga' gsol ba'i mkhan rabs nyer gsum pa dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang ngur smrig 
[\[168a.7\]]gar gyis rnam par rtsen pa'i mkhas grub sangs rgyas phun tshogs pa zhes bya ba/_'dzam gling bstan pa'i rgyan gcig pu dpal sa skya pa kun dga' bkra shis pa gtso bor smos pa'i gtsang dbus khams gsum gyi mkhas pa dang grub pa'i dbang po ma lus pa'i gtsug gi nor bur gyur pa de nyid 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]mdo khams phyogs kyi skye 'gro dpag tu med pa'i thar pa bgrod pa'i lam mkhan nyid du spyan drangs te/_chos grwa 'dir rtag par bzhugs nas/_lcags ra dang*/_ya na dang*/_dbon po stod dang*/_zul stod dang*/_spe bar dang*/_smad shod rnams su zhabs kyis bcags par gsol ba btab 
[\[168b.2\]]ste/_de dag tu spyan drangs nas/_sdom pa gsum gyi bdud rtsi'i sgo 'phar bsam gyis mi khyab pa phye bas skal bar ldan pa kun gyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang*/_sgrub mchod kyi rigs mang po gsar du btsugs pa dang*/_sngar yod pa rnams kyang dag ther mdzad pa'i sgo nas/_bstan 
[\[168b.3\]]pa rin po che'i dri ma phra mo rnams kyang lung dang rigs pa dang man ngag gi dag byed bzang pos legs par bkrus te/_sngon dus 'phags pa'i yul gyi bstan pa dar rgyas la 'gran par nus pa'i phrin las kyi rgyun chen po btsugs pa sogs la sa skyong bla ma chen po 'di nyid kyi bka' drin 
[\[168b.4\]]mtha' dag gzugs su rung na gnam sa'i dkyil 'khor kun kyang dog par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin kho na'o/_/dbon chen klu 'phel gyi rigs sras o D+yAn bkra shis de nyid la sras bzhi 'khrungs pa'i dang po sde dge khri chen bla ma bsod nams phun tshogs zhes yongs su grags pa 
[\[168b.5\]]las dbang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ste/_de ni thog ma nyid nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rtsom pa bla na med pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs par 'dod pa'i dam bca'i khur chen po blangs pa zhig ste/_shin tu mtho ba'i rigs su gyur kyang dregs pa dang 
[\[168b.6\]]khengs pa mi mnga' bar rang bzhin gyis bzang zhing*/_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa la zhugs pa/_bzo dang gso ba la sogs pa phyi rig pa'i gnas phal che ba dag la ma rmongs pa'i mkhyen rab dang ldan pa/_nang gsang sngags gsar rnying 
[\[168b.7\]]gi bstan pa la lhag par mos pas mkhas grub yongs kyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar gyur pa mkhan chen sangs rgyas phun tshogs pa la sogs pa gsar rnying gi bla ma mang po las zab chos kyi gdams pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i gsan sbyangs dpyis phyin par mdzad de/_bslab pa rin po che rnam pa 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gsum gyi 'byor pas thugs kyi bang mdzod rma med pa'i rang bzhin du yongs su bkang ste chos smra ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/gtsug lag gnyis ka zung du 'brel ba'i phrin las kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i go 'phang nyid du mnga' sgyur ba'i phyir sde dge'i gdan rabs rin po 
[\[169a.2\]]che'i khri 'phang mthon po la zhabs kyi pad+ma dmar po rnam par bkod de chos dang srid pa'i gzhung lugs thams cad smra ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/de nas brtsams te chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las mdog bzang gi 'khor lo sngon du rgyu bas/_yangs pa'i rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba phal che ba gzhol 
[\[169a.3\]]du med pa'i mkhyen rab dang brtse ba'i gdugs dkar gyi grib ma bsil po'i rwa ba gang na legs par bcug nas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i bde ba la ngal bso ba'i skal ba bzang po ci yang byin no/_/gzhan yang bsags pa'i dngos po gya nom pa dag kyang bod khams kyi chos sde ris su med pa'i dge 
[\[169a.4\]]'dun rnams la mchod cing rjed par byed pa dang*/_bye brag tu mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i dgon sde rnams su gtsug lag khang sngar yod nyams pa rnams kyi nyams gso dang*/_med pa rnams gsar du bzhengs pa dang*/_bstan pa'i rtsa lag dge slong gi dge 'dun grangs med pa la bsnyen 
[\[169a.5\]]bkur stob pa'i phyir gtong zhing*/_de dag gi bca' khrims dang kun spyod kyi sgrig lam gong ma rnams kyis bzhag pa'i rgyun bzang po skyong ba dang*/_grwa sa chen po rnams la ji ltar yongs su dar ba'i lugs srol bzang po sngon chad 'dir ma byung ba rnams kyang gsar bsgrub kyi srol btod pa la 
[\[169a.6\]]sogs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che ring 'tshor 'gyur ba'i bka' drin zla med pa mdzad do/_/gnyis pa dbon dbang chen mgon po zhes bya ba dang*/_gsum pa bla ma sangs rgyas dpal bzang pa ste/_'dis rnam pa thams cad du bsgrub par bya ba'i gtso bo ni/_spyir bde bar 
[\[169a.7\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad dang*/_sgos su rje btsun sa skya pa zhes khams gsum chos kyi sgron me chen por gyur pa de dang*/_rgyal ba gnyis pa rje btsun kun dga' bzang po yab sras brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i lugs bzang rtsod pa kun las grol ba gang de/_gangs kyi rwa bas 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]mdzes par bskor ba'i ljongs 'dir ji ltar sprin sngon dus kyi chu gter chen po bzhin du mi nyams shing gong nas gong du spel ba'i thugs bskyed rin po che 'byung ba'i gnas kyi dba' rlabs gnam du 'phyo ba'i rang bzhin las nam yang bri ba med pa nas/_grub pa'i dbang po'i gdan sa ri khrod smin grol 
[\[169b.2\]]gling dang*/_dbon po stod kyi gdan sa gnyis char skyong bar mdzad do/_/gdan sa de gnyis dang dgon sde gzhan dang gzhan dag la yang ngor lugs dkyil 'khor bdun du grags pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa mang po'i sgrub mchod dang gzhung 'don pa'i dus mchod kyi rgyun mang po 
[\[169b.3\]]gsar du bzhag ste/_ngur smrig 'chang ba'i dge 'dun bgrang las 'das pa la bsnyen bkur rgya chen po sbyor ba'i srol btod do/_/gzhan yang rje btsun e waM pa chen po brgyud pa dang bcas pa 'ga' zhig gi bka' 'bum dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa'i glegs bam dag cing dngos 
[\[169b.4\]]bzang ba mang po bzhengs te/_de dag gi mdun du yang spos dang mar me la sogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa rgya dpangs mi chung ba'i rgyun mchod kyi rgyun btsugs so/_/khyad par phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi yon tan dang phrin las mnga' ba 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas phun tshogs pa de nyid 
[\[169b.5\]]bod chen gyi ljongs 'dir spyan 'dren pa'i slad du/_'phags pa'i yul gyi paN chen nA ro ta pa'i rnam par thar pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dka' ba dpag tu med pa dang du blangs te/_ljongs 'di'i 'gro ba'i legs byas kyi mgron du spyan drangs nas/_'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las gzhal du 
[\[169b.6\]]med pas/_bstan pa mtha' dag nam langs pa la nyi ma shar ba ltar mdzad pa'ang 'di pa sku mched kyi drin kho na las byung ba yin no/_/bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po de la sogs pa'i yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag mang po gtsug na mchod cing*/_de dag las 'ongs pa'i gdams 
[\[169b.7\]]pa zab pa dang rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs nyams su bzhes te/_mdor na mkhas pa dang btsun pa dang grub pa'i yon tan zad mi shes pa'i ngang tshul bzang po yongs su 'dzin pa nyid do/_/bzhi pa byams pa kun dga' rab brtan pa ste/_'di ni skyes stobs dang sbyang stobs kyi 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i mig dkyus ring por spros pa'i khongs ga la ba de na/_phyi dang nang gi grub pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams thams cad dog pa med pa'i tshul gyis chud pas/_de'i 'bras bu grub mtha' so so'i lta grub kyi khyad par rnam par dbye ba'i gtam snyan gyi me 
[\[170a.2\]]tog bstar la brgyus pa'i phreng ba gang dag_/blo ldan yongs kyi rna ba'i rgyan du bkod pa la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i gdengs thob ste/_dbon stod kyi gdan sar bzhugs so/_/der bstan srid zung du 'brel ba'i phrin las dpag tu med pas bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rgya chen po bsgrubs 
[\[170a.3\]]shing*/_rgyu dang dka' tshegs kyi gting mtha' gzhal du med pas dpal sa skya'i rje btsun gong ma lnga'i bka' 'bum skya chos pusti bcu drug na bza' dang glegs shing glegs thag dang bcas pa spus bzang bar bsgrubs pa dang*/_dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul ba dang*/_dge 'dun la 
[\[170a.4\]]bsnyen bkur bgyis pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dkar ba'i legs mdzad kyi phung po gang la blo ldan thams cad kyi bsngags par brjod pa'i tshig gi gling bu ci yang bsgyur ba'i gnas so/_/dpon dbang chen mgon po la sras gnyis 'khrungs pa'i dang po mgon po tshe ring zhes bya ba ya rabs kyi rang 
[\[170a.5\]]bzhin bzang po yongs su mi 'dor ba'i las can zhig ste/_'on kyang gzhon nu'i dus nyid nas snga pa'i lam du gshegs so/_/de'i mched zlar gyur pa dpon dbang chen mgon po'i sras/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i chos ldan gyi rgyal po bstan pa tshe ring zhes yongs su grags pa ste/_
[\[170a.6\]]de ni snga na med pa'i les byas kyi gzhi chen por gyur pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i ma mo 'di nyid kyi dbu 'dzugs pa'i bdag po'i rkyen byed pa po ste/_nges par sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid mi'i bdag po'i mig 'phrul gyi rdzu la zhugs pa zhig ste/_thog ma nyid nas 'jig rten 
[\[170a.7\]]thams cad la yid brtse ba'i rlan gyis brlan pa/_na ba dang*/_rga ba dang*/_'chi ba dang*/_sdug pa dang bral ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi khur chen po dag gis yongs su gzir ba'i skye bo mgon dang bral ba dang*/_skyabs dang bral ba dang*/_dpung gnyen dang bral ba dag 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]mthong na/_snying rje'i phyag ring yangs par brkyang ste/_'jigs pa dang*/_nyam nga ba gang dang gang yin pa de las bskyab pa la spro ba mchog tu brtas pa/_sngon gyi bsod nams kyi mthu chen po thob pa la/_slar yang dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pas/_yon tan gyi chos gang 
[\[170b.2\]]dag phyir phyir rab tu brtan par byas pa/_phyogs bcu'i rgyal phran thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing rang gi ngang gis btud par byas pa/_de lta na'ang dge ba'i sems dang chos las 'byung ba'i spyod pa'i chu klung bsil por 'bebs pa la rab tu mkhas pas nga rgyal gyi me dpung yongs su 
[\[170b.3\]]bcil ba dang thugs dul bar gyur pa/_gtong ba la mchog tu dpa' ba/_yid gzhungs shing mang du thos pa dang*/_shes rab kyi nor dang ldan pa/_yi ge dang*/_grangs dang*/_rtsis dang*/_mig 'phrul dang*/_sngon gyi rabs dang*/_snyan dngags dang*/_zlos gar dang*/_rol mo'i bye brag 
[\[170b.4\]]dang*/_'pho ba dang*/_sgyu rtsal gyi rig pa thams cad legs par sbyangs pa/_khyad par gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs sman 'tsho ba'i mdo dang*/_yan lag brgyad pa dang*/_de'i man ngag rgyud bzhi 'grel pa dang bcas pa la sbyangs pa'i pha rol du son nas/_mchog dman gyi 'gro ba 
[\[170b.5\]]thams cad dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang nad kyi zug rngus gsungs par gyur pa'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing*/_gnas skabs kyi bde ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i go 'phang sbyin pa la ma rmongs pa ni sngon gyi 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos sam sman pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa lta bur gyur te sems can thams cad 
[\[170b.6\]]kyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhi chen po nyid do/_/de ltar yang skyes pa rabs kyi rgyud las/_rig byed shes la de ni tshangs pa bzhin/_/rgyal po rnams kyis bkur ba rgyal po bzhin/_/skye dgu rnams la brgya byin mngon sum bzhin/_/shes 'dod rnams la dran spyod pha dang 'dra/_/zhes pa ltar skye 
[\[170b.7\]]bo thams cad la pha dang 'dra bar thabs kyi bye brag ci rigs pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs pa zhig go_/der ma zad tshe rabs du ma nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa mngon par 'du bya ba la kun nas yongs su goms pa'i bag chags bzang po sad pas/_rgyal srid kyi khri la 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]ma bzhugs pa'i dus nas/_ji ltar mnga' ba'i bdog pa rnams la phongs sems med par bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod pa'i ched du gtong ba dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum bzhengs pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[171a.2\]]rnam par dkar ba'i legs byas kyi rgyun kho na'i ched du gtong zhing*/_ji ltar bzheng bar bya ba'i rten gsum rnams kyang blo dman kun gyis yid la mi shong zhing*/_sngon gyi skyes bu blo stobs dang ldan pa mang pos kyang brtsam par ma nus pa'i las gang yin pa der 'jug pa la mi spobs pa 
[\[171a.3\]]med pa zhig ste/_dper na rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin par gyi bya ba mthar phyin pa dang*/_bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin gyi phyi mo bsgrubs pa'i 'go brtsams pa 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin kho na las/_skye bo phal gyi bsam sbyor dang rjes su mthun par 'di 
[\[171a.4\]]dang 'di lta bu'i 'byor pa dag ni re zhig bsags na bdag gi dkor khang mngon par gtams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro snyam pa dang*/_bdag gis dpal 'byor 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba rnam par 'phel bar byas te/_dgra zlar gyur pa thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya'o snyam 
[\[171a.5\]]pa la sogs pa'i blo ngan thams cad ring du spangs pa dang*/_sgo gsum dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gcig tu 'dun pa'i ya rabs dang dam pa'i ngang tshul bzang po las gzhar yang mi 'gyur bas/_'gro ba thams cad kyi yid kyi dbang po kun nas 'dzin nus par gyur to/_/nam zhig na chos 
[\[171a.6\]]dang srid pa'i gtsug lag zung gi phrin las kyi 'khor lo mu med phyogs kyi pha rol dag tu bgrod pa'i gdan rabs kyi nor bu rin po che btegs pa'i khri 'phang mthon po ga la ba de na btso sbyangs dag pa'i gser gyi pa tra ris glog 'gyu stong gis mdzes pa dag kyang nyung ngur byed pas yongs su 
[\[171a.7\]]'khyud pa'i mngal gyi khur du lha dang mi dang gdengs can gyi dbang po'i yul na rin thang shin tu che ba'i nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phra tshom dang ldan pa/de lta bu'i rkang gdub mdzes pa dag gis mngon par spud pa'i zhabs kyi chu skyes zung dag nye bar bkod do/_/de ltar gtsug lag gnyis 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]kyis mtho ba'i khri la bzhugs ma thag nas/_rtogs brjod rin po che dpag bsam 'khri shing gi gtsug na nor bu'i skyes rabs las/_rtag tu dam pas bsten 'os shing*/_/rtsod dus rab tu 'phrog byed pa/_/rdzogs ldan lta bus gang gis ni/_/skye bo chos rnams 
[\[171b.2\]]'dzin par byas/_/sa bdag bzod la kun chags shing*/_/dpal gyis dkris gyur snying rjer dga'/_/rab grags la yang dbang thul gang*/_/skye dgu rnams kyi dga' byed gyur/_/zhes pa ltar snying rje'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa gang gi mthus chab 'bangs 
[\[171b.3\]]kyis mtshon pa'i rgyal khams thams cad rtag tu bde zhing 'byor pa dang*/_lo legs par gyur pas nang du dga' ba rab tu rgyas pa'i btung ba gang la skye bo ma lus pa rtse bar byed cing*/_cha lugs bzang la mi 'phyar ba dang*/_mi'i bdag po'i bzod pa dang*/_des pa dang*/_
[\[171b.4\]]snying brtse ba dang*/_grags pa'i yon tan mi zad pa dag snying gi dkyil nas yang yang dran par byed cing*/_dge ba yon tan de dag kyang phyogs phyogs kun du sgrog par byed pa'i bstod pa dang bkra shis kyi rol mo mang po 'khrol ba la lhur byed par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[171b.5\]]bzung ste yangs pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad byams pa chen pos dpung gis legs par bsrungs pa'i skabs der/_sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis legs par bzhag pa'i 'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos dang rjes su gdams pa zab mo rnams dang 
[\[171b.6\]]mi 'gal bar bya ba thams cad brtags nas byed pa dang*/_mi 'os pa'i las la g.yer por gyur kyang mi 'jug_/'os pa'i las thams cad la dka' yang le lo dang phyi bshol gyi dbang gis mi 'dor ba dang*/_gna' dus yan nas yongs su dar ba'i dpya khral 
[\[171b.7\]]rnams kyang dus dang gnas skabs dag la legs par brtags nas tshod zin par longs spyad pa las rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'dod chen gyi las mi brtsam pa ni/_dper na phreng brgyud mkhan mkhas pa dag gis kun dga' rwa ba'i me tog gi tshal nas dus la bab pa na me 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]tog gi rigs tsam btu bar bya'i/_sol ba mkhan gyis bzhin du dus gcig la rtsa ba yongs su 'byin par mi byed pa de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang dbang dang stobs kyi sgo nas brtsams na khyab 'jug bzhin du gzhan sde rnam par non pa la mi mthun pa ni 
[\[172a.2\]]'ga' yang med mod/_chos dang 'gal bar gyur pa'i chags sdang gi las mi brtsam par kun gyi sems bsrung ba dang*/_rtag tu dge sdig gi las 'bras zhib tu bsams shing sgo gsum dge ba'i lam du rang gzhan thams cad 'jug pa dang*/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 
[\[172a.3\]]'das pa'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dag la dbang 'byor yang*/_rgyags pa dang khengs pa'i sems mi 'dzin/_blo gtad kyi dpang dkon mchog gsum la bcol bas/_g.yo sgyu rnam par spangs nas lhag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu gnas shing zhi dul gsong por smra ba dang*/_
[\[172a.4\]]bag dang bcas pa'i ngang nas skye bo thams cad bu bzhin du skyong ba'i spyod tshul phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba yin te/_ji skad du/_gya tshom mi smra shes kyang ma bcol rang zhugs yong mi byed/_/zin khar mi 'dor 'og nas sngar brtsams 'gyod mi smra/_/lhag par khe 
[\[172a.5\]]mthong btsal glags yod kyang mi rigs 'dod chen yong mi byed/_/dbang dang tshan gyis thub kyang 'phyas gnon gzan mi 'tshol/_/nye zhes nye mgon mi byed ring zhes snyom las yong mi spyod/_/dbang sar phyin cing kun gyis bkur yang mtha' dag sems bsrung bya/_/
[\[172a.6\]]legs nyes bsam zhing srod dang tho rangs dge ba spyad/_/nga rgyal khengs sems mu cor smra dang rgyags chos med/_/tshan kar mi 'dor gzhan gyis brtsi sar yun ring sdod/_/phyi tshul mi 'chos nang gi g.yo sgyu med/_/gsong des mnyen dang gsal stug 'jam la 
[\[172a.7\]]ring*/_/ngan la khyad du mi gsod zhe sa phangs med mnyam/_/phrag dog 'gran sems nor ngan gzhan la 'phya mi byed/_/bdag la rang bstod mi byed gzhan la mtshang mi 'bru/_/dpa' la sran che byed dgu mthar phyin mdzangs las slob/_/chang dang bud med dad dang 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]khe brkam gcam bu'i las/_/nam du'ang mi byed chung ma ngan pa'i khar mi btang*/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/khyad par 'jig rten gyi mes po tshangs pa dang*/_drag po dang*/_sred med kyi bu dang*/_mig stong pa dang*/_skems byed la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha 
[\[172b.2\]]dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_gdengs can gyi dbang po dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_dri za dang*/_grul bum dang*/_nam mkha' lding dang*/_lang+ka'i dbang phyug dang*/_mi'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_gser gyi 'khor lo dang*/_dngul gyi 'khor lo dang*/_zangs kyi 
[\[172b.3\]]'khor lo dang*/_lcags kyi 'khor lo dang*/_stobs kyi 'khor lo rnams kyis mtshan pa la sogs pa 'jig rten na dbang che zhing gzi brjid che ba dag kyang rang rang gi ral pa'i thor tshugs nor bu rin po che 'od zer stong gi drwa bas dkrigs pa dag gis lan brgyar btud cing 
[\[172b.4\]]mchod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/_bstan pa'i bdag po chen po dpal sa skya pa zhes snyan grags lha'i rnga bo che ltar yongs su ldir ba de nyid brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i lugs bzang dri ma med cing rtsod pa kun las grol ba de nyid kyis mtshon te/_sangs rgyas pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i 
[\[172b.5\]]gzhung lugs dri ma med pa gang du dar zhing rgyas par gyur pa rnams dang*/_de nyid mkhas pa'i bgyi ba gsum gyi sgo nas 'dzin par byed pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mur thug pa med pa rnams su byon pa dang*/_'byon par 'gyur ba dang*/_
[\[172b.6\]]da ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes pa ji snyed cig mchis pa rnams la dad pa gsum gyi rtsa ba rab tu brtan pas/_don yod rnam pa bzhis bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod cing rjed par byed/_de dag gi rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las kyi rgyun chen po dag ring du gnas 
[\[172b.7\]]pa'i thabs kyang byed do/_/mi bdag chen po rang gi rigs kyi cod paN nyid du/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po legs par bzung nas mdo sde dang rgyud sder gtogs pa'i chos kyi phung po ji snyed pa dag 'chad pa dang*/_
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rtsod pa dang*/_rtsom pa'i phrin las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu rim par byon pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag 'jam pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas phun tshogs pa dang*/_gzhung lugs rab 
[\[173a.2\]]'byams smra ba'i dbang po 'jam mgon bkra shis dpal ldan pa dang*/_rgya chen chos kyi spyan ldan thub bstan mkhan rin po che bzang po rgyal mtshan dang*/_rnam 'dren bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po si tu chos kyi 'byung gnas dang*/_gsang chen rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag 
[\[173a.3\]]mtshungs med kun dga' chos 'phel dang*/_shes par bya ba'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag bkra shis dbang phyug dang*/_mthu stobs grub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pa la sogs pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po dang*/_
[\[173a.4\]]khyad par ngor chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po pa'i lugs bzang bdud rtsi'i rgyun ma lus pa bzung nas/_sems can gyi khams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rims nad mtha' dag zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi sman pa chen po thams cad mkhyen pa bkra shis lhun grub grags 
[\[173a.5\]]pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes yongs su grags pa de nyid dang*/_yar lung bkra shis chos sde nas/_rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las skyong ba ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa ste/_rje btsun dam pa de 
[\[173a.6\]]dag rang gi bla'i mchod gnas kyi ched dang*/_mdo smad phyogs kyi skye dgu ma lus pa mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i grong du 'khrid par byed pa'i lam mkhan dam pa nyid du spyan drangs te/_chab 'og tu gtogs pas mtshon pa'i sems can rgya mtsho chen 
[\[173a.7\]]po'i rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam pa rnams kyi rgyud la chos kyi sa bon ma rmas par btab ste/_la la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rab tu bzung ba la bkod/_la la ni khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba dge slong gi dngos por 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]bsgrubs te 'khor ba las mngon par 'phags pa'i gnas la bkod/_la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa stsal te theg pa chen po'i rigs su bkod/_la la ni gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi sgor smin par byas te 
[\[173b.2\]]ring por mi thogs par rnam par grol ba'i skal ba dang ldan par byas te/_mdor na 'khor ba phal mo che sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang*/_dam pa'i chos la bab pa dang*/_dge 'dun la gzhag par mdzad de/_de dag thams cad kyang mi bdag chen po 'di'i sku drin kho na 
[\[173b.3\]]las byung ba yin pas/_legs par bsams na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dzam+b+hu gser gyi phung pos yongs su bkang ste bcal bar byas kyang mi bdag chen po 'di nyid kyi sku drin dang gzhar yang mnyam par dka' ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[173b.4\]]kho na'o/_/de ltar ji skad smos pa'i 'dren mchog dam pa de dag spyi bo'i rgyan du bsten cing sgo gsum longs spyod dang bcas pas mnyes par 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de rtun pa lhur byed cing*/_de dag gi zhal sgo nas byung ba'i gsung gi bdud rtsi ni/_rgyu sde chen po rnams 
[\[173b.5\]]las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbang bskur ba dang*/_rjes su gnang ba dang*/_lung 'bogs pa dang*/_man ngag gi nyams khrid zab mo dpag tu med pa rang dang gzhan gyi thar pa'i gsos su rtag tu len par mdzad cing*/_ji ltar thos pa'i chos de dag las kyang 
[\[173b.6\]]phal cher gyi bsgom bzlas ma chag pa'i nyams bzhes chu bo'i rgyun babs pa lta bus nyin mtshan gyi dus 'da' bar mdzad do/_/de'ang thog mar dkar cha bzhi dang gtor ma brgya rtsa sngon du 'gro bas/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig 
[\[173b.7\]]pa'i lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi nyams len/_dpal kye rdo rje lha dgu man ngag lugs kyi mngon par rtogs pa 'bring du bya ba yan lag drug pa lam dus kyi dbang bzhi len pa dang bcas pa/_dpal nA ro ta pa'i thugs bcud kyi gdams pa zab mo rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ma'i bsgom bzlas/_rdo rje 'jigs byed rwa lugs kyi mngon par rtogs pa/_thugs rje chen po dang phyag rgya chen po zung 'jug tu nyams su len pa'i sgrub thabs mdo khams shar phyogs mar grags pa/_sgrol ma dkar mo yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub 
[\[174a.2\]]thabs/_rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i brag rdzong ma dang*/_gzhan yang rje btsun sa skya pa'i man ngag gser chos kyi skor la sogs pa gsang sngags gsar rnying gi yi dam gyi lha du ma'i bsgom bzlas mang po dang*/_de dag gi 
[\[174a.3\]]mjug tu'ang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor dang bcas pa rnams rgyun par chag nyams med pa'i dam bca' nges pa can du mdzad/_thun mtshams rnams su yang dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo dang*/_yan lag bdun pa dang*/_rgya bod kyi bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i sku 
[\[174a.4\]]bstod dang gsol 'debs kyi rigs mang po dang*/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyi ma re la tshar bdun re/_dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po'i bstod pa tshar nyi shu rtsa gcig re/_sgrol ma'i bstod pa phyag 'tshal nyer gcig pa tshar nyi shu rtsa gcig_/
[\[174a.5\]]nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa'i sgrol ma'i bstod pa rnam dag gtsug na can tshar re/_sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa tshar re/_shes rab snying po tshar dgu re/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med 
[\[174a.6\]]pa'i gzungs/_las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs rnams dang*/_phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang*/_bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam la sogs pa'i smon lam gyi skor mang po rnams zhal 'don du mdzad/_gzhan yang dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la phyag 'tshal 
[\[174a.7\]]ba dang bskor ba byed pa dang*/_sAts+tsha 'debs pa la sogs pa mdor na sa bdag chen po 'di nyid kyis nyi ma re la dam bcar bgyis pa'i dge sbyor kho na la yang*/_dge sbyor byed par rlom pa phal gyis nyi ma mang po 'phul ba'i rgyur 'gro ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brjod kyis 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mi ldang ba ni rnam par 'phrul pa mchog gi legs byas gcig pu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin no/_/gsang sngags zab mo'i bzlas brjod grangs su bgyis pa yang*/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa dung phyur gcig_/thugs rje chen po'i snying po yi ge 
[\[174b.2\]]drug pa dung phyur gcig_/gur gyi mgon po'i snying po yi ge bdun pa dung phyur gcig_/seng ge'i gdong can ma'i bsnyen pa dung phyur gcig rnams rang gi ljags thog nas bsags pa la sogs pa sgo gsum bag med kyi dbang du bzhugs pa ni rtag tu zhabs 'bring na 'khod 
[\[174b.3\]]pa rnams kyis kyang ye ma mthong ngo zhes kun gyis kha mthun par lan gcig ma yin par snyan dngags dam pa'i glu bzhin du len par byed do/_/mdor na rin chen phreng ba las/_dam pa'i chos dang chos smra la/_/nyid kyis bkur sti mchog dang ni/_/gus par mdzad de 
[\[174b.4\]]gnas las bzhengs/_/me tog gtor nas chos nyan cing*/_/chos kyi sbyin pa dag kyang mdzod/_/'jig rten gtam la dga' ma mdzad/_/'jig rten 'das la dgyes par mdzod/_/'khor rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/_/lhun stug brtan la nges par mdzod/_/
[\[174b.5\]]ces gsungs pa ltar dang*/_de dag gi bar skabs rnams su yang gzu bor gnas pa'i blo gros kyis legs par brtags pa'i bka' khrims btsan pos rgyal khams thams cad kyang byams pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las kyis bde bar skyong ba la blo sgam zhing gting 
[\[174b.6\]]mi rtogs pa/_bya ba gang brtsams kyang rang gi ngang gis 'grub pa la sogs pa yon tan bsam las 'das pa zhig ste/_de nyid las/_ji ltar rgyal srid bskyang ba dang*/_/'bangs kun bde la 'khod pa dang*/_/bsdo ba'i dgra rnams 'dul ba dang*/_/rgyal 
[\[174b.7\]]khams chos kyis bskyang bgyi ba/_/zhib tu dgongs nas grub par mdzod/_/'grub bam mi 'grub ma nges par/_/dgongs ma thag tu ma gsungs shig_/yun ji srid cig chos sgrub cing*/_/ser sna 'jur gegs ma mdzad par/_/bdog pa thams 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]cad gtugs te mdzod/_/khyod ni bdog pa kun bor nas/_/gcig bu ga shed gshegs 'tshal bas/_/chos kyi slad du spyad pa kun/_/khyod kyi mdun du 'ong ba nyid/_/'bangs la re ba ma 'jog par/_/zhal bzhugs tshe na myur bar 
[\[175a.2\]]mdzod/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa sngon gyi drang srong mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar gdams pa'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos rnams la nam yang mi 'da' ba lhur byed pa nyid do/_/der ma zad rin chen phreng ba las/_gtsug lag khang dag brtsig pa dang*/_/mchod rten brtsig 
[\[175a.3\]]dang na bza' gsol/_/zhig ral bcos dang mchod pa gzugs/_/lha khang la sogs gzhan bgyi ba/_/snga lugs bzhin du rgyas par mdzod/_/dam chos tshul bzhin spyod pa yi/_/dge slong dge bsnyen la sogs pa/_/gzhan gyis gtse ba med pa 
[\[175a.4\]]yi/_/dpung gnyen skyabs dang kha 'dzin mdzod/_/'di kun yun du bde ba yi/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i dge tshogs lags/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin du mi bdag 'di nyid kyi sku ring la lhun grub steng la sogs pa'i stod smad kyi dgon sde bcu gsum tsam du gtsug 
[\[175a.5\]]lag khang rten dang brten par bcas pa gsar du bskrun par mdzad pa'ang*/_'di lta ste/_gtsang e waM chos ldan du gling pa spyi khang dang*/_lhun grub steng gi lha khang gsar pa dang*/_mgon khang shar rten dang brten par bcas pa dang*/_lcags ri'i 'du khang rgyal 
[\[175a.6\]]mtshan dang bcas pa dang*/gzhan yang 'dzom thog dang*/_ye na dang*/_rab brtan dang*/_dum mdo dang*/_sbam mdzangs dang*/_dpal spungs dang*/_rga len steng dang*/_rnam rgyal gling dang*/_ldan gyi dran thang rnams su gtsug lag khang bcu bdun ldebs ris dang 
[\[175a.7\]]bcas pa dang*/_de dag gi nang du'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sku brnyan lder bzo dang*/_lhun grub steng 'dir gser zangs las grub pa'i bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems dang*/_chos skyong nor lha rnams kyi sku brnyen bzo bkod shin tu legs 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]pa snga phyir bzhengs pa phyed bzhi brgya tsam dang*/_tsan+dan dkar dmar las grub pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong gi sku brnyan cha gnyis kyis mtshon te gzhan mang po dang*/_ba so las grub pa'i sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sku brnyan slob dpon nyi ma sbas pa'i 
[\[175b.2\]]lugs dang*/_tsan+dan dkar dmar spel ma las grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten chen po brgyad thog tshad du langs pa bzo dbyibs khyad du 'phags pa can dang*/_rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal gser bris su byas pa glegs bam brgya phrag gcig 
[\[175b.3\]]la bdun gyis lhag pa dang*/_bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal dngul bris su byas pa glegs bam brgya phrag gnyis la brgyad kyis nye bar lhag pa dang*/_dpal sa skya'i rje btsun gong ma lnga'i bka' 'bum shog skyar bris pa glegs bam bcu drug ste de dag thams cad 
[\[175b.4\]]kyang glegs shing dang glegs thag dang na bza' tshun chad khyad par du 'phags pa dang*/_de dag gis mtshon pa'i glegs bam che chung bgrang las 'das pa bzhengs so/_/lha khang dang mchod rten rnams kyi gan 'ji ra dang rgyal mtshan mang po yang gser zangs las bgyis pa 
[\[175b.5\]]dang*/_lo bstar du gsang sngags zab mo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong rnams la chos dang mthun pa'i yon 'bul rgya chen po stob pa dang bcas te/_yi dam gyi lha mang po'i rtsa sngags dang*/_snying po dang*/_nye ba'i snying po rnams kyi bzlas pa dung phyur phrag mang po 
[\[175b.6\]]bsags/_sngon gyi gong ma rnams kyis ji ltar bzhag pa dang*/_rang nyid kyis gsar bzhag bgyis pa la'ang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lha drug brgya dang drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgrub mchod mang po lo dus ltar btsugs pa la dus las yol ba mi mnga' 
[\[175b.7\]]zhing*/_bar skabs rnams su yang dgon sde ris su med pa la sku rim gsar bskrun gyi cho ga'i rigs dang*/_mdo sna mang po khri 'don dang 'bum ther mang po 'don pa la sogs pa ste/_bsags pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba kho na'i rgyur 'gro bar mdzad do/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]sku tshe'i mthar yang bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin par du bsgrub pa'i dbu 'dzugs pa la sogs pa mdor na dus phyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lhag par bya ba byas pa'i bka' drin 'di dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang ma byung ngo zhes gtam du gling 
[\[176a.2\]]bar yang byed do/_/de ltar sa la spyod pa'i dbang po bstan pa tshe ring zhes yongs su grags pa de la sngon gyi bsod nams dpag tu med pa'i byed pos yongs su byin pa'i sde bzhi'i 'byor pa shin tu yangs shing rgya che la gzhar yang 'dzad du med pa'i longs spyod kyi gter chen po dang ldan 
[\[176a.3\]]par gyur te/_dper na rnam mang thos kyi bu'i dpal dang 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de lta na'ang thog mar rigs sras kyi phreng ba cung zad 'byon dka' ba ltar gyur par brten/_bdog pa'i dngos po phal che ba dag dkon mchog gi phyogs su gtong phod rgya chen po'i 'bul 
[\[176a.4\]]ba dang chab cig tu/_mthar thug gi 'bras bu bla na med pa'i byang chub nyid gtso bor dmigs te/_gnas skabs su'ang mi'i lha gang gi rigs sras chu bo'i rgyun ltar 'byon pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa la brtson pa lta bus/_'dzam gling bstan pa'i mnga' bdag dpal sa skya 
[\[176a.5\]]pa ngag dbang kun dga' bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa la sogs pa bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po/_gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi nus mthu grub pa gang dag gi bka' lung yid 'phrog dga' ma'i mig gi zur mda' gang du lhung ba tsam gyis/_
[\[176a.6\]]'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dregs byed mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba rnams kyang rang rang gi khengs pa ring du bskyungs nas/_ci bgyi zhes bsgo ba'i phrin las thams cad gus pas mnyan cing 'bad pa med par tshul bzhin du bsgrub pa la mi gus pa med pa'i rdo rje 'chang 
[\[176a.7\]]mang po'i bka' lung btsan pos srung ma'i dbang po gur mgon lcam dral dang*/_gdong bzhi mgon po la sogs pa srung ma rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams la/_bsil ldan ljongs kyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gdugs dkar thur ma brgya pa khams gsum gyi bla 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]ma nas bla mar 'degs pa'i snying stobs kyi yu ba brtan pa'i mi'i lha gang gi rigs sras gang+gA'i rgyun ltar chad pa mi mnga' zhing myur du 'byon pa'i phrin las su bskul ba'i rnga chen ci yang brdung bar brtsams so/_/dus ji tsam zhig na ji ltar bcol ba'i 'bras bus nam yang mi bslu 
[\[176b.2\]]ba nyid du 'byung ba ni dkon mchog gi bden pa'i mthu'i chos nyid do/_/de'ang sa gzhi thams cad chos bzhin du skyong ba'i rgyal po de la rigs sras kyi mchog tu gyur pa shing sA la chen po lta bu gsum zhig ris bral skye bo yongs kyi rtsa lag tu byung bar gyur to/_/de'i dang po la ni 
[\[176b.3\]]dpal mi'i dbang phyug bsod nams mgon po zhes bya ba phyogs rnams kun du rab tu grags pa ste/_de'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu zhig go snyam na/_'di ni phal dang thun mong du ma gyur pa zhig ste/_de'ang thog ma nyid nas chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyi thig le 
[\[176b.4\]]gcig tu bsdus nas legs par bskyed cing kun du yongs su bskyab pa'i skyes bu nyid du gdon mi za ba'i bden dpang du rnam par dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_sa chen po skyong ba la gnod pa dang sdo ba med pa/_gzi brjid che zhing 
[\[176b.5\]]mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas gzhan sde mi srun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/_sgyu rtsal gyi rigs thams cad la mkhas par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_yi ge dang*/_lag rtsis dang*/_grangs dang*/_rtsis chen dang*/_thor tshugs dang*/_gom 
[\[176b.6\]]stabs dang*/_lcags kyu'i bsgyur thabs dang*/_ral gri'i thabs dang*/_zhags pas gdab pa dang*/_mda' bo che 'phen pa dang*/_mdun du bsnur ba dang*/_phyir bsnur ba dang*/_gcad pa dang*/_dral ba dang*/_dbug pa dang*/_rgyang nas 'phog pa dang*/_sgra grag par 'phog 
[\[176b.7\]]pa dang*/_gnad du 'phog pa dang*/_mi 'chor bar 'phog pa dang*/_tshabs che bar 'phog pa dang*/_mchong ba dang*/_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang*/_bang dang*/_rkyal gyis brgal ba dang*/_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang*/_rta la zhon pa dang*/_shing rta'i thabs dang*/_mda' dang*/_
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gzhu dang*/_gyad stobs te bzor gtogs pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang gar dang bro dang*/_rnga bo che dang*/_rdza rnga dang*/_rnga phran dang*/_rnga chen/_'khar rnga/_pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang*/_rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang*/_lcags kyi sil khrol dang*/_'khar 
[\[177a.2\]]ba'i sil khrol dang*/_pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang*/_rnga mu kun+da dang*/_sil snyan glu dbyangs dang bstun pa dang*/_pheg rdo ba dang*/_rol mo'i sgra'i rigs gzhan dang*/_pi wang spyi'i rigs dang*/_gling bu ste rol mo'i bye brag rnams dang*/_gzhan yang dbyangs kyi nges pa 
[\[177a.3\]]bar ma dang*/_drang srong dang*/_sa 'dzin dang*/_drug ldan dang*/_lnga pa dang*/_blo gsal dang*/_'khor nyan rnams dang*/_gzhan yang*/_sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa/_/drag shul bzhad gad 'jigs su rung*/_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ste/_/zhes pa'i gar gyi cha byad rnams 
[\[177a.4\]]te/_sgyu rtsal gyi rigs rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang*/_gzhan yang pho rtsal sna dgu zhes bya ba/_mtheb kyis sha non pa dang*/_rkyal gyis chu chen brgal ba dang*/_yang rtsal bya lta bu ste lus kyi rtsal gsum/_lo rgyus kyis dge 'thon pa dang*/_gtam gyis bzhad 
[\[177a.5\]]gad 'thon pa dang*/_gshags kyis pha rol gnon pa ste ngag gi rtsal gsum dang*/_mdzangs la blo 'gyu ba dang*/_dpa' la bsran tshugs pa dang*/_kha gsal zhing gting mi rtogs pa ste yid kyi rtsal gsum dang bcas pa dang*/_gzhan yang pho rtsed sna dgu zhes 
[\[177a.6\]]bya ba/_gtam yig rtsis gsum/_mda' rdo mchongs gsum/_bang rkyal shed gsum dang bcas pa ste skyes bu dam pa la 'os pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa rab tu rdzogs par gyur to/_/rnam pa gcig tu las 'bras ston pa'i mdo dang bstan bcos kyi rigs la 
[\[177a.7\]]shin tu 'dris pas dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa'i blang dor gyi gnas rnams la 'dzol med du dpyod cing gzhan la yang rgya cher 'doms pa la mkhyen rab kyi 'jug pa shin tu g.yer por gyur te/_dbon po stod kyi gdan sa'i khur bzhes so/_/der chab 'bangs su gtogs pa 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang rjes su 'brel ba'i bka' khrims bzang pos bde ba la sbyor ba'i thabs la shin tu mkhas shing*/_skye bo ma lus pa phyogs su lhung ba med pa'i thugs brtses gting nas mi 'dor zhing*/_nyes par spyod pa rnams kyang 'phral la bsdigs pa'i 
[\[177b.2\]]tshul gyis legs pa'i lam du 'chos pa dang*/_legs par spyod pa rnams ni gong nas gong du bkur ba'i sgo nas bogs 'byin pa'i tshul gyis bde bar skyong ba'i mdzad pa bzang po nam yang mi bskyud par lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa nyid do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[177b.3\]]rtag tu sgo gsum bag dang bcas pa la legs par gnas nas/_bgyi ba dang bgyi bar bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_bkur ba dang bkur bar bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_gzhom pa dang gzhom par bya ba ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad yang dang yang du legs par brtags nas nyam nga 
[\[177b.4\]]ba med pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa ste/_'phags mchog nA gArdzu nas/_phan sems che ba sgrin pa'i tshul/_/drang po'i tshul ni mi bslu ba/_/bag yod nyam nga med pa ni/_/de ni rgyal po'i tshul du gnas/_/zhes dang*/_ma su rak+Shas byas pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos 
[\[177b.5\]]las kyang*/_brtan zhing zab mo'i blo dang ldan/_/mdangs ldan chos dang bstan bcos rig_/dul zhing bden par smra ba dang*/_/rgyal po'i 'khor la phan par sems/_/rigs btsun rgyud ni mnyin pa dang*/_/bla ma la ni gus nyan dang*/_/skye dgu rjes brtser ldan pa 
[\[177b.6\]]yi/_/rgyud byung de ni rgyal sras yin/_/zhes bshad pa lta bu'i yon tan rin po che'i bang mdzod legs par bzung nas/_rang gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i dngos po ma lus pa bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/khyad par chos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i mdo las/_lha dang bcas 
[\[177b.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten na/_/dkon mchog gsum po ma gtogs pa/_/yon gyi gnas 'ga' yod ma yin/_/zhes dang*/_sangs rgyas phal po che las/_rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas na/_/de dag bdud bzhi'i 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]lam las rab 'das te/_/byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa'i lung don dang mthun par dkon mchog gsum la dad pa gsum gyi rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa'i sgo nas bdog pa'i dngos po phal che ba dag gis bsnyen bkur ba la sogs pa 
[\[178a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba lhur byed pa gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa zhig ste/_de yang skye bo phal pa kha cig ni/_rang gis bsags pa'i dngos po bzang zhing shin tu phangs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag bdag gir bzung nas/_de'i lhag mar gyur pa'i dngos po dman pa'am yan 
[\[178a.3\]]'gar du lus pa de nyid mchod sbyin gyi ched du gtong ba dag yod kyang*/_sa 'dzin chen po 'dis ni rang gi bdog dgu thams cad kyi phul du byung ba'am mchog tu gyur pa'am/_ches dkon pa'am/_gces par bzung ba gang yin pa de dag ni dkon mchog gi phyogs su btang ba gtso 
[\[178a.4\]]bor byed cing*/_khyad par 'dzam gling bstan pa'i mnga' bdag dpal sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams rin chen pa yab sras rnams dang*/_rje btsun rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po'i dam pa chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la mnga' bsgyur ba'i mkhan chen thams cad 
[\[178a.5\]]mkhyen pa bkra shis lhun grub pa dang*/_rgyal ba kun gyi rigs kyi bdag po dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rtsen pa mkhan chen dpal ldan chos skyong ba dang*/_mdo sngags rgya mtsho smra ba'i dbang phyug yar klung mkhan po ngag dbang kun 
[\[178a.6\]]dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas dang*/_phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba sangs rgyas ye shes pa dang*/_rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pa la sogs pa mkhas pa dang btsun pa dang grub pa'i yon tan mi zad nam mkha'i 
[\[178a.7\]]mdzod du gyur pa mang po'i zhabs kyi pad+ma rnams ni/_lha dang mi'i yul na rnyed par dka' zhing rin thang gzhal du med pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od zer stong gi drwa ba ring po'i lam du 'phro ba gang gis nye bar spud pa ste/_de lta bu'i ral pa'i thor tshugs rin po che 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]an+da rnyil gyi khu bas lan brgyar byugs pa snyam byed pa'i rtse mo na mngon par bkod cing*/_de dag mnyes pa'i zhal gyi 'dzum sgros ban+d+hA dzi ba ka ltar rnam par phye ba las legs par 'ongs pa'i mdo sde dang rgyud sde rnams kyis rjes su bstan par bya ba'i gdams pa zab mo'i bdud 
[\[178b.2\]]rtsi'i bcud len mtha' dag yang dang yang du btung bas/_mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i grong khyer mchog tu 'jug par byed pa'i lam gyi lus stobs yongs su rtas par byed pa'i thabs su/_rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa mchog dang thun mong gi dngos 
[\[178b.3\]]grub sgrub par byed pa'i gnas su mchog tu bsngags pa'i lhag pa'i lha mang po'i bsgom bzlas kyi rim pa rgyun bar nyid du ma chag par thugs nyams su bstar ro/_/gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa dang*/_shes rab snying po pa dang*/_sgrol bstod pa dang*/_slob 
[\[178b.4\]]dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi gsol 'debs le'u bdun pa la sogs pa gsang sngags gsar rnying gi bla ma brgyud pa mang po'i gsol 'debs dang smon lam gyi rigs mang po zhal ton du mdzad do/_/khyad par rang gi yab rje sa skyong bstan pa tshe ring gi dgongs rdzogs 
[\[178b.5\]]bsgrub pa dang*/_sa bdag rang gi dal 'byor gyi rten bzang po brnyes pa chos tshul dge ba bcu dang ldan par bya ba dang*/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snying po can du bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/_chu pho khyi'i lor gtsang dbus kyi phyogs su chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur 
[\[178b.6\]]te dbus gtsang gi sa'i char 'khod pa'i dgon sde ris su ma chad pa rnams su/_bstan pa rin po che'i rtsa lag tu bzhugs shing rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las mu med par spro ba la bka' drin gzhal du med par gyur pa'i bla ma dang*/_mkhan po dang*/_zur 'chad pa mtha' dag la 
[\[178b.7\]]dngos po bzang zhing rgya dpangs mi dman pa'i mchod 'bul dang*/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho lta bu ji snyed cig mchis pa rnams la 'bul ba dang bsnyen bkur gya nom pa dag gis mnyes par bgyis so/_/de dag tu bzhugs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi rten byin rlabs 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]kyi gzi 'od mngon par 'bar ba mtha' dag la yang*/_snyan shal dang*/_'phan dang*/_ba dan dang*/_bla re dang*/_lda ldi dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_spos dang*/_mar me dang*/_zhal zas la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rnam grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dngos 
[\[179a.2\]]po bzang zhing rgya che ba dag gis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_rjed par byas/_phyag 'tshal bar byas te/_sa bdag chen po rang gi yab mes gong ma chos kyi dbyings su thim pa rnams kyi thugs kyi bzhed pa ma lus pa yongs su bskang ba dang*/_rang dang rang 
[\[179a.3\]]la ltos bcas kyi skye bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang bcas pa rnams kyi rgyud la bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i rgya mtsho rgya che zhing gting mi dpog par bskyil te/_mdor na gtsug lag zung gi phrin las kyi snang ba dkar pos phyogs kyi kho ra khor 
[\[179a.4\]]yug ma lus pa yongs su bkang ba dang 'gengs bzhin pa'i ngo mtshar gtam gyi zla 'od gzhon nu phyogs kyi lus phra'i rna rgyan du 'god pa 'di ltar lags so/_/lha sras rigs kyi shing sA la chen po lta bu gsum pa ni sde dge blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni sngon gyi 
[\[179a.5\]]bsod nams kyi rgyu dpag tu med pas bskyed pas skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i lha'i rigs su 'khrungs pa/_thog ma nyid nas dbang po dul bar gyur pas spyod tshul mi mthun pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/_rtag tu thos bsam la goms pa lhur byas pas blo dri ma med par 
[\[179a.6\]]gyur pa/_rig byed gsum dang brtag pa brgyad la sogs pa rig pa'i gtsug lag mang po la mkhas pa/_gzhan yang 'phags mchog klu sgrub zhabs kyis/_gang la pha dang ma dag mchod byed pa'i/_/rigs de tshangs bcas slob dpon bcas pa'ang lags/_
[\[179a.7\]]de dag la mchod grags par 'gyur ba dang*/_/slad ma la yang mtho ris 'gyur ba lags/_/zhes pa ltar rang gi bla ma dang yab yum dang rgan rabs zhe sar 'os pa rnams la bkur sti mkhas pa/_gang gi yon tan gyi grags pa dkar po la 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]pa'i gnas su gyur cing*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang sems can thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i snying stobs dang dam bca'i ya lad shin tu btsan par bgos pa zhig go_/de yang 'di ltar yid la byed de/_bdag gis bstan 'gro'i don bgyid 
[\[179b.2\]]pa la ni rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i 'gal 'brel tshul bzhin du dpyod pa'i blo gros phun sum tshogs pa zhig la rag las so/_/de yang blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i gnas rig pa'i gtsug lag lnga po legs par rtogs pa las 'byung bar dgongs nas de dag 
[\[179b.3\]]gi gzhung yan lag dang bcas pa ci rigs pa la mkhas par sbyangs so/_/khyad par skye bo gzhan dag phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa'i phyir/_gso ba rig pa'i rgyud bzhi 'grel pa snga phyi mang po dang bcas pa la sbyangs pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa g.yu thog yon tan mgon 
[\[179b.4\]]po'i dpal la 'gran par gyur te/_nad rlung las gyur pa dang*/_bad kan las gyur pa dang*/mkhris pa las gyur pa dang*/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis nyen pa'i skye bo grangs med pa duHkha las rnam par bkrol te mi shigs pa'i 
[\[179b.5\]]srog gi ka ba brtan por btsugs pa'i phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur to/_/nang don rig pa'i gnas ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos chen po sdom pa gsum gyi rab tu dbye ba dang*/_dpal kye rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa dang*/_rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par 
[\[179b.6\]]gzhag pa dang*/_rgyud kyi mngon par rtogs pa dag gi don ma lus pa ston pa'i bstan bcos tshul dang po gsum dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa ljon shing ste mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan rnam pa gnyis dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang*/_dbu ma bshes pa'i spring 
[\[179b.7\]]yig dang*/_rgyal po la gdams pa la sogs pa'i gzhung mang po thugs su chud par mdzad pas lung dang rigs pa'i bdag por gyur to/_/gzhan yang tshogs 'don gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i chos spyod rnams dang*/_kye rdo rje dang rdo rje phur pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]mchod chen po mang po dang*/_de dag gi phyag len phra mo tshun chad la'ang gzhan dring mi 'jog par mdzad do/_/khyad par du yang slob spring las/_gang zhig thob na skye ba'i rgya mtsho mthar 'byin cing*/_/byang chub mchog gi sa bon dge ba'ang 'debs byed la/_/yid 
[\[180a.2\]]bzhin nor bu bas kyang yon tan ches lhag pa'i/_/mi nyid thob nas su zhig 'bras bu med par byed/_/bde gshegs lam bstan 'gro ba 'dren par chas gyur cing*/_/sems kyi stobs chen mi yi rnyed pa gang yin pa/_/lam 'di lha dang klu yis mi rnyed gnod sbyin dang*/_/mkha' 
[\[180a.3\]]lding rig 'dzin mi'am ci dang lto 'phyes min/_/zhes dang*/_bshes spring las/_rgya mtsho gcig nas gnya' shing bu ga dang*/_/rus sbal phrad pa bas kyang dud 'gro las/_/mi nyid ches thob dka' bas mi dbang gis/_/dam chos spyod pas bde 'bras mchis par mdzod/_/
[\[180a.4\]]ces gsungs pa ltar dal 'byor gyi rten bzang po rnyed pa 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa'i tshul legs par dpyod cing blang dor thams cad phyin ci ma log par mdzad do/_/khyad par mkhas grub yongs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'jam mgon 
[\[180a.5\]]bkra shis lhun grub pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i yongs 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po'i zhabs kyi pad+ma gtsug gi rgyan du brten cing*/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun mang pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang gi bde ba bla na med pa de nyid 
[\[180a.6\]]thob par byed pa'i gsos su yang yang btung nas/_de dag gi snying po sdom pa gsum gyi bslab pa'i gnas thams cad mig gis 'bras bu bzhin du gces par bsrung zhing*/_ngor pa'i chag med rnam pa bzhis thog drangs pa'i mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs la 
[\[180a.7\]]mchog tu gyur pa'i yi dam gyi lha'i bsgom bzlas dang nyams len mang po thugs nyams su bstar ro/_/'di yum sras kyi skam thog gi pho brang du lha khang dang mgon khang rten dang brten par bcas pa gsar du bzhengs te/_der sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku brnyan 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]gser zangs las byas pa dang*/_tsan+dan dkar dmar las byas pa mang po bzhengs/_rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal dang sa skya bka' 'bum par ma la sogs pa'i glegs bam mang po yon gyis bslus te/_de dag gi glegs thag dang glegs shing thams cad kyang 
[\[180b.2\]]bzo bkod khyad par 'phags pa mdzad do/_/de dag gi mdun du'ang rtag par mchod pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bkur sti dang bcas te bzhugs su gsol ba la/_dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi rig sngags grub pa ngor gyi mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang dpal ldan chos skyong 
[\[180b.3\]]grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po dang*/_yar lung mkhan po ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas dang*/_mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes la sogs pa mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po rnams/_dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi 
[\[180b.4\]]dbur bzhugs su gsol ba'i rten de dag la mngon par zhen pa'i bgegs dang dri ma sbyang ba dang*/_rten rang rang gi rigs kyi lhar bskyed pa la ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga yang dag par bsgrubs te byin gyis brlabs pa dang phan bde'i 
[\[180b.5\]]gzi 'od nyi ma bye ba'i dpal las lhag par 'bar ba mdzad do/_/mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po de dag la'ang snga phyir bdog pa'i dngos po bzang dgu brgya phrag mang pos bsnyen bkur bstabs te longs spyod thams cad snying po can du byas so/_/'dzom thog dgon du dge 
[\[180b.6\]]'dun gyi kun dga' rwa ba rten dang brten par bcas pa gsar du bskrun te/_der dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po bsdus nas ngor pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga'i sgrub mchod yod pa la bca' sgrigs chos dang mthun par bsdams shing*/_gsar du'ang rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor 
[\[180b.7\]]ma'i sin+d+hu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub mchod zla re bzhin tshes bcu la rgyun mi chad par 'dzugs pa dang*/_sa ngor dang ljongs 'di'i dgon sde ris su med par yang mchod 'bul rgya chen po byed pa la sogs pa mdor na rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las kyi bya ba rgya dang dpangs mi chung bar bgyis pa dang 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]bgyid bzhin pa'i snying stobs dang gtong ba chen po'i sgo nam yang mi bsdam pa 'di nyid do/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i bsod nams dang stobs kyis mngon par mtho ba'i lha sras kyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu gnyis pa ni/_tha gru rnam par yangs pa'i sa chen po la 
[\[181a.2\]]'khod pa'i skye bo phal mo che gzhal du med pa'i byams brtse dang phrin las kyi gdung skyob dkar po'i grib bsil snum po gcig gis yongs su khyab par bde bar skyong ba la brdzi ba mi mnga' zhing*/_slar yang gnam gyi mthongs nas bskos pa'i mi bdag gong ma chen po'i las lung gi 
[\[181a.3\]]dbang skal btsan pos lan gcig min par shin tu brling bar byas pa'i mi'i nor bu rin po che/_gcig tu gangs ldan ri bo'i rwa bas yongs su bskor ba'i sman ljongs chen po 'di nyid du bzhugs pa'i bstan pa rin po che ris su ma chad pa'i dbu 'phang bla nas blar 'degs pa la bsnyengs 
[\[181a.4\]]pa med pa'i snying stobs kyi phrag pa brtan pa gang de/_bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i legs byas kyi mthu chen po dag gis kun tu rab tu brling bar byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi dbang po/_bstan pa'i snying po sdom pa gsum gyi tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas rgyud yongs su gtams pa'i 
[\[181a.5\]]mtshan ni sde dge sa skyong bla ma chen po kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes yongs su grags pa'i zla ris gsar pa'i 'phrin yig dam pa gang de/_phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi yid 'phrog dga' ma'i 'gram dkyus yangs par legs par 'dri ba/_khyad par du yang rnam par 
[\[181a.6\]]dkar ba'i bya ba rgya chen po 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i thog mtha' bar gsum gyi bdag po'i rkyen byed pa po gang yin pa de nyid do/_/gnyis pa de'i yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa la/_yang dag pa'i lung la brten nas skye ba'i sprul skur grub pa'i khyad par/_gzhon nu'i sa la gnas nas ya 
[\[181a.7\]]rabs kyi spyod pa bskyangs pa'i khyad par/_bstan pa'i rjes su zhugs nas thos pa dang tshogs bsags kyi khyad par/_bstan srid kyi khri la bzhugs nas phrin las kyi rgyun skyong ba'i khyad par brjod pa ste bzhi las/_dang po yang dag pa'i lung la brten nas skye ba'i sprul skur 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]grub pa'i khyad par ni/_spyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos kyi phrin las 'jig rten gyi khams su yun ring por gnas pa dang*/_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par la rjes su zhugs pa'i tshe na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[181b.2\]]dpa' dang*/_'phags pa nyan thos dang*/_rang sangs rgyas dang*/_'jig rten na che ba'i tshangs pa dang*/_dbang po dang*/_'jig rten skyong ba dang*/_stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang*/_khams kyi rgyal phran dang*/_dam pa'i chos smra ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[181b.3\]]pas don mdzad pa yin te/_de'ang blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdor/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/brgya byin tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong*/_/'khor los sgyur dang mi yi bdag por 'gyur/_/bde dang yid bde'i byang chub de 'tshang rgya/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[181b.4\]]pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing*/_/mkhas pa yan lag smad pa med par 'gyur/_/de la blta bas ngoms par yongs mi 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa cho 'phrul rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo las/_bcom 
[\[181b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang*/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mang ngo*/_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu dang*/_ji ltar 'dul ba dang*/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dang*/_
[\[181b.6\]]sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas chos ston te/_sems can kha cig ni byang chub sems dpas 'dul/_kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/_kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/_kha cig ni lhas 'dul/_kha cig ni brgya byin gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni tshangs 
[\[181b.7\]]pas 'dul/_kha cig ni klus 'dul/_kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul/_kha cig ni rgyal pos 'dul/_kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni chos nyan pas 'dul/_kha cig ni cho 'phrul gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul/_kha cig 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]ni ring bsrel gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni mchod rten byed du 'jug_/gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal byed du gzhug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang*/_ri mo dang*/_gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_ra gan gyis sku gzugs byed du 
[\[182a.2\]]gzhug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bar spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni mdo sde 'dri ba dang*/_'drir gzhug pa dang*/_bklag pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni mar me dang*/_spos dang*/
[\[182a.3\]]me tog dang*/_dri dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_do shal la sogs pas brgyan pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul ba yin te/_don dam pa mkhas pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang*/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yang de bzhin gshegs pas ni mi mkhyen pa dang*/_mi 
[\[182a.4\]]gzigs pa dang*/_mi gsan pa dang*/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/_'ong ba yang mkhyen/_ma 'ongs pa yang mkhyen/_'das pa yang mkhyen/_da ltar byung ba yang mkhyen/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang mkhyen/_spyod pa yang mkhyen/_khams kyang mkhyen/_
[\[182a.5\]]skye ba yang mkhyen/_'byung ba yang mkhyen to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/_dper na sman pa legs par bslabs pa tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad pa thams cad la ches mkhas shing khams thams cad la mkhas pa/_sman dang yo byad sbyor ba la brtson pa ni/_sems can nad pa 
[\[182a.6\]]nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba rnams kyi khams kyang shes/_dus kyang shes/_tshod kyang shes/_sman yang shes/_rlung las gyur pa dang*/_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang*/_bad kan las gyur pa dang*/_'dus pa las gyur pa dang*/_khrag las gyur pa dang*/_ma zhu ba las gyur pa dang*/_
[\[182a.7\]]skran dang*/_dmu rdzing dang*/_snying nad dang*/_mdze dang*/_g.yan pa dang*/_shu ba dang*/_'bras la sogs pa dang*/_dug dang*/_me dbal la sogs pa'ang shes so/_/des thams cad shes nas sman gyi rdzas sna tshogs kyi phye ma dang*/_sna nas blugs pa'i las dang*/_gtar ga gdab pa dang*/_mar 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang*/_'bru mar bskol ba dang*/_smin par bya ba rnams sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nad de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing nad sna tshogs kyi 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin 
[\[182b.2\]]sna tshogs dang*/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang*/_stobs dang*/_mi 'jigs pa dang*/_lha'i mig dang rna ba rnams kyi tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams dang bcas sbyor ba sna tshogs la mkhas pas/_'dod chags dang*/_zhe sdang dang*/_gti mug gi nad 
[\[182b.3\]]dang*/_nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can dang*/_nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pas bsgribs pa dang*/_chags pa dang*/_mya ngan dang*/_'jigs pa dang*/_khro bas bsgribs pa rnams sems can dmyal ba dang*/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang*/_yi 
[\[182b.4\]]dwags kyi skye gnas dang*/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas nas yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs dang*/_sbyor ba sna tshogs dang*/_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang*/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pas sems can rnams yongs su sgrol bar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[182b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sar bkod pas lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par mdzad do/_/mi dge ba'i chos brgyad las yongs su thar bar mdzad cing*/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'god pa ni/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla 
[\[182b.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor ni thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas ji ltar khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag nyid mi snang bar yang ston/_zla ba kham pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor kyang ston/_zla ba mar gyi ngo dang yar gyi ngo yang ston/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas 
[\[182b.7\]]pa yang ston/_mun nag thibs po thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang 'bru la sogs pa yang bsil bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams dang 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]khams sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' yang skye bar yang ston/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por yang ston/_rtse ba dang*/_dga' ba dang*/_bud med kyi bzhad gad dang*/_ku re dang*/_dri dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_
[\[183a.2\]]dga' zhing rtse ba yang ston/_khyim nas 'byung ba dang*/_rab tu byung ba dang*/_dka' ba spyod pa rnams kyang ston/_bdud btul ba dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/_chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pas sems can rnams tshim par byed pa'i bar yang ston/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[183a.3\]]pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang spyod pa sna tshogs kyis ring bsrel mchod pa dang*/_mchod rten dang*/_gtsug lag khang dang sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang*/_rab tu byung ba'i phyir khyim nas byung ba dang*/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams mchod pa dang*/_dam pa'i chos 'dri 
[\[183a.4\]]ba dang*/_bklag pa dang*/_kha ton du bya ba la spro ba bskyed pa dag gis kyang sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad pa dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_brtul zhugs dang*/_sdom pa dang*/_nye bar gnas pa dang*/_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rnams 'dzin du gzhug pa'i thabs mkhas pas kyang sems can rnams thar bar 
[\[183a.5\]]mdzad de/_sems can dmyal ba dang*/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang*/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang*/_mi khom pa dang*/_ngan song dang*/_ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par mdzad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do zhes dang*/_mdo sde sa bcu pa las/_sa 
[\[183a.6\]]dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni phal cher dzam+bu'i gling gi dbang por 'gyur zhing*/_dbang phyug chen po la dbang rab tu thob pa dang*/_chos rjes su bsrung ba dang*/_gtong ba chen pos sems can rnams sdud pa'i gtso bor gyur cing*/_sems can rnams kyi ser sna'i dri ma 
[\[183a.7\]]bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin/_gtong ba chen po rtsom pa la yongs su dub par mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/sbyin pa dang*/_snyan par smra ba dang*/_don spyod pa dang*/_don mthun pas las gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de thams cad sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang*/_chos yid la bya ba dang*/_dge 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'dun yid la bya ba dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba nas/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_gtso bor 'gyur/_phul du 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[183b.2\]]dang*/_'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phrul pa chen po rnam pa bcur khong du chud par bya ste/_gang zhe na 'khor los sgyur bar 'phrul ba dang*/_brgya byin du 'phrul ba dang*/_tshangs par 'phrul ba dang*/_nyan thos su 
[\[183b.3\]]'phrul ba dang*/_rang sangs rgyas su 'phrul ba dang*/_byang chub sems dpar 'phrul ba dang*/_sangs rgyas su 'phrul ba dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'phrul ba dang*/_byang chub kyi snying por 'phrul ba dang bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phrul ba chen por khong du chud par bya'o/_/de 
[\[183b.4\]]la nam 'jig rten na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gtso bor byed cing tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang*/_spyod pa gtso bo byed pa der ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa rnam par sprul nas sems can gyi don byed do zhes sogs dang*/_de la sogs 
[\[183b.5\]]pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bkod pa thams cad sprul nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems la dbang ba/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/_mi rin po che kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las zab pa/_snum pa/_phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa chos chen po 
[\[183b.6\]]la gzhol ba/_'khor los sgyur ba chen po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brten pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'phrul ba chen po zhes bya'o zhes dang*/_theg pa chen 
[\[183b.7\]]po'i bstan bcos mdo sde rgyan las/_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ni/_/khyim pa 'khor los sgyur rnams su/_/gyur nas skye ba thams cad du/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/zhes dang*/_dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis rin chen phreng bar/_de dag dang por rab dga' ba/_/byang chub 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]sems dpa' dga' byed phyir/_/kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs shing*/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs skyes phyir/_/de yi rnam par smin pas na/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin mchog gyur/_/'jig rten khams ni brgya g.yo zhing*/_/'dzam gling dbang phyug chen por gyur/_/zhes so/_/des na sangs 
[\[184a.2\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa cir yang ston pa la zhugs pa na/_brgya byin dang*/_tshangs pa dang*/_'jig rten skyong ba dang*/_'khor los sgyur ba dang*/_mi'i rgyal po dang*/_nyan thos dang*/_rang sangs rgyas dang*/_dgra bcom pa dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' la sogs 
[\[184a.3\]]pa'i tshul bzung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las kyi rgyun mi nub par skyong bar byed do/_/bye brag tu dam pa'i chos yun du gnas par byed pa dang*/_sems can rnams nyes par byed pa las bzlog nas legs par byed pa la 'god pa la sogs par chos dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyal po'i skye bar sprul pa ni 
[\[184a.4\]]lha dang mi'i yul na grags pa dge ba'i gzhir gyur pa ste/_gser 'od dam pa las/_rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi/_/grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste/_/sum cu gsum gyi gnas rnams na/_/lha yi dbang po dgar 'gyur te/_/'dzam bu'i gling na nged kyi bu/_/'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin/_/
[\[184a.5\]]chos kyi yul 'khor der brten nas/_/legs par byed la skye bo bkod/_/rgyal po de ni legs byed pas/_/skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de/_/lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo/_/chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas/_/rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'/_/lha dbang rab tu dang gyur 
[\[184a.6\]]pas/_/mi yi rgyal po de la bsrung*/_/nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du/_/rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/_/rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing*/_/char pa'ang dus su 'bab par 'gyur/_/lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du/_/yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed/_/lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha yi gnas rnams gang 
[\[184a.7\]]bar byed/_/de lta bas na rgyal po yi/_/bdag gis phangs pa'i srog btang gis/_/bdag gis 'jig rten bder 'gyur ba'i/_/dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste/_/yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa/_/chos dang ldan pas bsten par bya/_/rang gis skye bo rtag dga' ba/_/rtag tu sdig pa rnam par spang*/_/chos kyis yul 'khor 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]bskyang bar bya/_/chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya/_/legs par byed la sems can dgod/_/nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya/_/gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams/_/tshul bzhin 'dul bar byed pa'i tshe/_/yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing*/_/rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing*/_/skye dgu 
[\[184b.2\]]rnams kyang bde bar skyong*/_/zhes so/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sdom brtson mi'i dbang phyug chen po 'di ni/_skye ba nas skye bar snying stobs dman pa min pa'i thugs bskyed kyi khur chen po yongs su khyer bas/_dus snyigs ma lnga'i mun klong stug po'i khrod du rang dbang med par chud pa'i 'gro ba rnams gnas 
[\[184b.3\]]skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba la ci nus su dgod pa'i phyir dang*/_dge legs thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dam pa'i chos rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams su yun ring por gnas pa'i cho ga mtha' dag bsgrub pa'i g.yar dam dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_sa 
[\[184b.4\]]gzhi yangs pa chos bzhin du skyong ba la bsnyengs pa dang bral ba'i stobs dang 'byor pa dang grags pa dkar pos mngon par mtho ba'i mi'i rgyal po chen por skye ba'i sprul sku'i dpag bsam gyi ljon pa yongs su bzung nas/_'gro ba kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir byed pa gdon mi za ba zhig go_/gnyis pa gzhon nu'i sa 
[\[184b.5\]]la gnas nas ya rabs kyi spyod pa bskyangs pa'i khyad par ni/_de ltar ring nas dge tshogs dpag tu med pa mngon par 'du byas pa'i mthu las legs par 'khrungs pa'i bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/_bsam pa dge ba/_rang dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid 
[\[184b.6\]]chen po dam pa'i chos 'dod pa/_'gro ba thams cad la mnyes gshin pa la sogs pa ya rabs dam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhig ste/_de'ang 'phags mchog klu sgrub kyis/_gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la dga'/_/mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med/_/gzi brjid che yang bzod cing des pa'i 
[\[184b.7\]]ngang*/_/je mthor phyin yang nga rgyal dregs pa med/_/ces dang*/_ser sna g.yo sgyu chags dang snyom las dang*/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'dod chags zhe sdang dang*/_/rigs dang gzugs dang thos pa lang tsho dang*/_/dbang thang che bas rgyags pa dgra bzhin gzigs/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin du lang tsho gzhon nu'i sa 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]la gnas pa'i dus nas/_rang gi bla mar gyur pa dang*/_slob dpon dang*/_mkhas pa yon tan can dang*/_pha ma la sogs pa zhe sa bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa gang yin pa dag la zhe sar mkhas pa'i sri zhu'i sgo nas mngon par mchod cing*/_rang nyid ni dpa' ba dang*/_rtul phod pa dang*/_
[\[185a.2\]]yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang lang tshor ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi mig tu sdug cing yid 'phrog par bzod pa/_pad+ma'i rdzing bur 'khrungs pa'i chu skyes gzhon nu kha phye ma thag pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rgyas shing*/_gtam gyi sgo nas li shi gsar pa'i dri 'byung ba la sogs pa gzhon 
[\[185a.3\]]nu dam pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos legs par bzung ba'o/_/der ma zad bslad pa med pa'i rigs dang*/_brdzi ba med pa'i stobs dang*/_gzhom du med pa'i dpung pa dang*/_bri ba med pa'i mnga' thang dang dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dag gis phyur bur gtams par gyur mod 
[\[185a.4\]]kyi/_bdag ni 'di ltar bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan no snyam du gzhan la ji mi snyam byed pa'i mngon par khengs pa yongs su spangs pa dang*/_rang gi bdog pa'i dngos po dbyig gi rnam pa'am/_'bru'i bang ba'am/_bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rnam pa'am/_bgo ba dang rgyan gyi bye 
[\[185a.5\]]brag gam/_rta dang bzhon pa la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung la mngon par zhen cing*/_'di ni dkon mchog gi phyogs su mchod par phul ba'am/_bkren pa dang phongs pa dang*/_nyam thag pa dang*/_mgon med pa dang*/_nad pa dang*/_yul gzhan nas bskrad pa la sogs pa snying rje'i yul 
[\[185a.6\]]du gyur pa'i skye bo rnams la sbyin par byin na/_slar yang 'di dang 'di lta bu'i 'byor ba dag gis yongs su dben par 'gyur ro snyam pa la sogs pa sog srung gi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba'i ser sna'i 'ching ba thams cad las rang bzhin gyis grol ba/_slong ba thams cad kyi dpag 
[\[185a.7\]]bsam ljon pa lta bu'i gtong phod chen po'i phyag ring rab tu rkyong ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la gcig tu 'dun cing spro ba mchog gi rtser 'dzegs pa zhig go/_/der ma zad/_mgon po byams pas/_rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la sbyong bar ma byas na/_/'phags mchog ci gsung thams cad mkhyen 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]nyid mi 'gyur te/_/zhes dang*/_sa skya paN+Di tas/_ma bslabs pa la kun mkhyen du/_/'gyur na rgyu 'bras ga la bden/_/rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa 'di/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i khyad chos yin/_/zhes gsungs pa dang*/_skyes rabs las kyang*/_/yon tan yod na rgyal po'i go 'phang 
[\[185b.2\]]dang*/_/skye dgu mngon par mtho ba thob par 'gyur/_/lha dbang dpal yang yon tan la ltos te/_/yon tan yod na pha rol mgu bar 'gyur/_/grags pa rnams kyang yon tan nyid las 'phro/_/bdag nyid che ba'ang yon tan ldan las 'byung*/_/zla 'od las kyang gsal ba'i yon tan 
[\[185b.3\]]gyis/_/dgra bo mi zad dregs shing sdang ba dang*/_/'khon rnying yod cing phrag dog che ba yang*/_/yid ni rab tu dang zhing mgu byed do/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar gnas skabs su skyon yon gyi khyad par ma 'khrul bar rnam par 'byed cing blang dor gyi gnad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang*/_de 
[\[185b.4\]]la brten nas mdza' ba dang mdza' ba ma yin pa'i skye bo thams cad ma bsdus par yang rang dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ba dang*/_srid pa nas srid pa thams cad du yon tan gyi grags pa'i zla 'od dkar po phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug thams cad du nyul ba yang yon tan gyi dbang 
[\[185b.5\]]las byung bar rjes su rtogs so/_/de ltar rtogs nas kyang thog mar 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang*/_las kyi gnas dang*/_yi ge dang*/_grangs dang*/_rtsis dang*/_lag rtsis dang*/_ral gri'i thabs dang*/_'phong dang*/_stobs dang*/_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs 
[\[185b.6\]]rnams la sems can gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i rig pa mang po la 'dris par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang gzhi brtag pa dang*/_gos brtag pa dang*/_rin po che brtag pa dang*/_shing rta brtag pa dang*/_rta dang glang po che brtag pa la sogs pa dang*/_'byed pa 
[\[185b.7\]]dang*/_klog pa rnams la g.yer por gyur to/_/gsum pa bstan pa'i rjes su zhugs nas thos pa dang tshogs bsags kyi khyad par ni/_de lta bu'i gzhon nu de nyid srid pa'i dpal 'byor kun gyi dbus na mngon par mtho yang*/_ji tsam zhig na sngon gyi bskal pa 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dpag tu med par goms pa'i chos kyi bag chags bzang po dman pa min pa'i grogs kyis nye bar bskul nas 'di ltar yid la byed par gyur to/_/kye ma deng bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos rnyed par dka' ba'i lus rten dal ba brgyad dang 
[\[186a.2\]]'byor pa bcu'i bdag nyid can gyi rnyed pa 'di ni legs par rnyed do/_/tshe 'di'i mtho 'byor dang grags pa'i zla ris dkar po ring du 'phro ba'i go 'phang dam pa de yang thob par gyur to/_/'on kyang 'khor ba'i ltar snang gi bde 'byor gyi dpal ni ji ltar bdo yang rnam par 
[\[186a.3\]]dpyad na mtha' bzhi las mi 'da' ste/_ji skad du/_bsags pa kun mthar 'dzad pa ste/_/mthon po'i mtha' ni dma' ba yin/_/'dus pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar 'khor ba mtha' bzhi'i rang bzhin can 
[\[186a.4\]]te mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug med pa'i chos can kho na ste/_skye 'chi'i phreng ba ni gar mkhan gyi lag pa'i zlos gar bsgyur ba lta bu'o/_/'byor rgud kyi ri mos ni ston ka'i sprin gyi 'du 'god brtsams pa lta bu'o/_/skyes bu'i 'tsho ba ni sprin rum stug po'i khrod na glog gi 
[\[186a.5\]]thag pa 'gyu ba lta bu'o/_/khyad par khyim na gnas pa'i ltar snang gi bde ba ni thar pa med pa'i me 'obs stug po'i nang du lhung ba lta bu'o zhes dang*/_gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim na chags pa'i nyes dmigs mang po bstan pa rjes su dran pa'i yid 'byung gi 
[\[186a.6\]]mtshon rnon po dag gis/_'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa'i 'ching ba dam po yongs su dral ba la spro bas zhugs par gyur to/_/de'ang dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo las/_shin tu legs pa'i tshul khrims gang*/_/bsdoms pa'i mi de mdzes pa'i 
[\[186a.7\]]gzugs/_/'dul ba la ni nye bar gnas/_/tshul khrims bslab pa rang yid ches/_/mi de nyid ma gcig la yang*/_/bsod nams phung po dpag tu med/_/gsog cing sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'grub/_/ces dang*/_tshul khrims 'di ni bde ba'i mchog_/tshul 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]khrims 'di ni thar pa'i lam/_/tshul khrims 'di ni yon tan gzhi/_/tshul khrims 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyu/_/zhes dang*/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/_khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams mod mi dma'/_/ma 'dres ma sbags pa dag bsten par mdzod/_/khrims 
[\[186b.2\]]ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa bzhin du/_/yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims kyi bslab pa tshul bzhin du bsrungs pa'i phan yon dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjod byed kyi gling bu dri za'i rol mo bye ba 
[\[186b.3\]]phrag brgyas kyang gang gi dpe zlar mi bzod cing char yang mi phod pa'i snyan 'gyur ngag gi lang tsho yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin yig dam pas yid kyi dbang po yongs su phrogs par gyur to/_/de la'ang thog mar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa las/_bla ma mkhas pa 
[\[186b.4\]]rnams la rtag tu brten par bya/_/ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung*/_/zhes dang*/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis kyang*/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa tshangs par spyod/_/yongs su rdzogs par thub pas gsungs de'i phyir/_/skyes bu dam pa bsten 
[\[186b.5\]]bgyi rgyal ba la/_/brten pa rab tu mang pos zhi ba thob/_/ces dang*/_dge ba dge ba'i bshes la brten na 'phel/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ste/_de dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par rjes su rtogs so/_/de ltar rjes su rtogs 
[\[186b.6\]]nas kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa rje btsun kun dga' bzang po'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la mkhas pa'i phrin las rnam pa gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdan rabs sum cu pa/_legs par gsungs pa dam pa'i chos 'dul rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa smra ba'i dbang 
[\[186b.7\]]phyug chen po/_/don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos na mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi mkhan po dang*/_'dul ba smra ba'i mchog 'phags pa u pA li lta bu'i thos pa dang yon tan gyi phung po 'dzin cing 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]legs par smra ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas bstan pa slob dpon dang*/_gnas brtan 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po bkra shis bzang po pa dus bsgo ba la sogs pa mkhas shing btsun pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su tshigs dang po gnyis rim nos kyi rab tu byung 
[\[187a.2\]]ba dge tshul gyi dngos por bsgrubs te/_de'i mtshan la phun tshogs bstan pa zhes bya bar gsol to/_/de nas brtsams te bslab par bya ba'i gnas thams cad mig gi 'bras bu ltar gces par bsrung ba'i sgo nas sngon gyi 'phags pa rta thul la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i rjes su slob cing 
[\[187a.3\]]rjes su 'gro ba'i 'dun pa sa lta bur brtan par mdzad do/_/de ltar nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i gzhi gtsang ma la gnas pa des/_mngon pa mdzod las/_tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas/_/bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyar/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don dang rjes su
