[\[187a.4\]]mthun par bstan pa'i bya ba thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa gsum la 'jug pa'i 'dun pa drag pos kun nas bslangs te/_de'ang thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las/_thos pas chos rnams shes par 'gyur/_/thos pas sdig las ldog par 'gyur/_/thos pas don ma yin 
[\[187a.5\]]pa spong*/_/thos pas mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar phyi dang nang gi grub pa'i mtha' shes pas blang dor gyi gnas rnams legs par shes par byas te/_nyes pa'i spyod pa las ldog pa dang*/_don med pa'i 'dod pa yongs su spong ba dang*/_zag pa zad 
[\[187a.6\]]pa yongs su shes pa la sogs pa mang du thos pa'i phan yon rnams theg pa che chung gi gzhung mang po nas rgya cher bstan pa'i don la rjes su slob pa'i phyir dang*/_bye brag tu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i nye lam/_gzhi dang lam dang 'bras 
[\[187a.7\]]bu'i gnas skabs thams cad nas zab pa'i khyad par mang pos brtun pa rab 'bring gi dbang las tshe 'di'am/_bar do'am/_skye ba bdun nam bcu drug tu zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang gdon mi za bar 'grub pa'i lam zab mo gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste/_de lta na'ang lam der 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'jug pa la ni dbang bskur ba legs par thob dgos kyi/_dbang bskur ba ma thob par sngags kyi lam la 'bad pa byas kyang dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur zhing*/_brgya lam na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub phra mo tsam thob srid kyang phyi mar ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs te/_dam pa dang po'i rgyud 
[\[187b.2\]]las/_dbang bskur med par rgyud 'chad dang*/_/zab mo'i de nyid sgom byed pa/_/de don legs par shes na yang*/_/dmyal bar 'gyur gyi grol ba min/_/zhes dang*/_phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud las/_dbang med na ni dngos grub med/_/phye ma btsir yang mar med bzhin/_/
[\[187b.3\]]gang zhig rgyud lung nga rgyal gyis/_/dbang bskur med par 'chad byed pa/_/slob dpon slob ma shi ma thag_/dngos grub thob kyang dmyal bar skye/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/bla ma la ni dbang nod zhu/_/zhes dang*/_dbang bskur ma thob par sngags pa nyid du khas len pa 
[\[187b.4\]]snying po med cing smig rgyu'i chu la btung bar 'dod pa dang mtshungs te/_bde mchog rtsa rgyud las/_sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/_/gang zhig rnal 'byor par 'dod pa/_/mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang*/_/smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang*/_/zhes dang*/_rdo rje thod pa'i 
[\[187b.5\]]rgyud las kyang*/_/dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/_/shi ba tsam gyis stong bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin dbang dang bral ba yi/_/ye shes kun gyi stong pa nyid/_/dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs/_/rgyud dang bral na bzung mi rung*/_/de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/_/sngags dang bsam gtan 
[\[187b.6\]]'grub mi 'gyur/_/rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par/_/bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/_/ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/_/slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbang bskur ba ma thob par sngags kyi lam la 'jug pa'i nyes pa dpag tu med pa 
[\[187b.7\]]gsungs shing dbang bskur ba tshul bzhin du thob pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab kyang*/_mdor bsdu na/_gang zag dbang po yang rab dbang gi rjes de ma thag par grol bar gsungs te/_'grel chen sgron ma gsal ba las/_dngos grub thams cad ni dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba las 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_sa skya paN+Di tas kyang*/_des na gang zag dbang po rab/_/dbang bskur nyid kyis grol bar gsungs/_/zhes so/_/gang zag rab tu gyur pa ma yin na'ang dbang len pa la rtag tu goms par byas pas skye ba bdun nas 'grub ste/_
[\[188a.2\]]gsang ba'i mdzod las/_dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na/_/skye zhing skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur/_/de yis skye ba bdun nas ni/_/ma bsgoms par yang dngos grub thob/_/ces so/_/dbang thob nas rtsa ba'i ltung bas ma gos na skye ba bcu drug nas 'grub pa yang*/_dam tshig lnga pa 
[\[188a.3\]]las/_gal te ltung ba med gyur na/_/skye ba bcu drug dag nas 'grub/_/ces gsungs shing*/_grol byed kyi lam ston pa'i snod rung du byed pa'i thabs kyang dbang bskur ba nyid yin te/_phyag rgya chen po thig le las/_dang por re zhig slob ma la/_/dbang rnams lan cig bskur ba 
[\[188a.4\]]yis/_/de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi/_/nges par snod du 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phan yon brjod kyis mi ldang bar yid ches pa'i lung dang man ngag gi tshogs kyis nye bar bstan pa'i yi ge dam pa gsub tu med pa gang dag yid kyi ngos su legs par 'dri bzhin pa'i sdom 
[\[188a.5\]]brtson mi'i dbang phyug 'dis gong du smos pa'i bla ma de nyid kyi drung nas dpal kye rdo rje'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi po yongs su rdzogs par mnos te/_phung po dang*/_khams dang*/_skye mched kyi zhing sa gshin par sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyi sa bon legs 
[\[188a.6\]]par btab ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa sngags kyi sdom pa'i myu gu rma med pa nyid du yongs su 'dzin pa'i skal ba can du bgyis so/_/de nas brtsams te ngor lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bdun du grags pa'i dbang bskur ba dang*/_rdo rje 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor gyi dbang bskur ba 
[\[188a.7\]]dang*/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud nas bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang bskur ba rnams dang*/_gzhan yang kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dang*/_'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum dang*/_tshe dpag tu med pa lha dgu dang*/_mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu dang*/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]mgon po'i bka' bab bzhir grags pa bram ze chen po'i bzhed pa'i mgon po gri gug lha lnga ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang*/_bla ma lo tsA ba'i bzhed pa'i mgon po lha brgyad ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang*/_bla ma brag steng pa'i bzhed pa'i gur gyi mgon po lha bcu 
[\[188b.2\]]gnyis ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang*/_gyi ljang lugs kyi mgon po lha bcu bdun pa ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang*/_mgon po gri gug lha lnga snyan brgyud lugs sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i dbang bskur gyi rigs 
[\[188b.3\]]mang po mnos so/_/gzhan yang mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i yi dam gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbang bskur ba dang*/_byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_rjes su gnang ba dang*/_rjes su gdams pa mang po bum pa gang 'byo'i tshul du gsan no/_/yar lung mkhan po ngag gi 
[\[188b.4\]]dbang phyug kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa'i drung nas/_rdo rje phreng ba dang kr-I ya sa muts+tsha gnyis ka'i dbang gi chu bo chig 'dres su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ras bris la brten pa/_kr-I ya sa muts+tsha'i sgos chos bsabs pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[188b.5\]]phyag len rgyas pa'i lugs kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rigs gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam dpal rdo rje lha bcu dgu/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa mi bskyod rdo rje lha so gnyis/_rnam snang sgyu dra'i rgyud la brten pa'i 'jam dpal rdo rje 
[\[188b.6\]]lha zhe gsum/_rtsa ba'i rgyud gshin rje dgra nag gi rgyud la brten pa'i rnam snang gi rigs dpal gshin rje gshed lha bcu gsum ste pha rgyud bzhi/_brtag pa gnyis pa nas gsungs pa'i he ru ka'i rigs kyi dpal dgyes pa rdo rje thod pa can zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa lha dgu/_thugs rdo rje zhal gsum 
[\[188b.7\]]phyag drug pa lha dgu/_gsung rdo rje zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa lha dgu/_sku rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lha dgu/_mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i mkha' 'gro lnga rigs bsdus pa lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum/_sam+pu Ta'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bdag med lha mo nyer gsum/_
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]brtag gnyis nas gsungs pa'i bdag med lha mo bco lnga/_yang rgyud sde de nyid nas gsungs pa'i ku ru kul+le lha bco lnga/_mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur nas bshad pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma lha bcu gsum/_sam+pu Ta nas gsungs pa'i snying po kye rdo rje mtshon cha can zhal brgyad phyag 
[\[189a.2\]]bcu drug pa lha bcu bdun/_thugs rdo rje zhal gsum phyag drug pa lha bcu bdun/_gsung rdo rje zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa lha dgu/_sku rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lha bcu bdun rnams gnyis med kyi rgyud/_sam+pu Ta nas gsungs pa'i bde mchog rdo rje sems dpa' lha so bdun/_bde 
[\[189a.3\]]mchog rtsa ba'i rgyud nas gsungs pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa lha drug cu rtsa gnyis/_bde mchog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lha drug cu rtsa gnyis/_bde mchog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lha drug cu rtsa gnyis/_phag mo dmar mo lha sum cu so 
[\[189a.4\]]bdun/_phag mo sngon mo lha so bdun/_phag mo ser mo lha so bdun/_a b+hi d+ha na las gsungs pa'i hU~M mdzad khro bo lha bcu gcig pa/_yang rgyud de nyid las gsungs pa'i bde mchog 'khor los sgyur drug lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud la brten nas rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs 
[\[189a.5\]]kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi lha nyer gcig_/bdud rtsi hU~M mdzad lha nyer dgu/_bdud rtsi khro bo lha nyer gcig_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa lha bcu gsum/_he ru ka'i rigs sangs rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga/_sangs rgyas thod pa lha dgu/_ma hA mA ya'i rgyud chung la brten pa'i ma hA mA ya lha lnga/_gdan 
[\[189a.6\]]bzhi'am rgyud gser gyi char pa nas bshad pa'i rnam snang gi rigs rnal 'byor nam mkha' lha lnga bcu rtsa brgyad/_de'i yum bka' ye shes mkha' 'gro lha bcu gsum rnams bde mchog gi phyogs su gtogs pa'am rnal 'byor ma rgyud/_sngon byung drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta sogs drang srong bye ba 
[\[189a.7\]]phrag phyed dang bzhi 'dul ba'i don du gsungs pa dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud la brten nas sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa lha drug brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi/_pha rgyud ma rgyud gnyis su phye na dgyes rdor nas 'di'i bar ma rgyud du bsdus kyang 'thad do/_/de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]thabs gtso bor ston pa rdo rje dbyings lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum/_ngan song sbyong rgyud dang brtag pa phyogs gcig pa gtsug dgu lha sum cu rtsa bdun/_sgyu drwa'i rgyud dang 'jam dpal grags pa'i mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa la brten nas shes rab gtso bor ston pa chos dbyings gsung dbang lha nyis 
[\[189b.2\]]brgya nyer gcig ste rnal 'byor rgyud/_'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud la brten pa'i rdo rje'i rigs 'byung po 'dul byed lha so gsum pa spyod rgyud/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum 'od zer can ma lha nyi shu rtsa lnga/_gzungs grwa lnga lha bcu gsum 'di yan gyis 'phreng rkyang gi dkyil 'khor zhe 
[\[189b.3\]]gnyis tshang ngo*/_/kr-I ya nas gsungs pa'i bde legs su byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum zhes pa nor rgyun ma'i rtog chung la brten pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gnas gtsang ma'i lha nor rgyun ma lha bcu dgu/_gza' yum gyi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rigs byed ma nub byang gi grwar bzhugs pa 
[\[189b.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor byas pa'i gza' yum lha zhe drug gam lnga bcu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma lha sum cu rtsa gsum ste bya rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bcas pa rnams so/_/gzhan yang gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung 
[\[189b.5\]]thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du byis pa 'jug pa'i dbang bdun/_mchog dbang gong ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po bdag po'i dbang dang bcas pa dang*/_dpal kye rdo rje'i chos skor la brgyud pa'i bka' babs bzhir bzhugs pa'i dbang ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa dang*/_rwa 
[\[189b.6\]]chen rdo rje grags pa'i lugs kyi rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum gyi dbang bskur ba dang*/_gzhan yang byin rlabs dang rjes su gnang ba dang*/_khrid kyi skor la sogs pa'i gdams pa dpag tu med pa gsan no/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du snga phyir gdams pa'i bdud rtsi 
[\[189b.7\]]dpag tu med pa gsan pa rnams 'dir phyogs su bsdoms te rags pa tsam smos na/_thog mar rje btsun sa skya pa'i gser chos kyi nang tshan du gyur pa'i tshe dpag tu med pa sprul sku'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/'jam dpal nag po skyil krung can gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_rdo rje khyung khra'i rjes gnang 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]dang*/_paN+Di ta zla 'byung nas brgyud pa'i 'jam dpal shes rab 'khor lo'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dgra bcom pa nas brgyud pa'i khro bo gtsug tor 'bar ba'i rjes su gnang ba/_de'i man ngag zab mo dang bcas pa dang*/_paN+Di ta dA na shI la nas 
[\[190a.2\]]brgyud pa'i dbyangs can ma dmar mo dang*/_grwa pa mngon shes las brgyud pa'i sman skyong chen po zhang blon rdo rje bdud 'dul dang*/_mnyam med jo bo chen po nas brgyud pa'i rta mgrin shwa na bzhis bskor dang*/_thub pa dang spyan ras gzigs dang mi g.yo ba dang sgrol ma ste bka' gdams lha bzhir 
[\[190a.3\]]grags pa dang*/_ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo lugs kyi rta mgrin dbyug tho can dang*/_kr-I ya sa muts+tsha'i bzhed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gza' thams cad kyi yum rje btsun ma rig pa chen mo lha bcu bzhi dang*/_dpal mo lugs kyi 'phags pa bcu gcig zhal lha lnga dang*/_gzhan yang lha 
[\[190a.4\]]mo nam mkha'i gos can ma dang*/_phyag na rdo rje khang bu brtsegs pa dang*/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga dang*/_rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag gnyis pa dang*/_lha mo 'od zer can gtso rkyang rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba dang*/_sgrol ma dkar mo yid bzhin 'khor lo'i rjes su gnang ba tshe khrid 
[\[190a.5\]]dang bcas/_gser chos kyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong can ma'i rjes su gnang ba man ngag gi skor dang bcas pa/_ras chung rdo rje grags pa nas brgyud pa'i tshe dpag tu med pa'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba dang de'i gdams pa zab mo'i khrid kyi rim pa dang bcas pa/_grub thob thang stong rgyal po'i 
[\[190a.6\]]lugs kyi bla ma zhi khro'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba/_rdzong byung ba'i lugs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba zab mo rnams legs par mnos shing*/_grub chen la ba pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i dbang bskur ba dang*/_bde mchog sgyu ma chen po lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[190a.7\]]du dbang bskur ba dang*/_'khor lo bde mchog grub chen dril bu pa'i lugs kyi byin rlabs zab mo dang*/_gzhan yang dmar po skor gsum dang*/_dmar mo skor gsum la sogs pa gser chos dang zab chos kyi skor mang po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang rjes su gdams pa'i 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa gsan cing*/_khyad par du yang bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras la bstan pa srung ba'i mtshon char chos skyong ba'i srung ma'i rigs rno zhing myur mgyogs che ba mang po'i gdams ngag gi bka' bab pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa ni chos skyong 
[\[190b.2\]]ba'i srung ma che chung gnyis su grags pa las/_chos srung che ba ni 'phags yul rdo rje'i gdan gyi sgo skyong du bzhugs pa'i srung ma'i dbang po rdo rje nag po chen po 'di nyid ni/_mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug rdo rje gur gyi rgyud le'u bco lnga pa las bstan pas gur gyi mgon po zhes bya ste/_'di 
[\[190b.3\]]la bka' babs rnam bzhi'i gdams ngag chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du ma nub par bzhugs pa las/_brgyud pa'i bka' babs dang po dpal rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bir+Wa pa las brgyud pa'i mgon po dpa' bo gcig pa lam 'bras pa'i mgon rkyang du grags pa'i rjes su gnang ba las tshogs kyi 
[\[190b.4\]]lung dang bcas pa dang*/_bka' babs gnyis pa ba ri lo tsA ba nas brgyud pa'i mgon po dpa' bo gcig pa'i rjes su gnang ba dang*/_bka' babs bzhi pa kha che paN chen shAkya shrI nas brgyud pa spu gri skor gsum gyi lung dang bcas pa rnams mnos so/_/brgyud pa'i bka' babs gsum 
[\[190b.5\]]pa bla ma mal lo tsA ba nas brgyud pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bka' ma nub pa la lo chen gyi bzhed pa gtso bor gyur pa nag po chen po lcam dral lha gsum sbags te sgrub pa dang*/_lha brgyad mkha' 'gro sbags te sgrub pa thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis dang*/_lha bcu gnyis pa thun mong ba dang 
[\[190b.6\]]thun mong ma yin pa gnyis dang*/_mgon po khro bo bcu dang bcas pa gtso 'khor sbags te sgrub pa'i rjes su gnang ba bka' rgya shin tu dam pa can dang*/_shin tu zab pa gsang khrid kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i nag po chen po lha brgyad la ber nag zangs gri can bsnan pa'i lha dgu pa rnams kyi rjes gnang dang*/_dpal ldan 
[\[190b.7\]]lha mo dud pa'i sol ba can phyi sgrub thun mong ba dang*/_gsang sgrub thun mong ma yin pa gnyis dang*/_las kyi mgon po pu tra mi sring dang*/_nang gi las mkhan ber nag zangs gri can dang*/_phyi'i las mkhan gcer bu zangs gri can dang*/_ru mtshon gyi las mkhan bran bdud gshin 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]rje nag po thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i lugs te de dag gi rjes su gnang ba rnams legs par mnos so/_/chos skyong chung bar grags pa ni/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bdun pa dang*/_'khor lo bde mchog gi bshad pa'i rgyud la brten pa'i 
[\[191a.2\]]zhing skyong stobs 'phrogs nag po gdong bzhi pa'am drag po gzi ldan dbang phyug tu grags pa ste/_de'i rjes su gnang ba'i skor la/_bsten dus kyi mgon po zhal bzhi pa dang*/_sgrub dus kyi mgon po zhal khra can gyi rjes su gnang ba thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis/_las sbyor gyi 
[\[191a.3\]]mgon po gdong brnyan can dang*/_nang zhing skyong ltar sgrub pa'am gsang sgrub ces grags pa dang*/_las bzhi'i rjes su gnang ba la/_dkar po tshe 'phel bar byed pa thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis dang*/_ser po bsod nams rgyas par byed pa lha dgu pa dang lha lnga pa gnyis 
[\[191a.4\]]dang*/_dmar po skye 'gro dbang du sdud par byed pa dang*/_sngon po dgra bgegs sgrol bar byed pa dang shi sa bsten pa dang*/_gshin rje ltar sgrub pa dang*/_dmag dpon gyi mgon po khyung zhal can rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba rnams dang*/_gzhan yang zhing skyong stobs 'phrogs dbang po'i bka' sdod kyi 
[\[191a.5\]]gtso bo bla ma gnyan lo tsA ba'i srung ma mthu rtsal shin tu che bar grags pa beg rtse lcam dral gnyis dang lha mang gnyis ka'i rjes su gnang ba rnams gsan par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang gur gyi mgon po sprin gseb ma dang*/_dpal ldan lha mo rdo rje rab brtan ma la sogs pa'i rjes su gnang 
[\[191a.6\]]ba mang po dang*/_de dag gi sgrub skor dang*/_las tshogs zab cing ches zab pa gsang sngags 'dzin pa phal gyi rna ba'i snod du lhung bar ma gyur pa'i zab chos kyi gsan pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol tu son par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang gsang sngags gsar rnying gi bstan pa'i srol 'dzin chen por 
[\[191a.7\]]gyur pa'i bla ma mkhas grub kyi yon tan mnga' ba/_gzhan mang po pas kyang snga phyir zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bdud rtsi gsan pa'i rnam grangs mang du yod kyang 'dir ma spros so/_/des na rgyal rigs dang mi dpon gzhan pa 'ga' zhig ni rigs dang stobs dang 'byor pa la sogs pa cung zad res 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]khengs te 'jig rten pha rol gyi ltad mo 'byung snyam yid la mi byed/_de la brten nas bla ma dang dkon mchog la mos gus tsam yang mi skye zhing*/_gal te gus pa byas na rang gi che ba nyams kyis dogs pas bde 'gro'i lus rten thob par gyur kyang dam pa'i chos nyan pa la sogs pa'i skal ba 
[\[191b.2\]]bzang po myong ba'i skabs yod pa ma yin no/_/der ma zad dgra bsad pa dang*/_dbal 'phrog pa dang*/_g.yo sgyu brtsams pa'i lo rgyus rnams kyang chos dang yon tan bzhin du bsams nas dbyangs su len par byed pa dang*/_rgyu des mnga' ris rnams kyang sdig pa dang sdug bsngal la sbyor bar byed 
[\[191b.3\]]do/_/'dir ni de dag dang thun mong du ma gyur pa ste rgyal rigs mtho ba'i gnas su skyes kyang khengs pa la sogs pa ring du bskyungs nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i spyod pa skyong ba 'di ni blo ldan kun gyi snyan dngags dam pa'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ba'i yul du gyur 
[\[191b.4\]]pa nyid do/_/ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la bsam pas sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i blo gros kyi snang ba bskyed pa la mthun pa min pa'i phyogs su gyur pa ni mi shes pa'i mun pa ste/_de'i gnyen por rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs dang*/_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 
[\[191b.5\]]bzlog pa la rab tu bsngags pa'i tshe sgrub kyi rigs 'ga' zhig gi bzlas bsgom gyi rgyun ma chag par mdzad do/_/de nas brtsams te dpal e waM chos ldan gyi gtsug lag khang chen po'i tshogs 'don gyi rim pa ji ltar srid pa rnams dang*/_dpal kye rdo rje dang rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[191b.6\]]po rnams kyi sgrub thabs dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yan lag dang bcas pa'i thugs 'dzin byang chub par mdzad nas/_de dag lag tu blang ba'i rim pa cho ga'i chings dang*/_'don 'grigs dang*/_gdangs dbyangs dang*/_gar 'cham dang*/_rol mo'i rigs kyi 'bud dkrol la sogs pa 
[\[191b.7\]]la shin tu 'dris par mdzad de/_lo grangs kha yar du dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po'i dbur bzhugs nas dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub cing mchod pa dang*/_'jug cing dbang blang ba rnams la byang chub par mdzad do/_/der ma zad gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye rdo rje'i rtsa rgyud 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]brtag pa gnyis pa dang*/_de nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud sde mang po'i rnam gzhag dang*/_mtshan gyi don dang*/_bshad pa'i thabs kyi man ngag dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa rnams ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos chen po tshul gsum mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan dang*/_
[\[192a.2\]]mngon par rtogs pa mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan dang*/_yongs su rdzogs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i dgongs don mtha' dag dpyad pa gsum gyi sgo nas legs par 'doms shing*/_chos dang chos ma yin pa rnam par 'byed pa'i bstan bcos chen po sdom pa gsum gyi rab tu dbye ba 
[\[192a.3\]]la sogs pa nang don rig pa'i gzhung lugs rnams kyang sbyangs pa la rtsol bas khong du chud par byas nas de dag gi tshogs 'don rnams la yang byon no/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos skye bo gso ba'i thig pa dang*/_shes rab brgya pa dang*/_tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i lugs 
[\[192a.4\]]kyi bstan bcos dang*/_legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter la sogs pa dang*/_phyi rol rig pa'i gtsug lag gi gzhung du gtogs pa mang po dang*/_'phrin yig dang chab shog gi snyan dngags yan chad kyi tha snyad rig pa'i bstan bcos phal che ba rnams dang*/_'khor ba las 
[\[192a.5\]]yid 'byung skyed par byed pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang*/_rnam par thar pa mang po'i tshig don la legs par dpyad pa'i gzigs rtogs kyi sgo nas tshar phyin par bgyis so/_/mdor na ji skad du/_legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter las/_mi gang skye bo dam pa dang*/_/dman pa'i khyad 
[\[192a.6\]]par legs shes nas/_/de yi bya ba bsgrub shes pa/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi tshan yin/_/zhes pa ltar rang gzhan gyi spyod pa'i cha la legs par brtags nas dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dpyod pa la ma rmongs pa nyid du gyur to/_/de nas bstan pa'i gzhi 
[\[192a.7\]]ma yongs su rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por bsgrub pa'i phyir dang*/_dbus gtsang phyogs kyi dgon sde ris su ma chad pa rnams su kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa'i rtsa lag tu bzhugs pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs ji snyed cig mchis pa dag la 'bul 'gyed 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]dang bsnyen bkur stob pa'i phyir dang*/_de dag gi gtsug lag khang chen po rnams su 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du bzhugs pa'i rten gsum ngo mtshar can bgrang gis mi lang ba ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams kyi zhal mjal zhing mchod pa dbul ba'i sgo nas bsod 
[\[192b.2\]]nams kyi tshogs gsog pa'i phyir dbus gtsang gi phyogs su chibs kyi gdong bsgyur ba la mchog tu dga' ba'i 'dzum gyi phreng ba mang pos bsu ba'i gdong gi pad+ma rnam par rgyas pa dang spro ba mchog gi shing rta dam pa'i khar mngon par 'dzegs par gyur to/_/ji ltar bzhed pa'i don de dag gi rkyen sel la 
[\[192b.3\]]yang dngul mda' lhun grub steng gtso bor smos pa'i mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i dgon sde mtha' dag la sku tshe ring du 'tsho ba'i cho ga mang po dang*/_bsrung bzlog gi rim gro rgya chen po dang*/_mgon khang rnams su bskang gso rgyun 'don byed pa'i grwa pa gsar 'phar mang po yang bzhag go/_/khyad par mkhan chen 
[\[192b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa bkra shis lhun grub pa dang*/_yar lung mkhan po ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas pa dang*/_mthu stobs grub pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ste/_rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ded dpon chen po de dag ni mgon khang gsar rnying rnams su rim pa bzhin du gdan drangs zhus 
[\[192b.5\]]te/_bstan srung yongs kyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje gur gyi mgon po lcam dral dang*/_gdong bzhi gnyan gyi mgon po la sogs pa'i srung ma rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pas bran bzhin du bkol te/_mdun du ci bgyi zhes bka' nod pa'i tshul gyis 'khod pa la khyed 
[\[192b.6\]]rnams kyis rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus dang grib ma bzhin du rtag par 'grogs la/_dam pa'i chos tshul bzhin du sgrub par byed pa la 'gal rkyen bar du gcod pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang*/_mthun rkyen bzhed pa'i don thams cad chos dang mthun par tshul bzhin du sgrub pa'i phrin las dang stong 
[\[192b.7\]]grogs gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i bka' bsgo yang dag pa mdzad do/_/de nas rim gyis bteg ste lam bar du 'khod pa'i dgon sde rnams la yang dge gtong gi mchod sbyin rgya chen po bstar ba dang bcas te/_yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi lte ba lha ldan sprul pa'i 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]gtsug lag khang chen po dang nye ba'i char phebs so/_/de'i tshe gzhung sa chen po mchod yon nyi zla zung du 'brel ba lta bu dag nas thugs shin tu dges pa'i rol mor mdun bsu'i bkod pa snga phyi'i rim pa mang po stsal ba la sogs pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i 
[\[193a.2\]]bsngags bkur rgya chen po dang bcas te lha ldan du bde bar phebs so/_/der phebs pa dang thog mar bsil ldan ljongs kyi bod 'bangs spyi'i bsod nams kyi rwa ba gzhal du med cing rnam par yangs pa dag tu 'gyur khug snyan pa'i mgrin pa mtha' dag lhan cig tu bsgrigs pa'i smon lam gyi rgyang 
[\[193a.3\]]glu shin tu snyan pa'i gdangs su bsgyur te/_dus ring mo zhig nas lan brgya 'am stong gi bar du bos pa dang 'dra bar nye bar lhags pa'i mgron gyi dam pa/_sde srid mi'i dbang po pho lha thA ji zhes bya ba legs byas kyi mkhur tshos yangs pa'i ngos su rgya chen dbang gi phrin las kyi dmar mdangs 
[\[193a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pas mngon par 'phos pa de nyid kyi zhal bzang zla ba gzhon nu yongs su mjal bar zhu ba'i rten dang*/_deng gi dus na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ris su ma chad pa la phan pa'i ri mo lhag par bgyi ba'i sgo nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde skyid kyi dpal la 
[\[193a.5\]]bkod pa'i drin gzor dmigs nas 'bul tshan brgya phrag gcig dang gsum gyis lhag pa phul lo/_/der 'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos dang mthun pa'i gsung mchid kyi bdud rtsi'i zer phreng ci yang stsal ba'i dga' ston bzang po myang ngo*/_/de nyid nas mtshams sbyar te mi ring 
[\[193a.6\]]bar dpal ldan gru 'dzin zhing gi mgon po'i pho brang gnyis pa po ta la zhes bya ba sprul pa'i lha bzo bi shwa karma'i lag gi 'du byed las byung ba lta bu'i bsti gnas de nyid du 'phags pa phyag na pad+ma'i rnam par 'phrul pa gdon mi za ba'i thugs rje dang ldan pa/_rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad 
[\[193a.7\]]mkhyen pa bskal bzang rgya mtsho zhes yongs su grags pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po de nyid zhal mjal gyi ched du byon pa na/_nam zhig gi tshe na skyabs mgon chen po de ni 'jigs med gdong lnga'i dbang po dregs pas bsgyings pa'i khri mthon po ga la bar zhabs kyi pad+ma rnam par bkod de/_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]lham me/_lhang nge*/_lhan ner bzhugs pa mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang gnas skabs su skal ba bzang po 'di lta bu dang phrad par gyur to snyam pa'i dga' ba dang spro ba dpag tu med pa dang chab cig par/_de nyid kyi spyan lam du bkra shis pa'i kha dar dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[193b.2\]]rten gsum ngo mtshar can gyis thog drangs pa'i 'bul ba dngos po bzang zhing gtos che ba tshan grangs stong phrag las kyang lhag pa'i tshogs rdzogs rgya dpangs mi chung tsam phul te/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dngos su mjal ba'i dga' ba gya nom pa brnyes so/_/de nas rim gyis dpal 
[\[193b.3\]]'bras spungs dang se ra la sogs pa de phyogs kyi dgon sde che phra rnams su dge slong gi dge 'dun ji snyed bzhugs pa dag la'ang gral 'gyed dang bsnyen bkur gzabs par bstabs so/_/khyad par me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs las/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang gis de 
[\[193b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/_lo brgya'am/_lo stong du yang rung ste bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod rten rnams la me 
[\[193b.5\]]tog 'bul lam/_chu snyim pa gang 'thor ram/_byug pa'i thig le 'dri'am/_me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/_byug pa 'bul lam/_spos 'bul lam/_gdug pa 'bul lam/_mar me 'bul zhing phul na dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i stabs 'ga' bor te sangs 
[\[193b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba de dag ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong du'am/_bskal pa brgya stong du ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs 
[\[193b.7\]]pa'i phan yon gyi 'phrin yig bslu ba min pa'i lung gi phreng ba mang po yid kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yangs pa dag tu rjes su sems shing rjes su dran pa'i byed pos legs par 'dri bzhin pas 'jig rten kun gyi mchod sdong bla na med par bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]kyi khams na gnas pa'i lha dang*/_mi dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_dri za dang*/_gdengs can dbang po la sogs pa dang*/_'phags pa nyan thos dang*/_rang sangs rgyas dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/_nyi 
[\[194a.2\]]ma re re bzhin du mchod pa'i sprin gyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod cing rjed par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi rten bla na med pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i sku brnyan rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa'i rten gsum gyi rnam pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams te/_de dag la zhal gser gsol 
[\[194a.3\]]ba dang*/_bdug pa dang*/_mar me dang*/_zhal zas sogs nye bar spyod pa rnams dang*/_stong 'khun gyi yul las 'thon pa'i dar gos kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i snyan shal dang*/_'phan dang*/_gser las brdungs pa'i mchod kong la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad gya nom pa rnams kyis 
[\[194a.4\]]mchod pa 'bul ba dang bcas te/_mdor na bsags pa'i dngos po snying pos dben pa rnams kyang 'di'i don mthar thug bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gro ba'i snying po shin tu lci ba'i rang bzhin can du mdzad do/_/de nas mthar gyis gtsang phyogs su bteg ste lam bar gyi dgon sde ris su ma chad 
[\[194a.5\]]pa rnams su bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la bsnyen bkur rgya chen po bsring ba dang bcas te/_rim gyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phan bde ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas gcig pur gyur pa'i dpal stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa'i chu klung bye ba 
[\[194a.6\]]phrag brgya yongs su bzung ba/_bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i phrin las kyi rgyun chen pos phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi kho ra khor yug ma lus pa khyab par rtag tu 'bebs pa'i gnas/_nye bar bsten na gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi yon tan rin po che zad mi shes pa'i 'byung gnas dam par 
[\[194a.7\]]gyur pa/_dpal e waM chos ldan gyi chos grwa chen po zhes pa 'og min stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams chen po nyid sa'i steng na 'phos pa snyam byed pa ste/_de'ang e waM zhes pa ni mdo sde dang rgyud sde phal che ba dag gi thog mar gleng slong ba'i gzhi thams cad ni yi ge dam pa de gnyis las rnam par 'phros 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]te/_chos kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa ltar/_'dir yang de lta bu'i sgra don dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_gdan sa de nyid kyi yon tan gyi khyad par mang po yid la rjes su byed cing*/_rjes su mthong ba lhur byed pa dang bcas te/_dper na skom pas gdung 
[\[194b.2\]]ba'i skyes bu gang la la zhig shin tu bsil ba'i chu rgyun gtsang ma yid du 'ong ba'i chab sgra snyan par sgrogs bzhin du 'bab pa gang zhig yid la byed kyin rings pa rings par 'gro ba de bzhin du mchog tu spro ba'i shing rta dam pa la mngon par 'dzegs te byon no/_/ji skad yid la bya ba'i gnas de'i 
[\[194b.3\]]yon tan gyi khyad par yang ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyas par na brjod kyis mi ldang ba nyid kyang 'dir mdo tsam zhig ni/_rje btsun mkhas pa'i dbang po dkon mchog lhun grub pa'i dngos slob shar dwags po'i paN+Di ta rje btsun phrin las pa 'jigs bral gsung rab gter mdzod sbas pa'i sde/_
[\[194b.4\]]phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i mkhas pa chen po des mdzad pa'i bstod pa DA ki rnam par bzhad pa'i glu dbyangs zhes bya ba las/_kun dkris nyes brgyas gzings pa'i grong khyim las/_/lam ring bgrod dkas phyin pa nyer zhi'i gnas/_/ngan 'gro'i 'jigs 
[\[194b.5\]]las rgyal byed tshal dang ni/_/myang 'das thar pa mchog gi gzhal med khang*/_/'du 'dzi'i klung brgya brgal ba ri bo'i phab/_/bya dang ri dwags rtse ba'i do ra mchog_/grub pa rig 'dzin drang srong dga' ba'i tshal/_/'brog dgon shin tu dben pa'i bsti gnas gang*/_/
[\[194b.6\]]ting 'dzin ngang gis 'phel ba srid nyon gyi/_/gdung skyob dpal gyi dum bu'i lding khang nyid/_/lho phyogs ma la ya yi nags [{]klungs [,]klung [}]las/_/byang phyogs dpal mo'i rgyan du 'phos pa snyam/_/srid pa'i 'dam rdzab nA ri'i bgrod pa dang*/_/mtshan rgyu sred byed kha zas maM sa'i dum/_/
[\[194b.7\]]myos 'gyur dug gi khu ba'i thigs pa ste/_/nyes brgya'i bskyed rtsa bdud kyi longs spyod dag_/rtag par ring du spang ba bca' khrims kyi/_/ra ba brtsegs pa'i go skabs mi phyed pa/_/zho 'thung rus pa'i dum bu go bin+da'i/_/mtshon gyi 'khor lo yis kyang gzhig nus min/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dkar gsum mngar gsum 'phags pa dges pa'i zas/_/zla ba'i dum bu bdud rtsi'i zil mngar dang*/_/bza' shing 'phur ma mang po bgrungs pa'i chab/_/lha yi zhal skyems btung bas nyer 'tsho ba'i/_/gtsang spyod sa ha ka ra'i snye ma dag_/yongs 
[\[195a.2\]]su smin pa'i tshul khrims dri bzang po/_/phyogs brgyar 'thul bas lha rdzas spos ngad kyis/_/srid lam dub pa'i mgron po dbugs 'byin bzhin/_/gus pa'i pho nyas mgron gnyer lam ring gis/_/ngal brgya'i khur bcas lam du bgrod ma thag_/thos bsam sgom pa'i bya 
[\[195a.3\]]ba lhur byed las/_/tshe 'di'i zang zing g.yengs pa ngang gis spong*/_/bud shing la sogs nyer spyad btsal dka' bas/_/bza' btung rnyed bkur lhur byed mi 'du zhing*/_/dbang lung man ngag chos kyi char 'bab pas/_/thar 'dod skal ldan skye bo ngang gis 'du/_/zhes bya ba 
[\[195a.4\]]la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa mang po dang ldan pa'i gnas de nyid dang nye ba'i sa phyogs su bde bar son no/_/de'i tshe ngor gyi bla brang khag rnams dang khang tshan rnams kyis bsu ba snga phyi mang pos rim par son cing*/_khyad par sin+d+hU wA ra'i rgya mtsho chen po shin tu rangs pa'i rba rlabs 
[\[195a.5\]]kyi lce zhags nam mkha'i mthongs su 'phyo ba la/_kha dog lnga pa'i gzha' ris gsar pas slar yang kun nas mdzes par byas pa lta bu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po phreng du bstar ba'i ser sbreng gi bkod pa skye bo kun gyi mig gi longs spyod du bskrun pa'i ngo mtshar gyi ltad mo mthong 
[\[195a.6\]]ba ni 'di lta ste/_thog mar dge zhing bkra shis par bya ba dang snyan pa'i grags pas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu dgang bar bya ba'i rten 'brel gyi dang por skye ba snga pa'i chos dung dkar po g.yas su 'khyil ba 'bud pa'i sgra dang*/_de nas rim bzhin du gling bu'i sgra dang*/_sil snyan gyi sgra 
[\[195a.7\]]dang*/_rnga bo che'i sgra dang*/_rnga zlum gyi sgra dang*/_rdza rnga'i sgra dang*/_pi wang gi sgra ste rol mo'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang*/_gzhan yang phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_gdugs dang*/_ba dan dang*/_phye ma phur ma dang*/_'phan rtse gsum pa dang*/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]rin po che'i rnga yab dang*/_bsil yab la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas te bsu ba'i dga' ston rgya chen po dang bcas te ring nas bsam pa'i yul du lan brgyar byas pa'i chos grwa chen po de nyid du sku dang gsung dang thugs la mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 
[\[195b.2\]]las rnam par rgyal ba'i ngo mtshar gtam gyi gling bu bye ba phrag brgyas mdun bdar ba dang bcas te nye bar byon no/_/de la'ang 'di ltar dogs pa sems te/_mtshungs pa med pa'i bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam par gyur pa'i bla ma dang mkhan po gang du bzhugs bzhin du/_rang gi slob ma la 
[\[195b.3\]]bsu ba 'di lta bu'i bkod pa bshams pa mi rigs so snyam na/_shin tu'ang rigs te/_gang dag gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi rnam pa thams cad du dge legs su byed pa'i rten 'brel thams cad kyi thog ma ni rang gi mkhan por gyur pa'am/_bla mar gyur pa'am/_slob dpon 
[\[195b.4\]]du gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis bsgrigs dgos pa ni/_chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i gnad la mkhas pa kun gyi chos lugs yin no/_/de'ang dper na bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid sngon gyi dus na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul du gyur pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[195b.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snying po'i spyan sngar bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed cing smon lam chen po lnga brgya btab nas bden pa'i stobs brjod pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i zhal nas/_khyod ni pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i 
[\[195b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgya cher bsngags pa dang*/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang*/_byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag skyes su stsal ba dang bcas te/_
[\[195b.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dbyangs dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa las 'phos pa'i bstod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa dang*/_bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan cing 'khor gyi dbus su mngon par bstod pa 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]dang*/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa tog tu gyur pa'i tshe dga' ldan gyi gnas nas dzam+bu'i gling du 'pho bar brtsams pa na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstod cing sems can gyi don la 
[\[196a.2\]]bskul ba dang*/_rang gi cod paN dam pa rje btsun ma pham pa'i dbur bcings te/_ma 'ongs pa na 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan cing 'khor gyi tshogs su mngon par bstod de/_theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba dang*/_shar phyogs za hor gyi rgyal po dge ba 
[\[196a.3\]]dpal gyi sras jo bo chen po dpal ldan a ti sha 'khor dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa brgya dang brgyad/_dge tshul bcu gsum/_dge slong chen po bzhi ste brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lngas yongs su bskor te/_bla ma gser gling pa'i drung du byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang*/_theg 
[\[196a.4\]]pa chen po'i blo sbyong la sogs pa/_thugs la ji ltar mnga' ba'i chos rnams zhu ba'i ched du byon pa na/_bla ma gser gling pa'i 'khor dge slong chos gos rnam pa gsum sku la gsol ba thams cad kyang ril ba spyi blugs dang*/_'khar gsil phyag na thogs pas mdzes 
[\[196a.5\]]pa/_sngon dus ston pa'i 'khor gyi dgra bcom pa rnams ltar dwang ba 'dren pa'i dge slong lnga brgya dang sum cu rtsa lnga/_rab tu byung ba drug cu rtsa gcig ste/_mdor na rab tu byung ba lnga brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa bdun gyi ser sbreng gi sna bla ma gser gling ba nyid kyis drangs nas/_rgyang ring 
[\[196a.6\]]po nas bsu ba mdzad pa la sogs pa sngon gyi mkhas grub mang po'i rnam par thar pa rnams la legs par bltas pas rtog pa'i tsher ma de dag yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi ring bar e waM bla brang zhes pa dus rtag par dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs thams cad sprin bzhin 
[\[196a.7\]]du 'du zhing*/_gsang chen chos kyi pho brang chen po nyid du rdo rje theg pas mtshon pa'i chos kyi tshul dri ma med pa thams cad bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i sgra dbyangs chen po rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i phrin las rgya chen po bsgrub pa dang*/_gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i bu gzhon nu grangs 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]med pa'i tshogs ni/_dper na chu las skyes pa'i pad+ma rnam pa sna tshogs pas kun nas brgyan te nyams dga' dga' ltar byas pa'i rdzing bu gang la ngang pa dang ngur pa'i tshogs mang po ma bsdus par yang ngang gis 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du nyi ma re re bzhin du nam mkha'i ngos 
[\[196b.2\]]thams cad du sprin gyi shing rta dang*/_glang po che dang*/_mkha' lding dang*/_rta mchog gi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sprul te/_de dag gi rgyab tu zhon te mngon par lhags nas 'ongs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i me tog gi sil mas gtor ba dang*/_bdug pa'i sprin gyis 
[\[196b.3\]]dkrigs pa dang*/_rin po che'i sgron ma bteg pa dang*/_dri zhim po'i chus zil ma 'thor ba dang*/_bza' ba dang bca' ba sbyar ba'i zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa dang*/_sil snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i bye brag dpag tu med pa dag gis mngon par mchod pa dang*/_gzhan 
[\[196b.4\]]yang 'phan dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_rnga yab dang*/_khang bzang nyams dga' ba la sogs pa dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dag gis bkur stir byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_snyan pa'i tshig thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur bar byed pa'i gnas 
[\[196b.5\]]kyi dam pa ga la ba der/_bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos mngon par mtho bar byas pa'i lha sras mi'i dbang phyug chen po rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing dul ba'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos yongs su bzung ba'i rgyal ba'i myu gu'i rigs mchog rma med pa de nyid dang*/_de'i bka'i las byed 
[\[196b.6\]]kyi gtso bo 'phrul blon chen po bsod nams bkra shis zhes bya ba/_sa gzhi skyong ba chen po gang de'i bka' lung gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong gis mngon par mdza' ba gang de gzu bor gnas pa'i blo gros kyi lag pas legs par bzung nas/_phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi rgyal 
[\[196b.7\]]phran dang*/_blon po dang*/_sde dpon dang*/_mkhas pa dang*/_mdzangs pa dang*/_dpa' zhing rtul phod pa kun gyi spyi bo'i stegs la ngal bsor spyod cing*/_lugs dang mthun pa'i bka' mchid lha'i bdud rtsi lta bus skye 'gro thams cad dge ba bcu dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod lam bzang po la 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]rnal du 'god par byed pa de nyid dang*/_mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo 'phrul blon chen po lha bu tshe ring zhes bya ba/_byams ldan sa gzhi skyong ba'i dbang phyug dam pa de nyid kyi chos dang srid kyi gtsug lag nyi zla zung 'brel lta bu'i bgyi ba mtha' dag gi phrin las thur 
[\[197a.2\]]ma brgya pa'i gdugs dkar po gang yin pa de/_bsgrun du med pa'i snying stobs kyi phrag pa brtan pos gong nas gong du 'degs pa'i 'grib ma bsil pos yangs pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa yongs su skyob pa la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen dpyod kyi rtsal 
[\[197a.3\]]chen po kun nas rdzogs par gyur cing*/_gcig tu rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che la kha tsam tshig tsam ma yin pa'i snying nas phan pa'i thugs bskyed kyi kho lag kun nas bdo ba de nyid dang*/_gzhan yang sa bdag chen po'i bzhed pa thams cad yid bzhin du bsgrub pa la lus dang ngag dang 
[\[197a.4\]]yid kyi rtsal dgu yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyi blon dang*/_nang blon dang*/_dkor gnyer dang*/_mgo dpon la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dren mchog mtshungs pa med pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor legs par mjal ba'i phyir/_thams cad kyang snga na med pa'i 
[\[197a.5\]]dga' ba dang*/_spro ba dang*/_gus pa mchog gi bdud rtsi'i 'dzum rlabs stong gis bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa legs par bkrus pa bzhin du mngon par chas te gsang chen chos kyi gnas mchog dam pa de nyid du nye bar phyin to/_/ji tsam zhig na gnas der sde snod rin po che rnam pa 
[\[197a.6\]]gsum dang*/_rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs rgyun mi chad par rtag tu sgrogs pa la 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i brdar/_gdong lnga'i dbang po brgyad kyis mngon par bteg pa'i chos kyi khri chen po zhig tu rgyal bas lung bstan pa'i skyes bu chen 
[\[197a.7\]]po rje btsun kun dga' bzang po pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la mnga' bsgyur ba'i gdan rabs so gsum pa/_mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po ba zhes bya ba/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]khams rab 'byams mtha' dang mur thug pa med pa'i zhing na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byon pa dang*/_'byon par 'gyur ba dang*/_da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung 
[\[197b.2\]]dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa chen po deng gi dus kyi lha dang*/_mi dang*/_klu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'khod pa'i skye dgu ma lus pa'i yan lag mchog gis lan brgyar btud par byas pa'i skyabs kyi dam pa 
[\[197b.3\]]ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs pa dang*/_the tshom gyi mun pa ma lus pa sel bar byed pa/_lta ba ngan pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa thams cad ye shes kyi thur ma rnon pos rnam par snang bar byed pa/_mngon par zhen pa'i me dpung gi lce zhags 'jil bar byed pa/_khong nas 
[\[197b.4\]]'khrugs pa'i mtshon cha rnon po rtul bar byed pa/_rjes su gdams pa'i bdud rtsi'i sgo 'phar bye ba phrag brgyar phye bas sems can gyi re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/_'khor ba dang ngan song gi 'jigs pa las skyob par nges pa'i thugs rje'i phyag ring rkyong ba/_ma dad pa 
[\[197b.5\]]rnams kyi rgyud la dad pa'i zhing sa gshin par byed pa/_dad pa rnams kyi rgyud la dge ba'i lam gyi sa bon ma rmas pa 'debs par byed pa/_deng nas bzung ste byang chub mchog gi go 'phang la reg par ma gyur pa de srid du bsten par 'os pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po 
[\[197b.6\]]de nyid bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyus sam/_bla ma bsu ba la sogs pa legs byas kyi mthu chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bslu ba min pa'i bden dpang nyid du/_zhabs mthil pad+ma rA ga bzhu ba'i tshon gyis lan brgyar byugs pa snyam byed pa la/_slar yang 
[\[197b.7\]]bkra shis pa'i rtags kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi gzugs kyis nye bar spud pa gang de chos kyi khri mthon po ga la ba der mngon par bkod de/_mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gang las mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i gzi byin ring po'i lam 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]du snang ba 'byin par 'byed de/_dper na/_dzam+bu gser gyi rdul tshogs mngon par brtsegs pa'i lhun po zhig la gur gum gyi char bas lan brgya stong du bkrus pa la/_'char ka'i nyi 'od kyi thigs pa dag gis kyang yongs su bran pa bzhin du lham mer bzhugs pa mthong 
[\[198a.2\]]ngo*/_/mthong nas kyang lha sras chos kyi bag chags rab tu brtas pa gang gi yid la spro ba gsar du skyes pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/_e ma de ring thob pa'i 'bras bu 'di/_/dngos su yin gyi rmi lam snang ba min/_/ring nas gsol ba btab pa'i snying po de/_/de ring smin par 
[\[198a.3\]]gyur gyi don med min/_/e ma dge ba'i zong gis bsgrubs pa'i rten/_/skal ba bzang por gyur gyi dman pa yin/_/ji ltar yid la bya ba'i dgos pa de/_/bla na med par byung gi gyi na min/_/e ma de ring kun dga' gsar pa 'di/_/'dren pa khyed las byung gi gzhan las 
[\[198a.4\]]min/_/de phyir mi yi skye ba blangs pa ni/_/nges par don chen gyur la bdag dga'o/_/zhes ched du brjod cing ba spu rnam par gzings pa'i snyim pa'i chu skyes dmar po gtsug gi rgyan du bkod de/_phyag gi phreng ba brtsegs pa dang chab cig tu bkra shis pa'i re khA mngon par gsal 
[\[198a.5\]]ba'i dar dkar gyi phyag rten 'bul ba dang bcas te mdun du 'khod do/_/der rje btsun de nyid nas lam gyi bar chad 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa stsal ba/_legs par byon tam mngon mtho'i rigs kyi bu/_/legs par byon tam bsod nams smin pa'i lha/_/legs par byon tam 
[\[198a.6\]]kun gyi mnyes gshin pa/_/legs par byon tam byams dang brtse ba'i bdag_/bshul ring lam du bgrod pa mang po yis/_/sku thang rnam par dub par ma byas sam/_/nyi lhags gdung ba'i bza' ba dman pa yis/_/pad+ma'i sku mdangs phrogs par ma byas sam/_/'byung 
[\[198a.7\]]ba lnga tshogs dal 'byor chos kyi snod/_/gcong nad phra mos rgud par ma byas sam/_/dge ba'i las la sdang ba'i nye zho yis/_/thugs la tsher ma'i bya ba ma byas sam/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bka' mchir dbyangs kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]lta bu rna ba'i bcud du stsal te/_de'i tshe lan 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]du gsol ba/_legs par 'ongs so mdo smad sa'i thig le/_/sde bzhi'i rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i khab/_/dge bcur rtag tu spyod pa'i rgyal rigs kyi/_/ljon pa'i yal ga rnam par 'phyang ba nga*/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i zhal bzang blta phyir 'ong*/_/zhabs kyi pad+ma gtsug tu len 
[\[198b.2\]]phyir 'ong*/_/legs par gsungs pa'i bdud rtsi 'thung phyir 'ong*/_/ye shes gzigs pa'i byin rlabs 'bebs phyir 'ong*/_/ngan 'gro'i skye sgo 'gog pa'i ched du 'ong*/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs las skyob pa'i ched du 'ong*/_/bsod nams sa bon 'jog pa'i ched du 'ong*/_/bslab 
[\[198b.3\]]gsum nor bu bsgrub pa'i ched du 'ong*/_/thar pa'i khang bzang bsten pa'i ched du 'ong*/_/byang chub snying po'i lam gyi ched du 'ong*/_/mkhyen dang brtse dang nus pa'i dbang phyug gi_/sngags srung rdo rje'i rwa bar chud pa'i brdar/_/nad dang bar du gcod pa'i khab kyi sos/_/ma 
[\[198b.4\]]rmas ma btab pa ru lhags 'di'o/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi phreng ba snyan sgron du 'bul ba dang bcas te/_rje btsun dam pa bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i snying rje chen pos lan brgyar bkrus pa 
[\[198b.5\]]snyam byed pa/_su zhig mthong na don gyi snying pos mngon par lci ba gang yin pa de nyid/_lha sras mi'i dbang phyug dam pa de nyid sku 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'dren byed kyi dbang po'i dga' ston bla na med pa nyid du mthong bar gyur to/_/ji ltar mthong ba la'ang dus de nyid nas brtsams 
[\[198b.6\]]te bla ma'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dang bcas pa la rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang gnyis su med pa'i snang ba kho na la/_'gro ba phal dang thun mong du gyur pa'i ma dad pa la sogs pa skad cig kyang mi 'byung ba ni kun gyis mngon du gyur pa'o/_/tshul 'di la bsams na rje 
[\[198b.7\]]btsun dam pa 'di nyid dang skye ba dpag tu med pa'i ring nas bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du byas shing smon lam gser gyi skud pa bzang pos lu gu rgyud du sbrel ba'i skyes bu dam pa nyid du gdon mi za ba'o/_/ci'i phyir na gzhan du bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang rgyal ba kun 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gyi phrin las las sprul pa'i mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po'i mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas skye bo ma lus pa smin par byed pa'i bdag nyid can dang nam du yang mjal bar dka' zhing*/_gal te mjal bar gyur kyang sems can rang rang las 
[\[199a.2\]]kyi nyes pas bsgribs te/_tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa dang*/_blo dri ma dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa dang*/_yang dag par ma yin par smra ba dang*/_rang dang skal ba mnyam pa tsam du mthong ngo*/_/de ltar mthong ba la brten nas sems kyi rgyud la dad pa tsam yang skye bar 
[\[199a.3\]]mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ltar yin pa'ang cis shes na/_ba tsha chu klung gi mdo las/_lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na/_/nga nyid slob dpon gzugs 'dzin te/_/nga yin snyam du yid byos la/_/de tshe de la gus pa skyed/_/ces so/_/rdo rje gur las/_rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu yi/_/
[\[199a.4\]]de ltar slob dpon gzugs 'dzin te/_/sems can rjes su gzung dmigs nas/_/phal pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o/_/zhes dang*/_slob dpon ston par gyur pa ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/_/bdag cag rnams kyi pha dang ma/_/'di nyid yid la bsam 
[\[199a.5\]]par bya/_/zhes dang*/_gang phyir ye shes rdo rje ni/_/brnyes pas myur du thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir slob dpon drung gshegs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag mdzad do/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin/_nges pa'i don du bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i gong rol nas zung 'jug rdo rje 
[\[199a.6\]]'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phang mngon du mdzad zin kyang*/_srog chags kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gdul ba'i thabs la bzhugs pa na/_la lar ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par bstan nas don mdzad/_la lar ni sangs rgyas kyi skur bstan nas don mdzad/_de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[199a.7\]]sems dpa' dang*/_'phags pa nyan thos dang*/_rang sangs rgyas dang*/_paN+Di ta dang*/_grub pa thob pa dang*/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi tshul bzung nas don mdzad do/_/de skad du'ang*/_sa skya paN+Di tas/_khyod ni rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras/_/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rab byung dge bsnyen khyim pa sogs/_/'gro ba kun gyi gzugs mdzad nas/_/gdul bya thams cad smin par mdzad/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tsha yang*/_/me shel med par me mi 'byung*/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyang*/_/bla ma med par 'byung mi 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_
[\[199b.2\]]rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las/_gang du snang nas kyang sems can gyi don mdzad do/_/so sor snang nas kyang sems can gyi don mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so/_/de bas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa la bskal 
[\[199b.3\]]pa'i phreng ba'ang de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par bsnyen bkur ba las/_rdo rje slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu gcig la mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob pa'i tshul mang du gsungs shing*/_bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba las/_mchod pa thams 
[\[199b.4\]]cad yongs spangs te/_/bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam/_/de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen gyi/_/ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na/_/de yis bsod nams ma byas ci/_/dka' thub ma bsten 
[\[199b.5\]]ci zhig yod/_/ces dang*/_slob dpon yon tan gleng bya yis/_/skyon ni nam yang ma yin no/_/zhes so/_/gal te de ltar yin na thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can du bzhugs nas rnam pa thams cad du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar srog chags mtha' dag gi don ji ltar 
[\[199b.6\]]mi mdzad ce na/_bshad par bya ste/_dper na lha'i rgyal po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun chen po rab tu phab kyang*/_til dang nas la sogs pa'i sa bon rul ba dang*/_mes tshig pa dang*/_sa bon du mi rung ba btab pa dag las ni nam yang myu gu skye bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_sangs rgyas 
[\[199b.7\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la mi mkhas pa med kyang skal ba med pa rnams kyis dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pa dang*/_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang*/_yul de la brten nas tshogs bsags pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]las bzang po myang bar mi 'gyur te/_ji skad du yang*/_rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas/_/gang dang gang la gang dang ni/_/gang tshe bya ba phan gyur pa/_/de dang de la der snang ngo*/_/lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang*/_/sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar/_/
[\[200a.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang*/_/skal ba med pas bzang mi myang*/_/zhes so/_/de la sogs pa rgyu mtshan du mas yid yongs su drangs nas mi ring bar gza' skar dang sbyor byed bzang po 'dzom pa'i zla tshes dge ba'i nyin 'bul chen gyi bkod pa legs par bshams te/_de'ang 'phags 
[\[200a.3\]]pa'i yul gyi snyan dngags mkhan thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar gyur pa dpal ldan daN+Di'i zhabs kyi snyan dngags kyi gzhung las legs par 'phos pa'i mchod par brjod pa yan lag bdun pa dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa nyams 'gyur stong gi ro dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis mdun 
[\[200a.4\]]bsu nas/_thog mar bkra shis pa'i lha dar dang*/_rgyal ba bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten ngo mtshar che ba rnams kyis thog drangs pa'i 'bul ba dngos po bzang zhing rgya dpangs mi dman pa tshan grangs brgya phrag bdun brtsegs pa maN+Dal du phul lo/_/gzhan yang e 
[\[200a.5\]]waM thar pa rtse'i mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang nam mkha' bsam 'grub bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes pa/_shes rab kyi snang ba dam pas sgrib pa'i mun pa mtha' dag bsal bar byas pa/_dka' ba brgya stong gis bsgrubs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang po la 
[\[200a.6\]]dbang 'byor pa/_mngon par shes pa'i mig grungs por gyur pas dus gsum gyi shes par bya ba thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa/_'gro ba thams cad legs pa'i lam du 'khrid pa la sha thang ba med pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag par ston 
[\[200a.7\]]pa la bsnyengs pa med pa'i mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug grub pa de nyid kyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skal ba bzang po'i ro la longs su spyod pa'i mtshon byed du rnam grangs brgya dang lnga bcu phul lo/_/e waM klu sdings bla brang gi shar pa rin chen rgyal mtshan zhes pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa la ma 'dris pa med pas dam pa'i spyod pa la dga' ba/_skye ba nas skye bar sbyangs pa'i bag chags kyi mthu brtas par gyur pas tshe 'di'i gtsug lag mang po'i gnad la mkhas pa/_zab cing yangs pa'i chos thams cad sdeb legs ngag gi shing rta la brten nas/_'gro ba kun gyi thar 
[\[200b.2\]]pa'i gsos su 'dren pa/_rtag tu mkhas pa'i bya ba thams cad lhur len pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bur gyur pa de nyid la 'bul ba rnam grangs brgya dang lnga bcu/_e waM phun tshogs gling bla brang gi mkhan chen 'jam pa'i dbyangs bsod nams bzang po bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal 
[\[200b.3\]]bzang po zhes pa/_phyi dang nang gi grub pa'i mtha'i gzhung lugs ma lus pa mkhyen cing legs par smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po/_snyigs ma'i dus 'dir rgyal ba gnyis pa bzhin du bstan pa la lhag par sman pa'i bya ba byas pa/_rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor 
[\[200b.4\]]lo'i yon tan gya nom pa'i 'byor pas rgyas pa/_skye dgu ma lus pa'i yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i dpag bsam dam pa de nyid la 'bul ba rnam grangs brgya dang lnga bcu/_de skabs su zur 'chad pa yin pa la phyis su gdan rabs kyi khrir phebs pa'i mkhan chen 'jam 
[\[200b.5\]]pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas dpal bzang bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes pa/_skye ba du ma nas lhag pa'i lha 'jam dpal gzhon nus rjes su bzung ba/_tshe 'dir shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thugs su chud pa phyi gnas lnga rig pa'i paN+Di ta chen por gyur pa/_nang 
[\[200b.6\]]du bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la ji ltar mnga' ba'i yon tan ma lus pa rdzogs pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa mkhas pa'i bya ba rnam pa gsum gyis lhag par phan pa'i bgyi ba bgyis pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam pa der yang 'bul ba dpangs mthor brtsegs/_
[\[200b.7\]]dpon slob dbu mdzad sangs rgyas tshul khrims zhes gzhung lugs rab 'byams la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas shing*/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun rgya mtsho lta bu'i dbus na yon tan gyi khyad par du mas mngon par 'phags pa de nyid la yang 'bul ba gzab par brtsegs/_gzhan yang 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]khang tshan bco brgyad kyi dge 'dun rnams la mang ja rten bzhag pa la sogs pa mdzad do/_/khyad par dpal e waM chos ldan la bsngags pa DA ki rnam par bzhad pa'i gling bu las/_chos kyi dung dang rnga chen gaN+DI'i sgra/_/sprin chen 'brug gi gad rgyangs las lhag 
[\[201a.2\]]pas/_/tshul bzhin mgron gnyer ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i dpung*/_/li khri'i chu gter g.yo ba'i rba klong bzhin/_/'dus pa rgya mtsho'i snam sbyar 'phags pa'i gos/_/gur gum gzhon nu'i tshon gyis nam mkha'i khams/_/sin+d+hu wA ra li khri'i rdul tshogs ltar/_/dmar 
[\[201a.3\]]ser 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya che'i dbus/_/zhes bsngags pa'i don dang mthun par e waM gtsug lag khang chen po nyid du sems can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du bzhugs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'i rtsa lag tu gyur pa/_sum 
[\[201a.4\]]ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ngur smrig gos kyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshogs stong phrag phyed gnyis su ldang ba thams cad zla ba gcig dang zhag bzhi'i bar du bsnyen bkur yang dag par bgyis te/_rnal 'byor rgyud kyi nang gses cha mthun gyi rgyud kyi khongs su 
[\[201a.5\]]gtogs pa/_dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud kyis dngos su bstan par bya ba'i gtso bo kun rig rtsa ba'i lha sum cu rtsa bdun mgron thabs kyi lha dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/_rje btsun rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i yig cha sgrib pa rnam sel dang 
[\[201a.6\]]gzhan phan mtha' yas ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgrub mchod du btsugs te/_gla pa re la gser zho re 'gyed pa nyin gcig go_/grwa pa bzhi re la dngul zho phyed dang gnyis re 'gyed pa nyin nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/grwa pa bzhi re la gzhung ja bar khag re 'gyed pa nyin gsum mo/_/grwa pa bcu re la 
[\[201a.7\]]ja nag po bar khag re 'gyed pa nyin gcig go_/grwa pa bzhi re la ma hany+tsi yug re 'gyed pa nyin bzhi'o/_/grwa pa re re la mdzod dar legs pa re 'gyed pa nyin gcig ste/_de ltar nyin sum cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa dang*/_de'i mtshams nas 'di'i mdun na 'don la sogs pa'i sku 'khor du 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gtogs pa rnams kyis rim par btsugs pa la zla ba gcig ste/_mdor na zla ba gnyis kyi bar du dge 'dun ji snyed mchis pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang yon 'bul gzabs par bstabs so/_/gzhan yang dge 'dun nyung btus kyis bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med 
[\[201b.2\]]pa'i cho ga dang*/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i stong mchod dang*/_mgon khang shar nub rnams su bskang gso dang*/_ka drug khang du 'jigs byed drug cu pa'i gtor rgyab gsar 'phar btsugs pa dang*/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gtor chen gtong ba rnams la'ang yon 'bul dang bsnyen 
[\[201b.3\]]bkur dpangs mthor byas so/_/gtsug lag khang dang*/_gtsang khang dang*/_lam 'bras lha khang dang*/_lam zab lha khang la sogs pa'i lha khang rnams su skye dgu ma lus pa'i phan bde'i rtsa lag tu bzhugs pa'i bla ma rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten shin tu dkon 
[\[201b.4\]]zhing ngo mtshar ba/_byin rlabs kyi gzi 'od rab tu 'phro ba rnams la spos dang*/_mar me dang*/_zhal zas dang*/_kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dar gyi snyan shal dang*/_gos bzang khyad par du 'phags pa mang po'i rgyu las bskrun pa'i bla re dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_'phan dang*/_lda ldi 
[\[201b.5\]]la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad phul ba'i gtong phod mi dman pa ngo mtshar rna ba'i dga' ston bla na med pa nyid du mdzad do/_/de nas dpal sa skya nyid du 'byon pa'i phyir mthun pa'i yo byad sna tshogs pa'i 'byor pa bsnams pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs mang po dang bcas pa gdan bteg ste byon pa 
[\[201b.6\]]na/_nam zhig na chos grwa chen po de nyid la bsngags pa dbang po'i nyer 'tsho zhes bya ba las/_'dzam gling 'dzin ma'i khyon gyi dbus/_/dbus kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhing*/_/zhing khams rgya mtsho kun gyi mchog_/mchog 'di sa yi snying po ste/_/skye dgu kun la rab dga'i dpal ster 
[\[201b.7\]]ba/_/gang gis byang chub snying po brnyes pa'i gzhi/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje gdan 'di ni/_/rgyal ba rgya mtshos byang chub brnyes pa'i gnas/_/ma ga d+hA yang 'di las gzhan du ci/_/zhes dang*/_longs spyod rnam mang ldan pa'i gnas mang yang*/_/rig pa'i 'byung gnas 'di 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]lta 'ga' yod min/_/yid 'phrog mdzes pa'i rin chen mang yod kyang*/_/'dod dgu 'grub pa bsam 'phel gcig po tsam/_/zhes dang*/_de phyir rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis bsten cing*/_/rig pa'i gnas lnga phul byung rnams kyis bsti ba'i 
[\[202a.2\]]gnas/_/ngur smrig gos mchog 'dzin pa rnams kyi dga' tshal te/_/gdan sa chog 'di byang chub snying po yin lags grang*/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar/_bskal pa bzang po'i rnam par 'dren pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i gnas/_'phags pa'i yul gyi rdo rje 
[\[202a.3\]]gdan chen po'i gan+d+ho la dang*/_rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa dang grub pa'i dbang phyug gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa la ni khyad par cung zad kyang dmigs su med pa/_'phags pa rigs gsum mgon pos dgongs bzhin du skye ba'i zlos gar grangs med pa deng nas bzung ste ma 'ongs bskal pa'i 
[\[202a.4\]]bar du yang 'byon par 'gyur bar mngon par shes pa drug gi mig grungs por gyur pa rnams kyis legs par gzigs shing lung bstan gyi bdud rtsi'i chu gtsang mas legs par chag chag btab pa/_ji ltar lung du bstan pa de ltar bden pa'i mthas kyang shin tu gsal bar byas pa'i gdan sa chen po dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen po zhes bya
[\[202a.5\]]ba de'i nye 'dabs su byon no/_/der byon pa dang gdan sa de nyid nas kyang bsu ba snga phyi mang pos son pa rnams kyis mdun bsu ba dang*/_lha bsangs kyi dud pa gnam sa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus par khyab par gtul ba dang*/_phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba 
[\[202a.6\]]dan dang*/_'phan dang*/_gdugs la sogs pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgreng ba dang bcas te/_ring nas mngon par 'dun pa'i ri mo lan cig ma yin par yang dang yang du 'dri ba'i gnas ga la ba der bde bar phebs so/_/der cung zad cig nas skyabs gcig rin 
[\[202a.7\]]po che'i bstan srid zung gi phrin las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug phyag mdzod rin po che'i sku zhabs su 'dzam gling bstan pa'i bdag po'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mjal ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol lo/_/des kyang legs par skabs phyed pa dang*/_ji tsam zhig 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]na dzam+bu rkang 'thung gi rgyal mtshan gyis nye bar spud pa'i gling dam pa 'di nyid rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan gyi mchog tu gyur pa/_skyabs gcig mtshungs zla med pa/_dpal sa skya pa sngags 'chang bla ma ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams rin chen bkra shis grags 
[\[202b.2\]]pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes mtshan gyi rnga bo che srid pa gsum gyi khongs su ldir ba/_de nyid su zhig gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i bcud du len par byed pa kho nas kyang srid zhi'i rgud pa thams cad las skyob pa'i thugs rje chen po dang yon tan dpag tu med pas bzung ba'i bdag 
[\[202b.3\]]nyid can/_gang gi zhabs mthil ban+d+hu dzI wa ka'i 'dab ma lta bu'i ngos su bsod nams kyi byed pos legs par bris pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i rtags kyis nye bar spud pa de ni/_'jig rten gyi khams na mthu che zhing gzi brjid che bar rlom pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_tshangs 
[\[202b.4\]]pa dang*/_dbang po dang*/_drag po dang*/_sred med kyi bu la sogs pa'i lha'i dbang po rnams dang*/_de bzhin du mi dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_lto 'phye dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_mi'am ci dang*/_grul bum ste/_de dag gi bdag por gyur pa rnams kyang mngon par khengs pa bskyungs 
[\[202b.5\]]te/_mun pa'i gnyen por byed pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs rnams kyi rtse na legs par bkod cing*/_ri mor byas pa/_bla mar byas pa/_mchod cing rjed par byas pa/_'jig rten na grags pa'i zla 'od bkar pos yongs su 
[\[202b.6\]]bran pa'i mkhas pa dang*/_grub pa dang*/_rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyis rjed par byed/_tshig gi bdog pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gi bstod pa'i me tog ji snyed pas mngon par gtor yang yongs su gtugs pa med pa'i yon tan gyi phung por gyur pa/_mchog gi sprul pa'i sku 
[\[202b.7\]]dpal ldan stobs bcu mnga' ba nyid dang*/_de'i rnam par 'phrul pa bgrang las 'das pa rnams kyis legs par bshad pa'i tshogs ji snyed mchis pa dang*/_de dag gi brjod byar gyur pa gang yin pa'i dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi bdag po/_mtha' drug tshul bzhi'i lam 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]nas rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ma lus pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i mkhas pa rnams la 'os pa'i phrin las gsum gyi sgo nas/_bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dam pa gong nas gong du bslang ba la 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med pa'i mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug chen po ste/_gang de 
[\[203a.2\]]mi 'jigs bzhi dang ldan pa'i go 'phang nye bar brnyes pa'i brdar/_seng ge chen po brgyad kyis mngon par bteg pa'i chos kyi khri mthon po zhig tu srid pa gsum gyi gzi brjid kyi phung po ma lus pa gcig tu spungs pa las lhag pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'od dang 'od zer gyi tshogs rab tu dkrigs 
[\[203a.3\]]pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor ni/_dper na 'char ka'i nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrib byed med pa zhig_/thun mtshams sprin gyi lang tsho mngon par bdo ba'i rtse na 'dug pa dang 'dra bar mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i sku las mtshan gyi snang ba ring po'i lam du 'phro ba ste/_de ni dge slong gi 
[\[203a.4\]]dge 'dun spyod lam dul zhing mdzes pa kho nas kyang skye 'phags thams cad kyi yid 'phrog par bzod pa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te gnas so/_/de dag kyang la la ni a ga ru dang*/_tu ruSh+ka dang*/_tsan+dan la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i spos 
[\[203a.5\]]mchog gi sdong bu dag gtul ba'i dud sprin bai DUr+Ya sngon po'i sprin phung lta bu dag gtibs par byed do/_/la la ni yi gar shin tu 'ong ba'i dri zhim po sna tshogs pa dag gcig tu sbyar ba las byung ba'i spos kyi rengs bu sbar ba dag thogs te/_sngo bsangs dud pa'i sprin gyi ri mo ngo 
[\[203a.6\]]mtshar ba dag nam mkha'i ngos la ci yang 'dri bar byed do/_/kha cig ni mthun pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i yo byad gtsang zhing bsod pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gis sku'i rim gro dag lhur byed do/_/kha cig ni gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la nye bar mkho ba'i 
[\[203a.7\]]nyer bsdogs kyi phreng ba mtshar du dngar ba ci dang ci dgos pa dag mngon par bskrun par byed do/_/phal cher ni 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag phra zhing phra ba nyid du rnam par 'byed pa'i legs bshad kyi bdud rtsi mang po 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]dag len par byed do/_/kha cig ni ji skad thos pa'i gsung gi bdud rtsi mang po dag brda dang tshig la rmongs par ma gyur pa'i skyes bu'i 'du byed kyis yi ge'i lam du 'god par byed do/_/kha cig ni 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi phreng ba rnam par g.yos pa'i rtse 
[\[203b.2\]]mo nas 'khrungs par dngos su 'byor pa'i yo byad kyi maN+Dal gya nom pa dag kyang stob par byed pa'i dbus su/_rje btsun dam pa de nyid 'od dang 'od zer gyi snang ba lham mer 'bar ba dang bcas te bzhugs pa dngos su mthong bar gyur to/_/de ltar mthong bar gyur pa dang*/_sdom brtson 
[\[203b.3\]]mi'i dbang phyug dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di snyam du/_e ma khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po chen po/_dus gsum mnyam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug_/'jig rten gsum gyi snying po mtha' dag gcig tu spungs pa lta bu'i skyabs kyi mchog 'di lta bu dang dngos su mjal 
[\[203b.4\]]ba'i skal ba bzang po'i ro la longs su spyad par gyur pa 'di ni nges par ngo mtshar che ba zhig go snyam du thugs la byed pa dang bcas te/_rje btsun dam pa des skye ba dpag tu med pa nas bzod pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i zhal bzang zla ba rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[203b.5\]]rtag tu gang ba'i rang bzhin can de nyid/_skal bar ldan pa'i mig gi me long dag tu 'gog pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'char ba dang*/_legs par gdams pa'i bdud rtsi'i sgo 'phar phye bas thar pa bla na med pa'i lang tsho'i bcud len du 'thung ba'i skal ba bzang po la sbyor bar gsol ba'i 
[\[203b.6\]]mtshon byed du/_thog mar srid zhi'i skyabs mgon mtshungs pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba/_gang gi yon tan 'dzad du med pa'i rang bzhin rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang nas phyogs re tsam zhig nyams dang 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa'i snyan dngags dam pa'i glur blangs pa'i mchod par brjod pa 
[\[203b.7\]]dang*/_yan lag bdun pa tshigs su bcad par bsdebs pa'i me tog gi sil mas mngon par gtor zhing rab tu gtor ro/_/de nas bkra shis pa'i rtags kyi dge mtshan rnam par bkra ba'i lha dar dkar po dang*/_bde ldan zhing gi mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i sku brnyan 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gyis thog drangs pa'i 'bul ba dngos po bzang zhing gtos che ba rnam grangs stong phrag gcig dang brgya phrag gsum gyis nye bar lhag pa'i 'bul ba phul lo/_/der bshul thag ring po'i lam gyi bde legs dang khams 'dri ba dang lan ldon pa las 
[\[204a.2\]]brtsams pa'i bka' mchid ut+pal dkar po'i phreng ba lta bu kun gyi rna bar mdzes pa'i rgyan du legs par stsal to/_/de nas rim par zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi dga' ston thob pa la/_thog mar 'phags yul gyi grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po dze tA ri las rim par brgyud 
[\[204a.3\]]de/_bstan pa'i bdag po dpal sa skya pa la bka' bab pa'i 'jam dpal a ra pa tsa na'i rjes su gnang ba dang*/_grub pa'i dbang phyug thang stong rgyal po zhes pa dgung lo brgya dang nyi shu lngar bzhugs nas sems can gyi don mdzad par grags pa de nyid las brgyud pa bar ma chad 
[\[204a.4\]]pa las byung ba'i tshe sgrub zab gter dag snang chu bo nyis 'dres su gyur pa'i bla ma zhi khro'i tshe dbang zab mo dang*/_dpal kye rdo rje man ngag lugs kyi dkyil 'khor ras bris la brten pa'i rgyu dus kyi dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa/_rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor chen po zhal phye ba'i rdo rje 
[\[204a.5\]]phur pa sa lugs stod las byang chub sgrub pa'i dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang*/_rdo rje gur gyi rgyud le'u bco lnga pa las bstan pa'i rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po lcam dral lha brgyad kyi rjes su gnang ba dang*/_gzhan yang rjes su gnang ba dang rjes su gdams 
[\[204a.6\]]pa dpag tu med pa stsal to/_/gzhan yang sngon gyi dus nas bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi bka' dang dam tshig gnyen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi snying la sim pa dral du ma btub par dus rtag tu mkha' 'gro chos skyong gi tshogs thams cad sprin bzhin du 'du zhing bsgo ba thams 
[\[204a.7\]]cad bran bzhin du nyan pa'i bsti gnas su gyur pa'i mgon khang chen po rnams su/_he ru ka dpal mi'i srid par bzung ba'i rje btsun dam pa de nyid dang*/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po 'di nyid lhan cig tu byon nas/_chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la mchod gtor rgya chen 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pos mnyes par byas te/_sngon dus bla ma mal lo tsA bas sa chen kun dga' snying po la ji ltar gtad pa de ltar du/_rje btsun he ru ka dpal chen po nyid kyi phyag na dam tshig gi rdo rje 'bar ba thogs te ched du bsgo ba/_chos skyong ba'i srung ma mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/_
[\[204b.2\]]bcol ba'i las thams cad la skad cig kyang g.yel ba med par sgrub pa/_mngon par shes pa'i mig dang ldan pa khyed rnams dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'bral ba med par 'grogs la/_phyi dang nang gi bar du gcod pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs 
[\[204b.3\]]thams cad zhi ba'i phrin las sgrubs shig_/mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gong nas gong du spel ba'i phrin las sgrubs shig_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las rnam pa bzhi gang dang gang bcol ba thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrubs shig ces bya ba la 
[\[204b.4\]]sogs pa'i bka' dang dam tshig gi rdo rje phyed par dka' ba'i ra ba de na legs par bcug ste/_mthar thug byang chub ma thob kyi bar du skad cig kyang 'bral ba med par lu gu rgyud du sbrel lo/_/gzhan yang chos dang srid pa'i gtsug lag zung las brtsams pa'i bka' mchid nyin 
[\[204b.5\]]mor byed pa'i nor bu'i 'od zer gyi drwa ba mang du spros pas/_blo gros kyi 'dab brgya rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i bka' drin bsam pa'i yul las 'das pa'i tshul gyis rjes su bzung zhing rjes su bskyangs te nyin zhag gi 'khor lo mang po yang brgal bar mdzad do/_/de dag gi bar 
[\[204b.6\]]skabs rnams su/_skye dgu ma lus pa'i phan pa dang bde skyid 'byung ba'i rtsa lag tu bzhugs pa'i rten mjal dang mchod 'bul mdzad pa ni/_gdan sa chen po de nyid kyi gdags srib tu bzhugs so 'tshal gyi lha khang dang*/_gtsug lag khang dang*/_mgon khang dang*/_
[\[204b.7\]]sgrub khang khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang*/_sprul pa'i lha khang chen po zhes bya ba/_gang gi ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i bkod pa lta bu'i khyad par gyi ltad mo'i cha shas re yang skal bar ldan pa su zhig gi mig gi dbang po'i longs spyod nyid du thob par gyur pa'i mod la/_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bsod nams kyi mthu las grub pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba/_sprul pa'i bzo bo bi shwa kar+m+ma'i 'phrul gyis bzos pa/_lha'i rin po che sna bzhi las bsgrubs pa zhig ste/_de'i bzo dbyibs 
[\[205a.2\]]lta na sdug pa'i ngo mtshar dang grags pa yang 'gog par nus pa'i rang bzhin can nyid do/_/de yang ji ltar zhe na/_bskal pa bzang po'i legs lam las/_gang du 'jug pa'i them skas su zhig gis/_/'gongs pa tsam na thar pa'i grong khyer du/_/bde bar son pa 
[\[205a.3\]]srid las 'das pa yi/_/sgo de'i khyad par ci yin yongs mi shes/_/rta babs nor bu rgyas pa'i ljon pa yi/_/ka ba stong gis bteg pa'i 'od kun du/_/'bar bas rang gnas phrogs te gnam sngon po/_/sa la lhung ba min nam khyams de sngo/_/de la nor 'dzin zla 
[\[205a.4\]]ba'i mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris/_/bkra ba de ni mthing gi rol ba'i mtshor/_/sin+d+hu wA ra'i ge sar phye ma'i phreng*/_/rlabs kyi sor mos bris pa bzhin du mdzes/_/in+d+ra nI la'i ba gam 'od tshogs kyis/_/rtsig ngos dag pa'i logs la yongs khyab pa/_/ut+pal sngon po rab 
[\[205a.5\]]rgyas nags su sems/_/me tog zas can rnams la 'khrul pa 'jug_/_mda' yab phreng ba las 'phyang drwa phyed tshogs/_/pha gu chu skyes dkar po'i ngos rtse la/_/reg pa rnam par gsal te bcu drug cha/_/snying las bdud rtsi'i thig phreng bsgreng ba bzhin/_/bya 'dab 
[\[205a.6\]]mkha' dang 'dres pa'i 'gram pa la/_/rgya phibs 'jig rten gsum gyi mun 'phrog pa'i/_/snang ba'i ri mo glog gi gar mkhan mas/_/gzhan yid rku ba'i cho 'phrul mdzes las lhag_/zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa'i rnga yab rtser/_/dzam+bu nA da'i gser gyi dril chung 
[\[205a.7\]]gi_/mgrin la zad mi shes pa'i sgra snyan mang*/_/rna ba'i bcud du 'gro ba'i dbyangs su 'bab/_/tog gi khyad par nyi ma'i spyi bo la/_/'od zer 'bab stegs byed pa'i gzi brjid gter/_/mdzes pa'i gos can lhab lhub rta gdong mer/_/rig pas mi brdzi'i rgyal 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mtshan 'bum gyis spud/_/ces pa lta bu'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de dang bcas pa ste/_rten de dag tu bzhugs pa'i brten pa rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mang po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 
[\[205b.2\]]rnams dang*/_dpal sa skya'i gdung rabs rim par byon pa rnams kyi thugs dam rten du mdzad pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dngos su bzhugs pa/_phan bde thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa spyi la spos dang*/_mar me dang*/_zhal zas phul lo/_/bye brag pa rnams la 
[\[205b.3\]]lhag par 'phan dang*/_bla re dang*/_rgyal mtshan 'bul ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskrun pa'i ngo mtshar brjod kyis mi ldang ba nyid do/_/de ltar gdan sa chen po der ji ltar bzhed pa'i don thams cad legs par grub nas/_dpal zhwa lu'i chos sder byon nas/_
[\[205b.4\]]der bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la mang ja dang gral 'gyed/_grwa pa rer dngul dkar bal po'i dong tse re'i 'gyed pa dang*/_gdan sa de'i bla ma dang las tshan rnams la 'bul ba tshan grangs dang*/_rten gsum rnams kyi zhal mjal dang mchod 'bul mdzad do/_/skabs der 
[\[205b.5\]]chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i dgon par gdan 'dren zhu ba'i bsu bar/_bla brang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i mgron gnyer ba dang*/_gzhis rtse rdzong gi dpon po dang*/_hags gdong grwa tshang dang*/_rgya khang tshan gyi dge bskos rnams kyis sngon nas bsu ste/_de phyogs su 
[\[205b.6\]]chibs kyi gdong bsgyur bar mdzad pas mi ring bar bla brang chen po rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba/_de'i ngo mtshar gyi khyad par ni/_dper na bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bzhi pa'i rgyal tshabs chen po mgon po byams pas/_skal ba ldan pa'i lha bu grangs med pa'i 
[\[205b.7\]]dbus su/_theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor ba'i gnas dga' ldan chos kyi gzhal med khang chen po zhes pa/_de ni phal cher sbyong bar dka' ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu tshogs phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pas 'thob par dka' ba 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ngo mtshar gyi khyad par brjod mi nus pa zhig ste/_de'i bkod pa legs pa dang dpal ma lus pa sa'i steng na yongs su 'phos pa snyam byed pa'i ngo mtshar skye bo yongs kyi mig gi bdud rtsir gyur pa zhig go_/de'ang 'di ltar lha'i rin po che sna 
[\[206a.2\]]bdun gyi pha gu brtsegs pa lta bu'i stegs bu dang*/_ba gam dang*/_mda' yab dang*/_lan kan rnams kyis mdzes pa/_zur bzhi dang ldan pa ches mtho zhing brling ba/_sgo dang rta babs dang skar khung dang*/_rgyan gyi rnam pa mang po dang ldan pa/_btso ma gser gyi rgya 
[\[206a.3\]]phibs mang po dag la nyi ma bye ba'i dpal bzhin du 'od zer gyi drwa ba dkrigs pa/_de'i phyi rol kun du gtsug lag khang dang*/_khang pa dang*/_khang phran gyi tshogs mang po dang*/_me tog gi ldum ra dang*/_skyed mos tshal la sogs pas bskor bas yid du 'ong bar byas pa/_de 
[\[206a.4\]]lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi phung por gyur pa gang yin pa de'i nye 'dabs su byon no/_/der byon pa dang chos grwa chen po de nyid nas kyang*/_dri zhim po'i sman dang*/_spos dang*/_sih+la dang*/_bdud rtsi can gyi shing gi lcug phran gzhon nu dag bsregs pa'i lha bsang gi dud sprin sngon pos nam mkha'i 
[\[206a.5\]]dbyings khyab par gtul lo/_/de dang chab cig par lha'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_lha'i ba dan la sogs pa'i dar 'phyar gyi dga' spro dpag tu med pa bstar ba'i bkur sti dang bcas te bla brang chen por spyan drangs zhus so/_/de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi yon gyi 
[\[206a.6\]]gnas dam par gyur pa ni paN chen thams cad gzigs pa blo bzang ye shes dbang po zhes yongs su grags pa ste/_de ni sngon dus 'phags pa'i yul dang bsil ldan kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba ltar rab tu grags pa'i mkhas pa chen po du ma'i sku'i skye ba lu gu rgyud 
[\[206a.7\]]du bzhes pa/_de'i dbang gis dpal stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs ris med pa la skye ba nas skye bar phan pa'i bya ba yang dag par bgyis pa/_skye ba 'dir yang gser mdangs cod paN 'chang ba thams cad kyi bstan pa rgyal mtshan mdzes par byed pa'i tog tu 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar brtse ba'i thugs rje che zhing*/_rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par gyur pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu zhig go_/de lta na'ang skabs der skye 'gro spyi'i legs byas kyi thag pa phra mos ma zin pa bzhin 
[\[206b.2\]]du re zhig de nas mi snang bar zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i tshul bstan no/_/de'i skye ba'i zlos gar gyi sprul pa'i sku yang byon ma zin pa'i skabs su mchis mod/_rje btsun dam pa des theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor ba'i seng ge'i khri mthon po dang*/_
[\[206b.3\]]dam pa de nyid kyi sku brnyan phyag nas can gyi mdun ga la bar rnam grangs brgya phrag gcig la brgyad kyis nye bar lhag pa'i mchod 'bul mdzad do/_/chos grwa de'i gtsug lag khang chen por bstan skyong 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhi zhing dul ba/_sku las ha ri tsan+da na'i dri bsung 
[\[206b.4\]]mngar po kho ra khor yug tu 'thul ba/_mtha' med 'khor ba'i rims nad kyi gnyen por byed pa'i yon gnas dam pa stong phrag bzhir ldang bar bzhugs pa rnams la mang ja gnyis dang*/_grwa pa re la dngul dkar bal po'i dong tse re re gral 'gyed du phul lo/_/de na byin 
[\[206b.5\]]rlabs dang phan bde'i dpal gyis mngon par gtams pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten mchog dzam+bu'i gling na dkon pa ltar gyur pa'i grags che zhing grangs mang bar bzhugs pa rnams la'ang zhal gser gsol ba dang*/_spos reng gtul ba dang*/_mar me sbor ba dang*/_snyan 
[\[206b.6\]]shal dang 'phan tshar 'dogs pa la sogs pa/_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byung ba rnams kyis/_phyogs bcu'i zhing gi rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa'i sprin gyi phung po dpag tu med pas mngon par mchod cing ri mor byas pa de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa dag gi rjes
