[\[206b.7\]]su 'jug pa dang rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing rjed par mdzad do/_/de nas 'phags pa'i gnas brtan dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rol rtsed gdon mi za ba'i mkhan po dge ba'i 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bshes gnyen chen po rim par byon pa rnams kyis bka' gdams bstan pa'i snying po'i chos tshul dri ma med pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i gdan sa chen po/_/dpal snar thang zhes bya ba'i chos grwa nyid du 'byon par brtsam pa na/_de nas kyang mdun bsu'i 
[\[207a.2\]]phreng ba snga phyi'i rim par bstar ba ni snga ma bzhin du byung ste/_de dag dang bstun nas dpal snar thang gi chos grwar byon no/_/de na dpal ldan nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa dam pa'i rtsa lag tu bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang mkhan po phyi dang nang gi yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos 'byor pa/_sems 
[\[207a.3\]]can thams cad la phan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir zhugs pa rnams la 'bul ba tshan grangs bsngo rten dang bcas pa phul lo/_/der 'phags pa'i dge 'dun chos spyod bcu'i rgyun dang nyams len lhur len pas nyin mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dus 'da' bar byed pa'i yon gnas dam pa ji snyed 
[\[207a.4\]]mchis pa rnams la'ang mang ja'i bsnyen bkur dang dngul dkar gyi dong tse re re 'gyed du bstabs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i rten rnams kyi spyan sngar nye bar spyod pa rnams dang yo byad 'bul ba rnams ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du gzabs so/_/de ltar ji skad 
[\[207a.5\]]bshad pa rnams kyang de dag las gang gtsor gyur pa gang yin pa'am rags pa gang yin pa kho na btus nas smos pa yin gyi zhib tu ni ma yin no/_/gzhan du na sdom brtson bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po 'dis thugs bskyed dang snying stobs rmad du byung ba'i gtong ba dam pa'i sgo 'phar yangs 
[\[207a.6\]]por phye nas/_dus gzhan dang gnas skabs gzhan dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i tshul brjod pa lta zhog_deng gi dus kho nar yang dbus gtsang gi phyogs kyi dgon sde phyogs ris su med pa la mchod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i ngo mtshar gtam gyi phung po kho na brjod kyang 'dzad du 
[\[207a.7\]]med pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ni nges pa'o/_/de'ang 'di ltar mdo ru bsdu na/_yul stag lung gi dgon pa nas bzung ste/_dbus phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa dang*/_gtsang phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa dang*/_stod kyi gnya' nam grod pa phug 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]man chad kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ste/_de dag tu gnas pa'i gdan sa dang*/_gtsug lag khang dang*/_dgon sde dang*/_sgrub gnas dang*/_ri khrod dben pa'i bsti gnas ji snyed mchis pa ste/_de dag la brten pa'i dge slong dang*/_dge slong ma dang*/_bar 
[\[207b.2\]]slob ma dang*/_dge tshul dang*/_dge tshul ma dang*/_dge bsnyen dang*/_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge de nyid kyi bstan pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa ji 
[\[207b.3\]]snyed mchis pa dang*/_gshen rabs bon gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa ji snyed mchis pa rnams te/_de dag thams cad du ma khyab pa med pa'i mang ja'i bsnyen bkur dang*/_gral 'gyed kyi 'bul ba yang dag par bgyis so/_/de'ang dgon sde gang dang gang 
[\[207b.4\]]yin pa de dang de'i grwa pa'i tshogs mang nyung gang yod kyi grangs dang mnyam par/_dngul bal po'i dong tse re re 'gyed pa ni dgon sde phal che ba la yod cing*/_tha na dgon pa'i ming thogs tsam zhig la'ang mang ja re dang 'gyed skal mi re la dngul zho gang phyin chad du lhung 
[\[207b.5\]]ba ni gcig kyang med pa'i dgongs gtad kyi yon 'bul mdzad do/_/dgon sde de dag tu mkhas pa'i phrin las bzang po la dbang 'byor pa'i bla ma dang*/_mkhan po dang*/_slob dpon dang*/_zur 'chad par bzhugs pa thams cad la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu 
[\[207b.6\]]yongs su bsngo bar zhu ba'i rten dang yon 'bul gyi dngos pos ma khyab pa med pa'i dgongs gtad kyi bsnyen bkur gzab/_de dag gi gtsug lag khang dang rten mchog khyad par can gyi bzhugs gnas rnams su/_ji skad du/_ji ltar bde gshegs sku gzugs shing las sam/_/rdo 
[\[207b.7\]]las byas pa'ang rung ste mkhas pas mchod/_/ces dang*/_gang zhig sangs rgyas yid byed pa/_/de yi mdun na thub pa bzhugs/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar sems can rang rang gi mos pa'i bye brag tsam ma gtogs par thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje che zhing 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i phrin las can gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten yin pa'i phyir/_mchog dman dang bzang ngan gyi khyad par dbyer mi btub kyang*/_kun rdzob kyi rjes su 'brang ste rten gsum gyi rnam pa bzheng ba rgyu'i khyad 
[\[208a.2\]]par dang*/_bzhed pa po gang zag gi khyad par dang*/_tshad dang mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i khyad par dang*/_'phags pa gsum gyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i khyad par dang*/_thun mong dang khyad par ba'i rab tu gnas pa'i dus su ye shes kyi 'khor lo phebs pa'i ltas dang 
[\[208a.3\]]mtshan ma mthong ba'i khyad par la sogs pa'i sgo nas grags che chung byed pa ltar/_'dir yang de'i dbang gis rten gsum grags che ba rnams su 'phen dang*/_bla re dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_snyan shal dang*/_nye bar spyod pa'i phreng ba mtshar du dngar ba brgya phrag brtsegs pa'i 
[\[208a.4\]]mchod pa dang*/_stong phrag brtsegs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_gzhan rnams la yang dri zhim po'i spos dang*/_mar me'i mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs pas rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus pa mnyes par mdzad pa'i rnam par thar pa 'di ni/_sngon gyi 'phags pa byang 
[\[208a.5\]]chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho lta bu la zhugs pa'i dus kyi snying stobs ji ltar bskyed pa de kho na dang mtshungs par 'gyur gyi/_de las gzhan pa'i so so skye bo gtong phod che bar rlom pa dang*/_snying stobs che bar rlom pa bye ba 
[\[208a.6\]]brgya stong mang po bsdams kyang gang gi cha shas re yang bskrun du yod pa'i re ba ni ston ka'i dus kyi sprin lta bu'o zhes dge ba'i phyogs la mngon par dga' ba'i skyes bu gzu bor gnas pa mtha' dag mgrin gcig tu snyan dngags dam pa'i glu bzhin du len par byed pa dag yod do/_/
[\[208a.7\]]de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa dang bstan 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen ris su med pa la phan pa'i ri mo dang bsnyen bkur rgya chen po stob pa dang bcas te/_snying po med pa'i zang zing gi dngos po rnams las bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ba'i snying po 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]yang dag par blangs zin nas/_da ni thob par dka' ba'i dal 'byor gyi lus rten zhes bya ba mi rtag cing mi brtan la chu bur bzhin du snying po med pa'i chos can 'di la brten nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi thos pa'i bag chags 'ga' zhig 
[\[208b.2\]]ni sngar yang bsags mod/_da dung yang dam pa'i chos kyi thos pa mang po'i pha rol tu son par byas te/_rang dang gzhan gyi don rgya chen po bsgrub par bgyi'o snyam du dgongs pa rtse gcig pas ngor du bzhugs nas chos gsan par mdzad do/_/de la'ang slob 
[\[208b.3\]]dpon dbyig gnyen gyis/_spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni/_/chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i sde snod dang*/_mdo sde'i sde snod dang*/_mngon pa'i sde snod de gsum mam/_yang na de 
[\[208b.4\]]las rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod logs su phye na sde snod bzhir bzhed pa ste/_gang ltar yang de dag gis brjod par bya ba'i snying por gyur pa'i lam gyi gtso bo ni sdom pa rin po che rnam pa gsum ste/_de dang rjes su 'brel pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi zab cing rgya che ba'i rnam grangs 
[\[208b.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsan te/_de'ang thog mar rgyal ba'i bstan pa thams cad kyi gzhi ma so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ste/_de rang gi rgyud la yongs su rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por bsgrub pa'i phyir/_de nyid bka'i gnang ba zhu ba'i mkhan po ni/_dgag sgrub 
[\[208b.6\]]gnang gsum gyi sgo nas bslab par bya ba'i gnas rnams nye bar lung 'bogs pa'am ston pa la shin tu mkhas pa dang*/_bsgrub bya la nad pa'am bu'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas shin tu snying brtse ba dang ldan pas dman pa'i gnas su ltung ba las yongs su 'dzin pa dang*/_
[\[208b.7\]]dngos su legs par gsungs pa dam pa'i chos 'dul ba las 'byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa rin po che la nye bar sbyor zhing*/_brgyud nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang dam pa la sbyor bar byed pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos na thams 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas zhes yongs su grags pa de nyid dang*/_las kyi slob dpon ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dul ba'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol 
[\[209a.2\]]du son cing*/_de'i bslab pa'i gnas ma lus pa tshul bzhin du ston pa la mgrin pa rnam par yangs pa dpon slob sangs rgyas tshul khrims pa dang*/_gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon gnas brtan 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po chos rje kun dga' rgya mtsho pa dang*/_gzhan yang 
[\[209a.3\]]dus bsgo ba dang*/_kha skong gi dge 'dun grangs tshang ba dang bcas pa'i dbus su/_mdo rtsa bar dge bsnyen nyid dang*/_dge tshul nyid dang*/_dge slong nyid dag gis snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la phyi ma mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa ltar tshigs gsum rim nos kyi sgo nas 
[\[209a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs pa dge slong gi sdom ldan nyid du bsgrubs so/_/de ltar bsgrubs pa'i mtshan du yang bla ma chen po kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bar bsgyur te lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su mnga' gsol bar mdzad do/_/
[\[209a.5\]]de nas brtsams te bcas pa'i nyes pa phra rags rnams kyis nam yang nongs pa med pa'i bslab pa rin po che la shin tu gus pa'i sgo nas/_bshes spring las/_bag yod bdud rtsi'i gnas te bag med pa/_/'chi ba'i gnas su thub pas bka' stsal te/_/de bas khyod 
[\[209a.6\]]kyis dge chos spel slad du/_/gus pas rtag tu bag dang bcas par mdzod/_/ces gsungs pa bzhin du sgo gsum bag yod kyi spyod pa la nam yang ma g.yos par mdzad do/_/slar yang rang gzhan sems can thams cad sdug bsngal mtha' dag las sgrol 
[\[209a.7\]]ba dang*/_gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba thams cad 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo ni theg pa chen po'i lam dang*/_de'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed pa ste/_de'ang bslab btus las/_sdug bsngal mthar 'byin 'dod pa dang*/_/bde ba'i 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]mthar ni 'gro 'dod pas/_/dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan bya ste/_/byang chub la ni blo brtan bya/_/zhes gsungs shing*/_gal te 'di nyid med na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa las/_
[\[209b.2\]]de bzhin 'di na byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi/_/ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun du ga la 'byung*/_/zhes dang*/_chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar/_/rim gyis nyung ngu nyung ngus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar/_/de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste/_/
[\[209b.3\]]rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par/_byang chub sems bskyed gyur na skad cig gis/_/'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya 
[\[209b.4\]]ste/_/'jig rten lha mir bcas pa'i phyag byar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phan yon dpag tu med par lung gis nye bar bstan pa'i don la rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir/_sngar gyi mkhan chen tshad med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/_thun mong 'gro ba'i blo dang rjes su mthun par 
[\[209b.5\]]rgyal ba'i sras po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par rol ba/_snyigs ma'i dus kyi skye bo thams cad theg pa chen po'i lam du bkri ba'i thabs la mkhas shing thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_khyad par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par 'jug pa las/_rtag par dge ba'i 
[\[209b.6\]]bshes gnyen ni/_/theg chen don la mkhas pa dang*/_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs mchog_/srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo*/_/zhes gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa de nyid la gsung ngag rin po che'i snang ba gsum gyi khrid dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed kyi 
[\[209b.7\]]sdom pa rin po che 'bogs pa'i ston par gsol ba btab bo/_/ji ltar gsol ba de bzhin du mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nas zhal gyis bzhes te/_rgyal gyis yongs su nya ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rdzogs pa gnyis pa'i tshes la/_dpal e waM chos ldan gyi gtsug lag khang 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]chen por byon te/_de'ang gang du bzhugs pa'i chos kyi khri ni/_snyigs ma'i dus kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po zhes mtshan gyi snyan pa tshangs pa'i bu mo'i rgyud [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]dpal las legs par 'phos pa snyam byed pa gang de/_lha dang mi 
[\[210a.2\]]dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_dri za dang*/_grul bum dang*/_lto 'phye chen po dang*/_nam mkha' lding la sogs pa'i skye dgu skal ba mchog dang ldan pa gang dag gi rna ba'i snod du lhung bar gyur pa de'i mod la/_gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba ma skyes pa rnams kyi spro ba gsar du bskyed 
[\[210a.3\]]pa dang*/_skyes pa rnams kyi spro ba gong nas gong du bogs dbyung bar byed do/_/'gro ba de dag gi gnas su skye ba dman pa'i rten can du gyur pa gang dag gis/_gang gi mtshan gyi sgra dbyangs snyan pa de nyid lan cig tsam du thos pa'am/_dad pas ngag tu rjod par byed pa de'i mod la/_
[\[210a.4\]]dman pa'i skye ba yongs su bor te/_skye ba dam pa'i mtshan gyi 'khri shing dang ldan par byed do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya dang ri dwags la sogs pa'i rna lam du bsgrags pa tsam gyis skye ba de nyid kyi 'tsho ba'i 'du byed yongs su btang ba nas brtsams te/_yang 'byung 
[\[210a.5\]]ba'i srid pa thams cad du ngan 'gro dang ngan song log par ltung ba rnams su skye ba'i sgo 'gegs pa la sogs pa'i lung gi tshogs kyis mngon par bsngags so/_/de ltar bsngags pa'i yul du gyur pa bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po de nyid kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes rnyog pa thams cad 
[\[210a.6\]]dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can gang du rnam par bkod de/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rgya che ba dang zab pa'i bdud rtsi'i sgo 'phar bsam gyis mi khyab par phye bas/_legs bris dbang po'i bcud kyis len pa'i btung ba bye ba brgya stong gis kyang*/_
[\[210a.7\]]gang gi zegs ma rer yang 'gran par bzod pa'i skal ba shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin can gyi 'byor pa bla na med pas/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa skal ba bzang po la sbyar ba'i dus kyi chos kyi khri chen po pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog can gang la/_mkhan chen 'jam pa'i dbyangs de nyid kyi 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]zhabs kyi pad+ma legs par bkod de/_sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mngon du bzhag ste/_nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal bzhin du gzi brjid kyi phung po mngon par dkrigs te lham mer bzhugs so/_/de ltar bzhugs 
[\[210b.2\]]pa dang*/_chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa'i mod la/_sdom brtson mi'i dbang phyug chen po rang gi mdun na 'don rnams dang*/_rgyal po'i sku srung ba dang*/_nye ba'i 'khor dang*/_las gnyer ba la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu/_stod mnga' ris nas 
[\[210b.3\]]brtsams te/_smad dar rtse mdo yan gyi phyogs ris mtha' dag nas/_dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi btung ba'i ched du nye bar lhags pa'i bu slob kyi tshogs gnam gyi skar ma bkra ba lta bu'i dbus su/_dpal gyi mgur/_dung gi tshems bar nas/_'phrul gyi ljags brkyang ste/_mdo 
[\[210b.4\]]sde dang rgyud sde zab mo thams cad kyi don gyi bcud phyung ba/_'jigs bral dpal ldan chos skyong gi bzhed gzhung*/_mkhas pa thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i 'jug ngogs/_bsod nams dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer 
[\[210b.5\]]du 'gro ba rnams kyi them skas/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ston par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin/_gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag gi nyams khrid zab mo smin rgyas su legs par stsal ba'i thog mar/_snang ba 
[\[210b.6\]]gsum gyi nyams khrid rgyas par stsal ba sngon du btang nas/_mchu zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi rdzogs pa gsum pa'i tshes bzang po la/_rje btsun dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can de nyid la/_theg pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs mi dang mi ma yin pas 
[\[210b.7\]]bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pas kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te gnas pa'i dbus su/_'phags pa bskal pa bzang po las/_bde gshegs skye dbang 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od zer la/_/gling bzhi 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dag ni dbul bar byas nas kyang*/_/dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags byin 'dzam gling rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la/_/gtsug lag khang ni bye ba byas nas kyang*/_/dang por byang chub 
[\[211a.2\]]mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bkod pa'i rgyal po 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od de la/_/bai DUr+Ya yi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phul nas kyang*/_/dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad bsrung ba'i tshe/_/
[\[211a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la/_/bshos dag bdag nyid btsong ste sbyar nas kyang*/_/dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gya nom rgyal po yi/_/pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal ba yi/_/bshes gnyen de la lan cig 
[\[211a.4\]]bskor byas nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/zhes dang*/_de ltar sangs rgyas rnams la chung ngu yi/_/yon phul rnam par smin pa 'di dag yin/_/'khor tshe de yi 'bras bu de 'dra na/_/mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems mi bskyed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa 
[\[211a.5\]]sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems dang por bskyed pa'i rnam par thar pa lung gi phreng ba dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis legs par bstan pa/_thos pa 'dzin pa'i lam du lhung ba dag gi don la rjes su sems shing*/_rjes su mos nas/_rjes su slob pa dang*/_rjes su 
[\[211a.6\]]'jug pa la spro ba mchog tu skyes pa'i sdom brtson lha sras chen po nyid nas bkra shis pa'i kha dar dang*/_gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_gos yug dang*/_rta mchog gi bzhon pa la sogs pa'i 'bul tshan dang*/_sku 'khor rnams nas kyang rang rang gi bdog pa'i dngos po gya nom pa dag gi 
[\[211a.7\]]sems bskyed kyi phyag rten du 'bul ba dang bcas te/_gang dag 'das pa dang*/_ma byon pa dang*/_da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam/_rgyal ba'i myu gu thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed dam par mdzad do/_/de yang rin chen phreng ba las/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems/_/ri dbang rgyal po ltar brtan dang*/_/phyogs mthas gtugs pa'i snying rje dang*/_/gnyis la mi brtan ye shes lags/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar 
[\[211b.2\]]stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can gyi byang chub kyi sems yin te/_de la'ang rags pa brda las thob pa dang*/_phra ba chos nyid kyis thob pa gnyis las/_phyi ma 'di ni mdo sde rgyan las/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mnyes byas/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab 
[\[211b.3\]]bsags/_/chos la mi rtog ye shes ni/_/skyed phyir de ni dam par 'dod/_/ces gsungs pa lta bu las skye bar 'gyur ba yin gyi/_de nyid 'bogs par byed pa cho ga'i sgo nas blang du med par gsungs shing*/_'on kyang de nyid rgyud la skyed par byed pa la sngon du kun 
[\[211b.4\]]rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa legs par thob nas/_gong gi rgyud de dag la 'bad par bya dgos pa yin no/_/de bas na 'dir thob pa'i sems bskyed kyi sdom pa'ang smon pa dang 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can gyi kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid thob pa ste/_de'i cho ga 
[\[211b.5\]]la yang theg pa chen po thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis su bzhugs pa las/_skabs 'dir thun mong ma yin pa brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis dang ldan pa'i cho ga rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi srol chen po la brten nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang 
[\[211b.6\]]dag pa len par mdzad do/_/de ltar 'bogs byed rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom ldan nyid du bskrun te/_de phyin chad nas thams cad kyis rgyal ba'i sras rgyal ba'i sras zhes ming don gnyis ka 'phos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid du legs 
[\[211b.7\]]par bsgrubs nas/_'jig rten gyi khams na so so skye bo dang*/_'phags pa'i khongs su gtogs pa 'ga' dang bcas pas kyang phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing chen po zhig tu bskrun to/_/de ltar byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed nas/_de'i 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bslab pa'i gnas ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad ni gsum po 'di dag kho nar zad de zhes gsungs pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad mdor bsdu na/_byang 
[\[212a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rgyal po la 'byung ba dang*/_blon po la 'byung ba dang*/_rgyal blon thun mong du 'byung ba dang*/_las dang po pa la 'byung ba ste/_ltung ba de dag spong ba'i sems pa sa bon dang bcas pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang*/_sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa pha 
[\[212a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i chos bsgrub par 'dod pa dge ba chos sdud kyi tshul khrims dang*/_sems can thams cad kyi gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don gyi phan pa dang bde ba bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sems pa sa bon dang bcas pa ni sems can don byed kyi tshul 
[\[212a.4\]]khrims te/_gsum po de nyid du 'du bar gsungs pa las/_de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba dang*/_mthun pa'i phyogs sgrub pa ste/_de dag gi spang blang mtha' dag pa ni/_'dir rgyal srid kyi bya ba'i khur lci bas tshul bzhin du 'grub par dka' ba ltar mchis na'ang*/_
[\[212a.5\]]gzhan don dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas chen po mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_de'i go 'phang dam pa mngon par 'dod pa'i smon pa'i sems pa mi gtong ba'i thabs la ci nus su 'bad pa lhur byed pa nyid do/_/slar yang de'i steng du rje btsun 
[\[212a.6\]]dam pa de nyid sdom pa sum ldan gyi bla mar gsol ba'i phyir/_rje btsun rin po ches/_de tsam gyis kyang blo gros ma khengs shing*/_/blo chen sbyangs pa zab mo dag la mos/_/rdo rje 'chang chen myur du thob 'dod pa/_/de la rdo rje theg pa sbyin par bya/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[212a.7\]]pa ltar spyir zab mo sngags kyi sdom pa la mchog tu mos pa dang*/_bye brag tu rje btsun sa skya pa la zab cing rgya che ba'i gdams pa rgya mtsho tsam mnga'/_de'i nang nas kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i nyams len du gyur pa gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]bcas pa'i gdams ngag ste/_de'i rtsa bar gyur pa dpal kye rdo rje man ngag lugs zhes yongs su grags pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur ba dang*/_de'i man ngag zab mo rnams dang bcas pa bzhugs te/_de nyid legs par zhus te bdag dang gzhan gyi 
[\[212b.2\]]re ba'i snying po grub par bgyi'o/_/mir skyes pa'ang don dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/ngan 'gro'i sgo dgag par bgyi'o/_/sgrib pa kun gyi dgra tshogs gzhom par bgyi'o/_/sdom pa gsum ldan gyi rgyal por bgyi'o/_/lam gyi rgyal srid chen po yang bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[212b.3\]]yan lag bdun ldan gyi nor bu'i 'byor pa thob par bgyi'o/_/phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i 'khor lo rgyun mi chad par bskor bar bgyi'o zhes rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas sngar gyi sdom pa gnyis po'i bka' drin legs par mnos pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa/_'phags 
[\[212b.4\]]yul gyi grub pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa/_dpal mthu stobs kyi mgon po bir+Wa pa nyid dang*/_mtshan don gnyis ka logs na dmigs su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po de la gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du/_rdo rje slob dpon chen 
[\[212b.5\]]po'i las su 'os pa'i slob ma rjes su bzung ba dang*/_zhag bdun phrag gcig tu lhag pa'i lha'i bsnyen pa kha gso ba dang bcas pa dgos pa rnams sngon du btang ngo*/_/de las grol ba na rje btsun kun dga' bzang pos gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 
[\[212b.6\]]ba'i dus nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi legs par bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gi khang pa khyad par can der/_rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dpal ldan dges pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra ba'i cho ga'i gzhi chen po brgyad 
[\[212b.7\]]dang ldan par dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur te/_slob ma'i rten dkyil 'khor bzhi/_sku bzhi/_ye shes lnga ldan gyi 'bras bu myur du 'grub pa'i skal ba can du smin par mdzad do/_/slar yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis rdo rje'i tshig rkang las/_lam gyi thun bzhi la dbang 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bzhi blangs pas bde chen gyi sgrib pa 'gags te 'tshang rgya ba bshad rgyud ces gsungs pa ltar rdo rje slob dpon gyi zab mo lus kyi dkyil 'khor du lam dus kyi dbang gi chu bo chen po ma nub par bskur ba de dag gi skabs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas lung dang*/_yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas 
[\[213a.2\]]lung dang bcas pa/_gsang dbang gi lam gyi sngon 'gror rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma'i sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor dang*/_bla ma'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor du byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams par bskur ba dang bcas pa legs par stsal to/_/de dag dang rjes su 'brel par/_rtsa ba'i rgyud 
[\[213a.3\]]las/_'di ni 'khor ba zhes bya ste/_/de nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid/_/'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin du 'khor 'das gnyis su med pa'i lta ba zab mo'i rgya dang ma bral ba'i phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang nang bskyed pa'i rim 
[\[213a.4\]]pa dang*/_zab mo rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste/_dbang bzhi po gang dang gang yin pa de dang de'i lam gang yin pa dang*/_lta ba gang yin pa dang*/_grub pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang*/_'da' ka ma'i gdams pa gang yin pa dang*/_bar do'i gdams pa gang yin pa dang bcas pa'i nyams khrid rgyas par 
[\[213a.5\]]mnos so/_/de dag dang 'brel par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid byin gyis brlabs pa dang bcas pa dang*/_lam zab nang gi bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_bla ma rin chen 'byung ldan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_phyi'i bar chad srung 
[\[213a.6\]]ba'i thabs su rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi srung ba thun mong ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_nang gi bar chad srung ba'i thabs su dbang bzhi'i brda don gyi man ngag chig brgyud ma dang*/_thun mong gi bar chad srung ba la phan 'dogs pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa bir+Wa pa'i lugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_mtshan par 
[\[213a.7\]]bya ba gsung ngag rin po che'i lam thams cad mtshon par byed pa bir+Wa pa'i srung ba thun mong ma yin pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bye brag tu gyur pa tshar gsum khug pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yan lag dang bcas pa rnams legs par mnos so/_/de rnams kyi rgyab brten tshad ma 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bzhi dang rjes su 'brel ba'i yi ge rnams kyi lung gsan pa la/_thog mar bstan bcos rdo rje'i tshig rkang la rje btsun sa skya pa chen pos rnam 'grel bcu gcig mdzad pa la/_de'i nang nas tshig nyung la don rgyas pa rnam 'grel gnyags ma yig chung dang bcas pa la/_deng sang lam 'bras glegs 
[\[213b.2\]]bam zhes mtshan du grags pa tshang rgyas su gsan pa'i rnam grangs ni/_rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang*/_de'i bsdus don/_kun gzhi rgyu rgyud gdan sogs/_lam la sogs pa chos nyi shu la/_lus kyi dkyil 'khor/_bum dbang gi 'da' ka ma'i skabs su 'chi ltas 'khrul 'khor 'chi bslu 
[\[213b.3\]]dang bcas pa/_bum dbang gi snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' ka ma/_gsang dbang gi skabs su thig le'i rnal 'byor bzhi/_shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid/_dbang bzhi pa'i 'da' ka ma bum dbang gi thun mong du yi ges sgo dgag pa dang bcas pa/_bar do bzhi'i gdams ngag_/lam dus kyi 
[\[213b.4\]]dbang*/_tshad ma bzhi/_gdams ngag drug_/rten 'brel lnga/_grib sel gyi sbyin sreg bsdus pa/_grib ma khrus kyis sel ba dang*/_sAts+tshas sel ba dang*/_thig le bsrung ba dang*/_yi ge brgya pa'i 'don thabs/_'jig rten pa'i lam gyi skabs su rlung gi sbyor ba bdun gyi lam khrid pa/_b+ha 
[\[213b.5\]]ga'i yi ge bcu bzhi/_'das pa'i lam la gsang dbang gi skabs su 'khor bzhi'i rgya/_bzhi pa'i skabs su dbang phyug gi don brgyad/_sa bcu gsum pa'i phyed kyi mngon rtogs/_de thams cad kyi don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/_de dag la 'phros pa las/_kun gzhi rgyu rgyud 
[\[213b.6\]]la 'phros nas 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi lta ba rtsa 'grel gnyis/_gdan sogs la 'phros nas dbang gi chu bo ma nub par bskur ba ste/_de la'ang dbang bzhi'i cho ga mtha' dag mdor bsdus pa man ngag gi gnad/mchog dbang gsum grol lam la brten nas bskur ba/_lam sogs 
[\[213b.7\]]nyi shu la 'phros nas phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_dam tshig la 'phros nas bdud rtsi ril bu bsgrub pa/_byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa/_srung ba sum cu dang man ngag gi gnad bdun cu la 'phros nas gegs sel lo/_/de la yi ge bzhi ste/_bsam gtan 'dor 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]ba'i 'phrang bdun/_byung rgyal du mi btang ba'i gnad bzhi/_'byung ba lus 'khrugs rlung dang spyod lam gyis bsal ba/_rnal 'byor gyi phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis dang*/_las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun te lam rgyas pa dang*/_rtsa ba med pa'i lam 'bring po dang*/_
[\[214a.2\]]rang gi gzhung cung zad yod pa bsgrub pa'i lung sbyin pa lam bsdus pa ste/_de ltar na lam rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum dang*/_lam de dag rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs pas rtogs tshad bskyed pa'i phyir lam gyi gzhung shing bzhi dang*/_rtogs pa bskyed pa'i chos lnga yod do/_/gzhung 
[\[214a.3\]]shing chen po bzhi ni/_gang zag gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkri ba'i gzhung shing*/_man ngag gi gnad drug gis bkri ba'i gzhung shing*/_brtson 'grus can man ngag gi gnad bcu gcig gis bkri ba'i gzhung shing*/_gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gsum du bkri ba'i gzhung shing ngo*/_/rtogs pa 
[\[214a.4\]]bskyed pa'i chos lnga ni/_lam 'jug ldog_phyag rgya 'jug ldog_shes pas phan 'dogs pa'i man ngag bdun/_lam bsre ba 'gros bzhi dang bcas pa/_phyi nang gi mdzad pa bcu gnyis/_rtogs pa bskyed pa'i dpe chung la/_'chi ltas kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis/_rtsa'i dpe chung*/_b+ha 
[\[214a.5\]]ga'i yi ge bcu bzhi'i dpe chung*/_gegs sel gzhan gyi dpe chung rnams ni gang zag tha ma'i lam gyi man ngag yin la/_'bring gi lam dam tshig dang sdom pa ni de dag gi gseb tshags su 'du'o/_/gang zag rab kyi man ngag bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi yi ge'o/_/de thams cad kyi rgyab brten 
[\[214a.6\]]lung 'di nyid dang mdor bsdus te sbyar ba dang*/_zhib tu sbyar ba dang*/_lung mtha' dag dang mdor bsdus te sbyar ba dang*/_bla ma rgya bod kyi lo rgyus rnams legs par gsan no/_/man ngag phra mo'i rkang grangs rnams rje btsun kun dga' dbang phyug pas phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa po sti rmar 
[\[214a.7\]]btus sam rmar chung du grags pa kha skong dang bcas pa gsan pa'i rnam grangs la/_thog mar bla ma tshad ma'i skabs su bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs rje pas mdzad pa/_de'i kha skong shar pas mdzad pa/_sa bir mjal ba'i lo rgyus rje pas rga theng la gnang ba rnams so/_/nyams myong 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]tshad ma'i skabs su gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkri ba'i khrid yig rje pas bra ston la gnang ba/_smin byed kyi skabs su sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnal 'byor dang*/_aSh+Ta'i bzlas lung sa chen gyis mdzad pa/_aSh+Ta'i gzhi bshad sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_bdud rtsi ril bu'i sgrub thabs 'phags pas 
[\[214b.2\]]mdzad pa/_dbang gi rab dbye rje pa'i gsung las zhang btsun gyis bris pa/_rje pas rga ston la springs pa/_phyi nang gsang gsum gyi maN+Dal sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_de'i kha skong shar chen gyis mdzad pa/_lus sbyong nyi shu pa nor bzang gis mdzad pa/_lus gnad kyi man ngag 
[\[214b.3\]]dmar gyis mdzad pa/_bdag med ma'i byin rlabs rje pas mdzad pa/_gtum mo 'khor lo bzhi pa/_gtum mo'i dmigs pa nyi shu rtsa dgu/_gegs sel gsang bdun ma/_bar chad gsum sel/_bka' rgya ma/_nyams che chung*/_gleng gzhi ma/_rlung rengs lnga bcos pa sogs/_
[\[214b.4\]]'byung ba lus 'khrugs sogs sel ba/_gegs sel gyi yi ge bzhi'i gsal byed rnams sa chen gyi gsung sgros yi ge rnying pa/_phrin las so gnyis kyi sdom tshig dang de'i zhal shes bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad pa/_dbang bzhi ngo sprod rtsa 'grel sa chen gyis mdzad pa/_brda don gsal ba 
[\[214b.5\]]rtsa 'grel sa paN gyis mdzad pa la lho pas zin bris byas pa rnams so/_/bstan bcos tshad ma'i skabs su gnad du che ba drug gi yig rnying*/_rten 'brel lnga sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_lam bsdus pa dmar gyis mdzad pa/_phyag chen gyi dbye ba sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_tshogs 
[\[214b.6\]]sbyor gyi mngon rtogs 'phags pas mdzad pa/_'khor bzhi'i rgya sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_lam bsdus pa'i bshad pa sa chen gyis mdzad pa/_sgrub pa lung sbyin sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_gsang ba bcu'i rgyas gdab sa chen gyis mdzad pa/_lung tshad ma la/_lung 'di 
[\[214b.7\]]nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba rje btsun rtse mos mdzad pa/_de'i gsal byed kyi yi ge gcig dang bcas pa rnams so/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis sa chen la gnang ba'i zab chos bzhir grags pa la/_lam zab kyi khrid yig sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_bla ma rin chen 'byung 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ldan dmar gyis mdzad pa/_lam sbas bshad sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_pho brang lnga'i sbas bshad yi ge rnying pa/_sbas bshad kyi 'khrul 'khor rtsa 'grel dpal ldan pas mdzad pa/_grub chen bcu dang phra mo brgyad kyi rtsa 'grel sa paN gyis mdzad 
[\[215a.2\]]pa/_gsal byed bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad pa/_bir srung gi man ngag rnying pa gsum/_bir srung gi man ngag byin rlabs byed tshul dang bcas pa 'phags pas mdzad pa/_rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs byed tshul gyi yi ge rnying pa/_gzungs kyi mchan dang de'i gsal 
[\[215a.3\]]byed sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_de'i lag len rigs 'dzin grags kyis mdzad pa rnams so/_/man ngag zur pa la/_tshar gsum khug pa rje pas mdzad pa/_yi ge brgya pa'i gdams ngag gi yi ge rnying pa/_sgo drug chos 'brel du grags pa la/_shAn+ti pa'i mdo rgyud 
[\[215a.4\]]bsre ba/_shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa dang*/_dz+nyA na shrI dang*/_rin chen rdo rje gsum gyi bar chad gsum sel/_ngag dbang grags pa'i gnyug ma dran gsal/_nA ro pa'i sdug bsngal gsum sel rnams so/_/de rnams kyi kha skong rje bla ma yab sras kyis 
[\[215a.5\]]mdzad pa la/_bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i lam 'bras bshad thabs kyi man ngag gsang ba'i sgo 'byed/_khrid yig tshigs bcad ma'i sa bcad/_lam zab nang gi bla ma'i rnal 'byor/_rgyu dus kyi dbang gis rtogs pa bskyed pa/_bir srung bar chad kun sel/
[\[215a.6\]]sku'i rnam 'gyur drug gi zin bris/_bir srung thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul/_de nyams su blang tshul/_de dang lam 'bras mtshon bya mtshon byed du sbyar ba/_bir srung gsar pa rnams so/_/bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam par thar pa thor bu ba gsan pa'i rnam grangs ni/_rje 
[\[215a.7\]]sa chen gyi rnam thar dang*/_rje btsun rtse mo'i rnam thar bstod pa mchan bu dang bcas pa rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/_rje btsun pa'i rnam thar chos rje pas mdzad pa/_rnam thar mnal lam ma sbal ston gyis bris pa/_chos rje pa'i rnam thar lho pa kun mkhyen gyis mdzad pa/_rnam thar 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gsung sgros ma bla ma rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa/_'phags pa'i rnam thar ye chen pos mdzad pa/_tshogs nyan gnyis kyi rnam thar bar ston gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud pa'i lo rgyus las btus pa/_nyan chen pa'i rnam thar dkar po grags pas mdzad pa/_zhang pa'i rnam thar dpal ldan pas mdzad pa/
[\[215b.2\]]brag phug pa'i rnam thar ri khrod pas mdzad pa/_chos rje bla ma dang ri khrod pa'i rnam thar dpal ldan pas mdzad pa/_dkar po brag pa'i rnam thar rang gis mdzad pa/_dpal ldan pa'i rnam thar mus chen pas mdzad pa/_bud+d+ha ba'i rnam thar bla ma rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa/_chos 
[\[215b.3\]]rje shar pa'i rnam thar dad pa rgyas byed ngor chen gyis mdzad pa/_rdo rje 'chang gi rnam thar kha skong dang bcas pa mus chen gyis mdzad pa/_rnam thar dngos grub dbang gi rgyal po gu ge paN chen gyis mdzad pa/_de gnyis ka'i don bsdus pa legs bshad chu bo 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho sangs 
[\[215b.4\]]rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa/_mus chen gyi rnam thar gsung sgros ma gung rus mdzad pa/_rnam thar ngo mtshar chu rgyun kha skong dang bcas pa kun mkhyen gyis mdzad pa/_rje kun dbang pa'i rnam thar rin po che'i phreng ba mkhan chen legs 'byung gis mdzad pa/_mkhas grub dpal 
[\[215b.5\]]rdor ba'i rnam thar mi nyag paN chen gyis mdzad pa/_kun mkhyen gyi rnam thar rje sangs rgyas rin chen pa dang glo bo mkhan chen pa dang bya btang kun dga' mchog ldan pa rnams kyis mdzad pa/_rje 'dren mchog gi rnam thar yon tan mtha' yas pa rje sangs rgyas rin chen pas mdzad pa/_
[\[215b.6\]]rnam thar ngo mtshar snang ba'i nyin byed rje dkon mchog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa/_rje sangs rin pa'i rnam thar dge legs rin po che'i gter kha skong dang bcas pa sa skya lo tsA bas mdzad pa/_de'i rnam thar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi yon tan rnam par bkod pa rje dkon mchog lhun grub 
[\[215b.7\]]pas mdzad pa/_dkon mchog lhun grub kyi rnam thar 'dod dgu dpal 'byung gi 'grel pa dkon mchog dpal ldan gyis mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam thar dad pa'i me tog gi phreng ba nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa/_brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang gi rnam thar kha 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]skong dang bcas pa/_byams pa kun dga' bkra shis kyi rnam thar ye shes glu dbyangs zhes bya ba dang*/_dpal ldan don grub kyi rnam thar dad pa'i gsal 'debs zhes bya ba gnyis ngag dbang brtan pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_nam mkha' dpal bzang gi rnam 
[\[216a.2\]]thar byin rlabs chu rgyun sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa/_shes rab 'byung gnas kyi rnam thar dge legs ngo mtshar lhun po ngag dbang bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/_ngag dbang bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa/_bsod 
[\[216a.3\]]nams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar yon tan rgya mtsho lhun grub dpal ldan gyis mdzad pa/_dpal mchog rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar dad pa'i gsal 'debs dang lhun grub dpal ldan gyi rnam thar legs byas dpal gyi dga' ston gnyis sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa/_sangs 
[\[216a.4\]]rgyas phun tshogs kyi rnam thar nges 'byung gtam gyi rol mtsho rang nyid kyis mdzad pa rnams kyi lung mnos so/_/gzhan yang snang ba gsum gyi skabs snga chos su/_chos spyod pusti dngos kyi rkang grangs ni/_dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo/_nye ba 'khor gyis zhus 
[\[216a.5\]]pa'i mdo las byung ba'i phung po gsum pa'i mdo/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po la mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas bstod pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad par grags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa mgon po byams pas mdzad pa mdo sde rgyan las byung ba/_thub dbang dang rgyan 
[\[216a.6\]]drug mchog gnyis sogs la bstod pa 'phags pas mdzad pa 'dogs 'brel dang bcas pa/_mkhan po bod+d+hi satwa dang*/_chos rgyal mes dbon/_lo paN rnams la thun mong du bstod pa rnams chos rje bla ma dam pas mdzad pa'i rgyal rabs gsal ba'i me long gi mchod brjod 
[\[216a.7\]]du mdzad pa rnams dang*/_jo bo yab sras kyi bstod pa sh+lau ka re re/_jo bo'i bstod pa phun tshogs b+hang+ga la nas 'byung ba/_sa chen gyis rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso 'khor lnga mngon sum du zhal gzigs pa'i dus su mdzad pa'i bstod pa a la la ste zhes bya ba yod pa/_sa paN gyis 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]mdzad pa'i bir+Wa pa'i bstod pa/_rje sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying po'i bstod pa slob dpon bsod nams rtse mos mdzad pa nas 'byung ste/_mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos skyong pa'i bar gyi lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag gi bla ma brgyud pa rnams kyi bstod pa rgyas bsdus ji snyed 
[\[216b.2\]]bzhugs pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang rgyud gsum man ngag dang bcas pa'i bla ma brgyud pa la gsol ba 'debs pa kun khyab 'khor lo ma rje dkon mchog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa kha skong dang bcas pa/_zhen pa bzhi bral gyi brgyud 'debs rje rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa kha skong dang bcas pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[216b.3\]]mtshan brjod lo chen rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_shes rab blo 'phel gyi gzungs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po bam po gcig pa/_rnam rgyal gyi gzungs/_bstod pa 'chi med dpal sbyin ma rje rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa/_lam 'bras phyag mchod chen mo 'phags pas mdzad 
[\[216b.4\]]pa/_kha skong shar pa dang rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis mdzad pa'i tshigs bcad thor bu ba rnams dang bcas pa/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/_snang ba mtha' yas kyi sgom don la brten pa'i 'pho ba sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_de'i bsdus don tshigs su bcad pa sa paN gyis 
[\[216b.5\]]mdzad pa/_bde ba can gyi smon lam mi mjed zhing ma kun mkhyen gyis mdzad pa/_byams pa'i smon lam/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi smon lam/_sgrol ma'i phyag 'tshal nyer gcig phan yon dang bcas pa/_yan lag bdun pa dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa/_'dod don 
[\[216b.6\]]gsol gdab rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/_nyin zhi mtshan khro'i sgom bzlas glo bo mkhan chen pas mdzad pa/_yang zhi khro'i 'don thabs gsal ba gcig_sdud pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo dang*/_phung po gsum pa 'don pa'i thabs sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_
[\[216b.7\]]'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'don pa'i thabs rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/_gsung ngag bla ma brgyud pa'i mchod chog gi tho yig kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges mdzad pa/_bla ma dam pa la thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa gang drin ma sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]thun mong ba'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa sku'i spyod pa ma sa paN gyis mdzad pa/_bla ma dam pa la maN+Dal 'bul ba'i tshul dang*/_phyogs bcu dus gsum ma dang thos pa rgya mtsho ma rnams 'phags pas mdzad pa/_mdo sgrub mchims kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[217a.2\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom brgyud kyi gsol 'debs brang ti pas mdzad pa/_yon sbyong ba'i gzungs/_rje ngor chen pas mdzad pa'i 'gro la phan bde skyid ma'i bar paN chen gyis thar rtser bsgrigs pa kha skong cung zad dang bcas pa'i phyag dpe'i steng nas so/_/gzhan yang rje btsun dam pa de 
[\[217a.3\]]nyid kyi drung nas/_skabs 'di dag dang gzhan du'ang rung ste dbang bskur ba dang*/_byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_rjes su gnang ba rnams ji ltar gsan pa'i rnam grangs ni/_slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis bkral ba'i gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i dkyil 
[\[217a.4\]]'khor du dbang bskur ba/_rwa lo tsA ba'i lugs kyi rdo rje 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/_slob dpon dze tA ris bkral ba'i tshe dpag tu med pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/_dpal ldan nA ro pa'i thugs bcud kyi gdams pa'i 
[\[217a.5\]]nying khu rje btsun sa skya pa la bka' bab pa'i rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dbang bzhi byin rlabs kyi tshul du bskur ba sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_rgyal chen in+d+ra b+hU ti'i lugs kyi phag mo zhal gnyis ma'i byin gyis brlabs pa/_grub chen mai tri pa'i lugs kyi phag mo 
[\[217a.6\]]rig pa 'dzin ma rtsen ma'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs la khyad par du bsngags pa dmar mo skor gsum mo/_/kye rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa la brten pa rgyal po lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa la rje btsun ma nyid kyis dngos su byin 
[\[217a.7\]]gyis brlabs shing legs par gdams pa/_rje btsun ku ru kul+le dpa' bo gcig pa'i rjes gnang rang byin rlabs kyi man ngag dang bcas pa/_kag chol 'dod pa'i rgyal po yab yum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zab mo/_dpal tshogs kyi bdag po'i rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa ste 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]las rgyas pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la mchog tu bsngags pa dmar po skor gsum mo/_/grub chen dze tA ri nas ba ri lo tsA ba sogs la brgyud pa/_rje sa skya pa chen po sogs la zhal gzigs kho nar byung ba'i 'jam dpal a ra pa tsa na dmar ser gyi rjes su gnang ba/_dpal ye 
[\[217b.2\]]shes yon tan bzang po'i bstod sgrub kyi rig pa gtad pa/_paN+Di ta ma ti'i lugs kyi 'jam dpal dkar po/_paN+Di ta gser gdugs can nas brgyud pa'i 'jam dpal dkar po/_rje btsun sa skya pa'i gser chos kyi 'jam dpal nag po'i byin rlabs zab mo/_grub chen me tra dzo ki 
[\[217b.3\]]nas brgyud pa'i tshe dpag tu med pa dkar po/_ba ri ba'i lugs kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu/_slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i 'chi bdag bslu ba'i rtog pa las byung ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo yid bzhin 'khor lo/_mnyam med jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i khro 
[\[217b.4\]]bo sme ba brtsegs pa ljang nag_/rje btsun sa skya pa'i lugs kyi sme brtsegs dud kha/_khro mo sme brtsegs/_sa lugs kyi spyan ras gzigs gtso 'khor gsum pa/_dpal mo lugs kyi spyan ras gzigs bcu gcig zhal/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga pa/_bka' 
[\[217b.5\]]gdams pa'i lugs kyi thub pa dang*/_spyan ras gzigs dang*/_mi g.yo ba dang*/_rje btsun sgrol ma ste lha bzhir grags pa/_bla ma gnyen gyi thugs dam sgrol ma yan lag bzhi pa gzungs kyi lung blang ba dang bcas pa/_jo bo rje'i lugs kyi sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig_/yang 
[\[217b.6\]]sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig stabs gcig tu 'byung ba'i rjes gnang*/_grub chen nyi ma sbas pa'i lugs kyi sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig_/rdo rje gur las brten pa'i dam pa thams cad 'dren pa 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes bkral ba'i khro bo 'byung po 'dul byed/_bla chen shAkya dpal ba'i lugs kyi 'byung po 
[\[217b.7\]]'dul byed me dbang can/_mkhas pa chen po don yod rdo rje nas brgyud pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po/_rwa lo tsA ba'i lugs kyi rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag gnyis pa/_mnga' bdag nyang ral chen po'i lugs kyi gu ru drag po dmar po me'i phreng ba can/_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba rgyal 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]mtshan pa'i lugs kyi rta mgrin nag po lcags ral can/_dbon ston skyer sgang pa la rmi lam du slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis gnang ba dang gter nas brgyud pa zung 'brel gyi rta mgrin dmar po/_krI ya sa muts+tsha'i dgongs pa dang mthun par mdzad pa'i gza' 
[\[218a.2\]]thams cad kyi yum rje btsun rig pa chen mo gtso 'khor bcu bzhi pa/_rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las brten pa'i lha mo nor rgyun ma gtso rkyang*/_ba ri ba'i lugs kyi rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rjes gnang bkru byab bsrung ba dang bcas pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje nas brgyud pa'i ri khrod lo ma 
[\[218a.3\]]can/_rje btsun mi g.yo ba sngon po dang dkar po gnyis/_rigs ldan chos kyi rgyal po nas brgyud pa'i rdo rje khyung khra/_sa skya pa'i thugs rtsis che ba'i chos skor gyi nang tshan mkha' lding gser mig 'khyil pa/_slob dpon chen po pad+ma nas brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi bya khyung dmar po 
[\[218a.4\]]rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba dang*/_ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo'i lugs kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i tshe 'dzab la brten pa'i tshe dbang zab mo/_grub pa'i dbang phyug thang stong rgyal po'i lugs kyi zab gter dag snang chu bo nyis 'dres kyi tshe dbang zab mo/_rig 'dzin chen po rgod ldem 
[\[218a.5\]]pa'i zab gter lugs kyi tshe dbang lcags kyi sdong bu can rnams dang*/_dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud pa'i lugs kyi mgon po dkar po yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang*/_jo bo rje'i lugs kyi dzam+b+ha la dkar po 'brug zhon lha lnga rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba legs par gsan no/_/chos skyong 
[\[218a.6\]]ba'i srung ma rnams kyi skor la/'dzam gling bstan pa'i bdag po dpal sa skya pa la bka' bab pa'i chos skyong ba'i srung ma rgya mtsho tsam gyi nang nas/_bstan srung yongs kyi sde dpon rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po ste/_de la'ang bka' bab rnam pa bzhi bzhugs pa las/_dang po 
[\[218a.7\]]paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra'i lugs srol lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag yongs su rdzogs par thos pa las gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa lam 'bras mgon rkyang gi rjes gnang*/_gnyis pa paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje nas brgyud pa'i mgon po pho rkyang*/_gsum pa shrad+d+hA ka ra 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]warma sogs nas brgyud de bla ma mal lo tsA ba'i lugs su grags pa mgon po lha bcu gnyis ma dang*/_lha brgyad pa dang*/_sa skya pa'i zhal ngo nang brgyud las byung ba'i lha brgyad thun mong ma yin pa/_lcam dral lha gsum rnams dang*/_kha'u brag rdzong pa'i lugs kyi 
[\[218b.2\]]mgon po khro bo bcu dang bcas pa/_ber nag zangs gri can bsnan pa'i gur gyi mgon po lha dgu/_pu tra ming sring rnams kyi zur bka' dang*/_grub thob thang stong rgyal pos shar lho 'jigs byed mun pa tshal gyi dur khrod du zhal gzigs pa'i gur gyi mgon po sprin 
[\[218b.3\]]gseb ma/_rgyal ba gnyis pa ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi bka' srung thun mong ma yin pa shin tu gnyen pa zhing skyong stobs 'phrog dbang po'i sgrub skor las bsnyen dus kyi mgon po zhal bzhi pa/_sgrub dus kyi mgon po zhal khra can/_dkar po tshe 'phel bar byed pa/_ser 
[\[218b.4\]]po bsod nams rgyas par byed pa/_dmar po skye 'gro dbang du byed pa/_sngon po dgra bgegs 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba dang*/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bka' srung thun mong ma yin pa nor skyong dur khrod kyi bdag po yab yum/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs 
[\[218b.5\]]byed kyi bka' sdod thun mong ma yin pa 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje dam can chos kyi rgyal po lha bcu gsum pa/_las kyi gshin rje dpa' bo gcig pa yab yum/_dmar po khrag gi mdog can yab yum/_ma ru tse bzhis bskor ba rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba rnams 
[\[218b.6\]]gsan no/_/gzhan yang mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud la sogs pa nas bstan pa rgya bod kyi mkhas grub chen po rnams kyis legs par bkral ba'i myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i skor la/_mkhas grub khyung po rnal 'byor gyis bla ma mai tri pa dang grub 
[\[218b.7\]]chen rA hu la gnyis las zhus pa'i skor gyi rjes su gnang ba rnams bsdoms pa bcu gsum ste/_de'ang myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i gtor dbang bar chad kun sel/_rjes gnang bar chad kun sel/_dbang bzhi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul du bskur ba/_bla ma mgon po dbyer 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]med kyi skor la/_zhi ba grib sel ba/_rgyas pa bla ma mgon po dbyer med/_mkha' 'gro dbang sdud dang gnad dbab gcig tu byas pa/_gsang sgrub kyi mgon po mtshan kha/_nang sgrub kyi mgon po rgyan can/_mgon po dbang gi rgyal po/_mgon po tshe bdag_/sa ra ha'i 
[\[219a.2\]]mgon po khrag 'thung*/_mgon po lha bzhi dril te sgrub pa/_mgon po dkar po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste bka' bcu gsum mo/_/klu sgrub lugs kyi mgon po phyag bzhi pa lha mang*/_dpal ldan lha mo re wa tI dmag zor rgyal mo/_dpal ldan lha mo dud pa'i sol ba can/_mgon po stag 
[\[219a.3\]]zhon lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa/_gdong bzhi pa'i bka' 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nang nas gnod sbyin chen po zangs kyi beg rtse can lcam dral dang lha mang gnyis/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje nas brgyud pa'i rmugs 'dzin ser nag gnyis rnams so/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i chos skor la rjes 
[\[219a.4\]]su gnang ba lnga phrag lnga tsam bzhugs pa'i thog mar gong gnon du 'gro ba phyag na rdo rje 'gro bzang snying po'i lugs kyi rjes su gnang ba/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dkar po tshe 'phel ba/_rnam thos sras ser chen lha dgu pa/_de dang 'brel pa'i rnam sras drag po/_slob dpon shu rang+ga warma'i 
[\[219a.5\]]lugs kyi rnam thos sras sku mdog mthing ga zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_gar mkhan mchog sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum phyag bco brgyad pa lha brgyad dang ldan pa/_gar mkhan mchog sku mdog dmar smug zhal gsum phyag bco brgyad pa/_dregs byed seng ge'i bzhon pa can klu brgyad 
[\[219a.6\]]kyis bskor ba/_seng ge'i bzhon pa med pa'i dregs byed klu brgyad kyis bskor ba/_drag po yang gsang srin po bzhis bskor ba/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis sprang po nyi ma'i dngos grub bsgral ba'i lo rgyus can gyi rgyal po chen po rta sngon can sku mdog mthing nag bdud mo bzhis bskor 
[\[219a.7\]]ba/_rnam thos sras nang ma mo ltar sgrub pa lha dgu pa/_yang gsang mdung dmar can phyag bzhi pa/_rnam thos sras dmar po las mkhan mdung dmar can/_gsang ba gshin rje ltar sgrub pa lha bcu gsum/_rnam thos sras ljang yul ma'am sprin gseb mar grags pa'i ser 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]chen lha dgu/_rnam thos sras ljang ser be con can dang bcas pa ste bka' bco lnga rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba rnams gsan no/_/gzhan yang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la 'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba/_khams gsum gyi skye 'gro ma lus pa bdag 
[\[219b.2\]]gir mdzad pa'i mkhan chen 'jam pa'i dbyangs bsod nams bzang po bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa dang*/_mkhan chen thams cad gzigs pa nam mkha' bsam grub bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po ste/_yongs rdzogs chos kyi rgyal po chen 
[\[219b.3\]]po rnam pa gnyis las bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang*/_ku ru kul+le lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang*/_bka'i gnang ba shin tu zab pa 'ga' zhig mnos so/_/de ltar legs par thos pa'i chos don mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_nyin zhag phrugs rer ngor pa'i lugs 
[\[219b.4\]]kyi rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi gtor ma dang bcas pas mtshon te/_dngos grub zung gi 'byung gnas lhag pa'i lha'i bsgom bzlas ma chag par nyams su bstar bar mdzad do/_/de ltar na sdom brtson bla ma chen po 'di'i dgongs bzhed kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[219b.5\]]gnyen bdag nyid che ba/_mthu che ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_brtul zhugs grub pa/_mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/_ring nas bsgrubs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang po la dbang 'byor ba dam pa'i pha rol du son pa rnams ni legs par mjal lo/_/bstan pa dam pa'i snying po sdom pa gsum gyi 
[\[219b.6\]]'byor ba ni rgyas par thob bo/_/su zhig gis thos na phan yon che ba'i chos kyi bag chags bzang po ci rigs pa ni rgyud la bzhag go_/bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon rma med pa ni ci yang bzung ngo*/_/zang zing gi dngos po rnams ni bar ma dor ma yin par dkon mchog mchod pa dang dge 'dun bsnyen bkur 
[\[219b.7\]]bgyis pa'i ched du ni legs par thong ngo*/_/drin lan blan par dka' ba'i pha mes su gtogs pa 'di nas mi snang bar gyur pa rnams kyi thugs dgongs rgya chen po ni yongs su rdzogs par bgyis so/_/da ltar zhal bzhugs pa rang nyid gnyen 'dun du 'brel ba ltos dang bcas pa'i rgyud la'ang 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]dge ba'i sdong po ni rab tu brtan par btsugs so/_/'khor du 'dus shing rjes su lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyang la la ni skyabs su 'gro bar bskul/_la la ni shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar bskul/_phal cher ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[220a.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bskul/_la la ni gsang sngags dang rig sngags 'chang ba'i skal ldan du bskul te bzhag go_/thugs rjer ldan pa gang gi mnga' 'og tu 'khod cing bde ba'i grib mar spyod pa rnams kyis mtshon te/_yangs pa'i rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba dpya dang zang zing gi 
[\[220a.3\]]'bul ba'i 'brel pa yod dgu thams cad kyang*/_nam zhig dge ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 'di yongs su gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag kyang gzhar yang 'dzad du med pa'i rang bzhin du byas so/_/chos dang mthun par spyod pa'i dam pa rnams kyi dge ba'i grags pa dkar po dag 
[\[220a.4\]]kyang mi nub par rtag tu brtan pa/_skye dgu rnams kyi thos pa 'dzin pa'i rgyan du bkod de/_mdor na ji ltar bzhed pa'i snying po ma lus pa legs par grub nas/_slar yang khams phyogs su 'byon pa'i dgongs pa gtad de/_de dag gi nyer bsdogs ji ltar 'os pa rnams brtsams so/_/
[\[220a.5\]]de nas snron gyi zla ba'i gza' tshes dge bar sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po sku 'khor gyi tshogs chen po rnams dang bcas pa'i chibs kyi gdong bsgyur te/_dper na nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa dmar ser mtshams kyi sprin phung gzhon nu rab tu 'khrigs pa dang lhan cig tu 
[\[220a.6\]]'grogs pa'am/_dzam+bu gser gyi ri bo sin+d+hu wA ra'i chu gter chen po dang mnyam du 'grogs nas 'gro shes pa bzhin du rim gyis byon nas lha sar phebs so/_/de na gzhung sa chen po mchod yon nyi zla zung 'brel lta bur bzhugs pa la zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mjal ba dang stabs su ji 
[\[220a.7\]]ltar yid la byas pa'i chos kyi tshul rnams legs par thos pa'i tshul dang*/_bdog pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po rnams kyang gegs med pa nyid du dge ba'i rtsa bar yongs su gtong grub pa'i tshul rnams rgyas par snyan dbang du gsol lo/_/de dag nas kyang legs byas kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul las 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]brtsams pa'i legs so'i mchid kyi me tog u dum+bA ra'i phreng ba lta bu dag spyi bo'i rgyan du stsal ba dang*/_bsngags bkur mngon par mtho ba'i khri la bzhag ste dga' ston dang gtang rag gi skyes gnang rgya che zhing dpangs mi dman pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i dpal dang longs spyod kyi 
[\[220b.2\]]ngo mtshar la yang co 'drir byed snyam pa dag brtsegs te/_skye bo kun gyi mig dang rna ba'i dga' ston bla na med pa nyid du legs par stsal to/_/'di dag gi skabs shig tu khams nas mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa de nyid zhing khams 
[\[220b.3\]]gzhan gyi 'gro don la gshegs pa'i gtam gyi tsher ma rnon po thogs pa'i pho nya zhig gis slebs so/_/de skad snyan du gsol ba'i mod la/_sdom brtson sa gzhi skyong ba chen po nyid ni yongs 'dzin chen po de dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyi me zhags reg bya shin tu tsha ba'i rang bzhin can gyis/_blo gros 
[\[220b.4\]]kyi chu gter ni kun nas yongs su bskol/_'dren pa mchog gi zhal bzang dngos su mjal ba'i skal ba ni nyams so zhes gsung mchid snyan pa ma yin pa'i chu rlabs kyi phreng ba rnams ni rang 'byung bar gyur/_mu tig gi 'od zer ring du 'phro ba'i tshems kyi ge sar rnams kyang mchu'i sgrib byed zung 
[\[220b.5\]]gis 'gebs par byed/_rnam par dpyod pa'i skyes bu gzhon nu de yang ci bya gtol med kyi thang la ring zhig 'phyan pa'i ngal ba ci yang ston par gyur to/_/der cung zad cig nas 'di ltar sems par byed de/_kye ma 'jig rten gyi bya ba gzhan gyis ngal ba la sogs pa'i gdung ba dag ni yongs su 
[\[220b.6\]]bsal bar bla'i/_yongs 'dzin dam pa dang bral ba'i gdung ba shin tu tsha ba'i rang bzhin can 'di ni/_ston mtshan zla ba rgyas pa stong gi 'od kyi thigs pa dag gis yongs su bran kyang 'gog tu med cing*/_ma la ya'i nags tshal stug po bskyod pa las nye bar 'phos pa'i dri khyer dal bu dag gis 
[\[220b.7\]]kyang bzlog par bzod pa'i go skabs de ni ci zhig_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i rgyal tshab kyi skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po pa'i lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal srid kyi 'byor pa bla na med pa la mnga' bsgyur ba'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po zhig bla'i 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]mchod gnas su thob par gyur na yongs su bsal bar nus so/_/de'i nang nas kyang kho bo cag sdom pa gsum gyi bka' drin gzhal du med pas legs par bskyangs pa'i 'dren mchog mtshungs pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po/_chos 
[\[221a.2\]]kyi gru chen po/_smra ba'i ded dpon chen po/_sbyin pa'i gnas chen po/_srid pa'i chu gter skem par mdzad pa/_rmongs pa'i gzebs dral bar mdzad pa/_khro ba'i me lce 'jil bar mdzad pa/_ngan 'gro las 'pho bar mdzad pa/_lam bzang po ston par mdzad pa/_sems can 
[\[221a.3\]]thams cad kyi snying po dam pa/_chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang phyug dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhabs kyi chu skyes gang yin pa de/_rtag par gtsug gi rgyan du bkod pa'i skal ba bzang po de thob par gyur na/_bzod par dka' ba'i 
[\[221a.4\]]gdung ba 'di ni yongs su dbrog par nus so/_/der ma zad bod chen po'i phyogs kyi yul dang yul gru chen po dang*/_grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_grong rdal la sogs par 'khod pa'i skye 'gro thams cad la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba dang*/_spyi dang bye brag gi rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po 
[\[221a.5\]]che'i bshad sgrub kyi phrin las yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang*/_zhar las rang gi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gtan gyi 'dun ma bla na med pa dag kyang 'bad med lhun grub tu 'byung ba ni gdon mi za'o/_/de bas na don de nyid ring por ma yin par 'grub par byed pa'i thabs shig brtsam 
[\[221a.6\]]par bya'o snyam du yang nas yang du yid la byed par gyur to/_/ji tsam zhig na/_lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong bur/_dam pa mang po khas 'che mi byed la/_/gal te dka' bas khas ni blangs gyur na/_/rdo la ri mo bris pa lta bur ni/_/shi yang gzhan du byed par mi 
[\[221a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs pa dang*/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis/_dman pas gang tshe nor ni cung zad rnyed/_/'gro ba thams cad brnyas pa'i nga rgyal ldan/_/dam pa nor gyi 'byor pa thob gyur kyang*/_/sA lu smin pa lta bur shin tu 'du/_/rigs dma' ba yi sems can dag_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]nor ram rag pa rnyed gyur na/_/'gro ba kun la rtswa snyam sems/_/pags pa sngon po'i wa bzhin no/_/nor ram rig par ldan gyur na/_/dman pa rnams ni dregs par 'gyur/_/go 'phang gnyis po de dag gis/_/mkhas pa shin tu dul bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar 
[\[221b.2\]]rang nyid stobs dang rig pa dang nor gyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gis kyang dregs pa mi mnga' zhing*/_shin tu thugs sgam pa/_sgrin por rlom pa mang po dag gis kyang thugs dgongs kyi bzhed pa'i gting phyin par dka' ba bya ba ci dang ci byed pa thams cad kyang dngos dang brgyud pa'i 
[\[221b.3\]]sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa'i rgyu ru 'gyur ba/_bla ma dang dkon mchog la mchog tu gus shing 'dud pa'i bdag nyid can gyi las kho nas/_ji ltar dam bcas pa nyid nam yang mi 'gyur bar byed do/_/de'ang thugs la ji ltar bzhed pa'i don de 'grub par 
[\[221b.4\]]byed pa'i thabs kyi thog mar/_gzhung sa chen po mchod yon zung dang*/_dpal sa skya gong rnams nas dgongs khrol 'ong dgos pa las/_de dag tu ji ltar brnag pa'i don rgyas par gsol ba'i sgo nas dgongs pa zhus pas/_bstan don la dmigs pa'i thugs rgyas mkhan chen 
[\[221b.5\]]khri thog pa nyid khams phyogs su spyan 'dren zhu chog pa'i bka' lung gi gnang bkod yang dag par stsal to/_/de nas rim gyis ngor du mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sku zhabs su/_mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub pa zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i snyan gsan 
[\[221b.6\]]'bul ba dang*/_de'i dgongs rdzogs sngon ma cung zad dang bcas te/_khams phyogs su bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs pas cis kyang 'byon dgos pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa'i nan tan gyi snying po rnams snyan dngags dam pa'i lam nas drangs pa'i gling bu dang bcas te mi sna brdzangs 
[\[221b.7\]]so/_/der rje btsun thugs rje'i bdag nyid can de nyid/_yongs rdzogs chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas mnga' sgyur ba'i skabs yin na'ang*/_dper na sngon dus bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po de nyid 'khor dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]bcas te rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'khor rnam bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs pa na/_de nas dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum brgal ba na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba nas ma ga d+hA bzang mos mu stegs pa rnams dad par bya ba'i ched du bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong 
[\[222a.2\]]khyer chen po'i tshong dpon gyi bu khyu mchog byin gyi khang pa'i yang tog gi steng du mngon par 'dzegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas me tog rnams gtor zhing spos gtul nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[222a.3\]]'das spyan drang ba'i phyir gser gyi bum pa las chu sbreng ba dang bcas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_bdag ni ri dwags dang 'dra bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis te/_dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la rjes su bzung 
[\[222a.4\]]bar mdzad cing*/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsol zhes dang*/yang 'di skad smras te/_tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag_/dad ldan snying po nyan thos che rnams kyis/_/mgon med gyur pa bdag la rjes bzung ba'i/_/don 
[\[222a.5\]]mdzad thugs rjes gshegs par mdzad du gsol/_/zhes gsol ba dang*/_me tog dang*/_spos dang*/_bum pa'i chu yang nam mkha' la 'phags so/_/ji tsam na/_me tog de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas so/_/
[\[222a.6\]]spos kyi dud pa yang sprin brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to/_/de mthong ba dang*/_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa 'di ga las mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kun dga' bo 'di nas dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na 
[\[222a.7\]]bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongs so/_/kun dga' bo grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis bzung ba yin pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims shig ces gsungs nas sang gi gdugs tshod la 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gshegs par gnang ba de bzhin du/_bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas byams pa chen po dang*/_snying rje chen po dang*/_byang chub kyi sems kyi mthus shin tu mnyen par byas pa'i rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob bla na med pa 'di ni/_sems can phra mo zhig gi don du 'gyur na'ang dpag 
[\[222b.2\]]tshad bye ba brgya phrag mang po'i pha rol tu yang gshegs pa la dka' ba'i 'du shes sam mi spro ba mi mnga' na/_'dir skye ba'i phreng ba mang po'i dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phan pa'i smon lam gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i sdom brtson mi'i dbang phyug chen po 'dis 
[\[222b.3\]]mtshon te 'gro ba tshad med cing grangs med pa'i don du 'gyur ba na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na dad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa'i sdom brtson sa bdag chen po'i brtul zhugs bzung ba nyid nas ji ltar gsol ba btab pa'i don bzhin/_ji skad du/_sangs rgyas nyi 
[\[222b.4\]]ma gdul bya yi/_/ri la ji ltar 'os par 'bab/_/ces bya ba dang*/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/ces pa ltar rgyal ba gnyis pa rdo rje 
[\[222b.5\]]'chang gis bskal pa mang po'i gong nas smon lam gyi sa bon bzang po legs par btab pa'i gdul bya'i zhing sa thun mong ma yin pa yod pa'i gnas ni khams phyogs dang*/_de'i nang nas kyang sa phyogs chos ldan gyi rgyal pos bskyangs shing*/_phyi nang gi nyer 'tshe med pa zhes 'byung 
[\[222b.6\]]ba bzhin du rang gi gdul zhing gang du yod pa de dus gsum gzigs pa rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa'am/_rnam par mi rig pa ci yang mi mnga' bas rje btsun dam pa de nyid kyis sde dge'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du bstan pa dar 
[\[222b.7\]]rgyas che ba'i gnas su gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang ring zhig nas der 'byon par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i bka' 'phrin gyi gling bu snyan 'gyur 'bum gyi ro dang ldan pa stsal to/_/ji tsam na mi'i bdag po'i mngags gzhug pa des kyang bka' mchid ji ltar nod pa 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]khyer te 'ongs nas sde dge bla ma zhes pa bsam pa dge ba/_dad pa brtan pa/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de nyid kyi mdun du ji ltar nod pa de ltar phul lo/_/de'i mod la nges dgongs pa/_da ni yongs 'dzin dam pa 
[\[223a.2\]]de nyid mi ring bar rang gi skal bas thob par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o snyam pa'i thugs dges pa las byung ba'i ngo mtshar ni/_dper na yid 'phrog pad+ma'i rdzing bu dag na 'khrungs pa'i 'dab ma brgya pa kha zum pa zhig_nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer gyis yongs su phog 
[\[223a.3\]]pas kha bye bar gyur pa la/_slar yang sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i bung ba gzhon nu dag gis snyan pa'i glu dbyangs len pa la mi spro ba med pa de bzhin du/_yongs 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung gi zegs mas snying la bran pa'i mod la/_mi rje dam pa'i bzhin gyi dkyil 
[\[223a.4\]]'khor dga' ba brgya phrag brtsegs pa'i 'dzum gyi phreng ba gsar pas nye bar phye ba'i zhal sgo nas/_snyan pa'i gdangs su drangs pa'i legs so'i dga' ston gsar pa ci yang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas slar yang khams kyi phyogs su bteg pa'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag 
[\[223a.5\]]ste 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dag dang lhan cig tu/_me lha'i phyogs su chibs kyi gdong bsgyur te rim gyis grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_khang khyim rnams kyis yongs su dben pa'i ri klung dang*/_gnam gyi dum bu sa la lhung ba lta bu'i thang chen po mang po bde bar brgal 
[\[223a.6\]]te byon pas/_ji tsam na bod chen por grags pa'i nor 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po mdo stod 'o ma'i thang zhes bya ba/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po rang gi yab mes su gyur pa/_dman pa min pa'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba/_sde dge sa spyod chen po pa/_
[\[223a.7\]]bsod nams kyi mthu che ba/_dbang che ba/_gzi brjid che ba/_sde dang dpung che ba/_dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/_mthon por 'phags nas dman pa'i mtha' ru nam yang ma lhung ba'i gong ma rim par byon pa rnams kyis dge ba bcu dang rjes su mthun pa'i bka' khrims 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]kyi 'khor lo nam mkha'i lam na mngon par rgyu ba'i grib ma snum po dang ldan pas 'bab stegs su byas shing*/_legs par bsrungs pa'i sa gzhi ga la ba der bde bar byon no/_/der byon pa dang gang gi mched zlar gyur pa'i mi'i bdag po brtse ba'i bdag nyid can rnam pa 
[\[223b.2\]]gnyis dang*/_bka'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'phrul blon chen po rnams gtso bor gyur pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag kyang bsu ba nyid du mngon par lhags par gyur to/_/ji ltar lhags pa de rnams la yang gtam snyan gsar pa me tog gi phreng ba lta bu thos pa 'dzin pa'i rgyan du 
[\[223b.3\]]rung ba ci yang stsal to/_/slar yang rim gyis byon pas sde bzhi'i dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pas yongs su gtams shing dge legs kyi mtshan ma mang po ched du bkram pa ltar/_lhun gyis grub pas kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i sa'i thig le gang yin pa ste/_de 
[\[223b.4\]]nyid mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan dam par gyur pa'i rgyal khab chen po mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de'i nye 'dabs su zla tshes dge ba'i nyin mor byon par gyur to/_/de tsam na rgyal po'i khab kyi pho brang dam pa de'i phyi rol dang*/_steng gi phyogs 
[\[223b.5\]]mtshams kyi kho ra khor yug rnams su rgyal po chen po mig skya'i gan mdzod las blangs ma thag pa lta bu'i gos bzang dang*/_rin po che'i rigs las legs par grub pa'i rgyan gyi rnam pa mang po rnams ni 'di lta ste/_kha dog sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_mdzes 
[\[223b.6\]]pa'i gdugs dang*/_ba dan dkar po dang*/_sngon po dang*/_dmar po dang*/_ser po dang*/_ljang gu dang*/_le brgan dang ldan pa'i phreng ba dag bsgreng ba dang*/_'phan dang*/_gos kyi chun 'phang dang*/_me tog gi phreng ba dang*/_rin po che'i do shal dang*/_dril chung 
[\[223b.7\]]dang*/_g.yer kha'i phreng ba du ma dpyangs pas kun nas mdzes par brgyan te bzhag go_/gzhan yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rwa ba dang*/_khang bzang dang*/_khang phran dang*/_skyed mos tshal rnams kyang legs par brgyan te/_de dag gi steng nas dri zhim po'i spos dang*/_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]lha shing sna tshogs pa dag bsregs pa'i dud sprin gyi phung po bskal pa chags pa'i dus kyi sprin lta bu yang gtul lo/_/de na gdan sa chen po lhun grub steng gi chos grwa chen po zhes/_gang gi grags snyan kA shi ka'i gos bzang dri ma med pa de 
[\[224a.2\]]ni phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi bu mos rang lus mdzes par bklubs pa'i rgyan gyi gtso bo nyid du len pa la nam yang mi spro ba med cing gus pas btud pa snyam byed pa/_rig pa'i gzhung lugs rnam pa lnga la mkhas shing grub pa'i yon tan mang po yang 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po/_sa'i 
[\[224a.3\]]steng na yongs su grags pa mang po'i 'khor los mtshan pa'i zhabs kyis dngos su bcags shing legs par bshad pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi dga' ston nam yang 'dzad pa med pa'i rang bzhin du bkye ba'i gdan sa ste/_de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i sum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bla ma dang 
[\[224a.4\]]slob dpon chen po lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol du son cing*/_'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las kyi snang ba dkar po ring po'i lam du spro ba rnams dang*/_ngur smrig 'chang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag mang po ste/_thams cad kyang phyi tshul zhi 
[\[224a.5\]]zhing dul ba'i spyod lam mdzes pa ni/_sngon dus ston pa'i 'khor gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i rjes su byed cing rjes su slob pa/_skye bo mi srun pa rnams kyi yid kyi dbang po yang dge ba'i lam du bsgyur ba la sha thang ba med pa/_nang du bsgrub par 
[\[224a.6\]]bya ba'i snying po ni gzhan don dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang ste/_de nyid thob pa la rtse gcig tu smin pa dang*/_de la 'jug pa'i sems rin po che dang gzhar yang mi 'bral ba dang*/_de'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnams la yang 
[\[224a.7\]]shin tu gus pa lhur byed pa/khyad par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i nye lam gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i sngags kyi rgyas sgo gsum legs par btab nas/_sa lam gyi yon tan gya nom pa sgrub pa'i thabs la ma rmongs pa'i tshogs rnams ni me tog 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ut+pal dmar po dang*/_ban+du dzI ba ka dang*/_kiM shu dang*/_kar+Ni kA ra dang*/_kung+ku ma'i me tog rnam par bzhad pa'i nags klung stug po gang la la zhig_ser bu yid du 'ong ba dag byung ste dal gyis bskyod pa na mtshar sdug gi ltad mo ci yang 'byung ba de bzhin du thub pa'i gos mchog rnam pa 
[\[224b.2\]]gsum gyis kun nas mdzes par bklubs pa'i ngur smrig gi tshon mdangs gsar pas sa gzhi'i khyon chen po yongs su bkab pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos ser sbreng gi bkod pa mtshar du dngar ba dag rim gyis byon te bsu bar byed do/_/de dag kyang la la ni spang bya mi mthun pa'i 
[\[224b.3\]]phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du/_bkra shis par byed pa'i me tog gi sil ma mang po 'thor bar byed do/_/'ga' zhig ni dri 'dzin gyi dbang po yongs su tshim par bzod pa'i dri ngad rab tu ldang ba'i spos kyi mchog mang po dag gtul bar byed do/_/kha cig ni bstan pa 
[\[224b.4\]]dang 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i dge legs dang dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa thams cad gsar du 'gugs pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i cho ga rnams ni skye ba lnga pa'i dung dkar gyi sgra dang*/_snyan dgu yongs su rdzogs pa'i gling bu'i sgra dang*/_lo paN spyan 'dren gyi dus su dar ba'i 
[\[224b.5\]]dung gi sgra dang*/_smra ngan thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra dang*/_rnga zlum gyi sgra dang*/_'khar rnga'i sgra dang*/_ting ting shag gi sgra dang*/_sil snyan gyi sgra dang*/_pheg rdob kyi sgra rnams su bsgyur te/_bstan la dga' ba'i lha dang mi'i 'gro ba rnams kyi rna bar 
[\[224b.6\]]'jebs par byed/_snying la 'bebs par byed/_kun nas rangs par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed do/_/la la ni rin po che'i gdugs dang*/_phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_dga' ba'i ru mtshon dang*/_ba dan dang*/_phye ma phur ma dang*/_me tog gi phreng ba dang*/_
[\[224b.7\]]rin po che'i rnga yab dang*/_bsil yab rnams te de dag re re yang brgya stong mang po thogs te 'gro ba na/_nam mkhar lhags pa'i lha rnams kyi lag pas 'khyud pa bzhin du bre bar byed/_dpyangs par byed/_gdengs par byed/_bskyod cing g.yob par byed pa'i mdun bsu'i bkod pa dpag tu med 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]pa dag gis bsu zhing dal gyis 'ongs pa dang*/_de'i rjes thogs nyid nas dpal sdom brtson mi'i nor bu rin po che sde dge bla ma chen po ste/_chos las byung ba'i mtshan gyi rol mo ni kun dga' 'phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba/_bsod nams kyi mthus mngon par 
[\[225a.2\]]bteg pas je mthor gyur pa mi'i rgyal po/_'jig rten du snga na med pa'i bde skyid kyi dpal 'gugs par byed pa'i dbang gi lcags kyu/_phyogs kyi rgyal phran mang po'i gtsug na ngal bsor spyod pa la mi gus pa med pa gtsug gi nor bu/_kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa ring du gnas 
[\[225a.3\]]par byed pa'i sman pa chen po/_byams pa dang brtse bas rgyud brlan par byas pa rgyal ba'i myu gu dam pa/_bgyi ba thams cad kyi blo sna dkon mchog la gtod pas gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i dpa' bo chen po de nyid ljongs 'di'i 'gro ba spyi'i bsod nams kyi bzhon pa la legs par bcibs te/_
[\[225a.4\]]rang gi rgyal khab dam pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba de nyid rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par byed pa'i bcud kyi snying po nyid du legs par byon te/_gzi brjid kyi phung po mngon par brtas pa'i rang bzhin du brtan par bzhugs so/_/bzhi pa bstan srid kyi khri la bzhugs 
[\[225a.5\]]nas phrin las kyi rgyun skyong ba'i khyad par la gnyis te/_khri la bzhugs pa'i dus su bsod nams kyi skal bar ldan pa'i khyad par/_skal bar ldan pas bstan pa dang 'gro la phan pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ro/_/dang po bsod nams kyi skal bar ldan pa'i khyad par ni/_de ltar khams gsum 
[\[225a.6\]]chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa ji skad smos pa de dag gi drin gyis lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ma lus pa'i phyag bgyir 'os pa'i bla ma/_sdom pa gsum gyi 'byor pa bla na med pa dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab dam pa nyid du cho ga yang dag pa'i sgo nas mnga' gsol 
[\[225a.7\]]du zin yang slar yang snyigs ma'i dus kyi skye bo mi srun pa shin tu gdul dka' ba dag_/dngos su chos dang mthun pa'i bka' khrims rdo rje brtsegs pa'i rwa ba na legs par bcug ste/_brgyud nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i spyod pa las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rin po che'i dbu 'phang mngon par 'degs pa'i phyir/_bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu smin pa snyam byed pa'i dzam+bu gser gyi phung po mtha' dag gcig tu brtsegs pa dpal sde dge rgyal po zhes bya ba'i bstan srid nyi zla zung du 'brel ba lta bu'i gdan sa'i 
[\[225b.2\]]khri 'phang mthon po/_phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun du 'khod pa'i rgyal rigs dang*/_blon po dang*/_mi dpon dang*/_che btsan gyi skye 'gro phal che ba dag gi ral pa'i do ker snum po mdzes par byed pa nor bu'i rgyan dang bcas pas lan gcig min par btud par byas pa'i gnas ga la ba der/_sdom brtson bla ma 
[\[225b.3\]]chen po gang gi zhabs kyi chu skyes dmar po/_sen mo mu tig gi dog pa 'dzin pa dag nye bar bkod de skye dgu'i bdag po dam pa nyid du dbang bskur ro/_/de'ang ji ltar khri la mnga' gsol ba'i tshul ni/_sdom brtson bla ma skye dgu'i bdag por gyur pa rang gi sku'i mched zlar gyur pa che zhing mtho ba'i 
[\[225b.4\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu sde dge bla ma blo gros rgya mtsho dang*/_dpon chen bsod nams mgon po zhes pa gong du smos pa'i ya rabs dam pa'i spyod tshul dang*/_phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i gtsug lag rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag can te rnam pa gnyis dang*/_mkhyen dpyod kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 
[\[225b.5\]]yangs pa'i dge tshul ma tshe dbang lha mo zhes pa srid zhi'i yon tan mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang rgyags pa dang g.yeng ba ma mchis par sgo gsum tshul dam pa la rtag tu gnas pa/_bdog pa'i rdzas phal che ba dag kyang dkon mchog la mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_sems can la sbyin par gtong 
[\[225b.6\]]ba'i phyag thung ngur ma gyur pa de nyid dang*/_sdom brtson bla ma skye dgu'i bdag po'i bka' lung gi nor bus/_'gro ba'i sems kyi rnyog pa ma lus pa bgrung par byed cing*/_gcig tu phrin las kyi 'khor lo rin po che lag tu thogs nas 'dzin ma'i khyon gyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa mtha' dag rang 
[\[225b.7\]]dbang du bgyid pa la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i blo gros kyi rtsal rab tu rdzogs pa'i 'phrul gyi mdun na 'don dang*/_nang blon dang*/_sku srung ba dang*/_yi ge pa dang*/_tshong dpon dang*/_dmag dpon dang*/_sde dpon la sogs pa rgyal po'i 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs dbang che zhing mtho bar gyur 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]pa rnams kyang gus pa'i zhe sa dang bcas te/_rkang rten dang ldan pa'i khri mthon po gang yin pa de la gtsug gis nye bar btud nas mdun du 'khod pa dag ni 'di lta ste/_mdun na 'don thams cad kyi mes por gyur pa'i blon chen chos skyong blo gros dang*/_rgyal ba'i myu gu'i 
[\[226a.2\]]spyod tshul la goms pa sdom brtson bsod nams bkra shis dang*/_ngo mtshar tshig gi bang mdzod 'dzin pa dge slong bstan pa bzang po dang*/_rig pa'i gnas kyi bang mdzod 'dzin pa drung yig rnam pa gnyis dang*/_mang du thos pa'i dbang phyug dge slong bzang po dang*/_ngang tshul chos dang 
[\[226a.3\]]mthun pa dge slong mgon srung dang*/_dran 'dzin gyi me long rab tu gsal ba dbon po lha dgyes dang*/_bstan srid zung gi phrin las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba lha bu tshe ring dang*/_bgyi ba kun la rmongs pa med pa'i blo ldan dar rgyas dang*/_blo dang thabs kyi rtsal rab tu rdzogs pa phyag mdzod gu ru 
[\[226a.4\]]bkra shis dang*/_gtsug lag zung gi mkhyen pa rab tu rgyas pa bo dgyes dang*/_sdeb legs gtam gyi 'byung gnas tshong dpon 'bum skyabs dang*/_shes rab dang gzungs kyi me lce rab tu 'bar ba bkra shis rgya mtsho dang*/_brtan cing zab mo'i blo dang ldan pa grog ma dang*/_rnam par 
[\[226a.5\]]dpyod pa'i mig dkyus ring por gyur pa a zlos la sogs pa ste/_thams cad kyang ji skad du/_ma su rak+Sha'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las/_tshig gsal blo ni phun sum tshogs/_/lugs kyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas/_/ngang 'jam dpyod par byed pa ste/_/rgyal po'i blon po de 
[\[226a.6\]]'dras bya/_/zhes dang*/_rigs dang ngang tshul yon tan ldan/_/bden dang chos la mchog tu gzhol/_/gzugs byad shin tu bzang ba ni/_/rgyal po'i spyan mi yin par bshad/_/ces gsungs pa ltar phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i gtsug lag mang po'i brjod par bya ba thams cad 'dren pa la thogs 
[\[226a.7\]]pa med pa'i rjod byed kyi tshig gsal ba/_brjod tshul gyi sdeb legs pa/_dgos pa'i gtso bo gang dang gang yin pa de dpe dang gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas bde blag tu ston nus pa/_'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong bu dang*/_skye bo gso ba'i thigs pa dang*/_tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]lugs kyi bstan bcos dang*/_tshigs su bcad pa brgya pa dang*/_legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter la sogs pa lugs kyi bstan bcos thams cad rig cing de dag gi rjes su byed pa/_gtum pa dang rtsub pa'i tsher ma'i me dbal btul nas/_snying rje chen po'i sems bzhin du 
[\[226b.2\]]'jam zhing mnyen pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/_brtsam par bya ba dang brtsam par bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_bskyab par bya ba dang bskyab par bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_bskyung bar bya ba dang bskyung bar bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_gzhom par bya ba dang gzhom par bya ba ma yin pa dang*/_bkur bar bya ba dang bkur 
[\[226b.3\]]bar bya ba ma yin pa legs par dpyod cing blang dor tshul bzhin du byed pa/_bden pa'i lam du rgyu zhing bden pa'i tshig gsong por smra ba/_bgyi ba thams cad kyang mthar dam pa'i chos su 'gyur ba dang bstan pa'i zhabs tog tu 'gyur ba'i las la gzhol ba/_bzod pa bsgom pa bzhin du bzhin 
[\[226b.4\]]'dzum zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas kun gyi mnyes gshin dam par gyur pa dang*/_gzhan yang rgyal po'i 'khor du 'os pa dpa' zhing brtan pa dang*/_bzo'i las dang*/_mtshon gyi las dang*/_bzhon pa dag la yang 'dab chags bzhin du shin tu goms par byas pa 
[\[226b.5\]]ste/_de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas te kun nas bskor ba'i dbus ga la ba de nyid du/_gser gyi ri dbang nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'khyud pa'am ka na ka'i mchod sdong la mar me'i 'od kyis phog pa ltar bzhugs su gsol lo/_/dus de nyid 
[\[226b.6\]]du yar lung bkra shis chos ldan gyi mkhan po ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes pa dpal ldan stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'chad pa dang*/_rtsod pa dang*/_rtsom pa'i phrin las kyi sgo nas ring du gnas par byed pa'i mkhyen brtse 
[\[226b.7\]]nus pa'i bdag nyid can de nyid gtso bor byas pa'i gsang sngags grub pa'i rdo rje slob dpon chen po rnams dang lhan cig pas/_sdom brtson sa gzhi skyong ba'i brtul zhugs bzung ba'i bla ma chen po gang de/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid ji srid gnas pa de srid du/_sku gsung thugs mi
