[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]shigs rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga zab mo'i rten 'brel la brten nas/_rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las gyi 'khor lo gang de ring po'i lam du rgyu bas snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i khrims kyi ra ba la yang dag par 
[\[227a.2\]]gzud par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_bsgrun du med pa'i snying stobs kyi phrag pa brtan pos thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs kun du mi nyams par bgyi ba'i khur chen po gong nas gong du gdegs par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_phyogs su lhung ba med pa'i 
[\[227a.3\]]snying rje yongs su rgyas pa'i gdugs dkar gcig gi grib tu yangs pa'i rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba thams cad rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i dus kyi bde skyid gsar pa'i ro la longs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang mngon du bya 
[\[227a.4\]]ba'i thabs kyi gtso bo gzhan la phan pa nye bar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir du zhabs brtan gyi cho ga yang dag par bsgrub par brtsams so/_/de lta bu'i zhabs kyi pad+ma brtan pa'i cho ga de ltar bsgrub pa'i dgos pa'ang/_shes rab brgya par/_
[\[227a.5\]]nad dang 'dra ba'i dgra med de/_/'chi ba dang mnyam 'jigs pa med/_/ces 'byung ba ltar 'khor ba na shin tu 'jigs shing bag tsha bar byed pa'i gnas ni de dag tu bshad la/_des na de dag bzlog pa'i thabs la brtson dgos pa yang*/_slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad 
[\[227a.6\]]pa'i 'chi ba bslu ba'i man ngag las/_chos spyod dbang po thul ba ni/_/'khor ba ru ni ji srid 'tsho/_/de srid bsod nams la sogs tshogs/_/byang chub sgrub byed rab tu skye/_/'khor bar srog las gces pa ni/_/ci yang yod pa ma mthong ste/_/de bas myur du thabs mang pos/_/
[\[227a.7\]]'chi ba bslu bar kun du spyod/_/ces gsungs shing de lta bu'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bzlog pa'i thabs kyang*/_de nyid las/_gang zhig rigs pa'i thabs sbyor ba/_/dka' ba cung zad yod ma yin/_/nor bu sngags dang sman rnams kyi/_/mthu ni thams cad 'dod pa yin/_/zhes dang*/_
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]lus dang ngag gi las kyis phyi/_/bsam gtan las kyis nang gi yin/_/nor bu sngags sman phyi yi ste/_/rnal 'byor nus pas nang yin no/_/zhes dang*/_sngags kyis gang zhig las byed pa/_/de yi tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/tshe ni 'phel bar gyur pa na/_/des ni 'chi ba bslu 
[\[227b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/sngags rnams kyi ni mthu la yang*/_/the tshom bya ba rigs ma yin/_/gang phyir sngags kyi mthu dag ni/_/bsam mi khyab par kun la 'dod/_/'jig rten na ni dngos gzhan dag_/sngags kyis mi 'grub de yod min/_/yang dag dad dang mngon brtson las/_/sngags 
[\[227b.3\]]rnams yid bzhin nor bur mtshungs/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin du nor bu dang sman dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pas tshe bsring ba'i thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa cig bstan pa las/_'dir gtso bor gsang bsngags kyi gdams pa ste/_de la yang sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po 
[\[227b.4\]]rnams kyi bzhed srol gyi cho ga mi 'dra ba tshul 'ga' zhig mchis pa las/_'dir slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas/_tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang*/_/drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang*/_/spu rtse tsam yang ma nyams par/_/'chi bdag lta bur 'chi las rgyal/_/
[\[227b.5\]]skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan dang*/_/nad dang dbul ba kun zad byed/_/seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad/_/sdug bsngal tshogs ni 'jig par byed/_/ma bslangs par ni zas skom sogs/_/khang bzang gos la sogs pa rnyed/_/ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang*/_/bum pa 
[\[227b.6\]]bzang sogs dngos grub rnams/_/snyan dngags smra mkhan nyid kyi blo/_/shes rab gcig tu dri ma med/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub gzhan dag kyang*/_/'khor lo 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i 
[\[227b.7\]]rang gzugs rje btsun sgrol ma dkar mo yid bzhin 'khor lo'i cho ga rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas/_'chi bdag bdud kyi dpung gis mi phyed pa'i 'chi ba med pa rdo rje'i srog gi ka ring shin tu brtan par btsugs so/_/slar yang de nyid rgyun du brtan par byed pa'i cho ga la bkra shis pa'i rdzas rtags 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rnam pa brgyad kyi mnga' 'bul dang bcas pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa'i ched du/_phyogs bcu rab 'byams kyi zhing mur thug pa med pa rnams su bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang slob mar bcas pa'i tshogs dang*/_gzhan yang 'chi med tshe'i dngos 
[\[228a.2\]]grub brnyes pa'i lha dang*/_klu dang*/_drang srong dang*/_grub pa dang*/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i gtos thams cad du khyab par mngon par bltas te/_de dag dang mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po rnams mgrin bsgrigs te bkra shis kyi glu dang rol mo'i bye 
[\[228a.3\]]brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra shin tu snyan par 'byin cing*/_lha'i me tog man+d+ha rwa ba dang*/_puN+DA rI ka dang*/_ut+pal la sogs pa'i me tog gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis sil ma gtor ba ni/_bskal pa chags pa'i dus kyi char gyi rgyun chen po bzhin du bsnyil bas/_mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[228a.4\]]pa'i 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i dbang po lnga'i spyod yul du sngon chad mthong ba dang*/_thos pa dang myang bar ma nus pa'i ngo mtshar gyi ltad mo tshar du dngar ba dag bskrun to/_/de nas brtsams te/_ji skad du/_nor dang 'dod pa thar ba chos/_/zhes pa ltar sde bzhi ste/_de yang chos ni gnas skabs su mngon 
[\[228a.5\]]par mtho ba dang*/_mthar thug nges par legs pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'i rgyu'o/_/nor ni rig byed mang du thos pa dang*/_sa gzhi dang rin po che la sogs pa sog pa dang bsrung bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/'dod pa ni lha dang mi'i dbang po'i yul du gyur pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams so/_/
[\[228a.6\]]thar pa ni gtan gyi bde ba byang chub kyi snying po ste bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu nyid du bshad do/_/dge ba ni ma chags pa dang*/_zhe sdang med pa dang*/_gti mug med pas kun nas bslangs pa'i las te/_de la dbye na lus ngag yid kyi spang ba bcu ste 'bras bu rdul med pa nyid du skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang 
[\[228a.7\]]yin pa'o/_/mdor na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dpal 'byor gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad sde bzhi po 'dir ma 'dul ba med cing*/_phyi ma ni skye ba nas skye bar bde ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu'am lam kho na nyid do/_/des na ming don de dang ldan pa'i bstan srid zung 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'brel gyi bgyi ba shin tu lci ba'i khur chen po yongs su bzhes par mdzad do/_/de la'ang legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter las/_dam pa dpon du bskos gyur na/_/don grub pa dang bde skyid 'thob/_/nor bu rgyal mtshan rtser mchod na/_/yul phyogs dge zhes 'jig rten 
[\[228b.2\]]sgrogs/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongs su sbyangs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa de nyid mnga' 'bangs kyis mtshon pa'i bstan 'gro spyi'i bsod nams kyi nor bu brtsegs pa'i khri ga la bar bzhugs pa nas brtsams te/_'di ltar mdo las/_lus 
[\[228b.3\]]can rnams kyi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu smin pa nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_rgyal po la gdams pa las/_skyes bu de ni gang dang gang 'gro yang*/_/las ni grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brangs/_/zhes dang*/_
[\[228b.4\]]las kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mdo las/_ji ltar gang zag las 'di lta bur gyur pas sngar yang bde la/_phyis kyang bde bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin zhe na/_gang zag su yang rung ste sbyin pa byin pa yang mang po dang rangs par byin/_bdag kyang yid dga' ste byin pas phyis kyang mi 'gyod pa'i 
[\[228b.5\]]gang zag de'i 'bras bu ni/_mir skyes na yang phyug po'i rigs su skye ste nor mang po spyod pa dang*/_mang po'i jo bor gyur nas/_blon po dang*/_grogs po dang*/_gnyen dang rigs gcig pa/_mang du bdog pa dang*/_bang mdzod thams cad gang zhing bde ba'i rigs su skye ste/_gang zag 
[\[228b.6\]]las 'di lta bu 'dus pas sngar yang bde/_phyis kyang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_zung gi mdo las/_gang dag nga yi bstan pa la/_/sbyin pa skra tsam byin pa ni/_/bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu ru/_/longs spyod che zhing nor yang mang*/_/zhes dang*/_mdo rgya cher rol pa las/_khyod 
[\[228b.7\]]kyis sngon chad dge las bsags pa dang*/_/yun ring dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang*/_/khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs pas/_/de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung bar gyur/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po skye dgu'i bdag por gyur pa gang gi legs byas kyi mthus/_
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]dus de nyid nas brtsams te mnga' 'og tu 'khod pas mtshon te/_phyogs bcu'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor kun du che ba'i yon tan dang*/_rigs dang*/_stobs dang*/_dpung gi sde chen pos mngon par khengs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal phran dang*/_blon po dang*/_mi dpon dang*/_
[\[229a.2\]]rdzong dpon dang*/_sde dpon dang*/_che btsan dang*/_'byor ldan gyi skye bo rnams te/_thams cad kyang legs bris kyi yul nas 'ongs pa lta bu'i gos bzang dang rgyan gyi rnam pa mang pos lus la sgeg par byas pa bgrang gi mi ldang ba rnams kyis lhags te/_rang rang gi mngon par rgyags 
[\[229a.3\]]pa thams cad chog shes ldan pa'i nor bzhin du btang nas/_gang gi zhabs stegs kyi khri mthon po rin thang che ba'i nor bu rin po che'i phra tshom mtshar du dngar bar bkod pa dag ni/_btso ma gser gyi pa tra ris 'khyug pas legs par bzung ba'i ngo mtshar mig gi dga' ston du gyur pa ga la ba de na/_
[\[229a.4\]]lus thams cad nas gus pa'i zhe sa dang bkur sti sngon du 'gro bas/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po'i thugs la ji ltar bzhed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad legs par grub nas/_deng gi dus su bod chen po'i ljongs kyi 'gro ba spyi'i bsod nams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du bde bar byon 
[\[229a.5\]]pa'i dga' ston dang*/_gcig tu bstan srid zung 'brel gyi khri la mnga' gsol ba'i legs so'i gtang rag tu/_rang rang gi bdog pa'i dngos po gya nom pa dag stobs par byed do/_/de dag la yang snga na med pa'i gtam snyan gyi bka' stsal dang*/_gnang skyes kyi rnam pa mang po dag 
[\[229a.6\]]gis yid kyi re ba dag kyang tshim par byed do/_/gzhan yang bsod nams kyi mthu chen po des/_de tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyi nang thams cad dang*/_mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i yul ljongs dang*/_grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_grong rdal dang*/_tshong dus dang*/_pho brang dang*/_khang 
[\[229a.7\]]khyim thams cad kyang 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang*/_bde zhing lo legs pa dang*/_mi dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyang dga' gzhas kyi glu len pa dang*/_gar gyis rtsen pa'i ngo mtshar ci yar rgyas pa dang*/_nyen kor gyi kun dga' rwa ba dang*/_skyed mos tshal dang*/_me tog gi ldum 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]ra dang*/_shing ljon pa dang*/_tshang tshing 'khrigs pa'i nags tshal rnams kyang*/_rin po che mar ka ti dang*/_in+d+ra nI la dang*/_g.yu ljang gi kha dog la 'gran pa'i lo 'dab dang ldan pa'i dbyar skyes kyi phreng ba dag kyang*/_rtsa ba dang*/_sdong bu dang*/_lcug ma dang*/_lo ma dang*/_me tog dang*/_
[\[229b.2\]]'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag kyang rang rang gi dus kyi ngo mtshar dang lang tsho ngom pa bzhin du nyams dga' bar byed do/_/yul phyogs de dang de dag tu ni gter dang*/_'bru'i tshogs dang*/_bza' ba dang*/_bca' ba dang*/_btung ba dang*/_bgo ba dang*/_rgyan dang*/_rta dang bzhon 
[\[229b.3\]]pa dang*/_gnag lug la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba rnams kyang yid bzhin du 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/gzhan yang rin po che gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_nor bu dang*/_mu tig dang*/_bai DUr+Ya dang*/_dung dang*/_man shel dang*/_byi ru la sogs pa lha dang mi'i dbyig gi rnam 
[\[229b.4\]]pa mang po yang yul phyogs de dang de dag tu 'phel bar gyur to/_/de ltar mtshungs pa med pa'i stobs dang*/_bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos je mthor gyur pa'i sdom brtson mi'i dbang phyug dam pa des ni/_bod chen ljongs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[229b.5\]]kun du 'khod pa'i skye dgu thams cad gzhal du med pa'i thugs rje dang phrin las 'dod dgu'i dpag bsam gyi ljon pa ltar rgyas par gyur pa'i grib ma snum po gcig gis yongs su khebs par byed cing ci bde bar skyong ba la/_rnam pa kun du brdzi ba mi mnga' zhing*/_gal te srid pa dang zhi 
[\[229b.6\]]ba'i dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par mthong ste/_de la ma bzod par sdang ba'i sems dang*/_gdug pa'i sems dang*/_drag shul gyi sems dang*/_bsam pa ngan pa dang*/_sbyor ba rtsub mor gshom pa'i skye 'gro mi srun pa 'ga' zhig yod pa rnams kyang*/_gang gi 
[\[229b.7\]]bsod nams kyi stobs dang*/_lhag pa'i bsam pa mi dman pa'i khang bzang yangs pa de na rtag tu bstan cing bsgrubs pa'i dbang gis 'bral ba med par bzhugs pa'i lha dang srung ma'i tshogs gzi brjid che ba/_mthu che ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_stobs che ba/_ye shes kyi mig rdul 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]med cing dri ma dang bral ba mang po dag mchis te/_de dag la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don gang dang gang yin pa de dang de gsol zhing las su bsgo ba na/_'bad rtsol drag po la ma ltos par las ngan la 'dris shing brtsams par byed pa gang yin pa de dag gtan brlag tu 
[\[230a.2\]]song ba kun gyis mngon du gyur pa mang po dag kyang yod do/_/de lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos chab srid kyi tha gru rnam par yangs pa'i sa chen po chos bzhin du skyong ba la ni gnod pa dang sdo ba mi mnga' ba'i khar/_slar yang dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal khab chen po bzhi'i 
[\[230a.3\]]ya gyal du gyur pa gnam gyi mthongs nas bskos pa'i shar phyogs gong ma rgyal po zhes bya ba/_sa'i steng na mtshungs pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba'i stobs dang las dbang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po des/_bka' lung dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las bsgrubs pa'i cod paN dam pa bas kyang 
[\[230a.4\]]rab tu lci zhing rin thang che ba gang zhig_/deng gi sdom brtson bla ma chen po'i spyi bor bcings te/_deng nas brtsams te bod chen por gtogs pa'i sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun du 'khod pa'i skye 'gro mtha' dag dang*/_mi bdag spyi'i mes por dgos pa'i 'ja' sa dang gser dam 
[\[230a.5\]]chen po yang dang yang du stsal te/_shin tu brling bar byas pa'i sgo nas kyang mtshungs pa med pa'i stobs ldan gyi rgyal po'i go sa ru dbang bskur ba legs par thob bo/_/dus nam zhig na sdom brtson chen po 'dis bzhed pa'i gtso bo/_mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan 
[\[230a.6\]]chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po de nyid dang*/_mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas ye shes pa ste/_bstan pa'i bdag po che chung gnyis ka ngor nas dbang po'i phyogs su chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur te/_rim gyis 'bri klung gser dang ldan pa 'bab pa'i rgyun phyogs 
[\[230a.7\]]nas brgyud de byon no/_/de dag gi lam bar rnams su 'khod pa'i dad ldan gyi 'gro ba rgya mtsho lta bu la rang rang gi blo dang 'tshams pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi stsal bzhin pa nas lcags pho sprel lo'i rgyu skar tha skar gyis nya ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi dus tshes dge bar/_chos sde chen po lhun grub steng gi rgyal khab dang 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]khad nye ba'i nor 'dzin ma'i cha shas lha lung khug ces bya bar phebs so/_/der phebs pa na byams brtse'i dbang phyug sde dge bla ma chen po 'di nyid sku 'khor rnams kyis mtshon pa'i chibs bsu'i rim pa mang po dag gis byon nas bsu zhing*/_khyad par lhun grub steng gi gdan sa 'dir 'byon pa'i 
[\[230b.2\]]sta gon yang 'di ltar brtsams te/_de'ang chos kyi rje sa skya paN+Di tas/_khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed/_/brten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur/_/bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad/_/bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'ang bde ba 'byung*/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar rang gi dngos kyi bla ma bsu ba 
[\[230b.3\]]dang skyel mar byas pa'i 'bras bu ni mthar thug phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa 'thob pa la sogs pa'i phan yon rjes su dran pa sdom brtson bla ma chen po de'i bka'i bkod pas ji ltar stsal ba de bzhin du/_sa phyogs 'di'i kho ra khor yug dang*/_yangs pa'i khyams dang*/_srang bar dang*/_
[\[230b.4\]]bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su phyag dar gyi tshogs/_rdo ba dang*/_bong ba dang*/_gseg ma dang*/_gyo mo dang*/_sdong dum dang*/_so phag dang*/_mi gtsang ba'i 'dam dang ljan ljin gyi tshogs legs par bsal te/_dri zhim po dang tsan+dan gyi chus rdul gyi 'tshub ma med par chag chag legs 
[\[230b.5\]]par btab la/_de nas rin po che rnam pa bzhi'i kha dog la mngon par 'khu ba'i stegs bu dang*/_ba gam dang*/_rta babs dang*/_sgo dang*/_sgo khang dang*/_skar khung dang*/khyams kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang*/_lha'i khang bzang dang*/_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[230b.6\]]brang dang*/_dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang*/_sgrub pa'i khang pa dang*/_khang pa brtsegs pa dang*/_skyed tshal gyi do ra rnams su yid la mi 'bab pa med pa'i rgyan gyi bye brag mang pos legs par brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste/_rgya gar dang*/_bal po dang*/_kha che dang*/_stong 'khun gyi 
[\[230b.7\]]yul las 'ongs pa'i gos bzang dang*/_ras dar gyi bye brag kha dog dkar po dang*/_sngon po dang*/_ser po dang*/_dmar po dang*/_le brgan dang*/_sna tshogs spel ba dag gis rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba dan dang*/_bla re dang*/_yol ba dang*/_'phan gyi rnam pa dang*/_rin po che'i rnga 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]yab kyi rnam pa mang po dag bsgreng ba dang dpyangs pas kun nas mdzes par byas so/_/gzhan yang me tog gi phreng ba dang*/_gser gyi drwa ba dang*/_mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang*/_dril bu g.yer kha'i phreng ba dang*/_me shel dang*/_chu shel dang*/_zla ba rlung gis bskyod 
[\[231a.2\]]pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mang po'i snying la snga na med pa'i dga' ba rab tu ster bar byas so/_/gzhung lugs rab 'byams 'dzin cing smra ba'i mgrin pa rnam par yangs pa'i bla ma dang*/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho chen po'i rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam pas mdun nas bsu ba'i ser sbreng gi 
[\[231a.3\]]mtshar du dngar ba dag ni ngur smrig bla gos gsar pa'i tshon gyis sa dang nam mkha'i kha dog kyang bsgyur ba snyam byed pa rnams/_kha cig ni a ga ru dang*/_tu ruSh+ka dang*/_ha ri tsan+dan la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa dang sbyar ba'i bdug spos kyi dud pa ni/_char ldan ma'i dus kyi sprin sngon 
[\[231a.4\]]yid du 'ong ba rab tu brtsegs pa la co 'dri ba lta bu'i phyogs kyi khor yug thams cad kyang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i lus bzhin du byed do/_/la la ni srung ma rgya mtsho'i sde dpon chen po rdo rje gur gyi mgon po lcam dral lha brgyad dang*/_zhing skyong chen po bram ze'i gzugs can dang bcas 
[\[231a.5\]]pa'i 'cham sku chen po phal thog phyed gnyis tsam brgal ba bsnams te/_sgeg pa'i stang stabs mang po byed kyin bsu'o/_/'ga' zhig ni bkra shis dang dge legs thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i rje btsun chen po nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal nas 
[\[231a.6\]]bskal pa mang por sku gsung thugs mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin du brtan par bzhugs nas/_sems can gyi don la bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa thams cad/_chos kyi dung dang*/_gling bu dang*/_rnga bo che dang*/_sil snyan la sogs pa'i rol mo'i bye brag tha dad pa de dang de dag 
[\[231a.7\]]gi gdangs su bsgyur te 'bud pa dang 'khrol bar byed do/_/phal che ba dag ni brgya byin gyi tshon gyi kha dog dang*/_ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang*/_btso ma'i gser dang*/_gur gum dang*/_le brgan rtsi dang*/_ut+pa la dang*/_kar+Ni ka dang*/_ldong ros dang*/_mtshal dang*/_mthon 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ka chen po dang*/_mar ka ti dang*/_rma bya'i lkog ma'i mdongs lta bu'i ras dang dar gyi khyad par rab tu mang po las byas pa'i gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba dan dang*/_lda ldi dang*/_phye ma phur ma dang*/_'phan gyi rnam pa bgrang las 'das pa bsgreng ba rnams ni yid 'phrog 
[\[231b.2\]]rlung gi bgrod pa dal bus kyang cung zad bskyod pa dang bcas te mdun nas bsu bar byed/_de dag las gzhan pa'i rgyal po dang*/_rgyal phran dang*/_blon po dang*/_rig byed pa dang*/_khyim bdag dang*/_grong khyer gyi skye bo dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ni phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun du yongs 
[\[231b.3\]]su khyab par sa chen po'i rdul bzhin du lhags pa rnams kyis kyang mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mthong na don gyi snying po dam pas yongs su lci ba gang der/_mig gi dbang pos yang dang yang du mjal zhing*/_lag pa'i thal sbyar bcings pa spyi bo'i rgyan du bkod 
[\[231b.4\]]de/_phyag gi phreng ba grangs med pa brtsegs pas mngon par mchod pa dang*/_'di phyi bar do'i gnas skabs kun du ye shes kyi gzigs pa dam pas 'jug pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa la brel bar gyur to/_/der ma zad dus de nyid du rje btsun dam pa nyid 'byon pa'i mdun phyogs kyi nam mkha'i 
[\[231b.5\]]khams phal cher yang sprin gyi dum bu mchod rdzas kyi rnam pa can mang po ched du byas pa lta bus gtams pa'i khrod na/_kha dog lnga ldan gyi 'ja' tshon gsar pa'i rang bzhin yin pa la/_rnam pa ni lha'i rgyal mtshan dang*/_lha'i ba dan dang*/_lha'i 'phan dang*/_lha'i gos bzang srab la 
[\[231b.6\]]'jam pa dang 'dra ba dag kyang ched du dpyangs pa lta bur mchis pa 'gro ba mang po'i mthun snang du byung ngo*/_/tshul de la dpag na sde dge sa skyong bla ma chen po 'di'i sngon gyi dus nas bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang*/_thugs bskyed rmad du byung ba'i legs byas kyi mthu chen pos/_
[\[231b.7\]]dkar po'i phyogs su mngon par dgyes pa'i lha dang srung ma'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang sa skyong chen po rang gi mthun pa'i grogs su nye bar bkug nas mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyid 'dir spyan 'dren pa dang bsu ba bya ba'i grogs su nam mkha'i mthongs la 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]lhags par gdon mi za'o/_/cis mngon na/_sngon dus ded dpon don kun grub pas rgya mtsho las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnyed pa/_nag phyogs klu gdug pa can gyis phrag dog gis rgya mtshor dor ba na/_ded dpon snying stobs kyi mthu bri ba med pa des/_lha 
[\[232a.2\]]bdag gi rin po che stsol cig ces yang yang smras kyang des nor bu ma byin pa dang*/_da ni bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po yongs su bskam par ma gyur gyi bar du phyir dor la yid bzhin gyi nor bu de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi dbul 'phongs kyi rgyun gcad par bya'o 
[\[232a.3\]]zhes dam bcas te rgya mtsho'i chu 'phyags par brtsams pa na/_lha'i dbang pos de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs nas las sna tshogs pa la chu snod byin cig ces bsgo ba na/_des kyang de ma thag tu chu 'phyags pa'i gzhong pa dag sprul te byin pas/_der bstan la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyang 
[\[232a.4\]]de'i grogs su lhags nas rgya mtsho bskam par brtsams pa na/_klu des kyang ded dpon mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin par shes nas skrag ste nor bu de byin pa lta bu'o/_/mdor na sdom brtson sde dge bla ma chen po zhes bya ba/_gang gi thugs rgyud kyi dad pa'i zhing sa gshin pa/_thugs bskyed 
[\[232a.5\]]kyi sa bon dge ba/_phan sems kyi so nam legs pa/_thabs mkhas kyi srung bas bsrungs pa/_snying stobs kyi drod gsher 'dzom pa/_smon lam gyi char chu zhod pa ste/_mthun pa'i rkyen thams cad tshogs pa'i dus 'dir/_sa bdag mchog gis mtshon pa'i sa stengs kyi skye 
[\[232a.6\]]'gro spyi'i bsod nams rnam par yangs pa'i dga' tshal dam pa de na/_skyabs gcig mtshungs pa med pa'i mkhan chen skye dgu'i dpag bsam chen po zhes bya ba/_byams pa'i rtsa ba brling ba/_snying rje'i sdong pa rgyas pa/_phan sems kyi yal ga brkyangs pa/_yon tan gyi me tog 
[\[232a.7\]]kha bye ba/_phrin las kyi lo 'dab rgyas pa/_phan bde'i grib ma 'gugs pa/_nyon mongs pa'i tsha gdung 'jil ba/_chos kyi sbyin chen 'gyed pa/_mos pa'i shing rta 'gengs pa/_thar pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'i bdag nyid chen po gang 'di deng gi dus mdo stod smad bar gsum gyi 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]skye 'gro spyi'i phan pa dang bde ba 'dzad pa med par 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i mgron gyi dam pa nyid du legs par spyan drangs so/_/de nas brtsams te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rin po che la phrin las gzhal du med pas phan 'dogs pa dang*/_sems can dpag tu med pa

[\[232b.3\]]'am/_mdza' bshes la sogs pa gzhan gang gi yang drin las byung ba ma yin gyi/_chos skyong ba'i bla ma chen po bsod nams kyi skal bar ldan pa 'di nyid kho na'i sku drin las byung bar shes par bya'o/_/des na tshul 'di kho na la bsams kyang skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa su zhig gis

[\[232b.5\]]'das pa chen po'i phyogs su gzhol zhing 'bab par 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i mthu nyid kyis so/_/gnyis pa skal bar ldan pas bstan pa dang 'gro la phan pa bsgrub pa'i khyad par la gsum ste/_zang zing gi sbyin pas bstan pa dang 'gro ba la phan pa

[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]yod bzhin du mchod pa 'bul ba dang sbyin pa gtong ba la sogs pa dge ba'i ched du chung ngu yang gtang bar mi nus pa dag yod de/_de dag ni skyes bu shin tu ma rabs kyi spyod par gyur pa/_tshe 'dir yang sog srung gi sdug bsngal che ba dang*/_skye ba gzhan du yang*/_

[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]mkhyen pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang ste/_de nyid gang la brten nas mthar phyin par gyur pa'i sngon gyi skyes bu chen po ji snyed cig byon pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam thams cad kyi dang por gyur pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid de/_skyes pa rabs

[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]thams cad sbyin pas thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar nges don gtan la phab na sbyin pa sus mi byed/_/sbyin pas nor gyi snying po len par gsungs/_/sbyin pa dbang phyug rnams kyi rgyu zhes gsungs/_/sbyin pa dpal ldan skye bo mchog gi tshul/_/shes rab chung ngus rdul tsam

[\[234a.3\]]kyang ci dgos zhes dang*/_chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ser sna'i dgra bo zil gyis mnan nas sbyin pa legs par byin pa'i mi de ni 'jig rten na dpa' bo thams cad kyi nang nas kyang ches dpa' bo nyid yin te/_ched du brjod pa'i tshoms las/_'di na lan brgyar g.yul bzlog dpa' bo 
[\[234a.4\]]bas/_/ser sna dgrar gyur zil gyis mnan nas su/_/gang zhig chags med sems kyis sbyin byed pa/_/de dag ches dpa' yin par nges gsungs so/_/zhes so/_/sbyin pa gtong bas longs spyod re zhig zad pa ltar snang yang zad pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar

[\[234a.7\]]te/_chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba rnam pa gsum ste/_gtong ba dang*/_gtong ba chen po dang*/_shin tu gtong ba'o/_/de la gtong ba gang zhe na/_bza' ba dang*/_btung ba dang*/_bzhon pa dang*/_gos dang*/_mar me 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dang*/_spos dang*/_rgyan la sogs pa gang sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba ma gtogs pa mi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni gtong ba'o/_/gtong ba chen po 'di lta ste/_chung ma dang*/_bu dang*/bu mo dang*/_yid du 'ong ba'i bran dang*/_khyim dang*/_rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong 
[\[234b.2\]]ba ni gtong ba chen po'o/_/shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/_lag pa dang*/_rkang pa dang*/_rna ba dang*/_sna dang*/_sha dang*/rus pa dang*/_pags pa dang*/_mig dang*/_lce dang*/_mgo rus dang*/_rkang la sogs pa gtong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba 
[\[234b.3\]]zhes bya'o zhes gtong ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa las/_'dir dang po dang 'brel bar bsags pa'i dngos po thams cad mchod sbyin gyi ched du btang ba'i skabs te/_de la nang gses kyis sbyin par bya ba'i rdzas kyang ma dag pa'i sbyin pa spangs nas sbyin du rung ba'i dngos po

[\[234b.5\]]stobs ldan bde skyid 'gyur/_/skom byin pas ni mkhas pa de/_/kun du 'bar zhing rab 'bar ba/_/yi dwags nyam ngar mi skye la/_/skom pa'i gnod pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gos sbyin shin tu dpal dang ldan/_/rtag tu rigs ldan gzugs bzang zhing*/_/mi de ngo tsha shes par 'gyur/_/
[\[234b.6\]]zhes dang*/_sbyin pa'i legs pa'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mkhas pa rnams kyis rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun sbyin par byin no/_/sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/_ser sna rnam par spang ba'i phyir dad pas sbyin pa byin no/_/dus 
[\[234b.7\]]su sbyin pa byin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i rung ba dngos po gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa byin no/_/sems kyi 'khrug pa'i skyon thams cad spang ba'i phyir bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa byin no/_/snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ba'i phyir rang gi lag nas sbyin pa byin no/_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gtong ba chen po rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/kha dog phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa kha dog mdzes pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/spos phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par byin na rnam par 
[\[235a.2\]]smin pa grags pa'i spos rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/ro bro ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par byin na ro bro ba'i mchog gi dpe byad bzang po rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gya nom pa sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa longs spyod kyi nom pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgya chen po sbyin par byin na 
[\[235a.3\]]rnam par smin pa longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba thams cad du bkres pa rnam par gcod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/btung ba sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba thams cad du skom pa rnam par gcod pa rab tu 
[\[235a.4\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/gos sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa gos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa pu shu dang*/_khang pa brtsegs pa dang*/_khyim dang*/_khang pa dang*/_gzhal med khang dang*/_skyed shing gi rwa ba dang*/_
[\[235a.5\]]kun dga' rwa ba dang*/_yul rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/mal cha sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa rigs mthon po rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhon pa sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sman sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa rga shi med cing 
[\[235a.6\]]mya ngan dang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba dran pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/me tog sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/phreng ba sbyin par 
[\[235a.7\]]byin na rnam par smin pa 'dod chags dang*/_zhe sdang dang*/_gti mug gi dri ma rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdug pa sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba thams cad med pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gdugs sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa chos la dbang thob 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pa rab tu 'gyur ro/_/dril bu sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sil snyan sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/mar me sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa lha'i mig sgrib pa med cing rnam par dag pa 
[\[235b.2\]]rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/dar sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa lha dang mi'i nang na rnam par grol ba'i dar gyis bcings pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la 'bru mar dri zhim po phul lam spos kyi khrus chu dbul 
[\[235b.3\]]ba phul na rnam par smin pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/khrus kyi yo byad sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba thams cad du nad nyung ba dang rigs mchog tu skye zhing kun du mdzes pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying 
[\[235b.4\]]po lnga sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba thams cad du mthu che zhing spro ba chen po mi thul ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa la gnas te sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa gnod sems med pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje la gnas te sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa 'tshe ba med 
[\[235b.5\]]pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba la gnas te sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms la gnas te sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa mi dga' ba spong ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin par byin na rnam par 
[\[235b.6\]]smin pa longs spyod sna tshogs rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan la mi re ba la gnas te sbyin par byin na rnam par smin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa zang zing gi sbyin pa tshul bzhin du byin pa'i phan yon mang po dri ma med pa'i lung gi 
[\[235b.7\]]tshogs kyis legs par gdams pa'i yi ge dam pa'i rnga chen brdung ba ni ci yang thos so/_/thos nas kyang slar yang 'di ltar thugs la sems par byed de/_rje ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis/_da lta'i bde sdug 'byor rgud 'du 'bral rnams/_/sngon bsags las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]phyir/_/las 'bras bslu med don la ma rmongs pas/_/blang dor tshul bzhin spyod dang shes ldan dag_/ces gsungs pa ltar/_bdag gi sngon gyi skye bar sbyin pa ma nyung tsam zhig btang ba'i mthus/_da lta ni kun gyi 'gran pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba'i stobs 
[\[236a.2\]]dang*/_dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu zhig thob par gyur pa 'di dag go_/'on te 'di dag gi rang bzhin la ji ltar dpyad kyang 'khor ba'i phun sum tshogs pa zhes pa mi rtag pa'i mtha' can gang rung zhig las ma 'das pa'i phyir/_nam zhig na/_ston ka'i sprin gyi 
[\[236a.3\]]'du 'god ltar mi brtan cing g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang*/_tshwa chu ltar ji tsam spyad kyang ngoms pa'i mtha' mthong ba med pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang*/_chu'i chu bur ltar snying pos rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir/_yid brtan du rung ba ni cung zad kyang ma 
[\[236a.4\]]mchis so/_/'on kyang snying po med pa las kyang sbyin pa gtong ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po len pa la shin tu mkhas pa ni sngon gyi skyes bu chen po thabs la mkhas pa rnams so/_/de bas na kho bo cag kyang sngon gyi skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[236a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya chen po spyad pa'i lam gang yin pa de'i rjes su zhugs la/_ser sna med pa'i gtong ba la rab tu dpa' bar grags pa'i rnga bo che ni brdung bar bgyi'o/_/lan dang rnam par smin pa re ba med pa'i sbyin pa dam pa'i sgo brgya 
[\[236a.6\]]phrag gcig ni dbye bar bgyi'o/_/gtong phod dman pa min pa'i lag pa ni brkyang bar bgyi'o/_/'gro ba thams cad ni mchod pa dang sbyin pa'i zhing du dgod par bgyi'o zhes snyam du rtse gcig pas dgongs te/_zang zing gi 'byor pa phal che ba dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i ched du tshul 
[\[236a.7\]]bzhin du gtong ba la mi spro ba med pa'i snying stobs kyi chu gter rab tu 'phel bar gyur to/_/de'ang gang du gtong bar bya ba'i zhing du gyur pa ni/_dbu ma bshes pa'i spring yig las/_longs spyod g.yo ba snying po med mthong nas/_/dge slong bram ze bkren dang bshes rnams la/_/sbyin 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa tshul bzhin stsal bgyi pha rol du/_/sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so/_/zhes bshad pa ltar/_sbyin pa'i zhing ngam mchod pa'i zhing ngam yon gyi zhing dam par gyur pa ni/_dam pa'i chos smra ba dang*/_dge slong dang bram ze la sogs pa dang*/_phan 'dogs pa'i zhing 
[\[236b.2\]]du gyur pa ni bkren pa dang nad pa la sogs pa dang*/_re ba'i zhing du gyur pa ni mdza' bshes la sogs pa rnams su gsungs pa las/_'dir sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'di nyid ni/_spyir dzam+bu'i gling gi byang phyogs kha ba can gyi ljongs su bzhugs so 'tshal gyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[236b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rin po che mtha' dag dang*/_de nyid yun du gnas par byed pa'i rtsa lag bstan pa 'dzin pa'i gang zag rgya mtsho chen po'i rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa thams cad kyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po nyid du legs 
[\[236b.4\]]par grags shing grub pa'i tshul phal che ba ni gong du smos pa las shes par 'gyur zhing*/_de dag tsam du ma zad skabs 'di dang 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams su yang rgyas par 'byung ste/_ci'i phyir na/_gna'i dus nas dar ba'i dpya dang gzhan gyis phul ba dang*/_tshong zong 
[\[236b.5\]]gis bsgrubs pa la sogs pa bdog pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang mthar dkon mchog la mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang slob mar bcas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten bzhengs pa la sogs pa'i rgyur gtong ba dang*/_
[\[236b.6\]]khyad par chos kyi sbyin pa rgyun mi chad pa'i 'phrul gyi sgo chen po 'di phye ba'i rgyur gtong ba'i tshul rgyas pa ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ba ltar dang*/_bye brag tu bod chen po'i ljongs na sdom brtson bla ma 'di nyid kyi yab mes gong mar gyur pa bstan pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog tu dkar ba 
[\[236b.7\]]rnams kyi sku ring nas gsang sngags gsar rnying bon gsum gyi grub pa'i mtha' phyogs ris med pa'i dbu 'phang bla ma nas bla mar 'degs pa'i 'dzin skyong dang zhabs tog yang dag pa mdzad cing*/_de dag gi nang nas kyang mchog gam/_gtso bo'am/_phul lam/_gtsug gi nor 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bu bzhin du gces par bzung ba ni 'dzam gling bstan pa'i bdag po dpal sa skya pa'i lugs bzang dri ma med pa 'di nyid dang*/_rgyal ba nyi ma'i gnyen gyi rgyal tshab chen po rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po pa'i bstan pa rtsod pa kun gyi phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i 
[\[237a.2\]]rgyal mtshan dam pa 'di gnyis gang gi snying stobs kyi phrag pa rab tu brtan pa'i rtse na bzung ngo*/_/ji ltar bzung ba de dag kyang bskal pa nas bskal pa'i phreng bar brtan par byed pa'i cho ga rmad du byung ba ni mkhas pa'i phrin las rnam pa gsum ste/_de dag la shin tu dbang 'byor pa'i bstan 
[\[237a.3\]]'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po/_sa gsum gyi khongs nas grags pa'i zla 'od rnam par gsal ba mang po spyan drangs te/_bstan pa'i rgyun chen po mi nub par btsugs so/_/des na gong ma de dag gi bstan pa la dam pa'i bya ba ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/_deng gi dus kyi sdom brtson skye dgu'i 
[\[237a.4\]]bdag po 'dis kyang gong ma de dag gi phrin las dang*/_rnam par dkar ba'i legs byas kyi sdong po chen po rma med pa nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag rkyen las byung ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'di 
[\[237a.5\]]nyid 'jig rten gyi khams na yun du 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa mang po mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang*/_de nyid legs par gnas pa la brten nas yangs pa'i rgyal khams kun du bde legs rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te/_gtong phod 
[\[237a.6\]]chen po'i phyag gi dpag bsam gyi yal ga rnam par brkyangs te/_bla ma dang dkon mchog la mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa la sogs pa'i gtam rags pa tsam brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_bgrang ba las 'das pa'i bskal pa rnams su bsags 
[\[237a.7\]]pa'i legs byas rgya mtsho lta bus kyang shin tu 'grub par dka' ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog ste/_de'i go 'phang nyid kyang dka' tshegs chen po la ma ltos par bde blag tu brnyes par 'dod pa'i slob ma blo dang ldan pa dag gis/_mchod pa gzhan thams cad 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]spangs te/_rang nyid la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa bla na med pa thams cad mdzad pa'i dpal ldan bla ma mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po gang yin pa de nyid do/_/de ni rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur bltas la/_shin tu 
[\[237b.2\]]gtong bar dka' ba dang dkon pa dang*/_khyad par can du gyur pa'i yo byad gang dang gang yin pa de dang des mngon par mchod cing*/_mnyes par 'gyur ba'i thabs su ci 'gyur byed pa de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' can du byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa ste/_ji skad du/_mchod pa 
[\[237b.3\]]thams cad yongs spangs nas/_/bla mar mchod pa yang dag brtsam/_/de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i/_/ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na/_/de yis bsod nams ma byas shing*/_/dka' thub ma 
[\[237b.4\]]bsten ci zhig yod/_/ces bya ba dang*/_rim pa lnga pa las kyang*/_de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis/_/shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang*/_/shin tu khyad par can de de/_/de dang de ni bla mar byin/_/slob dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog_/slob dpon gyis ni 'jigs pa sel/_/slob dpon 
[\[237b.5\]]gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi/_/rgya mtsho'i mching las pha rol sgrol/_/zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/_blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis/_/ci ste bde ba kun 'dod na/_/dad mos sems kyis dbul bar bya/_/yid la gang bsams ma phul lam/_/khas blangs de ni ma phul na/_/
[\[237b.6\]]yi dwags dmyal ba rnam gnyis su/_/nges par skye ste brlag par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las kyang*/_gang dang gang gis sdug pa'i rdzas/_/re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/de dang de ni bla mar dbul/_/zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje phreng ba las/_gser dang 
[\[237b.7\]]do shal gos dang ni/_/rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog_/bran dang las byed grangs med dang*/_/dad cing gus pa la sogs kyi/_/chags pa bral ba'i sems kyis ni/_/rab tu 'bad pas mnyes par bya/_/ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis/_/sngags 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]kyi don ston bla ma ni/_/dgongs pa yongs su bskang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba dang*/_gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/_de nas bla mar yon dbul ba/_/'di na rab tu bshad par bya/_/bdag nyid zhi ba nyid dang ni/_/las kun 'grub pa'i phyir du yang*/_/phongs pa med 
[\[238a.2\]]par dbul bya ste/_/bdag nyid dngul gyi rna rgyan dang*/_/gser dang nor bu mA la dang*/_/de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang*/_/skyed byed ma dang sring mo dang*/_/rnam pa sna tshogs na bza' nyid/_/gdugs dang rnga yab mdzes pa dang*/_/khang pa khri dang dri bzang dang*/_/de bzhin glu dang rol mo nyid/_/ral 
[\[238a.3\]]gri dang ni rgyan nyid kyang*/_/bla mar rab dbul brtul zhugs can/_/zhes bya ba dang*/_bla ma lnga bcu pa las kyang*/_bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/_/rjes su mthun par sbyin par bya/_/des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/_/phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/_/
[\[238a.4\]]sbyin dka' bu dang chung ma dang*/_/rang srog gis kyang bsten bya na/_/longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos/_/gang phyir bskal pa bye ba ni/_/grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/_/tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/_/rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung*/_/rtag tu de 
[\[238a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa mchod/_/rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/_/mi zad de nyid 'dod pa yis/_/cung zad yid 'ong gang dang gang*/_/shin tu khyad par gyur pa nyid/_/de dang de ni bla ma sbyin/_/de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de 
[\[238a.6\]]byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/_/tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud sde rin po che rnams nas brjod bya'i gtso bo ltar bstan cing*/_skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag rnams la rjes su gdams pa rnams gang gi thugs nyams su bstar nas/_'dir mkhan 
[\[238a.7\]]chen thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba/_lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ma lus pa'i thor tshugs rnam par spra ba'i rgyan du bzhugs pa la phyogs res thob shor du 'gyur ba'i skabs ci zhig_/'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam bzang 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]po'i grogs po mdza' gcugs dam pa de ni sus kyang bslu ru med pa chos nyid de/_de'ang 'di ltar/_rje btsun chen po de nyid ni sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'di dang skye ba nas skye bar mchod yul dang sbyin bdag gi tshul lam/_slob dpon dang slob ma'i tshul gyis nyi zla zung 'brel bzhin du 
[\[238b.2\]]mi 'bral bar byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni don yod zhags pa lta bus legs par sbrel bar brten/_deng gi dus su'ang ljongs 'di'i skye 'gro spyi'i bsod nams kyi zhing du spyan 'dren ji ltar gsol ba bzhin du legs par zhugs pa'i dga' ston gyi 'bul ba stob pa'i phyir 
[\[238b.3\]]rje btsun dam pa nyid la skabs dbye ba'i ched du/_mi bdag chen po'i zhal las 'di skad du mchid pa thos te/_rje btsun dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can ni/_khams gsum gyi 'gro ba ma lus pa'i dpal dam par gyur pa'i chos kyi rgyal po/_chos kyi dbang phyug_/
[\[238b.4\]]chos kyi 'byung gnas/_chos kyi sgron me chen po nyid du bzhugs bzhin pa nas/_gus ldan kho bo cag gi lhag bsam gyi rdzing bu'i nang nas byung ba'i spyan 'dren par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gi pad+ma dkar po'i phreng ba nan ltar brgyus pa'i tshul la thugs brtse bas rjes su dgongs te/_
[\[238b.5\]]bshul ring lam gyi ngal ba du ma khyad du bsad/_snying rje chen po'i shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor ni legs par bskor/_deng gi dus na bdag cag ltos dang bcas pa'i bsod nams kyi nam mkha' yangs pa'i rgyan du legs par byon pa'i bka' drin gyi phung po 'di ko gal te gzugs can nyid 
[\[238b.6\]]du byar btub na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi snod kyang yangs po ma yin pa'i grags pa byung du dogs pa ci ste mi mchi/_des na de lta bu'i sku drin gyi phung po rdzogs par 'tshob par byed pa'i nus pa de ni 'jig rten kun gyi mes po gser mngal can gyis kyang 
[\[238b.7\]]gsob par bzod pa'i mthu ni shin tu yang phra na/_gzhan gyis lta ga la zhig_/'on te lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid gtso bor bzung ba'i legs 'bul nyung zad cig stob par 'tshal te/_sang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rwa ba chen por zhabs kyis bcags par gsol ba 'debs kyin mchi 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]na/_ci gnang zhes bya ba'i ngag gis skabs dbye ba na/_mkhan po chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nas kyang*/_de ltar du bgyir rung bar bka'i gnang ba byin no/_/de tsam na dpal mi'i bdag po mchog gi 'khor rnams dang dge slong 'ga' zhig la 'di ltar 
[\[239a.2\]]bsgo ste/_mi ring bar dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang chen po'i phyi dang nang gi khyams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa thams cad du rdo ba dang*/_gseg ma dang*/_gyo mo dang*/_bong ba dang*/_phyag dar gyi tshogs thams cad legs par bsal te/_tsan+dan gyi chu dang*/_dri bzang po'i chu 
[\[239a.3\]]dang*/_spos kyi chu dag gis chag chag legs par thob cig_/der ma zad rgyan gyi bye brag ji snyed pa dag kyang mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar bre zhig ces bsgo'o/_/de rnams kyang mi bdag chen po'i ltar mnyan te/_gtsug lag bsam grub mthong grol gyi phyi dang nang thams cad du phyag 
[\[239a.4\]]dar legs par bgyis pa la/_dri zhim pos yang dag par bsgos te/_ngo mtshar mig gi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can gyi bla re dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_phye ma phur ma dang*/_'phan tshar gyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dbang po'i gzhu ris ltar bkra ba rnams btags 
[\[239a.5\]]shing gtsug lag khang gi phyogs kun du mdzes par brgyan no/_/khyad par de'i dbus su sngon dus kyi mkhan po chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas phun tshogs bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa dang*/_rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[239a.6\]]dpal bzang po pa ste bstan pa'i bdag po zung gi zhabs kyi pad+ma dri ma med pa dag rnam par bkod pa'i chos kyi khri chen po/_rin po che gser btso ma'i kha dog tu snang zhing zur bzhi dang ldan pa la/_sa 'dzin dang*/_rdo rje'i gdan dang*/_lha snam dang*/_nor bu brtsegs pa dag dang*/_pad+ma'i 'dab 
[\[239a.7\]]ma dang*/_bre dang*/_glang po'i rgyab dang*/_seng ge'i khyim dang*/_nor bu dang*/_bad chung dang*/_bad chen dang*/_tsan+d+ra'i gdan rnams bang rim ring thung gi rnam par yod pa/_logs shig tu ni them skas kyi rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_rgyab phyogs nas gser gyi pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i 'dab ma ltar 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]yangs pa'i rgyab yol chen po gyen du bslangs pa'i ngos su/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phra tshom gyi khur bu thogs pa'i 'od zer gyi pa tra ris mang po ci dgar 'khyug pa/_pa tra'i lag pa kha cig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs nas phyi rol du gdengs pa/_'ga' zhig ni nang du 
[\[239b.2\]]log nas chu'i dba' klong ltar 'khyil ba/_de dag la brten nas dpyangs pa'i dar dkar po dri ma med pa'i cod paN dang*/_mu tig gi drwa ba dang*/_drwa ba phyed pas mdzes par byas pa/_rtse mor dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu dbang gi rgyal po'i tog dang bcas pa'i khri lhun stug pa 
[\[239b.3\]]de nyid legs par bshams so/_/bang rim gyi khar steng khebs kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos bzang shin tu 'jam pa mang po brtsegs pa'i gding bas bkab pa/_mdun ngos su rten dang bcas pa'i lhung bzed dang*/_dkar zhal dang*/_ril ba dang*/_bdug spos gtul ba'i snod 
[\[239b.4\]]dang*/_spos kyi reng bu thogs pa'i skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'degs par byed pa'i stegs bu yangs shing mtho ba/_de'i ngos na yang nor bus gang ba'i yol go thogs pa'i sgra brgya pa sprin gyi ri mo 'khrigs pa'i gseb nas klog bzhin du 'gyu ba'i rnam pa can yang bzhag 
[\[239b.5\]]go_/de'i nyen skor rnams su nye bar mkho ba'i khri'u 'ga' zhig dang dge 'dun gyi gding ba dgram pa dang bcas pa'i nyer bsdogs thams cad ma tshang ba med par bshams so/_/sang nyin rgyu skar tha skar gyis nya ba'i zhag gi phung po de'i rgyal ba gnyis pa'i tshes bzang po res 
[\[239b.6\]]gza' pa sangs dang skar ma chu smad 'dzom pa'i nyin/_khor yug tu 'khod pa'i sa 'dzin gyi phreng ba rnams kyi mdun nam/_ngos thams cad la nyin mor byed pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas pa'i dus kyi tshe/_dge slong spos kyi reng bu thogs pa dag gis rje btsun mchog gi spyan sngar 
[\[239b.7\]]phyin te dus la bab pa mkhyen par gsol bar byed do/_/ji tsam na gan+d+harba'i yul nas 'ongs pa dang 'dra ba'i gling bu bsgyur ba la sbyangs pa mchog gi mthar son pa dag sngon du 'ongs te/_de'i lag pa na mig bu mang po dang ldan pa'i gling bu dag thogs te/_shin tu mnyen pa'i mdzub 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rtse rnams ni glog gi thag pa 'khyug pa'i rnam 'gyur du ma bsgyur cing 'bud pa na/_kun gyi snying la bdud rtsi'i thigs pa ltar sim par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_gzhan yang dge slong spos kyi dud sprin sngon po rab tu 'thul ba'i spos snod 
[\[240a.2\]]thogs pa dang*/_drang srong chen po'i zhal zas kyi snod du rung ba'i lhung bzed bai DUr+Ya sngon po'i kha dog can thogs pa dang*/_chu gtsang ma'i zhabs bsil gyi rgyun gtigs pa'i dngul gyi ril ba lta na sdug pa thogs pa dang*/_skyes bu chen po'i sku la bgo bar bya ba'i gos ber gyi na bza' dang*/_
[\[240a.3\]]gdan du gding bar bya ba'i brtul zhugs kyi yo byad ha cang gsar pa yang min la shin tu rnying pa yang min pa/_tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pos legs par bgos pa dag phrag na thogs pa la sogs pa'i nye ba 'khor gyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng 
[\[240a.4\]]ge dgra bcom pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te ljongs rgyu ba ltar nyi ma bye ba'i dpal la 'khu bar byed pa'i 'od dang 'od zer gyi tshogs lham mer dkrigs shing dal gyis byon te chos kyi khri mthon po gang na bar zhabs kyi pad+ma rnam par bkod de bzhugs so/_/der bzhugs ma thag tu phyogs 
[\[240a.5\]]mtshams thams cad nas li khri'i rgya mtsho chen po rab tu bskyod pa lta bu'i ngur smrig 'chang gi brtul zhugs la gnas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi rigs su gtogs pa dang*/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs grangs med pas kyang nye bar lhags te/_ha cang yang nye ba ma yin pa'i mtha' 
[\[240a.6\]]skor kun du rang rang gi 'os pa'i khri'u dang stan bstabs pa rnams su bag dang bcas pa'i spyod lam gyis legs par 'khod cing*/_thams cad kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi sku'i yon tan la bsngags pa'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa rnams ni snyan cing ldir ba'i gdangs su bsgyur te 
[\[240a.7\]]gdon par byed do/_/der yun ji srid cig nas dpal sdom brtson bla ma skye dgu'i bdag po nyid kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnam par gdengs pa'i mthil na/_stong 'khun gyi rgyal po'i gan mdzod las 'thon pa'i dar dkar po dri ma med pa la dpal gyi be'u la sogs pa bkra shis pa'i ri mo rnams ni 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]lhan skyes su bkra ba dang chab cig par/_skye 'gro kun gyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rten 'brel du legs par dgongs nas kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dar gyi cod paN dang*/_su war+NaN 'byams brdungs su byas pa las grub pa'i za ma tog bzo dbyibs dang bkod pa khyad par can dang 
[\[240b.2\]]bcas pa'i bkra shis par byed pa'i rdzas rnam par brgyad kyi gzugs rnams gus pa'i zhe sa dang bcas pas thogs te/_sngon dus bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang*/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bkra 
[\[240b.3\]]shis pa'i rdzas kyis mngon par mchod pa de ji lta ba bzhin du dge legs kyi rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod rdzas dag gis thog ma nyid du yang dag par mchod par byed do/_/de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yum chen shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma dbyangs kyi rgyal mo'i ye shes kyi nyi zer rnon pos lan brgyar 
[\[240b.4\]]bran pas/_blo gros kyi 'dab stong rnam par grol ba'i sbubs nas/_shes par bya ba'i gtsug lag ma lus pa rnyog pa dang bral ba'i snyan dngags sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa'i glur len pa la bsnyengs pa med pa'i ngag gi dbang phyug chen po dpal ldan daN+DI zhes bya ba/_gang gis legs par gsungs 
[\[240b.5\]]pa'i zegs ma re yang 'phags pa'i yul gyi smra ba'i khyu mchog dam pa thams cad kyi gtsug na yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar len pa la mi gus pa med pa ste/_de nyid kyis legs par stsal ba'i gzhung gis dngos su bstan pa'i thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyan gyi snyan dngags dam pa'i 
[\[240b.6\]]rgyud las 'phos pa'i shis par brjod pa dang*/_yul khyad par can rnams la phyag bya ba dang*/_dngos po nges par bstan pa'i sgo rnams sngon du 'gro bas/_skabs su bab pa'i 'bul tshan gyi rnam grangs la/_thog mar bkra shis pa'i rtags kyis spras pa'i mang bkur mchod yig can/_de 
[\[240b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rten la bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sku brnyan gser zangs las grub pa/_bstan pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku brnyan rgya gar gyi li ma khyad par 'phags pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sku brnyan chos rgyal li ma/_gsung 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gi rten la kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can gyi ljongs su 'gyur ro 'tshal pusta ka nyis brgya dang brgyad/_thugs kyi rten la sku tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten gser zangs las grub pa 
[\[241a.2\]]bka' gdams mchod rten lcags rtse can khyad 'phags gnyis/_chos gos ngur ser gras drubs can gcig_/lhung bzed rten pa dang bcas pa gcig_/dngul ljang brdung gi phud kong gcig_/dngul gyi spyi blugs legs pa gcig_/gan dkar gser ris ma stegs dang bcas pa gcig_/
[\[241a.3\]]dngul gyi bzed zhal bzo dbyibs legs pa gcig_/theg chen gan gyi rdo rje dril bu legs pa gcig_/rdo rje dang dbu rtse gser las byas pa'i dril bu gcig_/rag las byas pa gcigating shag dngul thag can cha gcig_/rag thag can cha gnyis/_gtor cha legs pa lnga tshar gcig_/ting 
[\[241a.4\]]bdun che ba cha gcig_/seng ldeng gi DA ma ru 'phan tshar bcas pa gcig_/rigs lnga'i cod paN dar dpyangs dang bcas pa/_rten khebs jus ma 'brug mthongs can gcig_/bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi gzugs dngul gyi maN+Dal che zhing legs pa gcig_/ri dwags ru ru'i rwa gcig_/glang po 
[\[241a.5\]]che'i mche ba ya gcig_/ma hA tsi na'i spog phor zong rnying las grub pa che legs gcig_/de la sogs pa'i yo byad kyi rnam pa rgya gar dang rgya nag dang bal po dang bod kyi yul gru chen po rnams la rin thang shin tu che ba'i nye bar spyad pa'i rigs dang*/_gzhan yang gser dang dngul dang*/_dar gos 
[\[241a.6\]]dang*/_ardo ka'i spobs rtse dang*/_rta phyugs la sogs pa ste de dag re re la'ang nang gses kyi rnam grangs shin tu mang zhing dngos po bzang ba'i 'bul tshan gyi rnam grangs rags pa rnams phyogs su bsdoms pa tshan grangs stong phrag gcig dang brgya phrag lnga la sum cus lhag pa'i 'bul ba bstab 
[\[241a.7\]]bo/_/de'i rjes su sdom brtson chen po'i sku'i bar chad srung bar byed pa'i bla ma dang*/_chos khrims dang*/_grwa tshang dang*/_gsol dpon dang*/_mchod dpon dang*/_bka'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i mdun na 'don chen po rnams dang*/_gnyer pa dang*/_tshong dpon dang*/_hor 'dra dang*/_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]las byed du gtags pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa'i bang mdzod dag dbye zhing*/_gtong phod kyi phyag ring legs par brkyangs pa'i 'bul ba rgya chen po dag gis bsnyen bkur stob par byed do/_/de'i rjes thogs su lhun grub steng gi chos grwa 'dir gnyug mar bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang*/_slob 
[\[241b.2\]]dpon dang*/_chos khrims dang*/_spyi pa'i dus ja ba khag rnams dang*/_dge slong dang*/_dge tshul ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi bdog pa'i dngos po gya nom pa dag gis yang dag par mchod par byed do/_/de dag gi rjes su rdzong khag chen po bco brgyad kyi mnga' 'og tu gtogs 
[\[241b.3\]]so 'tshal gyi bla ma dang*/_mi dpon dang*/_dgon pa dang*/_khyim bdag 'byor pa dang ldan pa rnams te/_mdor na sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'di'i thugs rjes legs par bsrungs pa'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor kun du 'khod pa'i 'gro ba gzhan mang po dag kyang 'ongs te/_rang rang gi dad 
[\[241b.4\]]mos kyi shugs las byung ba'i 'bul ba dang bsnyen bkur yang dag par stob par byed do/_/phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang rje btsun dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje dang*/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen po gang gi/_zhal bzang zla ba rgyas pa'i 
[\[241b.5\]]dkyil 'khor legs par mthong ba'i bsod nams kyi skal ba rmad du byung ba'i rgya mtsho chen po ni gsar du 'phel ba'i bka' drin gzhal du med pa byung ngo*/_/de bzhin du yar lung bkra shis chos sde'i mkhan po phyi dang nang gi yon tan gyi nor bu'i 'byor pas rab tu gtams shing*/_sems can gyi re ba thams cad 
[\[241b.6\]]bde blag tu 'gengs par byed pa'i ngag gi dbang phyug kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa de nyid kyang ljongs 'dir/_bstan pa'i don dang 'gro ba'i dpal du dang por spyan 'dren pa dang*/_bar du don yod pa rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas dgyes pa'i bya ba yang 
[\[241b.7\]]dag par bsgrubs nas/_de nyid kyi zhal sgo nas byung ba'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bsam las 'das pa/_rang dang gzhan gyi thar pa mchog gi srog zung brtan par byed pa'i bcud len du bsten te/_de'i rnam grangs ni mdo tsam gong du smras zin to/_/'dren mchog dam pa de'i 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las kyi rgyun chen po ni/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod gsar du btsugs pa dang*/_mgon po'i dmar chen gtor ma'i bzlog pa lo dus bzhin du btsugs pa dang*/_bskang gso chos 
[\[242a.2\]]nyid ma'i rgyun 'dzugs rnams kyi srol ma nub par bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen por mdzad/_mthar rje btsun bla ma de nyid dbus phyogs kyi bstan don la chibs kyi gdong bsgyur nas 'byon dgos byung ba na yang*/_'bul rdzongs kyi dngos po bzang zhing gtos che ba tshan grangs brgya phrag lnga las 
[\[242a.3\]]lhag pa'i yon 'bul ba stabs te/_mdor na mthar thug thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang mngon du ma gyur pa de srid du mthas gtugs pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bskyil bar mdzad do/_/de bzhin du mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'i dpon 
[\[242a.4\]]du gyur pa'i gnas lnga rig pa smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po 'jam dbyangs bla ma sangs rgyas ye shes pa'ang*/_ljongs 'dir dang por spyan 'dren pa dang*/_bar du bsnyen bkur dang yon 'bul stob pa la sogs pa thams cad snga ma nyid dang rigs mtshungs su mdzad cing*/_khyad par mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang 
[\[242a.5\]]bkra shis lhun grub pa'i gdung 'bum khang du 'das dus kyi zla mchod rgyun mi chad pa'i rten bzhag gi mthun rkyen rgya dpangs mi dman pa'i legs byas kyi tshogs chen po bskrun no/_/gzhan yang sa skya gong dang ngor pa bla brang rnams nas brdzongs pa'i 'bul sdud kyi chos rje 'byon bzhud 
[\[242a.6\]]mdzad pa thams cad la'ang phan 'dogs gang che dang*/_gnang sbyin gya nom pa mdzad pa la sogs pa bstan par dmigs pa'i mgo 'don yang dag par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang bar skabs dag tu dge slong bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa lhur bgyid pa rnams dang*/_sngon chad bsnyen pa ma grub pa 
[\[242a.7\]]rnams la mtshams rgyags legs par sbyar te yi dam gyi lha gang yang rung ba'i gsang sngags bgrang du bcug pa'ang dpag tu ma mchis pa mngon par 'du byas so/_/mdor na sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'di'i gtong sgo dang*/_mdzad pa thams cad kyang mthar ni bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]'degs su gzhol zhing 'bab pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ldan gyi rgyal po zhes grags pa'i yi ge rnam par gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gcam bu ma yin pa'i nges pa'i don nyid do zhes bden pa'i mtha' nyid kyis gsal bar 'bod pa bzhin du mchis so/_/khyad par rngu mda' lhun grub steng gi chos grwa 
[\[242b.2\]]'dir sde dge sa skyong gong mar gyur pa rnams kyi thugs bskyed rmad du byung ba nyid kyi mthu dang*/_bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu sprul pa'i sku rim par byon pa rnams kyis legs par bshad pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis rtag tu brlan pa'i dbang gis/_rnam gsum bslab pa'i nor bu'i 'byor pas kun nas 
[\[242b.3\]]bdo ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams kyi sgrigs srol la rnyog pa'i dri ma phra zhing*/_tshogs 'don dang cho ga'i rim pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de'i lag len phra mo tshun la'ang de kho na la sbyangs pa lta bu'i byang chub pa sha stag tu mchis mod/_'on kyang bar skabs 'ga' re nas sgrigs 
[\[242b.4\]]lam bag yongs su song ba'i rkyen gyis cung zad 'phyugs pa mthong ba rnams kyang*/_sngon dus mkhan chen 'jam pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas phun tshogs pas mdzad pa'i dgon gnas kyi bca' yig lhag bsam rab dkar zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub pas mdzad 
[\[242b.5\]]pa'i bca' yig lhag bsam mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang*/_grwa sa chen po rnams kyi gnang bkag ji ltar bya ba'i mig mthong byung ba dang bstun pa'i khrims su bca' ba gsar du sdom pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas/_yon gnas dang ba 'dren pa'i mchog tu 
[\[242b.6\]]bskrun no/_/de lta bu'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs 'du ba'i sgrub mchod kyi rgyun sngar yod pa rnams ma nyams par mdzad nas/_lo dus bzhin du rim par 'dzugs pa ni/_'di ltar rgyu skar rgyal gyis nya ba'i zla bar/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i rgyal tshab chen po rje btsun kun 
[\[242b.7\]]dga' bzang po pa'i gzugs sku sgyu 'phrul gyi spros pa mkha' khyab chos kyi sku'i dbyings su brtul ba'i zla dus kyi mchod pa 'bul ba'i dus bzang po dang bstun pa'i nyi shu lnga'i nyin nas brtsams te/_cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i tshes bcu drug gi bar du/_lhun grub steng gi chos grwa chen po 'di nyid du 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang lcags ra'i dgon pa dang*/_rga ldan steng gi dgon pa dang*/_'khor lo mdo'i dgon pa dang*/_rdzong chen mgo'i dgon pa dang*/_ye na'i dgon pa dang*/_rab brtan gling 
[\[243a.2\]]gi dgon pa ste/_dgon sde bdun gyi bla ma dang dge slong zhib rgyas su 'du ba'i dge 'dun gyi 'du ba chen mor grags pa ste/_de la mchod gnas stong phrag gcig la brgya phrag lngas lhag pa rnams kyis/_gtsug lag khang chen po bsam 'grub mthong grol gyi nang na stabs su 'tshogs 
[\[243a.3\]]shing*/_de'i dbur rab tu ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol ba'i mkhan po rin po che re bzhugs pa'i skabs yin na de nyid dang*/_de ltar ma byung ba na ngor pa'i chos rje chen po res rdo rje slob dpon mdzad pa la/_deng gi skabs ni mkhan rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal 
[\[243a.4\]]ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa tshogs kyi dbur spyan 'dren par mdzad de/_thog mar dus dgra'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed 'khor dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga drug cu pa dang bcas pa'i gtor rgyab nyin lnga/_tshes gcig la gtsug 
[\[243a.5\]]tor rnam par rgyal ma'i stong mchod dang*/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga gnyis so/_/tshes gnyis nas brtsams te ngor pa'i dkyil 'khor bdun du grags pa 'dzugs te/_thams cad kyang sta gon tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i cho ga dang*/_dngos gzhi rdul tshon 
[\[243a.6\]]la brten te sgrub cing mchod pa dang*/_bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga dang*/_rjes gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa nyin bco lnga ste/_de'ang gtso bor thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud rnams 
[\[243a.7\]]kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal bir+Wa pa'i zhal snga nas man ngag lugs su bkral ba'i bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa rdo rje lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor dang*/_rgyud de nyid kyi bshad pa'i rgyud thun mong ma yin pa mkha' 'gro rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las 'byung ba'i rigs bsdus pa 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]mkha' 'gro lnga'i pho brang lha bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i dkyil 'khor dang*/_rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud dpal kha sbyor ram yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i rdo rje dbyings lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang*/_shes rab rgyud gtso bor gyur pa 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[243b.2\]]rgyud le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa dang*/_rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas grub chen lo hi pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor/_rtsa ba'i rgyud de nyid dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas grub chen nag po spyod 
[\[243b.3\]]pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor dang*/_thabs rgyud gtso bor gyur pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_rgyud phyi ma dang*/_bshad pa'i rgyud dang cha mthun gyi rgyud rnams la brten nas 'phags mchog klu sgrub yab sras kyis legs par 
[\[243b.4\]]bkral ba'i gsang ba 'dus pa mi bskyod rdo rje lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor dang*/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_de'i rgyud phyi ma dang*/_rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnams la brten nas/_rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob dpon 
[\[243b.5\]]sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis dam par bkral ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor te/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud sde rin po che rnam pa gsum gyis bstan par bya ba thams cad kyi snying po las kyang ches snying por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po gser gyi ri bo'i grangs dang 
[\[243b.6\]]ldan pa rnams kyi zhal phye ba'i sgrub mchod chen mo 'dzugs shing*/_de la brten nas rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la bskal pa bye ba du ma nas bsags pa'i sdig pa'i phung po brtsegs pa ri rab ltar yod pa rnams kyang skad cig re'i yun la bsnyil bar byed do/_/yang dus tshes de dang mnyam du chos sgrog 
[\[243b.7\]]mkhan brgya dang nyi shu tsam gyis rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal tshar grangs gang 'gror klog pa dang*/_slar yang chos sgrog mkhan nyung btus kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa brgya tshar man chad gang 'grub dang rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal rdzogs pa tshar gcig klog pa dang*/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]gzhan yang dus tshes de dag dang mnyam par mkhar gsum mdo'i dgon pa dang*/_dbon po stod la sogs pa ngor gyi dgon lag yod pa phal che ba rnams su yang dge 'dun mang po 'du ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga bdun gang rung gi sgrub mchod dang*/_de dag tu ma zad sdom brtson skye dgu'i 
[\[244a.2\]]bdag po rang gi mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i gsar rnying gi dgon sde rnams su yang rang rang gi phyogs su bsdu khral yod pa las byung ba rnams kyang phal cher sku'i mched zlar gyur pa dang*/_sku tshab dang bskos mi la sogs pa la 'gan bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sgo nas/_dgon sde rang rang gi phyogs 
[\[244a.3\]]su sku rim dang*/_gtan pa med pa'i dge bskul du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnam dkar gyi bya ba rgya chen po skyong ba dang*/_gzhan yang lhun grub steng gi chos grwa 'dir zla dus dang*/_tshes grangs gang dang gang yin pa de dang de las nam yang bskal du med pa'i mchod pa dang*/_cho ga'i rim pa ni/_hor lugs 
[\[244a.4\]]kyi zla ba dang po'i tshes bcu bdun nas stong gi bar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa sa lugs kyi sgrub mchod chen mo 'dzugs pa ste/_de'ang 'di ltar dpal sa skya'i rje btsun mchog gi phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyi rol pa las byon pa'i mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po mtshan nyid dang ldan 
[\[244a.5\]]pa/_spyir mdo dang sngags kyi gzhung lugs rab 'byams la sbyangs pa dang*/_khyad par rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos rdo rje phur pa'i stod smad kyi phrin las mtha' dag la gzhan dring mi 'jog par bri thig dang*/_'don gdangs dang*/_'chams dang*/_rol mo rnams la sbyangs pa rab kyi mthar 
[\[244a.6\]]son pa re gdan sa chen po nas gdan 'dren par mdzad de/_de nyid tshogs kyi rdo rje slob dpon du bzhugs su gsol nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs dang lhan cig tu dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod/_zla ba de'i nyi shu lnga'i 
[\[244a.7\]]nang bar dge 'dun ji snyed bzhugs pas rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang*/_de'i phyi ma red nas nyer dgu'i bar la bskang gso dang*/_thugs gso dang*/_gzungs gso gang rung re mdzad/_dbo zla ba'i tshes gsum nas brtsams te dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang chen po 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bsam 'grub mthong grol la sogs pa'i lha khang rnams su rdo rje slob dpon lnga bcus dpal kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa nyin gsum pa tshar brgyad/_nyer gsum nas nyer dgu'i bar mgon khang shar du mgon po'i dmar chen gtor ma'i bzlog pa/_nag pas nya ba'i 
[\[244b.2\]]zhag gi phung po'i tshes brgyad nas nyi shu bzhi'i bar la thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas legs par bkral ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo thugs gsung sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mkha' ro dus kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[244b.3\]]dkyil 'khor chen po rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod 'dzugs/_de nas lcags ra'i dgon par sku zhabs grwa tshang dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs ji snyed bzhugs pas nyi shu lnga nas nyer dgu'i bar rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i gtor rgyab/_sa ga zla ba nas rim 
[\[244b.4\]]par dpal kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i rab tu gnas pa rgyas pa lan gnyis/_dpal rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bir+Wa pa'i zhabs kyis bkral ba'i rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod nyin brgyad/_rdo rje 'jigs byed rwa lugs ro langs 
[\[244b.5\]]brgyad skor gyi dkyil 'khor rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod nyin brgyad/_nyi shu gsum nas nyer dgu'i bar rdo rje phur pa sa lugs kyi gtor bzlog_/snron gyi zla bar bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa 'chi med rnga sgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub mchod nyin brgyad/_chu stod zla bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[244b.6\]]'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor rdul tshon la brten pa'i sgrub mchod nyin brgyad pa rnams 'dzugs so/_/zla ba de'i tshes 'gor lhun grub steng gi chos grwa 'dir ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha sum cu rtsa bdun mgron thabs kyi lha dang 
[\[244b.7\]]bcas pa'i cho ga stong phrag gsum la nyin gsum/_gro bzhin zla bar sgrol ma maN+Dal bzhi pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga nyin gsum/_nyer gsum nas nyer dgu'i bar la mgon po'i gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i gtor bzlog_/khrums kyi zla bar mgon po'i gtor bzlog_/tha skar zla ba'i tshes bcu 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bzhi'i nyin sa skor chen po zhes bya ba ste/_de yang*/_mdo sde las brgya pa las/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu rnams tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[245a.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byon te/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings 
[\[245a.3\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_rgyal po mdzes pas de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas/_mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas te mchod rten gyi dus ston gyi lugs btod do zhes dang*/_bdag cag gi ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[245a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po de nyid grong khyer rtswa can gyi gnas su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten la/_rtswa can dang sdig pa can gyi gyad dang*/_yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal po dang*/_ser skya'i grong khyer gyi shAkya'i rigs dang*/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma 
[\[245a.5\]]skyes dgra rnams kyis rang rang gi yul du dus ston gyi mchod pa dpag tu med pa btsugs par 'dul ba lung phran tshegs dang*/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo la sogs pa nas gsungs shing*/_lhag par bsod nams kyi tshogs bye ba grangs med du 'phel bar 'dod pa rnams kyis/_khyad par 
[\[245a.6\]]can gyi dus chen bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub par gsungs pa las/_de'i ngos 'dzin tshul yang yongs su grags pa ni/_mchu zla bar cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i dus mchod dang*/_sa ga zla bar mngon par byang chub pa'i dus mchod dang*/_chu stod zla bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i 
[\[245a.7\]]dus mchod dang*/_dbyug pa zla bar lha las bab pa'i dus mchod rnams sngon dus 'phags pa'i yul du dar bar grags shing*/_gzhan yang khyim nas khyim med par mngon par byung ste/_mchod rten rnam dag gi drung du dbu'i gtsug phud bregs pa'i tshe gtsug gi phud bu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]byin gyis blangs te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer ba la gtsug phud kyi dus ston byas pa dang*/_de nyid sha wa ri pa'i cha byad can du sprul nas nye bar 'ongs te/_sha na'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon gyis bran pa/_srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/_de'i na bza' kA 
[\[245b.2\]]shi ka'i gos rin thang gzhal du med pa gus pas blangs te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer te der ngur smrig blangs pa'i dus ston byas pa dang*/_dka' thub kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin nas kha zas rags pa gsol bar bzhed pa'i tshe/_legs skyes ma dang dga' stobs mas/_nyis 
[\[245b.3\]]stong gi 'o ma bskol ba'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi can gyis gser gyi yol go yongs su bkang ste phul ba bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bzhes te/_yol go de nyid kyang nai rAny+dza na'i chu bo chen por bsgyur ba/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya bas mchod pa'i ched du blangs pa na/_lha'i dbang po 
[\[245b.4\]]brgya byin nam mkha' lding gi rnam par sprul nas phrogs te/_de nyid rang gi gzugs kyis lha'i gnas su khyer ba dang yol go'i dus ston byas pa la sogs pa bshad pa dang*/_'dul ba mdo rtsa bar/_de la dus ston bya'o/_/bltams pa dang*/_gtsug phud dang*/_dbu skra dang*/_
[\[245b.5\]]byang chub pa'i dus ston dag kyang ngo zhes gsungs shing*/_khyad par bla ma'i dus chen gyi tshe mchod pa byas pa'i phan yon dang dgos pa ni/_dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu bla ma'i yon tan bzung ba'i rgyud las/_nye du 'brel pa shul na gnas pa yis/_/gshin gyi don du dge ba gang byas 
[\[245b.6\]]pa'i/_/rnam par smin pa ma phyir be'u bzhin/_/gang du skyes pa de yi rjes su 'brang*/_/de bzhin mos gus ldan pa'i slob ma yis/_/bla ma 'das nas gdung bas mchod byas na/_/thugs kyi dgongs pa gong du yongs rdzogs shing*/_/slob mas bla ma'i rnam thar snyogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[245b.7\]]bla ma 'das pa'i lo zla tshes grangs dag_/nges par bzung ste mchod pa byas gyur na/_/bskal par bsags pa'i sdig chen rab bcom nas/_/shin tu mi bzad gshin rje'i grong las thar/_/stong gsum skye bo mig bral srog nyams la/_/mig srog byin kyang de yi dper mi phod/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]de snyed skye bo dgra bcom la bkod nas/_/bskal par mchod pa'i dge bas dper mi bzod/_/bskal pa grangs med bsags pa'i sdig pa yang*/_/mun la nyi ma ji bzhin ma lus sel/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar/_'dir 'dzam gling bstan pa'i bdag po dpal sa skya 
[\[246a.2\]]pa kun dga' snying po zhes phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun du grags pa'i yi ge rnam par gsal ba/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du mkhyen pa/_thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa/_srid pa'i 'ching dgu gcod pa/_lus med g.yul las rgyal ba/_bden par yang dag par 'doms par 
[\[246a.3\]]mdzad pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po/_chos bzhin du smra ba/_rigs par 'doms pa'i rgyal po/_gzhi thugs su chud pa/_lam ma nor bar ston pa/_'bras bu bde blag tu ster ba/_phyogs bcu'i rnam par 'dren pa thams cad kyis legs so'i me tog 
[\[246a.4\]]stsal ba/_gang gi zhabs kyi chu las skyes pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi mes po gser mngal can dang*/_gtsug na zla ba dang*/_shis brjod nyan dang*/_rnam gsum gnon pa la sogs pas yan lag mchog gi gus pas btud cing phyag byas pa/_sa'i steng gi mkhas pa skye ba nas skye 
[\[246a.5\]]ba'i phreng bar shes par bgyi ba'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams la sbyangs pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu bskyil bas sgrib pa'i dri ma ma lus pa bkrus nas skye ba 'dir lhag pa'i lha'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_zab mo'i sngags kyis legs par btab pa/_phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i 
[\[246a.6\]]gtsug lag rab 'byams la lta bar byed pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'i mig dbang shin tu dag par gyur pa mang pos/_dri za'i bu mo'i rgyud [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]glu dang lhan cig tu bsres pa snyam byed pa'i snyan dngags kyi me tog u dum+bA ra mtha' dag gcig tu spungs nas/_gang gi yon tan gyi khyad 
[\[246a.7\]]par la lan brgya stong du mar mngon par bsngags pa'i tshig gi me tog sil mas yang dag par 'thor ba na/_nam zhig snyan dngags kyi me tog gi phung po ni yongs su zad par gyur kyang*/_de'i yon tan gyi cha shas ni gzhar yang gtugs par byar med pa de nyid kyis/_mi'i srid pa'i 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]za ma tog ni chos dbyings su mnyam pa nyid du rnam par bsres te/_ye shes sgyu ma'i rgyal po'i mig 'phrul gsum du sprul pa yang bde ba can dang*/_mngon par dga' ba'i zhing dang*/gser mdog can rnams su bde bar gshegs pa'i lo dus kyi mchod pa'i dus ja chen pos bskor zhes 
[\[246b.2\]]bya ba sa ngor gyi dgon sde mtha' dag tu yod cing*/_khyad par lhun grub steng 'dir gtsug lag khang du/_dus thang gi sku brnyan mthong ba don ldan zhes bya ba bkram pa'i mdun gang na bar/_me tog dang*/_spos dang*/_mar me'i phreng ba dang*/_byug pa dang*/_lha bshos la sogs 
[\[246b.3\]]pa'i nye bar spyod pa rnams ni/_re re'ang brgya stong grangs med par bskrun du bcug ste bsham mo/_/ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi tshogs ji snyed bzhugs pa ma lus pa rgyal po'i khab kyi gtsug lag khang du bsdu zhing*/de dag gi gtso bor bzhugs pa ni/_'di skabs su lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[246b.4\]]gsum gyi mchod yul mchog tu gyur pa mkhan po rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos skyong pa nyid spyan 'dren mdzad cing chos kyi khri la zhabs kyi chu skyes rnam par bkod pa dang bcas te/_mchod pa dang bstod pa'i gdangs dbyangs yid du 'ong bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas mchod cing rjed 
[\[246b.5\]]par byed do/_/de nas phyi rol du ser sbreng gi bkod pa bstar ba'i ngo mtshar ni/_dper na sin+d+hu wA ra'i rgya mtsho chen po zhig mchog gi skyes bu su zhig gi yon tan dang ngo mtshar gyi phung po gang dag rjes su dran pas g.yos shing rab tu g.yos te/_sa'i steng na yongs su lud par gyur pa na/_dga' 
[\[246b.6\]]ba'i dba' rlabs kyi phreng ba rnams ni nam mkha' la 'gong ba bzhin du rnam par 'phyo ba de ni kAny+tsa na'i lhun po 'gro shes pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te/_'dzin ma'i gzhi la brten te dal bus rgyu ba dang 'dra bar/_bla mar gyur pa dang*/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mtshar du dngar ba rnams 
[\[246b.7\]]kyis 'bud pa dang dkrol bar bya ba'i rol mo'i bye brag dpag tu med pa dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_'phan dang*/_ba dan la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sngon dus sde dge gong ma rnams kyis bzhag pa dang*/_sdom brtson bla ma skye dgu'i bdag po 'di'i sku ring 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]la gsar bskrun dang bcas pa'i yo byad kyi phreng ba/_mdzes shing lta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bzung nas/_nam mkha' la 'phyar ba dang*/_dpyangs pa dang*/_rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar gang zhig mthong bar gyur pa'i skye bo 'ga' zhig ni bcom 
[\[247a.2\]]ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi bkod pa yang 'di las lhag pa ci zhig ces gtam du sgrog pa la'ang mi spro ba med pa nyid do/_/nyer lnga nas nyer dgu'i bar la mgon po'i gtor bzlog chen po 'chams dang bcas pa dang*/_stong la phyogs bzhi gtor ma/_smin drug zla ba'i tshes la 
[\[247a.3\]]rnam par rgyal ma'i stong mchod dang rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum sgrub kyi cho ga rnams so/_/de nas mkhar mdo la sogs pa'i dgon sde mang po rnams su drug cu pa'i gtor rgyab la nyin lnga pa re'o/_/mgos nya ba'i zla bar nyi ldog gi dus tshod ri mo'i nges pa dang bstun te ngor lugs kyi dgon sde 
[\[247a.4\]]mtha' dag tu 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga drug cu rtsa bzhi pa dang bcas pa'i gtor rgyab nyin lnga pa re rnams lo dus kyi mchod pa nyid du btsugs so/_/gzhan yang zla dus kyi mchod pa la/_mkhas pa 'chi ba med pa'i seng ges/_phyogs ni sngon ma phyi ma ste/_/de gnyis zla ba dkar nag 
[\[247a.5\]]go_/zhes nyin zhag bco lnga la ni phyogs dang*/_phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis la ni dkar phyogs dang nag phyogs te/_de gnyis bsdoms pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba ste/_de lta bu'i zla ba shar dgu thams cad kyi tshes gsum la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa tshar re/_tshes 
[\[247a.6\]]brgyad kyi nang bar sgrol ma lha khang du rnam par rgyal ma'i stong mchod kyi cho ga dang*/_a thig bang rgod du dge slong bcus lam zab bla ma mchod pa/_mgon khang nub tu dge slong mang 'tshogs kyis mgon po'i bskang gso dang*/_yang mgon khang nub tu dge slong bco lngas bskang gso/_tshes bcur 
[\[247a.7\]]lha khang gsar par dge slong bco lngas gter ston 'ja' tshon lugs kyi dkon mchog spyi 'dus gtor 'bul 'chams dang bcas/_bcu gnyis la kun dga' chos 'phel gyi gdung 'bum khang du dge slong bcus kun rig gi bsnyen pa rgyas pa mdun bskyed kyi cho ga dang bcas/_bcu bzhir 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]lam 'bras lha khang du dge slong nyi shus bla ma rin chen 'byung ldan mchod pa'i cho ga dang*/_ngor pa'i chos spyod kyi rim pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa smon lam rnam pa bzhi dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang*/_mgon khang gnyis su bskang ba snga ma bzhin du btang ba dang*/_sde dge grub 
[\[247b.2\]]thob pa'i dus mchod du dge slong bzhis lam zab bla mar mchod pa'i cho ga rnams so/_/nyi shur mkhan po chen po bkra shis lhun grub pa'i gdung 'bum khang du dge slong bcu phrag gcig gis lam 'bras bla mar mchod pa'i cho ga_/nyi shu gsum la lam 'bras lha khang du dge slong bco 
[\[247b.3\]]lngas zhang blon chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa dang*/_mgon khang gnyis su chos skyong rnams kyi bskang ba snga ma ltar ro/_/nyi shu dgu la mgon khang gnyis su bskang ba snga ma bzhin no/_/stong gi nyin la dge slong bco lngas slob dpon chen 
[\[247b.4\]]po pad+ma 'byung gnas la gsol ba 'debs pa le'u bdun ma ste rim pa de nyid kyis zla dus kyi mchod pa rnams so/_/gzhan yang nang re bzhin sgrol ma lha khang du dge slong bzhis sgrol ma maN+Dal bzhi pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga dang*/_mgon khang shar nub gnyis su res 'ga'
