[\[247b.5\]]ni lnga re/_res 'ga' ni bcu re ste/_de yang bskang ba rtag 'don byed pa'i mchod pa rnams de dag gi rim pas dus mchod kyi rim pa rnams ma chag par 'dzugs par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du sdom brtson bla ma skye dgu'i bdag po gang gi sku'i srung ba pa sku zhabs grwa tshang zhes pa/_mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i dgon 
[\[247b.6\]]sde mtha' dag gi dkyil nas bkrabs shing btus pa'i bla mar gyur pa dang dge slong gi tshogs rnams ni gsang ba chen po sngags kyi theg pa gsar rnying dang bka' gter gyis bsdus pa'i chos kyi tshul mtha' dag gi gsan pa dang sbyangs pa rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pas lha dang srung ma'i tshogs 
[\[247b.7\]]gang yin pa de dang de dag gi bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang*/_las la sbyar ba'i tshul thams cad la 'jug par byed pa'i rnam par dpyod pa'i mig dkyus rnam par yangs shing*/_'dri ba dang*/_bca' ba dang*/_'don pa dang*/_gdangs dang*/_dbyangs kyi 'gyur khug dang*/_gar 'chams dang*/_
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'bud pa dang*/_dkrol bar bya ba'i rigs thams cad la thogs pa mi mnga' ba sha stag tu bzhugs pa rnams te/_de dag gis 'don par bya ba dus mchod kyi rim pa la/_lo dus kyi mchod par/_ngor lugs kyi mgon po che chung gi bskang ba brgya tshar/_dpal ldan lha 
[\[248a.2\]]mo re wa tI dmag zor rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang ba stong tshar/_rgya zhang khram pa'i gter chos las 'byung ba'i gshin rje tshe bdag gi gtor bzlog_/'ja' tshon snying po'i lugs kyi dkon mchog spyi 'dus tshogs 'khor brgya tshar/_gu ru drag po me rlung 'khyil ba'i bskang ba brgya tshar/_
[\[248a.3\]]klong gsal lugs kyi ye shes rab 'bar gyi bstan srung yongs su rdzogs pa'i bskang ba brgya tshar/_'khor lo bde mchog las bka' srung skyes bu chen po'i bskang ba brgya tshar/_mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po'i bskang ba rnams so/_/zla dus kyi mchod par zla ba thams cad kyi tshes 
[\[248a.4\]]gcig la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i stong mchod kyi cho ga_/gnyis la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum sgrub kyi cho ga dang*/_'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/_gsum la sa bdag chen po bstan pa tshe ring pa'i dus mchod du na ro mkha' spyod ma'i cho ga sin+d+hu ra'i 
[\[248a.5\]]dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_bzhi la dze tA ri'i lugs kyi tshe dpag tu med pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_tshes lnga la rdzogs chen pad+ma rig 'dzin gyi dus mchod du dkon mchog spyi 'dus/_drug la ngor lugs kyi chos spyod rgyas pa/_bdun la slob dpon rin po che'i gsol 
[\[248a.6\]]'debs le'u bdun pa dang klong gsal lugs kyi tshe sgrub yang gsang bla med/_tshes brgyad la slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i lugs kyi sgrol ma dkar mo yid bzhin 'khor lo'i cho ga dang*/_bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs bskang dang*/_ngor lugs kyi mgon po che chung gi 
[\[248a.7\]]bskang ba/_dgu la gter ston nyi ma grags pa'i lugs kyi bdud 'dul ma/_bcu la gsol 'debs bsam pa lhun grub dang dkon mchog spyi 'dus/_bcu gcig la rje mo'i dgongs rdzogs su grub chen kun dga' snying po'i lugs kyi kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bcu gnyis la bla ma kun dga' chos 'phel ba'i dus mchod du kun rig gi bsnyen pa rgyas pa'i cho ga_/bcu gsum la rje btsun bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i lugs kyi bkra shis tshe ring ma'i gsol bskang*/_bcu bzhi la nyi ma grags pa'i lugs kyi tshe sgrub bdud bzhi'i g.yul las rgyal ba dang*/_
[\[248b.2\]]ngor lugs kyi mgon po'i bskang ba/_bco lnga la lha bsang dang brgyags brngan chen po dang dkon mchog spyi 'dus dang yang 'dus/_bcu drug la sgrol ma dkar mo'i cho ga_/bcu bdun la thub pa gnas brtan dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod/_bco brgyad la mkhan po chen po sangs rgyas phun 
[\[248b.3\]]tshogs pa'i dus mchod du lam 'bras phyag mchod/_bcu dgu la nyi ma grags pa'i lugs kyi rta mgrin dregs pa zil gnon dang lha chen tshogs bskang*/_nyi shu la bstan bcos chen po sdom pa gsum gyi rab tu dbye ba/_nyer gcig la 'jam pa'i dbyangs bkra shis dpal ldan pa'i 
[\[248b.4\]]dus mchod du lam 'bras bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga_nyer gnyis la klong gsal ba'i lugs kyi ye shes rab 'bar tshogs bskang*/_nyer gsum la rat+na gling pa'i lugs kyi gu ru drag po me rlung 'khyil pa dang ngor lugs kyi mgon po'i bskang ba dang*/_dmag zor ma'i bskang ba dang*/_
[\[248b.5\]]nyer zhi la dpal sa skya pa bsod nams dbang phyug pa'i dus mchod du bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga_/nyer lnga la sangs rgyas bstan pa dang bsod nams phun tshogs gnyis kyi dus mchod du rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa'i cho ga dang na ro mkha' spyod kyi cho ga_/nyer drug la chos spyod rgyas pa/_nyer bdun 
[\[248b.6\]]la rgyal sras zhi ba lhas mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang*/_jo bo'i byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i phreng ba dang*/_klu sgrub kyi dbu ma bshes pa'i spring yig dang*/_nyi ma grags pa'i lugs kyi bde mchog tshogs bskang*/_nyer brgyad la thams cad 
[\[248b.7\]]mkhyen pa dpal mchog rgyal mtshan pa'i dus mchod du lam 'bras phyag mchod/_nyer dgu la ye shes rab 'bar tshogs bskang dang*/_ngor lugs mgon po dang dmag zor gyi bskang ba/_stong la sgrol ma maN+Dal bzhi'i mchod pa'i cho ga dang*/_gnam chos tshogs bskang rnams so/_/
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gzhan yang nyin re bzhin rgyun khyer du ye shes rab 'bar las/_seng ge'i gdong can ma dang*/_ma mo dang*/_mgon po tshogs bdag dang*/_rnam thos sras 'khor rta bdag bcas dang*/_gnod sbyin stag mda' gdong dang*/_drang srong dang*/_dam can dang*/_rgyal 
[\[249a.2\]]po sku lnga dang*/_g.yu phreng can dang*/_rmu mo dkar mo rnams dang*/_bde mchog dang*/_de'i bka' srung lngas rtsen dang*/_dam can dang bcas pa/_nyi ma grags pa'i lugs kyi drag khros gter srung klu mo dang bcas pa/_d+hi ri chos grags lugs kyi tshogs bdag_/rat+na gling pa'i lugs kyi dam 
[\[249a.3\]]can dang*/_dkon mchog spyi 'dus la sogs pa rnams dang*/_gzhi'i lha gnyer rnams kyis kun rig gi cho ga tshar re/_ngor lugs kyi mgon po'i bskang ba tshar re rnams ni nyin bzhin du ma chags par 'dzugs pa'i bdag po'i rkyen byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/gzhan yang lo dus su ka 
[\[249a.4\]]thog rdo rje'i gdan gyi bla ma dpon slob rnams dang*/_dpal byang chub gling gi bla ma dpon slob rnams dang*/_thang shing bro brdung dgon gyi bla ma dpon slob rnams dang*/_dge dgon pa'i bla ma dpon slob rnams dang*/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po'i sku srung ba'i gto mkhan gyi rgyal po dang*/_rtsis 
[\[249a.5\]]mkhan gyi rgyal po dpon g.yog rnams kyang*/_rgyal po'i khab kyi pho brang chen po 'dir drug cu chen po'i tshogs pa dang lhan cig tu lhags nas/_bka' brgyad 'dus chen dang ye shes rab 'bar dang*/_zhing skyong la sogs pa rang rang gi lugs kyi lag len la dbang 'byor ba'i 
[\[249a.6\]]gtor bzlog gi rigs mang du bca' ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas/_bcom ldan 'das bu ram shing pa'i lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bstan pa rin po che yun du brtan pa'i rim gro dang*/_sa phyogs 'di nyid kyis mtshon te yangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[249a.7\]]du bde zhing 'byor pa dang*/_lo legs pa dang*/_skye 'gro thams cad kyi rgyud la dge tshogs kyi chu gter kun nas rab tu 'phel bar bya ba'i dgongs pa mngon du bzhag ste/_sgrub cing mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim pa thams cad kyang dus dang dus las nam yang 'dzol du med pa'i 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]legs byas dpyid kyi dpal mo'i g.yab mo lta bu ni ci yang g.yob par byed do/_/de ltar gong du smos pa'i drug cu rtsa bzhi chen po nas brtsams te ji skad bshad pa'i dus mchod kyi rim pa de dag 'don par byed pa'i yon gyi zhing du gyur pa/_thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang gral 'gyed 
[\[249b.2\]]du dbul bar bya ba yang*/_res 'ga' ni dar gyi bye brag dang*/_res 'ga' ni gos bzang gi rnam pa dang*/_res 'ga' ni zam so'i rnam pa dang*/_res 'ga' ni gser dang*/_de bzhin du dngul dang*/_ja dang*/_mar dang*/_nas dang*/_tha mi ka dang*/_snam bu dang*/_snod 
[\[249b.3\]]spyad kyi rim pa dang*/_lpags pa'i rim pa dang*/_rta phyugs la sogs pa re mos kyis stob par byed pa'i sgo nas/_dge ba gang byas pa thams cad kyang byang chub kyi lam du 'gyur ba kho na lhur byed kyi/_byas grags kyi dge chos glo stong spos pa'i thug rdor bzhin du kha la yod cing gting 
[\[249b.4\]]la med pa'i rnam pa can ma yin par/_gtong phod chen po'i sgo mo bye ba brgya stong du ma ni nam yang ma bsdams par yod pa yang skye dgu'i bdag po 'di nyid kyi khyad par gyi chos so/_/gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pas bstan pa dang 'gro la phan pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ni/_spyir chos kyi 
[\[249b.5\]]sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gzhan smin par byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_'phags pa chos bgro ba'i mdo las/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dga' bar bgyi ba'i chos bzhi ste/_lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i 
[\[249b.6\]]sbyin pa dang*/_sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis snyan par smra ba dang*/_sems can thams cad kyi don ma legs pa sel zhing don sgrub pas don spyod pa dang*/_sems can thams cad la dga' ba'i bdag nyid kyi don mthun pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag ni byang 
[\[249b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dga' bar bgyi ba'o zhes dang*/_dkon mchog sgron mer/_gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/_/de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed mkhas/_/'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa/_/de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]'gro ba sdud shes cho ga gang mkhas pa/_/de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/_/gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa/_/de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed/_/ces dang*/_mdo sde rgyan las/_sbyin mtshungs de stob len 'jug dang*/_/
[\[250a.2\]]bdag nyid rjes su 'jug rnams kyis/_/snyan par smra dang don spyod dang*/_/don mthun nyid du 'dod pa yin/_/zhes dang*/_phan par byed pa'i thabs dang ni/_/'dzin dang 'jug par byed pa dang*/_/de bzhin rjes su 'jug byed pas/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir bshad do/_/zhes 
[\[250a.3\]]gsungs pas gdul bya rnams la gnas skabs su phan gdags par bya ba'i don du zang zing dang*/_mthar thug nyid du phan pa'i rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshig 'dzin pa dang*/_de'i don la 'jug pa dang*/_don de la yang dang yang du brtun te rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/yang na snod du 
[\[250a.4\]]rung bar bya ba dang*/_mos par bya ba dang*/_bsgrub par bya ba dang*/_bsgrub pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir te/_rgyan las/_dang po snod 'gyur dngos po ste/_/gnyis pa yis ni mos pa yin/_/gsum pa yis ni bsgrub pa ste/_/bzhi pas rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/zhes so/_/de 
[\[250a.5\]]ltar bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas chos la sbyor bar gsungs la/_pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa las/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bus yangs pa thob gyur nas/_/srid pa'i mun par 'thoms pa'i skye bo la/_/dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen gyis/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od las gsal bar ston/_/
[\[250a.6\]]'jig rten dam pa'i don grub snyoms pa de/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub gzhir gyur pas/_/nyi shar zer bkye 'od chen mi zad bzhin/_/_de yi bsod nams kun du zad mi shes/_/_zhes par/_chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med/_/ces gsungs pa ltar sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang nas 
[\[250a.7\]]snying po'am gtso bor gyur pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin zhing*/_bye brag tu snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can 'dod chags bdo ba dang*/_zhe sdang bdo ba dang*/_gti mug bdo bas yongs su dkrugs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la mos pa 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]lhur mi byed cing*/_nub ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pa'i nyi ma bzhin du ring du mi gnas pa'i skabs 'dir/_dam pa'i chos rnams yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_glegs bam sbyin pa dang*/_lung nod pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_kha ton du byed pa dang*/_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher 
[\[250b.2\]]yang dag par rab tu ston pa dag gi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab par gsungs pa rnams kyis thugs yongs su phrogs pa'i mi'i lhar gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po bstan pa tshe ring zhes bya ba dang*/_de'i sras su gyur pa sde dge bla ma chen po sku mched gsum ste/_yab sras thams 
[\[250b.3\]]cad zhal 'dzom du bzhugs pa'i skabs su bzhengs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' gangs can gyi brda'i lam du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi phyi mo par du bsgrub pa la/_'khor lo dang por gtogs pa 'dul ba lung gi skor dang*/_'khor lo bar pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skor dang*/_
[\[250b.4\]]'khor lo tha ma'i mdo gzhung bzhugs tshan che ba'i skor dang*/_theg pa che chung gi mdo ci rigs pa phyogs su bsgrigs pa mdo mang du grags pa'i skor dang*/_rgyud sde rnam pa bzhi bsdoms pa gsang sngags rgyud 'bum du grags pa'i skor dang*/_mthar bsngo ba dang smon lam dang shis 
[\[250b.5\]]brjod kyi skor rnams bsdoms par glegs bam brgya dang brgyad de/_rgyas par ni/_de'i dkar chag chos sbyin par du bsgrubs pa'i tshul las nye bar brtsams pa'i gtam bzang po blo ldan mos pa'i kun+da kha yongs su bye ba'i zla 'od gzhon nu'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba nyid du bkod pa ltar 
[\[250b.6\]]phyi mo chen po rdzogs pa ni chu glang gi lor yongs su grub pa nas brtsams te shing pho byi ba'i lo 'di yan chad du/_'dul ba'am/_shes phyin nam/_mdo sna la sogs pa chos tshan phyogs re tsam gyi tshar grangs ni bgrang du ci zhig_/bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal yongs su tshang ba 
[\[250b.7\]]tshar grangs brgya phrag bco lnga tsam chos kyi sbyin par btang ba dang*/_'dzam gling bstan pa'i sgron me dpal sa skya pa kun dga' snying po dang*/_gnas lnga rig pa'i paN+Di ta slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mo dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba 'dzin 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pa rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan dang*/_phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba chen po sa skya paN+Di ta dang*/_khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po chen po 'phags pa blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa ste/_dpal sa skya pa'i rje btsun gong ma lngar grags 
[\[251a.2\]]pa'i gsung rab kyi skor la/_gsung rab rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag gi skor gyi glegs bam dang*/_chos srung rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po dang dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa'i sgrub skor dang*/_lcags ri'i khongs las mi 'da' ba'i gser chos dang 
[\[251a.3\]]zab chos la sogs pa/_gsang sngags 'dzin pa thun mong ba'i spyod yul du ma btub pa rnams logs su bzhag_/gsang sngags 'dzin pa thun mong bar yongs su grags pa'i bstan bcos rnams bsdoms par glegs bam bco lnga ste/_de dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par ni 
[\[251a.4\]]dpal sa skya'i rje btsun gong ma lnga'i gsung rab rin po che'i par gyi sgo 'phar 'byed pa'i dkar chag 'phrul gyi lde mig tu bkod pa ltar/_phyi mo rdzogs pa me mo sbrul gyi lor yongs su grub pa nas brtsams te/_shing byi 'di yan chad du yongs su tshang ba tshar grangs brgya phrag 
[\[251a.5\]]gsum tsam chos kyi sbyin par btang ba dang*/_gzhan yang ngor lugs gtso bor bton pa'i chos spyod kyi rigs dang*/_sgrub thabs dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang*/_mchod pa dang*/_gtor ma la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba'i rigs su gtogs pa dang*/_gso ba rig pa'i 
[\[251a.6\]]rgyud bzhi dang*/_man ngag rgyud kyi lhan thabs sogs/_bsdoms pa glegs bam bcu gcig tsam par du bsgrubs te chos kyi sbyin pa btang ngo*/_/khyad par sdom brtson bla ma chen po 'di nyid chos dang srid pa'i gtsug lag nyi zla'i sgron ma zung 'brel ba lta bu'i phrin las kyi snang ba dkar po phyogs 
[\[251a.7\]]kyi dkyil 'khor kun du 'phro ba/_dpal sde dge rgyal po zhes yongs su grags pa gang gi gdan rabs kyi khri 'phang mthon po gang na bar/_bsod nams dpag tu med pa mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i las shugs dang*/_dman pa min pa'i stobs kyi 'khor los mnga' bsgyur ba nas brtsams 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]te/_thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don ma lus pa rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i brda'i lam du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams 
[\[251b.2\]]kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa zhes bya ba/_srid pa gsum gyi mchod sdong snga na med pa'i chos sbyin gyi phyi mo 'di nyid gsar du bskrun par brtsams shing*/_shing pho byi ba'i lor yongs su grub par bgyis te/_de'i 'phral la'ang dgongs 'grel yongs su tshang ba tshar nyi shu rtsa 
[\[251b.3\]]gcig tsam chos kyi sbyin par stsal ba dang*/_da ltar stsol bzhin pa nas/_ma 'ongs dus kyi bskal pa nas bskal pa'i phreng ba kun du yang dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rgya che zhing rgyun mi chad par stsal ba'i dam bca' brtan pa'i rwa ba ni nam yang gzhig tu med pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/
[\[251b.4\]]de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam dkar gyi legs byas chen po de dag 'grub tu nye ba dang*/_ji tsam na rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po dang gnyis su med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas sdom 
[\[251b.5\]]brtson skye dgu'i bdag po de la 'di skad du mchid pa thos te/_'dir gsung ngag rin po che'i khog phub pa la sogs pa mtshan gyi phreng bas gsal bar byas pa 'di dag kyang par gyi rgyun du bsgrub pa'i bdag rkyen mdzod cig_/de ltar byung na 'gro ba mang po zhig la phan par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[251b.6\]]bka' lung snyan dgu rdzogs pa'i phrin yig dam pa de nyid kyis nye bar phyin par gyur to/_/de ltar son pa dang*/_ji skad du/_blo gros chen pos dga' sems dang*/_/bla ma'i bka' ni 'bad de mnyan/_/rig pa yis ni mi nus na/_/mi nus de ni tshig gis sbyang*/_/bla ma 
[\[251b.7\]]las ni dngos grub dang*/_/mtho ris dang ni bde ba 'thob/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi/_/bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/_/zhes dang*/_bla ma las ni bka' stsol zhu/_/bka' bzhin bgyi zhes brjod byas la/_/thal mo sbyar zhing ma yengs par/_/bla ma'i bsgo 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ba mnyan par bya/_/zhes 'byung ba ltar bla ma'i bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de ni dngos grub mang po'i snod du 'gyur bar dgongs bzhin pas ji ltar stsal ba de ltar du bgyi zhes 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pas zhal gyis 'ches pa 
[\[252a.2\]]ltar/_slar yang yongs rdzogs bstan pa rin po che'i nyams len gyi man ngag gsung ngag rin po che'i byon tshul khog phub dang bcas pa rgyas par bshad pa legs bshad 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang*/_kun mkhyen chen po rong ston pa'i rnam thar ngo mtshar dad pa'i rol mtsho/_
[\[252a.3\]]rgyal sras rin po che thogs med bzang po dpal gyi rnam thar gzhan la phan pa'i 'od zer dang gsum la glegs bam gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam chen gsung ngag rin po che'i bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa 
[\[252a.4\]]glegs bam gsum/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam thar rmad du byung ba mdzad pa 'khrul pa med par brjod pa bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod pa mchog gi gter zhes bya ba glegs bam gcig_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gsal byed chos kyi 'byung gnas gsung rab rin 
[\[252a.5\]]po che'i mdzod dang*/_rgyal rabs gsal ba'i me long gnyis la glegs bam gcig_/ma Ni bka' 'bum glegs bam gnyis/_pad+ma bka'i thang yig glegs bam gcig_/thang yig sde lnga glegs bam gcig_/sgra bsgyur mar pa'i rnam thar dang*/_rje btsun mi la'i 
[\[252a.6\]]rnam thar/_rnam thar rgyas par phye ba mgur 'bum bcas glegs bam gcig_/phug lugs rtsis kyi legs bshad mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan bai DUr dkar po'i do shal dpyod ldan snying nor glegs bam gnyis/_bstan bcos bai DUr dkar po las dris lan 'khrul snang g.ya' 
[\[252a.7\]]sel don gyi bzhin ras ston byed snyan sgron dang bcas pa glegs bam gnyis/_gso ba rig pa'i bstan bcos sman bla'i dgongs rgyan sman rgyud bzhi'i gsal byed bai DUr sngon po'i mal+li ka zhes bya ba glegs bam gnyis/_klu 'bum dkar nag khra gsum glegs bam 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gcig_snyan dngags kyi bstan bcos chen po me long la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar daN+Di'i dgongs rgyan glegs bam gcig ste/_mdor na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po nyid dang*/_shAkya'i 
[\[252b.2\]]rgyal po'i sras su gyur pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po/_shes par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lus pa la sbyangs pa rgya mtsho'i mthar son pa/_chos thams cad thugs su chud pa/_chos kyi spyan yangs shing dri ma med pa mnga' ba/_chos bzhin spyod kyin chos bzhin du 
[\[252b.3\]]'doms pa/_chos kyi tshul mtha' dag so sor smra ba la tshig gi dbang phyug grub pa rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa'i gsung gi phrin las kyi rgyun chen po'i dam pa'i chos phal che ba dag nub par mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen po rtag tu 'byung ba'i par gyi ma mo 'di 
[\[252b.4\]]dag_/rmad du byung ba'i bzod pa dam pa'i go chas kun nas brling bar byas pa'i thugs bskyed dman pa min pa'i stobs ni/_sred med bu'i dpal la yang co 'dri bar bzod pa'i sdom brtson bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po gang gis 'bad pa du ma'i sgo nas bdag po'i rkyen 
[\[252b.5\]]legs par sbyar te/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i mun pa mtha' dag dpyis 'byin byed pa'i chos kyi nyi ma chen po 'di dag gsar du bsgrubs so/_/bsgrubs nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams kyang sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[252b.6\]]po 'di'i chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i zhing du lhags pa ni/_'di lta ste/_gang dag 'gro ba mang po'i don la rtse gcig tu gzhol ba'i bla ma dang*/_dge slong dang*/_dge tshul dang*/_dge bsnyen dang*/_gzhan yang mi dpon dang*/_blon po dang*/_'khor dang*/_yang 'khor 
[\[252b.7\]]dang*/_khyim bdag dang*/_zho shas 'tsho ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lung gi chos tshul rnyog pa med pa gang dag bzhugs pa la/_gus pa'i ri mo yongs su lhod par ma gyur pa'i sa'i steng gi skye 'gro ris su ma chad pa rnams te/_de dag thams cad la bde 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zad mi shes pa'i snang ba chen po bkye ste/_de'ang don du gnyer ba'i 'gro ba rang rang gi blo dang mos par 'tsham pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang dang gang yin pa de dag_/che ba'i yon tan dang phan yon bsam 
[\[253a.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa rnams rjes su gdams pa dang bcas pa'am/_yang na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gi rjes su yi rang bar byed pa'i tshig gis snyan par smra ba dang bcas pas len du 'jug go_/de la brten nas yangs pa'i rgyal khams kyi snod thams cad rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin 
[\[253a.3\]]thang gzhal du med pa'i 'byor pa bla na med pa dang ldan pa'i snying po can du bgyid do/_/de lta bu'i mdzad pa gang la phyogs bcu'i rnam par 'dren pa thams cad kyang dbyings nas dgyes pa'i brda mtshon du/_legs so'i lung gi gling bu mtha' dag mgrin gcig tu bsgyur ba la mi spro 
[\[253a.4\]]ba cung zad kyang med na/_'gro ba phal pa dag mgu ba tsam la ngo mtshar che ba ci zhig_/gzhan yang chos kyi ched du dmigs nas phul ba'i nor rdzas kyi bye brag ji snyed byung ba rnams kyang phal cher ni gong du smos pa'i mchod sbyin gyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la gtong ba dang*/_dge 
[\[253a.5\]]'dun 'du ba'i dri'i gtsang khang brtsigs pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang*/_de dag gi sras dang slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten rnams bzheng ba'i rgyur sbyor ba dang*/_deng gi dus su'ang 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod sdong bla na med pa chos 
[\[253a.6\]]sbyin par gyi phyi mo rgya chen po 'di dag bskrun pa la dgos pa'i yo byad mkho dgu phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa bsgrubs pa'i rgyur byed pa dang*/_de dag gi las byed pa rnams kyi bza' yon du stob pa la sogs pas/_'gro ba gang dag gis chos kyi sbyin pa mngon 
[\[253a.7\]]par 'du byas pa'i nor rdzas kyi 'brel pa cung zad re bzhag pa rnams kyang*/_nam zhig na dge ba nyid nas dge ba nyid kyi rgyu rkyen du mchi ba ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du chu'i thigs pa nyung zad cig ltung ba na yang*/_ji srid rgya mtsho chen po de nyid yongs su stong par ma gyur 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]pa de srid du ro gcig par 'dres nas so sor dbyer mi btub pa lta bu'i legs byas kyi rgyun chen po nyid du 'gro ba kho na nyid do/_/de ltar rlabs chen dge ba'i las la spro ba mchog tu brtas pa'i mi bdag chen po 'di'i mdzad pa'i phreng ba legs byas kyi zer phreng stong dang ldan pa'i 
[\[253b.2\]]ngo mtshar grags pa'i phung po 'di ni/_'bras ldan dus kyi zla 'od las kyang ches mchog tu dkar zhing bsil bar gyur pa gang dag_/phyogs bcu'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor kun du 'khod pa'i rgyal phran dang*/_sde dpon dang*/_stobs ldan dang*/_'byor ldan gyi skye 'gro mtha' dag 
[\[253b.3\]]gi rna ba'i bcud len mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed pa ni 'ga' yang med cing*/_der ma zad rnam par dkar ba'i legs mdzad dang*/_rnam par thar pa gang dag gtam du gleng bar thos pa la brten nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba sngon chad dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sgrub pa la spobs pa ma 
[\[253b.4\]]skyes pa rnams kyi spobs pa gsar du skyed pa dang*/_spobs pa skyes pa rnams gong nas gong du bogs dbyung ste/_sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po gang yang rung ba la 'jug par bskul ma 'debs pa'i mchog tu yang 'gyur ba nyid do/_/des na gong du lung drangs pa ltar byang chub sems 
[\[253b.5\]]dpa'i spyod pa bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi'i thabs kyis sems can gzhan smin par byed pa'i tshul rnams kyang ci rigs pa'i sgo nas tshang ba yin no/_/de las gzhan pa mkhas pa la 'os pa'i bgyi ba bla na med pa ni/_phyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gtsug lag thams cad dang*/_nang sdom 
[\[253b.6\]]pa rin po che rnam pa gsum dang rjes su 'brel ba'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bang mdzod ma lus pa bzung nas/_'chad pa chos kyi 'khor los skal ldan gyi gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pa dang*/_rtsod pa lung rigs kyi 'khor los log par rtogs pa tshar gcod pa dang*/_rtsom 
[\[253b.7\]]pa legs bshad kyi 'khor los rgyal ba'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa rnams kyi sgo nas chos kyi sbyin pa gtong bas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chos kyi snying po can du bgyid pa nyid ni/_sdom brtson bla ma chen po rang nyid sde dge gong ma rnams kyi bstan srid kyi bya ba 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]chen po'i khur khyer ba'i las can du song bas/_thog ma nyid nas 'bad pa gtso bor ma brtsams pa dang*/_gal srid brtsams kyang mi'i rgyal po'i kun spyod dang ldan pa'i bla mar song bas/_phan 'dags chung ba la dgongs nas/_re zhig de'i spros pa ma 
[\[254a.2\]]mdzad cing*/'on kyang rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse'i bdag nyid can rnams ni gang dang gang gi rnam pas gnas kyang*/_gzhan la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang*/_sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag ni nam yang mi 'dor ba chos nyid de/_de'ang 'di ltar bod chen 
[\[254a.3\]]ljongs kyi yul gru 'di nyid kyis mtshon pa'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du/_mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po brtan par 'dzugs pa dang*/_'gro tshogs rgya mtsho lta bu'i don la phan pa'i sems dam pa nye bar bzhag nas/_dus 'dir khams gsum chos kyi 
[\[254a.4\]]rgyal po chen po mkhan po rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la sogs pa/_gong du smos pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen po/_mkhas pa dang grub pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos yongs su bzung ba de dag 
[\[254a.5\]]sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po rang gi rigs kyi cod paN du mngon par mnga' gsol te/_sgo gsum longs spyod dang bcas pas mnyes par byed cing*/_zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i go 'phang 
[\[254a.6\]]gi gsos su rtag par len pa dang*/_srog chags dpag tu med pa'i don du yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya che zhing rgyun mi chad par bskor ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa po byed pa dang*/_gzhan yang dpal ldan sa skya pa dang ngor chen rdo rje 'chang dag gi phrin 
[\[254a.7\]]las lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun mi chad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i chos kyi rje rin po che/_phyogs bcu kun du chos kyi dga' ston 'gyed pa po ji snyed 'byon pa rnams dang*/_chos grwa chen po 'di nyid na gnyug mar gnas shing bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i phrin las zung 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gis bstan pa skyong bar byed pa'i zur chos pa yang*/_mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug bsod nams rgyal mtshan zhes pa/_kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi gsung rab mdo sde dang rgyud sde ma lus pa'i brjod byar gyur pa'i bslab pa'i gnas rnams 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mnyam pa la blo dang 
[\[254b.2\]]'tsham par tshul bzhin du 'doms pa la 'jigs med mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par yangs pa de dang*/_rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug bkra shis bzang po zhes pa/_phyi ru mkhas pa dang btsun pa'i yon tan ston pa'i 'khor gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pa/_
[\[254b.3\]]nang du grub pa'i yon tan bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa yang 'di nyid kyi ngo na ring po ma yin pa/_gcig tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar brtse ba de dang*/_gsang sngags grub pa'i rtse mor son pa rje btsun nam mkha' dpal bzang zhes pa/_mdo rgyud kyi mkhyen pa rab tu 
[\[254b.4\]]rgyas shing*/_gang gi sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs rdo rje'i zeg ma res kyang yid kyi srub shing dpung dang bcas pa dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol du yang gnas pa'i skabs med par byed pa'i nus pa mchog gi bdag nyid can de dang*/_gzhan yang bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam par gyur pa yang 
[\[254b.5\]]dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhung lugs mang po'i don la sbyangs pa mtha' ru phyin par gyur pas mgrin pa chos kyi bang mdzod du gyur pa gang dag bzhugs pa rnams te/_de dag thams cad la yang 'gro ba ris su med pa'i ngor rang rang gi blo dang mos par rjes su mthun pa'i 
[\[254b.6\]]dbang bskur ba dang*/_lung 'bogs pa dang*/_man ngag gi tshogs sbyin pa'i chos kyi gru char rgyun mi chad par bsnyil du 'jug pa la sogs pas chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo mo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po phyogs mtha' dag nas phye zhing*/_de la brten nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag 
[\[254b.7\]]dpag tu med pa dag_phal che ba ni las dang 'bras bu dang*/dkon mchog la yid ches pa'i dad pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa la bkod/_'ga' zhig ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa'i skal ba can la bkod/_phal cher ni bla na med pa 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin pa'i skal ba can la bkod/_kha cig ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi gsang ba'i sngags dang rig pa'i sngags 'chang ba'i skal ba bzang po can la bkod de/_mdor na 'gro ba phal mo che sangs rgyas la 
[\[255a.2\]]gzhol ba dang*/_chos la 'bab pa dang*/_dge 'dun la bab par bgyis te/_de dag thams cad kyang sdom brtson chos ldan gyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku drin las byung ba nyid du nges par shes dgos te/_ci'i phyir na/_gnas skabs su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i 'phel 'grib 
[\[255a.3\]]dang*/_sems can gyi bde sdug rnams ni yul phyogs gang yin pa'i sa bdag rgyal po de'i spyod pa nyid la rag las te/_dper na sngon gyi chos rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drin las/_bod yul mun pa'i gling 'dir bstan pa rin po che nyi ma shar ba ltar mdzad de/_'khor 
[\[255a.4\]]dang chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang*/_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan pa dang*/_bshad pa dang*/_sgrub pa'i phrin las dri ma med pa la longs spyod du gzhug pa dang*/_de la brten nas gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde dga'i lo thog phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 
[\[255a.5\]]sbyar ba lta bu'o/_/de las ldog pa'i las la'ang rgyal po nyid mthu che ba ni/_dper na sdig can nag po'i rtsa lag glang dar mas/log pa'i chos kyi khrims lugs bcas te/_'khor dang chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po sangs rgyas dang chos kyi sgra tsam yang mnyan pa'i 
[\[255a.6\]]skabs med par/_blang dor thams cad phyin ci log par spyad du gzhug pa dang*/_de la brten nas bstan pa dam pa'i chos la gnod tshab chen pos yun ring du nyams par byas pa dang*/_sems can rnams kyi gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde dga' ring du bcom pa lta bu'o/_/
[\[255a.7\]]de bas na sa phyogs gang dang gang gi sems can thams cad/_bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyar ba'am/_bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa gang la sbyar na'ang*/_mi bdag rgyal po de dang*/_de'i rjes su 'brang mi dgos pa ni 'ga' yang med pa las/_deng gi dus na 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]chos bzhin spyod pa'i sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'dis/_bsil ldan kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir/_rgyal ba bu ram shing pa'i lugs bzang dri ma med pa yun ring du gnas pa'i phan 'dogs rmad du byung ba ni/_lung gi chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_de'i sbyin pa'i sgo mo bye ba brgya stong 
[\[255b.2\]]phrag du ma phyogs thams cad nas phye ste/_lhag pa'i bya ba yang dag pa ni bgyis/_'jig rten du bde legs rgya chen po 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dag ni mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i sku drin gang dag gsob pa la ni bstan pa dam pa'i chos rgyas pa nyid kyis 'tshob par nus kyi 
[\[255b.3\]]de las gzhan pa'i las dang dngos po gang gis kyang gzhar yang 'tshob pa'i mtha' yod pa ma yin par sems so/_/gsum pa mi 'jigs pa dang byams pa'i sbyin pas 'gro la phan pa sgrub pa'i khyad par la/_dang po ni/_spyir mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba/_dgra gnyen 
[\[255b.4\]]bar ma'i sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang*/_rkun po la sogs pa mi'i 'jigs pa dang*/_gdon bgegs dang*/_seng ge dang stag la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa dang*/_me dang chu la sogs pa 'byung ba'i 'jigs 
[\[255b.5\]]pa ste/_'jigs pa de dag gis nyen pa las yongs su skyob pa'o/_/de skad du yang*/_rdo rje rtse mo las/_dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la/_/sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin/_/zhes dang*/_phal chen ta la lar/_mi 'jigs sbyin pas gang zhig bskyab bya ba/_/
[\[255b.6\]]srog chags gsod las bzlog par byas pa dang*/_/'jigs pas skyabs 'tshol rnams la skyabs byas pa/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/_/zhes so/_/de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa de la bdag cag gi ston pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' slob pa'i 
[\[255b.7\]]lam par gyur pa'i tshe/_sgron ma snang byed ces bya ba'i skye bar/_'dod pas yongs su drangs pa'i tshangs pa 'ga' zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa na/_mi ma yin gyi cho 'phrul gyis phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du mun bsros par byas pas/_phyogs kyi mtshan ma 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'khrugs te gang du mchi bar ma shes par ci bya gtol med du gyur pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa zhun mar du sbags pa'i ras kyis dkris pa la me sbar nas zhag bdun gyi bar du snang ba'i sgron ma bteg cing*/_tshong pa rnams 'jigs pa chen po las 
[\[256a.2\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang*/_seng ge'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_tshong pa lnga brgya dug sbrul nag pos yongs su 'khyud cing bza' bar brtsams pa na/_rang nyid yal bar bor nas sder mo rnon pos dug sbrul gyi gdengs ka la bsnun cing bsad de 'jigs pa de las bskyab pa dang*/_
[\[256a.3\]]ri dwags ru rur gyur pa'i tshe/_'bab chu drag po'i shugs kyis bdas pa'i skye bo ngan pa'i rang bzhin can skam par phyung ba dang*/_ri dwags sha ra b+ha dang spre'u'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_grog rong du lhung ba'i skye bo nyam nyes pa yongs su bskyab pa la sogs pa sngon gyi byang chub 
[\[256a.4\]]sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can dag gis ji ltar bslabs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i 'dun pa lhod par ma gyur pa'i sdom brtson mi'i bdag pos/_spyir 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa'i khyon thams cad dge ba'i lam dang rjes su mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyal khrims rdo rje 
[\[256a.5\]]brtsegs pa'i rwa ba ltar gzhig tu med par bca' ba dang*/_sngon dang da lta'i legs byas dman pa min pa'i mthu chen po'i srung bas legs par bsrungs pas na/_'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par yongs su skyob par byed de/_de'ang mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i skye 
[\[256a.6\]]'gro thams cad ni/_mthong ba'i chos 'dir phan tshun 'thab pa dang*/_rtsod pa dang*/_g.yul 'gyed pa dang*/_'phrog 'joms la sogs pa mi srun pa'i las brtsams pa'i 'jigs pa rnams ni/_mi'i rgyal po'i lugs kyi bka' khrims dam pa'i chos dang mthun pa nyid 
[\[256a.7\]]du bca' zhing*/_de la brten nas las ngan par spyod pa gang yin pa de las bzlog cing yongs su skyob par byed do/_/phrag dog drag po'i chang gis rab tu myos pa'i pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang*/_de bzhin du dgra dang*/_rkun po dang*/_rgyal po'i chad pa'i las kyi 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]'jigs pa la sogs pa mir gtogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnams ni/_mi bdag chen po 'gran pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang*/_dpung gi tshogs chen po dang*/_grags pa dkar po phyogs kyi mthar rgyas pa dang*/_bsod nams dpag tu med pa'i mthu 
[\[256b.2\]]rnams kyis yongs su skyob par byed do/_/gdon dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang*/_gcan gzan gdug pa can gyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnams ni/_chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos sngon gyi skye bar dge ba bsags pa'i mthu dang*/_da ltar dge ba legs 
[\[256b.3\]]par spyod pa la zhugs pa dang*/_sems can thams cad la phan 'dod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs dang ldan pa rgyud la skyes pa'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par byed do/_/me'i 'jigs pa dang chu'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i 'jigs pa dang*/_nad dang mu ge 
[\[256b.4\]]dang bkra mi shis pa la sogs pa byur dang skal ba ngan pa'i 'jigs pa rnams ni/_mi bdag chen pos rgyal srid thams cad dam pa'i chos bzhin du skyong ba dang*/_de'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i chab 'bangs rnams kyang dge ba'i las dang sdig pa'i las rnams kyi blang dor tshul bzhin par spyod 
[\[256b.5\]]du 'jug pa dang*/_'gro ba ma lus pa'i bde skyid kyi mdza' bo gsar du 'gugs pa'i rim gror bgyid pa dang*/_dkon mchog la mchod pa 'bul ba dang*/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rdzas dang sngags dang*/_ting nge 'dzin gyi srung ba dang bzlog pa'i cho ga rnam pa mang po rtsom pas yongs su 
[\[256b.6\]]skyob par byed do/_/de bzhin du phyi ma'i dus su nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'i 'jigs pa dang*/_mtho ris su skyes par gyur kyang*/_rten de la tshe thung ba la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i 'jigs pa rnams ni/_
[\[256b.7\]]chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po gang gis chab 'bangs su gtogs pa'i skye 'gro thams cad kyang da lta nas srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa dge ba bcu'i khrims la sbyor bar byed pas na 'jigs pa de dag mi 'byung bar yongs su skyob par byed do/_/de ltar yang rgyal po byams pa'i stobs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]kyi skyes rabs las/_rgyal po de'i mthu khyad par che bas na/_/bdag gi yin pa'i blo ni gar bzhag pa/_/de nyid de yi srung ba mchog yin pas/_/de dag gis kyang mdangs 'phrog nus ma gyur/_/zhes dang*/_bde legs chen po'i 'gro ba 'di/_/yongs 
[\[257a.2\]]su bskyang bar gyur pa na/_/lha yi dbang po dag gis kyang*/_/'di dag gtse bar mi nus na/_/sha za rnams kyis ga la nus/_/de bas nags na khyim bzhin du/_/mtshan mo dag kyang nyin par bzhin/_/gcig pu'ang grogs kyi nang 'dug 'dra/_/bdag ni 'jigs pa med par 
[\[257a.3\]]'dug_/ces 'byung ba bzhin no/_/gzhan yang bzod pa dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa'i las ni khong khro ba ste/_de nyid kyis kun nas bslangs te smra lcer thug pa rnams kyang*/_rgyal po phal pa'i khrims lugs 'khyog po lta bu ma yin par rigs pa'i 
[\[257a.4\]]lam dang rjes su mthun pas legs par brtags shing dpyad pa'i mtha' mar/_bka' lung gser gyi gnya' shing lta bu'i ljid kyis mnan te/_phan tshun gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi ngan sems kyi tsher ma rnon po mtha' dag drung nas 'byin cing rnal du gnas pa'i thabs su ci 'gyur 
[\[257a.5\]]mdzad kyi/_de las gzhan pa'i g.yo sgyu dang phyogs lhung gi spyod par ma song ba nyid gtso bor mdzad do/_/de'i dbang gis mi bdag chen po rang gi mnga' zhabs su 'khod pa rnams dang*/_de las gzhan du gyur pa'i mi dpon dang*/_blon po dang*/_sde dpon dang*/_dbang btsan 
[\[257a.6\]]pa dang*/_mdzangs par rlom pa mang pos thabs kyis bzlum par ma nus pa'i smra mchu thams cad kyang*/_'di nyid du phyin na legs par 'dum par 'gyur ro zhes/_phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad nas bkres pas nyen pa bza' ba don du gnyer 
[\[257a.7\]]ba'i phyir ram/_skom pas nyen pa btung ba don du gnyer ba'i phyir ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du rings par lhags nas/_skye dgu'i bdag po gang gi sgra 'dzin gyi dbang po ga la bar ji ltar nus pa'i tshig gis gsol bar byed do/_/ji ltar gsol ba de dag kyang gzod ma nas yongs su dar 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ba'i khrims lugs bzang po gang dag gi 'jal bar byed pa'i srang la bcal te/_mtha' don bslab par bya ba gang dang gang bsgo ba thams cad kyang*/_sngon chad med pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i mchog cig 'dod ldan gyi skye bos ji ltar thob pa de ltar du yan lag mchog gis 'dud pa dang 
[\[257b.2\]]bcas te gus pas len cing*/_'gro ba thams cad kyi yid bde bar byed pa'i sman bzhin du ngoms pa med par rtag tu 'thung bar byed do/_/khyad par legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter las/_rgyal ngan gzhan gyis gtses pa na/_/lhag par chos rgyal dran par 'gyur/_/
[\[257b.3\]]rims kyis btab pa'i sems can 'ga'/_/gangs chu 'ba' zhig yid la byed/_/ces pa ltar rgyal phran dregs pa rang gi 'khor la yang snying brtse ba med pa rnams kyis gtses pa dang*/_chad pa'i las kyis phog pa dang*/_khri mun du bskyur ba dang*/_bcings pa las thar te 
[\[257b.4\]]byung ba dang*/_rang gi dgrar gyur pas 'das pa dang*/_lus dang srog gi phung po la gtugs su nye ba'i skye bo mgon med pa dang skyabs med pa/_ri dwags smas ma bzhin du 'bros shing*/_skrag pa'i dbang gis mig rtsa rig rig tu gyur pa rnams kyang*/_sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[257b.5\]]po gang gi snying rje rnam par yangs pa'i brag rdzong btsan po ga la bar skyabs su 'tshol zhing*/_thar pa dam pa'i grong khyer bzhin du 'jug par byed do/_/der shugs ring dbugs kyi rgyu ba rab tu brdzangs pas rjod byed kyi sdeb sbyor shin tu 'khrugs par gyur pa'i ngo tsha dag ni ci yang ston par 
[\[257b.6\]]byed/_ba spu rnam par gzings pa'i lag pa dag ni thal mo sbyar ba 'ching bar byed kyin rings pa rings par lhags nas 'ongs pa dag la'ang thog ma nyid nas ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces 'jam pa'i ngag gi dbugs dbyung sngon du 'gro bas/_nam zhig na lus dang srog nongs 
[\[257b.7\]]par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de las yongs su skyob par byed do/_/gzu bor gnas pa ma yin pa'i khrims srol 'khyog por gyur pa rnams kyang bden rdzun rig pa'i thig gis btab ste/_chos kyi tshul dri ma med pa bzhin du yang dag par 'chos par byed do/_/sdom brtson chen po rang nyid 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ni sngon gyi sde dge gong mar gyur pa rnams kyi mthu dang stobs dang dpung gi tshogs dang*/_byams pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsrungs shing brtan par bzhag pa'i chab srid rnam par yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang*/_sngon gyi bsod nams kyi nus pa dman 
[\[258a.2\]]pa min pa'i bgo skal du ji ltar byung ba tsam gyis chog shes bstan te gnas so/_/de lta na'ang gnam gyis bskos pa'i rgyal po shar phyogs gong ma chen po'i bka' lung gi bkod pa btsan po snga phyi mang por stsal te/_bod chen po'i ljongs kyi bde skyid thams cad gang la shes su bcug 
[\[258a.3\]]ste/_'gro khams spyi'i mes po nyid du bskos so/_/de'i dbang gis sngon gyi bskal par byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ltar/_yul ris dang skye bo mang po rang dbang du 'du bar gyur pa kho na las/_gzhan gyi mnga' ris las 'phrog bcad la sogs pa chos min gyi 
[\[258a.4\]]bgyi ba nam yang mi mdzad cing*/_der ma zad ha cang stobs dang mthu che ba ma yin pa'i mi dpon gzhan gyi mgo 'don mdzad pa'ang rab tu mang bar yod pa dang*/_dgra jag gi rgyun lugs che ba'i gnas nas/_gzhan gyi 'dron pa la sogs pa srog dang longs spyod kyi bar du gcod par 
[\[258a.5\]]'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad pa'ang bgrang gis mi ldang ba nyid do/_/gzhan yang snying rje'i bdag nyid can 'di ni slong ba'i skye bo rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi ljon pa'i mchog tu gyur te/_de'i grags pa'i dri bsung mngar po ring po'i lam du 
[\[258a.6\]]song bas/_rgya gar gyi yul dang*/_nai pa la'i yul dang*/_kasmi ra'i yul dang*/_bod kyi yul la sogs pa phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i mi'i 'gro ba bkres pa dang*/_phongs pa dang*/_nyam thag pa dang*/_'khyams pas dub pa dang*/_mgon med pa dang*/_skyabs 
[\[258a.7\]]med par gyur pa rnams kyang me tog dang pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i mtsho la ma bsdus par yang ngang pa'i khyu dag rang 'du ba lta bu'am/_ri dwags skom pa chu klung gi ched du bsnyags pa ltar lhags nas bag tsha ba med par shing sdong gog po lta bu'i lus thams cad sa la phab pa'i 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]phyag 'tshal ba dang chab cig par/_lha'i rgyal po rgyal bar gyur cig_/bla ma chen po rgyal bar gyur cig_slong ba'i dpag bsam rgyal bar gyur cig_'dod pa'i re skong rgyal bar gyur cig ces pa'i shis par brjod pa'i tshig gi phreng ba 'ga' zhig gis mdun bsu ste/_ngo tshas 
[\[258b.2\]]nyams par byas pa'i gdong gis sa la blta ba dang bcas te rang nyid gang dang gang gis nyen par gyur pa de dang de'i gnyen po dag rtabs shing rtabs pa'i ngag gis slong bar byed de/_/de skad smra ba skye dgu'i bdag po gang gi snyan gyi dbang por sim par gyur pa'i mod la sngar 'dris kyi grogs dang 
[\[258b.3\]]phrad pa bzhin du 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung zhing snying rjes shin tu 'jam par byas pa'i gsung gis dbugs dbyung mang po sngon du 'gro bas/_ji tsam na slong ba'i skye bo gang la bza' ba'i rnam pa'am/_bgo ba'i rnam pa'am/_dbyig gi rnam pa'am/_bzhon pa'i rnam pa gang dgos pa 
[\[258b.4\]]de dag gis yongs su tshim par byed pa'i sgo nas/_bkres pa dang phongs pa la sogs pas nyam nyes par gyur pa'i 'jigs pa chen po gang dag las ci bde bar yongs su skyob par byed do/_/gzhan yang bshas rar chud pa'i srog chags kyi rigs spyan lam du bab pa thams cad la 
[\[258b.5\]]yang mi bzod pa'i snying rjes kun nas bslangs pa'i mchi ma 'khrugs bzhin pas rings pa rings par 'dod ldan gyi skye bo sdig pa'i las la ji mi snyam pa'i bdag po gang yin pa de la rin thang tshad du langs par bcal te/_srog chags de dag gi srog bslu bar mdzad pa kho na yang 
[\[258b.6\]]bgrang du med do/_/'on te rgyal po'i khab 'di dang gzhan du yang rung ste/_rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs ris mtha' dag nas lhags pa'i mgron 'grim gyi rigs mang ba dang*/_rtag tu gtong srol che ba dang*/_rgyal po'i kun spyod kyi dbang du gyur pas bza' sha'i ched du dmigs pa'i 
[\[258b.7\]]gnag lug gi srog gcod mang du 'gro ba yod pa 'di ni shin tu spang dka' bar mchis mod/_de dag gi sdig sbyong du dge slong bcu gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kun rig gi cho ga tshar re nyin re zhing 'don pa 'di nyid yin zhing*/_lan re tsa na sde dge bla ma rang gis bzhes sha mchod 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa'i rus pa dum bu bsags pa la dge 'dun rnams kyis byang chog btang nas rus bu de las sAts+tsha btab pa'i lo rgyus kyang thos so/_/gzhan yang slob dpon ma ti tsi tras rgyal po ka niSh+ka la gdams pa las/_'gro ba dman pa log ltung ba/_/mgon med 
[\[259a.2\]]nyes med phal cher ni/_/rtswa dang chu dang 'bras bu ni/_/phal pas 'tsho ba sgrub bgyid pa/_/bya dang ri dwags phyugs dag la/_/rgyal pos gsod dam gsod 'jug pa/_/ci ga rigs sam mi rigs pa/_/bde la gnas pa khyod nyid gsungs/_/khyod ni chen por mi khro 
[\[259a.3\]]zhing*/_/gnod pa bgyid la'ang bzod ces gda'/_/khyod kyi thugs rje dud 'gro la/_/kye ma su yis dgag par bgyis/_/gnod pa bgyid la bzod mdzad cing*/_/gnod mi bgyis pa 'gums mdzad pa/_/khyod la brtse dang mi brtse ba'i/_/rgyu mthun pa ni gnyis ka gda'/_/
[\[259a.4\]]sngon chad bgyis pa'i sug las kyi/_/'di ltar 'ben du gyur pa la/_/khyod nyid gnod pa mdzad na ko_/su la skyabs su mchi ba gsungs/_/gzhan gyis gnod pa bgyis na yang*/_/nyid kyi phyag gis bshug 'tshal na/_/khyod bzhengs mngon du gnod mdzad na/_/phyogs 
[\[259a.5\]]kun mun par ma gyur tam/_/kun la srog ni phongs pa ste/_/kun la gson pa sdug pa lags/_/thams cad 'chi ba'i chos can te/_/thams cad sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdungs/_/'di ltar gang zhig mi 'tshal ba/_/de nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal te/_/mkhas pa su zhig 
[\[259a.6\]]mgar ba ltar/_/tshig pa la ni yang sreg bzhin/_/khyod ni srog gcod mi dgyes shing*/_/srog gcod dgyes las phyir log na/_/rgyal srid nyams par 'gyur ram ci/_/lugs 'di ci zhig lags pa gsungs/_/mtshon cha'i thabs la mkhas khyod kyis/_/g.yul 
[\[259a.7\]]ngor srol bstod mthong lags na/_/gzhan du khyod brten ri dwags la/_/ci slad gnod pa'i las rnams mdzad/_/ri dwags gzhon nu'i spyan mnga' khyod/_/spyan dang 'dra ba'i ri dwags rnams/_/rtabs nas rig rig lta ba las/_/ci yi slad du thugs mi rje/_/khyod kyi spyan 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]dang mig 'dra'i phyir/_/khyod la dga' ba gang lags de/_/ri dwags la yang dga' bgyid na/_/khyod ni ji ltar dgyes mi mdzad/_/log par ltung dang spyan 'dra dang*/_/mgon med yul na gnas pa nyid/_/re re yang ni ri dwags dag_/mi 'gums pa yi rgyur rung ngo*/_/mi 
[\[259b.2\]]rnams la ni mdzad pa bas/_/sdug bsngal lhag par brtags pa yi/_/dud 'gro rnams la ches lhag par/_/khyod kyi thugs rjes mdzad du gsol/_/zhes dang*/_skyes rabs las kyang*/_gal te bdag ni dga' bar khyod bzhed na/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis rngon pa'i phrin 
[\[259b.3\]]las spangs/_/dud 'gro'i rang bzhin sems ni glan pa can/_/ri dwags nyon mongs rnams la snying rje mdzod/_/bde la gnas dang sdug bsngal bral 'dod pa/_/sems can thams cad mtshungs par thugs la dgongs/_/de bas bdag nyid mi 'dod gang yin pa/_/de dag 
[\[259b.4\]]gzhan la bgyi bar mi rigs so/_/grags pa med cing dam pas smad par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal sdig las byung bar rig nas ni/_/dgra bo'i phyogs bzhin sdig pa spong bar mdzod/_/de ni rang bzhin yal bar dor mi rigs/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin 'dod ldan gyi skye 
[\[259b.5\]]bo sdig pa'i bre ga ma gang ba/_dug dang khrag gi khu bas lag pa dang mtshon cha la sbags pa sdang ba'i rgyu med par ri dwags kyi rigs la bsnun pa/_don du rang gi bsod nams kyi snying la 'bigs pa/_ngan song 'bab pa'i rkang stegs 'cha' ba/_mtho ris kyi ltad mo mthong 
[\[259b.6\]]ba'i tha mar gyur pa/_gshin rje'i skyes bu bzhin du srog len gyi cho ga la goms pa'i rngon pa rnams la'ang ri dwags kyi rigs gsod du mi ster ba'i mngon rgya lo grangs kyis nges par bcad pa'i bka' khrims kyang mang du 'cha' bar mdzad do/_/gzhan yang rang dang gzhan gyi 
[\[259b.7\]]bde dga' dang legs byas kyi rtsa ba cig car du 'joms pa'i g.yul gshom dang dmag 'khrug gi rigs rnams kyang thabs kyis mgo gnon gang thub dang legs 'dum du ci 'gro gtso bor mdzad pa las/_de las ldog ste g.yul gyi las la dga' ba'i dga' ston bzhin du 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ches cher spro ba'i rgyal rigs ngan pa'i ngang tshul dag ni nam yang mi 'dzin pa chos ldan bla ma skye dgu'i bdag po 'di nyid kyi rnam par thar pa rmad du byung ba nyid do/_/des na tshul 'di dag la legs par bsams na sems can ris su med pa la rang rang gi brten gnas 
[\[260a.2\]]su gyur pa'am/_pha mar gyur pa'am/_spun zlar gyur pa'am/_mdza' bshes su gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa rnams las sdom brtson chen po 'di nyid drin du che bar khums so/_/gnyis pa ni/_spyir theg pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa'i blo ldan rgyal ba'i myu gu dam par 
[\[260a.3\]]gyur pa/_rtag tu sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir lam yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis don du gnyer bya'i 'bras bu ci zhig yin snyam na/_mgon po byams pas/_bdag sred ma lus shes rab kyis bsal te/_/sems can sred phyir brtser ldan zhi thob min/_/de 
[\[260a.4\]]ltar blo brtse byang chub thabs brtan pas/_/'phags pa 'khor ba'am mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas/_shes rab chen pos 'khor ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par/_khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las 'das shing snying rje chen pos mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' la mi 
[\[260a.5\]]gnas par/_'khor ba srid du sems can gyi don 'bad med lhun grub tu 'byung ba'i mi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang de nyid ni blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba'i snying po yin no/_/de yang rang dga' tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_theg pa chen 
[\[260a.6\]]po'i lam tshang la ma nor ba zhig la tshul bzhin du bslabs nas/_de nyid mthar phyin par gyur pa las 'byung dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i lam thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni snying rje yin te/_chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/_spyan ras gzigs kyis gsol pa/_
[\[260a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pas chos mang po la bslab par mi bgyi'i chos gcig la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de gang zhe na/_snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du mchis pa der dpung gi tshogs 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po gang du mchis pa der sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mchi ba lags so zhes dang*/_yang byang chub sems dpa' chos shin tu mang po la bslab par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[260b.2\]]chub sems dpa' chos gcig bzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po'o zhes dang*/_mgon po byams pas mdo sde rgyan las/_dang po rtsa ba tha ma 'bras 
[\[260b.3\]]mchog ldan/_/'di ni snying rje'i ljon shing chen po yin/_/rtsa ba snying rje med gyur na/_/dka' spyad bzod pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_snying rje chen po yon tan 'byung gnas kyis/_/sems can rnams la snying rje su mi byed/_/'di ltar 'di dag la ni sdug bsngal 
[\[260b.4\]]yang*/_/brtses bskyed bde ba gzhal du med pa 'byung*/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i snying rje chen po yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de nyid rgyud la bskyed pa la yang*/_thog mar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nan tan bya dgos te/_snying rje ni byams pa'i 
[\[260b.5\]]rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du yang*/_mdo sde rgyan las/_snying rje'i chu ba byams pas te/_/zhes so/_/de bsgoms pa'i phan yon ni/_zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/_bye ba phrag khrig gtams pa'i zhing dag na/_/mchod pa'i rnam pa dpag med ji snyed pas/_/skyes 
[\[260b.6\]]mchog rnams la nyin re rtag mchod pas/_/byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char mi phod/_/ces dang*/_bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa las/_chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bo la yang mi khro ba dang*/_byams pa la gnas pa dang*/_chos 'dod pa dang*/_
[\[260b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa'o zhes gsungs pas byams pa'i sbyin pa byin pa las bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/_de'i rgyu mtshan yang spyod 'jug las/_de dag dga' nas thub pa kun dges shing*/_/de la gnod byas thub la gnod pa byas/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]zhes dang*/_'gro ba 'di kun thugs rje'i bdag can des/_/bdag tu mdzad pa 'di la the tshom med/_/sems can ngo bor mthong ba 'di dag nyid/_/mgon de'i bdag nyid ci phyir gus mi byed/_/ces gsungs pas sems can la gnod pa byas pa na/_sangs 
[\[261a.2\]]rgyas la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang*/_sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis bdag gir mdzad pa dang*/_sems can rnams ni rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i ngo bo ji lta bu zhe na/_mtha' med pa'i sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde 
[\[261a.3\]]ba'i rgyu dang ldan par 'dod pa'i dmigs rnam can gang yin pa'o/_/de ltar yang slob dpon zla bas/_'gro la phan pa nyer bsgrub pa/_/byams pa chen po zhes byar brjod/_/ces dang*/_rtse mo las/_snyan cing bden par smra ba yis/_/zhe sdang 'joms byed byams pa 
[\[261a.4\]]bsgom/_/zhes pa ste/_de la dbye na gang zag gi rim pa gsum du 'gyur te/_sems can la dmigs pa dang*/_chos la dmigs pa dang*/_dmigs pa med pa la dmigs pa'o/_/de skad du yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po 
[\[261a.5\]]bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o/_/spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi ni chos la dmigs pa'o/_/bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ni dmigs pa med pa'o zhes so/_/de lta bu'i dbye ba de dang ldan pa'i byams pa de ni theg pa chen po'i lam thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 
[\[261a.6\]]ste/_de nyid kyi sbyin pa byin pa la brten nas sems can la phan 'dogs bsgrubs pa'i tshul ni/_bla ma chen po 'di nyid rang gi mnga' 'og tu gtogs pas mtshon te/_sa chen po la 'khod pa'i skye bo ma lus pa mthong ba'i chos 'dir mtho ris kyi yon tan bdun dang ldan pa'i 
[\[261a.7\]]bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing*/_slad ma rnams su yang bde legs thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba dang ldan par 'dod pa'i mnyes gshin byams pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsrung ba la sus kyang brdzi ba mi mnga' ba ni/_rgyal po byams pa'i stobs kyi skyes rabs su/_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]de'i dpung byams pa ru mtshon khro bo'i dpung ni cho ga tsam/_/de ni mi khro tshig rtsub mi smra sa yang legs par bsrungs/_/de yi bka' khrims chos yin rgyu med nor yang dam pa mchod/_/de ltar rmad du byung yang ngan pa'i chos nyid dregs pa med/_/ces dang*/_skye dgu rnams ni bde dang 
[\[261b.2\]]sdug bsngal gang*/_/rgyal po de yang de dag de bzhin 'gyur/_/de bas de ni skye dgu bsrung la mkhas/_/mtshon cha rnams dang gtsug lag rnams la goms/_/mi yi bdag po'i bka' khrims spyi bos mnos/_/de yi mtshon cha rgyan dang 'dra bar gyur/_/'jig rten phan 'byung 
[\[261b.3\]]bstan bcos tshul rnams kyis/_/gtsug lag dag kyang rnam par gsal bar snang*/_/tshar gcad pa dang phan gdags byas pa la/_/chos dang 'gal ba de ni yongs mi byed/_/tshul la mkhas shing gzhan la phan par sems/_/skye dgu rnams la rtog mkhas pa dang 'dra/_/zhes 'byung 
[\[261b.4\]]ba bzhin du/_'dir byams ldan dam pa gang gi mnyes gshin byams pa'i thugs kyi srung bas legs par bsrungs pa'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa'i khongs su/_chab 'bangs kyi 'gro ba kun kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med par ci bder gnas par byed/_rang 
[\[261b.5\]]rang gi skye ba sngon ma'i las kyi bdag pos legs par stsal ba'i bgo skal gang dang gang yin pa de la longs su spyod par byed do/_/mi'i bdag po gang gi thugs brtse dang byams pa'i sgo mo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dag ni phye ste/_de las byung ba'i phan 'dogs kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa 
[\[261b.6\]]dag 'gro ba rang rang gi skal ba dang mnyam par legs par 'gyed par mdzad do/_/de dag kyang bag tsha ba med par dper na bdag po rang gis sngon chad bcol ba'i nor la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du len par byed do/_/skye dgu'i bdag po de yis ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' lung gi bya ba'i khur 
[\[261b.7\]]lci ba dang yang ba gang yin pa de ni skye bo'i tshogs de dag gis rgyan gyi dam pa bzhin du spyi bos btud cing gus par len par byed do/_/byams pa'i sems kyis kun nas sbags pa'i zhal bzang 'dzum pa'i bdud rtsi mang po yang rtag tu 'thung bar byed do/_/tshig rtsub kyi tsher ma med 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa'i 'dzum sgros pad+ma dmar po'i 'dab ma kha bye ba las byung ba'i gsung 'jam gyi sbrang rtsi mngar po ni ci yang 'jib par byed do/_/chab 'bangs kyi 'gro ba de thams cad kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i gnas skabs kyi rnam pa ci 'drar gyur kyang mi'i bdag po'i 
[\[262a.2\]]mkhyen pa'i mig dkyus yangs pa dang dri ma med pa nyid du spros te yang dang yang du gzigs par byed do/_/de lta bu'i byams pa'i go cha bzang pos legs par bsrungs pa'i sa phyogs gang du dgra'i 'jigs pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dag gis glags rnyed pa'i 
[\[262a.3\]]skabs ci zhig_/'on kyang legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter las/_rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa 'di/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i khyad chos yin/_/zhes dang*/_rgyal po la gdams pa las/_skyes bu de ni gang dang gang 'gro yang*/_/las ni grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang*/_/
[\[262a.4\]]zhes gsungs pa ltar sems can gyi khams rnams su rang rang gi sngon bsags las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas 'byor pa dang rgud pa dang bkres skom gyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhig 'byung ba 'di ni bzlog tu ma mchis pa nyid de/_de'ang 'di ltar/_sngon gyi sbyin pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i skye 
[\[262a.5\]]bo 'ga' zhig ni/_bdog pa'i rdzas kyi 'byor pa rgya che zhing zad mi shes pa mchod pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i ched du ji tsam zad par byas pa de tsam du gang bar 'gyur ba/_rin chen 'byung gnas chen po'i chu lta bu la longs su spyod pa dag yod do/_/phal cher ni 'byor pa'i tshogs sbom zhing 
[\[262a.6\]]rgyun ring ba/_dus dus su 'phel 'grib kyi rnam pa cung zad ston kyang yongs su zad par byar med cing rtag tu 'byung ba chu klung chen po'i rgyun lta bu la spyod pa'ang yod do/_/kha cig ni ji ltar 'byor par gyur pa yongs su bzung ba la mkhas kyang gtong ba la mi mkhas pa/_yun ji srid cig nas 
[\[262a.7\]]dgos pa'i ched du yang spyod par byar med pas yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ba rdzing bu'i chu lta bu la spyod pa'ang yod do/_/gzhan pa phal cher ni bsags pa'i rdzas kyi rgyun mang po dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/_shin tu 'grib par 'gyur ba yang min pa/_ji ltar dgos pa'i dus nyid 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]na'ang rtsol ba chung ngus 'byung ba/_chu mig rtag tu 'bab pa'i chu lta bu la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/_/'ga' zhig ni bdog pa'i rdzas gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba ji snyed cig nyung ngu nyung ngu nas shin tu 'bad pas bsags kyang mang po nyid du 'phel ba mi srid la/_nyung zad gang ba ltar snang 
[\[262b.2\]]yang yongs su rdzogs pa nyid rang dbang du spyod pa'i skabs med par/_gzhan rkyen phra mo res 'khyag pa'am skom par 'gyur ba rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu la spyod pa'ang yod do/_/'ga' zhig ni phan pa'i thabs kyi khyad par mang pos lan 'gar bskyangs na'ang*/_bdag tu bzung ba'i yo 
[\[262b.3\]]byad rnams ni de'i nyes pa dran pa bzhin du spangs te sdig med kyi longs spyod dag ni yang dang yang du yid smon byed cing bsgugs nas de nyid nam byung ba na len pa tsam gyis mi tshe phyid par byed pa char sdod kyi byi'u'i chu lta bu spyod pa dag kyang yod do/_/de lta bu'i mnga' ris rnams la ni/_
[\[262b.4\]]spyir mi'i bdag po 'dis phan pa'i sems dang rjes su 'brel pa'i bgyi ba rmad du byung bas/_gna'i lugs srol du dar ba'i bgyi ba thams cad gtso bor bzung nas/_dgos pa'i dpya 'bul rnams kyang dus dang gnas skabs kyi khyad par la mngon par dpags pa'i sgo nas bsdu zhing 
[\[262b.5\]]mnga' ris thams cad yun ring du gnas pa'i bya ba kho na lhur len par mdzad de/_dper na sbrang rtsi len pa la mkhas pa bzhin no/_/de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_sbrang rtsi len pa la mkhas pa dag ni/_nam zhig dus la bab pa na sbrang bu 'tsho ba'i gsos su'ang 'jog cing rang gi dgos pa nyid kyang 
[\[262b.6\]]len par byed kyi/_sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa nyid kyang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de ni nam yang rtsom par mi byed pa de bzhin du/_sdom brtson mi'i bdag po 'dis kyang mnga' ris la longs su spyod pa'i tshe/_lan cig ma yin par rtag tu spyad par bgyir rung ba'i 
[\[262b.7\]]las kho na rtsom pa gtso bor mdzad cing*/_dus gcig nyid du rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ba'i las rnams ni rnam pa thams cad du bgyid pa ma lags shing*/_khyad par nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod kyi skal ba rmig rjes kyi chu dang bye'u'i btung ba lta bu la spyod pa'i rigs can/_gna' 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]nas dar ba'i shog ma tsam yang stob par mi nus pa dang*/_cung zad stob par nus kyang phyi nas lag pa dag ni daN+Da dang yol gos brel ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur ba rnams la ni/_bdog pa ngan ngon gang rung res kyang 'tsho bar byed pa dang*/_de'ang med na dkon mchog gsum gyi 
[\[263a.2\]]rten la phyag 'tshal ba'am/_bskor ba byed pa'am/_thugs rje chen po'i yi ge drug pa'i bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'tshob par byed cing*/_slar yang rang rang gi gnas su bkod pa'am khol por bkol ba'i bya ba gang rung dag la 'god par mdzad do/_/de las gzhan pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i las la 
[\[263a.3\]]rtag tu goms pa/_byed pa rgyu mthun gyi bag chags sad pa dang*/_snyigs ma lnga'i myos byed kyi btung bas mngon par khengs pa'i skye bo mi srun pa'i rigs can/_gzhan gyi 'tsho ba 'phrog pa dang*/_ma byin par len pa dang*/_'dod pas log par g.yems pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i las 
[\[263a.4\]]la dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du zhugs pa rnams kyang*/_gnas skabs su nyes pa gang dang gang yin pa de gsal bar bsgrags te/_spyo ba dang*/_bsdigs pa dang*/_longs spyod kyi cha las phri ba la sogs pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa mang po dag gis skyo ba skyed pa dang*/_ji srid cig nas skyo ba skyes par 
[\[263a.5\]]gyur pa na/_gos rnying pa'i dri ma bkrus nas dag par gyur pa na rang gis yongs su spyad pa de ji lta ba bzhin du/_spyod pa ngan pa de las bzlog nas rnal du gnas par gyur pa dang phan 'dogs kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba dag gis sems mgu bar byed do/_/yang ji skad du/_chu ni ji ltar bzlog 
[\[263a.6\]]gyur kyang*/_/thur du 'bab pa kho nar 'dod/_/ces pa ltar rang bzhin ngan pa'i mtha' ru lhung ba'i skye bo mi dge ba'i las las ji ltar bzlog kyang 'chos su ma btub pa rnams kyang*/_re zhig yul gzhan du spyugs nas 'brel thag gcod pa tsam mdzad kyi dri ma dang ldan pa'i gos rnying pa me la 
[\[263a.7\]]sbyangs pa bzhin du/_rgyal rigs blo ngan rnams la yongs su dar ba'i khrims lugs ngan pa dug gi sdong po lta bu de bzung nas srog gi dbang po bkums pa la sogs pa'i bya ba nam yang mi byed pa ni/_chos dang ldan pa'i sa skyong chen po rnams kyi lugs la byams pa'i sbyin pas 'gro ba la phan pa sgrub 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa rmad du byung ba nyid du shes par bya'o/_/gsum pa de ltar par du bsgrub par bskul ba'i dgos pa ni/_spyir rang re rnams kyi ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po'i bstan pa rin po che gang dang mjal ba'i skal ba sbom pa las ches sbom par gyur pa'i skabs 
[\[263b.2\]]'dir/_skyes bu dam pa blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshe 'di'i bgyi ba chu shing bzhin du snying po rnam par dben pa thams cad las rgyang bsrings te/_rje ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis/_'gro la bde skyid 'byung ba'i sgo gcig pu/_/kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che/_/zhes mtha' dang mur 
[\[263b.3\]]thug pa med pa'i lus can thams cad la/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa byang chub mchog gi bar gyi dge legs dang bde skyid kyi 'bras bu gang dang gang 'dod pa thams cad 'dzad pa med pa'i gter bzhin du 'byung ba'i sgo gcig pu nyid ni/_kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 
[\[263b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rin po che zhes bya ba/_rin thang gzhal du med pa'i bdag nyid can 'di kho na ste/_de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams su yun ring por gnas par byed pa'i thabs kyi khyad par gang yin pa dag la shin tu 'bad par bya dgos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de las 
[\[263b.5\]]lag par gyur pa'am/_phul du byung ba'am/_ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa ni/_'jig rten gsum po ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khongs na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar 'bad par bya ba'i tshul yang*/_slob dpon dbyig 
[\[263b.6\]]gnyen gyis/_de 'dzin pa dang smra byed pa/_/sgrub par byed pa kho na yin/_/zhes pa ste/_de'ang de'i rang 'grel du/_de la lung ni mdo sde dang*/_'dul ba dang*/_mngon pa rnams so/_/rtogs pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams te/_de ltar na dam pa'i chos ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes 
[\[263b.7\]]dang*/_lung 'dzin par byed pa dang smra bar byed pa yin no/_/rtogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin te/_de'i phyir de gnyis ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o zhes pa ltar lung gi chos rnams ni nyan pa dang bshad pa yang dag pa'i sgo nas gnas par 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]byed pa dang*/_rtogs pa'i chos ni sgrub pa lhur len gyi sgo nas gnas par byed pa'am/_yang na chos rje paN+Di tas/_des na sangs rgyas gsung rab dang*/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi bstan bcos kyi/_/tshig don la ni byin rlabs yod/_/'di 'dra nyan bshad byed 
[\[264a.2\]]pa la/_/thos pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/de don dpyod pa bsam pa yin/_/nan tan gyis ni de sgrub pa/_/sgom pa yin par shes par bya/_/thos bsam sgom gsum de ltar gyis/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar thos pa dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_sgom pa ste gsum gyi sgo nas 'dzin 
[\[264a.3\]]pa'am/_yang na klog pa thos bsam gyi 'khor lo dang*/_spong ba bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo dang*/_bya ba las kyi 'khor lo ste gsum gyi sgo nas 'dzin dgos shing*/_gang zhig nyan bshad bya ba'i chos de yang*/_bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du legs par 
[\[264a.4\]]brtags pa zhig dgos te/_'di ltar bzo mgar mkhas pas mer bsregs pa la sogs pa'i thabs kyis slad 'byin cing don du rung bar byas pa'i gser gang zhig_/tshong dus chen po la sogs pa gang du yang mi brin pa med pa de bzhin du/_nyan bshad bya ba'i chos gang 
[\[264a.5\]]gis/_mngon gyur brjod byar byed pa la mngon sum gyis mi gnod pa dang*/_lkog gyur brjod byar byed pa la rjes su dpag pas mi gnod pa dang*/_shin tu lkog gyur brjod byar byed pa la lung rang gis mi gnod pa cig dgos te/_chos mngon pa'i mdo las/_dge slong dag 
[\[264a.6\]]gam mkhas rnams kyis/_/bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du/_/legs par brtags la nga yi bka'/_/blang bar bya yi gus phyir min/_/zhes dang*/_'jam mgon sa skya paN+Di tas/_lung rigs rjes su gdams pa'o/_/zhes dang*/_de'i bshad par/_mdo 
[\[264a.7\]]rgyud bstan bcos dang mthun pa'i lung*/_sgra tshad dngos stobs dang mthun pa'i rigs pa/_chos nyid zab mo dang mi 'gal ba'i gdams pa'o zhes 'byung ba ltar mtshan nyid gsum mam gnyis sam gang rung cig dang ldan yang rung*/_de rnams kyi nang nas kyang yid ches pa'i lung dang 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]brgyud pa dri ma med pa las 'ongs pa'i gdams pa gtso che ste/_shin tu lkog gyur la spyod pa'i tshe lung nyid tshad mar yin pa'i phyir dang*/_lung don brgyud pa yang dag pa'i man ngag gi 'gros kyis brgyan pa med na nyams su mi lon pa mang du yod pa'i phyir dang*/_gang zag kha cig lung gi 
[\[264b.2\]]tshig sgra ji bzhin par zhen nas don du mi 'gyur ba yang du ma yod par bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na nyan pa dang bshad par bya ba'i chos ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/_sdud pos bsdus/_mkhas grub rnams kyis bkral/_paN+Di tas bshad/_lo tsA bas bsgyur/_bla ma brgyud pa'i man 
[\[264b.3\]]ngag dang lung gi rgyun dang ldan pa/_mkhas pa rnams la grags pa zhig dgos kyi/_de las gzhan pa'i chos la bshad sgrub byas kyang chos bzhin du mi 'gyur ba yang yod par gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na deng 'dir blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa su dag gis nyan pa dang bshad 
[\[264b.4\]]pa la sogs pa'i bya ba yang dag pa'i sgo nas gces spras su bya ba'i snying po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa gang des/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[264b.5\]]phan pa'i phyir legs par bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i btung ba ji snyed cig stsal ba thams cad kyang*/_bsgrun du med pa'i mkhyen rab dang*/_spobs pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dang*/_dran pa'i snyim pa dag rab tu brkyangs nas yang dag pa nyid du 'thungs pas/_chos kyi tshul thams cad la zhum 
[\[264b.6\]]pa med pa'i yon tan gyi kho lag phyogs thams cad brtas par gyur pa'i sras kyi thu bor gyur pa gang dag byon pa ste/_de'ang ston pa nyid kyis rgyal tshab chen por dbang bskur ba'i rje btsun ma pham pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba 'dzin pa dpal ldan lag na 
[\[264b.7\]]rdo rje la sogs pa sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang*/_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol te 'khor ba las ring du mngon par 'phags pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang*/_ston pa nyid kyis nges pa don gyi lung gi tshogs kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]bstan skyong chen po/_phyi dang nang gi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa'i mkhas pa dang grub pa'i sa la gnas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi phung po ji snyed pa'i tshig dang don gyi cha rnam 
[\[265a.2\]]par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_de dag gi dgongs don gsal bar byed pa bstan bcos chen po rang rgyud du brtsams pa la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_ston pa nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams su chos kyi snang ba mi nub par bya ba'i khur 
[\[265a.3\]]yongs su gtad pa/_nyon mongs pa'i bro nad kyis kun nas gtses pa rnams skyob par nges pa'i chos kyi sman pa bla na med pa/_chos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i smra spobs phun sum tshogs pa'i nga ro mthon pos lta ba ngan pa'i ri dwags thams cad ring du 'byer bar byed 
[\[265a.4\]]pa/_mi shes pa'i rab rib stug pos rnam par dpyod pa'i lta byed long ba rnams kyi dmigs bur gyur pa/_gdul bar bya ba'i blo gros kyi ku mu dA'i dga' tshal mtha' dag cig car du kha 'byed par byed pa tshig gi 'od dkar ci yang 'jo ba/_gtsug lag rab 'byams 
[\[265a.5\]]kyi don la dpyod pa'i spyan yangs pa/_smra ba'i dbang phyug_/smra ba'i rgyal po/_chos kyi gru dam pa/_chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po/_rmongs pa nges par 'jigs pa/_som nyi'i drwa ba gcod pa/_bden pa yang dag par ston pa/_chos bzhin du smra 
[\[265a.6\]]ba'i rtsom pa po tshad mar gyur pa rnams kyis/_blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bslab par bgyi ba'i gnas/_rig pa'i gzhung lugs rnam pa lnga las brtsams pa'i bstan bcos kyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig bzhugs pa las/_'dir 
[\[265a.7\]]bod gangs can pa'i brda'i lam du ji snyed cig bsgyur ba rnams sngon gyi mkhas pa rgya chen chos kyi spyan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyogs gcig tu bsdebs par bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal zhes yongs su grags pa 'di dag su zhig gis glegs bam du 'dri ba dang*/_nyan 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bshad la sogs pa'i rgyun la brten nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i bstan pa rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams su yun ring por 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i gsos sman bla na med pa nyid du 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa dang phan yon dpag tu med pa'i lung dang 
[\[265b.2\]]rigs pa'i dag byed lha'i bu mos shin tu 'jebs pa'i lhung lhung gi sgra snyan 'bum du 'byin bzhin par bla na med pa'i byang chub tu rtse gcig pas 'dun pa'i sems kyi rgya mtsho gang la mnga' ba de nyid du gzhol zhing bab pa la brten nas rgya chen spyod pa'i legs byas kyi rlabs 
[\[265b.3\]]phreng gi lce zhags srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du lud par 'phyur ba'i ngo mtshar gyi ltad mo ci yang byung ba nyid do/_/'dir smras pa/[ (*]mngon gnas gsum gyi gsal byed las bya ba brjod bgod pa'i gsal byed/[)]par sbrul lo sa gzhi chu gter las/_/gdon pa gang tshe khyab 'jug phag pa'i gzugs/_/rtsod pa'i dus 'dir rgyal bstan bskyong ba'i tshe/_/
[\[265b.4\]]thub pa'i phrin las de yang mi bdag tshul/_1_/[(*]bai darba ba'i mdzes pa bsngags pa la sbyar ba/[)]rigs rus gang du dran dbang grub pa'i bdag_/dpa' mdzangs ldan pa sngon gyi skyes bu yis/_/'bab stegs byin gyis brlabs pa de nas bzung*/_/lha bzhin 'jig rten 
[\[265b.5\]]'di na bsngags pa thob/_2_/[(*]srid min gyi dpe/[)]ga pur btung ba la brten tsha ba'i yams/_/dpal gyi dum bu las ni dri ngan bzhin/_/rigs kyis mngon par mtho ba'i skye ba las/_/ma rabs kun spyod mi 'byung khyad par chos/_3_/[(*]kun du phan par byed pa/[)]snying brtses mnga' 'bangs 
[\[265b.6\]]thams cad bde ba la/_/'god pa'i mi bdag mchog cig 'gro ba 'dis/_/smon lam dbyangs su len tshe 'jig rten khams/_/kun du phan byed mchog 'di skal bas thob/_4_/bsod [(*]mtha' dag gi gzugs can/[)]nams zla ba tshes pa'i 'od 'thung bas/_/snga na med pa'i 
[\[265b.7\]]dge mtshan ku mu dA'i/_/'dab stong rab tu rgyas pa'i ngo mtshar gyis/_/chab srid yangs pa'i dga' tshal mdzes par byas/_5_/[(*]rab rtog 'dra ba'i sgra can/[)]e ma skabs gsum bdag por 'os pa'i bu/_/sa stengs rgyan du thob pas 'tsheng ngo zhes/_/nor 'dzin 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dga' bas rang lus 'dod pa dgu'i/_/'byung gnas sprul pa'i dga' ston 'gyed pa 'dra/_6_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]lang tsho'i me tog dus su dgod pa dang*/_/'grogs pa'i yi ge rtsis dang 'gyed stobs dang*/_/'phong skyen lnga dang ger ling rtsen pa sogs/_/
[\[266a.2\]]sgyu rtsal bung ba'i rtse 'jo ci yang bsgyur/_7_/[(*]rkang pa bzhi ka'i thog mar yod pa bar chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]dge bar goms pa rnams kyi bag chags mthu/_/dge ba'i bshes kyis 'phel ba'i tshul rtogs nas/_/dge ba'i blo gros shing rta bzung ba des/_/dge ba'i 'byung gnas mang po skyabs su thob/_8_/[(*]nang shes byed kyi rgyu/[)]khyim gyi nyes 
[\[266a.3\]]pa dran pas bzhin gnag pa/_/lang tsho las byung gtam la ma 'dzum zhing*/_/'dod lha'i sgyu 'phrul kun du ma khugs par/_/tshigs gsum rim par bzlas pa'i brtul zhugs bzung*/_9_/[(*]rmad byung gi dpe/[)]sbrang rtsi'i bcud bzang 'khyil 
[\[266a.4\]]pa'i pad+ma dkar/_/bslab pa'i gnas kyis mnyen byas nyid yin na/_/srid zhi'i 'byor pa rdzogs pa'i sdom brtson gyi/_/zhi dul yon tan 'jal ba'i dpe ru byed/_10_/[(*]sbyar ba'i dpe rgyan/[)]ris bral sems can kun gyi re ba dag_/bde bar 'gengs pa gang gi rin thang ni/_/gzhal bar ches 
[\[266a.5\]]dka' byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/tshul khrims dbang gi rgyal po bzhin du bzung*/_11_/[(*]bar chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]rdo rje 'chang ba las byung cho ga yis/_/rdo rje'i pho brang mchog tu legs bcug nas/_/rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid smin byas pa'i/_/rdo rje'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i skal bas brgyan/_12_/[(*]rgyu las 'bras bu snga ba can/[)]rnam 
[\[266a.6\]]'dren skye dgu'i bla ma nyid dang de sras sa la gnas pa'i bdag nyid chen po rnams/_/zhing rab sbyong dang sems can yongs su smin pa'i spyod pa dpag med bskal pa'i sngon du spyad/_/slad nas rang gi rnam par 'phrul pas gzhung lugs kun gyi thos pa mi dman rgyud 
[\[266a.7\]]la bsags/_/rtsod pa'i dus su dam pa'i chos tshul stobs kyis skyong ba'i dus la bab na rgyal srid byed/_13_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]skabs gsum bdag po'i stobs dang 'byor pa dag_/sa la 'phos lta'i rdzong chen drug gsum gyis/_/mtshon pa'i bod chen spyi yi rje bo ru/_/rgyu skar 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dbus su rgyu skar bdag po bzhin/_14_/[(*]'byor ba rgya che ba/[)]'di yi rkang bkod stegs bu kany+tsa na'i/_/pa drwa'i glog gi rtse 'jos dam 'khyud pa'i/_/nor bu brgya phrag 'bar ba'i me long du/_/phyogs kyi sa 'dzin 'dud pa'i bzhin ras 'char/_15_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]de na kun dga'i dpal ster rgyal ba'i bstan/_/srid par 
[\[266b.2\]]bcas pa'i phrin las 'khor lo yis/_/rgya mtsho'i gos can yangs par dbang sgyur ba'i/_/sde bzhi'i bdag po nyid du gnam gyis bskos/_16_/[(*]bya ba lhan cig brjod pa/[)]gang tshe mchog gi rdo rje'i slob dpon dang*/_/lhan cig rgyal ba sras dang slob mar bcas/_/'dus 
[\[266b.3\]]pa kun gyi srid zhi'i ya mtshan ni/_/rtag tu shis pa'i dbyangs snyan mgrin pa bsgrigs/_17_/[(*]bya ba brjod pa bar gyi gsal byed/[)]der de'i gnas gsum lha yi sku gsung thugs/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgrubs pa'i spyi bo nas/_/dbang bskur rigs kyi cod paN bcing ba yis/_/bdud las 
[\[266b.4\]]rnam par rgyal ba'i go 'phang byin/_18_/[(*]rnam par rmongs pa'i dpe/[)]de tshe dpal ldan sa yi bdag po'i dpal/_/rdzogs ldan 'khor los sgyur du rnam 'khrul te/_/bi shwa karmas dgra las rgyal byed pa'i/_/'khor lo rin chen byin pa'i shes pa bsgrubs/_19_/[(*]rab rtog gi dpe/[)]gang bsams yid bzhin 
[\[266b.5\]]'jo ba khyod kyi dpe/_/nga nyid 'os snyam de tshe lag pa na/_/bzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen ci la rgyags/_/dpal de dpag bsam yongs 'du la yang yod/_20_/[(*]kun phan/[)]sdom brtson mi yi bdag por mi 'dud pa'i/_/phyogs bral khengs pa ldan pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[266b.6\]]tshogs/_/dbang byed mig zur 'khyog pos 'debs pa yi/_/grogs su btsun mo rin chen 'dzum zhing byung*/_21_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]bgyi ba kun la sgrin cing yid rab gzhung*/_/grungs pa'i mig lam de ru lkog na mo'i/_/dbyig gi rnam pa mi mthong 'ga' yang med/_/'dod don sgrub pa'i 
[\[266b.7\]]blon po rin chen mang*/_22_/[(*]ngag don gyi dpe las bzhin sgra gcig pa/[)]gzugs mdzes yan lag rdzogs pa'i gom lhod kyis/_/bsams pa'i gnas su myur skyel gnyis las 'thung*/_/ston ka'i sprin dkar g.yo ba'i phung po la/_/nyi gzhon 'od kyis 'khyud bzhin mngon par rgyu/_23_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\](*]srid pa can/[)]'gras pa med par dbang sngon ri dang 'thab/_/snying grogs min yang rlung dang lhan cig rtse/_/bslu 'dod med par kun gyi yid 'phrog pa'i/_/rnga rngog zar bu g.yo ba'i cang shes rta/_24_/[(*]gzi brjid ldan pa/[)]dpa' rtul yan lag mchog gi lang tsho yis/_/khengs ldan ral gri bskyod pa'i 
[\[267a.2\]]dmag dpon 'dis/_/nyes bral skye bo gzhom pa'i dogs pa med/_/sdang sems 'chang ba min rnams rjes su srung*/_25_/[(*]nyams ldan las dpa' ba'i nyams dang ldan pa/[)]'chi med dpal 'byor la sdang lha ma yin/_/bsad pa khrag gis sa gzhi ma brlan par/_/kun las rgyal ba'i dpa' mtshan bkra 
[\[267a.3\]]shis rtags/_/rnam brgyad mchod pa'i yul du gyur 'di ci/_26_/[(*]rab spel gyi rgyan/[)]shAkya'i skyes mchog de yi byin rlabs kyis/_/'bab stegs legs par byas pa'i rdzas mchog brgyad/_/shis pa brjod pa'i glu dang mnyam 'grogs pas/_/lugs brgya'i mdun sa che 
[\[267a.4\]]la mnga' gsol to/_27_/[(*]gau Da ba'i mdzes pa bsngags pa la sbyar ba/[)]dkar min ngag gi nyes pa zad pa'i bka'/_/shis pa yang dag bsgrubs pa'i nyin mo nas/_/mi bdag gang gi dge ba'i phrin las ni/_/nam mkha'i pha rol bgrod pa'i bkra shis phyug_28_/[(*]bya ba lhan cig brjod pa/[)]'gro ba thams cad bde dang bde ba'i rgyur/_/dgod pa'i snying 
[\[267a.5\]]stobs brling bar bzung ba dang*/_/lhan cig shar phyogs gong ma'i las lung gis/_/lan mang dag tu rdo rje'i khams su bsgrubs/_29_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]dka' lung zla 'od gsar pa'i zer gyi phreng*/_/phyogs bral sa gzhi skyong ba gzhan dang de'i/_/chab 'bangs bcas pa'i 
[\[267a.6\]]bde skyid sa mos tshal/_/'dab stong rnam par bzhad pa'i bcud du 'thung*/_30_/[(*]chos dpe/[)]rtag tu gus pas bsten dang dam tshig chu/_/'thungs pa rjes su dran pas mnyam 'grogs shing*/_/mthun pa bsgrub dang bar chad bsgral ba yi/_/las la yid ltar mgyogs pa srung ma'i tshogs/_31_/[(*]drag shul gyi nyams/[)]rab khros sdang 
[\[267a.7\]]mig blta ba'i 'gyur ba res/_/bstan dgra'i don snying dmar po rang gnas su/_/skad cig gnyis par mi tshugs kha yi sgor/_/khrag gi dba' rlabs rtse na 'phen par byed/_32_/[(*]rig byed kyi gtam rgyud las drangs pa'i khyad par la gnas pa'i don gzhan bkod pa/[)]snying rje'i bdag nyid rang don sgrub pa yi/_/zol gyis 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'gro ba kun la phan pa brtson/_/rgyal po skal ldan shing rta'i dka' spyad kyis/_/gang+gA mi yul phab pa bdag don nam/_33_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sgra gzhung gis zin pa'i dpe/[)]gang phyir ljongs 'dis mtshon pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/_/rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi grangs la 'phya ba yi/_/mgon du dpal dang ldan pa stobs bcu pa'i/_/chos kyi rgyal 
[\[267b.2\]]srid skyong gis mdzes par byas/_34_/[(*]rim pa can gyi rgyan/[)]mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu chos dang dbyig_/'dod pa thar pa sde bzhi'i dge mtshan rnams/_/bskal pa'i char dang chu gter dpag bsam shing*/_/'bras bu phun tshogs dpyid kyi dpal la snyegs/_35_/[(*]rgyu 'gog pa/[)]khyod nyid 
[\[267b.3\]]sbyin pa'i gnas gyur thams cad kyi/_/dpal kun 'byung ba'i gnas su nges na yang*/_/ring nas sems can kun gyi nyer 'tsho ru/_/'gyur ba'i smon lam btab phyir su zhig bstod/_36_/[(*]sems med rab rtog[)]sbyin pa rnams bzhi'i dngos po'i rang dbang du/_/'dzin pa'i thag pa chad pas ches 
[\[267b.4\]]'thor ba/_/rjes su 'tshol la khyod kyi grags pa des/_/phyogs bcu kun du rgyug pas brel lam snyam/_37_/[(*]ngo mtshar phul byung*/[)]thub bstan ring du gnas byed mi bdag gi_/chos drin rnam par brdal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/rdzogs par chud pa'i stong gsum mi mjed zhing*/_/byed pa po de'i snying stobs e ma che/_38_/mi rnams 
[\[267b.5\]]nor ni phal cher bung ba'i dpal bzhin bsags la rang yang spyad pa'i skal ba phra/_/phal cher snyim par gnas pa'i chu bzhin ji tsam btsir ba de tsam 'dzad la shin tu nye/_/'di yi dpal ni rin chen gser bzhin bsod nams 'bab stegs dam pa'i rten gsum 'grub byed dang*/_/dag dang ma sbyar ba'i dge
