[\[267b.6\]]dag sbyin pa'i zhing gyur kun gyi nor mchog mi zad grags pa 'phel phyir gnas/_39_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo 
[\[267b.7\]]rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_bstan pa gnas pa'i ched du dgongs 'grel par du bsgrub par bskul ba'i sarga ste lnga pa'o//_//
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]@#/_/kalpas+yatsirAm+bupeyamar+haSh+yAshwAsAgatayAbataHkathAr+SheHkApyapatib+hAnashAsanemaMkAr+YaMkr-in+narapat+yanenasaMdz+nyaH/_
[\[268a.2\]]@#/_/[(*]mchog gi nges par bstan pa/[)]skal pa'i srid du btung bar 'os pa'i chab/_/ji snyed r-i Shi'i hub tu song ba'i gtam/_/bstan pa 'di la sus kyang ma spobs pa'i/_/bya ba mi bdag 'di yis sgrub pa ston/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\](*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]kun du dga' ba'i dpal ster dkon mchog gsum/_/skyabs kyi dam par brnyes pa'i brtul zhugs kyi/_/mchog gsum dgyes pa'i phrin las rgya mtsho yi/_/ska rags ldan pa mdzes byed sde bzhi'i bdag_/des ni sems can byang chub gnas 'dong ba'i/_/theg pa mi 
[\[268b.2\]]bslu nges pa dam pa'i chos/_/mchog tu legs par rtogs pa'i blo gros kyis/_/legs byas 'di yi sgo 'phar 'byed la zhugs/_/[(*]ngag don gyi dpe/[)]zla gzhon zer gyis chu yi gter bzhin dang*/_/mi sbyin skyes kyis pad+ma'i tshal la bzhin/_/gtong ba 'di yi phan yon bsam yas

[\[268b.5\]]pa'i blo 'khrul te/_/rgyud mang sgra dang bsres pa'i chos 'chad pa/_/blta 'dod 'di na yang dang yang rgyu'o/_/spyi don drug pa bskul ba mi ldog ched du ji ltar par du bsgrub pa la/_gang du bsgrub pa'i yul gyi khyad par/_nam zhig bsgrub pa'i dus

[\[268b.7\]]'dzin gyi rwa bas yongs su bskor ba'i bod kha ba can gyi rgyal khams te/_de'ang mdo sde pad+ma dkar po las/_ston pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa'i dus na/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phros te/_byang phyogs kha ba can gyi rgyal khams la song*/_der gzigs 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]te zhal 'dzum mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel bas de'i rgyu rkyen bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang*/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas gang gis kyang gdul byar ma gyur pa'i gnas/_
[\[269a.2\]]'dre srin du mas gang ba'i mtha' 'khob kha ba can gyi rgyal khams der/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dam pa'i chos nyi ma shar ba lta bu zhig dar zhing rgyas par 'dug ste/_sems can de rnams kyang thar pa byang chub kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' 'khob de 'dul ba'i gnyen

[\[269a.4\]]bcags pa'i gnas/_mtha' 'khob kha ba can gyi rgyal khams la yod pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba de rnams thar pa byang chub kyi lam la 'god par gyur cig_mtha' 'khob de yang bdag gis 'dul ba'i zhing du gyur cig_/bdag 'dre srin la sogs pa'i sems

[\[269a.7\]]tog bkod pa'i mdo'i 'khor lo tha ma las/_ston pa mya ngan las 'da' bar nye ba'i tshe/_byang phyogs kha ba can gyi rgyal khams zhabs kyis ma bcags/_gsung gis ma bskyangs pa 'di rnams kyi don du bzhugs par zhu zhes gsol bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]nga'i gdul bya ni rdzogs pa yin/_da gdul byar gyur pa med pas le lo can rnams chos la bskul ba dang*/_rtag par sun 'don pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul ston no/_/byang phyogs kha ba can gyi rgyal khams kyi sems can ni da lta dud 'gror song bas sems can 
[\[269b.2\]]mi'i ming med do/_/mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa/_shi ba thams cad kyang mi ldog pa/_mtsho la kha ba babs pa bzhin du ngan 'gro'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba yin pas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa mar 'grib kyi dus su/_byang chub sems dpa' khyod nyid kyi gdul byar 'gyur 
[\[269b.3\]]gyis/_thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pas mi'i 'gro ba bskyed/_de nas zang zing gis bsdus/_de nas chos kyis bsdus/_'gro ba'i don du 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_jo bo rje lha gcig rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs na 'od dpag med pa'i lha khang zhig yod pa'i nang du

[\[269b.7\]]kye rdo rje las gnas dang sa sbyar ba'i bcu gnyis par bshad cing*/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/_bod yul du ni lhan skyes te/_/zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can ma/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs/_/brag gi khyim la brten te gnas/_/rang byung gi ni skye gnas can/_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]zhes dang*/_lha mo dri ma med pas zhus pa'i mdo las/_nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyis stong lnga brgya na gdong dmar can gyi yul du dam pa'i chos dar bar 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_sher rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i mdo'i yul yongs su sbyong bar/_yul

[\[270a.3\]]tshul ni/_thog mar dag byed kyi phung pos yongs su gtams shing bai DUr+Ya sngon po'i maN+Dal phyis pa lta bu mtshor gyur pa de rim gyis bri nas/_shug pa la sogs pa'i rtsi shing nags tshal stug pos khyab pas/_sA la'i ljongs zhes grags pa'i yul du gyur pa ste/_de'ang 
[\[270a.4\]]'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_nga yi dus nas lo brgya na/_/kha ba can du mtsho bri nas/_/sA la'i nags ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/der khyad par bod kyi 'gro ba chags pa'i tshul ni/_lha las phul byung gi bstod par/_khyab 'jug gis ni 'thab dka' bsad/_/
[\[270a.5\]]ces pa'i 'grel par/_'di ltar khyab 'jug gis 'thab dka' la dris pa/_dpung gi tshogs bco brgyad khyer ram/_'on te nor lha gcig pu khyer zhes dris pas/_des dpung gi tshogs rnams khyer ro zhes smras pa dang*/_des zhe 'gras par gyur nas/_khyab 'jug 
[\[270a.6\]]gis skya bseng gi phyogs byas te g.yul ngor chas pa na/_srid sgrub kyis kun du bltas te smras pa/_kho bos ni nye du'i tshogs gsod par mi nus te/_gang gi don du rgyal srid thob par 'dod pa'i nye du'i tshogs de ji ltar gsad par bya zhes smra ste/_srid sgrub 'thab pa las 
[\[270a.7\]]ldog par gyur pa dang*/_khyab 'jug gis smras pa/_khyed ni blun pa yin te/_gang gis mi ni gsad pa dang*/_/gang zhig gsod par byed pa dag_/de dag gnyis ka mi dmigs te/_/bsad dang gsod pa po yod min/_/rigs dang 'dul ba phun sum tshogs/_/bram 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ze ba lang glang po dang*/_/khyi dang sme sha can dag dang*/_/mkhas pa rnams ni mnyam par blta/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa med par lta ba'i tshigs su bcad pa mang po bstan cing*/_sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan pas bslus nas/_srid sgrub kyi kha lo pa rang nyid kyis byas te/_g.yul 
[\[270b.2\]]bgye bas 'thab dka'i rigs dpung gi tshogs bco brgyad dang bcas pa brlag par gyur to/_/rU pa ti zhes bya ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs gcig dang bcas pa g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/_bud med kyi cha lugs su byas te bros nas ri kha ba can gyi khrod du zhugs te/_gnas pa'i rigs 
[\[270b.3\]]las deng sang na yang bod ces bya bar grags pa yin no zhes 'byung ba dang*/_bod kyi gtam rgyud ltar na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyis byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje dang ldan pa khyod kha ba can gyi rgyal khams bya ba yod pas/_bcom 
[\[270b.4\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdul byar ma gyur pas sku'i zhabs kyis ma bcags/_gsung gi 'od zer gyis ma khyab/_thugs kyi byin gyis ma brlabs pas/_khyod kyis kha ba can gyi sems can rnams dang por zang zing gis bsdus/_de nas chos kyi sbyin pas thul la de rnams kyi 
[\[270b.5\]]rgyud smin par mdzod cig ces bya ba 'byung ngo*/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis pho brang ri tA la'i rtse mo rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas kha ba can du gdul bya'i sems can la gzigs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa med par 
[\[270b.6\]]mtshan mo mun pa mun rum dang 'dra bar mun nag 'thibs por 'dug pa gzigs nas/_der skyes pa'i sems can rnams mtsho la kha ba bab pa ltar yar 'thon pa med par mar ngan song du 'gro bar 'dug_/de nas thar pa med par lcags kyi za ma tog kha bcad pa 'dra bar gzigs 
[\[270b.7\]]nas der 'gro ba'i don byed pa la ni/_dus de tsam na bod khams gling dgu zhes pa/_rin po che 'od kyi gling ni stod khams gsum ste/_g.ya' ri dang*/_gangs ri'i bar na glang po che dang ri dwags rnams kyis dbang byas pa/_ru bzhi sogs pa'i gling ni bar khams gsum ste/_brag ri 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]dang spang ri'i shod na brag srin dang spre'u rnams kyis dbang byas pa/_rma bya 'og gling ni smad khams gsum ste/_nags tshal dang ljongs kyi dbus na bya dang srin po rnams kyis dbang byas pas sems can mi zhes bya ba'i ming yang ma byung ba dang*/_dud 'gro ni 
[\[271a.2\]]ha cang glen zhing gti mug pas blang dor tshul bzhin du ston pa'i yul du ma btub bo/_/des na thog mar mi'i 'gro ba bskyed par dgongs te/_'phags pa gru 'dzin gyi mgon po'i phyag g.yon pa'i 'od zer las byang chub sems dpa' spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu many+dzu zhes bya ba zhig sprul te/_
[\[271a.3\]]de la gtan khrims lnga'i sdom pa phog ste/_zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi bdud rtsi yang mang du stsal te/_byang phyogs kha ba can zhes bya ba'i rgyal khams su song la brag dum bu gcig pa la sgoms shig ces sgom byed du btang ngo*/_/des kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pas skad cig gcig 
[\[271a.4\]]gi yun la kha ba can du phyin te/_sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go_/ji tsam na/_rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgyu 'phrul gyi zlos gar yin pa'i brag srin mo zhig rtse dga'i bde ba rjes su dran pa'i tshul gyis rang gi rigs dang mthun par spre'u mo'i cha byad du bzung ste mdun 
[\[271a.5\]]du 'ongs so/_/'ongs nas kyang bsam gtan pa de dang dga' mgur spyod pa'i brda thabs kyi rnam pa ci yang bstan pas zhag bdun gyi bar du dus 'da' bar byas kyang de'i sems ni cung zad kyang g.yo bar ma nus so/_/spre'u mos bsams pa/_kha dog dang byad bzhin mi sdug pas lan 
[\[271a.6\]]no snyam ste/_nyin gcig bud med bzang mo mdzes shing lta na sdug pa lang tsho gzhon nur gyur pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa cig tu sprul nas/_slar yang 'dod pa'i rtse dga' la spyod pa'i brda bstan pa dang*/_spre'u de'i sems cung zad g.yos pa bzhin du de'i gdong la mig zur gtad de 
[\[271a.7\]]cung zad gnas par gyur to/_/ji tsam na des kyang glags rnyed par shes nas/_ngo tshas spangs pa bzhin du de'i gam du lhags te/_bdag cag gnyis ni mthun pa'i khyim thabs bya'o zhes lan gcig ma yin par smra bar byas so/_/spre'us smras pa/_nga ni 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gzigs las dge bsnyen du bslabs nas de'i bslab bya la slob pa zhig yin pas srog gi dbang po 'gags pa ni bla'i/_bslab bya 'dor ba la ni de lta ma yin no zhes so/_/der brag srin mos smras pa/_kye ma spre'u'i rgyal po bdag la dgongs shing gson/_/bdag ni las kyi 
[\[271b.2\]]dbang gis srin mo'i rigs su skyes/_/'dod chags dbang gis khyod la zhen cing chags/_/chags pa'i dbang gis khyod la bskor zhing gsol/_/bdag ni khyed dang khyim thabs mi byed na/_/tha mar srin po dag dang 'grogs nas ni/_/nyi ma re la srog chags nyi khri gsod/_/
[\[271b.3\]]nang ma re la srog chags stong stong za/_/srin mo'i phru gu mang po skyes gyur nas/_/kha ba can gyi yul phyogs 'di nyid ni/_/srin po'i rgyal khams dag tu gyur nas kyang*/_/dzam+bu'i gling kun srin pos za bar 'gyur/_/des na bdag ni 'di ru 'chi bar bgyi/_/shi nas bdag cag las kyi 
[\[271b.4\]]dbang gis kyang*/_/bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba'i gnas su ltung*/_/sdom pa bsrungs pas mi phan khyod la sdig pa 'ong*/_/khyod kyi byang sems sdom pa'ang nyams nas 'gro/_/de bas bdag la dgongs la thugs rjes gzigs/_/zhes gdung ba'i smre sngags 'don pa dang*/_
[\[271b.5\]]mchi ma'i rgyun ni khrag gi chu gter bzhin du dbab par brtsams so/_/byang chub sems dpas bsam pa ma la 'di'i bsam pa bzhin byas na ni bslab pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur la/_cig shos de las bzlog ste bslab pa la gnas par byas na ni srin mo shi bar 'gyur gyi/_da ni 'phags pa 
[\[271b.6\]]nyid la gsol te/_des ji ltar bka' stsal pa de ltar bgyi'o snyam du rdzu 'phrul gyis ri po ta la'i gzhal med khang na 'phags pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i drung du mngon par dong ste phyin nas gsol pa/_kye ma 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje can/_/bdag gi dge bsnyen 
[\[271b.7\]]sdom pa srog bzhin bsrungs lags kyang*/_/bdud kyi rigs kyi srin mo 'dod sems can/_/bdag la tho 'tsham lags sam sdom pa dbrog tu byung*/_/de la ji ltar bgyis la bdag gis sdom pa bsrung*/_/byams mgon khyed kyis bdag la gnang bar zhu/_/zhes gsol pa la/_
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'phags pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brag srin mo dang bza' tsho gyis shig_/bar chad du mi 'gro zhing phan pa rgya chen po 'byung ba'i grogs su 'gro ste/_ma 'ongs pa na kha ba can gyi rgyal khams su khyod kyi bu tsha rigs rgyud 'phel zhing mi'i 'gro bar gyur to/_/
[\[272a.2\]]de dag gis dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur bas na mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_rje btsun ma sgrol mas kyang*/_de ni legs kyi des ni mi'i 'gro ba 'phel nas dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i rten du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de skad thos nas slar yang kha ba can du log ste brag srin mo dang bza' tsho byas 
[\[272a.3\]]te/_dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa las/_zla ba dgu dang ngo bcu nas 'gro ba rigs drug nas tshe 'phos pa'i phru gu gshis mi 'dra ba drug byung ste/_lus thams cad spus khengs pa dang*/_ma srin mo yin pas mjug ma med cing gdong dmar ba/_de'ang lha las 'phos pa 
[\[272a.4\]]ni/_dal ba dang*/_yid gzhungs pa dang*/_rgyud 'jam pa/_lha ma yin las 'phos pa ni zhe sdang che ba dang 'thab pa la dga' ba/_mi las 'phos pa ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sred pa che ba/_dud 'gro las 'phos pa ni go ba zhan pa dang shes rab chung ba/_yi dwags las 'phos pa ni lto 
[\[272a.5\]]la zhen pa dang ser sna che ba/_dmyal ba las 'phos pa ni khro gtum che ba dang sdug bsngal la bzod sran che ba rnams byung ste/_de thams cad kyang pha la ltos nas lus la spus gang ba dang*/_ma la ltos nas mjug ma med pa dang*/_sha khrag la dga' ba dang*/_mgo la skra yod pa 
[\[272a.6\]]dang*/_smra shes pa rnams su gyur to/_/ji tsam na pha spre'u byang chub sems dpa' des lho phyogs kyi nags tshal rma bya can zhes bya ba na spre'u mang du yod pa'i zlar bskyal te bzhag go/_/ring zhig lon na de thams cad spre'u yang ma yin la/_mi yang ma yin pa kho na lnga brgya tsam 'phel 
[\[272a.7\]]nas/_rang rang gi pha ma dang mes po dag mthong ba na/_kha du ma nas lag pa gdengs pa rong rong byed cing nga la zas byin zhes slong bar byed do/_/de dag spre'u byang chub sems dpa' des mthong nas shing thog la sogs pa btus nas byin pas tshim par yang ma nus shing lus sems 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]shin tu gdung bar gyur pas yid la 'di ltar byed de/_nga la lus sems gdung ba 'di lta bu 'byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bka' bzhin du bsgrubs pa las byung gi khong la ni 'khrul pa ci zhig srid/_des na da ni ji ltar bgyi zhes 'phags pa nyid la zhu bar rigs so snyam nas ri bo gru 'dzin gyi gzhal 
[\[272b.2\]]med khang du phyin te 'phags pa la gsol pa/_kye ma khyim thabs bdud kyi btson rar ma shes shing*/_/bud med bdud kyi 'ching bar ma shes la/_/bu tsha 'khor ba'i bdud du ma shes pas/_/'dod pa dug gi lo mar ma rtogs te/_/snying rjes chags par gyur nas bdag bslus na/_/
[\[272b.3\]]'dod pa'i 'dam bying sdug bsngal ri yis mnan/_/nyon mongs dug 'thung las ngan rims kyis btab/_/sdug bsngal nad kyis bdag nyid mnar gyur na/_/'khor ba'i gnas su bdag nyid rang gis bcings/_/ma rig mun 'thibs rtog pa'i drwa bar chud/_/da ni ji ltar byas la bu tsha 
[\[272b.4\]]bskyong bar bgyi/_/'phags pas bka' yis gnang nas bdag la 'di ltar byung*/_/phyi ma dmyal bar ltung bar the tshom med/_/de phyir bdag la thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol/_/zhes zhus pas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas/_bod kha ba can gyi 
[\[272b.5\]]yul ni mun pa'i smag rum dang 'dra/_mi ma yin gyi sems can gyi dbang byas nas nga'i gdul bya'i rten du ma gyur/_'di rnams 'gro ba mir spel la/_mtho ris dang thar pa thob pa'i ched du khyod btang ba yin/_khyod nga la the tshom dang yid gnyis ma byed cig_/khyod kyang sdug bsngal 
[\[272b.6\]]bar ma byed cig_/khyod kyi bu tsha bo 'di rnams mthar mir 'gyur gyis de dus nam zhig na nga'i gdul byar 'gyur ba yin pas/_khyod la nyes pa med kyis thar pa'i cha dang mthun no/_/shin tu legs so/_/sdug bsngal bar ma sems shig_/khyod kyi rigs brgyud de rnams kyi zas 
[\[272b.7\]]skal 'di yin no gsungs nas/_nas dang*/_gro dang*/_sran ma la sogs pa'i 'bru sna bdun gnang nas 'di kha ba can gyi yul dbus su thob cig dang 'bru'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung zhing gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_zangs dang*/_lcags la 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]sogs pa rin po che'i phye ma snyim pa gang kha ba can gyi phyogs su gtor nas sa gzhi rin po che'i 'byung gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/_khyod kyi rigs rgyud 'di dag mir gyur pa'i tshe gser dngul la sogs pas kyang 'tsho zhing*/_rin po che'i 'byung khungs rnams kyang dus 
[\[273a.2\]]dus su kha bye bar 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_ljags kyi mchil ma zhig kyang kha ba can gyi phyogs su 'phangs te/_ma 'ongs pa na byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa chos skyong ba thod brgal ba re 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyung nas btang ngo*/_/spre'u byang chub sems dpas kyang kha ba 
[\[273a.3\]]can gyi yul du 'ongs te yul dbus su 'bru de dag btab bo/_/de legs par smin pa dang sprel phrug rnams la bstan te/_'di dag 'phags pas khyed rnams kyi zas skal du gnang ba yin pas 'di zo dang zhes smras pas/_yul de la zo dang du grags so/_/de nas slar 
[\[273a.4\]]yang thugs rje chen po'i phyag mthil gyi 'od zer las khye'u chung mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa cig sprul te/_sngar gyi mi yang min la spre'u yang min pa de rnams kyi khrod tu btang ba na/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod kyi lus byad mdzes shing lta na sdug pa 'di ci las byung*/
[\[273a.5\]]khye'u chung gis smras pa/_ngas mi dge ba bcu spong ba dang*/_dge ba bcu spyad pa las byung ngo*/_/'o na bdag cag rnams la yang slobs shig dang de ltar du spyad par bgyi'o zhes gsol lo/_/de nas sprul pa'i khye'u des sprel phrug rnams la mi dge ba bcu spong ba dang*/_dge 
[\[273a.6\]]ba bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'i tshul rnams legs par bshad do/_/de dag gis kyang blang dor tshul bzhin du byed pa'i sgo nas bsgrubs pas/_gzugs byad je bzang du song ste mthar thams cad kyang mir gyur to/_/re zhig na de dag gcig la gcig 'jigs 
[\[273a.7\]]pa'i snang ba dang bcas mchis pa la/_mes pos che bzhi byas te zhing rnams khag bzhir bgos nas gtad pa ltar so sor gyes pas/_se dang*/_rmu dang*/_ldong dang*/_stong ste nang gi mi'u rigs bzhi'am gdung drug tu grags so/_/de ltar ji skad bshad pa lta bu'i 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdul zhing du gyur pa'i yul de'i gnas tshul dang ngo mtshar gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/_pu rgyal bod kyi yul la bsngags pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rdo rje'i mgur du blangs pa las/_shar rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs na/_/gnas pu rgyal 
[\[273b.2\]]bod ces bya ba yod/_/ri mthon po gnam gyi ka ba yod/_/mtsho dma' mo g.yu mi maN+Dal yod/_/gangs dkar po shel gyi mchod rten yod/_/spang ser po gser gyi lhun po yod/_/dri zhim po sman gyi bdug spos yod/_/tshon bkra ba gser gyi me tog yod/_/dbyar bkra 
[\[273b.3\]]ba g.yu yi me tog yod/_/kye gangs ri'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/gnas de na khyod kyi zhing khams yod/_/zhing de na khyod kyi gdul bya yod/_/kye gangs ri'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/ri pad+ma stong ldan dbyibs legs pa/_/dus dgun gsum dkar po shel gyi 
[\[273b.4\]]mdog_/dus dbyar gsum sngon po g.yu yi mdog_/dus ston gsum ser po gser gyi mdog_/dus dpyid gsum khra bo gzi yi mdog_/mdog phun sum tshogs pa'i ri bo la/_/ltas khyad par 'phags pa'i mtshan ma yod/_/dung dkar po g.yas su 'khyil pa la/_/
[\[273b.5\]]dar dmar po rA ga'i cod paN yod/_/mi khyod kyi snyan pa phyogs bcur 'phel/_/dpal be'us ri skor brgyan pa la/_/nags bkra shis yal 'dab rgyas pa yod/_/mi khyod kyi bu slob phyogs bcur 'phel/_/ri bogs chad g.yu yi bum pa la/_/chu yan lag brgyad 
[\[273b.6\]]ldan chu mig 'bab/_/mi khyod kyi thugs rjes bsil bar byed/_/gnam sngon po g.yu bya'i gdugs su phub/_/las nyon mongs tshad pa zhi bar byed/_/mi khyod kyi dge bshes 'phel ba'i rtags/_/ri zur gsum bra gzhung gnam du mtho/_/deng mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba 
[\[273b.7\]]'dra/_/mi khyod kyi gnas der bstan pa spel/_/sa rtse brgyad lung pa phyogs su gyes/_/kye 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phab pa 'dra/_/mi khyod kyi mi mthun gcod pa'i rtags/_/thang chen po'i gseb na ri chung nyal/_/mtsho chen po'i nang gi nya mo 'dra/_/mi khyod kyi spyan lnga 'phel ba'i 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rtags/_/kye gangs ri'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/mi khyod kyi zhing khams de na yod/_/zhing de na khyod kyi gdul bya yod/_/'bru sna tshogs smin pa'i zhing sa can/_/'bru bang mdzod rgyas pa'i rtags su bzang*/_/shing sna tshogs skyes pa nags kyi khrod/_/gnas 
[\[274a.2\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'phel ba'i rtags su bzang*/_/chu mi che rgya mtsho chen po med/_/chu mi chung chu bo dpag med 'bab/_/chu snyoms pas yul mi rtag tu bde/_/kye gangs ri'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/gnas de ni khyod kyi zhing khams yin/_/zhing de na khyod kyi gdul bya yod/_/
[\[274a.3\]]shar lhun po'i rtse nas nyi ma 'char/_/phyogs gzhan gsum mi nor shugs la shes/_/'char mi snga snga dus bsam gtan 'phel/_/'char mi 'phyi nyi 'od smin pa la/_/lus bag pheb bde bar spyod par byed/_/rgas mi snga pho rab mdun stangs 'phel/_/rgas mi 'phyi mdzangs 
[\[274a.4\]]ma'i las rnams 'grub/_/kye gangs ri'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/yul bkra shis 'byung de khyod kyi zhing*/_/zhing de na khyod kyi gdul bya yod/_/ces gsungs pa dang*/_'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis stod mnga' ris nas bod ston rnams jo bo rje lha gcig 
[\[274a.5\]]spyan 'dren pa'i grogs su sbren pa'i phrin shog las/_shing rta'i dbyibs 'dra 'dzam gling gi_/bye brag brjid ldan gangs ri'i byang*/_/lo hi ta 'gram rin chen khungs/_/kha ba can zhes mang grags na/_/bla chen stobs ldan mi bsrun pa/_/bod ces bya bar gnas pa'i phyir/_/zhes 
[\[274a.6\]]dang*/_nai pa la'i rgyal po de wa lhas rang gi sras mo lha gcig khri btsun la gsungs pa/_nga yi snying dang 'dra ba'i bu mo khyod/_/bod ces bya ba khyad par 'phags pa'i yul/_/ri mtho sa gtsang gangs ri gnyan gyi mgul/_/bsil la mdzes pa lha gnas gzhal med khang*/_/ngo 
[\[274a.7\]]mtshar rmad byung phan bde 'byung ba'i gzhi/_/chu bo bzhi 'bab rtsi shing nags kyis mdzes/_/'bru sna lnga 'khrungs rin chen sna tshogs 'byung*/_/zhes dang*/_rgya nag tong 'khun rgyal pos lha gcig kong jo la bslab byar gdams pa las/_bod ces bya ba kha ba can gyi yul/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]yul la khyad par 'phags pa de yin te/_/gangs ri rang byung mchod rten ya mtshan can/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa ni/_/mtsho bzhi g.yu yi maN+Dal bkram pa 'dra/_/thang bzhi yid 'ong mchod pa bshams pa 'dra/_/chu bo bzhi yi 'gros bzhi'i rang bzhin can/_/ri mtho 
[\[274b.2\]]sa gtsang gangs ri gnyan gyi ljongs/_/bkra shis nyams dga' g.yung drung bris pa 'dra/_/zhes dang*/_'phrul gyi blon po mgar gyis lha gcig kong jo la 'di ltar/e ma ngo mtshar che/_/lha gcig kong jo khyed/_/bdag gi tshig la gson/_/bkra shis nyams su dga'/_/
[\[274b.3\]]bod kyi rgyal khams na/_/rin chen lnga las grub/_/rgyal po'i pho brang na/_/mi rje lha yis mdzad/_/srong btsan sgam po de/_/rigs gzugs dpal gyis brjid/_/mthong na sems yid 'phrog_/thugs rje chen po lags/_/rgyal srid chos bzhin bskyangs/_/
[\[274b.4\]]'bangs rnams bka' la nyan/_/rgyal blon 'khor 'bangs rnams/_/dga' skyid glu ru len/_/chos kyi nyi ma shar/_/dpal gyi sgron me bteg_/ri la shing sna tshang*/_/sa gzhi yangs pa la/_/'bru sna lnga yi tshogs/_/go mtshams med par skyes/_/gser dngul 
[\[274b.5\]]zangs lcags sogs/_/rin chen du ma yod/_/gnag rta lug gsum rgyas/_/dga' skyid de ltar yod/_/ces dang*/_khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bai DUr+Ya'i tshong dus nas paN chen shAkya shrI spyan 'dren po'i pho nya paN chung dza ya shrI dang*/_wA rA Na sI ba sogs 
[\[274b.6\]]mngags pa'i dus kyi zhu yig tu/_ma ga d+hA sogs rig 'byung gnas na sdig to yi/_/dmag tshogs kyis bcom au rgyan kha che bal yul yang*/_/log spyod kyis khengs deng sang bstan srog legs gnas ni/_/bod yul 'dir zad skyes chen byang phyogs zhabs bskyod 
[\[274b.7\]]zhu/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar kha ba can gyi rgyal khams ni sa gzhi mtho zhing gtsang ba/_'chi ba med pa'i gzhal med khang du son pa ltar ha cang grang ba yang min pa'i reg pa bsil po 'jo bas snying la dga' ba ster ba/_shel dkar po dang bsil zer byed pa'i dkyil 'khor btags 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]pa'i phye ma dag legs par spungs pa dang 'dra ba'i gangs ri'i phreng ba mtshar du dngar bas bskor ba'i ljongs/_rtswa dang*/_shing ljon pa dang*/_gel pa dang*/_lo ma dang*/_me tog dang*/_'bras bu dang*/_'bru dang*/_sman gyi rnam pa mang po rtsi bcud che zhing dri zhim po'i 
[\[275a.2\]]tshogs kyis kun nas gtams pa/_rin po che'i rigs su gtogs pa/_gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_zangs dang*/_lcags la sogs pa sa gzhi las rang 'byung ba/_phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bkra shis pa'i rtags kyis nyams dga' bar byas pa/_'phags pa rigs 
[\[275a.3\]]gsum mgon gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i lha btsan po rim par byon pa rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i khrims kyis legs par bskyangs pa/_mi dpa' zhing rta mgyogs pa la sogs pa rten dang brten pa'i yon tan 'ba' zhig gis rnam par bklubs pa/_de'i shar du rgya nag dang khri brtan/_
[\[275a.4\]]lhor rgya gar dang kha che/_nub tu stag sde gzig phan/_byang du khrom dang ge sar te brgyad kyis kun nas bsten pa'i yul ljongs gang la spyi'i ming du bod yul zhes grags so/_/gnyis pa bye brag tu chos kyi sbyin pa'i ma mo 'di gang du bsgrub pa'i gnas ni/_spyir skor gsum dang*/_ru bzhi 
[\[275a.5\]]dang*/_khams gsum mam/sgang drug tu dbye ba'i rnam bzhag byung ba ltar na/_spu rangs dang*/_mang yul dang*/_zangs dkar gsum skor gcig go_/li dang*/_bru sha dang*/_sbal te gsum skor gcig go_/zhang zhung dang*/_khri te dang*/_stod smad gsum skor gcig ste 
[\[275a.6\]]stod kyi mnga' ris skor gsum mo/_/dbus na dbu ru dang g.yo ru gnyis/_gtsang na g.yas ru dang ru lag gnyis te bar gyi dbus gtsang ru bzhi'o/_/mdo khams la smad khams btags pa khams gcig dang*/_mdo smad la dbyar mo thang btags pa khams gcig dang*/_gtsong 
[\[275a.7\]]kha la gyi thang btags pa khams gcig ste smad khams gsum du btags pa'i dbang du byas na mdo smad kyi khams dang*/_yang na rngul rdza zal mo sgang dang*/_tsha ba sgang dang*/_smar khams sgang dang*/_spo 'bor sgang dang*/_dmar rdza sgang dang*/_mi nyag rwa ba sgang ste smad kyi mdo khams 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]sgang drug ni bod chen po'i rgyal khams su grags pa las/_zal mo sgang dang*/_yang tshe ring gnam gyi mthongs nas bskos pa'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba jing gir gan gyis/_chos kyi rgyal po dpal sa skya pa 'phags pa blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa la dbang yon 
[\[275b.2\]]rim pa gsum phul ba'i dang po la khri skor bcu gsum phul ba dang*/_bar pa la chos dung dkar po rgyang grags kyis gtsos pa'i bod chol kha gsum phul ba dang*/_rjes ma la bla ma'i bka' bzhin du rgya'i mi yur chen po phul ba las/_bar pa chol kha gsum zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 
[\[275b.3\]]gdags gzhi yang*/_mnga' ris gung thang nas sog la skya bo'i bar la dbus gtsang dam pa chos kyi chol kha dang*/_sog la skya bo nas rma chu khug pa'i bar la mdo stod mgo nag mi'i chol kha dang*/_rma chu khug pa nas rgya mchod rten dkar po'i bar la mdo smad ger ling rta'i chol kha ste 
[\[275b.4\]]gsum po 'di la zhing gcig tu brtsis pa yin te/_de'ang hor se chen rgyal po'i mnga' 'og tu zhing bcu gcig yod pa las/_'dir chol kha gsum du zhing gcig cung zad ma lang na'ang*/_bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas yin pa dang bstan pa dar ba'i gnas yin pas gzhan las khyad par 
[\[275b.5\]]'phags par dgongs nas zhing gcig tu brtsis nas phul bar grags so/_/de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i chol kha gsum las chol kha phyi ma bod dang bod chen po gnyis las/_bod chen por grags pa'i sa'i thig le gang yin pa ste/_de'ang 'di ltar gang dag 'das pa dang*/_ma byon 
[\[275b.6\]]pa dang*/_da ltar byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byon pa dang*/_'byon par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang yid kyi srub shing dpung dang bcas pa'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i go 'phang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mngon du bgyid 
[\[275b.7\]]pa dang bgyi bar 'gyur ba/_dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du yang mi shigs rdo rje chen po'i khams su byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas/_gling rnams kyi nang nas ches khyad par du 'phags pa/_dzam+bu rkang 'thung gi rgyal mtshan gyis nye bar spud cing*/_shing de'i 'bras bu legs par 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]smin pa chur lhung ba'i sgra las nye bar drangs te/_dzam+bu gling zhes bya ba'i yul dbus gyur 'chang gi lte ba 'phags yul rdo rje'i gdan no/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i phyogs su dpag tshad brgya phrag gcig gzhal ba'i nor 'dzin dga' ma'i bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[276a.2\]]rnam par yangs pa ga la bar/_nges pa'i don du bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rtsal ma lus pa rdzogs par gyur kyang*/_dus 'dir 'gro ba thun mong ba dag gi snang ngo ru/_dper na nam mkha' dwangs pa'i 
[\[276a.3\]]dus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid ma g.yos bzhin du/_chu'i snod che chung ji snyed pa de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyan 'gog pa med par ston pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rigs gsum mgon po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyi rol rtsed/_'od gsal lha'i 
[\[276a.4\]]rigs kyi shing sA la chen po'i pang par rgyun mi chad pa nyid du skye ba len cing*/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lugs mchog dri ma dang bral ba gang dag bzhugs pa ma lus pa legs par bzung nas/_mkhas pa'i phrin las rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas/_phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma 
[\[276a.5\]]lus pa yang dag pa'i 'byor pa bla na med pas snang bar byed do/_/rab tu snang bar byed do/_/kun du rab tu snang bar byed cing byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdan sa chen po dpal sa skya'i dgon pa zhes yongs su grags pa/_mkhas shing grub pa'i sa la gnas pa grangs med pa'i bsti gnas 
[\[276a.6\]]su gyur pa'i bod yul dbus kyi rdo rje'i gdan chen po/_'phags yul gyi grub pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'jigs bral dpal ldan chos skyong chen po'i zhabs kyis/_sems can rgya mtsho'i khams su nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum du gzigs nas 
[\[276a.7\]]bdag gi skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya su zhig ni yongs su smin par bgyi/_su zhig ni rnam par grol ba'i lam du bkri bar bgyi/_su zhig ni byang chub kyi snying po la dgod par bgyi/_su zhig ni sems can gyi don du bskul bar bgyi snyam pa rtse gcig tu dgongs te/_sku dngos 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]su byon nas gdan sa chen po de nyid du phebs pa na/_der legs pa'i rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa 'dzom par brten/_sa 'di thams cad nga la dbang ba yin no zhes gsungs shing bdag gir mdzad cing byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas de nyid/_lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ma lus pa'i 
[\[276b.2\]]mchod sdong phul du byung ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so/_/slar yang gdan sa chen po de nyid nas kyang*/_me lha'i mtshams su zhag gi phung po gsum tsam zhig bskal ba na/_'chi ba med pa'i yul gyi dum bu mi'i yul na 'phos pa lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i nor 'dzin ma'i cha 
[\[276b.3\]]gling zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nyid yod do/_/de yang chu bo chen po bzhi las 'bri zhes bya ba'i chu klung gser dang ldan pa'i rgyun chen po dang*/_shar zla'i chu klung chen po gnyis nor rgyas kyi bu sa'i steng na gya gyur 'phyan zhing dal gyis 'ongs pa na/_slar yang rgya mtsho chen po'i rang gnas 
[\[276b.4\]]rjes su dran te de nyid du 'jug pa bzhin du dal gyis 'bab pa'i bar na chud cing*/_yul gyi dge bcu dang bkra shis pa'i ltas bzang thams cad ma tshang ba med pa zhig ste/_ji skad du/_zhing sa khang sa sa yi dge_/khang rdo 'thag rdo rdo yi dge_/'thung chu yur chu chu yi dge_/khang 
[\[276b.5\]]shing bud shing shing gi dge_/gam 'brog rkyang 'brog rtswa yi dge_/zhes bshad pa lta bu'i yul gyi dge bcu dang*/_khyad par sa phyogs 'dir mkhas pa dang btsun pa dang grub pa'i dbang phyug gi sa la gnas pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu nyi zla ltar yongs su grags pa mang po'i zhabs 
[\[276b.6\]]kyi 'khor los bcags shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_sa skyong chen po yab mes sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis sngon gyi bskal par legs byas rgya mtsho lta bu bsags pa'i mthu dang*/_dge ba bcu dang mthun pa'i bka' khrims kyis chab 'bangs thams cad chos bzhin du bskyangs pa 
[\[276b.7\]]dang*/_'gro ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las rngam chen bsags pa nyung zhing*/_spyi mthun du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i stobs bdo bar gyur pa'i bdag po'i 'bras bu legs par smin pa'i sa phyogs phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu gdon mi za ste/_gzhan du na mi dge ba spyad 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa'i bdag po'i 'bras bur/_rin chen phreng bar/_sa gzhi gzi chung sa char mang*/_/rdul 'khrigs dri nga mtho dma' can/_/tsha sgo can dang dus log dang*/_/'bras bu phra kha chung ngu'ang med/_/ces gsungs shing dge ba spyad pa'i 'bras bu ni de las ldog ste 'byung bar 
[\[277a.2\]]gsungs pa bzhin du/_ljongs 'di'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tha gru rnam par yangs pa dang*/_gzi che zhing snum bag dang ldan pa/_dam pa'i chos dang srid kyi gtsug lag rab 'byams kyi longs spyod dang dge legs thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul du 'byung ba'i sgo chen po 
[\[277a.3\]]cig tu nges pa'i phyir ro/_/khyad par yul phyogs 'di na dge zhing bkra shis pa'i rtags dang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa dge legs kyi ltas bzang thams cad rang byung du grub pa yod do/_/de'ang 'di ltar sngon gyi bskal par byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi legs 
[\[277a.4\]]byas kyi bgo skal du thob pa'i rgyal srid rin po che rnam pa bdun dang*/_bsod nams brgya pa'i gzugs sku mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa la yongs su tshang ba'i bkra shis kyi rtags rnam pa brgyad de/_de dag gi gzugs brnyan ci rigs 
[\[277a.5\]]pa rnams kyang*/_ljongs 'di'i phyogs kyi 'khor lo kun tu lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis tshang ste/_de yang ji ltar zhe na chos dang srid pa'i dge legs dang dpal 'byor gyis bsdus pa'i sde bzhi'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag gi 'byor pa ma tshang ba med pas mngon par gtams pa'i 
[\[277a.6\]]ngo mtshar 'dzad pa med pa'i phung po ma lus pa yongs su chud par dka' ba'i dogs pa mang pos yid kyi dbang po kun nas bslangs te/_gser ldan dga' ma rang gi lus 'di pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu rgyas shing rnam par yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du sprul pa snyam byed pa'i 
[\[277a.7\]]sa gzhi'i khyon thams cad tha gru rnam par yangs shing*/_phyogs thams cad nas khod mi snyoms pa med pa/_sems can kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir gyur pa ni/_'di lta ste/_sa gzhi gang las rin po che gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_bai DUr+Ya dang*/_dung dang*/_man shel la sogs pa'i rin po che du 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ma'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_'bru'i rigs su gyur pa so ba dang*/_nas dang*/_gro dang*/_sran ma dang*/_til dang*/_yungs kar la sogs pa ched du btab pa dang*/_ched du btab pa ma yin par 'khrungs pa'i lo thog dang snye ma dang*/_'bras bu la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rigs 
[\[277b.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag skye zhing*/_skyes pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi dri dang ro dang nus pa dang*/_bcud phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa mang po rang dbang du 'byung ba'i sa gzhi rin po che dgos 'dod thams cad yid bzhin du 'byung ba de lta bu dag yod do/_/ji skad bshad pa'i sa gzhi rin po che gang la 
[\[277b.3\]]brten nas phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi kho ra khor yug rnams su ri bo'i phreng ba mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/_dbyibs legs pa mtshar du dngar ba dag yod de/_de'ang 'di ltar lha'i nor bu rin po che rgyu bai DUr+Ya'i rang bzhin las grub pa/_dpag tshad gcig gi khor yug tu snang ba'i 'od zer gyi drwa ba dkrigs 
[\[277b.4\]]pa/_rnam pa zur brgyad dang ldan pa gang las ji ltar 'dod pa'i dgos 'dod thams cad 'bad pa med par 'byung ba de gcig pu'i rnam pa'am/_de lta bu mang du brtsegs shing phyur bur spungs pa dang 'dra ba'i spang ri dang*/_nags ri dang*/_brag ri brtsegs mar yod pa rnams ni/_rin po che mar 
[\[277b.5\]]ka ti dang*/_an+da rnyil dang*/_mthon ka dang*/_mthon ka chen po'i kha dog gi dpal la cung zad sdang ba snyam byed pa'i rtswa sngon po gsar par skyes pa dang*/_ldum bu dang*/_lo 'dab dang*/_myu gu gzhon nu'i tshogs stug por skyes pa/_de dag gi ro dang nus pas rta dang phyugs kyi rigs dang*/_ri dwags 
[\[277b.6\]]kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis srog gi dbang po yongs su bsrung ba dang*/_yid la re ba'i shing rta thams cad 'gengs par byed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/gzhan kha cig na ni bud med rin po che mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/_de'i lus la lha'i gos dang*/_lha'i nor bu rin po che bai DUr+Ya 
[\[277b.7\]]dang*/_in+d+ra nI la dang*/_mu tig dang*/_dung dang*/_man shel dang*/_byi ru la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa las sil khrol gyi sgra snyan par 'byin cing*/_sngo bsangs sgra'i lan bu mdzes pa g.yo ba dang 'dra ba'i skyed mos tshal dang*/_sman ljongs dang*/_nags tshal 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]stug po rnams te/_de dag ni spang ljang margad kyi kha dog 'dzin pa'i rtsi shing dang*/_lo 'dab dang*/_ldum bu'i tshogs mang po skyes pa/_ut+pal la sogs pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bkra bas mdzes par byas pa/_rtsi sman gyi bye brag mang po ro dang bcud dang dri zhim po mchog 
[\[278a.2\]]tu rgyas pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su khebs par skyes pa dag la ser bu bsil zhing yid du 'ong ba langs pa dag gis bsnun pa na rnga yab ltar g.yob cing*/_de dag gi dri zhim po rnams ring du khyer ba/_de'i yon tan dang ro bcud bzang po dag rjes su dran pa'i bung pa mang po dag nye bar lhags nas 
[\[278a.3\]]mgrin pa'i gling bu rab tu snyan pa'i glur bsgyur ba/_gos bzang ltar 'jam pa'i lo ma dang ku su ma dang 'bras bu g.yur du za bas dud par gyur pa'i ljon shing gi nags tshal rab tu 'khrigs pa rnams kyi khrod na/_spre'u rnams kyi gar bsgyur ba dang*/_'dab chags ko ki la la sogs pa skad 
[\[278a.4\]]snyan pa rnams kyi rol mo 'khrol ba snyam byed pa/_sa phyogs la lar ni dpa' zhing mdzangs pa'i blon po rin po che yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa la dar ljang gu'i smad g.yogs dang*/_kA shi ka'i ras kyis stod g.yogs byas pa/_dbu la dar dkar po dri ma med pa'i la thod bcings 
[\[278a.5\]]pas mdzes par byas pa dang 'dra ba'i ke la sha'i ri bo'i phreng ba rnams ni/_bgrod pas dub pa'i 'gron pa rnams kyi tsha ba'i gdung ba 'jil bar byed pa'i rlung gi bsil yab yid du 'ong ba dag g.yob pa dang*/_dngul chu'i reg pa ltar bsil ba'i chu gtsang ma'i rgyun 'bebs pa la brtson pa/_
[\[278a.6\]]res 'ga' ni na bun gsar pa yid du 'ong ba lang ling 'khrigs pa'i stod g.yogs kyis bsgrib pa'i thabs la brtson par byed do/_/kha cig ni skye ba lnga pa'i chos dung kha dog dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba la stong 'khun gyi gan mdzod nas 'phos pa'i dar ljang ser gyi sham bur 'phyang 
[\[278a.7\]]ba'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa ni/_gangs ldan gyi ri bo rnams rang gi lang tsho dang kha dog rgyas pas nor bu chu shel dang*/_zla ba dag pa dang*/_ston ka'i sprin dkar brtsegs pa rnams kyi mdzes sdug dang ngo mtshar dag la co 'drir rtsom par byed do/_/skabs kha cig tu ni rin po che'i 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]gdugs mchog dri ma med pa dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug pa/_rin po che'i tog gi 'od zer 'phro ba/_khor yug kun du rin po che'i rgyan gyi drwa ba dang drwa ba phyed pa rnam par dpyangs pa gang zhig_/gser ldan dga' ma rang gi lus la drod kyi gdung ba rgyas pa gang dag 'phrog par byed pa'i ched du/_bla 
[\[278b.2\]]ma nyid na legs par phub pa lta bu'i rin po che'i lhun po/_me tog gi rigs rnam pa mang po gcal du bkram pa ltar skyes pa lhun chags shing kun nas zlum por gyur pa shin tu mtho bas/_phrag pa na nor bu chu shel gyi dbang po 'char zhing*/_nor bu chu shel gyi 'od zer ring po'i lam du snang bas/_
[\[278b.3\]]tsha ba'i gdung ba mtha' dag bsil bar byed pa dag yod do/_/de las gzhan pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig na ni/_dper na gnyis 'thung gi dbang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa'i thabs kyis dul bar byas pa/_gser gyi drwa ba dang*/_gser gyi pad+ma dang*/_nor bu dang*/_mu tig gi tshom bu can gyi 
[\[278b.4\]]chun 'phyang gis mdzes par byas pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan mi dman pa'i khur dang ldan pa gang dag_/bdag po la 'dud cing bag phebs par gnas pa'i rnam pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri bo 'ga' zhig brjid cing lhun chags pa/_rgyab dang spyi bo mtho zhing sna lag legs par brkyangs pa 
[\[278b.5\]]la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/_de'i ngos logs kyi skabs rnams su/_grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_spyil bu dang*/_bya skyibs dang*/_nags tshang tshing dang*/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas kun nas bkra bar gyur pa'i skyed tshal yi gar 'ong ba can dang ldan pa mang po khor yug 
[\[278b.6\]]tu 'khod pa/_logs 'ga' zhig na ni dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i dmag mi rin po che stobs dang kho lag yongs su rdzogs pa ya lad bgos nas ral gri dang*/_shag+ti dang*/_ru mtshon rnon po la sogs pa lag char bsrel zhing*/_mthun pa'i phyogs dang legs pa'i phyogs rnams la 
[\[278b.7\]]rtag tu tho btsam zhing bsdo ba'i dgra bo rnams ni skad cig tsam gyi yun du gson par gnas su ci zhig rung zhes 'jigs pa'i nga ro dang bcas te/_khong nas 'khrugs pa'i ba spu rnam par gzings pa dang 'dra ba'i brag ri rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtsegs pa/_'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba/_'byung 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]po'i 'dab chags mang pos mi snyan pa'i gdangs kyi nga ro mthon por sgrogs pa la sogs pa mi sdug pa'i nyams kyi khyad par ci yang ston pa'i rwa bas bskor ba/_de dag tu skyes pa'i tsher ma can gyi ljon pa'i nags rum stug po rnams ni/_yal ga'i lag pa 'khyog 
[\[279a.2\]]po dag brkyangs nas g.yul gyi dga' ston la chags pa ltar 'khod pa/_de dag dang ngang tshul mthun pa'i stag dang*/_gzig dang*/_dom dang*/_dred dang*/_gsa' dang*/_dzam+bu ka la sogs pa'i srog chags mche ba'i mtshon cha dang ldan pa mang pos rgyu 'grul byed pa/_ngang tshul de 
[\[279a.3\]]las ldog pa'i brag ri 'ga' zhig dag ni/_dper na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan mtho zhing lta na sdug pa/_kau sham+bI'i ras sam/_wA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa/_kha dog mi 'dra ba mang po brtsegs pa'i lhab lhub khor yug tu dpyangs pa/_de la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od zer 
[\[279a.4\]]stong gi drwa ba dkrigs pa'i dpal dang ldan pa gang zhig_/mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i dga' ston gyi rgyan du bslangs pa ji lta ba de ltar gnas pa'i brag ri dang*/_nags ri dang*/_spang ri dang*/_kai la sha'i ri rnams gad pa bang rim gyi rnam par brtsegs pa de nyid 
[\[279a.5\]]kyis nam mkha' 'bigs byed kyi ri bo'i khengs pa yang thung ngur byed pa'i rang bzhin can te/_de'i phrag na ni nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yang ngal bsor spyod pas phyogs kyi mtshan ma dag kyang ma 'khrul bar ston par byed do/_/phyogs mtshams tha dad pa mang po na ni/_rta mchog rin 
[\[279a.6\]]po che'i kha dog rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar rab tu sngo ba/_gang dag muk+ti ka'i sga srab dang rgyan gyi rnam pa mang pos spras pa'i dril chung gi phreng ba rnams ni phan tshun 'thab pa'i kha nas sgra snyan par 'khrol ba dang chab cig tu dri gzhon gyi 'tshubs ma'am/_glog gi gya gyu la'ang sma 'bebs ster ba'i gom 
[\[279a.7\]]stabs stong du bsgyur ba la mi mkhas pa med pa de bzhin du/_chu klung dang*/_chu phran dang*/_'bab chu dang*/_gtsang chab bsil ma'i rgyun gtsang ma dwangs shing dri ma med pa mang po rtag par gzhol zhing 'bab/_kha cig ni dus su bab ste/_de dag las mang po zhig ni skyes bu chen po mtshan 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i thugs ka na dpal gyi be'u 'od 'bar ba'i rnam par snang ba de lta bu'i ri mo dag la legs par 'dri ba'i tshul gyis 'bab/_kha cig ni dga' ba 'khyil ba'am g.yung drung ris kyi ri mo 'dri ba'i tshul gyis 'bab ste/_thams cad kyang lbu ba dkar po puN+Da rI ka'i 
[\[279b.2\]]phreng ba 'grems pa bzhin du/_yid 'ong lhung lhung snyan pa'i chab sgra rtag tu sgrog pas/_drang srong bsam gtan la gnas pa'am/_chags bral dka' thub brtan pa rnams kyi snying la yang rab tu sim pa'i bde ba ster nus pa mang po zhig ste/_de dag kyang dbyar skyes sman gyi nags 
[\[279b.3\]]tshal stug pos yongs su khebs pa'i ri klung dang*/_ri sul dang*/_ri shod yangs pa rnams na ci bder rgyu ba dag yod do/_/kha cig dag na skyes bu chen po'i spyan dang mtshungs pa'i nya'i rgyal po lus thams cad gser gyi kha dog can la/_mig dag kyang gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/_
[\[279b.4\]]lus la mdzes pa'i ri mo mang pos khyab pa de ni 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can bzhin du/_res 'ga' ni chu'i kha ru ci bder 'phyo zhing*/_res 'ga' ni chu'i gting du 'gro ba la chags thogs med pas rgya mtshor byings pa'i sems can mang po 'dzin par byed pa 
[\[279b.5\]]dang*/_pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'i mnyes gshin pa ste/_de'i dpal dang rjes su mthun par thang mnyam pa g.yu'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa lta bur yod pa'i dkyil nas/_ha cang yang mtho ba ma yin pa'i spang ri gser gyi nya mo nyal ba ltar yod pa la dri zhim po'i sman dang ldum bu'i rigs 
[\[279b.6\]]mang du skyes pa/_me tog kha yongs su bye ba 'dab ma dang ge sar thams cad gser gyi kha dog 'dzin pa stug pos khyab pas mdzes par byas pa ste/_der bshul ring gi lam gyis dub pa'i 'gron pa gang dag ngal bsor spyod cing dga' ba'i ro la spyod pa'i yul du gyur pas sam/_yang 
[\[279b.7\]]na 'bab chu'i rgyun chen po dal gyis 'bab na/_skabs la lar rgyun srol gyi dbar las kha gnyis su gyes nas 'bab pa ste/_de'i bar du chud par gyur pa'i bza' shing gi rwa ba dang*/_skyed mos tshal yid du 'ong ba/_rtswa dang shing ljon pa mang du skyes pa dag ste/_gang gis chur lhung 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ba rnams ni 'dzin par byed la/_pha rol dang tshu rol nas lhags pa rnams la bde ba'i ngal bso ster bar bgyid pas/_der yang legs pa'i ltas dang bcas pa'i sa phyogs su brtag par byar mi btub pa'i skyon 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/kha cig tu ni 
[\[280a.2\]]lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs dang myu khyud dang bcas pa/_lha dang lag 'gro'i yul nas 'ongs pa'i rin po che dkar po dang*/_sngon po dang*/_ser po dang*/_ljang gu la sogs pa kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phras kun nas spras pa/_skye bo ma lus pa'i yid rang dbang du sdud par 
[\[280a.3\]]byed pa la dbang ba gang yin pa de ni nor 'dzin gyi bu mo'i lag pa na thogs pa dang 'dra ba'i sa gzhi lag mthil ltar khod mi snyoms pa med pa snum zhing gzi mdangs che ba/_phal cher na ni dbyar skyes myu gu'i tshogs kyis khyab pas mnan na nem pa bteg na phar ba'i reg bya phun 
[\[280a.4\]]sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_khor yug nas bskor ba'i ri bo'i tshogs phreng du bstar ba rnams kyi mtha' bsnol ba'i mtshams nas/_lung pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar yangs pa/_phyogs phyogs su song ba/_de dag gi bar skabs rnams su yang yul dang*/_yul gru dang*/_ljongs 
[\[280a.5\]]dang*/_grong dang*/_grong khyer dang*/_tshong 'dus dang*/_rgyal po'i pho brang dang*/_gtsug lag khang dang*/_mchod rten dang*/_kun dga' rwa ba rnams kyi gang ba ste/_dper na g.yu'i maN+Dal ngos mnyam pa yid du 'ong ba zhig la skyes bu mkhas pas me tog gi tshom bu bkram pa lta bu 
[\[280a.6\]]dag yod do/_/de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang 'byor pa lo legs pa/_skye bo mang po dang mis kun du gang ba/_de dag gi nyen skor rnams su kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i zhing sa shin tu gshin pa mang po ste/_de dag las dus dus su myu gu dang*/_sdong bu dang*/_lo ma dang*/_
[\[280a.7\]]'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'bru'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste/_de dag gi ro dang bcud dang nus pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag sdud par byed/_dga' bar byed/_mgu bar byed/_'tsho bar byed/_srung 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]bar byed do/_/'bru'i bang mdzod rnams kyang dngos po de dang de dag gis rab tu rgyas par byed do/_/rgyu de dag gis ni sems can dpag tu med pa bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa dang*/_phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa dang*/_rgud pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa dang*/_
[\[280b.2\]]mu ge'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa ste/_'jigs pa de dag gi rgyun yang gcod par byed pa dag yod do/_/des na sa phyogs dge ba'i mtshan mar rdzogs pa gang gis mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad rang dbang du sdud par byed cing*/_cig shos mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyogs thams 
[\[280b.3\]]cad gcod par byed pa'i phyir 'khor lo rin po che nyid dang chos mtshungs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa bzang po zhes pa nang bcud du rin po che'i gter mang pos yongs su khengs pa/_gang zhig thob par gyur na ni skyes bu de'i yid la ji ltar re ba'i shing rta ma lus 
[\[280b.4\]]pa mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de dang de dag gis bde bar 'gengs pa la rtsol ba dang tshegs che ba la ma ltos par 'bad med lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig ste/_de dang rjes su mthun par sdom brtson sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshul bzung ba'i bla ma chen po 
[\[280b.5\]]'di nyid sku mched yab mes dang bcas pas yongs su bsrungs pa'i rgyal srid rnam par yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste/_der 'khod pa'i yul dang yul gru chen po rnams kyi rgyal phran dang*/_mdun na 'don dang*/_sde dpon dang*/_khyim bdag dang*/_grong khyer gyi skye bo la sogs pa 
[\[280b.6\]]rnams kyis bdag gir byas pa'i pho brang dang*/_dkor khang dang*/_mdzod dang*/_'bru'i bang ba dang*/_phyugs kyi rwa ba rnams na/_rang rang gi yul nas byung ba dang*/_yul khams gzhan nas byung ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang*/_'bru'i rigs dang*/_bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rigs dang*/_bgo ba 
[\[280b.7\]]dang rgyan gyi rigs dang*/_bzhon pa dang bkol spyad bya ba'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste/_mdor na nor dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bus bsdus pa'i dpal dang 'byor pa dang longs spyod dang*/_dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pas mngon par gtams shing*/_'dod dgu phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/_/de la brten nas skye 'gro thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas/_rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa dang mtshungs pa'i bya ba ma lus pa byed pa'i phyir ro/_/khyad par mchog gi sprul pa'i sku pad+ma ka ra'i lung 
[\[281a.2\]]bstan gyi rnga bo ches lan du mar bsngags pa'i rtsod bral grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po lcags zam pa'am/_thang stong rgyal po'am/_brtson 'grus bzang po zhes mtshan gyi rnam grangs gsum dang ldan pa/_lung dang rtogs pa'i yon tan mi zad pa'i mdzod du gyur pas 'byung ba bzhi'i yul la 
[\[281a.3\]]thogs rdugs med par 'gro zhing*/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mang po bstan pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho dad pa'i zhing sa gshin par byas nas/_der dge ba'i sa bon rma med pa 'debs pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don la zhugs pa na/_dus gsum rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[281a.4\]]zhugs nas/_'jig rten gyi khams su bltas pas/_phan pa dang bde ba'i bdud rtsi zad mi shes pa'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa/_dam pa'i chos kyi zla ba 'di ni gang du 'grib par 'gyur/_gang du 'phel bar 'gyur/_gang du gnas par 'gyur/_gang du yang dag par brtan par 'gyur snyam du 
[\[281a.5\]]dgongs pa na/_ljongs 'dir dge legs kyi mtshan ma phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ngom pa bzhin du mchis pa de legs par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang ji skad du/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs 
[\[281a.6\]]rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/ces 'byung ba ltar sems can la snying brtse ba'i grogs kyis legs par bskul nas ljongs 'dir sku dngos su byon nas zhabs kyi 'khor los bcags/_gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa 'debs pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dam pa btsugs so/_/
[\[281a.7\]]de nas brtsams te gong du smos pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam pa rim par byon pa rnams kyis zhabs kyis bcags shing phrin las kyi rgyun mi nub pa skal ldan shing rta'i rgyun chen po bzhin du gnas par mdzad pa'i gdan sa chen po dpal lhun grub steng gi chos grwa chen po zhes grags snyan sprin gyi rnga gsang 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]lhang nger ldir ba gang la/_dkar po'i phyogs su mngon par 'dun pa'i lha dang mir bcas pa'i mdongs mtha' rnams ni kun nas dga' ba'i sgro gshog zlum por phub pa'i gar stabs stong du bsgyur bas brel bar bgyid pa de nyid yod do/_/de lta bu'i gnas de na yod pa'i gtsug lag khang bsam grub mthong 
[\[281b.2\]]grol zhes bya ba gang zhig legs par bltas na 'phags yul rdo rje'i gdan gyi dri'i gtsang khang chen po yang 'di las lhag pa ci zhig snyam pa de nyid yod de/_de'ang rnam pa ni ji lta bu zhe na/_lha'i bzo bo las sna tshogs pa'i lag pa'i zlos gar gyis rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i pha gu brtsegs pa las byas pa lta 
[\[281b.3\]]bu'i stegs bu dang*/_ba gam dang*/_mda' yab dang*/_lan kan dang*/_sgo dang*/_sgo khang dang*/_rta babs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_bai DUr+Ya mthing ga'i chu gter chen po bskyil pa lta bu'i khyams kyi dkyil 'khor sngo zhing dwangs pa la brtan pa'i ka ba brgya phrag gcig gis bteg pa'i gdung dang*/_gdung 
[\[281b.4\]]phran dang spang leb rnams legs par bkod pa/_logs thams cad nas mi mnyam pa med par shin tu mtho zhing zur bzhi dang ldan pa/_btso ma gser gyi rang bzhin las grub pa'i rgya phub dang tog dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang nam mkha' lding dang me long dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnams las shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od 
[\[281b.5\]]zer gyi drwa ba ring du 'phro ba/_chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i mche ba'i phrag nas nye bar 'thon pa'i rin po che'i dpyangs thag la 'khyud nas shin tu snyan pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa'i g.yer ka'i phreng ba dang dril bu dang zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis phyogs thams cad nas mdzes par dpyangs pa/_phyi rol du nI lot+pal dang 
[\[281b.6\]]puN+Da rI ka dang ban+d+hu dzI ba ka yi kha dog can gyi khang pa dang*/_khang phran dang*/_dri'i gtsang khang dang*/_rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi sgrub khang dam pa dag gis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus su dper na rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i mchod sdong dang*/_thun mtshams kyi sprin dang*/_pad+ma dmar po'i nags tshal dang*/_byi ru'i 
[\[281b.7\]]lhun po rnams la slar yang nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer gyi phung pos lan stong du dkris pa bzhin du lham mer 'bar ba/_nang na de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i sku brnyan lugs su blugs pa dang*/_'bur du bzhengs pa dang*/_ri mor bris pa dang*/_glegs bam gyi tshogs grangs med pa rnams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bkur sti dang bcas te bzhugs pa/_de'i phyi dang nang gi khyams gtsang ma dang*/_kho ra khor yug kun du sgo gsum bag dang bcas shing spos mchog ha ri tsan+dan gyi dri bsung mngar po ring du 'thul ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs mang pos sde 
[\[282a.2\]]snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i gzhung lugs kyi tshig dang don gyi cha rnam par bkrol zhing bgro bar byed/_mnyan par byed/_klog par byed/_'dzin par byed/_'chad cing ston par byed/_kha ton du byed/_tshul bzhin du nyams su len par byed pa'i sgo nas lung gi chos kyi tshul mang po ni yun du gnas par 
[\[282a.3\]]byed do/_/rtogs pa'i chos kyi tshul mang po ni rgyud la mngon du byed do/_/de lta bu'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lugs bzang dri ma med pa nyid phyogs du ma nas dar zhing rgyas par byed pa dag yod do/_/de dang zung du 'brel ba'i rgyal khab dam pa 
[\[282a.4\]]mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba shin tu brling zhing mtho ba zur bzhi dang ldan pa la stegs bu dang ba gam dang sgo dang rta babs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa la nor bu chu shel dang*/_in+d+ra nI la dang*/_pad+ma rA ga rnams so sor bzhu ba'i kha dog can gyi tshon ris rim par byugs 
[\[282a.5\]]pas dbang po'i gzhu'i mdzes pa la co 'drir byed pa/_ngos rnams na mun pa sel bar byed pa'i skar khung dam pa rin po che'i sgron ma bteg pa lta bu mang po la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon gyis mdzes pa/_nang gi khyams thams cad du 'phrul gyi byed pos mngon par bskrun pa dang 'dra ba'i ka ba 
[\[282a.6\]]mang pos bteg pa'i gdung dang*/_gdung phran rnams kyis legs par bres pa la brten pa'i steng thog rim par phub pa la mthon ka chen po'i mda' yab dang pu shus brgyan pa/_nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od mdangs phun sum tshogs pa la 'gran zlar byed pa'i gser btso ma'i rang bzhin can gyi 'gan ji ra chen 
[\[282a.7\]]po dang rgyal mtshan dang me long dang dril bu g.yer kha'i phreng ba rnams kyis spras pa dag yod do/_/phyi rol na me tog gi ldum ra dang*/_bza' shing gi rwa ba dang*/_skyed mos tshal dang*/_shing ljon pa'i grib bsil snum po 'bab pa'i spang ljong rtswa sngon dang*/_ldum bu dang*/_me tog dang*/_sman gyi lo 'dab stug 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pos khebs pa'i skabs 'ga' zhig nas/_reg pa shin tu bsil ba'i chu rgyun gtsang ma yid 'ong snyan pa'i chab sgra 'byin bzhin pa 'bab pa dang bcas pa'i skyed tshal gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba yod do/_/pho brang gi nang dang khor yug gi rim pa rnams su dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po 'du ba'i gtsug lag 
[\[282b.2\]]khang dang lha khang dang mgon khang mang po rnams su/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rten gsum ngo mtshar dang byin rlabs kyi gzi 'od rab tu 'bar ba bgrang gis mi lang ba rnams kyi mdun na mchod par phul ba'i yo byad kyi rnam pa ni/_me tog dang*/_bdug pa dang*/_mar me dang*/_dri mchog dang*/_zhal zas dang*/_rol mo'i bye 
[\[282b.3\]]brag mang po dang*/_gzhan yang stong 'khun gyi rgyal po'i gan mdzod las thon pa'i bzang gos dang*/_dar gyi bye brag shin tu rnyed dka' zhing rin thang che ba gya nom pa dag las grub pa'i bla re dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_'phur ma dang*/_'phan dang*/_snyan shal la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad bsam 
[\[282b.4\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i bkur sti dang bcas pa ste bzhugs pa'i gzhal med khang mang po dang*/_mi'i bdag po dang*/_mdun na 'don dang*/_mi dpon dang*/_las gnyer ba rnams kyi bsti gnas dang*/_mdun gros kyi gnas dang*/_rgyal po'i dkor khang dang*/_gan mdzod dang*/_mdzod phal pa dang*/_'bru'i bang 
[\[282b.5\]]ba rnams kyi khang bzang dang*/_khang pa brtsegs pa dang*/_khang lcog rnams kyis kun nas mdzes par byas pa dag yod do/_/de dag kyang 'byor zhing rgyas pa sde bzhi'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas chen po nyid du nges pa ni/_'di ltar nor dang 'dod pa'i sde rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i 
[\[282b.6\]]'byor pa la dbang thob cing*/_zang zing gi sbyin pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i sgo chen po brgya phrag stong du ma dus cig car du yongs su bye ba lta bu yod de/_ji ltar zhe na/_rgyal khab chen po 'di nyid kyis mtshon pa'i mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa'i grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang tshong 'dus rnams 
[\[282b.7\]]nas 'byung ba dang*/_de dag las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi tshong 'dus chen po rnams nas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i 'dod pa dgu'i longs spyod dang dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_nor bu rin po che bai DUr+Ya dang*/_tog gi blo gros dang*/_in+da nI la dang*/_mu tig dang*/_pad+ma 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rA ga dang*/_ke ta ka dang*/_spug dang*/_karte ka dang*/_shel dang*/_nya phyis dang*/_dung dang*/_me shel dang*/_chu shel dang*/_rgyal po 'khyil ba dang*/_pe ro tsa dang*/_byi ru dang*/_mchong la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams so/_/gzhan yang rnga dang*/_rdza rnga 
[\[283a.2\]]dang*/_rnga zlum dang*/_cang te'u dang*/_rol mo dang*/_dung dang*/_sil snyan dang*/_gling bu dang*/_pi wang dang*/_sgra brnyan la sogs pa rol mo'i rigs su gtogs pa dang*/_'bras dang so ba dang*/_nas dang gro dang*/_sran ma dang til dang*/_khre dang yungs kar la sogs pa 'bru'i rigs su gtogs 
[\[283a.3\]]pa dang*/_dkar gsum dang mngar gsum dang*/_shing thog dang*/_'bru'i rigs la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams dang*/_kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos bzang po dang*/_dar dang ras zung dang*/_ras yab dang*/_ther phrugs la sogs pa bgo ba dang rgyan gyi 
[\[283a.4\]]rigs su gtogs pa nye bar spyad pa'i yo byad kyi rnam pa mang po dang*/_ar+d+ho ka'i phur ma dang*/_rta dang*/_dre'u dang*/_gnag phyugs la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba'i rigs su gtogs pa ma tshang ba med pa dag yod do/_/mdor na chen po dang bar ma dang dman pa'i skye 'gro thams cad rang rang gi mngon 
[\[283a.5\]]par 'dod pa bzhin du bcang bar rung ba'i zang zing gi longs spyod zad mi shes pa la dbang 'byor pa'i tshul ni/_sngon gyi sbyin pa dpag tu med pa'i dpal las legs par 'khrungs pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam mang thos kyi bu'i 'byor pa dang mnga' thang la 'gran par bzod pa'i ngo mtshar gyi phung po ci 
[\[283a.6\]]rigs pa yongs su rdzogs pa yod do/_/de lta bu'i 'byor ba'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang skye bo phal gyi chos lugs bzhin du mchog gi go 'phang du 'dzegs par byed pa'i lam yang dag pa bzhin du/_rtag tu gces par bsrung bar mi byed par yongs su btang ba la mkhas pa'i sgo nas/_
[\[283a.7\]]bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med par gyur pa rnams la mchod pa'i ched du btang ba dang*/_rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten phan bde kun gyi rtsa lag tu gyur pa mang po bzhengs pa'i rgyur btang ba dang*/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i rgyur btang ba dang*/_
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]las byed rnams kyi drin gzo'i yon 'bul du stob pa dang*/_mchod pa'i yo byad bsgrubs pa'i zong du btang ba la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kho na'i ched du gtong ba la snying stobs kyi rgya mtsho nam yang bri ba med par sbyin pa'i sgo chen po 'byed par byed do/_/de'ang 'di ltar/_bza' ba 'dod pa rnams 
[\[283b.2\]]la ni bza' ba dang*/_bgo ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bgo ba dang*/_rgyan gyi bye brag 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyan gyi bye brag dang*/_mkho ba'i yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni mkho ba'i yo byad dang*/_ja dang gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni ja dang gser dang dngul/_bzhon pa dang gnag phyugs 'dod pa 
[\[283b.3\]]rnams la ni de dang des tshim par byed pa ste/_mdor na sems can rang rang gi yid la ci dang ci 'dod pa'i re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i longs spyod zad mi shes pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/der ma zad 'jig rten gyi 'byor pa ma lus pa gcig tu spungs kyang*/_
[\[283b.4\]]gang gi snang ba'i zegs ma phra mo re res kyang zil gyis gnon cing mog mog por byed pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'byor pa bla na med pa ste/_de yang chos dang thar pa'i sde rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i 'byor pa la dbang zhing chos kyi sbyin pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i sgo chen po bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[283b.5\]]dus cig car du dbye ba lta bur yod de/_de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa'i lung gi chos sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i bdag nyid can de'i dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i 
[\[283b.6\]]bstan bcos dang bcas pa gangs can gyi skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyis mtshon pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i ma mo rgya chen po 'di dag bsgrubs so/_/ji ltar bsgrub pa de dag thams cad kyang gegs med pa nyid du mthar phyin nas/_phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba chen po bkye ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba rgya 
[\[283b.7\]]mtsho'i rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i 'byor pa dam pa deng nas brtsams te rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du zad mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can la sbyor ba 'di dag lags so/_/de'ang glegs bam tsam du ma zad bshad sgrub kyi rgyun chen po'ang yod de/_ji skad smos pa rnams kyis 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mtshon pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu shes bya'i gnas kyi gtsug lag thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i mkhyen rab dang*/_spobs pa dang*/_gzungs dang*/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la dbang 'byor ba/_dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i 
[\[284a.2\]]mang du thos pa rnams kyis rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas chos kyi snang ba chen po phyogs thams cad du bkye ste/_skye dgu thams cad kyi re ba'i yol go ma lus pa thos pa mchog gi 'byor pa bla na med pas phyur bur 'gengs par byed do/_/de la brten nas rang gis nus na 
[\[284a.3\]]thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu yang ring por ma yin par lag rtser gnas pa lta bur gyur pa yod do/_/des na chos dang srid pa'i dpal 'byor ma lus pa'i 'byung khungs su gyur pas na 'byor pa rgyas pa dang*/_phyi nang kun du mchog dang phal pa'i mi dang skye bo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[284a.4\]]yongs su gang ba ste/_de las bla'i mchod gnas su gyur pa ni phyi dang nang gi yon tan gyi nor bus phyug pa'i bla ma dang*/_slob dpon dang dge slong gi dge 'dun zhi zhing dul ba'i yon tan gyi tshogs bzung ba mang po dag yod de/_de dag 'ga' zhig ni klog pa thos bsam gyi 'khor lo la 
[\[284a.5\]]gnas/_'ga' zhig ni spong ba bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i tshogs dang*/_rgyal po'i 'khor du bsnyen par 'os pa ni dpa' zhing mdzangs la rtul phod pa/_chos dang srid pa'i gtsug lag gi gzhung rab 'byams la rnam par dpyod pa'i blo gros kyi rtsal rab tu rdzogs nas/_mgrin 
[\[284a.6\]]pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa 'khor rnam par grol ba'i lam nas legs bshad gtam gyi ngo mtshar dang mtshar sdug zad mi shes par 'jo bas/_skye bo mang po yid kyi brtan pa rang dbang du 'phrog par bzod pa'i mdun na 'don dang*/_mi dpon dang*/_las byed dang*/_gtso bo dang*/_
[\[284a.7\]]tshong dpon dang*/_bya ma rta dang*/_khyim bdag dang*/_ljongs kyi skye bo dang*/_gzhan yang mchog dang phal pa'i bzo'i gnas dang*/_rig pa'i gnas kyi gtsug lag rab 'byams rnams la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa'i tshogs mang pos yongs su gang ba'o/_/gzhan 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]yang dga' ston dang ngo mtshar ba'i ltad mo'i gnas su gyur pa'i gtam brjod pa dang*/_bzhad gad byed pa dang*/_glu len pa dang*/_zlos gar bsgyur ba dang*/_mig 'phrul ston pa dang*/_pi wang brdung ba dang*/_gling bu bsgyur ba dang*/_khar rnga dang sil khrol 'khrol ba la mkhas pa 
[\[284b.2\]]dang*/_bus pa srang bar na rtse ba'i bar rnams te/_de dag thams cad kyang srang dang*/_srang bar dang*/_bzhi mdo dang*/_sum mdo rnams su rang rang gi bya ba de dag gis 'tsho bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de ltar sde bzhi rnam par rgyas pa'i dge mtshan gyi phung pos gong nas gong du 
[\[284b.3\]]mngon par mtho bar gyur pa'i gdan sa dpal lhun grub steng gi chos grwa chen po zhes bya ba/_sngon gyi skyes bu mkhas pa skye ba nas skye ba'i phreng bar shes par bgyi ba rig pa'i gnas kyi gzhung lugs mtha' dag la sbyangs pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa gtsug lag rab 'byams kyi yul 
[\[284b.4\]]la blta bar byed pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'i mig dbang shin tu dag par gyur pa/_chos kyi tshul thams cad mgrin pa rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor lo'i sbubs nas 'dren pa la bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i ngag gi dbang phyug grub pa mang pos sdeb legs tshig gi me tog ma lus pa 
[\[284b.5\]]gcig tu spungs nas mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog gi sil ma mang pos yang dag par 'thor bar byed pa'i gdan sa/_bskal pa bgrang du med pa'i ring nas sems can thams cad la phan par sgrub pa'i dam bca' dbrog tu med pa'i khur chen po khyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsams bzhin du skye ba nye bar len pa'i zhing dam pa/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las las rnam par 'phrul pa'i smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po rnams kyis mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa brtan par 'dzugs pa'i khang 
[\[284b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po/_srid pa'i sdug bsngal chu srin ma ka ra'i mche ba ltar gzings pa las ring du brgal ba'i ngur smrig 'chang ba rnams kyis ngal 'tshor spyod pa'i dga' tshal/_lha dang*/_mi dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_dri za dang*/_lto 'phye dang*/_srul po dang*/_lus srul po la sogs 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis gtsug gi nor bus gus par bsten cing mchod pa'i yul du gyur pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bsam 'grub mthong grol zhes bya ba dang*/_de dang zung 'brel du yod pa'i lha'i pho brang dam pa/_sngon gyi bsod nams dpag tu 
[\[285a.2\]]med pas nye bar bskyed pa'i mi'i lha/_che zhing mtho ba shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs mchog ma nyams pa rnams kyis srid pa nye bar len pa'i gnas/_gzhal du med pa'i stobs dang thugs brtse chen po lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i phrin las kyi zla 'od dkar po gang gis chab 'og tu 
[\[285a.3\]]'khod pa'i 'gro ba dang*/_byang phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dum bu rnam par yangs pa'i khyon thams cad du 'khod pa'i skye 'gro ma lus pa dang bcas pa rnams la/_snga na med pa'i bde skyid kyi kun+da'i dga' tshal shin tu rgyas par byed pa'i mi bdag chen po rnams 'tsho gzhes su bzhugs 
[\[285a.4\]]pa'i rgyal po'i khab dam pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba zhes/_gang gi yi ge dam pa phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba yongs kyi thos pa 'dzin pa'i bcud len du rtag par rgyu ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i bsti gnas chen po gang yin pa de ni/_snga na med pa'i legs byas kyi 
[\[285a.5\]]mchod sdong chen po 'di nyid gang du sgrub pa'i gnas so/_/gnyis pa nam bsgrub pa'i dus bshad pa la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad bshad pa/_de las chos sbyin 'di'i phyi mo bsgrub pa'i dus bkar ba'o/_/dang po la'ang bshad pa'i tshul so sor 'god pa dang*/_sgra ji bzhin 
[\[285a.6\]]pa'i lung ngos bzung ba'o/_/dang po la spyir bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i gtso bo'i lung dang rtogs pa'i bstan pa rin po che ni/_nges pa'i don du gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed pas 
[\[285a.7\]]rgyun chad med par 'byung bar gsungs pa la sogs pas nam yang nub pa med pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa de lta na'ang*/_gdul bya thun mong ba rnams kyi snang ngo ru bstan pa rin po che ji tsam gnas pa'i tshad la ring thung sna tshogs su gsungs pa las/_bstan pa lo stong phrag gcig tu 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gnas par bshad pa ni/_'dul ba lung phra mo las/_kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ma byung na ni da dung nga'i bstan pa lo stong tshang bar nyes pa med cing cang nyams pa med par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_ji ltar khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[285b.2\]]zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba bab pas lo stong tshang bar gnas pa'i yun thung ngur lhag ma tsam du byas so zhes dang*/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ji srid cig gnas par 'gyur/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_lo stong ngo zhes pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon tshul khrims 
[\[285b.3\]]bskyangs kyis mdzad pa las lo stong zhes bya ba ni gnas brtan gyi lo stong gi bar du bstan pa nyams pa med cing ral ba med par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mngon pa mdzod kyi rang 'grel las/_lung 'dzin par byed pa ni smra bar byed pa'o/_/rtogs 
[\[285b.4\]]pa 'dzin par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin te/_de'i phyir de gnyis ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o/_/de dag kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes bshad do/_/gzhan dag na re/_rtogs pa ni de lta bu yin gyi/_lung ni yun ring du gnas so zhes zer ro 
[\[285b.5\]]zhes rang nyid kyi bzhed pa la lo stong du gnas par bshad pa dang*/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyis mdo'i 'grel pa bal po zhi gnas lhas mdzad par gser phreng can gyi rtogs brjod du drangs pa las kyang*/_btsun pa mdang bdag mtshan mo'i rmi lam na rmi lam thun bcu mthong ste/_btsun pa glang po 
[\[285b.6\]]che chen po skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma thogs pa dang*/_skom pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi bzhin du khron pa gda' ba dang*/_phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang brje ba dang*/_tsan+dan shing tha mal ba la 'tshong ba dang*/_kun dga' rwa ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs la/_me tog dang 
[\[285b.7\]]'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de ni thams cad ma byin par len pas phrogs pa dang*/_glang po che chung ngus spos kyis glang po che bsdigs pa dang*/_spre'u mi gtsang bas 'bags pas gzhan la skud pa dang*/_spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang*/_snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos pa la 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]snam bu yang de bzhin du gnas pa dang*/_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus te tshig ngan brjod cing chad pa dang gnod pa byed pa bdag gis mthong ngo*/_/mthong nas bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong zhes bdag rengs shing 
[\[286a.2\]]'jigs pa dang skrag par gyur to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig_/rgyu 'di las khyod rgyal srid las nyams pa dang*/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur gyi ma 'jigs shig_/de ci'i phyir na/_
[\[286a.3\]]rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po che skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma thogs pa mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_ma 'ongs pa na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus na/_shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 
[\[286a.4\]]'gyur te/_de'i nyan thos dag rang gi skye bo gnyen bshes rgya chen po spangs nas rab tu byung ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas gtsug lag khang la khyim gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur zhing*/_de nas ser sna kun du brten cing lan mang du byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro 
[\[286a.5\]]rnams su ltung zhing skye bar 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis skom pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi bzhin du khron pa gda' ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston pa de dag nyan par mi 'dod cing gnas par 
[\[286a.6\]]'gyur ba de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang brje ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos phye tshol ba'i phyir dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa'i rin po che yang dag par gsal bar byed de/_de'i snga ltas 
[\[286a.7\]]so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis tsan+dan shing tha mal par 'tshong ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos dag lus ma bsgoms pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing*/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang*/_sems ma bsgoms pa dang*/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]'gyur la/_lus ma bsgoms pa dang*/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang*/_sems ma bsgoms pa dang*/_shes rab ma bsgoms pas mu stegs kyi bstan pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab dang mnyam par byed par 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kun 
[\[286b.2\]]dga' rwa ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag ma byin par len pas phrogs pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos khyim la brten te dge 'dun gyi me tog dang 'bras bu btsongs shing btsongs te bzung nas 'tsho ba'i phyir sems pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[286b.3\]]de ni de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po chung ngus spos kyi glang po chen po skrag par byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des gang dag dge slong tshul khrims dang 
[\[286b.4\]]ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/_des shing dge ba de dag bskrad nas gnas gzhan na gnas par 'gyur te/_de ni de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas 'bags pa gzhan la skud pa rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos sdig pa'i chos can tshul khrims 
[\[286b.5\]]'chal pa de dag gis dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa des shing dge ba'i chos can dag la mi bden pa'i skyon 'gel bar 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i dus na ma ning yang 
[\[286b.6\]]rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos la snam bu yang de bzhin du gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i bstan pa kha bco brgyad du gyes par gyur la rnam par grol ba'i snam bu ni ral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[286b.7\]]te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus shing tshig ngan brjod de/_chad pa dang gnod pa byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i bstan pa lo stong du gnas shing ngan par smra ba dang chad pa byed pas nub par 'gyur te zhes dang*/_de 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]bzhin du mdo sde bskal pa bzang po las kyang*/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po nga skyes pa'i yul ni grong khyer ser skya zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/gdung ni gau ta ma'o/_/'od ni 'dom gang ngo*/_/yab ni zas gtsang zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sgyu 
[\[287a.2\]]'phrul ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kun dga' bo'o/_/shes rab can gyi mchog ni nye rgyal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog ni pang na skyes zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgya'o/_/

[\[287a.4\]]mdo sde las brgya par/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang*/_rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/_dbang po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring por mi thogs par phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/_nga yongs 
[\[287a.5\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed kyis bstan pa srung bar gyis shig_/dbang po dag lo stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa nub tu cha ba'i tshe/_'jig rten chos ma yin pa shas che zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i 
[\[287a.6\]]mdo'i 'grel pa dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las kyang*/_slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir gyi khyad par brjod pa'o/_/de yang dper na mi'i tshe lo brgya thub pa la lo lnga bcu'i bar du ni 'phel ba'i dus

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]du sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la 'bras bu thob pa dang*/_shin tu rgyas pa'i dus ni lo stong zhig dzam+bu'i gling na gnas so/_/de'i phyed du bgos te lnga brgya snga ma ni 'phel ba'i dus su bzhag la/_lnga brgya phyi ma ni 'grib pa'i dus su bzhag go_/'phel ba ni lo brgyad cu'i bar du 
[\[287b.2\]]shAkya thub pa mya ngan las ma 'das te/_de'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos la sogs pa 'phags pa phyogs bcu nas dge ba'i rtsa ba smin te lhag ma rnams kyang shin tu lhag par rnam par grol/_gzhan lha dang mi la sogs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bkas

[\[287b.4\]]'dzin cing dzam+bu'i gling na khyab par grangs mang du gnas te/_de dag gis kyang lha dang mi la sogs pa shin tu tshad med pa yongs su smin pa dang*/_yongs su grol bar byas te 'bras bu thob par gyur to zhes dang*/_de bas na lnga brgya snga ma ni dus bzang po ste/_dus de la ltos nas

[\[287b.7\]]bar du lnga brgya phyi ma zhes bya ba'i dus su bsdu'o/_/lnga brgya phyi ma'i dang po tshun chad dus ngan par bzhag mod kyi/_'on kyang lo lnga brgya'i bar du ni dus ngan pa'i nang nas kyang 'bras bu thob pa ni shin tu mi dka' ba'i phyir/_dus ngan pa'i yang ngan pa khyad par du smos pa'o/_/lnga brgya phyi ma'i lo 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]'das phyin chad nas chos med kyi bar du dus ngan pa'i yang ngan par bzhag mod kyi/_de'i tshe na yang brtson 'grus dang nan tan byas nas 'bras bu mi thob pa yang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dang*/_nyan thos 'ga' tsam zhig 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba yang ma 
[\[288a.2\]]yin no zhes pa ste de ltar bshad pa de rnams kyis ni bdag cag gi ston pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid lo stong phrag gcig tu gnas par bstan pa yin no/_/yang bstan pa lo chig stong dang chig brgyar gnas par bshad pa ni/_mdo mya ngan las 'das pa lo chen gyi 'gyur las/_kun 
[\[288a.3\]]dga' bo nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya phrag dang po la ni bstan pa la chos bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi kun dga' rwa ba la dga' ba dang ldan par gnas par 'gyur zhing shes pa la mkhas pa dang*/_shes rab dam pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin du 
[\[288a.4\]]'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas/_kun dga' bo nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong chig brgya na/_dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'khor dang g.yog mang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams ni 'khor nyung zhig g.yog nyung

[\[288a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa'i mdo las/_lo stong phan chad sum brgya tshun chad ni che thang du 'khrugs te nga'i nye gnas rnams lus la chos gos gyon kyang shing kha la 'phan rnying btags pa dang 'dra ste gzi byin med ces sogs kyis ni bstan pa lo stong dang sum brgyar gnas pa'i tshad du bstan pa 
[\[288a.7\]]shugs las 'byung ngo*/_/de bzhin du bstan pa lo grangs chig stong dang lnga brgyar gnas par bshad pa'ang yod de/_snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i bam po bcu pa bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smon lam chen po lnga brgya las/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/_rang gi sku 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing*/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du bdag ni slad kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[288b.2\]]yang lo lnga brgyar ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur cig ces dang*/_mdo de'i bam po bcu gcig pa las/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[288b.3\]]shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pas bstan pa dam pa'i

[\[288b.5\]]nyis stong du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga brgya'i bar du nga'i bstan par spyod pa'i sems can rnam par grol ba mang du 'gyur/_de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du ting nge 'dzin spyod pa mang du 'gyur/_rgyal po dang sems can phal pa dam pa'i chos la dad cing*/_
[\[288b.6\]]spyod pa yang phyir zhing nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du dam pa'i chos ston cing sems can 'dren pa dang thar bar byed pa'i slob dpon mang du 'byung*/_nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa ni nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang sems can phal gyis nyan pa tsam du zad kyis nyams
