[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gzhung bzhin mi spyod/_brtson 'grus chung bas grub pa yang nyung bar 'gyur/_kha dog bzhi dang bzhi las gyur pa yang dri dang ro la sogs pa chung bar 'gyur/_mi nad phyugs nad dang mu ge yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lo nyis brgya la dge slong yang chos bzhin mi spyod/_
[\[289a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khe dang grags pa tshol zhes bya bas ni bstan pa lo nyis stong du gnas par bshad pa yin no/_/de las gzhan dag tu ni lo phyed dang sum stong du gnas pa'ang slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa'i 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa dbu ma'i tshul du rgya cher 'grel pa las/_lnga brgya tha 
[\[289a.3\]]ma zhes bya ba la/_/brgya phrag lnga'i tshogs ni lnga brgya ste/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lnga brgya phrag lnga'i bar du gnas zhes grags pas de'i phyir tha ma zhes bye brag tu mdzad de/_de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga po dag shes che ba'i phyir ro/_/dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa ni mos pa dang*/_
[\[289a.4\]]klog pa dang*/_kha ton byed pa dang*/_lung nod pa dang*/_'chad pa dang*/_nyan pa dang*/_sems pa la sogs pa nyams pa'o zhes dang*/_slob dpon 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas thub pa dgongs pa'i rgyan las/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas 
[\[289a.5\]]par 'gyur zhe na/_lnga brgya pa tha ma ji srid bar ro/_/brgya phrag lnga rnams 'dus pa ni lnga brgya pa'o/_/tha ma ni lnga brgya pa lnga pa ste/_lnga brgya pa lngar dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gsung las te/_dam pa'i chos nub pa ni sgrub pa yongs su nyams pa'o zhes kha cig go/_/
[\[289a.6\]]gzhan rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i dus ni lo stong phrag lnga rnams te/_de rnams brgya phrag lnga lnga rnams kyis phye bar byas pa ni lnga brgya pa bcu rnams su 'gyur ro/_/dus bcu rnams te/_sngon la re zhig rtogs pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus dang lung gi dus 
[\[289a.7\]]zhes pa gsum mo/_/slar yang so sor rnam pa gsum ste dgra bcom pa dang*/_phyir mi 'ong ba dang*/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang*/_lhag mthong dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dang*/_tshul khrims dang*/_chos mngon pa dang*/_mdo sde dang*/_'dul ba'i sde snod kyi dus te dgu po rnams grangs ji lta bar lnga brgya pa 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dgu rnams la'o/_/bcu pa'i dus ni rtags tsam ste 'di nyid lnga brgya pa tha ma'o zhes smra'o zhes gsungs pas bstan pa lo phyed dang sum stong du gnas pa dang lnga stong du gnas pa gnyis ka smos so/_/'bum TIka dang*/_yum gsum gnod 'joms dang*/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[289b.2\]]rgyal po'i mdo'i 'grel pa rnams las bstan pa lo lnga stong du gnas par bshad de/_de dag gi lung ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs brjod las/_gnas brtan yun ji srid cig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[289b.3\]]gnas par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag dogs pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi lag tu dam pa'i chos gtad par 'gyur te/_sbyin bdag dang sbyin 
[\[289b.4\]]pa po'i sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes dang*/_ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba 'das nas mi rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pas tshe slar 'phel te/_lo brgyad cu thub pa na ston pa'i nyan thos de dag yang phyir la dzam+bu'i gling du byon nas dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston 
[\[289b.5\]]par byed cing rab tu 'byin par byed do/_/ji srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur te/_mi rnams kyi tshe lo bdun brgya par gyur pa na nyan thos de dag gis gang sa'i steng 'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[289b.6\]]thub pa'i bstan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de dag gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gcig byas te kun nas bskor nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[289b.7\]]thub pa de la 'dud pas phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/_phyag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de yang nub nas 'og gi gser gyi sa gzhi gang yin pa de la gnas so/_/
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos nub par gyur to/_/de nas de'i rjes la rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung ngo*/_/de nas mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[290a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes bya bas ni yar 'phel gyi tshe lo bdun brgya par gyur pa de srid du ston pa'i bstan pa 'di nyid gnas par bshad do/_/gnyis pa de ltar bshad pa'i tshul de dag las bstan pa dam pa'i chos lo stong du gnas pa dang*/_stong dang chig 
[\[290a.3\]]brgyar gnas pa dang*/_stong dang sum brgyar gnas pa dang*/_stong dang lnga brgyar gnas pa dang*/_nyis stong du gnas pa dang*/_nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du gnas pa ste de las ring du mi gnas par gsungs pa rnams ni drang don dgongs pa can du gsal te/_dgongs gzhi ni 'bras bu'i 
[\[290a.4\]]dus kyi bstan pa dang sgrub pa'i dus kyi bstan pa tsam la dgongs so/_/tshe lo bdun brgya pa'i bar du gnas par gsungs pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang glegs bam la sogs pa ni ring du gnas pa tsam la dgongs so/_/dgos pa ni nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar tsam las 
[\[290a.5\]]mi gnas par bshad pa ni/_gdul bya rnams skyo ba bskyed de chos la bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/ha cang ring bar gnas par bshad pa yang*/_zhum pa gzengs stod de bshad pa dang*/_sgrub pa la sogs pa la rtsom pa chen pos 'jug pa'i phyir te/_dngos la gnod byed ni/_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 
[\[290a.6\]]'od lung bstan pa'i mdo las/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyis stong lnga brgya na gdong dmar can gyi yul du dam pa'i chos dar bar 'gyur ro zhes ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo phyed dang sum stong nas gdong dmar can gyi yul du dam pa'i chos dar bar lung bstan pa la sogs 
[\[290a.7\]]pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na bstan pa dam pa'i chos lo lnga stong du gnas pa gsungs pa ni nges pa'i don gyi tshig yin no/_/de yang ji ltar zhe na/_'di ltar slob dpon daMSh+T+ra se nAs mdzad pa'i 'bum TIka le'u las/_de la phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur te/_lo lnga stong la lo lnga brgya phrag bcu yod de/_de la lnga brgya dang po la dam pa'i chos spyod pa rnams phal cher dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_lnga brgya gnyis pa la phal cher 
[\[290b.2\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_lnga brgya gsum pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang*/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba mang ste/_lnga brgya phrag gsum po de dag gi tshe ni chos rtogs shing 'bras bu thob pa mang ba'i tshigs zhes bya'o/_/lnga brgya bzhi pa la ni lhag mthong gi 
[\[290b.3\]]shas che zhing shes rab rno ba mang ngo*/_/lnga brgya lnga pa la zhi gnas kyi shas che ste/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa mang ngo*/_/lnga brgya drug pa la ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang ste/_lnga brgya phrag gsum po de dag gi tshe ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang bas sgrub pa dang 
[\[290b.4\]]ldan pa'i tshigs zhes bya'o/_/lnga brgya bdun pa la chos mngon pa dar bar 'gyur/_lnga brgya brgyad pa la mdo sde dar bar 'gyur/_lnga brgya dgu pa la 'dul ba dar bar 'gyur te/_lnga brgya phrag gsum po de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa'i sde snod gsum la brten cing 
[\[290b.5\]]lung la spyod pa mang bas lung gi tshigs zhes bya'o/_/lnga brgya bcu pa la sde snod gsum yang btsan par mi byed/_chos spyod pa rnams kyang gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du legs par nyams 'og tu mi chud de/_mtshan ma tsam zhig spyod pa mang bas mtshan ma tsam gyi tshigs zhes bya ste/_
[\[290b.6\]]de la lnga brgya phrag bcu'i tha ma 'di la phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya'o zhes te/_de la'ang 'bras bu thob pa mang ba'i tshigs gsum dang*/_sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs gsum dang*/_lung gi tshigs gsum dang*/_mtshan ma tsam gyi tshigs zhes tha snyad du mdzad pas lo lnga stong du 
[\[290b.7\]]gnas par gsungs pa dang*/_slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo'i 'grel pa grags pa'i phreng ba las kyang*/_brgya phrag lnga bsdus pa ni lnga brgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i dus lo lnga stong gnas so zhes zer ro/_/lo lnga 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]stong la lnga brgya lnga brgya tha dad du byas pa'i dbang du byas nas lnga brgya phrag bcur 'gyur bas dus bcur 'gyur te/_re zhig dang por ni mngon par rtogs pa'i dus yin no/_/de nas bsgrub pa'i dus so/_/de nas lung gi dus zhes bya bas dus gsum mo/_/de la

[\[291a.3\]]gi dus kyang gsum du 'gyur te/_chos mngon pa'i sde snod kyi dus dang*/_mdo sde'i sde snod kyi dus dang*/_'dul ba'i sde snod kyi dus so/_/de ltar dus dgu dang*/_rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dus dang bcur 'gyur ro/_/de la dus re re la yang lo lnga brgya lnga brgyar 'gyur te/_de ltar dus bcu la lnga brgya phrag bcu yin 
[\[291a.4\]]pas lo lnga stong du 'gyur ro/_/de la lnga brgya phrag dang po la ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/gnyis pa la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/gsum pa la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/bzhi pa la ni lhag mthong ngo*/_/lnga pa la ni ting nge 'dzin no/_/drug pa la ni tshul khrims so/_/bdun pa la ni chos mngon 
[\[291a.5\]]pa'o/_/brgyad pa la ni mdo sde'o/_/dgu pa la ni 'dul ba'o/_/lnga brgya phrag bcu pa la ni rtags tsam mo/_/de lta bu la lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya'o/_/lnga brgya zhes bya ba kha cig gzhan du 'don te/_lnga brgya zhes bya ba ni ring po bor ba'o zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag ni 'di skad smra ste/
[\[291a.6\]]mi rnams ni tshe tshad lo brgya yin no/_/de la dang po'i lo lnga bcu la ni kha dog dang*/_gzugs dang*/_stobs dang*/_shes rab la sogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/phyed phyi ma'i lnga bcu la ni de dag rim gyis 'grib par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten thams 
[\[291a.7\]]cad kyi dus kyi tha ma la bab pa'i tshe phyed phyi ma'i lnga bcu'i tha ma la bab pa 'dra bar tha mar gyur pa dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe mngon par rtogs pa nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/lung gi chos kyang 'dri ba dang*/_'drir 'jug pa 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]dang*/_klog pa dang*/_'don pa la sogs pa la nyon mongs pa dang*/_grogs ngan pa la sogs pas kun nas dkrugs pas 'jig rten rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bur gyur pa ni nub pa'o zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i dus gsum dang*/_sgrub pa'i dus gsum dang*/_

[\[291b.4\]]dus zhes bya ste khong du chud pa'i dus gsum mo/_/de nas lnga brgya bzhi pa dang*/_lnga pa dang drug pa rnams la'ang rim pa bzhin du lhag mthong dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dang*/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang du 'byung bas/_lhag mthong gi dus dang*/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dus dang*/_tshul khrims

[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]po ni/_de ltar bstan pa'i gnas tshad lo lnga stong du bshad pa de las sngon du ji tsam zhig 'das par gyur pa'i dus na/_deng gi bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin gyi ma mo 'di bsgrubs pa yin zhe na/_bshad par bya ste/_de la thog mar grangs su rtsi bar byed pas 
[\[292a.2\]]lor 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan cung zad bshad na 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i lugs ltar na/_mngon pa mdzod las/_skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la/_/de yi skad cig de dag kyang*/_/drug cu la ni thang gcig go_/yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni/_/gong nas gong du sum cur 
[\[292a.3\]]'gyur/_/zhag gi thub dang bcas pa yi/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig_/ces dang*/_'jig rten gzhag pa las/_'di lta ste bud med bal 'khal pa 'bring gis ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung bar snyod pa de tsam gyi yun ni skad cig gi tshad yin no/_/de lta bu'i skad cig 
[\[292a.4\]]brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig go_/de'i skad cig de lta bu drug cu la thang gcig go/_/thang gcig de lta bu sum cu la yud tsam gcig go/_/yud tsam de lta bu sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go/_/de sum cu la zla ba gcig go_/zla ba sum cu la lo gcig go zhes dang*/_gso ba rig

[\[292a.7\]]sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go/_/de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/de gnyis la dus gcig go/_/dus drug la lor brtsi ba dang*/_yang de dbugs kyi sgo nas brtsi ba ni/_shig la sogs pa phra mo dang*/_mi dang*/_yi dwags chen po dang*/_lha dang*/_lha ma yin dang*/_nus 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]pa'i ming can 'og min pa dang*/_gtso bo'i ming can srid rtse ba rnams te/_'gro ba bdun gyi dbugs sum brgya drug cur chu tshod gcig go/_/dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya la zhag gcig go/_/de sum brgya drug cu ni rang rang gi lo yin pas mi'i chu tshod gcig la srog chags phra mo'i lo gcig ste/_
[\[292b.2\]]nyin zhag gcig la lo drug cur phyin par 'gyur ba dang*/_yi dwags chen po ni/_'jig rten gdags pa las/_mi rnams kyi nyin zhag gsum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dwags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste zhes dang*/_mngon pa mdzod las/_mchog ring bskal pa'o yi dwags rnams/_/zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya/_/
[\[292b.3\]]zhes dang*/_bshes pa'i spring yig las/_lnga stong dag dang khrir yang 'chi mi 'gyur/_/zhes yi dwags chen po rnams kyi zhag gcig la nyin zhag sum cur 'gyur ba la sogs pas 'gro ba bdun po rang rang gi lo grangs bgrang lugs mi 'dra bar 'gyur zhing*/_de dag gi los gzhal na/_mi lo gcig 
[\[292b.4\]]la phra mo'i lo nyis khri chig stong drug brgya'o/_/yi dwags chen po'i zhag bcu gnyis so/_/lha'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/lha ma yin gyi chu tshod gcig go/_/nus pa'i ming can nam/_'og min pa'i dbugs gcig go/_/gtso bo'i ming can nam srid pa'i rtse mo ba'i dbugs nyis khri chig stong drug brgya'i 
[\[292b.5\]]cha gcig rnams dang*/_gza' brgyad po rang rang gi rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i yun tshad rang rang gi zhag tu byas pa'i zhag phyed gnyis la mi lo brgya 'byung ngo*/_/de yan mi lo sa ya gnyis dang bzhi 'bum la sogs pa gtso bo'i 'pho chen gcig gi yun du gsungs pa sogs mang du snang 
[\[292b.6\]]ba las/_'dir mdor bsdus snying po ni/_dus kyi 'khor lo las/_rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te/_/zhes dang*/_phyag rgya chen po thig le las/_thog mar 'byung dang rngubs pa'i grangs/_/nyis khri dang ni chig stong dang*/_/de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug_/
[\[292b.7\]]nyin dang mtshan mor nges par rgyu/_/zhes dang*/_rje ngor chen thams cad mkhyen pas/_de ltar sna sgo gnyis nas 'byung ba'i rlung*/_/ldang 'jug gnas gsum bsdoms pa zhag re la/_/nyis khri chig stong drug brgya rtag par rgyu/_/de ltar 'ong ba'ang snga ma'i bag chags ni/_/sems la gnas pa lus la smin pa 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]ste/_/de yi dbang gis phyi rol dus sogs snang*/_/zhes skyes bu nad med cig gi dbang du byas nas/_nyin zhag phrugs gcig la sna sgo gnyis nas rlung ldang 'jug gnas gsum bsdoms pa nyis khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu ste/_de ltar 'ong ba'i 'thad pa'ang tshe rabs snga ma'i phyi rol 
[\[293a.2\]]gyi bag chags sems la gnas pa nang du lus la smin cing*/_de'i dbang gis phyi rol gyi yul rnams snang bar gsungs so/_/des na nang rlung gi dbang las phyi rol gyi chu srang dang chu tshod la sogs pa'i dus rnams 'byung ba yin zhing*/_de dag rtogs byed dus kyi 'khor lo pa'i ri mo ba rnams kyang rags par mi nad 
[\[293a.3\]]med kyi dbugs 'byung 'jug gnas gsum gcig tu byas pa drug la srang dang*/_de drug cu la chu tshod dang*/_de drug cu la nyin zhag dang*/_nyin zhag bco lnga la phyogs dang*/_phyogs gnyis la zla ba dang*/_zla ba gnyis la dus drug gi gcig dang*/_zla ba gsum la dus bzhi'i dus gcig dang*/_zla ba bzhi la 
[\[293a.4\]]dus gsum gyi dus gcig dang*/_zla ba drug la bgrod par 'jog cing*/_bgrod pa gnyis la ni lo gcig ces bshad do/_/de lta bu'i lo'i skad dod la legs par sbyar ba'i skad du war+Sha zhes 'byung zhing*/_de la'ang yang bgrang dang*/_bgrang bya dang*/_bgrang gzhi dang*/_rang skyob dang*/_'dor byed ces bya ba 
[\[293a.5\]]rnams ni ming gi rnam grangs te/_'chi ba med pa'i seng ges/_yang bgrang bgrang gzhi rang skyob dang*/_/'dor byed ces bya lo yi ming*/_/zhes so/_/de lta bu 'jal byed lo'i grangs kyi nges pas gtan la dbab pa la/_'phags pa'i yul gyi mkhas pa chen po dpal ldan a ti sha'i bzhed pas/_bdag cag gi ston pa 
[\[293a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'di nyid zhing 'di'i gdul byar gyur pa rnams dam pa'i chos kyis 'dul ba dus la bab par mkhyen nas mchog gi sprul pa'i skur byon pa na/_shing mo glang gi lo la sku bltams nas/_sa mo phag la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang*/_shing pho spre'u'i gnam 
[\[293a.7\]]lo'i ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la mya ngan las 'das par 'dod de/_de ltar na ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas deng gi dus kyi chos kyi sbyin pa'i ma mo 'di'i dbu dang por tshugs pa'i bar la lo grangs sum stong dang brgyad brgya sngon du 'das par grub bo/_/'di la 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal gyis lugs 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]'di ni stod lungs pa jo bo tshul khrims bya ba'i 'dod pa yin gyi/_jo bo'i bzhed pa ma yin no zhes kyang gsungs so/_/kasmi ra'i ma hA paN+Di ta shAkya shrI'i lugs la ni/_ston pa 'di nyid me mo sbrul gyi lo la sku bltams shing*/_me pho byi ba'i lor mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa yin te/_de ltar na ston pa mya ngan las 
[\[293b.2\]]'das nas 'di'i bar la bgrang gzhi nyis stong dang nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa dgu sngon du brgal bar shar ro/_/'di la chos rje sa skya pa'i zhal nas/_lugs de ni rgya gar na nyan thos sen+d+ha ba rnams dus brjod pa'i tshe/_ston pa 'das nas lo 'di song zhes nub re zhing brtsi ba zhig yod pa la/_de'i lugs ma ga d+hA'i byang chub 
[\[293b.3\]]chen po'i sku gzugs de/_slob dpon mtho btsun grub rje dang bde byed bdag pos mdzad par bzhed nas/_tsan+dan gyi lde gu spungs pa na rang byung du 'khrungs pa'i dus de nas bzung ba'i dus tshigs 'khrul te/_ston pa 'das nas lo 'di song zhes brtsis pa de'i rjes su 'brangs nas/_rgya bal kha che'i paN+Di ta phal 
[\[293b.4\]]cher bzhed kyang yid brtan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/deng sang yongs su grags che ba pad+ma dkar po'i zhal lung gi rjes su 'brangs nas legs par bshad pa'i bstan bcos chen po bai DUr+Ya dkar po ste/_de las byung ba'i lugs ltar na sa mo lug gi lo'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la 
[\[293b.5\]]bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa nas deng gi chos kyi sbyin pa 'di brtsams pa'i bar la lo nyis stong dang drug brgya dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das shing*/_drag po lcags sprel gyi gnam lo'i sa ga zla ba'i bzang po gnyis pa'i tshes la zla skar rgyal la bab pa'i dus su sku bltams nas zla ba'i phung po 
[\[293b.6\]]nyis stong drug brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa bdun sngon du brgal ba dang*/_shing rta sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_lo de'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bzhi la lnga sder bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lo nyis stong dang drug brgya drug cu rtsa gsum 'das pa dang*/_dpa' bo lcags 
[\[293b.7\]]'brug gi nag pa zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la lho phyogs shrI d+ha n+ya ka Ta kar/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi gsang ba 'dzin pa po lag na rdo rje nyid mi'i dbang po'i tshul bzung ba'i chos rgyal zla ba bzang po la sogs pa'i skal bar ldan pa'i gdul bya rnams la/_bden don yan lag bcu gnyis pa dam pa dang po'i 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs nas/_lo de nyid kyi sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan nas bgrang bya nyis stong drug brgya dang bcu bdun 'das pa dang*/_shing sprel gyi lo la sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi gsang ba gsum po gcig tu bsdus 
[\[294a.2\]]pa'i rang gzugs/_snyigs ma'i dus 'dir gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam las/_gsang sngags rnying ma'i theg pa zab mos 'dul bar gyur pa'i skal ldan gyi gdul bya rnams yang dag pa'i lam la 'khrid par mdzad pa'i slob dpon chen po mtsho las skyes pa'i rdo rje de nyid d+ha na ko sha'i rgya mtsho'i gling ga la 
[\[294a.3\]]ba na ngo mtshar pad+ma'i gzhal med khang dam pa'i nang na brdzus te 'khrungs nas lo grangs stong phrag gnyis dang drug brgya bcu gsum mo/_/shing byi la ma hA tsi na'i yul gyi skye 'gro thams cad gtsug lag rtsis kyi bden pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/_rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i yab 
[\[294a.4\]]gcig lhag pa'i lha mchog 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid gnas ri bo rtse lngar tr-ik+Sha'i shing gi lba ba las mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'od phung stong gis dkrigs pa'i bus pa mtshar sdug gi tshul du brdzus te skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan nas lo nyis stong dang lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum sngon du 'das par grub bo/_/gzhan 
[\[294a.5\]]yang dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'grel las 'byung ba'i rtsis kyi lo dag dang bstun pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rtsis sa skya lo tsA ba la sogs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa las ni/_thub pa'i dbang po don thams cad grub pa 'di nyid shing pho byi ba'i lo la sku bltams nas nyi shu rtsa dgur khab tu bzhugs 
[\[294a.6\]]pa dang*/_dka' ba spyad pa la lo drug dang*/_sum cu rtsa drug pa sa mo phag la rdo rje'i gdan du mngon par byang chub pa dang*/_brgyad cu bzhes pa chu mo lug gi nag pa zla ba'i nya la dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi mchod rten chen por gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bdud rtsi 
[\[294a.7\]]legs par stsal nas/_lo de'i sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la mya ngan las 'das par bzhed de/_de ltar na ston pas mdzad pa'i tha ma bstan nas 'di'i bar la lo nyis stong dang drug brgya bcu gsum sngon du 'das par grub bo/_/gnyis pa ni/_dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pas phyi dang nang gi shes bya'i gnas thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i blo gros brnyes nas smra ba'i rgyal por gyur pa chos kyi rje dpal ldan sa skya pas/_dri ma med pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa'i lung don dang legs par sbyar te yang dag par bshad pa'i lugs la/_ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po 
[\[294b.2\]]'di nyid rab byung me yos kyi lo la/_dga' ldan 'chi ba med pa'i gzhal med khang chen po nas/_dzam+bu rkang 'thung gi rgyal mtshan dam pas nye bar mtshan pa'i zhing 'di'i gdul bar bya ba rgya mtsho chen po'i rdul gyi grangs snyed rnams ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam dam pas 'dul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen pa na/_
[\[294b.3\]]gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs te/_dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pas mngon par gtams pa'i grong khyer chen po ser skya zhes bya bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i ngo bo sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i khongs su lha rnams kyis mngon par sprul pa'i gzhal med khang dam pa ga la ba de na/_glang po che'i mchog thal kar mche 
[\[294b.4\]]ba drug dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can gyi lhums su zhugs nas/_zla ba bcu rdzogs pa stod 'grel gyi skad du rnam byung ste dbang thang dang bstun pa'i ming sa 'brug ces bya ba'i lo la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkra shis pa'i ltas kyis yongs su dkrigs pa dang bcas te/_lum+bi'i tshal du yum gyi dku g.yon pa nas 
[\[294b.5\]]sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bltams nas/_deng gi dus kyi legs byas par gyi sgo chen rnam par 'byed pa'i 'go dang por tshugs pa'i bar la lo grangs sum stong dang dgu brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yongs su 'das pa dang*/_dgung lo sum cu rtsa lngar son pa chu stag gi lo'i sa ga zla ba'i nya gang ba la/_sangs rgyas stong gis byang 
[\[294b.6\]]chub kyi snying po mngon du mdzad pa'i gnas ma ga d+hAr byang chub ljon pa'i drung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi go 'phang mngon du mdzad pa'i tshul bstan to/_/de nas kyang zhag bdun phrag bdun brgal ba'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bzhi la gzugs khams kyi tshangs pa chen po dang*/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 
[\[294b.7\]]gyis 'ongs te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab nas/_wA rA Na sIr lnga sde la bden pa rnam pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas brtsams te/_'jig rten gyi khams na snga na med pa'i chos kyi snang ba mtshungs pa med par bkye ba la sogs pa bgrang gzhi brgyad cur son pa me mo phag gi bar du bzhugs 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]te/_lo de la grong khyer rtswa can du mdzad pa'i tha ma mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan nas lo sum stong dang brgyad brgya bdun cu tham pa sngon du brgal to/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/zhes lung bstan pa ltar/_sa 'brug la rab tu dga' ba'i sa 
[\[295a.2\]]la gnas pa'i yon tan rgyud la 'khrungs nas bka' don mtha' dag rang dbang du 'grel ba'i shing rta'i srol 'byed chen po slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub bltams nas bgrang gzhi stong phrag gsum dang bzhi brgya bdun cu 'das shing*/_de bzhin du ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo dgu brgya lon pa na thogs med byon par 
[\[295a.3\]]rgya'i mkhan po wan brtsegs kyis mdo sde dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i 'grel par bstan pa bzhin du/_sa pho byi ba'i lo la ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa'i slob dpon chen po thogs med zhabs 'khrungs nas bgrang bya stong phrag gnyis dang dgu brgya bdun bcu'o/_/dmar ser zhes pa me mo sbrul gyi 
[\[295a.4\]]lo la 'phags pa'i yul gyi mkhas pa dang grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po mtha' dag gi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa'i shing rta chen po dpal mthu stobs kyi mgon po bi rU pa de nyid so ma pU rir sku 'khrungs yan zla ba'i phung po nyis stong dang brgyad brgya re gcig go/_/mdo las de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 
[\[295a.5\]]'das nas lo nyis stong lnga brgya na bod kyi yul du dam pa'i chos dar bar thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhal gyi pad+ma kha yongs su bye ba las lung bstan rkang pa drug pa'i glur blangs pa ltar me mo yos kyi lo la bsil ldan kha ba can gyi yul 'dir lha tho tho ri gnyan btsan gyi sku'i bsod nams gzhal du med pa'i dpyangs 
[\[295a.6\]]thag la brten nas/_pho brang yum bu gla sgang du dpang skong phyag brgya pa dang tshin+d+ha ma Ni'i bskol phor la sogs pa bab ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi dbu brnyes nas bgrang bar bya ba chig stong dang sum brgya bdun cu'o/_/lcags mo glang la 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod sdong bla na 
[\[295a.7\]]ma mchis pa 'phrul snang gi gan+d+ho la chen po'i jo bo shAkya mu ni bod du phebs nas lo chig stong dang chig brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug go_/sa glang la snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can rnams la rgyal ba gnyis pa lta bu'i thugs rje rmad du byung ba slob dpon chen po pad+mA ka ra nyid/_kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir snga na med pa'i legs 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]byas kyi mdza' bo 'gugs pa la rnam par sdang ba'i lha 'dre gdug pa can rnams kyi gnyen por spyan drangs nas bgrang ba'i gzhi brgya phrag dgu dang brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do/_/lcags stag gi lo la rten dang brten pa'i ngo mtshar gzhal du med pa'i snang zhen bcom pa'i legs byas kyi zhing bla na med pa/_zan g.yang 
[\[295b.2\]]mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po btab nas dgu brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa bdun no/_/chu rta la bde ldan zhing gi mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas pa'i gsang ba gsum gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i zlos gar chen pos byang chub lam gyi rim pa mtha' dag gsal bar byed pa'i 
[\[295b.3\]]'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po dpal ldan mar me mdzad bzang po za hor rgyal po'i sras su 'khrungs nas lo bdun brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa lnga sngon du 'das so/_/chu mo glang la zab yangs dam pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs snyan dgu rdzogs pa'i gdangs su rtag par rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa 
[\[295b.4\]]'og min stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams gnyis pa dpal ldan sa skya zhes yongs su grags pa'i dri bsung ring du 'thul ba'i dgon pa chen po gang de bsil ldan ljongs kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du btab nas bgrang bya drug brgya dang drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so/_/chu pho spre'u'i lo la dbang po'i phyogs kyi gru 'dzin zhing 
[\[295b.5\]]gi mgon po puN+Da rI ka 'chang ba chen po/_dang por byang chub kyi mchog tu thugs bskyed pa na/_rang gi smon lam gyi sa bon legs par btab pa rjes su dgongs bzhin du srid par skye ba'i phreng ba bzung nas/_sems can gyi don la rtse gcig tu gzhol bas 'gro ba rgya mtsho bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong du 'khrid 
[\[295b.6\]]par byed pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rje btsun sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying po zhes snyan pa'i ba dan srid pa gsum na gsal ba de nyid kyi gtsang la stod grom pa kha'u zhes bya bar 'khrungs nas lo drug brgya dang bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad brgal ba'i dus so/_/shing byar bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byon 'gyur gyi 
[\[295b.7\]]rgyal ba bdun pa rab gsal nyid shAkya seng ge'i lung dang rtogs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i dpal du 'byon pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bod du phebs pa'i dus dang*/_rig pa sngags kyi mthu grub pa'i ngo mtshar dpag tu med pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho dad pa'i gnas la bkod nas hor gyi rgyal khams su yang 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]grags pa'i zla 'od rnam par gsal ba karma pak+shi 'khrungs pa/_gnyis ka nas lo lnga brgya dang so gsum 'das so/_/chu stag la mi nas mi'i skye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga la bar ma chad du 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bzung nas/_phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son 
[\[296a.2\]]cing*/_yang dag par smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po chos kyi rje sa skya paN+Di ta chen po de nyid 'dzam gling dam pa'i chos kyi snang byed du 'khrungs nas dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa gcig lon pa na/_'phags yul rdo rje gdan nas dpag tshad bcu drug bgrod pa mang yul skyid grong gi 'phags pa wa ti'i gtsug lag khang dang 
[\[296a.3\]]'dab 'byor ba'i gnas su/_rgya gar lho phyogs kyi cha nas 'ongs pa dbang phyug tshangs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i mu stegs kyi ston pa 'phrog byed dga' ba la sogs pa rig pa'i gtsug lag mang po'i mthar son nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la rnam par sdang 
[\[296a.4\]]yang*/mkhas pa gzhan gyis pham par bya bar ma nus pa'i rgol ba ngan pa drug yang dag pa'i lung dang rigs pas sun phyung ste rang gi bstan pa la bcug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ngan smras kyi rma med par mdzad nas bgrang bya lnga brgya dang lnga sngon du 'das so/_/shing mo lug gi lo la 
[\[296a.5\]]'phags pa mchog gi yon tan gyi rtsal yongs su rdzogs shing khams gsum 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes pa gang gi thugs rje rnam par yangs pa'i phrin las kyi gdugs dkar po thur ma brgya pa gcig gis shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 
[\[296a.6\]]mthar thug pa yongs su khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen po de/_stag sde rlung khung du 'khrungs nas dgung lo bcu dgu pa chu mo glang gi lo la stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba shar phyogs gong ma chen po'i rigs kyi cod paN gcig pur mnga' gsol te gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i lam 
[\[296a.7\]]gyi rtsa ba dbang bskur ba legs par mnos shing*/_dbang yon du bod kyi chol kha gsum la sogs pa phul nas bod khams yongs kyi bdag po dpal sa skya par gyur nas bgrang bya bzhi brgya dang gya bzhi brgal lo/_/chu pho stag gi lo la gsung rab kun gyi bzhed don 'dab ma brgya 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]pa'i dga' tshal ma lus pa'i kha rnam par 'byed pa'i legs bshad nyin mor byed pa'i snang ba chen po 'degs pa la 'jigs med smra ba'i dbang phyug grub pa'i mkhas pa chen po bu ston rin chen grub bltams nas lo bzhi brgya dang bzhi bcu rtsa bdun sngon du 'das so/_/me mo 
[\[296b.2\]]bya lor zab mo stong pa nyid kyi lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa dang legs par gsungs pa dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel ba'i phyir/_rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ngur smrig 'chang ba chen po'i gar gyis mngon par rtsen pa rje btsun blo bzang grags pa 
[\[296b.3\]]de nyid mdo smad btsong kha'i yul du sku bltams nas lo sum brgya dang brgyad cu'o/_/shing mo glang lor dzam+bu'i gling gi yul dang*/_yul gru dang*/_ljongs dang*/_grong khyer la sogs pa 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor phal mo che dag rdzu 'phrul mchog gi rkang pa'i bgrod pas rnam par 
[\[296b.4\]]bcags shing byin gyis rlob pa dang*/_khyad par yul ljongs 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i phrin las kyi rgyun bzang po rtag par gnas pa'i chos kyi grwa chen po lhun grub steng 'di dang por 'debs pa'i thugs rje mtshungs 
[\[296b.5\]]pa med pa grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po thang stong rgyal po 'khrungs nas bgrang ba'i gzhi sum brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa dgu sngon du brgal lo/_/sa glang lor rje btsun blo bzang grags pas stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa dar ba dang*/_'gro ba'i legs byas kyi phung po spel ba'i ched du ston pas cho 'phrul 
[\[296b.6\]]bstan pa'i dus chen la lha sar smon lam gyi 'du ba chen po tshugs pa dang*/_chos 'dul bslab pa'i gzhi rnyog pa med pa la 'bad pa lhur byed pa 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis bsten pa'i gnas mchog chos grwa chen po ri bo dga' ldan gyi dgon pa btab nas lo sum brgya dang nyer brgyad 'das so/_/rnga chen chu 
[\[296b.7\]]khyi'i lo la kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po kun du dgyes par skyed pa'i 'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las rnam par dag pas/_snyigs ma'i dus 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lung dang rtogs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bya ba yang dag par byas pa'i rgyal tshab kyi skyes bu 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]sa gsum gyi khongs na mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po zhes yongs su grags pa de nyid dpal ldan sa skyar ngo mtshar bye ba'i ltas kyi phung po dang chab cig tu bltams nas/_sku las skyes pa'i 'od dang 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang pos mur thug pa med 
[\[297a.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par dkrigs te/_'phro 'du 'od zer gyi pho nya mang pos gzhan don dang por mdzad pa nas brtsams te lo grangs sum brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa bzhi yongs su brgal ba'i dus so/_/sa mo bya lor skye dgu rgya mtsho'i las nyon gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa sbyong ba'i gnyen 
[\[297a.3\]]por gyur pa/_sde snod rin po che rnam pa gsum gyi bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i bya ba gang+gA'i lha mo'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_bod yul dbus kyi rdo rje'i gdan dam pa shrI e waM chos ldan gyi gan+d+ho la chen po khang tshan gyi gtsug lag khang dang bcas pa legs par btab nas 
[\[297a.4\]]bgrang bya brgya phrag gsum dang nyag ma brgyad 'das so/_/me mo sbrul gyi lor mkhyen rab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dbyer mi phyed cing*/_de'i bka' don rab 'byams kyi brjod par bya ba ma lus pa sdeb legs tshig gi rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]snyan dgu rdzogs par sgyur ba'i lam nas 'dren pa 
[\[297a.5\]]la 'jigs pa med par smra ba'i rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs dkon mchog lhun grub pa dpal ldan sa skyar 'khrungs nas lo nyis brgya dang bzhi bcu sngon du brgal lo/_/chu khyir snyan brgyud bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu klung mtha' dag mkhyen rab rnam par yangs pa'i gsus bar bzung nas/_
[\[297a.6\]]legs par gdams pa'i chu klung gi rgyun chen po bye ba brgya stong 'bebs shing gsang chen bstan pa'i srog zung 'tsho bar byed pa tshar chen rdo rje 'chang blo gsal rgya mtsho 'khrungs nas lo nyis brgya dang sum cu rtsa lnga'o/_/me 'brug gi lo la yongs su grags pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu chen 
[\[297a.7\]]po rim par byon pa rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing*/_sum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mnyam pas bstan pa'i bya ba dri ma med pas/_mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa mgon po byams pa'i bstan pa ma shar gyi bar du brtan par 'dzugs pa'i chos 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]grwa chen po sde dge lhun grub steng gi gan+d+ho la bsam 'grub mthong grol chen po bzhengs nas bgrang bya brgya phrag gcig dang nyer gcig go_/sa khyi'i lo la 'khor 'das thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'od gsal bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du shar ba sde dge grub thob kun dga' rgya mtsho 
[\[297b.2\]]dge ba'i zhing du gshegs nas bdun cu rtsa dgu/_me mo lug la bsod nams kyi gom rlabs chen pos 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa la mnga' mdzad pa sa skyong byams pa phun tshogs bde bar gshegs nas lo bdun bcu tham pa 'das so/_/shing yos kyi gnam lo tshes bar phyi nang 
[\[297b.3\]]rig pa'i gtsug lag rgya mtsho 'dzin cing*/_mtshungs pa med pa'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba khri chen sangs rgyas bstan pas sde dge'i gdan sa'i khri bskyangs nas zla ba'i phung po drug cu rtsa gnyis so/_/sa yos kyi lo la de nyid sku mched rnams kyi thugs bskyed rmad du byung ba'i shing rtas/_
[\[297b.4\]]e waM chos ldan gyi dgon pa nas/_phyi tha snyad rig pa'i gzhung lugs thams cad dang nang mdo sngags bstan pa'i bdag po chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas phun tshogs pa bod chen po'i yul ljongs 'dir spyan drangs te bstan pa dam pa'i sgron ma mngon par bteg nas lo sum cu rtsa 
[\[297b.5\]]brgyad brgal lo/_/rnam rgyal zhes pa chu mo sbrul gyi lo la bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i legs byas kyi 'bras bu mtha' dag smin pas/_stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che la sman pa'i bya ba lhag par byas pa'i sde dge rgyal po bstan pa tshe ring de nyid sde bzhis mngon par mtho ba'i 
[\[297b.6\]]gdan sa'i khri la phebs nas sa'i steng thams cad chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las kyis bskyangs pa'i thog ma nas lo nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/sa skyong bsod nams ldan pa de'i bla'i mchod gnas su rje btsun e waM pa chen po'i bstan pa'i rgyal srid mthon po la mkhas pa'i phrin las kyi 'khor 
[\[297b.7\]]los sgyur ba'i gdan rabs sum cu pa rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa mdo smad kyi phyogs 'dir sa pho spre'u'i lo la spyan drangs nas zla ba'i phung po dgu sngon du song ngo*/_/sa mo bya lor dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje gang de 'od gsal 'chi ba med pa'i 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]rigs kyi skye bar bzung nas lus med thul ba mchog gi lung rtogs pad+ma'i dga' tshal mtha' dag cig car du bzhad pa mi'i nyi ma chen po dpal sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes sa'i steng na grags 
[\[298a.2\]]pa'i zla ris rnam par gsal ba 'di nyid/_deng gi lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ma lus pa'i mgon du rgyal bu don thams cad grub pa bzhin du dge legs kyi mtshan ma 'bum gyi tshogs dang lhan cig tu bltams nas bgrang gzhi bkra shis pa'i grangs dang mnyam pa brgal lo/_/
[\[298a.3\]]chu glang gi lo la mi bdag chen po yab sras rnams kyi thugs bskyed phul du byung bas/_bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i bka' gangs can gyi brdas drangs pa mtha' dag gi ngo mtshar bar gyi legs byas rgya chen po gang de rgyal khab 'di nyid du mngon par bsgrubs nas/_'jig 
[\[298a.4\]]rten gyi khams su chos kyi gtong ba mi zad pa'i sgo thog mar phye ba nas bgrang gzhi chu bo'i grangs kyis sngon du 'das so/_/shing stag la dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rab 'byams kyi gsang ba rnam gsum gcig tu bsdus pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa chen pos sems 
[\[298a.5\]]can gyi khams su bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon rma med par 'jog pa la 'gran zlas dben pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje chen po dang nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po 
[\[298a.6\]]'di nyid/_rgyal ba kun dga' bzang po'i zhabs stegs mi 'jigs bzhi ldan gyi rtags su seng ge'i khri mtho ba gang la phebs nas zla ba'i phung po rtse mo'i grangs dang mnyam pa sngon du brgal zhing*/_me mo sbrul lor bod chen por grags pa'i sa'i steng gi dkyil 'khor phal che ba 
[\[298a.7\]]dag_/dam pa'i chos tshul dge ba bcu dang mthun pa'i phrin las dang*/_stobs kyi 'khor los mnga' bsgyur ba la mi 'jigs shing*/_khyad par shar phyogs gong ma chen po'i las lung gi bkod pa btsan pos bod chen ljongs kyi skye 'gro spyi'i rje bor mnga' gsol ba'i sde dge sa 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]skyong chen po bstan pa tshe ring zhes grags pa'i rnga chen phyogs brgyar ldir ba de nyid kyis/_ya rabs kyi ngang tshul bzang po nam yang mi gtong zhing bye brag tu gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i dbang bskur gyi dam tshig rdo rje'i rwa ba gnyen po las mi 'da' ba rnams kyi nang nas ches mchog tu gyur pa ni/_
[\[298b.2\]]bla ma'i bka' lung gus pas mnyan pa dang*/_mnyen pa'i don tshul bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i dam bca' las mi 'da' ba ni bsngags 'os thams cad kyi nang nas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa nyid du lung dang rigs pa dang man ngag gi gtan tshigs mang po thugs la sim par brten/_skabs 
[\[298b.3\]]der mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang chen po bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa'i bka' lung gis ji ltar bskul ba zhal gyis 'ches te/_kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi tshig don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos 
[\[298b.4\]]sbyin chen po 'di nyid par du bsgrubs pa'i 'go tshugs tsam zhig mdzad do/_/de nas brtsams te kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal pos legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul mtha' dag 'jig rten gyi khams su ring por brtan par byed pa'i bka' khrims dang phrin las kyi 'khor lo nor 
[\[298b.5\]]'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs par 'gro ba la brdzi ba med pa'i sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul bzung ba'i sde dge bla ma kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes yongs su grags pa 'di nyid/_dus der gdan sa'i khri la dngos su phebs zin pa med na'ang sdom brtson bla ma rang gi bla na med 
[\[298b.6\]]pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang*/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po'i bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi kho ra khor yug tu ma khyab pa med par brdal 
[\[298b.7\]]bar bgyi'o snyam pa rtse gcig pa'i snying stobs kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rgyas shing*/_spro ba mchog gi dba' rlabs srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du lud pa snyam bgyid pas 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod sdong bla na med par gyur pa'i rten bzhengs 'di'i thog mtha' bar gsum du 'grub par 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]byed pa'i bdag po'i rkyen sbyar ba 'dis mtshon te/_dpal sa'i dbang phyug sde dge sa skyong zhes mtshan gyi rol mo phyogs mtha' nas phyogs mthar khyab cing*/_rnam 'dren bzhi pa'i bstan pa bla ma nas bla mar 'degs pa'i bya ba yang dag par byas pa'i 
[\[299a.2\]]yab mes gong ma rnams kyi bstan jus chen po gang zhig dgung du bteg pa na/_yangs pa'i rgyal khams thams cad du phan bde'i grib ma tsan+da na'i reg pa ltar bsil bar 'bab pa 'di nyid kyi bya ba'i khur chen po bzhes pa'i thog mar gyur pa'i gsar tshes kyi gnam lo/_/ston

[\[299a.7\]]sum cu tham pa dang*/_'dul ba'i dus kyi lnga brgya phrag gcig dang*/_rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dus kyi lnga brgya phrag gcig ste/_ma 'ongs pa na bstan pa rnal ma'i lhag ma drug brgya dang sum cu yod pa dang*/_rtags tsam 'dzin pa lnga brgya phrag gcig dang bcas na stong phrag 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]gcig dang chig brgya sum cu tham pa mchis so/_/de ltar sngon du 'das pa'i phyi ma gsar tshes kyi gnam lo de la/_dus 'khor ba'i rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i nang gses kyi 'bod phyogs/_'phags pa'i yul gyi skad rigs rnam pa bzhi las saM skr-i ta'i skad du sing+ga la ste/_stod 
[\[299b.2\]]'grel las 'byung ba'i bod skad du bsgyur ba dmar ser can du grags pa/_gtsug lag spor thang gi lugs dang mthun par shar phyogs ma hA tsi na'i yul du ting zir 'bod pa gang yin pa ste/_de'i srog ni 'od kyi nor can rab tu 'bar ba'i drod kyis 'tsho bar byed cing*/_lus kyi 
[\[299b.3\]]khams ni 'od srungs byin gyi rang bzhin du brtan par byas pa/_dbang thang ni pad+ma rA ga'i tshon gyis btsos pa'i bgo ba stug pos legs par bklubs pa/_klung ni in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can gyi chu dar dri ma med pa'i ska rags kyis mdzes par byas pa/_pho brang gling dgu pa'i dbus su klung 
[\[299b.4\]]gi kha dog dang mthun pa'i me long gnas pas 'byung ba chen po sum ldan du gyur pa/_srog dang dbang thang tha dad par ma gyur pa'i kha yan gyi lo dang*/_lha'i bla ma'i klung dang ldan pa ste/_gang la dbang thang dang bstun pa'i ming gi bye brag la ni me mo sbrul zhes 'bod pa'i gnam lo gang 
[\[299b.5\]]yin pa de nyid do/_/de la'ang nyin mor byed pa lho dang byang du bgrod pa gnyis las ni gnod sbyin gyi bdag pos legs par bsrungs pa'i phyogs ga la ba de na mngon par rgyu bas dkar po'i phyogs kyi bya ba thams cad la dge bar ster ba/_zhag gi phung po bcu gnyis las ni dz+ye twA ste 
[\[299b.6\]]snron gyis yongs su nya ba'i zla ba'o/_/dus bzhi las ni gnyis su med pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i lugs la dbyar 'bring po nyin mor byed pa rags par yar ngo sngon du 'gro ba 'khrig pa'i khyim/_zhib par khyu mchog gi khyim du spyod pa'i dus so/_/gso ba rig pa dang hor lugs rjes su 
[\[299b.7\]]mthun pa'i zhag gi phung po lnga par 'dod cing*/_gtsug lag spor thang gi lugs kyi ston rwa ba/_phug khyung mkhas pa de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'i nag rtsis rnam par dag pa'i lugs la shing sprel che ba/_hor lugs la sogs pa'i nag rtsis pa phal che bas chu rtar 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bzhed pa'i zla ba ste/_de la yang phyogs ni rnam pa gnyis su mchis pa las dkar po'i phyogs kyi rdzogs pa gsum pa la bab pa/_dus 'khor ba'i lugs kyi tshes la 'char ba'i dbyangs kyi yi ge ni la'o/_/gsal byed kyi yi ge rags pa ni Ta la'o/_/'byung ba ni 
[\[300a.2\]]sa'i khams so/_/'dod pa'i yon tan ni dri nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das thal ba'i dbang po'i lugs kyi dbyangs kyi yi ge ni o'o/_/gsal byed kyi yi ge ni ha'o/_/'byung ba ni kun la khyab pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/'dod pa'i yon tan gyi yul ni sgra nyid do/_/gnyis ka 
[\[300a.3\]]mthun pa'i dar gud ni smin pa'o/_/nyi ma ni shing gi khams dang ldan pa'i sgra brgya pa nyid do/_/spar kha dang sme ba dag ni dwa dang yab lha gdal drug go/_/res gza' ni mdza' lha'i grogs po ste/_de'ang rags par gud pa dang zhib par spyi lugs kyi gyod pa ste/_de nyid rnam 
[\[300a.4\]]par dag pa grub pa'i rtsis kyi lugs la rgyu skar gyi lha mo a nu rA d+ha'i dga' ston la bsu zhing*/_chu tshod phyogs kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i yun la 'chi ba med par 'grub pa'i sbyor bas rnam par rtse ba'o/_/dge legs sgrub pa la dge ba shas che ba 'phel ba'i nyi ma yod pa/_gza' 
[\[300a.5\]]dang skar ma'i sbyor 'phrod nyi shu rtsa brgyad mchis pa las gzhon gyi 'phrod dang*/_khams kyi sbyor ba rnam pa bcu las lang tsho'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/_/zla skar gyi longs spyod de las yongs su brgal ba na/_bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba byed rtsis dang gnyis ka mthun 
[\[300a.6\]]par snron gyi dga' ma dang res gza' lhag pa lhan cig tu tshogs nas bkra shis nyi ma'i dga' ston bzang po la ci dgar longs su spyod pa'o/_/rnam pa gcig tu na bya rog gi 'phrod dang khams kyi sbyor ba ni lang tsho dang*/_byed pa bcu gcig las ni snga char biSh+Ti dang*/_phyi char sa bon 
[\[300a.7\]]gdab pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa bcu gnyis las ni skye mched nyid do/_/gzhan yang dus tshod sa'i khams las grub pa'i 'brug gis rnam par rtse ba la sogs pa dge legs 'dzom pa'i dus phun sum tshogs pa ste/_'di dag ni kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gyi 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]bka' lung rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos ji snyed pa rnams chos kyi sbyin par spel ba'i ma mo 'di dag nam zhig 'go brtsam pa'i dus phun sum tshogs pa nyid do/_/gsum pa par du ji ltar sgrub pa'i tshul la/_'go 'dzin bkod pa'i nyer bsdogs dang*/_bya ba las kyi 'khor

[\[300b.3\]]gang yin pa de las nyog tu mi 'gro ba dang*/_byas pa'i rjes su sgros gtsang ba la sogs pa 'go 'dzin gyi bkod pa'i nyer bsdogs kho na la rag las pas/_de'ang gza' skar dang dus tshes phun sum tshogs pa'i nyin de la/_dpal mi'i dbang phyug chos rgyal chen po yab

[\[300b.7\]]'go gnyer gyi gtso bor gyur pa'i sku tshab pa ni sku don gzhan du bgrod dgos pa dang snyun gyis zin pa la sogs pas thog mtha' bar gsum du bskos te/_de'ang 'di lta ste/_thog mar chos dang srid pa'i gtsug lag gi shes bya mang po'i go 'byed pa'i mkhyen dpyod nam 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]mkha'i ngos ltar yangs shing dad dang gtong ba'i nor dang ldan pa'i 'phrul gyi blon chen phyag mdzod gu ru bkra shis so/_/bar du yi ge 'dri klog dang tshe'i rig byed dang rtsis kyi rig pa la sbyangs pa mi dman zhing*/_phyi thag ring du lta ba'i blo gros kyi mig dkyus

[\[301a.3\]]yig rtsis kyi rig pa la mkhas pa dge slong tshul khrims rab brtan te de rnams rim pa ltar bsko bar mdzad do/_/ji ltar bskos pa de dag gtso bor bzhugs pa'i phyi dang nang gi bya ba che phra thams cad kyi khur len byed pa'i grogs ldan pa ni/_bgyi ba gang dang gang yin pa thams cad las 
[\[301a.4\]]'bras ston pa'i mdo sde'i rjes su sgrub cing*/_ngo tsha shes pa la sogs pa ya rabs kyi ngang tshul la gnas pa'i par dpon dge slong rin chen bkra shis dang*/_blo gros brtan pa dang*/_dpal ldan rgyal mtshan dang*/_ngag dbang rin chen te chos grogs bzhi dang*/_par gyi bkram

[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]byed pa la rang yang las bzang gi 'brel pa bzhag pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ba dang*/_mi'i bdag pos dge ba rgya mtsho lta bu bsags pa'i nang du rang gi las bzang chu'i thigs pa tsam gyi rgyun yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang*/_deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa

[\[301b.7\]]de nyid nas 'dri 'don gyi 'go brtsams te/_de'ang dgongs 'grel rin po che 'di dag gi bzhugs tshul la ltos nas mchog dman gyi rim pas bzhugs pas/_thog mar rgyud kyi 'gres pa nas 'dri bar 'os na'ang*/_de nyid shin tu bka' gnyen cing mkha' 'gro'i 'khu ldog 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]che bar sems shing*/_sngon du bar chad chung ba'i thabs su mtshan nyid theg pa'i dbu nas 'dri 'don gyi 'go nye bar brtsams so/_/de'ang ji ltar brtsam par bya ba rnam par dkar ba'i bgyi ba gang yin pa thams cad gegs med nyid du mthar phyin par byed pa 
[\[302a.2\]]la ni/_bar du gcod pa srung ba'i thabs la shin tu 'bad par bya dgos pa'ang*/_mdo sdud pa las/_rin chen chos kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba mang*/_/zhes dang*/_sa skya paN+Di tas/_rin chen chos kyang dkon la ni/_rtag tu 'tshe ba mang zhes gsungs/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[302a.3\]]pa ltar snyigs ma lnga'i myos byed kyi btung bas kun nas myos pa'i skye bo mi srun pa'i khrod na nor bu rin po che lta bu'i dam pa'i chos dang de tshul bzhin du sgrub pa'i gang zag gnyis ka dkon pa dang*/_'ga' zhig 'byung ba rnams la yang*/_skabs der bdud rigs rnams kyi stobs 
[\[302a.4\]]shin tu che bar gyur pas/_chos la bar du gcod pa'i rnam pa mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang*/_khyad par deng gi dus na bstan pa la lhag par sman pa'i thugs bskyed dang*/_de'i bya ba ni 'di las rgya che ba'am mchog tu stobs che ba 'ga' yang bsgrub tu med pa ltar mchis 
[\[302a.5\]]na/_de'i tshe gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po de yang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang*/_sems khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang*/_rtag tu spyad par bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yid spro ba med par 'gyur ba dang*/_de'i gnas su yid du 'ong ba ma yin pa'i sgra 
[\[302a.6\]]chen po 'byung bar gyur te/_kye ma bdag la slad ma'i dus 'dir yid la mi bzad pa'i zug rngu rtsub mo 'di dang yul gyi mi 'dod pa 'di lta bu dag 'byin pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma shes na/_deng bdag la 'khon pa'i rgyu med par sdang zhing*/_nam zhig 
[\[302a.7\]]na bdud kyi gnas kyang stongs par bgyid pa la yang spro ba dam pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'i dge ba can su zhig sa'i steng na mchis par ma gyur tam snyam du rtog cing brtags pa la zhugs so/_/ji tsam na mi'i bdag po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i mthu las byung bar shes 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]nas/_de la bar du gcod par rtsom pa la mi spro ba med par 'gyur na'ang*/_sdom brtson mi'i bdag po gang gi bskal pa nas bskal par bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs ni dbrog tu nus pa su zhig_/'on te da ni bdag gis de'i dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun lam de gang du 
[\[302b.2\]]gnas pa de legs par brtags nas/_der bslu byed kyi mda' rnon po me tog gi mde'u dang ldan pa/_rnam pa ni shin tu rtsub mo ma yin na yang nus pa mchog dang ldan pa de 'phangs la/_ji tsam zhig gi dus na de'i sems dge ba'i rjes su zhugs pa de 'phyang mo nyug gi lcug phran 
[\[302b.3\]]la zhon pa zhig gam/_yang na dge ba'i las de las thabs kyis 'byol zhing rim gyis spro ba med pa zhig tu 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta bu zhig brtsam par bya'o snyam du yid la mi byed pa ni mi srid pa nyid do/_/de lta na'ang de nyid las srung bar byed pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa gang dag la 
[\[302b.4\]]zhugs pa rnams ni de dang de'i rigs can mang po glags blta bar brtsams kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing*/_khyad par gsang ba'i sngags dang rig pa'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor sgrub pa rnams la ni rgyal bas rgyud sde rin po che rnams las nye bar bstan pa'i chos skyong ba'i 
[\[302b.5\]]srung ma mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje gnyen po rab tu gdengs pa rnams ni rtag tu lus dang grib ma 'grogs pa bzhin du 'go zhing bcol ba med par bdud dang bdud kyi rigs can rnams kyi gshed ma nyid du mngon par rgyug pa la rab tu dga' 
[\[302b.6\]]na/_ched du gnyer gtad cing las su bskos na/_bar du gcod pa'i ri rab kyi rnam pa nyid kyang skad cig dang po nas gnyis pa'i bar du gnas pa'i go skabs mi ster ba ni 'bras bu gsang ba sngags kyi theg pa zab cing myur ba'i khyad par gyi chos nyid do/_/don de dag 
[\[302b.7\]]rjes su dran cing thabs kyi khyad par gang dag brtsam pa la spro bas zhugs pa'i mi bdag chen po chos la spyod cing chos la bskul ba de nyid yab sras nas/_las 'di gegs dang bral ba nyid du mthar phyin par byed pa'i rtsa lag tu chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la gnyer du 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gtad cing bka' bsgo ba gsol ba'i phyir zla ba de'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa ste mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus tshes khyad par can la rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal po thams cad mkhyen pa chen po bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po de 
[\[303a.2\]]nyid mgon khang chen por spyan drangs te ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar du gsol ba btab bo/_/de nyid nas kyang ji ltar gsol ba bzhin du bdag nyid chen po de gtso bor bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dge slong nyi shu rtsa lngas nyin gcig gi bar du bzhugs te/_srung ma'i dbang po thams 
[\[303a.3\]]cad sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pa'i lcags kyus mngon sum bzhin du bkug ste mdun du bka' lung mnyan gyin 'khor du gzhug go_/de ltar 'khod pa de dag la/_kye rdo rje las/_sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/_/rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan/_/
[\[303a.4\]]zhes gsungs pa ltar dngos su bshams pa gya nom pa dang*/_yid kyis mngon par sprul pa'i mchod pa dang gtor ma rgya chen pos mnyes par byas te/_bstan pa'i sbyin bdag pa chen pos ji ltar bsgrub pa'i bya ba rgya chen po/_kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa'i rgyal 
[\[303a.5\]]mtshan dam pa 'jig rten gyi khams su mi nub cing yun du brtan par bya ba dang*/_de'i rgyud la dge ba'i tshogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i las 'di la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung ba dang las mthar phyin cing phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i phrin las dang stong grogs su bsgo ba'i 
[\[303a.6\]]'dod pa'i don gsol ba mkhan po chen po nyid nas bsdebs legs tshig gi phreng ba gsar du spel bar mdzad pa dang*/_dam tshig gi rdo rje gnyen po'i ri mo rtag tu mi brjed par snying la gsal bar bris so/_/gsum pa bya ba las kyi 'khor lo la/_zhus dag gi rim 
[\[303a.7\]]pas yid rton par bsgrubs pa dang*/_de nyid par du bsgrub par rtsom pa dang*/_brtsams pa'i las mthar phyin pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po la'ang phyi mo gang la gtugs pa dang*/_zhus dag ji ltar byas pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po phyi mo gang la gtugs pa la/_spyir sa chen po 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams ni rtag par sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar brtse ba'i spyan ras kyis nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum ste dus drug tu gzigs pa las ni nam yang yol ba mi mnga' zhing*/_gzigs 
[\[303b.2\]]pa gang gi rwa ba na 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba su zhig ni 'phel bar gyur/_su zhig ni 'grib par gyur/_su zhig ni dbul ba'i dgon par 'khyams/_su zhig ni gnod pa dang lhan cig par gyur/_su zhig ni nyam nga ba'i g.yang du rgyu/_su zhig ni sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba'i khur 
[\[303b.3\]]gyis non/_su zhig ni sdug bsngal la mngon par rgyug_/su zhig ni ngan song gi thang du gzhol zhing 'bab/_su zhig srid pa'i chu gter du byings pa deng ngas snying rje'i lag pas gdon/_su zhig sdug bsngal gyi srin pos gtses pa las deng ngas 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[303b.4\]]gnas su bskyal/_su zhig 'dod chags kyi mes gdungs pa deng ngas chags bral dam pa'i chos kyi chus dbang bskur bar bya/_su zhig sdang sems gdug pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa deng ngas zhi byed gnyen po'i sngags kyis gso bar bya/_su zhig rnam par g.yeng ba'i rlung gis 
[\[303b.5\]]bdas pa deng ngas rtse gcig sems kyi stegs la ngal bsor spyod du gzhug_/su zhig ma rig pa'i smag rum du lhung ba deng ngas ye shes kyi snang ba chen po'i sgron ma sbyin par bya/_su zhig ltar snang bde ba'i 'ching thag gis bcings pa deng ngas yid 'byung gtam gyi sor mos bkrol 
[\[303b.6\]]la gtan gyi bde ba'i grong khyer du bkri bar bya snyam du rtse gcig pas rtog par zhugs pa na/_gangs ldan gyi ri bo'i phreng bas bskor ba'i nor 'dzin yangs pa'i gzhi la brten pa'i srog chags kyi tshogs tshad med cing grangs med pa rnams/_dam pa'i chos kyi snang bas ma 
[\[303b.7\]]khyab pa/_blang dor log par zhugs pa/_dug gsum gyi sdong po rgyas pa/_mi 'dod na'ang sdug bsngal la mngon par rgyug pa/_bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs la mi mkhas shing mtha' 'khob kyi mun pa stug po'i khrod du 'phyan pa rnams rnam par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]kyang pad+ma'i mtsho la ngang pa 'jug pa bzhin du gdul dka'i mi srun tshogs kyis yongs su khyab pa'i gdul zhing de na bsam bzhin par srid pa'i dpag bsam dam pa'i skye bar yongs su bzung ba'i sngon gyi sprul pa'i rgyal blon rnams dang*/_de dag gis spyan 
[\[304a.2\]]drangs pa dang*/_sngon gyi smon lam bzang po'i pho nyas yongs su bskul te byon pa'i 'phags yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po shes bya rig pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams kyi yul la rnam par blta ba'i mkhyen rab kyi mig dkyus thung ngur ma gyur pa rnams dang*/_skad gnyis smra ba'i 
[\[304a.3\]]lo tsA ba 'jig rten thams cad chos kyis snang bar byed cing*/_'jig rten kun gyi mig tu gyur pa rnams kyis/_thugs bskyed dang rtun pa brgya phrag du ma brtsegs pa'i bka' drin gyi shing rtas/_rgya gar dang*/_kha che dang*/_za hor dang*/_bal po dang*/_li yul dang*/_
[\[304a.4\]]sham+b+ha la dang*/_o D+yAn dang*/_rgya nag la sogs pa rnams nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang*/_bstan bcos kyi rigs dpag tu med pa spyan drangs te/_gangs can pa'i skad dang rjes su mthun pa'i brda'i lam du bsgyur ba dang*/_bshad pa dang*/_dpyad 
[\[304a.5\]]pa gsum gyi sgo nas legs par gtan la phab ste/_gangs ri'i khrod 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po/_shAkya seng ge_shAkya'i gtso bo/_shAkya'i skyes mchog chen po de'i bstan pa 
[\[304a.6\]]dri ma med pa shin tu dar shing rgyas par mdzad do/_/de dang mnyam du sprul pa'i rgyal blon chen po rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' lung dgongs 'grel dri ma med pa dang bcas pa'i glegs bam gyi tshogs bgrang gis mi lang ba mang po thugs dam gyi rten du bzhengs te mchod 
[\[304a.7\]]cing rjed pa dang*/_nyan pa dang bshad pa la sogs pa'i srol bzang po nam yang bsub tu med par btsugs so/_/chos ldan gyi rgyal po sad na legs mjing yon gyi sku ring la/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta dang*/_de wen+d+ra dang*/_dpal 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]gyi lhun po la sogs pas 'phang thang ka med kyi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i gsung rab rnams la/_tsheg bar brgyad la rkang pa gcig tu brtsis pa'i rkang pa bzhi tshogs pa la sh+lau ka dang*/_de sum brgya la sogs pa la bam po'i tshad du byas te/_gzhung tshad de nyid 
[\[304b.2\]]kyis legs par gzhal ba'i them byang ma 'khrul bar chos tshan 'di dang 'di la rnam grangs 'di dang 'di bkod pa dkar chag 'phang thang mar grags pa ste/_bod la dam pa'i chos 'gyur ro cog phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'i thog mar 'di yin par grags shing*/_
[\[304b.3\]]de'i rjes su sgra bsgyur gyi ban+de dpal brtsegs dang*/_'khon klu'i dbang po'i bsrungs pa la sogs pas stong thang ldan dkar gyi pho brang chen po na bzhugs pa'i gsung rab dang bstan bcos bod kyi rgyal khams su 'gyur ro 'tshal bam po dang sh+lau ka'i grangs su 'di dang 'di 
[\[304b.4\]]mchis zhes nges par gtan la phab zin pa rnams kyi mtshan byang dkar chag tu btab pa la dkar chag ldan dkar mar grags pa byung*/_de'i rjes su btsad po khri lde srong btsan pho brang 'on cang gi rdor bzhugs pa na/_nyi 'og gi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya dzi na mi tra dang*/_su ren+d+ra bo 
[\[304b.5\]]d+hi dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_bo d+hi mi tra dang*/_bod kyi mkhan po rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_d+harma ta shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba mkhas par chud pa dz+nyA na se nA dang*/_dzA ya rak+Shi ta dang*/_many+dzu shrI war+m+ma dang*/_ran+ten+t+ra shI la sogs pa rnams kyis theg pa che chung las 'byung 
[\[304b.6\]]ba'i rgya gar gyi skad las bod kyi skad du bsgyur zhing ming du btags pa rnams dkar chag tu bris te/_nam du yang gzhung lugs de las mi bsgyur zhing kun gyis bslab tu rung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal bar brten/_de rnams kyis kyang rgyal ba'i gsung rab dang bstan bcos kyi 
[\[304b.7\]]rigs sngar bsgyur ba rnams skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab/_gsar du yang mang po bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab bo/_/slan chad kyang de las mi bsgyur bar bkas bcad pa sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa mdzad/_bstan pa phyi dar gyi dus su chos rgyal chen po rnams 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]kyi thugs bskyed dang*/_sa steng na nyi zla ltar yongs su grags shing grub pa'i paN+Di ta ji snyed byon pa rnams kyi sku drin dang*/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po sprul pa'i lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis gsung rab sngar bsgyur ba rnams kyang zhu nan gyi sgo nas bstan 
[\[305a.2\]]pa rin po che sgro skur gyi dri ma dang bral bar mdzad/_sngon chad bod du ma bsgyur ba'i bka' dang bstan bcos kyi rigs dpag tu med pa yang gsar du bsgyur cing zhu ba dang*/_bshad pa la sogs pas legs par gtan la phab nas gangs ri'i khrod 'dir dam pa'i chos 
[\[305a.3\]]kyi 'byor pa rgya che zhing zab pa'i tshogs kyis sngon dus 'phags pa'i yul du ji ltar byung ba'i ngo mtshar gyi phung po la 'gran par bzod pa'i rang bzhin du gyur to/_/dus phyis 'dzam gling bstan pa'i sgron me dpal ldan sa skya'i gdung brgyud dri ma med pa rnams kyi sku'i zhang por 
[\[305a.4\]]gyur pa/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po se chen gan gyi brgyud pa dang bcas pas legs par bskyangs shing chen po'i go sar dbang bskur ba/_sku zhang chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi sras kyi thu bo gtsug lag zung gi mkhyen rab rnam par yangs pa'i dpon 
[\[305a.5\]]chen po kun dga' don grub kyi bsod nams gsog pa'i rten du/_bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal bzhengs pa'i dus su/_chos grwa chen po snar thang na bzhugs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal la ma phyir bzung ste/_de nyid du ma bzhugs pa'i chos tshan rnams dang*/_gsar 
[\[305a.6\]]du bsgyur ba'i bstan bcos kyi rigs rnams dbus gtsang gi chos grwa che chung rnams nas 'bad pa chen pos btsal te/_chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag tsam rnyed pa bsnan pa dang bcas pa'i bstan bcos rin po che stong phrag gsum dang sum brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis bzhugs pa'i 
[\[305a.7\]]glegs bam gyi tshogs bzhengs te legs byas kyi rgya mtsho chen po bskyil bar mdzad do/_/dus der gangs can khrod na yongs su grags pa'i mkhas pa chen po bu ston rin chen grub ces pa/_kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la rgyal tshab chen po'i bgyi ba bla na med 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]pa bgyis pa'i bstan skyong dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po des/_chos kyi rnam grangs mtha' dag gi mtshan byang dang*/_mdzad 'gyur mtha' dpyad dang bcas pa'i sgo nas gtan la phab pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi dkar chag nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i phreng ba zhes 
[\[305b.2\]]pa brtsams so/_/de'i rjes su bsod nams du mas bskyed pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'phags shing khrims gnyis kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ta'i si tu chen po byang chub rgyal mtshan gyis yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gis mtshon pa'i sa phyogs thams cad du bstan pa rgyas pa'i phyir 
[\[305b.3\]]dang*/_mi bdag chen po rang gi rigs kyi cod paN dam pa/_dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo mtshungs med chos kyi rje bsod nams rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas gtso bor smos pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sku khams bzang zhing phrin las 
[\[305b.4\]]rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dang*/_bdag gzhan thams cad kyi rgyud la tshogs gnyis kyi dpal 'byor rgya chen po bskyed pa'i phyir dang*/_sngon gyi rgyal blon bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir/_dpal zhwa lu gser khang gi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i 
[\[305b.5\]]bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal phyi mor bzung ste/_der ma tshud pa'i dpe dkon pa phyis su rnyed pa dang*/_gsar du 'gyur ba sum cu rtsa brgyad tsam bsnan pa dang bcas pa rnams la sgro skur gyi mtha' spang ba'i phyir/_lung rigs smra ba'i dbang po shAkya 'od dang*/_byang 
[\[305b.6\]]chub rgyal mtshan pa rnams kyis zhal ta legs par mdzad de/_chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag gsum dang bzhi brgya nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhugs pa'i glegs bam gyi tshogs rnams bzhengs te/_kun mkhyen bu ston chen pos slar bsnan pa rnams dang bcas pa dkar chag 
[\[305b.7\]]tu btab ste/_de'i dkar chag yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya ba brtsams so/_/yang bla na med pa'i stobs dang 'byor pa rgya mtsho'i mched zlar gyur pa la dbang 'byor zhing*/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal po'i bstan pa gong ma nas gong mar 'degs pa'i snying 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]stobs bsgrun du med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyal po chen po a mgon bzang po dang*/_snyigs ma'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po nyid glo bor spyan 'dren par mdzad de/_bka' dang dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos 'gyur 
[\[306a.2\]]ro 'tshal rnams bzhengs pa na/_de'i sgrig rim dang gzhung don 'ga' zhig the tshom can yin min gyi mtha' dpyad dang bcas pa legs par mdzad de/_mtshan nyid theg pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal dang*/_rdo rje theg pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi dkar chag 
[\[306a.3\]]gnyis mdzad do/_/gzhan yang lha sras mu ne btsan po'i sku'i yang srid du lung gis zin pa sde srid mi'i dbang po sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhes/_don du dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bzung ba'i paN+Di ta chen po/_shes bya rig pa'i gzhung lugs mtha' dag gang gi mkhyen 
[\[306a.4\]]rab kyi me long gcig tu rnam par bkra zhing*/_ji ltar bkra ba'i rnam pa gang dag tshul bzhin du 'doms pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen rab dang ngag gi dbang phyug brnyes pa chen po des/_rang gi rigs kyi cod paN chen po/_tshangs sras bzhad pa'i rdo rje ngag dbang blo 
[\[306a.5\]]bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sde zhes pa/_snyigs ma'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen por gyur pa/_gangs can khrod kyi grub pa'i mtha' gsar rnying ris med kyi bstan pa ma lus pa'i gtsug rgyan chen po de nyid zhabs kyi pad+ma mi 'gyur rdo rje'i khri la 
[\[306a.6\]]brtan par bzhugs pa'i rim gror dmigs nas/_'phyong rgyas 'phying bar stag rtse'i pho brang du/_zhwa lu gser khang gi gtsug lag khang gi bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal la phyi mor bgyis nas yar lung pas bzhengs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal nyid las rim par 
[\[306a.7\]]brgyud de mched pa'i bu dpe chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs dang*/_se ra theg chen gling dang*/_ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang dang*/_'phyong rgyas la sogs par bzhugs pa'i phyi mo rnams dang*/_der ma bzhugs pa bu ston rin po che nas deng sang gi 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]bar gyi gsar 'gyur dang*/_mdo dang sngags dang*/_rig gnas kyi dpe rnying khungs btsun pa sngar ma chud pa rnams dang bcas pa'i khyon bdun brgya dang brgyad cu tsam bsnan pas/_khyon bsdoms par chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag bzhi dang nyis brgya dgu tsam bsags 
[\[306b.2\]]pa la/_ma phyir sdeb kyi zhu chen pa rnam gling paN chen dkon mchog chos grags kyis gtsos pa'i brda dag dang rig pa'i gnas la byang chub pa rnams kyis bgyis te bzhengs nas/_de'i dkar chag 'jig rten gsum gyi bde skyid pad tshal bzhad pa'i nyin byed ces bya ba/_rgyal 
[\[306b.3\]]ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa chen pos brtsams so/_/de la sogs pa sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po thub dbang bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam par gyur pa rnams kyis/_lan grangs du ma'i bar du brda dang don gyi zhus chen lan grangs mang pos legs par gtan la phab 
[\[306b.4\]]ste/_de dag las mched pa'i dpe rgyun mang po rnams ni yul dbus gtsang gi phyogs kyi gdan sa chen po rnams su dar rgyas shin tu che bar bzhugs na'ang*/_mdo smad kyi ljongs 'dir sngon dus dgongs 'grel 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi glegs bam yongs su tshang ba'i 'dri srol che ba 
[\[306b.5\]]zhig ma byung ba lta bus/_phyi mor btub pa'i dpe rgyun ni shin tu dkon pa tsam snang ba las/_rga stod kyi phyogs na rga a gnyan dam pa zhes pa/_khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po chen po dpal sa skya pa 'phags pa blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa'i gsung las skyes pa'i 
[\[306b.6\]]slob ma'i thu bor gyur pa/_dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi gsang ba'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs par grub pa'i rtags su/_gang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba/_mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi khams su brtas pa'i byin rlabs me dpung gi tsha tsha res kyang*/_chu srin rgyal mtshan 
[\[306b.7\]]can sde dang bcas pa bskal pa brgya phrag mang po'i pha rol du yang gnas pa'i go sa 'phrog pa la/_cung zad kyang bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba'i dpa' bo chen por gyur te/_de'i grags pa chen po hor gyi rgyal khams su yang a gnyan pak+Shi zhes kun du yongs su grags pa'i skyes bu chen po 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]zhig byung ngo*/_/de nyid gang las byon pa'i rigs kyi dbon du gyur pa zhig gis rgyu rkyen phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/_zhwa lu gser khang gi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal phyi mor bzung zhing yi ge'i rig byed pa rnams 
[\[307a.2\]]bsags nas bzhengs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi glegs bam rnams dang*/_zhwa dmar cod paN 'chang ba rim par byon las bzhi par gyur pa shAkya'i sras kyi bstan pa snang bar byed pa'i nyi ma chen po/_dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa'i bdag rkyen la brten nas/_
[\[307a.3\]]'phying bar stag rtse'i pho brang du mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal las dpe byas nas/_karma si tu rin po che chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs su gyur pa'i rig pa'i gnas lnga yan lag dang bcas pa 
[\[307a.4\]]tshul bzhin du mkhyen cing*/_mkhyen pa thams cad kyang rjod byed dri ma med pa'i lam nas 'doms pa la mi 'jigs pa'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyis bdag po'i rkyen sbyar te bzhengs pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal dang*/_dus gsum mnyam par gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[307a.5\]]'dren byed dkyus su ring bar gyur pa'i rgyal dbang karma pa mthon ka chen po'i cod paN gyis gtsug tor mdzes par spras pa'i skyes bu dam pa rim par byon pa nas/_karma pa ye shes rdo rje'i bar la thugs dam rten du bzhugs pa la/_dus phyis 'gran zla med pa'i stobs 
[\[307a.6\]]kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mi bdag sa'i tshangs pa sde dge bstan pa tshe ring la bsod nams gsog pa'i rten du legs par stsal ba'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal dang*/_sa bdag chen po rang gi phyag mchod kyi zhing du/_mthing shog legs par bstar ba'i gzhi ma la rin po che 
[\[307a.7\]]dngul dkar zla ba'i grogs po 'dul sbyangs legs par bgyis pa'i khu bas shin tu gzabs par dris pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal dang*/_gzhan yang byams chos lnga la sogs pa par ma thor bu ba rnams gang 'byor byas te/_zhu dag gi ma phyi'i ched du mngon par 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]'du bgyis so/_/gnyis pa zhu dag ji ltar byas pa ni/_de ltar mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i phyi mo de rnams kyi nang nas rga a gnyen pa nas byung ba'i bstan bcos kyi dpe ni mdo phyogs kyi skor rnams dang*/_rgyud 'grel nyung shas shig shin tu dag cing yid brtan rung ba kho na 
[\[307b.2\]]mchis kyang*/_de las gzhan pa'i rgyud 'grel rnams dang*/_brda sprod rig pa'i skor dang*/_tshad ma rig pa'i skor nas phal cher phyis su 'thor god du song bas ma tshang ba mang zhing*/_kha 'thor lus pa rnams kyang rjes ma zhig gis kha skong thon lo tsam byas pa'i gras 
[\[307b.3\]]su song bas/_yi ge mkhan mkhas po ma byung ba dang chad lhag mang po yod pa'i skyon gyis yid rton 'char btub pa mang po ma byung bas cung zad tsam las phan skyed chen po thub pa ma byung ngo*/_/de bzhin du karma pas stsal ba'i glegs bam gyi tshogs rnams bzo bkod kyi 
[\[307b.4\]]rnam pa ni mig gi dga' ston chen po kho nar bzhugs kyang*/_yi ge pas bris zin nas zhus dag song ba'i rjes ci yang med pas chad lhag shin tu mang ba dang*/_rig pa'i gnas kyi bstan bcos skor ni nyung zad cig las gzhan ltar rgyas par ma bzhugs pa dang*/_skabs 
[\[307b.5\]]'gar yig mkhan mkhas po ma byung ba'i lag rjes su song bas klog pa la yang bka' tshegs ma chung tsam 'byung ba kho nar bzhugs pas yid rton btub pa zhig ma byung*/_'on kyang snga dus zhig nas gyes pa'i dpe rgyun gzhan zhig las bris pa yin nam snyam pa 
[\[307b.6\]]go rim 'khrugs pa'i mtshams dang*/_skabs 'ga' zhig nas cung zad re phan pa byung ngo*/_/sde dge nyid kyis bzhengs pa'i dngul bris can ni dpe ma bur song bas bum chu yar 'byo mar 'byor tsam las phan skyed nus pa ci yang ma byung ngo*/_/de rnams kyi 
[\[307b.7\]]nang nas si tu rin po che'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal 'di tshang zhing rgyas pa dang*/_mtshan nyid theg pa'i skor dang sngags kyi theg pa'i skor gyi skabs 'gar 'di nyid grags pa byung bas gtso bor bzung ba yin no/_/'on kyang 'di'i nang na'ang tshad ma'i skor 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]la sogs pa 'ga' zhig tu yi ge bas bslad skyon che bas chad lhag dang bri nor byung ba shin tu brtag dka' ba mang du mchis kyang*/_ma phyi gzhan la'ang de mtshungs kho na las med pas cung zad re las phan skyed chen po ma byung zhing*/_de 
[\[308a.2\]]las gzhan pa'i ma phyi yid ches pa gzhan dang bstun pa'i ya ba yang khams phyogs 'di nas shin tu rnyed dka' bar bcas/_dogs gnas che tsam mchis kyang sor bzhag go/_/ji skad smos pa'i phyi mo de rnams kyang 'ga' zhig ni dpe rgyun gcig par song 
[\[308a.3\]]ba dang*/_kha cig ni rang blo dbang du ma gyur pa thams cad kyi chos nyid yin pa ltar/_yi ge pa dang*/_dag byed pa'i blo bying ba dang*/_rmugs pa dang*/_ha cang 'phro rgod du gyur pa'i dbang gis chad lhag tu song ba'i rgyun 'byams te/_chad pa la chad mnyam 
[\[308a.4\]]dang*/_lhag pa la lhag mnyam byung ba dang*/_skabs 'ga' zhig tu ni tshig dang don gyi cha la skyon du zhugs pa dngos su mthong bar byung ba rnams dang*/_phyis kyi zhu dag mkhan gang zag rang stobs kyis dpyod tshul mi 'dra ba'i dbang du btang bas bcos nor song ba rnams

[\[308a.6\]]bar bya ba'i bka' dang bstan bcos gang yin pa de dang de la gtugs nas bcos so/_/la la ni mdzad pa po tha dad pa'i gzhung 'grel gzhan las 'byung ba rnams dang yang bstun nas gang la nges par shar ba de dang de'i thad nas bcos shing*/_de dag gis kyang nges 
[\[308a.7\]]pa ma byung ba rnams ni re zhig dpyad par bya ba'i gnas su bzhag go/_/khyad par sngags kyi tshig 'bru rnams ni spyir bstan bcos 'di dag gi nang nas kun la rgyug che ba'i dpe tshan 'ga' re min pa/_sngon chad par du brko ba'am tshig gi byi dor byed pa nyung ba ltar 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]gyur pa dang*/_glegs bam du bris pa'i rgyun rnams kyang phal che ba dag ni yi ge gshar du bris pa la dpe byas pa shas che bar byung ba'i rtags su/_dper na yig 'bru ta ra dang*/_pa sa dang*/_d+ha ha dang*/_Ta sde dang ta sde lta bu phan tshun 'bru nor byung ba dang*/_
[\[308b.2\]]brtsegs pa gral rim du shor ba la sogs pa'i 'bru nor cung zad res rkyen byas te/_me stag chung ngu las mched pas/_nags tshal chen po mer sbar ba bzhin du rim gyis rgya min bod min du gyur pa'ang mang du mchis/_de dag las 'dri mkhan dang klog mkhan 
[\[308b.3\]]gnyis kas kyang dag snang sbyong ba tsam ma gtogs/_rtog dpyod rig pa'i srang mdas gzhal 'degs ma grub par btang snyoms su lus/_de las rgyun 'byams su song ba shin tu dpyod dka' bar mchis so/_/'on kyang saM kr-i ta'i skad kyis yin pa'i sngags 
[\[308b.4\]]las ni phal cher rgyud gzhung dang brda sprod pa'i lugs gnyis ka dang bstun nas rang blor gang nges pa rnams ni ci nus kyis bcos/_sngags btu las 'byung ba rnams ni de nyid kyis nges par byas/_cis kyang the tshom dang bral bar ma nus pa rnams ni slar yang brtag par bya 
[\[308b.5\]]ba'i yul du bzhag_/pi sha tsi dang*/_a wa b+h+raM sha dang*/_pra kr-i ta'i skad kyis yin pa rnams dang*/_shin tu gsang ba brda'i skad kyis yin pa sngags kyi tshig legs par sbyar ba'i skad dang mthun par bcos su mi btub pa rnams ni phyi mo mthun pa shas che ba rgyu mtshan 
[\[308b.6\]]du byas nas sor bzhag pa dang bcas te zhus so/_/gangs can skad kyi brda rnams kyang*/_/dpal khang pa chos mdzad lo tsA bas/_/so so rig bzhi sa dgu pa/_/ma thob de srid chos kun gyi/_/nges tshig shes min de yi phyir/_/mtha' dag sdeb sbyor su yis 
[\[308b.7\]]shes/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'i yon tan rdzogs par ma gyur pa de srid du rtogs par dka' na'ang sngon gyi mkhas pa rnams kyis bzhed pa'i gzhung gi rjes su bgyid pa'i sgo nas te/_de'ang rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i slob dpon thon mi saM 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]b+ho Tas/_'phags pa'i yul gyi brda sprod pa'i gzhung chen po brgyad dang grangs mtshungs su sbyar ba'i bod skad la nye bar mkho ba'i brda sprod kyi gzhung rnam pa brgyad mdzad par grags kyang*/_bstan pa 'phel 'grib kyi dbang gis deng sang ni sum 
[\[309a.2\]]cu pa dang rtags gnyis kyi 'jug pa gnyis las mi bzhugs par grags shing*/_gzhung de gnyis dang*/_gzhan yang bkas bcad bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po dang*/_sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa dang*/_smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu rtsa 'grel dang*/_gzhan yang 
[\[309a.3\]]mkhas pa phyi ma rnams kyis kyang gzhung de dag gi dgongs pa dang*/_brda rnying gi gsung rab thams cad dang sgo bstun nas gsar rnying gi brda tshig dag par byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi tshogs ni mig 'byed kyi thur ma 'dra ba mang du brtsams so/_/ji ltar brtsams pa

[\[309a.5\]]bzhi dang*/_gsal byed sum cu tham pa'i grangs nges mdzad la/_mkhas pa'i kha rgyan las/_bod kyi dbang du mdzad de dbyangs ni lnga'o/_/gsal byed ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'o zhes a yig dbyangs kyi khongs su drangs pa la mi 'gal ba'i dbang gis de ltar du mdzad do/_/
[\[309a.6\]]gang ltar yang de dag gi dbye ba la'ang sngon 'jug gi yi ge dang*/_rjes 'jug gi yi ge dang*/_mi 'jug pa'i yi ge dang*/_yi ge so so'i rtags dang bcas pa'i rnam par dbye ba mang du 'byung ba rnams dang*/_yi ge gnyis sam mang po 'dus nas brjod par bya ba 
[\[309a.7\]]don gyi ngo bo ston par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ming ste/_de yang 'dogs pa'i dgos pa dang rgyu mtshan la ma ltos par don de dang de la rgan po rnams kyis brda sbyar ba'i ming gang yin pa de ni 'dod rgyal dang*/_'dra ba'am 'brel ba rgyu mtshan du byas nas rjes su btags pa'i ming 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]gang yin pa de ni rjes su sgrub pa ste/_de dag gi nang gses kyi rnam par dbye ba tha dad par 'byung ba rnams so/_/dngos btags kyi ming gang yang rung ba gnyis sam mang po 'dus nas brjod par bya ba don gyi khyad par ston par byed pa gang yin pa de ni dam pa'i chos

[\[309b.4\]]dang*/_bsnan pa dang*/_'byed pa dang*/_sdud pa dang*/_rgyu mtshan la 'jug pa dang*/_lhag bcas kyi sgra dang*/_'das pa dang*/_rnam grangs gzhan brjod pa dang*/_spyi dang bye brag gi sgra dang*/_bdag po'i sgra dang*/_dgag pa'i sgra dang*/_dgrol ba la sogs pa rnams 
[\[309b.5\]]so/_/gzhan yang rtags kyi nges pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams ni/_gang la 'jug pa dang*/_gang gis 'jug pa dang*/_ji ltar 'jug pa dang*/_ci'i phyir 'jug pa dang*/_de dag kyang dus rnam pa gsum dang rjes su 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'jug pa dang*/_bskul ba'i tshig dang 
[\[309b.6\]]rjes su 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'jug pa tha dad pa mang du 'byung ste/_ji ltar 'byung ba ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi tshul 'ga' zhig la/_thos pa dang bsam pa'i sbyangs stobs dman pa min pas blo'i dri ma rags pa sbyangs shing*/_shes par bgyi ba rig pa'i gtsug lag 
[\[309b.7\]]gi gnas gzhan mang po la'ang rnam par 'byed pa'i blo gros kyi lang tsho dar la bab pa'i zhus dag pa'i grogs ldan pa rnams ni/_sngon gyi brda sprod mkhas pa thon mi sam+b+ho Ta nyid slar yang sa skyong sdom brtson chen po'i bsod nams kyi rim pa rab tu brtsegs pa'i them skas la brten nas 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bde bar bab pa snyam byed pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_ma phyi 'don pa'i zhu chen bar rmugs sangs kyi bla ma sbyin pa rgya mtsho dang*/_spo lu bla brang gi drung yig blo gros rgyal mtshan/_lcags ra'i drung yig bstan 'dzin lhun grub/_'dzom thog gi dge 
[\[310a.2\]]slong bsod nams blo gros rnams dang*/_bu yig gi rjes 'ded par rmugs sangs kyi dge slong o rgyan rab dga' dang*/_shes rab bstan 'dzin dang*/_'dzom thog gi dge slong dpal bzang rnams dang*/_par yig gi yang 'don par sku tshe'i pad+ma la sogs pa'i 
[\[310a.3\]]blo gsal rnams kyis kho bo'i ngag bkod dang len gyi sgo nas gong du smos pa'i ma dpe dag dang legs par gtugs nas snyom las med par 'don pa'i zhu dag gi 'gan 'degs bgyis nas/_tshig don gyi cha la chad pa dang lhag pa'i skyon gyi rnam pa gang dag mchis pa rnams 
[\[310a.4\]]brtags dpyad rig pa'i 'phrul gyi sor mos 'byin 'jug gi bya ba gang 'os bgyis te/_yid rton pa'i gnas su rung ba'i zhus dag yang dag par byas so/_/blo gros gsal ldan de dag gi dpyad pas nges par ma gyur pa dang*/_the tshom du gyur pa dang*/_rtogs par dka' 
[\[310a.5\]]ba'i dogs gnas gang dag byung ba rnams ni kho bo'i mig sngar bstan du byung ba dang rang gis bltas pa rnams la brtag dpyad gang shes byas shing*/_gang dag yid la nges par gyur pa'i gnas rnams su dbri bsnan dang sor bzhag gang 'os kyi bkod pa byed pa'i khul 
[\[310a.6\]]bgyis so/_/gnyis pa de nyid par du sgrub par rtsom pa ni/_de ltar zhus dag gi rim pas gtan la phab pa'i phyi mo de dag las/_par yig 'dri ba'i yi ge pa mkhas pa rnams kyis gong du smos pa'i dus tshes nas brtsams te yi ger 'dri ba'i grwa legs par btsugs te/_
[\[310a.7\]]de la'ang sngon gyi dus na 'dir phyogs su yi ge rdzab ma 'dri pa po ma thogs tsam las/_mkhas mthong che ba'i snyug 'dzin pa mang po ma byung bar grags kyang*/_phyis su bsod nams kyi skal bar ldan pa'i sdom brtson chen po sku mched yab mes dang bcas pa'i sku ring 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten mang po ris su 'dri ba dang*/_'bur du bzheng pa dang*/_lugs su blugs pa dang*/_zabs su brko ba la sogs pa dar srol shin tu che ba byung ste/_de las byung ba'i legs byas kyi grags pa dam pa dpyid kyi rgyal mo'i 
[\[310b.2\]]rgyangs glu lta bu gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun gyi rna ba'i bcud du legs par sim zhing*/_de la brten nas/_ji skad du/_sa skya paN+Di tas/_pad+ma'i mtsho la ngang pa 'du/_/dri ldan me tog bung ba sdud/_/sha yi dri la sha sbrang 'du/_/'brog bzang du ni ri dwags 'du/_/bza'
