[\[310b.3\]]btung mang sar skye bo 'tshogs/_/gal te de dag mi ldan na/_/bsdus kyang skye bo phal cher 'bros/_/dro zhing brlan sar nags tshal skye/_/de sogs phyi yi rten 'brel yin/_/mchod la brtson na mchod par 'gyur/_/byams pa byas na glags kyis byams/_/bdag gi bla ma 
[\[310b.4\]]mchod byas na/_/sems can kun gyis bdag mchod 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos la gus byas na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi chos mdzod 'dzin/_/dge 'dun rnams ni mnyes byas na/_/dge 'dun dam pa rnams ni sdud/_/'khor rnams bsam pa dag pa yis/_/'khor gyi 
[\[310b.5\]]dkyil 'khor 'du bar 'gyur/_/mdor na bsam pa dag pa yis/_/gang dang gang la 'dod sems yod/_/shes na de dang de dag 'du/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar yul phyogs gzhan gyi bzo gnas rig pa la mkhas pa'i blo ldan gyi skye bo rnams kyang*/_bshul thag ring po'i 
[\[310b.6\]]lam gyi bgrod pas ngal ba dang tshegs che ba la ma ltos par grags pa'i yi ge rnam par gsal ba gang dag rna ba'i gsos su len kyin/_ched du bos pa bzhin du rang lhag pa mang po byung ba dang*/_rgyal khab chen po 'di'i mnga' zhabs nas kyang mi bdag rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 
[\[310b.7\]]mthu las gtso bo dang phal gyi bzo gnas rig pa 'chang ba'i blo ldan gyi skye bo sprul pa'i bzo bo dang 'dra ba mang du byung ngo*/_/khyad par 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod sdong bla na med par gyur pa'i dgongs 'grel gyi rten bzhengs chen po 'di'i 'go brtsams pa nas/_gtong phod mi dman pa'i sgo mo 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]brgya stong phrag du ma cig car du bye bar brten/_mnga' 'og gi mi'i 'gro ba mang shas shig ni/_legs byas chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen po 'di dag myur du 'grub par byed pa'i las byed par gyur to/_/de'ang la la ni gsar rnying brda'i tshig dang don gyi 'khrul pa sel 
[\[311a.2\]]bar byed pa'i dag sdeb par gyur/_la la ni snag tsha dang smyug bu lag char thogs nas yig rigs mang po sor mo'i 'phrul gyis bskrun pa la dka' ba med pa'i yi ge'i 'du byed par gyur/_phal cher yi ge'i gzugs brnyan gyi tshad dang mtshan nyid nyams pa med pa'i yig 'bru brko ba'i 
[\[311a.3\]]rkos byed par gyur to/_/gzhan yang dkar zhing 'jam pa'i ngos gzhi rab tu gtsang ba'i shog bu'i 'du byed pa dang*/_shing gzhog pa dang*/_tha na shing dang shog gu'i zho shas 'tsho ba pa yan chad kyang mi bdag chen po'i dge tshogs sgrub pa'i grogs su gyur pa ni/_dper na ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i 
[\[311a.4\]]ngos la brten pa'i 'dab chags kyi rigs kha dog tha dad par yod pa rnams kyang*/_rin po che kany+tsa na'i kha dog 'ba' zhig tu snang ba ltar/_mi bdag skye dgu'i sa 'dzin chen po dge ba'i lam du snying stobs rmad du byung ba zhugs pa na/_de'i rjes su chab 'bangs kyi skye bo thams cad kyang dge ba'i 
[\[311a.5\]]las kyi bya ba byed pa dang lag tu len pa por gyur te/_thams cad kyang rang rang gi las skal gang dang gang bskos pa de dang de la ma rmongs pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi rig pa 'chang ba kho nar gyur to/_/khyad par yi ge 'dri ba la nye bar mkho ba'i mtshan nyid gdon pa bcu dang gces so brgyad de bco brgyad dang*/_
[\[311a.6\]]mgo dang*/_dpung ba dang*/_zags mchu dang*/_yar 'then dang*/_mar 'then dang*/_mig spu ste/_de re re la'ang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ste gsum gsum du phye ba'i ma chos nyi shu rtsa gcig dang*/_rna ru'i chos gsum dang*/_'greng bu'i chos gnyis dang*/_gi gu'i chos gsum dang*/_
[\[311a.7\]]zhabs kyu'i chos gsum dang*/_ra btags kyi chos gnyis dang*/_ya btags kyi chos gsum ste bu chos bcu drug dang*/_spyi'i chos gsum sbo dang bcas pa ste rags par chos bzhi bcu'i mtshan nyid dang*/_zhib par so so'i thig gis cha dbye ba dang bcas pa ste/_de dag gi srol 'byed chen 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]po 'jam pa'i dbyangs thon mi sam+b+ho Ta'i yi ge'i rgyun 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa khyung po g.yu khris thig ris su btab pa la/_mkhas pa rong pos lhan thabs kyi stong thun mdzad pa dang*/_phyis byung gi mkhas pa rnams kyis brtsams pa'i legs par bshad pa dri ma med pa rnams dpang por 
[\[311b.2\]]bzung ste/_de dag gi tshul la legs par bslabs nas sbyangs pa'i mthar son par gyur pa'i yi ge'i dbu pa/_dge tshul gyi bslab pa la gnas shing gzhan la phan pa lhur byed pa bstan pa rgyal mtshan la sogs pa 'dir yod pa dang*/_dga' stod kyi 'dzin ma'i cha nas dbu pa 'jam dbyangs 
[\[311b.3\]]la sogs pa mang po'i dkyil nas bkrabs pa dang nyung shas rnams kyis dang por dbu tshugs pa'i dbyar zla 'bring por yi ge pa mkhas btus bco lngas bris/_de'i phyi lo nas bzung ste sngar yod pa rnams zhib 'tshogs dang*/_gsar du sbyong rtsol byed pa'ang mang du byung ba dang bcas te thams cad 
[\[311b.4\]]bsdoms par smyug 'dzin pa brgyad cu kha yar gyis lcags sprel gyi lo'i hor zla bdun pa'i bar gyi dbyar ngo phyed gsum ste/_dang por dbu tshugs pa'i dbyar smad bcas pa'i dbyar ngo gsum gyi dod tsam la/_mtshan nyid theg pa'i skor dang rig pa'i gnas kyi bstan bcos bcas bsdoms pa glegs 
[\[311b.5\]]bam brgya dang nyi shu rtsa brgyad po thams cad mthar phyin par bris zin to/_/de nas hor zla bdun pa de nyid nas brtsams te rgyud kyi 'grel pa rnams bri ba'i dbu btsugs te/_de la thog mar mkha' 'gro chos skyong gi tshogs la gnang ba nod pa dang bar chad mi 'byung ba'i phrin las gzhol ba'i phyir/_mgon 
[\[311b.6\]]khang nub tu sum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhib 'tshogs su bgyis pa'i ngor lugs kyi bskang gso dang*/_mgon khang shar du dam pa'i bskang gso chos nyid ma 'don pa rnams tshogs nas bskang gso dang phrin las bcol ba yang dag par mdzad do/_/dus de nyid du mgon po'i sku brnyan 
[\[311b.7\]]rnams su snyan shal phul ba rnams la'ang gnang ba zhu ba dang 'dod pa'i don gsol ba kho bos sug bris byas pa ni 'di lta ste//_//swasti bi dza yan+tu/_rgyal ba kun gyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi/_/cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas zlos pa'i gar/_/gang zhig dran pas bdud las rgyal ba yi/_/go 'phang sbyin pa 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]srung ma'i dbang por 'dud/_/gang gi 'jigs rung nyams kyi 'gyur ba res/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan sde dang bcas pa yi/_/don snying kha ru 'byin yang bstan skyong gi_/dbu 'phang bstod pa'i gur mgon lcam dral dang*/_/zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/_/las kyi dngos grub char du bsnyil ba la/_/
[\[312a.2\]]yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i srung ma che/_/zhing skyong gdong bzhi ldan pa sring dang bcas/_/bstan dang bstan 'dzin skyong ba'i khas blangs dang*/_/dam tshig rdo rje'i rwa bar gnas bcas pa'i/_/las kyi mgon po gnod sbyin yab yum dang*/_/pu tra ming sring sprul pa yang sprul bcas/_/mthu dang dpung gis khengs pa ma btang yang*/_/
[\[312a.3\]]rnam 'dren bstan la dga' ba'i ru mtshon dag_/'phyar la mi gus med pa srung ma'i tshogs/_/'dod pa'i phrin las bcol la gcig tu dgongs/_/'jig rten khams su rgyal bstan rin po che/_/yun du gnas phyir rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel rnams/_/phyi mo gcig las du ma 'byung ba'i 'phrul/_/chos sbyin mi zad par gyi sgo 
[\[312a.4\]]brgya dbye/_/de yi bdag rkyen sa spyod kun gyi rtse/_/bla ma kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde/_/sku 'khor bcas dang bka' bzhin sgrub pa yi/_/las byed kun la gegs med gnang ba stsol/_/mngon par bsgrub bya mtha' ru ma son bar/_/gzugs can gzugs med gtogs pa'i dgra dang bgegs/_/nad dang 
[\[312a.5\]]rims yams gdon gyi gnod pa sogs/_/'gal rkyen bar du gcod dgu zhi bar mdzod/_/'chi ba med pa'i tshe dang bsod nams dang*/_/chos dang srid pa'i dpal 'byor blo gros sogs/_/mthun pa'i rkyen rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig_/'gran ltar rnam par rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/rigs stobs 
[\[312a.6\]]'byor pas dregs pa'i che dgu dang*/_/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i skye 'gro rnams/_/rig byed dga' ma'i ut+pal mda' gzhu yis/_/reg pa ji bzhin 'di na rang dbang khugs/_/bka' yi dgongs 'grel chen po'i 'phrul gyi sgo/_/rnam par dbye la nag po'i phyogs kyi rigs/_/phrag dog sems ldan rnams 
[\[312a.7\]]kyis spros pa'i bgegs/_/zhi ba'i bdud rtsi 'thung bar ma 'dod na/_/sngon gyi dam tshig la dgongs mthu stobs dang*/_/mi bzad dpung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas ni/_/'thor byed rlung dang 'phrad pa'i thal ba bzhin/_/dgra bgegs dbyings su sbyar dang bsgral bar mdzod/_/bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]dang*/_lha srung rtag tu bstan las byung ba'i mthu/_/grag stong ngag gis gsol btab rten 'brel gyis/_/bsam pa'i 'bras bu 'phral la smin par shog_/ces pa phrin las zhu ba'i ched du bris shing las byed pa rnams la gsang ba sngags kyi rgyud 'grel zab mo 'dri 'don byed du 'jug pa'i nyes pa rang gzhan la mi 
[\[312b.2\]]'byung ba dang rkyen sel gyi ched du'ang dmigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po'i rjes su gnang ba zhig gyis zhes sku tshab pa'i gsung gis bskul ba ltar de bzhin yang byas so/_/skabs la lar rang gzhan la mkha' 'gro'i sun ltas sam lha 'dre'i byad ltas lta bu'i mtshan ma 'ga' zhig byung 'dug par/_
[\[312b.3\]]de la phan par bsams nas nang nub tu seng gdong ma'i bsgom bzlas mang tsam dang*/_de la bstod cing 'dod don gsol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa kho bo'i sug bris su bgyis pa'ang 'di lta ste/_dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong pa can ma la bstod pa mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i rnga sgra 
[\[312b.4\]]zhes bya ba/_gang la bstod cing gsol ba btab tsam gyis/_/bdud las rnam par rgyal byed bla ma dang*/_/gnyis su med pa'i gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i gtso/_/seng ge'i gdong pa can la bstod par bgyi/_/ye shes me 'od 'bum gyis dkrigs pa'i dbus/_/bdud sde'i 
[\[312b.5\]]dpung gis mi phyed rdo rje yi/_/sa gzhi rwa ba gur khyim rab yangs pas/_/mi mthun phyogs las rnam par rgyal la 'dud/_/rab 'jigs dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i/_/chos 'byung dbang sngon mdog tu 'bar ba'i nang*/_/khrag zhag bskyil ba'i dba' rlabs phan 
[\[312b.6\]]tshun du/_/'thab pa'i lbu phreng tshar du dngar la 'dud/_/de na sna tshogs pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha/_/zums kyis dogs nas nam mkha'i nor bu yang*/_/gdan du 'ongs la bdud rnams ma bzod nas/_/ro yi rnam pas nyal te bsgribs pa bzhin/_/de steng rgyal ba skyed dang rol 
[\[312b.7\]]ba'i yum/_/mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum gyi mnga' bdag mo/_/bdud dpung ri dwags mthar mdzad seng ge'i gdong*/_/sku ni gar gyi nyams dgu rdzogs la 'dud/_/zhe sdang rnam dag rnam shes gnas gyur yang*/_/chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin bcom ldan ma/_/thugs kyi rigs mchog mthing nag khro mo'i 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]sku/_/seng ge'i gdong can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gti mug rnam dag gzugs phung gnas gyur pa/_/me long ye shes rang bzhin bcom ldan ma/_/sku yi rigs mchog rab dkar khro mo'i sku/_/seng ge'i gdong pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ser sna'i 
[\[313a.2\]]rang bzhin tshor phung gnas gyur pa/_/mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin bcom ldan ma/_/yon tan rigs mchog gser 'dra khro mo'i sku/_/seng ge'i gdong can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dod chags rnam dag 'du shes gnas gyur pa/_/sor rtog ye shes rang bzhin 
[\[313a.3\]]bcom ldan ma/_/gsung gi rigs mchog rab dmar khro mo'i sku/_/seng ge'i gdong pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phrag dog rnam dag 'du byed gnas gyur pa/_/bya grub ye shes rang bzhin bcom ldan ma/_/phrin las rigs mchog ljang sngon khro mo'i sku/_/seng ge'i gdong 
[\[313a.4\]]pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyams pa'i sha rus bldad pa'i zhal sgo nas/_/dgra bgegs byad ma'i tshogs ni skad cig tsam/_/'tsho bar rung ngam zhes pa'i nga ro yis/_/sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g.yo la 'dud/_/dri gzhon gyis bskyod 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bzhin/_/khyod gdong khro 
[\[313a.5\]]ba'i gnyer ma rab tu spungs/_/rno dkar mche ba gzengs pa'i phrag pa nas/_/ljags 'gyu glog gi stang stabs bsgyur la 'dud/_/bde 'byung mig gis mda' lnga'i bdag po'i lus/_/bsregs pa'i ngo mtshar yi ge 'gog byed pa'i/_/dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gtsubs 
[\[313a.6\]]pa las/_/me yi tsha tshas gdon bgegs sreg la 'dud/_/sma ra smin ma 'khyug cing 'khyog pa yis/_/glog 'gyu stong gi mdzes pa dma' yang 'bebs/_/ral pa kham ser mkha' la gzings pa'i khrod/_/rang rtags rigs kyi cod paN 'dzin la 'dud/_/rgya chen thabs 
[\[313a.7\]]dang thugs rje chen po yis/_/yangs par brdal ba brang gi ngos dag las/_/dngos grub bcud kyi btung ba rtag 'jo ba'i/_/nu ma 'bur ba'i khur gyis mdzes la 'dud/_/pha rol byas pa'i rdzas sngags ting 'dzin gyi/_/nus pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i gri gug g.yas/_/byad 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]ma'i snying khrag lang ling khol ba'i snod/_/lcang lor bcas pas lag g.yon brel la 'dud/_/zhabs g.yas bskum pa'i sor mo rnams kyi rtse/_/chu shing ltar mkhrang g.yon pa'i brla la gtad/_/gar stabs stong gis ro yi snying ga na/_/kha T+wAM ga dang chab cig rol la 'dud/_/
[\[313b.2\]]dbang po'i grangs ldan thod pa skam po la/_/srog lnga'i pa tras 'khyud pa 'od du 'bar/_/ro skra'i dpyang thag la brten mgo bo ni/_/brgya phyed rlon pa'i do shal 'phyang la 'dud/_/dung chen rgyan gyi phreng ba rnam lnga dang*/_/khrag gis sbags pa'i stag lpags sham thabs sogs/_/dpa' 
[\[313b.3\]]mo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rdzogs pa'i slad/_/ye shes me yi dkyil na bzhugs la 'dud/_/mi sdug sku yi cha shas re re nas/_/sprul pa yang sprul rdo rje'i char rlung gis/_/pha rol brtsams pa'i byad gtad 'khrul 'khor sogs/_/nus pa'i brag ri thal bar rlog la 'dud/_/
[\[313b.4\]]sgo gsum gus pas mchod cing bstod pa dang*/_/gsang gsum rnal 'byor bsgom dang bzlas pa yis/_/sgo gsum rdo rje'i srung ba mthar phyin nas/_/khams gsum 'gro ba'i don chen byed par shog_/deng gi rnal 'byor sbyin bdag 'khor dang bcas/_/byang chub sgrub dang sgo 
[\[313b.5\]]gsum dge ba yi/_/bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i dpal 'phrog nad dang gdon/_/bgegs rigs 'khrugs pa'i bar chad zhi bar mdzod/_/tshe srog nyams zad bdud dang gshin rje yis/_/brkus dang phrogs pa thams cad snod bcud kyi/_/tshe dang bsod nams gsar pa'i skyes dang bcas/_/
[\[313b.6\]]'di na tshur bsdus tshe yi ka ring tshugs/_/lo dang zla ba zhag dang dus tshod dang*/_/phyi nang 'byung ba dgra gshed 'thabs pa yi/_/chag che nyam nga keg dang srir ldang ba'i/_/dus min 'chi ba thams cad bzlog tu gsol/_/phrag dog chang myos mi dang mi min gyi/_/bsam ngan sbyor ba 
[\[313b.7\]]rtsub mo'i kha yi rlangs/_/byad kha sbod gtong gtad khrom bcug pa sogs/_/gnod pa thams cad bzlog cing bsgyur du gsol/_/cir yang thogs pa med pa'i mthu dang dpung*/_/bskal pa'i 'thor rlung lta bur bskyed nas ni/_/bsam sbyor ngan par goms pa'i dgra 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]bgegs dag_/skad cig gnyis par gson du ma ster cig_/mdor na deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar/_/sa 'og sa steng sa blar rgyu ba yi/_/gdon dang dgra bgegs 'byung po'i gnod pa las/_/bdag cag 'khor bcas bsrung zhing bskyab par 
[\[314a.2\]]mdzod/_/rtsa brgyud bla ma rnams kyi byin rlabs dang*/_/mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum gyi mthu rtsal dang*/_/mthu chen gsang sngags zab mo'i bden pa yis/_/ji ltar gsol ba'i 'bras bu 'grub gyur cig_/de ltar ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong can ma la bstod pa mi 
[\[314a.3\]]mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i rnga sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhu ba'i ched du ban+de tshul khrims rin chen zhes bgyi bas lhun grub steng gi chos grwar bris pa 'dis kyang sems can thams cad bdud dang bar du gcod pa kun las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig 
[\[314a.4\]]ces bya ba'ang bris shing*/_gzhan yang las tshan nam zhig gyes pa'i bar de srid du/_mgon khang gnyis su dge slong gsum re gsar 'phar du bzhugs pa'i bskang gso rtag 'don dang*/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa rtag 'don dang*/_zla ba byung ngo cog gi nya dang stong 
[\[314a.5\]]la bla ma dpon g.yog brgyad res rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgo nas phyogs bzhi'i gtor chen brdzong ba dang*/_bar skabs rnams su yang dge slong mang 'tshogs kyis bskang gso 'don pa dang bcas te bya ba las kyi 'khor lo mngon par brtsam mo/_/khyad par de'i phyi lor mkhan chen 
[\[314a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa'i zhal snga nas kyi ye shes kyi me long gtsang ma'i ngos su lkog gyur shes par bgyi ba'i dngos po mtha' dag mi 'char ba med pa ni dus gsum gzigs pa kun gyi chos nyid do/_/'dir yang 
[\[314a.7\]]mi'i bdag po'i phrin las thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i las 'di dang*/_bstan dang 'gro ba'i dge legs sgrub pa la bar du gcod pa yod med rnams kyang gong du ji ltar shar ba'i lung du bstan par/_'di ltar deng gi skye dgu ma lus pa'i bsod nams dang dbang thang gi bum pa brgya 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]las skyes pa'i zong gi dngos po gya nom pas legs par bsgrubs pa'i sdom brtson mi'i dbang phyug rin po che sku mched dang bcas pa chab srid rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyan du brtan pa dang*/_gtsug lag lugs brgya'i mdun sa chen po 'dis mtshon pa'i yangs pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du bde legs 
[\[314b.2\]]'byung ba yang chos ldan gyi rgyal po nyid la rags pas na de dag gi ched dang*/_mtshungs pa med pa'i stobs dang dbang phyug dang grags pa dang mnga' thang rnam par rgyas pa ni/_sngon yang bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa'i mthus bskrun pa yin gyi/_deng yang 'jig rten gsum na skyabs 
[\[314b.3\]]gnas bslu ba med pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can ni dkon mchog rin po che rnam pa gsum ste/_de dag la ci nus kyis mchod cing gsol ba 'debs pa dang*/_yon gnas dam par bzhugs pa 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi sde la bsnyen bkur stob pa dag ni/_ji ltar bsam pa thams 
[\[314b.4\]]cad 'grub pa dang*/_ring 'tshor bgyid pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi nang nas 'di las mchog tu gyur pa 'ga' yang med na/_rnam pa thams cad du thabs kyi bye brag de las g.yel ba ni ci zhig bgyir rung*/_khyad par deng gi bstan pa'i bya ba chen po 'di dag bsgrub pa la bar chad med cing 
[\[314b.5\]]mthar phyin par gyur na/_nyid kyis tshe rabs mang po nas smon lam bzang pos legs par sbrel ba'i 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur ba dang*/_nyid chos ldan gyi rgyal po'i sku'i skye ba bzhes pa'i dgos pa dang*/_phrin las kyi gzhi thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di las lhag pa'i bgyi ba bgyir med 
[\[314b.6\]]pa zhig na/_deng de dag la dmigs pa'i sku rim sgrub pa la mi g.yel ba'i bka' drin ci gnang*/_ji ltar gsol ba legs par grub na/_phan bde'i rtsa lag dam pa rnams kyi sku tshe mi shigs rdo rje chen po'i khams su 'grub pa dang*/_tha gru yangs pa'i rgyal srid kyi bya ba yang chos 
[\[314b.7\]]dang mthun par byed la/_deng gi bzhed pa'i gtso bo nyid kyang gegs med du mthar phyin par 'gyur zhing*/_de dag la brten nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge legs thams cad kyang rang gi ngang gis 'phel ba dang bsod nams kyi stobs rab tu rdzogs pa'i mthu nyid kyis so 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]zhes pa'i bka' stsal tshangs pa'i bu mo'i rgyud [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]glu dang 'dra bar stsal bar brten/_lo der mnga' 'og tu gtogs pas mtshon pa'i dgon sde ris su med pa mtha' dag la sku rim gyi rten rgya che ba lan gnyis su dgram pa dang*/_khyad par lhun grub 
[\[315a.2\]]steng gi chos grwa 'di nyid du zla ba byung ngo cog phal che ba la gtor bzlog gi rigs gang yang rung ba re 'dzugs par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du rten bzhengs 'di'i gegs sel gyi rim gro yang phal cher snga ma ltar dang*/_lhag tu seng gdong ma'i snying po sngags dung phyur gcig 'don pa dang*/_sbyin 
[\[315a.3\]]sreg gi rigs ci mang blugs pa dang*/_chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams kyi gtor bsngo brgya rtsa mang du byas na legs pa'i bkas gnang ji ltar phebs pa ltar thams cad tshang bar mdzad song zhing*/_khyad par mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nas/_zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar sku mtshams 
[\[315a.4\]]dam par bcad nas/_srung ma'i dbang po rab 'byams kyi tshogs la mchod gtor brgya rtsa res mnyes par mdzad de/_sdom brtson bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku la bar chad mi 'byung ba dang*/_ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dag gegs med 
[\[315a.5\]]du mthar phyin pa dang*/_bstan dang 'gro ba'i dge legs kyi tshogs gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i phrin las dang stong grogs su rtag par 'go ba'i bka' bsgo ba dang*/_gtor ma gtad bzung ba'i man ngag zab mo dang bcas pas gnyer gtad yang dag par mdzad do/_/sku mtshams de 
[\[315a.6\]]las grol ba na dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bsam 'grub mthong grol nyid du phebs nas las byed pa rnams la'ang sgrol ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i rjes su gnang ba mtha' rten bkru byab bsrung gsum dang bcas pa'i bka' drin gyis bskyang ngo*/_/de lta bu'i rkyen sel gyi rim pa 
[\[315a.7\]]mang po dang bcas pa'i 'bad rtsol chen pos par du bsgrubs pas/_chu pho khyi lo'i ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]bar du bris pas lhag lus cung zad tsam ma gtogs pa'i gtos che ba rnams bris zin pa byung ngo*/_/de'i rjes su'ang dbyar dpyid gnyis tsam la smyug 'dzin pa nyi shu rtsa lngas sngar gyi 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]'phro lus pa rnams rdzogs par 'dri ba dang*/_gsar du yang grub mtha' ris su med pa la nye bar mkho ba'i rigs kyi bstan bcos gong du smos pa lta bu'i mang rab cig par du bsgrub pa dang bcas te/_de dag la'ang par brkos ni mang po'i khrod nas mkhas btus byas pa brgya phrag lnga 
[\[315b.2\]]tsam la bkram nas par du brkor bcug pa yin no/_/gzhan yang glegs bam rnams kyi dbu khang g.yas g.yon du bzhugs pa'i sku brnyan la/_thog mar bstod pa'i tshogs kyi dbur bstan pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang*/_de'i bstan pa la bya ba lhag 
[\[315b.3\]]par byas pa sa skya paN+Di ta gnyis so/_/de nas rim par rgyud sde gong 'og gi 'grel pa rnams la rgyud sde rang rang nas 'byung ba'i yi dam gyi lha'i gtso bo dang*/_de'i 'grel byed kyi slob dpon dang*/_so so'i dbang bshad kyi brgyud pa nas 'byung ba 'ga' zhig dang*/_lha dang slob dpon 
[\[315b.4\]]mdzad pa po rnams stod smad nas zlos te byung ba rnams la ni 'dod pa'i lha gzhan dang*/_'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta dang grub thob 'ga' re dang*/_mthar rgyud sde nas bshad pa'i chos skyong ba rnams dang nor lha 'ga' zhig bris so/_/mtshan nyid theg pa'i skor la/_shes rab kyi 
[\[315b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa mngon par rtogs pa rgyan gyi dbur ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang*/_bstan bcos gsung ba po mgon po byams pa dang*/_de nas rim par byang chub ltung ba bshags pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa lnga dang*/_dpang skong phyag brgya pa nas 
[\[315b.6\]]'byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang*/_phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba nas 'byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas re dang*/_g.yon du dpang skong nas 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu'o/_/de las gzhan phal che ba ni me tog bkod pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas brgya 
[\[315b.7\]]dang nyi shu rtsa gsum las gang dag chud pa dang*/_mngon pa'i 'grel pa glegs bam bzhi pa phyin gyi brgyad po la g.yon du 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang*/_de nas 'dul ba'i 'grel pa la thub pa gnas brtan bcu drug dang*/_nyan thos chen po mchog brgyad 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dang bcas pas khyab par bkod do/_/de nas rig gnas kyi skor la/_sngar gyi sangs rgyas rnams las ma rdzogs par yod pa rnams tshang bar bkod pa dang*/_bstan bcos rang rang gi mdzad po dang*/_bod la bka' drin che ba'i slob dpon dang 
[\[316a.2\]]rgyal blon 'ga' re/_sde dge mchod yon rnams dang*/_chos spyi'i srung ma rgyal po chen po bzhi'i sku brnyan dang bcas pa rnams bris so/_/de dag gi ri mo'i 'du byed pa ni sman mkhyen gnyis pa bzhin du snang srid kyi dngos po 'dus byas pa thams cad ri mo'i lam du 'dren pa la 
[\[316a.3\]]shin tu mkhas pa'i gzugs ris pa g.yung drung bon gyi theg pa 'chang ba a 'phel gyis bris shing*/_de'i brkos kyi 'du byed pa ni/_mig 'phrul mkhas pa'i ngo mtshar brgya phrag stong yang nyung ngur byed cing phra zhib ri mo'i 'gros la mtshungs pa med pa'i blo ldan bu nag can la 
[\[316a.4\]]sogs pa gsum dang*/_gzhan yang lany+tsa dang wartu la'i yi ge dgos pa rnams kyi 'bru brkos pa gnyis dang bcas pas brkos so/_/de dag gi rjes su yang par gyi ngos la zhu dag lan re dang bcas te/_mdor na snga phyir zhus dag lan bzhi tsam gyis yid rton du btub par bgyis 
[\[316a.5\]]so/_/des na slan chad kyang phyi mo 'di dag gi rgyun la brten nas yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_lung nod pa dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_kun chub par byed pa dang*/_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang*/_glegs bam du byas te/_khor yug kun 
[\[316a.6\]]du me tog gi phreng ba dang*/_bdug pa'i sprin dang*/_mar me'i phreng ba dang*/_dri zhim po'i chu'i byug pa dang*/_lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang*/_dbyangs snyan rol mo'i tshogs kyis mngon par mchod cing*/_gzhan yang lha dang mi'i yul na khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'phan 
[\[316a.7\]]dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba dan dang*/_dril bu sil sil gyi drwa ba dang*/_me tog gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas kun nas yongs su bskor te bkur stir bgyi ba dang*/_bla mar bgyi ba dang*/_mchod par bgyi ba dang*/_rjed par bgyi ba dang*/_ri mor bgyi ba dang*/_
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]khyad par chos kyi tshul 'di dag gi dgos pa'i gtso bor gyur pa thos pa dang*/_bsam pa dang*/_bsgom pa rnams la rab tu gus pa dang shin tu brtson par bgyis na/_de'i phan yon bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi lung bzang dri ma med pas mdo sde dang rgyud sde rnams nas ji ltar 
[\[316b.2\]]bsngags pa rnams ring por mi thogs par 'thob pa ni nges pa'o/_/gsum pa brtsams pa'i las mthar phyin pa'i tshul la/_nam zhig mthar phyin pa dang*/_mthar phyin pa'i bya ba gnyis las/_dang po nam zhig las mthar phyin pa de'ang*/_rdo rje snying po'i gzungs kyi mdo 
[\[316b.3\]]las/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_kun chub bar bgyid pa dang*/_yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de la tshe 'di la yon tan ji snyed cig mchis par 
[\[316b.4\]]'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la lha dang*/_klu dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_dri za rnams srung bar shes par bya'o/_/de chos thams cad la the tshom med par shes par bya'o/_/de chos rab tu dbye ba'i shes pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o zhes 
[\[316b.5\]]dang*/_dkon mchog ta la lar/_kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/_lce na bar mi 'gyur/_sna na bar mi 'gyur/_so na bar mi 'gyur/_lag pa dang rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/_klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/_rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[316b.6\]]lus dman par mi 'gyur/_lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/_pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig 
[\[316b.7\]]rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ltar/_sdom brtson mi bdag chen po'i lhag pa'i sems kyi rgya mtsho rab tu rgyas pa la/_slar yang dge tshogs rin po che'i lhun po 'di nyid bskrun pa la spro ba dam pa'i dba' rlabs kyi phreng bas nam mkha'i ngos la 'god pa snyam 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]bgyid pa 'di dag la/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang dbyings nas dgyes pa'i ye shes kyi spyan ras shin tu grungs par gyur pa dag gis yang dag par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshad med pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_
[\[317a.2\]]thugs rje chen po'i phyag ring legs par brkyang ba'i rwa ba yangs pa'i khongs las nam yang mi 'da' bar yongs su bsrungs pa dang*/_yongs su bskyabs pa dang*/_zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzad pa dang*/_rtag tu brten cing bsgrubs pa'i lha srung gnyen po'i tshogs thams cad kyang 
[\[317a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du lus dang grib ma ltar 'grogs nas/_deng gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nyid sgrub pa'i nyen kor dang*/_kho ra khor yug gi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i khyon thams cad du bar du gcod pa rtsom pa la mi spro ba med pa'i bdud dang*/_bdud kyi rigs 
[\[317a.4\]]can rnams dang*/_gzhan yang log par 'dren pa gdug pa can dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_srin po dang*/_'byung po dang*/_ro langs dang*/_yi dwags dang*/_sha za dang*/_smyo byed dang*/_brjed byed dang*/_ma mo dang*/_srul po dang*/_lus srul po dang*/_lha ma yin la sogs pa 
[\[317a.5\]]legs pa'i phyogs la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du phrag dog dang bslu brid kyi gom pa 'dor zhing bgrod pa'i rgyun yongs su bcad pa dang*/_de dag gi bsam sbyor ngan pa'i kha rlangs 
[\[317a.6\]]kyi 'tshubs mar gyur pa'i nad thams cad dang*/_gdon thams cad dang*/_nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang*/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang*/_'thab mo dang rtsod pa 'gyed pa thams cad kyi gnod pa dang bar du gcod pa thams cad mi gnas pa dang*/_yang 'byung 
[\[317a.7\]]ba med pa nyid du/_de dag gi mthu chen po dang*/_rdzu 'phrul chen po dang*/_gzi brjid chen po'i srung ba dag gis yongs su bsrungs pa dang*/_yongs su bskyabs pa dang*/_yongs su sba ba bgyis te/_mdor na phrin las su 'os pa gang dang gang bsgos pa thams cad thogs pa med pa nyid 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]du legs par bsgrubs so/_/gzhan yang rnam par dkar ba'i legs byas kyi phung po 'di dag mngon par 'du bgyid pa na/_de'i tshe rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong ba la gus pa dang mngon par dpa' zhing rtse gcig tu 'dun pa'i phyogs bcu'i srung ma la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha 
[\[317b.2\]]mthu bo che rnams kyang dga' ba'i ru mtshon srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du snyegs par bsgrengs shing*/_rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i 'khor dang yang 'khor dang*/_bran dang yang bran la sogs pa'i sde dang dpung du bcas pa rnams kyang*/_dper na kha dog 
[\[317b.3\]]bzang po dang dri bzang po dang*/_ro bro ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i skyed tshal chen po rab tu rgyas pa ni gang du mchis pa der/_sbrang rtsis 'tsho ba'i rkang pa drug pa rnams ngang gis 'du ba de bzhin du yang dang yang du lhags shing*/_lhags nas kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang bstan pa'i rtsa lag tu 
[\[317b.4\]]gyur pa 'khor dang sde dang g.yog tu bcas pa thams cad kyang yongs su bsrungs pa dang*/_yongs su bskyabs pa dang*/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba'i stong grogs dang dpung gnyen dam pa ni ci yang byas so/_/des na thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dang mthu stobs chen po dang ldan pa 
[\[317b.5\]]de dag gis legs par bsrungs shing dge legs su bsgrubs pa'i rwa ba na legs par gnas bzhin pas/_sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ma pham pa dang lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang*/_dgra bcom pa dang*/_paN+Di ta dang*/_grub pa'i slob dpon chen po 
[\[317b.6\]]rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bstan bcos rin po che/_gangs can gyi ljongs su ji snyed bzhugs pa'i glegs bam brgya phrag gnyis la mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan bkra shis pa'i grangs kyis brgyan pa'i chos kyi gtong ba nam zhig thub pa'i dbang po'i bstan pa ji srid gnas par 
[\[317b.7\]]gyur pa de srid du glegs bam gyi phreng bar rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i phyi mo 'di dag rtag sbyor dang gus sbyor gyi brtson 'grus me 'bar ba lta bus bsgrubs pa'i las kyi rjes mar gyur pa par gyi ngo'i zhus dag dang bcas pa ma tshang ba med pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]par grub pa'i dus ni/_rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i nang gses kyi gnam lo'i ming ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi brda sprod pa'i gzhung gi cho gas mngon par bsgrubs pa saM skr-i ta'i skad du rak+tA k+Shi zhes pa/_mngon brjod 'bum phrag gsum par mig dmar 
[\[318a.2\]]zhes 'byung ba/_shar phyogs stong kun gyi mi bdag chen pos yongs su bsrungs pa'i yul na gya tsi zhes dang*/_ljongs 'dir dbang thang dang bstun nas rjes su bsgrub par shing pho byi bar grags pa/_pho brang gling dgu pa'i dbus su klu'i me long gis gnas pa/_'byung ba sum 
[\[318a.3\]]ldan se zhig gi lo bkra shis kyi klung dang ldan pa'o/_/de la'ang bcu gnyis khyim gyi bdag po gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su bgrod pa'i dus dang*/_mdo sde gser 'od dam pa dang*/_dus kyi 'khor lo ba'i lugs kyis ston pas dus 'khor rtsa rgyud gsungs pa'i dus chen yin pa 
[\[318a.4\]]la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan mang pos lo 'gor 'god pa/_nag pas nya ba'i dri zhim ldan gyi zla ba/_hor lugs kyi zhag gi phung po gsum pa'i dkar phyogs kyi rdzogs pa gsum pa ste/_gnyis su med pa'i rgyud chen dus kyi 'khor lo gsungs pa'i dus bzang po/_dus 'khor ba'i 
[\[318a.5\]]lugs kyi dbyangs ni la'o/_/gsal byed ni tsa la'o/_/'byung ba ni sa'i khams so/_/'dod pa'i yon tan ni dri nyid do/_/gtsug na zla ba'i lugs kyi dbyangs dang gsal byed ni o dang ha'o/_/'byung ba ni nam mkha'i khams so/_/'dod pa'i yon tan ni sgra nyid do/_/gnyis ka mthun 
[\[318a.6\]]pa'i dar gud ni smin pa'o/_/nyi ma ni shing 'brug go/_/spar kha dang sme ba ni zin dang dgu dmar dag go/_/res gza' nyi ma ste rags par zhud pa zhib par gud pa ste/_de nyid rgyu skar gyi lha mo nag pa dang lhan cig tu rtse ba'i 'phrod ni 'dod pa dang*/_sbyor ni stobs dang ldan pa la sogs pa 
[\[318a.7\]]dus tshes phun sum tshogs pa 'dzom pa'i nyin mor ma tshang ba med pa mthar phyin par yongs su grub bo/_/gnyis pa las mthar phyin pa'i bya ba la/_gang du bzhugs pa'i rten gtsug lag khang 'du byas pa dang*/_las byed pa yon gyis mnyes par byas pa dang*/_bkra shis pa'i ngo 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]mtshar ji ltar byung ba dang*/_rab tu gnas pa byas pa gleng ba'o/_/dang po la'ang sngon du sa chog ji ltar byas pa dang*/_dngos ji ltar 'du byas pa'o/_/dang po la'ang sa chog gi dgos pa dang*/_cho ga dngos dang*/_de las ji ltar bkar ba gleng ba'o/_/dang po sa chog gi dgos 
[\[318b.2\]]pa ni/_sa phyogs gang du gtsug lag khang dang*/_khang pa brtsegs pa dang*/_mchod rten dang*/_dkyil 'khor bzheng pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba dag gis sngon du sa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du bgyis pas skyon dang bral ba'i sa gzhi rang dbang du 'gyur ba dang*/_'phral dang yun 
[\[318b.3\]]du dge zhing sde bzhi'i dpal thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa cho ga dngos la/_spyir phyi dang nang gi rig pa'i rgyud gzhung rnams nas sa chog gi rnam gzhag mang du 'byung ba las/_'dir skabs su bab pa ni dpal kye rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_
[\[318b.4\]]bshad pa'i rgyud rnams kyi dgongs pa rgya bod kyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyis gsal bar phye ba'i bka' srol/_lhag pa'i lha de'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas sa'i cho ga yang dag par byas pa ste/_cho ga de yang don rnam pa lngas bsdus pa'i bdag nyid can no/_/de'ang ji ltar zhe na/_sa gzhi 
[\[318b.5\]]brtag pa dang*/_bslang ba dang*/_sbyang ba dang*/_gzung ba dang*/_srung ba'o/_/dang po ni/_gsang ba spyi rgyud las/_dang po pus nub tsam brkos la/_/sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/_/gal te lhag par gyur na ni/_/dngos grub dag ni yod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya bas sa nyid 
[\[318b.6\]]kyis brtag pa dang*/_khru phyed brkos nas chu yis bkang*/_/gom pa brgya ru 'gro bar bya/_/myur du 'ongs nas blta bya ste/_/de bzhin 'dug na lhag par bsngags/_/zhes bya bas mtshan mas brtag pa dang*/_mtho dma' can dang tsher ma can/_/gyo mo dum bu can dag dang*/_/
[\[318b.7\]]dbyibs kyi dus pa sdong dum khung*/_/grog mkhar thal ba tsha sgo can/_/gseg ma rdul dang rdo dang skra/_/srin bu grog sbur la sogs mang*/_/de lta bu yi sa gzhi ni/_/mkhas pas las rnams kun la spang*/_/zhes zug rngu yod med kyi sa brtag pa la sogs pa ste/_
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]de dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dang thun mong du brtag pa'o/_/bye brag tu gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la yul gyi dge ba bcus brtag pa dang*/_dbyibs kyi gnas tshul gyis brtag pa dang*/_phyi dang nang gi rten 'brel gyis brtag pa dang*/_kha dog gis brtag 
[\[319a.2\]]pa la sogs pa mang tu 'byung ba ste de dag gis brtag pa'o/_/gnyis pa la gnyis kyi/_mngon pa las bslang ba ni/_legs par brtags pa'i sa gzhi de yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pas bdag gir byas pa na/_de las tshig gam rin gyis bslu ba ste/_spyi rgyud las/_
[\[319a.3\]]bden pa'i tshig gis bslu ba'am/_/yang na ri ba'i rin gyis blu/_/zhes so/_/mi mngon pa las bslang ba ni/_lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis sa gzhi der mchod gtor tshul bzhin du bshams nas/_sa'i lha mo dang*/_phyogs skyong ba rnams la mchod gtor byin nas 
[\[319a.4\]]bslang ba ste/_yang dag par sbyor ba las/_sa'i lha mo kha dog gser gyi mdog can bum pa lag na thogs pa bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas/_dri zhim po la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga po rnams kyis mchod cing lhag par nye bar gnas par bya'o zhes dang*/_rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_gong gi 
[\[319a.5\]]a sogs sngags kyis ni/_/de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin/_/zhes dang*/_ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to/_/gzhan yang bgegs rigs phra mo rnams kyang thog mar gtor mas tshim par bya ba'ang*/bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/_
[\[319a.6\]]gegs su 'gyur ba'i bgegs rigs la/_/mnyam pa'i don gyis sun mi dbyung*/_/dmigs kyi kha zas sna tshogs kyis/_/bgegs rnams mgu nas lan chags 'khor/_/zhes so/_/gsum pa la'ang gnyis kyi/_las dang bya bas skyon sbyang ba ni/_sa bdag lto 'phye rgyu ba'i tshul la 
[\[319a.7\]]legs par brtags nas/_de'i lus kyi cha dgu las 'das pa'i lto ba'i phyogs nas dngos grub kyis blangs pas sbyang ba ste/bzang po yongs bzung las/_dgun zla ra ba la sogs nas/_/brtsams te zla ba gsum gsum du/_/lto 'phye lho dang nub dang byang*/_/shar du de yi mgo bo ste/_/g.yon 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]pa'i zur gyis nyal ba yin/_/phyi yi lto ba shes nas brko/_/mgo dang rgyab sogs nas brkos pa'i/_/skyon ni rgyas pa las shes bya/_/zhes dang*/_de nyid rnam par brtag pa'i tshul yang legs par grub pa'i rgyud chen po'i lung*/_rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_zhang grub pa dpal gyi 'gyur las/_
[\[319b.2\]]sa gzhi gang yin de ni gru bzhir bya/_/zla ba gsum gyi nyin mo'i grangs kyis 'dir/_/phyogs ni so sor sa de rnam par dbye/_/dbang ldan nas ni me yi mtshams kyi bar/_/shar gyi sa de dgu bcur rnam par dbye/_/me nas bden bral mtshams kyi bar dang ni/_/bden bral nas ni 
[\[319b.3\]]rlung gi mtshams bar dang*/_/rlung nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i mtshams kyi bar/_/de bzhin kho nar dgu bcur rnam dbye bya/_/ston zla rwa ba 'bring dang tha ma'i bar/_/dbang ldan mtshams la sogs par mgo bor gnas/_/bden bral mtshams sogs mjug ma'i cha ru gnas/_/gsang 
[\[319b.4\]]ba'i gnas ni sa yi dbus su gzhag_/lte ba man chad lto 'phye'i lus su gnas/_/stod ni gdengs ka dang ldan mi yi lus/_/lhor bltas lag pa g.yon pa rna bar bzhag_/g.yas pa rin chen dang bcas dku ru bzhag_/sa yi cha dgur khyab par nyal nas gnas/_/klu rgyal de yi 
[\[319b.5\]]lus tshad mtho bcu'o/_/shar dang nub la sogs par gnas pa yang*/_/sa yi dum bu de ni gzhal ba ltar/_/nyi ma'i bgrod pa tshes gcig la sogs par/_/nyin zhag re re zhing ni cha re rer/_/ji ltar rigs par shar gyi cha ru rgyu/_/lho dang nub dang byang du'ang de bzhin no/_/zhes dang*/_
[\[319b.6\]]de yi lus la klu yi bdag po brgyad/_/'o ma la sogs nyer spyad rnams kyis mchod/_/zhes pa ste/_de'ang mjug rtse dang*/_gsang ba dang*/_lte ba dang*/_dpung pa dang*/_snying ga dang*/_mgrin pa dang*/_rna ba dang*/_spyi bo rnams su rim pa ltar rigs ldan sngon po dang*/_stobs kyi rgyu du ba'i mdog 
[\[319b.7\]]dang*/_dung skyong dkar po dang*/_pad+ma chen po ser po dang*/_nor rgyas ljang gu dang*/_'jog po dmar po dang*/_pad+ma dkar po dang*/_mtha' yas sngon po rnams so/_/ji ltar brko ba'ang*/_de spyod mi ni bgegs mthar byed du bsgom/_/dpa' bos lag pa tog rtse rdo rjes mtshan/_/lag pa g.yon 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]pa 'og tu byas la gzung*/_/de yis bdud kyi tshogs rnams skrag cing bzlog_/shar dang byang gi phyogs su kha bltas pas/_/tog rtse kham bzhi brgyab nas blangs pa yis/_/zhi ba'i sems kyis gtor ma'i nang nyid du/_/bzhag pa'am phyi rol me yi mtshams sogs 
[\[320a.2\]]dor/_/'bad par de yis kham lnga blangs pa'i sa/_/sa yi dbus su legs par yid kyis dgram/_/kham lnga 'das nas de la du ma yis/_/phyogs dang mtshams rnams kun nas brko bar bya/_/zhes dang*/_gang du brko ba'i sa dmigs kyang*/_skar ma khrums kyis nya ba dang nyi ma bu mo'i khyim du 
[\[320a.3\]]spyod pa la ston zla rwa bar brtsis pa'i ston 'bring po la mgo bo shar dang*/_mjug ma nub drang por 'ong ba la dper mtshon nas/_de nyid las/_shar nas cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun dor/_/byang nas phyed dang bcu bzhi'i cha dor bar/_/shar nub cha dgu lho byang phyed dang lnga/_/'di ni mchan gyi mdun du thog mar brko/_/
[\[320a.4\]]de yis chos nor 'dod don 'phel zhing 'grub/_/ces pa'i tshul gyis brko ba ste/_de ltar legs par brkos nas rus pa dang*/_gyo mo dang*/_rdo ba la sogs pa'i zung rngu rnams phyung la/_gter gzhug pa dang*/_sa de nyid sa gnyen bzang po gzhan dang bsres nas dri zhim po'i chus sbrus pas dkyil 'khor 
[\[320a.5\]]la sogs par stegs bu bya ba dang*/_gtsug lag khang la sogs par sa de dang gzungs sngags bzlas pa'i chu dag gis sa gzhi kun du khyab par dge 'dun bzhi sde dag gis gtor zhing bcag pa dang*/_gal te zug rngu de dag bsal gyis ma ldang ba dang*/_sngon chad dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la sogs pa byas pa 
[\[320a.6\]]yin na sa phyogs nam mkha'i rang bzhin du sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin rnams kho nas sbyang ba nyid do/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyis bgegs sbyang ba ni/_sa phyogs der srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pas bgegs sbyang ba ste/_kye rdo rje las/_dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyis/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[320a.7\]]pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang*/_/zhes so/_/bzhi pa la'ang gnyis las/_blos bzung ba ni/_legs par sbyangs pa'i sa der deng bdag gis 'dod pa'i snying po gang yin pa de mngon du bgyi'o snyam pa dam tshig tu bya ba tsam mo/_/stang stabs kyi bkod pas bzung ba ni/_sa der slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pas rtsa ba'i 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]rkang stabs brgyad dang*/_gom stabs bzhi dang*/_tshul bcu drug dang*/_ba dan gnyis dang*/_mchod pa bcu gnyis dang*/_'dug stangs bcu dang*/_gar gyi nyams dgu dang*/_glu'i bkod pa rnams te/_stang stabs de dag thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'am/_de ltar ma grub na rtsa ba'i rkang stabs 
[\[320b.2\]]tsam byed pa ste/_rdo rje gur las/_sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni/_/dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul bas/_/ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/_/'di ni dam tshig rim pa'i mchog_/ces so/_/lnga pa ni/_de ltar bzung ba'i sa phyogs su slar yang bgegs kyi rigs kyis 'jug pa'i skabs med par srung 
[\[320b.3\]]ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms pas srung ba ste/_ji skad du/_ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir/_/srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/_/ces so/_/gsum pa de las ji ltar bkar ba gleng ba ni/_de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga de dag thams cad 'dir yang tshang bar bya dgos so snyam na/_ma yin te de 
[\[320b.4\]]dag ni sngon chad sa'i cho ga ma byas pa'i phyogs su ni nges par dgos kyi/_gtsug lag khang dang dgon sde yin pa la sogs pa sngon chad sa'i cho ga grub pa la ni thams cad tshang bar mi dgos te/_de ltar du'ang gsang ba spyi'i rgyud las/_drang srong gnas dang ba lang lhas/_/phug dang ri yi rtse mo 
[\[320b.5\]]dang*/_/sa gzhi gang na 'thas pa dang*/_/khang thog dang ni rdo leb dang*/_/mchod rten drung dang 'bab chu'i gling*/_/mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram dag tu/_/sa gzhi sbyang dang brtag pa dang*/_/nan tan du ni bya mi dgos/_/der ni zung rngu dbyung mi dgos/_/'thas par bcag kyang der mi dgos/_/mtho 
[\[320b.6\]]dma' la sogs skyon rnams ni/_/der ni dogs pa bskyed mi dgos/_/zhes dang*/_legs bshad bai DUr dkar po'i sa dpyad kyi sngon byung la brten nas brtag pa'i skabs su'ang*/_dang po thun mong sangs rgyas kyis/_/mdzad pa bcu gnyis bstan pa'i gnas/_/sher phyin gnas bshad sa phyogs 
[\[320b.7\]]lha'i/_/rten yul mchod gnas gyur pa dang*/_/gang zag khyad can byin rlabs gnas/_/chos ldan bya ba khyad par can/_/'byung bzhin pa'am sngon byung nas/_/re zhig zam chad pa yang rung*/_/bya ba mi shis bar ma chod/_/bkra shis gnas su grags shing grub/_/thun mong ma yin rdo rje'i theg_/bsgrub 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]pa'i gnas su byed pa na/_/'dzam gling gnas mchog nyi shu bzhi'i/_/yul ni so gnyis nang du gtogs/_/yid ches lo rgyus tshad ma ru/_/bzung la legs par gtan 'bebs pa'i/_/gnas rnyed phyi yi sa dpyad sogs/_/mi shes pa'am ma grub kyang*/_/dge legs rang 
[\[321a.2\]]bzhin 'byung bar bshad/_/ces gsungs pa'ang shin tu yid ches pa'i legs par bshad pa rmad du byung bar snang ngo*/_/des na chos grwa chen po 'dir ni gong du ji skad bshad pa'i skyes bu dam pa mkhas shing grub pa de dag gis sa gzhi legs par brtags shing sbyangs nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang*/_de 
[\[321a.3\]]nas brtsams te srid pa dang zhi ba'i dpal 'byor gyis phyogs thams cad nas shin tu bkra shis pa'i gnas su gyur cing*/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten chen po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir sa'i cho ga la nan tan du ma byas kyang mi btub pa med pa'i phyir/_bye brag tu sa gzhi brtag pa'i cho ga rnams dang*/_
[\[321a.4\]]mngon pa las bslang ba dang*/_las dang bya bas skyon sbyang ba rnams ni lhag par dgos pa ma mchis so/_/de las gzhan pa'i cho ga rnams ni slar yang bgyis na shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid du ches cher bsngags shing*/_mkhas pa kun gyi lag len la'ang mdzad pa dang*/_bye brag tu dper na gzugs 
[\[321a.5\]]dang stobs dang kho lag kun nas rdzogs pa'i glang po'i mchog gangs ri'i dum bu 'gro shes pa dang 'dra ba rnams kyang 'dul mkhan mkhas pa'i lcags kyo chung ngus btab pas de'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su mthu che ba dang*/_rdzu 'phrul che ba dang*/_dpung 
[\[321a.6\]]che ba dang*/_dbang che bar rlom pa rnams kyang gsang sngags dang rig sngags grub pa rnams kyi bka' lung gi 'phrin yig gnyen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i bcud du sim pa tsam gyis de'i don tshul bzhin du bsgrub pa la gus par mi 'gyur ba su zhig_/des na de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis sa gzhi byin gyis rlob pa'i 
[\[321a.7\]]cho ga tshul bzhin du bgyis pa ni ches mchog tu yang bde legs phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa ste/_deng 'dir skye ba nas skye bar dkar ba min pa'i ngag gi las rnam par spangs pa/_mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba'i snying po zab mo sngags kyi dngos grub kyis shin tu brling bar byas 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]pa/_nges par dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang nyid las nam yang dmigs su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po dpal ldan chos skyong nyid kyi bka'i sa gzhi byin gyis rlob par g.yar 'dren du bgyi ba ni ches mchog tu gyur pa'i blo gros so snyam du sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po nyid nas mkhan po rin po cher de 
[\[321b.2\]]skad du gsol ba dang*/_de nyid nas kyang de ltar du bgyir btub pa bkas gnang nas spyan drangs so/_/gzhan yang mkhas pa dang btsun pa dang grub pa'i yon tan mi zad pa'i mdzod du gyur pa rje btsun nam mkha' dpal bzang pas mtshon te/_rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rab 'byams la dbang ba'i 
[\[321b.3\]]gsang sngags 'dzin pa bcu gsum dag dang lhan cig tu/_sa gzhi mi mngon pa las bslang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams yang dag par mdzad pa dang*/_gzhan yang gter bum gyi rigs mang du 'jog pa la sogs pas sa phyogs zhi zhing dul ba mtsho las skyes pa gzhon nu'i 'dab ma 
[\[321b.4\]]lta bu la/_slar yang 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor zad mi shes pa'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs so/_/gnyis pa dngos ji ltar 'du byas pa ni/_de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi der hor lugs kyi zla ba gnyis pa'i dmar ba'i phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa'i tshes dang gza' skar dge bar 'dzom pa la 
[\[321b.5\]]gtsug lag khang chen po chos 'byung bkra shis sgo mang zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rmang 'ding bar brtsam ste/_de'i thog mar yang ji skad du/_gtsug lag pho brang mkhar khang sogs/_/'debs par bya ba'i las brtsam dus/_/keg dang dgu dur rtsub rigs bcos/_/gnam sa'i sgo bsdam cho ga 
[\[321b.6\]]bya/_/'khrug gto nyes pa kun sel dang*/_/g.yo 'khrug dong rtse 'khon bsdum sogs/_/gang 'grub sna sel cho ga btang*/_/chu gtor klu brgyad klu gsum dang*/_/klu gtor brgyags brngan btang bya zhing*/_/snang brgyad sdong rgyan mdo thig dang*/_/bkra shis brtsegs pa gzungs bsdus sgrogs/_/gnam gto 
[\[321b.7\]]gnam khyi bcos pa dang*/_/bar gto 'brug lha bcos pa dang*/_/sa gto dur phag bcos rnams bya/_/zhes 'byung ba'i bcos thabs rnams kyang*/_skar nag rtsis kyi gzhung lugs du ma la blo gros kyi spyan dkyus rnam par yangs pa'i bla mkhyen bsod nams rgyal dpon g.yog rnams kyis sngon du grub 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]par byas nas/_de'i nyin mor las kyi 'go brtsams so/_/de la'ang gtsug lag khang 'di'i tshad dang bzo'i bkod pa phal che ba dag ni gtsug lag lugs brgya'i tshul la rnam par dpyod pa'i mkhyen rab pad+ma'i gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor ltar rab tu gsal ba'i sdom brtson stobs kyi 
[\[322a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba nyid nas bka'i bkod pas yang dag par khyab par mdzad pa la/_thog mar tshad kyi thig 'debs pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ci yang yid la byas pa tsam gyis mi 'grub pa 'ga' yang med pa de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi mthu che zhing rnam pa gcig tu 'byor pa phun sum 
[\[322a.3\]]tshogs pa dar nas rgud pa'i mtha' ru ma lhung ba'i dge slong tshul khrims rab brtan nam don grub can dang*/_o+o D+yAn tshe ring dang*/_lhun grub rgyal mtshan te gsum gyis byas shing*/_mtshams dang phyogs kyi rtsig rmang 'ding ba po ni/_blo sna bden pa'i phyogs su gtod pas bya ba thams cad brling 
[\[322a.4\]]zhing kun gyis yid rton pa'i gnas su byas pa/_mchog tu yi dam gyi lha mang po'i bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa'i dge slong nam mkha' rdo rje dang*/_ting 'dzin rdo rje dang*/_kun dga' rdo rje ste gsum gyis bgyis nas rtsig 'gram legs par bting ngo*/_/de nas bzung ste/_shing gzhog pa dang*/_shing 
[\[322a.5\]]brkos pa dang*/_gyeng bzo ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa mi grangs bzhi brgya tsam bsags te mthar phyin pa nyid du legs par bslangs so/_/de'i rjes su'ang lha ris pa la sogs pa'i bzo rig pa mkhan rnams bsags te rtsi tshon dgye ba dang*/_ldeb ris 'dri ba dang*/_nang gi khor yug kun du bre 
[\[322a.6\]]ba'i 'phen dang*/_bla re dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_chos kyi bzhugs khri dang*/_steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]rtse mo na gser zangs las grub pa'i gan 'ji ra dang*/_rgyal mtshan la sogs pa ngo mtshar che ba'i rgyan gyi bkod pa yid du 'ong ba dag gis kun nas rab tu mdzes par byas so/_/de lta bu'i tshul gyis legs 
[\[322a.7\]]par grub pa'i rten gzhal du med pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chos 'byung bkra shis sgo mang zhes bya ba gang gi nang logs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i snang brnyan mthong na mi mthun pa med pa ci yang bkra ba'i khyad par la bsams na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bgrang 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]du med pa'i yon tan gyi bkod pa yang nye bar mtshon par nus so/_/blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyis yid la ji ltar dmigs pa'i legs par bshad pa'i tshogs kyi gtong ba ci yang 'jo ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i khyad par la bsams na/_theg pa gsum gyi bstan pa rin po che'i 
[\[322b.2\]]'byung gnas su gyur pa 'phags yul rdo rje gdan gyi d+harma g+hany+dza gang yin pa'am/_gsang sngags bstan pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa lcang lo can nam/_o+o D+yAn rdo rje chen po rnams kyi d+harma g+hany+dza gang yin pa'i dpal la co 'dri bar 'os pa/_phyi rol gyi rnam pa la bsams na 'chi 
[\[322b.3\]]ba med pa'i yul gyi 'phrul bzo bi shwa karma'i lag rtse las 'khrungs pa lta bu'i 'gram logs dang*/_ka ba dang*/_gdung dang*/_thog phubs rim pa dang*/_mda' yab dang*/_pu shu dang*/_lan kan dang*/_sgo dang*/_rta babs la sogs pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtse 
[\[322b.4\]]mor nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid kyi phung po las 'phos pa lta bu'i rin po che gser zangs las grub pa'i tog dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_me long dang dril bu sil sil rnams kyis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/_nang gi bla khab las rnam par dbyangs pa'i bla re dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan 
[\[322b.5\]]dang*/_'phan tshar la sogs pas yid du 'ong bar byas pa'i gzhal med khang rgyan dang bcas pa gsar du bskrun pa'ang legs par mthar phyin to/_/der ji ltar bshams pa'i chos kyi khri shing gi drwa ba mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres pa ga la bar 'jig rten gsum na mchod 'os bla na med pa'i dgongs 
[\[322b.6\]]'grel gyi phyi mo gang dag bzhugs pa rnams mchod pa'i yo byad kyi rnam grangs mang pos bkur sti dang bcas te mnga' gsol bar bgyis so/_/mdor na de lta bu'i rten dang brten par bcas pa thams cad legs par mthar son pa nyid du yongs su grub bo/_/gnyis pa las byed pa yon gyis mnyes par byas pa la/_
[\[322b.7\]]spyir las byed pa'i bzo bo rnams mnyes dgos pa'ang*/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/_rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni/_/phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod/_/gang dag de la grogs byed pa/_/gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya/_/zhes dang*/_sman lha don grub pa'i cha tshad kyi rab tu byed pa yid bzhin nor 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]bu las/_kun nas lhag bsam rab dkar lus/_/khrel yod ngo tsha'i gos rgyan ldan/_/dad dang gtong phod mchod tshogs kyis/_/lha dang bzo bo dbyer med mchod/_/ces pa ltar bzo gnas rig pa mkhan ni 'gro ba kun gyis bkur zhing 
[\[323a.2\]]mdun 'jog gya nom pa dag gis mnyes par bya ba'i yul du gsungs pa ltar 'dir yang las 'di sgrub pa'i ring la/_bzo gnas rig pa 'chang ba rnams la dus rgyun par bza' ba dang btung bar sbyar ba dang*/_bar skabs rnams su'ang ston mo dang ston tshab gang rung re stob pa dang*/_
[\[323a.3\]]mthar las byas pa drin du gzo ba'i phyir yon gyis mgu bar byas pa'i rnam grangs zhib tu brjod na 'dri bar bya ba mang du yod na'ang dgos pa chung bas rgyas par mi 'dri'o/_/'on te deng 'dir mdor bsdus shig ma brjod na/_spyir rgyal po dang mi dpon rnams kyi bya ba phal che ba ni gzhan 
[\[323a.4\]]la khral bzhag pa dang 'u lag bskul nas sgrub pa'i srol zhig mchis pa ltar/_'dir yang de ltar du byas pa yin nam snyam du go bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/des na dogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir rags bsdus tsam zhig bsnyad pa la/_'di ltar dgongs 'grel yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[323a.5\]]bsdoms pa'i glegs bam rin po che brgya phrag gnyis la mdzes par byed pa bkra shis pa'i rgyan dang bcas pa bzhugs pa/_yi ge'i ldeb grangs kyis rnam par dbye na/_yig ldeb drug khri nyis stong dang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa bdun mchis pa par du bsgrubs pa la/_sdom 
[\[323a.6\]]brtson skye dgu'i bdag po 'di'i gtong phod chen po'i phyag ring legs par brkyangs nas/_rgyal po chen po rnam mang thos kyi bu'i gter mdzod kha yongs su bye ba lta bu'i 'dod dgu ma tshang ba med pa'i dkor mdzod dang*/_'bru'i bang ba dang*/_phyugs kyi rwa ba rnams ser sna'i rgyas bcings pa 
[\[323a.7\]]med par lhug par phye ste/_de'i mod la rin po che gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_byi ru dang*/_mu tig dang*/_dung dang*/_g.yu dang*/_gos bzang po dang*/_dar gyi bre brag mang po dang*/_ras zung dang*/_ras yab dang*/_snam phrug gi rigs su gtogs pa mang po dang*/_bgo ba dang rgyan gyi bye 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]brag rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang*/_nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma dang*/_ar+d+ho ka'i phur ma khag tu byas pa mang po dang*/_tha mi ka dang*/_rta dang*/_gnag phyugs kyi rigs la sogs pa mdor na rang rang gi mos par ci dang ci 'tsham pa'i dbyig gi rnam pa gya nom pa dag stsal to/_/
[\[323b.2\]]de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_ji ltar byin pa thams cad 'dir 'bru'i rin thang gi tshad kyis bcal te brjod na/_thog mar zhus dag pa rnams kyi zhus dpon mi re la nyin rer bris pa rab cig gi yon du brtsis pa nas 'dong nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_de 'og la nas 'dong bcu bzhi/_zhus dag pa gzhan 
[\[323b.3\]]rnams la nyin rer nas 'dong bcu gsum re ste bsdoms pas nas khal drug stong dgu brgya dang drug cu/_lha ris pa dbu lha gnyis re'i bri yon la nas 'dong nyi shu rtsa lnga re brtsis pa bsdoms pa nas khal brgya dang so lnga/_lha brkos pa sku brnyan gnyis re'i yon du nas khal gsum re 
[\[323b.4\]]bsdoms pas nas khal drug brgya bzhi bcu/_yi ge pa yang rab dang*/_rab dang*/_'bring gsum las bar ma'i dbang du btang ba'i grangs kyis brtsi na/_yig ldeb re la nas 'dong nyi shu rtsa gnyis re brtsis pa bsdoms pas nas khal sum khri bzhi stong dang nyis brgya zhe gcig_/par 
[\[323b.5\]]brkos pa rab dang 'bring stod dang 'bring gsum las bar ma zhig gi dbang tu btang ba'i grangs kyis brtsi na/_par ldeb re la nas khal gsum dang zho re byin pa bsdoms pas nas khal 'bum phrag gnyis dang nyis stong sum brgya so lnga/_par zhus pa mi re la nyin rer nas 'dong bcu gsum 
[\[323b.6\]]re brtsis pa bsdoms pas nas khal nyis stong drug brgya/_thig 'debs pa nyin rer nas 'dong bcu re bsdoms pas nas khal lnga brgya/_shog bu'i 'du byed pa mi re la nyin rer nas 'dong bcu re brtsis pa bsdoms pas nas khal nyis stong bdun brgya nyi shu/_shing gzhog pa shing ldeb brgya 
[\[323b.7\]]dang bzhi bcu la nas khal lnga re brtsis pa nas khal nyis stong nyis brgya nyer gsum/_shog bu kha bzhi bcu'i rin la ja bar khag byin pa 'brur bsdoms pas nas khal sum stong dang brgya nyer gsum/_shing ldeb bcu drug re'i rin la ja bar khag byin pa 'brur bsdoms pas nas khal 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]khri phrag gcig dang dgu stong bzhi brgya nga lnga song ngo*/_/bza' btung sbyar ba rags bsdus su bsdoms na nas khal 'bum phrag gcig dang drug khri brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o/_/mdor na rten bzheng gi rim gror song ba dang bza' btung sbyar ba la song ba rnams mi 
[\[324a.2\]]'grang bar las byed pa rnams kyi yon 'bul dang*/_shing dang shog bu'i rin du song ba kho na bsdoms pas nas khal 'bum phrag gnyis dang bdun khri bzhi stong dgu brgya dang so gnyis song zhing*/_de dag ja'i tshad kyis grangs su bcal na ja 'khor drug can khri phrag gcig dang sum stong 
[\[324a.3\]]bdun brgya zhe drug la/_bar khag gnyis dang sdum gcig gi lhag ma bcas song ngo*/_/gzhan yang par khang chen mo 'di nyid gsar du bskrun pa ldeb ris dang bcas pa la'ang nyer spyad dang bzo yon la sogs par gtong ba'i dngos po rags rtsis kyis ja 'khor drug can sum stong drug brgya 
[\[324a.4\]]tsam song ba sogs/_mdor na rten bzhengs 'di'i cha rkyen du sum rtsen pa'i mdzod sgo chen po yongs su phye ba lta bus stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid yun du gnas pa dang*/_sems can gyi khams su bde legs kyi mdza' na mo gsar du 'gugs pa'i lhag bsam 
[\[324a.5\]]dang mdzad pa rmad du byung ba la ni sdom brtson sa bdag dam pa 'di dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang ma byung bar sems so/_/gsum pa bkra shis pa'i ngo mtshar ji ltar byung ba la/_de ltar bsgrubs pa la ngo mtshar gyi rnam pa ji ltar byung ba'i gleng ba mang du yod na'ang*/_'dir [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]dogs pas rdzogs 
[\[324a.6\]]par mi 'dri zhing rags pa tsam zhig brjod na/_spyir mi bdag chen po 'di'i mdzad pa thams cad ni nam phugs su bstan pa rgyas pa'i grogs su 'gro ba kho na lhur byed cing*/_bye brag tu sdom pa gsum gyi bka' drin dpag tu med pas bskyangs pa'i mkhan po rin po che dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis 
[\[324a.7\]]grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa 'di nyid/_yongs rdzogs chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i mnga' bdag tu zhabs kyi pad+ma mi 'gyur rdo rje brtsegs pa'i khri 'phang mthon po brtan pa'i bgyi ba nyid gtso bor lhur mdzad pa bzhin/_deng gi rten bzhengs chen po 'di yang 'dren mchog dam 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]pa de nyid kyi zhabs brten du gtso cher dmigs pa yin te/_de'ang ji ltar dmigs pa nyid kyang*/_mdo las/_bsod nams rnam smin bde ster zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel/_/bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yis bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub/_/bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du 
[\[324b.2\]]reg par 'gyur/_/mya ngan las 'das zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po thob/_/ces dang*/_don kun grub pa'i rtogs brjod las/_rang don la 'jug dmigs pa dang bral zhing*/_/gzhan la phan pa rtag tu brtson rnams kyis/_/grub pa nyon mongs rnams la mi 'jigs shing*/_/gdung dang 
[\[324b.3\]]gregs bral gzir byed min par gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs dang ldan pa dang bsod nams kyi mthu che ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i bya ba gang dang gang yin pa de dmigs pa tsam gyis mi 'grub pa med pa ni rang don bral ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi khyad par gyi 
[\[324b.4\]]chos te/_de'ang ji ltar na/_deng khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po mkhan po rin po che bstan pa'i sgron me nyid ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum gyi bcud len dam pa bzhes nas 'tsho gzhes su bzhugs pa dang*/_de'i bya ba sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phrin las kyis nam mkha'i khams 
[\[324b.5\]]kyi mthas gtugs par 'gro bar gyur pa 'di ltar dang*/_sdom brtson bla ma bstan pa'i rtsa lag chen po sku mched du bcas pa rnams kyang*/_sde bzhi'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs shing dge ba'i phrin las dkar po rgya mtsho'i mthar thug tu khyab par rgyu ba'i rgyal srid chen po'i mdzes par byed pa'i 
[\[324b.6\]]rgyan du/_lha dang mi'i yul gyi rin thang che ba'i nor bu rin po che rab tu brtsegs pa'i khri 'phang mthon po la sku tshe mi shigs rdo rje rin po che'i khams su brtas shing mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal nas/_de'i phrin las kyi 'khor lo rin po che gtsug lag lugs brgya'i rtsibs dang ldan 
[\[324b.7\]]pas/_'dzam gling byang phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs par rgyu ba la thogs pa med pa'i rab 'byams dbang gi phrin las grub pa rnams lhan cig tu byung zhing*/_shar phyogs gong ma'i lung gis zla chu'i rgyud kyi mi sde nyis stong tsam la sogs pa'ang gsar du legs par stsal to/_/mkhyen 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]pa'i spyan dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang gi 'phrul blon chen po thams cad kyang*/_sku tshe dang bsod nams dbyar gyi rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba la longs su spyod cing*/_mi bdag chen po'i bstan srid kyi gdugs dkar po thur ma brgya pa skye dgu rgya mtsho'i bla ma nas bla mar 'degs 
[\[325a.2\]]pa la zhum pa med pa'i snying stobs kyi lang tsho dar bar gyur pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di dag go_/gzhan yang skye dgu'i bdag po'i thugs rje'i dpag bsam chen po kun gyi mnyes gshin dam par gyur pa'i bde skyid kyi 'bras bu'i 'tsho ba'i bzo dang rig pa'i gnas kyi las byed pa rnams 
[\[325a.3\]]te/_de dag gi 'go 'dzin du mi'i dbang po'i bka' lung gis bskos shing las de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel ba dang*/_mthun pa'i phyogs bsgrub pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon te/_bzo'i las byed dman pa yan chad kyi khrod nas dus kyis nyen te lnga pa'i lam du song 
[\[325a.4\]]ba dang*/_bya bas nyes te chad kyi las kyis phog pa'i mi'i 'gro ba gcig kyang ma byung ba 'di dag kyang*/_thugs rjer ldan pa rnams kyis legs par bsrungs shing ye shes gzigs pa'i 'bab stegs su mdzad pa dang*/_mi bdag chen po'i bsod nams kyi shugs las byung ba gdon mi za ba'i 
[\[325a.5\]]ngo mtshar shin tu che ba nyid do/_/gzhan yang gnas skabs de dang de dag tu sdom brtson chen po'i stobs kyi 'khor los legs par bsrungs pa'i mnga' 'og tu gtogs pa ljongs dang*/_yul 'khor dang*/_grong dang grong rdal la sogs pa rnams su yang nad kyi 'jigs pa dang*/_mu ge'i 'jigs 
[\[325a.6\]]pa dang*/_phan tshun 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang*/_g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa snyigs ma'i dus kyi brlang spyod thams cad kyang ming gi lhag ma tsam du gyur to/_/de'i dbang gis 'gro ba rnams kyang gnas skabs su 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang*/_nyam nga ba ma mchis pa dang*/_bag tsha ba ma mchis par 
[\[325a.7\]]gyur te/_ltar snang gi bde ba kha zas bzang po'i ro lta bu la ci bde bar longs spyod par byed/_myong bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed do/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dkar po'i phyogs su mngon par 'dun pa'i lha rnams kyang kun nas rangs par gyur pa'i skyes kyi phreng ba gya nom pa bstar ba ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor kun du dus dus su sngo bsangs sprin gyi phreng ba lang ling du 'khrigs pa dag kyang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang phan tshun 'thab pa'i ya mtshan che ba ci yang ston par byed de/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pas rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'i 'phrul las/_rta mchog gi rnam pa dang*/_
[\[325b.2\]]shing rta'i rnam pa dang*/_glang po che'i rnam pa dang*/_nam mkha' lding gi rnam pa dang*/_gzhan yang yul gling dang*/_grong dang grong khyer dang*/_grong rdal dang skyed mos tshal gyi rnam pa la sogs pa du ma mngon par sprul te/_sprul pa de dag kyang pha rol dang tshu rol du 'gro ba dang*/_dga' ba dang*/_rtse ba 
[\[325b.3\]]dang*/_dga' mgur spyod pa'i rnam pa can ci yang sprul te skye bo phal gyi mig la tshim pa med pa'i ltad mo ci yang 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du char ldan dus kyi dga' ston tshar du dngar ba mang po dag kyang 'gro ba kun gyi mig gi dpyid du ngom par byed do/_/ji tsam na de dag las kyang lha'i me tog nI lot+pa 
[\[325b.4\]]la'i 'dab ma gzhon nu lta bu'i sbrang char zim bu dag kyang dus dang dus su ni 'bebs par byed cing*/_dus min du ni dengs par yang byed de/_des ni 'dod ldan skye bo rnams kyi yid la gcags pa'i re ba ci bde bas 'gengs par byed/_tshim par byed do/_/de'i dus na sa gzhi'i khyon thams 
[\[325b.5\]]cad kyang mi srun pa'i skal ba ngan pa thams cad med par byas te snum zhing mnyen pa'i reg bya phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba snying la sim pa dag ci yang ster ba'i mthu dang ldan par byed do/_/res 'ga' ni sprin rum stug po 'ga' zhig gi khrod nas rnam gsal glog gi 'gyu ba skad cig ma 
[\[325b.6\]]yun du g.yo ba ston cing*/_gang gi tshe byis pa rnams ni ya mtshan mig gi sman du yang byed la/_mi rtag pa sgom pa'i dam pa rnams la ni mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos thams cad de'i rang bzhin can du rjes su dran pa gsal 'debs pa'i dge ba'i bshes su bgyid pa dag kyang byung ngo*/_/
[\[325b.7\]]res 'ga' ni ha cang rtsub mo'i gdangs kyang min la shin tu dman pa yang ma yin pa'i 'brug sgra lhang lhang ba dal bu dal bus ldir bas ston gyi 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyi snying gi rma bya gzhon nu dag ni dga' ba rgya phrag mang pos myos par gyur pa'i gar stabs stong gis lan cig ma yin 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]par brel ba'i ngo mtshar gyi phreng ba dag ni ci yang ston par byed do/_/skabs 'ga' zhig tu ni lha'i bu nyi mas kyang rang gi 'od zer drod kyi rang bzhin can rnam par spros te/_sa bon phun sum tshogs pa dang*/_rlan gsher phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[326a.2\]]'dzin ma'i khyon thams cad khyab par bsro zhing*/_de'i rum nas 'thon pa'i sngo ljang dbyar skyes kyi phreng ba tshang tshing du 'khrigs pa'i nags tshal dang*/_myu gu dang*/_sdong bu dang*/_yal ga dang*/_lo 'dab kyi rnam pa mang po'ang dus dang dus su kha 'bus pa dang*/_dus dang dus su 'bras bu smin pa'i 
[\[326a.3\]]rkyen yid du 'ong ba dag ci yang stsol bar byed do/_/gzhan yang dpal gyi 'byung gnas sa'i lha mo brtan ldan mas ni rang gi lus thams cad bde ba'i thang dang*/_ri klung yangs pa dang*/_skyed mos tshal dang*/_zhing sa gshin pa la sogs pa snod kyi dge mtshan mtha' dag rdzogs par byas pa gang dag 
[\[326a.4\]]gi rum nas kha dog dang*/_dri dang*/_ro bcud dang*/_nus pa dpag tu med pa yon tan du 'dzin pa'i rtsi thog dang lo thog dang rtsa ba dang sdong po dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i dga' ston zad pa med pa nyid du bkye'o/_/de dag gi kha dog dang dri dang ro bcud dang nus pa dpag tu med pa'i 
[\[326a.5\]]yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos 'gro ba kun gyi srog gi dbang po dang lus kyi zungs rnam par bskyed cing ring por 'tsho ba'i bcud len du byed do/_/ji ltar yid la re ba'i snod kyi bre brag gang dang gang yin pa thams cad kyang dngos po de dang de dag gis bde bar 'gengs nus pa kho na byung ngo*/_/rgyu de dang de dag 
[\[326a.6\]]gis yul phyogs thams cad kyang bde ba dang*/_nad med pa dang*/_bkres ngab med pa dang*/_'byor pa dang*/_rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i las la zhugs pa la sogs pa bskal pa rdzogs ldan dus kyi dpal la 'gran pa snyam byed pa kho nar gyur to/_/mdor na snod kyi 'jig rten dang bcud kyi sems 
[\[326a.7\]]can thams cad nas bkra shis pa dang dge legs kyi dpal thams cad rab tu 'phel bar gyur te/_de rnams kyis ni dge zhing ngo mtshar byung ba'i gtam cung zad tsam gleng zin to/_/bzhi pa rab tu gnas pa ji ltar byas pa la/_rnam gzhag spyir bstan pa dang*/_dbye ba so sor bshad pa dang*/_
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]skabs su bab pa'i rab gnas ngos bzung ba'o/_/dang po rnam gzhag spyir bstan pa la'ang*/_mtshan nyid dang*/_sgra don dang*/_dgos pa ste rnam pa gsum las/_dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten dam tshig pa la/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i byin rlabs thams cad ye shes sems 
[\[326b.2\]]dpa'i rnam par bcug nas/_sems can gyi don du ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar du bzhugs su gsol bas dge zhing bkra shis pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad du rab tu gnas pa la pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hiHzhes 'byung ste/_de'ang pra ni nye 
[\[326b.3\]]bar sgyur ba'i tshig las byung ba rab ces pa dang*/_tiSh+Tha ni byings kyi lus 'gyur las byung ba ste/_yun du gnas pa'am brtan pa'i don to/_/bi d+hiHni cho ga ste/_de nyid ji ltar sgrub pa'i thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa'o/_/yang na su pra tiSh+Tha ste/_legs par rab tu gnas pa'am/_nye bar sgyur ba'i 
[\[326b.4\]]pra ti'i sgra las drangs na/_legs par so sor gnas pa zhes kyang bsgyur du rung ste/_mdor na rten gang dang de la bstim pa'i ye shes sems dpa' gnyis dbyer med du legs par rab tu gnas pa'am/_rten dang brten pa'i tshul gyis so sor til gyi gang bu til gyis gang ba ltar gnas pa'am/_sems 
[\[326b.5\]]can kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i gzhir yun ring du gnas par byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o/_/gsum pa ni don dam par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu nam mkha' ltar rab tu bzhugs pa las nam yang mi g.yo bas na rab tu gnas par bgyir med na'ang*/_kun rdzob tha snyad tsam du skye bo dad pa 
[\[326b.6\]]can rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba dang*/_de la brten nas sems can gyi khams su dge legs rgya chen po 'byung ba'i phyir rab tu gnas par bgyir yod par bstan te/_rab tu gnas pa'i gzhung rnams las/_skye bo rab tu dad pa yis/_/byed pa dge ba spel ba'i phyir/_/rab gnas bstan 
[\[326b.7\]]bcos las gsungs pa/_/tha snyad tsam du byas pa yin/_/zhes dang*/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud mdor bsdus pa kha che'i paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badzra dang 'bro shes rab grags kyi 'gyur las/_/sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu bzhugs/_/rab tu gnas pa gang na'ang med/_/kun tu mkha' ltar gnas pa la/_/cig shos 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]kyis ni rab tu brtag_/'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas/_/rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtags/_/zhes dang*/_'jam dbyangs sa skya paN+Di tas/_de phyir dam pa'i don du ni/_/chos rnams thams cad spros bral yin/_/de la cho ga gang yang med/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang yod min no/_/
[\[327a.2\]]cho ga gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yi/_/dbye ba thams cad kun rdzob yin/_/so sor thar dang byang chub sems/_/dbang bskur la sogs cho ga dang*/_/bsgom pa'i rim pa ji snyed dang*/_/rten 'brel zab mo thams cad dang*/_/sa dang lam gyi dbye ba dang*/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[327a.3\]]rgyas thob pa yang*/_/kun rdzob yin gyi don dam min/_/zhes dang*/_de 'dra'i dbye ba shes nas ni/_/cho ga byed na thams cad kyis/_/min na thams cad dor bar byos/_/cho ga la la dgos bzhin du/_/la la'i cho ga mi dgos zhes/_/smra ba mkhas pa'i bzhad gad gnas/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don la legs 
[\[327a.4\]]par brtags pas dgos pa yang dag grub bo/_/khyad par rten la rab tu gnas par ma byas par yun ring du gnas na 'jig rten du bkra mi shis par 'byung ba dang*/_mchod pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ba ste/_dper na skyes bu blun po ni ji ltar gzugs mdzes kyang 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas 
[\[327a.5\]]min pa'am/_dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i sngags pa dman pas sreg blugs kyi thal ba bzhin du phan gnod gang yang med par gsungs te/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/_gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/_/byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na/_/de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing*/_/ji srid mchod pa der 
[\[327a.6\]]mi 'os/_/dper na skyes bu la la zhig_/rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/_/'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed/_/de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de/_/rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/_/gang gis mchod cing phyag byed pa/_/dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas/_/sbyin sreg thal ba 
[\[327a.7\]]'bras med mtshungs/_/zhes so/_/des na rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga yang dag par rtsom pa la dgos pa shin tu che ste/_yang de nyid las/_cho ga dag nyid nus pa yis/_/brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pa/_/des byas bsod nams che ba yin/_/zhes sogs mang du 'byung ngo*/_/gnyis pa 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]dbye ba so sor bstan pa la/_spyir mdo las rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mtshan nyid pa bstan pa med la/_'ga' zhig 'dul ba las/_gaN+Di'i rab gnas bshad pa dang*/_/de yi rab gnas bya ba ni/_/shin tu brtan pa'i chos kyi sku/_/bskyed pa ma yin 'jigs byed min/_/gdod nas ma skyes 
[\[327b.2\]]pa dge ba/_/de ltar rab gnas byas nas ni/_/de yis spyan dbyer 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes pa tsam la brten nas sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rten bzhengs grub nas dus ston bya ba la sogs pa'i tshe rten gang yin pa de nyid mchod pa mang po'i bkur sti dang bcas te khri la bzhugs su gsol 
[\[327b.3\]]nas/_mchod pa 'bul ba dang gso sbyong blangs te so sor thar pa'i mdo bklag pa dang*/_'dul ba lung gi bkra shis kyi tshig brjod pa dang bcas te me tog 'thor ba la rab tu gnas pa'i tha snyad tsam gdags su rung ba ste/_sa skya paN+Di tas/_mdo las rab gnas bshad pa med/_/'on 
[\[327b.4\]]kyang mchod bstod bkra shis sogs/_/rgyal po'i mnga' dbul lta bu la/_/rab gnas yin zhes smra na smros/_/zhes so/_/gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i lugs la 'phags pa'i yul du mkhas shing grub pa'i slob dpon chen po rnams kyis rgyud sde so so'i rjes su 'brangs nas bkral 
[\[327b.5\]]ba'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bsam gyis mi khyab pa cig bzhugs pa las/_gangs can gyi ljongs 'dir 'gyur ba la/_bya ba'i rgyud dang mthun par bkral ba'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la/_paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa dang*/_dpal ldan mar me mdzad bzang 
[\[327b.6\]]po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i rab gnas kyi gzhung rnams bzhugs so/_/rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang mthun par bsdebs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la/_rgyud de nyid kyi nang gses su gyur pa rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni/_rab 'byor bskyangs dang*/_kun dga' snying po dang*/_pradz+nyA pA li 
[\[327b.7\]]ta dang*/_zhi ba'i snying po dang*/_slob dpon dad pa'i 'byung gnas go cha bzang po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung rnams bzhugs so/_/rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang mthun par bkral ba'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la/_grub pa'i dbang phyug nag po dam tshig rdo rje dang*/_slob dpon sbyang dka' 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]zla ba dang*/_slob dpon zla ba'i 'od dang*/_snang byed zla ba dang*/_mi 'jigs phyag dang*/_mai tri pa dang*/_dpal 'dzin bzang po dang*/_paN+Di ta sA d+hu pu tra dang*/_slob dpon 'jigs pa med pa'i 'byung gnas dang*/_dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya la sogs pa rnams kyis kye rdo rje dang*/_
[\[328a.2\]]gsang ba 'dus pa dang*/_gshin rje'i gshed dang*/_dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud rnams la brten nas mdzad pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams da lta'i dgongs 'grel chen po 'di nyid du bzhugs shing*/_de dag la brten pa'i cho ga'i phyag len gyi srol yang bstan pa snga dar gyi 
[\[328a.3\]]dus su 'jam pa'i dbyangs khri srong lde btsan gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba 'tsho bod kyi yul du bstan pa'i sgron me sbor ba'i ched du spyan drangs nas/_dbus kyi bsam yas mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bzhengs pa la rab tu gnas par gsol ba btab bo/_/de 
[\[328a.4\]]nyid nas kyang ji ltar gsol ba btab pa bzhin du rab tu gnas pa legs par mdzad pas/_de nas brtsams te bstan pa dang sems can gyi dge legs bye ba'i nyi ma dang por shar ba 'byung ngo*/_/bstan pa phyi dar gyi dus su ma hA paN+Di ta dad pa'i 'byung gnas go cha dang*/_sprul pa'i lo tsA ba chen 
[\[328a.5\]]po rin chen bzang po dpon slob rnams kyis mnga' ris su tho ling gser gyi gtsug lag khang chen po la/_rnal 'byor rgyud kyi gzhung rnams la brten nas rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rnam par dag par mdzad do/_/gzhung de dag gi go rim dang lag len rnams nges par byed pa'i sdom tshig 
[\[328a.6\]]lo tsA ba chen po de nyid kyis mdzad do/_/de nas slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mos mi thub zla ba'i rab gnas bzang po drug gi rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa dang*/_rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sngar smos pa'i gzhung de rnams dang*/_lo chen gyi sdom tshig rnams la brten nas rab tu 
[\[328a.7\]]gnas pa'i cho ga don gsal 'di nyid mdzad do/_/de'i rjes su 'phags pa rin po ches chen po hor gyi rgyal khab tu/_yu gur gyi ban+de saM g+ha mi tra'i ngor rab gnas saM g+ha mi tra zhes grags pa yang mdzad do/_/kun mkhyen bu ston rin po ches yo ga la brten pa'i rab gnas bkra shis rab rgyas dang*/_dus kyi 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]'khor lo la brten pa'i rab gnas bkra shis dpal 'bar gnyis mdzad do/_/rje ngor chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po yab sras rnams kyis bkra shis rgya mtsho dang*/_dge legs rgya mtsho la sogs pa mdzad cing*/_rab tu gnas pa'i srol chen po mi nyams shing dar rgyas shin tu che ba byung ngo*/_/
[\[328b.2\]]gsum pa skabs su bab pa'i rab gnas ngos bzung ba ni/_deng 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga ni dpal kye rdo rje lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga don gsal dang*/_bkra shis rgya mtsho dang*/_dge legs rgya mtsho dang*/_dpal 'byor rgya mtsho rnams kyi cho ga'i gzhung gi dgongs pa ma 
[\[328b.3\]]nor ba lhur len pa la cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa ni bzang po drug gis bsdus te/_de'ang ngor chen thams cad mkhyen pa dkon mchog lhun grub kyis/_rab gnas rten dang slob dpon dus dang gnas/_/yo byad cho ga bzang po rnam drug las/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar las/_dang po gang zhig rab tu gnas 
[\[328b.4\]]par bya ba'i rten ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rten tshad dang mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa ste/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud mdor bsdus pa las/_sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/_/zhi ba la sogs ro yi ldan/_/tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang*/_/de 'dra rab tu gnas par 
[\[328b.5\]]'gyur/_/zhes pas sku gzugs dngos su bstan nas/_de'i shugs las gsung gi rten dang thugs kyi rten tu gtogs pa thams cad kyang shes dgos te/_ji skad du/_sku gzugs dang ni glegs bam dag_/yod na khyod kyis rab gnas gyis/_/zhes sogs rgya cher 'byung ba ltar las/_'dir rab tu gnas par 
[\[328b.6\]]bya ba'i rten gyi gtso bo ni thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa zhes bya ba bzo'i 
[\[328b.7\]]bya ba ma lus pa mthar phyin pa 'di nyid do/_/gnyis pa gang gis rab tu gnas par byed pa'i slob dpon ni/_spyi'i mtshan nyid du rdo rje slob dpon du dbang thob cing sngags kyi gzhung lugs mang po sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/_kye rdo rje las/_rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son/_/zhes dang*/_bye brag tu 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]rdo rje gur las/_dal zhing zab mo'i chos dang ldan/_/rig pa thams cad mkhas par bcas/_/sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing*/_/rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/_/de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig_/nyan thos spyod pa srung ba po/_/sngags spyod rim par gus 
[\[329a.2\]]pa dang*/_/gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang*/_/dkyil 'khor bri zhing bzlas par ldan/_/rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po/_/sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yi/_/'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed/_/ces dang*/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/_slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing*/_/mtshan nyid kun 
[\[329a.3\]]dang yang dag ldan/_/phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/_/las rnams kun la mkhas pas so/_/zhes dang*/_kr-i ya sa muts+tsha las/_rab tu dwang ba'i mtshan gyis phyug_/de nyid bcu la rnam par mkhas/_/bzo yi cha ni thams cad dang*/_/sngags kyi bstan bcos rab 'byams shes/_/gza' 
[\[329a.4\]]dang skar ma dus sbyor shes/_/'jig rten smod las gzhan du gyur/_/rab tu gnas par rab tu mdzad/_/grong khyim gang der nges par ni/_/'di yis sangs rgyas bzhugs gsol bas/_/gang du zhi dang bzlas 'phel zhing*/_/nad med chos kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/_/nor dang tshe dang bde ba 
[\[329a.5\]]ster/_/zhes gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan ni rtogs par sla shing*/_de kho na nyid bcu rig pa ni/_dkyil 'khor dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dang*/_phyag rgya dang*/_byed pa dang*/_gdan dang*/_bzlas pa dang*/_sbyin sreg dang*/_gtor ma dang*/_mchod pa'i las spro zhing bsdu ba rnams la mkhas pa ste/_
[\[329a.6\]]slob dpon zla ba'i 'od kyis/_dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang*/_/stang stabs 'dug stangs sbyin sreg dang*/_/sngags dang bzlas brjod mchod pa'i las/_/spro ba dang ni bsdu ba ste/_/de nyid bcu po shes pa yin/_/zhes rgyud sde 'og ma rnams dang thun mong ba phyi'i de nyid bcu'am/_rdo rje slob 
[\[329a.7\]]dpon la nye bar mkho ba'i de nyid bcu dang*/_rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/_phyir bzlog gnyis kyi cho ga dang*/_/gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang*/_/kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga dang*/_/gtor ma rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang*/_/drag shul sgrub pa'i cho ga dang*/_/rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgrub/_/
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin no/_/zhes bye brag bla med kyi dgongs pa nang ngam/_/gsang ba'i de nyid bcu dang*/_gur gyi dgongs pa slob dpon Dom+bi bas/_/bsrung ba dbang bskur gtor ma bzlas dgar dang*/_/phyir bzlog gnyis dang dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang*/_/sdig sbyong ba dang gshegs 
[\[329b.2\]]su gsol ba ste/_/de nyid bcu zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/_/zhes kye rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa la dgos pa cho ga'i de nyid bcu dang*/_'bum lnga'i dgongs pa rin chen 'bar ba las 'byung ba/_rdo rje dril bu ye shes dang*/_/lha dang dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang*/_/sngags dang rdul 
[\[329b.3\]]tshon gtor ma dang*/_/dbang bskur de nyid bcu rig pas/_/zhes thams cad la dgos pa de kho na nyid kyi de nyid bcu ste/_de rnams ci rigs par shes pa dgos shing*/_nyan thos spyod pa srung ba po ni dus 'khor rtsa rgyud las/_de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa/_/gsum las dge slong mchog yin te/_/
[\[329b.4\]]'bring ni dge tshul nyid du brjod/_/khyim na gnas pa tha ma yin/_/zhes gsungs shing*/_sa thob ma gtogs khyim pa ni/_/rgyal po'i bla mar mi bya ste/_/de las thos pa yongs shes pa/_/gang zhig rtags can bya ba nyid/_/sa thob ma gtogs slob dpon ni/_/khyim gnas gang tshe mchod 
[\[329b.5\]]byed pa/_/de tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni/_/dge 'dun rnams la gus med 'gyur/_/lha khang sogs kyi rab gnas kyang*/_/rtags can gyis ni rtag tu bya/_/gnas gcig na ni gsum yod na/_/khyim pa gos dkar can gyis min/_/zhes gsungs pas so so skye bo'i rdo rje slob dpon la rab 
[\[329b.6\]]tu byung ba dang*/_bye brag tu dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid mchog tu bsngags pa ltar/_'dir rab tu gnas par byed pa'i rdo rje slob dpon ni spyi dang bye brag gi mtshan nyid ma lus pa yongs su tshang ba/_phyi kun spyod thams cad ston pa'i 'khor gyi dgra bcom pa chen po lta bu la nang du 
[\[329b.7\]]stong pa nyid dang snying rje gnyis su med pa'i rang gdangs gdan gsum lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs nas/_skal bar ldan pa'i gdul bya rgya mtsho'i rgyud la sku bzhi'i sa bon yang dag par 'jog pa la mkhas shing*/_gsang bar srid 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]pa gsum po ro gcig tu gyur pa/_mi phyed rdo rje chen po'i go 'phang las nam yang mi g.yo ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po nyid gtso bor bzhugs pa dang*/_rdo rje slob dpon chen po gzhan rnams
