[\[330a.2\]]kyang byang chub kyi sems rin po che dang ldan pa/_bye brag tu gzhi'i bsnyen pa la sogs pas dag par byas pa/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga tsam gyis thog mar rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rtsom pa por bzhugs pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang lo re bzhin du rab tu 
[\[330a.3\]]gnas pa brgya phrag mang po bskyar ba na de dag gi skabs su rdo rje slob dpon du 'os pa gang dag bzhugs pa rnams so/_/gsum pa nam zhig rab tu gnas par bya ba'i dus ni/_bkra shis par byed pa'i tshes dang gza' dang skar ma dang byed pa dang sbyor ba la sogs pa dus bzang po phun 
[\[330a.4\]]sum tshogs pa 'dzom pa nges par dgos te/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/_dbyar zla rwa 'am dpyid zla 'bring*/_/dgun zla dpyid kyi tha [{]chungs sam[,]chung ngam[}]/_/dbyar rwa de bzhin dbyar 'bring po/_/nyi ma byang du bltas pa yi/_/dkar po'i phyogs ni shis pa'o/_/zhes dang*/_kr-i ya sa 
[\[330a.5\]]muts+tsha las/_mchu dang dbo yi zla ba de bzhin nges par sa ga snron dang chu stod zla ba dang*/_/mgo ste de srid 'di rnams dge ba gcig pus 'bras bu ster ba'i zla ba drug tu gsungs/_/zhes dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs su bzung ba las/_zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang zhes 
[\[330a.6\]]gsungs pa'i zla ba drug las/_dpyid zla 'bring po ni sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba'i dus dang*/_dgun zla 'bring po ni 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyi dus te de gnyis ni gzhan las khyad par du 'phags par bshad pa las/_'dir ches mchog tu gyur pa'i dus ni snga ma de nyid kyi dus su'o/_/de'ang 
[\[330a.7\]]bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis su yod pa las/_nyi ma lho bgrod kyi dus la ni/_tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa rgyas par byed pa'i las brtsam pa la shis par mi 'gyur bar gsungs te/_de'ang lho'i phyogs na gshin rje mi bzad pa rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]nyi ma byang bgrod kyi dus la ni/_rgyas par byed pa'i las la mchog tu shis par gsungs te/_de'ang byang gi phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam mang thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin nor bdag chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 'dir yang nyin 
[\[330b.2\]]mor byed pa byang bgrod kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe brtsams pa yin no/_/zla ba la'ang 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i phyogs gnyis las/_yar gyi ngo la 'dzom na rab tu gyur pa dang*/_gal te gza' dang skar ma'i sbyor 'phrod legs par 'dzom na mar gyi ngo la'ang dbang bskur ba dang rab tu gnas pa'i 
[\[330b.3\]]las brtsam par bshad pa las/_'dir yar gyi ngo la bab pa na'o/_/dus de nyid du shar ba'i gza' dang skar ma dge ba ni/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/_phur bu lhag pa pa wa sangs/_/zla ba'i gza' sogs shes bya ste/_/gza' skar 'di rnams las byas na/_/rab tu gnas 
[\[330b.4\]]pa mchog tu dge_/zhes dang*/_thams cad du ni chu smad dang*/_/snar ma gro bzhin de bzhin te/_/lag pa snubs dang snron dang ni/_/rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no/_/khrums smad kyang ni de bzhin te/_/rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du/_/skye dgu 'phel zhing de yis ni/_/rab tu 
[\[330b.5\]]gnas pa'i mchog tu byed/_/ces gsungs pa ltar las 'dir mchog tu gyur pa'i gza' ni phur bu dang*/_rgyu skar gyi lha mo snar ma lhan cig tu 'dzom pa'i sbyor 'phrod bzang po dang ldan pa'i gral tshes shin tu dge ba'i nyin mo la'o/_/dus tshod kyang snga dro'i dus su shis pa ni/_rgyud las/_
[\[330b.6\]]snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang*/_/zhes sogs rgyud dang bstan bcos mang po nas snga dro'i dus su bya bar nges par bshad pa ltar/_'dir yang dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma shar dros kyis dus phun sum tshogs pa de nyid du spyan dbye ba'i bya ba yang dag par grub par bgyis pa yin no/_/bzhi pa gang du 
[\[330b.7\]]rab tu gnas par bgyi ba'i gnas ni/_spyi'i mtshan nyid du chos ldan gyi rgyal pos bskyangs pas nye bar 'tshe ba med pa zhig tu ste/_dbang mdor bstan las/_gang na sa phyogs chos ldan zhing*/_/gang zhig kho nar skye dgu rnams/_/bder gnas sa 'dzin rtsod med pa'i/_/gnas 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]der rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/_/zhes dang*/_bye brag tu rab tu gnas par bya ba'i gnas ni bkra shis shing nyams dga' ba dang*/_gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bla khab can du nges par dgos pa'ang*/_rin chen 'bar ba las/_gnas ni yid 'ong 'du 'dzi sogs/_/
[\[331a.2\]]skyon med rnam mdzes bla khab can/_/zhes dang*/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las kyang*/_/yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang*/_/khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su/_/zhes gsungs pa las/_'dir chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i stobs kyis legs par bskyangs shing*/_bye brag 
[\[331a.3\]]tu kho ra khor yug kun du mdzes shing bkra shis pa'i phreng bas mngon par brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po dam pa'i chos kyi 'byung khungs su gyur pa chos 'byung bkra shis sgo mang zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nyid du'o/_/lnga pa rab tu gnas pa la nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad ni/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[331a.4\]]dang 'brel ba'i yo byad dang*/_sbyin sreg dang 'brel ba'i yo byad dang*/_rab tu gnas pa la nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad du khrus kyi yo byad dang*/_'thor nas dang*/_mnga' dbul dang*/_dga' ston la sogs pa'i yo byad dang*/_dbang bskur ba dang 'brel na slob ma la nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad dang 
[\[331a.5\]]bcas pa ste/_de dag tu dgos pa'i yo byad kyi dngos po bzang zhing gya nom pa'i 'byor pa ma tshang ba med pa nyer bsdoms su bshams pa rnams so/_/drug pa ji ltar rab tu gnas par byed pa'i cho ga ni/_sbyor ba dang*/_dngos gzhi dang*/_rjes te rnam pa gsum gyi cho ga ste/_de'ang lag 
[\[331a.6\]]len phra mo tshun chad la ma nor ba dang dag pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa 'jug par gsungs kyi/_ma dag pas ni de lta ma yin te/_rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud mdor bsdus pa las/_cho ga dag dang ldan byas la/_/cho ga dman pas mi bya ste/_/rab gnas rtag par bkra 
[\[331a.7\]]mi shis/_/'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la/_/'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar cho ga rnam par dag pa 'phags pa'i yul dang bod yul gyi mkhas pa dang grub pa'i dbang phyug 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]chen po rnams kyi rgyud sde so so'i rjes su 'brangs nas bkral ba'i cho ga mang du mchis pa las/_'dir mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa skya pa'i rje btsun gong mar gyur pa rnams dang*/_mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug ngor chen rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi gsung rab rnam par dag pa la 
[\[331b.2\]]brten pa'i cho ga la/_sbyor ba dang*/_dngos gzhi dang*/_rjes kyi bya ba gsum ste/_de dag zhib tu ni gong ma rnams kyi cho ga'i steng du rtogs par bya'o/_/'dir mdor bsdus sdoms su smos na/_dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba'i rgyas par byed pa na/_bsnyen pa dang*/_sa chog dang*/_sta gon 
[\[331b.3\]]gyi cho ga dang*/_dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba'am ras bris bkod pa dang*/_rgyan dgram pa dang*/_sgrub cing mchod pa dang*/_'jug cing dbang blang ba rnams sngon du song nas rab tu gnas pa'i sta gon la 'jug go/_/gzhan du na/_legs bshams bdag bskyed bum pa bzlas/_/rten sbyong 
[\[331b.4\]]bkru zhing phyi ba dang*/_/rten bskyed ye shes spyan drangs la/_/bgegs bskrad mchod de dgug gzhug bya/_/rgyas btab mchod bstod gtor ma btang*/_/snyan gsan dbab cing mchod bstod bya/_/bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol/_/rten dgab bdag srung sta gon no/_/zhes 
[\[331b.5\]]pa ltar don tshan bcu gsum dang*/_dngos gzhi la/_tho rangs bdag bskyed mdun bskyed mchod/_/rten sbyong bkru zhing phyi ba dang*/_/ring bsrel gzhug cing gsol ba gdab/_/rten bskyed spyan drangs dgug rgyas gdab/_/dbang bskur mchod bstod spyan dbye bya/_/gsol gdab mnga' 
[\[331b.6\]]dbul rgyas par bya/_/de yang mchod bstod bye brag dang*/_/sbyin sreg sngags te dngos gzhi'o/_/zhes pa ltar don tshan bcu gsum dang*/_mjug gi bya ba la/_gtor ma sbyin dang chos skyong bsgo/_/dkyil 'khor mchod de dngos grub blang*/_/bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol/_/
[\[331b.7\]]yon bdag bsgo zhing shis pa brjod/_/rten mchod bsod nams yongs su bsngo/_/slob dpon mchod de dga' ston bya/_/slar yang shis pa rgyas par brjod/_/rjes bsdu sbyin sreg mjug don no/_/zhes pa ltar bcu gsum ste don tshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi cho ga rnam par 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]dag pa'i sgo nas rab tu gnas par bgyis pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i cho ga la brten nas rab tu gnas pa legs par bgyis pa'i rten gyi phyi mo 'di dang*/_'di las rnam par 'phros par gyur pa'i dpe rgyun rnams ni gang dang gang du bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs dang yul khams de 
[\[332a.2\]]dang der/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang slob mar bcas pa'i tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi srung bas yongs su bsrungs pas/_byur dang skal ba ngan pa dang bkra shis pa ma yin pa'i phyogs thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang*/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde legs dang 
[\[332a.3\]]bkra shis kyi dpal thams cad yid bzhin du 'byung ba dang*/_chos ma yin par smra ba dang*/_phyir rgol ba ngan pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba dang*/_sa phyogs de yang yul mtha' 'khob tu mi 'gyur ba la sogs pa dam pa'i chos kyi bden pa'i byin gyi 
[\[332a.4\]]rlabs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang*/_phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal rab tu 'bar bar gsungs kyang rgyas par 'dri ba la ni yi ges tshogs che bar 'gyur bas ma spros la/_'dir mdo sde re re'i byin gyi rlabs dang*/_phan yon la dper mtshon pa tsam brjod na/_bdud 
[\[332a.5\]]rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yul gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang*/_chos smra ba gnas pa'am/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te yod pa'i yul der yams kyi nad dang*/_gnod pa dang*/_'go ba'i nad dang*/_
[\[332a.6\]]'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di ltar dam bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus la bab cing*/_sangs rgyas 
[\[332a.7\]]kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i dus la bab pa na bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/de dag la gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/_/yul gang na mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]dus ma lags pa'i bser ma dang*/_dgung char dang*/_mu ge dang*/_bro nad ya nga ba dang*/_mi ngas dang*/_yams kyi nad dang*/_'go ba'i nad dang*/_gnod pa dang*/_'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang*/_glegs bam du bgyis 
[\[332b.2\]]pa'am/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang*/_chom rkun dang*/_srin po dang*/_mkha' 'gro ma'i ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag na chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag dang*/_
[\[332b.3\]]mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul der bdag gis lo tog dang*/_nor dang*/_'bru dang*/_me tog dang*/_lo ma dang*/_'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang*/_bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o zhes dang*/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 
[\[332b.4\]]las/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/_mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun du bsrung bar bgyid/_yongs su bskyab pa dang*/_yongs su 'dzin pa dang*/_
[\[332b.5\]]yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/_mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun du bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyab pa dang*/_yongs su gzung ba dang*/_yongs su bskyong ba dang*/_zhi ba dang bde 
[\[332b.6\]]legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o zhes so/_/khyad par rab tu gnas pa'i thabs kyi khyad par la brten nas/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams 'byams klas su bzhugs pa rnams nas/_gdan gsum lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ye shes pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra ba 
[\[332b.7\]]snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa spyan drangs te de dag gi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa'i rten 'di dag la dad pa'i skye bo gang la las mchod pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bkur sti la sogs pa bgyis pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa phul bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za ba ni/_
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga zab mo'i mthu nyid kyis so/_/de dang mthun par phan yon gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mngon du bzhugs pa'i gnas skabs su mchod pa phul ba dang*/_sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[333a.2\]]kyang de'i rten rab tu gnas pa legs par bgyis pa la mchod pa phul ba dang byi dor byas pa la sogs pa bsod nams mnyam par 'thob par 'gyur te/_me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs las/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam lo brgya'am 
[\[333a.3\]]lo stong yang rung ste/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rten rnams la me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/_chu snyim pa gang 'thor ram/_byug pa'i thig le 'dri'am/_me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/_byug pa 'bul lam/_
[\[333a.4\]]spos 'bul lam/_bdug spos 'bul lam/_mar me 'bul lam phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i stabs 'ga' bor te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba de dag ni/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba bskal pa'am bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong du'am/_bskal 
[\[333a.5\]]pa brgya phrag stong du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do zhes dang*/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/_dga' bos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs pa na gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_rin po che sna bdun dang*/_
[\[333a.6\]]gzhal med khang dang*/_bu dang*/_chung ma dang*/_bran khol dang*/_gos dang*/_zas dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad phul nas bsti stangs dang bcas pas phyag byas te mchod pa byas pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang*/_dngul dang*/_
[\[333a.7\]]rin po che sna bdun dang*/_gzhal med khang dang*/_bu dang*/_chung ba dang*/_bran khol dang*/_gos dang*/_zas dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phul te/_dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stangs dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te mchod pa byas na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]skyes bu de gnyis kyis dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa bgyis na/_bsod nams gang gis mang du thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu de gnyis kyis de ltar dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na bsod nams thob pa'i khyad par med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas mya ngan 
[\[333b.2\]]las 'das kyang chos kyi sku ni rtag pa yin pas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa bsod nams 'dra ste khyad par med do zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bzhugs pa la dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stangs dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa dang*/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung ril 
[\[333b.3\]]po dang*/_sku gdung phyed nas brtsams te/_sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam gyi bar la'ang spros te rgya cher gsungs so/_/bye brag tu gsung gi rten glegs bam ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug par byed pa'i thabs sam/_de'i phan yon ston pa'am de nyid rjod par byed pa'i dbang du 
[\[333b.4\]]byas pa yin pas/_de la mchod cing bsti stang du byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/_slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i yum gyi 'grel pa las/_gtso bor chos kyi sku'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin no/_/de bas na 
[\[333b.5\]]de ston par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i yum la mchod na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi sku la mchod pa'i phyir bsod nams mang du skye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dri ma med pa'i gsung rab rnams las rgya cher 'byung ba'i don la yid rton par byas te/_tshul 'di dag la shin tu gus pa'i sems 
[\[333b.6\]]kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang*/_bkur bsti rgya chen po bgyid pas bsod nams rdzogs pa'i thabs la shin tu 'bad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/'dir smras pa/[(*]nyams ldan las rmad du byung ba'i nyams ldan/[)]yid 'ong lo 'dab stug por skyes pa lhab lhub gos gyur me tog grol ba mu tig gi_/drwa ba drwa ba phyed pas mdzes byas snye ma dud rnams spel 
[\[333b.7\]]legs nor bu'i do shal gyur/_/nyi ma zla ba nyin mtshan re mos rtse mo la shar yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis mdzes/_/dzam+bu shing gi dbang po gang yin rang byung rgyal mtshan ngo mtshar ldan pa gling gi mchog_1_/[(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]gling bzhi'i rgyal po de yi dbus gyur 'chang*/_/
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]mi mchog dpa' bos mngon par byang chub pa'i/_/gnas su byin gyis brlabs pas dngos kun gyis/_/mi phyed rdo rje'i rang bzhin grub pa'i gdan/_2_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]de las gnod sbyin bdag po'i phyogs cha ru/_/bgrod par kha ba'i rdul brtsegs ri bo yi/_/do shal ldan pa'i dpal 
[\[334a.2\]]ni 'od gsal lha/_/gzugs mchog phan tshun ngom la 'khod pa bzhin/_3_/[(*]rab tu spel ba/[)]slar yang thub pa dgyes pa'i 'dzum gyi rlabs/_/zla ba'i spun dang 'grogs pa'i dbyangs nyid las/_/nga yi bstan pa dri med rgyas 'gyur zhes/_/lung du bstan pas ches dkar byas pa bzhin/_4_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan/[)]de nang 
[\[334a.3\]]sA la'i tshang tshing rab 'khrigs pa'i/_/sman ljongs yid kyi chom rkun byed pa la/_/nyer brten 'gro ba byang chub snye ma can/_/bsgrub pa'i dam bcas snying nas bskul ba dang*/_5_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]gcig tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bkas/_/lung bstan 'khyog po min pa'i 
[\[334a.4\]]dus kyi steng*/_/son par rgyal dang rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob rnams/_/gzhan snang skye bar zlos pa'i gar gyis rtsen/_6_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]gang tshe chos kyi nyi ma bkrag po ches/_/mtha' 'khob yul gyi sngo bsangs me la tshe ma/_/mthar byas bod dang bod yul chen po zhes/_/yi ge 
[\[334a.5\]]phyogs kyi rtsig logs gsal bar byas/_7_/[(]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]bod yul chen po'i nor 'dzin pad+ma dkar/_/sgang gi 'dab ma drug ldan dkyil 'khor las/_/zal mo sgang gi 'dab yangs la chags pa/_/gling zhes bod pa sa yi thig le yod/_8_/[(*]the tshom can gyi rab rtog/[)]de na stobs bcu mnga' 
[\[334a.6\]]ba'i sde snod 'chang*/_/grangs mthas dben pa 'byon pa'i sta gon du/_/srid pa 'di yi thog ma'i byed pa pos/_/dge mtshan mang po ched du bsham pa'am/_9_/yang na nor ldan ma 'dis rang gi lus/_/mi dbang rin chen bdun dang 
[\[334a.7\]]shis pa'i rtags/_/rnam brgyad ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i nang*/_/'dod dgu'i sa bon btab snyam 'phyang mo nyug_10_/[(*]bya ba brjod pa thog ma'i gsal byed/[)]mgron du bos so sems can grangs dang mtha'/_/gzhal du med pa mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/_/ya mtshan yul gyi yon tan dge ba 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]bcu/_/ma tshang med pa'i yul gru 'di na'o/_11_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sgras zin pa'i dpe/[)]thams cad bde dang 'byor ldan gzhan dag gis/_/rnam 'tshes dogs pa med pa'i skyid nyams la/_/longs su spyod pa'i chab 'bangs 'di dag gis/_/mang pos bkur ba'i 'bangs la co 'drir byed/_12_/[(*]'byor pa rgya che ba/[)]snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten 
[\[334b.2\]]rgyas pa der/_/chos kyi bkra shis phyug pa'i cho ga mkhan/_/gtsug lag khang dang khang phran mchod rten gnas/_/grangs med tshom bur bkod pas kun nas mdzes/_13_/[(*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[)]lto bar chos dang srid pa'i rgyal srid zung gi dbu 'phang mthon por 'khrungs pa'i 
[\[334b.3\]]dpag bsam shing*/_/sde bzhi'i dpal gyi 'bras bu yid 'ong ma tshang med pa dge ba'i phyogs su smin pa las/_/phan dang bde ba'i 'dod dgu'i gtong ba lhun gyis grub pa'i 'byung gnas mtshungs pa med pa 'di/_/sa stengs 'di ru skye dgu kun gyi bsod nams rnam par yangs pa'i mgron du 
[\[334b.4\]]yang dag 'khrungs/_14_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]de na lnga rig mkhas dang grub pa yi/_/yongs rtser son pa'i dus gsum 'dren pa rnams/_/mkhas pa la 'os bgyi ba rnam gsum gyis/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan brtan pa'i cho gas brel/_15_/[(*]bsam pa rgya che ba/[)]gsang gsum yon tan mi zad rgyan gyi mdzod/_/yongs 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po 
[\[334b.5\]]mngon gyur kyang*/_/sngon chad thub pas bzhag pa ma nor lam/_/bkral phyir mkhas pa'i tshul bzung sa skya pa/_16_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]gang de'i yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i rgyal srid la/_/mnga' mdzad smra ba'i rgyal po e wa pa'i/_/lugs mchog rgyal bas bsngags pa bskal 
[\[334b.6\]]pa brgyar/_/brtan byed phrin las yongs su dar ba'i gzhi/_17_/[(*]sems med rab rtog/[)]bstan pa'i dpal gyur ngur smrig 'chang gi sde/_/'dus pa sin+d+hU wA ra'i tshon gyi mdangs/_/ring du 'phos pa thun mtshams sprin gos su/_/'khrul te mkha' 'dis lan mang gyon pa bzhin/_18_/[(*]yul la ston pa/[)]kun kyang rnam gsum 
[\[334b.7\]]sdom pa'i bslab pa la/_/legs par zhugs pa'i tshul 'di lha dang mi'i/_/phyag gi 'os su grags mdo rnam pa brgyas/_/gtses pa lan blan ma nus pa ru go/19_/[(*]dngos po'i dpe/[)]'dus pa de dag phyi nang gsang ba'i theg_/sprin gyi rnga gsang ltar sgrog 'khor ba dang*/_/ngan par song 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]ba'i sdug bsngal gzhom la mngon/_/phyogs pas mthun par 'du ba'i gan+d+ho la/_20_/[(*]mtshungs pa dang dbye ba'i dpe/[)]gang gi rten dang brten pa'i bsam yas 'phrul/_/bkod pa las grub ngo mtshar mthong ba na/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes snang ba rang*/_/byung ba'i gzhal med khang du 'khrul pa 'jug_21_/[(*]skabs gsum 'dod pa'i zung ldan/[)]de dang zung 
[\[335a.2\]]'brel dpal ldan rgyal po'i khab/_/phyogs las rnam par rgyal byed shis pa'i glur/_/lhang lhang mgrin pa bsgrigs la rgyal ba sras/_/mi dgyes med pa'i legs byas gzhi chen po/_22_/[(*]'byor pa rgya che ba/[)]sde bzhi'i dpal gyis brling ba'i rgyal srid la/_/dge ba'i bka' 
[\[335a.3\]]khrims 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal/_/bar chad mi mnga' byon dang 'byon 'gyur rnams/_/gtsug lag lugs brgya bgro ba'i 'dun sa che/_23_/[(*]sems ldan gyi rab rtog[)]gang gi dpal la 'dod pa khams kyi lha/_/rang gnas lta na sdug pa'i grong khyer du/_/lan gcig ma yin rmongs pas mkhar 'khyams 
[\[335a.4\]]pa/_/legs so'i bsodaM sgra sgrogs pa'i zol gyis bsgribs/_24_/[(*]yongs su brjes pa/[)]re ba'i dam bca' med par sbyin pa bzhi'i/_/gtong ba 'gro ba ris su med byin nas/_/de dag las byung grags pa bskal pa'i bar/_/brtan ldan bdag gir byed pa'i gnas su'o/_25_/[(*]rigs pa'i gzugs can/[)]bgrang gzhi 
[\[335a.5\]]sbrul gyi rgyal mo lang tsho yi/_/nad bu me yi rang bzhin 'bar las skyes/_/lnga tshigs zla ba'i bu chung bsrings ba'i skyed/_/'phur 'gro snon gyis na tshod dar bar byas/_26_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan/[)]mkha' yi glang po rang gi gnas kun tu/_/bgrod pas dub pa'i 
[\[335a.6\]]'khun sgra stong du 'byin/_/rngul chu gtsang ma'i rgyun babs 'thungs pa'i sa/_/sngo bsangs lang tsho'i bcud len grub pa'i dus/_27_/[(*]mtha' dag gi gzugs can ma'i gzugs kyis cung zad spang*/[)]'gro sems rang bzhin mkha' yi bu mo de/_/gdod nas spros bcas bag ma gsar pa yi/_/brtul zhugs spangs pa

[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]gzhan dbang gyur tshe rtsis la rag_29_/[(*]yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]legs byas rgya chen rtsom pa'i thog ma ru/_/dge ba gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshod sogs/_/bdag po phan tshun mdza' gcugs 'dus pa'i gros/_/shis pa'i kha lo sgyur la 'cham pa'i nyin/_30_/[(*]cha shas kyi gzugs can/[)]stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur mchog

[\[335b.4\]]stong*/_/rnam gsal chos blon dbang po chu gter grangs/_33_/[(*]don gzhan bkod pa'i 'gog pa/[) ]de des legs par brtags pa'i las byed tshogs/_/bskos pa'i las la gzhan dring mi 'jog mtshar/_/'on te gang la sbyangs pa de nyid la/_/mkhas pa rgyu 'bras bslu ba min pa'i 
[\[335b.5\]]mthu/_34_/[(*]bzlog pa'i dpe/[)]mi bdag bsod nams rgyas pa'i dpal 'thungs pa/_/thams cad sbyangs pa'i blo ldan 'gyur ba bzhin/_/rin chen ri bo'i phang par 'dzegs pa'i bya/_/spu sdug gser du mthong de ya mtshan byed/_35_/[(*]gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa can/[)]gzhan gyis bsgrub dka' tshegs med pha rol du/_/
[\[335b.6\]]phyin pa sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul mtshungs na yang*/_/'bad pa thang re yis kyang sgrib pa'i tshogs/_/za phyir 'di las mig 'phrul shin tu dman/_36_/[(*]phan tshun med pa'i byed rgyu/[)]rgya chen rtsom pa tshe 'di'i so nam min/_/mkho dgu'i gtong ba khyim gyi bde phyir min/_/phan pa'i bsam 
[\[335b.7\]]sbyor bdag don zhen pas min/_/de phyir 'di la rangs par mi 'gyur su/_37_/[(*]bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]bde gshegs rten gsum yid bzhin nor bu las/_/phan bde byin rlabs 'dod pa 'jo ba la/_/rab gnas byi dor rim par mkhas pa las/_/'byung ba phan mdzad dam pa'i 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]bka' yin no/_38_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]de slad dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang gi/_/lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid che/_/mkhas pa'i phrin las 'khor los mnga' mdzad cing*/_/yun du skyong ba chos kyi rgyal pos mtshon/_39_/[(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]mchog gi slob dpon mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i bkas/_/bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis 
[\[336a.2\]]mdzes rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dus pa'i cho ga rnam dag dbyangs gcig tu/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i rang bzhin bsgrubs/_40_/[(*]gzugs brnyan gyi dag dpe/[)]grogs dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas/_/mchod pa'i legs byas mngon par 'du byed pa/_/de kun 'dus pa yi ge'i rnam pa

[\[336a.5\]]lha lus ltar/_/thob pa de ni btung mchog phul las byung*/_44_/[(*]yan lag gcig pas gzugs can/[)]mdzes pa'i gzugs ldan dam pa'i brtul zhugs dga'/_/yon tan mang po'i rgyan gyis mdzes gyur pas/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa de/_/me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mchod pa'i mthu/_45_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sbas zin pa'i dpe/[)]zhi 
[\[336a.6\]]zhing dul ba tshul khrims gtsang ldan lus/_/gang las mngar ba'i dri rab 'thul ba yis/_/spos bzang brgya yi grags pa dang 'thab pa/_/byug pa spos kyi dam pas mngad pa'i mthu/_46_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]rab rib yogs pa dag dang 'grogs min pa'i/_/lha mig dngos po kun la nam du langs/_/shes rab sgron 
[\[336a.7\]]me yang ni rab gsal ba/_/de ni snang gsal byin pa'i bsod nams so/_47_/[(*]sbad pa'i dpe/[)]yan lag ma nyams blta na sdug pa'i dpal/_/chu skyes gzhon nu nyid dang mtshungs na yang*/_/ring du 'tsho dang stobs kyis 'phags gyur pa'i/_/lus bzang de ni lha bshos phul 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]bas thob/_48_/[(*]ngag don gyi dpe las bzhin sgra du ma can/[)]tshangs pa'i sras mo'i dbyangs bzhin de yi gsung*/_/rgyud mang brdungs pa'i sgra bzhin de'i grags pa/_/thugs rjes bzhin du de mthus 'jig rten khams/_/'geng ba'i rgyu ni dbyangs snyan rol mos so/_49_/[(*]yon tan brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]gling bzhi sa 'dzin rgyal po'i rtse mo'i bar/_/rang dbang bgyid la bsngo ba'i 
[\[336b.2\]]dgras dben pa/_/'gro ba yongs kyi bla mar 'gyur ba yang*/_/gdugs dang bla bre byin pa'i 'bras bu'o/_50_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]skye bo kun gyis mdun nas bdar ba dang*/_/slong ba rnams kyi dpag bsam 'gyur la sogs/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dpal brnyes thams cad ni/_/
[\[336b.3\]]rgyal mtshan la sogs phul ba'i bsod nams yin/_51_/[(*]rab spel gyi rgyan/[)]mi mchog chen po'i go sar gshegs nas ni/_/sems can mos pa bsam yas rjes mthun du/_/lhun grub chu zla lta bus don byed pa'i/_/yon tan thams cad bsod nams lag pas byas/_52_/[(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[)]des na sras bcas rgyal ba'i 
[\[336b.4\]]thugs kyi bcud/_/glegs bam za ma tog tu 'khyil ba la/_/gya nom mchod pas mdun du bdar ba nas/_/rgya cher ston pa'i bar la gus pa byos/_53_/[(*]'bad pas 'gog pa/[)]thob dka'i lus dang longs spyod gces bya yi/_/gdams pa mang po'i yid 'bab 'doms sems kyang*/_/phan yon rjes su 
[\[336b.5\]]dran pas phyag mchod sogs/_/bskul ba de skad thon la ci byar yod/_54_/[(*]dga' ba'i 'gyur bsgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/[)]e ma dpal ldan mi yi bdag po'i smon lam yangs pa'i mthu nyid las/_/bde bar 'khrungs pa'i dge tshogs gang las brtsams pa'i gtam dgu gleng ba la/_/smra mkhas dge ba'i dbang po yin yang ngal ba mi 
[\[336b.6\]]'gyur med snyam can/_/re ba med pa'i mgrin nas glo bur yang dag byung 'di ci zhig yin/_55_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo 
[\[336b.7\]]mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_bskul ba mi ldog ched du ji ltar par du bsgrub pa'i sarga ste drug pa'o//_//

[\[337a.1\]]@#/_/nAmAupalak+ShaNas+yad+harmANAM/_yonAmamukhewanish+tsitagritrA/_nAmAlayad+harmatsAbatArAbaM/_nAmany+tsapadaubitsak+ShaNAnAd+hIH//
[\[337a.2\]]@#/_/[(*]rkang pa bzhi ka'i thog mar yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[) ]ming gis nye bar mtshan pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/ming gang thog ma nyid du nges byas nas/_/ming gzhi chos dang don la 'jug pa ni/_/ming tshig mkhas pa rnams kyi blo gros yin/_/
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\](*]rkang pa gnyis pa dang gsum par yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[)]rang bzhin gzhi la gnas pa'i drir bcas pa/_/dri med byed pa'i thabs kyi khyad par mang*/_/dri mas spangs pa mchog gi 'bras bu'i bar/_/rgyud du legs par song ba sngags kyi gzhung*/_/[(*]gzugs can las yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[)]lhag pa'i tshul khrims rkang pa'i bkod pa yis/_/sdug bsngal zhi ba thar pa'i grong 'jug las/_/
[\[337b.2\]]rnam par ltung ba rgyu dang bcas rig nas/_/bag yod spyod pas 'dul bar ston pa'i 'grel/_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[)]lhag sems gtso bor gyur pa'i bslab pa gsum/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas 'dong bar/_/rjes su mthun pa'i chos 
[\[337b.3\]]dang don mtshan nyid/_/smos pas yang dag gsungs pa mdo yi 'grel/_/[(*]rab rtog las snyam sgra can/[)]chos rab rnam par 'byed pa'i lag rtse ru/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gnas snyam du/_/bgyid pa shes bya kun gyi rang dang spyi'i/_/mtshan nyid mngon gyur rtogs pa ma mo'i gzhung*/_/[(*]yan lag gsum pa'i gzugs can/[)]dngos 
[\[337b.4\]]stobs rig pa'i lam gyi drang thig gis/_/log rtogs 'khyog po'i ri mo sun 'byin cing*/_/tshad mar gyur pa'i dgongs pa drang po'i lam/_/sgrub byed gtan tshigs rig pa'i gzhung 'grel bzang*/_/[(*]nges bstan las mchog gi nges par bstan pa/[)]mtha' klas gzugs kyi khyad par legs ston 
[\[337b.5\]]pas/_/mig ldan kun dga' skyed pa'i nyi ma 'dis/_/rjod pa dri ma med pas chos thams cad/_/snang byed brda sprod bstan bcos yin par ston/_/[(*]gnas gsum gyi gsal byed las rigs brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[)]chos don sgrub pa kun gyi yang dag mthar/_/bgrod pa'i lus rten ring du 'tsho ba'i dpyid/_/phan byed rdzas dang 
[\[337b.6\]]dpyad dang sngags gdab pa/_/bcud len kun gyi 'byung gnas gso ba'i gzhung*/_/[(*]mi mnyam pa'i gzugs can/[)]'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde legs dang*/_/bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i dbyar ring mo/_/rang dbang 'gugs pa'i pho nya dang po'i phrin/_/bzo gnas 
[\[337b.7\]]rig pa'i bstan bcos dpyid kyi glu/_/[(*]sgrub byed kyi rgyu las skyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu la gzugs rgyan gyis sba ba/[)]'khor ba mya ngan las 'das shes bya'i gnas/_/gang gi lam du legs par song tsam gyis/_/'phags dang so so skye bo'i brtan ldan blo/_/'phrog pa'i chom rkun snyan dngags glu yi gzhung*/_/
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\](*]rigs brjod pa bar gyi gsal byed/[)]de yang bcad lhug spel ma'i yid 'phrog lus/_/gnyis su 'di dag med na mtshang che ba/_/br-it+ta dzA ti'i sdeb sbyor phreng dngar bas/_/yi ge rnam par mi 'khrugs ston pa'i gzhung*/_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[)]ming don gcig tu mngon par zhen pa'i sgrog_/mtha' dag gcod par byed la rten brten pa/_/rgyu 
[\[338a.2\]]dang 'bras bu 'dra ba 'brel sogs la/_/ltos pa ming gi mngon brjod shin tu rno/_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[)]rtsi byed rig pa'i pra 'phrul ci dang ci/_/ston pa'i gtsug lag des ni dus gsum gyi/_/bde sdug ma nor ri mo'i 'phrin shod pa'i/_/mchu 'dab shin tu snyung ba 
[\[338a.3\]]rtsis kyi gzhung*/_/[(*]don gzhan bkod pa las kun khyab kyi don gzhan bkod pa/[)]mdor na shes bya'i gnas gyur gang dang gang*/_/blta 'dod de de'i gzhung 'grel zungs shig kye/_/mun par gnas pa'i gzugs dbyibs blta ba la/_/snang byed sgron ma 'degs pa mi rigs sam/_/spyi don bdun pa dgos don rtogs par sla phyir chos kyi bzhugs 
[\[338a.4\]]byang smos pa ni/_spyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag ji ltar bzhugs pa'i go rim ni blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyi 'jug ngogs su 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis ji ltar slob pa'i rim pa dang rjes su mthun par/_thog mar bzo rig pa 
[\[338a.5\]]dang*/_gso ba rig pa dang*/_brda sprod rig pa dang*/_gtan tshigs rig pa dang*/_nang rig pa'i sde snod kyi bstan bcos rnams [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]'god pa'am/_sgrub pa nyams len gyi rim pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dul ba dang*/_mdo sde dang*/_mngon pa'i sde snod kyi bstan bcos rnams [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]
[\[338a.6\]]'god pa'am/_dman pa dang mchog gi rim pa dang rjes su mthun par 'jig rten lugs kyi bstan bcos dang*/_phyi rig pa'i gnas dang nang rig pa'i gnas/_theg pa chung ngu dang theg pa chen po thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bstan bcos rnams [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]'god pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ji 
[\[338a.7\]]ltar byas kyang mi btub pa med mod/_'dir mchog dang dman pa'i go rim gyi dbang du bgyis te/_thog mar nang rig pa'i bstan bcos nas brtsams te 'god pa la/_de'ang theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa dang*/_theg pa chen po thun mong ba dang*/_theg pa chung ngu'i bstan bcos rnams dang*/_de 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]dag gi rjes su gtan tshigs rig pa dang*/_brda sprod rig pa dang*/_gso ba rig pa dang*/_bzo rig pa'i bstan bcos rnams rim par dgod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bod kyi mkhas pa snga rabs pa dag gis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gces shing dpe rgyun dkon pa ci rigs pa rnams kyang sngon gyi dkar chag rnams 
[\[338b.2\]]su bzhugs su bcug pa ltar dang*/_sngar ma chud pa'i bstan bcos rnying pa la logs su lus pa phyis byung ba dang*/_gsar 'gyur gyi rigs kyang 'di dag tu chud pa dang ma chud pa phyis kyi dkar chag la la nas byung ba rnams kyang slan chad rtun pa la lhur byed pa rnams kyi phyir thor dgod par bya zhing*/_de dag gi 
[\[338b.3\]]mthar bsngo ba smon lam dang*/_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mtha' brgyan pa dang bcas pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyi bzhugs byang smos pa la/_thog mar yul khyad par can rnams kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas phyag 'tshal ba ni legs pa thams cad 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo 
[\[338b.4\]]yin pa'i phyir dang*/_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa rmad du byung ba gang dag gi rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_yul mchog tu gyur pa rnams la mchod par brjod pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa'i tshogs rnams bkod pa ni/_'di lta ste/_ka pa la/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mtho btsun grub 
[\[338b.5\]]rjes mdzad pa/rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen mchog gi 'gyur/_slad kyis lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di 
[\[338b.6\]]ta dzA ran+dan dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa las bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'grel pa rgya dpe ma rnyed nas dus phyis dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya 
[\[338b.7\]]bas dpal sa skya'i dgon par sbyar ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba bram ze'i dge bsnyen mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+dan dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa slob dpon bde byed bdag 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen mchog gi 'gyur la/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa/_lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[339a.2\]]po paN+Di ta dzA ran+dana'i zhal snga nas dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba 'phags ma nor rgyun mas mdzad pa/_rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal ba'i bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong 
[\[339a.3\]]nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_de kho na nyid la 
[\[339a.4\]]bstod pa lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI b+ha dra dang*/_dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_bdud btul ba la bstod pa rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i tshogs kyi skor 
[\[339a.5\]]la/_chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa/_dpe med par bstod pa/_'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/_sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa/_don dam par bstod pa/_sku gsum la bstod pa rnams slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul 
[\[339a.6\]]khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa/_sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[339a.7\]]mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba d+harma pA las dpal gdan sa thel gyi yang dgon du bsgyur ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/_bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa/_bla na med pa'i bstod pa/_rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/_gnas chen po 
[\[339b.2\]]brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/_yang gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/_mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa/_phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa/_dmyal ba nas 'don pa'i bstod pa rnams slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[339b.3\]]pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur rnams so/_/slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i skor la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba 
[\[339b.4\]]dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[339b.5\]]la bkra shis kyi bstod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsigs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/_gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa/_bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa 
[\[339b.6\]]mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa'o/_/tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon 
[\[339b.7\]]rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shAn+ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po'i sde'i 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA 
[\[340a.2\]]ba shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_gaN+DI'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba btsun pa d+harma yon tan gyi 'gyur/_spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma ti tsi Ta dang slob dpon phyogs kyi 
[\[340a.3\]]glang po dag gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams bzang po'i 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog 'bangs 
[\[340a.4\]]kyis mdzad pa/_dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa mchog sred kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang po'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa bcu pa paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i lo chen 
[\[340a.5\]]bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde'i 'gyur/_yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog 'bangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen mchog gi 'gyur la/_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/_yon tan 
[\[340a.6\]]mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa dang*/_yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen mchog gi 'gyur la/_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus 
[\[340a.7\]]nas gtan la phab pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_bshags pa'i bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]bzang po'i 'gyur/_bshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang 
[\[340b.2\]]po'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs 'di rgyud dag las byung ba yin/_bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad pa gnyis mang du thos pa'i slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA 
[\[340b.3\]]ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bstod pa dang*/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[340b.4\]]brgyad la bstod pa slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa sangs rgyas la kha che'i rgyal po shrI ha ri sha de bas bstod pa dang*/_gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa kha che'i rgyal po shrI ha ri sha de bas yum gyi ched du 
[\[340b.5\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta rA dza shrI dz+nyA na mi tra dang*/_khe'u brgad yon tan dpal gyi 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba kha che paN+Di ta shAkya shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_slad char sa skya lo tsA bas cung zad bcos 
[\[340b.6\]]shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/_sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_bal po ma hA bA na'i rang 'gyur/_mkhas pa chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ga ta shrIs sbyar ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_
[\[340b.7\]]lo tsA ba dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta snyan dngags mkhan chen po lak+Sh+mi ka ras sbyar ba/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_rje 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la bstod pa snyan dngags mkhan chen po slob dpon gnyis skyes srung bas mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras bsgyur ba/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba 
[\[341a.2\]]rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa de nyid kyi spyan sngar/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang phyug lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rgya mtsho'i sde zhes pas yang dag par bsgyur cing zhus pa/_tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa slob dpon 
[\[341a.3\]]dpal nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas nor bu rgyas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por bod skad du bsgyur ba/_dpal ri khrod zhabs kyi bstod pa rin po che mkhas pa chen po dpal nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_rje 
[\[341a.4\]]btsun dam pa de nyid kyi spyan sngar chos smra ba gzhon nu dpal gyis nye bar bsgyur ba/_dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa yul ma ga d+ha nas byung ba'i dge bsnyen dam pa nyi ma pas mdzad pa/_rtses thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_skyes pa rabs 
[\[341a.5\]]kyi bstod pa slob dpon ye shes grags pas mdzad pa/_saM skr-i ta la bod skad kyi mchan bu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra'i 'gyur/_bla ma dam pa la bstod pa ha ri puny+dza'i dge slong chos kyi nyi mas bkod pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/[ (*]ma byung*/[)]grwa lnga'i bstod pa sbyar byang med pa zhwa lu 
[\[341a.6\]]lo tsA ba'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/rgyud sde'i lha so so'i bstod pa rnams ni rang rang gi skabs su bri bar bya'o/_/yon tan mtha' yas rgya mtsho mnga' ba yi/_/mchod gnas bla med rnams kyi bstod pa'i tshogs/_/sdeb sbyor snyan dngags rgyan gyis rab mdzes 
[\[341a.7\]]pa/_/'grel pa dang bcas bdun cu rtsa bzhi bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni thun mong du mchod par brjod pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa'i tshogs bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to/_/bstod pa'i bstan bcos kyi skabs te dang po'o//_//da ni rig pa'i 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]gnas lnga las nang rig pa'i bstan bcos la/_'bras bu sngags dang*/_rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i skor gnyis las/_dang po 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa'i skor ni/_ka pa la/_rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur pa dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud kyi skor la/_kye rdo rje 
[\[341b.2\]]bsdus pa'i don gyi rgya cher 'grel pa byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'i le'u lnga pa yan chad paN+Di ta dA na shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba 'bro seng dkar shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su b+hU ti shrI shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba cog gru ting nge 'dzin bzang 
[\[341b.3\]]pos zhus te gtan la phab pa/_de la slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal po'i sras dpal 'jigs med lha'i zhal sngar lo tsA ba snyel cor dge slong shes rab grags kyis yul dbus kyi dpes gtan la phab pa las/_slar yang shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par 
[\[341b.4\]]bshad pa'i slob ma dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pas de kho na nyid kyi le'u yan legs par bcos pa dang*/_rdo rje snying po'i 'grel pa kye'i rdo rje'i bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa le'u drug pa man byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa 'di sngon de kho na nyid kyi le'u yan 
[\[341b.5\]]las ma 'gyur bas/_slad kyis bal yul gyi grong khyer rol pa zhes bya ba nas 'bro dge slong lo tsA bas paN+Di ta mai tri zhabs las rnyed nas bod yul du dpe spyan drangs te bsgyur ba/_kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel pad+ma can zhes bya ba slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[341b.6\]]gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po k+Shi ti gar+b+ha'i zhal snga nas zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur ba la/_dben gnas rtsed kyi stag lung du slad kyis skad gsar chad kyis TI ka dang gtugs nas gtan la phab pa/_dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam bshad rnam par 'grel 
[\[341b.7\]]pa slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya kIrti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//kha pa la/_dges pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba brtul 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\](*]'di nag po pa chung ba kr-iSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa yin/[)]zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po D+haM ka dA shas 
[\[342a.2\]]mdzad pa/_phyi nang gi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i mthar son pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong blo brtan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//
[\[342a.3\]]ga pa la/_kye rdo rje'i 'grel pa kau mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyangs dka' zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyis mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel 
[\[342a.4\]]zhes bya ba dpal kha che'i paN+Di ta dge slong snyan grags bzang pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bzang po'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dpyal chos kyi bzang pos bkra shis gser sdings kyi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab par mdzad 
[\[342a.5\]]do/_/de la slar yang dpang lo tsA ba chen po dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas legs par bcos shing gtan la phab pa/_rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dgyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba sgyu ma brtag pa gnyis pa'i dka' 'grel dran pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba slob dpon nag [(*]'di nag po pa chung bas mdzad/[)]po pas mdzad 
[\[342a.6\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan zla ba dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/[ (*]dpe thams cad la dbu nas ma tshang ba byung ba/[) ]kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel pa slob dpon pad+ma'i myu gu rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba mtshur ston dbyig 
[\[342a.7\]]gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po shrI rat+na ka ra shAn+ti pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]bzhugs so//_//nga pa la/_'grel pa rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon kA yas+tha bgres pos mdzad pa/_glan dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal dges pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel spyan 'byed ces 
[\[342b.2\]]bya ba d+harma kIrtis mdzad zer ba las/_'gyur mkhan mi gsal ba rnams bzhugs so/_/'di rgya gar ma min par 'dug ste sngar gyi rnams kyis kyang bris zin 'dug pas 'dir bzhugs su bcug pa yin no//_//ca pa la/_dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel 
[\[342b.3\]]rdo rje'i tshig btu ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po kA ma d+he nu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta bi na ya de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi shesarab kyi 'gyur/_dpal dgyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i brgyud kyi don bsdus gsham cung zad ma tshang ba cig_/'dir dges rdor gyi 'grel 
[\[342b.4\]]pa nag po pa'i gsung gi 'od zer las skyes pa zhes bya ba ni rdzun mar snang bas ma bris so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dka' 'grel zhal nas brgyud pa zhes bya ba rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po nyi ma sbas pa dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya brtson 
[\[342b.5\]]'grus kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa dang po'i rgyal po'i bshad sbyar slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_
[\[342b.6\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje drwa ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon lha'i rigs kyi blo gros chen po zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dges rdor bde mchog la sogs 
[\[342b.7\]]rgyud sde mang po'i thun mong gi bshad rgyud dpal sam+pu Ta'i 'grel pa las dpal kha sbyor thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag par lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI badzra bo 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]d+hi dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//cha pa la/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa man ngag gi snye ma zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas 
[\[343a.2\]]sbas pas mdzad pa sh+lau ka stong phrag brgyad pa/_yul dbus kyi mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang mang du thos pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags kyis nA len+d+rar bsgyur zhing*/_slad nas kha che paN chen shAkya shrI dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos yul 
[\[343a.3\]]dbus kyi dpe dang bstun nas bcos pa la/_slar yang dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rgya gar gyi dpe gnyis la gtugs te 'di'i snga 'gyur ma dag par gzigs pa la brten nas legs par bsgyur cing dag par bcos pa bzhugs so//_//
[\[343a.4\]]ja pa la/_rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang chen dpal kun du kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher bshad pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dpal zab mo'i don gsal ba rmad du byung ba phyag rgya chen po thig le'i 
[\[343a.5\]]rgyud kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba o D+yAn gyi slob dpon phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa slob dpon zab pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shes rab gsang ba dang*/_lo tsA ba g.yung drung snying po'i 'gyur/_dga' ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po rnal 'byor 
[\[343a.6\]]gyi dbang phyug shes rab dpal gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel khog don bsdus pa slob dpon chen po rdo rje gsang 
[\[343a.7\]]bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA yo gI shrI pradz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur/_dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba slob dpon A tsAr+Ya dz+nyA na pa ra ma yis mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas kyi 'gyur/_dpal rnyog pa med 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa slob dpon chen po dge slong gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa/_dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi slob dpon ma hA su kha ta badzras mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas kyis 
[\[343b.2\]]bsgyur ba/_'grel chung phran brgyad la/[(]bshad pa rnam grangs bdun gyi le'u yang zer/[) ]dgongs pa'i skad kyi 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu g+ho Sha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis yer pa'i dben gnas su bsgyur/_glu'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 
[\[343b.3\]]rdo rje glu'i 'grel pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na badzra dang*/_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje'i glu bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon sgrol ma can gyi sdes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[343b.4\]]po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/_zhar byung dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bshad pa/_kye'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnam par phye ba dang*/_kye rdo rje'i bshad pa'i brgyud kha sbyor dang*/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rtsa ba'i 
[\[343b.5\]]skabs bshad pa rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dur khrod brgyad ces bya ba/_yang dur khrod brgyad ces bya ba gnyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na shrI mi tra dang*/_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_brda nges par gzung ba bla chen 
[\[343b.6\]]mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba dang bcas brgyad do/_/gnas la sogs pa gtan la dbab pa yongs su grags pa'i paN+Di ta gnas brtan shAkya rak+ShI tas mdzad pa/_dpal bde chen yangs pa can gyi gtsug lag khang du zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA las bsgyur ba/_
[\[343b.7\]]yang slob dpon rnal 'byor pas mdzad pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyi bshad pa zhes bya ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dpal rin po che'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shrI gu pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad 
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]pa/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//de ltar rgyud so so'i dgongs 'grel rnams bkod nas/_spyi'i dgongs 'grel sgrub thabs dkyil chog lam rim la sogs pa'i skor la/_nya pa la/_dges pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs 
[\[344a.2\]]dang*/_kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga slob dpon pad+ma badzras mdzad pa/_dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba/_dpal kye rdo rje'i mar me'i rtse mo lta bu'i gdams pa zhes bya ba mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[344a.3\]]'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dgyes pa rdo rje'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga_/kye rdo rje'i bstod pa/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga rnams slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dam tshig lnga pa slob dpon dpal pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rig pa'i 'byung gnas kra ma shI la'i gtsug 
[\[344a.4\]]lag khang du khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri d+harma kIrti'i 'gyur/_dpal kye'i rdo rje'i b+haD+DA ra ga'i bstod pa nyi shu pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_dpal dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje dril bus mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[344a.5\]]po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dpal kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba lha btsan po mu ni rA dza'i 'gyur/_dpal kye rdo rje las sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon bo d+hi 
[\[344a.6\]]gar+b+has mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la shrI dang*/_dge slong shes rab skyabs kyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid bcu pa slob dpon Dom+bi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhabs dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor pha 
[\[344a.7\]]dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la thun mong ma yin pa'i don la gdams pa zhes bya ba slob dpon Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA nas bsdus pa/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA nA ka ra 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyi 'gyur/_dpal kye'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs Dom+bi pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po ba na rat+na dang*/_rtses thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis kha che dngul gyi bum pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur ba/_kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi dka' 'grel 
[\[344b.2\]]kha che dngul gyi bum pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen dang*/_rtses thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_slong mo ba'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba Dom+bi pas mdzad pa/_bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra pa chen po dze ta kar+NaN dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan 
[\[344b.3\]]dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon badzra a la las mdzad pa/_kye'i rdo rje dran pa gcig pa slob dpon gar+b+ha ri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_lo tsA ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs kyi 
[\[344b.4\](*]slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa/[)]mdor bshad pa dag pa rdo rje'i sgron ma zhes bya ba grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon dpal dza lan+d+ha ri pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI las mnyan te lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal sgra 
[\[344b.5\]]gcan gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta shrI ba na rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis pho brang sne gdong du bsgyur/_kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad 
[\[344b.6\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bzang po yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po thub dka' zla bas mdzad pa dang*/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[344b.7\]]ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid bzhi pa'i man ngag gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dpal o D+yAn gyi yul gyi dngos grub grub pa'i slob dpon til+li pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na shrI nyid kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur/_kye rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]slob dpon a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa 'gyur byang med pa 'di dang*/_'og gi nags rin gyis bsgyur ba 'di gnyis 'gyur 'chad mi 'dra ba ma gtogs tha dad med kyang snga ma rnams kyis kyang gnyis ka bris 
[\[345a.2\]]'dug pas so/_/kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rnam par dag pa'i gter zhes bya ba a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen dang*/_rtses thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis legs par bsgyur ba/_'di'i gzhung tshad ni rgya dpe la tshigs su bcad pa bdun cu 
[\[345a.3\]]lhag pa'i sum brgya zhes so/_/'khrul pa spang ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/[ (*]'di ma byung*/[)]lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_dpal rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_lo tsA ba ting 'dzin bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[345a.4\]]lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_dpal ku mA ra ka la shu'i 'gyur/_lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa'i 'grel pa snying po rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba o D+yAn gyi slob dpon chen po bram ze tha ga nas mdzad pa/_
[\[345a.5\]]paN+Di ta chen po man+t+ra ka la shu'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid bzhi'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon kam+pa las mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs slob dpon yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad 
[\[345a.6\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs slob dpon bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba d+harma tsan+d+ra'i rang 'gyur/_rin chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 
[\[345a.7\]]pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dpal dgyes pa rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dgyes pa'i 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]rdo rje'i sgrub thabs de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon paN+Di ta nag po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzhung 'grel gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_ro bsreg gi cho ga_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sbyin 
[\[345b.2\]]sreg gi cho ga rnams slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_rab gnas kyi cho ga'i tshul zhes bya ba dang*/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na 
[\[345b.3\]]paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_mchod rten gyi cho ga dang*/_gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan las mnyan te lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs 
[\[345b.4\]]par bsgyur ba/_dpal he ru ka 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mkhas pa chen po slob dpon nyin mo'i 'byung gnas zla ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal he ru ka'i man ngag rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po stong pa nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje zhes bya bas 
[\[345b.5\]]mdzad pa/_bal po'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyi zhabs dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shes rab ye shes dang*/_dpyal se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rnams legs par bzhugs so//_//ta pa la/_kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim 
[\[345b.6\]]pa'i cho ga slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal rnal 'byor pa yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kun du bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul 
[\[345b.7\]]khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po sa ha dza bi lA pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba len+d+ra ru tse dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa'i ming slob dpon snang ba mtha' yas rdo rjes mdzad pa sh+lau ka brgyas rim pa bdun du byas nas chos thams cad go bar byas pa go byed snying po'o/_/dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 
[\[346a.2\]]dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dA na shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_dbang bskur ba'i cho ga slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA shrIs mdzad pa/_he ru ka nye bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po stong nyid rdo rjes mdzad pa/_
[\[346a.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong pUr+Na kIrti dang /_lo tsA ba sna nam rdo rje bla ma'i 'gyur/_kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po tA ra shrIs mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos dbang gi 'gyur/_rdo rje 'chang gi dkar chag tu phyag rgya bzhi'i 
[\[346a.4\]]sgrub thabs zer ba cig 'dug pa 'dir ma byung*/_dgyes pa rdo rje'i dbang gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dgra las rgyal bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_dpal khro bo bcu'i rig pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta dze tA ris 
[\[346a.5\]]mdzad pa/_sgra pa chen po dze tA kar+Na dang*/_dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos legs par bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/_gsang ba'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub can bi na pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_dbang chen po'i rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba dang*/_
[\[346a.6\]]dgyes pa rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti shrI b+ha dra dang*/_dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_dpal kye'i rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le zhes bya ba rnam par grags pa'i mkhas pa gnas brtan shAkya srung ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_skad gnyis smra ba'i 
[\[346a.7\]]gtsug gi nor bu dpal byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin las/_lo tsA ba skyob pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_chos spyod mdor bsdus pa'i bya ba dang*/_sAts+tsha'i cho ga 'di gnyis rgya gar ma yin min the tshom za'o/_/bung ba 'dod pa'i sgrub thabs grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon rat+na tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]ta de nyid dang*/_khu dngos grub kyi 'gyur/_gtor ma'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa slob dpon d+harma pA kas mdzad pa/_ro bsreg gi cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/_mdzad pa po'i mtshan ma smos pa la/_dpa' bo gcig pa dpal he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs 
[\[346b.2\]]zhes bya ba/_spyan dbye ba'i cho ga_/tsha tsha bya ba'i rim pa/_gtor ma'i cho ga_/yang gtor ma'i cho ga_/dpal kye'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_kye rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/phyag mtshan gyi phan yon rnams la mdzad po 'gyur byang mi snang zhing the tshom gyi gzhi'o/_/thig le chen po'i 
[\[346b.3\]]rim pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba/_dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rje nA ro pa'i zhal gyi lung dang sbyar ba/_yang ro bsreg gi cho ga nA ro pas mdzad zer 
[\[346b.4\]]ba rdo rje 'chang gi dkar chag tu snang yang 'dir ma byung*/_de kho na nyid kyi snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA thas bsgyur zer ba 'di rdzun mar 'dug ste paN+Di tar bshad 'dug pas bzhugs su bcug pa yin/_rdo rje 'chang gis kyang the tshom du bzhed 'dug_/dgyes pa 
[\[346b.5\]]rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba/_bod kyi lo tsA ba se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'di se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis brtsams pa yin 'dra ste sngar gyi rnams kyis kyang bris 'dug pas bris so/_/gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_kye'i 
[\[346b.6\]]rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa/_mkha' 'gro ma de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_kye'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta A tsAr+ya kr-iSh+Na pas mdzad pa/_dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i rim pa slob dpon chen po a la la badzras mdzad pa/_
[\[346b.7\]]paN+Di ta kA yas+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]mtshan dpal bzang pos thar pa gling du bsgyur/_kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs he ru ka mnyes par byed pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_rong zom d+harma b+ha dras bsgyur/_dpal 
[\[347a.2\]]kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag slob dpon chen po shrI A nan+da badzras mdzad pa/_sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal dges pa rdo rje la bstod pa rig pa'i gnas ma lus pa la mkhas pa grub pa'i slob dpon kha che rin chen rdo rjes 
[\[347a.3\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong byang chub shes rab kyi 'gyur rnams so/_/de ltar yab skor rnams bkod nas/_yum gyi skor la/_bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'od kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa dang*/_bdag 
[\[347a.4\]]med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga la bstod pa slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rab tu gsal ba dpal 
[\[347a.5\]]paN+Di ta gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni las mnyan te/_slad kyis dge slong mtshur dz+nyA na A ka ra'i 'gyur/_bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba dpal dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_bdag med ma dpa' bo gcig ma'i sgrub thabs 
[\[347a.6\]]bskyed pa dang rdzogs par ldan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon bsod snyoms pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_bdag med ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon kr-iSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa/_bdag med ma'i man ngag ces bya ba 'jam pa'i 
[\[347a.7\]]dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal bzang po'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la reg pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bka' drin las skyes pa paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wa A ka ra tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs nA ro pa'i lung dang sbyar ba 'di the tshom gyi gzhi'o/_/dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rim pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po dpal don yod rdo rje dang*/_
[\[347b.2\]]lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags kyi 'gyur/_dgyes pa rdo rje las byung ba ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po lhan skyes sgeg pas mdzad pa dang*/_kye rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dA na shI la nyid kyi 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru 
[\[347b.3\]]kul+le'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs paN+Di ta bim pa dang*/_lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyi 'gyur/_myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs o+o D+yAn gyi yul nas byung ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i byang chub chen por rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan 
[\[347b.4\]]many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos bzang gi 'gyur/_myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs lha bcu gsum pa'i bdag nyid/_ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po kr-iSh+Na badzras mdzad pa/_ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur rnams so/_/gur gyi skor la/_mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi mkha' 
[\[347b.5\]]'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po lI la badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen 
[\[347b.6\]]po lha'i brtul zhugs zhes bya bas mdzad pa dang*/_de kho na nyid bcu pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dri med grags pas mdzad pa/_mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_paN+Di ta chen po shAkya 
[\[347b.7\]]shrI b+ha dra la zhus shing mnyan nas yul dbus kyi sgra bsgyur ba chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs grub thob chen po sna tshogs dmar po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]yang rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dge ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje gur nas gsungs pa'i ro sreg gi cho ga slob dpon blo gros chen pos mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[348a.2\]]gar gyi mkhan po a wa d+hU tI pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri lo tsA'i 'gyur/_ro sreg bya ba dge slong ta thA ga ta rik+Sha tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_gdung sreg pa'i cho ga a sho kas man ngag tu brtsams pa/_rgya 
[\[348a.3\]]gar gyi mkhan po chen po a shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi snying po'i 'gyur/_phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i skor la/_rin po che char yang zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po shes rab gsang bas mdzad cing*/_rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba/_dpal rin chen thig pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[348a.4\]]sgrub pa'i thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal shes rab gsang bas mdzad cing*/_de nyid kyis bsgyur ba/_dbang rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal shes rab gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ka ma dge bsnyen chos kyi ye shes dang*/_
[\[348a.5\]]phyug mtshams dbang phyug rgya mtsho'i 'gyur/_phyag chen thig le'i rgyud la brten nas dpal chen po ye shes mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po longs spyod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi 
[\[348a.6\]]'gyur/_sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa'i me'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba paN+Di ta rin chen rdo rje dpal gyis mdzad pa/_dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi man ngag dpal o+o D+yAn rdo rje chen po'i gnas las byung ba dpal rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU ti'i 
[\[348a.7\]]zhal snga nas mdzad pa dang*/_dpal de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi'i man ngag dpal in+d+ra b+hU ti rang las byung ba slob dpon chen po rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mchog gi dngos grub brnyes nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dbang rin chen 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]phreng ba'i man ngag_/dbang gi rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_rim pa lnga pa zhes bya ba/_yan lag brgyad pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba rnams rgya gar gyi slob dpon dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad cing bsgyur ba/_rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba snying po de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs yang dag pa'i 
[\[348b.2\]]sa la gnas pa slob dpon nA ro pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta badzra gu Na b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal ye shes rin po ches mdzad pa/_byang sems thig pa'i man ngag ces bya ba rnal 
[\[348b.3\]]'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po las kyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba slob dpon yul so ma pu rir byung ba'i dge slong dpal ldan byang chub bzang po'i slob ma dpal ma hA ma tis zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi slob dpon paN+Di ta A tsAr+ya du lo pa dang*/_bod kyi 
[\[348b.4\]]lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/dges pa rdo rje'i rgyud 'grel sum cu brgyad/_/yab skor gya dgu yum skor bco brgyad de/_/gur la bcu dang thig le gnyis bco lnga/_/dril bas brgya dang bdun cu tham pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni 
[\[348b.5\]]thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud dges pa rdo rje'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar dges pa rdo rje'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i skor la/_tha pa la/_mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i 
[\[348b.6\]]bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba las/_mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang dus 'khor gyi tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la dpyad cing*/_lo tsA ba chen po dge 
[\[348b.7\]]slong shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/_/'di ni rtsa 'grel phyogs gcig tu bsdebs na bsod nams che zhing*/_deng sang bshad nyan dar ba'i phyir phan che ba la bsams 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]nas 'dir bris pa yin gyi/_rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bstan bcos kyi khongs su gtogs nas bris pa ni ma yin no/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/_
[\[349a.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i phyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi le'u dang*/_nang sems can gyi le'u gnyis 'gyur rgyud dang 'dra bar bzhugs so//_//da pa la/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa spyan ras gzigs kyis mdzad pa'i dbang gi le'u dang*/_sgrub 
[\[349a.3\]]thabs kyi le'u dang*/_ye shes kyi le'u rnams 'gyur snga ma dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa las/_slar yang paN+Di ta s+thir ma ti'i slob ma'i mchog lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dang*/_blo gros dpal bzang pos rgyud dang 'grel pa'i rgya dpe mang por gtugs shing*/_dag pa rnams dang mthun par bsgyur cing 
[\[349a.4\]]gtan la phab pa bzhugs so//_//na pa la/_dpal don dam bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sku pad+ma dkar pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta zla ba mgon pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa/_dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar 
[\[349a.5\]]mi g.yo ba'i snying po snang ba zhes bya ba/_shong lo tsA ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi slob mar gyur pa/_dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas bsgyur ba/_pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel dpal dus zhabs pa chen pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA thas bsgyur ba/_dbang 
[\[349a.6\]]mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam bsdus pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i slob dpon dpal nA ro pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta d+harma d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal po'i mthil du bsgyur ba la/_slar yang lo tsA ba chen po rin chen rgyal 
[\[349a.7\]]mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen por legs par bcos shing gtan la phab pa/_dbang mdor bstan pa'i mdor bshad sA d+hu pu tra dpal 'dzin dga' bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan byang chub sems dpa' nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]gzhon nu dpal gyis chos 'khor dpal bsam yas kyi mchims phu'i dben gnas su bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//pa pa la/_dbang mdor bstan pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa rnal 'byor pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i zhabs pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta zla ba mgon po dang*/_lo tsA ba 'bro 
[\[349b.2\]]shes rab grags kyi 'gyur/_dbang mdor bstan pa'i dka' 'grel sh+lau ka sum brgya drug cu pa/_skad gnyis smra ba thar pa lo tsA ba'i sras kyi thu bor gyur pa lo tsA ba chen po bu ston rin po ches rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs te bsgyur ba/_rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i
