[\[349b.3\]]'grel pa rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs yan lag bzhi pa zhes bya ba dus zhabs pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bi shwa shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer 
[\[349b.4\]]gyi 'gyur/_dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs pa chen pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_dpal dus kyi 'khor 
[\[349b.5\]]lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po sA d+hu pu tras d+harma A ka ra shAn+ti'i don du mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po wA gI shwa ra gup+ta dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba dus zhabs pa chen po snang 
[\[349b.6\]]ba dang ldan pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta ba ni shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dus zhabs pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor 
[\[349b.7\]]lo skad cig gis bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang*/_lo tsA ba rwa chos rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor rab gsal zhes bya ba dbu ma chen po'i paN+Di ta mai tri pa'i zhal snga nas 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba dpal ldan chos skyong bzang pos zil gnon gyi lo'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bcu drug la yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_'di la gzhung gi tshad ni cung zad kyis nye bar lhag pa'i sh+lau ka bzhi brgya yod ces byung 
[\[350a.2\]]ngo*/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor la/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba/_dpal ldan gsang ba pa'i bdag po sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal 
[\[350a.3\]]rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_lo tsA ba cog ro dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di phyag rdor stod 'grel las gud du phye bar snang ste/_sngar gyi rnams kyis kyang bris 'dug pas so/_/dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i 
[\[350a.4\]]yul du 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa chen po bram ze bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI b+ha dra bo d+hi'i zhabs dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs chen pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[350a.5\]]gyi mkhan po chen po bud+d+ha ka ra b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba/_grub pa thob pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shrI a nu pa ma rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_
[\[350a.6\]]gnyal gyi lo tsA ba mi mnyam pa bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa paN+Di ta chen po nyi ma dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas kyis ru lag gi snying po 
[\[350a.7\]]'bring mtshams kyi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i gdams ngag nyi ma zla ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/_rigs gsum mgon pos paN+Di ta b+hi ku ni la legs par gsungs pa/_mkhas pa chen po shrI bi b+hU 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas kyis dpal ding ri glang 'khor du sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_ye shes spyan sgrub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dus zhabs pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas kyis sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_rnal 
[\[350b.2\]]'byor gsum gyi snying po gsal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal rgyal po grags zhes bya bar skye ba bzhes pas mdzad pa dang*/_sbyor ba yan lag drug gi man ngag dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i snyan rgyud ces bya ba/_paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang*/_lo tsA ba 'bro shes 
[\[350b.3\]]rab grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag sbyor ba yan lag drug gi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel sbas pa mig 'byed ces bya ba slob dpon a wa d+hU tI pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong zla ba grags pa'i 'gyur/_sbyor ba yan lag drug gi sbyor ba'i man ngag tsi lu pas 
[\[350b.4\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta sa man+ta shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba rwa chos rab kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug gis paN+Di ta ma hA bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra la gsungs pa/_des sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_sbyor ba'i phreng ba paN+Di ta rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA 
[\[350b.5\]]ba dge tshul shes rab dpal gyi 'gyur/_nang gi snye ma zhes bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras phyogs gcig tu mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_snying po rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba ri khrod zhabs kyis paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen la gnang ba/_de nyid dang lo chen bsod 
[\[350b.6\]]nams rgya mtsho'i sde'i 'gyur/_rdo rje theg pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sdom tshig paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta jo bo ri pa dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba khe'u brgad 'khor lo grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal 
[\[350b.7\]]dus kyi 'khor lo'i bstod pa rgyun chags pa zhes bya ba ka ling+ga'i rgyal po'i bla ma sde snod gsum bshad pa'i mkhas pa chen po legs pa'i grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bi nA ya shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba ldan ma tshul khrims seng ges chu mig ring mor 'gyur/_brgyad brgyad drug cu rtsa 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]bzhi'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gtor ma'i cho ga_/paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsin+d+ra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rtsis kyi bstan bcos slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung 
[\[351a.2\]]gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba shrI d+harma kIrtis bsgyur ba la/_/slad kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i paN+Di ta chen po mkhas btsun grub pa brnyes pa rA hu la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal sngar chag lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis dag par bcos pa/_dpal 
[\[351a.3\]]dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba/_nyi zla 'dzin pa'i rtsis/_gza' lnga so so'i rkyang rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba rnams paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba dpal ldan mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs par rgyud sna tshogs 
[\[351a.4\]]pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor mkhas pa dpe med bsrung bas mdzad pa/_la stod ding ri glang 'khor mkhan pa khrod du rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_gnyal gyi lo tsA ba mi mnyam bzang pos bsgyur ba/_slar yang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas legs 
[\[351a.5\]]par bsgyur te zhu chen grub pa/_rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi brjed byang yon tan gyis 'gengs pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po gnas brtan nyi ma dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lau ka phyed dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag drug pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI b+hU ti tsan+d+ras ru lag gi snying po 'bring 
[\[351a.6\]]mtshams kyi sa'i cha dpal rgya rtags kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_slar yang dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pas legs par bsgyur cing zhus chen mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//pha pa la/_dbang mdor bstan gyi 'grel pa dpal dus kyi 'khor lo pa paN+Di ta 
[\[351a.7\]]rnam par rgyal ba dbang pos mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dpang dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i 'gyur/_gzhung tshad ni tshigs bcad bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag bzhi'o/_/rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]kha che'i paN chen shAkya shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi drung du lo tsA ba dpyal chos bzang gi 'gyur/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon 
[\[351b.2\]]dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang*/_lo tsA ba rwa chos rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdor bshad bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan nyi ma'i dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[351b.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po nor bu dpal ye shes dang*/_bla ma rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen po dpal nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal sngar/_lo tsA ba chag dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi thigs pa sgron 
[\[351b.4\]]ma gsal ba zhib mo rnam par 'thags pa zhes bya ba grub pa mchog gi yon tan brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a nu pa ma rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_byang ri bkra shis kyi gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta su ga ta shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba d+harma kIrti dang*/_dge slong rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam 
[\[351b.5\]]dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnam par bshad pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa mi'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a b+ha ya badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba sbal rdo rje rgyal po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa dri ma 
[\[351b.6\]]med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal po pad+ma dkar pos mdzad pa/_yul ma ga d+hA'i dpal nA len+d+rar rje btsun sgrol ma'i lha khang du paN+Di ta dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal bsod snyoms pa chen po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i phan yon gyi 'grel pa sngags kyi 
[\[351b.7\]]don snying po bsdus pa dpal mkhas pa chen po dus zhabs pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya a b+ha ya badzra dang*/_dge bsnyen rdo rje rgyal pos bsgyur zer ba 'di gsum bod ma yin par snang ste snga ma rnams kyis bris snang bas 'dir bzhugs su bcug pa yin no/_/'phags pa 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyis mdzad pa/[(*]ma byung*/[) ]mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong 
[\[352a.2\]]byang chub rtse mo'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/shes dang shes bya dbyer med dus 'khor lo/_/phyi nang gzhan gsum bden gnyis dbyer med par/_/ston pa'i bstan bcos rjes 'brang dang bcas pa/_/mchog tu gyur pa lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni thabs shes 
[\[352a.3\]]gnyis su med pa'i rgyud dus kyi 'khor lo'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi skor gyi bstan bcos rnams bkod nas/_rgyud sde sgo drug pa rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i rgyud bde mchog gi rgyud kyi skor gyi bstan bcos la//_//ba pa la/_
[\[352a.4\]]dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po lA ba pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sUr+ya gup+ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las byung ba nyung ngu'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don 
[\[352a.5\]]rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba le'u dang po'i 'grel bshad byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_cog gru lo tsA ba dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang pos bsgyur ba las/_dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po bla ma dam pa'i bka' drin gyis 
[\[352a.6\]]bskyangs pa/_shong lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas brag dmar dben par legs par bsgyur ba/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po b+ha ba b+ha dra se mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs lha mo'i mkhar nas byung ba'i paN+Di ta mi mnyam rdo rje dang*/_dbyar 
[\[352a.7\]]mo thang nas byung ba'i khams pa dge slong ba ri lo tsA ba rin chen grags kyis bal yul grong khyer yam bur pan ru ba ro'i lha khang du neng dang pa ris yon bdag byas nas lo paN de gnyis kyis legs par bsgyur ba/_'di'i gzhung tshad ni stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag lnga'o/_/rin po che'i tshogs 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po rgyal dka' mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po tA ra ka la shu dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gu Na shrI'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ma pa la/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel dpa' bo'i yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba slob 
[\[352b.2\]]dpon chen po skal ldan grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon lang+ga rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad bdun brgya yod pa/_
[\[352b.3\]]dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs gnas pa thams cad rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba lho phyogs kyi rgyud du 'khrungs pa dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon lha sbas kyis mdzad pa/_yon tan ma lus pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di 
[\[352b.4\]]ta chos skyong dang*/_khams pa ba ri lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grags kyi 'gyur/_gnyis ka'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma blo gros kyis lho phyogs a ti bi sha'i yul b+hats+tsha ma'i 
[\[352b.5\]]grong khyer du ka ya ta'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i rje btsun ta zhes grags pas gang+gA'i chu 'gram gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur/_dpal sdom pa'i 'grel pa de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba dga' byed bdag po'i slob ma rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_'di kun ldan gyi lo cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla 
[\[352b.6\]]ba'i yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyi 'gyur/_sdom pa'i rgyud nyung ngu'i mtshams sbyor dpal nA ro ta pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog 
[\[352b.7\]]gi rgya cher bshad pa tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//tsa pa la/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]po bde mchog bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa nges par brjod pa'i bla ma rtsa ba rtsa ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shU rang+ga badzras mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis dz+nyA na shrI mi tra'i gsung 
[\[353a.2\]]ji lta ba bzhin bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//tsha pa la/_rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po b+ha wa b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos 
[\[353a.3\]]lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa bla ma Dom+bi he ru ka zhes bya ba brtul zhugs brnyes pas mdzad pa/_gu ru rat+na badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba bla ma shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud kyi de kho na nyid rab tu brtan par byed pa zhes 
[\[353a.4\]]bya ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_dpal gsang chen pad+ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa rgya gar kha che'i mkhan po longs spyod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di 
[\[353a.5\]]ta de nyid kyi rang 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/phyi ma 'di bde mchog dang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud 'grel du 'dod pa ci rigs su snang zhing so sor dbye dka' bar snang na'ang sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bshad pa dang*/_mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje phag mo'o zhes sogs 
[\[353a.6\]]bde mchog dang mthun pa shas che bar snang bas 'dir bkod do//_//dza pa la/_dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon pad+ma rdo rjes mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad mnyam pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi sh+lau ka stong phrag brgyad pa/_
[\[353a.7\]]bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer gyi dbus yu rud lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba'i gtsug gi nor bu skye 'gro rnams chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa rgyal ba'i sde dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi yon tan gyi 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//wa pa la/_sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel pad+ma can zhes bya ba grub pa brnyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po dge slong rat+na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_de nyid kyi dngos slob paN+Di ta thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpal gyis rang 'gyur du 
[\[353b.2\]]mdzad pa la/_dus phyis bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong blo brtan gyis phu ri'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur zhing bcos pa/_dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa/_lho phyogs 
[\[353b.3\]]o Di bi Sha'i yul b+hats+tsha ma'i grong khyer du rje btsun mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rgya gar gyi mkhan po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma blo gros kyis legs par bsgyur ba/_rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i bshad sbyar slob dpon ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[353b.4\]]gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i 'grel pa tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_nam mkha' 
[\[353b.5\]]dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa paN+Di ta rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shU n+ya tA sa mA d+hi dang*/_lo tsA ba shes rab ye shes kyi 'gyur/_de ltar rgyud so so'i 'grel pa rnams bkod nas/_sgrub thabs dkyil chog man ngag la sogs pa'i skor ni/_
[\[353b.6\]]dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa/_de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po so ma nA thas gnyal mi shes rab mchog gi don du bsgyur ba/_dpal bcom ldan 'das mngon par rtogs 
[\[353b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba yul b+hang+ga la'i slob dpon bsod snyoms pa dngos grub brnyes pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lU hi pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta shrad+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis rdo rje slob dpon chen po rje btsun na ba ko Ti pA 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]da dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis yul shar phyogs kyi dpe dang bstun te bcos pa/_dus phyis shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las 'grel pa dang bstun nas cung zad bcos pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa don thams 
[\[354a.2\]]cad grub pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa slob dpon dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_yul kha che'i mkhan po d+harma badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta 
[\[354a.3\]]ku mA ra badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba nyi ma rdo rjes rgya gar shar phyogs kyi grong khyer mnga' ldan du bsgyur zhing bcos pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs de kho na nyid kyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rig pa'i brtul zhugs pa dpal dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_b+hang+ga la'i paN+Di 
[\[354a.4\]]ta ku mA ra badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rje'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rig pa'i brtul zhugs pa dpal dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rje 
[\[354a.5\]]dang*/_spyil cog gi tho gar dge mdzes kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta kr-iSh+Na pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo 
[\[354a.6\]]sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs phyag rgya chen po grub pa dpal rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta pradz+nyA b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa slob dpon chen po mkhas pa rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta 
[\[354a.7\]]pa dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur la/_phyis bla ma su ma ti kIrti dang*/_dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bcos pa dpal pham thing pa'i brgyud pa ma nor ba'i bshad pa'o/_/de dag la dril bu skor gsum du grags so/_/'khor lo sdom pa'i lus dkyil gyis mngon par 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]rtogs pa dang*/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs grub thob slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta 
[\[354b.2\]]rdo rje gdan pa niska lang+ga dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog sgrub pa'i thabs rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_
[\[354b.3\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig paN chen grub pa brnyes pa'i rje btsun rat+na rak+Shi ta 
[\[354b.4\]]dang*/_chag lo tsA ba chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che'i sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba slob 
[\[354b.5\]]dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos dbang gi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba rtog ge pa'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[354b.6\]]gar gyi mkhan po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyi 'gyur/_'di'i gzhung tshad ni bla ma'i phyag dpe la tshig rkang pa bzhi'i re re zhing yi ge sum cu rtsa drug tu gnas shing*/_rkang pa bzhi ka bsdoms pas yi ge stong sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 
[\[354b.7\]]bzhugs la/_bod kyi dpe la ni tshig rkang re re la tsheg bar nyis brgya dgu bcu rtsa lnga yod cing*/_bsdoms pas tsheg bar stong brgya brgyad cu yod do zhes 'byung ngo*/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang*/_
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin po che rab tu gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal lwa ba pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_
[\[355a.2\]]nag po pa'i skor la/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs sh+lau ka brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa dang*/_bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha 
[\[355a.3\]]shrI shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma 
[\[355a.4\]]b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nu'i 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa skor gsum mo/_/rdzogs rim skor gsum la/_dpyid kyi thig le zhes bya ba nag po spyod pa pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta blo gros bzang po grags pa dang*/_lo tsA ba sgra sgyur mar pa chos kyi dbang 
[\[355a.5\]]phyug gi 'gyur/_dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen zhes bya ba rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i zhabs kyi thig le la reg pas he ru ka'i dpyid kyi dga' ba thob pa des mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis 
[\[355a.6\]]rgyal po'i pho brang sne'u gdong du bsgyur ba/_gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur ba las/_slad kyis dpal paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_
[\[355a.7\]]lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bcos pa/_rim pa bzhi pa dang*/_rim pa bzhi pa'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba A tsAr+ya nag po nyid kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyi 'gyur te nag po chos drug tu grags so/_/yi 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang*/_lo tsA ba klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyi 'gyur ba las/_slad nas bod kyi lo tsA ba A tsAr+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhus te gtan la phab pa rnams bzhugs so//_//
[\[355b.2\]]zha pa la/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i bde mchog gi sgrub thabs slob dpon lU hi pas mdzad pa/_'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bsdus pa dpal o rgyan lha mo'i gnas pa rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na 
[\[355b.3\]]nyid grub pa slob dpon chen po dza lan+d+ha ras mdzad pa/_dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_dpal lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba ri khrod chen po'i gsung dang*/_bde mchog dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i 
[\[355b.4\]]sgrub thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti 'bring pos mdzad pa/_rje mi nyag chen po'i 'gyur/_sdom pa bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa/_dza ga ta lar 'ol ston chos 'byung gi 'gyur/_yi ge bdun pa'i 
[\[355b.5\]]sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal dka' zla bas mdzad pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa/_bde mchog shes par byed pa zhes bya ba bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa slob dpon byang chub rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[355b.6\]]po b+ha dra shrI bo d+hi dang*/_lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_rje dI paM ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel/_rgya 
[\[355b.7\]]gar gyi mkhan po dpal su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i cho ga_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lag mchod kyi cho ga_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon pradz+nyA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa ste/_pradz+nyA rak+Shi ta'i chos bzhir grags pa rnams paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba'i rim pa 
[\[356a.2\]]paN+Di ta chen po slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang phyug dge slong d+harma shrI b+ha dras/_lo tsA ba chen po bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' ltar dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas zhwa lu ri phug tu bsgyur ba/_dpal lhan 
[\[356a.3\]]cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i mchog bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po til+li pas mdzad pa/_rje mi nyag chen po'i 'gyur/_dpa' bo gcig pa he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nA ro pas mdzad pa/_bde mchog gi sbyin sreg spyi'i gsal 
[\[356a.4\]]byed pad+ma dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa/_bde mchog gi sAts+tsha'i cho ga ma hA pradz+nyA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba bshes gnyen ba ri ba'i 'gyur/_'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa/_
[\[356a.5\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po don yod rdo rje dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thabs zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad pa dgu brgya pa slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta 'jam dpal dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 
[\[356a.6\]]dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa kha che'i 
[\[356a.7\]]yul du byung zhing dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta tA ra ka la shu dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'di'i zhus dag dang*/_srung ba'i 'khor lo'i kha skong rnams 'phags pas mdzad do/_/de kho na nyid kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]slob dpon dad byed go chas mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po bi nA ya ka dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa slob dpon shrad+d+ha ka ra warmas mdzad pa/_slob dpon de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rje btsun dpal he ru ka sgrub 
[\[356b.2\]]pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba bram ze b+h+r-ing+ga ras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhon nu bum pa'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti'i zhabs dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi zhus tig byas pa/_yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta gnyis su med pa'i 
[\[356b.3\]]rdo rje mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma slob dpon mkhas pa mai tri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ba reg thos pa dgas 
[\[356b.4\]]bsgyur ba/_slad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa ba ri lo tsA bas bcos pa las/_dus phyis kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na'i bka' drin la brten nas gnubs lo tsA bas sgra don ji lta ba bzhin du gtan la phab pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon 
[\[356b.5\]]gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_grub pa'i slob dpon bla ma b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsi'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lha bcu gsum ma'i bdag nyid kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes 
[\[356b.6\]]mdzad pa/_bal po A tsAr+ya dz+nyA na badzra'i zhabs dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po zhang zhung gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rab gnas slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar 
[\[356b.7\]]gyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad sum cu pa slob dpon sprin gyi bzhon pa'i lhas mdzad pa/_'di paN+Di ta tshul khrims 'byung gnas blo gros kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rgya dpe dang gtugs nas/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba chen po d+harmA pa la b+ha dra zhes bya bas legs 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]par bsgyur ba/_lha bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dpal ba na rat+nas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba chen po gzhon nu dpal gyis legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_lU hi pas mdzad pa'i mngon par 
[\[357a.2\]]rtogs pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po di paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[357a.3\]]po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_rdo rje gdan gyi rdo rje gdan gyi glu/_rdo rje gdan gyi rdo rje'i glu'i 'grel pa rnams mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di 
[\[357a.4\]]ta de nyid dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_spyod pa'i glu slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta badzra pA Ni dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel pa jo bo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_nag 
[\[357a.5\]]tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ma hA paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta pA das mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta pA da dang*/_lo tsA ba rdo rje 'dzin pa zhang grub pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_dbang gi rab tu byad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 
[\[357a.6\]]a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_mkhas pa shes rab dpal gyi 'gyur/_rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bde mchog nyid dang dbyer med pa'i 
[\[357a.7\]]paN+Di ta chen po dpal rje btsun rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rdo rje slob dpon chen po dpal nyin mor mdzad kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI su b+hU ti shAn+ti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_bde mchog gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bram ze chen po nyin mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi sems kun du gzigs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ka la 
[\[357b.2\]]ka pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po krI ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba slob dpon chen po dpag med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_A tsAr+ya mar 
[\[357b.3\]]pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po de kho na nyid bsdus pa slob dpon ku sa li pas mdzad pa/_rdo rje slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug dang*/_A tsAr+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba dang*/_dpal 'khor 
[\[357b.4\]]lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag slob dpon ku sa li pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhas pa b+ha dra bo d+hi dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bsam gtan gyi man ngag rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gtum mo slob dpon chen po dge ba'i 
[\[357b.5\]]mgon pos mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang*/_lo tsA ba A tsAr+ya mar pa chos dbang gi 'gyur/_lU yi pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_lU yi pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i TI ka khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba/_dpal bde mchog 
[\[357b.6\]]gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnams paN+Di ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i rang 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon bI ra badzras mdzad pa/_dpal bde 
[\[357b.7\]]mchog 'khor lo'i cho ga yid 'ong phreng ba zhes bya ba dang*/_mnyes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba slob dpon k+ShAn+ti dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_ye shes 'byung ba man ngag ces bya ba kA yas+tha pa ga ya d+ha ras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi 
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]'gyur/_sdom pa 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po k+Shan+ti shrI'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong blo brtan gyis legs par bsgyur te gtan la phab pa rnams bzhugs so//_//za pa la/_dpal mkha' 'gro rgya 
[\[358a.2\]]mtsho'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs pad+ma rA ga'i gter zhes bya ba dang*/_rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa bsgyur ba'i bstod pa/_shrI dza ya se nA dang*/_dpal d+harma yon tan gyi 'gyur/_'di la tshigs su bcad par bsgyur ba'ang snang ngo*/_/gtor ma'i cho ga rin po 
[\[358a.3\]]che asma gar+b+ha dang*/_bla ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga rin po che marka ta mkhas pa dza ya se na'i gsung*/_dpal ye shes rdo rje'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa/_dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang*/_
[\[358a.4\]]dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rin po che me shel mkhas pa chen po dza ya se nA'i gsung*/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_dpal ye shes rdo rje'i 'gyur/_rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po gzhon nu dpal gyi zhal 
[\[358a.5\]]snga nas gyis mdzad pa/_gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa zhes bya ba dpal ldan nA ro pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shrI na ro pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyi 'gyur/_gsang ba rin po che zhes bya ba mi bskyod rdo rjes 
[\[358a.6\]]mdzad pa'i snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis phul+la ha ri'i dgon par bsgyur ba/_bdud rtsi 'od zer can zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rat+na shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_mar pa lo tsA ba chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 
[\[358a.7\]]mkha' 'gro lus med pa'i chos zhes bya ba rje te lo pas nA ro pa la gsungs pa/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma lta bsgom spyod gsum gyi brda bstan pa/_dpal sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro'i gsang tshig mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]bu la ha rir bsgyur ba/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta shU ra ka la shas mdzad pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bsod nams bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba dang*/_dpal 'khor lo 
[\[358b.2\]]sdom pa la bstod pa kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags rgyas pa slob dpon b+hu ri pas mdzad pa/_jo bo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[358b.3\]]rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_lam gyi rab tu bya ba grong khyer sum+b+ha ri'i rgyal po'i sras dpal 'jigs byed lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid kyi spyan sngar/_bod kyi lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba kha che'i paN+Di ta bde 
[\[358b.4\]]ba'i rgyal pos mdzad pa/_rat+na shrI'i zhabs kyi pad+mo la gtugs pa paN+Di ta shrI pa ra hi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta dpal ma Ni ka shrIs mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[358b.5\]]paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti'i spyan sngar dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_dpal 'khor 
[\[358b.6\]]lo bde mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon dbus pa blo ldan gyis mdzad pa/_lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrIs mdzad pa/_bod kyi rgyal po pho brang zhi ba 'od kyis bsgyur ba/_slob dpon nag 
[\[358b.7\]]po pas mdzad pa sgron ma bzhi'i TI ka zhes bya ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas gyis mdzad cing bsgyur ba'o/_/de ltar bde mchog yab bka'i skor rnams bkod nas/_yum gtso bor gyur pa'i skor la/_dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs A tsAr+ya b+ha dras mdzad 
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mchod pa mdor bsdus pa rgya 
[\[359a.2\]]gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba mtshur gyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po seng ge'i gdan can khyab 'jug sbas pas mdzad pa/_'jigs med lha'i zhabs dang*/_lo tsA ba rje btsun pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_grub pa'i 
[\[359a.3\]]rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dpal o+o D+yAn gyi mi dbang in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal nA len+d+ra pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes 
[\[359a.4\]]bya ba rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti chen pos mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba ye shes rdo rje'i 'gyur/_rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal lha lcam lak+Sh+mI ka ras mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs dpal ri khrod dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs 
[\[359a.5\]]rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_bla ma bai ro tsa na'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhal gnyis ma chung ba ri khrod dbang phyug gis mdzad par grags pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bsod nams 'byung gnas bzang po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 
[\[359a.6\]]'gyur/_dpal de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba zhal gnyis ma che bar grags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mkhas pa chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs rdul la reg pa paN+Di ta stong nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/[(]don grub ma chung ba'ang zer/[)]don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[359a.7\]]sgrub thabs slob dpon grub pa brnyes pa a ba d+hU tI pas mdzad pa/[(*]don grub ma che ba zer/[)]ye shes 'pho ba zhes bya ba dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rdo rje phag mo dbu bcad ma'i sgrub thabs chung ba lha mo dpal gyi blo gros mas mdzad pa rnams bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dbu bcad ma'i sgrub thabs che ba zhes bya ba dpal bir+Wa pas mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po bsod snyoms pa'i 
[\[359b.2\]]slob ma rgyal bas byin gyi tsha bo sangs rgyas byin gyis mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsi dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gzhung drug gi sbyin sreg dang bcas pa 'di dag bod na grags pa'i rim pa ltar bkod pa'o/_/rigs ldan ma'i de kho na nyid nges 
[\[359b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba o+o D+yAn du grub pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i 'gyur/_rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba mtshur gyi 'gyur/_rus sbal zhabs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs grub thob rngon 
[\[359b.4\]]pa bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta A nan+da ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_phag mo thugs kyi sgrub thabs kurma pA da'i gdams pa/_paN+Di ta A nan+da ka ra dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 
[\[359b.5\]]mkha' spyod ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs grub thob rngon pa bas mdzad pa/_bla ma rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lang+ga dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_slob ma rjes su gsung ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dbang mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_rdo rje phag mo'i tshogs 
[\[359b.6\]]kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams grub thob sha ba ri dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/_yul ma ga d+hA'i paN+Di ta gau tam b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis legs par bsgyur ba/[ (*]zhal gnyis ma chung ba'i 'grel pa zer/[)]rnal 'byor gyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba grub thob chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta klu'i sbyin pa'i 
[\[359b.7\]]rnal 'byor gyi snying po'i don bsdus bstan pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rnams rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta dA na shI las bod yul dbus kyi drang srong srin po ngor rang 'gyur/_keng rus tA ra na pa'i sgrub thabs lha 'dre bran du 'khol ba'i 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]slob dpon dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_keng rus tA ra na'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba mang du thos pa'i slob dpon ku mA ra bo d+his mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dzA lan+d+ha ra pas mdzad pa/_
[\[360a.2\]]phag mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs o rgyan nas byung ba rnams paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos dbang gi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//'a pa la/_rdo rje phag mo dkar mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kong+ka byin gyis 
[\[360a.3\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba khams pa ba ri d+harma kIrti'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon kong+ka byin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong grub pa dpal bzang po'i 
[\[360a.4\]]'gyur/_dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bzhed pa'i sbas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon kong+ka byin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta d+ha pa la ha 'u dang*/_lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon kong+ka byin 
[\[360a.5\]]gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta badzra pA Ni dang*/_lo tsA ba mtshur dz+nyA na A ka ra'i 'gyur/_dpal rnal 'byor ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdzad 'gyur mi gsal ba 'di bod ma 'dra/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gnyis 
[\[360a.6\]]med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis gtsang nyang ro cung pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs dpal nA ro pa'i zhal gyi brgyud pa rjes su gnang ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_
[\[360a.7\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_'di nA ro mkha' spyod kyi gzhung yin/_gzhan don slob ma rjes su bzung ba'i cho ga bla ma b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsis mdzad pa/_bla ma bal po lo tsA ba dang*/_ye shes rdo rjes thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas bsgyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]ba bi rU pa'i gdams ngag gi brgyud pa shrI u ma pa ti dat+tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po wA gI shwa ra gup+ta pA da dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyi 'gyur/_mngon par rtogs pa'i snye ma zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dge ba'i 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_
[\[360b.2\]]rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba mchog gi sdom pa la 'jug pa nges pa don gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po a wa d+hU tI pa dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rnal 
[\[360b.3\]]'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba dpal u ma pa ti dat+tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po wA gI shwa ra gup+ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyi 'gyur/_de kho 
[\[360b.4\]]na nyid ye shes yang dag par grub pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa de kho na nyid bshad pa zhes bya ba/_bi kra ma shI la'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong paN+Di ta brtson 'grus dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI dang dze tA kar+Na'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi 
[\[360b.5\]]ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling du legs par bsgyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phag mo khros pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_dpal 
[\[360b.6\]]rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mkha' spyod dkar mo'i bstod pa paN+Di ta dI paM ka ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rig pa 'dzin pa rtsen ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sde'am mtshan gzhan khang pa gsar pa zhes bya 
[\[360b.7\]]bar brjod pas bris pa/_gzhan don slob ma rjes su bzung ba'i cho ga dza ya se nAs mdzad pa/[(*]phag mo dmar chung ma zhes kyang bya/[) ]dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba tri sa ra ha pas mdzad pa/_rin po che rgyan gyi sgrub pa/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rnams 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]rje dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bstod pa paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba khu ne tso'i 'gyur/_rdo rje phag mo mdor bsdus pa'i bstod 
[\[361a.2\]]pa a b+hi sang ka tAs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug dang*/_klog skya lo tsA'i 'gyur/_ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa'i gsang ba sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon a b+hi yuk+tas mdzad pa/_gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bsad pa las kyi man 
[\[361a.3\]]ngag_/phyir bzlog 'khor lo/_phag mo'i srung ba'i 'khor lo/_gtor ma'i cho ga_/lag pa'i mchod pa rnams slob dpon a b+hi yuk+tas mdzad zer ba 'di ni the tshom gyi gzhir snang ngo*/_/rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rnam par sgeg pa zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje phag mo'i bstod pa rim pa 
[\[361a.4\]]gnyis pa rdo rje btsun mos byin gyis brlabs pa grub dbang rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_chos 'khor lo tsA ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyis 'bras yul nor bu'i gling du bsgyur ba la/_phyis chos smra ba rgya mtsho'i sdes mi 
[\[361a.5\]]bcos su mi rung ba rnams bcos nas don la rton par bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mtha' can/_rdo rje phag mo don thams cad grub ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_yang rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba zhal gnyis ma ste/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po 
[\[361a.6\]]nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyi 'gyur/_gnas la sogs pa gtan la dbab pa rnam par grags pa'i paN+Di ta gnas brtan shAkya rak+Shi ta'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harmA pA la b+ha dras legs par bsgyur 
[\[361a.7\]]ba rnams bzhugs so/_/bde mchog 'khor lo'i rgyud 'grel nyi shu bzhi/_/yab skor gtso bo brgya dang bco brgyad la/_/yum gyi skor la drug cu rtsa bdun te/_/dril bas brgya phrag gnyis dang dgu bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni bde mchog 'khor lo'i chos skor 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar bde mchog 'khor lo'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_dpal gdan bzhi'i skor la/_rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi'i 'grel pa dran pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta 
[\[361b.2\]]ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ya pa la/_'phags pa gdan bzhi'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon dge ba'i go chas gzigs nas sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rnam par bshad pa yan chad mdzad cing*/_de man chad rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran 
[\[361b.3\]]pa'i ye shes grags pas mdzad pa/_smr-i ti'i rang 'gyur/_mchan khung gi sbyor ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dpal gdan bzhi'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[361b.4\]]rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po dza ga ta A nan+da dzI wa b+ha dras mdzad pa/_sgrub thabs 'di dang mthun pa'i bka' lung sngon chad bod du dar ba ma byung ba la/_de nyid kyi sras kyi thu bo paN+Di ta ma hA bo d+hi las nos shing lung mi 
[\[361b.5\]]chad pa'i don du paN+Di ta'i phyag nas rgya dpe gdan drangs shing*/_bod kyi paN+Di ta ma ti d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dpal ldan smra ba'i seng ges dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba/_gdan bzhi'i yum skor la/_ye shes dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_
[\[361b.6\]]paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_phyis paN+Di ta sa ma ya shrI dz+nyA nas rgya dpe la zhus tig byas pa/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga snying po mdor bsags pa slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod 
[\[361b.7\]]kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khugs pa lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dpal gdan bzhi'i zab don ston pa shing gcig gi dka' 'grel dang*/_rdo rje dril thabs kyi mchod pa'i thabs kyi rim pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_dpal gdan bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po b+ha ba b+ha tras mdzad pa/_
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dpal gdan bzhi pa'i chu'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon b+ha ba'i man ngag lo tsA ba tshul khrims gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_gdan bzhi'i yum skor la/_ye shes mkha' 
[\[362a.2\]]'gro'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen por dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis rgya dpe las bsgyur te zhus pa/_rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang po'i sdes mdzad pa/_gdan bzhi'i 
[\[362a.3\]]de kho na nyid bzhi pa slob dpon dze tA ri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid drug rnam par gzhag pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi 'gyur rnams so/_/dpal ldan rdo rje gdan bzhi'i rgyud 'grel 
[\[362a.4\]]gsum/_/yab yum sgrub thabs dkyil 'khor cho ga dang*/_/rdzogs rim la sogs chos skor bcu gnyis te/_/dril bas bcu phrag gcig dang lnga bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni dpal gdan bzhi'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar gdan bzhi'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_
[\[362a.5\]]sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi skor la/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel sgyu ma can zhes bya ba rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa dpal du dza ya tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bde gshegs grags pa dang*/_lo tsA ba ye shes sems dpa'i 'gyur/_dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa yon tan ldan pa 
[\[362a.6\]]zhes bya ba slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa dran pa zhes bya ba nag po dam tshig rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na wa ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos 
[\[362a.7\]]lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel dpal slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rgyan pas mdzad pa/_sgyu ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid o D+yAn gyi yul du byon nas gsungs pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a wa d+hU tI pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]shAkya brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba spros pa med pa'i man ngag_/ma hA mA yA'i sgrub thabs rmongs pa sgrol ba'i brtag pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[362b.2\]]po a nI la badzra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa ku ku ri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po na bi ko Ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_ma hA mA yA'i dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[362b.3\]]lha la bstod pa slob dpon chen po ku ku ri pas zhal gzigs pa'i tshe bstod pa/_de kho na nyid kyi man ngag dang*/_de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gi 'grel pa slob dpon blo bzang snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs slob 
[\[362b.4\]]dpon chen po dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs dang*/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa gsal ba zhes bya ba nag po spyod pa bas mdzad pa/_
[\[362b.5\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po kar+m+ma badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_'di la dpe la lar ku ku ri pas mdzad zer ba'ang 'dug_/spyi'i chos spyod/_rigs lnga mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa/_dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa/_bdun tshigs kyi cho ga rnams slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_sAts+tsha 
[\[362b.6\]]gdab pa'i man ngag_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa slob dpon chen po chos kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa dang*/_sgyu ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_sgyu 'phrul 
[\[362b.7\]]chen mo'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sbyin sreg dang bcas pa slob dpon grub thob rnal 'byor pa chen po dpal rgyan pas mdzad pa/_sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bla ma'i zhal snga'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa 'dul bas byin gyis mdzad pa/_he ru ka phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/_ro sreg pa'i sgrub 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]thabs kyi cho ga_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po sku med rdo rjes mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa bzhi/_/sgrub thabs la sogs chos skor nyer gsum ste/_/gsang ba yid bde'i chos skor dri ma med/_/bcu phrag gnyis dang bcas pa'i bdun 
[\[363a.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni sgyu ma chen mo'i skor gyi chos tshan gyi rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sgyu ma chen mo'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i skor la/_ra pa la/_dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dka' 'grel slob dpon dri med bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_'di sngar gyi 'gyur rnying pa'i le'u 
[\[363a.3\]]gnyis pa man chad ma tshang zhing*/_de yan chad kyang shin tu 'khrugs te 'grel pa gzhan dang 'dres pa las/_lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen grub kyis rgya dpe las bsgyur zhing smr-i ti'i spel mar bshad pa dang yang bstun nas gtan la phab pa/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi bshad pa slob dpon yon tan bzang pos mdzad pa/_
[\[363a.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti'i rang 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon chen po b+ha gos mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad tshigs bcad stong sum brgya yod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta tA ra pA la dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba kha chings yon tan 'bar 
[\[363a.5\]]gyi 'gyur la/_phyis paN+Di ta shrI la kudz+ha badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis legs par bcos pa rnams bzhugs so/_/he ru ka dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi yi/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rnam bshad dri ma med/_/mkhas grub rnams kyis mdzad pa rnam pa gsum/_/shin tu khyad par 'phags pa legs par 
[\[363a.6\]]bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_sangs rgyas thod pa'i skor la/_dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po sa ra ha'i zhal 
[\[363a.7\]]snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel de kho na nyid kyi zla ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po pad+ma rdo rjes mdzad pa las/_le'u gnyis pa yan chad ji tsam rnyed pa dang*/_sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung zhes bya ba/_gnas brtan mkhas pa a b+h+ya yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_ding ri chos grags kyi 'gyur yin nam zer ba'i 'gyur rnying la bar skabs su dpe stor bas ma tshang ba la dpang lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas le'u dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya 
[\[363b.2\]]chen po zhes pa nas/_'og gi lam nas byung zhes pa'i bar dang*/_lha'i sku bsgoms te zhes pa nas sa gzhi la sogs pa rnams dang g.yo ba zhes pa'i bar dang*/_le'u gsum pa'i mjug bsgom pa rdzogs pas zhes pa nas/_le'u bzhi pa'i tha ma la ni 'dir ma rig pa ste des zhes pa'i bar dang*/_le'u bcu pa'i 
[\[363b.3\]]dbu'i de kho na nyid ni thams cad la zhes pa nas/_le'u bcu bzhi pa'i mjug na gang zhig shar bas ni zhes pa'i bar dang*/_srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis rnams hor kong bsabs shing lhag ma rnams la zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/_dpal sangs rgyas 
[\[363b.4\]]thod pa'i sgrub thabs/_'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga_/dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa gsal ba zhes bya ba rnams dngos grub kyi mchog brnyes pa'i slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_ri gi a ra 
[\[363b.5\]]la'i sgrub thabs lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis rgya dpe ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur ba rnams so/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rnam bshad rnam pa gsum/_/sgrub dkyil gtor chog ri gi'i sgrub thabs te/_/chos skor dri ma med pa bdun bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni 
[\[363b.6\]]sangs rgyas thod pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sangs rgyas thod pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi skor la/_dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba dpal 
[\[363b.7\]]o D+yAn gyi mkhas pa chen po 'dzam gling gi nyi ma dang 'dra ba dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon rgyal po brgya byin sdang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba lha rin po che'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi 'grel pa 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]mnyam sbyor gyi rgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//la pa la/_dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen 
[\[364a.2\]]gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rnam par bshad pa sh+lau ka drug stong lnga brgya bdun cu pa shrI nA len+d+ra na bzhugs pa rdo rje slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad 
[\[364a.3\]]pa/_smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_'di mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma phyi ma'i 'grel par snang gi rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa min par snang ngo*/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang zhu 
[\[364a.4\]]chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka'i gsang don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/_dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i don rnam 
[\[364a.5\]]par dgod pa zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje rin chen nyi ma'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/_rta mchog rol pa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba lha rin po che'i 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 
[\[364a.6\]]rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI badzra ha sa dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba rma rin chen mchog gi 'gyur/_dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[364a.7\]]mkhan po gu len+d+ra gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dran pa nam mkha'i 'gyur la/_phyis lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bcos la/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A nan+da gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dran pa nam mkha'i 'gyur/
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]phyis lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bcos pa/_dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thu bo rA dza hastis mdzad pa/_dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po hU~M mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba lha rin po che'i 'gyur/_dpal he ru ka zhes bya 
[\[364b.2\]]ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po hU~M gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra ha sa dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba rma rin chen mchog gis bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis lo tsA ba phyi ma dag gis sum thug tu zhu chen bcos pa/_yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa 
[\[364b.3\]]hU~M mdzad grags pas mdzad pa/_dpal bsam yas kyi mchims phur dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon paN+Di ta dpal rdo rje bzhad pa dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po rma rin chen mchog gis dbang sgrub dang bcas pa legs par bsgyur ba/_dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim 
[\[364b.4\]]pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po hU~M mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po che'i 'gyur/_dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag par grub pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po badzra hU~M ka ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi 
[\[364b.5\]]mkhan po hU~M ka ra de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba gnubs nam mkha'i snying po'i 'gyur/_rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba kha che'i mkhas pa shes bya mtha' dag la 
[\[364b.6\]]mkhas pa dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dpal o+o D+yAn du sbyangs pa mkhas pa ye shes rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba gnyan bsod nams kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dpal rdo rje sems 
[\[364b.7\]]dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thu bo rA dza hastis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi/_/mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog rgyud 'grel lnga/_/sgrub thabs la sogs chos skor bcu dgu ste/_/mnyam sbyor chos skor nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi chos skor rnams bkod nas/_sgrol ma'i skor la/_sha pa la/_sgrol ma rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ltar du bshad pa la/_sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba 
[\[365a.2\]]sgrol ma rgya mtsho'i rgyud nas phyung ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po d+harma badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis/_chos 'khor 'jo 'jo'i gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur cing zhus chen mdzad pa/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma 
[\[365a.3\]]sgrol ma spyi'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_de'i so so'i sgrub thabs las tshogs dang bcas pa kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rnams mkhas pa chen po many+dzu shrI dang*/_
[\[365a.4\]]lo tsA ba chen po mal gyo blo gros grags pas bi kra ma shI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa slob dpon chen po nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_'di dang po ma 'gyur ba la/_phyis kha che'i paN+Di tas kha ba can gyi ljongs su spyan drangs pa'i dpe las bod skad du 
[\[365a.5\]]dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs rje btsun lha mo mchog gis rjes su bzung ba'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_chos rje ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par grags pa'i paN+Di ta chen po bsod snyoms 
[\[365a.6\]]pa kha che shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul dbus kyi gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che dang*/_pho brang khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_lha mo sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la bstod pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po sUr+ya gup+tas mdzad pa/_
[\[365a.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges tho lding gser gyi lha khang du bsgyur ba/[ (*]ma byung*/[)]lha mo dam tshig sgrol ma'i bstod pa/_sgrol ma phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa snga 'gyur/_me tog phreng 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]'dzin gyi bstod pa slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gcig tu mdzad pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta ma ni ka shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_
[\[365b.2\]]chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa tsheg bar bdun mar bcad pa slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nu'i rang 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod 
[\[365b.3\]]pa kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta sA d+hu kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ldan ma tshul khrims seng ges bsgyur ba la/_phyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du dag par byas pa/_lha mo sgrol ma la sme sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 
[\[365b.4\]]slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shAkya shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bi kra ma shI 
[\[365b.5\]]la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing*/_pho brang byang chub 'od kyis zhus pa/_me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[365b.6\]]dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_cog gru lo tsA ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba/_so so'i sgrub thabs la/_sgrol ma dkar mo la brten nas stong pa nyid bsgom pa/_sngon mo la brten nas log par lta ba sun dbyung ba/_ser mo la brten 
[\[365b.7\]]nas chom rkun bcing ba/_dmar mo la brten nas rig pa bskyed pa/_ljang ser la brten nas 'chi ba bslu ba rnams 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_cog gru lo tsA ba mya ngan med pa'i 
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bstod pa'i rgyal po slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa/_'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang*/_
[\[366a.2\]]lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyi 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa/_'brog mi lo tsA'i 'gyur/_u rgyan sgrol ma'i skor la/_'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_
[\[366a.3\]]dpal u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/_u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa/_dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa paN+Di ta pa ra hi tas mdzad pa rnams kha che'i paN+Di ta sang+g+ha shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i 'gyur/_
[\[366a.4\]]dpa' bo gcig ma'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_u rgyan gyi rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gdan mas gsungs pa/_gtor ma'i cho ga nyung ngu dang*/_zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i mchod pa'i rim pa rnams paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba nag 
[\[366a.5\]]tsho shes rab rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i man ngag paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa mkhas pa chen po slob dpon su dza ya shrI b+ha dra'i 
[\[366a.6\]]zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa rin chen dpal gyi slob ma paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_ma hA mA yA'i rdzogs rim de dang cha 'dra bar 'dug na'ang*/_nag tsho'i lugs la u rgyan sgrol ma'i rdzogs rim du bzhed do/_/gnas 
[\[366a.7\]]chen gyi rim pa'i lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta pA ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i paN+Di tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta ye shes rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba nag 
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]tsho chen po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba dang*/_thod pa mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho shes rab rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'di u rgyan sgrol ma'i chos skor du mdzad do/_/rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba'i bshes 
[\[366b.2\]]gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su ga ta shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_sgrol ma'i 'chi kha ma'i nyams len dpal chos kyi rje sa steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i kha che shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa dang*/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob 
[\[366b.3\]]dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/[ (*]ma byung*/[)]sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i 
[\[366b.4\]]zhal snga nas byung ba/_dpyal pad+mo can gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje phag mo sgrol ma la bstod pa paN+Di ta zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_sgrol ma khro mo la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod pa tshig rkang bcu gnyis pa/_sgrol ma u gra tA ra'i sgrub thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i zhabs 
[\[366b.5\]]kyis mdzad pa dang*/_'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na dang*/_lo tsA ba many+dzu shrIs bsgyur ba/_'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes 
[\[366b.6\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang*/_dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde'i 'gyur/_ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las 'o na 'di'i sku grong du 
[\[366b.7\]]legs par bsgyur cing zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma khros pa'i ba liM gi gtor ma'i cho ga bsdus pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shI las 'gran gyi 'phyang sar du rang 'gyur mdzad pa/_sgrol ma ral gcig ma'i blo 'phel snyan ngag mkhan rtag pa'i rdo rjes 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las yang dag par bsgyur ba/_'phags pa ral pa gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rol pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren+d+ra dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta dA na shI las yul dbus 
[\[367a.2\]]kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba/_ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun spangs rdo rje zhes pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta mi dbang bzang po dang*/_chos smra ba'i btsun pa legs pa'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i byin 
[\[367a.3\]]rlabs kyi cho ga nag po spyod pa bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta mi dbang bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba gzhon nu shes rab kyi 'gyur/_mchog gi sgrol ma ral gcig ma'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs snyan ngag mkhan rtag pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag b+ha gu paN+Di ta'i khyad chos/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN chen dA na 
[\[367a.4\]]shI la las mnyan te/_rig pa 'dzin pa khu rnal 'byor pas 'on dmar du legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rat+na da ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban 
[\[367a.5\]]chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dngos grub phreng ba slob dpon rtag pa'i badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba mkhas pa ba ris rgya dpe bod du spyan drangs nas ba sbugs rong gi gser khang du bsgyur ba/_sgrol ma'i 
[\[367a.6\]]nang gi gtor chog slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_yul bal po rdzong du bsgyur ba/_phyir bzlog gi 'khor lo rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_sgrol ma gsang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na 
[\[367a.7\]]da ti dang /_lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_thugs rje sgrol ma las sna tshogs pa'i sgrub thabs rgya gar bsil ba'i seng ldeng phug tu slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po ba ri lo tsA'i 'gyur/_khwa gdong ma srang mda' nag po zhes bya ba slob dpon rtag pa'i 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]badzras mdzad pa/_sgrol ma'i man ngag me long dwangs pa zhes bya ba rma dang ba ri lo tsA ba d+harma kIrti zhes bya bas dpyal dang*/_bla ma gus ston la zhus nas bsgyur ba/_de rnams sgrol ma rnal 'byor bla med du bkral ba'i skor rnams so/_/ma rgyud spyi dang 'brel pa la/_dpal u rgyan gyi rnal 
[\[367b.2\]]'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba slob dpon bir+Wa pas mdzad pa las btus pa/_rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag ces bya ba paN+Di ta chen po don yod rdo rje'i 
[\[367b.3\]]zhal snga nas mdzad pa dang*/_las kyi phyag rgya brtag pa'i man ngag ces bya ba paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra las byung ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dbang chos rten 'brel 'gro ldog dpal nA ro pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi bla ma te phu ba dang*/_bod kyi 
[\[367b.4\]]lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_'chi ba bslu ba'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/_sh+lau ka sum brgya drug cu pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di phyi nang gi rgyud du ma dang 'brel 
[\[367b.5\]]yang*/_khyad par ma rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang*/_gdan bzhi dang 'brel par snang bas 'dir bkod do/_/rmi lam brtag pa rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i rang 'gyur/_pad+ma dra ba 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa dang*/_pad+ma spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[367b.6\]]phyug gi pad+ma dra ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i cho ga rgyal ba dpal ye shes ming gzhan pad+ma rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po su ma na shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyi 'gyur/_ma rgyud dang phyogs mthun pa mgon po nag 
[\[367b.7\]]po'i skor la/_dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi rim pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud drag po'i brtag pa dur khrod chen po zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa dpal rta dbyangs 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]kyis mdzad pa/_dpal nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang*/_ye shes kyi me sbar ba zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi cho ga paN+Di ta chen po sa man+ta shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyi 'gyur/_nag 
[\[368a.2\]]po chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob pa'i dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa dang*/_nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa lhan cig skyes pa'i zhabs kyi slob ma slob dpon li ka ri'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[368a.3\]]mkhan po shrI na ren+d+ra b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba u rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po spu tra'i mgul bde chen gling gi pho brang chen por bsgyur ba/_dpal nag po chen po yum can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi 
[\[368a.4\]]paN+Di ta shrI ba na rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang chos 'khor lo tsA ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyi 'gyur/_dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba rtsa mi chen po'i 'gyur/[ (*]bya rog gdong can zer/[)]dpal mgon po'i nang sgrub paN+Di ta a b+ha
