[\[368a.5\]]yA ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba rtsa mi chen po'i 'gyur/_dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po sha ba ri pas mdzad pa/_dpal nag po chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 
[\[368a.6\]]bram ze mchog sred zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta nag po ro 'dzin dang*/_lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar ba'i 'gyur/_dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 
[\[368a.7\]]'gyur/_dpal mgon po'i gtor chog dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'brom ston gyi 'gyur/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga slob dpon lo ka shrI'i 'gyur/_lha mo re ma ti dmag zor gyi man ngag A tsAr+ya dmar po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal ldan 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]lha mo dud sol ma'i rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga_/dud sol ma'i sgrub thabs/_gtor ma'i cho ga rnams paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i btsun pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde'i 'gyur/_dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/_

[\[368b.3\]]pas mdzad pa/_rje btsun dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa dang*/_bya rog ming can dang bya rog gdong can la bstod pa rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas mdzad pa/_se lo tsA bas bod skad du bsgyur ba 'di la thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston gyis/_'di gnyis rtsom mkhan bod kyis brtsams pa 
[\[368b.4\]]yin kyang saM skr-i ta'i skad du brtsams shing*/_bod skad du bsgyur ba yin pas sngar gyi rnams kyis bris 'dug pas bris zhes gsung ngo*/_/lha mo nag mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa/_dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang*/_yang dpal 
[\[368b.5\]]nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa na badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ding ri chos grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po nA ro pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[368b.6\]]skad gnyis smra ba'i slob dpon lo ka shrI'i 'gyur/_gtum chen drag po'i mngon par rtogs pa paN+Di ta bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes bsgrigs pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_mi g.yo ba'i mngon par rtogs pa rab tu dga' bar mngon par brjod pa slob dpon dpal nags 
[\[368b.7\]]kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/sgrol ma bla med skor la drug cu gsum/_/ma rgyud spyi 'brel drug dang pad dra'i gnyis/_/mgon po'i chos skor sum cu mi g.yo'i gnyis/_/dril bas chos skor brgya dang rtsa gsum bzhugs/_/
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]de dag gis ni sgrol ma la sogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sgrol ma la sogs pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_rnal 'byor chen po thabs kyi rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa'i skor la/_dang por mgon po klu sgrub kyi rjes su 
[\[369a.2\]]'brang ba'i 'phags skor la/_sa pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba rdo rje theg pa chen po pa slob dpon chen po dpal klu sgrub kyis mdzad zer ba'i le'u bcu bdun pa yan chad rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI tA ra ka la sha'i sras paN+Di ta ku mA ra ka la sha'i dbon po man+t+ra ka 
[\[369a.3\]]la sha zhes bya ba nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_le'u bco brgyad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa rdo rje theg pa chen po pa dpal klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal gzhon nu bum pa'i rang 'gyur bzhugs so/_/'grel pa 'di slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad ma mdzad rtsod pa can du 'dug 
[\[369a.4\]]na'ang*/_bod ma ma yin par 'dug cing mtshan bzang por g.yar 'dug pa'i don la dbu ru bzhugs su bcug pa yin zhes gsungs so//_//ha pa la/_sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon chen po nA gArdzu na'i man ngag la brten te slob dpon zla ba grags pas 
[\[369a.5\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI dz+nyA nA ka ra bas bshad nas/_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba la/_yang slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta nag po'i zhal snga nas bshad 
[\[369a.6\]]cing*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang gtugs te bcos pa/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_

[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]btus pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba dang gnyis ka slob dpon chen po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel 
[\[369b.2\]]slob dpon thugs rje dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_gzhung gi tshad ni tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam grangs stong phrag gsum la brgya phrag lngas lhag ma yod pa/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang phyug dge slong rin chen grub kyis zhwa lu ri phug dga' ldan gyi dben gnas su bsgyur cing gtan

[\[369b.4\]]bar byed pa'i dka' ba btus pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal ba mchog dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ki khi gnyis la/_sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i dgongs pa rab 
[\[369b.5\]]gsal zhes bya ba bshad pa'i TI ka slob dpon chen po b+ha dra kIrtis zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_gzhung gi tshad sh+lau ka stong phrag bcu drug pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta ku mA ra'i rang 'gyur/_sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'i 'grel bshad slob dpon Ar+ya de was mdzad zer ba 
[\[369b.6\]]'di bod ma 'dra bar 'dug na'ang sngar gyi rnams kyis bris 'dug pas bris so//_//gi pa la/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa zab mo'i don gyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta a laM ka ka la shas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_steng pa lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'i le'u bzhi 
[\[369b.7\]]bcu rtsa lnga pa'i phyed par du 'grel pa ji tsam rnyed pa bzhugs so/_/'di'i 'phro da rung yang btsal bar bya'o/_/de ltar rgyud 'grel gyi skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni sgrub thabs dkyil chog man ngag la sogs pa'i skor la/_ngi pa la/_sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad 
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsre ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[370a.2\]]gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hA Shi ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dbang bzhi 
[\[370a.3\]]pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa tshigs bcad ma zhes bya ba slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu Na 
[\[370a.4\]]A ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba rab zhi bshes gnyen gyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bcos pa/_byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa lhug pa ma slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya A nan+da dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA 
[\[370a.5\]]ba khu mdo sde 'bar gyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang yang gtugs 
[\[370a.6\]]te bcos pa/_spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de was mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sh+lau ka stong sum brgya pa'o/_/sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'i don 'grel sems kyi sgrib pa rnam par 
[\[370a.7\]]sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa/_A tsAr+ya dz+nyA nA ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sgyu lus kyi don 'grel bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba rnam par dbye ba/_'od gsal gyi don 'grel mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i man 
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]ngag ces bya ba/_ro bsreg pa'i cho ga rnams slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim mthar phyin pa slob dpon Ar+ya de was mdzad zer ba/_'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam 
[\[370b.2\]]par gzhag pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i blos zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyi shu pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta ti la 
[\[370b.3\]]ka ka la sha dang*/_bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po ban+de pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba/_las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba rje btsun 'phags pa klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_rje btsun chen po re wen+d+ra'i zhal snga nas gus par 
[\[370b.4\]]mnyan te chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga'i khongs su bsdu ba'i man ngag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po klu'i blo rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub brnyes nas da dung dpal gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rten dpal 
[\[370b.5\]]tshangs pa 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po A lang+ka ka la sha dang*/_bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga'i don mdor bshad pa rnal 'byor pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba ma ga d+hA'i paN+Di ta thub pa dpal bzang pos mdzad pa/_dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos 
[\[370b.6\]]bsnams pa'i rgya dpe las lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad ni rkang pa dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gnyis pa dpal bi kra ma la shI la'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga 
[\[370b.7\]]ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis dpal tho ling dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dI paM kA ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bcos pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa li lA 
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]badzra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i rgya dpe la bltas nas lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis legs par bsgyur cing dag par byas pa/_bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal ldan zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_slob dpon shrad+d+hA ka ra warma 
[\[371a.2\]]dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad zer ba 'di ni the tshom gyi gzhi cig snang ngo*/_/zung du 'jug pa gsal ba zhes bya ba dbang gi bya ba sh+lau ka phyed dang brgyad brgya pa dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[371a.3\]]po'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po sgra gcan 'dzin dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di la sh+lau ka phyed dang brgyad brgya'o/_/dpal gsang ba 'dus 
[\[371a.4\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon nag po pa'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i man ngag la brten te mdzad pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa'i cho ga_/gtor ma'i cho ga_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa rnams slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 
[\[371a.5\]]lam gyi rim pa man ngag bdud rtsi gsang ba slob dpon chen po sgra dbyangs bcu gcig pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes pa za hor gyi mkhan po shAn+ta de wa 
[\[371a.6\]]zhes bya ba mngon shes lnga dang ldan pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos kyi 'gyur/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga dpal ldan rab 'jigs rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lau ka 
[\[371a.7\]]brgya brgyad cu rtsa gsum mo//_//ci pa la/_da ni sgrub skor de dag gi 'grel pa'i skor ni/_mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po karma badzra'i rang 'gyur/_sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya 
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]ba slob dpon chen po dpal dz+nyA na badzra zhes bya ba gsang 'dus rim pa gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen btsun pa ku mA ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba lha btsun pa'i 'gyur/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 
[\[371b.2\]]'khor gyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi gnas rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa'i rnam par bshad pa smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na 
[\[371b.3\]]kIrti de nyid kyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po brtson 'grus bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta bIr+ya b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge bsnyen chen po shes rab brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga pa'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 
[\[371b.4\]]'od zer zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i 'gyur/_sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis dbo'i lo mgo'i zla ba'i tshes bcu dgu la rgya dpe la 
[\[371b.5\]]gzigs nas dpal ri phug gi dben gnas su bsgyur ba/_rim pa lnga'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa zhes zer ba 'di rdzun ma yin par 'dug na'ang sngar gyi rnams kyis bris 'dug pa ltar bris so/_/spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa 
[\[371b.6\]]shes rab mchog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi bshad pa slob dpon ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_tho lding dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_khams pa ba 
[\[371b.7\]]ri lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bal po'i dge bsnyen su'o dI ta dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang po'i bsgyur ba 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]rnams bzhugs so//_//chi pa la/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po b+ha bya kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal ba mchog dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_rim pa lnga'i bshad pa li la badzra zhabs 
[\[372a.2\]]kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rim lnga'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 
[\[372a.3\]]'gyur/_'di slob dpon klu byang gis mdzad ma mdzad the tshom za bar 'dug kyang rgya gar gyi paN+Di tas mdzad par 'dug pas bris so/_/rim lnga'i dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dam tshig rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_
[\[372a.4\]]rim pa lnga'i 'grel ba'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba kha che'i mkhas pa chen po lak+Sh+mIs zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa tA ra ka la sha'i sras man+t+ra ka la sha nyid kyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/de ltar 'phags skor la 'grel pa bcu gnyis dang*/_sgrub thabs la sogs kyi skor la bzhi bcu rtsa 
[\[372a.5\]]bdun te chos skor lnga bcu nga dgu'o//_//ji pa la/_slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi skor gyi 'grel pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa man ngag gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba le'u bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa 
[\[372a.6\]]zhes kyang bya ba slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_'di slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyi dngos slob tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gang zag bzhi'i ya gyal rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen dang gcig mi gcig dpyad byar lus so/_/gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa zhes pa le'u 
[\[372a.7\]]bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs pa man chad kyi 'grel pa slob dpon bi shwa na mi tras mdzad pa/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon tha ga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]nyi pa la/_rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po tsi lu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba rtsa rgyud le'u bcu bdun pa slob 
[\[372b.2\]]dpon rgyal bas byin gyis mdzad pa dang*/_rgyud phyi ma le'u bco brgyad pa dang bcas pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon sman pa'i bu rgyal bas byin gyis mdzad pa gnyis/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab ye shes kyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis lha sa 'phrul snang du paN+Di ta ting 'dzin rdo rjes yang zhu chen 
[\[372b.3\]]bgyis/_yang slad kyis paN+Di ta shrI su n+yA ya mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyis bcos pa rnams bzhugs so//_//ti pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon byang phyogs kyi lam la mkhas pa chen po slob dpon zla ba'i 'od dang*/_ming gzhan rin chen 
[\[372b.4\]]rdo rje myu gus mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su n+yA shrI mi tra dang*/_bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis mang yul grong gi lha khang ka ru dang ag tsar sgang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_yang dag rig byed ces bya ba rgyud phyi ma'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon bir+ya pA das mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[372b.5\]]po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba le'u bcu gsum pa yan slob dpon chen po rat+na a kar shAn+tis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//thi pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus 
[\[372b.6\]]pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog gi le'u bcu bzhi pa man chad slob dpon chen po rat+na A kar shAn+tis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_'di ye shes zhabs kyi rjes 'brang bya ba'i dmigs bsal mi 'dug na'ang*/_lha'i bskyed chog la sogs ye shes zhabs lugs dang 
[\[372b.7\]]mthun par byung zhing*/_sngar gyi mkhas pa dag gis kyang ye shes zhabs lugs kyi phyogs su bris 'dug pas 'dir yang de ltar bris so/_/gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bshad pa zla ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon rab tu dga' ba'i 'byung gnas go chas mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]de ltar rgyud so so'i 'grel pa rnams bkod nas/_spyi'i man ngag la sogs pa'i sgrub skor la/_di pa la/_rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung 'jam dpal zhal lung chen mor grags pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[373a.2\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_zhal gyi lung chung ba dpal ldan o+o D+yAn yul nas byung ba'i sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag_/lo tsA ba dge slong khyung wer rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i 
[\[373a.3\]]thabs byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru'i rdul la reg pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_yan lag bzhi'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes 
[\[373a.4\]]zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal he ru ka sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa/_'di gsum la sgrub pa'i thabs kun tu bzang mo gsum zhes zer ro/_/grol ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje slob dpon sangs 
[\[373a.5\]]rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_rje btsun 'phags pa 
[\[373a.6\]]gnod 'dzin chu dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gsang ba'i dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs dang*/_rgya che ba'i dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis 
[\[373a.7\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ya se na dang*/_btsun pa dar ma yon tan gyi 'gyur/_sbyin sreg gnyis kyi cho ga dang*/_gtor chog mi nub pa'i sgron ma dang*/_tshogs 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'khor lo dang*/_rin chen 'bar ba dang*/_rtsa ba'i ye shes chen po dang*/_tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod dang*/_byang chub sems 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]kyi thig le dang*/_bkra shis kyi rnam bshad chen po dang*/_rgyud kyi rnam bshad dang*/_dkyil 'khor cho ga nyis brgya lnga bcu pa rnams la lung dang mthun pa'i chos bcu bzhi zhes bshad pa la/_rgyud kyi rnam bshad ni ma mdzad/_dkyil chog ni kha cher khyer nas rgya gar na med par bshad/_gzhan rnams la gong du smos pa rnams ma gtogs pa bod 
[\[373b.2\]]du 'gyur ba mi snang ngo*/_/stang stabs kyi bkod pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa sangs rgyas ye shes kyi dngos slob tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'da' ba bzhi'i ya gyal slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[373b.3\]]gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur rnams so/_/da ni de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'grel pa'i skor la/_mdzes pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhal gyi lung gi 'grel pa/_slob dpon chen po bi ta pA des mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_
[\[373b.4\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_kun tu bzang po'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa byang phyogs kyi dge slong yon tan 'byung gnas bzang po'i slob ma shrI pha la badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bIr+ya b+ha dra dang*/_bi b+hA ka ra dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal kun tu 
[\[373b.5\]]bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tha ga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ni pa la/_yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po'i snyem zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal kun tu 
[\[373b.6\]]bzang pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po n+ya yan shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bal yul mthil du 'gyur/_grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal 
[\[373b.7\]]mtshan gyi 'gyur/[ (*]bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa yang zer/[)]dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bIr+ya b+ha dra dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba rnams so/_/da ni de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs dkyil chog 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]la sogs pa'i skor la/_yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang*/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo 
[\[374a.2\]]tsA ba mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//pi pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/_sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa/_gtor ma chen po'i cho ga_/mi shigs 
[\[374a.3\]]pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_bdag gi don grub par byed pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i rim pa rnams slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la guh+ya dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_
[\[374a.4\]]sbyor ba yan lag drug gi snang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bla ma chen po paN+Di ta puN+ya shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong g.yung drung 'od kyi 'gyur/_slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam bshad dpal gsang ba 'dus 
[\[374a.5\]]pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal kun tu bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ga ta kIrtis bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa/[ (*]ma byung [)]kun tu bzang po'i bsdus don slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_dpal gsang 
[\[374a.6\]]ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rgyal bas byin gyis 
[\[374a.7\]]mdzad pa dang*/_ye shes zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dpal mi bskyod rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di la smr-i ti'i rang 'gyur cig kyang yod mod kyi/_don gcig cing 'gyur 'di 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]bzang bas bris so/_/dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rtogs sla zhing mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs dpal mkhas pa chen po puN+yA shrI mi tras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dbang gi rab tu byed pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal dga' ba'i 
[\[374b.2\]]rdo rjes mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad ni tshigs bcad sum brgya/_bam po gcig pa/_tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba mdor bsdus pa paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad 
[\[374b.3\]]pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar dang*/_mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_yan lag bdun pa sh+lau ka bzhi brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/_de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba/_de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa rnams slob dpon ngag gi dbang 
[\[374b.4\]]phyug grags pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dpe las zhu gtugs byas pa/_'di gsum gsang 'dus kyi chos skor yin yang ye shes zhabs lugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gsal kha mi snang ste/_sngar gyi rnams kyis ye shes zhabs lugs kyi skor du bris 
[\[374b.5\]]'dug pas bris so/_/rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dpe med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bIr+ya b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_gsang 'dus kyi dkyil 'khor la spyan ras gzigs gtso bor ston pa dpal gsang ba 
[\[374b.6\]]'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa rnams slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen 
[\[374b.7\]]bzang po'i 'gyur/_de kho na nyid bcu pa slob dpon rgyan pas mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_brtan pa'i 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]nor thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyi 'gyur/_khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dbang gtan la dbab pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa dge slong 'od srung 
[\[375a.2\]]gzhon nus mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi lugs/_paN+Di ta smr-i tis mdzad cing*/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya 
[\[375a.3\]]ba ye shes zhabs kyi lugs 'di gnyis 'grel pa chen po nas sbyor drug la mos pa zhig gis logs su phyung ba yin par 'dug pas logs su ma bris kyang btub mod kyi/_sngar gyi rnams kyis kyang bris 'dug cing don bzang bas bris so/_/'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 
[\[375a.4\]]sbyin gyis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros seng ges zhus chen byas nas paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//phi pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud la brten pa'i arga'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba dang*/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho 
[\[375a.5\]]ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal paN+Di ta wa ren+d+ra pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i paN+Di ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag gis mdzad pa/_rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 
[\[375a.6\]]slob dpon dpal kA tsa zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_zha lu lo tsA ba d+harmA pA la b+ha dras dben gnas dpal e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur ba/_dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud las phyung ba spyan ma'i ngan song sbyong ba'i cho ga dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[375a.7\]]po a wa d+hU tI bai ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba khams pa ldi ri chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba/_dus tha ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga ming gzhan gshin po bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas la 'god pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal phyogs dbang 
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]dga' byed dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur ba rnams so/_/de ltar ye shes zhabs lugs kyi 'grel pa'i skor bcu/_sgrub thabs rab gnas la sogs kyi chos skor lnga bcu rtsa bdun te/_chos skor drug cu rtsa bdun no//_//de ltar ye shes zhabs lugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkod nas/_da ni 
[\[375b.2\]]slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa la sogs pa'i bzhed pa'i lugs kyi gsang 'dus kyi skor ni/_rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsA na'i 'gyur/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 
[\[375b.3\]]rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad pa/_dpal bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ma la gar+b+has mdzad pa rnams te/_'di dag sngar gyi rnams kyis 
[\[375b.4\]]ye shes zhabs lugs kyi gseb tu bris mod kyi/_'di dag ye shes zhabs lugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gsal kha med cing*/_lha bskyed chog la sogs kyang 'phags skor dang cha mthun par 'dug cing*/_ye shes zhabs lugs dang mi mthun pas lugs gud du byas so/_/dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 
[\[375b.5\]]lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_de ltar rdo rje bzhad pa lugs kyi chos skor lnga'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma gnyis bla ma'i man ngag las 
[\[375b.6\]]bris pa zhes bya ba dang*/_lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad cing*/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad 
[\[375b.7\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa ye shes grags pas bsgyur ba rnams te 'di dag kyang sngar gyi rnams kyi ye shes zhabs lugs kyi skabs su gtogs par bshad mod kyi/_ye shes zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gsal kha med cing*/_bzang po zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang bar smr-i tis gsal bar gsungs pas 'di 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]dag kyang lugs tha dad yin no/_/de ltar bzang po zhabs dang smr-i ti'i chos skor gsum mo//_//bi pa la/_dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shrI d+ha ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin 
[\[376a.2\]]chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_slad nas A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas zhus te gtan la phab pa/_'di 'grel pa mkhan pos rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bkral nas snang na yang rgyud kyi ngo bo rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud yin pas skabs 'dir bris so zhes pa rnams kun mkhyen pas gsungs so/_/de ltar slob dpon kun dga' 
[\[376a.3\]]snying po'i lugs kyi chos skor gcig go_/gsang 'dus 'phags skor ye shes zhabs lugs dang*/_/rdo rje bzhad pa bzang po'i zhabs dang ni/_/smr-i ti kun dga' snying po la sogs pa'i/_/chos skor brgya dang sum cu rtsa lnga bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i chos skor bzhugs 
[\[376a.4\]]pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud dang 'brel pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni de'i cha dang mthun pa'i rgyud gshin rje gshed kyi skor la/_gshin rje gshed dgra nag gi rgyud le'u bco brgyad pa'i 'grel pa dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 
[\[376a.5\]]'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon shrI d+ha ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rat+na ka ra shAn+ti 
[\[376a.6\]]pas mdzad pa/_A tsAr+ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis dad pas bsgyur/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par mthong ba'i lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po kr-iSh+Na pa chen pos mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa 
[\[376a.7\]]pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba shar phyogs b+haM ga la ra bi kra ma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang du sku 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa chen po a wa d+hU tI pa gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po lI la badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]dpyal se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba/_gshin rje dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma pA Nis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi slob dpon ba ra me shwa ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//mi pa la/_
[\[376b.2\]]gshin rje nag po'i sgrub thabs tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dang*/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob 
[\[376b.3\]]dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed dgra nag gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo 
[\[376b.4\]]tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla ma'i 'gyur/_mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badzras mdzad pa dang*/_srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa dang*/_gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon nyin mor 
[\[376b.5\]]byed pa'i grags pas mdzad pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar gyi phyi mo dang gtugs te gtan la phab pa/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon g+ho Sha badzras mdzad pa/_bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de tshogs chag chung ba'i 'gyur/_
[\[376b.6\]]dpal gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs bzhi brgya 
[\[376b.7\]]lnga bcu pa las btus pa dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la rak+Shi ta zhes bya bas bsdus pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_maN+Dal gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]gar gyi mkhan po a du la da sa dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rak+Shi tas gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba shrI pradz+nyA dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_gshin rje'i dgra 
[\[377a.2\]]nag po'i sgrub thabs ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_A tsAr+ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs 
[\[377a.3\]]zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI paN+Di tas mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/_gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs 
[\[377a.4\]]zhes bya ba/_'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i 
[\[377a.5\]]sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_las kyi rdo rje gau rI ma'i sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa dang*/_rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes 
[\[377a.6\]]bya ba nA da ku be ra las byung ba'i don kun da na k+She ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_dbyug pa gshin 
[\[377a.7\]]rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_pad+ma gshin rje gshed kyi shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba zangs gling nA ga pU ri'i rnal 'byor pa ka ma la rak+Shi tas ta ru ba ri'i dur khrod kyi tshal du mdzad pa/_chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba mchod rten gyi cho ga rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed kyi ro sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/_tshogs kyi 'khor 
[\[377b.2\]]lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba bla ma nag po zhabs kyis dpal rdo rje gdan du mdzad pa/_de rnams rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_yi dwags thams cad rdo rjes bcings pa slob dpon 
[\[377b.3\]]chen po dpal nag po pas mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa/_dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga_/gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs 
[\[377b.4\]]slob dpon kun tu bzang pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje'i 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub 
[\[377b.5\]]thabs slob dpon la li ta badzras mdzad pa/_'o ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon A tsAr+ya dzi mu dra pA das mdzad pa/_A tsAr+ya badzra pA Ni dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag slob dpon nA ga bo d+his mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyi 
[\[377b.6\]]'gyur/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po la lI ta badzras mdzad pa/_'chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje gshed kyi lag mchod dA na shI las mdzad cing*/_de nyid kyis bsgyur ba 'di gshed dmar gyi skor yin te 'brel 'dug pas der bzhag go/_/gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 
[\[377b.7\]]'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba A tsAr+ya kIrtis mdzad pa dang*/_rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa gcig go/_/de ltar gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'grel skor lnga dang*/_sgrub skor la sogs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/_chos skor lnga bcu nga bzhi'o//_//rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi skor la/_
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon so na shrIs mdzad pa/_
[\[378a.2\]]mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta'i zhal nas brgyud pa zhes yod pa/_'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pas mdzad pa/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla bas 
[\[378a.3\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags kyis 'gyur/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nag po pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid las blangs nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta dpal 
[\[378a.4\]]bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam par snang mdzad srung ba dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri d+harma kIrti'i 'gyur/_rdo rje 'jigs byed 
[\[378a.5\]]zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya A nan+da dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi 
[\[378a.6\]]bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang*/_sgrub pa'i cho ga dang*/_las sbyor/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje'i rang 'gyur/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon many+dzu shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad 
[\[378a.7\]]pa/_zhang 'or ston pa shes rab bsod nams kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs dang*/_las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa A tsAr+ya don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje nyid kyi rang 'gyur la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing*/_slar yang phyug mtshams dbang phyug rgyal pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rwa rdo rje grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bsad pa'i 
[\[378b.2\]]'khor lo la li tas mdzad pa/_dpal de kho na nyid grub pa slob dpon chen po ke ra lis mdzad pa/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpal la li ta badzras mdzad pa/_grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[378b.3\]]mar pa dge bsnyen chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje'i tshig rnal 'byor dbye ba zhes bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzras mdzad pa/_rdo rje tsartsi ka'i las sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rgyas sras bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas glo 
[\[378b.4\]]bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur ba/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon a shwa ka shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/_dpal 
[\[378b.5\]]rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_rdo rje dkar mo'i sgrub thabs rnams grub thob 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rgyal sras dpal bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i khab sku mkhar nyi 
[\[378b.6\]]gzungs su bsgyur ba/_las kyi gshin rje'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dAr+pan A tsAr+yas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes dag par bsgyur ba/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon many+dzu badzras mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di 
[\[378b.7\]]ta b+ha ro phyag rdum dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba slob dpon rat+na A ka ra shAn+tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyi 'gyur/_tsuts+tshun+d+ha ra'i rtog pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi phyag 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]dpe las rwa rdo rje grags kyis phyis bsgyur ba/_rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba a mo g+ha badzras mdzad pa/_rwa rdo rje grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon la li ta badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI de ba 
[\[379a.2\]]dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru ban+de shes rab bla ma'i 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs dang*/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa/_'jigs byed kyi zhi ba'i bya ba bdun pa paN+Di ta a mo g+ha chung bas mdzad pa/_drag po'i bya ba bdun pa 
[\[379a.3\]]de nyid kyis mdzad pa/_'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga_las kyi grogs kyi bya ba/_dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te brten pa'i cho ga dang gsum po 'di kha cig rtog pa gsum pa'i rgyud du 'dod de/_kha cig man ngag tu 'dod de zhang lo tsA ba shes rab bla ma'i 'gyur/_gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs 
[\[379a.4\]]byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_u to bo pa ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dz+nyA na ka ras mdzad pa/_zla ba'i 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs 
[\[379a.5\]]byed kyi bstod pa/_de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa/_yang 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa gcig_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_zhang lo tsA ba shes rab bla ma'i 'gyur/_'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa/_slob dpon las kyi 
[\[379a.6\]]rgyal pos mdzad pa/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba dang*/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/
[\[379a.7\]]de ltar 'jigs byed kyi skor la 'grel skor lnga sgrub thabs la sogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/_chos skor bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no//_//tsi pa la/_gdong drug gi skor la/_dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_de la 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]phan pa'i le'u gcig slob dpon rig pa bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal u pA ya shrI mi tra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba/_gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon de wa A ka ra tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_
[\[379b.2\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wa A ka ra tsan+d+ra de nyid dang*/_cog ro ban+de shes rab bla ma'i 'gyur/_u rgyan nas byung ba'i gshin rje'i dgra brub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa ste de ltar gdong drug gi chos skor la bzhi'o//_//gshed dmar skor la/_gshin rje mthar 
[\[379b.3\]]byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon shrI bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di 
[\[379b.4\]]ta dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_gtor ma'i [(*]ma byung*/[)]cho ga gnyis dang*/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byin rlabs kyi man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa slob dpon mthu stobs kyi mgon po dpal bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta re wen+d+ra dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_gshed 
[\[379b.5\]]dmar gyi rdzogs rim shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon dpal mthu stobs kyi mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa/_chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dngos grub 
[\[379b.6\]]brnyes pa dpal dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga slob dpon bir+Wa pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs dpal dpa' bo rgyal pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang*/_
[\[379b.7\]]chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi phreng ba slob dpon bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po dA na shI las yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur/_dpal gshin rje gshed dmar 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]po'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su bzung ba nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer 
[\[380a.2\]]dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs la mnga' brnyes pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_glo bo lo tsA'i 
[\[380a.3\]]'gyur/_gshed dmar [(*]ma byung*/[)]gyi yum bzhi so so'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dal du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rnams grub thob dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal 
[\[380a.4\]]bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba'i gdan sa dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur ba/_dpal gshin rje gshed nag po dang dmar po mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang*/_chag chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed dmar 
[\[380a.5\]]po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad srung 
[\[380a.6\]]bas mdzad pa/_rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa slob dpon chen po mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa rnams paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje 
[\[380a.7\]]dpal gyis bsgyur ba/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed bsdus pa dang*/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed slob dpon gnas brtan byang chub snying pos mdzad pa/_rdo rje gdan pa niSh+ka lang+ka dang*/_dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]gshin rje'i dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po blo bzang snying po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba'i gdan sa dpal thar pa gling du legs par bsgyur ba/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 
[\[380b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dAr+pan A tsAr+Yas mdzad pa dang*/_gshin rje gshed mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa grub 
[\[380b.3\]]thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa grub thob mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wa A ka ra dang*/_
[\[380b.4\]]lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos 'gyur la/_dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'gyur/_snga 'gyur la 'di las tshan che tsam gda'o zhes bu ston gyis gsungs so/_/'od 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis 
[\[380b.5\]]mdzad pa/_sgyur byed kyi lo paN snga ma dang 'dra'o/_/rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta rgya gar mngon shes can dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khugs pas bsgyur ba las/_dus phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba dAr+pan 
[\[380b.6\]]A tsAr+Ya dang*/_lo tsA ba shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang*/_me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis legs par bsgyur ba/_bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba 
[\[380b.7\]]rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_srung 'khor gyi byin rlabs dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba dang*/_bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gdams rnal 'byor 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]gyi dbang phyug dngos grub mchog brnyes pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a nu pa ma rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyi 'gyur la/_phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar gnyis su rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhan po chen po dAr+pan A tsAr+Ya dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab 
[\[381a.2\]]rin chen gyi 'gyur/_'di'i dpe bar skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad du rgyun chad pa la/_phyis au D+yAn du mkha' 'gro ma rgya mtsho'i gos can las rnal 'byor pa san+ta wa lan+tas zhus te byung ngo*/_/gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dA na shI la dang*/_
[\[381a.3\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams seng ge'i 'gyur/_gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phreng ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba la longs spyod can ma'i rtog pa/_rin chen phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs/_klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs/_klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_klu mo a 
[\[381a.4\]]phu zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_dga' bas tshim ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_gnod sbyin nA Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs/_gnod sbyin mo sa'i bdag mo bkra shis ma'i sgrub thabs/_gnod sbyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs/_rdeg par byed pa'i gnod 
[\[381a.5\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi sgrub thabs/_dpal zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs/_yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs/_legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs/_spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs/_'dod chags dgas pa'i sgrub thabs/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya 
[\[381a.6\]]ba'i sgrub thabs/_lhag par rgyal ba mi pham pa'i sgrub thabs/_gang ba bzang po'i sgrub thabs/'byung mo mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs/_dbang rgyal ma mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs/_dri med mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs/_sha za pi lU'i sgrub thabs/_sha za nor bu 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs/_sha za nag po'i 
[\[381a.7\]]sgrub thabs/_sha za nag po snying po'i sgrub thabs/_sha za mo ha na ma na'i sgrub thabs/_a lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_a la gup+ta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_bong bu'i gdong can ma'i sgrub thabs/_sha za a lu bi ni'i zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_uts+tshusma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_k+Shu k+Shu se 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]ri kun+da'i sgrub thabs/_sha za mo rna ba 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs/_sha za mo kha nag mo'i sgrub thabs te/_de ltar sgrub thabs sum cu rtsa drug gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhabs rdul la reg pa slob dpon shes rab skyong gis mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[381b.2\]]shar phyogs b+haM ga la'i paN+Di ta dA na shI la zhes bya bas gnas byin gyis brlabs pa drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs lam gyi snying po zhes bya ba mkhas grub rnal 'byor chen po bud+d+ha dz+nyA na pA das u ga ya na 'bar ba'i phug tu badzra wA rA hI nyid las 
[\[381b.3\]]dngos su thob pa dang*/_lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/_sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba rnams rdo rje phag mos dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs 
[\[381b.4\]]kyis mdzad pa/_yul dbus kyi paN+Di ta A nan+da b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong khyer ti ra ha ti'i lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa/_slar yang thar pa lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan 
[\[381b.5\]]gyis shrI nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang chen por bcos pa/_de ltar gshin rje gshed dmar la chos skor bdun cu don gnyis so/_/'phags pa gshin rje tshe bdag nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_gtor ma dang bcas pa dang*/_dpal gshin rje tshe bdag nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dran gsal dpal nag po 
[\[381b.6\]]zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po nag po'i zhabs de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba gnyan dar gyi 'gyur rnams te/_de ltar tshe bdag la chos skor gsum mo/_/'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud/_/gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje 'jigs byed dang*/_/gdong drug gshed dmar sogs dang tshe bdag 
[\[381b.7\]]bcas/_/chos skor brgya dang brgyad cu tham pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni gshin rje gshed dmar nag la sogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar gshin rje gshed dmar nag la sogs pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa rnal 'byor bla med kyi lugs su 
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]bkral ba'i skor la/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta mngon shes can gyi phyag nas byung ba/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas dang shes rab brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_mtshan yang dag 
[\[382a.2\]]par brjod pa'i 'grel pa tshul gsum gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma 'di gnyis rgyud sde spyir bkral bar snang zhing the tshom gyi gzhi yod pa rnams bzhugs so//_//tshi pa la/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon bi ma la mi tras 
[\[382a.3\]]mdzad nas thugs kyi sras nyang ting nge 'dzin gyis zhus pa gnyags dz+nyA na'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad zer ba 'di ni the tshom gyi gzhi'o zhes gsungs so/_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nye bar bsdus 
[\[382a.4\]]pa'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI badzra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpyal se rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis gangs can pa'i skad du legs par bsgyur ba/_nor bu gling du sku 'khrungs pa'i 
[\[382a.5\]]dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa'i sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang*/_de'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge gnyis kyi don bsdus pa mtshan gyi sgron me zhes bya ba pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa/_'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i 
[\[382a.6\]]mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/_rang bzhin du 
[\[382a.7\]]gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa/_rmi lam brtag pa/_sangs rgyas byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel bar byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yid 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_thig le grub pa/_thig le gcig pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal ye 
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]shes sems dpa'i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_slob dpon chen po mai tri pa'i gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa dang*/_dpal mai tri pas mdzad pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[382b.2\]]gyi zab cing rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa mkhas pa chen po dril bu pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI sid+d+hi dang*/_dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes 
[\[382b.3\]]bya ba/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa/_rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag ces bya ba/_khrus kyi cho ga_gtor ma'i cho ga_/bdun tshigs kyi cho ga_/ro bsreg pa'i cho ga_/sAts+tsha gdab pa'i rim pa/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga_sbyin sreg gi cho 
[\[382b.4\]]ga_/thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag_maN+Dal dbul ba'i man ngag ste bcu gsum po rnams ni bram ze sdom pa bzang pos mdzad cing*/_'bro lo tsA ba d+harmA b+hi'i 'gyur/_'di dag la the tshom za ba snang yang rgya gar mar byed kyin 'dug pas bris so zhes gsungs/_mtshan brjod rnal 'byor 
[\[382b.5\]]chen po bla med du/_/dgongs pa 'grel pa'i rgyud 'grel rnam pa lnga/_/sgrub thabs la sogs nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/_/dril bas chos skor sum cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni 'jam dpal mtshan brjod bla med du bkral ba'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin 
[\[382b.6\]]to//_//de ltar 'jam dpal mtshan brjod rnal 'byor bla med du bkral ba'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_bde chen ral gcig gi skor la/_bde chen ral gcig [(*]ma byung*/[)]lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sgrub thabs/_dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba grub pa brnyes 
[\[382b.7\]]pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa/_dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi pham sbas pas mdzad pa/_dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs mi pham sbas pa'i bshes gnyen nam/_mtshan gyi rnam grangs rol pa'i rdo rjes 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]mdzad pa/_dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shrI badzra kIrtis mdzad pa/_dpal ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas pa mi tra dzo kis mdzad pa rnams shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba 
[\[383a.2\]]byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mi pham zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su b+hA shAn+ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+hA shrI b+ha dra dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs 
[\[383a.3\]]byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_de'i rdzogs rim ston pa'i man ngag rang gi sems ngal bso ba'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las dngos su gsan nas/_grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da pa/_
[\[383a.4\]]skad gnyis smra ba chen po byams pa'i dpal gyis yang dag par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa/_dpal khar+sa pA Ni yab yum gyi sgrub thabs/_gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra dzo kis mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang 
[\[383a.5\]]phyug mi tra A nan+da'i phrin las kyis lha'i rigs gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_'di dag ma rgyud kyi phyogs su gtogs pa 'dra bar snang yang bla ma rnams kyis pha rgyud kyi phyogs su byas snang bas 'dir bris so/_/rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba zhes bya ba rje btsun 
[\[383a.6\]]ma nyi mas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa kha che'i paN+Di ta dri med dpal bzang pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba yar lungs pa shud 
[\[383a.7\]]ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_kul lo ka nA tha'i byin rlabs paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI'i zhal snga nas byung ba bzhin bris pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i rjes gnang gi cho ga kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_shong lo tsA ba blo 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]brtan gyi 'gyur/_rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs bram ze b+h+ring+ga ras mdzad pa/_'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs mi tra dzo kis mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_
[\[383b.2\]]'di rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs shing*/_thabs shes rab kyi rgyud 'dir gtogs pa gsal bar ma gsungs kyang*/_thabs rgyud dang mthun pa gtso bor snang bas 'dir bkod do zhes bu ston gyis gsungs/_dpal thugs rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i man ngag gi rab tu byed pa zhes 
[\[383b.3\]]bya ba'am/_pad+ma zab pa dang pad+ma rgyal po gnyis kyi dbang chog sbyin sreg dpal dzA lan+d+ha ras mdzad pa/_mnga' bdag mai tri pa'i phyag dpe las rgya gar phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ma gcig grub 
[\[383b.4\]]pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa/_sba lcag ma'i gzhung la/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i rgya gzhung*/_rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rnams rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma 
[\[383b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+d+ra bla ma dang*/_lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs ye shes mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye 
[\[383b.6\]]shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos byas pa yin zer ba rnal 'byor bla med du byas pa 'di rgya gzhung yin zer ba rnams so/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang rnal 'byor bla med du/_/gyur pa'i ral gcig 'jig rten mgon la sogs/_/tshe 
[\[383b.7\]]dpag med pa'i chos skor rnam brgyad de/_/bcu phrag gnyis la drug gis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bde chen ral gcig la sogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar bde chen ral gcig gi chos skor rnams bkod nas/_phyag na rdo rje 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du bkral ba la/_'khor lo chen po'i skor ni/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa bdud rtsi myu gu zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i dza wa ri pas sa wa ri pa la man ngag tu zhus pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_de wa pUr+Na 
[\[384a.2\]]ma ti dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/_lag na rdo rje go sngon po 
[\[384a.3\]]can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs gsum dang*/_klu rigs bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnam par sbyong zhing sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/_yi dwags dang grul bum dang sha za dang srul po rnams 
[\[384a.4\]]rnam par sbyong zhing sel ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ste 'jig rten pa'i sgrub thabs gsum dang*/_dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rnams nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po bram ze'i btsun pa dza wa ri pas 
[\[384a.5\]]mdzad pa/_bla ma de wa pUr+Na ma ti dang*/_lo tsA ba she'u badzra de was bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bla ma las shin tu legs par zhus te cung zad bcos pa/_rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba/_bsad pa bdud rtsis gso ba zhes bya ba/_bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa zhes bya ba/_
[\[384a.6\]]klu khro bo bsad pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba/_klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 
[\[384a.7\]]'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba rnams nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dza wa ri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]gyi mkhan po de wa pUr+Na ma ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong mgar chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur te de ltar bco brgyad do/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i srung ba zhes bya ba nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa dza wa ri'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de wa pUr+Na ma ti dang*/_lo 
[\[384b.2\]]tsA ba she'u badzra de wa'i 'gyur/_phyag na rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du bkral ba la/_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku dngos su sprul nus pa phyag na rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_
[\[384b.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_slob dpon des [(*]ma byung*/[)]mdzad pa'i me lce'i phreng ba'i sgrub thabs so/_/slob dpon b+ha wa pas mdzad pa'i skor la/_'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[384b.4\]]dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs che ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs chung ba/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag_/rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye 
[\[384b.5\]]ba rnams slob dpon b+ha wa pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba khu pa bIr+Ya dang dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//dzi pa la/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyor ka chen po'i cho ga_/phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga 
[\[384b.6\]]tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka_/rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka_/dbang gi sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka_/drag po'i las kyi sbyor ka_/bsdus pa'i las kyi sbyor ka_/phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/maN+Dal gyi sbyor ka rnams slob dpon b+ha wa pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba 
[\[384b.7\]]gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon b+ha wa pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon bIr+Ya gup+ta dang*/_slad kyis lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur te dur khrod nags tshal du brgyud pa'i slob dpon la shin tu gsang zhing 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]legs par mnos pa/_phyag na rdo rje rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig phreng ba dang*/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi gsang ba'i yang bkol gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa/_slad kyis bla ma dza yA ka ra dang*/_
[\[385a.2\]]lo tsA ba mar pa'i 'gyur/_'dir lce dbab pa'i bya thabs/_rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba gnyis mdzad 'gyur ma nges pa/_lag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sngon 'gro'i lag len rnal 'byor gyi sbyor lam brgyad po slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyi mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dza yA ka ra dang*/_mar 
[\[385a.3\]]pa lo tsA'i 'gyur/_gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa rnams so/_/gtum po lha lnga'i skor la/_rdo rje gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa klu sgrub 
[\[385a.4\]]kyis mdzad pa gnyis so/_/gtum po khyung gsham ma'i skor la/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang bya khyung gi sgrub thabs zhes nang sgrub yid bzhin nor bu dang*/_dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba gsang ba thugs kyi phur gcig ma paN+Di ta las kyi 
[\[385a.5\]]rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta wa la tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_rig sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus/_klu gtor rgyas pa rnams glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_khro bo rdo rje gtum po'i 
[\[385a.6\]]sgrub thabs rgyal po zla ba'i snying pos mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba sgeg pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje pad+mas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta sa'i snying po dang*/_lo tsA ba rma ban gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob 
[\[385a.7\]]dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po zla ba bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyi 'gyur ba rnams so/_/phyag na rdo rje be con mar grags pa'i skor la/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa/_be con can gyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa las rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_'phags pa gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon chen po mchog rab snying pos mdzad pa/_lag 
[\[385b.2\]]na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa rtog pa drug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon gu ya rU pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba mkha' 'gro'i gling nas dum bu brgyad du legs par bris pa/_de'i bshad rgyud 'bum phrag phyed dang sum stong las phyung ba 'di rgyud du 'dod do/_/de kho na nyid 
[\[385b.3\]]sgron ma zhes bya ba phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyan dge slong klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas dang*/_lo tsA ba glang dpal gyi seng ge'i 'gyur/_slad kyis kyang paN+Di ta des rgya gar nas sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ro/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje 
[\[385b.4\]]gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/sngags kyi rgyan gyi sgrub thabs/_rab gnas kyi rgyan rnams dge slong nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa/_gtor ma'i rgyan dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa/_dam tshig gi rgyan/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs dge slong klu'i byang chub 
[\[385b.5\]]kyis mdzad pa/_de'i 'grel pa sngags kyi rgyan gyi 'grel pa dang*/_dam tshig gi rgyan gyi rnam par bshad pa slob dpon mchog rab kyis mdzad pa/_zangs dkar tshul khrims gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa klu sgrub 
[\[385b.6\]]snying po zhes kyang bya/_slob dpon klu'i byang chub ces bya bas mdzad pa/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs pa dang*/_de kho na 
[\[385b.7\]]nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon dpa' bos byin gyis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so/_/phyag na rdo rje rnal 'byor chen por bkral ba'i skor 'di la the tshom za ba'i gzhi mang du snang yang bod na grags pa can du 'dug pas bris so zhes bu ston gyis gsungs so/_/'khor chen 
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]gtum po be con la sogs pa/_/phyag na rdo rje rnal 'byor bla med du/_/dgongs pa bkral ba'i rgyud 'grel sgrub skor sogs/_/bcu phrag bdun la gcig gis spras pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni phyag na rdo rje rnal 'byor bla med du bkral ba'i chos 
[\[386a.2\]]skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar thabs kyi rgyud dang*/_shes rab kyi rgyud dang*/_thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi so so'i bstan bcos rnams bkod nas/_da ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud spyi'i dgongs 'grel gyi skor la/_wi pa la/_rgyud ma 
[\[386a.3\]]lus pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa ma lus pas zhabs zung pad+mar me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa grub thob chen po pad+ma badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal 
[\[386a.4\]]ba'i 'gyur/_thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa grub pa slob dpon pad+ma badzra'i slob ma slob dpon chen po yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_gzhung de gnyis la brtan nas slob dpon 
[\[386a.5\]]de'i slob ma rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa'i ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba/_slad kyis nag tshos kyang bcos pa'o/_/gzhung de rnams la brten nas slob dpon de'i slob ma bcom 
[\[386a.6\]]ldan 'das ma lak+Sh+mI ka ras mdzad pa'i gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs/_gzhung de rnams la brten nas lcam gyi slob ma slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i dngos po gsal [(*]ma byung*/[)]ba grub pa/_dpal o rgyan nas byung ba gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag slob 
[\[386a.7\]]dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i slob ma slob dpon chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/_slob dpon de'i slob ma lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma tsi tos mdzad pa'i dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid grub pa paN+Di ta zhi ba bzang po dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]dpal lhan cig skyes pa grub pa zhes bya ba sgeg pa rdo rje'i slob ma slob dpon chen po dpal Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa de rnams la grub pa sde brgyad ces grag go_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba'i glu de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon pa don
