[\[386b.2\]]dam pa'i yi ge_phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa slob dpon klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa/_bla ma d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_'di man ngag snye ma la sogs par slob dpon klu sgrub kyis byas pa ma yin te/_so so'i skye bo man ngag mi shes 
[\[386b.3\]]pa kha cig gis byas so zhes bshad mod kyi 'on kyang rgya gar ma yin cing bod la grags pa gtsor byas nas bris so/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyis Ar+Ya de wa la bshad cing*/_des sems kyi sgrib sbyong mdzad de bris so/_/shes rab ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen 
[\[386b.4\]]po de wa tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta badzra pA Ni dang*/_lo tsA ba d+harma kIrti'i 'gyur/_gnas pa bsdus pa slob dpon chen po dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bla ma d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur la/_phyis bar ston gyis zhus nas bla ma rgya 
[\[386b.5\]]gar ba dang*/_mtshur lo tsA bas dpe phyi mo la gtugs te gtan la phab pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i slob dpon tog tse pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bde ba'i myu gu dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos kyi 'gyur te/_de ltar lnga dang*/_sems kyi sgrib [(*]ma byung*/[)]sbyong 
[\[386b.6\]]dang bcas pa'i drug po de la snying po'i skor zhes grags so/_/tha dad du chos spyod yod par ston pa lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mtshur ston ye 
[\[386b.7\]]shes 'byung gnas kyi 'gyur/_sngags kyi lta ba ston pa dbu ma drug pa slob dpon mkhas pa mai tris mdzad pa/_bla ma badzra pA Ni dang*/_nag tsho'i 'gyur/_lta ba ngan pa sel ba'i dka' 'grel dpal ldan nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pas mdzad pa dang*/_sngags kyi spyod pa 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]ston pa lhan skyes drug pa bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa/_bla ma badzra pA Ni dang*/_mtshur gyi 'gyur/_lta ba dpes ston pa rmi lam nges par bstan pa/_spyod pa dpes ston pa sgyu ma nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba/_lta ba'i don la 'bebs pa'i rab tu mi gnas par gsal 
[\[387a.2\]]bar ston pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta badzra pA Ni dang*/_nag tsho tshul rgyal gyi 'gyur/_spyod pa gtan la 'bebs pa de kho na nyid bcu pa zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bla ma phyag na dang mtshur gyi 'gyur la/_phyis lo tsA ba tshul 
[\[387a.3\]]khrims rgyal bas bcos pa/_thabs shes rab dbyer med du ston pa zung du 'jug pa rab tu gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba slob dpon a wa d+hU tIs mdzad pa/_badzra pA Ni dang*/_nag tsho tshul rgyal gyi 'gyur/_snang stong dbyer med du ston pa dga' gcugs lnga pa slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa/_'khor 
[\[387a.4\]]'das gnyis med du ston pa mi phyed pa lnga pa slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa/_bden gnyis tha mi dad du ston pa'i bde ba chen po gsal ba slob dpon a wa d+hU tI pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rnams bla ma badzra pA Ni dang rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_theg pa thun mong gi lta ba 
[\[387a.5\]]ston pa de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_badzra pA Ni dang*/_nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_gang zag gsum gyi rtogs thabs ston pa de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang*/_lha'i rnal 'byor gtan la 
[\[387a.6\]]'bebs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dbang gi dgos pa mdor bsdus pa/_dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa/_rang bzhin lnga pa/_thabs dang shes rab brtse ba 
[\[387a.7\]]lnga pa rnams slob dpon a wa d+hU tI pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mtshur dz+nyA na A ka ra'i 'gyur/_'di A ma nas kyi skor du mi bgrang bar snang*/_do ha ti zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi man ngag a wa d+hU tI pas mdzad pa/_rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i rang 'gyur/_
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]gang zag gsum gyi sgom thabs ston pa theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_yid la mi byed pa'i sgra la rtsod pa spong ba yid la mi byed pa ston pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 
[\[387b.2\]]gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyan chung gi 'gyur/_mtha' bral rtogs pa'i shes rab ston pa de kho na nyid theg pa chen po nyi shu pa a wa d+hU tI pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/_lo tsA ba seng dkar shAkya 'od 
[\[387b.3\]]kyi 'gyur/_shes pa spro bsdu med par 'jog pa'i man ngag gsang ba dam pa 'di gzhan rnam grangs su mi bgrang bar snang*/_dbang gi khyad par gtan la 'bebs pa dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba mai tri pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang 
[\[387b.4\]]lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_chos sna nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de mnga' bdag mai tri dang*/_mtshan gyi rnam grangs gnyis med rdo rje zhes kyang bya/_a wa d+hU tI pa zhes kyang bya bas mdzad pa'o/_/de'i rjes su 'brang ba bkas bskur ba'i chos bzhi la/_dbang bskur ba nges 
[\[387b.5\]]par bstan pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon dga' ba skyong gis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta sa man+ta b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho'i 'gyur/_de kho na nyid bcu pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa paN+Di ta chen po slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni las mnyan te/_slad kyis paN+Di 
[\[387b.6\]]ta ka l+yA na warma dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dz+nyA na A ka ra mtshur gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba rdo rje slob dpon badzra pA Nis zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba mtshur ston dge slong dz+nyA na A ka ra'i 'gyur/_paN+Di ta badzra pA Nis mdzad pa'i lta ba 
[\[387b.7\]]ngan sel gyi dran pa ni ma rnyed de/_de ltar chos sna nyi shu rtsa drug la a ma na se ka ra'i skor zhes grags so/_/'di'i gsang ba grub pa gsang 'dus kyi don 'grel yin pas de'i phyogs su rigs kyang*/_bod na grub rnying a ma na se'i skor zhes bshad bka' dang*/_man ngag gi bka' 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu yod pas 'dir lhan cig tu bris so/_/da ni de dag gi 'grel pa'i skor la/_do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar lho phyogs kyi yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po shrI bai 
[\[388a.2\]]ro tsa na badzra'i rang 'gyur/_mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba gnyug ma'i de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i rgya cher bshad pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i dgongs pa mkhas par grags pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor pa bsod 
[\[388a.3\]]snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_do ha mdzod kyi bka' 'grel zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thar pa'i 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal ba'i lha dang*/_rgya lo tsA'i 'gyur/_phyag rgya bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/_rgya gar 
[\[388a.4\]]gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa bla ma bi ta karmas mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/dA ri ka pas mdzad pa'i grub mtha' bdun pa/[ (*]ma byung*/[) ]rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen dang*/_rtses thang lo tsA'i 'gyur/_
[\[388a.5\]]dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu [(*]ma byung*/[)]byed pa paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen gyis mdzad pa/_byams pa gling pa'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//zhi pa la/_lhan cig skyes grub rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po zla ba mgon po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba shes rab grags kyi 'gyur/_lhan 
[\[388a.6\]]cig skyes grub kyi gzhung 'grel zhes bya ba lha lcam rje btsun ma dpal mos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma nA bi ha ra la dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_dpal de kho na nyid grub pa slob dpon chen po ke ra li pas mdzad pa/_'di 
[\[388a.7\]]gsum kha cig grub pa'i chos skor du gtogs par 'dod do/_/da ni de dag dang phyogs mthun pa phyag rgya chen po ston pa'i gzhung do ha la sogs pa'i skor la/_do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu dang*/_mi zad pa'i gter mdzod man ngag gi glu zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]phyug dpal bram ze chen po sa ra ha pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bla ma a sus zhus pa/_'di gnyis rgyal po do ha dang btsun mo do har grags shing*/_bram ze chen pos mdzad ma mdzad the tshom gyi gzhi'o/_/dmangs do ha dang*/_btsun mo do ha dang*/_
[\[388b.2\]]rgyal po do ha dang*/_do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bal po skye med bde chen gyis mdzad pa/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur du gtan la phab pa/_gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi la sbyar te ston pa ka kha'i do ha zhes bya ba dang*/_de'i 
[\[388b.3\]]rang 'grel ka kha'i do ha'i bshad pa bris pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu dpal sa ra has mdzad pa/_rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sa lar 'khrungs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badzra'i rang 'gyur/_do ha mdzod kyi snying po don gyi glu'i 
[\[388b.4\]]'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon a wa d+hU tI pas mdzad pa/_do ha sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo rje'i glu/_gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glu/_thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu/_sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba rnams sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar 
[\[388b.5\]]grags pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_bla ma nag po pa'i rang 'gyur/_do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri khrod pa chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_shrI bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta'i rang 'gyur/_de rnams lnga 
[\[388b.6\]]po bram zer chen po sa ra ha pas mdzad pa'o/_/man ngag tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa bram ze chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi 
[\[388b.7\]]lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta'i rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga pa'i 'grel pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po Ar+Ya de was 
[\[389a.2\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po ma hA kA ru Na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bir+Wa pas mdzad pa/_do ha mdzod slob dpon chen po til+li pas mdzad pa/_brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos 
[\[389a.3\]]mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa/_dpal bi rU pas mdzad pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams yul lho phyogs ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badzra'i rang 'gyur/_lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang dang*/_bdud 
[\[389a.4\]]rtsi grub pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnal 'byor pa las grub pa thob pa'i rgya gar e na de wa'i 'gyur/_mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas 
[\[389a.5\]]gzhung du bkod pa/_phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu brda brgyud gsang ba'i sgron ma dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang*/_mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan ma dang*/_pad+ma'i spyan gnyis rnams kyis snying po'i don mgur du bzhes pa/_slob dpon chen po nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu/_ma hA yo 
[\[389a.6\]]ga nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu/_yang rdo rje'i glu/_slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi rdo rje'i glu/_grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtog pa'i snying po zhes bya ba slob dpon dpa' bo 'od gsal gyis phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa dang*/_spyod pa'i glu'i mdzod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu 
[\[389a.7\]]de kho na nyid gsal bar shes pa'i skye bo rnams la slob dpon thub pas byin gyis 'grel pa mdzad pa la/_rdo rje'i glu 'grel pa dang bcas pa paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas gdams pa dang bcas pa zhus shing*/_chos kyi rje dpal ldan sa skya pa khu dbon rnams kyi 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]sku drin la brten nas bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bod kyi lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa zhes bya ba nor bu gling pa'i slob dpon bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_phyag rgya bzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad 
[\[389b.2\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas par ston pa'i de kho na nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi 'grel pa dpal a wa d+hU tI'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa zhes 
[\[389b.3\]]bya ba slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po shrI A nan+da badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 'char ba [(*]ma byung*/[)]zhes bya ba slob dpon lU hi 
[\[389b.4\]]pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen dang*/_byams pa gling pa'i 'gyur/_bsgom rim drug pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa'i badzra pA Nis mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_nag tsho'i 'gyur/_na mo bud+d+hA ya'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po slob dpon 
[\[389b.5\]]nag po rdo rjes mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba dang*/_dpal nag po rdo rje zhabs kyi do ha mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa paN+Di ta 'od dpag med kyis mdzad pa/_shrI bai ro tsa na badzra'i rang 'gyur/_phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag til+li pas nA ro pa la chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du gsungs pa/_rje nA ro'i lta ba mdor bsdus pa 
[\[389b.6\]]zhes bya ba lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyi 'gyur/_phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas go ri shar ba'i rgyal po'i khab tu rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa dang*/_mthu chen la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas gyad kyi nor bu'i grong 
[\[389b.7\]]du gdams pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_glu mkhan la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas 'dus pa rin po che'i tshong dus su gdams pa rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_mu stegs la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]po til+li pas rgyal po seng grags seng ge'i sgo drung du gdams pa chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_shan pa la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas rigs ngan gtum mo'i grong khyer du gsod pa'i sbyar ba bsam gyis mi 
[\[390a.2\]]khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_rig byed mkhan la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas grong khyer pad+ma can du gdams pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa rnal 'byor gi dbang phyug til+li pas grong khyer grags pa skyong du gdams 
[\[390a.3\]]pa dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba dang*/_smad 'tshong la gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas sgyu ma sprul pa'i grong khyer du gdams pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ste til+li pa'i chos brgyad do/_/'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung 
[\[390a.4\]]bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bi kra ma la shI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_slad nas bla ma de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos

[\[390b.1\]]lo btsun chung gi 'gyur ro/_/bskyed rim gyi skor la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/_'jam dpal khro bor sgrub pa de rnams rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad cing*/_paN+Di

[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]na dang*/_lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon lU hi pas mdzad pa/_rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon li lA pas mdzad pa/_las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi klu zhes bya ba

[\[392a.1\]]zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po pa nas brgyud pa'i slob dpon d+harma pas mdzad pa/_rang bzhin grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon d+ho ka ris mdzad pa/_lhan cig skyes pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba slob dpon me d+hi nis mdzad pa/_bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes

[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]pa dang*/_ltung ba sbom po bsdus pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_ltung ba bco lnga pa/_yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa/_rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad pa rnams slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_
[\[394b.2\]]slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun paN+Di ta chen po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bcos pa/_yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba/_rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_ma ga d+hA'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang*/_mang du thos 
[\[394b.3\]]pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas nA len+d+rar 'gyur/_rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po dpal lcam lak+Sh+mI ka ras mdzad pa/_rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa b+ha wa pa'i 
[\[394b.4\]]gdams ngag mngon par bkod pa/_slob dpon rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas gsungs pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa'i rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya 
[\[394b.5\]]cher 'grel pa lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa/_myang ro stag tshal du dI paM ka ra bod du byon tsam na bsgyur ba/_bu ri sha'i grong khyer du A tsAr+Ya u pa d+ha shrI badzra shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges legs par mnos te gus par bsgyur/_yang bal po'i khyim du 
[\[394b.6\]]rin chen grags pas kyang 'grel dpe rnying pa la gtugs te shin tu dag par bgyis pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bla ma mngon shes can rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa/_yul dbus kyi dpe ji lta ba bzhin lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug lag khang chen po dpal 
[\[394b.7\]]thar pa gling du bsgyur ba/_dpal gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'i snying po rgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa/_bal po'i mkhan po ka na ka shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta hA s+ya badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rjes 
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]bsgyur/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba ma hA paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta'i rang 'gyur/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 
[\[395a.2\]]'gyur/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga paN+Di ta bzang po sbyin pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa dang*/_
[\[395a.3\]]tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba A tsAr+Ya he ru ka badzras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra de 
[\[395a.4\]]nyid dang*/_rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba/_gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga dang*/_sa dang shing dang rdo'i cho ga gnyis kyi rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed cing zhwa lu lo tsA bas dpal sne'u gdong rtser bsgyur ba/_'di rnal 'byor chen po'i thabs rgyud las 'phros 
[\[395a.5\]]pa zhig 'dra na'ang gang gi dum bu yin ma gsal bas 'dir bkod do/_/dbyig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba cho ga'i bya ba bcu pa lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos dpal e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur/_'di rgyud sna tshogs las btus par snang bas 'dir bkod do/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos slob dpon 
[\[395a.6\]]gzugs bzang gis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so/_/rnal 'byor bla med spyi yi lta sgom dang*/_/dbang don sdom pa dam tshig la sogs dang*/_/tshogs 'khor rab gnas la sogs ston pa yi/_/chos skor nyis brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bla med spyi'i lta sgom spyod 
[\[395a.7\]]'bras la sogs pa ston pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar bla med spyi'i lta sgom spyod 'bras la sogs pa ston pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi skor la/rtsa ba'i rgyud de nyid bsdus pa'i skor ni/_dang po slob dpon sangs rgyas 
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]gsang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la/_'i pa la/_rgyud kyi don la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga bsdus pa slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba 'jam dpal go cha'i 'gyur/_
[\[395b.2\]]rgyud kyi don la 'jug pa'i 'grel bshad slob dpon chen po pad+ma badzras mdzad pa gnyis bzhugs so//_//yi ri gnyis la/_slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyi bzhed pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa'i skor la/_de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan zhes bya ba sh+lau ka stong phrag bcu gnyis pa mang 
[\[395b.3\]]du thos pa'i slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mu di ta ko Shas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma 
[\[395b.4\]]dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa mdor bsdus pa dang*/_dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i 'grel pa yul kha cher skyes pa'i rdo rje slob dpon shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge 
[\[395b.5\]]slong rin chen bzang pos skad gsar bcad kyis bcos pa/_thig gdab pa'i cho ga dka' ba spyod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon shud+d+hi pra b+has mdzad pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi thig gi cho ga slob dpon d+harma kIrtis mdzad pa/_khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dum bu las 'phros pa 'phags pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par 
[\[395b.6\]]rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon mu di ta ko Shas mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//li shi gnyis la/_slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i skor ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa de kho na 
[\[395b.7\]]nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba sh+lau ka stong phrag bco brgyad pa slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_dum bu dang po yan chad lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur la/_man chad rgya gar gyi mkhas pa paN+Di ta thugs rje chen po dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//si 
[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]hi i gsum la/_cha mthun gyi rgyud dpal mchog dang po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu'i 'grel pa slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal mchog dang 
[\[396a.2\]]po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba dum bu dang po'i phyag rgya bshad pa zhes bya ba sh+lau ka stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_smad 
[\[396a.3\]]'grel lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos ci rigs par bsgyur ba la/_gu ge'i yul gyi dbus byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dam sa'i snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po man+t+ra ka la sha dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i gdung brgyud 
[\[396a.4\]]lha bla ma dge slong zhi ba 'od kyis hor kong bsabs te yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur ba'o/_/'di la rgya dpe rnyed na hor kong bsabs dgos pa'ang da dung cha gnyis gsum snang ngo*/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad 
[\[396a.5\]]pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur ba/_rgyud 'di rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi 
[\[396a.6\]]rgyud las rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gsungs kyang*/_'grel pa mkhan pos rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bkral bas 'grel pa 'di gnyis phyogs 'dir bris so/_/dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_bod 
[\[396a.7\]]kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis yang dag pa nyid du bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//de ltar rgyud kyi 'grel pa'i skor rnams bkod nas/_sgrub thabs dkyil chog man ngag la sogs pa'i skor la/_ku pa la/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung 
[\[396b\]]
[\[396b.1\]]ba zhes bya ba slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya bud+d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs gzhung tshad sh+lau ka brgya phrag gnyis dang rkang pa gcig bcas dang*/_rdo rje 
[\[396b.2\]]sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bud+d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las btus pa slob dpon chen po kun 
[\[396b.3\]]dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang*/_spyan dbye ba'i cho ga slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa chung ba dang*/_che ba [(*]ma byung*/[)]gnyis paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo 
[\[396b.4\]]tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_che ba 'di the tshom gyi gzhi cig snang ste bla ma rnams yang dag tu bzhed kyin snang bas bris so/_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 
[\[396b.5\]]'gyur/_spyan dbye ba'i cho ga slob dpon pradz+nyA wa li tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_thugs rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po ye shes rdo rje'am ming gzhan pad+ma dkar po 
[\[396b.6\]]zhes bya bas mdzad pa dang*/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon rab 'byor bskyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin 
[\[396b.7\]]sreg gi cho ga_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rab gnas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don bsdus pa A tsAr+Ya mu nIn+d+ra b+ha dras mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje dbyings kyi 
[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi don bsgom pa'i don bsdus pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus pa/_bya ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po ni saM ga A tsAr+Ya dpal ldan rigs kyi byin pas mdzad pa/_bla ma paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ras zhus shing 
[\[397a.2\]]gzhung sum gnyis bal po'i mthil du bsgyur nas sum cha gcig lo tsA ba dge slong yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis/gzhu'i gtsug lag khang chen po nyid du yongs su rdzogs par legs par bsgyur cing shin tu dag par byas pa/_'di nyid ni dpal rdo rje 
[\[397a.3\]]dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yin pas 'dir bris so/_/de nyid bsdus pa dpal mchog dang po dang*/_sgyu 'phrul drwa ba la sogs dgongs 'grel ba'i/_/mkhas grub gsum gyi gzhung lugs rjes 'brang bcas/_/bcu phrag gsum la gnyis kyis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/
[\[397a.4\]]de dag gis ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de nyid bsdus pa dang dpal mchog dang sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni rtsa ba'i rgyud de nyid bsdus pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las 'phros 
[\[397a.5\]]pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bkral ba'i skor la/_khu pa la/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa [(*]'grel brgya ru gsal/[)]slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 
[\[397a.6\]]'gyur/_'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i rdo rje nyi ma can gyi rin po che'i gling na bzhugs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba dang ldan pa gang gi mtshan dpal sna tshogs 
[\[397a.7\]]gzugs can du grags pa des mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i 'gyur la/_phyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bcos pa la yang gnyen gyis bcos pa/_gzhung tshad ni sh+lo ka nyis stong lnga brgya'o/_/
[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[397b.2\]]bzhugs so//_//gu pa la/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po zla ba bzang po grags pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po shrI ma hA dza na dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge 
[\[397b.3\]]slong 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bsdus pa'i gsal ba o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po a wa d+hU tI pas mdzad pa dang*/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan 
[\[397b.4\]]don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gnyis su med pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos o rgyan gyi dzam+bu d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i mthar bsgyur ba/_'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi bshad 'bum paN+Di ta 
[\[397b.5\]]smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon gzhon nu grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wa rA dza dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba shes rab bla 
[\[397b.6\]]ma'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dka' 'grel dbu ma la dga' bas mdzad pa/_'di'i rgya dpe dpal sne gdong gi gtsug lag khang du bzhugs pa sngar ma 'gyur ba la/_dus phyis 'gos kyi rigs las 'khrungs pa'i skad gnyis smra ba chos 
[\[397b.7\]]skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dka' 'grel bsdus pa zhes bya ba rat+na A ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA la tsakra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang 'bro jo sras dang chos kyi 
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa/_gzhung gi tshad la tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag 
[\[398a.2\]]gcig dang drug brgya lnga bcu mchis pa/_bkra shis kyi gdan sa chen po tsong ka ser to bla mkhar gyi nang du bod kyi lo tsA ba dge tshul khyung grags kyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/gzhung 'di la'ang the tshom gyi gzhi can du snang ngo zhes sngon gyi mkhan pa dag gsung ngo*/_/de ltar mtshan 
[\[398a.3\]]brjod kyi 'grel pa'i skor rnams bkod nas/_de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dkyil chog dang*/_man ngag gi skor la/_ngu pa la/_mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa chung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba nam mkha' dri med chung ba zhes grags pa'i skor ni/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa dkyil 
[\[398a.4\]]'khor gyi cho ga nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_
[\[398a.5\]]'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil cho ga la/_byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/rnam par snang mdzad dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/mi bskyod pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/snang ba mtha' yas dbugs dbyung 
[\[398a.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/rin chen 'byung ldan dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/don yod grub pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i chu sbyin/_mtshan yang dag par brjod 
[\[398a.7\]]pa'i zas kyi rnal 'byor/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'byung po'i gtor chog_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bskor ba bya thabs/_'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs bsags pa'i thabs/_'jam dpal 
[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]gyi mtshan 'don pa'i man ngag_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mi rtag pa sgom pa/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mi rtag pa 'khor ba la yid byung ba/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i shes pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag_/
[\[398b.2\]]skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga_/sems bskyed pa'i cho ga_/byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag_/tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i man ngag_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la lta ba/_dbang po tha mas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rjes su dran pa drug sgom pa'i man ngag_/dbang po 'bring gis mtshan 
[\[398b.3\]]yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis sgom pa'i man ngag_/dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid sgom pa'i man ngag_/'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i byang chub chen po'i sku gdung gi cho ga zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg 
[\[398b.4\]]gi cho ga bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag_/'jam dpal dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par 
[\[398b.5\]]brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga dang rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor los bsad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang 
[\[398b.6\]]dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba tshe 'phos pa la phan gdags pa'i bdun tshigs kyi cho ga_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/_ngan song sbyong ba 'gro ba rigs drug gi cho ga rnams slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen 
[\[398b.7\]]gyis mdzad pa ste/_'di dag ni paN+Di ta su badzra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba gu rub chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'di la la rgya gzhung yin min the tshom za bar 'dug na'ang bla ma gong ma rnams rgya gzhung du bzhed cing*/_sngar gyi rnams la'ang bris 'dug pas bzhugs su bcug pa yin no/_/byang 
[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]chub kyi sems bsgom pa don bcu gnyis bstan pa lung gi rjes su 'brangs pa sing+ga la'i gling gi slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu pa'i 'grel pa 'di mdo phyogs su bzhed pa mi 'thad de/_gzhung nas rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal 
[\[399a.2\]]bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'grel pa bar pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i skor la/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i 'gyur/_
[\[399a.3\]]mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag pa'i sgom khog_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog 
[\[399a.4\]]gi skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa skye ba gcig la mtshan lnga thob pa'i slob dpon de'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i 'gyur/_phyis slob dpon 'phags pa mchog gis zhus nas gtan la phab ste 'gyur phyi ma yang yin no/_/'phags 
[\[399a.5\]]pa 'jam dpal gyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon shAn+tiM gar+b+has mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba dang*/_sgrub thabs gsang ba ldan pa'i thig gi cho ga_/spyan dbye 
[\[399a.6\]]ba'i cho ga rab gnas bcas pa rnams paN+Di ta smr-i tis mdzad nas/_de nyid kyis sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dge mas mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin mas 
[\[399a.7\]]mdzad pa/_smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_mtshan brjod 'grel chen gyi skor la/_nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jam dpal grags [(*]dpe dngos pa mdzad 'gyur ci yang 'dus/[)]pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[399b\]]
[\[399b.1\]]de dag dang rjes su mthun pa dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba rnams bzhugs so//_//cu pa la/_mtshan brjod 'grel pa chung ba'i skor la/_byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang*/_'phags pa 'jam 
[\[399b.2\]]dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_mtshan brjod 'grel pa bar pa'i skor/_gsang ldan gyi dka' 'grel don bsdus sgron pa zhes bya ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wa A ka ra tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA 
[\[399b.3\]]ba klog skya'i 'gyur/_gsang ldan gyi tho yig don bsdus su mdzad pa/_smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta shAn+tiM gar+b+has mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_'phags 
[\[399b.4\]]pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/_mtshan [(*]ma byung*/[)]brjod kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje las bsgrub kyis mdzad pa/_'phags 
[\[399b.5\]]pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grags pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa a wa d+hU tI pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i skor la/_'phags pa 'jam 
[\[399b.6\]]dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/_yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon gnyis 
[\[399b.7\]]su med pa sbas pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor byas pa slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa/_'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po a wa d+hU tIs 
[\[400a\]]
[\[400a.1\]]mdzad pa/_d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa slob dpon a ba d+hU tI pas mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[400a.2\]]A shwa ka shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba 'a zha rgya gar brtsegs kyis 'gyur/_rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon a sho ka shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[400a.3\]]gtor ma'i cho ga_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyod lam gyi cho ga_/'jam dpal rdo rje'i bum pa'i cho ga rnams slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa/_dpal au rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po d+harma shrI mi tra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos 
[\[400a.4\]]bsgyur ba/_ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba mgar chos bzang gi 'gyur/_'di'i dgra nag 'jigs byed rnams kyang 'di nyid du bzhugs par bya'i/_gzhan du mi 'khyar bar bya'o zhes bu ston gyis 
[\[400a.5\]]gsungs/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mi g.yo seng ges mdzad pa/_mar pa do pa'i 'gyur/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba pra b+hA ka ras mdzad pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos thar 
[\[400a.6\]]pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs gnyan dar ma grags kyi rang 'gyur/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog pa'i man ngag kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rnam pa nyi shus byang chub rim pas bcom ldan 
[\[400a.7\]]'das 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i thabs/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 
[\[400b\]]
[\[400b.1\]]'khor thams cad la bstod pa rnams slob dpon so ma shrIs mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dzA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyi 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyi gtor ma'i cho ga gcig rnams so/_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa rnal 'byor gyi/_/rgyud du bkral ba'i 'grel skor bcu gnyis dang*/_/sgrub 
[\[400b.2\]]skor la sogs brgyad cu rtsa gsum ste/_/dril bas chos skor dgu bcu rtsa lnga bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni 'jam dpal mtshan brjod rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bstan pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs bkod zin to//_//de ltar mtshan brjod rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bstan pa'i chos skor rnams 
[\[400b.3\]]bkod nas/_da ni thams cad gsang ba dang ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud kyi skor la/_dpal thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[400b.4\]]rtsa rgyud de nyid bsdus pa'i dum bu gnyis pa khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dum bu las/_ngan 'gro dgug cing sdig pa sbyong ba las 'phros pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud kyi skor la/_ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i don gyi 'bru 'grel zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad 
[\[400b.5\]]zer ba/_'di paN+Di tas chos gsung ba la lo tsA bas zin bris su byas pa yin nam yang zer/_'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba dza lan+d+ha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon 
[\[400b.6\]]kA ma d+he nu pa zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_A tsAr+Ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis 'phen yul rgyal gyi lug lhas su bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//chu pa la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[400b.7\]]sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par bshad pa mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rdo rje go cha'i slob ma slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad zer ba dang*/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal 
[\[401a\]]
[\[401a.1\]]po'i brtag pa snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bid+yA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dbang phyug rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur zer ba gnyis bzhugs so/_/'di la kun mkhyen bus sbyong rgyud kyi bshad pa byed lugs cung 'di nyid 
[\[401a.2\]]legs par gsungs pa dang*/_ngor pa rdo rje 'chang yab sras kyis 'khyin lo tsA ba dge tshul khyung grags kyis byas nas kun dga' snying po la kha 'phangs pa'i bod mar bzhed do/_/'on te sngon gyi rnams kyis khungs mar bzung ste bcug pa ltar 'dir bris so//_//ju pa la/_de bzhin 
[\[401a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i bshad pa zhes kyang bya/_gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes kyang bya ba slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la 
[\[401a.4\]]sha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba khyung po chos brtson gyi 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor spyi'i rim pa slob dpon su ra b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kun 
[\[401a.5\]]dga' snying pos mdzad zer ba gtsug dgu'i gzhung dang cha 'dra ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur zer/_dpe la la na paN+Di ta su b+hU ti shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur zer ba snang ngo*/_/dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 
[\[401a.6\]]thugs rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdo rje go cha'i slob ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ki re Na ka ra warma dang*/_lo tsA ba dge tshul khyung grags kyi 'gyur/_'di gnyis snga ma cung drag par snang ngo*/_/dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong 
[\[401a.7\]]ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i shi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i las kyi rim pa mdo dang bsres nas slob dpon kun dga' 
[\[401b\]]
[\[401b.1\]]snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon skal bzang dga' bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po 
[\[401b.2\]]bla ma ni na shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong g.yu rung 'od kyi 'gyur/_gtsug tor dgu'i rgyud la brten pa'i ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya bud+d+hA shrI shAn+ti dang*/_bod kyi lo 
[\[401b.3\]]tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di rtsod med yang dag pa yin no/_/ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sangs rgyas gsang ba dang*/_many+dzu shrI warma dang*/_
[\[401b.4\]]bran ka mu ti'i 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon d+harma kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya d+harma pA la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong 
[\[401b.5\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa yan chad rdzogs pa'i 'phro gcig slob dpon kun snying gis mdzad zer ba/_'di bod ma 'dra ba cig 'dug ste sngar gyi rnams kyis kyang bris 'dug pas bris so/_/ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa rgya gar gyi 
[\[401b.6\]]mkhan po A nan+da pa ra hi ta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_ngan song sbyong ma byung* ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba paN+Di ta 'gro kun bzang pos mdzad pa/_dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin las lo tsA ba mnga' ris pa rdo rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 
[\[401b.7\]]sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba glan chung gi 'gyur la/_slad kyis stag lo tsA bas bcos pa/_de la brten nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snying po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dA ri ka 
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]pas mdzad pa/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba dpal kam+pa las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_de kho na nyid 
[\[402a.2\]]gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dpal kam+pa la'i yum gyis mdzad pa/_mdo rgyas 'bring gi gleng gzhi'i sangs rgyas byang sems rnal 'byor rgyud du dgongs pa bkral te dkyil 'khor la bkod nas ston pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya 
[\[402a.3\]]ba slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa dang*/_de la brten nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_bal po ma hA pa na'i rang 'gyur/_rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dad pa'i 'byung 
[\[402a.4\]]gnas go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kan ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du dgongs pa bkral ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa/_
[\[402a.5\]]yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga slob dpon pad+ma'i rdo rje lcags kyus stong phrag brgya pa las ji snyed pa rnams brjed du dogs nas bris pa/_yang yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga bsdus pa/_bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid/_sku khrus kyi cho ga rnams paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal 
[\[402a.6\]]mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs las byung ba'i mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang bsdebs te slob dpon zhi ba snying pos mdzad pa/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa'i gzungs rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du dgongs pa bkral ba mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub 
[\[402a.7\]]thabs zhes bya ba rgyas pa dang*/_mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_de'i dkyil chog las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes 
[\[402b\]]
[\[402b.1\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa dang*/_mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dze tA ris mdzad pa/_bla ma gnyen dar 
[\[402b.2\]]ma grags kyi rang 'gyur/_yang mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs lo chung legs pa'i shes rab kyi 'gyur ba 'di mdzad byang med pas/_sngar gyi rnams kyi bris 'dug pas bzhugs su bcug pa yin/_rgyan dam 
[\[402b.3\]]pa sna tshogs pa rim par phye ba bkod pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po s+thi ra ma tis yo ga'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang las nges don mdor bsdus te mdzad pa/_bam po gcig pa/_cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis skad phyi mo dang gtugs pa'i 'gyur yin zer ba/_'di rnying ma'am bod ma cig yin pa 'dra ste/_
[\[402b.4\]]sngar gyi rnams kyis bris 'dug pas bzhugs su bcug pa rnams so/_/thams cad gsang ba ngan song sbyong rgyud dang*/_/sher phyin mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i gzhung*/_/'grel pa dag dang sgrub thabs la sogs skor/_/rnam grangs bzhi bcu tham pa legs par bzhugs/_/de dag gis 
[\[402b.5\]]ni thams cad gsang ba dang ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grags rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar thams cad gsang ba dang sbyong rgyud la sogs pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_spyod pa'i rgyud kyi skor la/_nyu pa la/_rtsa ba'i rgyud las rnam par snang 
[\[402b.6\]]mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don slob dpon shrI bud+d+ha gu h+yas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka nyis stong sum brgya yod do/_/rnam par snang mdzad mngon par 
[\[402b.7\]]byang chub pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel bshad sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i stod dum bzhugs//_//tu pa la/_rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel bshad kyi smad dum slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas phyin ci ma log par mdzad pa/_
[\[403a\]]
[\[403a.1\]]dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du bstan bcos bod kyi yul du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa bsdus pa'i tshe 'grel pa 'di'i dpe phyi mo ma dag cing gong 'og 'khrugs la bar bar nas cung zad ma tshang ba la brten pas bstan 'gyur thams cad du ma dag pa brgyud pa dang*/_skad 
[\[403a.2\]]gsar chad kyis gtan la ma phab pa'i 'gyur yang mi bde ba zhig snang bas/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyi tshig dang bstun te skad gsar bcad dang mthun par bcos pa 'di ni yul dbus kyi lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal zhes bya bas dpal rtse thang gi gtsug 
[\[403a.3\]]lag khang du bris pa zhes pa'i mtha' can/_rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub par rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon skal bzang rab dgas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi 
[\[403a.4\]]sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi sgrub thabs dang las kun gyi gter zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon lha sbas kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rig pa gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_
[\[403a.5\]]'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dang*/_dngos grub kyi tshul nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon don yod zhabs kyis 
[\[403a.6\]]mdzad pa/_khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa gsham ma tshang ba cig rnams bzhugs so/_/rnam snang mngon byang rgyud 'grel la sogs skor/_/bzhi dang 'jam dpal gsang rgyud chos skor bzhi/_/khro bo rnam rgyal rtog pa'i 'grel pa gcig_/spyod pa'i 
[\[403a.7\]]rgyud kyi chos skor dgu bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni rnam snang mngon byang sogs spyod pa'i rgyud kyi chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar spyod pa'i rgyud kyi chos skor rnams bkod nas/_bya ba'i rgyud kyi skor la/_thu pa la/_bya ba spyi'i rgyud bsam 
[\[403b\]]
[\[403b.1\]]gtan phyi ma rim par phye ba rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang 
[\[403b.2\]]bas mdzad pa/_'phags pa dpung [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]zhus pa'i rgyud kyi tshig gi don bshad pa'i brjed byang*/_'phags pa dpung [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don dgrol ba'i brjed byang*/_'di bod kyis byas pa yin nam sems/_so so'i dgongs 'grel la/_dang po sku'i 
[\[403b.3\]]rigs 'jam dpal gyi skor la/_dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa gtsug lag khang dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta su b+hA ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa la/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis legs par zhus pa/_gsung gi rigs thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[403b.4\]]'grel pa ni mi snang ngo*/_/thugs kyi rigs phyag na rdo rje'i skor la/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges shrI nA len+d+rar bsgyur cing 
[\[403b.5\]]zhus pa/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po karma badzras mdzad pa/_dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po blo bzang skyong gis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka'i grangs tshigs bcad bdun brgya pa/_rgya gar 
[\[403b.6\]]gyi paN+Di ta sgra pA Ni ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i snyan ngag dang tshig gi sdeb la mkhas pa non ni paN+Di ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba u rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po spu tra'i mgul du bsgyur ba/_phyag na rdo rje dang phyogs mthun pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi skor la/_rdo rje rnam 
[\[403b.7\]]par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi bshad pa slob dpon bo d+hi sa twas mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba gsang sngags mtha' dag la mnga' brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen 
[\[404a\]]
[\[404a.1\]]po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi grub pa sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba da bas many+dzu shrI warma'i 'gyur la/_phyis paN+Di ta 
[\[404a.2\]]'jon te ta'u la dang*/_lo tsA ba 'og bsod nams mos pa'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang*/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 
[\[404a.3\]]gzungs kyi 'grel pa slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa slob dpon bde ba'i myu gus mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[404a.4\]]gzungs kyi 'grel pa dang*/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi man ngag paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba gzungs kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sa wa ri pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de wa puN+ya 
[\[404a.5\]]ma ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags la mkhas pa slob dpon bud+d+ha gu h+ya dang*/_
[\[404a.6\]]bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ska ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po rin chen bzang pos rgya dpe dang gtugs nas bcos zer ba/_de dag dang 'brel ba'i gtsug tor la sogs pa'i gzungs kyi skor la/_kun nas 
[\[404a.7\]]sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dza ya de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims 
[\[404b\]]
[\[404b.1\]]brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shU rang+ga warma badzras mdzad pa/_zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//du pa la/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i 
[\[404b.2\]]mdo'i 'bum 'grel las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje'i rang 'gyur/_rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel/_gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba 
[\[404b.3\]]rnams slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta mkhas par grags pa mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras skye ba lnga brgyar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu lnga rig la ma rmongs shing gsang sngags gdams pa thugs la mnga' ba'i mtshan don yod rdo rjer grags pas bod yul du byon nas/_
[\[404b.4\]]'dzam gling byang phyogs kyi brag dmar dpal bsam yas su rgyal po khri pa'i gdung brgyud kyi sras lha gcig lha lcam dar sgron gyi pho brang rdo lung dgon par rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//nu pa la/_'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad 
[\[404b.5\]]pa/_'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs 
[\[404b.6\]]pa'i 'gyur/_chos ma byung*/_spyod thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa'i man ngag gi rgyud kyi 'grel pa gzi brjid snang ba zhes bya ba klu'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/_dge tshul khyung grags kyi 'gyur/_'di rtsa 'grel gnyis ka rdzun ma yang dag pa cig 'dug ste/_nag tsho lo tsA ba yang dag tu bzhed pa yin zer 
[\[404b.7\]]nas/_sngar gyi rnams kyis bris 'dug pas 'dir yang bzhugs su bcug pa yin no/_/de ltar bya ba'i rgyud so so'i 'grel pa rnams bkod nas/_da ni de dag gi sgrub thabs dkyil chog la sogs pa'i skor la/_bya ba'i rgyud kyi lha gsum tshan lngar grags pa las/_dang po rigs kyi gtso 
[\[405a\]]
[\[405a.1\]]bo gsum la/_sku'i rigs kyi gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad yin pas/_de dang phyogs mthun pa dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po ke d+ha ra Na d+his mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal go mi 'chi med dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan 
[\[405a.2\]]shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'di spyod pa'i rgyud dang bskyed chog rnams mthun par bkod 'dug na'ang*/_rgyud 'grel dag las dam tshig gsum bkod bya rgyud du gsungs 'dug pas 'dir bris so/_/gsung gi rigs kyi gtso bo tshe dpag med kyi skor la/_tshe dpag med la bstod pa/_'phags pa tshe dang ye shes 
[\[405a.3\]]dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon dze tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas bram ze nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bu'i ched du mdzad pa rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI many+dzu dang*/_lo tsA ba lce dga' ba'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_rigs kyi bdag po gsum 
[\[405a.4\]]la/_sku'i rigs kyi bdag po 'jam dpal gyi skor la/_'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_'jam pa'i ma byung*/_dbyangs kyi dpyad 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa sh+lo ka brgya pa/_'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 
[\[405a.5\]]chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng ge'i sgrub thabs rje btsun dam pa rgya gar gyi gdams pa/_zha ma seng rgyal gyi 'gyur/_rje btsun 'jam dpal 
[\[405a.6\]]shes rab 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsan+d+rA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis 'gyur/_'jam dpal g.yo ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa/_'phags 
[\[405a.7\]]pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa/_'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gtso 'khor lnga pa'i bstod pa paN+Di ta thig le bum pas mdzad pa/_gur gum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa slob dpon seng ge mi g.yo bas mdzad pa rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA 
[\[405b\]]
[\[405b.1\]]ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa snyan dngags mkhan rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po su ma ti kIrti'i 
[\[405b.2\]]zhal snga nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab dang mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon rdo rje mtshon chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa dang*/_bod kyi rngog lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam 
[\[405b.3\]]pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga slob dpon shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas mdzad pa/_a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub 
[\[405b.4\]]thabs dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur/_a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid kyis 
[\[405b.5\]]dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shrI ban rat+na'i bka' drin las/_lo tsA ba dge slong rgya mtshos sdes 'gyur rnying las cung zad bcos shing*/_rgya dpe dang rkang pa mthun par dpal gnod gnas kyi gtsug lag khang chen por 'gyur/_'jam dbyangs dkar po mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya 
[\[405b.6\]]ba slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shrI ban rat+na'i spyan sngar chos 'khor lo tsA bas bsgyur ba la/_dge slong rgya mtsho bcos pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ma tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar 
[\[405b.7\]]phyogs kyi dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir lha'i skad las bod kyi brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba dpal ldan mkhas pa rnams kyi nang nas rgyal mtshan rtse mo ltar shin tu mtho zhing gsal bar gyur 
[\[406a\]]
[\[406a.1\]]pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ma tis 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs dang bstun te bskyed rim gyi gsal 'debs bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bstod pa/_paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba khro phu ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis srin po'i rir bsgyur ba/_'phags pa a ra pa 
[\[406a.2\]]tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skyid grong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_gsung gi 
[\[406a.3\]]rigs kyi bdag po thugs rje chen po'i skor la/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/_'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 
[\[406a.4\]]'joms zhes bya ba shar phyogs wa ren+d+ra'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_wa ren+d+ra'i dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba dge bsnyen chen po zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pA ra me shwa ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas 
[\[406a.5\]]btsas kyi 'gyur/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba tsarba Tis mdzad pa/_sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa paN+Di ta chen po e ra ba tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[406a.6\]]paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pa'i 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa grub thob chen po tsarba Tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_dpal 'jig rten mgon po mkha' 
[\[406a.7\]]la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba grub chen pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ban rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang*/_chos 'khor lo tsA bas bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis btsun pa rgya mtshos dag par bcos pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa snyan dngags mkhan 
[\[406b\]]
[\[406b.1\]]chen po shrI badzra de wa zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dngags mkhan po ma hA paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mI ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyi 'gyur/_'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa/_nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa slob dpon rta 
[\[406b.2\]]dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa byin rlabs can zhes bya ba lnga brgya pa 
[\[406b.3\]]rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar gyur pa mthong lam rgyud las skyes pa'i gang zag slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_snying rje la bstod pa dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa/_dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa zhes bya ba dge slong ma zla mdzes kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[406b.4\]]rgya gar shar phyogs kyi btsun pa tsan+d+ra shrIs ngag las 'byung ba dang rgya dpe dang bstun nas dge slong bsod nams rnam rgyal gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bus bstod pa/_dpal nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal sngar bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_
[\[406b.5\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa klu sgrub bdag nyid chen po mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa sa drug pa'i byang sems yin yang sa dang po'i byang sems su byin gyis brlabs pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_
[\[406b.6\]]zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon pad+ma'i zhal snga nas bod kyi lo tsA ba btsun pa rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis 
[\[406b.7\]]bsgyur ba/_rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/_'phags pa spyan 
[\[407a\]]
[\[407a.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa/_rje btsun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa rnams dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes grags pa la 'di'i rnam grangs ni/_thugs rje chen po 
[\[407a.2\]]kha sar+pa Na'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs/_spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum bsgom pa/_thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/_'jig rten mgon po tshad med bzhi'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[407a.3\]]dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs/_sems ngal bso ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po yi ge med pa'i sgrub thabs/_stong nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag_/dpal kha sar+pa Ni mar me sbar ba'i sgrub thabs/_dpal kha sar+pa Ni sku gsum gyi gdams 
[\[407a.4\]]pa/_thugs rje chen po mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po nam mkha' dri med kyi sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub thabs/_spyan ras gzigs bcu gcig zhal can gyi sgrub thabs/_dpal kha sar+pa Ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/_spyan ras gzigs yid 
[\[407a.5\]]bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/_dpal thugs rje chen po po Ta la ke ri'i rtse mo'i sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po can dpal 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po lus kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/_thugs rje chen po dka' thub can gyi sgrub thabs/_dpal thugs rje chen po rtag tu bya ba'i rnal 
[\[407a.6\]]'byor/_dpal 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa'i man ngag_thugs rje chen po'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/thugs rje chen po'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga_/thugs rje chen po'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga_/spyan ras gzigs kyi smon lam du bya ba/_dpal spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi mnyes pa'i 
[\[407a.7\]]zas kyi cho ga_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po shrI mi tra'i gdams pa lus sbyin pa'i cho ga_/thugs rje chen po'i chu sbyin gyi cho ga_/dpal thugs rje chen po'i chab gtor gyi cho ga_/me'i mchod pa'i cho ga_/sku gzugs kyi cho ga_/sku gzugs dang mchod rten gyi cho ga_/ye shes spar ba'i gdams pa/_
[\[407b\]]
[\[407b.1\]]dri ma rnam dag gi cho ga_/chags nyams gso ba/_ting nge 'dzin myur du bskyed pa'i gdams ngag_/ting nge 'dzin brtan par byed pa'i gdams ngag_/sems brtan par byed pa/_byin rlabs mi zad pa'i cho ga_/'khor lo 'bar ba/_dpal ngag gi mthu bskyed pa'i man ngag_/gsang sngags 
[\[407b.2\]]myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga_/rmi lam dri ma med pa'i bsgom pa/_rmi lam lta ba ngan pa rnam par zlog pa/_khro ba bsal ba/_'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i cho ga_/skye bo gdul dka' ba rnams kyi snying gi dregs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba/_bla ma'i man ngag_/dpal 'khor 
[\[407b.3\]]lo rnam dag gi sgrub thabs/_snying gi dug sbyong ba/_lus kyi 'khor lo bcing ba dang dgrol ba'i man ngag_/dpal rdo rje thod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs/_dpal mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgrub thabs/_kha sar+pa Ni pad+ma kha 'byed kyi man ngag_/thugs rje chen po gzugs brnyan la brten 
[\[407b.4\]]pa'i sgrub thabs/_dpal me tog gi gdan can gyi sgrub thabs/_me tog la brten pa'i sgrub thabs/_spyil bu can gyi sgrub thabs/_thugs rje chen po rnga sgra'i sgrub thabs/_nyi zla sgron ma'i cho ga_/grags pa bskyed pa'i cho ga_/gzi brjid bskyed pa'i cho ga_/sems mgu bar byed pa'i cho ga_/
[\[407b.5\]]rmi lam ston pa/_yid 'gyod pa bsal ba/_longs spyod mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs/_dpag bsam gyi shing can gyi sgrub thabs/_bum pa bzang po can gyi sgrub thabs/_lam chen po'i sgrub thabs/_dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug wa ti can gyi sgrub thabs/_pad+mo'i sdong bu can gyi sgrub thabs/_
[\[407b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dri ma 'jig pa'i bum pa'i cho ga_/dpal rdo rje 'bar ba bsrung ba chen po'i man ngag_/srung ba'i 'khor lo/_rang srung ba'i cho ga_/gzhan skyab pa'i cho ga_/srung skud kyi cho ga_/gzhon nu bsrung ba'i cho ga_/dpal spyan ras gzigs kyi nad bsrung ba'i cho ga_/spyan ras 
[\[407b.7\]]gzigs kyi nad bsal ba'i cho ga_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi klu gso ba'i cho ga_/mdze'i nad gso ba/_gzhan las rnam par rgyal ba'i gdams ngag_/pha rol gyi gnod pa bsrung ba/_pha rol gyi sde gzhom pa/_pha rol dbang du bya ba/_chom rkun bcing ba/_slob ma la shes rab bskyed pa/_dpal 
[\[408a\]]
[\[408a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs khros bas ser ba zlog pa'i cho ga_/rmi lam dri ma med pa bsgom pa/_slob ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i man ngag_/ye shes gzhug pa'i cho ga_/ting nge 'dzin gyi byin rlabs/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur/_dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor/_skye ba bsdams pa'i 
[\[408a.2\]]cho ga_/'chi ba bslu ba'i gdams pa/_dpal lha'i grong khyer du 'jug pa/_rdo rje skar mda'i man ngag_/tshe 'das pa la bya ba'i cho ga_/ro bsreg cho ga_/sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/bkra shis kyi cho ga_/tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rnams la brgya dang bzhi'o/_/'di rnams grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di 
[\[408a.3\]]ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi trA nan+da'i zhal snga nas dang*/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba/_'di dag la rnal 'byor bla med dang*/_rnal 'byor gyi khongs 
[\[408a.4\]]su gtogs pa'ang snang mod kyi/_thugs rje chen po phyogs gcig tu bya ba'i phyir 'dir bris so/_/phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa ta thA ga ta badzras mdzad pa/_mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas shar phyogs b+haM ga la'i paN+Di ta nyi ma 'byung gnas zla ba dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge tshul 
[\[408a.5\]]khyung grags kyis 'dul ba'i bstan pa snying por gnas pa'i sa dpal ldan rgyan gong gi gtsug lag khang du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la phan pa'i phyir bsgyur ba/_'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dze tA ris mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta pUr+Na 
[\[408a.6\]]kIrti dang*/_sna nam rdo rje bla ma'i 'gyur/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_chag lo tsA ba chos rje dpal gyis nyung ngur bsdus te bsgyur ba/_yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba 
[\[408a.7\]]gzhon nu 'od kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sar+pa Ni'i sgrub thabs/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po pU dza badzras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra 
[\[408b\]]
[\[408b.1\]]shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs tshigs bcad bzhi pa dang*/_rnal 'byor snying po gnyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tras mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_byams pa lo tsA'i 'gyur/_dpal kha sar+pa Ni 'jig 
[\[408b.2\]]rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs grub pa brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po shrI shAn+ta ka ras mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_kha sar+pa ma byung*Ni lha lnga'i sgrub thabs A tsAr+ya pad+ma ka ras mdzad pa/_chos 'khor lo tsA'i 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha lnga'i 
[\[408b.3\]]sgrub thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI mi tra A nan+das mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_gnubs lo tsA'i 'gyur/_seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_bla ma rdo rje gdan pa dang*/_dpal chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/_
[\[408b.4\]]rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba mal gyi 'gyur/_seng ge sgra'i srung ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/_don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/gso sbyong blang ba/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i 
[\[408b.5\]]gso sbyong gi cho ga'i man ngag rnams kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad cing*/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rab mchog dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi rigs kyi skor la/_dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas 
[\[408b.6\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'jam dpal go cha'i 'gyur/_phyag na rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bkral ba la/_phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs su grags pa'i chos skor ni/_gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye bar byed pa'i mchod rten gyi man ngag_/gnod pa 
[\[408b.7\]]sel ba'i bdud rtsi/_rdo rje byab pa'i las tshogs/_yan lag bdun pa'i sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa dang*/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba 'grel pa las gzungs sgrub thabs su mdzad pa/_
[\[409a\]]
[\[409a.1\]]phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba gta'i gtor ma'i gdams ngag_/'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba/_dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_sde dpon bzhi'i sgrub thabs thun mong 
[\[409a.2\]]ma yin pa/_don 'grel sgron ma/_sgrub pa'i go rim/_bum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba/_phyag na rdo rje'i spur bsad las tshogs bsdus pa rnams slob dpon su wA gI shwa ra kIrtis mdzad pa dang*/_phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag lag tu blang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_gsang 
[\[409a.3\]]sngags bzlas brjod kyi man ngag_/nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon bIr+ya tsan+d+ras mdzad pa/_phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas mdzad pa/_rten 'brel gyi bsrung ba rnams jo bo rje dang*/_rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur/_
[\[409a.4\]]phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_rang gi bla ma nyid las thos nas khams pa dge slong ba ri lo tsA ba chen po rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing*/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po a b+hi yuk+ta dang zhus dag byas
