[\[409a.5\]]nas gtan la phab pa/_phyag na rdo rje gos dkar can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub dang 'gro bzang snying pos don gcig tu bsdebs pa rnams so/_/'di dag la rgya gzhung yin 
[\[409a.6\]]min the tshom za ba ci rigs pa snang zhing*/_gzungs kyi ngo bo bya rgyud du gsal yang*/_bskyed chog dang*/_dbang chog rnams rnal 'byor gyi rgyud bzhin byas snang ngo*/_/dpal phyag na rdo rje la mtshan ma byung*/_nyid bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa slob dpon bIr+Ya tsan+d+ras mdzad pa dang*/_phyag na rdo rje la don rtags kyi sgo nas 
[\[409a.7\]]bstod pa slob dpon dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba brgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa bsdus pa gcig_/phyag na rdo rje 'gro [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]skor la/_phyag na rdo rje 'gro [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma byung* ma'i sgrub thabs/_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor/_
[\[409b\]]
[\[409b.1\]]phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi klu gtor/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnams slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta te dza de wa dang*/_zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs yid bzhin gyi nor bu 
[\[409b.2\]]zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po nyin mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ku mA ra ka la sha'i rang 'gyur/_dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon bram ze nyin mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa/_phyag na rdo rje rdo rje snying po'i man ngag ces bya ba'i sgrub 
[\[409b.3\]]thabs paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shrIs mdzad pa/_rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po pa dang*/_nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po stong nyid ting nge 'dzin snying rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje 
[\[409b.4\]]dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba khams pa ba ri dge slong rin chen grags kyi 'gyur/_khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_de'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga_rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_bsrung ba'i cho ga las thams cad pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ba su ta badzras mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor bsod snyoms 
[\[409b.5\]]pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti'i rang 'gyur/_khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon su tsan+d+ra b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po blo bzang skyong gis mdzad 
[\[409b.6\]]pa/_'di'i sh+lau ka'i grangs tshigs bcad bdun brgya pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta sgra pA Ni ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i snyan dngags la mkhas pa non ni paN+Di ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba u rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po spu tra'i mgul du 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor drug gi cho ga rin po che'i mig thur zhes bya ba slob dpon 
[\[409b.7\]]chen po shU rang+ga warmas mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pu rangs bsod nams blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa dang*/_las kyi mtha' bco brgyad 
[\[410a\]]
[\[410a.1\]]pa'i man ngag slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho 
[\[410a.2\]]ga bram ze dza ya warmas mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs dpal gang+gA d+ha ras mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/_dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la bstod pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i cho ga_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/gtor ma'i 
[\[410a.3\]]cho ga zhes bya ba/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i cho ga rnams bram ze ma Ni badzras mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i bum pa'i cho ga_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i cho 
[\[410a.4\]]ga rnams paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA nashrIs mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga byang chub sems dpa' 'byams pa'i zhabs rdul la reg pa dpal gang+gA d+ha ra'i sras kyi thu bo bram ze ma Ni badzras mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na 
[\[410a.5\]]shrIs mdzad pa rnams paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba rab zhi bshes gnyen gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa bram ze rig sngags 'chang ba mkhas pa chen po ku mA ra se nAs mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha gup+ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dbang many+dzu shrI warma'i 
[\[410a.6\]]'gyur la/_phyis paN+Di ta dz+nyon teng hang ngu dang*/_lo tsA ba da 'og bsod nams mos pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba dang*/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen 
[\[410a.7\]]po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dba' many+dzu shrI warma'i 'gyur/_las kyi thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_/khrus kyi cho ga'i rim pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[410b\]]
[\[410b.1\]]kyi man ngag paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_rnam 'joms sa wa ri'i skor la/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje khro bos bsad pa'i las zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po sa wa ri pas mdzad 
[\[410b.2\]]pa/_phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs au D+yAn gyi slob dpon a mo pa nA tha zhes bya bas mdzad pa dang*/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po bram ze pa ra ma tis mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i sa pa ri pas mdzad 
[\[410b.3\]]pa rnams bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus ma byung*kyi cho ga sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa 'gyur byang med pa/_rnam 'joms sgrub ma byung*skor slob dpon gang+gA d+ha ras mdzad pa 'gyur byang med pa rnams bzhugs so//_//pu pa la/_rdo rje 
[\[410b.4\]]rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rim ji lta ba zhes kyang bya/_gzhan la phan pa zhes kyang bya ba rig sngags 'chang gi slob dpon rat+na shrI pha las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra bo d+hi dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul dge rin chen gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs 
[\[410b.5\]]zhes bya ba dang*/_'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa rnams bal po'i paN+Di ta ma hA pA na'i rang 'gyur/_slob 
[\[410b.6\]]dpon ye shes rdo rje dang*/_slob dpon pad+ma la sogs pas mdzad zer ba'i rnam 'joms kyi sgrub thabs brgya rtsar grags pa las/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dbang bskur gyi cho ga dang*/_dam tshig bsrung ba slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa/_
[\[410b.7\]]khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad kyis rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa/_lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i cho ga_/dpal yab yum gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba 
[\[411a\]]
[\[411a.1\]]bde sbyin dam pa zhes bya ba/_bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes bya ba khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zab mo/_/sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rin po che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba/_rgyal po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/_phyogs skyong bcu'i dkyil 
[\[411a.2\]]'khor du dbang bskur ba/_gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len zhes bya ba/_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje go cha ma zhes bya ba/_lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba legs pa'i lam ston par byed pa zhes bya ba/_
[\[411a.3\]]klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug las rgyal ba zhes bya ba/_snga ma dang da lta dang phyi ma'i sdig pa ma lus pa las thar bar byed pa 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga_/'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rnams slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad 
[\[411a.4\]]bzang pos mdzad pa/_dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las la sbyar ba 'grub par nges pa'i cho ga_/man ngag gi sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang stobs sgrub pa zhes bya ba/_rgyud kyi bden pa'i don nges par sgrub pa rnal 'byor pa'i pra se na legs par brtags pa/_'dod pa'i don dus la nges par sgrub pa/_
[\[411a.5\]]rgyud kyi brten pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa zhes bya ba/_rgyud thams cad thogs pa med pa'i tshig legs par sgrub pa zhes bya ba/_mna' las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs/_tshong las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i sgrub thabs/_rang rtags rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i 
[\[411a.6\]]thabs bdun pa las kyi bye brag bcu rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bsgrub bya gza'i byang du gzhug pa'i 'khor lo can/_the tshom med par 'grub pa las bsgrub bya thog gis bsad pa'i cho ga drag shul zhes bya ba/_bsgrub bya skrag pa'i las chu thigs zhes bya ba/_'gal ba skrag par byed pa'i las sna 
[\[411a.7\]]tshogs pa'i cho ga 'gal ba ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rnams dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa rgyun gcod spu gri zhes bya ba/_gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba/_las thams cad 'joms pa'i ye shes 'dus pa'i tho ba zhes bya ba/_gzhan gyi 
[\[411b\]]
[\[411b.1\]]rig sngags bshig pa'i phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba/_gzhan gyi las 'jig par byed pa rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba/_mu stegs can gyi rig sngags 'jig pa'i sgrub pa nye ba'i las phyi ma zhes bya ba/_gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa rdo rje tho ba zhes bya ba/_lha'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/'byung po'i 
[\[411b.2\]]gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/dri za'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/tshangs pa'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/srin po'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/sha za'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/klu'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_log 'dren gyi gdon las thar bar byed 
[\[411b.3\]]pa'i man ngag_/rjed byed kyi gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/smyo byed kyi gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/lha ma yin gyi gdon las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/gzhon nu'i gdon bzhi las thar bar byed pa'i man ngag_/gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar bar byed 
[\[411b.4\]]pa'i man ngag_/'byung po 'gugs pa'i sgrub pa rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba/_las kyi bye brag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bkod pa yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba/_gzungs sngags kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'i rdo rje be con zhes bya ba/_gzungs sngags kyi las grub pa rnams chud mi za bar 
[\[411b.5\]]byed pa rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_klu'i char dbab pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba/_klu rnams mnyes par byed pa chu la brten pa'i gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/_sems can bsrung ba'i las sprin dral ba'i 'byung ba gcod byed ces bya ba rnams dpal mar me 
[\[411b.6\]]mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_byis pa gdon las thar bar byed pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyud kyi zhi ba'i mtshan don zhes bya ba/_rgyud kyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par bsgrub pa rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi rgyas par byed pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/mngon spyod 
[\[411b.7\]]kyi sbyin sreg gi sgo nas tshar bcad pa'i las dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga_/sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa'i las jag chings 'phrul yig ces bya ba/_bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi zhags pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_bsgrub bya 
[\[412a\]]
[\[412a.1\]]klu rnams kyi byed du gzhug pa'i cho ga sreg gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_tsha ba'i rims kyis dgra bsad pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' gzi mdangs chen po zhes bya ba/_dpal 
[\[412a.2\]]bkra shis bskyed pa nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba dpal kun gyis brgyan pa'i mtha'/_mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba/_rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso ba'i cho ga dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/_sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i 
[\[412a.3\]]sbyong byed ces bya ba/_lce'i dbang po nyams pa gsol ba'i cho ga pad+ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba/_lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dang lus na ba gsol ba'i cho ga rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_shi ba'i sems can sdig pa 
[\[412a.4\]]las thar bar byed pa'i ro bsreg pa'i cho ga dug sbyong gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba dang*/_mchod rten gdab pa shi ba'i sdig pa byang bar byed pa rang byung 'jigs bral zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa/_sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga sgrub pa pad+ma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba/_
[\[412a.5\]]dal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa bcud kyis len pa zhes bya ba/_lan chags dang bral bar byed pa'i gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba/_longs spyod dang ldan par nges pa'i dpal tshogs kyi gtor ma rin po che'i gser phreng zhes bya ba/_phun sum tshogs pa'i las kyi nye bar sgrub par 
[\[412a.6\]]byed pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_'jig rten gyi lha mnyes par byed pa don grub pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_skye bo sdang ba'i las myur byed chen mo zhes bya ba/_gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa bzlog pa zhes bya ba/_sdang ba gsum gyi 
[\[412a.7\]]las thor bu pa/_bran dang bza' mi gdon gyis gtses pa bsrung ba'i cho ga chen mo zhes bya ba/_mi mthun pa zhi bar byed pa'i rtsi sbyor dbyig gi nor bu zhes bya ba/_nor 'grib pa dgang ba'i cho ga dpag bsam gyi shing rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_tshogs bdag 
[\[412b\]]
[\[412b.1\]]gi sgrub pa dbul ba gter sbyin zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_sbas pa'i ga'u zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_gza' ngan pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rgya mtsho sprin zhes bya ba/_gza'i gdon las grol bar byed pa'i cho ga rin po che grol byed ces bya ba/_gza' 
[\[412b.2\]]brgyad kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'i cho ga 'dod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/_rgyu skar ngan pa zlog par byed pa'i cho ga_/rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba rnams dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes 
[\[412b.3\]]bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_klu chen po brgyad mchod pas mi bzad pa'i nad yams drag po las thar bar byed pa/_klu sgrub rin po che dbyig sgrub ces bya ba/_klu'i gdon las grol bar byed pa sbrul 'dzin gsang ba zhes bya ba/_klu'i srog med dbal gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba klu'i rnam 
[\[412b.4\]]par 'joms pa'i snying gzer du bkod pa rnams slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa/_mi zad pa'i nad zhi bar byed pa gser gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/_tshe 'phel ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba/_bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'i dpal ye shes kyi phreng ba zhes bya 
[\[412b.5\]]ba rnams slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba/_sgra la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i 'khor rkyen drungs nas 'don pa/_sgra mthar gyis rnal 'byor pa'i lus sems kyi 'brel pa bcad pa rnams slob dpon chen po dpal mar 
[\[412b.6\]]me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i thim yig gsang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_de rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs brgya dang brgyad do/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs klu 'dul ba'i ngan thabs bal po'i man ngag dang*/_khro 
[\[412b.7\]]bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bal po de ba puN+ya badzra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gar chos kyi bzang pos bal yul du 'gyur/_rigs kyi yum 
[\[413a\]]
[\[413a.1\]]spyan ma dang*/_gos dkar mo dang*/_mA ma kI gsum gyi sgrub thabs so sor bkod pa ni mi snang la/_phyogs mthun ni 'og na mar 'god par bya'o/_/rigs kyi khro bo gsum la/_sku'i rigs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po sgrub pa'i thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na 
[\[413a.2\]]dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_gsung gi rigs rta mgrin gyi skor la/_rta mgrin gyis sgrub thabs slob dpon nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa/_dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_rtog pa bdun brgya pa nas gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes 
[\[413a.3\]]bya ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rgyud thams cad kyi snying po bla na med pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba paN+Di ta pra b+hA ka ras mdzad pa rnams rgya gar yul wA rA Na sI'i paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug lag khang 
[\[413a.4\]]chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur ba/_'phags pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dang*/_dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_thugs kyi rigs khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs dngos su ni mi snang ngo*/_/de'i phyogs mthun mi g.yo 
[\[413a.5\]]ba'i skor la/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa/_slob dpon dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad nas dge slong dbang phyug rgyal mtshan la gnang ba/_khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la bstod pa dang*/_yang khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi 
[\[413a.6\]]g.yo ba la bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pra b+hA ka ra kIrtis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa chen po sbyin pa tshul khrims kyi rang 'gyur/_khro bo 
[\[413a.7\]]gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon dze tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta suN+yA ya shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyi 'gyur/_gtum po dkar po chen po'i sgrub thabs lhug pa ma dang*/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad ma rgya gar shar 
[\[413b\]]
[\[413b.1\]]phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las mdzad pa/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_de ltar rigs gsum po so so'i sgrub thabs rnams bkod nas/_rigs gsum spyi'i sgrub thabs ni/_legs par grub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bsdus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po slob dpon byang chub mchog gis 
[\[413b.2\]]mdzad pa/_dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes dge ba'i 'dod 'jo'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_gtsug tor la sogs pa gzungs sna tshogs kyi skor la/_'phags 
[\[413b.3\]]pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs bklag cing mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa dang*/_yang 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing mchod 
[\[413b.4\]]rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa slob dpon bo d+hi sa twas mdzad par grags pa/_bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs dang rgyud dag pa las tsai t+ya dang sAts+tsha gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga A tsAr+ya d+harma kIrti dang*/_badzra kIrti dang badzra bo d+hi la sogs pa la thos nas slob 
[\[413b.5\]]dpon de dag gis lung bstan te gtan la phab par byas pa'i dang po mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba/_mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga_/mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga_/mchod rten gsum gdab pa'i cho ga_/mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga_/mchod rten dgu gdab pa'i cho ga_/mchod 
[\[413b.6\]]rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas kyi sku bshad pa rnams btsan po'i phyag nas mkhan pos btus pa/_mchod rten gyi cha rnam par dbye ba 'dul ba las byung ba'i mdo slob dpon zhi ba snying pos mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[413b.7\]]po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sAts+tsha lnga gdab pa'i cho ga_/gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog_/yang gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_
[\[414a\]]
[\[414a.1\]]nag tsho tshul rgyal gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor 
[\[414a.2\]]ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/_
[\[414a.3\]]srung ba'i 'khor lo/_'khrul 'khor bcing ba/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog pa'i thabs/_bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba'i thabs/_dmag dpung gzhom pa'i thabs/_dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs/_'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs/_ser ba srung ba'i thabs/_mdze nad 
[\[414a.4\]]gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs/_gtor ma'i cho ga paN+Di ta ma hA dza na'i rang 'gyur yin gsungs/_gdugs dkar mo can gyi ma byung* gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_rims 
[\[414a.5\]]bsrung ba'i cho ga_/phyugs nad gor bsrung ba'i cho ga_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg_/mngon spyod kyi las/_dngos grub sgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba/_bzlog pa'i zor bya ba'i cho ga_mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim pa rnams slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_zangs dkar 
[\[414a.6\]]'phags pa lo tsA'i 'gyur/_gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon rdo rje rnon pos mdzad pa/_'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya 
[\[414a.7\]]ba dang*/_'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi sAts+tsha'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus mdzad pa/_zangs dkar lo tsA bas tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du 'gyur/_gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon shu rang+ga warma badzras mdzad pa/_zangs 
[\[414b\]]
[\[414b.1\]]dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_lo 
[\[414b.2\]]tsA ba dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon gi ri wa tas mdzad pa/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon bi 
[\[414b.3\]]ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba mang du thos pa'i slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus rigs ldan ha ra pa'i slob dpon ka ma la d+he nu pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba/_A tsAr+ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'phags ma gdugs 
[\[414b.4\]]dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa sgrub pa'i thabs/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_'phags ma gtsug tor 
[\[414b.5\]]gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa slob dpon gi ri wa tas mdzad pa/_srung ba lnga'i skor la/_'phags pa ma rig pa chen mo so so 'brang ma'i 'khor lo'i sems sbyong slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chos kyi sde dang*/_lo tsA ba dge tshul nam mkha' rdo rje'i 'gyur/_so sor 
[\[414b.6\]]'brang ma'i 'khor lo bri ba'i thabs slob dpon rat+na A ka ra shAn+ti pas mdzad pa/_so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs/_rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs/_gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs/_bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs slob 
[\[414b.7\]]dpon chen po dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa/_so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i srung ba slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba chen po d+harma kIrti'i 'gyur/_'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rgya gar 
[\[415a\]]
[\[415a.1\]]yul wA rA Na sIr paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal las legs par mnyan te/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug lag khang chen po thar pa gling du 'gyur/_srung ba lnga'i cho ga slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[415a.2\]]gyi mkhan po mu di ta shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba ban+de bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba las/_slar chag chos rje dpal gyis bcos pa/_so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga slob dpon dze tA ris mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_dge slong pra dz+nyA kIrti'i 
[\[415a.3\]]'gyur/_srung ba lnga'i sgrub thabs dang mdo ma byung*ngo klog pa'i cho ga bal po'i dpe las mnga' ris pa rdo rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba/_srung ba lnga'i mchod pa'i cho ga dang*/_gza' dgu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta nags kyi rin chen gyis nyid kyi slob dpon hang sa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[415a.4\]]gsung zin bris su bgyis pa'i yi ge las rtses thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa dra bi ta'i bum pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba/_rab gnas kyi cho ga slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang*/_khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri'i 
[\[415a.5\]]'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/_yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad 
[\[415a.6\]]par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de smon lam gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus te rim par bklag pa mkhan po bo d+hi sa twas mdzad pa 'di gsum cho ga rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum yin no/_/gzungs thams cad kyi sgrub thabs rim pa gnyis 
[\[415a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba/_gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las kyi bya ba rnams slob dpon chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_bal po ma hA pA na'i rang 'gyur/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo mkhan po nar ban rak+Shi tas mdzad 
[\[415b\]]
[\[415b.1\]]pa/_rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta dpal su ma ti kIrtis mdzad pa/_mkhas pa de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/'dir bkod pa'i sgrub thabs 'ga' zhig rnal 'byor rgyud dang mthun pa dang*/_spyod rgyud dang mthun pa'i bskyed chog tu byas pa ci rigs pa 
[\[415b.2\]]snang yang brten pa'i rgyud phal cher bya rgyud du snang ba dang*/_sde tshan phyogs gcig tu snang ba'i phyir 'dir bkod do zhes kun mkhyen bus gsungs so/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rigs gsum gtsor gyur pa'i/_/bya ba'i rgyud dang 'brel ba'i 'grel pa dang*/_/sgrub skor la sogs 
[\[415b.3\]]chos skor brgya phrag bzhi/_/bcu phrag bdun la lnga yis spras pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bya ba'i rgyud kyi chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar rgyud sde so so ba dang 'brel ba'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_rgyud sde bzhi thun mong ba ci rigs pa dang 'brel 
[\[415b.4\]]ba'i dgongs 'grel bstan bcos kyi skor la/_phu pa la/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba kher gad ban+de 'khor lo grags kyi 'gyur la/_dus phyis lo tsA ba shes rab dpal gyis 
[\[415b.5\]]bcos shing*/_slad nas paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_rA hu la shrI b+ha dra dang*/_ma ni ka shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_chag chos rje dpal gyis bcos pa las/_slad nas dpang lo tsA ba blo brtan gyis mi bcos su mi rung ba rnams bcos nas dag par byas pa/_rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba 
[\[415b.6\]]sh+lau ka stong nyis brgya pa rdo rje phag mos mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpal bzang pos 'gyur rnying pa la brten nas smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang du rang 
[\[415b.7\]]'gyur du mdzad cing*/_yang paN+Di ta de nyid kyis lan gnyis su zhus shing gtugs/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po mkhas btsun mchog gi grub pa brnyes pa bla ma rje btsun chen po re wen+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis zhus shing dag par bsgyur 
[\[416a\]]
[\[416a.1\]]nas bcos pa/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'od kyi snye ma zhes bya ba rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen dpal bzang pos bod yul gyi 
[\[416a.2\]]dbus drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur du mdzad pa la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po rig pa'i gnas rnams thugs su chud pa'i mkhas pa dag dang grub pa brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis thugs gtams shing de kho na nyid la gzhol ba'i slob dpon nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od 
[\[416a.3\]]zer dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis legs par bsgyur zhing bcos pa la/_dus phyis shong lo tsA ba dge slong blo brtan gyis legs par bcos shing dag par byas pa/_tshigs bcad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur 
[\[416a.4\]]ba'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsar grags pa'i rnam grangs la/_dang por 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/_de nas rim gyis dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po ku mud 'byung gnas blo gros kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra'i zhal snga nas pa tshab kyi brgyud kyi 
[\[416a.5\]]dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dam tshig gsum rgyal gyi rtog pa nas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa/_rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las gsungs pa'i bstod pa'i phan yon/_dam tshig gsum gyi dam tshig 
[\[416a.6\]]gi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po rin chen 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_gdams ngag gi rim pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs/_yang rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs gcig_/'phags pa yi ge drug par rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa yi ge drug pa rig 
[\[416a.7\]]pa chen po rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gdams ngag rgyud nas 'ongs pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga_/yi ge drug pa'i gdams ngag gi khyad par rnams pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_bde ba 'byung ba'i khar+sa pa Ni'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta rat+na A ka ra gup+ta dang*/_dge slong tshul 
[\[416b\]]
[\[416b.1\]]khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_bde ba 'byung ba khar+sa pa Ni zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs pad+ma 'byung gnas blo gros kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/_seng ge sgra'i gzungs/_seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs 
[\[416b.2\]]paN+Di ta rat+na A ka ra dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_snying rje khros pa zhes bya ba'i ha la ha la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs a b+ha ya dang*/_tshul rgyal gyi 'gyur/_snying rje khros pa'i ha la ha la'i sgrub thabs dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_pad+ma gar gyi 
[\[416b.3\]]dbang phyug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs dang*/_pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs mkhas pa rat+na A ka ra'i zhal snga nas tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_seng ge dang bya khyung dang khyab 'jug la bzhugs pa las byung ba'i sgrub thabs/_seng ge dang bya khyung dang 
[\[416b.4\]]khyab 'jug la bzhugs pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/_au rgyan nas byung ba'i rim pa 'jig rten gsum dbang du byed pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_a b+ha ya'i zhabs drung nas pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_au Di 
[\[416b.5\]]yA na nas rnam par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jig rten gsum dbang du byed pa'i sgrub thabs sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_mkhas pa rat+na A ka ra dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po'i sgrub thabs/_sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i 
[\[416b.6\]]lugs kyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta A ka ra dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta Ar+Ya A ka ra dang*/_pa tshab kyi 'gyur/_tshig lhug pa'i brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub 
[\[416b.7\]]thabs/_'phags pa dpal dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gsung gi mnga' bdag gi sgrub thabs/_gsung gi mnga' bdag gi sgrub thabs/_spros pa med pa'i sgrub thabs/_spros pa med pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba tshig lhug pa'i a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs/_'phral du nyams su myong 
[\[417a\]]
[\[417a.1\]]ba'i spros pa med pa'i sgrub thabs/_lha lnga'i khyad par gyi gdams ngag_/rdo rje lus med kyi sgrub thabs/_'jam dpal rdo rje lus med kyi sgrub thabs/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/_chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs 
[\[417a.2\]]las dbang du bya ba'i cho ga_/chos kyi dung gi ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rnams paN+Di ta a b+ha ya las/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs ngag grub pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta rak+Shi ta 
[\[417a.3\]]la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas mnyan te dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_ngag sgrub pa'i thabs/_rgyal po chen po brjid pa zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs/_'phags pa dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs/_yang dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i 
[\[417a.4\]]sgrub thabs/_khor yug mngar ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa/_dbang du byed pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs/_'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod las byung ba'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs/_shes 
[\[417a.5\]]rab mngon par bskyed pa/_shes rab 'phel ba'i cho ga_/'jam dpal gyi shes rab 'khor lo/_'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_yang sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[417a.6\]]rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rnams paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_yang rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang a b+ha ya la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rgya 
[\[417a.7\]]nag po'i lugs kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_gdams ngag gi khyad par gyi sgrub thabs/_rgya nag chen po'i lugs kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_'chi ba bslu bar byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_yang sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[417b\]]
[\[417b.1\]]yang sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_dug sel ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma nor sbyin ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs rtog pa las gsungs pa/_sgrol ma las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i tshig lhug pa'i sgrub thabs/_ku ru kul+le'i dbang 
[\[417b.2\]]du bya ba'i gdams ngag_/gdams ngag gi khyad par/_ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_yang ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs in+d+ra b+hU tis zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_bung ba'i rnal 'byor gyi ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_yang ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_yang ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs rnams a b+ha 
[\[417b.3\]]yA ka ra'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_au D+yAn nas nges par byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' ma la ba dA na shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gser mdog gi shes rab kyi 
[\[417b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs dang*/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po mA la ba zhes bya ba dA byang chub 
[\[417b.5\]]sems dpa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dbyangs can ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub 
[\[417b.6\]]thabs ma la ba zhes bya ba dA'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po dA dang a b+ha ya dang A ma ra la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//bu pa la/_
[\[417b.7\]]rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can dkar mo'i sgrub thabs dang*/_mya ngan med pa la dga' ba'i 'od zer can ma'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa dA na shrI dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rtog pa nas gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha ya'i 
[\[418a\]]
[\[418a.1\]]zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_yang 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_au D+yAn gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_o Di yA na nas byung ba'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs 
[\[418a.2\]]au D+yAn nas 'byung ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs/_mya ngan med pa la dga' ba'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_gdams ngag gi khyad par/_'phags ma 'od zer can gyi gzungs 'don pa'i man ngag_/nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_yang nor rgyun ma'i sgrub 
[\[418a.3\]]thabs rnams paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang*/_nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi man ngag dA byang chub sems dpa' las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs ma la ba'i 
[\[418a.4\]]zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gdams ngag gi khyad par gzhan gyi rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs ma la ba'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan 
[\[418a.5\]]gyi 'gyur/_yang khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs/_'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma dug sel ma'i gzungs rnams a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs byang chub sems dpa'i zhal 
[\[418a.6\]]snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_skul byed ma'i sgrub thabs a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po dA dang a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gtsug 
[\[418a.7\]]tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma gdugs dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sgrub thabs/_so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs/_gsang sngags kyi 
[\[418b\]]
[\[418b.1\]]rjes su 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_gdams ngag gzhan gyis lha lnga legs par bstan pa zhes bya ba/_phyir bzlog ma chen mo/_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje dri 
[\[418b.2\]]ldan ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma rab tu dang ba'i sgrub thabs rnams a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gtum mo cher khros pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'od zer 'byung gnas grags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po dA dang a 
[\[418b.3\]]b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs a b+ha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_byams pa'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta dang a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_yang byams pa'i sgrub 
[\[418b.4\]]thabs/_dzam+b+ha la chen po'i sgrub thabs/_dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rnams a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta dA dang a b+ha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_yang dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs a b+ha ya las tshul 
[\[418b.5\]]khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs dang*/_mdor bsdus pa'i dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs dA las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dpal dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs dang*/_dzam+b+ha la'i rgyun 'babs pa'i gdams ngag a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul 
[\[418b.6\]]khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dzam+b+ha la'i gdams ngag dA dang a b+ha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_gdams ngag gi khyad par a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_dzam+b+ha la'i khyad par gyi gdams ngag dA dang a b+ha

[\[419a\]]
[\[419a.1\]]gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/_yang gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/_yang gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje mthar mdzad kyi sgrub thabs/_yang gshin rje mthar byed kyis sgrub thabs/_bgegs mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_

[\[419a.3\]]'ba' zhig gi sgrub thabs dA dang a b+ha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje phag mo dbang du bya ba'i cho ga_/rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje phag mo'i rtog pa don thams cad sgrub par

[\[419a.7\]]paN+Di ta chen po de dag dang*/_pa tshab kyi rigs su skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis legs par bsgyur ba/_rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta a wa d+hU tI pa dpal ldan 'gro ba'i me long gis mdzad pa/_bi kra ma 
[\[419b\]]
[\[419b.1\]]shI la'i paN+Di ta chen po many+dzu shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_slar yang dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa dge slong badzra shrIs kyang bcos shing dag par bgyis pa'o//_//mu pa la/_ba ri ba'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsar

[\[423a.4\]]sgrub thabs/_sku mdog dmar mo phyag bcu gnyis ma o Di yA na'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_yang sku mdog dmar mo phyag bcu gnyis ma o Di yA na'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa/_sku mdog dmar mo phyag bcu gnyis pa'i o 
[\[423a.5\]]Di yA na'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta slob dpon snying po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_dpal 'od zer can pi tsu pa'i sgrub 
[\[423a.6\]]thabs/_'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/_'phags ma 'od zer can gyi gzungs 'don pa'i man ngag_/ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs/_yang ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs/_'phags ma ri khrod lo ma can gyi gzungs/_dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub 
[\[423a.7\]]thabs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dge 'dun sbyin gyi 
[\[423b\]]
[\[423b.1\]]bus mdzad pa/_yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta dpal ldan pad+ma 'phel gyis mdzad pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs/_gser mdog can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[423b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa/_dbyangs can ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_yang rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/_yang rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub 
[\[423b.3\]]thabs/_rdo rje pi wang dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las byung ba'i rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/_khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs/_yang khro gnyer can gyi sgrub 
[\[423b.4\]]thabs/_sgrol ma'i rtog pa las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma'i rtog pa las byung ba'i tshig lhug pa'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_ku ru kul+le'i dbang du byed pa'i man ngag_/rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs/_dpal ldan 
[\[423b.5\]]'phags ma rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs/_o Di yA na nas byung ba'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs/_rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa/_kye rdo rje'i rim pa'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs dpal kye rdo rje'i rgyud las phyung ba snyan 
[\[423b.6\]]dngags mkhan chen po brtse ba can zhes bya bas tshigs bcad du bsdebs pa/_rje btsun ma ku ru kul+le phyag drug ma'i sgrub thabs/_rigs byed ma phyag drug ma'i sgrub thabs/_rigs byed ma phyag brgyad ma'i sgrub thabs in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[423b.7\]]rigs byed ma'i man ngag gi rim pa/_rigs byed ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu drug pa las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs mchog tu gyur pa slob dpon dpal nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_ku ru kul+le'i 
[\[424a\]]
[\[424a.1\]]sgrub thabs/_rtog pa las gsungs pa'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/_ku ru kul+le'i las rab tu skyong ba sbyor ba/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgrub thabs/_rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sgrub thabs/_
[\[424a.2\]]so so 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_yang so so 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_yang so so 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i 
[\[424a.3\]]sgrub thabs/_bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_lha mo lnga'i sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa/_phyir bzlog ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs/_gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje g+han+d+ha rI'i sgrub thabs/_yang rdo rje gan+d+ha rI'i 
[\[424a.4\]]sgrub thabs/_srung ba lnga'i cho ga_/rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs/_man ngag gi rim pa'i nang nas byung ba'i rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs/_rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga_/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chos kyi 'byung gnas blo gros zhabs 
[\[424a.5\]]kyis mdzad pa/_'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/_yang gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/_lha mo nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_yang nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi man ngag_/rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub 
[\[424a.6\]]thabs paN+Di ta chen po a wa d+hu tI pa dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_shes rab kyi snang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga_/rdo rje phag mos dbang du bya ba'i cho ga_/dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtog pa las gsungs pa'i don thams cad grub pa/_byams pa'i sgrub thabs/_yang byams pa'i 
[\[424a.7\]]sgrub thabs/_khro zhing dgyes pa dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs bzhi/_bar gyi man ngag dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs/_dpal dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_yang 
[\[424b\]]
[\[424b.1\]]dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/_dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa/_dpal ldan dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs/_dzam+b+ha la la chu rgyun dbul ba'i man ngag_/rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rtog pa bdun brgya pa las gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/_
[\[424b.2\]]rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta pra b+hA ka ras mdzad pa/_'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs/_rta mchog gi sgrub thabs/_'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje 
[\[424b.3\]]gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/_yang gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/_gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_yang gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_bgegs mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sgrub thabs/_
[\[424b.4\]]stobs po che'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa stobs po che'i sgrub thabs/_yang 'phags pa khro bo stobs po che'i sgrub thabs dge slong shAkya bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_Ar+ya tsan+d+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa la sgra bag tsam bcos/_he ru ka'i sgrub thabs/_dgyes pa rdo rje 
[\[424b.5\]]phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs tA ra shrIs mdzad zer ba/_bdag med ma rkyang pa'i sgrub thabs/_bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs/_dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/_'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dam pa thams cad 'dren pa'i 'jig rten gsum 
[\[424b.6\]]gyi rdo rjes mdzad pa/_dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/_yang dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs rnams so/_/lha so so'i sgrub thabs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di rnams ni dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta chen po gau tam shrI las brgyud cing paN+Di 
[\[424b.7\]]ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas zhus te/_de shAn+ta ri yo gi grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bya lo zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i dkar po'i tshes gsum la dben gnas dam pa chu mig rdzing khar yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur ba/_'di la chos kyi rnam grangs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bzhugs 
[\[425a\]]
[\[425a.1\]]so//_//klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/_slob dpon bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_yig brgya'i cho ga slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa/_
[\[425a.2\]]'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bzang pos mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_jo bo chen po dang dge bshes ston pa'i 'gyur la/_dus 
[\[425a.3\]]phyis paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dang*/_gnubs lo tsA bas dag par bcos pa/_dpal mi pham mgon po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon nai ri ti pas mdzad pa/_gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa khar+sa pa Ni 'jig rten 
[\[425a.4\]]mgon po'i sgrub thabs/_lha mo sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs/_'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po chen po sgeg pa'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs/_lha mo nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_ku ru kul+le'i 
[\[425a.5\]]sgrub thabs/_gnod gnas kyi sgrub thabs/_khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs/_lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon chen po phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa dri ma med pa'i lhas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bcu gcig_/lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_yang 
[\[425a.6\]]lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_yang 'phags ma 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa/_rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dze tA ri dgra 
[\[425a.7\]]las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal rnam 
[\[425b\]]
[\[425b.1\]]par snang mdzad rdo rje'i 'gyur/_sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_slad kyi rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dA na shI la dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo gros 
[\[425b.2\]]grags pas bcos pa/_sgrol ma tshe 'phel ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan 
[\[425b.3\]]gyi zhal snga nas/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal po'i 'gyur la cung zad dag par bcos pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las thams cad sgrub pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i 
[\[425b.4\]]bstod pa me tog phreng ba/_'phags ma sgrol ma la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob kyi bstod pa/_'phags pa 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rnams slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba tshul 
[\[425b.5\]]khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' dA na shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bcos pa/_sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang*/_lo tsA 
[\[425b.6\]]ba khams pa dge slong ba ri'i 'gyur/_sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa dang*/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta shrI bi ma la kIrti'i zhal snga nas 
[\[425b.7\]]dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bal po'i grong khyer yam bu'i nub phyogs nyi ma'i gtsug lag khang du 'gyur/_sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma'i khrus kyi cho ga_/gso sbyong gi cho ga rnams sgrol ma'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon 
[\[426a\]]
[\[426a.1\]]b+ha wa b+ha dras mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal gyi 'gyur/_sgrol ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga snyan dngags mkhan chen po snying rje chen pos mdzad pa/_sgrol ma mchog sgrub pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon bsod snyoms pas 
[\[426a.2\]]mdzad pa/_'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta b+ha dra dang*/_dge slong 'phags pas rgya'i yul cong to'i mkhar du bsgyur ba/_dpal sgrol ma dkar mo 'chi ba bslu ba'i sgrub thabs 
[\[426a.3\]]slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/_dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/_sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dA byang chub sems dpas 
[\[426a.4\]]mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen grags pa'i 'gyur/_rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'phags 
[\[426a.5\]]ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dul ba'i lha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrub thabs dang*/_'phags ma sgrol ma la 
[\[426a.6\]]bstod pa dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 
[\[426a.7\]]'gyur/_chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po bai ro tsa na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dar ma blo gros kyi 'gyur/_me tog phreng 
[\[426b\]]
[\[426b.1\]]'dzin sgrol ma'i bstod pa dang bcas pa'i bsgrub pa ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta pA da'i zhal snga nas lo tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsai tras mdzad pa/_rje btsun ma 'phags pa sgrol ma la bstod pa chos kyi rje paN+Di ta 'bum phrag 
[\[426b.2\]]gsum pas mdzad pa/_yang 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa/_rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bla ma chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra'i rang 'gyur/_dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs bram ze phur bus mdzad pa/_
[\[426b.3\]]tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba lha mo nyid kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i bram ze phur bus mdzad pa/_sum pa lo tsA ba d+harma yon tan gyi 'gyur/_dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa paN+Di ta nag mo khol gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dz+nyA na 
[\[426b.4\]]shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs snyan dngags mkhan chen po slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa/_rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_dpal lha 
[\[426b.5\]]mo nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_dpal nor rgyun ma'i smon lam/_dpal nor rgyun ma'i bstod pa rnams dpang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol bug tu rgya dpe las bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ge pa ni dge ba'i bshes 
[\[426b.6\]]gnyen rin chen mtha' can yin no/_/mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos bram ze shang kus mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze a wa d+hU tI pa chen po dpe med kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba ban+de pradz+nyA kIrti'i 'gyur/_lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa 
[\[426b.7\]]chen po paN+Di ta nag mo khol gyis dbyangs can ma zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/lha so so sna tshogs kyi sgrub thabs 'di rnams rgyud sde sna tshogs nas 
[\[427a\]]
[\[427a.1\]]btus pa dang*/_rgyud sde mtha' dag gcig tu ma nges pa rnams 'dir thun mong du bkod pa'o//_//tsu pa la/_dkyil 'khor spyi'i bya ba dang 'brel pa la/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[427a.2\]]sangs rgyas gsang bas dbas many+dzu shrI dang*/_bran ka mu di ta gnyis la brdzangs pa/_bod yul du lo tsA ba ska ba dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur ba/_gzhal yas khang gsal ba'i mngon rtogs mun sel sgron me zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad zer ba rnams 
[\[427a.3\]]so/_/rgyud sde bzhi po spyi dang 'brel pa dang*/_/khyad par so so'i sgrub thabs sna tshogs pa'i/_/gzhung lugs ngo mtshar brgya phrag lnga dang ni/_/bcu phrag bdun la gcig gis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni rgyud sde bzhi po sna tshogs dang 'brel pa'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil chog la sogs 
[\[427a.4\]]pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar rgyud sde bzhi po sna tshogs dang 'brel pa'i sgrub dkyil la sogs pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni theg pa gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi la sogs pa'i khyad par dang*/_mtshan nyid kyi rnam gzhag dang*/_bsgom rim la 
[\[427a.5\]]sogs gtan la 'bebs pa'i skor la/_tshul gsum gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po mtho btsun tri pi Ta ka ma las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_de kho na nyid grub pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos 
[\[427a.6\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_slad kyis paN+Di ta ku mA ra ka la sha dang*/_lo tsA ba 'bro shAkya 'od kyis tshad ma'i skabs bcos shing gtan la phab pa/_de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' 
[\[427a.7\]]ma lus pa mdor bsdus te bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon dpal ye shes grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi snang ba zhes bya ba rdo rje slob dpon chen po mtho btsun tso yag 
[\[427b\]]
[\[427b.1\]]gis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa slob dpon chos kyi dbang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza nar dA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_theg pa gsum 
[\[427b.2\]]rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi don la 'jug pa bsdus pa slob dpon shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[427b.3\]]shrad+d+hA ka ra warma de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_rdo rje theg pa'i mtha' gnyis sel ba slob dpon dz+nyA na shrIs bkod pa/_de nyid mthong ba'i lam dpal ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rngog bud+d+ha pA las dpal shing kun du tshogs 'khor 
[\[427b.4\]]sar gsol ba btab nas lha khang bi hA rar bsgyur ba/_bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po rnal du mtshon par byed pa slob dpon chen po badzra pA Nis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi roSh+k+r-i dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'brog mi jo sras kyi 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i 
[\[427b.5\]]lam gyi rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon skal ba bzang po'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyi 'gyur/_gsang sngags la 'jug pa'i rab tu byed pa drug cu pa slob dpon dz+nyA na A ka ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dz+nyA na A ka ra nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge 
[\[427b.6\]]slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_gsang sngags la 'jug pa'i rab tu byed pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta A tsAr+ya dz+nyA na A ka ras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na A ka ra nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//tshu pa la/_theg pa chen 
[\[427b.7\]]po'i don bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa'i rnam gzhag gi skor la/_bla ma lnga bcu pa slob dpon chen po rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[428a\]]
[\[428a.1\]]gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_bla ma lnga bcu pa'i dka' 'grel rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po dpal nags kyi rin chen gyi bka' drin las/_mkhas pa gzhon nu dpal gyis dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i dben 
[\[428a.2\]]gnas lha khang steng du 'gyur/_spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig dang mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes dpal bzang pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA 
[\[428a.3\]]ba dge slong blo gros snying po dang*/_dge slong rab zhi bshes gnyen gnyis kyi 'gyur/_dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_rje btsun bla ma chen po de nyid kyi zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_las dang po pa'i 
[\[428a.4\]]dam tshig mdor bsdus pa dbang pos mtshan pa'i yul gyi rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyA na bo d+his mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_lo tsA ba bsod nams rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sdom gsum 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti 
[\[428a.5\]]tsan+d+ras mdzad de/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i las kyi cho ga bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags kyis bsgyur ba/_zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad zer ba 'di 
[\[428a.6\]]the tshom gyi gzhi gcig snang bas mjug tu bkod pa yin no/_/chos skyong dang nor lha la sogs pa'i skor la/_rnam sras kyi sgrub thabs rnam sras bde byed kyi rtog pa dang*/_rnam sras drag byed kyi cho ga slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar dbus kyi paN+Di ta chen po te dza de wa dang*/_bod kyi lo 
[\[428a.7\]]tsA ba dge slong zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam sras gsang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa/_sgra pa chen po rgyal ba'i snyan la legs par 
[\[428b\]]
[\[428b.1\]]zhus shing*/_lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba/_rnam thos sras kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon shU rang+gA warmas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta te dza de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bai sha 
[\[428b.2\]]wa Na'i rtog pa dang bstod pa/_bde byed kyi rnam sras kyi rtog pa cho ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzod/_rnam sras kyi bstod ma byung*pa thugs rje ba 'jo zhes bya ba snyan dngags kyi phreng ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta te dza de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bgegs 
[\[428b.3\]]kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs 'di rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro las phyung ba'o/_/tshogs kyi bdag po gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dpal dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzras mdzad pa/_tshogs kyi bdag po chags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstod pa paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_
[\[428b.4\]]tshogs kyi bdag po sprin gyi sgron me'i sgrub thabs slob dpon bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rnams rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta 
[\[428b.5\]]chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges yam bu karta rir legs par bsgyur/_'chol ba'i sgrub thabs sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la'i rang 'gyur/_rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tas 
[\[428b.6\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta a lang+ka de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas chos 'khor shod ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta ma hA bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur zhing dag par bcos pa/_dzam+b+ha la'i 
[\[428b.7\]]sgrub thabs rgyal po Ar+ya ma tis mdzad pa/_dge slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_dpal rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thabs gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba sbas pa bum pa 'khyil pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nor sbyin gyis mdzad pa/_dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral 
[\[429a\]]
[\[429a.1\]]ba'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul gyi dbus ngam shod kyi mthil bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyal po'i pho brang yid bzhin nor bu'i mdzod dbu rtse rim gsum lha khang gi steng du legs par bsgyur ba/_dzam+b+ha la nag po'i 
[\[429a.2\]]sgrub thabs bsdus pa paN chen shAkya shrIs zhal nas gsungs pa/_de nyid dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la phrin las nyi shu'i sgo nas khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nor 'dzin dpal gyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha 
[\[429a.3\]]shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis mang yul gyi grong gi 'phags pa wa ti'i pho brang du bsgyur ba/_'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po btsun pa zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu di ta shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba/_
[\[429a.4\]]'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badzras mdzad pa/_dzam+b+ha la la bstod pa mi'i dbang po nyi ma rnam par gnon pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma d+ha ra dang*/_yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag 
[\[429a.5\]]gi bstod pa bla ma dA byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa/_kha cig slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad zer ro/_/lha mo nor rgyun ma'i bstod pa paN+Di ta dza ma ris mdzad cing*/_de nyid kyi rang 'gyur/_dpal lha mo nor rgyun ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni mkhas pa chen po zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong 
[\[429a.6\]]d+harma pA la b+ha dra'i 'gyur/_gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rgya gar gyi bla ma dza ma ri'i 'gyur/_rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa rnam par phye ba'i sgrub thabs te legs ldan nag po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon snang mdzad myu gus mdzad 
[\[429a.7\]]pa 'di rnying ma yin pa 'dra'o zhes bu ston rjes gsungs so/_/sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi sogs kyi/_/spyi yi rnam gzhag sngags kyi theg pa yi/_/dam tshig la sogs gsal bar ston pa'i gzhung*/_/bcu phrag lnga la gcig gis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni sde snod dang rgyud sde spyi'i 
[\[429b\]]
[\[429b.1\]]rnam gzhag dang*/_sngags kyi theg pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa ston pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkong zin to//_//de ltar sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi sogs kyi spyi'i rnam gzhag dang*/_sngags kyi theg pa'i dam tshig ston pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni gnas chen du bgrod tshul 
[\[429b.2\]]dang*/_bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa'i skor la/_po Ta la kar 'gro ba'i lam yig rje btsun spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta a b+hi yuk+ta de wa shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba d+harma yon tan gyis ji ltar rnyed par bsgyur/_byang chub chen po mdor bstan pa zhes rdo rje 
[\[429b.3\]]gdan gyi bkod pa zhwa lu lo tsA bas pho brang chen po sne'u gdong gi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi dpe las bod kyi skad du bsgyur ba/_grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gsol 'debs bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na dang*/_lo tsA ba shrI chos kyi grags pa'i 'gyur/_bla ma dam pa bsod nams dpal zhes 
[\[429b.4\]]bya ba la bstod pa/_rgya gar lho phyogs kyi yul dpal ldan 'bras phung zhes bya ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pa'i gnas der bla ma man lungs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa rlabs po che byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dang cha mthun pa la mos pa'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI zhes bya ba mkhas shing btsun pa 
[\[429b.5\]]des tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/_/dpal ldan man lungs kyi gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta gau taM b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba grags pa byang chub gnyis kyi 'gyur/_maN+Dal dang sAts+tsha la sogs pa'i nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi chos spyod kyi skor la/_maN+Dal gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob 
[\[429b.6\]]dpon mkhas pa chen po kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_sngon gyi lo tsA ba rnams kyi 'gyur rnying ngo*/_/maN+Dal bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang gsang sngags gnyis ka'i thun mong ngo*/_/bla ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga_/maN+Dal 
[\[429b.7\]]gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rgyal ba gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tu lo pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_yang maN+Dal gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga 
[\[430a\]]
[\[430a.1\]]nas mdzad pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_slob dpon srid gsum rnam par dag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i las dang po pa'i tshogs sog bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_byang chub gzhung lam zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung 
[\[430a.2\]]gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa kha che'i mkhan po chen po chos kyi rje shAkya shrI b+ha dra las mnyan nas/_bod yul dbus kyi sde snod 'dzin pa chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyi 'gyur/_maN+Dal gyi cho ga kha che paN chen gyis mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyi 
[\[430a.3\]]'gyur/_de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon shI la swa b+hA was las dang po pa'i ngor bsdus te mdzad pa/_gtor ma'i cho ga sna tshogs kyi skor la/_rgyud sna tshogs las btus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon 
[\[430a.4\]]chen po karma badzra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi 'gyur/_chos skyong thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon chen po ba liM A tsAr+yas mdzad pa/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_gtor ma'i phreng ba slob dpon blo bzang seng ges mdzad pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi 
[\[430a.5\]]dge slong d+harma dI paM ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras dpal e waM chos 'khor du 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge bshes ston pa'i 'gyur/_gtor ma chen po'i las kyi rim pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon rdo rje mi bskyod pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[430a.6\]]mkhan po badzra kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_cha gsum 'bring po'i cho ga nor bu gling pa bde ba'i rdo rje'i gdams ngag la brten nas paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra warmas nye bar sbyar ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_chu gtor gyi cho ga 
[\[430a.7\]]'jam dpal ma'i rtsa ba slob dpon dza ya se nAs mdzad pa dang*/_chu gtor 'jam dpal ma'i 'grel pa phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon shAkya mi tras mdzad pa gnyis dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_gtor ma'i 'grel pa slob dpon bid dz+nyA nas mdzad 
[\[430b\]]
[\[430b.1\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba A tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gi 'gyur/_bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad cing*/_lo tsA ba khu dngos grub kyis gtan la phab pa/_chab gtor dri ma med pa'i gzhung slob dpon 
[\[430b.2\]]dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_klu gtor gyi cho ga sgrol ma'i zhabs rdul la reg pa'i mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_bkra shis dang bde legs 
[\[430b.3\]]su byed pa'i skor la/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum 
[\[430b.4\]]cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol mas gsungs pa'i bkra shis brgyad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba ldan ma tshul khrims seng ge'i 'gyur/_mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad rnams bzhugs so/_/gsang ba 
[\[430b.5\]]'dus pa le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa bam po brgya rtsa bcu dang sh+lo ka bcu gnyis pa slob dpon rab tu byung ba'i mtshan pra b+ha wa gsang mtshan 'phags pa snying pos mdzad zer ba/_paN+Di ta phra ras kyis 'bal byams pa shes rab dang*/_gnyan byang chub tshul khrims gnyis kyi don du bsgyur ba 'di rdzun ma 
[\[430b.6\]]yang dag yin pas ma bris so zhes kun mkhyen bus gsungs so/_/bla ma'i gsol 'debs nyin zhag phrug gcig gi_/bya rim chos skyong nor lha'i bkra shis kyi/_/tshigs su bcad pa la sogs bstan bcos grangs/_/dri ma med pa sum cu tham pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni las dang po'i bya ba'i rim 
[\[430b.7\]]pa dang chos skyong dang nor lha dang bkra shis la sogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sngags phyogs kyi chos skor la bstan bcos nyis stong bdun brgya gya gcig bzhugs so/_/sngags kyi bstan bcos skabs te gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[431a\]]
[\[431a.1\]]gnyis pa phyi mtshan nyid kyi phyogs la/_rig pa'i gnas lnga ston pa'i bstan bcos las dang po nang rig pa'i bstan bcos la theg pa che chung gnyis las/_theg chen gyi snying po bka' bar pa rgyal ba'i yum gyi dgongs 'grel la shing rta chen po'i srol bzhir grags pa las/_dang 
[\[431a.2\]]po rgyal ba'i yum gyi mngon par rtogs pa'i don ston pa ni/_ka pa la/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa mgon pos mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_paN+Di ta go mi 'chi med dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_
[\[431a.3\]]de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i 'grel pa la/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa legs par spyad pa'i las can theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba ku ru kul+le'i sde pa gtsug 
[\[431a.4\]]lag khang du ma'i bdag po slob dpon sangs rgyas 'bangs kyi tsha bo dge slong 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes mdzad pa/_nyi khri snang bar grags pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po shar phyogs kyi dge bsnyen chen po go mi 'chi med dang*/_lo tsA ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur gnyis bzhugs so//_//
[\[431a.5\]]kha pa la/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa mkhas pa chen po mos pas spyod pa'i sa brnyes pa slob dpon rnam grol sdes mdzad pa/_bal yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_'bro 
[\[431a.6\]]seng dkar dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa dang nyi khri lnga stong pa dang khri brgyad stong pa gsum don mthun par mngon rtogs brgyad du bstan pa paN+Di ta chen po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la dpe rnying dag po 
[\[431a.7\]]rnams na paN+Di ta byams pas mdzad bya ba snang ste/_de ltar na mai tri pa la smr-i tir nor ba yin nam sems so zhes bu ston gyis gsungs so//_//ga nga ca gsum la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa slob dpon 
[\[431b\]]
[\[431b.1\]]seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa nyi khri le brgyad mar grags pa bam po bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa/_bal yul yam bu'i bsod nams rgyun 'byung gi gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta zhi ba bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur bzhugs so//_//cha pa la/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[431b.2\]]pa brgyad stong pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa sh+lo ka stong phrag brgyad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hA Shi ta dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur nas/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di 
[\[431b.3\]]ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang yang gtugs nas bcos pa la/_dus phyis paN+Di ta chen po gzhung 'bum phrag gnyis kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa d+hi ra pA la dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//
[\[431b.4\]]ja pa la/_mngon rtogs rgyan sdud pa dang sbyar ba'i 'grel pa'am/_bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bka' 'grel rtogs par sla ba zhes bya ba sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya pa slob dpon chen po seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa/_bal yul gyi paN+Di ta dze ta hang ngu shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_bod 
[\[431b.5\]]kyi lo tsA ba 'phro seng dkar shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa bam po lnga pa slob dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis
