[\[431b.6\]]bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta dpal go mi 'chi med dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis legs par bcos shing gtan la phab pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rtogs par dka' ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel 
[\[431b.7\]]bshad slob dpon gser gling pa chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa'i bsdus don nub kyi sgo glegs pa dpal mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas 
[\[432a\]]
[\[432a.1\]]blo gros kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//nya pa la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel bshad tshig rab 
[\[432a.2\]]tu gsal ba zhes bya ba yul chen po bai da lar skyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po grub pa'i mtha' rab 'byams la mkhyen pa'i snang bas khyab pa theg pa chen po dbu ma'i slob dpon dpal chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po a b+hi yuk+ta kat+ta ra shrI mi tra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 
[\[432a.3\]]dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba/_sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bka' 'grel slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i dngos slob bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas 
[\[432a.4\]]mdzad pa bam po drug pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA sing+ha ka ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa grags pa'i cha zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrti de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba la chings yon tan 
[\[432a.5\]]'bar gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ta pa la/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dpal chos kyi rje byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mkhas pa thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa 
[\[432a.6\]]kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_mngon rtogs rgyan sems tsam gyi lta bar bkrol ba 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub brnyes pa mkhas pa chen po slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas 
[\[432a.7\]]zhi bas mdzad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa dag ldan zhes bya ba nyi khri dang sbyar ba'i 'grel pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI su b+hU ti shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros dang*/_dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang*/_zhu 
[\[432b\]]
[\[432b.1\]]chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bcos te gtan la phab pa/_stong phrag brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa mngon rtogs rgyan dang mthun par bshad pa kha che'i paN+Di ta d+harma shrIs mdzad do zhes grags pa rnams bzhugs so//_//tha pa la/_mngon rtogs rgyan brgyad stong pa dang sbyar nas sems tsam 
[\[432b.2\]]du ston pa 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i bka' 'grel snying po mchog ces bya ba sh+lau ka stong phrag brgyad pa/rgyal po'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrI su b+hu ti shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi 
[\[432b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus sgron ma zhes bya ba dpal shAn+ti pa'i slob ma slob dpon mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//da pa la/_brgyad stong pa [(*]ma byung*[)]mngon rtogs rgyan dang sbyar ba'i 'grel pa slob 
[\[432b.4\]]dpon 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang*/_mkhas pa shes rab dpal gyis dpal 
[\[432b.5\]]nA len+d+rar bsgyur ba/_sdud pa mngon rtogs rgyan dang mthun par bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi lde mig ces bya ba kha che'i mkhan po bla ma d+harma shrIs mdzad pa/_'phags pa sdud pa'i gdams ngag 'di byang chub sa'i snying po dpal 'bum steng gi gtsug lag khang gsar du bzhengs pa'i dus 
[\[432b.6\]]mkhas pa chen po ba reg lo tsA bas bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/de ltar mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'grel pa nyi shu rtsa gcig go_/shing rta'i srol 'byed gnyis pa dbu ma rig pa'i tshogs ni 'og tu dbu ma dang lhan cig bri'o//_//na pa gnyis la/_shing rta'i srol 'byed gsum pa 
[\[432b.7\]]slob dpon daMSh+TA se nas mdzad par grags pa'i 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa rgya cher 'grel pa le'u lnga bcu nga gnyis pa'i 'phro la lus pa bzhugs/_'di la dkar chag 'phang thang mar rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis mdzad zer ro//_//pha pa la/_'phags pa shes 
[\[433a\]]
[\[433a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa dang*/_nyi khri lnga stong pa dang*/_khri brgyad stong pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur ba/_'di la kun mkhyen bus kha cig daMSh+Ta se nas mdzad zer mod kyi/_slob dpon 
[\[433a.2\]]dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i gzhung gi 'grel par bzhed pa nyid 'thad par rtogs te/_rgya 'grel rnams su lung drangs pa'i gzhung rnams de na mi snang ba'i phyir 'dis lta ba sems tsam du bkrol zhing*/_'di dang 'bum TIka che ba gnyis ka sgo gsum rnam grangs bcu gcig tu 'chad do zhes bshad 
[\[433a.3\]]do/_/shing rta'i srol 'byed bzhi pa gtso bo'i don sum cu rtsa gnyis su ston pa 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa dang*/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par 'grel 
[\[433a.4\]]pa slob dpon bla ma dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga brgya bzhi bcu pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ba pa la/_dpal ldan rgyal po dza gat+ta tA lar gnas pas mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[433a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba gzhung tshad sh+lo ka stong phrag brgyad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a lang+ka de wa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ga rod tshul khrims 'byung gnas kyis dpal sgye'u ri'i drung du chos 'khor dben pa'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_'di brgyad stong don bsdus 
[\[433a.6\]]dang*/_nyi khri gzhung 'grel gnyis ka'i rjes su 'brang ba'i 'grel pa yin no//_//ma pa la/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa slob dpon chen po kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma 
[\[433a.7\]]dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon chen po kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[433b\]]
[\[433b.1\]]dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mgon po ngag gi dbang pos spobs pa bskyed pa'i slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa bam po bdun pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon ka ma la 
[\[433b.2\]]shI las mdzad pa bam po drug pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang*/_li'i mkhan po su ren+d+ra ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong nam mkha' skyong gis bsgyur ba/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i gnas bdun gyi rgya cher 'grel ba 
[\[433b.3\]]slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa gzhon nu dpal ba'i zhal snga nas gsar 'gyur mdzad pa'i 'phro cung zad lus pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba 'gos chos skyong bzang pos lugs gnyis kyi mdun sa chen po pho brang sne'u gdong rtser chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po chen po dpal ngag gi 
[\[433b.4\]]dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi mnga' thang chen po la brten nas legs par bsgyur/_slar yang rgya dpe la gtugs shing slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa'i 'grel par brjod bya ris mthun pa rnams dang sbyar te/_tshig phrad dang 'khrugs sdeb 
[\[433b.5\]]sogs cung zad legs char 'gyur ba rnams 'bad cing dag par bgyis pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa dbu ma'i tshul du rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI dang*/_dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye 
[\[433b.6\]]shes sdes bsgyur ba/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i rgya cher bshad pa don brgyad ma rgya gar gyi mkhan po dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra de nyid dang*/_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de nam mkha' dang ye shes snying 
[\[433b.7\]]po la sogs pas bsgyur ba/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa slob dpon dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba paN+Di ta phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_
[\[434a\]]
[\[434a.1\]]sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po rgya cher 'grel pa don bcu pa gsal bar bstan pa slob dpon pra shas+t+ra se nAs mdzad pa/_sher snying gi 'grel pa [(*]ma byung*[)]ma tshang ba gcig_/shes rab kyi pha 
[\[434a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i don yongs su shes pa paN+Di ta shrI ma hA dza nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_shes rab snying po'i rnam par bshad pa dge slong legs pa'i shes rab kyis slob dpon mar me mdzad dpal 
[\[434a.3\]]ye shes la gsol ba btab nas legs par bshad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sher snying gi [(*]ma byung*/[) ]'grel pa slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad zer ba rnams bzhugs so/_/gsung rab kun gyi snying po bla na 
[\[434a.4\]]med/_/dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus skyed pa'i yum/_/shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i mdo yi don/_/gsal byed bstan bcos bzhi bcu tham pa bzhugs/_de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//
[\[434a.5\]]de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i skor rnams bkod nas/_gnyis pa bka' thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'grel zhing*/_khyad par du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa 'grel pa dbu ma'i skor la/_tsa pa la/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba slob 
[\[434a.6\]]dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can du gshegs pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha 
[\[434a.7\]]dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu/_bam po phyed dang gnyis su byas so/_/slad kyis grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus gtsug lag khang rin chen sbas pa'i dbus su kha che'i mkhan po 
[\[434b\]]
[\[434b.1\]]ha su ma ti dang*/_bod kyis sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis 'grel pa tshig gsal dang bstun nas bcos pa dang*/_slad kyis ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang du lo tsA ba de nyid kyis zhu chen bgyis pa'o/_/rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa 
[\[434b.2\]]klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu di ta shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab 
[\[434b.3\]]kyi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba gzhon nu mchog dang*/_gnyan dar ma grags dang khu'i 'gyur dag las don dang tshig bzang du bris pa/_rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 
[\[434b.4\]]'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya A nan+da dang lo tsA ba khu mdo sde dpal gyis bcos pa/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa ga las 'jigs med ces bya ba'i tshig le'ur 
[\[434b.5\]]byas pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba/_'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun/_sh+lo ka ni nyis stong chig brgya/_bam po ni 
[\[434b.6\]]bdun du byas so/_/'dir rigs pa drug cu pa'i rang 'grel rnyed na bri'o/_/zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta dzA ya A nan+da dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong khu mdo sde 'bar gyi 'gyur/_stong pa 
[\[434b.7\]]nyid bdun cu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rtsod pa bzlog pa'i 'grel pa sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba la bzhugs pa slob dpon 'phags pa nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[435a\]]
[\[435a.1\]]gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po tsan+d+ra ku mA ra dang*/_dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_yi ge brgya pa dang*/_yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[435a.2\]]'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_dpal kha che'i grong khyer dpe med du ban+de gzhon nu shes rab kyis bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyis bcos pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_rten 
[\[435a.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i rnam par bshad pa/_ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa rnams slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_skye med rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba 'phags pa klu 
[\[435a.4\]]sgrub snying pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_lo tsA ba sUr+ya kIrtis lha sa ra mo cher 'gyur/_dbu ma srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_zla ba gzhon nu'i rang 'gyur/_srid pa 'pho ba'i TI ka paN+Di ta byams pa mgon pos mdzad pa/_
[\[435a.5\]]paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nu la gru ston chung gis zhus nas rang 'gyur/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa bud+d+ha pA li ta zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bka' grub pa bstan bcos du ma'i rnam bshad mdzad pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[435a.6\]]rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i gnas khyad par can du gshegs pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rang bzhin gsum la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_kha 
[\[435a.7\]]che'i paN+Di ta dge slong zla ba grags pa'i rang 'gyur/_cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa dang*/_cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA 
[\[435b\]]
[\[435b.1\]]ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//tsha pa la/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bstan bcos bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbung rin chen sbas 
[\[435b.2\]]pa'i kun dga' rwa bar rgya gar gyi mkhan po sUk+Sh+ma dzA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_'khrul ba bzlog pa'i rigs pa gtan tshigs grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[435b.3\]]dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dpal 'byor snying pos bsgyur cing*/_zhu 
[\[435b.4\]]chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus pa/_dbu ma 'khrul ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de was mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_ye shes snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba 
[\[435b.5\]]slob dpon chen po 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_ye shes snying po kun las btus pa'i bshad sbyar slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge 
[\[435b.6\]]slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma slob dpon btsun pa legs ldan 'byed kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba 'di la rab tu byed pa nyi 
[\[435b.7\]]shu bdun/_sh+lo ka drug stong*/_bam po nyi shur byas so/_/dbu ma rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bdag gzhan gyi grub mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu la mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_sku tshe 'di nyid kyis rig 'dzin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po b+ha byas slob dpon 
[\[436a\]]
[\[436a.1\]]'phags pa klu sgrub kyi gsung bzhin du mdzad pa/_phyis so ma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang du lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ge dang nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba gnyis kyis yang dang yang du zhus nas bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//dza pa la/_dbu ma'i 
[\[436a.2\]]snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_dbu ma'i snying po 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba slob dpon chen po b+ha byas mdzad pa bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa dang*/_dbu ma_'i don bsdus pa slob dpon legs ldan 'byed kyis mdzad pa rnams jo bo rje dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dbu ma 
[\[436a.3\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//wa zha za gsum la/_slob dpon legs ldan 'byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma'i rgya cher 'grel pa theg pa chen po dbu ma pa'i slob dpon yul sa 
[\[436a.4\]]ke ta nas byung ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag chub pa rang dang gzhan gyi grub mtha' thams cad la mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge 
[\[436a.5\]]slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so/_/'di la rab tu byed pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun/_sh+lo ka ni nyi khri bzhi stong*/_bam po ni brgyad cur byas so//_//'a pa la/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs 
[\[436a.6\]]gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mo bris pa'i ba drus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba/_kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge pa chen 
[\[436a.7\]]po ma hA su ma ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun par bsgyur ba las/_phyis ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par 
[\[436b\]]
[\[436b.1\]]bcos pa/_dbu ma la 'jug pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka ka shAn+ti paN+Di ta la sha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi tshul khrims rgyal ba ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun par bsgyur/_phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_lo tsA ba de nyid 
[\[436b.2\]]kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing bcos pa/_dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i rgyal po 'phags pa lha'i sku [{]rings [,]ring [}]la rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[436b.3\]]po ti la ka ka la sha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun par bsgyur ba las/_phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab 
[\[436b.4\]]pa/_gzhung tshad ni bam po bcu gcig dang bam po sum gnyis so/_/dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ya pa la/_rigs pa drug cu pa'i 
[\[436b.5\]]'grel pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po dbu ma'i slob dpon yul sa ma ta nas skyes pa mu stegs can rtog ge ngan par smra ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi mun pa mang po rnam par 'joms pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_shI 
[\[436b.6\]]len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_dpal grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i kun dga' rwa bar rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[436b.7\]]sUk+Sh+ma dzA na zhes bya ba gdung rabs grangs med par paN+Di ta brgyud pa'i rigs su sku 'khrungs pa bram ze rin chen rdo rje'i dbon po bram ze chen po sadz+dza na'i sras gcig pu bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gces spras su mdzad pa'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags 
[\[437a\]]
[\[437a.1\]]kyis bsgyur ba/_phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_tshangs pa'i 'byung gnas gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas legs par bsgyur ba/_stong nyid 
[\[437a.2\]]bdun cu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra dang*/_snur lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_'di'i gzhung grangs stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag gcig gis lhag pa'o/_/stong nyid bdun cu pa'i rnam par 
[\[437a.3\]]bshad pa kha che'i yul gyi mkhas pa chen po so ma shrI'i zhabs rdul la brten par mdzad pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhan la phan pas mdzad pa/_thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling du kha che'i mkhan po pa ra hi ta'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu mchog gi 'gyur/_
[\[437a.4\]]rtog ge tho ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya A nan+das mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba khu mdo sde 'bar gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ra pa la/_dbu ma 'jug pa'i 'grel bshad don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba kha che'i paN+Di ta 
[\[437a.5\]]chen po dza ya A nan+das mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhas pa chen po dza ya A nan+da de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba kun dga' grags kyis bsgyur ba bzhugs so//_//la pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa slob dpon shAn+ta de was mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa 
[\[437a.6\]]dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis kha che'i dpe las zhus te gtan la phab pa la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po dang*/_shAkya blo gros kyis yul dbus kyi dpe 'grel pa dang mthun par bcos pa/_slar yang dus phyis 
[\[437a.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis dag par bcos pa/_sh+lo ka stong du grags pa/_bam po gnyis su byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dka' 'grel shes rab kyi le'u'i rgya cher bshad pa dge slong mkhas 
[\[437b\]]
[\[437b.1\]]pa shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros kyis mdzad pa/_'grel bshad 'di'i le'u dang po gnyis dang*/_brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab kyi TI ka_mkhas pa chen po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug dang*/_gnyan dar ma grags gnyis kyis stod smad bgos nas 
[\[437b.2\]]bsgyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i dka' 'grel mdzad byang 'gyur byang mi gsal ba rnams bzhugs so//_//sha pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i legs par sbyar ba sh+lo ka chig stong dgu brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga pa 
[\[437b.3\]]slob dpon dge ba lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ku mA ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas gtan la dbab pa'i gzhung slob dpon mkhas pa chen po kr-iSh+Na pas mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[437b.4\]]gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dka' 'grel dpal bi kra ma la shI la'i gtsug lag gi mkhas pa chen po dge slong bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_spyod 'jug gi shes rab le'u'i bka' 'grel 
[\[437b.5\]]paN+Di ta mi mnyam khol po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur la/_li ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mos pa'i dbang gis legs par bsgyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i shes rab le'u dang*/_bsngo ba'i le'u'i dka' 'grel 
[\[437b.6\]]mdzad byang 'gyur byang med pa gcig_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i don sum cu rtsa drug tu bsdus pa dang*/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i gtso bo'i don bcu gcig tu bsdus pa gser gling gi bla ma chos skyong la gus pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma ka ma la rak+Shi ta 
[\[437b.7\]]dang*/_dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas gsol ba btab nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dgongs pa'i 'grel pa khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs dza gat+ta la bi ha ra'i paN+Di ta chen 
[\[438a\]]
[\[438a.1\]]po bi g+hU ti tsan+d+ras mdzad cing*/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyis ru lag gtsang stod 'bring mtshams kyi sa'i cha dpal rgya rtags kyi gtsug lag khang du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//sa pa la/_bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur 
[\[438a.2\]]byas pa dang*/_bden pa gnyis rnam par gtan la dbab pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_bam po gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi 
[\[438a.3\]]mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_dbu ma rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chen po zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_dbu ma'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa slob 
[\[438a.4\]]dpon chen po zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_dbu ma rgyan gyi dka' 'grel slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes 
[\[438a.5\]]sde'i 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka stong sum brgya brgyad cu bam po bzhi yod do/_/dbu ma snang ba zhes bya ba/_de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/_chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du grub pa rnams slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_
[\[438a.6\]]zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ha pa la/_sku gsum la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos slob dpon klu'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes 
[\[438a.7\]]sde'i 'gyur/_sku gsum 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes zla bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka bdun brgya drug cu mchis so/_/de kho na la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dpal sbas kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[438b\]]
[\[438b.1\]]dbu ma lugs kyi snying po mdor bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon bid+yA ka ra pra b+has mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_rnam pa med pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa bal yul gyi paN+Di ta dga' ba'i dpal gyis 
[\[438b.2\]]mdzad pa/_snang ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon kam+pa las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_snang ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel yid kyi dga' ba skyed pa dge bsnyen btsun pa ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa/_
[\[438b.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta gnas brtan chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'gyur byang med pa rnams bzhugs so//_//a pa la/_lta 
[\[438b.4\]]ba tha dad pa rnam par phye ba mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dbu ma'i seng ges mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ta ro shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa b+hang+ga lar 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa 
[\[438b.5\]]chen po dzai tA ri pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa'i bshad pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gcig tu gzhol ba'i slob dpon dgra las rgyal bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po ka na ka shrI 
[\[438b.6\]]mi tra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba shes rab grags kyi 'gyur/_dbu ma rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po tsan+d+ra ha ri bas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba cog ro ting nge 'dzin bzang po'i 'gyur/_bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal 
[\[438b.7\]]mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur/_thub pa dgongs pa'i rgyan sh+lo ka stong phrag phyed dang drug pa/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu bde 
[\[439a\]]
[\[439a.1\]]bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byams la mkhyen pa'i snang ba skyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po de la mnyan nas/_de nyid kyi spyan sngar dge slong dpang zho gsal ba grags zhes bya bas yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal nA len+d+rar bsgyur 
[\[439a.2\]]ba la/_dus phyis lung rigs kyi dbang phyug stag sde pa chen po seng ge rgyal mtshan pa'i bka' drin dang*/_de nyid kyi sras kyi thu bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyi stobs mtha' yas pas shes bya'i chos la dbang sgyur ba shong ston lo tsA ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs 
[\[439a.3\]]bshad kyi srol la brten nas phyi nang gi gzhung lugs la blo'i snang ba cher rgyas pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dbang dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rgya dpe dang gtugs te legs par dpyad nas bsgyur cing zhus pa zhes pa'i mtha' can/_tshad ma rnam par 'joms pa mdor bshad 
[\[439a.4\]]pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba rtsa 'grel gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i dum bu gcig_/theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid kun las btus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta kar+No pa ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA sing+has 
[\[439a.5\]]dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur/_sems brtag pa slob dpon tshul khrims 'phags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta ka na ka dang*/_lo tsA ba rma chos 'bar gyi 'gyur/_theg pa thams cad du snang bar byed pa'i bye brag tu bshad pa zhes bya ba bram ze'i btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[439a.6\]]dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rab 'byor dbyangs de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang po'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ki pa la/_lta ba gtso cher gtan la phab nas/_bsgom pa'i rim pa ston pa'i bstan bcos ni/_slob dpon 
[\[439a.7\]]'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta lo ta dang*/_dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i lam 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pa sde snod gsum la mkhas pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad 
[\[439b\]]
[\[439b.1\]]pa/_cig car 'jug pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i bsgom don slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma tA shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag pad+ma spungs pa zhes bya ba dang*/_
[\[439b.2\]]don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i yi ge rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal mkhas pa chen po rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_byang chub kyi 
[\[439b.3\]]sems bsgom pa slob dpon chen po ka ma la shI la'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bgyi bas gra thang du bsgyur ba/_tshad med bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa/_bsgom rim dang po/_bsgom 
[\[439b.4\]]rim bar pa/_bsgom rim tha ma/_rnal 'byor sgom pa la 'jug pa rnams slob dpon chen po ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag rdo rje lta bu 
[\[439b.5\]]zhes bya ba dpal kam+pa las mdzad pa/_lus yongs su dpyad pa'i sgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon dge ba'i go chas 
[\[439b.6\]]mdzad pa/_'di ni sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis bsgyur ba ste 'gyur rnying lags skad do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa bsgom pa'i rim pa'i man ngag slob dpon chen po dpal ye shes 'di de kho na nyid la zhug pa'i dum bu yin/_grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge 
[\[439b.7\]]slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bla na med pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon ma hA ma tis mdzad pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u zhes bya ba slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya 
[\[440a\]]
[\[440a.1\]]tsan+d+ra las zhus te/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bsam gtan 
[\[440a.2\]]gyi chos drug rnam par gzhag pa slob dpon chen po a wa d+hU tI pas mdzad pa dang*/_bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par bzhag pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dA na shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dran pa gcig pa'i man 
[\[440a.3\]]ngag dang*/_dbu ma'i man ngag ces bya ba paN+Di ta dI paM ka ras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas lha sa 'phrul snang du 'gyur/_dbu ma'i man ngag rin po che'i za ma tog kha phye ba zhes bya ba ma hA paN+Di ta dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI 
[\[440a.4\]]paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge bsnyen chen po rgya brtson 'grus seng ge dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_dbu ma'i man ngag ces bya ba'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta shes rab thar pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shes rab thar pa de nyid dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur 
[\[440a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gzhag pa rgya'i mkhan po ha shang zab mo la sogs pa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'gyur/_bsgom pa'i rim pa mdo kun las btus pa rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bsam gtan rje btsun ka ros mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab bya dang spyod pa 
[\[440a.6\]]gtso cher ston pa'i skor ni/_mdo kun las btus pa A tsAr+ya Ar+ya nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa/_bam po lnga pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_mdo kun las btus pa'i bshad pa rin po che'i snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba lung gi tshad mas rab tu 
[\[440a.7\]]sbyar ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta nag po'i zhabs dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'di lta ba sems tsam du smra ba'i paN+Di tas brtsams mod kyang rtsa 'grel stabs gcig pa'i 
[\[440b\]]
[\[440b.1\]]phyir 'dir bris so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA ka ra warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'di bsgom pa'i bstan bcos yin 
[\[440b.2\]]kyang dus phyis rnyed pas sprod pa'i pusti'i gsham du bzhugs su bcug pa yin no/_/mdo kun las btus pa'i don bsdus pa slob dpon dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur/_rim gyis 'jug pa'i bsgom don slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[440b.3\]]gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sdes ka chur gtan la phab pa rnams bzhugs so//_//khi pa la/_bslab pa kun las btus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_bslab pa kun las btus pa slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_
[\[440b.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur ba las/_slad kyi kha che'i paN+Di ta ti la ka ka la sha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis sri mda'i dgon par zhu gtugs legs par byas pa/_bslab pa kun las btus pa nas 'byung ba de bzhin 
[\[440b.5\]]gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa/_bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa/_dpal mar me mdzad ye shes dang*/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_bslab pa kun las 
[\[440b.6\]]btus pa'i phyogs tsam zhig blangs pa'i bshad pa bslab pa'i me tog snye ma zhes bya ba bi kra ma shI la'i paN+Di ta chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong zha ma seng rgyal dang*/_klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur ba la/_slad nas bod kyi lo tsA 
[\[440b.7\]]ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bcos pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa Ar+ya wI ras mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba A tsAr+ya bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_las dang po pa'i sa sbyang ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dgra las rgyal ba gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa dang*/_
[\[441a\]]
[\[441a.1\]]zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdo tsam gdams ngag tu byas pa slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_byang chub lam gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[441a.2\]]gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_chos 'di zhang zhung gi tho ling gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa'o/_/byang chub lam gyi sgron me'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba b+hang+ga la'i rgyal po'i rigs rgyud dge slong mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA 
[\[441a.3\]]nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po b+hang+ga la pa dpal mar me mdzad ye shes zhabs dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_snying po bsdu ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas de ba rtses 
[\[441a.4\]]bsgyur ba/_snying po nges par bsdu ba zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i phreng ba/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i lam la 'jug pa bstan pa rnams slob dpon dpal mar ma mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_skyabs su 'gro ba bstan pa zhes bya ba/_theg 
[\[441a.5\]]pa chen po'i lam gyi sgrub thabs yi ger bsdus pa/_theg pa chen po'i lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa/_rang gi bya ba'i rim pa la bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa rnams slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA 
[\[441a.6\]]ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_mdo sde'i don kun las btus pa'i man ngag_/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/_las rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba/_spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma rnams slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na de nyid dang*/_lo 
[\[441a.7\]]tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//gi pa la/_mdo kun las btus pa chen po zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta rgyal ba kun dga' dang*/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dge slong nyi ma grags pa dang khu mdo sde 'bar gyi 'gyur/_byang 
[\[441b\]]
[\[441b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa 'di la chag chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur ba cig kyang yod mod kyi 'di dang gcig tu 'dug pas ma bris/_theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas chos rje shAkya shrIs yul 'khor so sor byon pa'i tshe zhu ba po rnams kyi skal ba dang sbyar te zhar 
[\[441b.2\]]byung du brtsams shing gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa kha 'thor ba rnams mdzad pa/_ma hA paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya ba kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chag dgra bcom gyi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[441b.3\]]yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dpal sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa/_dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba kha che shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed la sogs kyi cho ga'i skor la/_byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[441b.4\]]pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bla ma su nA ya shrI mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA bdage 
[\[441b.5\]]slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang*/_yi dam blang ba'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom 
[\[441b.6\]]pa'i cho ga'i rim pa slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bzung ba'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa 
[\[441b.7\]]chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_kha che paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyi 'gyur/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun bcu pa slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[442a\]]
[\[442a.1\]]skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga thams cad yod par smra ba'i paN+Di ta de wa shAn+tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes 
[\[442a.2\]]kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_kha ton dang glegs bam bklag pa'i sngon du bya ba'i cho ga_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga_/bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa rnams slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_sdom pa 
[\[442a.3\]]gsum gyi rim pa slob dpon chen po rnyog med rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tu l+ya dA sa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi trA nan+das mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid dang*/_gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 
[\[442a.4\]]'gyur/_dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong par ston pa'i tshul/_/'phags mchog klu sgrub rjes 'brangs bcas pa'i gzhung*/_/lta sgom spyod pa gsal bar byed 
[\[442a.5\]]pa yi/_/bstan bcos brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa bdun bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni dbu ma'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar dbu ma'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_bka' 'khor lo rim pa gsum pa legs par rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa'i bka'i dgongs pa gtso cher 'grel par byed pa'i bstan bcos la/_
[\[442a.6\]]bka' so so'i dgongs 'grel dang*/_spyi'i dgongs 'grel gnyis las/_dang po bka' so so'i dgongs 'grel ni/_ngi pa la/_'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[442a.7\]]ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i 'grel pa/_chos rjes su dran pa'i 'grel pa/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i bshad pa rnams slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa sA lu ljang pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_
[\[442b\]]
[\[442b.1\]]'phags pa sA lu ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgya cher bshad pa brgya phrag bcu gnyis pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba legs pa'i blo gros dang dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur nas/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[442b.2\]]rjes su dran pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa'i bshad pa/_'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/_'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad 
[\[442b.3\]]pa rnams slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes byin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_ga ya go ri'i mdo'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen 
[\[442b.4\]]gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_'phags pa ga ya go ri'i mdo dang spel mar bshad pa 'phags pa 'jam dpal gtso bo'i zhabs la brten pa mang du thos pa gnas brtan shAkya'i blos mdzad pa/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa mdo 
[\[442b.5\]]sde sa bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang*/_pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde dang ban+de dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ci pa la/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//_//
[\[442b.6\]]chi pa la/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bshad pa bam po bzhi pa slob dpon ba su ban+d+hus mdzad pa dang*/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon yon tan blo gros kyis mdzad pa bam po bcu gcig pa/_li'i mkhan po su ren+d+ra ka ra pra b+hA dang*/_
[\[442b.7\]]lo tsA ba dge slong nam mkha'i 'gyur/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon ngang tshul bzang pos mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//ji pa la/_sa bcu'i rnam par bshad pa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel bshad slob dpon nyi ma grub kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[443a\]]
[\[443a.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng bzhi'i bshad pa slob dpon shAkya'i blos mdzad pa/_'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon ka ma la 
[\[443a.2\]]shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'phags pa sA lu ljang pa'i mdo sde'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa slob dpon chen po mdzes bkod kyis 
[\[443a.3\]]mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon pradz+nyA sa mu dras mdzad pa/_'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo'i don gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon zhi ba lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma rA dza dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_byang chub 
[\[443a.4\]]kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ta rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rnye ba de wa g+ho Sha'i 'gyur/_byang chub kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i 'grel pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dzai ta ri dgra las rnam 
[\[443a.5\]]par rgyal bas mdzad pa/_bal po paN+Di ta dang*/_chag lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyang ba'i cho ga'i bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa dang*/_phung po gsum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon kr-iSh+Na pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na 
[\[443a.6\]]dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'od srungs kyi le'u'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon blo brtan gyis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//nyi pa la/_'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 
[\[443a.7\]]mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i 'grel pa grags pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'phags 
[\[443b\]]
[\[443b.1\]]pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po chen po'i bshad sbyar 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po thig le bum pa dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi don kun bsdus te slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_
[\[443b.2\]]'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon shAkya'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon 
[\[443b.3\]]rgyan bzang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ska ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta A tsAr+ya A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong b+ha dra pA 
[\[443b.4\]]la'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ti thi di gsum la/_'phags pa dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel pa'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa rgya'i slob dpon mkhan po wen tsheg gis mdzad pa/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab 
[\[443b.5\]]pa/_dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i 'grel pa yul sing+ga la'i slob dpon sa'i rtsa lag gis mdzad pa dang gnyis bzhugs so//_//ni pa la/_'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes dpal bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so//_//pi pa la/_'phags pa 
[\[443b.6\]]lang+kar gshegs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i 'grel pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rgyan zhes bya ba rgya'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badzras mdzad pa bzhugs so/_/yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis legs spangs pa'i/_/nges don rtsod med legs par rnam phye ba'i/_/'khor lo gsum pa'i dgongs 
[\[443b.7\]]'grel gtso che ba'i/_/gsal byed bstan bcos bzhi bcu tham pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bka' tha ma'i mdo sde sna tshogs kyi 'grel pa'i skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar mdo sde sna tshogs kyi 'grel pa'i skor rnam bkod nas/_gnyis pa spyi'i 
[\[444a\]]
[\[444a.1\]]dgongs 'grel la/_bka' 'khor lo gsum pa'i don gtso bor ston cing*/_spyir theg chen thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'grel pa/_rnal 'byor spyod pa sems tsam dang tshul mthun par ston pa'i bstan bcos la/_phi pa la/_theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan zhes bya 
[\[444a.2\]]ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa bam po gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs la sogs pa'i 'gyur/_slad kyi paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_bram ze chen po sadz+dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis cung 
[\[444a.3\]]zad bcos te legs par bshad nas gtan la phab pa/_mjug gi sh+lo ka gcig cig 'gro don 'phel ba dang gzhung gzhan na 'dug pa ltar bris pa'o/_/dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra 
[\[444a.4\]]bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_zhu chen 
[\[444a.5\]]gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dga' rdor gyis thugs dam tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du gtan la phab pa/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa mgon po byams pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po ma hA dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong zha ma seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_theg pa chen 
[\[444a.6\]]po'i rgyud phyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa'i mdo zab mo rnams kyi dgongs 'grel theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos mgon po byams pas mdzad pa dang*/_theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i 'grel pa slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_dpal grong khyer dpe med 
[\[444a.7\]]kyi mkhas pa chen po bram ze rin chen rdo rje'i dbon po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po sadz+dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis grong khyer dpe med de nyid du bsgyur ba/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyan gyi bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_gzhung tshad sh+lo ka sum stong 
[\[444b\]]
[\[444b.1\]]drug brgya lnga bcu pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs la sogs pa'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//bi pa la/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra 
[\[444b.2\]]bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta ma hA dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan gyi rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon btsun pa ngo bo nyid 
[\[444b.3\]]med pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs la sogs pa'i 'gyur/_mdo sde rgyan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po gnyis kyi bshad pa kha che'i yul gyi mkhas pa chen po dpal btsun pa so ma shrI'i zhal snga nas kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo'i ze'u 'bru'i rdul 
[\[444b.4\]]la reg pa slob dpon gzhan la phan pa bzang pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu mchog gi 'gyur/_theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan gyi don bsdus pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrIs mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta de nyid dang*/_bod kyi 
[\[444b.5\]]lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel bshad slob dpon blo brtan gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las 
[\[444b.6\]]'phags pa byams pa'i le'u nyi tshe'i bshad pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//mi tsi gnyis la/_mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad slob dpon chen po blo gros brtan pas mdzad par grags pa/_mang yul du mkhan po mu ne tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba lce bkra shis kyis TI 
[\[444b.7\]]ka rnam pa gnyis kyi gzhi bzung ste mkhan pos kyang ci mkhyen du TI ka gsar du bsgyur ba rnam pa gnyis dang gtugs na yang TI ka gsar pa las mi mngon pa dag kyang 'di las zhib tu 'chad pas 'di yang gces par gyis/_mjug cung zad cig ma tshang ba 'di stor bas TI ka gnyis dang gtugs 
[\[445a\]]
[\[445a.1\]]pa bzhugs so//_//tshi pa la/_'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i sa sde lnga'i dang po rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i dngos gzhi sa mang po pa 'di la sh+lo ka brgyad stong dgu brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa bzhugs so//_//dzi pa la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 
[\[445a.2\]]sa las nyan thos kyi sa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lau ka drug stong yod do//_//wi pa la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i go rim rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[445a.3\]]ye shes sde'i 'gyur bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lau ka drug stong bdun brgya lnga bcu yod do//_//zhi pa dang zi pa'i stod la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu ba bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye 
[\[445a.4\]]shes sde'i 'gyur/_smad la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhi bsdu ba'i nang gi mdo sde bsdu ba bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lo ka drug stong bdun brgya dgu bcu rtsa gsum mchis 
[\[445a.5\]]so//_//'i pa la/_gzhi bsdu ba'i nang gi rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las 'dul ba bsdu ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rnam grangs bsdu ba sh+lo ka bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/_rnam par bshad pa bsdu ba 'di ni 'phags pa 
[\[445a.6\]]thogs med bdag gzhan gyi grub mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin byang bar brnyes pa 'phags pa mi pham pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo rnyog pa med pa'i ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye 
[\[445a.7\]]shes sde'i 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga yod do/_/de ltar sa sde lnga la sh+lo ka bzhi khri lnga stong*/_bam po brgya dang lnga bcu bzhugs so/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa zhes pa'i stod 'grel ji snyed pa bzhugs/_'di la sngon gyi gna' mchan las/_dzi na mi 
[\[445b\]]
[\[445b.1\]]tras bshad par bshad/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i 'grel pa sbyin pa'i rim par phye ba dgu pa yan chad slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i 'grel pa las ji snyed 'gyur ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_byang chub sems 
[\[445b.2\]]dpa'i tshul khrims le'u'i 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra 
[\[445b.3\]]dang*/_pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//yi pa la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon rgya mtsho sprin gyis mdzad pa/_bal yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong 
[\[445b.4\]]tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//ri pa la/_theg pa chen po'i sdom theg pa chen po bsdus pa bam po bzhi pa dang*/_theg pa thun mong gi sdom chos mngon pa kun las btus pa bam po lnga pa slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_
[\[445b.5\]]shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa bstan bcos phul du byung ba du ma mdzad pa'i slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims 
[\[445b.6\]]rgyal bas yul drag dmar lha sdings ri khas po ri'i rtsa chu bo lo hi ta'i 'gram dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas dbyig 'dul pe dkar gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_'di la sh+loka ni nyis stong chig brgya brgyad cu/_bam po ni brgyad du byas so/_/theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad 
[\[445b.7\]]sbyar slob dpon dge bsnyen btsun pa ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur la/_dge slong dpal brtsegs kyis kyang zhus so/_/'di la sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun brgya bdun bcu rtsa bzhi yod/_bam po bdun du byas so/_/
[\[446a\]]
[\[446a.1\]]theg bsdus kyi gnas dang po'i bshad pa don gsang ba rnam par phye ba bsdus te bshad pa ji snyed pa rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la sngon gyi dkar chag las slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad zer ba snang ste min pa 'dra'o//_//li pa la/_chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i bshad pa 
[\[446a.2\]]bam po bcu pa slob dpon chen po rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi 
[\[446a.3\]]lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rtsa 'grel 'di gnyis lo paN ches cher mkhas pa rnams kyis legs par bsgyur mod kyi/_'on kyang rgya gar gyi dpe la 'grel pa'i nang na rtsa ba'i tshig yongs su rdzogs par yod pa dang*/_skabs la lar 'grel pa chad pa dang*/_de ltar dris lan dang mtshams sbyor gyi tshig chad pa 
[\[446a.4\]]dang*/_'grel pa'i tshig gong 'og ha cang bsnur ches par bsgyur ba dang*/_'grel pa'i tshig ji lta ba ma yin par don tsam bsdus te bsgyur ba dang*/_mdor bstan dang rgyas bshad mi mtshungs par bsgyur ba dang*/_rang bzor bsgyur ba'i tshigs bcad byas pa la sogs pa'i skyon 'ga' zhig la brten slar yang 
[\[446a.5\]]rgya gar gyi dpe dang mthun par mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du cung zad dag par bcos pa rnams bzhugs so//_//shi pa la/_thams cad rnam rig tsam du ston pa sum cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chen po 
[\[446a.6\]]dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_phyi rol gyi don 'gog pa nyi shu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_dA na 
[\[446a.7\]]shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rang bzhin gsum nges par 
[\[446b\]]
[\[446b.1\]]bstan pa/_paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde la sogs pa'i 'gyur/_
[\[446b.2\]]slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa'i mdo sde'i dum bu brgya/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba rtsangs de wen+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba many+dzu shrI warmas kyang zhus pa/_rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa slob dpon 
[\[446b.3\]]dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_bam po bcu pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_shAkya sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rtsangs de wen+d+ra rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_las grub pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rtsangs de wan+d+ra rak+Shi 
[\[446b.4\]]tas bsgyur cing*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/_theg pa chen po'i chos brgya gsal ba'i sgo'i bstan bcos rgya'i dpe las slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa snang*/_deng sang bod rnams dpal ldan chos skyong gis mdzad ces grags so/_/dpal ldan 
[\[446b.5\]]dbang phyug rgya'i lo tsA ba thang sang tsang zhes bya bas rgya gar gyi skad las rgya'i skad du bsgyur cing*/_phyis ston pa dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bas bsgyur bar zhus pa'i don du gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba rgya nag chen po'i lha btsun chos kyi rin chen gyis dpal sa skya'i 
[\[446b.6\]]gtsug lag khang du bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa/_sum cu pa'i bshad pa slob dpon blo brtan gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel bshad slob dpon dul ba'i lhas 
[\[446b.7\]]mdzad pa dang*/_phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa bye brag tu bshad pa/_bam po bzhi pa slob dpon blo gros brtan pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rnams bzhugs 
[\[447a\]]
[\[447a.1\]]so//_//si pa la/_phung po lnga'i rnam par 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa dang*/_phung po lnga'i bshad pa slob dpon sa'i rtsa lag gis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rnam 
[\[447a.2\]]par bshad pa rigs pa'i bshad pa bam po bco lnga pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_shAkya sing+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba de wen+d+ra rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'di la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi stong chig brgya bzhugs so//_//hi pa la/_sum cu pa'i 'grel bshad bam po lnga pa slob dpon dul ba 
[\[447a.3\]]lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_las grub pa'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang chen po na gnas pa dge slong blo bzang ngang tshul gyis mdzad pa/_rgya 
[\[447a.4\]]gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rtsangs de wen+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa/_dbu ma rgyan gyi 'grel bshad dbu ma'i lam grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas 
[\[447a.5\]]kyis mdzad pa/_'di la bod na sems tsam rgyan zhes grags pa lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa sems tsam pa'i lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i bstan bcos rnams bstan nas/_bsgom pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i bstan bcos ni/_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[447a.6\]]sgron ma zhes bya ba'i man ngag rnal 'byor pa mig gi snying po slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor la 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_
[\[447a.7\]]de'i don 'grel rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag slob dpon chos kyi dbang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran dA na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i man ngag slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin 
[\[447b\]]
[\[447b.1\]]chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bsgom pa'i don mdor bsdus nas bstan pa slob dpon ye shes zla bas mdzad pa/_rtsa ba slob dpon klu'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_
[\[447b.2\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i man ngag slob dpon chen po rat+na A ka ra shAn+tis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang 
[\[447b.3\]]po'i 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag paN+Di ta chen po rat+na A ka ra shAn+tis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_dge ba'i sdong po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bi kra ma shI la'i paN+Di ta rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bid+yA 
[\[447b.4\]]ka ra sing+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba many+dzu shrI warma'i 'gyur/_spyod pa dang bslab bya ston pa'i skor la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon shAn+ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba many+dzu 
[\[447b.5\]]shrI warma'i 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta k+She ma ga ga na dang*/_lo tsA ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'di dag rtsom pa po rnams sems tsam gyi lta ba 'dzin 
[\[447b.6\]]pa ma yin yang*/_bod na 'di dag sems tsam lugs su grags 'dug pa dang*/_brjod bya'ang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims le'u'i skabs dang mthun par 'dug pas 'dir bris so/_/chos rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di 
[\[447b.7\]]ta chen po rat+na kIrti de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyi 'gyur/_dbu ma rgyan gyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba zhes bya ba paN+Di ta rnams las mchog tu gyur par kun gyis bsngags shing 'gran zla med pa/_khyad par du slob dpon 'di 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud las/_
[\[448a\]]
[\[448a.1\]]rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming gang*/_/ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed 'byung*/_/zhes lung bstan pa des mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba/_slad nas kha chen a mo g+ha dang*/_'o ru lo tsA'i 'gyur rnams 
[\[448a.2\]]bzhugs so/_/'di sems tsam gyi lta ba ston pa'i bstan bcos yin kyang*/_dus phyis rnyed pas pusti'i gsham du bzhugs pa yin no/_/chos rnams gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i/_/rnam rig tsam du ston pa'i lta bsgom spyod/_/gsal byed byams pa thogs med 
[\[448a.3\]]rjes 'brang gzhung*/_/bcu phrag drug la drug gis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni theg pa chen po sems tsam du ston pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar sems tsam du ston pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_gsum pa 
[\[448a.4\]]bka' 'khor lo dang po bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bka'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos la/_dang po lhag pa shes rab kyi bslab pa ston pa mngon pa'i bstan bcos ni/_i pa la/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos mdzad pa'i gdags pa'i 
[\[448a.5\]]bstan bcos la/_'jig rten bzhag pa bam po dgu/_'di la dkar chag chen mo nas bam po bdun zhes 'byung*/_rgyu gdags pa bam po drug_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde la sogs pa'i 'gyur/_
[\[448a.6\]]las gdags pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde la sogs pa'i 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/'di dag bye brag tu smra ba rnams bka' ru 'dod la/_mdo sde pa rnams bstan bcos su bzhed 
[\[448a.7\]]do//_//ku khu gnyis la/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshigs le'ur byas pa dang*/_de'i rang 'grel chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa bam po sum cu pa slob dpon chen po dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal 
[\[448b\]]
[\[448b.1\]]brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'dus [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//gu ngu gnyis la/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel bshad don gsal 
[\[448b.2\]]ba zhes bya ba sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong*/_bam po drug cu pa slob dpon rgyal po'i sras grags pa bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//cu chu gnyis la/_
[\[448b.3\]]chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel bshad mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon gang ba spel zhes pa chos mngon pa'i gzhung lugs gangs can mtsho'i pha rol tu son pas mdzad pa/_'di ni gangs ri chen po ti se dang yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i lho ngos/_ri bo chen 
[\[448b.4\]]po spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i 'dab yul pu rangs su/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//ju nyu gnyis la/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel bshad nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba mdo dang sbyar ba bal 
[\[448b.5\]]po'i paN+Di ta dge slong zhi gnas lhas yang dag par sbyar ba/_kha che'i grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi dbus dza ra me'i gtsug lag khang gi byang phyogs kyi bsil khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ya shrI dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba khams pa dge slong shes rab 'od zer gyi 'gyur/_
[\[448b.6\]]chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa gnad kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_gzhung gi tshad sh+lo ka bzhi stong yod pa/_paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor zla ba dang*/_lo tsA ba 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel 
[\[448b.7\]]bshad mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gang ba spel chos mngon pa'i gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_'di 'grel pa chen mo las mchims kyis 
[\[449a\]]
[\[449a.1\]]bkol ba yin no zhes kyang grag go_/chos mngon pa la 'jug pa rgya cher 'grel pa'i snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_dA na shI la dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rab tu byed pa chos mngon pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rnams 
[\[449a.2\]]bzhugs so//_//gnyis pa lhag pa sems kyi bslab pa gtso bor ston pa mdo sde'i sde snod kyi dgongs 'grel la/_tu pa la/_ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya bzhi bcu pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba rin chen mchog 
[\[449a.3\]]gi 'gyur la/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa/_'di bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis bka' nyid du bzhed do/_/ched du brjod pa'i tshoms kyi rnam par 'grel pa slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa'i stod bzhugs so//_//thu pa la/_ched du brjod pa'i tshoms kyi 
[\[449a.4\]]rnam par 'grel pa'i smad dum yul ka ba d+h+yar skyes pa thos pa mang ba'i slob dpon bo d+hi warma'i slob ma yul b+hang+ga lar skye ba bzhes pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i slob dpon pradz+nyA warmas mdzad pa/_'di la sh+lo ka stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lnga brgya yod do zhes rgya gar gyi yi ge las smos/_rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[449a.5\]]po sgra'i gtsug lag la byams klas par mkhas pa paN+Di ta dza nar d+ha na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ye shes snying po dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal 
[\[449a.6\]]brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_bstan bcos tshigs su bcad pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba dang*/_tshigs su bcad pa'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba ye shes snying pos bsgyur te/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal 
[\[449a.7\]]brtsegs kyis zhus pa rnams bzhugs so//_//gsum pa lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gtso bor ston pa 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi dgongs 'grel la/_bka' so so'i dgongs 'grel dang*/_spyi'i dgongs 'grel gnyis kyi bka' lung so so'i dgongs 'grel la/_rtsa ba'i lung 
[\[449b\]]
[\[449b.1\]]gi dgongs 'grel dang*/_bshad pa'i lung gi dgongs 'grel gnyis las/_dang po la/_rtsa ba'i lung so sor thar pa'i dgongs 'grel ni/_du pa la/_so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel gyi stod bzhugs so//_//nu pa la/_so sor thar pa'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel gyi smad slob dpon 
[\[449b.2\]]dpa' bos mdzad par grags pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_'di la sh+lo ka dgu stong*/_bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun no/_/so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa 'dul ba bsdus 
[\[449b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba slob dpon khyad par bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa bam po bcu gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_shAkya pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba la/_slad kyis kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rgyal ba shes rab dang*/_shAkya 
[\[449b.4\]]bshes gnyen gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//pu phu bu gsum la/_so sor thar pa'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa kun las btus pa slob dpon dri med bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi 
[\[449b.5\]]na mi tra dang*/_sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba/_'di la sh+lo ka khri lnga stong yod/_bam po ni bdun cur byas so/_/so sor thar pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa mdzad byang 'gyur byang med pa cig rnams bzhugs so//_//mu pa la/_so sor thar 
[\[449b.6\]]pa'i 'grel pa mi brjed pa'i dran byed mdzad byang med pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+d+ra ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur zer ba cig_/so sor thar pa'i tshig gi brjed byang dA na shI las mdzad par grags pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin 
[\[449b.7\]]pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa tshig gi dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba mdo sde 'dzin pa ka l+yA na mi tras nye bar sbyar ba'i dum bu cig_/'dul ba bya ba'i phung po mjug ma tshang ba cig rnams bzhugs so//_//
[\[450a\]]
[\[450a.1\]]tsu pa la/_'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa mdzad byang dang 'gyur byang med pa cig bzhugs/_gnyis pa bshad pa'i lung gi dgongs 'grel la/_'dul ba gzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dge legs 
[\[450a.2\]]bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_gso sbyong gi gzhi dgag dbye'i 'phro bam po bcu gnyis pa yan chad mjug ma tshang ba rnams bzhugs so//_//tshu pa la/_'dul ba lung rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa slob dpon dul ba lhas mdzad pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par 
[\[450a.3\]]smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba 'di la sh+lo ka ni lnga stong chig brgya/_bam po ni bcu bdun du byas pa rnams bzhugs so//_//dzu pa la/_'dul ba lung phran tshegs kyi rnam par bshad pa slob 
[\[450a.4\]]dpon tshul khrims bskyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bud+d+ha shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_'dul ba lung bla ma'i bre brag lung zhu ba'i 'grel pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dge legs bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'go mjug gnyis ka nas ma tshang ba cig bzhugs 
[\[450a.5\]]so//_//gnyis pa 'dul ba'i bka' lung spyi'i dgongs 'grel ni/_wu pa la/_rtsa ba'i lung dang bshad pa'i lung thams cad kyi dgongs 'grel mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs par byed pa 'dul ba mdo rtsa ba sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun brgya/_bam po dgur byas pa dang*/_cho ga lag len gtan la
