[\[450a.6\]]'bebs par byed pa las brgya rtsa gcig pa gnyis slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta dzi na mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lo ka ni sum stong bdun brgya/_bam po ni dgur byas so//_//zhu zu gnyis la/_'dul ba mdo'i 
[\[450a.7\]]'grel pa mngon par brjod pa rang gi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba yul bcom brlag gi 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i rtsod pa chen po rnams kyi khyu mchog bstan bcos du ma mdzad pa gzhung 'bum phrag bco brgyad la kha ton mdzad pa'i slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar 
[\[450b\]]
[\[450b.1\]]gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta A lang+ka ra de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong ga rod tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pa gnyis kyis dpal sgye'u ri'i rtsa chos skor dben tsha'i gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ba bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lo ka stong phrag bcu bzhi yod do//_//'u yu gnyis la/_'dul ba 
[\[450b.2\]]mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po tho gar gyi bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon d+harmA mi tras mdzad pa/_kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur ba bzhugs/_'di la sh+lo ka ni nyi khri chig 
[\[450b.3\]]stong*/_bam po ni bdun cur byas so//_//ru pa la/_'dul ba mdo'i 'grel pa slob dpon pradz+nyA ka ras mdzad pa bzhugs so//_//lu pa la/_'dul ba mdo'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa chung ba slob dpon mang du thos shing yon tan dang ldan pa yon tan gyi 'od thams cad yod par smra ba pas byas 
[\[450b.4\]]par grags pa bzhugs/_'di bod mar the tshom za'o//_//shu pa la/_'dul ba tshig le'ur byas pa me tog phreng rgyud ces bya ba 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po 'phags pa dge 'dun 'bangs kyi slob ma dpal 'phags pa sa ga'i lhas mdzad pa bam po lnga pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta dza yA ka ra dang*/_
[\[450b.5\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur/_rgya gar shar phyogs sat+na ga ra'i paN+Di ta ba na rat+na ma hA s+thi bI ra la gtugs te sgra'i don la mkhas pa rong ston shes bya kun rig gis kyang 'gyur bcos cung zad byas pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa sum 
[\[450b.6\]]brgya pa dang*/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa 'od ldan bam po brgyad pa mang du thos pa'i slob dpon shAkya 'od kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rtsangs de wen+d+ra rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_tshig le'ur 
[\[450b.7\]]byas pa sum brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha shAn+ti dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la sh+lo ka stong phrag phyed dang bzhi yod do//_//su pa la/_'phags 
[\[451a\]]
[\[451a.1\]]pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa lnga bcu pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad kyang zer/_kha che dge 'dun bzang pos mdzad kyang zer ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ni warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba sna nam ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_de'i 'grel pa don brgyad ma yang zer/_
[\[451a.2\]]dge sbyong gi kA ri kA lnga bcu pa'i tshig gi brjed byang du byas pa slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_yang lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa thams cad yod par smra ba rnams kyi dge tshul gyi bya ba zhes bya ba 'di bod kyi mkhan po chen po dag gi brjed byang yin pa 'dra'o/_/dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i mdo mdo sde 'dzin pa'i 
[\[451a.3\]]slob dpon ka l+yAN mi tras mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po grong khyer dpe med kyi paN+Di ta ma hA dza na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu mchog gi 'gyur ba las/_slad kyis kha che'i paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu mchog gis bcos shing zhus pa/_gleng gzhi dang gang zag bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas 
[\[451a.4\]]pa byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul nas byung ba'i paN+Di ta 'dul ba 'dzin pa dge slong ba la shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa/_tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu mchog gi 'gyur/_dpe kha cig na bi ma la shrIs mdzad zer/_dge tshul gyi dang po'i lo dri ba kha che'i 
[\[451a.5\]]mkhan po na ras de wa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dge slong gi dang po'i lo dri ba dpal ra sa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'od mchog dngos grub kyi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_'dul ba dri ba'i tshig 
[\[451a.6\]]le'ur byas pa dang*/_'dul ba dri ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon mdo sde 'dzin pa kA l+yAN mi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_sh+lo ka stong drug brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi yod do/_/'dul ba la bstod pa btsun pa chos kyi tshong dpon gyis mdzad 
[\[451a.7\]]pa dang*/_'dul ba la bstod pa'i tshig gi rnam par bshad pa btsun pa chos kyi tshong dpon gyis mdzad cing slob dpon dul ba'i lhas bshad pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus 
[\[451b\]]
[\[451b.1\]]te gtan la phab pa/_gzhung lugs kyi bye brag bkod pa'i 'khor lo btsun pa dbyig gi bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba bzang skyong gi 'gyur/_sde pa tha dad par byed pa dang rnam par bshad pa slob dpon b+ha byas mdzad pa/_ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar shar phyogs 
[\[451b.2\]]b+hang+ga la'i mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na zhes bya ba'i paN+Di ta'i zhal snga nas dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_gzhung tha dad pa rim par bklag pa'i 'khor lo las sde pa tha dad pa bstan pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa bzhugs so/_/de 
[\[451b.3\]]gsum 'dul ba dngos ma yin kyang*/_de dang rjes su 'brel pa la bsams nas sngon gyi rnams kyis 'dul ba'i skabs su bris 'dug pa bzhin bris so/_/dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa brgyad pa dang*/_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa brgyad pa'i bshad pa slob dpon chen po su na ya shrIs mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid 
[\[451b.4\]]dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong dar ma grags kyi 'gyur/_rnam par grol ba'i lam la sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_'di sngon gyi dkar chag chen mo las bkar bshad gzhung gi ngo bo bltas na bstan bcos su 
[\[451b.5\]]gsal bas bstan bcos kyi sder snga ma rnams kyis kyang bris 'dug pas bris so/_/'dul ba'i sde snod kyi 'khor du gyur pa gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_ku na la'i rtogs pa brjod pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+mA ka ra 
[\[451b.6\]]warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa slob dpon gsang bas byin gyis mdzad pa/_bslab pa 
[\[451b.7\]]bcu'i cho ga klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_rtse thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu'i 'gyur/_ye d+harma'i 'grel pa slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/_rtse thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu'i zhabs kyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/rtogs pa brjod pa 'di dag 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi 'khor du gtogs par bshad pas 'dir 
[\[452a\]]
[\[452a.1\]]bris so/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag dang sems can med/_/rgyu dang bcas las byung bar ston pa'i gzhung*/_/'khor lo dang po'i rjes 'brang bslab pa gsum/_/ston byed gzhung ni drug cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bka' dang po'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de 
[\[452a.2\]]ltar bka' dang po'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni bka' 'khor lo rim pa gsum gyi nang nas ci rigs par btus pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i sde snod skyes pa'i rabs sna tshogs kyi skor la/_hu pa la/_skyes pa'i rabs sum cu rtsa bzhi pa slob dpon dpa' bos sbyar ba/_sh+lo ka sum stong phyed dang bzhi/_bam po bcu 
[\[452a.3\]]gnyis pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba many+dzu shrI warma'i 'gyur/_skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon d+harma kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dza na ra d+ha na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba i bu dge slong shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur gnyis bzhugs so//_//u pa la/_
[\[452a.4\]]slob dpon rgyal po'i sras seng ge zhabs 'bring bas mdzad pa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba sum cu rtsa lnga pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta a lang+ka de wa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas dpal sgye'u ri'i rtse chos skor dben pa'i gtsug lag khang du 'gyur/_gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'i 
[\[452a.5\]]skyes pa'i rabs zlos gar gyi bstan bcos 'jig rten kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du legs par 'gyur/_rig pa 'dzin pa sprin gyi bzhon pa'i skyes rabs klu 
[\[452a.6\]]kun du dga' ba'i zlos gar dpal dga' ba'i lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po lak+Sh+mI ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ke khe gnyis la/_byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing snyan dngags 
[\[452a.7\]]mkhan chen po dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dngags mkhan chen po lak+Sh+mI ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis mang yul 'phags pa'i drung dge 'dun bzhi sde'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du rgya dpe dang 
[\[452b\]]
[\[452b.1\]]legs par gtugs nas skad gnyis ka'i cha la zhu chen zhib pa cig grub pas gzhan las khyad du 'phags pa/_slar yang 'di'i skad gnyis zung du sbyar ba la/_'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur pa'i zhwa lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang pos legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi gzhung la sogs pa dang bstun te/_zhu chen 
[\[452b.2\]]mdzad pa bzhugs so//_//ge pa la/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po yul sha se ta ka'i gser mig ma'i bu dge slong snyan dngags mkhan chen po smra ba dang ldan pa phyogs su rnam par grags pa btsun pa rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta sa dbang bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal po'i 'gyur/_byang chub 
[\[452b.3\]]sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos kyi gaN+DI'i sgra bsgrags pa snyan dngags mkhan chen po slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa/_chos kyi rje sa steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po kha che shAkya shrI bzang po dang*/_lo tsA ba gnubs dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyi 'gyur/_skyes rabs 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[452b.4\]]'dul ba yin pas/_sngar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyogs su bris kyang rung mod kyi/_bka' 'khor lo dang po dang*/_tha ma'i gseb nas btus pa shas che bar snang zhing*/_bka' 'khor lo rim pa gsum ka dang 'brel par snang bas 'dir bris so/_/gang zhig rlabs chen byang chub sems kyi mthus/_/gcig tu 
[\[452b.5\]]gzhan don spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/dka' ba spyod pa'i rnam thar skyes pa'i rabs/_/ston pa'i gzhung lugs rnam pa brgyad bzhugs so/_/de dag gis ni skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar skyes rabs kyi chos skor rnams bkod nas/_bka' 'khor lo rim 
[\[452b.6\]]pa gsum ka dang spyir 'brel pa gtam du bya ba dang phrin yig sna tshogs kyi skor la/_rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka 
[\[452b.7\]]warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis rgya dpe gsum dang gtugs te legs par bcos pa/_rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam 
[\[453a\]]
[\[453a.1\]]sbyin pa'i gtam/_srid pa las 'das pa'i gtam rnams slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta shrI ra tha dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_yon tan bdun yongs su brjod pa'i gtam slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta gang+gA d+ha 
[\[453a.2\]]ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyi gtam slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran d+ha na dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi 'grel pa slob dpon gsal grags kyis mdzad pa/_tshogs kyi gtam slob 
[\[453a.3\]]dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po gang+gA d+ha ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_mi khom pa brgyad kyi gtam slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI a dzi ta b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_legs par bshad pa rin po che 
[\[453a.4\]]za ma tog lta bu'i gtam snyan dngags mkhan chen po slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ru dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i gtam slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 
[\[453a.5\]]'gyur/_rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_dben pa'i gtam slob dpon chen po sa 'tsho byin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[453a.6\]]bzhugs so//_//nge pa la/_chos smra ba dang dam pa'i chos nyan pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam slob dpon sa 'tsho sbyin gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po gnas brtan a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_ched du brjod pa'i gtam drang srong chen po zla bas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims 
[\[453a.7\]]rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_mi rtag pa'i don gyi gtam snyan dngags mkhan chen po dga' ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa dang*/_kha che'i paN+Di ta bi nA ya dang*/_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_legs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa bam po phyed dang gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrI 
[\[453b\]]
[\[453b.1\]]dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa slob dpon bram ze btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra warma dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_mya ngan bsal ba slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad 
[\[453b.2\]]pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'gro ba drug gi tshig 
[\[453b.3\]]le'ur byas pa slob dpon btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rtsangs de wen+d+ra rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen 
[\[453b.4\]]bzang po'i 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la spring ba'i phrin yig_/bshes pa'i spring yig slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdza' bo rgyal po bde spyod la bskur ba/_slob ma la spring ba'i phrin yig slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rnams rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[453b.5\]]po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po ka niSh+ka la spring ba'i phrin yig slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gi 'gyur la/_A tsAr+ya dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/_sems 
[\[453b.6\]]rin po che rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i spring yig slob dpon byang chub sems dpa' chen po dgra las rgyal ba gsang bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+Ya du lo pa dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bla ma la spring pa dge slong dgon pa bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_
[\[453b.7\]]bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_bu la spring pa paN+Di ta mkhas pa sadz+dza na chen pos mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po ma hA dza na dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi 'gyur/_dri ma med pa'i rin po che'i phrin yig ces bya ba gnas brtan mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas rgyal po nir+Ya pha la la 
[\[454a\]]
[\[454a.1\]]brdzangs pa dus de nyid du bla ma de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu pa'o/_/rgyal po zla ba la spring ba'i spring yig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+das mdzad pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyi 'gyur 
[\[454a.2\]]bshes pa'i spring yig gi rgya cher bshad pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon blo gros chen pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_slob ma la spring ba'i phrin yig gi dka' 'grel slob dpon bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po su ga 
[\[454a.3\]]ta shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_slob ma la spring ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros kyis rang gi slob ma rnams la phan pa'i don du mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_rgya gar nub phyogs kyi paN+Di 
[\[454a.4\]]ta chen po dz+nyA na b+ha dras lo tsA ba chen po bu ston gyi phyag tu [(*]ma byung [)]phrin yig tu bskur ba lo tsA ba rin chen rnam rgyal gyi 'gyur/_slob dpon ka ma la shI las lho za mo tshangs pa'i dbyangs la sdug bsngal brgyad kyi bye brag bstan pa dang*/_slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas bod rje 'bangs dang bod btsun rnams la brdzangs pa'i phrin 
[\[454a.5\]]yig_/slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa'i dad bskyed sgron ma/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pa'i phan yon ston pa dpe'i phreng ba las sangs rgyas mchog gi dpe rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba tshul khrims yon tan gyi 'gyur la/_dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos nas gtan la phab pa/_
[\[454a.6\]]dkon mchog ma byung mchod pa'i phan yon bstan pa/_mya ngan med pa'i sgo nas klu btul ba'i le'u/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po gnas brtan a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang*/_dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_dge 'dun spyan drang ba dpal 'byor rab brtan gyi phyag dpe rgya dpe las zhwa lu lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_gnas brtan spyan drang ba slob dpon b+ha wa 
[\[454a.7\]]skan+d+ha s+ya zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_A tsAr+ya dzi na mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_bstan pa'i gtad rabs mgo mjug ma tshang na yang tshong 'dus kyi pho brang du 'gos lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ji ltar gnas tshul dang tha mar nub tshul ston pa dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 
[\[454b\]]
[\[454b.1\]]'phel gyis lung ston pa dang*/_li'i yul lung bstan pa zhes bya ba gnyis bzhugs so/_/'di gnyis li yul nas 'gyur ba yin pa 'dra'o/_/ngan 'gro srid pa'i duHkha kun spong zhing*/_/mngon mtho zhi ba'i bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs/_/gtam du bya dang spring yig la sogs skor/_/bcu phrag bzhi la bdun gyis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/
[\[454b.2\]]de dag gis ni gtam du bya ba dang spring yig sna tshogs pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar rang nyid kun shes pa nang rig pa'i bstan bcos rnams bkod nas/_gzhan tshar gcod pa'i rig pa'i gnas gnyis kyi dang po gtan tshigs rig pa ni/_ce pa la/_tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes 
[\[454b.3\]]bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su da na rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge bsnyen zha ma seng rgyal gyi 'gyur/_tshad ma mdo'i rang 'grel paN+Di ta gser gyi go cha dang*/_lo tsA ba dad pa shes rab kyi 'gyur/_tshad ma kun las btus pa'i 'grel bshad spyod pa chen por shin tu phra 
[\[454b.4\]]ba'i thugs mnga' ba slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba su d+ha ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge bsnyen zha ma seng rgyal gyi 'gyur/_dmigs pa brtag pa/_dmigs pa brtag pa'i 'grel pa/_dus gsum brtag pa rnams slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di 
[\[454b.5\]]ta chen po shAn+tA ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_rigs pa la 'jug pa'i sgo slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta thams cad mkhyen pas bsrung ba dang*/_lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_tshad ma'i bstan bcos 
[\[454b.6\]]rigs pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_rgya gar las rgya'i lo tsA ba thang sang tsang gis rgya'i skad du bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis rgya'i dge bshes sing gyang jus dang*/_bod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston gzhon gyis bod skad du bsgyur shing*/_phyis gzhi thams cad 
[\[454b.7\]]yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba rgya nag chen po'i lha'i btsun pa chos kyi rin chen gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du rgya'i dpe dang bod kyi dpe gnyis po legs par gtugs shing bcos te dag par bsgyur ba/_rgya'i dpe las rigs pa la 'jug pa zhes snang*/_deng sang bod rnams rigs pa'i sgo zhes grags 
[\[455a\]]
[\[455a.1\]]so/_/'di rigs pa'i sgo dang gcig tu 'dod par mi rigs pa'i sgo sa n+yA ya mu pa zhes zer ba la/_bde lan+yA ya bra be sha zhes zer/_'thad de/_tshad ma'i 'grel chen rnams su rigs sgo nas lung drangs pa rnams 'di na mi snang ba'i phyir ro/_/phyogs chos dgu'i 'khor lo zhes gtan tshigs kyi 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_za hor gyi mkhan po 
[\[455a.2\]]bo d+hi satwa dang*/_dge slong d+harmA lo kas bsgyur ba/_tshad ma'i mdo kun las btus pa'i dgongs pa 'grel ba la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa 'gran zla med pa'i mkhas pa chen po dpal chos kyi grags pas 
[\[455a.3\]]mdzad pa/_rgya gar mkhan po sU b+hU ti shrI shAn+ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur la/_grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi shar phyogs na yul 'khor lo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i gnas su grags pa'i 'dab rnam par rgyal ba'i zhing zhes bya bar kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen 
[\[455a.4\]]po dge slong rngog blo ldan shes rab kyis bcos shing*/_dus phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla thams cad dang bral ba'i mkhas pa bsod snyoms pa chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra la sogs pa dang*/_lo tsA ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_tshad ma rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba dang*/_rigs 
[\[455a.5\]]pa'i thigs pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta gzhan la phan pa bzang po la sogs pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gtan tshigs thigs pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[455a.6\]]dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_'brel pa brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+hA dang*/_lo tsA ba nam mkha'i 'gyur la/_slad kyis paN+Di ta rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_lo tsA ba ting nge 'dzin bzang pos bcos shing gtan la phab pa/_'brel pa brtag pa 
[\[455a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa smra ba'i seng ge slob dpon chen po chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_rtog ge ma byung rab tu byed pa sde bdun dang*/_tshad ma rnam 'grel le'u dang po'i rang 'grel stong phrag phyed dang bzhi pa rig pa chen po sa'i steng ma lus pa na smra ba'i glang po che'i spyi bo 
[\[455b\]]
[\[455b.1\]]gnon par mdzad pa'i seng ge phyogs ma lus par snyan par grags pa can dpal chos kyi grags pas sbyar ba rnams bzhugs so//_//che pa la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel le'u phyi ma gsum gyi 'grel pa sgra pa chen po slob dpon lha dbang blos mdzad pa/_rang 'grel dang gnyis ka bsdoms pa la sh+lau ka stong phrag bcu gnyis 
[\[455b.2\]]pa/_bam po bzhi bcu pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su b+hU ti shrI dang*/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_rtsod pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po d+harma kIrtis mdzad pa/_dpal lha btsun pa zhi ba 'od kyi zhal snga nas/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra dang*/_dge slong 
[\[455b.3\]]dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur/_slad kyis kyang paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis zhus shing gtan la phab pa/_rgyud gzhan grub pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon d+harma kIrtis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur ba 
[\[455b.4\]]rnams bzhugs so//_//je nye gnyis la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad stong phyed dang phrag bzhi pa dang lha dbang blo'i 'grel pa gnyis kyi 'grel bshad bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs la brten pa slob dpon shAkya blos mdzad pa bam po drug cu rtsa gsum pa/_paN+Di ta su b+hU ti shrI dang*/_lo tsA 
[\[455b.5\]]ba rma dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur ba bzhugs so//_//te the gnyis la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel le'u gnyis pa man chad kyi 'grel pa rnam 'grel gyi rgyan zhes bya ba bam po drug cu pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo 
[\[455b.6\]]ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur la/_slad kyis kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ku mA ra shrI dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis zhus shing bcos pa bzhugs so//_//de ne gnyis la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi 'grel bshad slob dpon rgyal ba can gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_bod kyi lha btsun po dge 
[\[455b.7\]]slong lha bla ma zhi ba 'od kyi zhal snga nas dang*/_thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bi kra ma shI la'i mkhas pa chen po shrI dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang*/_zhang zhung gi lo tsA ba chen po mang 'or byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[456a\]]
[\[456a.1\]]bstan bcos 'di'i gzhung gi tshad ni bam po drug cu yin no//_//pe pa la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad bram ze bde byed dga' bas mdzad pa rnam 'grel gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'phro ji snyed pa dang*/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba bla ma dam pa dge ba'i bshes 
[\[456a.2\]]gnyen shes rab 'byung gnas kyis zhabs la btud de brten nas nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//phe be gnyis la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa las le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa slob dpon chen po shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa'i slob ma slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_
[\[456a.3\]]bam po bcu dgu pa/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi 'grel bshad shin tu yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba dpal mkhas pa dza mA ris sbyar ba'i le'u dang po'i TI ka bzhugs so//_//me pa la/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi mngon sum le'u'i 'grel pa dza mA ris mdzad pa bzhugs so//_//tse pa la/_rnam 'grel 
[\[456a.4\]]gyi rgyan gyi le'u bzhi pa'i 'grel pa dpal mkhas pa dza mA ris mdzad pa bam po brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/_paN+Di ta su ma ti dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba bzhugs so//_//tshe pa la/_slob dpon chos mchog gis sbyar ba tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i TI ka 'thad ldan zhes bya ba sh+lo ka stong phrag bcu gnyis dang*/_
[\[456a.5\]]brgya phrag bzhi dang drug bcu rtsa gsum pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta gzhan la phan pa bzang po la sogs pa dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis grong khyer dpe med du 'gyur/_tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad mkhas pa'i grags pas rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas par khyab pa slob dpon ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas 
[\[456a.6\]]mdzad pa/_gnas brtan mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra de nyid dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi brtson 'grus kyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//dze pa la/_slob dpon chos mchog gis sbyar ba'i tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel pa 'gyur byang med pa bzhugs so/_/'di 
[\[456a.7\]]la bam po bcu gnyis dang tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do//_//we pa la/_rigs pa'i thigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dul ba lhas mdzad pa/_bam po gsum pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_rigs pa'i thigs 
[\[456b\]]
[\[456b.1\]]pa'i rab tu byed pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka chig stong bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa bdun pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma lo ka'i 'gyur la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIrti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe 
[\[456b.2\]]dang gtugs nas legs par bsgyur te bcos pa/_rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma mdor bsdus pa slob dpon mang du thos pa ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_rigs pa'i thigs pa'i don bsdus pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na 
[\[456b.3\]]mi tras mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_gtan tshigs thigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa dul ba lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_gtan tshigs thigs pa'i 'grel pa bram ze a tsa Tas mdzad pa 
[\[456b.4\]]rnams bzhugs so//_//zhe pa la/_'brel pa brtag pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon dul ba lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang*/_lo tsA ba nam mkha'i 'gyur/_'brel pa brtag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba bram ze shang+ka rA nan+das mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po pa ra hi ta'i zhabs la zhus nas/_bod kyi sgra 
[\[456b.5\]]sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dga' ba rdo rje'i 'gyur/_rgyud gzhan grub pa'i 'grel bshad slob dpon dul ba lhas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po shAn+ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_dpal 
[\[456b.6\]]tshangs pa'i 'byung gnas bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab dang*/_'bro seng dkar shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dul ba lhas mdzad pa'i gsham ma tshang ba gcig_/dmigs pa brtags pa'i rgya cher 
[\[456b.7\]]bshad pa slob dpon dul ba lha shes bya'i dmigs pa mtha' dag la gzhol ba smra ba'i seng ge mu stegs can glang po che'i klad pa 'gems par mdzad pas sbyar ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/[ (*]'di bod na lta ba mthon por rlom pa zhig gis byas/[) ]rigs pa grub pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon 
[\[457a\]]
[\[457a.1\]]tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta shrI sing+ha pra b+ha dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong bai ro tsa na'i 'gyur/_thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang*/_phyi rol gyi don grub pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon dge srungs kyis mdzad pa/_kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon 
[\[457a.2\]]chen po dzi na mi tra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur/_thos pa brtag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_gzhan sel brtag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_dbang phyug 'jig pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa rnams slob dpon dge srungs kyis mdzad pa/_tshad ma brtag pa che ba dang*/_tshad ma brtag pa chung ba slob 
[\[457a.3\]]dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i grong khyer dpe med du 'gyur/_'jig rten pha rol grub pa 
[\[457a.4\]]zhes bya ba slob dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa/_grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi dbus rat+na rasmi'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i rgyal po shrI ha ri sha de wa'i sku ring la kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_bod kyi sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi 'gyur/_glegs bam bklag pa'i thabs 
[\[457a.5\]]paN+Di ta dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_skad cig ma 'jig pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_skad cig ma 'jig pa grub pa'i rnam par 'grel pa slob dpon bram 
[\[457a.6\]]ze mu tig bum pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya ka ra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur/_lhan cig dmigs pa nges par grub pa zhes bya ba rtsod par smra ba'i mchog slob dpon dpal shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa/_bal yul gyi paN+Di ta tsa hang ngu shAn+ti b+ha dra 
[\[457a.7\]]dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro seng dkar dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_sel ba grub pa zhes bya ba dge bsnyen dam pa mkhas pa chen po bram ze shang+ka rA nan+das mdzad pa/_grong khyer dpe med du kha che'i paN+Di ta ma no rA tha dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_'grel pa grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas 
[\[457b\]]
[\[457b.1\]]pa chen po bram ze'i rigs su sku 'khrungs pa chos kyi grags pa gnyis pa zhes 'jig rten na gtam du grags shing rtog ge pa phal pa'i gzhung 'jig pa dang*/_thogs pa med par don gyi de kho na nyid rnam par 'jig pa'i blo'i mthu stobs kyi 'gran zla dang bral ba/_bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 
[\[457b.2\]]gces spras su 'dzin pas legs par bshad pa'i ro myang ba la sems rtse gcig tu gzhol ba dge bsnyen dam pa shang+ka rA nan+das mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta skal ldan rgyal po dang*/_lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur/_rgyud pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrI mi tra'i zhal snga 
[\[457b.3\]]nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ku mA ra ka lA shu dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_phyis paN+Di ta A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba de nyid kyis gtugs shing gtan la phab pa/_rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du grub pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga 
[\[457b.4\]]nas kyis mdzad pa/_bal yul gyi paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_slad nas paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang*/_klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa/_nang gi khyab pa slob dpon chen po mkhas pa dpal rin chen 'byung gnas zhi 
[\[457b.5\]]ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa dang*/_gtan tshigs kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa mkhas pa chen po dzai tA ri'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ku mA ra ka lA shu dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_chos dang chos can gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dzai tA ris mdzad pa/_
[\[457b.6\]]byis pa 'jug pa'i rtog ge zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po dgra las rgyal bas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po nA ga rak+Shi ta da nga*/_bod kyi sum pa lo tsA ba dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i 'gyur/_rtog ge'i 'di rtog ge'i skad 'chud pa yin nam dpyad/_skad dza ga ta la'i gtsug lag khang chen po'i mkhas pa chen po dge slong thar pa'i 'byung gnas 
[\[457b.7\]]sbas pas mdzad pa/_tshul 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas nang dang phyi'i gzhung lugs du ma rnams la blo'i snang ba cher rgyas pa sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dpang dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas paN+Di ta la ma ltos par rang nyid kyis 
[\[458a\]]
[\[458a.1\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_rigs pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba kha che'i yul gyi mkhas pa chen po dngos grub brnyes pa bram ze'i slob dpon chen po rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong ting 
[\[458a.2\]]nge 'dzin bzang po'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//ze 'e gnyis la/_de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_gu ge yul gyi dben sa ri bo dge gnas phun tshogs gling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gu Na A ka ra shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang*/_
[\[458a.3\]]sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dpal lha btsan po dge slong lha bla ma zhi ba 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po de wen+d+ra b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong grags 
[\[458a.4\]]'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/'di la tshigs su bcad pa khri brgyad stong*/_bam po drug cur byas so//_//ye pa la/_yangs pa dang dri ma med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma kun las btus pa'i 'grel bshad byang chub sems dpa'i yul pa slob dpon rgyal ba'i dbang 
[\[458a.5\]]po blo gros kyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong phrag dgu pa tshul 'di ni chos kyi rje shong ston lo tsA ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par bshad pa'i srol la sogs pa la brten nas dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas paN+Di ta la ma ltos par de nyid kyis rgya dpe la gzigs nas 'gyur ba 
[\[458a.6\]]bzhugs so//_//sgrub pa dang sel ba rnam par dag pa yi/_/yang dag rigs pas lta ngan sun 'byin cing*/_/shes bya'i gnas lugs gsal byed rig pa'i gzhung*/_/bcu phrag drug la brgyad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni gtan tshigs rig pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam 
[\[458a.7\]]grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar gtan tshigs rig pa'i chos skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni gzhan tshar bcad pa'i gnas gnyis pa sgra rig pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor la/_re pa la/_lung du ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/_'phags pa'i yul gyi mkhas pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor 
[\[458b\]]
[\[458b.1\]]bu lta bu slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par bsgyur ba la/_slar yang 'jig rten gyi mig gcig pu dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas 'gyur bcos bgyis pa/_nye bar bsgyur ba nyi shu pa'i 
[\[458b.2\]]'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa/_sgra'i mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta dzai ta kar+Na'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/_sgyur byed kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos legs par bsgyur ba/_yi ge'i mdo zhes bya ba slob 
[\[458b.3\]]dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_legs par sbyar ba skad kyi brda sprod pa dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gangs can pa'i skad du yang dag par bsgyur ba/_yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chos skyong gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_sgra'i mkhan po chen po 
[\[458b.4\]]dzai ta kar+Na'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan nas/_sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba/_lung du ston pa tsan+d+ra ba'i mdo'i spyir btang ba yang dag par bsdu ba zhes bya ba skad gnyis smra ba chen po dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas shin tu dag par bsgyur 
[\[458b.5\]]ba/_brda sprod pa tsan+d+ra pa'i mdo'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa mkhas pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi rgyan du gyur pa'i slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta dpal sa dbang bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston blo gros brtan pa'i 
[\[458b.6\]]'gyur/_'di la rtags kyi bye brag ma phyed pa la sogs pa bstan bcos la mi legs pa 'ga' re yod pa dang*/_'gyur ma dag pa'ang bag re snang na yang las dang po pa rnams la phan par bsams nas bris pa yin no/_/lung du ma byung*ston pa tsan+d+ra ba'i ti la sogs pa dang si la sogs 
[\[458b.7\]]pa skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang phyug d+harma shrI b+ha dra'i 'gyur/_lung du ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i ti nga'i mtha' zhes bya ba bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i 'gyur/_lung du ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i sub ma byung*kyi mtha' rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba gnas brtan rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa/_skad 
[\[459a\]]
[\[459a.1\]]gnyis smra ba dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i slob mar gyur pa gnas lnga rig pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan sa skyar bsgyur cing zhus pa/_'brel pa mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba kA yas+tha tsaM ka dA shas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba chen po dpal ldan dpang 
[\[459a.2\]]blo gros brtan pas legs par bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa/_tsan+d+ra pa'i byings kyi dbung gnyen zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba gang bas mdzad pa las btus pa/_legs par sbyar ba'i gzhung lugs smra ba chen po thugs rje dpal bzang pos yang dag par bsgyur cing dag par 
[\[459a.3\]]bgyis pa/_lung du ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i 'grel pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i rjes su 'brangs nas ma hA paN+Di ta nyi ma'i snying po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_'gos kyi rigs las 'khrungs pa'i lo tsA ba chen po dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras g.yag sde lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe 
[\[459a.4\]]las gsar du bsgyur cing*/_slad kyi char yang rgya dpe rnying pa la gtugs te 'gyur bcos dang zhu dag mdzad pa/_u Na la sogs pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_'di bod dpe snga 'gyur gnyis tsam la 'gyur ma dag pa dang*/_lhag chad kyang cung zad 
[\[459a.5\]]byung bar brten/_slad kyis lo tsA ba chen po zhwa lu rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas shin tu dag par bsgyur ba/_'jam dpal gyi brda sprod pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgyad pa'i bdag nyid can/_chos 'khor lha sa'i gtsug lag khang du zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge 
[\[459a.6\]]slong chos skyong bzang pos legs par bsgyur ba/_yang 'jam dpal gyi brda sprod pa'i skabs lnga pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa zhwa lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras dpal grwa thang gi gtsug lag khang du yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//le pa la/_
[\[459a.7\]]lung du ston pa ka lA pa'i mdo zhes bya ba lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas slob dpon durga sing+ha'i 'grel pa la gtugs nas sgra don ji lta ba bzhin du dpal sa skyar bsgyur ba/_cha bsags kyi mdo'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba slob dpon durga sing+has mdzad pa'i stod cha lo tsA ba chen po grags pa 
[\[459b\]]
[\[459b.1\]]rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_ka lA pa'i 'grel pa nyung ngu las slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta sgrol ba'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/_lha bla ma zhi ba 'od kyis zhang zhung gi sa cha tho ling gser gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_byings kyi tshogs bgrod dka' seng ges mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba chen po dge slong 
[\[459b.2\]]rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing*/_slad kyi dus su'ang byings kyi mdo'i 'grel pa dang gtugs nas dag par bgyis pa/_lung du ston pa ka lA pa'i 'grel ma byung*pa paN+Di ta bgrod dka' seng ges mdzad pa/_bu ston lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_ka lA pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba jo bo brag 
[\[459b.3\]]'byor gyis mdzad pa/_chos kyi rje skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu thub pa'i dbang po dang mkhyen rab mi gnyis pa dpal blo gros brtan pa'i bka' drin las bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab dang tha snyad kyi gtsug lag rnams la blo gros rgya cher thob pa gangs can gyi khrod du skad gnyis 
[\[459b.4\]]smra ba dge slong byang chub rtse mos bsgyur ba zhes pa'i mtha' can rnams bzhugs so//_//she pa la/_ka lA pa'i si sogs kyi mtha'i bya ba mkhas pa dpal ldan 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas dpal gnas po che'i gtsug lag khang du 'gyur/_
[\[459b.5\]]paN+Di ta chen po mAM hi ka wis mdzad pa'i ka lA pa'i mdo dang 'brel pa'i si la sogs pa'i rnam dbye'i bya ba mkhas pa'i dbang po dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i legs par bshad pa la brten sgra rig pa'i dge slong lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dang*/_blo gros dpal bzang pos legs par bsgyur cing mchan 
[\[459b.6\]]bus kyang gtan la phab pa/_ka lA pa'i ti la sogs pa'i mtha'i bya ba rnam par dpyad pa zhes bya ba mkhan po sarba d+ha ras bkod pa legs sbyar gyi skad kyi tha snyad mtha' dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa ka lA pa'i rjes 'brang byings kyi 'grel pa chen po 'di ni mkhas grub du ma brgyud mar byon pa'i dpal ngam 
[\[459b.7\]]ring gi yang rtse'i gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta chen po shrI ma Ni ka dang*/_sgra tshad pa dpal ldan bsod nams bzang po la sogs pa yongs 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul la spyi bos reg par gyur pa/_lo tsA ba chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par 'gyur/_smra ba kun la 'jug pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos 
[\[460a\]]
[\[460a.1\]]sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pa dang*/_smra ba kun la 'jug pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos kyi 'grel pa sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pa slob dpon chen po su b+hA sha kIrtis mdzad pa/_rab tu sbyor ba'i sgo'i 'grel pa/_ldog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_ldog pa bsdus 
[\[460a.2\]]pa bstan pa'i rnam 'grel rnams slob dpon na bi d+harmas blo dman pa'i don du gsal tshig tu mdzad pa/_smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu zhes bya ba paN+Di ta dran pa'i ye shes grags pas mdzad pa dang*/_smra ba'i sgo mtshon cha lta bu zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon de nyid kyis mdzad pa yin nam yang zer/_
[\[460a.3\]]rong pa chos bzang gis byas pa yin yang zer ba/_dkyus su rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa'i ye shes grags pas bla ma nor bzang grags pa las thos te slob ma gzhon nu grags pa'i don du ming gi sbyor ba ni cung zad bzhag_/phrad kyi sbyor ba ni cung zad bshad nas bsgyur cing zhus pa zhes bya 
[\[460a.4\]]ba yod pa rnams bzhugs so//_//se pa la/_brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo dang*/_brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo'i 'grel pa rab tu bya ba gsal ldan zhes bya ba slob dpon a nu b+hU tis mdzad pa/_'phags yul nub phyogs ku ru k+She tra bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas 
[\[460a.5\]]lnga rig pa'i paN+Di ta ba la b+ha dra dang*/_ma hA paN+Di ta go ku la nA tha mi shra mched kyi bka' drin la brten pa'i lo tsA ba se dkar rigs kyi thig le 'dar pa lo tsA ba ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis pho brang chen po po Ta lar bsgyur ba/_sgra'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i bstan bcos la/_mngon brjod kyi bstan 
[\[460a.6\]]bcos 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod ces bya ba paN+Di ta 'chi med seng ges mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ra dang*/_lo tsA ba yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ba la/_slad nas 'gos lo tsA ba dge slong d+harmA pA la b+ha dra zhes bya bas rgya dpe dang 'gyur rnying la 
[\[460a.7\]]gtugs te don la dpyad de 'gyur bcos cung zhig byas pa gnyis 'bid can/_'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba paN+Di ta rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa/_dpal zhwa lu'i dge slong 'gos lo tsA ba gsum pa dge slong d+harmA pA la b+ha dras legs par bsgyur ba/_
[\[460b\]]
[\[460b.1\]]snyan dngags kyi me long paN+Di ta slob dpon dbyig pa can gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dngags mkhan chen po shrI lak+Sh+mI ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba/_de rjes dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pas go dka' ba'i cha shas 
[\[460b.2\]]su gyur pa rnams dang*/_don che ba rnams la 'gyur bcos mdzad pa la phyis snye thang blo brtan bzhi pas legs par 'gyur bcos mdzad pa/_snyan dngags sprin gyi pho nya zhes bya ba snyan dngags mkhan chen po nag mo khol gyis mdzad pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta snyan dngags mkhan chen po su ma na shrI dang*/_zhu chen 
[\[460b.3\]]gyi lo tsA ba mang du thos pa'i dge slong byang chub rtse mo dang*/_lo tsA ba lung rigs smra ba nam mkha' bzang pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba/_sdeb sbyor gyi mtshan nyid ston pa'i bstan bcos sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung 
[\[460b.4\]]gnas zhi bas mdzad pa/_sa gsum na 'gran zla bral ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po byang chub rtse mo'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba las/_slar yang bla ma de nyid dang*/_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa'i dge slong nam mkha' bzang pos bsgyur/_slar yang zhwa lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang 
[\[460b.5\]]pos dag par bcos pa/_yang sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rtsod dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa 'di ni chos ldan ra sa bas bsgyur ba'i 'phro yar lungs pa lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis rdzogs par bsgyur ba/_slad kyis sa gsum na 'gran 
[\[460b.6\]]zla dang bral ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nam mkha' bzang pos sdom brtson dam pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan sde snod gsum gyi glegs bam gcig pu skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i phyag bris kyi rgya dpe la gtugs nas shin tu dag par bsgyur ba/_sdeb sbyor gyi dper brjod ston pa 
[\[460b.7\]]sdeb sbyor gyi phreng ba'i bstod pa zhes pa 'di stag sde ba seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi sras kyi thu bo phyi nang gi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa de dus na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mkhas pa chen po skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi zhal snga nas bsgyur ba/_'di'i yi 
[\[461a\]]
[\[461a.1\]]ge bcu gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad bcu gnyis pa ya mu na yan chad shong ston lo tsA ba chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur te 'phro lus pa las shong ston de nyid kyi brgyud pa'i slob ma dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas slob dpon shAkya rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'i 'grel 
[\[461a.2\]]pa la brten nas yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so//_//rang bzhin rkyen dang rnam 'gyur legs sbyar nas/_/don la brda sprod gzhung gi bstan bcos dang*/_/de yi yan lag mngon brjod snyan dngags sogs/_//ston pa'i bstan bcos sum cu rtsa dgu bzhugs/_/de dag gis 
[\[461a.3\]]ni sgra rig pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar gzhan tshar gcod pa rig pa'i gnas kyi bstan bcos rnams bkod nas/_gzhan rjes su gzung ba'i rig pa'i gnas gnyis kyi dang po gso ba rig pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor la/_he pa la/_sbyor 
[\[461a.4\]]ba brgya pa zhes bya ba sman gyi gzhung 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze dze ta kar+Na'i zhal snga nas dang po rtsa 'grel lan cig gsungs shing*/_dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bud+d+hA shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas stod cung zad gsungs nas grub pa'i zhing skyid rong 
[\[461a.5\]]'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las cung zad mi ring bar chen po'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos 'grel pa gsum dang bstun nas bsgyur ba/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub 
[\[461a.6\]]snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzongs pa sman 'tsho ba'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sman a ba'i cho ga_sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa'i sman gyi ming gi rnam grangs yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa mdzad pa'i slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas 
[\[461a.7\]]mdzad pa/_yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba sman pa'i bdag po dge 'dun gsang ba zhes bya ba'i sras sman pa chen po slob dpon pha gol gyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+d+ha ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_de'i rang 'grel du grags pa yan lag 
[\[461b\]]
[\[461b.1\]]brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bshad pa'i stod le'u bcu bzhi pa yan chad kyi 'grel pa bzhugs so//_//e pa la/_yan lag brgyad pa'i rang 'grel du grags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bshad pa sman pa'i bdag po seng ge sbas pa zhes bya ba'i bu 
[\[461b.2\]]sman pa chen po pha gol zhes bya bas mdzad pa/_le'u bco lnga pa yan chad rdzogs pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya d+harma shrI warma dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba i bu dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing*/_mar lo dge slong rig pa gzhon nu dang mnyel cor dge slong dbyig gi rin chen dang gsum gyis 
[\[461b.3\]]tshad la phab ste mjug bsdus nas rdzogs par bgyis pa bzhugs so//_//ko kho go gsum la/_yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba chags pa la dga' ba'i bu slob dpon zla ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba tshe'i rig byed kyi bstan bcos mtha' dag la mkhas 
[\[461b.4\]]pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+d+ha ra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa las gyur pa'i/_/nad rnams sman dang dpyad dang rigs pa yis/_/gso thabs klu sgrub pha khol rjes 'brang gzhung*/_/gso ba rig pa'i bstan 
[\[461b.5\]]bcos rnam bdun bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni gso ba rig pa'i chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar gso ba rig pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor rnams bkod nas/_gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas gnyis pa bzo rig pa'i bstan bcos ni/_rtsa ba gser 'gyur gyi bstan 
[\[461b.6\]]bcos la/_ngo pa la/_dngul chu grub pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po b+ha li pas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI na ren+d+ra b+ha dra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba au D+yAn pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po spu Ta'i mgul gyi pho brang chen por 'gyur/_gser 'gyur gyi bstan bcos bsdus pa 
[\[461b.7\]]mjug ma tshang ba 'di grub chen o rgyan pa'i 'gyur/_gong gi b+ha li pas mdzad pa dang gnyis 'gyur chad ma gtogs don gcig pa yin pa 'dra'o/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma d+ha ra dang*/_lo tsA ba yar 
[\[462a\]]
[\[462a.1\]]lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul gung thang gi rgyal sar bsgyur ba/_drang srong chen po A tre'i bus mdzad pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba mkhas pa d+harma d+ha ra dang*/_sgra sgyur grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i mngon 
[\[462a.2\]]par rtogs pa bal po'i dge slong dpal gyi sdes mdzad pa/_mchod rten gyi ma byung*mtshan nyid ston pa bu ston lo tsA'i 'gyur/_thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi bcud len nad thams cad 'joms shing lus kyi stobs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba ha ri d+ho bar gyi rnal 'byor shi ba dA sha dang*/_o rgyan pa rin chen dpal 
[\[462a.3\]]gyis spu trar 'gyur/_spos sbyor gyi bstan bcos dri sbyar ba'i mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris kyi sbyor ba tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_spos sbyor gyi re'u char byas pa'i thabs bshad pa 'di dag gi zhus dag lo tsA ba snar thang pu N+ye rasmi yin no/_/de dag dang rjes su 'brel ba'i rten 'brel 
[\[462a.4\]]dang rtsis dang mo la sogs pa'i skor la/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtsug lag [(*]ma byung*[)]gi de kho na nyid slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta bud+d+hA ka ra b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi 'gyur/_shA ri'i bu'i mo rtsis [(*]ma byung*[)]mtshan ma brgyad pa/_paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal 
[\[462a.5\]]mtshan dpal bzang po'i 'gyur/_dpal ldan zhi ba  [(*]ma byung*[)]lhas mdzad pa'i mo rtsis paN+Di ta go ma shrI dang*/_bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang*/_lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur/_thub pa chen po drang srong gargas ltas kyi rnam pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag rgya nag nas bsgyur ba/_'phags 
[\[462a.6\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das thal ba'i dbang po dbang phyug gi skur bzhengs pas u ma dang zhu len gyi tshul du phyi rol gyi lugs su gsungs pa'i dpal g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba seng ge go chas mdzad pa'i sbas pa 
[\[462a.7\]]gsal byed man ngag dom nag lce mdung sogs dmar nag gi 'khor lo sh+la ka stong phrag gcig pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal dza ya A nan+da chen po dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba glo bo shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_tshe'i gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu gnod pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i las paN+Di ta 
[\[462b\]]
[\[462b.1\]]dza ya A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba shes rab rin chen gyi 'gyur/_gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal lhan cig skyes pa dang*/_o rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ljongs te rA hu'i tir 'gyur/_tshe rtsis kyi 'bras bu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ma na pu ru Shas mdzad pa/_i thi 
[\[462b.2\]]na ka ra ka Ta'i bram ze lag+ma ti dang*/_mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i 'gyur/_dbyangs 'char ba'i don bsdus pa paN+Di ta chen po seng ge'i go chas mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di dza ya A nan+da dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen zhes bya ba rmongs pa'i gnyen po dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas 
[\[462b.3\]]bal yul rnal 'byor pa'i gtsug lag khang du zhus shing gtan la phab pa/_dbyangs 'char ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'bras bu nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI dza ya A nan+da dang*/_chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur rnams bzhugs so//_//rgyal dbang lnga pa'i dkar chag tu bram 
[\[462b.4\]]ze chen po d+ha ra ha mis mdzad pa'i dus bstan pa'i me long rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shrI dang*/_lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyi 'gyur zhes bya ba dang*/_drang srong phur bus mdzad pa'i lo drug cu'i 'bras rtsis phur brtag bal yul gyi mkhas pa bi na seng ge'i 'gyur/_zhes pa byung yang dpe ma 
[\[462b.5\]]'byor bas slar btsal dgos so/_/rang dang gzhan gyi dbul ba kun sel zhing*/_/'dod pa bsgrub pa mkhas pa 'jug pa'i ngogs/_/bzo rig bstan bcos phyogs mthun bcas pa'i gzhung*/_/bcu phrag gnyis la gnyis kyis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bzo rig pa'i chos skor 
[\[462b.6\]]bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar bzo rig pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor rnams bkod nas/_thun mong ba lugs kyi bstan bcos la sogs pa'i skor la/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i shes rab brgya pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[462b.7\]]dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur/_lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong bu zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa las le'u gnyis pa logs shig tu bsgyur ba lo tsA ba shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_lugs kyi bstan bcos skye bo gso ba'i thigs pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_
[\[463a\]]
[\[463a.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_lugs kyi bstan bcos tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_za hor gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shAn+ti dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dpal gyi lhun po sde'i 'gyur/_tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[463a.2\]]brgya pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po mchog sred kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur/_dri ma med pa'i dris lan rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po snyan dngags mkhan gyi dam pa slob dpon don yod 'char gyis mdzad pa/_
[\[463a.3\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra b+hA ka ra shrI mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur/_ma su rak+Shas byas pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[463a.4\]]A tsAr+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur/_mi dpyad kyi bstan bcos rgya mtshos bstan pa'i skyes pa'i mtshan bco lnga pa dang bud med kyi mtshan bcu pa paN+Di ta pra b+hA ka ra dang*/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong o D+yAn pa rin chen dpal gyi 'gyur/_mi dpyad kyi bstan bcos bsdus pa rdo 
[\[463a.5\]]rje gdan du o D+yAn pas bsgyur ba/_mi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba sde snod 'dzin pa chen po b+ho Ta paN+Di ta'i gsung la brten nas/_paN+Di ta d+harma d+ha ta'i zhal snga nas/_yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba/_slob dpon pad+ma dge bsnyen gyis 
[\[463a.6\]]'jig rten dbang phyug las grub pa thob pa'i lo rgyus/_paN+Di ta bi nA ya shrI mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba ldan ma tshul khrims seng ge'i 'gyur/_tsan+d+ra go mi'i gtam rgyud/_paN+Di ta bi khyA ta de was thugs rje chen po las grub pa thob pa'i gtam rgyud/_shing bzo bas grub pa thob pa'i gtam rgyud/_bud med kyis grub 
[\[463a.7\]]pa thob pa'i gtam rgyud/_tshong dpon gyi bu su kha de was grub pa thob pa'i gtam rgyud rnams paN+Di ta bi nA ya shrIs bsgyur/_gzhon nu 'byung ba'i ma byung*bstan bcos ji ltar byung ba'i gtam rgyud paN+Di ta su ma na shrI'i ngag bzhin bu ston lo tsA bas bsgyur ba/_drang srong chen po sha li ho tras yang dag par bsdus pa'i 
[\[463b\]]
[\[463b.1\]]rta'i tshe'i rig byed mtha' dag rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba rgyas pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang*/_bud+d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/gang la brten nas 'jig rten 'dir bde zhing*/_/mtho ris thar pa'i dpal yang 'byung 
[\[463b.2\]]gyur pa'i/_/lugs kyi bstan bcos kun dang gtam rgyud sogs/_/bcu phrag gcig la dgu yis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni thun mong pa lugs kyi bstan bcos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar mtshan nyid kyi phyogs kun dril bas lnga brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug 
[\[463b.3\]]mchis so/_/mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos skabs te gsum pa'o//_//da ni bod kyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i dpe dkon pa ci rigs pa dang*/_mdzad pa po'i mtshan ma smos pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs la/_co pa la/_lo paN mang pos mdzad pa'i sgra bye brag tu rtog byed chen mo/_/bye brag tu rtogs 
[\[463b.4\]]byed 'bring po sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa pho brang 'on cang rdor bod dang*/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po thams cad kyis chos skad gtan la phab ste mkhas pa rnams 'tshogs te ming du btags/_lha btsan po khri srong lde btsan gyis bskul nas bkas bcad de mi bcos par bzhag pa/_'dir bye brag tu rtogs byed chung ngu 
[\[463b.5\]]rnyed na bri'o/_/thon mi a nus byas pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos lung du ston pa'i rtsa ba sum cu pa dang*/_lung du ston pa rtags kyi 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon a nus mdzad pa/_lce khyi 'brug gis mdzad pa'i byA ka ra Na'i skad mdo tsam zhig bsgyur ba gnas brgyad kyi rtsa ba dang*/_sgra'i bstan bcos gnas 
[\[463b.6\]]brgyad kyi 'grel pa dang*/_sgra'i rnam par dbye ba ma byung*bstan pa su ban+ta dang*/_bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma las mdor bsdus pa le'u bco lnga pa rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyis mdzad pa/_shrI sing+has mdzad pa'i sher snying gi 'grel pa mdo sde las sngags su bkrol ba pa gor bai ro tsA nas rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la 
[\[463b.7\]]gdams pa don gsal ba'i sgron ma dang*/_slob dpon bai ro tsA nas rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la gdams pa rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo/_gces pa bsdus pa'i phrin yig btsun pa chen po dpal dbyangs kyis bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa/_lta ba'i rim pa'i man ngag ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa/_gsung 
[\[464a\]]
[\[464a.1\]]rab rin po che'i gtam rgyud dang shAkya'i rabs rgyud mkhan po dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rnams bzhugs so//_//cho jo gnyis la/_'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo'i rnam par bshad pa bzhugs/_'di 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad zer ba mi 
[\[464a.2\]]bden te/_'di'i 'thad pa bsgrubs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skabs nas/_lha btsan po byang chub rdzu 'phrul gyis mdzad pa'i bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma las blta bar bya'o zhes bod kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos la kha 'phang yod pa'i phyir ro/_/sngon gyi dkar chag las/_lo tsA ba klu'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[464a.3\]]gyis mdzad pa'i mdo sde dgongs 'grel gyi 'grel pa bam po bzhi bcu zhes 'byung ba de yin par sems so/_/'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam la phyogs kyi glang pos 'grel pa mdzad pa dang*/_shAkya bshes gnyen dang*/_sangs rgyas grags pa dang rgyan bzang pos TI ka mdzad pa dang*/_rnam 
[\[464a.4\]]pa bzhi'i don dang 'phral du mkhan po dag las thos pa dang*/_mdo sde nas 'byung ba yang sbyar te bshad pa lo tsA ba ye shes sdes brda phrad sla bar brjed byang du byas pa/_lta ba'i khyad par mkhan po ye shes sdes mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas gtso'i rgya cher 'grel pa bod kyi lo tsA ba zhang ye shes sdes mdzad pa/_
[\[464a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs kyi brjed byang dang*/_chos kyi rnam grangs kyi brjed byang gi rtsa ba A tsAr+ya dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa/_'brug gi lo la pho brang stong thang ldan dkar gyi bka' dang bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog gi dkar chag lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs dang*/_nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pas mdzad pa rnams 
[\[464a.6\]]bzhugs so//_//nyo pa la/_mdzad pa po'i mtshan ma smos pa la/_don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 'grel pa/_'di 'grel pa bzang po cig snang ste mdzad byang 'gyur byang la sogs mi 'dug pas 'dir bzhugs su bcug_/lhag mthong bskyed pa'i thabs cung zad bris pa/_sems gnas 
[\[464a.7\]]pa spyi'i yi ge/_mi sdug pa'i sgo nas sems gnas pa'i thabs/_byams pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bgrang ba'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs/_khams rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs/_dbugs 
[\[464b\]]
[\[464b.1\]]bgrang ba'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs/_zhi gnas sku la bsgom pa'i thabs chung ngu*/_zhi gnas la 'jug pa'i thabs rnams cung zad bris pa/_bsam gtan la 'jug pa bsdus pa/_sems kyi nyams cung zad tsam zhig mdor bsdus nas brjod pa rnams 
[\[464b.2\]]so/_/rnam 'phrul dpag yas rgyal ba'i mdzad pa can/_/gangs ri'i khrod 'dir byon pa'i skyes bu mchog_/mkhas pas mdzad gzhung cha tsam bris pa yi/_/ngo mtshar bstan bcos sum cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni bod kyi mkhas pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bstan 
[\[464b.3\]]bcos las dpe dkon pa phyogs tsam bris pa bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to//_//de ltar bod kyi mkhas pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos kyi skor rnams bkod nas/_da ni gsar bcug mdo dang rig gnas la sogs pa'i bstan bcos sna

[\[464b.5\]]snang ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba btsun pa ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta gzhon nu bum pa dang*/_lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_'phags pa shes rab 
[\[464b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshigs su bcad pa chen po slob dpon Ar+ya de was mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta chen po mi pham mgon po'i rang 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i bshad pa jo bo chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/_sher phyin don bsdus sgron me dang*/_

[\[465a\]]
[\[465a.1\]]pa grub pa rta mkhan bgrod dkas bsrungs pa'i bu nyi ma bsrung pas byas pa/_mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_lo tsA ba tsan+d+ras bsgyur/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i gsang sngags zab mo rje zhwa lu lo tsA ba d+harma pA la b+ha dras bsgyur ba/_tshe'i rig byed

[\[465a.3\]]sman bcos dang phan byed kyi tsakra rigs mi gcig pa bdun cu don gnyis rnams lo paN de gnyis kyis bsgyur ba/_yang tshangs pa rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can zhes pa'i bstan bcos dang*/_phan byed kyi man ngag lag len thor bu gnyis 'phags yul 
[\[465a.4\]]ma d+hu ra'i rig byed 'dzin pa rA ku nA tha dang*/_ma hA lo tsA ba 'dar pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis pho brang chen po po ta lar bsgyur ba/_mig 'byed mthong ba don ldan 'phags yul shA dzang gi sman pa ma ho dang*/_ma hA lo tsA ba 'dar ba ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis pho brang 
[\[465a.5\]]chen po po ta lar bsgyur ba/_ka lA pa'i byings mdo 'jam dbyangs ral gri'i 'gyur/_tsan+d+ra pa'i byings mdo slob dpon gang ba'i zla bas mdzad pa/_lo chen byang chub rtse mo'i 'gyur/_tsan+d+ra pa'i u Na'i mdo lo chen nam mkha' bzang po'i 'gyur/_de'i rang 'grel lo chen gyi dpal 
[\[465a.6\]]bzang gi 'gyur/_byings kyi mdo bu ston rin chen grub kyi 'gyur mi 'dra tsam/_sub mtha' rin chen 'byung gnas dang su ban+ta'i bsgyur 'phro/_rkyen gsum rab tu bshad pa rong zom chos bzang gi 'gyur/_ti sogs kyi bya ba'i tha tshig gsal ba mkhan po dga' ba'i grags pas mdzad pa/_

[\[465b\]]
[\[465b.1\]]gtsug lag khang du zhwa lu lo chen d+harma pA la b+ha dras bsgyur ba/_gtor ma'i phreng ba slob dpon blo bzang seng ges mdzad pa/_paN+Di ta b+hik+Shu d+harma dI ka ra dang zhwa lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang pos e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur ba/_sdeb sbyor gyi bstan bcos rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas 
[\[465b.2\]]mdzad pa stag tshang lo tsA'i 'gyur/_brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos dbyangs can byA ka ra Na'i mtshams sbyor 'grel pa paN+Di ta kr-iSh+Na b+haT+Ta dang*/_lo tsA ba jo nang kun dga' snying po'i 'gyur/_skyes rabs kyi dka' 'grel bIr+ya sing+has mdzad pa/_dbang phyug byed pa po dang khyab 'jug byed 
[\[465b.3\]]pa po gcig nyid sel ba zhwa lu lo tsA ba'i 'gyur/_tshigs bcad dgu pa dang bdun pa la wa pas mdzad pa bu ston gyi 'gyur/_sham+b+ha lar 'gro tshul gyi lam yig 'phags pa don yod lcags kyus gsungs pa/_jo nang kun dga' snying pos bal dpe las bsgyur zhing go dka' ba rnams 
[\[465b.4\]]bram ze'i paN+Di ta kr-iSh+Na b+haT+Ta la dris shing gtan la phab/_tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i 'grel pa skyog lo ngag dbang rin chen bkra shis kyis grwa thang du bsgyur ba/_'jam dpal byA ka ra Na'i rtsa ba sA d+hu kIrtis mdzad pa/_dpal ldan ka ling+ka'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'i yul gyi slob dpon 
[\[465b.5\]]rgyal po'i lhas mdzad pa rnams so/_/gzhan yang slan chad dpe 'byor na 'dir 'jug kyang rung ba/_rgya 'gyur dang bka' btsan nam mi btsan snyam pa'i bod kyi bstan bcos kyi skor la/_rgyud kyi spyi 'grel skor/_rma rin chen mchog gi bshad thabs bcu pa/_lo chen 
[\[465b.6\]]bai ros mdzad pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa/_brgyad cu pa la gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyi mngon rtogs 'grel/_phra mo'i nang tshan lta ba la/_bai ros bstan pa'i snying po dz+nyA na'i 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor/_rtsa 'grel 'di lta'i dpe rgyun la bi ma la'i yin zer kyang dkar chag 
[\[465b.7\]]rnying pa rnams na dz+nyA na'i yin par bshad/_gnyen dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i thugs kyi sgron ma/_yang dag sgron ma/_mtha' mun sel sgron ma/_thabs shes sgron ma/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges don la ji bzhin bsgom thabs/_lta ba rin chen sgron ma 
[\[466a\]]
[\[466a.1\]]ste sgron ma drug go_/dbang la/_rma rin chen mchog gi nges 'byed che ba/_dam tshig la dar rje'i khrus lung*/_phrin las la gnyags dz+nyA na'i sa lam lung phran dang*/_bcol dang bskang ba'i lung phran/_gnad kyi gegs sel gzer bco brgyad 
[\[466a.2\]]pa rnams so/_/sgrub pa la/_nam snying gi zhi khro las kyi gal phreng*/_ting nge 'dzin la/_gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi 'grel pa rnams te/_gzhan yang zur che chung gi bstan bcos rnams kyang de dang 'dra zhes rgyal dbang lnga pa'i dkar chag tu 
[\[466a.3\]]'byung ngo*/_/mdo'i 'grel pa mun pa'i go cha dang*/_dka' gcod smra ba'i mtshon cha/_ska ba dpal brtsegs kyi mdo'i dka' 'grel mi shes mdud 'grol/_nyer bsgyur gyi mtshan nyid 'grel bshad slob dpon dbang pos byin gyis mdzad pa/_lo tsA ba nam mkha' dpal

[\[466b\]]
[\[466b.1\]]las byung ba'i smon lam/_sbyin pa'i rabs kyi smon lam/_rin chen phreng ba [(*]ma byung*[)]nas byung ba'i smon lam/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las byung ba'i smon lam/_'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i rdo rje'i smon lam/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di 
[\[466b.2\]]ta chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i dbang phyug dpal nags kyi rin chen dang*/_de nyid kyi bka' drin las legs par sbyar ba'i tshul rig pa dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas dpal kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod du bsgyur ba/_byang chub 'byung ba'i 
[\[466b.3\]]smon lam 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i btsun pa zla ba'i smon lam rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po nye ba'i 'thung gcod bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du bal po'i paN+Di ta dze ta kar+Na'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma

[\[466b.7\]]lo tsA ba dpal gyi lhun po'i sde'i 'gyur/_slob dpon ka ma la shI la'i smon lam mu gnyis ma zhes bya ba/_dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i smon lam/_smon lam rin po che'i rgyal po zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_
[\[467a\]]
[\[467a.1\]]rgya gar shar phyogs sat+na ga ra'i paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan nags kyi rin chen dang*/_dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang du bsgyur ba/_mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/_
[\[467a.2\]]'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam/_'phags pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa mdo sde chen po bklag pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsngo ba/_bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal gyis mdzad pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsngo ba/_spyi'i bsngo ba dang [(*]ma byung*[)]gsum/_
[\[467a.3\]]bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_lhas zhus pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_lhas zhus pa'i bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_rab 'tshe ma dang*/_
[\[467a.4\]]rab dga' ldan rnams kyis bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa phal po che las 'byung ba dang*/_tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/_yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs bcad/_
[\[467a.5\]]'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/_stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam/_rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam gyi bden tshig_/dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad 
[\[467a.6\]]pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_'di rdo rje 'byung ba'i nang na ji lta ba bzhin yod par de phyung ba 'dra'o/_/slob dpon 'phags pa 
[\[467a.7\]]klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bkra shis mtshan [{]mangs[,]mang[}]/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa'i dkon mchog 
[\[467b\]]
[\[467b.1\]]gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang*/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog 
[\[467b.2\]]gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_rigs gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad/_yang rigs gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad gcig_/bden pa brjod pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_rgya gar gyi dpe las 'gos lo tsA ba d+harma pA la 
[\[467b.3\]]b+ha dras bsgyur ba rnams bzhugs so/_/bsngo ba dang*/_smon lam dang*/_bkra shis kyi skor 'di rnams la bka' dang bstan bcos ci rigs par snang yang*/_sngon gyi rnams kyis kyang bkra shis pa'i yan lag tu bstan bcos kyi mjug tu bkod 'dug pas 'dir yang de 
[\[467b.4\]]bzhin du bkod pa yin no/_/gang zhig brjod na don rnams kun 'grub cing*/_/gnas skabs kun du bde legs 'gyur ba yi/_/bsngo ba smon lam bkra shis tshigs bcad skor/_/bcu phrag bzhi la drug gis brgyan pa bzhugs/_/de dag gis ni thun mong du bsngo 
[\[467b.5\]]ba smon lam dang bkra shis kyi chos skor bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs rnams bkod zin to/_/bsngo ba smon lam dang bkra shis kyi bstan bcos skabs te lnga pa'o//_//zhar las byung ba to pa la/_brda sprod pa pA Ni ni'i mdo sgra'i gtsug lag thams cad kyi 
[\[467b.6\]]phyi mo lta bur gyur pa mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud sogs su lung bstan pa'i bram ze pA Ni ni la 'jig rten dbang phyug gis dngos su stsal ba pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs reg zig tu bkod pa legs bshad 
[\[467b.7\]]nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba/_se'i rigs la 'khrungs pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/_ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer bod pas 'phags yul ku ru k+She trar bram ze'i rigs su sku 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i 
[\[468a\]]
[\[468a.1\]]paN+Di ta chen po ba la b+ha dra dang*/_go ku la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du legs par gsan te gzhung bod skad du bsgyur/_slob dpon rA ma tsan+d+ras mdzad pa'i 'grel pa pra kr-I ya gzhir bzhag_/kun bshad sogs cho ga rtogs dka' 
[\[468a.2\]]ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis brgyan pa'o/_/pA Ni'i gzhung 'di gong gi sgra rig pa'i bstan bcos kyi skabs der 'jug tu rung na'ang phyis su rnyed nas 'dir rtsa 'grel stabs su bris pa yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_thub pa [(*]cha shas can gyi gzugs can/[) ]skye dgu yongs kyi bla ma'i dgongs 
[\[468a.3\]]pa dang*/_/gzhar yang mi mthun med par yang dag bkod pa'i chos/_/nges par 'byung ba'i gnas gsum gang la mngon phyogs par/_/bde bar phyin par byed la chos kyi shing rta brling*/_/'di [(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]nyid las byung legs bshad 
[\[468a.4\]]nyi ma'i thigs pa re/_/gang dag thos pa 'dzin byed sbrang rtsi'i snod dag tu/_/lhung ba'i skal ba bzang po'i 'dab ma yangs byas pa'i/_/phan pa de yi pha rol brjod pas phyin pa med/_/pad+ma'i [(*]srid min gyi dpe/[) ]gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis 
[\[468a.5\]]bskyed mun pa dang*/_/lam gsum 'bab pa'i 'jug ngogs la brten skom pa bzhin/_/thos pa'i blo yis phung po khams dang skye mched sogs/_/shes bya'i mun par byas pa'i gtam ni chos la med/_/blang rgyu'i gzugs can/_dor yi ge ma 'khrugs ston 
[\[468a.6\]]phyir dmigs bu ste/_/tshul ma yin par ltung ba las 'dzin dpung pa'i 'dab/_/don med mngon par 'du byed reg gcod spu gri'i rno/_/thar ba'i bde ba dam par bsu phyir grogs kyi mchog_/thos [(*]dngos po'i rgyu'i skyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu/[) ]pa'i chos don bsam pa las 
[\[468a.7\]]byung rnam 'byed kyi/_/'khor lo gang gi snga rol ma shes shes par 'gyur/_/log shes de bzhin 'phyang mo nyug la brten pa'i blo/_/'grol ba'i las 'di blo ldan rnams kyi snying la gnas/_/tshul bzhin 
[\[468b\]]
[\[468b.1\](*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]bsgoms pas brdar ba bdag med rig pa'i mtshon/_/snying rje kun nas rgyas pa'i lag par thogs pa na/_/sgrib pa gsum gyi dgra sde yang 'byung med par bcom/_/don gnyis ldan pa'i rgyal srid skyong ba'i dbang phyug byed/_/[(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]de bzhin du ni klog 
[\[468b.2\]]dang 'dzin 'chang bya ba res/_/rtag tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos la chos kyi mig_/dri ma med 'gyur smra ba'i ro 'dzin yangs par byed/_/bsod nams phung po nam mkha'i mtha' la 'byams par spyod/_/
[\[468b.3\]]dkon pa u dum+ba [(*]de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/[) ]ra'i me tog mtshungs kyang de/_/ma yin 'byung bar dka' la phan yon che ba'i chos/_/'dod pa'i re skong dbang gi rgyal po 'dra yang de/_/ma yin bla na med pa'i dpal gyi 'byung gnas so/_/e [(*]gcig la gcig brten gyi rab spel/[) ]ma 'khor ba 'di ni bcud kyis

[\[468b.5\]]yul [(*]dngos med kyi rgyu las snga nas med pa'i byed rgyu/[) ]bgrod pa'i gom pa gcig cig bkod pa med/_/lang tsho'i mdzes pa nyi dang lhags par ma byin zhing*/_/brda sprod ma sbyangs rgya gar sma ra can gyi chos/_/thob pa'i 'gro ba 'di ni skal pa e ma sbom/_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i 
[\[468b.6\]]gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don ma lus pa rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan 
[\[468b.7\]]bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_dgos don rtogs par sla phyir chos kyi bzhugs byang smos pa'i sarga ste bdun pa'o//_/

[\[469a.1\]]@#/_/nir+pApaMhimaradzasany+tsit+samut+thAM/_swAgat+yaHkushalagaNAp+parashItad+hArA/_saMbod+hirguNayatawemahAsamudre/_mun+yegrAn+matipariNAmasamag+hawAyaM//

[\[469b.1\](*]de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/[) ]'khor ba'i gdung ba 'phrog pa'i rgyal po dge ba nyid/_/yin gyi ma la yar skyes dpal gyi dum bu min/_/rnam pa thams cad bsams kun 'jo ba bsod nams stobs/_/yin gyi 'jig rten pha rol 'bras med dpag bsam min/_/bskal [(*]gzugs brnyan gyi dga' ba/[) ]ba rgya lam rnyed dka' de bzhin gshegs pa

[\[469b.7\]]bsngo ba rnam gsal byed/_/spyi don brgyad pa brtsams pa don yod ched du dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba la/_phan yon bstan pa dang*/_de byang chub tu bsngo ba dngos so/_/dang po phan yon ni/_spyir 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa na bslu ba min pa'i skyabs kyi gnas bla na 
[\[470a\]]
[\[470a.1\]]med pa dang*/_yon gyi gnas bla na med par gyur pa ni dkon mchog gsum dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/_chos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i mdo las/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/dkon mchog gsum po ma gtogs pa'i/_/yon gyi gnas 'ga' yod ma 
[\[470a.2\]]yin/_/zhes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la mchod pa phul ba dang gsol ba btab pa la sogs pas bar chad med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi go 'phang bde blag nyid du ster ba'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dang nus pa'i yon tan ma lus pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul 
[\[470a.3\]]du rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du yang*/_sangs rgyas phal po che las/_rigs par ldan pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/sbyor ba skye ba med pas mchod byas na/_/de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/_/byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de lta

[\[470a.5\]]tu gyur pa ste/_sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa'i mdo las/_chos dang dkon mchog don gcig ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/_/dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming*/_/dge 'dun gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs/_/chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs legs te/_/

[\[470b.1\]]mthu ldan phyir dang 'jig rten gyi/_/rgyan gyur phyir dang mchog nyid phyir/_/'gyur ba med phyir dkon mchog nyid/_/ces so/_/de lta bu'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan yang gdul bar bya ba sems can dngos dang brgyud pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas mnyes par
