[\[471a\]]
[\[471a.1\]]bzhin rdo ba dang*/_/shing la ri mor bris pa'i sku gzugs kyang*/_/mdzes shing shin tu lta na sdug pa gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thob/_/ces dang*/_dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/_la las de bzhin rin chen gzugs byas pa/_/

[\[472a.1\]]lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed bsags pa dang*/_ngan song tu 'gro ba dang skyes pa rnams kyi phyir du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas pas yongs su byang zhing bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dag par yang 'gyur te/_sangs

[\[472a.3\]]ba dang*/_ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang*/_ri mo dang sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang*/_mar me dang*/_spos dang*/_me tog dang*/_dri dang*/_byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas pa dang*/_bslab pa 'dzin pa dang*/_brtul zhugs dang*/_dka' thub dang*/_

[\[472a.5\]]zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byas pas ched du sbyin pa po la phan yon gyi tshogs chen po lnga yang thob par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs

[\[472a.7\]]por grags pa dang*/_spro ba mang ba dang*/_tshe ring ba dang*/_grags pa dang ldan pa dang*/_bde bar mang ba ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang phyug po dang*/_nor mang ba dang*/_longs 
[\[472b\]]
[\[472b.1\]]spyod che ba dang*/_nor rdzas dang*/_yo byad mang ba dang*/_bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang*/_nor dang*/_'bru dang*/_dbyig dang*/_gser dang*/_mdzod dang*/_bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang*/_rta dang*/_glang po che dang*/_ba lang dang*/_lug dang*/_bran dang*/_bran 
[\[472b.2\]]mo dang*/_las byed pa dang*/_zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba dang*/_blon po dang*/_mdza' bshes dang*/_gnyen dang*/_snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa yin 
[\[472b.3\]]no/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang gzugs bzang po dang*/_blta na sdug pa dang*/_mdzes pa dang*/_mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang*/_mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang*/_lag pa ring ba dang*/_dpral ba dbyes che ba dang*/_smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang*/_yan lag nying 
[\[472b.4\]]lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang*/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin 
[\[472b.5\]]po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang*/_bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te/_de'i bu'am/_chung ma'am/_bran nam/_nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang*/_bka' nyan par byed de/_dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang 
[\[472b.6\]]zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang*/_lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/_gnas bcu po 
[\[472b.7\]]lha'i tshe dang*/_lha'i mdog dang*/_lha'i stobs dang*/_lha'i bde ba dang*/_lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang*/_lha'i gzugs dang*/_sgra dang*/_dri dang*/_ro dang*/_reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/_dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag 
[\[473a\]]
[\[473a.1\]]sbyin pa po'i phan yon lnga pa yin no zhes dang*/_ston pa'i sku gzugs mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas pas/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i lus kyi mchog thob pa dang kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mdo las/_gang zhig 
[\[473a.2\]]ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa/_/ras 'dri rtsig ngos 'dri'am gser las byas/_/de yi chos kyi khyad par gang yin pa/_/de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyis nyon/_/de ni blta min long bar zhar mi 'gyur/_/sgur bor mi 'gyur yan lag mi sdug min/_/de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha 
[\[473a.3\]]dog ldan/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go char 'gyur/_/lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob/_/spobs pa 'thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong*/_/shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/_/de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med 
[\[473a.4\]]sems ldan/_/g.yo med mi brku rgyal po 'khrug mi byed/_/mthu dang ldan zhing dbang che grags par 'gyur/_/byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/de ni mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os/_/blo ldan phyug cing de nyid rgya cher 
[\[473a.5\]]ldan/_/dbang ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa/_/lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur/_/bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston/_/de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan min/_/de 
[\[473a.6\]]ni rtogs mos shes rab tshang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te/_/'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs/_/sems can snying po mtshungs med mchod byas na/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/_/ngan 'gro gsum po des ni rnam spangs te/_/
[\[473a.7\]]bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te/_/mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod/_/rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 
[\[473b\]]
[\[473b.1\]]'gyur/_/yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad ldan/_/'dzam bu'i klung gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'i/_/gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug thob par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_khyad par gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde rin po che rnams kyi bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba las/_sngags pa 
[\[473b.2\]]las ni dang po pas/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs bya ba ste/_/bris sku bsgrubs na myur bar ni/_/dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_gzhan yang dpal kye rdo rje dang*/_dus kyi 'khor lo dang*/_'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud dang*/_gshin rje'i gshed dang*/_ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud 
[\[473b.3\]]rnams las thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ras bris bri ba'i tshul dang*/_de dag gi phan yon dang bcas pa rgya cher gsungs pa rnams kyi steng du rtogs par bya bas shes pa dang*/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa'i sgo nas sku gzugs dang mchod rten byas pa'i rgyu la rdul phra rab kyi grangs ci tsam 
[\[473b.4\]]song ba de snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i lha dang mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob pa dang*/_yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang lang tshor ldan zhing dbang po dul ba dang*/_bde ba dang*/_'byor pa rgyas pa dang*/_gsung rab mang po'i tshig dang don la mkhas pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin grub pa la sogs pa yon tan mang po dang 
[\[473b.5\]]ldan pa dang*/_sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas byang chub dam pa thob pa la sogs pa gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid de/_gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang ni/_/
[\[473b.6\]]sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/_/de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis/_/lha yul sa stengs nges par rgyal srid 'thob/_/gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas/_/tha mar skye dang rga la sogs pa 
[\[473b.7\]]yi/_/sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob/_/su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/_/de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan/_/dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/_/'jig rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/_/su dag bde bar 
[\[474a\]]
[\[474a.1\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/_/de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang*/_/pad+ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/_/nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs las thar/_/su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa/_/bran du mi skye mngag gzhug skye mi 
[\[474a.2\]]'gyur/_/dbul por mi 'gyur rigs dman mi 'gyur zhing*/_/dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yongs mi 'gyur/_/thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/_/mya ngan yongs med lus kun brtan pa dang*/_/longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/_/dgra yi 
[\[474a.3\]]tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_de dang don mthun par mkhas pa dpa' bos sku gzugs kyi gtam las/_sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhengs gsol ba/_/dang por mya ngan sel bar byed/_/rtsod pa kun spangs mthong na dga'/_/skal ldan gter 
[\[474a.4\]]tshogs dpal dang ldan/_/lus stobs ldan zhing snyan par smra/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing gzugs mdzes la/_/gsung rab kun la mkhas 'gyur zhing*/_/dbang po'i rta ni thams cad thul/_/blo ldan gtong dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan sku gzugs mchod rten la/_/phra 
[\[474a.5\]]rab rdul ni ji snyed song*/_/de snyed sa 'og sa steng 'dir/_/de snyed rgyal por nges par 'gyur/_/gzugs dang gzugs med ting 'dzin 'grub/_/thams cad bde ba ma lus spyod/_/tha mar skye dgu'i rgud spangs nas/_/de dag byang chub go 'phang thob/_/bde gshegs sku 
[\[474a.6\]]gzugs bzhengs gsol ba/_/mtshan bzang gis mtshan 'khor los sgyur/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis lus mdzes thob/_/nges par dgra 'joms rgyal bar 'gyur/_/dbang po rnams ni ma tshang med/_/dpal ldan ngan 'gro rnams las ring*/_/mi yi rigs su skye 'gyur zhing*/_/
[\[474a.7\]]ngag ni btsan pa nyid du 'gyur/_/skye bar thos dang dran ldan brtan/_/mngon par 'dod par 'byung 'gyur zhing*/_/gnas la mngon par dad pa dang*/_/'dod chags sogs kyis gnod pa med/_/'di rgyal rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/_/khyad legs pa yi gzhung la brten/_/gang 
[\[474b\]]
[\[474b.1\]]'di rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bzhengs/_/sangs rgyas sku'am mchod rten nam/_/bzheng byed srog dang ldan pa de/_/bran dang dbul bor mi skye zhing*/_/mngag gzhug bar min rigs dman min/_/zhes sogs mang du gsungs te 'dir de tsam las 'dri bar ma nus so/_/de 
[\[474b.2\]]bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rten mchod rten bzhengs pa'i phan yon ni/_spyir mchod rten zhes bya ba ni gtso bor de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshon byed mchod rten nyid yin na'ang*/_der ma zad sku gsung thugs rten dang yon gyi zhing 
[\[474b.3\]]dam par gyur pa 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la sogs pa la'ang 'jug pa las/_'dir chos kyi sku'i rten nam thugs kyi rten la mchod rten zhes bya ba ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i mdo las/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 
[\[474b.4\]]zhig pa mthong nas bcos pa'i phyir spro bar byed cing tha na 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tsam yang rtsig par byed pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ma brtsigs pa'i sa phyogs lam po che'i bzhi mdo skye bo mang po 'du ba'i sar mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_rdo ba'i ka ba dang*/_de 
[\[474b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran pa gang yang rung ba byed de/_'di lta ste dper na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/_mngon par 'byung ba'am/_byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'joms pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen 
[\[474b.6\]]po'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par bstan pa'am/_lha las babs pa'am/_lha yul du mngon par 'dzeg par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rtsig par byed pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[474b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye zhing 'thab pa dang*/_rtsod pa 'byung ba mthong nas mi dbye ba dang*/_mthun par bsdum pa'i phyir brtson pa yin zhes dang*/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/_shAka thub mchod rten brgyad po dang*/_/phyogs 
[\[475a\]]
[\[475a.1\]]bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na/_/bzhugs pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud/_/ces dang*/_mchod rten spyi'i bstod par/_sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i gdan steng du/_/sna tshogs rin chen khams las grub pa yi/_/sprul pa'i mchod rten sna tshogs rgyan 
[\[475a.2\]]gyis brgyan/_/chos sku'i rang bzhin can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes so/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod rten chos kyi sku'i ring bsrel can bzhengs pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab kyang*/_'dir mdor bsdus tsam zhig brjod na/_'phags pa sgra chen po'i mdo las/_bcom 
[\[475a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo khyod gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed la/_gang zhig gis de 
[\[475a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon 
[\[475a.5\]]gang tsam zhig byed na/_de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel zhes pa ni khyod kyi zhu ba bzang la spobs pa legs te dpyod pa dge'o/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig gi khang pa 
[\[475a.6\]]brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcugs ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs 
[\[475a.7\]]nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_kun dga' bo bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang*/_'bum gyi cha dang*/_grangs 
[\[475b\]]
[\[475b.1\]]dang*/_cha dang*/_dpe dang*/_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu 
[\[475b.2\]]med pa dang*/_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo dzam+bu'i gling chu zheng dang rgyar dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa 'di rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang*/_
[\[475b.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang*/_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang*/_dgra bcom pa rnams dang*/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di lta ste/_'bras sA lu'i zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing ngam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de dag la 
[\[475b.4\]]mi la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang*/_bsod snyoms dang*/_mal stan dang*/_nad kyi gsos sman dang*/_yo byad rnams kyis ci 'dod pa bstabs te/_de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mchod rten byas te gdugs dang*/_sil snyan 
[\[475b.5\]]dang*/_ba dan da nga*/_dri dang*/_bdug pa dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_phye ma dang*/_byug pa dag gis mchod pa byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_
[\[475b.6\]]srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_kun dga' bo bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang*/_'bum 
[\[475b.7\]]gyi cha dang*/_grangs dang*/_cha dang*/_dpe dang*/_rgyu yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang*/_
[\[476a\]]
[\[476a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang*/_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags gling chu zheng dang rgyar 
[\[476a.2\]]dpag tshad brgyad stong yod pa/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur zhes bya ba nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chu zheng dang rgyar dpag tshad dgu stong yod 
[\[476a.3\]]pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chu zhing du dpag tshad khri yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[476a.4\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba kA ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu brtan pa dag yod de/_ka ba de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bai DUr+ya sngon po yin no/_/kun dga' bo khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba gser gyi bye ma brdal ba la tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab 
[\[476a.5\]]pa/_gser gyi drwa bas g.yogs shing gser gyi dril bu g.yer khas bskor ba ste/_kun dga' bo gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de lta bu sha stag gis bkang ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la/_gang zhig 
[\[476a.6\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba nas rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha rgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 
[\[476a.7\]]la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sku gdung gi brgyad cha la bkur stir bya ba dang*/_bla mar bya ba dang*/_ri mor bya ba dang*/_mchod par bya ba dang*/_rjed par bya ba dang*/_gsol bar bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dge ba'i las de des byas pas sems 
[\[476b\]]
[\[476b.1\]]can dmyal bar lan cig song nas las de nyid dang*/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang*/_sngon legs par spyad pa de nyid kyis de las thar nas bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_yang dag par khyim nas khyim 
[\[476b.2\]]med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag 
[\[476b.3\]]dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang*/_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang*/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di 
[\[476b.4\]]ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa yang de ltar dpag tu med par shes par bya'o zhes dang*/_rgyal ba mya ngan las 'das 
[\[476b.5\]]pa'i mchod rten rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las legs par bzhengs te mchod pa phul na bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob cing*/_sdug bsngal mtha' dag las ring du 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur te/_mya ngan las 'das pa las/_lha dang mi dang 
[\[476b.6\]]'khor rnam pa bzhis rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas te ring bsrel la mchod na bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob cing*/_sems can de dag srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_dam pa'i 
[\[476b.7\]]chos pad+ma dkar po las/_rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa de dag gi_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la sus mchod cing*/_/rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma dag_/gser dang dngul dang 'on te shel gyi'am/_/rdo yi snying po'i mchod rten gang gis byas/_/bai DUr+ya 
[\[477a\]]
[\[477a.1\]]mchog de bzhin an+da rnyil/_/la las mu tig ke ke ru las byas/_/de dag gis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang*/_/gang gis a ga ru dang tsan+dan nam/_/gang gis thang shing mchod rten 
[\[477a.2\]]byas pa dang*/_/la las shing mang gzhan las byas pa dang*/_/sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dga' zhing byas pa dang*/_/de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang*/_/mya ngam dgon pa dag tu byas pa dang*/_/byis pa rtse mor de dang de dag tu/_/
[\[477a.3\]]gang gis rgyal la de phyir mchod rten dag_/bye ma las ni phung po byas pa yang*/_/de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur/_/zhes dang*/_gzhan yang sems can dad pa can gang la las dzam+bu'i gling nas brtsams te shar gyi lus 'phags po dang*/_nub 
[\[477a.4\]]kyi ba lang spyod pa dang*/_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang*/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar dang*/_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_phyogs 
[\[477a.5\]]bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul bar byed pa nas/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra tsam byed du 'jug la/_sku gzugs 
[\[477a.6\]]nas 'bru tsam la sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na/_de bas bsod nams rgyu mtshan dang bcas te/_khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo las gsungs so/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa gso ba dang gsar du brtsigs pas 
[\[477a.7\]]gnas skabs su rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba dang*/_gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ba dang*/_mdzes shing kun gyi mig tu sdug par 'gyur ba dang*/_dbang che bar 'gyur ba dang*/_'khor g.yog rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang*/_g.yog mi byed par 'gyur ba 
[\[477b\]]
[\[477b.1\]]dang*/_longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang*/_'jig rten pa rnams 'khor zhing 'du bar 'gyur ba dang*/_kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang*/_phyogs bcur brjod pa dang*/_sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa yangs par 'gyur ba dang*/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na bsngags par 'gyur ba dang*/_
[\[477b.2\]]phyug cing nor mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang*/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ba dang*/_tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang*/_lus rdo rje ltar mkhregs par 'gyur ba dang*/_lus mtshan bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang*/_mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang*/_mthar 
[\[477b.3\]]thug mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i mdo las/_sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas su/_/zhig pa phyir ni bcos par bya/_/de phyir stobs ni che ba dang*/_/lus che 
[\[477b.4\]]ba dang mi 'jigs 'gyur/_/gang du dad pa skye 'gyur ba'i/_/lam chen bzhi mdo phyogs su ni/_/ring bsrel gyi ni sku byed cing*/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ston pa/_/bsod nams mang po skyed par byed/_/gang zhig lam gyi bzhi mdor ni/_/'jig rten mchod pa'i mchod rten 
[\[477b.5\]]byed/_/de yi grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/phan tshun du ni rtsod pa yi/_/nyan thos bye ba rnams mthong nas/_/gcig la gcig ni bzod gsol te/_/de dag rnams ni mthun byed pa/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis su/_/mi 'jigs dpa' bor 'gyur ba yin/_/sred med bu ltar mkhregs 
[\[477b.6\]]pa yi/_/lus ni mngon par 'grub pa yin/_/zhes dang*/_gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa las/_thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/_/mya ngan yongs med lus kun brtan pa dang*/_/longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/_/dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/_/
[\[477b.7\]]rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/_/chos dang rjes mthun chos la sgrub pa dang*/_/tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/_/'jig rten dag na don kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchod rten sogs la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yi/_/lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba 
[\[478a\]]
[\[478a.1\]]dang*/_/sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/_/bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/_/thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/_/lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing*/_/lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/_/rtag tu skyid cing nor 
[\[478a.2\]]gyis phyug par 'gyur/_/gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mos g.yogs pa yi/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten byas pa yis/_/mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu/_/lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing mdzes par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so/_/bye 
[\[478a.3\]]brag tu gsung gi rten glegs bam bris pa'i phan yon ni/_spyir rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa rdzogs pa nas mthar thug bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar gyi yon tan thams cad rgyud la bskyed par 'dod pas brtsam par bya ba'i snying po ni chos spyod rnam pa bcu'i 
[\[478a.4\]]bdag nyid can gyi bya ba ste/_de ni dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge 'dri ba dang*/_mchod pa dang*/_gzhan dag la sbyin pa dang*/_gzhan klog pa las nyan pa dang*/_bdag nyid klog pa dang*/_len pa dang*/_tshig dang don ma nor bar 'chad pa dang*/_kha ton byed pa dang*/_don sems par byed 
[\[478a.5\]]pa dang*/_tshul bzhin du sgom par byed pa ste/_'di dag la spyod pa ni 'bras bu che bar bstan pa yin te/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las/_yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang*/_/nyan dang klog dang len pa dang*/_/'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang*/_/de sems pa dang bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[478a.6\]]spyod pa 'di bcu'i bdag nyid ni/_/bsod nams phung po dpag tu med/_/ces so/_/de lta bu'i phan yon chen po dang ldan pa'i chos spyod kyi rim pa de la yang thog mtha' bar gsum thams cad du gsung rab dri ma med pa yi ger bris pa'i glegs bam la ma brten par rang dga' tsam 
[\[478a.7\]]gyis 'bad pa la ni snying po med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na yon tan rin po che mtha' dag 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos rnams glegs bam du 'dri ba la sogs pa lhur bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brjod kyis mi ldang ba nyid 'byung na'ang 'dir mdo 
[\[478b\]]
[\[478b.1\]]tsam zhig brjod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/_me tog dang*/_bdug pa dang*/_dri dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_byug pa dang*/_phye 
[\[478b.2\]]ma dang*/_rol mo dang*/_na bza' dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_dril bu dang*/_ba dan dang*/_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang*/_mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya/_bla mar bya/_rjed par bya/_mchod par bya/_ri mor bya/_bsnyen bkur bya ste/_
[\[478b.3\]]kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes sogs yi ge gsal bar bris pa'i glegs bam la mchod pa'i bsod nams dpag tu med par bshad 
[\[478b.4\]]pa dang*/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob pa dang*/_de'i yon tan mang po rgyud la bskyed pa'i thabs kyang glegs bam du yi ger 'dri ba dang gzung ba la sogs pa bsod nams kyi mthu la rag las pa yin te/_de skad du'ang*/_sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 
[\[478b.5\]]las/_mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang*/_/yi ger bris dang gzungs dang bklags pa yi/_/bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni/_/sems can kun gyis shes par yong mi nus/_/de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong*/_/de dag la yang dad pa bsam yas 
[\[478b.6\]]rnyed/_/mdo sde zab mo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur/_/de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/_/bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang*/_/de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang*/_/gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang*/_/sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par 
[\[478b.7\]]yongs mi 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_gzhan yang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/_gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa des/_/nga yi mdun du dge 'dun la/_/mchod pa mang po byas pa yin/_/mos pa snying por gang gyur te/_/gang zhig mdo 'di klog pa'am/_/yi ger 'dri bar byed pa ste/_/de bas 
[\[479a\]]
[\[479a.1\]]bsod nams mang du thob/_/mi 'ga' la las glegs bam la/_/shin tu nges tshig 'drir bcug ste/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis/_/glegs bam de la mchod pa byed/_/spos kyi 'bru mar bkang ba yi/_/mar me rtag tu su 'bul zhing*/_/sna ma ut+pal sil ma 
[\[479a.2\]]dang*/_/tsam pa kas kyang rab tu gtor/_/glegs bam dag la 'di 'dra ba'i/_/mchod pa byed pa'i mi de ni/_/bsod nams mang po rab 'phel te/_/de la tshad kyang yod med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad/_/phyogs bcu dag ni thams cad du/_/rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[479a.3\]]ma yin/_/bsod nams phung po 'di de 'dra/_/zhes dang*/_gang gis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang*/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_gang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang*/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa gang gis chos kyi rnam 
[\[479a.4\]]grangs 'di bzung ngam/_bstan nam/_thos sam/_yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam du byas te bsti stang du byed pa dang*/_btsun par byed pa dang*/_bkur stir byed pa dang*/_mchod pa dang*/_me tog dang*/_bdug pa dang*/_spos dang*/_phreng ba dang*/_
[\[479a.5\]]byug pa dang*/_phye ma dang*/_gos dang*/_gdugs dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba dan dang*/_rol mo'i sgra dang*/_na bza' dang*/_thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang*/_mar gyi mar me'am/_'bru mar gyi mar me'am/_spos mar gyi mar me'am/_tsam pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_sna 
[\[479a.6\]]ma dang*skya snar dang*/_bar sha ka dang*/_na ba ma li ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bsti stang du byed/_btsun par byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed 
[\[479a.7\]]pa de dag gi mtha' ni/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so zhes dang*/_gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs yang dag pa thob par 'dod pas dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la sogs pa la gus par byas pas dbang po drug yongs su dag 
[\[479b\]]
[\[479b.1\]]par 'gyur ba ni/_de nyid nas rigs kyi bu gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_klog pa'am/_ston pa'am/_yi ger 'dri ba yang rung ste rigs kyi bu de mig gi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i 
[\[479b.2\]]yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/de yon tan brgya phrag mang pos dbang po drug gi grong yongs su dag cing*/_
[\[479b.3\]]shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes dang*/_der ma zad sa phyogs gang dag tu yi ge 'dri ba dang klog pa la sogs pa byas pa'i sa phyogs de yang 'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ba ni/_mdo de nyid las/_rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog 
[\[479b.4\]]gam/_ston nam/_rab tu 'chad dam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_sems sam/_'don tam/_kha ton byed dam/_glegs bam du byas pa kun dga'i rwa ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam khyim mam gnas sam shing drung ngam khang pa'am gnas khang ngam phug na 'dug kyang rung ste/_sa phyogs 
[\[479b.5\]]der de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por rig par bya ba dang*/_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[479b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rig par bya ba dang*/_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang*/_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig par bya ba yin 
[\[479b.7\]]pa'i phyir ro zhes dang*/_'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mdo sde mchog 'di gang dag 'dzin pa yi/_/bder gshegs sras po rnams kyi bsngags pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang brjod kyang*/_/de dag gi ni yon tan mtha' yas te/_/ji ltar phyogs rnams su ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/
[\[480a\]]
[\[480a.1\]]gang dag rtag tu mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de dag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das 'di dang*/_/nga dang 'dren pa 'di dag thams cad mthong*/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'di kun dang*/_/'khor bzhi rnams kyang de yis mthong ba yin/_/de 
[\[480a.2\]]yis deng 'dir nga ni mnyes par byas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po mya ngan 'das 'di dang*/_/phyogs bcu rnams na gang dag gzhan bzhugs pa/_/'dren pa de dag thams cad mnyes par byas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/'das dang da ltar ma byon sangs rgyas dang*/_/phyogs bcu 
[\[480a.3\]]dag na gang dag bzhugs pa yang*/_/de kun mthong zhing shin tu mchod par 'gyur/_/mdo sde yang dag chos 'di gang 'dzin pas/_/byang chub snying po rnam par gang dgongs pa/_/skyes mchog rnams kyi gsang chen shes par 'gyur/_/de ni de yang myur du rjes su sems/_/gang zhig mdo sde 
[\[480a.4\]]dam pa 'di 'dzin pa/_/de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/ji ltar rlung ni gang du'ang thogs med bzhin/_/chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang shes/_/'dren pa rnams kyis dgongs te gang gsungs pa/_/mdo sde rnams kyi mtshams sbyar rtag tu shes/_/rnam par 'dren pa 
[\[480a.5\]]mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/mdo sde rnams kyi yang dag don de shes/_/zla ba nyi ma 'dra bar de 'gyur te/_/de ni shin tu snang zhing gsal byed 'gyur/_/de ni sa la rgyu zhing de dang der/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/_/de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gang dag_/'di 'dra 
[\[480a.6\]]ba yi phan yon 'di thos nas/_/mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di zungs shig dang*/_/de dag the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur/_/zhes dang*/_bsod nams mtha' yas par 'phel ba dang*/_lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdang sems la sogs pa'i gnod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang*/_bde legs 
[\[480a.7\]]thams cad 'phel bar byed pa ci rigs pa la'ang dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dri ba dang klog pa la sogs pa las ches mchog tu 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med pa ni/_snying rje pad+ma dkar po las/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba 
[\[480b\]]
[\[480b.1\]]dang*/_klog pa dang*/_gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te/_da yang mdor 
[\[480b.2\]]bsdus te brjod par bya'o/_/gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang*/_gang yang ma 
[\[480b.3\]]'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha 
[\[480b.4\]]dang bcas pa dang*/_bdud dang bcas pa dang*/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang*/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang*/_gnod sbyin dang*/_klu dang*/_dri za dang*/_grul bum dang*/_yi dwags dang*/_sha za dang*/_mi'am ci dang*/_lha ma 
[\[480b.5\]]yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dwang bar bya ba dang*/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang*/_'thab mo dang*/_'thab pa dang*/_rtsod pa dang*/_'gyed pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang*/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang*/_dus ma 
[\[480b.6\]]yin pa'i char pa dang*/_'chi ba dang*/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang*/_mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang*/_bde bar bya ba dang*/_lo legs par bya ba dang*/_nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang*/_skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med cing bde bar bya ba dang*/_
[\[480b.7\]]nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang*/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba bya ba dang*/_ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba dang*/_theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang*/_ting nge 'dzin dang*/_gzungs dang*/_bzod pa 
[\[481a\]]
[\[481a.1\]]thob par bya ba dang*/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang*/_rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang*/_bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang*/_byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 
[\[481a.2\]]bya ba dang*/_'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang*/_'khor mang por bya ba dang*/_mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes dang*/_de bzhin 
[\[481a.3\]]du/_chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po'i mdo las kyang*/_bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang lags pa de yang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang*/_
[\[481a.4\]]'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang*/_gos dang rgyan gyi mchod pa chen po dag gis mchod par bgyid pa dang*/_rgyan gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri ba dang*/_yi ger 'drir stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes dang*/_su 
[\[481a.5\]]zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams ma lus pa rin po che'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ste/_bskal pa las lhag pa'i yun du 'gro ba ma lus pas rang gi grogs su bkug ste mchod pa phul ba bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dam pa'i chos 
[\[481a.6\]]kyi rnam grangs gcig cig glegs bam du bris nas bsti stang du byas pa na des bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du 'phel ba ni/_sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las/_la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas 
[\[481a.7\]]shing mchod byed la/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang+gA yi/_/bye ma snyed kyi bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste/_/yongs su brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na/_/sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_/las gzhan mi byed lha yi 
[\[481b\]]
[\[481b.1\]]me tog spos rab dang*/_/byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la/_/gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba/_/bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs bam la bris te/_/'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed gyur na/_/mchod 
[\[481b.2\]]rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod/_/ces dang*/_de bzhin du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa'i mdo las kyang*/_gang yang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun 
[\[481b.3\]]las byas pas gang bar byas te/_lha'i phreng ba dang*/_byug pa dang*/_me tog dang*/_mar me dang*/_rin po che'i gdugs dang*/_sil snyan dang*/_rgyal mtshan dang*/_ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjed cing mchod pa bas/_gang chos kyi 
[\[481b.4\]]rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang*/_klog pa dang*/_mchod pa dang*/_'dri ba dang*/_'drir 'jug pa dang*/_gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag 
[\[481b.5\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'jog cing*/_bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjed cing mchod pa bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang*/_'chang ba 
[\[481b.6\]]dang*/_'dri ba dang*/_'drir bcug pa dang*/_gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo zhes gsungs shing*/_khyad par su zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams na gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can ma lus pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa'i byang chub tu bkod 
[\[481b.7\]]pa las kyang theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sems can mchog la de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum du gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam byin pa'i bsod nams ches khyad par du 'phags te/_mdo sdud pa las/_la las gang+gA'i klung gi ji snyed zhing rnams na/_/sems can ji snyed 'khod kun 
[\[482a\]]
[\[482a.1\]]dgra bcom nyid btul bas/_/gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te/_/sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so/_/des na dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs re re yang yi ger 'dri ba 
[\[482a.2\]]dang*/_'dzin pa dang*/_'chang ba dang*/_nyan pa dang*/_klog pa la sogs pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ltar gsungs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung rab 'byams kyi tshig dang don ma lus pa gtan la 'bebs pa dang*/_shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi nyi ma chen po/_bka' 
[\[482a.3\]]lung rgya chen po rnams nye bar sdud pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed pa dang*/_zab cing brling ba rnams ni rnam par 'grel pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed pa dang*/_'khrugs pa rnams [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]sdebs pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi glegs bam 'di dag_
[\[482a.4\]]nam yang 'dzad pa med pa'i chos sbyin gyi rgyun chen po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i legs byas 'di dag bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i cha dang stong gi char yang bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar du brjod kyang mthar phyin pa med pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ni lta yang ci 
[\[482a.5\]]zhig smos/_de'i rgyu mtshan yang*/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa las/_ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed/_/de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg_/nga rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang 
[\[482a.6\]]chub reg_/ces 'byung ba ltar/_gang dag 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byon pa dang*/_da ltar ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dang*/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byon 
[\[482a.7\]]pa thams cad kyang*/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs su gyur pa'i shes par bya ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs rnam pa lnga po 'di dag la yongs su bslabs pa dang*/_bslab par mi 'gyur ba ni 'ga' yang med do/_/ji ltar bslab par bgyi ba'i gnas de dag 
[\[482b\]]
[\[482b.1\]]la legs par bslabs shing*/_bslabs nas kyang shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad la dbang 'byor pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang*/_'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang*/_'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba thams 
[\[482b.2\]]cad kyang tshul 'di dag la brten nas 'byung dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te de lta na ji ltar byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa de'i che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni ci lta bu zhe na/_de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kho na las/_gzhan blo ldan rgyal ba'i 
[\[482b.3\]]sras chen rnams kyi kyang brjod pa'i yul las yongs su 'das na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu lta ga la zhig_/'on kyang dri ma med pa'i lung don bzhin du gsang ba gsum gyi yon tan gyi khyad par mtshon tsam zhig smos na/_sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo/_gsung mi zad pa 
[\[482b.4\]]rgyan gyi 'khor lo/_thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'o/_/de'i dang po sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la gnyis las/_sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i tshad gzhan sus kyang bzung bar mi nus pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[482b.5\]]nas ring por ma lon te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer wA rA Na sIr drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus shig tu/_shar phyogs logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dgra 'dul nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub 
[\[482b.6\]]sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang*/_sku tshad med cing mtha' yas pa'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su btsal bar 'dod nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du byin gyis brlabs 
[\[482b.7\]]te bltas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyis/_bdag gis de bas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya cher skyed de/_
[\[483a\]]
[\[483a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal bar bya'o snyam nas/_de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas/_steng phyogs kyi logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed brgal te 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo can 
[\[483a.2\]]zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i gnas su phyin te bltas kyang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi mtha' ma mthong nas/_slar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te lan bdun du bskor ba 
[\[483a.3\]]byas te ched du brjod pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las bshad pa lta bu'o/_/sku thams cad pa ni sprul pa mchog nas bzung ste/_gru dang*/_gzings dang*/_zam pa la sogs pa gdul bya gang la gang gis 'dul ba de la de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i skur bstan nas don 
[\[483a.4\]]mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul yang 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to/_/sprul lo/_/sprul bar bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/_sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can mthong ba na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams 
[\[483a.5\]]su ji snyed mchis pa dag tu sprul pa'i gzugs kyis bzhud de sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'o/_/gsung la yang gnyis las/_gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung de drung nas nyan kyang che ba med la/_dpag tshad dang rgyang grags 
[\[483a.6\]]la sogs pa nas nyan kyang chung ngu med pa ste/_de yang maud gal gyi bus nub phyogs bde ba can dang*/_de nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya 'das pa na 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba 'khor dang bcas 
[\[483a.7\]]pa bzhugs pa'i gnas su byon te nyan pas kyang chung du med pa thos pa lta bu'o/_/gsung thams cad pa ni dag pa lha'i skad nas bzung ste klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa 'gro ba so so'i skad du chos ston nus pa ste/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/_sa bla'i lha dang de 
[\[483b\]]
[\[483b.1\]]bzhin bar snang lha/_/de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba/_/de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug_/rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o/_/ngang pa khrung khrung ka la ping ka dang*/_/rma bya ne tso khu byug shang shang te'u/_/ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun/_/ji lta'i skad kyis de 
[\[483b.2\]]ni tshim par byed/_/stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spre'u/_/gzig dang byi la ri dwags glang chen bse/_/rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun/_/ji lta'i skad kyis de ni tshim par byed/_/gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams/_/
[\[483b.3\]]bskul dang chad pas bcad dang phan gdags phyir/_/kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug_/sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na/_/rab bam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma'am/_/dmyal ba dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang*/_/lha mi rnams dang de ni skad kyang mthun/_/
[\[483b.4\]]ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni/_/mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med/_/ces dang*/_'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa las/_sku dang sku yi phrin las dang*/_/gsung gis gang dag brjod pa dang*/_/yid dang yid kyi rnam rtog rnams/_/rgyal ba'i thams 
[\[483b.5\]]cad 'jig rten 'das/_/'jig rten na ni thugs brtse bas/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin/_/sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/zhes gsungs so/_/thugs la yang gnyis las/_thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi 
[\[483b.6\]]khyab pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni rnam pa thams cad du ldog pa mi mnga' ba dang*/_rtog pa mi mnga' ba dang*/_dpyod pa mi mnga' ba dang*/_'gyur ba mi mnga' ba dang*/_tshad mi mnga' ba la sogs pas chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub pas na thugs yongs su 
[\[483b.7\]]dag pa'o/_/des na chos thams cad la yang chags pa dang thogs pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag pa ste/_thugs kyis chos gang la yang mngon par mi sgrub la/_
[\[484a\]]
[\[484a.1\]]chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug go zhes gsungs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyis shes bya mkhyen pa bzhin gzhan sus kyang mi mkhyen pa ste/_maud gal gyi bu 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan 
[\[484a.2\]]pas kyang rang gi ma gang du skyes ma mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa lta bu dang*/_dgra bcom pa gzhan sus kyang khyim bdag dpal skyes la thar pa'i sa bon yod pa ma mkhyen par rab tu 'byung ma nus pa la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal skyes skye ba bdun gyi gong rol 
[\[484a.3\]]du khyir skyes pa na/_phag gis bdas nas mchod rten zhig la bskor ba byas pa'i dge ba'i sa bon yod par mkhyen nas rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba lta bu'o/_/thugs thams cad pa ni ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste/_de yang ji lta ba ni dngos 
[\[484a.4\]]po'i gnas lugs ma bcos pa mkhyen cing mngon du gyur pa yin la/_ji snyed pa mkhyen pa ni/_tsher ma rno ba/_sran ma zlum pa/_pha wang long bu gru bzhir 'ong ba/_rma bya'i mdongs 'dra ba la sogs pa chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rten 'brel ma lus pa thugs 
[\[484a.5\]]su chud pas gang yang ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'o/_/rgyan ni mdzes par byed pa ste/_rang gzhan gnyi ga'i don 'bad med lhun grub tu 'byung bas mdzes pa'o/_/'khor lo ni mdzad pa phrin las kyi 'khor lo ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu 
[\[484a.6\]]med pa'i don la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas/_de rnams kyis kyang khyad par lhag par rtogs te/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang*/_la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang*/_la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang*/_la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du 
[\[484a.7\]]byed/_la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du lung bstan par 'gyur te/_mdor na 'khor ba phal mo che sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang*/_chos la 'bab pa dang*/_dge 'dun la bab par mdzad do/_/de rnams 
[\[484b\]]
[\[484b.1\]]re res kyang chos kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pas srog chags kyi tshogs de snyed cig gis byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa dang*/_de dag gis kyang phyi ma phyi ma'i sems can rnams la chos bstan pa la sogs pa mdor na 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[484b.2\]]pa'i phrin las kyi 'khor lo rgyun chad med pa'i bdag nyid can te/_de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul 'di dag las 'byung ba'i thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i lam srol chen po 'di dag la legs par bslabs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 
[\[484b.3\]]chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen po nyid du nges pa'i phyir/_bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' ni bskal pa mang por brjod kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan ni de ltar lags so/_/gnyis pa de byang chub tu bsngo ba la/_rnam gzhag 
[\[484b.4\]]spyir bshad pa dang*/_so sor bshad pa dang*/_skabs su bab pa'i bsngo ba dngos so/_/dang po la'ang mtshan nyid dang*/_sgra don dang*/_dgos pa ste rnam pa gsum las/_dang po mtshan nyid ni/_zag bcas dang zag med kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du 
[\[484b.5\]]bgyis pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su sgyur ba'i thabs khyad par can du gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_dper na gser gyi dngos po zhig rgyan gyi dam pa nyid du sgyur ba'i bzo mgar gyi las lta bu'o/_/de ltar yang 'grel pa don gsal ba las/_yongs su bsngo ba 
[\[484b.6\]]yid la byed pas ni/_gser mgar gyis rgyan bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu byed do zhes bya ba dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can/_/de yi byed pa mchog yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gnyis pa 
[\[484b.7\]]sgra don ni/_skad rigs rnam pa bzhi las legs par sbyar ba'i skad du/_pa ri Na ta zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_de ni yongs su sgyur ba'am yongs su spel ba la'ang 'jug ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar snang la rang bzhin med par yongs su sgyur bar byed 
[\[485a\]]
[\[485a.1\]]pa'am/_byang chub kyi bar du bar ma dor chud 'dza' bar mi 'gyur ba'i stobs dang ldan pa nyid du spel bar byed ces pa'i tha tshig can te/_de la yongs su bsngo ba zhes sngon gyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis don 'gyur du mdzad pa yin no/_/gsum pa dgos pa ni/_spyir 
[\[485a.2\]]bsod nams byas pa'i dge tshogs thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyas 'debs par byed pa ni/_mu stegs byed kyi gzhung dag la ma grags pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyid kyi khyad par gyi chos te/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa las/_bsod nams 
[\[485a.3\]]byas pa'i tshogs dag ni/_/sems can rnams la yongs bsngo ba/_/bcom ldan khyod kyis gang gsungs pa/_/de gzhan bstan bcos las ma bshad/_/ces so/_/des na ston pa bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po de'i rjes su slob cing*/_rjes su sgrub pa la mi spro ba 
[\[485a.4\]]med pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis/_bsod nams kyi dngos po gang dag bsags pa thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyas 'debs pa la shin tu gus par bya dgos pa yin no/_/gal te na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu zhig na'ang brnyas par mi bya bar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 
[\[485a.5\]]'phang du yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngos na/_nam zhig byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur ba dang*/_bsam gyis mi khyab par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang*/_byang chub kyi rgyur smin pa la sogs pa'i dgos pa dpag tu med pa yod de/_dper na chu'i 
[\[485a.6\]]thigs pa gcig cig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung ba'i rgyun de ni bskal pa'i bar du yang 'dzad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod pa ma yin pa lta bu'o/_/de skad du yang blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las/_ji ltar chu thigs rgya mtsho che nang lhung*/_/rgya mtsho ma zad bar du de mi zad/_/de bzhin 
[\[485a.7\]]byang chub yongs bsngos dge ba yang*/_/byang chub ma thob bar du de mi 'dzad/_/ces dang*/_blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang de dang mthun par 'byung ngo*/_/gzhan yang deng gi legs byas sgrub pa po 'brel pa dang bcas pas byas pa'i dge ba kho nar ma zad/_phyogs tha dad pa dang*/_
[\[485b\]]
[\[485b.1\]]dus tha dad pa dang*/_gang zag tha dad pa dag gis bsags pa'i dge ba thams cad kyang*/_'khor gsum gyi rnam par rtog pas ma bsgribs par yongs su bsngos na chu klung mang po rgya mtshor 'bab pa gzhol ba de bzhin du/_'khor 'das kyi dge ba thams cad kyang byang chub mchog gi 
[\[485b.2\]]rgyur 'gyur ba'i dgos pa yod de/_nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las/_tha dad phyogs nas chu klung mang po dag_/rgya mtsho cher 'bab ro gcig 'gyur ba ltar/_/tha dad phyogs nas dge ba bsags byas pa/_/byang chub bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/gzhan 
[\[485b.3\]]yang dge ba ji lta bu'i stobs dang ldan pa bsags kyang byang chub tu ma bsngos na bar ma dor chud 'dza' bar 'gyur ba ste/_ji skad du/_phal cher don med don yod dang*/_/rnam pa kun du don yod pa/_/zhes gsungs pas/_mos pas spyod pa'i dge ba phal cher don med 'gro ba mang ste/_
[\[485b.4\]]dge ba'i las kyi 'phen pas gnas skabs su bde 'gro'i gnas su 'phangs nas der bde ba cung zad cig myong ba'i skal ba can du gyur nas/_de tsam gyis zad par gyur pa'am/_yongs su zad par ma gyur na'ang bsod nams kyi stobs chung ngur gyur te/_/phyi nas 'bras bu 'byin pa'i 
[\[485b.5\]]mthu dman par 'gyur ba dang*/_yul khyad par can lta bu la khong khro ba skyes pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las re res kyang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ba yod de/_dbu ma 'jug pa las/_spyad dang dngos su yongs su zad pa na/_/phyin chad de las longs spyod 'byung mi 'gyur/_/
[\[485b.6\]]zhes dang*/_lits+tsha bIs zhus pa'i mdo las/_mang po yang nyung ngur rig par bya ste/_kun mkhyen du ma bsngos pa'i phyir ro zhes dang*/_spyod 'jug las kyang*/_bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi/_/sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/_/legs spyad gang yin 
[\[485b.7\]]de kun kyang*/_/khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed/_/ces so/_/des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa ni de lta bu'i rkyen gyis 'jig par mi 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa dpag tu med pa yod do/_/gnyis pa so sor bshad pa la/_gang zhig bsngo bar bya ba bsod 
[\[486a\]]
[\[486a.1\]]nams kyi khyad par/_gang du bsngo ba yul gyi khyad par/_ji ltar bsngo ba lam gyi khyad par te gsum las/_dang po bsngo bar bya ba'i bsod nams ni/_/spyir dge ba'i ming gis btags pa thams cad bsngo bas bsgyur du rung ngam snyam na/_ma yin te/_mngon 
[\[486a.2\]]pa'i gzhung rnams las de bzhin nyid la'ang dge ba zhes gsungs pa yod de/_de ni dgongs pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir/_bsngo bar bya ba'i rgyu ma yin pa dang*/_bsngos kyang 'gyur ba med par gsungs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_chos 
[\[486a.3\]]kyi dbyings la yongs su bsngo ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsngo ba'i rgyur byas na gnod byed mang du yod par gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te de ltar yin na bsngo ba'i rgyur btub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang dag yin snyam na/_bshad par bya ste/_dug gsum med pa'i sems 
[\[486a.4\]]kyis kun nas bslangs pa'i sgo gsum gyi las gang dag bsags pa ste/_rin chen phreng ba las/_ma chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/des bskyed las ni dge ba'o/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/de nyid legs par sbyar ba'i skad du/_ku sa la mU la zhes 'byung ngo*/_/de'ang 
[\[486a.5\]]ku sa la ni dge ba dang*/_mU la ni rtsa ba ste/_don du rnam par smin pa bde ba skyed pas na dge ba ste/_de'ang ji skad du/_dge ba legs par spyad pa ste/_/rnam smin bde ba skyed pa'o/_/zhes so/_/de nyid kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i sgo nas dbye na/_sbyin pa las byung ba'i 
[\[486a.6\]]bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang*/_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang*/_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ste gsum du 'gyur ba las/_deng 'dir skabs su bab pa ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ste/_de'ang 
[\[486a.7\]]sbyin pa'i sgra ni dbul ba 'dor ba'i don te/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbul ba 'dor bar byed pas sbyin pa zhes sam/_yang na 'chi ba dang chos dang srid pa gzhan go bar byed pas sbyin pa ste/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas/_'chi dang chos dang srid pa gzhan/_/sbyin 
[\[486b\]]
[\[486b.1\]]pa'i sgra yis gsal bar byed/_/des na byang chub sems dpa' la/_/sbyin pa'i sgra ni shin tu bstan/_/zhes so/_/de lta bu'i sbyin pa la'ang dbye na/_zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/_/zhes pa ltar rnam pa bzhi las/_'dir sdom brtson 
[\[486b.2\]]skye dgu'i bdag po'i thugs bskyed rgya mtsho lta bu las byung ba'i legs byas kyi phung po 'di ni sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi ga tshang ba'i sgo nas sgrub dgos shing*/_bye brag tu zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa gnyis ni shin tu gtso che ba ste/_dang po ni/_dus su sbyin dang 'gyod pa med pa 
[\[486b.3\]]dang*/_/yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du bsngor mi rung ba med pa dang*/_chos kyi sbyin pa ni gong du lung drangs pa rnams las ji ltar 'byung ba'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de nyid do/_/der yang ma zad sa skyong bstan 
[\[486b.4\]]pa'i sri zhu pa chen po nas dkon mchog mchod pa la sogs pa dus gsum dang rjes su 'brel bar rang nyid kyis bsags pa dang gzhan la bskul ba la sogs pa legs byas kyi tshogs ji snyed mchis pa rnams dang*/_gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gro ba su yang 
[\[486b.5\]]rung ba dang*/_dus nam yang rung ba dang*/_bsod nams gang yang rung ba byas pa thams cad kyang 'dir bsngor rung ba yin te/_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod las/_'gro kun dge ba ji snyed yod pa dang*/_/byas dang byed 'gyur de bzhin byed pa dang*/_/bzang po ji bzhin de 'dra'i 
[\[486b.6\]]sa dag la/_/kun nas kun kyang bzang por red gyur cig_/ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten grangs med pa yod de/_de dag tu ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang las 'das pa 
[\[486b.7\]]gang dag byung ba rnams kyis/_dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang*/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nas dam pa'i chos yongs su zad kyi bar te/_de dag gi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 
[\[487a\]]
[\[487a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bsags pa dang*/_yon tan gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes pa dang*/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang*/_chos de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu lung bstan 
[\[487a.2\]]pa dang*/_rang sangs rgyas dang*/_nyan thos slob pa dang*/_mi slob pa dang*/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rjes su bstan pa rjes su thos pa'i lha dang mi la sogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba zag bcas dang zag med gang dag bskrun pa rnams kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya ba 
[\[487a.3\]]nyid de/_de skad du yang sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las/_'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang*/_/zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang*/_/gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams/_/sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen 
[\[487a.4\]]chos ston pa/_/dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bskyed pa nas/_/rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus/_/de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa/_/pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang*/_/gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang 
[\[487a.5\]]ni nyan thos dang*/_/slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa/_/bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rangs shing*/_/'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo/_/zhes dang*/_phal po che las/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang yod pa'i/_/
[\[487a.6\]]dge ba de dag yang yang bsgrubs pas na/_/'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyi/_/ye shes mkhas pa de dag yongs su bsngo/_/zhes pa ltar te/_mdor na sgo gsum gyis mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ji snyed pa dag ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[487a.7\]]phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i chos so/_/gnyis pa gang du bsngo ba'i yul ni/_dge ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i chen po tshangs pa dang*/_brgya byin dang*/_stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang*/_khams kyi rgyal phran dang*/_'khor 
[\[487b\]]
[\[487b.1\]]dang longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa la sogs pa 'khor ba'i bde 'bras sgrub pa'i ched du bsngo bar bya ba ni ma yin te/_de dag ni dngos sam brgyud nas sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa las ma brgal ba yin la/_dge ba ni gtan gyi 'dun ma bsgrub pa'i phyir bsags pa yin pas 
[\[487b.2\]]so/_/der ma zad rang nyid gcig pu sdug bsngal dang bral ba tsam gyi 'bras bu nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo ba yang ma yin te/_de dag ni rang don zhi ba'i bde ba lhur byed pas/_gzhan don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i gegs su byed pa'i 
[\[487b.3\]]phyir ro/_/de bas na srid pa dang zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'ba' zhig ni bsngo ba'i yul du gyur pa yin no/_/de skad du yang rgyal ba'i yum las/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[487b.4\]]par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa yin no zhes dang*/_mgon po byams pas kyang*/_khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang*/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan yang mang du 'byung ngo*/_/gal te de ltar yin du chug kyang*/_tshe 
[\[487b.5\]]ring ba dang*/_nad med pa dang*/_dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang*/_rigs bzang por skye ba la sogs pa gnas skabs kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i ched du bsngo ba'ang dngos su mthong ba ci zhig ce na/_gnas skabs kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'ba' zhig gi phyir bsngo ba ni dmigs pa dman 
[\[487b.6\]]pa yin pas 'jig rten pa'i bsngo ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir bsngo nyes pa yin la/_mthar thug gi 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir gtso bor dmigs nas/_de nyid mngon du ma gyur bar gyi skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i 
[\[487b.7\]]phyir bsngo ba ni mi 'gal te/_byang chub sgrub pa la'ang 'gal rkyen med pa dang*/_mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa ni lam myur du mthar phyin pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba'i phyir dang*/_brgyud nas gzhan don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gsum pa ji ltar bsngo 
[\[488a\]]
[\[488a.1\]]ba lam la gnyis las/_dang po mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong bar bstan pa ni/_gal te bsod nams byas pa bsngo ba la gus pa lhur byed na'ang 'khor gsum du dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis ma zin pa'i bsngo ba ni yongs su bsngo bar mi chud de/_
[\[488a.2\]]dper na skyes bu gang la la zhig gis lus zung brtas pa'i ched du kha zas ro bzang po dang ldan pa g.yos na'ang*/_dug dang sbrags te zos pas phan par mi 'gyur ba kho nar ma zad lus 'jig pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'dod pas kun nas 
[\[488a.3\]]bslangs te bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus byas nas bsngo ba na 'khor gsum du mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'du shes can gyis bsngo ba byas na de ni dmigs pa dug dang bcas pa'i bsngo bar 'gyur te/_brgyad stong pa las/_dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo 
[\[488a.4\]]ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'o zhes dang*/_sdud pa las kyang*/_gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin/_/ci ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin/_/ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba/_/dkar po'i chos la dmigs 
[\[488a.5\]]pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs/_/zhes so/_/gzhan yang de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang yin te/_mgon po byams pas/_'khor gsum rnam par rtog pa gang*/_/de ni shes bya'i sgrib par 'dod/_/ces so/_/des na dmigs pa'i zug rngu 
[\[488a.6\]]can gyi bsngo ba ni spong bar bya ba nyid du bstan to/_/gnyis pa mthun pa'i phyogs sgrub par bstan pa ni/_thabs dang shes rab kyis zin pa'i bsngo bas yongs su bsngos na bzang po bzhi dang ldan pa'i bsngo bar yang 'gyur te/_dmigs pa bzang dang ston pa bzang*/_/thabs 
[\[488a.7\]]bzang ba dang nges 'byung dang*/_/spyod pa bzang po'i bdag nyid kyis/_/yang dag smon lam yin par bshad/_/ces pa ltar ro/_/de las thabs ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsis zin pa ste/_ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can 
[\[488b\]]
[\[488b.1\]]thams cad dang thun mong du byas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang rin po che myur du thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo snyam pa'i 'dun pa dang ma bral ba ste/_spyod 'jug las/_dngos sam yang na brgyud kyang rung*/_/sems can don las gzhan mi spyad/_/
[\[488b.2\]]sems can kho na'i don gyi phyir/_/thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/de lta bu'i byang chub sems kyi stobs kyis yongs su zin pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu ni nam yang zad pa med cing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dge ba gzhan thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa dpag bsam 
[\[488b.3\]]gyi shing gi dpes bstan te/_ji skad du/_dge ba gzhan kun chu shing bzhin du ni/_/'bras bu spyad pas zad par 'gyur ba nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi ljon shing rtag par yang*/_/'bras bu 'byin pas mi zad 'phel bar byed/_/ces dang*/_sems can tshad med pa la dmigs 
[\[488b.4\]]pas bsod nams kyang tshad med pa 'byung ste/_rin chen phreng ba las/_sems can khams ni tshad med la/_/phan 'dod de ni de 'dra'o/_/zhes so/_/cig shos shes rab ni chos thams cad lta ba bdag med pas zin pa ste/_de'ang don dam par chos thams cad kyi rang 
[\[488b.5\]]bzhin spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral bar shes nas/_'dir dngos po dang bsam pa dang yul te/_'khor gsum po yongs su dag pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can te/_sdud pa las/_gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang*/_/gang du yongs 
[\[488b.6\]]su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang*/_/chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na/_/de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin/_/zhes dang*/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_de ni dmigs med rnam pa can/_/phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do/_/zhes so/_/tha snyad kun 
[\[488b.7\]]rdzob tu sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i sprul pa ltar snang yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa nyid du bsngo ba ste/_mdo ting nge 'dzin rgyal po las/_sgyu ma byed pa dag gis gzugs sprul te/_/rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas/_/de la ji bzhin snang ba gang yang med/_/chos rnams thams 
[\[489a\]]
[\[489a.1\]]cad de 'drar shes par gyis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i tshul gyis bsngo ba'ang*/_spyod 'jug las/_sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag_/kun tu thogs med gzigs pa ldan/_/de dag kun gyi spyan snga na/_/bdag ni rtag par gnas so zhes/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[489a.2\]]pa ltar phyogs bcu rab 'byams mur thug pa med pa'i zhing khams rnams su bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das sras dang slob mar bcas pa thams cad dpang por bzhugs nas ji ltar bsngos pa de ltar du 'grub par byin gyis rlobs par mos nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad bla na med 
[\[489a.3\]]pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo ba ni ji ltar bsngo ba'i tshul du bshad pa lags so/_/gsum pa de byang chub tu bsngo ba ni/_de'ang ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang kun tu bzang po la sogs pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i rjes su slob 
[\[489a.4\]]cing rjes su sgrub pa'i 'dun pa dang bcas te/_gzhal du med pa'i legs byas kyi phung po 'di nyid sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur yongs su bsngo ste/_de'ang mdo sde dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las/_sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la bstod pa/_/gsal 
[\[489a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba'i snyan dngags 'bad par bya/_/zhes dang*/_dam pa'i chos shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i snyan dngags bya'o/_/de las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis de rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[489a.6\]]lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu'ang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ltar 'dir ji ltar bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'ang 'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po dpal ldan dbyug pa can gyi gzhung gi rjes su 'brangs nas/_rgyan gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i khongs las nye bar 
[\[489a.7\]]drangs te cung zad cig brjod pa ni/_'di lta ste/_oM swasti sid+d+ho b+ha wa tu/[ (*]rang bzhin brjod pa las yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]gang gi rang bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig las rnam grol 'dus ma byas/_/lhun grub zhi ba chen po'i sku ni spros mthar nam yang gnas pa min/_/'gro ba thams cad rang gi 
[\[489b\]]
[\[489b.1\]]go 'phang 'khrid pa'i thabs mkhyen thugs rje che/_/bsam gyis mi khyab nus pa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi/_1_/rnyog bral [(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]ye shes dam pa las gzhan sgra rtog yul las ring du 'das/_/gnyis su bgyi dang kun du rtog pa'i sgrib pa kun gyis ma bsgribs pa/_/de nyid 
[\[489b.2\]]thob byed mthong dang bsgom lam rmongs pa za ba'i gsus po che/_/shes bya'i gnas lugs yang dag snang byed dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi/_2_/ring [(*] cha shas kyi gzugs can/[) ]mo'i dus nas legs sbyangs blo gros snang ba'i gter gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas/_/zab yangs chos tshul yid 
[\[489b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rkang pa bkod pa'i gnas su chags thogs bral/_/phrin las 'od rlabs gzhal du med pas lung rtogs chos kyi 'dab stong tshal/_/rgya cher 'byed pa'i rtsa lag rmad byung 'phags pa'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi/_3_/'gro [(*]gzugs can gyi gzugs can/[) ]la phan pa'i blo gros 'brug sgra'i gar gyi 
[\[489b.4\]]glu dbyangs len pa mos/_/dge tshogs byang chub smin pa'i yon tan sprin gyi mdza' bo la chags nas/_/legs byas spu sdug mtha' dag bsdebs pa'i sna tshogs gos kyis legs par brgyan/_/'bras bu yid 'ong 'gugs pa'i smon lam 'phrin yig snyan pa'i 
[\[489b.5\]]rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'khrol/_4_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]bzod par ldan pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'di yi gdul bya rigs can gsum/_/tha dad blo dang 'tsham par theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo legs bskor bas/_/mngon mtho nges par legs pa'i phan pa ci yang 'byung gnas bla na med/_/bstan pa 'di yi 
[\[489b.6\]]byed por gyur pa ston mchog dam pa shAkya'i gtso/_5_/[(*]rkang pa gsum gyi thog mar yod pa'i zung ldan/[) ]de nyid kyis mtshon phyogs bcu dag tu lha yi rdzing ring rab song ba/_/de dag rnams su khyab par brdal bar phra rab rdul gyi go sar yang*/_/bgrang ba las 'das zhing gi bkod pa tshar du dngar bas gtams gyur pa/_/
[\[489b.7\]]de dag kun du byon dang 'byon 'gyur 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_6_/[(*]ngag don kyi dpe las bzhin sgra gcig pa can/[) ]ston mchog de dag re re la yang gdung 'tshob 'gyur ba rgyal ba'i sras/_/slob mar gyur pa'i 'phags pa dang bcas 'khor tshogs bye ba khrag 
[\[490a\]]
[\[490a.1\]]khrig gis/_/mdun nas legs par bdar ba'i ngo mtshar rgyu skar tshogs kyi do shal can/_/kun du phan pa gzhon nus brgyan bzhin mdzes par gyur pa gang dag yod/_7_/'di [(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]na bsod nams myu gu gzhon nus phyogs rab dkrigs pa dbyar gyi dpal/_/gnas 
[\[490a.2\]]skabs mthar thug snying po gang yin ston du nye bar bsu ba'i tshe/_/gang bsam don gyi snye ma kun nas smin byed dus kyi rgyal mo yis/_/bsngo bya smon pa'i dngos po thams cad snyan dngags dam pa'i rgyang glu len/_8_/[(*]rab tu spel ba/[) ]'on te skye ba'i 'khri shing gar ma'i lag pa 
[\[490a.3\]]bzhin du bsgyur ba'i tshe/_/g.yo sgyu'i gtam dang kyal ba la sogs 'phyon 'drid spangs pa yang mi dran/_/drang srong ngag gi mtshon cha rnon por ldan pa'i skye ba nyid kyang min/_/rig sngags grub pa'i gtsug tor yang min de srid thams cad gzhan gyi dbang*/_9_/[(*]spang gnas med pa'i byed rgyu/[) ]de slad du ni 
[\[490a.4\]]bgrang las 'das pa'i skye bar skyon rnams bskams byas pas/_/yon tan mtha' dag lhun grub rang bzhin dbugs kyi rgyu ba'i rgyun rer yang*/_/gzhan don nyid du mi 'gyur 'ga' yang med pa'i dbang bcu ldan pa rnams/_/de ring bdag cag ji ltar smon pa snying po 
[\[490a.5\]]kun gyis lci bar mdzod/_10_/[(*]rab rtog bzhin sgra can/[) ]phyag gi 'os gyur de dag so so'i spyan snga ru/_/grangs med sprul pa'i smra ba mkhas pa dang 'grogs te/_/yon tan phung po gtam du gleng ba'i khur lci bas/_/yan lag lnga yang dub pas sa la ngal bso bzhin/_11_/[(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]rang sems sgyu ma'i rgyal po 'dis ni skad cig rer/[) ]/
[\[490a.6\]]bskal pa kun gyi nyer spyad nyid du rtag 'jo ba'i/_/gya nom me tog bdug pa la sogs lha mi'i dpal/_/snang stong mchod pa'i ltad mo ci yang ngom la dga'/_12_/[(*]rigs mthun ldog pa can/[) ]zho 'thung rus pa'i spyad kyis brdar yang nyams pa med/_/pak+Shu'i 
[\[490a.7\]]rgyun gtsang phab pas kyang ni dag min pa'i/_/rang bzhin bcas par bgos pa'i dri ma nag po yis/_/thar pa sgrib par byed de stobs bzhi'i cho gas sbyang*/_13_/[(*]rmad du byung ba'i dpe/[) ]zla gzhon yid 'ong zer gyi thigs pa 'dzag pa 'dis/_/'khor ba mya ngan las 'das 
[\[490b\]]
[\[490b.1\]]dge ba dkar po yang*/_/ches dkar byed pa'i nus pa yod na da lta bdag_/dge la yi rangs bsgoms pa'i rjes su cis mi 'gro/_14_/[(*]'os shing mi 'os pa'i don gzhan bkod pa/[) ]yon tan ma rdzogs de srid dben pa la dga' mod/_/mi mchog bdud rtsi'i gtam la spro med rigs pa min/_/gong bur 'thums pa'i chu skyes sgra med yur 
[\[490b.2\]]ba'i las/_/'dab stong yongs su grol bas mi 'os pa min nam/_15_/[(*]gzhan gyi dbang gis 'gog pa/[) ]zab zhi bde dbyings spros pa brtul la dgyes pa rnams/_/rgyal ba'i sras chen 'gro la snying rjes sems 'khrugs nas/_/dus drug rgyal ba'i thugs rjes bskul ba thams cad 
[\[490b.3\]]la/_/gros su dris dang bdag kyang de dang mthun par smra/_16_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]de lta'i zhing bsam sbyor ba dag pa'i myos bum las/_/dge ba'i zil mngar mu tig mdangs 'tsher rab 'thungs pas/_/yon tan mi zad mchog gi lang tsho dar ba'i 'dzum/_/chos kyi 'od 
[\[490b.4\]]rlabs bye ba phrag mang gsal gyur cig_17_/'di [(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]na ring mo'i dus na rgyal ba'i bstan pa la/_/phan pa'i smon lam snyan dngags dam pa'i skud pa yis/_/lan brgyar btsems pa dus 'dir sdom brtson rgyal po yi/_/brtul zhugs la brten dam pa'i tshul 
[\[490b.5\]]la spro ba can/_18_/gang de je [(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]mtho'i rigs kyi ma la ya yi nags/_/skye ba dam pa'i dpal gyi dum bur 'khrungs gyur pa/_/gang tshe mched zlar gyur pa'i sA la zung dang bcas/_/byang chub spyod par yang dag zhugs pa'i dga' ston du/_19_/[(*]bya ba brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[) ]drang srong chen 
[\[490b.6\]]po'i bka' lung yongs kyi rnam par 'grel/_/'jig rten khams su ring por brtan pa'i cho ga ru/_/mi zad chos kyi gtong ba rtag tu 'byung ba'i dpyid/_/par zhes bya ba'i yi ge rab tu gsal ba bskrun/_20_/tshul [(*]yon tan brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[) ]'di thog mar mngon 
[\[490b.7\]]par brtsams pa'i g.yar dam bcas/_/bar du snying stobs zhum pa med par gtong ba rtsom/_/tha mar legs par pha rol phyin la dgyes pa'i 'dzum/_/brgya phrag grol ba las byung dge ba dkar po dang*/_21_/[(*]stong ba mtshungs pa'i rab spel/[) ]de yi drin gyis srid pa 
[\[491a\]]
[\[491a.1\]]gsum gyi khongs dag tu/_/bsod nams gom pa bgrang du med pa gang dag bkod/_/dus gzhan du yang sdig pa'i snying la 'bigs snyam can/_/bde ba'i 'byung gnas zla 'od 'dra ba bsags pa dang*/_22_/mi [(*]dngos po'i dpe/[) ]bdag 'khor lo rin chen gang du bgrod pa 
[\[491a.2\]]der/_/dpung gi tshogs kyang de na mngon phyogs rgyu ba bzhin/_/deng 'dir sa bdag chen pos dge ba brtsams rjes su/_/dngos dang brgyud pa'i grogs ldan gang dag yod pa dang*/_23_/legs [(*]yongs su brjes pa/[) ]byas gang las 'phos par gyur pa'i yi ge'i 'dzum/_/phyogs kyi dkyil 
[\[491a.3\]]'khor mdzes pa'i rgyan du legs byin pas/_/de dag kun nas dam pa'i chos phyir dmigs pa'i rdzas/_/gang dag legs bstabs 'gro ba rnams kyi dge bas mtshon/_24_/phyogs [(*]yon tan brjod pa tha ma'i gsal byed/[) ]bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang slob mar bcas/_/dang por theg pa 
[\[491a.4\]]gang dang gang du zhugs pa nas/_/de de'i byang chub snye ma nyid du rab song ba/_/phrin las 'gro ba'i dpal du gnas gyur dge ba dkar/_25_/de [(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]bzhin so so skye bor gtogs pa gang dag gis/_/kun gzhi'i zhing la bcas dang rang bzhin rnam par dkar/_/sa 
[\[491a.5\]]bon ma rmas gang dag btab pa yi rang gi/_/'dzum rlabs mu tig mdangs su gsal bas mdun bsu'o/_26_/e [(*]spangs nas med pa'i byed rgyu/[) ]ma yongs bsngo mkhas pa rnams kyi blo gros la/_/mtshan mar dmigs pa'i zug rngu gzhar yang yod ma yin/_/de phyir dam pa rnams kyi rnam 
[\[491a.6\]]par byang ba yi/_/yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul du 'phel/_27_/[(*]'di nas brtsams shis pa brjod pa'i rgyan te ma bsdus pa'i gzugs kyis spyir shes pa brjod pa ni/[) ]de bzhin 'dir yang sman 'dod sems kyi rgyal po dang*/_/mnyam 'grogs dmigs pas stong pa'i shes rab 'khor lo yis/_/bsod nams tshogs kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin 
[\[491a.7\]]'gro bas/_/byang chub mchog tu sgyu ma'i rol pas 'jug gyur cig_28_/tshul chen [(*]gzhi gcig gis las 'gal ba'i shis brjod/[) ]gang gis dge ba bzang por rlom pa yi/_/mtshan mas byang chub reg par bgyi ba med na yang*/_/de mthus 
[\[491b\]]
[\[491b.1\]]'gro ba thams cad mi gnas mya ngan las/_/'das pa'i go 'phang ster ba'i bden pas srung gyur cig_29_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]de 'dra'i go 'phang bla nas bla mar byar med pa'i/_/yon tan gzhal du med pa'i khang pa nyams dga' bar/_/bde bar 'dod pa sna tshogs theg pa'i rim pa can/_/thub 
[\[491b.2\]]dbang bstan pa skye dgu'i bla na brtan gyur cig_30_/[(*]dga' ba'i 'gyur ba sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/[) ]bka' don zab dang rgya che'i dgongs pa ma lon par/_/phal cher ma rtogs log rtogs 'phyang mo nyug gi g.yang*/_/'phyan pa gang tshe yang dag nyid du rnam bkod pa'i/_/'chos skyob dam pa'i 
[\[491b.3\]]chos 'di 'gro bas 'ji ltar thob/_31_/[(*]khyad par bcas pa'i gzugs can/[) ]da ko legs par thob pa mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/bshad dang sgrub pa'i gos mchog rnam par brtsegs pa'i rtser/_/yang dag bkod pa sa gsum dge ba'i rgyal mtshan du/_/gzi byin rab tu 'bar bar 
[\[491b.4\]]rtag tu rgyal gyur cig_32_/[(*]cha shas can gyi gzugs can/[) ]lugs mchog de dag ma nor thugs kyi dpal be'u ru/[) ]/yongs su bzung nas legs par 'doms la zla med pa'i/_/gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab spobs pa'i gter/_/sa skya pa ste khams gsum chos kyi sgron 
[\[491b.5\]]ma che/_33_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]gang de'i lung rtogs chos kyi rgyal srid mthon po nas/_/phrin las dam pa'i gser sbyangs 'khor lo ring song ba/_/thub pa'i rgyal tshab yongs kyi rgyal po e waM pa'i/_/lugs mchog srid pa gsum gyi khongs su gsal gyur cig_34_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sgras zin pa'i dpe/[) ]de sogs gangs ldan 
[\[491b.6\]]ri bo'i do shal gyis mdzes pa'i/_/ljongs su rgyal ba'i ring lugs yang dag smra ba'i mchog_/mang pos byi dor legs byas phrin las gang dag yod/_/char ldan dus kyi chu yi gter la 'gran gyur cig_35_/so [(*] mtha' dag gi gzugs can/[) ]so thar pa'i bslab gzhi'i 
[\[491b.7\]]rtsa ba shin tu brling*/_/rgyal sras spyod pa'i yul 'dab khor yug yangs par brkyang*/_/gsang chen gdams pa'i 'bras bu g.yur du za gyur pa'i/_/yongs 'dzin 'dod dgu'i ljon pa thams cad brtan gyur cig_36_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]tshig don gzung bde rtogs par sla dang zab 
[\[492a\]]
[\[492a.1\]]rgya che/_/skabs su gang babs gzhung gi dgos pa bsdus pa'i don/_/sgra don mtshams su sbyor dang brgal lan bcas pa yis/_/legs par 'doms pas sa stengs thams cad mdzes gyur cig_37_/[(*]rig byed gzhung gi lo rgyus las drangs pa'i mtha' dag gzugs can/[) ]gzhal bar bya ba pha rol phyin dka'i sa chen gsum/_/'jal byed 
[\[492a.2\]]tshad ma'i gom pa gsum gyis gnon byed pa'i/_/rigs lung 'doms pa'i blo gros pad dkar mig can gyis/_/log par smra ba'i bcud bral rkang 'og 'ching gyur cig_38_/nyams [(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]'gyur ro ldan sgra don rgyan gyi nags khrod nas/_/gtsug 
[\[492a.3\]]lag rab 'byams bcad lhug spel ma'i legs bshad kyi/_/glu ru 'jo bas mang thos sems kyi ri dwags kyang*/_/dka' ba med 'dzin smra mchog bye bas mdzes gyur cig_39_/[(*]dpe las dpe can lhag pa'i ldog pa can/[) ]gur gum rgyas pa'i nags stug bung ba'i sgra snyan can/_/tshul khrims dag pa'i dri 
[\[492a.4\]]yis rnam dben klog 'don gyi/_/sgra dbyangs rdzogs pa min no yon tan de dag gis/_/ring por 'phags pa 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gtams gyur cig_40_/[(*]skyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu/[) ]de mthus ljongs kyi thig le 'dis mtshon 'jig rten khams/_/dkar po'i phyogs su 'dzum
