[\[492a.5\]]brgya grol ba'i yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams/_/dus su yid 'ong chu 'dzin stug po nyid du bres/_/char zim ut+pa la yi 'dab 'dra 'bebs pa dang*/_41_/[(*]rmad du byung ba'i nyams ldan/[) ]ljon shing lo 'dab stug por rgyas pa'i gur khyim 'bub/_/rtsa ljang lo mas ser bu 'jo ba'i rlung yab g.yob/_/res 'ga' 
[\[492a.6\]]chu gtsang zil pa sbreng ba'i 'thor yab byed/_/me tog gad mor dgod pa bcas pas mdzes gyur cig_42_/[(*]phyi shes par byed pa/[) ]rma med chu bas btung ba lan mang 'thungs pa'i ros/_/sdong lcug lo 'dab stug por 'khrungs pa'i rtse mo nas/_/dus su lang tsho dar la bab gyur 'bras bu'i 
[\[492a.7\]]tshogs//_legs par yongs su dud pa'i khur gyis lci gyur cig_43_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]gdengs ka rab tu g.yo bas mdzes pa'i ltos 'phye rnams/_/rangs pa'i rnam 'gyur dus su nyal 'gro'i bu mo dag_/chab sgra snyan pa'i gling bu bsgyur bas ri klung dang*/_/nags tshal mdzes pa'i 
[\[492b\]]
[\[492b.1\]]gar stabs bsgyur ba spel gyur cig_44_/[(*]nang shes par byed pa/[) ]gang tshe mthong ba'i chos kyi bde la rab sred pa'i/_/'gro 'di ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i longs spyod phyir/_/lus sems mnar gyis dogs pa'i rgya las grol ba'i khas/_/snyan pa'i glu len gar gyi rtse 'jor rol gyur cig_45_/[(*]skabs ma yin par bstod pa/[) ]ma la snyigs 
[\[492b.2\]]ma'i rang stobs shin tu bdo gyur pa'i/_/rku dang 'phrog dang tshong 'phrul 'khor ba'i so nam sogs/_/blo mang rjes su mi rgyug nags kyi ri dwags rnams/_/rtsa dang myu gus 'tsho la 'tshe bar ma gyur cig_46_/[(*]snying rje'i nyams ldan/[) ]ring nas lan grangs bsten pa'i nyer 'tshos bor ba'i 
[\[492b.3\]]lus/_/ring por gyur pa 'dod pa gom pa'i stabs 'khyor zhing*/_/bza' dang bca' ba'i yi ge rnam 'khrugs bzlas brjod la/_/brtson pa'i dus de ming gi lhag ma nyid gyur cig_47_/[(*]chos kyi dpe/[) ]tsha dang grang ba 'dus pa las gyur mi bzad pa'i/_/zug rngu drag po ral gri'i lce 
[\[492b.4\]]bzhin rkyong ba yis/_/bde ba'i 'tsho ba dus ma yin par bza' phyir du/_/rnam par glal ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad med gyur cig_48_/[(*]'jigs rung gi nyams ldan/[) ]khrag dmar rlangs pa'i na bun 'phyur ba klad pa'i snod/_/btung bas cher myos mig gis gzhan srog la blta bas/_/phyogs phyogs 
[\[492b.5\]]rgyug pa'i srin po 'byung po yi dwags rnams/_/byams pa'i sems kyis 'gro la mnyes gshin gnas gyur cig_49_/[(*]drag shul gyi nyams ldan/[) ]khrag gis g.yos pa'i mig bsgyur smin ma rab gcus nas/_/rno mtshon mi bzad 'phen zhing 'debs pa'i tsheg sgra dang*/_/sod rgyob nga ro 
[\[492b.6\]]drag pos gnam sa'i dkyil 'khor yang*/_/dog mor bgyid pa'i 'khrug rtsod thams cad zhi gyur cig_50_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi rab rtog[) ]'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten yang dag lta la gzhol/_/rang dbang dpal gyis chog shes 'thung la rab dga' bas/_/mdza' gcugs byams pa'i

[\[493a.1\]]nas rgyas pa'i gad mo rdza rnga yi/_/dbyangs su rtag par 'byin pas 'jig rten mdzes gyur cig_52_/[(*]'di nas brtsams te bye brag tu shis pa brjod cing bsngo ba yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]khyad par 'phags pa'i yul 'khrungs mkhas pa'i mchog rnams kyis/_/legs par bshad pa 'di na mi bdag bsod nams stobs/_/gang dag thob pa rgyas par

[\[493b.1\]]dang rtogs pa'i yon tan rin chen mi zad gter/_/ring por mi thogs thob pa'i skal ba sbom gyur cig_59_/9[*]'byung min gyi dpe/[) ]lus can spyi yis legs byas phung po gang dag bsags/_/thams cad khyab 'jug lte ba las skyes mes po des/_/'di na gcig tu spungs pa lta bu'i

[\[494a.1\]]'byung gnas dpal gyi rim par spyod gyur cig_66_/sa [(*]bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyar ba/[) ]'dzin bye ba'i bla na thogs pa med rgyu zhing*/_/gzi brjid 'bar bas blang dor 'byed pa'i sdom brtson gyi/_/bka' khrims 'da' dka' nyid dang nyi ma'i 'od kyis kyang*/_/'gro khams

[\[494b.1\]]sde bzhi'i dpal 'byor rtag tu 'dzin/_/des ni dge legs grags pa brtan par byed gyur cig_73_/[(*]rab spel/[) ]rnam dkar las bzang 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer bzhin/_/mngon par 'degs la blo gros ri yi rgyal po'i stobs/_/mi dman lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu brling

[\[495a\]]
[\[495a.1\]]dga'/_/gzhan don la 'jug rang don re ba chad gyur pa'i/_/theg pa de las blo gros g.yo bar ma gyur cig_80_/slong [(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]ba dbugs su 'byin pa'i gtam gyis sngun bsu bas/_/'dod ster dpung pa'i mchel pa rab tu brkyangs pa las/_/re ba'i snyim pa kun nas 
[\[495a.2\]]gdangs pa de dang des/_/bde bar 'gengs pa'i gtong phod mtha' ru phyin gyur cig_81_/rnyog [(*]sems med kyi rab rtog[) ]pa kun gyis bslad pa med pa'i bsil ba gsum/_/'khor ba'i gdung ba rab tu 'phrog la mngon phyogs tshe/_/dpal gyi dum bu rang gi rin thang nyams dogs 
[\[495a.3\]]kyis/_/ma la ya yi nags 'dabs bros snyam byed gyur cig_82_/[(*]nang shes par byed pa'i rgyu/[) ]gshe dang brdeg dang mtshang 'dru'i skye bo brgya stong gis/_/nye bar gtse la bzod pa'i ngang tshul mi bskyud par/_/yid 'ong 'dzum pa'i 'od rlabs dkar po rab g.yo bas/_/rings par bsu zhing 
[\[495a.4\]]phan par smra la spro gyur cig_83_/[(*]the tshom phul byung*/[)]dge dang go cha sems can don sbyor rtun pa yis/_/bskal pa mang po'i tshogs gnyis pha rol 'gongs pa la/_/nyin mtshan 'khor lo'i go skabs yod dam ma yin zhes/_/'phyang mo nyug la 'gro ba'i blo gros mchongs 
[\[495a.5\]]gyur cig_84_/mtshan [(*]snga na med pa'i gzugs can/[) ]rtog sgrib pa'i durbA roHdang mi ldan zhing*/_/'og 'gyu kun rtog rgyun gyi bgrod pa yang med par/_/dga' ba gya nom yon tan mi zad rin chen gyi/_/'byung gnas zab gsal gnyis su med de 'phel gyur cig_85_/[(*]yon tan ma tshang ba'i khyad par brjod pa/[) ]bden pa zung gi chos 
[\[495a.6\]]don rnam par dpyod pa'i blo/_/rtsub mo'i dbal dang mkhregs pa'i bems chos mi ldan yang*/_/sgrib gnyis gcod la rno ba rab kyi rtser phyin pas/_/srid pa gsum po skad cig hrul por byed gyur cig_86_/[(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]nam mkha'i mtha' dang 
[\[495a.7\]]mnyam par 'byams pa'i sems can la/_/dmigs pa med pa'i tshad med sgyu ma'i rtse 'jo bzhi'i/_/sna tshogs thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa ci dang cis/_/nam yang mi gtong phrin las mtha' ru phyin gyur cig_87_/[(*]dgag pa'i dpe/[) ]mngon par shes sogs yon 
[\[495b\]]
[\[495b.1\]]tan du mas dben pa'i phyir/_/bai DUr+ya mchog tog gi blo gros grags pas kyang*/_/mtshungs par dka' ba smon pa'i lam gyi mthu bo ches/_/ji ltar 'dod pa lhun gyis grub pa nyid gyur cig_88_/[(*]rkang pa bzhi pa'i dbus na yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[) ]bsam sogs stobs kyi rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni cher g.yo bas/_/_sangs rgyas 
[\[495b.2\]]zhing khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa dang*/_/sems can khams kyi rgya mtsho yongs su smin byas te/_/thub dbang yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad mthong gyur cig_89_/stobs mtshungs pa'i rab spel/[) ]so so yang dag rig pa'i chos mig grungs po mas/_/ji snyed ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[495b.3\]]ltad mo mtshar mthong nas/_/phyogs bcu rnams su mu med 'od gtong don yang byed/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dbang bskur thob gyur cig_90_/[(*]bya ba ma tshang ba'i khyad par brjod pa/[) ]mi sdug nyams kyi 'gyur ba gcig cig bstan pa med/_/smin ma yon pos lta ba tsam yang ma byas par/_/
[\[495b.4\]]zhi 'dzum brtan pa'i rang bzhin yid 'ong mthong tsam gyis/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan sde dang bcas las rgyal gyur cig_91_/[(*]khyad par 'phags pa'i phul byung*/[) ]e ma stong gsum bye ba phrag brgya'i 'jig rten gyi/_/dga' ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ni cig car spungs pas kyang*/_/mi mchog gang gi 
[\[495b.5\]]mtshan tsam thos pa'i brgya stong cha/_/mtshon du med de nyid du ni thob gyur cig_92_/[(*]rig byed gzhung gi lo rgyus dang sbyar ba'i mtha' dag gzugs can/[) ]sku gsum rin chen gzhal du med pa'i khang pa ru/_/mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yongs su grub pa'i gzugs/_/ci yang 'phos pa de yi rang bzhin dpyod bzod pa/_/kun 
[\[495b.6\]]mkhyen ye shes any+dza na yi bu tsam mo/_93_/[(*]rkang pa bzhi gang yod pa chod pa'i zung ldan/[) ]bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan phung po thob nas ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing du bkod pa grangs med kyis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi 'khor lo legs bskor nas/_/bsam gyi mi 
[\[495b.7\]]khyab 'gro ba 'tshang rgyar dgod gyur cig_94_/[(*]ngag don gyi dpe las bzhin sgra gcig pa can/[) ]de nas kyang ni 'khor ba srid du rnam par 'phrul/_/sna tshogs zlos pa'i phrin las rgyun mi chad ston pa/_/che ba chu yi gter nas chung ngu zil pa'i gur/_/de snyed zla ba'i gzugs kyis 
[\[496a\]]
[\[496a.1\]]mtshon bzhin rtsen gyur cig_95_/[(*]chos can 'gog pa/[) ]de skad smon lam btab pa de yi bsod nams stobs/_/shin tu che'am min zhes tshad du brjod par dka'/_/zhing dang bsam pa dngos po dag pa dge chen du/_/gleng ba tsam las pha rol mthong ba 'ga' yang med/_96_/rnam [(*]byung ba 'gog pa/[) ]gzigs 
[\[496a.2\]]sangs rgyas mdun du sran rdog bdun gyis gtor/_/smon lam btab pas nga las nu gyur gtam de rdzun/_/yang na zhing dang bsam pa dag pa'i stobs dag ni/_/tshad med nges pas 'dir yang yid ches 'khrungs gyur cig_97_/[(*]gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa can/[) ]brjod pa gang la snying po mchog 
[\[496a.3\]]tu rab lci zhing*/_/gcad dang gzhig med de lta na yang drang srong phal/_/ngag gi nus pas sdang zhen phyogs su rgyug pa'i phyir/_/de las khyad par 'phags pa'i don 'di 'grub gyur cig_98_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]tshul 'di sngon byung dam pa rnams kyi spyod rjes su/_/'jug 
[\[496a.4\]]'dod gom pa bkod pa'i smon pa gang dag btab/_/rnam pa thams cad gang du 'phel ba'i mthun 'gyur glu/_/smon lam mtha' ru son pa kun gyis longs shig kye/_99_/[(*]srid pa min pa'i dpe/[) ]nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin zhig pa'i dum bu dang*/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis phye ba'i 
[\[496a.5\]]kun+da'i dga' tshal bzhin/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pas 'gro ba bslus pa'i 'phrin/_/srid pa min mthus smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig_100_/[(*]chos dpe gzugs can rab rtog rnams stobs mtshungs pa'i rab tu spel ba/[) ]gang zhig mthong na mi mthun dben pa sku yi bkra shis chu zhing gab pa rgyal mtshan lta bur ma bsnyal drang po 
[\[496a.6\]]nyid du brtan/_/'phro 'du 'od kyi rgyal pos rab dkrigs dbu yi gtsug tor mthon por 'khrungs pa'i tog gis legs mtshan yan lag mchog gi gdugs de mdzes/_/'dam las skyes pa dmar po'i lang tsho'i mtshar sdug 
[\[496a.7\]]thams cad phyag zhabs mthil du brkus pa'i mtshang ni 'khor lo'i rgya yis btab bam snyam/_/gzhom gzhig bral ba thub pa chen po'i bkra shis gsum gyis skye dgu thams cad rnam pa kun du bkra shis dpal gyis phyug par shog_101_/[(*]bsdus pa dang ma bsdus pa bsres pa'i gzugs can/[) ]dbyangs kyi 
[\[496b\]]
[\[496b.1\]]dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs med pa gsung gi bkra shis nyon mongs rims nad 'phrog la mngon phyogs skye ba lnga pa'i dbyangs su ldir/_/dge ba sum ldan chos kyi phung po 'dzad pa med pa'i sbrang rtsis rab myos glu yis 'bab stegs ro 'dzin pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs/_/legs par gsungs 
[\[496b.2\]]pa zab dang rgya che'i gtong pa thams cad rtag tu 'jo ba skyes bu chen po'i mgur gyi bum bzang zlum zhing rgyas/_/'gag med rtag par chos sgra 'byin pa'i bkra shis gsum gyis skye dgu thams cad rnam pa kun du bkra shis dpal gyis phyug par shog_102_/[(*]mchog gi nges bstan gzugs can dpe rgyan gsum gyi stong pa mtshungs pa'i rab tu spel ba/[) ]chos don ji lta ji snyed gzigs pa 
[\[496b.3\]]thugs kyi bkra shis nye bar mtshon byed dpal gyi be'u 'khyil brang gi ngos yangs 'od du 'bar/_/dus gsum dngos po phra rags yul gyi rgya mtsho kun du thogs pa med 'byo spyan gyi nya mo ba mchog rdzi 'dab bskyod la mkhas/_/nyin mor 
[\[496b.4\]]byed pas mkha' la bzhin du ye shes gzigs pa 'jig rten kun du rnam par mi rtog bgrod pa dus las yol ba med/_/sgrib pa mi mnga' gsal ler gzigs pa'i bkra shis gsum gyis skye dgu thams cad rnam pa kun du bkra shis dpal gyis phyug par shog_103_/ces pa dpal 
[\[496b.5\]]ldan rdo rje dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ma rab tu dgyes par bskyed pa'i gzhung lugs kyi tam+bu ra'i rgyud las nye bar 'phos pa'i 'khyog tshig gi lam nas nye bar drangs pa'i bsngo ba smon lam gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgya phrag gcig la gsum gyis nye bar lhag pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[496b.6\]]cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snying po'i gsos dam par yongs su bsngos zin to/_/slar yang smras pa/_dus [(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]gsum phyogs bcu'i rnam par 'dren/_/kun kyang dang por thugs mchog bskyed/_/de nyid nas brtsams lam thams cad/_/
[\[496b.7\]]bar chod med de smon lam mthu/_/[(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs can/[) ]de bzhin smon lam rgya mtsho'i mthar/_/son pa thams cad 'khor ba srid/_/sems can don chen rtag 'byung ba'i/_/yon tan rnams kyang de mthus so/_/[(*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[) ]deng yang byang 
[\[497a\]]
[\[497a.1\]]chub snying po'i mngal/_/'dzin 'dod rma bya'i rgyal mo 'ga'/_/dge ba'i sprin la mig gtod cing*/_/smon lam mgrin pa bsgyur ba yod/_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sgras zin pa'i dpe/[) ]ma byon dus kyi blo ldan yang*/_/mthong ba'i chos dang phyi ma'i bde/_/gegs med 'grub byed smon 
[\[497a.2\]]pa'i lam/_/grogs mchog bzhin du cis mi bsten/_/de [(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]bsams 'dir yang dge ba yi/_/myu gu bla med byang chub kyi/_/snye ma 'khrungs gyur de srid du/_/mi zad bsngo ba smon lam bgyis/_/thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi 
[\[497a.3\]]bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams 
[\[497a.4\]]pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa las/_brtsams pa don yod ched du dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba'i sarga ste brgyad pa'o//_//[(*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[) ]dpal dang ldan pa'i sdom brtson che ba'i lha/_/sde bzhi'i dpal gyi gdong pas rab mdzes pa/_/dge ba'i 
[\[497a.5\]]las bzang tshad du med pa bzhis/_/mngon par bskrun pa'i sa bdag tshangs pa che/_1_/[(*]mtshungs pa gsal byed kyi sgras zin pa'i dpe/[) ]gang des bla ma dkon mchog gsum bcas pa/_/skyabs su bsten don dgyes pa'i las bsgrubs pas/_/bla ma'i bka' las mi 'da' rA ma Na/_/brtan 
[\[497a.6\]]pa'i gtam rgyud mtshar la phrag dog go/_2_/mchog [(*]mdzes pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la sbyar ba/[) ]tu kha ba'i rdul brtsegs ri bo'i ljongs/_/dbyangs ldan mgrin pa la chags 'khyog po'i tshig_/smra ba mkhas dgu tshogs pa'i bsngags pas kyang*/_/brjod pa rtag tu 'phel 
[\[497a.7\]]pa'i ngo mtshar gzhi/_3_/[(*]yi ge ring por bskor ba'i rjes khri/[) ]che mchog bstan pa 'di la da sngan chad/_/cher rlom 'ga' yis brtsams pa lta zhog gi_/'thibs bu'i gnyid kyi rmi lam ltad mor yang*/_/nyams su myong ba med pa'i legs byas che/_4_/
[\[497b\]]
[\[497b.1\](*]mtha' dag gzugs can/[) ]gang 'di ji ltar bskrun las brtsams pa'i gtam/_/legs par bshad pa'i zla ba gsar pa gang*/_/mnyan 'dod rnams kyi ngo mtshar chu yi gter/_/'phel byed bstan pa'i mkha' la 'gros mdzes pa/_5_/[(*]don gsal/[) ]ston pa bstan pa skyong ba chos dag dang*/_/par du 
[\[497b.2\]]'grub byed bdag rkyen sgrub pa'i tshul/_/mtshan gyi phreng ba yongs bsngo dang bcas pa/_/bkra shis grangs su rdzogs pa'i sarga can/_6_/[(*]bya ba brjod pa thog ma'i gsal byed/[) ]mngon par brtsams so spros pa'i rtse mo min/_/ha cang bsdus pa'i mthar yang lhung ba med/_/thun 
[\[497b.3\]]mong skye bo'i blo dang rjes 'tsham par/_/dgos pa'i snye ma ma tshang med par ro/_7_/gzhan [(*]yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[) ]du de de'i khyad par phyogs re yang*/_/rdzogs par 'dri la rin chen 'byung gnas bzhis/_/legs sbyar tshos dang stong gsum rkang pas 'thung*/_/
[\[497b.4\]]'dri byed nyid du song yang rdzogs mtha' med/_8_/sngon [(*]rnam pa'i don/[) ]byung 'phags pa'i blo gros ldan pa dag_/'di dag don la dpyod tshe ba spu yi/_/'khri shing dus ma yin par g.yo ba'i phyag_/yan lag mchog tu sbyar ba cis ma byung*/_9_/[(*]'os pa'i cha rgyan/[) ]dam pa rnams dri yid la byas 
[\[497b.5\]]pa 'ga'/_/ched du ma gnyer spyan las dag byed ma/_/'khrungs de chos kyi phung po yod bzhin du/_/spangs pa'i 'gro la snying rje skyes par nges/_10_/tshul [(*]'bru mang po'i tshig sdud/[) ]'di brtags na rnyog ldan rdzing gi blor/_/skye ba'i ljon shing dbang che'i snyigs mas bsrubs/_/
[\[497b.6\]]de nang zla ba'i gzugs kyi shes bya dag_/'char 'dod mkha' yi re ba nges mod kyi/_11_/[(*]chos du ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan/[) ]bung ba'i rgyang glu mnyan 'dod nyi ma yis/_/'od zer brkyangs nas chu skyes kha phye zhing*/_/sbrang rtsi'i myos byed stob pa 'thung che bas/_/myos pa'i ca co ci dang ci ma 
[\[497b.7\]]bsgrags/_12_/[(*]dgongs pa can gyi rgyan/[) ]grags pa'i spring yig phyogs bral thos pa 'dzin/_/'god pa'i blo dang dman pa'i bsti gnas kyi/_/skyo ba min yang bzlog dka' gser gyi lung*/_/'bab stegs byas pa gang tshe ngas 'di brtsams/_13_/'on 
[\[498a\]]
[\[498a.1\]]te [(*]nges pa can gyi sbyar ba/_cung zad spros pa mkhas pa'i tshul/_/yin gyi nyi ma 'phul ba'i thabs ma yin/_/dgos pa chos dang dam pa'i drin gzo bar/_/yin gyi g.yar dga' rdzun gyi 'khor lo min/_14_/[(*]phan tshun med pa'i byed rgyu/[) ]sde bzhi'i dpal ni gces pa'i bus pa min/_/bcad lhug spel ma dga' 
[\[498a.2\]]ma'i lus ma yin/_/sgra don gab tshig lus phra'i do shal min/_/de phyir legs bshad rtsom pa bdag spro'o/_15_/lung [(*]dga' ba'i 'gyur ba sgeg pa'i nyams/[) ]dang rigs pa gnyis su 'brel che bas/_/yun ring sbyang bar 'os pa bya ba'i khur/_/thos pa nyung ngu ngas ni bde blag tu/_/
[\[498a.3\]]brtsams pa 'di yang 'dren mchog bla ma'i drin/_16_/[(*]ting nge 'dzin gyi rab rtog[) ]mdzub rtses shel gyi tam+bu rab bsnun pa'i/_/rab snyan tshig gi 'byung gnas dam ma de/_/'di na nges par mchis zhes yi ge'i tshogs/_/khong nas lan brgyar 'dzum pa yin nam snyam/_17_/[(*]mang ba'i dpe/[)]tshul 
[\[498a.4\]]'dir rnam par spros las byung ba yi/_/legs par bgyis pa zla ba'i 'khri shing dang*/_/mu tig ku mu dA yi mdangs 'dra de/_/dpal ldan bla ma mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul/_18_/[(*]gzugs can gyi rgyan las ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]sems can mos pa'i phra rab rdul gyi phreng ba rab brtsegs srid pa'i sa gzhi'i 
[\[498a.5\]]bla ma ru/_/dpal gyi 'byung gnas stobs bcu mnga' ba gang gi thugs rje gzhal du med par 'khrigs pa'i sprin/_/'bad rtsol mtshan ma nye bar zhi las chos kyi char rgyun ji snyed bab pa dge legs kyi/_/rin chen bye ba'i 'byung gnas nyid 
[\[498a.6\]]du legs par 'khyil 'di 'jig rten khams su gnas gyur cig_19_/de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don rnam par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi chad pa'i ngo 
[\[498a.7\]]mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las nye bar brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bod chen por grags pa'i 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa/_mtshungs 
[\[498b\]]
[\[498b.1\]]pa med pa'i stobs dang dge ba bcu dang rjes su mthun pa'i bka' khrims kyi 'khor los sgyur ba la bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i sde dge sa skyong bla ma chen po kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba'i bka' lung yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu/_phyogs kyi nor 'dzin 
[\[498b.2\]]skyong ba mang po'i gtsug na ngal bsor spyod pa snyam bgyid pa de nyid mgo bor bcings te bskul bar brten/_dzam+bu rkang 'thung gi rgyal mtshan dam pas mngon par spud pa'i gling gi rgyal po 'di'i khongs su/_ston pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[498b.3\]]'das kyi bstan pa rin po che yun du gnas pa'i bya ba rmad du byung ba/_'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang rtsom pa'i phrin las gzhal du ma mchis pa'i snang ba chen pos/_phyogs nas phyogs dang*/_khor yug nas khor yug tu dar bar byed pa la mtshungs zla 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa'i thugs rje 
[\[498b.4\]]chen po dang ldan pa ni dpal sa skya pa chen po yab sras brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams te/_gang de'i lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po bdag gir mdzad pa la 'jigs pa med pa'i mkhyen rab kyi dpal ni rgyal ba nyid las dmigs su ma mchis pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa'i 
[\[498b.5\]]skyes bu chen po/_rgya mtsho blo 'dzin nam rje btsun dam pa kun dga' bzang po zhes sa gsum gyi khongs su spobs pa rab tu dge ba'i grags pa dang rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las cig car du 'dres nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_de'i zhabs stegs mi 'jigs bzhi dang 
[\[498b.6\]]ldan pa'i rtags su seng ge chen po brgyad kyis rnam par bsgyings pa gang la zhabs kyi pad+ma rnam par bkod de/_de dag gis legs par bzhag pa'i bka' srol gyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun chen po/_srid pa'i zug rngu mtha' dag 'phrog par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gsang mdzod ma 
[\[498b.7\]]lus pa yongs su bzung nas/_mtha' med pa'i 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud la thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyi 'tsho ba brtan par byed pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu tshad mar gyur pa bdag cag gi skal bas thob pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_'jam pa'i dbyangs bsod nams bzang 
[\[499a\]]
[\[499a.1\]]po pa dang*/_rdo rje 'chang bkra shis lhun grub pa dang*/_rgya chen chos kyi spyan ldan tshul khrims lhun gyis grub pa dang*/_rdo rje 'dzin dbang nam mkha' bsam 'grub pa dang*/_thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dpal ldan chos skyong ba dang*/_mkhas btsun 
[\[499a.2\]]chen po mkhan chen sangs rgyas dpal bzang po dang*/_gzhan yang mdo sngags bstan pa'i snang byed chen po kun dga' lhun grub pa dang*/_gnas lnga rig par smra ba'i dbang phyug 'chi ba med pa thub bstan rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa sa'i steng na yongs 
[\[499a.3\]]su grags pa'i bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu mang po dag gi zhabs rdul rnyog pa med pa gtsug tu gus par bsten cing legs par gsungs pa bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po lta bu las/_rtswa mchog gi rtse mor chags pa'i zil pa tsam re 'thungs pas skal ba mi dman par gyur pa'i slob 
[\[499a.4\]]ma'i tha [{]chungs[,]chung[}]/_bstan pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i ming ni ban+de tshul khrims rin chen zhes 'bod cing*/_'byung du rung ba'i yon tan la smon lam du byed pa'i tha snyad ni ngag gi dbang po 'jigs bral phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha/_dbyangs can snyems pa'i lang tsho'i 
[\[499a.5\]]sde zhes btags pa'i snyom las pa des/_dngos gzhi chos tshan rnams kyi bzhugs byang dang [{]go rims kyi [,]go rim gyi [}]phreng ba rnams ni kun mkhyen bu ston rin po che'i dkar chag nyid gtso bor bzung nas/_dkyus dang bstun pa'i dbri bsnan la sogs pa'ang gang rigs bgyis 
[\[499a.6\]]shing*/_rgyud 'grel gyi bzhugs tshul la sogs pa cung zad re ni ngor chen rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i dkar chag dang yang legs par bstun no/_/sa dpyad gzhan bdun po rnams ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po mkhan chen dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[499a.7\]]dpal bzang po pa'i bka'i bkod pa dang*/_tho gsal ci rigs par phebs pa rnams yid la nges par byas te/_bka' dang bstan bcos rnams las byung ba'i lung don gtso bor bzung*/_blo dang ldan pa dga' bar byed pa'i lus dang*/_srog dang*/_rgyan gyi tshogs rnams 
[\[499b\]]
[\[499b.1\]]ni snyan dngags pa'i lugs kyi rjes su 'brangs te cung zad spros pa'i tshul gyis gsar bskrun gyi khul du/_rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i nang gses gyi gnam lo'i rgyal po/_gtsug lag spor thang gi dgongs pas dbang thang dang bstun pa'i tha snyad du chu mo phag ces 'bod pa/_bskal pa bzang 
[\[499b.2\]]po'i rnam 'dren bzhi pa shAkya'i rgyal pos tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du cho 'phrul bstan pa'i zla dus la bab pa'i dkar phyogs kyi gang ba gsum pa/_res gza' brda sprod rig pa smra ba'i blo ldan lha'i bla ma zhes bya ba/_rgyu skar rgyal gyi lha mos don thams cad 'grub pa'i dga' ston gsar pa 
[\[499b.3\]]la g.yar 'dren bgyid pa'i nyin mo nas 'dri ba'i 'go brtsams so/_/de nas bzung ste thun mtshams kun du 'bad pas 'dri ba'i zol du bgyis kyang*/_rang nyid 'byung tshogs kyi lus la phyi dang nang gi keg rtsis rtsub mo'i steng du son par bcas/_bar skabs rnams su lus kyi tshor ba bde sdug 
[\[499b.4\]]spel mar byung bas cung zad 'gyang bar gyur kyang*/_nam zhig yongs su grub par bgyis pa'i dus ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po rnam byung sa 'brug gi lo la 'jig rten gsum po bkra shis pa'i ltas kyis 
[\[499b.5\]]rgyas par bkang ste sku bltams pa nas brtsams te bgrang gzhi sum stong dang dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa lnga brgal lo/_/dpal sa skya pa kun dga' snying po pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sar+pa Ni bar srid kyi rnam pas lhums su zhugs shing chu pho spre'u'i lo la sku bltams pa nas lo drug brgya dang lngar 
[\[499b.6\]]phyin to/_/mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i dbang phyug ngor chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po pa nyid rnga chen zhes bya ba'i lo la bltams nas bgrang gzhi sum brgya dang drug cu rtsa gcig go_/shing sbrul gyi lo la skye ba nas skye bar rje btsun 'jam pa'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pas/_skye ba 'di nyid du 
[\[499b.7\]]gzhung lugs 'bum phrag mang po'i pha rol tu son cing smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po grub pa mkhan chen tshul khrims lhun grub bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po pa de nyid/_rje btsun e waM pa chen po'i zhabs stegs dam pa'i chos kyis mtho bar byas pa gang la rtsibs stong 'khor lo'i 
[\[500a\]]
[\[500a.1\]]gzugs kyis nye bar spud pa'i zhabs zung rnam par bkod de 'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i phrin las kyi snang ba dkar pos phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dkrigs pa nas brtsams te bgrang 
[\[500a.2\]]gzhi bcu dgu sngon du brgal lo/_/don grub ces bya ba'i lo la sdom brtson skye dgu'i bdag po kun dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes yongs su grags pa 'di nyid/_bsod nams dang stobs kyi dbang 
[\[500a.3\]]phyug tu gyur pa dpal sde dge gong ma'i bstan srid zung gi 'byor pas mngon par mtho ba'i gdan sa'i khri dam pa la/_zhabs mthil ban+d+hu dzI ba ka'i kha dog can dag mi 'gyur rdo rje'i khams kyi rang bzhin du rtag 
[\[500a.4\]]par bkod nas/_rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i bde skyid kyi nyi ma dang po shar ba nas brtsams te bgrang gzhi lnga phrag gcig sngon du brgal ba'i gsar tshes kyi gnam lo/_legs par sbyar 
[\[500a.5\]]ba'i skad du rak+tA k+Shi zhes pa/_bod skad du bsgyur na mig dmar du 'gyur ba/_ma hA tsi na'i mi bdag gi mdun sa chen por gya tsir brjod pa/_dbang thang dang bstun pa'i ming du shing byir grags pa'i 'byung 
[\[500b\]]
[\[500b.1\]]ba sum ldan/_se zhig gi lo/_dus 'khor ba'i ston rwa ba rags pa gro bzhin gyis nya ba/_yar ngo sngon du 'gro ba seng ge'i khyim/_hor lugs kyi bdun pa khyi'i zla ba/_dmar po'i phyogs kyi bzang po gsum pa/_dus 
[\[500b.2\]]'khor ba'i lugs kyi dbyangs U/_gsal byed b+hU/_'dod yon gzugs so/_/dbyangs 'char ba'i lugs kyi dbyangs I/_gsal byed D+ha/_'dod yon ro'o/_/gnyis ka mthun pa'i 'byung ba chu/_dar gud gzhon 
[\[500b.3\]]pa/_rten 'brel skye ba/_nyi ma 'brug_spar kha dwa/_sme ba drug dkar ro/_/lha'i bla ma rgyal sar phebs pa'i dga' ston gyi thog mar 'chi ba med pa'i drang srong chen po a gas+t+ya'i bden tshig gis grub pa'i nus pa ngom pa'i slad du/_
[\[500b.4\]]rgya mtsho dang*/_chu klung dang*/_chu phran dang*/_'bab chu dang*/_lu ma mtha' dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun du bsgyur ba'i mchod yon du stob pa dang chab cig_/skye 'gro thams cad kyi bro nad gzhom pa la 
[\[500b.5\]]rings par chas pa'i dus tshes dge ba'i nyin mo/_kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i lugs bzang gi nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su 'char ba'i ljongs dang yul dang yul gru chen po rnams kyi nang 
[\[501a\]]
[\[501a.1\]]nas 'dzam gling byang phyogs kyi 'dzin ma'i cha'o/_/de las kyang bod chen por grags pa'i sa'i thig le/_mkhas pa dang grub pa'i go sa mthon po la gang dag bzhugs pa'i 
[\[501a.2\]]bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi 'khor los legs par bcags shing*/_sde snod gsum gyi bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i 'khor los dus tshigs 'da' bar byed pa'i gdan sa chen 
[\[501a.3\]]po dpal lhun grub steng ge gan+d+ho la bsam 'grub mthong grol zhes bya ba ste/_de dang zung 'brel du yod pa'i rgyal khab chen po mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes yongs 
[\[501a.4\]]su grags pa de nyid yod de/_de'i nang gses su gyur pa'i bsti gnas dam pa phyogs kyi bdag po mig stong dang ldan pas legs par bsrungs pa'i phyogs ga la ba zhig ste/_de'i ba gam gnyis pa nyid 
[\[501a.5\]]du legs par grub par bgyis pa'i dge legs kyi snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ches shin tu gsal bar gyur cig_/sarba mang+ga laM b+ha wan+tu//_//
[\[501b\]]
[\[501b.1\]]@#/_/dzam+bUdrumenaling+gas+ya_sad+d+wIped+harmasarbadz+nya_prasAdab+hAskritANAMkiM_biSh+Nus+thAnenatul+yAn+ta//_
[\[501b.2\]]'dzam [(*]khyad 'phags phul du byung ba/[) ]bu rkang 'thung gis mtshan pa'i/_/gling gi dam par kun mkhyen chos/_/snang byas rnams kyi bka' drin mtha'/_/khyab 'jug gnas kyis gzhal du ci/_/
[\[502a\]]
[\[502a.1\]]chos [(*]yan lag gsum pa'i gzugs can/[) ]'dul khrims kyi rtsa ba brtan/_/gzhan phan spyod pa'i yal 'dab rdzogs/_/rim gnyis zung 'jug 'bras bus dud/_/dngos grub legs brnyes gang dag byon/_/[(*]ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]bzo 
[\[502a.2\]]dang gso ba'i gom stabs bde/_/sgra tshad rig pa'i mche ba rno/_/mdo rgyud gdams pa'i khur chen 'degs/_/rig smra'i khyu mchog ji snyed dang*/_/rnam [(*]yon tan rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]pa thams cad 
[\[502a.3\]]mkhyen pa'i bka'/_/'jig rten snang byed bla na med/_/yang dag mkhas pa'i phrin las gsum/_/dbang 'byor gang dag byon pa rnams/_/mkhyen [(*]gzhi gcig gi chos du ma 'gal ba/[) ]pas 'byor yang rmongs pas dbul/_/
[\[502a.4\]]brtse bas 'khyud kyang chags pas btang*/_/nus ldan gyur kyang gzhan dag la/_/'tshe med grub dbang brgyad cu bzhi/_/de dag [(*]yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]kun dang phyogs bcu yi/_/'gro la gzigs pa sgrib med 
[\[502a.5\]]spyan/_/dkyus ring spros pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sras dang slob mar bcas mang blta/_/[(*]rab rtog[) ]so so'i mdun na sprul pa'i lus/_/grangs med btud kyang yon tan cha/_/bgrang bar 
[\[502b\]]
[\[502b.1\]]ma nus yan lag lnga/_/dub pas sa la ngal bso bzhin/_/rang [(*]bsdus shing ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can/[) ]sems sgyu ma byed po gang*/_/skad cig rnam pa'i stang stabs kyis/_/rnam rtog bag chags brtan min pa'i/_/snang stong mchod pa'i mig 'phrul ngom/_/mchod [(*]rdzas rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]yon zhabs bsil me tog spos/_/
[\[502b.2\]]mar me dri chab zhal zas dang*/_/sgra snyan ma rnams rang rtags rdzas/_/bsnams shing sgyu ma'i rtse 'jos mchod/_/bdag lus longs spyod dus gsum dang*/_/'brel ba'i ge rtsa ji snyed dag_/sa gzhi ri gling nyi zla dang*/_/lha 
[\[502b.3\]]mi'i dpal 'byor tshang bar sprul/_/shes rab [(*] yan lag gnyis pa'i gzugs can/[) ]'khor lo'i 'khrul 'khor gyis/_/'khor gsum mngon par zhen pa'i gzebs/_/yongs su [(*]sbyor pa rgya che ba/[) ]dral te mchod 'os kun/_/dgyes par skyed pa'i yon du 'bul/_/dal [(*]bsdus pa'i gzugs can/_'byor rten mchog bsam 'phel 
[\[502b.4\]]nor/_/gti mug lag pa dbang mo ches/_/sdig ltung 'dam du bskyur byas pa/_/stobs bzhi tshad ldan chab kyis 'khrud/_/'phags [(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]dang so so skye tshogs kyis/_/legs byas zla 'od spros pa'i rjes/_/sems kyi kA 
[\[502b.5\]]shi mdzes dga' mo/_/yi rang grogs dang 'khyud pa thob/_/phyogs [(*]yan lag gcig pa'i gzugs/[) ]bcur bzhugs pa'i chos ston che/_/kun kyang 'gro la sman slad du/_/thog mtha' bar dge'i chos kyi sgra/_/'byin par ngag gi gling bus bskul/_/rtag par [(*]bya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa/[) ]'dzin rnams gdul 
[\[502b.6\]]ba'i phyir/_/chos dbyings bas mtha' tshol bzhed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba mgon med ngor/_/mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol/_/de ltar [(*]mang ba'i dpe/[) ]bgyis pa'i dge bas bdag_/yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam 
[\[502b.7\]]shing*/_/gter bzhin gdul bya'i bsam pa kun/_/rdzogs byed byang chub chen por bsngo/_/[(*]shis pa brjod pa la cha shas can gyi gzugs/[) ]gal te sngon bsags las shugs kyis/_/dbang byas re zhig byang chub mchog_/ster min de srid dal 'byor gyi/_/'dod 
[\[503a\]]
[\[503a.1\]]dgu'i ljon pa mchog gyur cig_/sems [(*]ldan pa'i gzugs can/[) ]kyi glang po 'dod lha yi/_/g.yo sgyu'i 'phrul la ma chags par/_/chos 'dul pad+ma'i skyed tshal du/_/bag yod rwa bar chud gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen [(*]rab rtog_pa'i rgyu yi gtso/[) ]/snying rje shin 
[\[503a.2\]]tu mnyen ldan gyis/_/'gro la lan brgyar dkris pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems mchog 'byang bar shog_/sngags spyod [(*]bsdus dang ma bsdus pa sres pa'i gzugs/[) ]gser gyi 'khor lo yis/_/cir snang lhan skyes ye shes kyi/_/'khor du bsdus nas rnam bzhi'i sku/_/zung 'jug 
[\[503a.3\]]rgyal sa zin par shog_/de brnyes [(*]cha shas can gyi gzugs/[) ]nas ni sku gsung thugs/_/sgyu 'phrul bkod pa dpag yas kyis/_/phyogs bcu'i gdul bya ma lus pa'i/_/chos rnga chen por bdag gyur cig_/de skad smon [(*]rgyu ma tshang ba'i khyad par brjod pa/[) ]bdag gsung rdo rje/_/mngon du gyur min bden 
[\[503a.4\]]tshig mtshon/_/grub pa min yang lhag bsam mthus/_/gang smras don med ma gyur cig_/nyi [(*]ngag don gyi dpe/[) ]bzhin ston pas 'jig rten brgyan/_/de yi 'od bzhin chos rab gsal/_/'dab brgya pas bzhin dpal 'thungs pa'i/_/bkra 
[\[503a.5\]]shis kun gyis dge gyur cig_/ces bla ma rdo rje gdan pa chen pos mdzad pa'i grub brnyes brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bstod pa'i kha 'gengs sam/_'di kho nas logs su bstod kyang rung ba la/_yan lag bdun pa gsol ba 'debs pa dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[503a.6\]]tshogs zung rgya mtsho 'phel ba'i zla 'od ces bya ba 'di'ang*/_/rje btsun nam mkha' dpal bzang ba'i bkas bskul ltar rnam grangs dge ba'i rten 'brel du btsun pa tshul khrims rin chen zhes bod pas lhun grub steng gi chos grwar bris pa dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig/_
[\[503a.7\]]slar yang dpal ldan sde dge khri chen pa/_/'jig rten kun du dga' ster dam pa de'i/_/phrin las rgya mtsho'i gos can mdzes phyir du/_/ngo mtshar yi ger 'khrungs pa'i par du bsgrubs/_/sarba mang+ga la b+ha wa tu//_//
